Ceru wa Abraham we' Davi myid: zo: Yesu Khristu byuxag' ngad: ra" .
Abraham wa Isag re- Isag wa Yaku re khau mung:- Yaku wa Yuda tao ho' re khau: ke' ra" .
Yuda myi: Tama mae" Pere we' Zera tao re khau: ra" . Pere wa Hezrum re khau: mung Hezrum wa- Aram re khau: ra" .
Aram wa Amminadab re- Amminadab wa Nashon re- Nashon wa Salmon re khau: ra" .
Salmon myi: Rahab kham: mae" Bua re khau: ra" . Bua myi: Rutha mae" Obed re khau mung:- Obed wa Yese re khau: ra" .
Yese wa Davi kho: kham re khau: ra" . Davi wa Uria yham sang myhi" mae" Sholamon re khau: ra" .
Sholamon wa Rehoboam re- Rehoboam wa Abiya re- Abiya wa Asab re khau mung: Asab wa Yehoshaphad re khau: ra" .
Yehoshaphad wa Yoram re- Yoram wa Uzia re- Uzia wa Yotham re khau: ra" .
Yotham wa Ahad re khau mung:- Ahad wa Hezekia re khau: ra" .
Hezekia wa Manashe re- Manashe wa- Amon re- Amon wa Yoshia re khau: ra" .
Babelon mung" khyo jeim kad' nae" taung" jhui" lo" ra" ayo, mae Yoshia wa Yehoiakhin tao ho' re khau: ra" .
Babelon mung" khyo jeim kad' nae" taung" jhui" lo" thao re Yehoiakhin wa Shealtie re- wa Zerubabela re- wa khau: ra" .
Zerubabela wa Abiud re- Abiud wa Eliakim re- Eliakim wa Azo re khau: ra" .
Azo wa Zadog re- Zadog wa Akhim re- Akhim wa Eliu re khau: ra" .
Eliu wa Eleaza re- Eleaza wa Mathan re- Mathan wa Yaku re khau: ra" .
Yaku wa Mari yham sang pho" Yoseb re khau: ra" . Mari wa Khristu ga: mhang" ra" Yesu yao: myhi" ngad: ra" .
Aimung: Abraham mae" Davi kho: kham pyad joe" sho' byuxag' daxe: byid xag'- Davi kho: kham mae" Babelon mung" khyo jeim kad' nae" taung" jhui" lo" ra" pyad joe" sho' byuxag' daxe: byid xag'- Babelon mung" khyo jeim kad' nae" taung" jhui" lo" ra" pyad mae" Meshia pyad joe" sho' byuxag' daxe: byid xag' ngad: ra" .
Ana" Yesu khau: li" ra" khyo wa ceru: ngad: ra" . Yao: myhi" Mari wa Yoseb: yang lo,xo' yu nae" mho' to" ra" . Yao: shid' zo: daga" mazam" na shi: re Mari wa Gyang"lho" Byo: yang gaung la" li" ra" .
Yao" yham sang pho" Yoseb wa din: man" ra" byu dayaug ngad mung: Mari re qho' maphyo' nhao nug yang: yao: re sae za: kao" pye' nae" myid: na: ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: cekhyo re myid qu" na: ra" au: Qu" wa,- Asang: Mug: Lagyo: dayaug yab mo, mae yao: re li" qhu" byid: mung:- Davi yao: zo: Yoseb we"- Mari re lo,xo' yu nae" dagyaug, wa,- pe"mung: ga"re yao: gaung la" li" ru wa Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang ngad: ra" .
Amung: yao: wa yauggai nau" khau: li" nae" ngad:- nao wa Yao: re Yesu ein: mhang" byid: zai ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa- yao" amyu" re yao: bam: qobo mae" khyad' yu: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ceru alhab' wa lapa: nhad' khyo" Asang ta" to" ra" dao: jab byang: li" nae" qhid' mae" boe" lo: ra" .
Ai: Lapa dao: wa Qu" wa,- Zomyi: gyang" dayaug wa gaung la" li" mung: yauggai nau" khau: li" nae" ngad:- yao: re Emanuela ga: mhang" li" genae" ngad: ra" . ( Emanuela ga" ru wa Mao" So ngonhaung" we' daga" na: ga" ru ngad: ra" . )
Yoseb yab: myhid' jo; rumae" so" li" mung:- Asang: Mug: Lagyo" yang Yao: re amyin" byid' ru we' dakhyo: kad' mung: Mari re lo,xo' yu: ra" .
Ngadqere: yauggai zo: re makhau khau wa Mari we' mazam" na ngad: ra" . Amung: Yoseb wa ai: yauggai zo: re Yesu ga: mhang" byid' ra" .
Ana"- Herod kho: kham ban: Yuda mung" mae" Betlehem vogaung: mae Yesu bin: khau: li" thao- Qu" wa, ba thug' shad' mae" pha,jhi" bo: ra" mo, Yerusalem khyo joe" ye: mung:-
Khau: li" va" Yuda kho: kham wa khotau mae ngad: ra" i? Ba thug' shad' mung"dan: mae yao" kyi re ngonhaung" the' myao yang: yao: re caung: pa" nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru ngad: ga: myid' ako" .
Herod kho: kham wa ai: dao: re the' gyo: lao"- yao: we' Yerusalem byu qe yaug khao: ngo" sang: gyo" kho" ako" .
Amung: Herod' kho: kham wa khinjaung qi: qe we' tung" pho" qere khai: zhang" yu mung: Meshia wa khotau mae khau: li" zai ngad: i? ga: yao: bam re myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa yao: re- Yuda mung" mae" Betlehem vogaung: mae khau: li" zai ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re lapa pho" yang ceru: tung" to" ra" .
Yuda mung" mae" Betlehem vogaung: we"- Nao wa Yuda mung" mae" vogaung: jham mae" ngai: thao" ra" mageim" vogaung: mangad:- Nga" amyu" Israel byumyu" re au: jhui" she nae" zug: wa nao mae" thug' li" zai ngad:- ga: bo: ra" ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" Herod wa pha,jhi" bo: ra" mo, re sae za: khai: yu mung: ai: kyi thug' li" ra" ayo, re jhaug' za: yao: bam mae" myid' yu mung: yang:-
Yao: wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" ye" lo" mung: ai: zoshao re nyang" za: yeqho ge,- naonhaung" ai zoshao re yeqho: myao gelao"- ngore: yao: re qo" goe; pa" nae" qhid' mae" ngore lodam: kyo: gela, ga: ta" mung: yao: bam re Betlehem khyo ye: nhao: ke' ra" .
Yao: bam wa kho: kham dao: re bin: gyo" yu lao" thug' ye" lo" ko" ra" . Alao" qu" wa- ba thug' shad' mae" mung"dan: mae yao: bam myao: ra" ai: kyi re yao: bam dam: myao lao" yao: bam wa matho' ta" lo: sho' gyai ngaui bau" ako" .
Ai: kyi wa yao: bam: qhid' au: mae ye" lo" mung:- ai: zoshao na: ra" jo, qo dao mae vang" vang" lo" thang: ra" .
Alao" Yao: bam yham khug khyo vao ye" lo" ko" re zoshao we' yao: myhi" Mari re yao: bam yemyao gelao" pad' thaug' thaug' mung: yao: re goe; pa" ko" ra" . Yao: bam: jo,nho" thaung phung" mung: yang: qhang- Lo: ban:- Mura: jhaung qhu" jham yao: re phoe' byid' ako" .
Herod kho: kham jhao" madam: tug' lo" nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa yao: bam re yab mo, mae ta" peim: byid' ra" . Amung: yao: bam wa- khyo gagau: khyo" yao: bam: mung" khyo dam: tug' lo" ako" .
Pha,jhi" bo: ra" mo, phao: lo" byaug gethao re- qu" wa,- Asang: Mug: Lagyo: dayaug yab mo, mae Yoseb jhao" thug' li" mung:- ai: zoshao ma: re jhui: mung: Egutu mung" khyo phao: ye: wa,- ngo nao re madam: khai khai wa aimae na: jo, wa,- pe"mung: ga"re Herod wa zoshao re se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" qho: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yoseb wa to" mung: yang: zoshao ma: re jhui: mung: myi" re Egutu mung" khyo phao: ye" lo" ra" . Amung: ai: mae Herod shid sho' yena: ra" .
Ceru wa- Nga" zo: re ngo Egutu mung" mae" khai: jhui" yu va"- ga: lapa: nhad' thoe khyo" ai: Asang ta" to" ru jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" boe" li" ru ngad: ra" .
Herod wa Pha,jhi" bo: ra" mo; yang yao: re mhug' pyag' to: co' vako" rure beim: lao" nhag' gyai yo" ra" . Amung: yao: wa pha,jhi" bo: ra" mo, mae" myid' yu: ra" ayo, re tau" qu" mung" Betlehem vogaung: mae" we' avai: ayae mae" vogaung: jham mae na: ra" shid' zin we' shid' zin: o mae" zoshao yauggai nau" qe alhab' re cao" se' pye' nhao: ra" .
Aimung:- Rama jo, qo mae gyai nhag' kaug' nhag' qhui: ru we' kaug' ngug: ra" thoe re the' gyo: va" . Rakhela wa yao: zo: qere ngug: na: ra" . Yao: zo: bam mana lo: gemung: yang: yao: re nhag' maqo" tang" byid: lo: ga:-
Lapa Yeremia yang ta" to" ra" dao: jab byang" lo: ra" .
Herod shid: byaug thao re Qu" ge,- Asang: mug: lagyo: dayaug wa Egutu mung" mae yab mo, mae Yoseb jhao" thug' li" mung:-
Yoseb re To" wa,- ai: zoshao ma: re jhui: mung: Israel mung" khyo dam: tug' lo" wa, Pe"mung: ga"re ai: zoshao re se' pye' nug: ra" mo, alhab' shid: byaug vako" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yoseb wa to" mung:- zoshao ma: re jhui: yang: Israel mung" khyo dam: tug' lo" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yuda mung" mae" Akelau wa yao: pho" Herod khu mae kho: kham kad' mung: eib: na: ga" rure Yoseb the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa ai: khyo vao ye: nae" gyaug: ra" . Alao" yab mo, mae Asang: mug: lagyo: wa yao: re ta" peim: byid: yang: Galile mung" khyo ye" lo" mung: Nazared ga: mang: ra" vogaung mae yena: ra" .
Airumung: yao: re Nazared Byu ga: mhang" li" genae" ga:- lapa qeyang ta" to" ra" dao: jab byang" lo: ra" .
Ai: ayo, mae qid nyhab' byid: yaug Yohan wa Yuda mung" mae" din"pyad' yo khyo joe" li" mung:-
Myid tha" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa jhao" li" na: ava"- ga: kho" kyo" na: ra" .
Yohan wa Lapa Esaia yang- Din" pyad' yo mae hug' na: ra" thoe wa Asang: khyo re nyhang" to: ge,- yao" khyo re din: za: nyhang" jhao" ge, ga: ta" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Amung: Yohan wa gola: u mug' yang qo; ra" mai bau: re ve, mung: sho: qid phyid' cui: cui" ci: ra" . Yao" zo: ve wa khyag' phaung" we' seyo: byoyhid ngad: ra" .
Yerusalem mae na: ra" mo,- Yuda mung" geim" mae" mo, we' Yodan gyaung: lhang" mae" mo,byu qe alhab' Yohan jhao" ye: mung:-
Yao: bam: qobo jham yelhang: yu: ru we' Yohan: lo, mae Yodan gyaung: mae qid nyhab' kham: yu: ako" .
Yohan wa Pharishe qe we' Saduke qe myo: sho' mo, qid nyhab' kham: yu nae" ga: li" ko" rure myao lao"- yao: bam re- Lhao maui amyu" qe we"- Joe" lo: na: ra" Mao" So nhag' yo" rumae" qo" phao: loe, nae" naonhaung" re khag' yang li" ta" peim: byid: ko" i?
Amung: myid tha" ru we' man: qi" ra" ashi: zaui: ge,-
Abraham wa naonhaung" yao: pho" ngad: ein: naonhaung" yao: yao" aung khug mae damyid: lam: na ge,- ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- Mao" So wa ce: laug baui jham mae" Abraham qhid' mae" yao: zo: qe re qo" phan" thug' ke' ra" .
Ana" yao: lhao" sag' gae jham re apan mae" thau: pye' nae" qhid' mae" vozaung: wa jin" jin" ngad: ava" . Airu: mung: ashi: gai mazaui" ra" sag' gae khao: ngo" re thau: lhang" ke' mung: myi: khyeim" khug khyo pye' zaui: ke' ra" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" myid tha" va" ga" ru qhid' mae" naonhaung" re qid mae qid nyhab' byid' ra" . Ngadqere: nga" thao mae joe" li" nae" ra" yaug wa naonhaung" re Gyang" lho" Byo mae re:- myi: mae re: qid nyhab' li" byid' li" nae" . Yao: wa ngo tho' qam: so' je: bo yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao" lo, mae gaug khyo" nae" qhid' mae" gaug khyo" gaung: zhab' ci: ra" . Amung: yao: wa gaug nao: jao: mae" gaug bam re vhag' kyang" pye' mung yang: gaug mo jham re wa yao" gaug jhi khug mae gag: zhang: ke' to" li" nae" . Gaug seim jham re kam" wa matho' se' ra" myi: khyeim" mae ngha" pye' li" nae"- ga: kho" kyo" ra" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa Yohan lo, mae qid nyhab' kham: yu nae" qhid' mae" Galile mung" mae" Yodan gyaung: khyo Yohan jhao" joe" lo: ra" .
Ngadqere: Yohan wa Ngo yaug; ni" lo, mae qid nyhab' kham: yu ca" yaug angad: ru nao lam: ngojhao" ali" i? ga: ta" mung: Yesu re lham: tam" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: re tau: mung:- ana" wa ngore qid nyhab' kham: byid: la,- pe"mung: ga"re ceru: kad' ru wa nyhao: shid' zo: Mao" So myid o: ra" mau" zo" alhab' re zaui" pyang" ru ngad nae" ga:- ta" ra" . Alao" Yohan wa gai: ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu qid nyhab' bin: kham: yu we' qid mae" thug' lo: na: au:- qu" wa, mung: gaung go; bung" li" mung: Mao" So: Byo wa phaung" kyug' ru: dao" gyo" li" mung: Yesu dao mae li" no" rure yao: myao: ra" .
Ai: thao re- ceyaug, wa ngo jhid' de; ra" nga" zo: ngad: Yao: re ngo o ngaui: ra" ga: mug: gaung mae" thoe jhau: thug' li" ra" .
Ai: thao re yui: yang ju" phyo' ru qhug' vashao: ga: Gyang" Lho" Byo wa Yesu re din"pyad' yo khyo jhui" vao ye" ra" .
Byid xe myi byid xe ba zo: ve jao" thao re- Yesu wa vae: moe' ra" .
Alao" yui wa Yesu jhao" li" mung: Nao Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ngad: re wa ce: laug baui jham re mug boe" li" geshao: amyin" byid: wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa tau: mung:- Byu wa zo: ve: yang za: kao so' qo" daui: na: ru mangad:- Mao" So: nhad' mae thug' li" ra" dao: thoe: yang za: kao so' qo" daui: na nae" ngad: ra" ga: jham: mugsug' mae tung" to" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yui wa Yesu re gyang" lho" ra" vogaung: mo" Yerusalem khyo jhui" lo mung: Caung: pa" Yham mae" khaung nho thao mae yhe' to: mung:
Yesu re Nao Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ngad: re wa mho: khyo byae: gyo" lo" wa,- pe"mung: ga"re jham: mugsug' mae Mao" So wa nao re lhaug' zaung" byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mug: Lagyo: jham re amyin" byid: mung: yao: bam wa- laug baui dao ni" khyid lhao" mathaung" cad' vashao:- Yao: bam: lo; yang: lham: vo; yu: li" genae" ga: tung" to" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- ai: Asang ni" Mao" So re nao magai: jham" qu" nae" ga: re: tung" to" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai mae" yui wa Yesu re gyai myhao: ra" bam khyo jhui" do, lo" mung: myid gaung dao mae" mung"dan: alhab' we' ai: mung"dan: jham: phung qab bao re ceim" shid' mung:-
Nao Ngo re goe; pa" ngad: re wa cegu: alhab' ngo nao re byid: nae" ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa tau:- mung: Satan we"- thug' lo" wa,- Asang ni" Mao" So re za: nao goe; pa" mung: Yao: re za: caung da" nae" ngad: ra" ga: jham: mugsug' mae atung" to" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yui wa Yesu mae" thug' lo" byaug: ra" . Ai: thao re mug: lagyo: jham li" caung da" byid' ako" .
Yesu wa Yohan re thaung: taung" lhaung" pye' va" ga" rure the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa Galile mug: khyo thug' ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: wa Nazared mae maye: na lo: Zebulun we' Nabhtali mug: gyo:- Galile tham: yae mae" Kapena-um vogaung: mae yena: ra" .
Ceru: kad' ru wa Lapa Esaia ta" to" ra" dao: jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Lapa Esaia wa Zebulun we' Nabhtali mug:- Yodan gyaung: thoete' Galile tham: khyo- joe" ra" khyo cao" yang: taung bug qe na: ra" mug: Galile we"-
Mug: cad' mae na: ra" mo, wa bo" bao qi: re the' myao: li" genae"- Amung: shid: ra" mug: cad' khug mae na: ra" mo; dao mae ai: bo" bao wa bao: li" nae" ga: ta" to" ra" .
Ai: au: mae" Yesu wa Naonhaung" myid tha" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa jhao" li" na va"- ga: yao" mungdao: re kho" kyo" ra" .
Yesu wa Galile tham: yae cao" yang: su" lo" na: au:- ngo: kung" zo: byu ngad: ra" Petru ga: mang: ra" Simon we' yao: nhaung: Andre tao wa tham: mae geim pye' na: ko" rure yao: myao: ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: tao re Nga" thao cao" ge,- ngo ni" shid' tao re byu kung" byu boe" nhao nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: shid' tao wa geim jham re to" pye' co' mung: yao: jhao" cao" ako" .
Yesu wa aitau mae" dam: su" ye" lo" re gatau danhae tao ngad: ra" Zebede yao: zo: Yaku we' yao: nhaung: Yohan tao re myao: ra"- yao: tao wa lha dao mae yao: pho" Zebede we' daga"- yao: bam: geim jham re pho: na: ako" . Yesu wa yao: shid' tao re yao" thao cao" nae" qhid' mae" khai: ke' ra" .
Ailao" jao" yao: shid' tao wa lha we' yao: pho" re to: co' mung: yao: jhao" cao" ako" .
Amung: Yesu wa Galile mung" geim" jao: sho' du" qin" mung: Tarha" Jung Yham jham mae mho" shid' byid' ra" . Mung"dan: ra" Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai re kho" kyo: mung:- no phyo: aja: ja: qhug' ra" mo, re we' no aja: ja: de; ra" mo, byu qere gai byid' ra" .
Yao" khyo re Suri mung" geim" jao: sho' hau" nhao" lo" ko" ruyang mo, byu qe wa no phyo: qhug' ra" mo,- no aja: ja: de, ra" mo,- khai" nho mo,- yui zaung mo,- ngho' be, mo,- gaung ajam: shid mo, re yao: jhao" jhui" li" ako" . Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam: no re gai byid' ra" .
Alao" Galile" mung"- Dekapoli mung"- Yerusalem Yuda mung" we' Yodan gyaung: thoete' mae" byu phung: mo" Yesu thao cao" ako" .
Yesu wa byu phung: mo" re myao lao" bug gaung dalam: dao khyo do, ye" lo" ra" . Yao: yezaung: jo, lao" Yao" mho"zo: qe wa yao: jhao" zang" lo: ako" .
Alao" yao: wa dao: phung" mung: yao: bam re mho" shid' ru wa-
Byo mae myaung sho: beim" ra" mo, wa- ngaui lho" ko" ra"- Pe"mung: ga"re mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa yao: bam: mung"dan: ngad: ra" .
Kaug' qhui: ra" mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa yao: bam re nhag' tang" byid' li" nae" .
Nhag' lam: nau" nhae" ra" mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa Mao" So: dao: so: to" ra" shaman" jeju re yao: bam qo" khae: yu genae" .
Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo re phug' cao" nae" moe, shab' ra" mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- Pe"mung: ga"re- Mao" So wa yao: bam re nhag' dag nhao: li" nae" .
Nhag' ba: khyag' ra" mo, wa- ngaui lho" ko" ra"- Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa yao: bam re nhag' khyag' yu: li" nae" .
Nhag' lam: san sin" mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa- Mao" So re qhug' myao: li" genae" .
Mang: dae ba: tae" ra" mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam re Mao" So: yao: zo: qe ga: mhang" li" genae" .
Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo re phug' cao" yang: yhin" ru qhug' ra" mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- Pe"mung: ga: re Mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa yao: bam: mung"dan: ngad: ra" .
Nga" mathao: yang byu qe wa naonhaung" re maphug' makhyad' kad' ru we' yhin" mung: madang: ra" khyo" qobo vhin mung: ta" gelao"- naonhaung" wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"-
Ngaui bau: ngaui lho" na ge,- pe"mung: ga"re mug: gaung: mung"dan: mae naonhaung" aphug' jhaung qhu" wa gyai qi" ra" . Naonhaung" qhid' au: mae" lapa qere re: yao: bam airu: za: yhin" avako" .
Naonhaung" wa myid gaung: dao: xo: ngad: ako" . Ngadqere: xo: wa ngae: ra" ru shao" byaug lao" ai: xo: re dam: ngae sho' magai: kad' yu lo: ngad: ra" . Ai: xo: wa pe" akyu" mabo loyang: taung gaung khyo shapye' pye' mung: byu jham zab: nhae" pye' ko" ra" .
Naonhaung" wa mug: myid: bo" bao ngad: ako"- Bug gaung dao mae te" to" ra" vogaung: re maqo" go: to: ngad: ra" .
Myikaug' re te' mung: ban" yang mamaug: lhaung" to" qu"- Yham khug mae na: ra" mo, alhab' re bao byid: nae" qhid' mae myikaug' tao" dao mae lhaung" zhaung: to" ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo: byu jham wa naonhaung" kad' ra" gai: ra" mau" zo" jham re the' myao mung: mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" naonhaung" Pho" re caung: khin" byid: vageshao: naonhaung" bo" bao re byu jham: qhid' kheim: mae bao byid' to: ge,-
Kham" to" ra" Tarha" we' Lapa qe: dao: jham re qab: pye' nae" qhid' mae" ngo joe" li" ru ngad: ein: naonhaung" dajho ge,- aijham re qab: pye' nae" ein: ngo joe" li" ru mangad: . Jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" ngo joe" li" ru ngad: .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang dang ta" geli"- Mug: gaung we' myid gaung malai: lo" shire ta" to" ra" gu: alhab' majab byang" byang" wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" dao: mae" tung" ce' dace' we' myo, dace' lhao" malai: lo" nae" .
Airu: mung: khag' ngadqere: ai: ngai: thao" ra" amyin" dao: re yao: shad' lhoe" mung: su gaje qere airu: shad' lhoe" nae" mho" byid' ra" yaug wa- Mug: gaung: mung"dan: mae ngai thao" yaug ngad: li" nae" . Ngadqere: ai: amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" mung: su gaje qere airu: phug' cao" nae" mho" byid' ra" yaug wa mug: gaung: mung"dan: mae qi" thao" yaug boe" nae" ngad: ra" .
Amung: Ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo" phug' cao" rumae Pharishe qe we' tung" pho" qe tho' naonhaung" maje qere wa mug: gaung: mung"dan: khyo maqo" vao ye: genae" .
Byu dase'- Byu se' ra" yaug wa dao: kho' ru qhug' ca" nae" ga: daba: pyad mae" mo, ta" to" ra" dao: naonhaung" the' gyo" avako" .
Ngadqere: ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa yao: mao: yao: nhaung: re nhag' yo" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: dao: kho' ru qhug' ca" nae" . Yao: mao: yao: nhaung: re byugao: ga: ta" ra" yaug wa tarha" yung" mae dao: phyid' ru qhug' ca" nae"- amung: yao: mao: yao: nhaung: re ago ga: shad' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: myiqid tham: khyo pye' zaui: ke' ru qhug' li" nae" .
Amung: nao wa phan dao mae Mao" So re xeim: ngaui" byid: nae" seim" na: au:- ni" mao: nhaung: dayaug yaug nao re nhag' mashid qobo vhin: to" ru daja: ja: re myid: beim" ke' lao"-
Ai: xeim: re shi" to: co' mung: lo" yang: ni" mao: nhaung: pho" we' shi" mang: dae sho' lo" kad' wa,- Bin lao" dam: tug' lo mung: ni" xeim: Mao" So re lo: ngaui" byid: wa, .
Nao re qobo zhaug' yaug we' daga" tarha" yung" khyo ye" lo" na: au:- tarha" yung" khyo majoe" shi: re yao: we' jho" vang" sho' phyad kad' yu wa, . Nao airu: makad' lao" yao: wa nao re tarha" zug: pho" lo, khug khyo ab byid' pye' li" nae" . Alao" tarha" zug: pho" wa nao re gug: gam pho" lo, khyo ab byid' pye' mung: nao re thaung: khug mae lhaung" to" li" nae" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang dang ta" geli"- nao khyug' ca" ra" ngaui alhab' mabin: khyug' khyug' wa thaung: mae" nao qo" thug' lo nae" mangad: .
Su: myi: su: lao dashad' wa,- ga: ta" to" ra" dao: re naonhaung" gyo" qu" vako" ra" .
Ngadqere:- ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa nhag' lam" yang qu" sang yu nug: ra" khyo" myiqe: re qu" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao" nhag' lam: mae ai: myiqe: re shad' yaug ngad: ra" .
Amung: ni" lo, yo shad' myo,jid' yang nao re qobo kad' nhao: ngad: re wa ai: myo,jid' re thad' shalhaui" pye' wa,- pe"mung: ga"re ni" gaung geim" myiqid tham: khyo gyo" lo" nae" tho' ni" gaung mae" dadau qeim: byaug: ru wa je: gai shi" ra" .
Ni" lo, yo lo; yang nao re qobo kad' nhao: ngad: re wa ai: lo, re qam" phyid' pye' wa,- pe"mung: ga"re ni" gaung geim" myiqid tham: khyo gyo" lo" nae" tho' ni" gaung dadau qeim: byaug: ru wa ni" qhid' mae" je: gai shi" ra" .
Alao"- yao" yham sang myhi" re kao" pye' nug yaug wa yao" yham sang myhi" re kao: mugsug' tung" byid' ke' ca"- ga" ra" dao: jo, gau ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa yao" yham sang myhi" re yug: qho yang: mangad: lo: kao" pye' mung: ai: myiqe: wa gatau dayaug we' dam: lo, xo' yu: ngad: re wa yao: wa yao" yham sang myhi" re lao shad' nhao: ra" qobo qo" ra" . Alao" ai: myiqe: re dam: lo, xo' yu: ra" yaug re: su: myi: lhad' yaug ngad: ra" .
Nao to" ra" dao: so: re daphyo' wa,- Mao" So re byid' to" ra" ni" dao: so: re zaui" pyang" wa,- ga: daba: mae" mo, re ta" to" ra" dao: re naonhaung" gyo" qu" vako" ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa- naonhaung" dao: so: dalam: lam: to" ra" au: mug: gaung re lao: yang: jham datang" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re mug: gaung wa Mao" So: zaung tao ngad: ra" .
Myid gaung re lao: yang: re: jham datang: ge,- Myid gaung wa Mao" So: khyid nao: jo, qo ngad: ra" . Yerusalem re lao: yang: re: jham datang: ge,- Yerusalem wa kho: kham mo" na: ra" vogaung: ngad: ra" .
Alao" yao: yao" au: re lao: yang: re: jham datang: ge,- pe"mung: ga"re Naonhaung" wa xae dakhe' re za: lhao" phyu sho' no, sho' maqo" kad' gengad: ra" .
Airumung:- naonhaung" dao: wa- ngad lao" wa ngad va" ein: mangad: lao" wa mangad: ein: za: ta" ge,- aimae" je: ra" naonhaung" ta" ra" dao: wa makhyang" ra" yaug mae" lo: ra" dao: ngad: ra" .
Myo,jid' qhid' mae" myo,jid'- zaui qhid' mae" zaui dam: tug' ca" ga" ra" dao: re naonhaung" gyo" qu" vako" ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa- Nao re magai kad' ra" yaug re lage, daphaug' wa- Ni" lo, yo shad' boqae pyo' yaug re lo, kaung: shad' rere: pyo' nhao shi: wa-
Ni" akhug: bau: re yu nug yang: yung" zaung: ra" yaug re ni" bau: qhang rere: yu: lo" nhao shi: wa,-
Nao re maqad maqui" deim" zag mung: khyo daman: qovin ye: nhao: yaug we' khyo shid' man: ye: shi: wa .
Nao jhao" mho' yaug re byid: wa,- nao jhao" daja: ja: jhid' ngho: nug yaug re jhid' ngho: byid: wa,-
Ni" Ba nam sang: cao: qere jhid' de; wa,- ni" gye jham re nghang: wa, ga" ra" dao: re naonhaung" gyo" qu" avako" .
Ngadqere: ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa naonhaung" re yhin" ra" mo; qhid' mae" akyu" mho' byid: ge, .
Airulao" naonhaung" wa mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" yao: Pho" zo: dau qe boe" genae" . Pe"mung: ga"re magai: ra" mo, we' gai: ra" mo; dao mae dakhyo: za: Mao" So wa ba zho byid' ru we' din: man" ra" khyo kad' mo, we' madin: man" ra" khyo kad' ra" mo; dao mae mug: qu byid' ra" .
Naonhaung" re jhid' de; ra" mo, re za: naonhaung" jhid' de; ko" re wa- Mao" So mae" pe" jhaung qhu" qo" yu genae" i? Khang: khyui zo: mo, lhao" re: airu: kad' ko" ra" .
Amung: naonhaung" wa- mao: nhaung: qe we' za: jho" jhau zam" khug ko" ngad: re wa- gaje tho' nao kad' ru pe" je: i? Taung bug qere: ai we' dakhyo: kad' ako" .
Amung: mug: gaung dao mae" naonhaung" Pho" wa jab byang" ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" re: jab byang" na ge, .
Amung: su the' myao vageshao: ein:- mo, byu qe myo: sho' qhid' kheim: mae naonhaung" lalam lakhug: mau" zo" jham re mazaui: nae" qhid' mae lha" ge,- Airu: mangad: re mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" naonhaung" yao: Pho" mae" pe" shaman" jeju re: maqo" yu genae" .
Amung: nao wa qo ca" ra" mo, re aung lam alu: byid' ngad: re- su: yang caung: khin" geshao: ein:- tarha" jung yham jham mae we' hau" mo" khyodang khaung: mae geim kad' ra" mo, kad' ru we' dakhyo: labo" mad nhao yang: dahau: wa,- ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa yao: bam wa yao: bam o: ra" jhaung qhu" qo" yu: avako" .
Ngadqere: qo ca" mo, re naonhaung" aung lam alu: byid: ko" re- ni" lo, yo lo, kad' ra" mau" zo" re ni" lo, kaung: lo, re daba nhao wa, .
Alao" ni" aung lam alu: byid' ra" khyo wa anyham: avho' mae kad' ru ngad nae" . Amung: anyham: avho' kad' rure myao: ra" ni" Pho" wa nao re jhaung qhu" byid' li" nae" .
Amung: naonhaung" akyu" mho' gelao"- geim kad' ra" mo, we' dakhyo: dakad' ge, Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa su alhab' yao: bam re the' myao vageshao: ga:- tarha" jung yham jham mae we' hau" mo" khyokao: jham mae ye; jo, yang: akyu" mho' nug mo, ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" kam" wa akyu" mho' gelao"- kug qe, khyo vao lo" mung: kham: pyid' yang: myo, yang mamyao: ra" naonhaung" yao: Pho" re akyu" mho' ge, . Alao" anyham: avho' mae kad' rure myao: ra" naonhaung" yao: Pho" wa naonhaung" re shaman" jeju byid' li" nae" .
Amung: naonhaung" akyu" mho' gelao" taung bug qe kad' ru we' dakhyo: lajheim: mabo ra" dao: jham re daci ge,- Taung bug qe wa akyu" qhang sho' mho' ruyang yao: bam akyu" mho' dao: re tae" gyo: byid' li" nae" ga: myid: jho: ako" .
Ai bam ru: dakad' ge,- pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" mamho' shi: gamae" naonhaung" qo: ra" ja: alhab' re naonhaung" yao: Pho" wa ba: to: gau ngad: ra" .
Airu: mung: naonhaung" akyu" mho' gelao"- ceru: mho' ge,- Mug: gaung dao mae" ngonhaung" Pho" we"- Ni" gyang" lho" ra" mang A re phug' myao: vageshao:-
Ni" mung"dan: joe" lo vashao:- Mug: gaung dao mae ni" nhag' dag: ru we' dakhyo: myid gaung: dao mae re: dag: lo vashao wo"-
Ngonhaung" qo: ra" zo: ve ana" ba ngonhaung" re byid: la,-
Ngonhaung" re shad' ra" mo; qobo re ngonhaung" khyad' byid' ru we' dakhyo: ngonhaung" qobo rere: khyad' byid: la,-
Ju" phyo' ra" khyo ngonhaung" re maye: nhao lo: makhyang: yaug: lo, mae" ngonhaung" re khyad' yu la, wo"-
Naonhaung" re shad' ra mo; qobo re naonhaung" khyad' byid: ko" ngad: re mug: gaung: dao mae na: ra" naonhaung" Pho" re: naonhaung" qobo re khyad' byid' li" nae" .
Naonhaung" re shad' ra" mo; qobo re naonhaung" makhyad' byid: ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" Pho" wa naonhaung" qobo rere: makhyad' byid: nae" .
Amung: naonhaung" zo: ve jao" gelao"- geim kad' mo, we' dakhyo: myo, nho asham zang dakad' ci ge,- yao: bam wa yao: bam zo: ve jao" na: ra" khyo re su alhab' the' myao vageshao: ga: yao: bam: ave, re lhai" pye' ako"- naonhaung" re ngo ta" gali" Yao: bam wa yao: bam o: ra" aphug' jhaung qhu" re qo" yu: avako" .
Naonhaung" zo: ve jao" gelao" myo,jid' yang mamyao: ra" naonhaung" Pho" mae" lai yang: naonhaung" zo: ve jao" na: rure khag' maqo" ba genae" qhid' mae" myo, cid' mung: au: xau gyad yang: kyo' shaung: pye' ge, .
Anyham: avho' kad' rure myao: ra" naonhaung" Pho" wa- naonhaung" re shaman" jeju byid' li" nae" .
Nhug we' zu: yang qo" zo" qheim" pye' mung: khug' mo, kyaung" thad' vao ye: yang: qo" khug' yu: ra" ce: myid gaung dao mae Naonhaung" jo,nho" jham re naonhaung" qhid' mae" daqaung" to: ge,-
Ai: atha" nhug we' zu: yang maqo" zo" qheim" ru we' khug' mo, re: maqo" kyaung" vao ye: maqo" khug' yu: ra" mug: gaung dao mae naonhaung" jo,nho" jham re naonhaung" qhid' mae" qaung" to: ge, .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" jo,nho" jo; ra" tau mae naonhaung" nhag' lam: taui" jo, li" genae" .
Amung: ai: myo,jid' wa- gaung khyao qhid mae" myi: baung: ru" ru ngad: ra" . Ai: ni" myo, jid' qang: qang: za: ngad: re wa ni" gaung geim" bao: jo; li" nae" .
Ngadqere: ni" myo,jid' mae athab zang ngad: re wa- ni" gaung wa cad' jo; li" nae" . Airu: mung: ni" bo" bao wa mug: cad' boe" byaug: re wa ai: mug: cad' wa khoqhi" no, sang: kyid ngad: nae" i? .
Khag' ngadqere: asang shid' yaug: jeim qo" kad' nae" mangad:- yao: wa asang dayaug re nghang: mung: dayaug re jhid' de; li" nae" . Asang dayaug re gyaug phug' mung:- gatau dayaug re maphug' makhyad' kad' li" nae" . Amung: naonhaung" wa Mao" So re we' ngaui qhang jo,nho" re daga" za: qo" caung da" byid: genae" mangad: .
Aimung: ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa- Pe" zo: pe" shaug' nae" laug ein: kao so' qhid' mae" Pe" ve, nae" laug ein: gaung khyao qhid' mae" naonhaung" damyid: ci" ge, Ai: kao so' wa zo: ve tho'- gaung khyao wa ve, mai ve, bau tho' je: akhyag: mangad: i?
Mug: phyo: mae dao" qin" ra" ngho' jham re qu" qu" ge,- yao: bam wa myug: shi: re masin: maqho:- yad re: mayad: yu- jhi mae re: maqaung" to: gengad: ra" . Ngadqere: mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" naonhaung" Pho" wa yao: bam re zho" na: ra" . Naonhaung" wa ngho' jham tho' myo: sho' je: phug' de, ko" mangad: i?
Naonhaung" mae" khag' ngadqere: myid: ci" ruyang yao: yao" kao re dadaung" je: qo" qhang nhao ko" i?
Naonhaung" wa pe"mung yang:- ve,mai ve,bau: qhid' mae" myid: ci" ko" i? Pa: din" mae" seyo: bin: gae jham khoru: yaug: qi" li" ko" rure myid: qu" ge, . Yao: bam wa mau" re: mazaui:- jid: re: manai: ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo naonhaung" re ta" kyo: geli" . Phung qab bao qi" ru we' gyai qo" ra" Sholamon kho: kham lhao" re: ai: bin: gae jham mae" dagae ru: yaung" sho' maqo" shaung ve; ngad: ra" .
Mao" So re lam khug: ra" myid ngai: ra" mo, we"- ana" ba yaug: jo, mung: ne, mo" ba myi: khyeim" mae ngha" pye' ra" seyo mae" myo, gae jham re Mao" So shaung vhe' byid' ra" . Yao: wa naonhaung" re je yang: vhe' byid' li" nae" mangad: i?
Airu: mung: naonhaung" wa- myid: ci" yang: pe" zo: pe" shaug' zai laug ein: data" ge, .
Pe"mung: ga"re taung bug qe wa- ai: gu: alhab' qhid' mae" myid: ci" yang: qho: ako" . Mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" naonhaung" Pho" wa ai: gu: alhab' naonhaung" qo ca" na ko" rure ba gau ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" kam" wa- Mao" So: mung"dan: we' yao: myid o: ra" khyo re sao qhid' qho ge, . Alao" yao: wa ai gatau qo ca" ra" gu: alhab' rere: naonhaung" re byid' li" nae" .
Airu: mung: ne, mo" ba: qhid' mae" damyid: ci" ge,- Ne, mo" ba wa yao" qhid' mae" myid: ci" li" nae"- ana" ba qug: khai" ru wa ana" ba: qhid' mae" ga" va" ra" .
Su re dao: dakho' ge,- ailao" za: Mao" So wa naonhaung" re dao: makho' nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" su re dao: kho' ra" au: ci: ra" jao dang re Mao" So ci: li" nae" .
Yao: yao" myo,jid' mae bo: ra" sag' thaung: re bo thoe magyo: lo: ni" mao: nhaung: pho" myo,jid' mae" sag' je, re pe"mung: qu" i?
Ni" myo,jid' mae sag' thaung: bo: jo, zang ni" mao: nhaung: pho" re ni" myo,jid' mae" myo, vao sag' je, re yu: pye' byid: li" ein: nao khoru: mung: vae" ta" i?
Geim kad' yaug we"- ni" myo,jid' mae bo: ra" sag' je; re shi" sao qhid' yu: pye' wa,- ailao" za: ni" mao: nhaung: pho" myo,jid' mae bo: ra" myo, vao bodan re nyang" za: nao myao mung: qo" yu: pye' byid' li" nae" .
Gyang" lho" ra" zai re lakha: jham re dabyid: ge, Airu: kad' lao" naonhaung" re dam: tug' bin" li" nae" . Amung: naonhaung" palhe" qui: re vo, jham: qhid' kheim: mae dashapye' to: ge,- Airu: kad' lao" vo, jham wa ai: palhe" qui: jham re khyid: yang zab: nhae" pye' li" genae" .
Mho' ge,- alao" naonhaung" qo" yu genae"- Qho ge,- alao" naonhaung" myao genae"- Kham: ko' ge, alao" naonhaung" re kham: phung" byid' li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re mho' ra" yaug wa qo" yu: li" nae"- Qho: ra" yaug wa qho: qhug' li" nae"- Kham: ko' yaug re kham: phung" byid' li" nae" .
Naonhaung" mae" dayaug yaug- yao: zo: mug mho' re laug baui byid: genae" i?
Ngo: mho' re lhao maui byid: genae" i?
Magai makhyang" ra" qobo jab qe- naonhaung" lhao" re:- naonhaung" yao: zo: qere gai: ra" ja: byid: nae" ba ko" ngad: re wa mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" naonhaung" Pho" wa yao: re mho' ra" mo, re gai: ra" ja: ai: tho' mago" je yang: byid: nae" mangad: i?
Aimung:- su: yang naonhaung" re khoru: kad' re naonhaung" o ngaui: ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" re: su gaje re airu: kad' byid: ge, Ce wa kham" to" ra" tarha" we' lapa qe: dao: amyhi" ngad: ra" .
Ai: lhae" ra" kham: dung: khyo" vao ye: ge,- pe"mung: ga"re myi: qid: tham: khyo joe" ra" kham: dung: we' khyodang wa lae: ra" . Amung: ai: khyo su" lo" mo, gyai myo" ako" .
Kao so' daui: ra" khyo joe" ra" khyodang we' kham: dung: wa lhae" ra" . Amung: aire qho: myao mo, mamyo: ko" ngad: ra" .
Aung khug mae zag ne we' dau: ra" myid bo mung: adao mae yao qid ve; ci yang: naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" ra" lapa apyag' qere lha" yang: jao" ge, .
Zau: bye, mae" sabyi shi: re mangad: lao"- zau: gae mae" pho' ham" shi: jham re lhaung" qo" phyo' yu ko" i? Yao: bam lapa apyag' qe ngad: rure yao: bam: mau" zo" ave, khyo" yang naonhaung" ba: li" genae" .
Amung: gai: ra" agae khao: ngo" wa- lho" ra" ashi: zaui" ra" . Qam: mabo: ra" agae wa malho" ra" ashi: zaui" ra" .
Gai: ra" agae mae malho" ra" ashi: maqo" zaui: ngad: ra" . Alao" magai: ra" agae mae re: lho" ra" ashi: maqo" zaui: ngad: ra" .
Ashi: lho" mazaui" ra" agae khao: ngo" wa thau: lhang" pye' mung: myi: khyeim" khyo pye' zaui: pye' ru qhug' ako" .
Airu: mung: lapa apyag' qere yao: bam: ave, khyo" yang naonhaung" ba: li" genae" .
Ngo re Asang we"- Asang we"- ga: ta" ra" mo, alhab' mug: gaung: mung"dan: qo" vao ye: genae" mangad:- Mug: gaung dao mae na: ra"- nga" Pho" myid o: ra" khyo" cao" ra" yaug za: qo" vao ye" li" nae" .
Aimung: dao: kho' ra" ba na joe" lao"- byu myo: sho' wa Asang we"- Asang we"- ngonhaung" wa ni" mang re lao: yang Mao" So: mungdao: re kho" kyo" lo va" mangad: i? Ni" mang re lao: yang: yui myo: sho' re khe' thug' pye' lo va" mangad: i? ga: ta" li" genae" .
Ailao"- ngo wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" re ngo khonhae" re: maba- makhyang" ra" mo, we"- nga" qhid' kheim: mae" thug' lo" ge, ein: ta" nae" .
Ce: nga" dao: jham re gyo" yu mung: phug' cao" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: yao" yham re laug thin dao mae zhaug' ra" pha,jhi" bo yaug we' dau: ra" .
Mug: qu mung: qid je" li" ru we' la qam" hug' lo mung:- ai: yham re lo deim: gengadqere: ai: yham wa laug thin dao mae zhaug' to" ruyang mabyo; gyang: lo" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ce:- nga" dao: jham re gyo" yu mung:- maphug' cao" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere:- yao: yao" yham re ma dam: mae zhaug' ra" kopyad' we' dau: ra" .
Mug: qu mung: qid je" li" ru we' la qam" hug' lo yang:- ai: yham re lodeim: gelao" ai: yham wa byo, gyang: lo" ra" . Ai: yham byo; gyang: lo" ru wa phyi yao: ngad: ra" .
Yesu ai: dao: jham re bin: kho" kyo: lao"- mo, byu qe wa yao: mho" shid' ra" khyo re mug' hao" byaug: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yesu wa tung" pho" qeru: mangad:- kheim: so' qo" ra" yaug we' dakhyo: mho" shid' byid' ra" .
Yesu bug gaung mae" gyo" lo lao"- byu phaung mo" zang yao" thao cao" lo: ako" .
Alao" mao gae: de: ra" byu dayaug Yesu jhao" li" mung:- yao" qhid' kheim: mae pad' thaug' thaug' yang:- Asang we"- nao nug: re wa ngore qo" gai: shao: lo" nhao zai ngad: ra" ga: mho' ra" .
Yesu wa lo, yheim" ke' mung: yao: re tin: byid: zo" re"- ngo nug:- Gyang" shao: lo" se,- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" jao" yao" mao gae: gyang" shao: lo" byaug: ra" .
Alao"- Yesu wa yao: re- Ce: ra" khyo re nao khag' rere: data" kyo: wa,- ngadqere: khinjaung pho" jhao" lo" mung: ni" gaung yao: re lo" qhu" wa,- amung: nao no gai: shao: lo va" khyo mo, byu qe: qhid' mae" sagse: doe, vashao:- Moshe amyin" to" ra" xeim: re lo" ngaui" byid: wa ga: ta" ke' ra" .
Yesu Kapena-um vogaung: khyo joe" vao lo lao"- Roma gyezug: pho" dayaug yao: jhao" li" mung:-
Asang we"- nga" daui daui okaung dayaug no zang qhug' mung: maqo" lab lo: yham mae no: lang" jo; ra" ga: Yesu re ta" kyo: zo" re" bao" yu nae" mho' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re ngo li" mung: yao" no re gai byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" gyezug: pho" wa Yesu re tau: mung:- Asang we" nao nga" yham khyo vao li" nae" wa- ngo wa maman: qi" yaug ngad: ra"- nao amyin" dakheim: byid' ke' lao" re: nga" daui daui yaug wa gai: lo: li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngore: kheim: so' qo" ra" zug: mo" qe: o mae na: ra" byu dayaug ngad:- amung: nga" o mae re: gyezo: qe na: ako" . Gyezo: dayaug re ye: wa, ein: ngo amyin" byid: lao" yao: ye" ra" . Amung: gatau dayaug re lo wa, ein: amyin" byid' ke' lao" yao: lo: ra" . Alao" nga" jeim dayaug re ceru kad' wa, ein: ta" lao" yao: kad' ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Ce: dao: re the' gyo: lao" mug' ra" . Amung: yao" thao mae cao" ra" mo, byu qere Naonhaung" re ngo dang dang ta" geli"- Israel amyu" mae lhao" ceru" ra" lam khug: myid bo: ra" byu dayaug rere: ngo mamyao: qu" shi:
Amung: naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Ba thug' shad'- ba vao shad' mae" byu myo: sho' lo mung: mug: gaung: mung"dan: mae Abraham- Isag- Yaku bam we' daga" qo" zo: shaug' li" genae" .
Ngadqere: ai: mung"dan: byumyu" boe" ang: ra" mo, wa taung gaung shad' mug: cad' yo khyo khe' thug' pye' ru qhug' genae" . Ai: mae yao: bam wa ngug byid ngug nhe' we' zaui kyag' yang: na: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao- Yesu wa gyezug: pho" re- Nao yham khyo lo" se,- nao lam khug: ru we' dakhyo: boe" vashao:- ga: ta" ra" . Ai: au: mae yao: gyezug: pho" daui daui yaug wa no gai: lo" byaug: ra" .
Yesu wa Petru yham khyo vao ye" lo" ra" . Yham khug mae Petru yaug myhi" wa noqam" bug yang: yab jaung: dao mae lang" jo; rure yemyao: ra" .
Yesu wa yao" lo, re tin: byid' ra"- Alao" noqam" gai: lo" byaug mung: to" li" yang: Yesu re bang" da" byid' ra" .
Myi" thao joe" lo lao" mo, byu qe wa yui zaung: ra" byu myo: sho' mo, re Yesu jhao" jhui" li" ako" . Alao" Yesu wa makhyang" ra" yui jham re dao: thoe: yang khe' thug' pye' ra" . No phyo: qhug' ra" mo, rere: gai byid' ra" .
Yesu ceru: kad' ru wa- yao: wa ngonhaung" no phyo: re yu: pye' byid: mung: ngonhaung" no jham re vin: pye' byid' ra" ga: Lapa Esaia ta" to" ra" dao: jab byang" lo nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa yao" lhang" gam: mae na: ra" byu phung: mo" re myao lao"- yao" mho"zo: qere tham: thoete' khyo gau" de: ye" lo" nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ra" .
Alao" Tung" pho" dayaug Yesu jhao" li" mung:- Mho" pho" we"- nao khai: ye: khai: ni" thao ngo cao" nae" ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re tau: mung:- Zag ne jham wa khyaung qo" ako"- Ngho' jham re: asad' qo" ko" ra" . Ngadqere: Byu: Yao: Zo: wa au: khyo" jo, qo lhao" maqo" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: gatau dayaug wa Asang we" nga" pho" mao gaung re shi" lo" nyhab' shaung: pye' nae" qhid' mae" akhang" byid: la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: re Nga" thao cao" wa,- byushid qe wa yao: bam: byushid qere nyhab' shaung vageshao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa lha khug khyo yevao: zaung: ra" . Yao" mho"zo: qere: yao: we' daga" cao" ye" ako" .
Alao" qu" ge, ai: tham: mae nyag din taung" la qam" hug' lo mung: lha wa bang: lhung" khug mae nab: lo" na: ra" . Ngadqere: Yesu wa yab: myhid' jo; ra" .
Yao" mho"zo: qe wa Yesu re nhug' mung: Asang we"- ngonhaung" re khyad' yu la, wo"- ngonhaung" wa nab: shid: lo" na va" ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- Mao" So re lam khug: ra" myid ngai: ra" mo, we"- naonhaung" pe"mung: ai: qhi" sho' gyaug: nin" ko" i? ga: bin: ta" lao" yab; jo; rumae" to" li" mung: la we' bang: lhung" re qeim: ke' ra" . Alao" la we' bang: lhung" wa saug za: tae" lo" byaug: ra" .
Mho"zo: qe alhab' mug' hao" byaug: ru we'- ceyaug wa pe" ru" byu ngad: i? La we' bang: lhung" lhao" re: yao" dao: re tae" gyo" ako" ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa tham: thoete' Gadara mug: khyo joe" lo" ra" . Alao" yui zaung: ra" byu shid' zo: wa lab bug mae" thug' li" mung: Yesu we' li" qhug' ako" . Yao: shid" zo: wa gyai makhyang: ko" ngad: ra"- amung: ai: khyo" khag' re: mavae" su: lai: lhau ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa Mao" So: yao: zo: we"- nao we' nga" shid' zo: pe" jho" sin" i? Ayo, majoe" shire qobo byid: nae" qhid' mae" cejo, qo khyo joe" lo: i? ga: zag: hug' ako" .
Yao: bam we' mataung" va" rumae vo, dajham mo" zang bad zo" na: ako" .
Alao" yui jham wa- Nao ngonhaung" re khe' thug' pye' nae" ngad: re wa- ai: vo, jham: khug mae ngonhaung" re yevao nhao la,- ga: Yesu re mho' ako" .
Yesu wa- Ye" lo" ge,- ga: yao: bam re ta" ke' ra" . Alao" yui jham wa ai shid' zo: mae" phao: thug' lo" mung: vo, jham: khug mae yevao gelao"- ai: vo, jham mo" zang dang" kam" nhad' mae" qid tham: khug khyo tao" byae: gyo" lo" gemung: nab: shid: pye' ako" .
Vo, zam: mo, wa- vogaung: khug khyo tao" phao: lo" gemung:- yui zaung: ra" byu shid' yaug: khyo re we' boe" lo" ra" khyo alhab' re vobyu qere ta" kyo" ako" .
Alao" vogaung geim" mae" mo, thug' li" mung: Yesu re li" qhug' ako" . Yao: bam Yesu re li" myao gelao"- yao: bam: mug: mae" thug' lo" nae" qhid' mae" yao: re mho' ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa lha khug yedo; zaung mung:- yao" vogaung: khyo dam: tug' gau" de; lo" ra" .
Byu damyo" wa yab qo mae lang" jo; ra" gaung jam: shid: ra" byu dayaug re Yesu jhao" dao: li" ko" ra" . Yesu wa yao: bam: lam khug: myid bo: rure myao lao"- gaung jam: shid yaug re- Nga" zo: we"- nhag' dangai wa,- ni" qobo khyad' pye' byid: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Tung" pho" qe damyo" wa- byu ceyaug wa Mao" So re jung" dao: jhau: ra" ga: yao: cao: yao: jho" ta" ako" .
Yesu wa- yao: bam: aung khug mae pe" myid: na ko" rure ba mung:- naonhaung" aung khug mae pe"mung: magai: ra" khyo" myid: na ko" i?
Ni" qobo re khyad' pye' byid: va" ein: ta" nae" je: laui: i? Mangad: lao"- To" ye, mung: su" lo" wa, ein: ta" nae" je: laui: i?
Ngadqere: byu: yao: zo: wa- myid gaung dao mae qobo khyad' byid: nae" kheim: so' qo" yaug ngad: rure qhu" byid: geli" ga: ta" mung:- ai: gaung jam: shid yaug re- To" wa, Ni" yab qo re gaug: vo, yang: yham khyo lo" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" yao: wa to" mung: yham khyo lo" ra" .
Aire myao: ra" mo, byu qe wa- gyaug: mug' ru we' xao su byu qere ceru" ra" kheim: so' byid' ra" Mao" So re caung: khin" byid' ako" .
Yesu wa ai: jo, qo mae" to" mung: su" ye" lo" na: au:- yao" khang: khyui zaung mae zaung: jo; ra" Mathe ga: mang: ra" khang: khyui zo: byu dayaug re myao: ra" . Yesu wa yao: re- Nga" thao cao" la, ga: ta" lao"- Mathe wa to" mung: Yesu thao cao" ye" lo" ra" .
Mathe yham mae Yesu zozo" na: au:- khang: khyui zo: mo, myo: sho' we' qobo qo" ra" mo, myo: sho' wa Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe we' daga" zo li" bozo" na: ako" .
Pharishe qe wa aire myao lao"- yao" mho"zo: qere- naonhaung" mho" pho" wa airu" ra" byu qe we' daga" pe"mung: zo qhan: zo" ra" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu aire the' gyo: lao"- yao: bam re- Qao" zin" mo, wa macid' sara maqo gengad: ra"- No mo, za: aqo: ako" .
Ngo wa xeim: ngaui" byid' rure- ma o nhag' khyag' rure o: ra"- ga" ra" jham: dao: lajheim: re ba nae" qhid' mae" lo" mung: xeim: yu ge,- ngo wa din: man: mo, re khai nae" qhid' mae" li" ru mangad:- Qobo qo" ra" mo, re khai nae" qhid' mae" li" ru angad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- Yohan: mho"zo: qe Yesu jhao" li" mung:- ngonhaung" we' Pharishe qe wa dazab: makyo zo: ve lhaung" jao" bam:- pe"mung: ni" mho"zo: qe zo: ve majao" ko" i? ga: Yesu re myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Lo,xo' poe mae poe leim bang" vo qe wa- pho" sag' we' na: jo, shi" au:- kaug' qhui gai: i? Airu: mangad: nae"- ngadqere: pho" sag' re yao: bam: phaung mae" kao" jhui" lo" ra" ba na joe" lo: li" nae" . Ailao" yao: bam wa zo: ve jao" li" genae" .
Bau: xug' mae pin: sag' yang khag' malhaung" pho: qu"- Airu: pho lao" zhan: lo" mung: pin: sag' cug' yang bau: xug' re lao" cad' mung: bau: je: jad; lae: lo" nae" .
Amung: sabyi qang: asag' rere: shoqid thaung axug' mae khag' malhaung" ke' qu" . Airu: ke' lao" shoqid thaung baug: go; lo" mung: sabyi qang: yug: lo" ru we' shoqid thaung re: qeim: lo" byaug nae" . sabyi qang: asag' re wa shoqid thaung asag' khug mae ke' to: lao" za: shid' ja: geim" maqeim nae"- ga" ta" ra" .
Yesu ceru: ta" na shi" au:- tarha" jung yham agyi dayaug Yesu jhao" li" mung:- yao" qhid' kheim: mae pad' thaug' thaug' mung: yang: Yesu re- Nga" zo: myiqe: nau" shid: byaug va"- ngadqere: nao li" mung: yao" dao mae ni" lo, li" kai: byid' ngad: re wa yao: dam: daui: li" nae" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa to" mung: yao" thao cao" ye" lo" ra" . Yao" mho"zo: qere: yao: we' daga" cao" ye" lo" ako" .
Alao"- qu" ge, daxe: shid' zin geim" sa: sheim no no: ra" myiqe: dayaug wa- Yesu nhaung thao" khyo te' li" mung: Yesu bau: qhang thao mae ye tin" ra" .
Yao" bau: thao re khalhao" ngo qo" tin" ke' re wa nga" no gai: lo" byaug nae" ga: yao: yao" aung khug mae ta" ra" .
Yesu wa lhang: qu" yang: yao: re myao lao" Nga" myiqe: zo: we"- Nhag' dangai wa,- ni" lam khug: myid wa ni" no re gai nhao: ava"- ga: yao: re ta" ra" . Ai: au: re yao:- ai: myiqe: myhi" wa no gai: lo" byaug: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa tarha" jung yham agyi pho" yham khyo joe" ye" lo" ra" . Alao" yao: wa khalhao: mad mo, we" mo,byu qe mo, thaui: mo, yaug mung: na ko" rure myao lao"-
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Phao: qhui: ge,- Myiqe: nau" wa shid: ru mangad:- yab: myhid' jo, ru angad:- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: bam alhab' mo, Yesu re qi: jung" pye' ako" .
Mo, byu qere taung gaung khyo bin: khe' thug' pye' lao"- Yesu wa qe, khug khyo vao ye: mung: myiqe: nau" lo, mae yezaui: yang: she: to" ke' ra" . Ailao" ai: myiqe: nau" wa to" lo: ra" .
Ce: lau dao: re- ai: mung" geim" byang" sho' hau" nhao" lo" ako" .
Yesu wa aitau mae" to" mung: su" lo" na: au:- myo, jid shid' yaug wa yao" thao cao" mung: Davi yao: zo: we"- nga" shid' yaug re nhag' khyag' yu la, wo"- ga: hug' ako" .
Yesu yham dayham khyo vao lo" lao"- myo, jid shid' yaug wa Yesu jhao" li" ako" . Alao" Yesu wa ni" shid' yaug lam" ko" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: shid' yaug wa Asang we" lam" ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: shid' yaug: myo,jid' re tin: byid: zo" re" ni" shid' yaug lam khug: ru we' dakhyo: boe" lo vashao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" yao: shid' yaug: myo, myao: li" ko" ra" . Yesu wa yao: shid' yaug re cekhyo re khag' rere: data" kyo: ge, ga: jhaug' za: zug' nhao: ke' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: shid' yaug wa thug' lo" mung: Yesu khyo re ai: mung" geim" byang" sho' hau" nhao" lo" ako" .
Yao: shid' yaug thug' lo" na ko" au:- qu" ge, byu damyo" wa yui zaung: ra" nhad' jid dayaug re Yesu jhao" jhui" li" ko" ra" .
Ai: yui re khe' thug' pye' lao" jao" ai: nhad' jid yaug wa- dao: jhau: thug' li" ra" . Mo, byu qe wa mug' hao" byaug: ru we'- ceru" ru Israel mung" mae ngonhaung" khonhae" re: mamyao: qu" shi:- ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Pharishe qe wa yao: wa yui zug: mo" qam: so' khyo" yang yui jham re khe' thug' pye' ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa vogaung: mo" vogaung: ngai jham alhab' geim" khyo gam: sho' du" qin" mung: yao: bam: tarha" jung yham jham mae mho" shid' byid' ru we' mug: gaung: mung"dan: ngaui bau" lau dao: gai re kho" kyo: mung:- no phyo: aja: ja: qhug' mo, re gai byid' ra" .
Byu phung: mo" wa- yao zaung" yaug mabo: ra" yao jham we' dakhyo: qug: khai: qhug' mung: byo: sin" qin" ko" rure Yesu myao lao" nhag' qu" khyag' ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Gaug myo: sho' mhang" jo; ra"- ngadqere: yad: yu nae" mau" zaui: mo, malaug ngad: ra" .
Airu: mung:- ai: gaug sang: yang Yao" gaug mhang" yo mae mau" zaui: nae" byu nhao byid: nae" qhid' mae" gaug sang re akyu" mho' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu yao" mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug re khai: yu mung:- makhyang" ra" yui jham re khe' thug' pye' nae" we'- no phyo: aja: ja: re gai byid: nae" kheim: so' yao: bam re byid' ra" .
Ai: lagyo: daxe: shid' yaug: mang jham wa- Petru ga: mang: ra" Simon we' yao: nhaung: Andre Zebede yao: zo: tao ngad: ra" Yaku we' yao: nhaung: Yohan
Philib we' Batholame- Thoma we' khang: khyui zo: yaug Mathe- Alphaeu yao: zo: Yaku we' Thadaeu
Byumyu" jhid' myid qi" ra" Simon we' thao phyao: yao: re ab: pye' ra" Yuda Iskarud ga: mo, bam ngad: ako" .
Yesu ai: daxe: shid' yaug re ceru: ta" mung: nhao: ke' ra" . Naonhaung" wa taung bug: mug: khyo we' Samari vogaung: jham khyo davao ye: ge,-
Ngadqere: Israel amyu" mae" byaug: lo" ra" yao jham jhao" ye: mung:-
Yao: bam re- Mug: gaung mung"dan: wa jhao" li" va' ein: kho" kyo: ge, .
No mo, re gai byid: ge,- Shid va" mo, re dam: daui nhao ge,- Mao gae: de, mo, re gai byid: ge,- Yui jham re khe' thug' pye' ge,- Aphug' mabyid: lo: naonhaung" qo" khae: yu vako" ru we' dakhyo:- aphug' mayu lo: su re byid: ge, .
Naonhaung" phyid' cui: mae qhang- ngaui- gyid: ngaui thang: the: davin ge, .
Gyaung: khyo qhid' mae" thaung pyan- bau: tha"- khyid zhaung: we' zaung: bao" daci ge,- pe"mung: ga"re mau" zaui: yaug wa zao: kho qo" yu ang: ra" .
Khovo khodam: khyo ngadqere:- naonhaung" vao ye: gelao"- naonhaung" re lham: khae: yu nug: ra" yaug re qho mung:- naonhaung" ai: vogaung: mae" dam: thug' lo" sho' aiyaug: yham mae za: thang: na ge,-
Amung: naonhaung" dayham yham khyo vao ye: gelao"- Ngaui bau: yaug yo geshao:- ein: bang" se" dao: ta" ge,-
Ai: yham mae na: ra" mo, naonhaung" re ngaui bau: za: lham: khae: yu ko" ngad: re wa- ai: bang" se" shaman" dao: wa yao: bam: dao mae thang: jo, vashao:- naonhaung" re ngaui bau: za: malham: khae: yu: ra" mo, ngad: re wa- naonhaung" bang" se" shaman" dao: wa- naonhaung" jhao" dam: tug' lo vashao: .
Amung:- naonhaung" re malham: khae: yu lo:- naonhaung" ta" ra" dao: rere: malham: tae" gyo: ko" ra" yham we' vogaung: mae" naonhaung" dam: thug' lo" ge,- naonhaung" dam: thug' lo" au:- naonhaung" khovo: mae" bodan jham re ko: khyo" co' ge,-
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa- dao: kho' ra" ba na mae Mao" So wa Sodom we' Gomora vobyu qere tho' je: qi" ra" qobo byid' li" nae" .
Qu" ge, zag ne phaung gaung: khyo yao jham re nhao: ke' ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" re nhao: ke' ra" . Amung:- naonhaung" wa lhao maui ru: qag mung: phaung" kyug' ru xam: mag ge,-
Lha" yang: na ge,- Byu jham wa naonhaung" re tarha" yung" khyo ab byid' pye' mung: yao: bam wa naonhaung" re yao: bam: tarha" jung yham mae taui" be: li" genae" .
Taung bug qere we' zug:- kho: kham qere Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: sagse: kham byid: nae" qhid' mae" Nga" mathao mae naonhaung" re zug: qe we' kho: kham qe: qhid' kheim: khyo taui" she: ye" li" genae" .
Naonhaung" airu: ab byid' pye' qhug' gelao"- khoru: jhau nae" laug- pe" ru ta" nae" laug ein: damyid: ci" ge,- naonhaung" jhau nae" dao: jham ayo, joe" lao" qo" yu: li" genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ai: dao: jham wa naonhaung" jhau: ra" dao: jham mangad: nae"- naonhaung" yao: Pho" nho: Gyang" lho" Byo wa- naonhaung" nhad' khyo" yang jhau: thug' li" ra" dao: jham ngad: li" nae" .
Mao: nhaung: yao: cao: dayaug wa dayaug re shid nae" khyo jho" ab byid' pye' mung: myhi" pho" qe wa yao: zo: qere- shid nae" khyo ab byid' pye' li" genae" . Alao" yao: zo: qere: yao: bam: myhi" pho" qere gye kad' mung: se' pye' nhao: li" genae" .
Nga" mang mathao: yang byu alhab' mo, naonhaung" re nghang" li" genae"- ngadqere: athao" joe" sho' zang: qhao" yaug wa khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" .
Vogaung: dalam: mae naonhaung" re yhin" gelao"- gatau vogaung: dalam: khyo phao: ye: ge,- ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa- Israel mung" mae" vogaung: jham alhab' mae naonhaung" mau" mabin: zaui: shi: re Byu: yao: Zo: wa joe" li" nae" ngad: ra" .
Mho"zo: wa mho" pho" tho' maje ngad: ra" . Amung: jeim re: jeim sang tho' maje ngad: ra" .
Airu: mung: mho"zo: wa yao" mho" pho" we' dakhyo:- jeim re: jeim sang we' dakhyo: ngad lao" wa nhag' dag gai: ava"- Yham khaung vin yaug re Bezelbu ga: mhang" ko" re wa- yham khug: byu qere wa je yang: magai: ra" khyo" mhang" li" genae" .
Amung:- byu qere dagyaug ge,- pe"mung: ga"re nghoe' to" ra" ja: alhab' wa de: de: mung: li" nae"- Nyham" to" ra" ja: alhab' wa myao: thug' li" nae" .
Ngo naonhaung" re mug: cad' khug mae ta" ra" dao: re mug: bo" mae ta" kyo: ge,- naonhaung" re dao: so' so' yang: ta" ra" dao: re yham khaung dao mae" kho" kyo: ge, .
Myi: qid: tham: mae qo" phyo' qheim" pye' ra" Mao" So re gyaug ge, Gaung khyao re qo" se' pye' ngadqere:- alo zo: re maqo" se' pye' ra" mo, re dagyaug ge, .
Gyid: ngaui thang: the: dakye' yang za: jokhyao" shid' dau: re qo" vai: yu: mangad: i? Ngadqere: naonhaung" yao: pho" maqad lo: ai: jokhyao" dadau: lhao" re: maqo" gai: shid .
Naonhaung" au: mae" xae khe' jham alhab' re lhao" nghe' to: gau ngad: ra" .
Airu: mung: dagyaug ge,- naonhaung" wa jokhyao" myo: sho' dau: tho' je: phug' de; ako" .
Su: qhid' kheim: mae ngore lhang: yu ra" yaug khag' re ngadqere:- mug: gaung mae na: ra" nga" pho" qhid' kheim: mae yao: re ngo lhang: yu nae" .
Su: qhid' kheim: mae ngore ha: pye' ra" yaug re kam" wa- mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" nga" Pho" qhid' kheim: mae yao: re ngo ha: pye' nae" .
Ce: myid gaung dao mae ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngo joe" li" ru ngad: ein: dajho ge,- ngo wa ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru byid: nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru mangad:- Shae cili" byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngo joe" li" ru ngad: .
Pe"mung: ga"re- yao: zo: wa yao: pho" we' myiqe: zo: wa yao: myhi" we' dau mo" qe wa yao: na qe we' gye jho" boe" nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngo joe" li" ru ngad: .
Amung: byu dayaug: qhid' mae" magai: thao" ra" gye jham wa yao" yham khug: byu qe ngad: li" genae" .
Khag' ngadqere: ngore jhid' de; ra" tho' mae myhi" pho" qere je: jhid' de; ra" yaug wa- nga" mho"zo: boe" nae" qhid' mae" maman: qi" ngad: ra" . Amung: ngore jhid' de; ra" tho' mae" yao: zo: yao: dau qere je: jhid' de; ra" yaug re: nga" mho"zo: boe" nae" qhid' mae" maman: qi" ngad: ra" .
Alao"- khag' ngadqere: yao: yao" pyao: zang re tau: vo, mung:- nga" khyid khu mae macao" ra" yaug wa- nga" mho"zo: boe" nae" qhid' mae" maman: qi" ngad: ra" .
Amung:- yao: yao" kao so' gug: nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' gug: gam yaug wa- kao so' jeim: nae" . Ngadqere: nga" mathao mae yao: yao" kao so' jeim: yaug wa kao so' qo" yu nae" .
Naonhaung" re lham: khae: yu: ra" yaug wa- ngore lham: khae: yu: ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Ngo re lham: khae: yu: ra" yaug re: ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug re lham: khae: yu: ru ngad: ra" .
Mao" So: lagyo: ngad: ra" ga" khyo" yang Mao" So: lagyo: re lham: khae: yu: ra" yaug wa ai: lagyo: the' yu: ra" aphug' jhaung qhu" re qo" yu: li" nae" . Alao" din: man: yaug ngad: ra" ga" khyo" yang din: man: yaug re lham: khae: yu: ra" yaug re:- ai: din: man: yaug qo" yu: ra" aphug' jhaung qhu" re qo" yu li" nae" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang dang za: ta" geli" . Nga" mho"zo: qe mae" ngai: thao" ra" yaug re nga" mho"zo: ngad: ra" ga: qid cae: dakeim byid: jhaug' yaug wa gaigai: yao: aphug' jhaung qhu" maqo" yu nae" khyo majo, .
Yesu wa Yao" mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug re ai: dao: jham bin: pyang lao"- avai: ayae mae" vogaung: jham mae mho" shid' kho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" yao: wa ai: jo, qo mae" thug' lo" ra" .
Khristu zaui" na: ra" mau" zo" jham: khyo re Yohan wa thaung: mae" the' gyo: lao"- yao" mho"zo: daqhae: re Yesu jhao" nhao: ke' ra" .
Yohan: mho"zo: qe wa Yesu re nao wa ai: joe" li" nae" ga" ra" yaug ngad va" i? Mangad: lao"- gatau re ngonhaung" myid: lao" na ca" shi" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re naonhaung" myao: ru we' the' gyo" ra" gu: Yohan re lo" ta" kyo: ge,-
Myo, jid qe myo, myao: li" ko" ra"- Khyid qeim mo, khyo qo" su: ko" ra"- Mao gae: de, mo, gyang" shao: lo" ko" ra"- No: jid mo, no: gyo" li" ko" ra"- Shid: ra" mo, dam: daui: li" ko" ra"- Myaung sho" ra" mo, wa Lau Dao: Gai the' gyo ako" .
Ngo re lam: ra" myid maaug' o: mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yohan: mho"zo: qe phao: lo" na ko" au: Yesu wa Yohan: khyo we' sin: mung: mo, byu qere naonhaung" wa din" pyad yo khyo pe" re ye: qu" nae" ein: thug' ye: ko" i? La: yang hug' nghan" na: ra" myo, phaung: gae jham re ye: qu" nae" ein: ye: ko" i?
Airu: mangad: lao" pe" re ye: qu" nae" ein: ye: ko" i? Mai gai bau: gai ve; ci: ra" mo, re qu" nae" ein: ye: ko" i? Mai gai bau: gai ve, mo, wa kho: kham kho" mae na: ako" .
Airu: mangad: re- pe"mung: naonhaung" ye: ko" i? Lapa re ye: qu" nae" ein ko" i? Ngad: va"- ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- Lapa tho' je: qi" ra" yaug re naonhaung" myao: avako" .
Amung: jham: mugsug' mae Qu" wa,- ni" khyo re nyhang" na nae" qhid' mae" nga" lagyo: re ni" qhid' au: mae ngo nhao: ke' nae"- ga: tung" to" ru wa Yohan re ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang dang za: ta" geli"- qid nyhab' kham: byid' ra" Yohan tho' je: qi" ra" xao su byu dayaug re: mana: qu" shi: ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: mug: gaung: mung"dan: mae je: ngai: thao" ra" yaug wa- Yohan tho' je: qi" ra" .
Qid nyhab' byid' ra" yaug Yohan mungdao: kho" kyo" ra" ba na mae" ana" ba joe" sho' mug: gaung: mung"dan: re lhad' yu nae" qam: ke' ko" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re lapa qe alhab' we' kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa ai: mung"dan: khyo re Yohan: pyad joe" sho' ta" kyo" lo: avako" .
Yao: bam: mungdao: re khae: yu mung: lam" ko" ngad: re wa Yohan wa joe" li" nae" ra" Elia ngad: rure re: naonhaung" khae: yu: li" genae" .
No: khye' de, mo, wa gyo" yu geshao: .
Ngo wa ce: qae" mae" byu qere pe" we' dau tau" nae" i? Yao: bam wa gai jao: mae zaung: jo, mung:-
Naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" khalhao: mad ngadqere: mago" ngad: ako" . Ngonhaung" ngug yao" yao" ngadqere: makaug' gengad ko" ra" ga: daphung: wa daphung: re zo: jhi jhi mung: jho" yao: na: ako" ra" zoshao qe we' dau: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yohan wa zo: ve jao" mung: mazo: mashaug' lo: joe" li" lao"- yao: bam wa yao: re yui de; ra" ga: ta" ako" .
Byu: yao: zo: wa zo: mung: shaug' mung: joe" li" lao" re:- yao: bam wa Qu" ge, yao: wa zo: shaug' so' kho' shu yaug- qobo qo" mo, we' khang: khyui zo: mo; byin cao: ngad: ra" ga: ta" ako" . Mao" So: pha,jhi" laba lajhao wa dang: ru ngad: ga" rure yao" ashi: jham khyo" yang sagse: kham byid' ra" .
Alao"- Yesu wa mug' pho: mau" zo" laug phyao: kad' qhu" lo: ra" vogaung: jham mae"- mo, byu qere myid matha" ko" ruyang ai: vogaung: jham re qeim: ra" .
Korazin we"- nao byu xa: voqoe, qhug' nae"- Bedsaida we"- nao re: byu xa: voqoe, qhug' nae"- naonhaung" shid' vo re kad' qhu" ra" mug' pho: mau" zo" jham re Ture we' Sidon shid' vo mae kad' qhu" ngad: re wa- ai shid' vo wa daba: mae" jid: mo" mai bau: ve, mung:- myiqe, bam mae lhau: yang: myid tha" genae" va" .
Dao: kho' ra" ba na mae naonhaung" shid' vo wa- Ture we' Sidon shid' vo tho' je: qi" ra" qobo dae qhug' kham zo: genae" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- Kapena-um we"- nao wa mug: gaung joe" sho' to' ke' ru qhug' nae" ein: jho: i? Myi: qid tham: khyo joe" sho' khyo" ke' ru nao qhug' nae" . Pe"mung: ga"re nao re ngo kad' qhu" ra" mug' pho: mau" zo" jham re Sodom mae kad' ngad: re wa ai: vogaung: wa ana" ba joe" sho' jo, shinae" ngad: ra" .
Dao: kho' ra" ba na mae nao wa Sodom vogaung: tho' je: qi" ra" qobo dae qhug' kham zo: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- Yesu wa mug: gaung we' myid gaung: Asang Pho" we"- Pha,jhi" bo: ra" mo, we' nyan: kung: ra" mo, re maba nhao lo: nyham" to" ra" ja: jham re pha,jhi" mabo: ra" mo, re nao qhu" byid' ruyang ngo nao re caung: khin" byid' ra" .
Ngad va"- Pho" we"- ceru: boe" ru wa nao myid o: ra" khyo ngad: ra" .
Nga" Pho" wa ngore ja: khao: ngo" alhab' byid' to: va" ra" . Pho" mae" je yang; ai: yao: zo: re khag' re maba . Pho" rere: ai: yao: zo: we' ai: yao: zo" yang qhu" byid: nae" khyin: yu: ra" mo, mae" je yang: khag' maba ko" ngad: ra" .
Qola: vin yang: myaung: dug: ra" mo, alhab' we"- ngojhao" lo geri:- ngo naonhaung" re myaung: ngho: nhao nae" .
Ngo wa xam: mag mung:- nhag' lam: nyham yaug ngad: ra" . Airumung:- nga" kyau: re vin ge,- nga" khyo re mho" yu ge,- ailao" naonhaung" dugno: qhug' genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo byid' ra" kyau: wa vin laui: ru we' ngo vhin: ra" qo wa seim" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Dugno: Ba mae gaug yo khyo" lai: lo" ra" . Yao" mho"zo: qe wa vae: moe; geyang: gaug shi: shan" yu mung: zo" ako" .
Aire Pharishe qe myao gelao"- Qu" wa,- ni" mho"zo: qe wa Dugno: Ba mae magai: kad' ra" ja: re kad' ako" ga: Yesu re ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Davi wa yao: we' yao" byu qe vae: moe; gelao"- khoru: kad' ko" ra" khyo re naonhaung" manghe' qu" ko" i?
Yao: wa Mao" So: yham khyo vao ye: mung:- khinjaung qe mae" je yang: khag' re: magai: zo" ra"- Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae qhaug' byid' to" ra" mug re yao: we' yao" byu qe yu zo: ko" ra" mangad: i?
Aimae"- Dugno: Ba khao: ngo" khinjaung qe wa Caung: pa" Yham mae- Dugno: Ba Tarha" re shad' lhoe" gengadqere: qobo maqo" ko" ngad: ra"- ga" ra" Moshe Tarha" re naonhaung" manghe' qu" ko" i?
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Caung: pa" Yham tho' je: qi" ru wa cemae na: ra" .
Ngo wa xeim: ngaui" byid' rure tho' nhag' khyag' rure je: o: ra" ga" ra" jham: dao: re ba: gyo: ko" ngad: re wa- qobo maqo" ra" mo, re naonhaung" qobo vhin genae" mangad: .
Pe"mung: ga"re- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa Dugno: Ba: Asang ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa ai: jo, qo mae" thug' ye" lo" mung: Tarha" jung yham dalam: khyo vao ye" ra" .
Qu" ge, ai: Tarha" Jung Yham mae lo, dashad' shid: ra" byu dayaug na: ra" . Byu damyo" wa Yesu re qobo zhaug' nug mung:- Dugno: Ba mae no gai: nyhang" gai byid' i? ga: Yesu re myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re tau: mung:- naonhaung" yao dadau: wa Dugno: Ba mae dung: khung: khug khyo byid: gyo" lo" ngad: re ai: yao re maye: phoe' yu nae" byu naonhaung" mae bo ko" i?
Byu wa yao tho' myo: sho' je: phug' de; mangad: i? Airu: mung:- Dugno: Ba mae gai: ra" mau" zaui: nae" akhang" jo; ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa ai: lo, dashad' shid yaug re Ni" lo, din" ke' wa,- ga: ta" ra" . Yao" lo, din" ke' we' lo, gai lo, we' dakhyo: gai: lo" byaug: ra" .
Pharishe qe wa aimae" thug' lo" mung: Yesu re se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" khyo qho: ako" .
Yesu wa ai: khyo re ba lao"- ai: jo, qo mae" thug' lo" ra" . Mo, byu myo: sho' yao" thao cao" ako" . No phyo: qhug' ra" mo, alhab' re gai byid' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao" khyo re mahau: genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re zug' nhao: ra" .
Yao: ceru: kad' ru wa Lapa Esaia nhad' khyo" Mao" So ta" ra" dao: jham jab byang" lo nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Ai: Lapa dao: mae- ngo khyin: yu: ra" nga" daui daui yaug- ngo jhid' de; o ngaui: ra" yaug re qu" ge,- Nga" Gyang" lho" Byo yao" dao mae nhao: ke' byid: nae"- Yao: wa nga" dao: kho' ra" khyo re byumyu" cao jab alhab' re ta" hau" kyo" li" nae" .
Yao: wa maha mangag- thoe qi: re: mahug' nae"- Hau" mo" khyodang mae yao" thoe re khag' mathe' gyo: genae" .
Yao: wa kaui: ra" qid phaung: yao: re makhyug' pye' nae" . Amung: kyi za: kyi: lo" ra" myi: rere: mase' pye' nae" . Yao: wa tarha" din: vang" ru aung: nghoe' lo sho' qam: ke' li" nae" .
Byumyu" cao jab alhab' yao: re khug ngha: li" genae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Ai: thao byu damyo" wa yui zaung yang: myo, jid: ru we' nhad' jid: ra" byu dayaug re Yesu jhao" jhui" li" ako" . Yesu wa aiyaug re gai byid' ra"- Alao" yao: wa myo, myao: li" mung: dao: re: jhau: li" ra" .
Mo, byu qe alhab' mo, wa mug' hao" byaug: ru we'- ceyaug wa Davi yao: zo: gai: ngad nae" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Pharishe qe wa aire the' gyo: gelao"- ceyaug wa yui zug: mo" Bezelbu qam: so' khyo" yang yui jham re khe' thug' pye' ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam: aung khug mae pe" bo: rure ba mung: yao: bam re- Mung"dan: dalam: wa phung: jho" kho' yang: yao: cao: gye jho" se' na ko" ngad: re wa mamyao" re byo; qeim: lo" li" nae" . Ai we' dakhyo: yao: cao: nhag' lam: majho" vang" ra" vogaung:- ug' khug' dinkhu: re: byo; qeim: lo" li" nae" .
Gatau: Satan re khe' thug' mung: Satan yao: cao: majho" vang" lo:- gye jho" se' na ko" ngad: re wa yao" mung"dan: wa khoru: qo" gang" tang: jo, nae" i?
Ngo wa Bezelbu qam: so' yang yui jham re khe' ru ngad: re wa naonhaung" mho"zo: qe wa khag' qam: so' khyo" yang yui jham re khe' thug' ko" ra" i? Airu: mung:- naonhaung" shad' na: rure naonhaung" mho"zo: qe: lo, mau" jham: yang yao: sagse: qhu" byid' na: ra" .
Ngo wa Bezelbu qam: so' khyo" yang mangad:- Mao" So: Gyang" Lho" Byo: Qam: so' khyo" yang yui jham re khe' thug' pye' ru ngad: ra" . Aiwa naonhaung" phaung mae Mao" So: mung"dan: joe" li" va" ga" rure qhu" byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Qam: bo yaug re shi" sao qhid' mataui" to: lo: yao" zai jham re lhad' yu nae" qhid' mae" ai: qam: bo yaug: yham khug khyo khag' re: maqo" vao ye: ngad: ra"- Bin: taui" to: thao re za: yeqo" lhad' yu: ra" .
Nga" thao khyo made, ra" yaug wa ngore gye kad' yaug ngad: ra" . Ngo we' daga" masham" zhang: ra" yaug wa abyo asin: yaug ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang dang ta" geli"- Byu wa qobo alhab' we' Mao" So re jung" dao: ta" ra" qobo alhab' re khyad' pye' byid' ru gai: qhug' ra" . Ngadqere: Gyang" Lho" Byo re jung" dao: ta" ra" yaug kam" wa qobo khyad' pye' byid' ru magai: qhug' nae" .
Byu: Yao: Zo: re jung" dao: ta" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: qobo khyad' pye' byid: ru gai: qhug' ra" . Gyang" Lho" Byo re jung" dao: ta" yaug kam" wa ana" ce: pyad mae ngadqere: thao: pyad khonhae" re: qobo khyad' pye' byid ru magai: qhug' nae" .
Gai: ra" agae wa lho" ra" ashi: zaui" ra" . Qam: mabo: ra" agae wa ashi: seim zaui" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re- agae qam: mabo: bo ru wa ashi: re qu" yang: ba: kho' ra" .
Lhao maui jham we"- Makhyang: magai: ra" mo, naonhaung" wa gai: ra" dao: khoru: gai: jhau genae" i? Pe"mung: ga"re aung khug nhag' lam: mae byang" sheim: jo, ra" gu: nhad' khyo" jhau: thug' li" ra" .
Gai: ra" yaug wa yao" jo,nho" ban" mae" gai: ra" zai jham re phoe' thug' ra"- Magai: ra" yaug wa yao" jo,nho" ban" mae" magai: ra" zai jham re phoe' thug' ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli" dao: kho' ra" ba na mae byu yaug khao: ngo" wa yao: yao: jhau: lai: pye' ra" akyu" mabo: ra" dao: jham: qhid' mae" dao: kho' ru qhug' ca" li" genae" .
Nao jhau: lo: ra" dao: jham khyo" yang nao qobo qo" maqo" rure Mao" So wa nao re dao: kho' li" nae" .
Ai: thao tung" pho" qe damyo" we' Pharishe qe wa Yesu re Mho" pho" we"- ngonhaung" re mug' pho: ve, lho daja: ja: kad' qhu" la, ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam re tau: mung: magai makhyang" ru we' Mao" So re malam: ra" ce: qae: mae" byu qe wa mug' pho: ve, lho kad' qhu" nae" mho' ako" . Lapa Yona nho: mug' pho: ve, lho mae" je yang: pe" mug' pho: ve, lho re: makad' qhu" nae" .
Yona wa ai: ngo: zang: vae: dug: khug mae sam myi sam ba geim" laung" jo, ru we' dakhyo: Byu: Yao: Zo: re: myid kao" khug mae sam myi sam ba laung" jo; li" nae" .
Nineve vobyu qe wa Yona kho" kyo" ra" mungdao: re the' gyo: gelao" yao: bam: qobo mae" myid tha" lo: ako" . Airumung: dao: kho' ra" ba na mae Nineve vobyu qe wa to" ye, mung: naonhaung" re qobo zhaug' li" genae" . Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli" Ce: jo, qo mae Yona tho' je: qi: yaug na: ra" .
Sheba kho: kham myhi" wa kho: kham Sholamon: Pha,jhi" dao: re tae" gyo: nae" qhid' mae" va" ra" mung"dan: mae" joe" lo: ra" . Airumung: dao: kho' ra" ba na mae Sheba kho: kham myhi" wa to" ye, mung: naonhaung" re qobo zhaug' li" nae" . Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- ce: jo, qo mae kho: kham Sholamon tho' je: qi: yaug na: ra" .
Ai: makhyang" ra" yui wa yao: vao: jaung" na: ra" byu mae" thug' lo" lao"- kyaug' ho: ra" jo, qo khaung: mae ye: du" qin" mung:- no: nae" jo, qo re cao" qho: ra" . No: qo maqhug' lao"-
Ai: yui wa- azhao ngo na co' ra" yham khyo dam: tug' lo" nae" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" . Amung: yao: dam: tug' joe" lo: re phyao: sham" pye' mung: nyang" za: shaung: nyhang" to" ra" yham keim re lomyao: ra" .
Ai: yui wa thug' ye" lo" mung:- yao: tho' je: makhyang" ra" yui nhad' dau: re khai: jhui" lo mung: yao: bam wa ai: yham mae lovao: na: ako"- Alao" byu aiyaug: ave, wa qhid' phyao: mae" tho' je: qo: byaug: ra" . Ce: ban: mae" makhyang: mo, re: ai we' dakhyo: boe" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa mo, byu qere dao: jhau: na shi" au: yao: myhi" we' yao: nhaung: bam joe" li" ako" . Yao: bam wa yao: we' qhug' jhau nug gemung: taung gaung mae lao" ye: jo; ako" .
Mo, byu qemae" dayaug wa Yesu re Asang we" ni" myhi" we' ni" nhaung: bam nao we' jho" qhug' jhau nug mung: taung gaung mae lao" ye: jo; ako" ga: ta" kyo" ra" .
Yesu wa nga" myhi" khag' ngad: i? Nga" nhaung: bam wa khag' ngad: ako" i? ga: phaug' ta" ra" .
Amung: Yesu wa Yao" mho"zo: qere lo, ceim: mung:- Qu" ge, cebam wa nga" myhi" we' nga" mao: nhaung: qe ngad ko" ra" .
Mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" nga" Pho" myid o: ra" khyo" cao" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: nga" mao: nhaung:- nga" myhi" ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: ba yao: re Yesu wa ai: yham mae" thug' lo" mung: tham: yae mae yezaung: jo; ra" .
Yao: jhao" zang" li" ra" mo,byu qe mo, paug' saung" thau: ruyang Yesu wa lha dakhye' dao mae yezaung: jo; ra"- Mo, byu qe wa tham: yae mae ye; jo; bam: ako" .
Alao" yao: wa yao: bam re dao: tau" tau" mung:- myo: sho' ja: re mho" kyo: zo" re" ta" ru wa- Myug: shi: sin: yaug wa myug' shi: sin: nae" qhid' mae" thug' ye" lo" ra" .
Yo mae myug: shi: yesin" ke' re- daqhae: wa khyodang cao" yang: gyo" lo" ako" . Aimung: myug: shi: jham re ngho' jham li" yang: gaug zo" pye' ko" ra" .
Daqhae: wa myid zhai: mathau: ra" laug qan" dao mae gyo" lo" ako"- Myid zhai: mathau yang: ajao" yao: yaug: thug' li" ra" .
Ngadqere: ba thaung: li" lao" lhe' mhai: pye' mung:- agyi: no, sho' macin" ruyang kyaug' shid: byaug: ako" .
Daqhae: wa zau: bye, gyo: mae gyo" lo" ako"- Zau: bye, jham yaug: qi" li" mung: qhovo: pan jham re hab' pye' ako" .
Ngadqere: myug: shi: daqhae: wa myid gai mae gyo" lo" ako"- Yaug: li" mung: daqhae: wa dayo nho"- daqhae: wa khyaug' xe nho"- gatau daqhae: wa sam xe nho" ashi: zaui" li" ako" .
No: khye' de, ko" re wa gyo" yu ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao" mho"zo: qe wa Yesu jhao" te' ye: mung:- Mo, byu qere nao pe"mung: dao: tau" ci yang: ta" i? ga: yao: re myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re tau: mung:- naonhaung" wa mug: gaung: mung"dan: no; thao" ra" khyo re ba: gyo: nae" akhang" qhug' yu: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa aire maqhug' yu ko" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re qo" ra" yaug re je: laung: byid: mung: yao: wa jan" sho' qo" li" nae" . Maqo" ra" yaug mae" kam" wa yao: qo" ra" gu dajhid' za: mae" lhao" alhab' re yu: pye' byid: nae" .
Yao: bam wa qu" gengadqere: mamyao- gyo: gengadqere: maba: gyo: ko" ruyang ngo wa ce: dao: tau" ci yang: ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Amung: Lapa Esaia ta" ru wa- yao: bam mae jab byang" lo: ra" . Esaia Lapa dao: wa Cebam wa tae" gyo: gengadqere: maba: gyo: genae"- Yao: bam qu" gengadqere: mamyao genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- yao: bam: nhag' lam: nhag' cad' cad' ru we' yao: bam: no: khye' va: mung:- yao: bam: myo, jid' cam" ci: ako" . Airu mangad: lo: yao: bam: myo, jid: myao mung: yao: bam: nokhye' gyo: yang:- yao: bam: aung khug nhag' lam: mae ba: gyo: ko" ngad: re wa yao: bam wa ngore khug ngha: lo: li" genae"- Ailao" ngo wa yao: bam re gai byid: nae" ga: ta" to" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Naonhaung" myo,jid' myao mung: naonhaung" no: khye' gyo: ko" ruyang naonhaung" wa ngaui lho" ko" ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa naonhaung" no: khye' gyo: ko" ruyang naonhaung" the' myao: ra" ja: re lapa qe we' Mao" So: byu qe myo: sho' mo, gyai myao nug: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam maqo" myao ko" ngad: ra"- amung: naonhaung" the' gyo" ra" ja: rere: yao: bam gyai gyo: nug ko" ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam maqo" the' gyo: gengad: ra" .
Amung: myug: shi: sin: yaug: dao: tau" lajheim: re tae" gyo" yu ge,-
Khyodang cao" yang: gyo" lo" ra" myug: shi" jham wa Ai: mung"dan: lau dao: re the' gyo: gengadqere: aire maba: gyo" yu: ra" mo, ngad: ako" . Satan wa li" mung: yao: bam: nhag' lham: khug mae sin" ke' to" ra" mung"dan: mungdao: myug: shi: jham re yu: pye' byid' ra" .
Myid zhai: mathau: ra" laug qan" dao mae gyo" lo" ra" myug: shi: jham wa mung"dan: lau dao: re the' gyo" yu we' ai jao" yao: ngaui bau: za: khae" yu: ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Ngadqere: ai: mung"dan: lau dao: wa yao: bam: nhag' lam: khug mae no, sho' agyi: macin" mung: myao" sho' maqo" yaug: jo, gengad: ra" . Ai: mung"dan: lau dao" mathao mae qug: khai" ru we' yhin" ru qhug' lo lao" yao: bam wa phyad za: dam: phaug' lo" ako" .
Zau: bye, gyo: mae gyo" lo" ra" myug: shi: jham wa ai: mung"dan: lau dao: re the' gyo" yu ngadqere: yao: bam byu na ban qhid' mae" myid: qug: myid: ci" ru we' ngaui qhang jo,nho" magan: mago" qo" nug: ruyang ai: mungdao: re hab' pye' mung: ashi: maqo" zaui" ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Amung: myid gai mae gyo" lo" ra" myug: shi: jham wa ai: mung"dan: lau dao: re gyo" yu mung: ba gyo" yu mo, ngad: ako" . Yao: bam wa ashi: zaui" li" mung: daqhae: wa dayo nho"- daqhae: wa khyaug' xe nho" daqhae: wa sam xe nho" myo" laug: lo: ako" .
Yesu wa dao: tau" gatau we' yao: bam re dam: ta" ra" . Mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa ceru we' dau: ra" . Byu dayaug wa- yao" yo mae gaug gai yesin" to" ra" .
Ngadqere: myi" re byu alhab' yab: myhid' jo, ra" au: geim lau gye wa li" mung: gaug yo mae myo, shi: jham re li" sin: co' mung: lo" byaug: ra" .
Gaug gae jham yaug: qi" li" mung: gaug nhae thug' li" lao"- ai: myo, gae jham re: myao: thug' li" ra" .
Alao" yosang: jeim qe wa lo mung: Asang we"- ni" yo mae nao gaug myug: gai asin" to" mangad: i? Aire myo, gae jham wa khai: mae" yaug: li" ko" ra" i? ga: yao: re ta" ako" .
Alao" yao: wa yao" jeim qere- Aiwa geim lau gye: yang kad' ru ngad: ra" ga: tau" ra" . Jeim qe wa ngonhaung" ai: myo, gae jham re yephan" pye' zai i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yosang wa daye: phan" pye' ge, Pe"mung: ga"re myo, gae jham re phan" lao"- gaug gae jham damyo" re: boban" lo" zai ngad: ra" .
Yad yo, joe" sho' gaug we' myo, gae shid' ja" geim" daga" yaug: qi" li" vageshao:- Gaug yad yo, joe" lo lao"- gaug yad okaung qere myo, gae jham re shi" sao qhid' phan" dang" yu mung: myi: mae ngha" pye' ge,- ai: thao gaug re yad: zhang: yu: mung: nga" jhi mae ke' to: ge,- ein: ngo ta" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa dao: tau" gatau we' yao: bam re dam: ta" ra" . Mao" So: mung"dan: wa ceru we' dau: ra" . Byu dayaug wa ao: shi: jid' re yao" yo mae yesin" ke' ra" .
Ao: shi: jid' wa myug: shi: jid' alhab' tho' mae ngai: thao" ra" myug: shi: jid' ngadqere: agae yaug: qi" li" lao"- ao: pho' gae alhab' tho' mae je: qi" ra" agae boe" li" ra" . Ngho' jham wa yao" akaung jham mae asad' li" sad' ako" .
Yesu wa dao: tau" gatau ci yang: yao: bam re dam: ta" ra" . Mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa ceru we' dau: ra" . Myiqe: dayaug man" yu: yu mung:- cin man" phaui: datang mae ke' mung: yang: lhag' ke' lao" cin man" alhab' geim" re bai" do, li" nhao: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa cegu: alhab' re dao: tau" ci yang: mo, byu qere ta" kyo" ra" . Dao: tau" maci lo: daja: rere: yao: bam re mata" kyo: ngad: ra" .
Yao: ceru: kad' ru wa Ngo wa dao: tau" ci yang: nga" nhad' thoe phung" mung: mug: myid phan" to" ra" ba na mae" nyham" to" ra" ja: re ngo ta" pheim: kyo: nae"- ga" ra" Lapa dao: jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa mo, byu qere to: co' mung: yham khug khyo vao lo" ra" . Yao" mho"zo: qe wa yao: jhao" te' lo mung:- ai: myo, gae jham: dao: tau" lajheim: ngonhaung" re pheim: kyo: byid: la, ga: mho' ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa gaug myug: gai sin: yaug wa ai: Byu: Yao: Zo: ngad: ra" .
Amung: yothaung: pa: wa ce: mug: myid dao ngad: ra"- Gaug myug: gai wa Mao" So: mung"dan: zo: dau qe ngad: ako"- Myo, gae jham wa yui Satan" nho: zo: dau qe ngad: ako" .
Aire sin: yaug wa yui Satan ngad: ra" . Gaug yad yo, wa mug: myid thao" lo" ra" ba na ngad: ra"- amung: gaug yad o: kaung qe wa mug: lagyo: qe ngad: ako" .
Ai: myo, gae jham re phan" dang" yu mung: myi: mae ngha" pye' ru we' dakhyo: mug: myid thao" lo" ra" ba na mae re: ai: yui Satan" nho: zo: dau qere myi: mae ngha" pye' li" nae" .
Byu: Yao: Zo: wa yao" mug: lagyo: jham re nhao: ke' mung:- su re qobo kad' nhao: ra" mo, we' magai: ra" mau" zo" kad' ra" mo, re yao" mung"dan: khug mae" khyin: thug' yu mung:
Yao: bam re myi: khyeim" mae pye' zaui: pye' li" nae"- aimae yao: bam ngug byid ngug nhe' we' zaui kyag' genae" .
Alao"- din: man: ra" mo, wa Pho" Mao" So: mung"dan: mae ba we' dakhyo: zho: na: li" genae"- no: khye' de, ko" re wa gyo" yu ge,-
Mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa ceru we' dau: ra" . Byu dayaug wa yo mae nyhab' to" ra" jo,nho" re yethe' myao lao"- yao: wa dam: nghoe' to: co' mung: ngaui bau" ru we' lo mung: yao: qo" gu: alhab' re lo: aung" pye' yang:- ai: yo re yevai: yu: ra" .
Mao" So: mung"dan: wa ceru we' re: dau: ra" . Phaga: byu dayaug wa phug' de; ra" palhe" re qho: na: ra" .
Yao: wa phug' de; ra" palhe" re qho: myao lao"- yao: qo" ra" gu: alhab' re lo" aung" pye' mung: ai: phug' de; ra" palhe" re yevai: yu: ra" .
Aimae"- mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa ceru we' dau: ra" . Ngo: kung" mo, wa yao: bam: geim re tham: khug mae ye: khyo" to: lao"- ngo: myo: sho' ja: myi" ako" .
Ngo: jham byang" sho' myi" gelao"- yao: bam wa tham: yae gyagao: yo khyo she: to' yu mung: zaung: jo, yang:- gai: ra" ngo: jham re gyan khug mae ke' to: mung:- magai: ra" ngo: jham re wa khyin: shapye' ko" ra" .
Mug: myid thao" lo" ra" ba na mae re:- ai we' dakhyo: ngad nae"- Mug: lagyo: jham wa makhyang" ra" mo, re din: man" ra" mo; phaung mae" li" khyin: zhang: yu mung:-
Myi: khyeim" khug khyo pye' zaui: pye' li" genae" . Aimae yao: bam wa ngug byid ngug nhe' we' zaui kyag' li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re naonhaung" cegu: alhab' re ba: gyo: ko" i? ga: myid' ra" . Alao" yao: bam wa ba: gyo"- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa airumung:- mug: gaung: mung"dan: mho"zo: boe" lo" ra" tung" pho" khag' ngadqere: yao" kyaung" lhaung" qe, khug mae" zai sag' zai kug jham re phoe' yu: ra" yham sang dayaug we' dau: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa ai: dao: tau" jham re bin: ta" lao"- yao: wa ai: jo, qo mae" thug' lo" mung:-
Yao" vogaung: khyo dam: tug' joe" lo: ra" . Yao: wa Tarha" Jung Yham mae mho" shid' byid' ra" . The' gyo" ra" mo, alhab' mug: hao" byaug: ako" . Amung: yao: bam wa yao: wa airu" ra" pha,jhi" khai: mae" ba: yu: laug i? Mug' pho: ve, lho jham re khoru: qo" kad' laug i?
Yao: wa lag sama yao: zo: mangad: i? Yao: nhaung: bam wa Yaku- Yoseb- Simon we'- Yuda bam mangad: ge, i?
Yao: nhae: mo" bam re: cemae nyhao: nhaung" we' daga" za: na: bam: ru mangad: i? Aire yao: wa cejham re khai: mae" qo" yu: laug i? ga: ta" mung: yao: re yao: bam ngag: pye' ako" .
Amung: Yesu wa yao: bam re Lapa wa yao: yao" vogaung: we' yao: yao" yham mae" je mung: khyi" khao: ngo" mae nga: ye; ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa yao: re lam khug: myid mabo ko" ruyang yao: wa ai: vogaung: mae mug' pho: mau" myo: sho' mazaui" qhu" ngad: ra" .
Ai: ayo, re Galile mung" re eib: na: ra" Herod wa Yesu khyo re the' gyo" ra" .
Alao" yao: wa yao" zug: qere ceyaug wa qid nyhab' byid: yaug Yohan ngad: ra"- yao: wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ru ngad: ra" . Airumung:- yao: wa mug' pho: mau" zo" jham kad' ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Herod wa yao: nhaung: Philib yham sang myhi" mathao mae Yohan re taung" yu mung: thaung: khug mae lhaung" to" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yohan wa Herod re- Ni" nhaung" nho: yham sang myhi" Herodia re magai: ngho" ngad: ra" ga: ta" ruyang ngad: ra" .
Herod wa Yohan re se' pye' nug: ra" . Ngadqere: Yuda mung" byu qere gyaug yang: mavae" se' pye' ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa Yohan re lapa ngad: ga: jho: na geyang: ngad: ra" .
Herod khau: ra" ba na mae Herodia nho: myiqe: zo: wa alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae li" go" nhan" qhu" ra" . Herod wa airu re gyai qu" ngaui: ra" .
Alao" Herod wa ai: myiqe: nau" re nao ngore mho' ra" jhaung qhu" pe" ja: ngadqere: nao re ngo byid: nae"- ga: jham tang: yang: yao: re dao: so: byid' ke' ra" .
Ai: myiqe: nau" wa yao: myhi" yang jhan" nhao: ru we' dakhyo: yao: wa qid nyhab' byid: yaug Yohan: au: re ban dao mae kai: yang: cemae ana" yao: ngore byid: la, ga:- mho' ra" .
Kho: kham pho" wa nhag' lam: gyai myid: qug: ngadqere: yao" bang" vo qe: qhid' kheim: mae jham tang: yang: dao: so: byid' pye' va" ruyang myiqe: nau" mho' ru we' dakhyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ke' ra" .
Alao" Herod wa Yohan: au: re thaung: khug mae" ye: phyid' yu nhao mung:-
Ban dao mae kai: yang: ai: myiqe: nau" re byid' ako" . Yao: wa yu: yu mung: yao: myhi" re lo" kai" byid' ra" .
Yohan: mho"zo: qe wa ai: mao gaung re yegaug: yu mung:- nyhab' shaung: pye' ako" . Ai: thao yao: bam wa Yesu jhao" ye: mung: lau dao: ye: ta" kyo" ako" .
Yesu wa Yohan: khyo re the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa ai: jo, qo mae" cae: tae" ra" dajo, qo khyo yao: dayaug za: lha jui: yang: thug' ye" lo" ra" . Ai: khyo re mo, byu qe the' gyo: gelao"- vo khao: ngo" mae" mo, byu qe wa taung gaung khyo" yao" thao cao" ye" ako" .
Yesu lha khug mae" thug' lo we' byu phung: mo" re myao lao"- yao: bam re nhag' qu" khyag' mung: yao: wa yao: bam: no phyo: re gai byid: ra" .
Myi" thao joe" lo lao"- yao" mho"zo: qe wa yao: jhao" lo mung: ce: jo, qo wa din"pyad' yo ngad: ru we' ba re: vao: lo" va" ra"- Airu: mung:- ce: mo, byu qere vogaung: jham khyo zo: ve ye: vai zo: geshao:- yao: bam re nhao: ke' wa,- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa mho"zo: qere Yao: bam ye: maca"- yao: bam re naonhaung" yao: zo: ve byid: zho: ge, ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Alao" mho"zo: qe wa ngonhaung" mug ngo" khai" we' ngo shid' dau: za: aqo"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa ai: mug we' ngo: cekhyo cilo geri:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa mo, byu qere vohau: yo mae zaung nhao mung:- ai: mug ngo" khai" we' ngo shid' dau: re yu yang: mug: gaung khyo tau: qu" mung: Mao" So re jeju caung: byid' ra" . Mug re khyoe' phai" yang: yao" mho"zo: qere byid' ra"- Mho"zo: qe wa mo, byu qere gae byid' ako" .
Yaug khao: ngo" gyi: sho' zo" ako" . Ai: thao mho"zo: qe wa zo" tang" ra" mug aje, abai" jham re daxe: shid' gyan byang" sho' gaug: zhang: yu: ako" .
Myiqe: zoshao qe manghe' lo:- mug zo" ra" mo, yauggai qeza: ngo" taung ko ngad: ako" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa- mo, byu qere nhao: ke' zo" re"- yao" mho"zo: qere- lha dao do; zaung mung: tham: thoete' khyo gau" ye" lo" na genae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' ra" .
Mo, byu qere phao nhao: ke' thao re- Yesu wa akyu" mho' nae" qhid' mae" yao: za:- bug gaung dalam: khyo do, ye" lo" ra" . Myi" thao mug: cad' lo: re Yesu wa yao: za: ai: jo, qo mae na: jo; ra" .
Mho"zo: qe zaung: ra" lha wa gyagao: mae" gyai va" byaug: ava" . La mayo" mung: la: yang lham: deim" thaug' ruyang lha re bang: lhung" jham lobe; ako" .
Ne, kao mug: bo" zo" re- Yesu wa qid dao mae khyo su: mung: mho"zo: qejhao" lo: ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa subyo ngad: ra"- ga: mung: gyaug yang: gyi: hug' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re nhag' dangai ge,- ngo angad: dagyaug ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Petru wa Asang we" nao ngad: re wa qid dao khyo" nao jhao" ngo su" lo nae" khai: ke' la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa lo ri:- ga: khai: ke' ra" . Alao" Petru wa lha khug mae" gyo" mung: qid dao mae khyo su: yang: Yesu jhao" ye" ra" .
