Ngadqere: Petru wa la thin: rure myao lao"- qu" gyaug: li" mung: qid khug khyo nab: vao lo" na: ra" . Alao" yao: wa Asang we"- ngore khyad' yu la,- ga: hug' ke' ra" .
Ailao" jao" Yesu wa lo, yheim" ke' yang: Petru re zaui" yu mung:- Lam khug: myid ngai: ra" yaug we"- nao pe"mung: aug' o: na: i? ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Yesu we' Petru lha khug khyo joe" vao lo lao"- la wa tae" lo" byaug: ra" .
Lha khug mae" mho"zo: qe wa Yesu re goe; pa" mung: Nao wa gaigai: yao: Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu we' mho"zo: qe wa tham: re gau" phyid' lo" mung:- Genesared mae lothang: ako" .
Vo byu qe wa Yesu re qu" xam: geyang:- avai: ayae vogaung: jham khyo byu nhao: ke' mung:- no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, alhab' re Yesu jhao" jhui" lo: ako" .
Yao: bam wa no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, alhab' re yao" mai bau: thao mae khalhao" tin" yu nhao nae" qhid' mae" Yesu re mho' ako" . Qo" tin" yu: ra" mo, alhab' re: no phyo: gai: byaug: ako" .
Alao"- Yerusalem mae" Pharishe qe damyo" we' Tung" Pho" qe wa Yesu jhao" joe" lo mung:-
Yesu re- Ni" mho"zo: qe wa phug' phyid' qe: thung" li" jham re pe"mung: maphug' cao" ko" ra" i? Yao: bam wa lo, macid' lo: zo zo: ko" ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re tau: mung:- aire naonhaung" wa pe"mung: Mao" So: amyin" dao: jham re to" pye' mung: naonhaung" yao" thung" li jham re phug' cao" ko" i?
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa ni" myhi" we' ni" pho" re phug' myao: wa,- yao: myhi" we' yao: pho" re nhad' dao: thoe: yang shad' yaug khag' ngadqere: se' pye' ru qhug' shao: ga: ta" to" ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" mho" shid' ru wa byu dayaug yaug yao: myhi" we' yao: pho" re bao" thaug' nae" zai daja: ja: qo" ngadqere:- ai wa Mao" So re qhaug' byid' to: va" zai ngad: ga: ta" lao"-
Ai: yaug wa yao: myhi" we' yao: pho" re bao" thaug' maca"- ga: mho" shid' ako" . Airu: mung: naonhaung" wa naonhaung" yao" thung" li jham re qo" phug' cao" nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: amyin" dao: jham re kyae" khyo" pye' ako" .
Geim kad' mo, we"- naonhaung" khyo we' sin: mung: Mao" So wa Lapa Esaia nhad' khyo" Ce: amyu" wa nhad' dao: thoe: yang za: ngore phug' myao" ako" .
Yao: bam: nhag' lam: kam" wa gaigai: yao: ngo we' gyai va" kyo: na: ako" .
Yao: bam wa byu: yang kad' to" ra" thung" li jham re nga" amyin" dao: jham we' dakhyo: mho" byid' ako" . Airumung: yao: bam ngore goe; pa" ru wa akeim ngad: ra"- ga: ta" to" ru wa gyai dang: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa mo, byu qere yao: jhao" khai: yu mung: yao: bam re tae" gyo: yang: ba: gyo" yu ge,
Nhad' khug khyo" vao lo: ra" ja: wa byu re masan masin" boe" nhao: ru mangad:- Nhad' mae" thug' li" ra" ja: kam" wa byu re masan masin" boe" nhao: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" mho"zo: qe wa Yesu jhao" lo mung: nao ceru: ta" ruyang Pharishe qe nhag' gyo" no ko" rure nao ba: i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- Mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" nga" Pho" maqho" to" ra" agae jham alhab' wa phan" pye' ru qhug' nae" .
Yao: bam re damyid: ci" ge,- yao: bam wa myo, jid qere khyo jhui" ra" myo, jid qe ngad: ako" . Myo, jid yaug wa myo, jid re khyo jhui" ngad: re wa shid' zo" geim" dung: khung: mae byid: gyo" lo" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Petru wa ce: dao: tau" lajheim: ngonhaung" re pheim: kyo: byid: la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa naonhaung" ana" joe" sho' su gatau tho' maje: ba: gyo: shi: genhaung i?
Byu: nhad' khyo" vao lo: ra" gu: alhab' wa vae dug: khug khyo vao lo" mung: ngha ye: jo, qo khyo dam: thug' lo" rure naonhaung" maba ko" i?
Ngadqere: byu: nhad' mae" thug' li" ra" ja: alhab' wa- nhag' lam: aung khug mae" thug' li" ru ngad: ra" . Amung: aijham wa byu re masan masin" boe" nhao: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re byu: nhag' lam: aung khug mae" makhyang" ra" myid byu se' ru- myi: shad' lao shad' ru- seim lai qho: ru- su: zai khug' ru- madang: ra" sagse: kham: ru- su re gaui mho: ru jham thug' li" ra" .
Aijham wa byu re masan masin" boe" nhao: ra"- Lo, macid' lo: zo zo" ru wa- byu re masan masin" maboe" nhao ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa ai: jo, qo mae" thug' lo" mung:- Ture we' Sidon mang: khaung: khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Ai: mang: mae na: ra" Khanan myiqe: dayaug wa- Yesu jhao" li" mung:- Davi yao: zo: Asang we"- ngore nhag' khyag' yu la, wo"- nga" myiqe: zo: wa yui vao: jaung" mung: qu" gyaug sho' no: na: ra"- ga: zag: hug' ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa pe" re: maphaug' tau: ngad: ra" . Alao" yao" mho"zo: qe wa yao: jhao" te' lo mung: yao: re- Ai: myiqe: myhi" re phao nhao: ke' wa,- pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa ngonhaung" thao mae cao" zag: hug' na: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa Israel byumyu" mae" byaug: lo" ra" yao jham: qhid' mae" za: ngore nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Myiqe: myhi" wa Yesu khyid qao: mae li" goe; jo, mung:- Asang we"- ngore bao" yu la,- ga: Yesu re mho' ra" .
Yesu wa- yao: re- zoshao qe: zo: ve re yu: yu mung: lakha: jham re byid' pye' nae" magai ngad: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Myiqe: myhi" wa- Ngad: ra"- Asang we"- Lakha: jham lhao" re: yao: bam: asang: zozo: jaung: mae" gyo" ra" zosheim jham re qo" gaug zo" ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: re- Nao wa lam khug: myid qi" ra" myiqe: ngad: ra"- nao o: ru we' dakhyo: boe" lo vashao:- ga: ta" ra" . Ai: ayo, mae" yao" myiqe: zo: wa gai: lo" byaug: ra" .
Yesu ai: jo, qo mae" thug' lo" mung:- Galile tham: yae cao" yang: su" lo" ra" . Amung: yao: wa bug gaung dalam: khyo do, ye: mung: yezaung: jo, ra" .
Byu phung: mo" zang wa- khyid qeim- lo, qeim- myo, jid mo, gaung dau qeim mo,- nhad' jid mo, we' gatau no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, myo: sho' re jhui" li" mung: Yesu khyid qao: mae li" nha: to" ako" . Yesu wa yao: bam alhab' re gai byid' ra" .
Amung:- nhad' jid mo, dao: jhau: li" ru- gaung dau qeim mo, dam: gai: lo: ru- khyid qeim mo, khyo su" li" ru- myo, jid qe myo, myao: li" ko" rure- mo, byu qe the' myao gelao"- yao: bam mug' hao" byaug: ako"- amung: yao: bam wa- Israel nho: Mao" So: phungbao re caung: khin" byid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: Qere: yao: jhao" khai: yu: mung: yao: bam re ce: mo, byu qe wa ngo we' daga" na: ru sam ba ngad va" . Ana" yao: bam zo: ve maqo" lo ko" ngad: ra" . Airumung: ngo yao: bam re nhag' khyag' ra" . Ngo wa yao: bam re zo: ve mazho: lo: manug: phao nhao: ke'- pe"mung: ga"re- yao: bam khyole; mae vae: moe' myad gazai ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa- Yesu re ceqhi" laug: ra" byu phung: mo" zang re gyi: sho' zho: nae" zo: ve ceru" ga" din"pyad' yo mae ngonhaung" khai: mae" qo" nae" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re naonhaung" mug khonho" qo" ko" i? ga: myid' ra"- Yao: bam wa mug nhad' khai" we' ngo: nau" dajhid' zo: qo"- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa mo, byu qere myid gaung mae zaung: jo, nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ke' ra" .
Yao: wa mug nhad' khai" we' ngo: re yu: yu mung:- Mao" So re jeju bin: caung: byid: lao" mug we' ngo: re khyoe' phai" mung: mho"zo: qere byid' ra" . Mho"zo: qe wa mo, byu qere gae byid' ako" .
Yao: bam alhab' mo, gyi: sho' zo" ako" . Mho"zo: qe wa mo, byu qe zo" tang" ra" aje, abai" jham nhad' gyan byang" sho' gaug zhang: yu: ako" .
Myiqe: zoshao re manghe' lo: mug zo" ra" mo, wa yauggai za: byid taung ko ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa mo, byu qere phao nhao: ke' mung: yao: wa lha zaung yang: Magadan mang: khyo gau" ye" lo" ra" .
Pharishe qe damyo" we' Saduke qe wa Yesu jhao" li" mung: yao: re jham" qu" zo" re"- yao: bam wa Yesu re- Nao wa Mao" So: yang nhao: ke' yaug ngad: rure ba nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" re mug: gaung mae" mug' pho: ve, lho kad' qhu" la,- ga: mho' ako" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- myi" thao ba vao: lo" au: re mug: gaung ne lao"- mug: gyang: naemyao:- ga: naonhaung" ta" mung:-
Ne, kao re mug: gaung mae mug: no, lao"- mug: qu- la qam" lo naemyao:- ga: naonhaung" ta" ako" . Naonhaung" wa mug: gaung re qu" yang: ba zho mug: qu re qo" ba: ta" ako" . Ngadqere: ana" ban: mae" ve, lho jham we' sin: mung: yang: wa naonhaung" maba: pheim ngad: ako" .
Ce: pyad mae" byu qe wa makhyang" ru we' Mao" So mabo: ra" mo, ngad: ako"- ngadqere: Yona mug' pho: ve, lho mae" je yang: pe" mug' pho: ve, lho re: naonhaung" re ngo maqhu" byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" . Ai: thao Yesu wa yao: bam mae" thug' lo" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa tham: thoete' khyo gau" joe" ye" ako" . Yao: bam wa mug yu: vin nae" to" myhid' pye' ko" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Pharishe qe we' Saduke qe: man" re lha" yang: jao" pye' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa ngonhaung" mug mavin yang: yao: ceru: ta" ru ngad: ra"- ga: yao: bam yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Yao: bam yao: cao: airu: jho" ta" na ko" rure Yesu ba lao"- Yesu wa yao: bam re lam khug: myid ngai: ra" mo, we"- naonhaung" pe"mung: yang: mug mayu: vin: ra" khyo re jho" ta" na ko" i?
Naonhaung" ana" re: maba: gyo: shi: genhaung i? Mug ngo" khai" re ngo cug' phai" mung: byu ngo" taung re zho" ra" au:- naonhaung" khonho" gyan byang" sho' qo" gaug: zhang: yu shiko" rure mabeim: ge, i?
Amung: ai: mug nhad' khai" re ngo cug' phai" mung: byu byid taung re zho" ra" au: naonhaung" khonho" gyan byang" sho' qo" gaug: zhang: yu shi: ko" rure re: mabeim: ge, i?
Mug we' sin: yang: ngo ta" na: ru mangad' rure naonhaung" pe"mung: maba: gyo: ko" i? Pharishe qe we' Saduke qe: man" re naonhaung" jao" pye' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" mho"zo: qe wa mug kad' rumae ci: ra" man" re jao" pye' nae" qhid' mae" ta" ru mangad: lo: Pharishe qe we' Saduke qe: mho" shid' ra" khyo re jao" pyae' nae" qhid' mae" Yesu ta" peim: byid' na: rure ba: gyo" yu: ako" .
Yesu wa Kesarea- Philipi mang: khyo joe" lo lao"- yao" mho"zo: qere Byu qe wa Byu Yao: Zo: re khag' ngad: ra" ga: ta" na ko" ra" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa tau: mung: damyo" wa qid nyhab' byid' yaug Yohan ngad: ra"- Damyo" wa Elia ngad: ra"- Damyo" wa Yeremia mangad: lao"- gatau Lapa dayaug yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" na: ako"- ga ta: ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- aire naonhaung" wa ngo khag' ngad: ein: ta" ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Simon Petru wa Nao wa kao so' daui: na: ra" Mao" So: Yao: Zo: Meshia ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa- Yona nho: yauggai zo: Simon we"- nao wa ngaui lho" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ce: dangman" rure nao re xao su byu: yang qhu" byid' ru mangad:- Mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" nga" Pho" yang nao re qhu" byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Amung: ngo nao re ta" li"- nao wa Petru laug zang ga" ru ngad: ra" . Ngo wa ce: laug zang dao mae nga" Phung: re te" to: nae" shid: ru wa ai: phung: re maqo" aung: pye' nae" .
Ngo wa nao re mug: gaung: mung"dan: kham: thug' jham re byid: nae" Myid gaung dao mae nao tam" to" ra" gu: alhab' re mug: gaung dao mae re: Mao" So wa tam" to" li" nae" . Amung: myid gaung dao mae nao akhang" byid' ra" gu: alhab' rere: mug: gaung dao mae akhang" byid' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: Meshia ngad: rure khag' rere: mata" kyo: genae" qhid' mae" yao" mho"zo: qere jhaug' za: zug' nhao: ra" .
Yesu ai: ayo, mae" yao" mho"zo: qere ngo wa Yerusalem khyo ye: mung:- Yuda au: jhaung lau: de, qe- khinjaung agyi qe we' tung" pho" qe: lo, mae khyag' qhui: ru myo: sho' kham zo: ca" nae" . Amung: ngo wa se' ru qhug' nae"- ngadqere: sam ba thao re ngo wa dam: taui: to' ke' ru qhug' nae"- ga: de: de: za: ta" ra" .
Alao" Petru wa Yesu re dadug khyo jhui" yu mung: Asang we"- nao ta" ru: maboe" nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So tam" pye' vashao:- nao wa airu: khonhae" re: magai: boe" nae" ga: qeim: ra" .
Yesu wa lhang: lo mung: Petru re Satan we"- ngo mae" thug' lo" wa,- nao wa nga" khyo mae kaung: kag' yaug ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re nao wa Mao" So shad' khyo" mamyid lo: byu: shad' khyo" za: myid ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere nga" thao cao" nug: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: yao" qhid' mae" ha: pye' mung: yang: yao" pyao: zang re tau: vo, mung: nga" thao cao" ca" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: yao" kao so' khyad' yu nug: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: kao so' jeim: nae" . Nga" mathao mae kao so' jeim" ra" yaug kam" wa kao so' qo" yu nae" .
Alao"- byu wa mug: myid alhab' geim" re qo" sang: yu ngadqere: yao" kao so' jeim" byaug: ngad: re wa pe" akyu" bo nae" i?
Byu: Yao: Zo: wa yao: Pho" phungbao we' yao" mug: lagyo: jham we' daga" joe" li" zai ngad:- Alao" yao: wa byu yaug khao: ngo" re yao: yao: kad' ra" mau" zo" we' dakhyo: aphug' dam: tug' byid' li" nae" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang dang ta" geli"- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa kho: kham khyo" joe" li" rure maqhug' myao geshi: re- cemae bo: ra" mo, mae" damyo" wa mashid genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Khyaug' ba kyo thao re Yesu wa Petru- Yaku we' yao: nhaung: Yohan bam re za: jhui: mung: myhao ra" bam khyo jhui" do, ye" ra" .
Yao: bam: qhid' kheim: mae yao:- Yesu ve, bao tha" lo" byaug: ra" . Yao" myo,khung: wa ba we' dakhyo: zho mung:- yao" mai bau: wa bao: bao: phyu: li" ra" .
Moshe we' Elia wa Yesu we' dao: jho" jhau: na ko" rure yao: bam myao: ako" .
Alao" Petru wa Yesu re Asang we"- ngonhaung" ce: jo, qo mae na: re gai: ra"- nao nug: ngad: re wa Asang: qhid' mae" dalam:- Moshe qhid' mae" dalam:- Elia qhid' mae" dalam:- zaung sam zaung ce: jo, qo mae- ngo kad' nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Petru airu: jhau: na shi" au:- Qu" ge,- bao qhui: ra" jham dathaui: yao: bam: dao mae losham: nghoe' ra" . Jham thaui: khug mae"- ceyaug wa ngo jhid' de; ra" nga" Zo: ngad:- ngo yao: re gyai o ngaui: ra"- yao" dao: re tae" gyo: ge,- ga: jhau: thug' li" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe ai: thoe re the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam wa gyaug: nin" byaug mung: myid gaung mae goe; jo; bam: ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam jhao" lo mung:- yao: bam re lotin: yang:- To" ge, dagyaug ge,- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: bam tau: qu" ke' ko" re- Yesu mae" je yang: gatau khag' rere: mathe' myao loko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam- bam dao mae" tug' gyo" lo: na ko" au:- Yesu wa yao: bam re- Byu: Yao: Zo: shid: rumae" madam: daui: to" li" shire- naonhaung" myao: ra" ai: ve, lho we' sin: mung: khag' rere: data" kyo: ge,- ga: zug' nhao: ra" .
Alao" mho"zo: qe wa Yesu re- aire Elia shi" sao qhid' joe" li" zai ngad: ga:- tung" pho" qe pe"mung: ta" ko" ra" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Elia wa gaigai: yao: sao qhid' joe" li" mung:- ja: khao: ngo" alhab' re jin" jin" seim" to: zai ngad:-
Ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli" Elia wa gaigai: yao: joe" li" ava" ngadqere: yao: bam yao: re maba geyang: yao: bam nug: khyo" yao: re kad' avako"- Byu: Yao: Zo: rere: ai we' dakhyo: yao: bam kad' li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- qid nyhab' byid: yaug Yohan nho: khyo re ta" na: rure mho"zo: qe ba; gyo" yu: ako" .
Yesu we' mho"zo: qe wa mo, byu qe na: ra" jo, qo khyo joe" lo gelao"- byu dayaug Yesu qhid' kheim: mae pad' thaug' li" thaug' yang:-
Asang we"- nga" zo: re nhag' khyag' yu byid: la,- yao: wa ngho' be, be, yaug ngad mung: myi: mae re:- qid mae re: alhang lhang gyang: vao lo" qu" va" ra" . Amung: yao: wa gyai yao: kham zo: qug' na: ra" .
Yao: re ni" mho"zo: qejhao" jhui" li" ngadqere: yao: bam yao: re maqo" gai byid: ko" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu tau: mung:- Lam khug: myid mabo: ru we' shad' nghung" ra" mo, we"- ngo naonhaung" we' daga" khomyhao" joe" sho' na zai i? Ngo khomyhao" joe" sho' naonhaung" re zang: zai i? Ai: yauggai nau" re ngojhao" jhui" lo geri:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yui re phao: thug' lo" nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ke' ra"- Yui wa ai: yauggai nau" mae" phao: thug' lo" ra" . Ailao" jao"- ai: yauggai nau" wa gai: lo" byaug: ra" .
Ai: thao re mho"zo: qe wa Yesu we' yao: bam za: na ko" au:- ai: yui re ngonhaung" pe"mung: maqo" khe' thug' pye' geli" laug i? ga: Yesu re myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re naonhaung" lam khug: myid malaug: bo yang: ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ra" . Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa naonhaung" lam khug: myid ao: jid' qhi" zo: bo: ngad: re bam re cemae" thoe: khyo qui" lo" wa, ein: ta" lao" qui" lo" li" nae"- Lam khug: myid bo: ngad: re wa- naonhaung" alhab' re qo" kad' genae" .
Ce: yui re wa- akyu" mho' ru we' zo: ve jao" ruyang za: mangad: re wa gatau pe" khyo" yang re: maqo" khe' thug' pye' ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu we' mho"zo: qe Galile mung" khaung: mae daga" du" qin" ko" au:- Yesu wa yao: bam re Byu: Yao: Zo: wa su: lo, khyo ab byid' pye' ru qhug' nae" jhao" li" na va" ra" .
Yao: bam wa yao: re se' pye' li" genae"- ngadqere: yao: wa sam ba kyo thao re dam: taui: ke' ru qhug' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" mho"zo: qe wa gyai myid: kaug' ako" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe Kapena-um khyo joe" lo gelao"- Caung: pa" Yham khang: khyui mo, wa Petru jhao" li" mung:- naonhaung" mho" pho" wa Mao" So: yham khang: malhaung" ke' ra" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Petru wa lhaung" ke' ra"- ga: tau" ra" . Petru yham khug khyo vao lo" lao"- Yesu shi" Petru re lham: jhau mung:- Simon we"- nao pe" ru: myid: i? Ce: mug: myid: dao: mae" kho: kham qe wa khag' mae"- khang: khyui: yu: ako" i? Yao: bam: mung" byu qe mae" i? Mangad: lao" taung bug qe mae" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Petru wa taung bug qe mae" khyui: yu ko" ra"- ga: tau" ra" . Alao" Yesu wa Airu: ngad: re wa mung" byu qe wa make' ca" gengad: ra" .
Ngad yang: re: yao: bam: nhag' lam: mamyid: shad' genae" qhid' mae" nao tham: khyo ye: mung:- ngo myhad' taui: ye: khyo" wa, Sao qhid' myi" ra" dau: re taung" yu mung: ai: ngo: nhad' re lao" ho" ke' lao"- ngaui thang: the: dapye: re nao myao nae"- ai: ngaui re yu: yu mung:- nao we' nga" qhid' mae" Caung: pa" Yham khang: ye: ke' wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: au: re mho"zo: qe wa Yesu jhao" lo mung:- mug: gaung: mung"dan: mae qi" thao" yaug khag' ngad: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa- zoshao dayaug re khai: yu mung:- mho"zo: qe: qhid' kheim: mae yhe' to: yang:-
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa- Nhag' lam: tha" pye' mung: zoshao ru: boe" gelao" za: mug: gaung: mung"dan: khyo qo" vao genae" .
Ce: zoshao we' dakhyo:- yao: yao" nhag' lam: re goe; nyham: ra" yaug wa- Mao" So: mung"dan mae qi" thao" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ce: zoshao ru" ra" yaug re nga" mang khyo" yang khae: yu: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: ngore khae: yu: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngo re lam khug: na: ra" ce: zoshao qe mae" dayaug yaug re lam khug: myid zai" phyo' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere:- yao" lang zang: mae laug lhang qi: taui" lhao: mung: no; thao" ra" panglai: khug khyo pye' zaui: pye' qhug' ru wa yao" qhid' mae" je: gai shi" ra" .
Lam khug: myid tha" lang: nhao: ra" ja: jo; ruyang myid gaung byu qe byu xa: vaqoe, qhug' ako" . Lam khug: myid tha" lang: nhao: ra" ja: jham wa khonhae" re: jo; ra" ngadqere: lam khug: myid tha" lang: nae" boe" nhao: ra" yaug wa byu xa: vaqoe; qhug' ra" .
Ni" khyid mangad: lao" ni" lo; yang ni" lam khug: myid re zai" phyo' nhao: ngad: re wa ai: khyid lo, re qam" phyid' shalhaui" pye' wa,- Khyid lo, jab jab za: apyad ato: myi: mae pye' zaui: pye' ru qhug' nae" tho' khyid lo, majab lo:- apyad ato kao so' daui: ra" khyo vao ye: nae" ru wa ni" qhid' mae" je: gai: ra" .
Ni" myo,jid' yang ni" lam khug: myid re zai" phyo' nhao: ngad: re wa ai: myo,jid' re thad' shalhaui" pye' wa,- myo,jid' shid' shad' geim" we' myi: qid tham: mae" myi: mae pye' zaui: pye' ru qhug' nae" tho' myo,jid' dashad' za:- apyad ato kao so' daui: ra" khyo vao ye: nae" ru wa ni" qhid' mae" je: gai: ra" .
Ai: zoshao qe mae" dayaug re za: lhao" naonhaung" maphug' makhyad' makad' genae" qhid' mae" lha" ge,- ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- Mug: gaung dao mae ai: zoshao qe: mug: lagyo: jham wa mug: gaung: mung"dan: mae" nga" Pho" myo,khung: mae khonhae" re: qu" na: ako" .
( Pe"mung: ga"re- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa byaug: lo" ra" mo, re khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru ngad: )
Byu dayaug yaug yao: qo" ra" yao dayo dau: mae" dadau: byaug: lo" lao"- aiyaug pe" ru: kad' nae" ein: naonhaung" jho ko" i? Yao: wa ai: dang: ra" yao gug xe: gug dau: re bam khyid mae zad zo: nhao: to: co' mung: byaug: byaug: ra" ai: yao re yeqho: yu: li" nae" mangad: i?
Yao: wa ai: yao re yeqho: myao lao"- mabyaug: ra" yao gug xe: gug dau: re bau" ra" tho' ai: byaug: byaug: ra" yao dadau" ra" mathao mae je yang: ngaui bau" ra" ein: ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- mug: gaung dao mae" naonhaung" Pho" re:- ai: zoshao qemae" dayaug yaug byaug seim" lo" nae" lhao" manug ngad: ra" .
Ni" mao: nhaung: pho" nao re shad' ngad: re wa yao: jhao" ye: mung: ni" shid' tao myo, nho zam" zaung: jo, yang: sae za: yao" qobo re ceim" shid' byid: wa, Ni" dao: re yao: tae" gyo" yu: ngad: re wa ni" mao nhaung: pho" we' nao qo" dam: jho" vang" ra" .
Ngadqere: ni" dao: re yao: matae" gyo: ngad: re wa nao qobo zhaug' ra" khyo alhab' ngad dang: rure boba nae" qhid' mae" jham: mugsug' mae ta" to" ru we' dakhyo:- sagse: shid' yaug- sam yaug re khai: jhui" ye: wa,-
Yao: wa ai bam: dao: rere: matae" gyo: lao" wa phung: re ai: khyo alhab' yeta" kyo: wa, Phung: rere: yao: matae" gyo: lo: lao" kam" wa yao: re Mao" So maba: ra" yaug we' khang: khyui zo: yaug re we' dakhyo: to" pye' wa, .
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa myid gaung dao mae naonhaung" tam" to" ra" gu: alhab' re- Mao" So wa mug: gaung dao mae re: tam" to" li" nae"- amung: myid gaung dao mae naonhaung" akhang" byid' ra" gu: alhab' rere:- mug: gaung dao mae akhang" byid' li" nae" .
Ai: tho' mae" ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa ce: myid gaung dao mae naonhaung" shid' yaug ko za: ngad yang: re: nhag' lam: qhan: mung:- akyu" mho' ra" ja: re mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" nga" Pho" wa yao: shid' zo: re byid' li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re nga" mang mae byu shid' sam yaug zang" ham: na ko" ra" phaung mae ngo wa yao: bam we' daga" na: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Petru wa- Yesu jhao" qui" lo mung:- Asang we"- nga" mao: nhaung: pho" wa ngore ana" na" shad' ngad: re- yao: re ngo khonho" lhang joe" sho' qobo khyad' byid: zai i? Nhad' lhang joe" sho' khyad' byid' zai i? ga: Yesu re myid' ra" .
Yesu wa Petru re- nhad' lhang joe" sho' za: mangad:- nhad' xe lhang lhang mung:- nhad' lhang joe" sho' khyad' byid: ca"- ga: ta" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa yao" jeim qe we' japhin: sho' nug: ra" kho: kham dayaug we' dau: ra" .
Yao: wa japhin: sho' qhid: lo" we' ngaui myo: sho' kye' jhin de; ra" jeim dayaug re yao: jhao" jhui" lo: ako" .
Ai: jeim wa jhin xe' nae" pe" maqo" lao"- kho: kham pho" wa ai: jeim pho" we' daga" yao: myi: yao: zo: qe we' qo" ra" zai alhab' re aung" pye' mung: jhin xe' vashao: ga: amyin" khyo" ke' ra" .
Alao" ai: jeim pho" wa kho: kham pho" qhid' kheim: mae pad' thaug' thaug' mung:- ngore nhag' khyag' yu shi: la,- Jhin alhab' zaung: sho' ngo nao re xe' byid: nae"- ga: goe; mho' ra" .
Kho: kham pho" wa yao: re nhag' khyag' yang:- yao" jhin alhab' re khyad' pye' byid: mung: phao nhao: ke' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: wa thug' lo" mung:- yao: re ngaui dayo jhin de, ra" yao" jeim byin cao: dayaug we' qhug' lao"- yao: wa aiyaug re zaui" yu mung: lang zang mae nhag' ci yang:- jhin phyad xe' la, ga: mho' ra" .
Yao" jeim byin cao: wa pad' thaug' thaug' mung:- ngore nhag' khyag' yu shi: la,- Jhin alhab' zaung: sho' ngo nao re xe' byid: nae"- ga: mho' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: wa maqad ha: pye' mung: jhin alhab' re bin xe' sho' yao: re thaung: khug mae lhaung" to" ra" .
Airu re jeim gatau qe the' myao gelao"- yao: bam wa nhag' lam: qu" no gemung:- yao: bam the' myao: ra" gu: alhab' kho: kham pho" re lo" ta" kyo" ako" .
Alao" kho: kham pho" wa ai: jeim re khai: yu mung:- makhyang" ra" jeim we"- nao ngore goe; mho' ruyang ni" jhin alhab' re ngo khyad' pye' byid: va" .
Nao re ngo nhag' khyag' ru we' dakhyo: nao re: ni" jeim byin cao: pho" re nhag' gai: khyag' ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
kho: kham pho" wa gyai nhag' yo: mung:- ai: jeim re jhin bin: xe' sho' thaung: khug mae lhaung" to" ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" khag' ngadqere: mao: nhaung: pho" shad' ra" qobo re gaigai: yao: makhyad' byid: ko" ngad: re wa mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" nga" Pho" re:- naonhaung" shad' ra" qobo re makhyad' byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa ai: dao: jham re bin: ta" lao"- Galile mung" mae" thug' lo" mung:- Yodan gyaung: thoete' mae" Yuda mung" khyo joe" ye" ra" .
Byu phung: mo" zang wa yao" thao cao" ako"- aitau mae Yesu wa no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, re gai byid' ra" .
Pharishe qe damyo" li" mung:- yao: re jham" qu" ako" . Pe" qobo khyo" ngad ngad yao: myid: o: ra" khyo"- yao" yham sang myhi" re gai: kao" pye' i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- Phan" Asang wa sao qhid' maqhid mae yauggai we' myiqe: re phan" to" ra" .
Airumung: yauggai wa yao: myhi" yao: pho" re to: co' mung: yao" yham sang myhi" we' yezam" khug: na yang: yao: shid' tao wa dagaung dasho: za: boe" lo: li" genae" .
Alao" yao: shid' tao wa shid' zo: mangad: lo:- dayaug za: ngad: ra" . Airumung: Mao" So: yang zham" to: va" rure byu: yang dazai" kao: ge- ga" ra" dao: re naonhaung" manghe' qu" ko" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Pharishe qe wa Yesu re Airu: ngad: re- kao: mugsug' tung" byid: yang: yao: yao" yham sang myhi" re kao" pye' nae" qhid' mae" Moshe wa pe"mung: amyin" byid' to: co' i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- naonhaung" nhag' lam: qao ko" ruyang yao: yao" yham sang myhi" re kao" pye' nae" qhid' mae" akhang" byid' to" ru ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: sao qhid' maqhid mae wa airu: mangad:- ngad: ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- Na: shad' ye, shad' ra" khyo" mangad: lo: gaja" qobo khyo" yang yao" yham sang myhi" re kao" pye' yang:- myiqe: gatau dayaug re lo, dam: xo' yu: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: myi: shad' yaug ngad: ra" ga: ta" ra" .
Yao" mho"zo: qe wa Yesu re yham sang myhi" we' yham sang pho" agyo: mae ceru: ngad: re wa- lo, maxo' lo: na: re wa je: gai: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam re- lo, maxo' lo: byu yaug khao: ngo" maqo" na ko" ngad: ra"- Qo" na nae" jeju qo" khae: yu: ra" mo, za: aqo" na: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re damyo" wa yao: myhi" aung mae" yao: yauggai maboe" geyang: lo, maxo' ko" ngad: ra" . Damyo" wa- byu: yang yauggai maboe" nae" thaug kad' pye' mung: yauggai maboe" gengad: ra"- Airumung: yao: bam wa lo, magai: xo' ko" ngad: ra" . Gatau damyo" wa- mug: gaung: mung"dan: mathao mae lo, maxo' lo: na: ako"- Airumung: myi: mayu lo: qo" na: ra" yaug wa airu: na vashao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" damyo" wa- zoshao qe: dao mae yao" lo, kai: byid: mung:- akyu" mho' byid: vashao: ga: zoshao qere Yesu jhao" jhui" li" ako" . Ngadqere: mho"zo: qe wa yao: bam re lham: qeim: ako" .
Yesu wa- zoshao qere ngojhao" lo nhao: ke' ge,- yao: bam re datam" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa airu" mo; mung"dan: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa zoshao qe: dao mae yao" lo, kai: mung: yao: bam re shaman" byid' ra" . Amung: yao: wa ai: jo, qo mae" thug' lo" ra" .
Alao"- qu" ge,- Byu dayaug Yesu jhao" li" mung:- Mho" Pho" we" apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" ngo gai: ra" mau" pe" kad' ca" i? ga: Yesu re myid' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- gai: ra" ja: we' sin: mung: nao ngore pe"mung: myid' i? Gai: ru wa dayaug za: na: ra" . Nao apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu nug: ngad: re wa kham" to" tarha" re phug' cao" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: wa Yesu re- Kham" to" ra" tarha" kholam: i? ga: myid' ra" . Yesu wa tau mung:- Byu dase' wa,- su: myi: dalhad' wa,- su: zai dakhug'- madang: ra" sagse: dakham:-
Ni" myhi" we' ni" pho" re phug' myao: wa,- ni" yham kyo: cao: re nao yao" gaung re jhid de; ru we' dakhyo: jhid' de; wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: zolau: pho" wa Yesu re- Ai: kham" to" ra" tarha" jham alhab' re ngo phug' cao" va" ngo gatau pe" ja: kad' ca" shi" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Nao wa qobo ta" nae" mabo lo" yaug boe" nug: ngad: re wa ni" jo,nho" alhab' re lo" aung" pye' mung: ai: ngaui jham re myaung sho" ra" mo, re gae byid: wa,- airulao" mug: gaung dao mae nao jo,nho" qo" li" nae"- amung: nga" thao cao" la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Zolau: pho" wa ai: dao: re the' gyo: lao" nhag' lam: mapyo: lo: phao: lo" ra"- pe"mung: ga"re- yao: wa gyai qo" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa jo,nho" qo" yaug wa Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo vao ye: nae" qhid' mae" gyai qug' ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" re dam: ta" geli"- Jo,nho" qo" yaug Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo vao ye: laui: ra" tho'- gola: u wa nghe' no: dung: khyo" vao: lai: lo" nae" ru wa je: laui shi" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa ai: dao: re the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam mug' hao" byaug mung:- Airu: ngad: re khyad' yu: ru khag' qhug' zai i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re zhaug' qu" zo" re"- ceru wa byu: yang magai: boe" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Mao" So wa alhab' re qo" boe" yaug ngad: ra" .
Alao" Petru wa phaug' tau: mung:- ngonhaung" wa alhab' re to" pye' co' yang: ni" thao cao" va"- ngonhaung" pe" the' zai i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa joe" lo nae" ra" pyad sag' mae Byu: Yao: Zo: wa phung qab bao byang" sheim: jo, ra" yao" zaung tao" mae zaung: jo, lao" nga" thao cao" mo, ngad: ra" naonhaung" daxe: shid' yaug re: zaung tao" daxe: shid' lam: mae bozaung: jo; mung: Israel byumyu" daxe: shid' kaung re eib: li" genae" .
Alao"- khag' ngadqere:- nga" mathao mae yham- mao: nhaung:- nhae: mo"- myhi" pho"- zo: dau- yham dang: yokhyao:- re to: co' ra" yaug wa yao: to: co' ra" tho' dayo nho" qo" khae: yu: li" genae" . Apyad ato: kao so' re: qo" yu: li" nae" .
Ngadqere:- ana" qhid' au: mae ngad mo, myo: sho' wa thao khyo ngad: li" genae"- ana" thao mae ngad mo, myo: sho' kam" wa qhid' au: mae ngad: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mao" So: mung"dan: wa ceru we' dau: ra" . Byu dayaug wa yao" sabyi khyae mae mau" zaui: okaung lhaung nae" qhid' mae" ne, seim no' mae" thug' ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: wa mau" zaui: okaung qe we' ba na phug' daba re ngaui dakye' byid: nae" qhid' mae" jho" dang mung:- yao: bam re yao" sabyi khyae khyo ye: nhao: ke' ra" .
Ne, kao gug yo, qug ko re yao: wa gai jao: khyo dam: ye" lo" re mau" maqo" yang: mageim: ye; jo; bam ko" ra" byu damyo" re ye: myao: ra" .
Yao: wa yao: bam re- naonhaung" re: nga" sabyi khyae mae mau" zaui: ge,- ngo naonhaung" re man: qi" ra" ba na phug' byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa thug' ye" lo" ko" ra"- ai: thao re yao: wa daxe: shid' yo, qug mae dalhang- myi" thao sam yo, qug mae dalhang gai jao: khyo ye: mung:- mau" zaui: okaung yelhaung: ra" .
Myi" thao ngo" yo, qug ko re gai jao: khyo dam: ye" lo" re- byu gatau damyo" mageim: ye; jo; bam shiko" rure yedam: myao lao"- yao: wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" Cetau mae daba geim" pe" makad' lo: mageim: ye; jo, ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa ngonhaung" re khag' mali" lhaung ko" ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ako" . Alao" sabyi khyae sang wa yao: bam re- airu: angad lao" wa naonhaung" re: nga" sabyi khyae mae mau" ye: zaui: ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Myi" thao joe" lao"- khyae sang wa yao" mau" sang pho re- okaung jham alhab' re khai: yu yang: thao re mau" vao: ra" mo, mae" qhid mung: sao qhid' mau" vao: ra" mo, alhab' re okaung phug' sho' byid: wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Mau" sang pho wa myi" thao ngo" yo, qug ko re mau" vao: ra" mo, dayaug re- ngaui dakye' kye' byid' ra" .
Sao qhid' no' mae" mau" vao: ra" mo, jhao" byid' joe" lo" lao"- yao: bam wa okaung phug' je: qo" nae" ga: myid: jho: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam re: dayaug ngaui dakye' za: qo" yu: ako" .
Alao" yao: bam wa khyae sang re- Ce: thao re mau" li" vao: ra" mo, wa dayo, qug za: mau" zaui" ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa ba zho wa te, ga" rumae daba geim" mau" zaui: va"- ngadqere: nao wa ngonhaung" re yao: bam re we' dakhyo: za: o: kaung phug' byid' ra"- ga: nyhung mung: ta" ako" .
Khyae sang wa sao qhid' mau" vao: ra" mo, mae" dayaug re- Ba nam pho we"- ngo nao re mavhan" zo: va" re- Nao wa daba re okaung phug' ngaui dakye' byid: nae" ein: jho" dang: rure myid vang" to: va" ra" mangad: i?
Ni" okaung phug' yu: ci mung: phao: lo" wa,- Thao re mau" vao: ra" yaug rere: nao re we' dakhyo: ngo byid: nug: ra" .
Nga" ngaui re ngoyao: nug: ra" khyo" magai: kad' i? Ngo gai kad' rure nao myo, qu" zau" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: thao gyo" ra" mo, wa qhid' khyo ngad: li" genae"- Qhid' mae" mo, wa thao gyo" li" genae" ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Yerusalem khyo do, ye" lo" na: au:- yao: wa mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug re za: dajheim khyo khai: yu mung:- yao bam su" ye" lo" zo" re"-
Qu" ge,- ngonhaung" wa Yerusalem khyo do, ye" lo" na: ru ngad:- aimae Byu: Yao: Zo: wa khinjaung qi: qe we' tung" pho" qe: lo, khyo ab byid' pye' ru qhug' li" nae"- yao: bam wa yao: re shid nae" qhid' mae" dao: phyid' mung:-
Taung bug qe: lo, khyo ab byid' pye' li" genae"- Taung bug qe wa Byu: Yao: Zo: re jung" qi: pye' ru we' se' da: be, khyad' kad' yang: pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' li" genae" . Ngadqere: sam ba kyo thao re yao: wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" zai ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Zebede yao: zo: tao: yao: myhi" wa- myo,nho mho' nae" qhid' mae" yao: zo: tao we' daga" Yesu jhao" li" mung: yao" qhid' kheim: mae pad' thaug' li" thaug' ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: re nao pe" ja: o: i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: wa nao kho: kham boe" lao"-ce: nga" zo: shid' tao re ni" lo, yo shad' mae dayaug- ni" lo, kaung: shad' mae dayaug qo" zaung nae" qhid' mae" akhang" byid: wa,- ga: mho' ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa Naonhaung" pe" nam mho' na ko" rure naonhaung" maba ko" ngad: ra"- ngo shaug' nae" ra" ai: keim re naotao qo" shaug' genae" i? ga: tau" ra" . Yao: tao wa qo" shaug'- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: tao re- Ni" shid' tao gaigai: yao: nga" keim re qhug' shaug' li" genae"- ngadqere: nga" lo, yo shad' lo, kaung shad' mae" ru khyin: yu nae" akhang" ngo maqo"- ai wa nga" Pho" yang nyhang" to: byid' ra" mo; qhid' mae" za: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: khyo re gatau mho"zo: daxe yaug qhug' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam wa yao: shid' tao re nhag' yo" ako" .
Airumung: Yesu wa mho"zo: qe alhab' re khai: zhang" yu yang: yao: bam re- Mao" So re malam: ra" mo, qemae" eib nae" akhang" qo" ra" mo, wa mung" byu qe: dao mae qam: so' we' eib: ako"- Zug: au: jhaung qere: kheim: so' qo" ko" rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Naonhaung" gyo: mae kam" wa airu: magai: ngad . Naonhaung" mae" je: qi: nug: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa alhab' mo; daui daui yaug boe" ca" .
Naonhaung" mae" au: jhaung boe" nug yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa alhab' mo; jeim boe" ca" .
Byu: Yao: Zo: lhao" re: su re yam" zo: nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru mangad:- su re caung da" nae" we' byu myo: sho' re khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" yao" kao so' re byid' pye' nae" ga: joe" li" ru ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu we' mho"zo: qe wa Yerikho vogaung: mae" thug' lo ko" au:- byu phung: mo" zang cao" ako" .
Qu" ge,- myo, jid shid' yaug wa khyoyae mae zaung: jo; ako"- yao: shid' zo: wa Yesu su" lo: na: rure ba gelao"- Davi yao: zo: Asang we"- nga" shid' zo: re nhag' khyag' yu la, ga: zag: hug' ako" .
Mo, byu qe wa yao: shid' zo: re sae za: na nae" qhid' mae" qeim: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: shid zo: wa Davi yao: zo: Asang we" nga" shid' zo: re nhag' khyag' yu la, wo"- ga: je: zag: hug' ako" .
Yesu wa thang mung: yao: shid' zo: re khai: yu yang:- ni" shid' zo" qhid' mae" ngo pe" kad' byid: nae" o ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa Yesu re- Asang we"- nga" shid' zo: re myo, myao: li" nhao byid: la,- ga: mho' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: shid' zo: re nhag' khyag' mung:- yao: shid' zo" myo,jid' re tin: byid' ra" . Ailao" jao"- yao: shid' zo: wa myo, myao: li" mung:- yao" thao cao" ye" ako" .
Yesu we' mho"zo: qe wa Yerusalem khyo jhao" li" mung:- Zhan: lun: bam nhae mae" Betphage vogaung: khyo joe" lo: ako" . Yesu wa mho"zo: shid' yaug re- ni" shid' yaug: qhid' au: mae" vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ge,-
Ai: mae loze nau" jhui" ra" loze myhi" dadau: taui" to" rure yemyao: li" genae"- ai: loze nau" re pheim: yu mung: ngojhao" she: lo geri:-
Byu dayaug yaug ni" shid' zo: re- loze Pe"mung: pheim ko" i? ga: myid' ngad: re- Asang ce shid' ma: re ci qo: ga"- ein: ta" ge,- ailao" jao" yao: wa ai: loze ma: re she: lo" nhao: li" nae"- ga: pyang mung: nhao: ke' ra" .
Ceru: boe" ru wa Ziun myiqe: nau" re ta" kyo: ge,- qu" wa,- ni" kho: kham pho" wa nau" nhae" xam: mag mung: loze dao mae zaung: ra" . Loze nau" dao mae zaung mung: nao jhao" joe" li" ra"-
Ga: lapa pho" ta" to" ra" dao: jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Mho"zo: shid' yaug thug' ye" lo" mung:- yao: shid' zo: re Yesu ta" ke' ru we' dakhyo: yekad' ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa loze myhi" we' loze nau" re she: lo mung: loze dao mae yao: shid' zo" bau: qhang khyad' nhae: byid' ako" . Yesu wa ai: dao mae do; zaung: ra" .
Ai: byu phung: mo" zang wa yao: bam: mai bau: jham re khyodang mae myhung: byid' ako"- Damyo" wa sag' dang" jham xe" yu mung: khyo mae myhung: byid' ako" .
Yesu qhid' au: mae su" ra" mo, byu qe we' yao" thao cao" ra" mo, byu qe wa zag: hug' mung:- Davi yao: zo: re Hosana ngad vashao:- Asang: mang we' joe" li" ra" yaug wa ngaui lho" vashao: wo"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu Yerusalem khyo vao ye" lo" au: re- vogaung: geim" mo,thaui: mo,yaug boe" li" mung:- ceyaug wa khag' ngad: ra" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Alao" mo, byu qe wa tau: mung:- ceyaug wa Galile mung"- Nazared vogaung: mae" lapa Yesu ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham khyo vao ye: mung:- ai: mae zai aung: zai vai mo, re khe' thug' pye' ru we' ngaui tha" zo: mo; jaung: jham we' phaung" kyug' aung: zo: mo; tao" khau" jham rere: tau: phaug' sin" pye' byid' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Nga" yham re akyu" mho' yham ga: mhang" li" genae"- ga: jham: mugsug' mae tung" to" ra" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa aire damya, laug aug' kad' na: ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Myo, jid qe we' khyid qeim mo, Caung: pa" Yham mae Yesu jhao" li" ako"- Yesu wa yao: bam re gai byid' ra" .
Khinjaung qi: qe we' tung" pho" qe wa Yesu kad' ra" mug' pho: mau" zo" re myao mung:- Davi yao: zo: re Hosana ngad vashao: wo"- ga: Caung: pa" Yham mae zoshao qe zag: hug' na ko" rure the' gyo: gelao"- nhag' qu" yo: geyang:-
Yao: bam wa Yesu re- ai: zoshao qe pe" ta" na ko" rure nao the' gyo" i? ga: myid' ako" . Yesu wa ngo the' gyo"- ga: tau" ra" . Yesu wa yao: bam re- Nao wa zoshao qe we' nug' nau" qe: nhad' thoe khyo" caung: nghaui" nhao nae" yao: bam re mho" to" ava"- ga" ra" jham: dao: re naonhaung" manghe' qu" ko" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re to: co' yang: ai: vogaung: mae" thug' lo" mung:- Bethani vogaung: mae ai: myi ye: yab: ra" .
Thao: ba ne, seim no' mae" Yerusalem khyo dam: vao lo: na: au:- Yesu wa vae: moe' ra" .
Khyoyae mae yaug: jo; ra" pho' ham" gae dagae re myao mung: yao: wa ai: pho' ham" gae khyo ye" lo" ra" . Ngadqere: pho' ham" gae mae avho' reza: yemyao lao"- Yesu wa nao wa khonhae" re: ashi: mazaui: lo: vashao:- ga: pho' ham" gae re ta" ra" . Ailao" jao"- ai: pho' ham" gae wa kyaug' shid: lo" byaug: ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa aire the' myao gelao" mug' hao" byaug: ako" . Yao: bam wa Yesu re- Ai: pho' ham" gae wa khoru: mung: ai qhi" yao: phyad za: kyaug' shid: lo" byaug: laug i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa naonhaung" aug' o: myid mabo: ra" lam khug: myid bo ko" ngad: re wa ngo ce: pho' ham" gae re kad' ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" qo" kad' li" genae"- ai za: mangad:- ai: bam re- Bam nao qui" lo" mung: panglai: khug khyo gyang: vao lo" wa,- ein: ta" lao"- ta" ru we' dakhyo: boe" nae" .
Naonhaung" lam" mung: akyu" mho' ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" pe" mho' gengadqere: qo" khae: yu: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham khyo dam: tug' lo mung: mho" shid' byid' na: au: re- khinjaung qi: qe we' au: jhaung lau: de, qe wa Yesu jhao" li" mung: yao: re- Nao wa aijham re pe" kheim: so' khyo" yang kad' i? Nao re ai: kheim: so' byid: yaug khag' ngad: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re tau: mung:- ngore: naonhaung" re dao: dakheim: myid: nae"- naonhaung" aire phaug' tau: gelao" wa aijham re ngo pe" kheim: so' khyo" yang kad' rure ngo naonhaung" re ta" kyo: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yohan byid' ra" qid nyhab' wa khai: mae" ngad: i? Mao" So: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngad: i? Mangad: lao"- byu: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngad: i? ga: myid' ra" . Ailao" yao: bam wa ngonhaung" pe" ru: ta" zai i? Mao" So: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngad: ra" ein: ngonhaung" ta" lao"- aire naonhaung" Yohan re pe"mung: malam" ko" i? ga: ta" li" nae" .
Aimung: byu khyo" yang ngad: ra" ein: ngonhaung" tau: lao" re:- mo, byu qe wa Yohan re lapa ngad: ga: myid: lam: na ko" ruyang mo, byu qere ngonhaung" gyaug ca" ra" ga: yao: bam yao: cao: jho" qham: ako" .
Alao" yao: bam wa Yesu re- ngonhaung" maba ga: tau" ako" . Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- ngore: aijham re pe" kheim: so' khyo" yang kad' rure naonhaung" re ngo mata" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa naonhaung" pe" ru: myid ko" i? Byu dayaug wa yauggai zo: shid' yaug qo" ra" . Yao: wa zoqhid' yaug jhao" ye: mung:- nga" zo: we"- ana" ba sabyi khyae khyo ye: mung: mau" yezaui: wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: zo: wa yao: pho" re- ngo manug: ye: ga: tau: ngadqere: thao re yao: wa nhag' lam: tha" mung: sabyi khyae khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: pho" wa yao: nhaung: jhao" re: ye: mung:- azhao ta" ru we' dakhyo: yedam: ta" ra" . Yao: wa Ngo ye: nae"- ga: tau" ra" ngad yang: re: yao: wa maye: ngad: ra" .
Ai: yauggai zo: shid' yaug mae" khoyaug lam: yao: pho" mho dao: re tae" gyo" ra" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: bam wa zoqhid' yaug ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ako" . Alao" Yesu wa ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa khang: gaug zo: mo, we' shava myhi" qe wa Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo naonhaung" qhid' au: mae vao ye" li" genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yohan wa naonhaung" re jo: ra" khyo re li" ceim" shid' byid: ngadqere:- naonhaung" wa yao: re malam" ko" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: khang: gaug zo: mo, we' shava myhi" qe wa yao: re lam" ako" . Naonhaung" wa aire the' myao gesho' ngadqere: nhag' lam: tha" pye' mung: Yohan re malam" ko" ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re dao: tau" gatau dalam: re tae" gyo: shige,- ga: ta" ra" . sabyi khyae qho: zo" ra" mug: myid sang dayaug wa sabyi khyae qho" to: mung: aire khyae kyae" lhang" to: sabyi pyag' khung: dau" to:- gyebyu zaung dalam: myhae" to: mung: sabyi khyae ngho" zaui: mo, re ngho: byid' to: co' yang: gatau: mung" khyo gyaung: su" lo" ra" .
sabyi shi: phyo' yo, joe" lao"- yao: wa yao" jeim qere khyae ngho" zaui: mo, jao" khyae ngho: phug' sabyi shi: mho' nhao: ke' ra" .
sabyi khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa yao" jeim qere lham: taung" yu yang:- be, yaug re be,- se' yaug re se'- laug baui: yang pye' se' yaug re pye' mung: kad' ako" .
Khyae sang wa sao qhid' lhang tho' mae" jeim gatau myo: sho' re dam: nhao: ke' ra"- Khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa azhao we' dakhyo: za: ai: jeim qere lham: kad' ko" ra" .
Lo" thao" mae khyae sang wa nga" zo: re wa yao: bam lham: phug' myao: genae"- ga: ta" mung: yao: zo: re khyae ngho: zo: mo, jhao" nhao: ke' ra" .
Ngadqere: khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa khyae sang: yao: zo: re myao lao"- ceyaug wa khyae sang: nho: yham khaung sang nae" yaug ngad: ra"- lo geri:- yao: re se' pye' gelang:- yao" jo,nho" re ngonhaung" yu: pye' gelang:- ga: yao: cao: yao: jho" ta" ako" .
Alao" yao: bam wa yao: re taung" yu yang:- khyae taung gaung khyo she: thug' lo" mung:- yao: re se' pye' ako" .
Amung: khyae sang joe" li" lao"- yao: wa ai: khyae ngho" zaui: mo, re pe" ru: kad' li" nae" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa tau: mung:- yao: wa ai: makhyang" ra" byu qere gaigai: yao: li" se' pye' li" nae"- amung: sabyi khyae rere: sabyi mhang" yo, re khyae ngho: phug' sabyi shi: man: man: za: byid' ra" gatau khyae ngho" zaui: mo, re ngho: byid' pye' li" nae"- ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Yham zhaug' mo, khyin: khyo" pye' ra" laug baui wa yham jheim mae" akhyag: thao" ra" laug baui boe" lo ra"- Ce wa Asang: yang kad' ru ngad: ra" . Amung: ai wa ngonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae mug' pho: mau" ngad: ra"- ga" ra" jham: dao: re naonhaung" khonhae" re: manghe' qu" ko" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- Mao" So: mung"dan: re naonhaung" mae" qab: yu mung: ai: mung"dan: ashi: zaui: nae" byumyu" re byid' pye' li" nae" .
Ai: laug zang dao mae gyo" lo" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: adau dau gyug' lo" li" nae"- amung: dayaug yaug: dao mae ai: laug zang gyo" zag: lo" re wa yao: re aphaui: mhan" pye' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Khinjaung qi: qe we' Pharishe qe wa Yesu dao: tau" jham re the' gyo: gelao"- Yesu wa yao: bam: khyo re ta" na: rure ba: gyo" yu: ako" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa Yesu re taung: nae" khyo qho: ako" . Ngadqere: Yesu re lapa ngad: ra" ga: myid: lam: na: ko" ra" mo, byu qere yao: bam gyaug: ako" .
Yesu wa dao: tau" jham ci yang: yao: bam re dam: ta" ra" .
Mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa ceru we' dau: ra" . kho: kham dayaug wa yao: zo" lo,xo' poe re seim" jin" to: mung:
ai: khai: to" ra" bang" vo qere lo,xo' poe khyo li" genae" qhid' mae" yao" jeim qere khai nhao: ke' ra"- ngadqere: yao: bam wa manug: li" ko" ngad: ra" .
kho: kham pho" wa Nga" poe wa zo: nae" jin" jin" ngad va"- nga" nung: jaung lo: jham we' zhe' to" ra" gug' nyhug' jham re: se' to: va"- Alhab' jin" va"- lo,xo' poe khyo li" gase, ga"- ein: khai: to" ra" bang" vo qere yeta" ge, ga: gatau jeim re dam: nhao: ke' ra" .
Ngadqere: khai: to" ra" bang" vo qe wa jeim qe li" ta" ko" rure pe" shui magyo" nho lo:- dayaug wa yothaung: khyo- gatau dayaug wa yao" phaga: mau" zo" khyo ye" lo" ko" ra" .
Gatau dang: ra" gu: wa- jeim qe re lham: taung" yu yang: be, mung: se' pye' ako" .
kho: kham pho" kam" wa nhag' gyai yo" ra" . Amung: yao: wa yao" gyezo: jham re nhao: ke' mung: ai: byu se' ra" mo, re yese' nhao: ra" . Yao: bam: vogaung: rere: ngha" pye' nhao: ra" .
Ai: thao re kho: kham pho" wa yao" jeim re khai: yu mung:- nga" poe wa jin" jin" ngad va"- ngadqere: ngo khai: to" ra" mo, wa ai: poe we' maman: qi" ko" ngad: ra" .
Airumung:- hau" mo" khyodang khyo ye: yang: naonhaung" the' myao: ra" mo, alhab' re yekhai ge, ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: jeim qe wa hau" mo" khyodang khyo thug' ye" lo" mung:- yao: bam the' myao: ra" magai: ra" byu- gai: ra" byu alhab' mo, re khai: zhang" lo: ako" . Ai: lo,xo' poe mae bang" vo jham byang" sho' zaung: bam: ako" .
Alao" kho: kham pho" wa bang" vo qere qu" nae" qhid' mae" vao lo: ra" . Yao: wa lo,xo' poe ve,mai ve,bau: mave; ra" byu dayaug re the' myao lao"-
kho: kham pho" wa yao: re- ba nam pho" we"- nao wa lo,xo' poe ve,mai ve,bau: mave, lo:- khoru: mung: ce: poe khyo li" i? ga: myid' ra" . Ngadqere: aiyaug wa pe" re: matau: lo: sae za: na: ra" .
Alao" kho: kham pho" wa yao" jeim qere khyid lo, re taui: mung: taung gaung shad' mug: cad' yo khyo yeshe: to: ge,- ai: jo, qo mae yao: wa ngug byid ngug nhe' we' zaui kyag' yang: na: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- khai: yu qhug' ra" mo, myo: geyang: re: khyin: yu qhug' ra" mo, wa nang" ako"- ga: Yesu dao: pin" pye' ra" .
Ai: thao re Pharishe qe wa thug' lo" mung:- Yesu re yao" dao: thoe: yang Yao: re myi" nae" dao: myid: khoru: myid: nae" rure pha,jhi" khyug' ako" .
Amung: yao: bam wa yao: bam: mho"zo: qe damyo" we' Herod byu damyo" re Yesu jhao" nhao: ke' ako" . Yao: bam wa Yesu re- Nao wa dangman" yaug ngad: ru we' Mao" So: khyo rere: dangman" ra" khyo" mho" shid' byid' ra" . Nao wa khoyaug khokhyo" myid: jho nae" rure re:- pe" shui manho yaug- myo, nho nga: lao: makhyin yaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: .
Airumung:- nao khoru: myid: rure ta" la,- Roma khosin" re ngonhaung" khang: gai: byid' i? Magai: byid: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam: makhyang" ra" nhag' lam: re beim: mung: yao: wa yao: bam re- Geim kad' mo, we"- naonhaung" ngore pe"mung: pha,jhi" khyug' yang: myid: ko" i?
Ai: khang: ke' nae" ngaui kye' ngore qhu" gela,- ga: ta" ra" . Alao" yao: bam wa Yesu jhao" ngaui dakye' cilo: ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Ai: ngaui kye' mae khag' sulho we' khag' mang aso: de; ra" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa khosin" sulho we' mang aso: ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ako" . Yesu wa yao: bam re kho: sin" we' sin" ra" gu: wa kho: sin" re byid: ge, Mao" So we' sin" ra" gu: wa Mao" So re byid: ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: dao: re yao: bam the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam wa mug' hao" byaug: ako" alao" yao: bam wa Yesu re nha co' mung: lo" byaug: ako" .
Ai: ba mae yao:- shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ru majo, ga: ta" na ko" ra" Saduke qe damyo" Yesu jhao" li" mung:-
Mho" pho" we"- Byu dayaug yaug zo: dau maqo" lo: shid: lo" byaug: ngad: re- yao: nhaung: wa ai: yao: mao" cug' re dam: gaug mung: yao: mao" qhid' mae" nyaug xo' myhung byid: ca" ga: Moshe ngonhaung" re tung" to: byid: co' ra" .
Ana"- ngonhaung" mae yao: mao: yao: nhaung: nhad' yaug na: ako" . Mao: mo" yaug wa myi: dayaug lo,xo' yu: ra"- ngadqere: zo: dau maqo" lo: shid: lo" byaug: ra" . Alao" yao: nhaung: yaug cug' dam: gaug: ra" .
Mao: le; thao re sam yaug- airu: dayaug: thao dayaug yao: tao ho' nhad' yaug: geim" ai: myiqe: myhi" we' zam" mung: zo: dau maqo" lo: shid: lo" ko" ra" .
Lo" thao" mae ai: myiqe: re: shid: lo" ra" .
Yao: tao ho' alhab' yao: re lo,xo' yu: ako" . Aire shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ra" ba na mae yao: tao ho' nhad' yaug mae"- khoyaug: yham sang myhi" lam: ngad nae" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" wa Jham: mugsug' we' Mao" So: qam: so' re maba geyang:- shad' nghung" na: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re shid: rumae" dam: daui to" li" gelao"- yao: bam wa myi: byid: myi: yu makad' lo: genae" . Yao: bam wa mug: gaung dao mae" mug: lagyo: qe we' dakhyo: ngad: li" genae" .
Shid: lo" ra" mo, dam: daui: to" li" nae" ra" mo, we' sin: yang: ngo wa Abraham Mao" So- Isag nho: Mao" So- Yaku nho: Mao" So ngad:- ga: Mao" So ta" to" rure naonhaung" manghe' qu" ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Mao" So wa shid: byaug va" mo, nho: Mao" So mangad: daui: na: ra" mo; nho: Mao" So ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: dao: re mo, byu qe the' gyo: gelao"- gyo" mug' ako" .
Yesu wa Saduke qere pe" dakheim: re: maqo" phaug' tau: losho' kad' pye' rure Pharishe qe the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam wa Yesu jhao" zang" li" mung:-
yao: bam mae" tung" pho" dayaug wa- Yesu re jham" qu" zo" re"- Mho" Pho" we"-
Kham" to" ra" amyin" dao: mae" kholam: qi" thao" ru ngad: ra" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa- ai: Asang ni" Mao" So re- ni" aung khug nhag' lam:- ni" kao so' we' ni" myid nyan: ba: ru
alhab' yang jhid' de; wa,- ga" ra" amyin" dao: wa je: akhyag: ru we' je: qi" thao" ru ngad: ra" .
Shid' lam: ein: ra" lam: wa- Ni" yham kyo: cao: re naoyao" gaung re we' dakhyo: jhid' de; wa,- ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Ce: amyin" dao: shid' lam: wa- Moshe kham" to" ra" Tarha" alhab' we' lapa qe: mho" dao: alhab' ra" ajhaung ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ra" .
Amung: Pharishe qe zang" ham: na ko" au: Yesu wa- yao: bam re-
Naonhaung" wa Meshia re khoru: ein: myid: jho: na ko" i? Yao: wa khag' myid: zo: ngad: ra" i? ga: myid' ra" . Alao" yao: bam wa- yao: wa Davi myid: zo: ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- airu: ngad: re- Davi wa Gyang" Lho" Byo jaung" yang: Meshia re pe"mung: Asang ga: ta" ra" i?
Pe"mung: ga"re- Davi wa Ni" gyevo qere ni" khyid vo: khug mae ngo mato: byid: byid: wa- nga" lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo, wa, ga: ai: Asang wa nga" Asang re ta" ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Airumung: Davi wa Meshia re Asang- ga: ta" ngad: re wa Meshia wa Khoru: mung: Davi yao: zo: gai: ngad nae" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu re khag' re: pe" dakheim: lhao" maqo" phaug' tau: ko" ngad: ra" . Ai: ba mae" Yesu re khag' pe" dakheim: re: mavae" myid: loko" ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa- mo, byu qere we' yao" mho"zo: qere-
Tung" pho" qe we' Pharishe qe wa- Moshe nho: Tarha" re pheim: kyo: nae" kheim: so' qo" mo, ngad: ako" .
Airumung:- yao: bam ta" ra" gu: alhab' re naonhaung" tae" gyo: mung: phug' cao" ge,- ngadqere: yao: bam: ave, alai re dacao" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa- yao: yao: kho" kyo" ru we' dakhyo:- macao" ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam wa- la: mung: vin qug' ra" qo re seim" mung: byu qere vin nhao: ako" . Ngadqere:- yao: bam yao: wa ai: qo jham re lo, au" yang re: manug: tin: ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam kad' ra" mau" zo" jham re su gaje the' myao genae" qhid' mae" kad' qhu" ako" . Qu" ge,- Jham: dao: tung" ke' to" ra" shoqid: yang thaung kyab' nau" zo: khyab' mung:- ai: khug mae jham: mugsug' mae" dao: jham re tung" ke' to" ako" . Amung: lo, kaung: shad' lo, pau" mae we' nga: lao: mae te' ci: ako" . Aijham re lu sho' qi: sho' kad' ve; ci mung:- yao: bam: bau: qhang athao mae ban byau: qhang sho' te' ve; ci: ako" .
Yao: bam wa poe mae je: gai: ra" zaung jo, qo mae zaung nug mo,- tarha" jung yham mae gatau jaung: to" ra" tao" khau" jham mae zaung nug mo, ngad: ako" .
Gai jao: gyo: mae su: yang lham: phug' myao: nae" o mo,- su: yang Rabai: ga: mhang" byid: nae" o mo, ngad: ako" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" kam" wa Rabai: ga: mhang" rure dangaui ge,- naonhaung" Mho" Pho" wa dayaug za: ngad: ra" . Amung: naonhaung" alhab' wa mao: nhaung: qe ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa ce: myid gaung dao mae khag' re ngadqere: Pho"- ein: damhang" ge,- naonhaung" yao: Pho" wa mug: gaung dao mae dayaug za: ngad: ra" .
Amung:- Au: Jhaung ga: mhang" nae" re: naonhaung" dangaui ge,- naonhaung" Au: Jhaung wa Meshia ga" ra" Au: Jhaung dayaug za: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" phaung mae" je: qi" thao" ra" yaug wa- naonhaung" daui daui yaug boe" ca" nae" .
Yao: yao" gaung re caung: khin" nug: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: khyo" pye' ru qhug' li" nae" . Amung: yao: yao" gaung re khyo" pye' yaug kam" wa- caung: khin" byid' ru qhug' li" nae" .
Geim kad' ra" Pharishe qe we' tung" pho" qe we"- naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re byu qe mug: gaung: mung"dan: khyo vao ye: nae" seim" lao" naonhaung" wa ai: kham: dung: re pyid' pye' ako" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" yao: re: mavao ye:- vao ye: nae" qam: ke' mo, rere: naonhaung" mavao ye: nhao ko" ngad: ra" .
Geim kad' ra" Pharishe qe we' Tung" pho" qe we"- naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa cug' mo" qe: yham zai yokhyao: jham re phyo' zo: lhad' zo" ci yang:- su qu" gai nae"- geim kad' mung: akyu" qhang sho' mho' mo, ngad: ako" . Airumung: naonhaung" wa je: qi" ra" dao: phyid' ru qhug' li" genae" .
Geim kad' ra" Pharishe qe we' Tung" pho" qe we"- naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re- naonhaung" wa phung: byu dayaug qo" poe" yu nae" qhid' mae" qid khyo"- taung khyo" su" gam" qin" mung:- phung: byu dayaug qo" poe" yu lao" re:- naonhaung" wa aiyaug re- naonhaung" tho' shid' zhao" myi: qid tham: khyo gyo" lo" nae" man: qi" ra" yaug boe" nhao: ako" .
Khyo jhui" ra" myo, jid qe we"- naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako" . Khag' ngadqere: Caung: pa" Yham re lao: mung: jham tang" re wa- ai wa madang ca"- ngadqere: Caung: pa" Yham mae" qhang re lao: yang: jham tang" ngad: re wa- ai wa dang ca"- ga: naonhaung" ta" ako" .
Ago myo,jid qe we"- Kholam: je: akhyag: i? Qhang i? Mangad: lao"- qhang re gyang" lho" nhao: ra" Caung: pa" Yham lam: i?
Amung: naonhaung" wa byu dayaug yaug phan re lao: mung: jham tang" ngad: re- ai wa madang ca"- ngadqere: ai: phan dao mae" ngaui" xeim: re jham tang: lao" wa- ai wa gaigai: dang ca"- ga: ta" ako" .
Myo, jid qe we"- Kholam: je: akhyag: i? Ngaui" xeim: i? Mangad: lao"- ngaui" xeim: re gyang" lho" nhao: ra" phan lam: i?
Phan re lao: mung: jham tang" ra" yaug wa- phan re we' ai: dao mae jo; ra" ja: alhab' rere: lao: yang: jham tang" ru ngad: ava" .
Ai: Caung: pa" Yham re lao: yang: jham tang: yaug re: Caung: pa" Yham mae we' ai: mae na: ra" Asang rere: lao: yang: jham tang" ru ngad: ava" .
Mug: gaung re lao: yang: jham tang: yaug wa- Mao" So: zaung tao" we' ai: mae zaung: jo, yaug rere: lao: yang: jham tang" ru ngad: ava" .
Geim kad' ra" Pharishe qe we' tung" pho" qe we"- naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako" . Naonhaung" wa shaban sham: nhang:- ban gya pajhi" jham re daxe bam mae" dabam Mao" So re byid: gengad yang: re:- ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" dao: mae" je: akhyag: ra"- tarha" din: vang" ru- nhag' khyag' ru we' din: man" ru jham re wa naonhaung" to" pye' ko" ra" . Naonhaung" wa alhab' re dakhyo: za: phug' cao" ko" ngad: re wa gai: ra" .
Khyo jhui" ra" myo, jid qe we"- naonhaung" wa shaug' qid mae" pyab' re wa kyae" pye' mung:- gola: u re wa myug: pye' ako" .
Geim kad' ra" mo, Pharishe qe we' tung" pho" qe we"- naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ko" ra" . Naonhaung" wa ai: keim kang:- ban khug' jham re adao shad' mae cid' shao: pye' gengadqere: akhug shad' mae wa- myo, nyad o: byid: ru we' se' da: be, khyad' ru byang" jo; ra" .
Myo, jid Pharishe qe we"- Keim akhug shad' re shi" sao qhid' cid' san: pye' ge,- ailao" wa adao mae" re: san: lo" li" nae" .
Geim kad' ra" Pharishe qe we' Tung" pho" qe we"- naonhaung" byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako" . Naonhaung" wa adao shad' mae qu" yaung" sho' laug man gyad: to" ra" lab zao jham we' dau: ako" ngad yang: re: akhug mae wa shoqug: thaung: jham we' mao gaung bab jham byang" jo; ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" wa adao shad' su: qhid' kheim: mae din: man: mo, ru" ru ngad geyang: re: nhag' lam: khug mae geim kad' ru we' qobo mau" za: byang" sheim: jo; ra" .
Geim kad' ra" Pharishe qe we' tung" pho" qe we"- naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako" . Naonhaung" wa Lapa qe: lab jham re zao byid' ako" .
Amung: ngonhaung" wa- phug' phyid' pyad mae naonhaung: qe bo: bo: ngad: re wa- lapa qere se' ra" mau" zo" mae bo: bo: zai mangad:- ga: ta" ako" .
Ai: ruyang naonhaung" wa- lapa qere se' pye' ra" mo; yao: myid: yao: zo: qe ngad ko" rure gaigai: yao: naonhaung" tau" yu: avako" .
Airumung:- naonhaung" phug' phyid' qeyang qhid: to: byid: co' ko" ra" mau" re bin sho' naonhaung" xo' yang: kad' ge,
Lhao maui jham we' Lhao maui: myid: zo: qe we" Naonhaung" wa myiqid tham: mae" khoru: qo" phao: loe, genae" i?
Airumung: ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- ngo wa lapa qe pha,jhi" bo mo,- Tung" pho" qere naonhaung" jhao" nhao: ke' nae" . Naonhaung" wa yao: bam mae" daqhae: re se' pye' mung:- daqhae: re wa pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' li" genae" gatau daqhae: re wa tarha" jung yham jham mae taui" be, mung:- daqhae: re wa davo mae" davo khyo khe' taung" pye' li" genae" .
Qobo maqo" ra" Abela mae" Caung: pa" Yham we' phan gyo: mae naonhaung" se' pye' ra" Barakhia yao: zo: Zakari joe" sho' qobo maqo" mo, re se' ra" yug: alhab' wa naonhaung" au: dao mae joe" lo nae" .
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa- Ai: byu se' ra" qobo alhab' wa- ana" pyad mae" byu qe qhug' kham zo: genae" .
Yerusalem we"- Yerusalem we"- Lapa qere se' pye' mung: Mao" So: yang nao jhao" nhao: ke' ra" lagyo: qere laug baui: yang pye' se' ra" vogaung: we"- Qo, zang wa qo, nau" jham re yao" daung khug mae zhang" to" ru we' dakhyo:- ni" vobyu qere nga" lo, khug mae zhang" to: nae" ngo khonho" lhang qam: ke' ngadqere: nao maqad ngad: ra" .
Airumung:- ni" Caung: pa" Yham wa shapye' pye' ru qhug' mung: akeim ngad: jo; li" nae" .
Nao re ngo ta" ru wa- Asang: mang we' joe" li" ra" yaug wa ngaui lho" vashao: wo"- ga: nao mata" ta" wa- ana" mae" thoegu: nao ngore maqhug' myao lo nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Caung: pa" yham mae" thug' lo" mung: su" lo" na: au:- mho"zo: qe wa yao: jhao" qui" lo yang:- Caung: pa" Yham mae" yham jham re Yesu re ceim" shid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- ce: yham jham re naonhaung" myao ko" mangad: i? Ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa- Ce: yham wa laug baui dabaui re: makai" jo, lo: sho' byo; qeim: lo" byaug li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa zhanlun bam dao mae zaung: jo, ra" au:- mho"zo: qe wa yao: bam yao: za: Yesu jhao" qui" lo gemung:- ceru khonhae" boe" li" zai i? Nao dam: joe" li" nae" ayo, we' mug: myid thao" lo" nae" ba na lao"- pe" ja" ve, lho jham boe" thug' li" zai laug i? ngonhaung" re ta" kyo: la,- ga: Yesu re myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" re khag' yang re: majhui" pyag' lo" geshao:- lha" yang: na ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re byu myo: sho' mo, wa nga" mang vin yang: thug' li" mung:- ngo wa Meshia ngad va"- ga: ta" yang: byu myo: sho' mo, re jhui" pyag' lo" byaug: li" genae" .
Gye khe' ru we' gyekhe' lau dao: jham re the' gyo: gelao"- naonhaung" dagyo" din ge,- ai: gu: wa boe" li" ca" ra"- ngadqere: ai: lo" thao" ru wa mangad: shi: ngad: ra" .
Byu damyu" we' damyu"- damang: we' damang: gye jho" zin" li" genae"- Jo, qo gatau tau mae myid lab: lab' li" nae"- bao" khug' khug' li" nae"-
Ai: jham wa qug: khai" ru aqhid ngad: ra" .
Byu jham wa- naonhaung" re qobo dae kham zo: nae" we' se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" ab byid' pye' li" genae"- nga" mathao mae byu alhab' mo, naonhaung" re nghang" li" genae" .
Alao"- byu myo: sho' mo, wa khyonghung: nghung: mung: yao: cao: yao: jho" ab byid' ru we' yao: cao: yao: manug jho" thug'- jho" nghang" li" genae" .
Lapa apyag' qe myo: sho' thug' li" mung:- byu myo: sho' mo, re jhui" pyag' lo" byaug: li" genae" .
Makhyang" ra" mau" zo" laug: li" yang:- byu jham wa jhid' de; myid cae" lo" byaug: li" genae" .
Ngadqere: athao jao: sho' thaug' qhao" yaug wa khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" .
Byumyu" cao jab: qhid' mae" sagse: boe" vashao:- Mug: gaung: mung"dan: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re mug: myid gam: sho' kho" kyo: byid: ca" nae" . Ai: thao re za: lo" thao" ra" ba na joe" lo: li" nae" .
Lapa Daniela ta" to" ra" qu" din sho' ra" maca' majhad' wa- ai: gyang" lho" ra" jo, qo mae li" ye, jo; rure naonhaung" myao: li" genae"- ( Nghe' na yaug wa ba: gyo: vashao: )
Ceru re the' myao lao"- Yuda mung" mae na yaug wa- bam khyo tao" phao vashao:-
Yham khaung dao mae na: ra" yaug wa- gyo" lo mung: yham khug mae" zai daja: ja: malo" vao: yu lo: vashao: .
Alao"- yothaung: din" mae na: ra" yaug re:- yao" bau: qhang yu: ci nae" qhid' mae" yham khyo madam: tug' lo vashao:-
Ai: ba na gyo: mae gaung la: mo, we' nug: nau" jhui: mo, wa- gyai qug: khai: genae" .
Airumung:- naonhaung" tao" phao nae" ra" ayo, wa- gyo, yo, mae we' Dugno: Ba mae mangad: vashao:- Mao" So re akyu" mho' na ge, .
Pe"mung: ga"re- Mao" So phan" to" ra" mug: myid aqhid mae" ana" ba joe" sho' maboe" qu" shi" ra" qug: khai: khyag' qhui: ru wa ai: ba na gyo: mae boe" thug' li" nae" .
Amung: ai: ayo, ba na jham re Mao" So: yang maqhaung" pye' ngad: re wa- khag' re: qo" daui: na nae" ru mangad:- ngadqere: khyin: yu: to" ra" mo; qhid' mae" Mao" So: wa ai: ba na jham re qhaung" pye' li" nae" .
Ai: ayo, mae byu dayaug yaug wa naonhaung" re- Qu" wa cetau mae Meshia na: ra"- thoetau mae Meshia na: ra" ga: ta" ngad: re- yao: ta" rure dalam" ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re- Meshia apyag' qe we' lapa apyag' jham thug' li" genae" . Yao: bam wa gai: boe" ngad: re khyin: yu: to: va" mo, re lhao" qo" jhui" pyag' yu nae" qhid' mae" ve, lho jham we' mug' pho: mau" zo" jham kad' qhu" li" genae" .
Tae" gyo: ge,- ngo naonhaung" re gau: qhid' khae" yang: ta" to: va" .
Su: yang naonhaung" re- Qu" ge,- Meshia wa din"pyad' yo mae na: ra"- ga: ta" gengadqere:- ai: khyo dathug' ye: ge,- Yham khug mae na: ra" ga: ngadqere: dalam" ge, .
Pe"mung: ga"re- lhe' cad' wa ba thug' shad' mae" cad' mung: ba vao shad' joe" sho' mug: gaung geim" bao qhui: lo" ru we' dakhyo: Byu: Yao: Zo: joe" li" nae" ngad: ra" .
Mao gaung jo; ra" tau nangda jham na: li" genae" .
Ai: qug: khai: khyag' qhui: ru bin: boe" we' ba wa no; byaug: li" nae" . Lho" re: mazho lo nae" . Kyi jham wa mug: gaung mae" byid: gyo" lo" mung:- mug: gaung mae" qam: so' jham wa- laui" nan" li" genae" .
Alao" mug: gaung mae" Byu: Yao: Zo: joe" li" nae" ve, lho jham myao: thug' li" nae" . Byu: Yao: Zo: wa qam: so' phungbao we' daga" mug: gaung: jham thaui: dao mae joe" li" rure myid gaung dao mae" byumyu" alhab' the' myao gelao"- ngug byid ngug nhe' boe" genae" .
Alao"- labo" qi: thoe myang: li" mung:- yao" mug: lagyo: qere mug: myid byid khyug geim" khyo nhao: ke' li" nae" . Yao: bam wa yao" yang khyin: yu: to" ra" mo, re mug: myid gam: sho' mae" cao" zhang: yu: li" genae" .
Alao" pho' ham" gae re qu" yang: zhao: yu ge,- Pho' ham" gae mae" anyaug thug' li" mung: vho' nau" tad' li" lao"- zin vao kheim: joe" li" na va" rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- aijham alhab' boe" lo: na: rure naonhaung" the' myao gelao"- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa jhao" li" mung: kham: dung: mae lhao" ngad va" rure naonhaung" ba ge, .
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa- Ana" na: jo; ra" byu ceqae: alhab' mashid shi: re aijham alhab' boe" li" nae" .
Mug: gaung we' myid gaung lai: lo" byaug ngadqere:- nga" dao: jham wa khonhae" re: malai: lo" nae" .
Ngadqere: ai: ba na we' yo, qug re Mao" So mae" je yang: khag' re: maba- Mug: gaung dao mae" mug: lagyo: jham we' Yao: Zo: lhao" re: maba ngad: ra" .
Noa ban: mae boe" ru we' dakhyo: Byu: Yao: Zo: joe" li" rumae re: airu boe" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re daqid mashi: shi" ra" pyad mae" byu jham wa Noa qid sang pho khyo vao lo" ra" ba na joe" sho'- zo: zo: shaug' shaug' myi: byid: myi: yu mung: na: ako" .
Ai: daqid shi" li" mung: yao: bam alhab' nab: shid: lo" ra" ba na joe" sho' yao: bam mabeim: maso: lo: na: ako" .
Alao"- yothaung: mae na: ra" byu shid' yaug mae" dayaug re jhui" yu mung:- dayaug re wa tang" to: co' li" nae" .
Laug lhang daga" gyag: na ko" ra" myiqe: shid' yaug mae" dayaug re jhui" yu mung:- dayaug re tang" to: co' li" nae" .
Airumung: lha" yang: lhaug' na ge,- pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" Asang wa kho: au: joe" li" nae" rure naonhaung" maba gengad: ra" .
Yham sang wa khug' hab' li" nae" yo,khyin: re ba: to" ngad: re wa yao" yham re khug' hab' maqo" kyaung" thad' vao li" nae" qhid' mae" yao: wa lha" yang: lhaug' na: li" nae" rure naonhaung" beim: ge,-
Airumung: naonhaung" wa khonhae" re: jin" jin" za: seim" to: ge,- pe"mung: ga"re- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa naonhaung" mamyid: to" ra" au: re joe" li" nae" .
Alao"- ai: kyid: ru we' qag: ra" jeim wa khoyaug ngad: i? Ai: yaug wa gatau: jeim qere eib khang" nae" we' ayo, joe" lao" zokho gae byid: nae" qhid' mae" Asang: yang san: to" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao" Asang dam: joe" lo: au: re airu:- yao" mau" zo" re kyid kyid za: zaui" na: ra" jeim wa ngaui lho" ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa Asang wa yao" jo,nho" alhab' re zaui: nae" qhid' mae" ai: jeim re san: to" li" nae" .
Ngadqere: ai: jeim wa makhyang" ra" jeim ngad: re wa yao" aung khug mae- Nga" Asang wa dam: tug' lo nae" myao" shi"- ga: myid yang:-
Yao" jeim byin cao: qere be, thaung: mung:- yhid ya: qe we' zo: shaug' yang: na: li" nae" .
Amung:- ai: jeim pho" matag: to" ra" ba na ayo, mae yao" Asang wa dam: lo: li" nae" .
Alao"- ai: Asang wa jeim pho" re qi: sho' qobo byid: be, mung: geim kad' ra" mo, kham zo" ra" qobo dae re kham zo: nhao: li" nae" . Amung: yao: wa ngug byid ngug nhe' we' zaui kyag' yang: na: li" nae" .
Ai: ayo, mae- mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa ceru we' dau: li" nae" . Zomyi: daxe yaug wa yao: bam: xau myibaung: re yu: ci mung:- pho" sag' re yetug: yu nae" thug' ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: bam mae" ngo" yaug wa qag mo, ngad mung: ngo" yaug: gu: wa maqag mo, ngad: ako" .
Maqag mo, wa yao: bam: myibaung: jham re yu: ci gengad yang: re: xau ajan" mabo: yu: vin ko" ngad: ra" .
Qag mo, kam" wa- yao: bam: myibaung: we' daga" xau ajan" re boyu: vin: ako" .
Alao" pho" sag' joe" li" nae" thao gyo" mung:- yao: bam alhab' mo, yab nghoe" nghoe" yang: yab: myhid' bam: ako" .
Gae gaung: myi: joe" lao"- Qu" ge, Pho" sag' joe" li" va"- yetug: yu gese,- ga: hug' thug' li" ra" .
Alao" zomyi: jham alhab' to" mung: yao: bam: myibaung: jham re myi: te' ako" .
Ai: maqag: ra" zomyi: qe wa qag: ra" zomyi: qere- ngonhaung" myibaung: shid: lo" na: ra"- amung: naonhaung" myibaung: xau ngonhaung" re dajhid' byid: gela,- ga: mho' ako" .
Ngadqere: ai: qag: ra" zomyi: qe wa tau: mung:- naonhaung" qhid' mae" we' ngonhaung" qhid' mae" ga" re wa ai: xau malaug nae" . Amung: xau aung: mo, jhao" mae" naonhaung" qhid' mae" xau yevai: yu ge,- ga: ta" ako" .
Ai: maqag: ra" zomyi: qe xau vai ye" lo" ra" gyo: mae- pho" sag' joe" li" mung:- ai: jin" jin" seim" na: ra" zomyi: qe wa pho" sag' we' daga" lo,xo' poe khyo vao ye" lo" mung:- kham: pyid' pye' ako" .
Ai: thao re- ai: maqag: ra" zomyi: qere: dam: joe" li" mung:- Asang we"- Asang we"- ngonhaung" re kham: phung" byid: la,- ga: yao: ako" .
Ngadqere: pho" sag' wa Ngo naonhaung" re dang dang za: ta" geli"- naonhaung" re ngo maba- ga: tau" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- naonhaung" wa ai: ba na we' ayo, re maba ko" ruyang lha" mung: lhaug' na ge,- ga: Yesu dao: pin" ra" .
Ai: ayo, mae mug: gaung: mung"dan: wa ceru we' dau: li" nae" . Byu dayaug wa gyaung: su" lo" nae" seim" lao"- yao: wa yao" jeim qere khai: yu mung:- yao: bam re yao" jo,nho" ab byid: co' ra" .
Dayaug re ngaui ngo" joe:- dayaug re shid' joe:- gatau dayaug re dajoe: kad' mung: yao: bam: qam: o: re cao" yang: ab byid: co' yang: yao: wa gyaung: su" lo" ra" .
Ngaui ngo" joe: qo" yu: ra" yaug wa ai lao" jao" thug' ye" lo" mung:- ai: ngaui jham: yang phaga: yekad' yang: yao: wa gatau ngaui ngo" joe: gau pai: the' yu: ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- ngaui shid' joe: qo" yu: ra" yaug re:- phaga: yekad' mung: ngaui gau pai: shid' joe: the' yu: ra" .
Ngadqere:- ngaui dajoe: qo" yu: ra" jeim wa thug' ye: mung: dung: khung: dau: yang: yao" Asang: nho: ngaui re nyhab' to" ra" .
Dayo, kyo thao re ai: jeim qe: Asang wa dam: tug' lo mung:- yao: bam we' ngaui japhin: losho' ra" .
Ngaui ngo" joe: qo" yu: ra" yaug wa gatau ngaui gau pai: ngo" joe: re cili" mung:- Asang we"- nao ngore ngaui ngo" joe: ab byid: co' ra"- Qu" wa,- ngo wa ngaui ngo" joe: gau pai: the' yu va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Asang wa gai va"- gai: ru we' kyid: ra" jeim we"- nao wa bun ngaui dajhid' za" rumae kyid: ra" . Amung: ngo nao re bun ngaui myo: sho' ab byid: nae"- nga" ngaui bau" rumae li" boleim ri:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngaui shid' joe: qo" yu yaug re: ngaui gau pai: shid' joe: re cili" mung:- Asang we"- nao wa ngore ngaui shid' joe: ab byid: co' ra" . Qu" wa,- ngo wa ngaui gau pai: shid' joe: the' yu va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Asang wa gai va"- gai: ru we' kyid: ra" jeim we"- nao wa bun dajhid' za" rumae kyid yaug ngad: ra" . Amung: ngo wa nao re bun ngaui myo: sho' ab byid: nae"- nga" ngaui bau" rumae li" boleim" ri:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re ngaui dajoe: qo" yu: ra" yaug wa joe" li" mung:- Asang we"- nao wa gyai qhag' yaug ngad: ru we' nao maqho" to" ra" jo, qo mae" yad: yu nug yaug- nao masin" to" ra" jo, qo mae" yad: zhang: yu nug yaug ngad: rure ngo ba: .
Ngo wa gyaug yang:- ni" ngaui joe: re myid gaung mae yedau" nyhab' to"- Qu" wa,- ni" ngaui cemae jo; ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- yao" Asang wa Makhyang" ru we' noe" ra" jeim we"- ngo wa maqho" to" ra" jo, qo mae" yad: yu nug: ru we' masin" to" ra" jo, qo mae" zhang: yu nug: ra" yaug ngad: rure nao ba: ra" .
Airu: ngad: re- nao wa nga" ngaui re ngaui jhi mae yeke' to: ang: ra" . Ngo dam: tug' joe" lo lao"- ai: bun ngaui we' daga" gau pai: ngaui re ngo dam: qo" yu zai ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yao" lo, mae" ngaui joe: re yu mung: daxe joe: qo" ra" yaug re byid: ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re- qo" ra" yaug wa laung: byid' ru qhug' mung: yao: wa magan: mago" je: qo" li" nae" . Maqo" ra" yaug mae" kam" wa- yao: qo" ra" gu: alhab' re lhao" yu: pye' byid' ru qhug' li" nae" .
Ai: lam maga" ra" jeim gao: re wa taung gaung shad' mug: cad' yo khyo khe' thug' pye' ge,- ai: mae yao: wa ngug byid ngug nhe' we' zaui kyag' yang: na: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Byu: Yao: Zo: wa yao" phung qab bao we' mug: lagyo: jham alhab' we' daga" kho: kham khyo" joe" li" lao"- yao" kho: kham zaung tao" dao mae zaung: jo; li" nae" .
Alao"- byumyu" cao jab alhab' wa yao" qhid' kheim: mae ham: phaung: na: bam: li" genae" . Yao zaung" yaug wa yao we' cad' be, jham re gatau tau kho' to" ru we' dakhyo:- Byu: Yao: Zo: re: byu qere phung: kho' to" li" nae" .
Amung: yao: wa din: man" ra" mo, re yao" lo, yo shad' mae- makhyang" ra" mo, re yao" lo, kaung: shad' mae nha: to" li" nae" .
Ai: thao re kho: kham pho" wa ai: lo, yo shad' mae" mo, re- Nga" pho" nho: shaman" jeju re qhug' khae: yu: ra" mo, we"- Lo geri:- Mug: myid phan" to" ra" ba na mae" naonhaung" qhid' mae" nyhang" jaung: to" ra" mung"dan: re kham: yu ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re- ngo vae: moe' ra" au: re naonhaung" ngore byid: zho" ako" . Ngo qid shab' ra" au: re naonhaung" ngore qid byid: jhaug' ako" . Ngo bang" vo ngad: ra" au: re naonhaung" ngore bang" da" byid' ako" .
Ngo gaung pyad' ngad: au: re- naonhaung" ngore mai bau: byid: vhe' ako" . Ngo no phyo: qhug' au: re- naonhaung" ngore gun caung: ako"- ngo thaung: laung" jo; au: naonhaung" ngore li" kam: vako" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" din: man" ra" mo, wa- yao: re tau: mung:- Asang we"- nao vae: moe' rure ngonhaung" khonhae" myao yang: nao re byid: zho: geli" laug i? Nao qid shab' rure ngonhaung" khonhae" myao yang: nao re qid byid: jhaug' geli" laug i?
Nao bang" vo ngad: rure ngonhaung" khonhae" myao yang:- nao re bang" da" byid' lai: lo geli" laug i? Nao gaung pyad' na: rure ngonhaung" khonhae" myao yang: nao re mai bau: vhe' geli" laug i?
Nao no phyo: qhug' rure ngonhaung" khonhae" myao yang nao re gun caung byid' lai: lo geli" laug i? Nao thaung: laung" jo; rure ngonhaung" khonhae" myao yang: nao re li" kam: geli" va" laug i? ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" kho: kham pho" wa Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa Ce: nga" mao: nhaung: qe mae" je: ngai: thao" ra" yaug re naonhaung" gun caung: ru wa ngore gun caung: ru ngad: ava"- ga: ta" li" nae" .
Ai: thao re kho: kham pho" wa yao" lo, kaung: shad' mae" mo, re- Mao" So: nhang: kheim: zao" ra" mo, we"- nga" qhid' kheim: mae" thug' lo" ge,- ai: yui Satan we' yao" lagyo: jham: qhid' mae" nyhang" jaung: to" ra" apyad ato: myiqid tham: khug khyo vao ye: ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re- ngo vae: moe' au: naonhaung" ngore mabyid: zho: ko"- ngo qid shab' au: naonhaung" ngore shaug' qid mabyid: jhaug' ko"-
Ngo bang" vo ngad: au:- naonhaung" ngore bang" mada" byid: ko"- ngo gaung pyad' na: au:- naonhaung" ngore mai bau: mavhe' ko"- ngo no phyo: qhug' ru we' thaung: laung" jo; au:- naonhaung" ngore magun caung ko" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa Asang we"- nao vae: moe' ru- qid shab' ru- bang" vo ngad: ru- gaung pyad' na: ru- nao no phyo: qhug' ru- thaung: laung" jo; rure ngonhaung" khonhae" myao yang: nao re ngonhaung" macaung da" byid: geli" laug i? ga: ta" li" genae" .
kho: kham pho" wa ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa je: ngai: thao" ra" cebam mae" dayaug yaug re naonhaung" magun macaung ko" ru wa ngore magun macaung: ru ngad: ava"- ga: ta" li" nae" .
Alao" yao: bam wa apyad ato: qobo dae kham zo: nae" khyo vao ye: mung:- din: man" ra" mo, kam" wa apyad ato: kao so' daui: ra" khyo vao ye" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa ai: gu: alhab' re bin: ta" lao"- yao: wa yao" mho"zo: qere-
Shid' ba lai lao"- Lai co' Poe joe" zai ngad: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" . Byu: Yao: Zo: wa pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" ab byid' pye' ru qhug' li" nae" .
Alao"- khinjaung qi: qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qe wa Khinjaung Yin" Kayapha yham mo" mae zang" phaung mung:-
Yesu re sae za: taung" yu yang: se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" jho" qham: ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa mo, byu qe mabeim" li" geshao: poe ba na gyo: gu: mae makad' ge jhao" ga: jho" ta" ako" .
Yesu wa Bethani mae- mao gae: boe" qu" ra" Simon: yham mae zozo" na: au:-
Myiqe: dayaug wa gyai phug' de; ra" Mura Nard xau laug gyang" thaug' dalam: cili" mung: Yesu au: mae ai: xau li" vhe' sheim: byid' ra" .
Yao" mho"zo: qe wa aire myao gelao" nhag' qu" yo: gemung:- pe"mung: ai: xau re amyid: avho: kad' pye' ra" i?
Ai: xau wa ngaui myo: sho' kye' re aung: mung:- myaung sho" ra" mo, re qo" gae byid: zai ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa aire ba lao"- yao: bam re- Naonhaung" ai: myiqe: re pe"mung: khin jang ko" ra" i? Yao: wa ngore gai: ra" mau" kad' byid' ava" .
Pe"mung: ga"re myaung sho" ra" mo, wa khonhae" re: naonhaung" we' daga" za: na: ako" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa ngo we' daga" khonhae" re: abang mabyid maqo" na genae" .
Ce: myiqe: nga" gaung re xau vhe' sheim: byid' ru wa ngore nyhab' shaung: pye' nae" qhid' mae" seim" nyhang" ru ngad: ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re kho" kyo" lo" ra" mug: myid gye, geim" khyi" khao: ngo" mae ce: myiqe: re beim: so: nae" qhid' mae" yao: kad' ra" mau" zo" rere: ta" kyo" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug mae bobo: ra" Yuda Iskarud ga: mang: ra" yaug wa khinjaung qi: qejhao" thug' ye" lo" mung:-
Yao: wa yao: bam re- ngo naonhaung" lo, khyo Yesu re ab byid: lao"- naonhaung" ngore ngaui khonho" byid: genae" i? ga: yemyid' ra"- yao: bam wa yao: re ngaui sam xe kye' nghe' byid' ako" .
Ai: ba na mae" Yuda wa Yesu re ab: pye' nae" khoau: yo" nae" rure qho: na: ra" .
Ai: Man" Make' ra" Mug Poe sao qhid' ba mae mho"zo: qe wa Yesu jhao" li" mung:- ni" qhid' mae" Lai co' Poe myi" xeim re khotau mae nao ngonhaung" re yenyhang" seim" to: nhao nug: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Vogaung: mae" byu dayaug jhao" ye: mung: aiyaug re- Mho" Pho" ta" ke' ra"- nga" ayo, joe" li" na va"- amung: ni" yham mae nga" mho"zo: qe we' ai: Lai co' Poe re kad' nug: ra" ga"- ein: yao: re yeta" ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" mho"zo: qe wa Yesu yao: bam re ta" ke' ru we' dakhyo: kad' mung:- ai: Lai co' Poe re yeseim" nyhang" to" ako" .
Myi" thao cad' sham" zo" joe" lao"- Yesu wa mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug we' daga" zaung: jo, mung: myi" xeim zo" ra" .
Yao: bam myi" xeim zo" na ko" au:- Yesu wa ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa naonhaung" mae" dayaug wa ngore ab byid' pye' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- mho"zo: qe wa gyai nhag' gyo" kaug' ru we' Yesu re dayaug: thao dayaug aiyaug wa Ngo ngad nae" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- ngo we' daga" dakhug' mae" za: mug jam zo" ra" yaug wa ngore ab byid' pye' li" nae" .
Byu: Yao: Zo: wa jham: mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: shid kham: nae" qhid' mae" ye" li" nae" . Ngadqere: Byu: Yao: Zo: re ab byid' pye' ra" yaug wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ra"- aiyaug wa makhau: li" ngad: re yao" qhid' mae" je: gai zai ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- Yesu re ab byid' pye' nae" yaug Yuda wa Mho" Pho" we"- aiyaug wa ngo ngad nae" laug i? ga: Yesu re myid' ra" . Yesu wa tau: mung:- nao ta" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam zozo" na ko" au: Yesu wa mug re yu mung: jeju caung: akyu" mho' ra" . Ai: thao re ai: mug re cug' phai" yang: Ce wa nga" gaung ngad:- yu mung: zo: ge,- ga: ta" mung: yao" mho"zo: qere gae byid' ra" .
Keim rere: yu mung: Mao" So re jeju bin: caung: byid: lao"- yao: bam re- Naonhaung" alhab' mo, aimae" shaug' ge,-
Ce wa qobo khyad' byid' ru qhug' geshao:- byu myo: sho' qhid' mae" sheim: pye' ra" Mao" So: dao: thang" re dazid thaung" te' to" ra" nga" sa: ngad: ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- nga" Pho" mung"dan: mae ngo wa naonhaung" we' daga" sabyi qang: asag' re mashaug' shaug' wa sabyi qang: re ana" mae" ngo khonhae" re: mashaug' lo nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re yao: bam wa caung: nghaui" dalam: bin: caung: lao"- Zhan: lun: Bam khyo thug' ye" lo" ko" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Ana" myi yao: naonhaung" alhab' mo, ngore to: co' mung: tao" phao: lo" byaug: li" genae" . Pe"mung: ga"re jham: mugsug' mae- ngo wa yao zaung" yaug re be, mung: yao jham wa byo: sin" lo" byaug: li" genae"- ga: tung" to" ra" .
Ngadqere:- ngo dam: daui: to" li" thao re ngo wa naonhaung" qhid' au: mae Galile khyo ye" lo" na: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Petru wa Yao: bam alhab' mo, nao re phao: cug' to: co' gengadqere: ngo wa nao re khonhae" re: maphao: cug' to: co' nae"- ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Petru re- ngo nao re dang dang ta" li"- ana" myi yao: qo, mateim shi: re nao ngore sam lhang ha: pye' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Petru wa Ngo nao we' daga" shid qo: li" ngadqere: ngo wa nao re maha: pye' nae"- ga: Yesu re tau" ra" . Mho"zo: gaje alhab' mo, re: ai we' dakhyo: ta" ako" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa mho"zo: qe we' daga" Getseman ga: mang: ra" jo, qo khyo joe" ye" lo" ra" . Alao" Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- ngo thoetau khyo ye: mung: akyu" yemho' na: ra" au:- naonhaung" wa cetau mae zaung: jo, lao: shi ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Petru we' Zebede yao: zo: tao re yao: we' daga" jhui" ye" lo" ra" . Yesu wa qi: sho' nhag' kaug' nhag' qhui: ru we' myid: qug: myid: ci" qhug' ra" .
Yesu wa Nga" nhag' lam: shid nae" qhi" yao: gyai kaug' qhui: ra"- naonhaung" cetau mae ngo we' daga" lha" yang: lhaug' na ge,- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa aimae" dazab zo: lai: ye: mung: myid gaung mae ye: goe; jo, yang:- nga" Pho" we"- gai: boe" ngad: re wa- ce: keim re ngo mae" lhai: ke' byid: la,- ngadqere: ngo o: ra" khyo" mangad:- nao o: ra" khyo" za: boe" lo vashao:- ga: akyu" yemho' ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu mho"zo: sam yaug jhao" dam: tug' lo: re yao: bam wa yab: pyo" jo, ko" rure lomyao: ra" . Yesu wa naonhaung" sam yaug wa dayo, qug za: lhao" re: ngo we' daga" maqo" lhaug' na ge i?
Naonhaung" wa ju" phyo' ru khyo magyo" lo" genae" qhid' mae" lha" mung: akyu" mho' na ge,- Byo wa nug kao bau ngadqere: gaung sho: wa qam: nang" ra"- ga: Petru re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa shid' lhang ein: lhang dam: ye" lo" mung: Nga" Pho" we"- ce: keim re ngo mae" magai: lhai: ke' lao" wa nao myid: o: ra" khyo" boe" lo vashao:- ga: akyu" mho' ra" .
Yesu dam: tug' lo: re mho"zo: qe wa myo, qid gyai la: geyang: yab: myhid' jo, ko" rure lodam: myao: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re nha co' mung: dam: ye: yang: azhao: mae" dao: we' dakhyo: sam lhang ein: lhang akyu" yedam: mho' ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa mho"zo: qejhao" dam: tug' lo mung: yao: bam re- naonhaung" ana" joe" sho' yab: myhid' jo, mung: no" na genhaung i? Qu" ge,- Byu: Yao: Zo: re qobo kad' ra" mo, khyo ab byid' pye' nae" yo, qug joe" li" va" ra" .
To" ge,- ngonhaung" ye" lo" gelang: se, Qu" ge,- ngore ab byid' pye' nae" yaug wa joe" li" na: ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu airu: jhau: na shi" au: re yao" mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug mae bobo: ra" Yuda wa khinjaung qi: qe tung" pho" qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qeyang nhao: ke' ra" shae tam" thaung kang ci: ra" byu phung: we' daga" joe" li" ra" .
Yesu re ab byid' pye' yaug wa- ngo bobaug baug: ra" yaug wa naonhaung" o: ra" yaug ngad: ra" Yao: re taung" yu ge, ga:- ave, byid' to" ra" .
