Yuda wa Yesu jhao" din: za: li" mung: Mho" Pho" we"- qao" na: i? ga: ta" yang:- bobaug baug: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Ba nam pho" we"- nao kad' nae" mau" re phyad za: kad' wa,- ga: tau" ra" . Alao" yao: bam wa Yesu re taung" yu mung: tang za: zaui" zag: ci: ako" .
Alao" qu" ge, Yesu we' daga" na: ra" mo, mae" dayaug wa yao" shae pyang: she: yu yang: Khinjaung Yin" nho: jeim dayaug re qam" ke' mung: yao" nokhye' byid: lo" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Ni" shae pyang: re shae byao khug mae dam: ke' to: wa,- Shae pyang: ci yang: gye kad' yaug khag' ngadqere: shae pyang" yang shid nae" .
Ngo wa Nga" Pho" re bao" thaug' nae" mho' lao"- yao: wa gyetab daxe: shid' tab mae" gyezo: tho' myo" ra" mug: lagyo: jham re ngojhao" nhao: ke' byid: zai ngad: rure nao maba i?
Ngadqere: airu: kad' ngad: re wa- ceru wa boe" lo ca" nae"- ga: tung" to" ra" jham: dao: wa khoru: qo" jab byang" lo zai i? ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa mo, byu qere- Naonhaung" wa damya, re taung" ruru: ngore taung: nae" qhid' mae" shae we' thaung kang we' li" ko" i? Ngo wa ba khao: ba ngo" Caung: pa" Yham mae zaung: jo, mung: mho" byid' na ngadqere: naonhaung" ngore mataung: ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: lapa qe tung" to" ra" jham: dao: jham jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" cegu: alhab' boe" li" ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" . Alao" mho"zo: qe alhab' wa Yesu re to: co' mung: tao" phao" lo" ko" ra" .
Yesu re taung" yu: ra" mo, wa yao: re Khinjaung Yin" Kayapha yham khyo jhui" ye" ako" . Tung" pho" qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qe wa ai: mae zang" phaung: na: bam: ako" .
Petru wa Khinjaung Yin" nho: yham vang" khyo joe" sho' va: va: mae" Yesu thao cao" ye" ra" . Yao: wa yham vang" khug khyo vao ye: mung: Yesu khoru: boe" lo" ra" rure ba nae" qhid' mae" gug: gam qe we' daga" ye: zaung: jo; ra" .
Khinjaung qi: qe we' Tarha" Qe, Do, geim" mae" mo, wa Yesu re qo" se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" madang: ra" sagse: qho: ako" .
Mhug' mung: sagse: kham: ra" mo, myo: sho' thug' li" mung:- yao" khyo re madang: ra" khyo" sagse: mhug' kham gengad yang: re:- yao: bam pe" sagse: mamyao ko" ngad: ra" .
Lo" thao" mae byu shid' yaug thug' li" mung: Byu ceyaug wa Ngo wa Caung: pa" Yham re phyo' pye' mung: sam ba gyo: mae qo" dam: kad' nae" ga: ta" ra"- ga: sagse: kham: ako" .
Alao" Khinjaung Yin" wa to" ye; li" mung: Yesu re- Nao dakheim: re: mata" i? Yao: bam ni" khyo re sagse: kham: na ko" ru wa khoru: i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa sae za: na: ra" . Khinjaung Yin" wa Yesu re Nao Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ngad lao" wa ngonhaung" re ta" la,- ngo wa daui: na: ra" Mao" So: mang re lao: mung: ngo nao re myid' ra"- ga: dam: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Yao: re- Aiwa nao ta" ru ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ngo naonhaung" alhab' re ta" geli"- ana" mae" thao phyao: Byu: Yao: Zo: wa phung qam: so' nho: lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo; ru we' mug: gaung: jham thaui: dao mae jui: mung: li" rure naonhaung" qhug' myao: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Khinjaung Yin" wa yao: yao" bau: qhang lao" cad' pye' mung:- yao: wa Mao" So re jung" gaui: ra" dao: jhau: ava"- ngonhaung" gatau pe" sagse: qo shilo" i? Yao: Mao" So re jung" gaui: rure naonhaung" yao: the' gyo" yu: avako" .
Naonhaung" khoru: myid ko" i? ga: ta" ra" . Alao" yao: bam wa tau: mung:- yao: wa qobo qo" yaug ngad mung: shid man" ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ai: thao re yao: bam wa Yesu myo,khung: re khota: phoe" sheim" ru we' zhab' thaung" ako" .
Daqhae: wa Yesu re bo: pyo' pyo' mung:- Asang Meshia we"- nao re khag' be; rure ngonhaung" re lapa pa: kyo: la,- ga: ta" ako" .
Petru wa taung gaung shad' ai: vang" khug mae zaung: jo; ra" au:- Khinjaung Yin" nho: okaung myiqe: nau" dayaug yao: jhao" li" mung:- Petru re- Nao re: Galile mae" Yesu we' daga" na yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Petru wa alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae ha: pye' mung:- nao ta" ra" khyo re ngo maba- ga: phaug' tau: yang: vang" kham: nhad' khyo thug' ye" lo" ra" .
Okaung myiqe: nau" gatau dayaug re: dam: the' myao lao" aitau mae na: ra" mo, re ceyaug re: Nazared mae" Yesu we' daga" na yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Petru wa Ai: yaug re ngo maba- ga: nhang: myan" nhang: thoe we' dam: ha: pye' ra" .
Ai: thao dazab gai re ayae mae ye; jo; ra" mo, wa Petru jhao" qui" li" mung:- yao: re gaigai: yao: nao re: yao: bam: phung: mae" dayaug ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ni" jhau thoe: yang yao: shid' na: ava"- ga: ta" ako" .
Petru wa nhang: myan" nhang: thoe we' Ngo wa aiyaug re maba- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" jao" qo, teim: ra" .
Petru wa qo, mateim shi: re nao wa ngore maba ga: sam lhang ha: pye' li" nae" ga: Yesu yao: re ta" to" ra" dao: re myid: beim" ra" . Alao" Petru wa taung gaung khyo thug' ye: mung:- gyai kaug' ngug: ra" .
Ne,seim no' mae" khinjaung qi: qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qe wa Yesu re se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" byin phyo: jho" zin" ako" .
Ai: thao re yao: bam wa Yesu re taung" yu mung: Roma mang: zug: pho" Pilad' re yeshe: ab, byid' ako" .
Yesu re ab: pye' ra" Yuda wa Yesu shid nae" dao: phyid' ru qhug' ra" khyo re ba lao"- Yuda wa myid tha" mung:- ai: ngaui sam xe kye' re khinjaung qi: qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qejhao" dam: citug' ye: mung:-
ngo wa qobo maqo" ra" yaug re shid nae" qhid' mae" ab byid' pye' ra" qobo qo" va"- ga: yeta" ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa Yuda re- Airu wa ngonhaung" we' pe" sin" i? Aiwa ni" mau" angad:- ga tau" ako" .
Alao" Yuda wa ai: ngaui sam xe kye' re Caung: pa" Yham mae shapye' to: co' yang: ai: tau mae" thug' lo" mung:- yao: yao: za: ye: jui" shid: pye' ra" .
Khinjaung yin" qe wa- ai: ngaui re gaug: yu mung: ce wa sa: phug' ngaui ngad: ra" . Airumung:- Caung: pa" Yham mae" Alu: ban" mae ke' to: nae" magai- ga: ta" ako" .
Yao: bam bin: jho" phyo" nyang thao re ai: ngaui: yang zhogam: ug' kad' yaug: myid gaung re taung bug qe: lab bug kad' nae" qhid' mae" vai: yu: ako" .
Aimung: ai: myid gaung re ana" ba joe" sho' Sa: Myid Gaung ga: mhang" ako" .
Amung: yao: bam wa aiyaug: gaung phug' khyo" Israel byumyu" qe gau jho ta" phyid' to: byid' ra" ai: ngaui sam xe kye' re yu: yu mung:-
Asang ngore pyang: to: co' ru we' dakhyo:- ai: ngaui: yang zhogam: kad' yaug: nho: myid gaung re vai yu: ako"- ga: lapa Yeremia ta" to" ru jab byang" li" ra" .
Yesu wa Roma mang: zug: pho" qhid' kheim: mae ye; jo; ra" . Mang: zug: pho" wa Yesu re- Nao wa Yuda qe: kho: kham ngad i? ga: myid' ra" . Yesu wa yao: re- Aiwa nao ta" ru ngad: ra" ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Ngadqere: khinjaung qi: qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qeyang qobo zhaug' ko" ra" khyo jham re yao: wa pe" dakheim: re: maphaug' tau: ngad: ra" .
Alao" Pilad' wa Yesu re- yao: bam nao re khoqhi" sho' qobo zhaug' na ko" rure nao mathe' gyo: i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: re dakheim: re: maphaug' tau: ngad: ra" . Airumung: mang: zug: pho" wa gyai mug' ra" .
Roma mang: zug: pho" wa- Lai co' Poe khao: ngo" mae mo, byu qe mho' ra" kyam: byu dayaug yaug re yao: bam: qhid' mae" lhaung" nhao: thug' ke' byid' ra" .
Ai: yo, mae makhyang: yang: su hau: qi" ra" Baraba ga: mang: ra" kyam: byu dayaug na: ra" .
Mo, byu qe zang" ham: li" gelao"- Pilad wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" qhid' mae" khag' re lhoe' ke' nae" o ko" i? Yesu Baraba re i? Mangad: lao" Meshia ga" ra" Yesu i? ga: myid' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam myid nug: geyang:- Yesu re yao" lo, khyo li" ab byid: ko" rure Pilad ba: ra" .
Pilad wa dao: kho' zaung tao" mae zaung: jo, shi" au:- yao" yham sang myhi" wa byu dayaug re nhao: ke' mung:- ai: qobo maqo" ra" yaug re pe" dakad' wa,- pe"mung: ga"re amyi ngo wa yab mo, mae yao" mathao: yang nhag' lam: dayin dayo: qhug' va"- ga: ta" nhao: ke' ra" .
Khinjaung qi: qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qe wa Baraba re lhoe' ke' byid: mung: Yesu re se' pye' wa,- ga: Pilad re mho' genae" qhid' mae" mo, byu qere poe: ako" .
Ngadqere: Pilad wa mo, byu qere- ce shid' yaug mae" khoyaug re lam: naonhaung" qhid' mae" lhoe' ke' byid: nae" naonhaung" o ko" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: bam wa Baraba re lhoe' ke' byid: la, ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Alao" Pilad' wa yao: bam re- Airu: ngad lao" wa- Meshia ga" ra" Yesu re ngo khoru: kad' zai i? ga: ta" ra" . Yao: bam alhab' mo, wa- yao: re wa- pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' wa,- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Alao" Pilad wa- yao: pe" ja" qobo shad' lhoe" ra" i? ga: myid' ra" . Alao" yao: bam wa- yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' wa,- ga: je yang: zag: hug' ako" .
Pilad wa pe" xo' ta" ngad yang: re: pe" akyu" mabo- mo, byu qe lu" to" li" na: rure qu" myao lao"- qid yu: yu yang:- ceyaug shid: ra" xao qug: wa ngo we' pe" re: masin:- ceyaug: xao qug: naonhaung" vin ca"- ga: ta" mung: mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae lo, cid' ra" .
Mo, byu qe alhab' mo, wa Yao" xao qug: wa- ngonhaung" we' ngonhaung" myid: zo: qe: dao mae ngad vashao:- ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" Pilad wa Baraba re yao: bam: qhid' mae" lhoe' ke' byid' ra" . Yesu re wa be, mung: pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" ab byid' ke' ra" .
Mang: zug: pho" nho: gyezo: jham wa Yesu re mang: zug: pho" yham mo" khug khyo jhui" vao ye" lo" ko" ra" . Gyetab geim" mae" gyezo: jham Yesu lhang" gam: zang" ham: li" ako" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re mai bau: khyad' pye' byid: yang:- bau: qhang amo, tha" vhe' byid' ako" .
Ai: thao re- yao: bam wa zau: kyao: yang maug dalam: nag mung: Yesu au: mae zhaung: byid: mung: yao" lo, yo lo, mae qid phaung: yao: dakhyaung: ke' byid' ako" . Bin lao" yao: bam wa Yesu qhid' kheim: mae pad' thaug' thaug' yang: yao: re jung" zo" re"- Yuda qe: kho: kham we"- kao qhang so' qhang vashao: wo"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re- khata: phoe" sheim: byid' ru we' qid phaung: yao: yu: yu yang: yao" au: re be; ako" .
Yao: bam wa yao: re bin: jung" khyoe' gelao"- ai: bau: qhang re khyad' pye' byid: mung: yao" mai bau: dam: vhe' byid: yang: pyao: zang dao mae jin" se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" Yesu re jhui" thug' lo" ako" .
Yao: bam thug' ye" lo" na ko" au: Kureni mung" byu- Simon ga: mang: ra" yaug re the' myao gelao"- gyezo: jham wa Yesu pyao: zang re vo, nae" qhid' mae" yao: re deim" zag: nhao: ako" .
Golgotha ga: mang: ra" au: gao: gye, jo, qo khyo joe" ye: gelao"-
yao: bam wa mocid' kho: we' phaung: to" ra" sabyi qang: Yesu re byid: jhaug' ako" . Yesu wa aire lham: yo; tau" qu" mung:- mashaug' ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam Yesu re- pyao: zang mae bin: jin" te' pye' gelao"- yao: bam wa pha" be, mung: Yesu mai bau: jham re yao: bam yao: cao: jho" gae: yu: ako" .
Ai: thao re- yao: bam wa aitau mae zaung: jo, mung: Yesu re lhaug' na: ako" .
Yao" au: tho' mae- ceyaug wa Yuda qe: kho: kham Yesu ngad: ra"- ga: yao: re qobo zhaug' ra" mugsug' tung" te' to" ako" .
Alao" yao: we' daga" damya, shid' yaug re- lo, yo shad' mae dayaug- lo, kaung: shad' mae dayaug pyao: zang dao mae jin" te' to" ako" .
Khyo mae su" lai: lo" mo, re:- Yesu re jung" ru we' au: nghoe" nghoe" mung:- Caung: pa" Yham re phyo' pye' yang; sam ba gyo: mae dam: kad' nae" ga: yaug we"-
nao Mao" So: Yao: zo: ngad: re wa- ni" gaung re naoyao: khyad' yu wa,- Amung: pyao: zang dao mae" gyo" lo ri:- ga: nyhe' ako" .
Khinjaung qi: qe- tung" pho" qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qere:- ai we' dakhyo:- Yesu re jung" khyoe' ako" .
Su gaje qere wa yao: khyad' yu: ra"- ngadqere: yao: yao" gaung re wa maqo" khyad' yu nhaung . Yao: wa Israel qe: kho: kham mangad: i? Pyao: zang dao mae" ana" gyo" lo: ngad: re wa- ngonhaung" yao: re lam" zai ngad:-
yao: wa Mao" So re khug ngha: ra" . Aimung: Ngo wa Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ga: ta" yaug ngad: ra" . Airu: ngad; re Mao" So yao: re ana" khyad' yu nug: laug ceim" qu" gelang: ga: ta" ako" .
Yao: we' daga" pyao: zang mae jin" te' to" ra" damya, shid' zo: lhao" re:- ai we' dakhyo: Yesu re jung" ako" .
Amung:- ba khaung tau yo, mae" myi" thao sam yo, qug joe" sho' damung" geim" no, sang: kyid mug: cad' cad' lo" byaug: ra" .
Myi" thao sam yo, qug mae Yesu wa- thoe qi: we'- Eli- Eli Lema Sabagthani?- ga: hug' ta" ra" . Aiwa- Nga" Mao" So- Nga" Mao" So Nao ngore pe"mung: yang: shapye' co' i? ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Ai: nhae mae ye; jo; ra" mo, damyo" aire the' gyo: gelao"- yao: Elia re khai: na: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ailao" jao" yao: bam mae" dayaug wa tao" ye" lo" mung:- qid mug sad' yu: yu yang: yhid jhin qang dag sho' jam: yu mung: gyang: yao: au: mae thug' ze: ci yang: Yesu re byid: jhaug' nae" seim" ra" .
Ngadqere: gaje qe wa na: jo, vashao:- Elia yao: re li" khyad' yu: ra" la,- mali" khyad' yu: ra" la,- ngonhaung" qu" na gelang:- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa thoe qi: zang hug' mung: kao gyo" lo" ra" .
Ailao"- Caung: pa" Yham mae" qe, kyo pin: lung: wa aau: mae" akhyid joe" sho' shid' gao go; lo" byaug: ra" . Mug: myid nan" li" ru we' laug thin jham go; sin" lo" byaug ko" ra" .
Lab jham re: bung" go; lo" mung:- shid: jo; ra" Mao" So: byu myo: sho' mo, re dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ra" .
Yesu shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" thao re yao: bam wa lab jham mae" thug' li" mung: gyang" lho" ra" vogaung: khug khyo vao ye" ako" . Byu myo: sho' mo, wa yao: bam re the' myao: ako" .
Gyezug: pho" we' daga" Yesu re lhaug' na: ra" gyezo: qe wa myid lab: lab' ru we' gatau boe" ra" gu: jham re the' myao gelao"- yao: bam wa gyaug: nin" mung:- ceyaug wa gaigai: yao: Mao" So: yao: zo: ngad nhaung ga: ta" ako" .
Galile mung" mae" yao" thao cao" mung:- yao: re caung da" byid: ko" ra" myiqe: myo: sho' mo, re: ai: tau mae va: va: mae" qu" ye; jo; bam: ako" .
Ai bam: phaung mae Magadala Mari- Yaku we' Yoseb tao: yao: myhi" Mari- Zebede yao: zo: tao ho' yao: myhi" bam bobo: ako" .
Myi" thao joe" lao"- Arimathe vo byu Yoseb ga: mang: ra"- jo,nho" qo" ra" byu dayaug joe" li" ra" . Yao: re: Yesu mho"zo: dayaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Pilad jhao" ye: mung: Yesu mao gaung re yemho" ra" . Alao" Pilad wa Yoseb re mao gaung byid' ke' nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ke' ra" .
Yoseb wa mao gaung re yu mung: jid: mo" pin: sag' yang mao gaung re thab' yang:-
Laug thin re kyaung" to" ra" yao" laug khyaung lab asag' khug mae ye: ke' to" ra" . Amung: lab kham: re laug zang qi: dazang: yang lhang" jhid' to: co' yang: phao: lo" ra" .
Aitau mae- Magadala Mari we' gatau Mari tao wa ai: lab tau" te' mae zaung: jo; ako" .
Ai: thao- Dugno: Ba mae khinjaung qi: qe we' Pharishe qe wa Pilad jhao" zang" ye: mung:
Asang we"- ai: mhug' pyag' yaug wa- yao: daui shi" au:- ngo wa sam ba kyo thao re dam: daui: to" li" nae" ga: ta" rure- ngonhaung" dam: myid: beim: va"-
Airumung:- yao" mho"zo: qe wa mao gaung re maye: qo" khug' yu genae" khyo: sam ba ein: ba joe" sho' yao" lab re nyang" za: zaung" nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid: wa,- airu: mangad' re yao" mho"zo: qe wa- yao: wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" va" ra"- ga: mo, byu qere ta" li" genae"- ce: lo" thao" re mhug' pyag' ra" ru wa- sao qhid' mhug' pyag' ra" tho' je: xo: li" nae"- ga: ta" ako" .
Pilad wa yao: bam re gug: gam gyezo: daphung: re khai: yu yang:- lab re qo" gug' qhi" gug: sho' yezaung" nhao ge,- ga: ta" ke' ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa- lab khyo ye: mung: laug baui re dazid thaung" te' yang: lab re gyai gug: sho' kad' ako" .
Dugno: Ba: thao: ba- Laban ba ne, seim myo, phye: phye: myao: li" au: re- Magadala Mari we' gatau Mari tao wa- lab kam: nae" ga: lab khyo ye" lo" ako" .
Qu" ge,- ai: mae nyag din taung" myid lab: qi: sho' lab: li" ra" . Asang: mug: lagyo: dayaug wa mug: gaung mae" gyo" li" mung: lab kham: mae" laug baui re tau: lhang" pye' yang: ai: laug baui dao mae zaung: jo; ra" .
Yao" myo,khung: wa lhe' cad' we' dau mung: yao" mai bau: wa gyu: ru: phyu: ra" .
Zaung" na mo, wa gyaug: din: nin" mung:- byu shid we' dakhyo: mo; byaug: ako" .
Mug: lagyo: wa ai: myiqe: tao re- Ni" shid' yaug dagyaug ge,- ni" shid' yaug wa pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' ra" Yesu re qho: na ko" rure ngo ba:-
Yao: cetau mae mana lo:- yao: ta" ru we' dakhyo: dam: daui: to" lo" byaug va"- li" geri:- yao: lang" jo, co' ra" jo, qo re li" qu" ge,
ana" phyad za: lo" mung: yao" mho"zo: qere yao: wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" va"- yao: wa naonhaung" qhid' au: mae Galile mung" khyo ye" lo" na: li" nae"- aitau mae naonhaung" yao: re myao: li" genae" ga" ein:- yeta" kyo: ge,- ngo ta" ra" dao: re ni" shid' yaug xam" ci ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: shid' yaug wa gyaug ngadqere:- gyai ngaui bau" ru we' ai: lab mae" phyad za: thug' lo" mung: yao" mho"zo: qere ta" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" tao" lo" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa nyag din taung" yao: shid' yaug jhao" li" mung:- Yaug yo: na ge,- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: shid' yaug wa Yesu jhao" qui" ye: mung: Yesu khyid re yezaui" ci yang: yao: re goe; pa" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: shid' yaug re dagyaug ge,- nga" mao: nhaung: qere Galile mung" khyo ye" lo" genae" qhid' mae" yeta" kyo: ge,- aitau mae yao: bam ngore qhug' myao: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: shid' yaug ye" lo" na ko" au:- lab zaung" ra" mo, damyo" wa vomo" khug khyo dam: tug' vao lo mung: khinjaung qi: qere boe" ra" ru alhab' lota" kyo" ako" .
Alao" khinjaung qi: qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qe wa qham yang: byin phyo: nyang pha,jhi" bin: khyug' mung:- gyezo: qere ngaui myo: sho' byid: mung: yang:-
myi" re ngonhaung" yab: myhid' jo; au:- yao" mho"zo: qe li" mung: yao" mao gaung re li" khug' cilo" byaug ko" ra"- ein: naonhaung" ta" ge,-
Cera" khyo re mang: zug: pho" the' gyo: lao" re:- naonhaung" qobo maqo" ra" khyo mang: zug: pho" re lam" sho' ngonhaung" jhu" nae"- naonhaung" pe" gaung yug maca" nae"- ga: ta" ako" .
Gyezo: qe wa ai: ngaui re yu: yu mung: khinjaung qi: qeyang yao: bam re mho" ke' ru we' dakhyo: ta" ako" . Gyezo: qe ta" ra" lau dao: wa ana" ba joe" sho' Yuda byumyu" qemae hau" nhao" lo" ako" .
Alao" ai: mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug wa Yesu yao: bam re pyang: to: co' ru we' dakhyo:- Galile mung" mae" bam dao khyo do, ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re myao lao"- yao: re goe; pa" ako" . Ngadqere: daqhae: wa aug' o: myid bo: ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam jhao" qui" ye: mung:- yao: bam re Mug: gaung dao mae re:- myid gaung dao mae re: eib nae" kheim: so' alhab' ngore ab byid' to: va" ra" .
Airumung:- naonhaung" wa thug' ye" lo" mung: byumyu" cao jab alhab' re nga" mho"zo: boe" nhao ge,- amung: Yao: Pho"- yao: Zo:- Gyang" Lho" Byo: mang mae qid nyhab' byid: mung:-
Ngo naonhaung" re pyang: to" ra" amyin" dao: alhab' re phug' cao" genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re mho" shid' byid: ge,- ngo wa mug: myid thao" sho' naonhaung" we' khonhae" re: daga" na nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ce wa Mao" So: yao: zo: Yesu Khristu nho: khyo Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai ngad: ra" .
Qu" ge,- Ni" qhid' au: mae ni" khyo re nyhang" byid: nae" qhid' mae" nga" lagyo: re ngo nhao: ke' ra" .
Din" pyad' yo mae dayaug hug' na: ra" thoe wa Asang: khyo re nyhang" to: ge,- Yao" khyo re din: za: nyhang" jhao" ge,- ga: Lapa Esaia mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: qhid: to" ra" .
Aimung: Yohan wa din"pyad' yo mae" thug' li" mung:- Qobo khyad' pye' byid' ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" myid tha" pye' yang: qid nyhab' kham: yu ge,- ga: kho" kyo: byid: mung: qid nyhab' byid' na: ra" .
Yerusalem vobyu qe alhab' mo, we' Yuda mung" geim" mae" mo, byu qe yao: jhao" ye: mung: yao: yao" qobo jham re lhang: yu: ru we' yao" lo, mae Yodan gyaung: mae qid nyhab' kham: yu: ako" .
Yohan wa gola: u mug' yang qo; ra" mai bau: re ve, mung: shoqid phyid' cui: cui" ci: ra" . Yao" zo: ve wa khyag' phaung" we' seyo: byoyhid ngad: ra" .
Alao" Yohan wa Nga" thao re joe" li" nae" yaug wa ngo tho' mae" qam: so' je: bo yaug ngad: ra" . Ngo wa yao" khyid zhaung: taui: goe; pheim nae" lao" maman: qi"-
Ngo wa naonhaung" re qid mae qid nyhab' byid' ra"- yao: wa naonhaung" re Gyang" Lho" Byo mae qid nyhab' byid' li" nae"- ga: kho" kyo" ra" .
Ai: thao mataung" myao" re Yesu wa Galile mung" Nazared vogaung: mae" joe" li" mung:- Yohan lo, mae Yodan gyaung: mae qid nyhab' kham: yu: ra" .
Qid mae" thug' li" lao" jao" mug: gaung go; bung" li" mung:- Gyang" Lho" Byo wa phaung" kyug' ru: yao" dao mae li" gyo" no" rure yao: myao: ra" .
Ailao" mug: gaung mae" thoe jhau: thug' li" mung:- nao wa ngo jhid' de; ra" nga" zo: ngad:- nao re ngo gyai o ngaui: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" jao"- gyang" lho" byo wa yao: re din"pyad' yo khyo jhan" nhao: ke' ra" .
Yao: wa din"pyad' yo mae ba na byid xe geim" Satan yang ju" phyo' ru qhug' ra" . Aimae seyo: gug' nyhug' jham re: na: ako" . Ngadqere: mug: lagyo: jham wa yao: re li" caung da" byid' ako" .
Aimung: Yohan re thaung: taung" lhaung" pye' thao Yesu wa
Galile mung" khyo ye: mung:- Ayo, byang" va"- Mao" So: mung"dan: jhao" li" va"- Myid tha" mung: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re lam" ge,- ga: Mao" So: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re kho" kyo" ra" .
Yesu Galile tham: yae mae su" lo" na: ra" au:- ngo: kung" zo: byu Simon we' yao: nhaung: Andre shid' tao geim pye' na: rure myao: ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa Nga" thao cao" ge,- ngo naotao re byu kung" byu boe" nhao nae"- ga: yao: shid' tao re ta" ra" .
Ailao" jao" yao: shid' tao wa geim jham re to" pye' co' mung: yao: jhao" cao" ako" .
Dazab zo: ye" lo" tau mae yao: bam: lha dao mae geim pho: na: ra" Zebede yao: zo: Yaku we' yao: nhaung: Yohan tao re myao: ra" .
Yao: shid' tao re myao we' Yesu khai: ke' ra" . Ailao" yao: shid' tao wa yao: pho" Zebede re okaung jham we' daga" lha dao mae nha: to: co' mung: Yesu jhao" cao" ye" lo" ko" ra" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa Kapena-um khyo joe" lo: ako" . Dugno: Ba mae Yesu wa Tarha" Jung Yham khyo vao ye: mung: mho" shid' byid' ra" .
Yao" mho" shid' khyo re the' gyo" ra" mo, byu qe wa gyai mug' byaug: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa Tung" Pho" qeru: mangad:- kheim: so' qo" yaug ru: mho" shid' byid' ra" .
Ailao" Tarha" Jung Yham mae bona: ra" makhyang" byo zaung: ra" byu dayaug gyi: hug' mung:-
Nazared mae" Yesu we"- nao we' ngonhaung" pe" sin" i? Ngonhaung" re lhau: phyo' pye' nae" ein: joe" li" i? Nao khag' ngad: rure ngo ba:- nao wa Mao" So: gyang" lho" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa Sae za: na wa,- yao: mae" thug' lo" wa,- ga: ai: makhyang" ra" byo re amyin" byid' ra" .
Ai: makhyang" ra" byo wa yao: re lao" thin: lhang" ke' ru we' zag: hug' mung: yao: mae" thug' lo" ra" .
Mo, byu qe alhab' mug' hao" bam mung:- ce wa pe" ngad va" i? Pe" ru" mho" shid' khyo asag' ngad va" i? Ceyaug wa makhyang" ra" byo jham re amyin" byid: nae" kheim: so' qo" ru we' yao: amyin" byid' rure yao: bam tae" gyo: ko" ra" ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Ai: lau dao: re Galile mang: geim" gam: sho' mae phyad za: hau" nhao" lo" ko" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu yao" mho"zo: qe wa Tarha" Jung Yham mae" thug' li" mung: Yaku we' Yohan tao we' daga" Simon we' Andre shid' tao: yham khyo vao ye" lo" ako" .
Joe" vao ye: we' Simon: yaug myhi" wa noqam" no mung: yab qo mae koe' jo; rure Yesu re ta" kyo" ako" .
Ailao" Yesu ye: mung: yao" lo; yang yao: re yeshe: to" ke' ra" . Ailao" jao" noqam" gai: byaug: ru we' yao: bam re da" zho: da" jhaug' ra" .
Aimung: myi" thao ba vao: cae: yo, joe" lao"- mo, byu qe no phyo: qhug' mo, alhab' we' yui zaung: ra" mo, alhab' re Yesu jhao" jhui" li" ako" .
Vobyu qere: alhab' mo, yham kheim: mae li" zang" ham: na: bam: ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa no phyo: aja: ja: qhug' ra" mo, myo: sho' re gai byid' ru we' yui myo: sho' rere; khe' khyo" pye' ra" . Yao: wa yui jham re dao: jhau nae" akhang" mabyid: ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yui jham wa yao: khag' ngad: rure ba: ako" .
Thao: ba ne,seim mug: bo" myi: re Yesu to" mung: cae: tae" ra" dajo, qo mae akyu" yemho' na: ra" .
Simon we' yao" byin cao: qe wa Yesu thao cao" qho: ye: mung:-
qho: myao lao" alhab' mo, nao re qho: na: ako"- ga: ta" kyo" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu tau: mung: ce: lhang" gam: vogaung: jham mae re: ngo qo" kho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" gatau: vogaung: jham khyo ngonhaung" ye: gelang:- ai: qhid' mae" ngo joe" li" ru ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: yao: wa Galile mung" geim" jao: sho' du" qin" mung: Tarha" Jung Yham jham mae cao" kho" kyo" ru we' yui jham re khe' thug' pye' ra" .
Ailao" mao gae: de; ra" byu dayaug Yesu jhao" li" ra" . Yao: wa Yesu qhid' kheim: mae pad' thaug' thaug' mung:- nao nug: re wa ngore qo" gyang" shao: lo" nhao byid: zai ngad: ra"- ga: yao: re mho' ra" .
Yesu wa nhag' gyo" khyag' ru we' yao" lo, yheim" ke' mung: yao: re zaui" ci zo" re" Ngo nug:- Gyang" shao: lo" se,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" jao" mao gae: gai: lo" mung: gyang" shao: lo" byaug: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re jhaug' za: zug' nhao mung: cekhyo re khag' rere: pe" data" kyo:- Lha" wa,-
Ngadqere: khinjaung pho" jhao" ye: mung: ni" gaung re yeqhu" wa,- amung: mo, byu qe: qhid' mae" nao gyang" shao: lo va" khyo sagse: doe, vashao:- Moshe amyin" to" ra" ngaui" xeim: re xeim: lo" ngaui" byid: wa,- ga: ta" mung: phyad za: lo" nhao: ke' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: wa thug' ye" lo" mung: ai: khyo re qam: ke' ta" kyo" ru we' lau dao: hau" nhao" ke' ra" . Airumung: Yesu wa vogaung: khug khyo de: de: za: magai: vao ye: lomung: vovai: voyae mae na: ra" . Khyi" khao: ngo" mae" mo, wa yao: jhao" li" ako" .
Dayo, zo: kyo thao re Yesu wa Kapena-um khyo dam: tug' joe" lo mung:- yham mae na: jo; ra" ga: ta" hau" ako" .
Qe, khug kham: dung: maqui" losho' mo, byu qe myo: sho' zang" li" ako" . Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re mungdao: kho" kyo" na: ra" .
Gaung jam: shid: ra" byu dayaug re byu byid zo" yang Yesu jhao" dao: li" ako" .
Yao: bam wa mo, paug' saung" thau yang: Yesu jhao" maqo" te' ye: gelao" yao" au: tho' mae" mhao: mug: tau: qhid' pye' mung: gaung jam: shid yaug re yab qo we' daga" shoe' khyo" ke' ako" .
Yao: bam: lam khug: myid re Yesu the' myao lao" yao: wa gaung jam: shid yaug re- Nga" zo: we"- ni" qobo re khyad' pye' byid: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Aitau mae zaung: jo; ra" Tung" Pho" qe damyo" nhag' lam: khug mae-
Ceyaug wa khoru: mung: cedao: vae" ta" i? Ce wa Mao" So re jung" ru ngad: ra" . Mao" So dayaug za: qobo re qo" khyad' byid: yaug ngad: ra" ga: myid: qho: na: ako" .
Yao: bam: nhag' lam: khug mae airu: myid: qho: na ko" rure Yesu dalhang: dae yao" nhag' lam: khug mae beim: mung:- naonhaung" nhag' lam: khug mae pe"mung: airu: myid: qho: qu" na ko" i?
Gaung jam: shid: ra" yaug re- Ni" qobo khyad' pye' byid: va" ein: ta" re je: laui: i? Mangad: lao"- To" wa,- ni" yab qo vo, yang: su" lo" wa,- ein: ta" re je: laui: i?
Ngadqere: Byu: Yao: Zo: wa myidgaung dao mae qobo qo" khyad' byid' ra" kheim: so' qo" yaug ngad mangad: rure ngo naonhaung" re qhu" byid: geli"- ga: ta" mung: gaung jam: shid yaug re-
Nao re ngo ta" li"- To" wa,- ni" yab qo gaug: vo, mung: yham khyo lo" se,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" jao" yao: to" mung: yao" yab qo gaug: vo, yang: yao: bam: qhid' kheim: mae" to" phao: lo" ra" . Alao" yao: bam alhab' mo, mug' hao" bam mung: Mao" So re caung: khin" zo" re"- ngonhaung" ceru" ru khonhae" re: mamyao: qu" shi: ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa Galile tham: yae khyo dam: ye" lo" ra" . Byu phung: alhab' yao: jhao" zang" phaung: li" gelao" Yesu wa yao: bam re mho" shid' ra" .
Aimae" yao: su" ye" lo" au: Alphaeu yao: zo: Levi wa yao" khang: khyui zaung mae zaung: jo; rure myao lao"- Yesu wa yao: re- Nga" thao cao" la,- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" jao" Levi to" mung: yao" thao cao" ye" lo" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Levi yham mae zozo" na: ra" . Yao" thao cao" ra" khang: khyui zo: mo, myo: sho' we' qobo qo" ra" byu myo: sho' mae" damyo" wa- Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe we' daga" zozo: jaung: mae bocao: zo" na: ako" .
Ailao" khang: khyui zo: mo,- qobo qo" ra" mo, we' daga" Yesu zo: shaug' na: rure Pharishe qemae" Tung" Pho" qe damyo" myao lao" yao: bam wa- Pe"mung: yao: wa qobo qo" ra" mo,- khang: khyui zo: mo, we' daga" zo: shaug' na: i? ga: yao" mho"zo: qere myid' ako" .
Aire Yesu the' gyo: lao" yao: wa yao: bam re- Qao" zin" mo, wa mocid' sara maqo ngad: ako"- No mo, za: aqo: ako" . Din: man" ra" mo, re khai nae" qhid' mae" ngo li" ru mangad:- Qobo qo" ra" mo, re khai nae" kam" wa ngo li" ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Qid nyhab' byid: yaug Yohan mho"zo: qe we' Pharishe qe wa zo: ve lhaung" jao" ako" . Amung: mo, byu qe damyo" Yesu jhao" li" mung: yao: re- qid nyhab' byid' yaug Yohan: mho"zo: qe we' Pharishe qe: mho"zo: qe zo: ve jao" re ni" mho"zo: qe pe"mung: zo: ve majao" ko" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re tau: mung: Lo,xo' poe leim mo, wa pho" sag' we' na shi" au: re zo: ve gai: jao" i? Yao: bam pho" sag' we' daga" ana na wa zo: ve magai: jao" .
Ngadqere: pho" sag' re yao: bam: phaung mae" kao" jhui" lo" nae" ra" ba na joe" li" nae"- ailao" yao: bam zo: ve jao" genae" ngad: ra" .
Bau: xug' mae pin: sag' cug' yang khonhae" khag' malhaung" pho- Airu: pho lao" pin: sag' cug' yang bau: xug' re lao" cad' mung: bau: je: jad; lae: lo" byaug nae" .
Alao" sabyi qang: asag' rere: shoqid thaung axug' mae khonhae" khag' malhaung" ke'- Airu: ke' lao" shoqid thaung baug; go; lo" mung: sabyi qang: yug: sheim: lo" ru we' shoqid thaung re: qeim: byaug nae" . Amung: sabyi qang: asag' re shoqid thaung asag' mae ke' to: ca"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Dugno: Ba re gaug yo khyo" su" lai: lo" ang: ra" . Yao" mho"zo: qe wa gaug shi: re shan" yu: ako" .
Alao" Pharishe qe wa yao: re- Qu" wa,- Dugno: Ba re tarha" mavao: ra" mau" re yao: bam pe"mung: kad' na: ako" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- Khinjaung Yin" Abiatha" ban: re Davi wa yao" thao cao" mo, vae: moe; qo ca" gelao" khoru: Mao" So: yham khug khyo vao ye: mung: khinjaung yin" mae" je yang: khag' zo: nae" tarha" mavao: ra" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae qhaug' byid' to" ra" mug re zo: mung: yao" thao cao" mo, rere: byid: zho" ra" khyo re naonhaung" khonhae" re: manghe' qu" ko" i? ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu yao: bam re- Byu wa Dugno: Ba: qhid' mae" mangad:- Dugno: Ba kam" wa byu: qhid' mae" to" ru ngad: ra" .
Amung: Byu: Yao: Zo: wa Dugno: Ba: Asang re: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa Tarha" jung yham khyo dam: vao ye" ra" . Ai: mae lo, dashad' shid: ra" byu dayaug na: ra" .
Ai: mae na: ra" mo, byu damyo" wa Dugno: Ba re aiyaug re yao: gai byid' ra" la, magai byid' ra" la, Yesu re qobo zhaug' nae" ga: te' za: jo" qu" na: ako" .
Amung: yao: wa lo, dashad' shid yaug re- Ce: qhid' au: khyo li" ye, ri:- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: wa mo, byu qere- Dugno: Ba mae gai: ra" mau" zaui: nae"- mangad: lao" magai: ra" mau" zaui: nae"- kao so' khyad' nae"- mangad: lao" se' nae" kholam: tarha" vao: i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: bam wa sae za: na: ako" .
Yao: bam: nhag' lam: qao: ruyang yao: nhag' kaug' mung: nhag' yo" ru we' lhang" gam: zhaug' qu" mung: aiyaug re Ni" lo, yheim" ke' wa,- ga: ta" ra" . Lo, yheim" ke' we' yao" lo, gai: lo" byaug: ra" .
Alao" Pharishe qe wa thug' lo" mung: yao: re khoru: kad' mung: qo" se' pye' nae" ru Herod nho: byu qe we' ai jao" yao: byin phyo: lo" zin: ako" .
Amung: Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qe we' daga" Galile" tham: khyo dam: ye" lo" ra" . Galile" mae" byu phung: mo" zang re: yao: bam: thao cao" ako" .
Ai: tho' mago" Yuda mang mae" mo, Yerusalem vomo" mae" mo, Idumia mang: mae" mo,- Yodan gyaung: thoete' ba thug' shad' mae" mo,- Ture we' Sidon mang: mae" mo,byu phung: mo" qere: yao: kad' ra" mau" re the' gyo: gemung:- yao: jhao" li" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa mo, byu qeyang yao: re mathe' zab: jhin" lhang: vageshao: ga: yao" qhid' mae" lha ngai dakhye' nyhang" to: byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao" mho"zo: qere ta" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re byu myo: sho' re gai byid' qu" va" rumung: no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, alhab' wa yao: re qo" tin: sho' ga: yao: jhao" jhin" vao li" ako" .
Makhyang" byo zaung: ra" mo, re: yao: re myao lao" yao: bam wa yao" qhid' kheim: mae gyang: goe; lo" mung: nao wa Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ngad: ra"- ga: zag: hug' ako" .
Yesu wa makhyang" ra" byo jham re yao" khyo we' sin: mung: mahau" nhao" lo" genae" qhid' mae" jhaug' za: zug' nhao: ke' ra" .
Alao" yao: wa bug gaung dalam: khyo do, ye: mung:- yao: o: ra" mo, re khai: yu: ra" . Yao: bam re: yao: jhao" lo: ako" .
Yao: wa daxe: shid' yaug re khyin: yu mung: yao: bam re lagyo: qe ga: mhang" byid' ra" .
Yao: wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" re ngo we' daga" na nae" qhid' mae" khyin: to" ru ngad: . Amung: mungdao: kho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" re: naonhaung" re ngo nhao: ke' nae" . Ailao" naonhaung" wa yui jham re khe' thug' pye' nae" kheim: so' re: qo" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: Yao: wa Simon re Petru ga: mhang" byid' ra" .
Zebede yao: zo: Yaku we' Yohan tao re Boanerga ga: mhang" byid' ra" . ( Aiwa mug: dam: nau" tao ga" ru ngad: ra" . )
Aimae"- Andre- Philib- Batholame- Mathe- Alphaeu yao: zo: Yaku- Thadaeu- byumyu" jhid' myid qi" ra" Simon we'-
Thao phyao: yao: re ab: pye' nae" ra" Yuda Iskarud bam re khyin: to" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa yham khyo vao ye" ra" . Yao: we' yao" mho"zo: qe zo lhao" maqo" gai: zo: losho' mo, byu qe dam: zang" li" ako" .
Ai: khyo re yao" yham byu qe the' gyo: lao" yao: bam wa yao: re taung" yu nae" ga: thug' ye" lo" ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re mo, byu qe yao: re go: ava" ga: ta" na: ako" .
Amung: Yerusalem mae" gyo" lo: ra" tung" pho" qere:- yao: wa yui bo yang: ngad: ra" . Yui zug: mo" qam" yang yui jham re khe' thug' pye' ra" ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" yao: wa yao: bam re yao: jhao" khai: yu mung: dao: tau" we'- Satan wa Satan re khoru: qo" khe' thug' nae" i?
Mung"dan: dalam: wa yao: phung: yao: jho" kho' mung: yao: cao: yao: gye kad' na: ru wa ai: mung"dan: wa byo; qeim: lo" byaug nae" ngad: ra" .
Ug' khug' dalam: re: yao: cao: yao: jho" kho' mung: manug jho" mung: re wa ai: ug' khug' wa byo: sin" lo" byaug nae" ngad: ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo: Satan wa Satan yao: cao: jho" kho' mung: gye kad' to" thug' li" re wa yao: wa maqo" gang" tang: jo, lo: thao" byaug nae" ngad: ra" .
Qam: bo yaug re sao qhid' mataui" to: lo: khag' re: yao" yham khug khyo vao ye: mung: yao" zai re maye: qo" lhad' yu ngad: ra" . Yao: re bin: taui" to: thao reza: yao" zai re yeqo" lhad' yu: ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa- xao su byu qe wa yao: bam shad' lhoe" ra" qobo alhab' we' jung" ra" dao: aja: ja" qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid' ru qhug' ako" .
Ngadqere: Gyang" Lho" Byo re jung" dao: ta" ra" yaug wa khonhae" re: qobo khyad' pye' byid: qhug' nae" mangad:- pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa apyad ato: qobo re shad' lhoe" yaug ngad: ra" .
( Yesu ceru: ta" ru wa mo, byu qe damyo" yao: re makhyang" ra" yui bo: ra" ga: ta" geyang: ngad: ra" . )
Alao" Yesu yao: myhi" we' yao: nhaung: bam wa yham kheim: mae li" joe" ye; jo, mung:- byu dayaug re yao: re khai nhao: ke' ko" ra" .
Yesu lhang" gam: mae zaung: jo; ra" mo,byu qe wa yao: re Ni" myhi" we' ni" nhaung:- ni" nhae: mo" bam yham kheim: mae nao re li" qho: na: ako" ga: ta" kyo" ako" .
Yesu tau: mung:- nga" myhi" we' nga" nhaung: bam khobam ngad: ako" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: yao: wa- yao" lhang" gam: zaung: jo; ra" mo,byu qere gam: sho' qu" mung:- Qu" ge,- cebam wa nga" myhi" we' nga" nhaung: bam ngad va" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo" cao" mo, khag' ngadqere: nga" myhi" we' nga" nhaung: nga" nhae: mo" bam ngad va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao- Yesu wa Galile tham: yae mae dam: mho" shid' na: ra" . Byu phung: mo" zang yao: jhao" zang" li" gelao" yao: wa tham: mae" lha dakhye' dao mae yevao: zaung jo; ra" . Mo, byu qe wa tham: yae taung gaung mae na: jo; ako" .
Alao" yao: wa dao: tau" yang yao: bam re myo: sho' ja: mho" shid' byid: mung: ta" ru wa- Tae" gyo" qu" ge,-
Byu dayaug wa myug: shi: sin: nae" ga: yo khyo thug' ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: yesin" ke' ra" myug: shi: daqhae: wa khyodang mae gyo" lo" ako" . Ai: myug: shi: jham re ngho' jham: yang li" gaug zo" pye' ko" ra" .
Daqhae: wa myid zhai: mathau: ra" laug qan" dao mae gyo" lo" ako" . Myid zhai: mathau yang: aijao" yao: yaug: thug' li" geyang: re:-
ba thaung: li" lao" lhe' mhai: pye' ru we' agyi: no, sho' maqo" cin" ruyang jhoe' byaug: ako" .
Daqhae: wa zau: bye, gyo: mae gyo" lo" ako" . Zau: bye, jham yaug: qi" li" ru we' qhovo: pan jham re li" hab' pye' byid: mung: ashi: maqo" zaui: gengad: ra" .
Ngadqere: myug: shi: daqhae: wa myid gai mae gyo" lo" ako" . Yaug: qi" li" mung: ashi: zaui" li" ko" ra" . Daqhae: sam xe nho" daqhae: khyaug' xe nho" daqhae: dayo nho" myo" laug: lo: ako" .
Nokhye' de, mo, wa gyo" yu geshao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu yao: za: ngad lao"- yao" dao: re the' gyo" ra" mo, mae" damyo" wa- mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug we' daga" Yesu jhao" li" mung:- ai: dao: tau" jham re pheim: kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" mho' ako" .
Ailao" yao: wa yao: bam re Mao" So: mung"dan: we' sin" ra" no; thao" ra" khyo pe" ngad: rure ba: gyo: nae" akhang" naonhaung" qhug' yu: avako" . Ai: akhang" re maqhug' yu: ra" mo, kam" wa dao: tau" jham khyo" za: gyo" yu: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re
Yao: bam wa Qu" ngadqere: mamyao- Gyo: ngadqere: maba: gyo: gengad: ra" . Yao: bam myao mung: ba: gyo" yu ko" ngad: re wa Mao" So jhao" tug' lo: li" genae" . Ailao" Mao" So wa yao: bam re qobo khyad' pye' byid: nae" ga: jham: mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa Yao: bam re- Ce: dao: tau" re naonhaung" maba: gyo: ko" i? Airu: ngad: re dao: tau" alhab' re khoru: ba: gyo: genae" i?
Myug: shi: sin: yaug wa ai: mungdao: re sin" ra" .
Byu damyo" wa khyodang mae gyo" lo" ra" myug: shi: jham we' dau: ako" . Mao" So: mungdao: re the' gyo: lao" jao" Satan li" mung: yao: bam: nhag' lam: khug mae" ai: mungdao: re yu: pye' byid' ra" .
Gatau damyo" wa myid zhai: mathau: ra" laug qan" myid mae gyo" lo" ra" myug: shi: jham we' dau: ako" . Ai: mungdao: re the' gyo: lao" jao" yao: bam ngaui bau" ru we' lham: khae: yu: ako" .
Ngadqere: ai: mungdao: wa yao: bam: nhag' lam: khug mae agyi: no, sho' maqo" cin" mung: myao" sho' maqo" zang: kham gengad: ra" . Aimung dao" ra" mathao mae qug: khai" ru- mangad: lao" yhin" ru qhug' lo lao" phyad za: dam: phaug' lo" ko" ra" .
Amae" damyo" wa zau: bye, mae sin" ke' ra" myug: shi: jham we' dau: ako" . Yao: bam wa ai: mungdao: re the' gyo" yu ngadqere:-
Ce: mug: myid: byu na ban" qhid' mae" myid: qug: myid ci" ru- ngaui qhang jo,nho" mamyaung: masho: qo" nug: ru we' gatau aja: ja: re myo, no, o: byid: ra" ruyang ai: mungdao: re hab' pye' mung: ashi: maqo" zaui: gengad: ra" .
Ngadqere: gatau damyo" wa myid gai re sin" ke' ra" myug: shi: jham we' dau: ako" . Yao: bam wa ai: mungdao: re the' gyo: lao" khae: yu mung: daqhae: sam xe nho"- daqhae: khyaug' xe nho"- daqhae: dayo nho" ashi: zaui" li" ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa xo' mung: yao: bam re myikaug' re yao" tao" dao mae makai" to: lo: dao: khug maug: lhaung" to: nae"- mangad: lao" yab jaung: gyid' mae to" to: nae" qhid' mae" khoyaug lhaung" ci: li" ko" i?
Pe"mung: ga"re mamyao lo: sho' nyham" to" ra" ja: alhab' de: de: za: myao: thug' li" nae"- Nghoe' to" ra" ja: alhab' re: bung" lo: li" nae" .
No: khye' de, mo, wa gyo" yu geshao: ga:- ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: wa Naonhaung" the' gyo" ra" ja: re galho: za: tae" gyo" yu ge,- naonhaung" su re lag byid' ra" jao, lag: yang yao: Mao" So wa naonhaung" re dam: tug' lag byid' li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re qo" yaug re wa je: dam: laung: byid: shi: nae" ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa xo' mung: Mao" So: mung"dan: wa ce we' dau: ra" . Byu dayaug yao" yo mae gaug myug: ye sin" ke' to: mung:-
myi" re yab- na" lao" to"- dam: to" dam: yab mung: na: ra" gyo: mae ai: gaug shi: wa baug: thug' li" mung: yaug: qi" li" na: ra" . Ngadqere: ai: gaug shi: khoru: yaug: qi" li" rure yao: maba ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re myid gaung wa yao: yao: za: ai: gaug gae re yaug: qi" li" nhao: ra" . Sao qhid' agan"- ai: dao gaug nhae thug' li" nhao mung: thao re gaug nhae mae" ashi: zaui" li" nhao: ra" .
Gaug mhang" lao"- yad yo, joe" va" rumung: yao: wa lagam" yang ye: yad: yu: ra"- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Amung: Yesu wa Mao" So: mung"dan: re pe" ja: we' dao: tau" nae" i? Pe" ja" dao: tau" ci mung: ta" nae" i?
Mao" So: mung"dan: wa ao: shi: jid' we' dau: ra" . Ao: shi: wa sin" ke' au: myid gaung dao mae jo; ra" ashi: alhab' tho' je: ngai: thao" ra" ashi: ngadqere:-
Myid mae sin" ke' lao" yaug: qi" li" mung: gatau: ao: pho' vho' alhab' tho' je: qi" lu: li" ra" . Akaung jham re: qi" byo: li" ru we' ai: aqab mae ngho' jham sad' li" sad' mung: qo" khug: na: ako" .
Amung: Yesu wa yao: bam qo" ba: gyo" ra" dao: tau" jham khyo" yang za: ai: mungdao: re kho" kyo" ra" .
Yao: bam yao: za: ngad lao"- Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere acao jab ta" pheim: kyo" ra" .
Ai: ba re yao:- myi" thao joe" lao" Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Soge, ngonhaung" tham: thoete' khyo gau" de; lo" gelang:- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa mo, byu qere to: co' mung: Yesu yao: zaung: jo, ra" lha dao mae yevao: zaung mung: gau" lo" ko" ra" . Gatau: lha jham re: bobo: ako" .
Ai: au: re la qam" mo" zang nyag din taung" hug' lo mung: bang: lhung" yang lha khug khyo qid lobe, vhao" ke' ra"- amung: lha khug mae qid alaug laug byang" lo: na: ra" .
Yesu wa lha thao mae au: khau" dalam: khau" mung: yab; jo; ra" . Mho"zo: qe wa yao: re nhug' mung: Mho" Pho" we"- ngonhaung" nab: shid: lo" na: rure nao pe" shui manho: i? ga: yao: re ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yab jo, rumae" to" li" mung: la qam" re Sae za: na wa,- ga: amyin" byid' ra"- bang: lhung" rere: Tae" lo" wa,- ga: ta" ke' ra" . Alao" la qam" thang: lo" mung: bang: lhung" re: tae" lo" byaug: ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Naonhaung" pe"mung: ai: qhi" taung" gyaug ko" i? Naonhaung" ana" joe" sho' lam khug: myid mabo shi: ge, i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam kam" wa gyai gyaug: din: pye' ako" . Amung:- ceyaug wa pe" ru" byu ngad: i? La qam" we' bang: lhung" lhao" yao" dao: re tae" gyo: ko" ra" ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa Galile" tham: thoete' mae" Gerasa mang: khyo joe" ye" ako" .
Yesu lha khug mae" thug' lo lao" jao" makhyang" ra" byo zaung: ra" byu dayaug lab bug mae" thug' li" mung: yao: re li" qhug' ra" .
Ai: yaug wa lab jham: agyo: mae na: ra" . Yao: re khag' re: maqo" taui: gengad: ako" . Jao co: taui" yang lhao" re: maqo" taui" to: ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: re myo: sho' lhang kyam: vhe' mung: jao co: taui" yang re: taui" to" qu" vako" ra"- ngadqere: lhang khao: ngo" jao co: taui: re lao" phyid' pye' mung: kyam: rere: lao" kho' sin" pye' ra" . Amung: yao: re khag' re: maqo" zaui: gengad: ra" .
Yao: wa myi" re: na" re: lab jham: agyo: mae we' bam khaung: mae hug' du" qin" mung: laug baui re yao: yao" gaung deim" thaung" cad' ci yang: na: ra" .
Yao: wa va: mae" Yesu re lham: myao lao" tao" ye: mung:- yao: re goe; pa" ra" .
Amung: yao: wa- Myhao: thao" ra" Mao" So: yao: zo: Yesu we"- nao we' ngo pe" jho" sin" i? Ngo re mayhin" vashao:- Mao" So re jham tang: yang: mho' ra"- ga: zag: hug' ra" .
Yao: airu: hug' ta" ru wa- makhyang" ra" byo we"- byu ceyaug mae" phao: thug' lo" se, ga:- Yesu amyin" byid' ke' mung: ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Ni" mang pe" ngad: i? ga: myid' ra" . Alao" yao: wa- Ngonhaung" phung: mo" zang ngad: ruyang nga" mang wa Legio ngad: ga: tau" ra" .
Yao: wa Yesu re- ai: mang: mae" yao: bam re makhe' thug' pye' nae" qhid' mae" gyai ga: mho' ra" .
Ana" ai: bug gaung khyid cao" mung: vo, jham mo" dajham bad zo" na: ako" .
Makhyang" ra" byo jham wa Yesu re- Ngonhaung" vo, jham: khug mae yevao: zaung nae" qhid' mae" vo, jham na: khyo nhao: ke' la, ga: mho' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re akhang" byid' ke' ra" . Makhyang" ra" byo jham wa ai: yaug khug mae" phao: thug' lo" mung: vo, jham: khug mae yevao: zaung: ako" . Alao" shid' taung ko bo: ra" vo, jham alhab' wa dang" kam" nhad' mae" qid tham: khug khyo tao" byae: gyo" vao: lo" gemung: nab: shid: pye' ako" .
Vo, zam: mo, wa tao" phao: lo" mung: ai: khyo re vomo" khug mae re:- seyo: vogaung: jham: khyo re joe" sho' ta" hau" ke' ako" . Alao" mo,byu qe wa boe" lai: lo va" khyo re qu" nae" qhid' mae" ai: jo, qo khyo thug' ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: bam Yesu jhao" joe" lao"- qhid' phyao: makhyang" byo Legio zaung: ra" yaug wa mai bau: nyang" za: ve, yang: nhag' gyang: gyang: za: zaung: jo; rure yemyao ge mung: yao: bam gyaug: byaug; ako" .
Aimung: ai: khyo re the' myao: ra" mo, wa makhyang" ra" byo zaung: ra" yaug we' vo, jham khoru: boe" lai: lo: ra" khyo mo, byu qere lham: ta" kyo" ako" .
Alao" yao: bam wa Yesu re yao: bam: mung" mae" thug' lo" nae" qhid' mae" mho' ako" .
Yesu lha khug khyo vao lo" na: au: qhid' phyao: makhyang" ra" byo zaung: ra" yaug wa Yesu jhao" yao: re: cao nae" qhid' mae" mho' ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu yao: re akhang" mabyid: lo:- ni" yham khyo phao: lo" mung: yham byu qe we' ba nam qere Asang wa nao re khoqhi" nhag' khyag' yang: bao" thaug' va" khyo re lo" ta" kyo: wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: wa thug' lo" mung: Yesu yao: re khoqhi" bao" thaug' byid: va" khyo re Dekapoli mang: jao: sho' ta" hau" lo" ra" . Aire the' gyo: mo, alhab' re: gyo" mug' ako" .
Thao re Yesu wa lha khyo" tham: thoete' khyo dam: gau" de; lo" ra" . Alao" tham: yae mae byu phung: mo" zang yao" lhang" gam: mae li" zang" phaung: na: ako" . Yesu wa tham: yae mae na: jo; ra" .
Alao" Ya: iru ga: mang: ra" Tarha" Jung yham agyi dayaug joe" li" mung: Yesu re myao lao"- yao" khyid qao: mae goe, mung:-
nga" zo: myiqe: nau" shid: lo" na va"- yao: no gai: lo mung: daui: na nae" qhid' mae" yao" dao mae ni" lo, li" kai: byid: la,- ga: yao: re gyai ga: li" mho' ra" .
Yesu wa Ya: iru we' daga" cao" ye" lo" ra" . Mo, byu phung: mo" zang yao" thao cao" gemung: Yesu re the' jhin" zao" ako" .
Ai: mae daxe: shid' zin sa: sheim no no: ra" myiqe: dayaug re: bobo: ra" .
Mocid' sara myo: sho' yang ya: qu" vako" ra" . Yao: qo" ra" gu: alhab' gan sho' yang ya ngadqere: no gai: li" khyo majo,- je: za: no: li" ra" .
Yao: wa Yesu khyo re the' gyo" qu" va" rumung:-
mo, phaung khyo ye: mung: Yesu nhaung thao"mae yeye; jo, yang:- ngo wa yao" mai bau: re khalhao" yeqo" tin" ke' ngad: re wa nga" no gai: lo" li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: Yesu mai bau: mae yao" lo; yang yetin" ke' ra"- ailao" jao" yao: sa: sheim: ru dam: lo" byaug: ru we' yao" no gai: lo" byaug va" rure beim" ra" .
Yesu wa yao" khug mae" qam: so' thug' lo" va" rure aijao" ba: ruyang mo, byu qe: shad' khyo lhang: qu" mung:- nga" mai bau: re khag' li" the' tin: ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao" mho"zo: qe wa- Mo, byu qe nao re the' jhin" zao" na: rure nao myao: na gau- ngore khag' li" the' tin: ko" i? ein: pe"mung: myid' i? ga: yao: re tau" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: re the' tin: yaug khag' ngad: rure myao nae" qhid' mae" gam: sho' lhang: qu" na: ra" .
Ai: myiqe: kam" wa yao: mae boe" lo va" khyo re ba beim: yang: gyaug: nin" ru we' Yesu qhid' kheim: mae goe, mung: ngad dang: ra" khyo alhab' yao: re ta" kyo" ra" .
Amung: Yesu wa yao: re- Nga" myiqe: zo: we"- ni" lam khug: myid: yang nao re gai byid: va"- Yaug yo za: lo" se,- ni" no gai: shao: lo" vashao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Airu: ta" na shi" au: Ya: iru yham mae" mo, joe" li" mung: Ni" myiqe: zo: shid: ava"- Mho" Pho" re pe" aqug: akhai: cekad' na shi" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam ta" rure Yesu the' gyo: lao" Ya: iru re- Dagaung yug wa, lam za: lam wa, ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Alao" Petru- Yaku we' Yaku yao: nhaung: Yohan mae" je yang: gatau khag' rere: yao: we' daga" macao" nhao ngad: ra" .
Ya: iru yham mae joe" lao" mo, thaui: mo, yaug mung: gyai kaug' ngug: yhau: na ko" rure myao: ra" .
Alao" yao: wa yham khug khyo vao ye: mung: yao: bam re- Naonhaung" pe"mung: mo, thaui" mo, yaug ngug: yhau: na ko" i? Zomyi: zo: wa shid: ru mangad:- yab: myhid' jo; ru angad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa yao: re qi: jung" pye' byid' ako" . Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re taung gaung khyo nhao: thug' pye' mung: zomyi: zo" nho: yao: pho" yao: myhi" we' yao" mho"zo: sam yaug re jhui: mung: ai: zomyi: zo: lang" jo; ra" qe, khyo vao ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: wa ai: zomyi: zo" nho: lo, re zaui: mung:- Talitha koum ga: ta" ra" . Aiwa Zomyi: zo: we"- nao re ngo ta" li"- To" wa,- ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Ailao" jao"- zomyi: zo: wa to" li" mung: su" lo" ra" . Yao" apyad wa daxe: shid' zin ngad: ra" . Yao: bam wa gyai mug' byaug: ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa cekhyo we' sin: yang: naonhaung" khag' rere: data" kyo: ge, ga:- yao: bam re zug' nhao mung: zomyi: zo: re zo: ve daja: ja: byid' zho: gese,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qe we' daga" ai: jo, qo mae" thug' lo" mung: yao" yham mug: khyo joe" lo: ra" .
Dugno: Ba joe" lao" yao: wa Tarha" Jung Yham mae byu myo: sho' mo, re mho" shid' byid' ra" . Yao" mho" dao: re the' gyo" ra" mo, alhab' gyo" mug' ako" . Ailao" yao: bam wa- Ceyaug khokhyi" mae" ce: pha,jhi" re ba: yu: laug i? Yao: ba: yu: ra" pha,jhi" wa pe" ja" pha,jhi" ngad: i? Mug' pho: mau" jham re yao: khoru: qo" zaui" i?
Yao: wa Mari yao: zo:- Yaku- Yoseb- Yuda we' Simon tao ho' yao: mao: lagsama" mangad: i? Yao: nhae: mo" bam: re: cemae nyhao: we' daga" na: bam: ru mangad: i? ga: ta" ako" . Airumung: yao: bam wa yao: re ngag: pye' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Lapa wa yao" mug:- ba nam ug zo: we' yao" ug' khug' mae" je yang: khyi" khao: ngo" mae myo, nho qo" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: wa no phyo: dajhid' dathao qhug' ra" mo, re lo, kai: yang: gai byid' rumae" je yang: ai: vo mae mug' pho: mau" pe" re: maqo" zaui: ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa mo,byu qe lam khug: myid mabo ko" ruyang gyai myid: mug' ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa ai: lhang" gam: mae" vogaung: jham khyo ye: mung: mo, byu qere yemho" shid' byid' ra" . Yao: wa mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug re yao: jhao" khai: yu mung: shid' zo: dazam" zam" zham" mung: nhao: ke' ra" . Makhyang" ra" byo jham re aung doe, nae" kheim: so' re: yao: bam re byid' ke' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Gyaung: khyo qhid' mae" zaung: bao" mae" je yang: zokho- thaung a: we' naonhaung" phyid' cui: mae ngaui davin ge,-
khyid zhaung: kam" wa zhaung: ge,- ngadqere: bau: shid' khye' dapaug' ve, ge,-
naonhaung" re bang" lham: tug: yu: ra" vo mae" yham khoyham mae ngadqere ai: vo mae" dam: thug' lo" yo, joe" sho' aiyham mae thang: na ge,-
Davo vo mae" mo, naonhaung" re bang" malham: tug: yu lo:- naonhaung" kho" kyo" ra" dao: re malham: tae" gyo: ko" ngad: re wa ai: jo, qo mae" thug' lo" ge,- aimae" thug' lo" au: re yao: bam: shad' mae sagse: boe" nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" khuvo: mae" phalhug jham re ko: khyo" to: co' ge,- ga: re: ta" ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam thug' ye" lo" mung: mo,byu qere myid tha" nae" qhid' mae" cao" kho" kyo" ako" .
Yao: bam wa yui myo: sho' khe' thug' pye' byid' ru we' no phyo: qhug' mo, myo: sho' re xau gyad byid: yang: nyhang" gai byid' ako" .
Ana" Yesu khyo alhab' re kho: kham Herod the' gyo" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Yesu mang wa khyi" khao: ngo" mae suhau: qi" lo: na: ra" . Byu damyo" wa Yesu re qid nyhab' byid: yaug Yohan dam: daui: li" ru ngad: ra" . Aimung: mug' pho: mau" zaui: nae" ceru" ra" qam: so' qo" ru ngad: ra" ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: gatau damyo" wa Yesu wa Elia ngad: ra"- ga: ta" mung: damyo" wa daba: pyad mae" lapa qe we' dau: ra" lapa dayaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Herod aire the' gyo: lao"- ceyaug wa ngoyang au: phyid' pye' byid' ra" qid nyhab' Yohan dam: daui: li" ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Herod wa yao: nhaung: Philib yham sang myhi" Herodia re lhad' ngho" ra" mathao mae Yohan re thaung: lhaung" nae" amyin" byid: mung: thaung: khug mae taui" to" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yohan wa Herod re- Ni" nhaung" nho: yham sang myhi" re lhad' yu nae" magai maang ngad: ra"- ga: gyai qeim: ra" .
Airumung: Herodia wa Yohan re manug yang: se' pye' nug ngadqere: Herod mathao mae khoru: maqo" se' pye' ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yohan wa din: man" ru we' gyang" lho" ra" byu dayaug ngad: rure Herod ba mung: yao: re gyaug phug' ru we' qu" gam byid' ra" . Yohan: mungdao: re the' gyo: khao: ngo" yao" nhag' lam: mae qi: sho' nhag' lam: mamyan ngadqere: yao" mungdao: re ngaui bau: taung" za: tae" gyo: nug: ra" .
Herodia wa Herod kho: kham khau: ra" ba na joe" lao"- yao: myid: to" ru kad' nae" ayo, gai the' yu: ra" . Khorumung: ga" re Herod wa yao: khau: ra" ba na mae Galile mang: mae" au: she mo, au: jhaung qe- lau: de, qe- mung" zug: qe we' yao" gyezug: qere khai mung: myi" xeim zo: poe da" byid' ra" .
Ai: myi" xeim zo: poe mae Herodia yao: zo: zomyi: nau" wa zozo: poe khyo vao li" mung: li" go" nhan" qhu" ra" . Airu re Herod we' yao" bang" vo qe qu" ngaui: ako" . Amung: kho: kham wa myiqe: nau" re- Nao o: ra" ja: ngore mho' la,- ngo nao re byid: nae" .
Nao ngore mho' ra" gu: nga" mung"dan: agaung: daqi" joe" sho' ngo nao re byid: nae" ga: jham tang: yang: ta" ra" .
Ailao" myiqe: nau" wa thug' lo" mung: yao: myhi" re- ngo pe" ja: mho' yu nae" laug i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: myhi" wa qid nyhab' Yohan: au: re mho' yu wa,- ga: tau" ra" .
Ailao" jao" myiqe: nau" wa hin hin za: kho: kham jhao" dam: tug' vao lo mung: qid nyhab' Yohan: nho: au: re ban mae ke' yang: ana" yao: ngore byid: nae" rure ngo o: ra" ga: mho' ra" .
Kho: kham pho" gyai nhag' lam: mangaui bau: boe" pye' ra" . Ngadqere: yao" bang" vo qe: qhid' kheim: mae jham tang: yang: ta" pye' va" dao" yang myiqe: nau" mho' rure maqo" ha: pye' ngad: ra" .
Amung: yao: wa ai lao" jao" gug: gam gyezo: dayaug re Yohan: nho: au: re cilo nae" amyin" we' daga" nhao: ke' ra" . Gyezo: pho" wa thaung: khyo ye: mung: Yohan: au: re yephyid' ra" .
Ai: au: lam: re ban dao mae kai" cilo mung: myiqe: nau" re lobyid' ra" . Myiqe: nau" re: yao: myhi" re lo" kai" byid' ra" .
Yohan: nho: mho"zo: qe cekhyo re the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam li" mung: yao" mao gaung re li" gaug: nyhab' pye' ako" .
Ai: thao lagyo: qe wa Yesu jhao" dam: tug' lo mung: yao: bam zaui" lo: ra" mau" zo" we' mho" shid' byid' ra" khyo bin sho' yao: re lota" kyo" ako" .
Mo,byu qe myo: sho' ye: ye: lo lo abang mabyid gemung: Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa zo zo: ayo, lhao" re: maqo" gengad: ra" . Amung: Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Cae: tae" ra" jo, qo dakhyo khyo ye: mung: nyhao: nhaung" yao: za: dazab zo: yeno" yu gelang:- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: yao: bam wa cae: tae" ra" dajo, qo khyo lha khyo" gau" de; ye" lo" ako" .
Ngadqere: mo,byu qe myo: sho' mo, wa yao: bam thug' ye" lo" rure cao" myao: ke' ru we' Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe ngad: rure qu" se" ke' ako" . Airumung: vo khao: ngo" mae" mo, byu qe wa khyid khyo" gau: qhid' khae" yang: tao" ye" lo" mung: Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe: qhid' mae yejoe" na: jo; ako" .
Yesu lha khug mae" thug' li" lao"- yao: wa byu phung: mo" re myao: ra" . Zaung" yaug mabo: ra" yao phung: we' dau gemung: Yesu wa yao: bam re nhag' qu" khyag' ra" . Amung: yao: wa yao: bam re myo: sho' ja: mho" byid' ra" .
Ba vao: lo" na lao" Yesu nho: mho"zo: qe wa yao: jhao" lo mung: cejo, qo wa din pyad' yo ngad: ru we' ba re: vao: lo" na: ava" .
Zo: ve daja: ja: yevai zo: genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re avai: ayae mae" vogaung: jham khyo ye: nhao: ke' wa,- ga: yao: re ta" ako" .
Yesu wa naonhaung" yao:- yao: bam re zo: nae" daja: ja: byid: ge, ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" . Ailao" yao" mho"zo: qe wa ngonhaung" ngaui shid' yo kye' phug' mae" mug yevai mung: yao: bam re byid: zho: zai i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa Naonhaung" mug khonho" qo" ko? Yequ" qu" ge,- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" . Yao: bam yeqho: myao gelao"- mug ngo" khai" we' ngo: shid' dau:- ga: yao: re ta" ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa mo,byu qe alhab' re kho' mung: vohau: yo mae azhan zhan zaung nhao nae" qhid' mae" yao" mho"zo: qere ta" ra" .
Amung: mo, byu qe wa dazhan re dayo- dazhan re ngo" xe jin mung: zaung: jo; ako" .
Yesu wa ai: mug ngo" khai" we' ngo: shid' dau: re bin: yu: yu lao" mug: gaung khyo qu" mung: Mao" So re jeju caung: byid' ra" . Yao: wa mug re khyoe' phai" mung: mo, byu qere gae byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao" mho"zo: qere byid' ke' ra" . Amae" Yesu wa ngo: shid' dau: rere: yao: bam re kho' byid' ra" .
Yaug khao: ngo" gyi: sho' zo" ako" .
Ai: thao mho"zo: qe wa dang: ra" ngo: we' mug aje, aman" jham daxe: shid' gyan byang" sho' gaug: zhang: yu: ako" .
Mug zo: mo, yauggai qe ngo" taung ko ngad: ako" .
Yesu wa mo,byu qere nhao: ke' zo" re" yao" mho"zo: qere lha dao do; zaung yang: tham: thoete' mae" Betsaida vogaung: khyo gau" de; ye" lo" na genae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' ra" .
Mo, byu qere bin: au" ke' thao re Yesu wa akyu" mho' nae" qhid' mae" bug gaung khyo do, ye" lo" ra" .
Myi" thao joe" lao" mho"zo: qe zaung: ra" lha wa tham: gaung: mae gau" ye" lo" na: ako" . Yesu wa yao: za: taung gaung mae na: jo; ra" .
Yesu wa la mayo" mung:- la lham: deim" thaug' ruyang yao" mho"zo: qe lha gau" qug' na ko" rure the' myao lao"- ne, kao mug: bo" zo" re qid dao khyo" yao: bam jhao" su" ye" lo" ra" . Yesu wa yao: bam: nhae khyo" su" lai: lo" nae" seim" ra" .
Yao: bam kam" wa qid dao mae Yesu khyo su" na: rure myao gelao"- subyo ngad: ga: jho mung: gyi: hug' ako" .
Yesu re myao lao" yao: bam gyai gyaug: pye' ko" ra" . Ailao" jao" Yesu wa yao: bam re jhau mung:- Dagyaug ge,- ngo angad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam zaung: jo, ko" ra" lha dao khyo do; vao ye" lo" ra" . Alao" la wa tae" lo" byaug: ra" . Yao" mho"zo: qe wa matho' ta" losho' mug' byaug: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re byu ngo" taung re mug zho" ra" mug' pho: mau" zo" lajheim: re yao: bam maba: gyo: geyang: ngad: ra" . Yao: bam: myid wa aire maqo" khae: yu ngad: ako" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa tham: thoete' khyo gau" ye" lo" ko" ra" . Genesared khyo joe" lao" yethang mung: lha re aimae taui" to" ako" .
Lha khug mae" yao: bam thug' li" lao" jao" mo, byu qe wa Yesu re qu" xam: gemung:-
Yao: bam wa avai: ayae mung" geim" jao: sho' tao" ye" lo" mung: no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, re yab myhung: phaung: thin we' zung geim" Yesu na thoe the' gyo" ra" jo, qo khao: ngo" khyo dao: li" ako" .
Yesu vao ye" ra" vozo: vozang khao: ngo" mae" hau" mo" cao" yang: mo, byu qe wa no phyo: qo" ra" mo, re li" jhui" lhang" to: mung: no mo, re yao" bau: thao mae khalhao" the' tin: nhao nae" qhid' mae" mho' ako" . Yao" bau: thao re qo" tin" yu: ra" mo, alhab' wa no phyo: gai: shao: lo" byaug: ako" .
Ailao" Pharishe qe we' Yerusalem mae" do, lo: ra" Tung" Pho" qe daqhae: wa Yesu jhao" zang" li" ko" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu nho: mho"zo: qe damyo" macid' san: pye' lo:- masan: ra" lo; yang zozo" na ko" rure the' myao: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Pharishe qe we' Yuda byumyu" alhab' wa daba: mae" phug' phyid' thung" li re cao" mung: lo, shi" macid' san: pye' lo: zo: ve khonhae" re: mazo" qu" gengad: ra" .
Amung: gai mae" vai: cilo: ra" ja: alhab' rere: sao qhid' macid' san: pye' lo: yao: bam mazo" qu" ko" ngad: ra" . Aimae" gatau keim kang: ug' we' gyid: khug' jham re cid' san: ra" thung" li" myo: sho' ja: rere: cao" ako" .
Pharishe qe we' Tung" Pho" qe wa Yesu re- Ni" mho"zo: qe wa phug' phyid' thung" li re macao" lo: masan masin" ra" lo; yang zozo" na ko" ra" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re tau: mung:- naonhaung" khyo re Lapa Esaia tung" to" ru khoqhi" dang: ra" i? Naonhaung" wa geim kad' mo, ngad: ako" . Esaia wa yao" lapa dao: mae byu cemyu" wa yao: bam: nhad' qid: yang za: ngore phug' myao" ako" . Yao: bam: nhag' lam: kam" wa ngo we' gyai va" kyo: na: ako" .
Yao: bam wa byu: mho" dao: jham reza: mho" shid' byid' na gemung: yao: bam wa aje mae goe; pa" na ko" ra" ga: tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: amyin" dao: jham re to" pye' co' mung: byu: thung" li jham reza: phug' cao" na: ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Xo' mung: Yesu wa naonhaung" wa naonhaung" thung" li re qo" phug' cao" nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: amyin" dao: jham re gyai shab shab za: ngag: shapye' vako" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Moshe wa Ni" myhi" ni" pho" re phug' myao: wa,- yao: myhi" yao: pho" re magai: ra" dao: jhau: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: dang dang yao: shid' ca" ga:- amyin" byid' to" ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa byu dayaug yaug yao: pho" mangad: lao"- yao: myhi" re bao" thaug' nae" daja: ja: qo" ngadqere: aire Mao" So re byid' to: va" jhaung qhu" Koban- ngad: ga: ta" re wa
yao: wa yao: pho" mangad: lao"- yao: myhi" re khau maca" ga: naonhaung" mho" byid' ako" .
Ceru: naonhaung" phug' phyid' thung" li" re naonhaung" lo, dai" mho" byid' gyo" lo ko" ruyang Mao" So: mungdao: re kyae" khyo" pye' ako" . Ceru" ru gatau myo: sho' ja: re: naonhaung" kad' ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa mo, byu qere yao: jhao" dam: khai: yu mung: yao: bam re Naonhaung" alhab' nga" dao: re tae" gyo" yu mung: ba: gyo" yu ge,-
Taung gaung mae" byu: aung khug khyo vao lo: ra" ja: pe" ja" yang ngadqere: byu re masan masin" maqo" boe" nhao ngad: ra" . Byu: aung khug mae" thug' li" ra" ja" yang kam" wa byu re masan masin" qo" boe" nhao: ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" no: de, ko' re wa tae" gyo: ge,- ga: ta" ra"
Yesu wa mo, byu qere nha: to: co' mung: yham khug khyo joe" vao lo" lao"- yao" mho"zo: qe wa ai: dao: tau" lajheim: re sho' kyo: nae" qhid' mae" mho' ako" .
Alao" yao: wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" re: maba: gyo: shi: genhaung i? Taung gaung mae" byu: aung khug khyo vao lo: ra" ja: pe" re: nhag' lam: khug khyo vao lo: ru mangad:- vae: dug: am phae: khug khyo vao lo" mung: ngha ye: jo, qo khyo dam: thug' lo" ra" .
Airumung: taung gaung mae" byu: aung khug khyo vao lo: ra" ja: pe" yang ngadqere: byu re masan masin" maqo" boe" nhao: rure naonhaung" maba ko" i? ga: ta" ra" . ( Yesu ceru: ta" ru wa zo: ve alhab' zo: gai: ga" rure sho' kyo" ru ngad: ra" . )
Xo' mung: Yesu wa byu: aung khug mae" thug' li" ra" ja" yang byu re masan masin" boe" nhao: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re byu: aung khug nhag' lam: mae" makhyang: mashab: ra" mau" zo" kad' nae" myid: yaung: thug' li" ra"- seim lai qho: ru- su: zai khug' ru-
byu se' ru- myi: shad' lao shad' ru- ju" phyo' ru- shab' mhin: ru- myid nug' ru- gaui mho: ru- nga: kad' ru we' go: joe; ru jham thug' li" ra" .
Ce: makhyang: mashab'- ra" ja: alhab' wa byu: aung khug mae" thug' li" mung: byu re masan masin" boe" nhao: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa ai: jo, qo mae" to" lo" mung: Ture mang: khyo ye" lo" ra" . Yao: wa yham dayham mae yethang: na: ra" . Ai: rure khag' rere: maba nhao nug ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: yao: maqo" vho' na ngad: ra" .
Yao: zo: myiqe: nau" re makhyang" ra" byo vao: jaung" ra" myiqe: myhi" dayaug wa Yesu li" joe" na: rure the' gyo: we' li" mung: Yesu khyid qao: mae li" goe; ra" .
Ai: myiqe: myhi" wa taung bug amyu" ngad mung: Suri Phoenikia mang: byu ngad: ra" . Yao: wa Yesu re yao" myiqe: zo" khug mae" ai: yui re khe' thug' pye' byid: nae" mho' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re zoshao qere shi" sao qhid' gyi: sho' zho: ca"- pe"mung: ga"re- zoshao qe: vae: re yu mung: lakha: jham re pye' byid: nae" magai ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Myiqe: myhi" wa- Ngad va" Asang we"- Lakha: jham lhao" vae: zo: jaung: gyid' mae" zoshao qe: zosheim jham qo" zo" ako"- ga: Yesu re tau" ra" .
Yesu wa myiqe: myhi" re- Nao airu: ta" ruyang yham khyo tug' lo" se,- ai: yui wa ni" myiqe: zo: mae" phao: thug' lo" ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: yham khyo joe" lo" re yui wa yao: zo: mae" phao: thug' lo" byaug mung: yao: zo: wa yab jaung: dao mae lang" jo; rure lo" myao: ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa Ture mang: mae" dam: tug' lo" au:- Sidon mang: re lai: to: co' mung: Dekapoli mang: gaung: khyo" Galile tham: khyo joe" ye" lo" ra" .
Byu damyo" wa nojid: ru we' myan" maboe" ra" nhad' jid dayaug re Yesu jhao" jhui" li" mung: yao" dao mae lo, kai: byid: nae" qhid' mae" mho' ako" .
Yesu wa mo, phaung mae" yao: re za: gatau dajheim khyo jhui" thug' lo" mung: aiyaug: nokhyaung khug khyo yao" lo, nyhug' thug' zaui byid' ra" .
Khota: phoe" yu mung: aiyaug: sho re tin: byid' ru we' mug: gaung khyo tau: qu" mung: so' mo" she yang: aiyaug re Ephata ga: ta" ra" . Aiwa bung" lo wa, ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Ailao" jao" yao" nokhye' bung" lo: ru we' shotaui: beim: lo" byaug mung: yao: wa dao: boe" boe" za: jhau: ra" .
Yesu wa ai: khyo re khag' rere: mata" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" mo, byu qere zug' nhao: ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa yao: je: zug' nhao re je: aire je yang: hau" lo" ako" .
Aire the' gyo" ra" mo, alhab' matho' mho losho' gyo" mug' pye' ru we' yao: wa ja: khao: ngo" re shab shab za: kad' ra" . Nojid mo, re no: gyo: nhao mung:- nhad' jid mo, re gai: jhau nhao: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ai: thao mataung" myao" re byu phung: mo" zang dam: zang" phaung: na: ako" . Yao: bam zo: nae" zo: ve maqo" gelao"- Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere yao: jhao" khai: yu mung:
Ce: mo, byu qe ngo we' daga" na: ru sam ba ngad va" . Ana" yao: bam zo: ve maqo" lo ge, ngad: ra"- amung: ngo ce: mo, byu qere nhag' khyag' ra" .
Yao: bam re vae: moe; zang yham khyo phao nhao: ke' ngad: re yao: bam khyole; mae moe; myad genae"- pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam mae" damyo" wa mug: va: mae" li" mo, ngad: ako" ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Alao" yao" mho"zo: qe wa yao: re tau: mung:- ceru: din"pyad' yo mae mo, byu alhab' re zho: nae" qhi" zo: ve khai: mae" qo" nae" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- mug khonho" khai" qo" ko" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: bam wa- mug nhad' khai" qo" ga: tau" ako" .
Yesu wa mo, byu qere myid gaung mae zaung: jo, nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ra" . Ai: mug nhad' khai" re yu: yu mung: Mao" So: jeju re bin: caung: lao" khyoe' phai" mung: mo, byu qere gae byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao" Mho" Zo: qere: byid' ke' ra" . mho"zo: qe wa mo, byu qere gae byid' ako" .
Amung: yao: bam wa ngo: nau" re: dajhid' zo: qo" ko" ra" . Yesu wa Mao" So re jeju bin: caung: lao" ngo rere: mo, byu qere gae byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao" mho"zo: qere ta" ra" .
Yaug khao: ngo" nyang" za: gyi: sho' qo" zo" ako" . mho"zo: qe wa zo" tang" to" ra" aje, abai" jham nhad' gyan byang" sho' qo" gaug: zhang: yu: ako" .
Mug zo" ra" mo, byu byid taung ko ngad: ako" . Ai: thao Yesu wa mo, byu qere aitau mae" phao nhao: ke' ra" .
Ailao" jao" yao" mho"zo: qe we' daga" lha khug khyo ye: vao: zaung mung:- Dalmanutha mung" khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Pharishe qe damyo" Yesu jhao" li" mung: yao: we' li" jho" ngag: ako" . Yao: re jham" qu" nug: ra" khyo" Mao" So yao: re o ngaui: rure sagse: qhu" nae" qhid' mae" ve, lho dalam: kad' qhu" la,- ga: yao: re mho' ako" .
Yesu wa so' mo" she mung:- ceqae" mae" byu qe pe"mung: ve, lho re mho' ko" i? Ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- cebam re airu" ra" ve, lho kad' qhu" nae" mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re nha: to: co' mung: lha khug khyo dam: do; zaung yang: tham: thoete' khyo gau" de; ye" lo" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa mug vin nae" to" myhid' pye' ko" ra" . Lha khug mae mug dakhai" za: bo: ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Pharishe qe: man" we' Herod nho: man" re lha" yang: jao" ge, ga: ta" peim" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa Yao: ceru: ta" ru wa ngonhaung" mug mavin yang: ta" ru ngad: ra" ga: yao: cao: yao: jho" ta" na: ako" .
Yao: bam airu: jho" ta" na: rure Yesu ba lao" yao: wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" pe"mung: mug mavin: ra" khyo re jho" ta" na ko" i? Ana" joe" sho' maba: gyo: shi: ko" i? Naonhaung" ai: qhi" myid: vhao: na shiko" i?
Naonhaung" myo,jid' de, geqere: mamyao ge i? Naonhaung" nokhye' de, geqere: magyo: ge i?
Ngo wa byu ngo" taung re mug ngo" khai" za: cug' phai" zho" rure naonhaung" mabeim: ge i? Zo" tang" ra" aje, aman" jham khonho" gyan byang" sho' naonhaung" gaug: zhang: yu ko" i? ga: myid' ra"- Yao: bam wa- daxe: shid' gyan ngad:- ga: tau" ako" .
Ai mae" byu byid taung re mug nhad' khai" za: cug' phai" zho" ra" au: zo" tang" ra" aje, aman" jham khonho" gyan byang" sho' naonhaung" gaug: zhang" yu ko" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: bam wa- nhad' gyan ga: tau" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" ana" joe" sho' pe"mung: maba: gyo: ge i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa Betsaida vogaung: khyo joe" ye" ako" . Byu damyo" wa myo, jid dayaug re Yesu jhao" jhui" li" mung: aiyaug re tin: byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao: re mho' ako" .
Yesu wa myo, jid yaug re lo; yang she mung: voyae khyo jhui" thug' lo" ra" . Yao" myo,jid' mae khata: bin: tag' byid: lao" Yesu wa aiyaug: dao mae lo, kai: mung:- Daja: ja: re nao myao: i? ga: yao: re myid' ra" .
Ailao" myo, jid wa tau: mung:- Byu jham re ngo myao:- ngadqere: yao: bam wa sag' gae jham ru" ru su" lhau: ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa aiyaug: myo,jid' dao mae yao" lo, dam: kai: byid' ra"- celhang re yao: wa qam: ke' yang: qu" ke' ra" . Ailao" jao" myo, dam: myao: lo mung: ja: khao: ngo" re qang: qang: za: myao: ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: re- vogaung: khug khyo davao lo" ga: amyin" byid: mung: yao" yham khyo phao nhao: ke' ra" .
Ai: thao re Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa Kesarea Philipi vogaung: jham khyo ye" lo" ako" . Khyole; mae yao" mho"zo: qere- Su bam wa ngore khag' ngad: ra" ga: ta" ako" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa yao: re- Damyo" wa qid nyhab' byid: yaug Yohan ngad: ra" ga:- damyo" wa Elia ngad: ra"- amung: damyo" wa lapa qemae" dayaug ngad: ra" ga: ta" na: ako"- ga: tau" ako" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- aire naonhaung" wa ngore khag' ngad: ra" ein: jho ko" i? ga: myid' ra" . Ailao" Petru wa tau: mung:- Nao wa Meshia ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- ngo khag' ngad: ga" rure naonhaung" khag' rere: data" kyo: ge,- ga: zug' nhao: ra" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa khyag' qhui: ru myo: sho' ja: re kham zo: ca" nae"- zug: ade, qe- khinjaung qi: qe we' Tung" pho" qeyang ha: pye' ru qhug' ru we' se' pye' ru qhug' nae" . Ngadqere: sam ba lao" dam: daui: to" li" nae"- ga: mho" shid' ra" .
Yesu wa cekhyo re de: de: za: yao: bam re ta" kyo" ra" . Aimung: Petru wa Yesu re gatau khyo jhui" ye: mung: qobo vhin: ra" khyo" qeim: ra" .
Yesu wa mho"zo: qere lhang: qu" mung: Petru re- Satan we" ngo mae" phao: lo" wa,- nao wa Mao" So shad' khyo" mamyid- byu: shad' khyo" za: myid: ra"- ga: qeim: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa mho"zo: qere we' mo, byu qere yao: jhao" khai: yu mung: yao: bam re- Nga" thao cao" nug yaug wa yao: yao" qhid' mae" ha: pye' yang: yao" pyao: zang vo, mung: nga" thao cao" vashao:-
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: yao" kao so' re khyad' yu nug: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: kao so' jeim: nae"- nga" mathao mae we' Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao" mathao: yang kao so' jeim: yaug kam" wa yao" kao so' khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" .
Alao" byu wa mug: myid geim" alhab' re qo" sang: yu ngadqere: yao: yao" kao so' jeim" byaug: ngad: re wa pe" akyu" bo: i?
Byu wa yao" kao so' re pe" ja" yang tha" mung: dam: qo" tug' yu nae" i?
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So re malam: ru we' makhyang: mashab: ra" ceqae" mae ngore we' nga" mho" dao: re qho' ra" yaug khag' re ngadqere: Byu: Yao: Zo: wa yao: pho" phungbao we' gyang" lho" ra" mug: lagyo: jham we' mung: daga" joe" li" ra" au: re Byu: Yao: Zo: re: yao: re qho' pye' nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa Mao" So: mung"dan: wa qam: so' we' joe" li" rure mathe' myao myao wa cemae na: jo; ra" mo, mae" damyo" mashid genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao khyaug' ba re- Yesu wa Petru- Yaku we' Yohan bam re za: gathaung: san bam myhao khyo jhui" do, lo" ra" . Yao: bam: qhid' kheim: mae yao: Yesu wa ve, bao tha" lo" ra" .
Yao" mai bau: bao: li" ru we' bao: bao: phyu: li" ra" . Myid gaung dao mae" mai bau: zab zo: mo, khag' re: ai qhi" bao: bao: phyu sho' maqo" cid' phyu gengad: ra" .
Amung: yao: bam: qhid' kheim: mae Moshe we' Elia thug' li" mung: Yesu we' jho" jhau: na: ako" .
Ailao" Petru wa Yesu re Asang we"- ngonhaung" cejo, qo mae na: re gai: ra" . Asang: qhid' mae" zaung dazaung- Moshe qhid' mae" dazaung Elia qhid' mae" dazaung- zaung sam lam: ngonhaung" re kad' nhao la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam gyai gyaug: pye' ruyang pe" ta" nae" ru maba lo: ta" ke' ru ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao re jham dathaui: thug' li" mung: yao: bam re losham: nghoe' ra" . Jham thaui: khug mae"- ceyaug wa ngo jhid' de; ra" nga" zo: ngad:- yao" dao: re tae" gyo: ge, ga: thoe jhau: thug' li" ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa avai: ayae khyo nyag din taung" qu" ke' ako" . ngadqere: Yesu mae" je yang: gatau khag' rere: mathe' myao lo: gengad: ra" .
Ai: bam mae" yao: bam dam: tug' gyo" lo: na: au: Yesu wa mho"zo: qere Byu: Yao: Zo: shid: rumae" madam: daui: to" li" li" wa naonhaung" the' myao: ra" khyo re khag' rere: data" kyo: ge,- ga: zug' nhao: ra" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu amyin" dao: re phug' cao" gengadqere: shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ga" ru wa pe" ga" ru ngad: i? ga: yao: bam yao: cao: jho" ta" qham: na: ako" .
Alao" yao: bam wa Yesu re- Elia shi" sao qhid' joe" li" nae" ga:- Tung" Pho" qe pe"mung: ta" ko" ra" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Ja: khao: ngo" re jin" jin" seim" nyhang" to: nae" qhid' mae" Elia wa gaigai: yao: sao qhid' joe" li" nae" ngad:- ngadqere: Jham: Mugsug' mae Byu: Yao: Zo: wa khyag' qhui: ru myo: sho' kham zo: mung: ha: pye' ru qhug' li" nae" ga: pe"mung: tung" to" ra" i?
Ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa Elia wa joe" li" ava"- yao" khyo re Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: yao: bam o nug: ra" khyo" yao: re kad' yu vako" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu we' mho"zo: sam yaug wa- dang: ra" mho"zo: qejhao" joe" lo gelao" yao: bam: lhang" gam: byu phung: mo" zang zang" na: bam: ru we' Tung" Pho" qe wa yao: bam we' jho" ta" ngag: na ko" rure yao: bam lomyao: ako" .
Mo,byu qe Yesu re myao lao"- yao: jhao" tao" ye: mung: yetug: ako" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere Pe" ja" khyo re naonhaung" yao: bam we' jho" ta" ngag: na ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Mo, phaung mae" byu dayaug tau: mung:- Mho" Pho" we"- ngo nao jhao" nga" zo: re jhui" li" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa nhad' jid yui bo: ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ai: yui vao: jaung" khao: ngo" myidgaung khyo be; lhang" ke' mung: nhad' mae" nyab dui" athaui: thaui: thug' ru we' zaui kyag' mung: gaung geim" kyaung: thin: byaug byaug mung: ra"- ai: yui re khe' thug' pye' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ni" mho"zo: qere ngo mho' ngadqere: yao: bam maqo" khe' thug' pye' ngad: ako"- ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- Lam khug: myid mabo: ra" byumyu" we"- ngo naonhaung" we' daga" khomyhao" joe" sho' na zai i? Ngo naonhaung" re khomyhao"joe" sho' zang: kham byid: zai i? Ai: yauggai nau" re ngojhao" jhui" lo geri:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa ai: yauggai nau" re Yesu jhao" jhui" lo: ako" . Ai: yui wa Yesu re myao lao"jao" ai: yauggai nau" re lao" thin: jab: lo" nhao mung: myid gaung khyo gyang: be; lo" ru we' nhad' mae" nyab dui" athaui: thaui: lang" lhe' lhau: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: pho" re- yao: ceru: boe" ru khomyhao" ngad va" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: pho" wa- Zonau" mae" ngad va" ga: tau" ra" .
Yui wa yao: re se' pye' nae" ga: myo: sho' lhang yao: re myi: mae qid mae lang" be; zaui: ke' ke' mung: ra" . Nao qo" boe" ngad: re wa ngopha: re nhag' khyag' ru we' bao" yu la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa- Nao qo" boe" ngad: re wa ein: pe"mung: ta" i? Lam khug: myid bo: ra" yaug: qhid' mae" ja: khao: ngo" qo" gai: boe" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" jao" ai: zoshao: yao: pho" wa- Ngo lam khug: ra"- nga" malam" ra" myid re bao" thaug' yu la,- ga: hug' ta" ra" .
Yesu wa mo, byu qe yao: jhao" tao" zang" phaung: lo: na: rure myao lao" ai: makhyang" ra" yui re- Nhad' jid nojid: ra" yui we"- ngo nao re amyin" byid' ra"- Yauggai nau" mae" thug' lo" wa,- yao: mae khonhae" re: dadam: vao lo:- ga: qeim: ra" .
Ai: makhyang" ra" yui wa gyi: hug' yang: ai: yauggai nau" re lao" thin: jab nhao mung: yao" khug mae" phao: thug' lo" ra" . Yauggai nau" re: sushid mao we' dakhyo: lang" jo; ra" . Byu myo: sho' wa yao: shid: ava"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa ai: yauggai nau" lo, mae zaui: mung: she: to" ke' ra" . Ailao" ai: yauggai nau" wa to" ye; li" ra" .
Yesu wa yham khug khyo dam: vao lo" mung: yao: za: na: au: yao" mho"zo: qe wa yao: re- Ngonhaung" ai: yui re pe"mung: maqo" khe' thug' pye' geli" laug i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Akyu" mho' ruyang mangad: re wa gatau pe" yang re: ceja" yui re maqo" khe' thug' pye'- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa aimae" to" mung: Galile khyo" lai: ye" lo" ako" . Ai: khyo re khag' rere: maba nhao nug ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa byu qe: lo, khug khyo ab byid' pye' ru qhug' mung: yao: bam wa yao: re se' pye' li" genae"- ngadqere: se' pye' thao sam ba re yao: wa dam: daui: to" li" nae" ga:- mho" byid' na: ruyang ngad: ra" .
Yao" mho"zo: qe wa yao" mho" shid' dao: re maba: gyo: ko" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa yao: re mavae" myid: gengad: ra" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa Kapena-um khyo joe" ye" ako" . Yham khug mae yevao: na thao Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere Naonhaung" wa khyole; mae pe" nam jho" ta" ngag ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa sae za: tae" bam: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa khyole; mae yao: bam mae" khag' qi" thao" ngad: ga" rure yao: cao: jho" ta" ngag: lo geyang: ngad: ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa zaung: jo, mung: daxe: shid' yaug re khai: yu yang: yao: bam re- Qhid' mae na nug yaug wa alhab' mo; thao mae na ca"- amung: alhab' mo; daui daui yaug boe" ca"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa zoshao dayaug re jhui" yu mung: yao: bam: agaung: mae yhe' to" ra" . Ai: zoshao re yao" lo; yang ge; ci zo" re" yao: bam re-
Zoshao qe mae" ceru" ra" zoshao dayaug re nga" mang khyo" lham: khae: yu: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: ngore lham: khae: yu: ra" . Amung: ngore lham: khae: yu: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: ngore za: lham: khae: yu: ru mangad:- ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug rere: lham: khae: yu: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yohan wa Yesu re Mho" Pho" we"- ni" mang: yang yui khe' thug' na: ra" byu dayaug re ngonhaung" myao:- ngadqere: yao: wa ngonhaung" we' daga" cao yaug mangad: mung: yao: re ngonhaung" tam" pye' co' va"- ga: ta" kyo" ako" .
Yesu wa- yao: re datam" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re nga" mang khyo" yang mug' pho: mau" bin: zaui: thao nga" khyo re magai: ra" dao: xoe" xoe" za: qo" ta" byu khag' mana .
Pe"mung: ga"re nyhao: re gye makad' ra" yaug wa nyhao" shad' mae" byu ngad: ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa- Nga" byu qe ngad: ako" ga" ra" khyo" yang naonhaung" re qid dakeim byid: jhaug' yaug khag' ngadqere: gaigai: yao: aphug' jhaung qhu" qo" khae: yu nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: ngore lam khug: na: ra" ce: zoshao qemae" dayaug yaug re lam khug: myid zai" phyo' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao" lang zang: mae laug lhang gye, qi: taui" lhao: mung: qid tham: khug khyo pye' zaui: ke' ru wa yao" qhid' mae" je: gai: ra" .
Ni" lo; yang ni" lam khug: myid re zai" phyo' byid' ngad: re wa- ai: lo, re qam" phyid' pye' wa,- lo, shid' lo, geim" we' myi: khonhae" re: mashid masham: ra" myiqid tham: khyo gyo" lo" nae" tho' lo, dashad' made, lo: kao so' daui: ra" khyo vao ye: nae" ru wa ni" qhid' mae" je: gai: ra" .
Ni" khyid: yang ni" lam khug: myid re zai" phyo' ngad: re wa ai: khyid re qam" phyid' pye' wa,- khyid shid' khyid geim" we' myi: khonhae" re: mashid masham: ra" myiqid tham: khyo gyo" lo" nae" tho' khyid dashad' made, lo: kao so' daui: ra" khyo vao ye: nae" ru wa ni" qhid' mae" je: gai: ra" .
Ni" myo,jid' yang ni" lam khug: myid re zai" phyo' ngad: re wa- ai: myo,jid' re thad' pye' wa,- myo,jid' shid' shad' geim" we' khonhae" re: myi: mashid masham- yao: bam re zo" ra" laug daung: khonhae" re mashid: ra" myiqid: tham: khyo gyo" lo" nae" ru tho' mae- myo,jid' dashad' za: de, mung: Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo vao ye: nae" ru wa ni" qhid' mae" je: gai: ra" .
Xeim: re xo: ke' yang: kyang" shao: pye' ru we' dakhyo:- byu alhab' rere: myi" yang kyang" shao: pye' li" nae" .
Xo: wa gai: ra"- ngadqere: ai: xo: shao: byaug lao"- ai: xo: re dam: ngae sho' naonhaung" khoru: qo" kad' yu genae" i? Naonhaung" khug mae jho" zam" khug: ra" xo: bo: jo, mung:- dayaug we' dayaug ngaui pyo: yaug yo za: zam" khug: na ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa ai: jo, qo mae" Yuda mung" khyo ye" lo" mung: Yodan gyaung: thoete' khyo gau" de; ye" lo" ra" . Byu phung: mo" zang yao: jhao" dam: zang" phaung: li" gelao"- yao: khonhae" re: lhaung" kad' ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam re mho" shid' ra" .
Pharishe qe damyo" Yesu jhao" li" mung: yao: re jham" qu" zo" re"- byu dayaug yaug wa yao" yham sang myhi" re kao" pye' gai: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" re Moshe khoru: amyin" byid' to" ra" i? ga: dam: tug' myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa- Kao: mugsug' tung" byid: mung: kao" pye' nae" akhang" byid' to" ra"- ga: tau" ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" nhag' lam: qao ko" ruyang ce: amyin" naonhaung" qhid' mae" tung" to: co' ru ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: sao qhid' maqhid phan" to" au: mae" Mao" So wa yauggai we' myiqe: re phan" to" ra" .
Airumung: yauggai wa yao: myhi" we' yao: pho" re to: co' mung: yao" yham sang myhi" we' yezam" khug: na: li" nae" .
Alao" yao: shid' zo: wa dagaung dasho: za: boe" lo genae" . Yao: shid' zo: wa- shid' zo: mangad:- dayaug za: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So: yang zham" to" rure byu: yang dazai" kao: ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yham khug mae dam: lo" na: au:- ce: khyo Yesu re dam: myid' ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- yao: yao" yham sang myhi" re kao" pye' mung: gatau dayaug re dam: xo' yu: ra" yaug wa yao" yham sang myhi" re shad' yaug ngad: ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo: yao: yao" yham sang pho" re kao" pye' mung: gatau dayaug we' lo, dam: xo' yu: ra" yaug wa lao shad' yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Byu daqhae: wa zoshao qere lo, kai: mung: shaman" byid: vashao:- ga: Yesu jhao" jhui" li" ako" . Ngadqere: mho"zo: qe wa yao: bam re qeim: ako" .
Aire Yesu myao lao"- nhag' qu" yo" ru we' yao" mho"zo: qere- Ai: zoshao qere ngojhao"lo nhao: ke' ge,- pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: Mung"dan: wa airu" mo; nho: mung"dan: ngad: ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa Mao" So: Mung"dan: re zoshao we' dakhyo: makhae: yu: ra" yaug wa ai: khug khyo maqo" vao ye: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: Yesu wa zoshao qere yao" tao: kheim" khyo vo; yu mung: yaug khao: ngo" dao mae lo, kai: yang: shaman" byid' ra" .
Yesu wa gyaung: khyo mae dam: su" lo" na: au:- byu dayaug wa tao" li" mung: Yesu qhid' kheim: mae pad' thaug' thaug' yang: yao: re- Gai: ra" Mho" Pho" we"- Apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" ngo pe" kad' ca" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Nao ngore pe"mung: gai: ein: ta" i? Mao" So mae" je yang: gai ru khag' mana .
