Byu dase'- su: myi: dalhad'- su: zai dakhug'- madang: ra" sagse: dakham- damhug' pyag' zo:- ni" myhi" we' ni" pho" re phug' myao: wa,- ga" ra" amyin" dao: jham re nao ba gau ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: yaug wa Yesu re Mho" Pho" we"- ai: amyin" dao: jham alhab' re zoqae: yo, mae" ngo phug' cao" lo va"- ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re jhid' de; myid we' zhaug' qu" mung:- nao daja: ca" ashi"- nao lo" wa,- ni" jo,nho" jham re lo" aung: mung: myaung sho: mo, re gae byid: wa,- ailao" nao mug: khaung: mung"dan: mae jo,nho" qo" nae"- amung: nga" thao cao" la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu dao: re yao: the' gyo: lao"- myo, nho phyug' mung: sham: lo" byaug: ru we' nhag' kaug' zang phao: lo" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa jo,nho" gyai qo" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere lhang: qu" mung:- Jo,nho" qo" ra" mo, wa Mao" So: Mung"dan: khyo vao ye: nae" qhid' mae" gyai qug: ako"- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa Yesu dao: re gyo" mug' ako" . Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Nga" zo: bam we"- Mao" So: Mung"dan: khyo vao ye: nae" gyai qug' ra" .
Jo,nho" qo" ra" yaug Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo vao ye: laui: ra" tho' gola: u wa nghe' no: dung: khyo" vao: lai: lo" nae" ru wa je: laui: ra"- ga: dam: ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa matho' ta" losho' mug' byaug: ru we'- Airu: ngad: re wa khoyaug khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" laug i? ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Yesu yao: bam re tau: qu" mung: Aiwa byu: yang magai: boe"- ngadqere: Mao" So wa gai: boe" ra"- Mao" So wa ja: khao: ngo" re qo" boe" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Petru wa Yesu re- Qu" wa,- ngonhaung" wa alhab' re to" pye' co' yang: ni" thao cao" va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa nga" mathao mae we' Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao" mathao: yang yham- yo- mao: nhaung:- nhae: mo"- myhi" pho"- zo: dau jham re to" pye' co' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere:
ce: apyad mae yhin" ru we' daga" yham- yo- mao: nhaung:- nhae: mo"- myhi" pho"- zo: dau jham re dayo nho" qo" khae: yu: li" genae"- thao: pyad ngad lao"- apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu genae" .
Ngadqere: qhid' au: mae" mo, myo: sho' wa nhaung thao" khyo ngad: li" genae"- nhaung thao" mae" mo, myo: sho' kam" wa qhid' au: mae ngad: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yao: bam Yerusalem khyo do, lo" na ko" au: Yesu wa mho"zo: qe: qhid' au: mae su" na: ra" . Yao" mho"zo: qe wa mug' mung: thao cao" mo, wa gyaug: ako" . Yesu wa mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug re dam: khai: yu mung: yao" dao mae boe" li" nae" ra" khyo re ta" kyo" ra" .
Tae" gyo: ge,- ngonhaung" Yerusalem khyo do, lo" na va"- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa- ai: mae khinjaung qi: qe we' Tung" Pho" qe: lo, mae ab: pye' ru qhug' nae"- amung: yao: bam wa Byu: Yao: Zo: re se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" dao: phyid' mung: taung bug qe: lo, khyo ab: pye' li" genae" .
Taung bug byu qe wa Byu: Yao: Zo: re jung" ru we' khata: phoe" sheim: mung: be, yang: se' pye' li" genae" . Ngadqere: yao: wa sam ba thao re dam daui: to" li" nae" ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Zebede yao: zo: Yaku we' Yohan tao wa Yesu jhao" te' lo mung: yao: re- Mho" Pho" we"- ngotao nao re mho' ra" ja: ngotao re kad' byid: nae" ngotao o: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao: tao re- ngo naotao: qhid' mae" pe" kad' byid: nae" o ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: tao wa Yesu re- Nao phungbao we' kho: kham boe" lao"- ngotao re ni" lo, yo shad' mae dayaug- lo, kaung: shad' mae dayaug nao we' daga" zaung nhao la,- ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: tao re- Naotao pe" mho' na ko" rure naotao maba ko" ngad: ra"- naotao wa ngo shaug' ca" ra" keim re qo" shaug' genae" i? Ngo kham: yu ca" ra" qid nyhab' re qo" kham: yu genae" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ailao" yao: tao wa Yesu re- Ngotao qo" doe;- ga: tau" ako" . Yesu wa yao: tao re- ngo shaug' ca" ra" keim re naotao qhug' shaug' genae"- ngo kham: yu ca" ra" qid nyhab' re qhug' kham: yu genae" .
Ngadqere: nga" lo, yo shad'- lo, kaung: shad' mae khoyaug zaung nae" rure khyin: yu nae" qhid' mae" ngo mae akhang" majo,- ai wa Mao" So: yang nyhang" to: byid' ra" mo; qhid' mae" za: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Gatau: mho"zo: daxe yaug ai: khyo re gyo: gelao"- Yaku we' Yohan tao re nhag' yo" ako" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere yao: jhao" khai: yu mung: yao: bam re- Mao" So re malam: ra" mo, qemae" eib nae" akhang" qo" ra" mo, wa mung" byu qe: dao mae qam: so' we' eib: ako" . Zug: au: jhaung qere: kheim: so' qo" rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Naonhaung" gyo: mae kam" wa airu: magai: ngad- Naonhaung" mae" je: qi: nug: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa alhab' mo; daui daui yaug boe" ca" .
Naonhaung" mae" au: jhaung boe" nug yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa alhab' mo; jeim kad' ca"-
Pe"mung: ga"re Byu: Yao: Zo: lhao" re: su re yam" zo: nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru mangad:- su re caung da" nae" we' byu myo: sho' re khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" yao" kao so' re byid' pye' nae"- ga: joe" li" ru angad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa Yerikho khyo joe" ye" ako" . Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qe we' byuphung: mo" zang we' daga" Yerikho mae" dam: thug' lo: na ko" au:- Tema nho: yao: zo: Barteme ga: mang: ra" mho' zo: byu myo, jid dayaug wa khyoyae mae zaung: jo; ra" .
Yao: wa Nazared mae" Yesu joe" na: rure the' gyo: lao" zag: hug' mung:- Davi yao: zo: Yesu we"- ngore nhag' khyag' yu la, wo"- ga: ta" ra" .
Myo: sho' mo, wa yao: re sae za: na nae" qhid' mae" qeim: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: wa- Davi yao: zo: we"- ngore nhag' khyag' yu la, wo"- ga: je: zag: hug' ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa thang mung: Yao: re khai: lo ge,- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: bam wa myo, jid re khai mung: yao: re- Ngaui bau: se,- To" wa,- yao: nao re khai: na: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ailao" yao: wa yao" bau: qhang khyad' shalhaui" pye' yang: pag' to" li" mung: Yesu jhao" ye" lo" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- ngo ni" qhid' mae" pe" kad' byid: nae" nao o: i? ga: myid' ra" . Ailao" myo, jid wa Yesu re- Asang we"- nga" myo, re myao nhao la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu yao: re- Su" lo" wa,- ni" lam khug: myid wa nao re gai nhao: ava"- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" jao"- myo, myao: lo mung: Yesu ye" lo" khyo thao mae cao" ye" lo" ra" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa Yerusalem we' Zhan: lun: bam khyid mae" Betphage we' Bethani khyo jhao" li" na lao"-
Yesu wa mho"zo: shid' yaug re nhao: ke' mung: yao: shid' zo: re- Ni" shid' zo" qhid' au: mae" vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ge,- vogaung: khug khyo vao ye: we' khag' re: mazaung: qu" shi" ra" loze nau" dadau: taui" to" rure ni" shid' zo: yemyao genae"- aire pheim: yu mung: she: lo ge,-
Byu dayaug yaug Pe"mung: airu: kad' ko" i? ga: ni" shid' zo: re myid: lao"- ni" shid' zo: wa yao: re Asang cere ci qo: ga"- ana" yao: jao" cekhyo dam: tug' nhao: ke' byid: nae" ga" ein: ta" ge,- ga: ta" ke' ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa ye" lo" mung: yham dayham: kham: dung: ayae- khyodang shad' mae loze nau" dadau: taui" to" rure yemyao lao" aire yepheim: ako" .
Aitau mae ye; jo; ra" mo, wa loze nau" pe"mung: pheim ko" i? ga: yao: shid' zo: re myid' ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa Yesu ta" ke' ru we' dakhyo: yao: bam re ta" kyo" ako" . Ailao" yao: bam wa yao: shid' zo: re loze nau" pheim: she: lo" nhao: ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa loze nau" re Yesu jhao" she: lo mung: loze nau" dao mae yao: shid' zo" mai bau: nhe: byid' ako" . Yesu re: loze nau" dao mae do; zaung: ra" .
Byu myo: sho' re: yao: bam: mai bau: jham re khyodang mae myhung: byid' ako" . Gatau damyo" wa pa: din" mae" cilo: ra" sag' vho' sag' dang" jham re khyodang mae myhung: byid' ako" .
Yesu qhid' au: mae" mo, byu qe we' thao cao" ra" mo, byu qe wa zag: hug' mung:- Hosana- Asang: mang we' joe" li" ra" yaug wa ngaui lho" vashao: wo"-
Joe" lo nae" ra" ngonhaung" yao: pho" Davi mung"dan: wa ngaui lho" vashao: wo"- Myhao: thao" ra" jo, qo mae Hosana ngad vashao: ga: ta" ako" .
Yerusalem khyo joe" lao" Caung: pa" Yham khug khyo vao ye: mung: ja: khao: ngo" re yecao" qu" lhau: ra" . Ba vao: lo" na lao" mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug we' yao: wa Bethani vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Ai: thao: ba Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa Bethani mae" dam: lo: na: au:- Yesu wa vae: moe' ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa avho' maung" jo; ra" pho' ham" gae dagae re va: mae" the' myao: ra"- yao: wa ashi: zaui" laug ga: pho' ham" gae qao: khyo ye" lo" ra" . Pho' ham" shi: zaui: yo, mangad: yang: avho' za: maung" jo; rure yemyao: ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa pho' ham" gae re thao phyao: dapyad daqae: khonhae" re: ni" ashi: khag' maqhug' zo: geshao:- ga: ta" ra" . Yao" mho"zo: qere: ai: dao: re the' gyo" ako" .
Yesu we' mho"zo: qe wa Yerusalem khyo joe" ye" ako" . Ailao" Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham khug khyo vao ye: mung: Caung: pa" Yham khug mae zai aung: zai: vai mo, re khe' thug' mung: ngaui tha" zo: mo; jaung: jham we' phaung" kyug' aung: zo: mo; tao" khau" jham re tau: phaug' sin" pye' byid' ra" .
Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham vang" khyo" pe" ja" zai rere: maci: lai: lhau nhao ngad: ra" .
Amung: yao: wa mo, byu qere- Nga" yham re byumyu" cao jab qera" akyu" mho' yham ga: mhang" genae" ga: Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" mangad: i? Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa aire damya, laug aug' kad' pye' avako"- ga: mho" byid' ra" .
Aikhyo re khinjaung qi: qe we' Tung" Pho" qe the' gyo: gelao"- Yesu re se' pye' nae" khyo qho: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re mo, byu qe alhab' yao: mho" byid' ra" khyo re mug' hao" na: bam geyang: yao: bam wa Yesu re gyaug: ako" .
Myi" thao joe" lo lao" Yesu we' mho"zo: qe wa vomo" mae" thug' lo" ko" ra" .
Ai: thao: ba no' mae" Yesu we' mho"zo: qe su" lai: lo" na: au: ai: pho' ham" gae wa gae geim" kyaug' shid: jo; rure myao: ako" .
Ailao" Petru wa myid: beim: mung: Yesu re Mho" Pho" we"- qu" wa,- nao nhang: co' ra" pho' ham" gae kyaug' shid: byaug vanhaung- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa tau: mung: yao: bam re Mao" So re lam khug: na ge,-
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa yao: yao" nhag' lam: khug mae aug' o: myid mabo lo: yao: yao: ta" ru we' dakhyo: boe" nae"- ga: lam: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: ce: bam re- bam nao qui" lo" wa,- amung: panglai: khyo gyo" vao lo" wa,- ga: ta" ngad: re ai wa yao: ta" ru we' dakhyo: boe" nae" .
Airumung: ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa Naonhaung" mho' ra" ja: alhab' qo" yu nae" ein: lam ge,- ailao" naonhaung" gaigai: yao: qo" khae: yu genae" .
Naonhaung" akyu" mho' ye; jo; au: naonhaung" re shad' lhoe" ra" yaug: qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid: ge,- ailao" za: mug: gaung dao mae" Pho" Mao" So wa naonhaung" shad' lhoe" ra" qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid: nae" .
Su gaje qere naonhaung" qobo makhyad' byid: ko" re wa mug: khaung dao mae" naonhaung" Pho" re: naonhaung" shad' lhoe" ra" qobo re makhyad' byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu we' mho"zo: qe wa Yerusalem khyo dalhang dam: joe" lo: ako" . Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham mae su" qin" au:- khinjaung qi: qe- Tung" Pho" qe we' zug: ade, qe yao: jhao" li" mung:-
Nao aijham re pe" kheim: so' khyo" yang kad' i? Nao re aijham kad' nae" ce: kheim: so' khag' yang byid' to" i? ga: Yesu re myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Ngo naonhaung" re dao: dakheim: myid: geli"- naonhaung" aire tau: gelao"- aijham re ngo pe" kheim: so' yang kad' rure naonhaung" re ngo ta" kyo: nae" .
Yohan byid' ra" qid nyhab' wa Mao" So: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngad: i? Mangad: lao"- byu: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngad: i? Ngo re tau: gela,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa- Mao" So: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngad: ra" ein: ngonhaung" ta" re wa- airu: ngad: re pe"mung: naonhaung" yao: re malam" ko" i? ga: yao: ta" li" nae" .
Amung: byu: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngad: ra" ein: ngonhaung" ta" nae" i? ga: yao: cao: jho" qham: ako" . ( Yao: bam wa mo, byu qere gyaug: ako"- pe"mung: ga"re byu alhab' mo, wa Yohan wa gaigai: yao: lapa ngad: ra" ga: myid: ako" . )
Ailao" yao: bam wa tau: mung:- ngonhaung" maba ga: Yesu re ta" ako" . Yesu yao: bam re- Aijham re pe" kheim: so' yang kad' rure ngore: naonhaung" re mata" kyo: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa dao: tau" jham we' yao: bam re ta" ra" . Byu dayaug wa sabyi khyae dakhyae qho" to: mung:- aire khyae kyae" lhang" to:- sabyi pyag' khung: dau" to" ru we' gyebyu zaung dalam: kad' to: mung: khyae kad' zo: mo, re ngho: byid' to: co' yang: gatau: mung" khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Ayo, joe" lao"- yao: wa khyae ngho" zaui: mo, jhao" jeim dayaug re khyae ngho: phug' sabyi shi: mho' nhao: ke' ra" .
Khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa ai: jeim re lham: taui" be, mung: akeim dam: nhao: ke' ko" ra" .
Khyae sang wa gatau jeim dayaug re dam: nhao: ke' ra" . Khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa ai: jeim re au: lham: be; cad'- dae te' mung: qho' lham: phyo' ako" .
Amung: khyae sang wa jeim gatau dayaug re dam: nhao: ke' lao"- khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa yao: re lham: se' pye' ako" . Gatau myo: sho' mo, rere: dakhyo: za: be, mo, re be,- se' pye' mo, re se' pye' mung: kad' ako" .
Khyae sang wa nhao: ke' nae" ru yao" zote: zo: dayaug za: adang: alo" . Amung: yao: wa- Nga" zo: re wa lham: phug' myao: genae"- ga: ta" yang: lo" thao" mae khyae ngho" zaui: mo, jhao" yao: zo: re nhao: ke' ra" .
Ngadqere: khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa Ceyaug wa khyae sang: nho: yham khaung sang nae" yaug ngad: ra"- lo geri: Ceyaug re se' pye' gelang:- ailao"- yao" jo,nho" wa nyhao: mae" boe" zai ngad: ra" ga:- yao: cao: yao: jho" ta" ako" .
Amung: yao: bam wa yao: re taung" yu yang: se' pye' mung: khyae taung gaung mae yeshapye' to" ako" .
Ailao" khyae sang wa khoru: kad' nae" i? Yao: wa li" mung: khyae ngho" zaui: mo, re se' pye' yang: ai: sabyi khyae rere: gaje qere byid' li" nae" .
Amung: Yham zhaug' mo, khyin: khyo" pye' ra" laug baui wa yham jheim mae" akhyag: thao" ra" laug baui boe" lo va" .
Ce wa Mao" So: yang kad' ru ngad: ra" . Aiwa ngonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae mug' pho: mau" ngad: ra"- ga" ra" jham: dao: re naonhaung" manghe' qu" ko" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yuda au: jhaung qe wa yao: bam re qang yang: Yesu ce: dao: tau" re ta" rure ba gemung: yao: bam wa Yesu re taung: nae" seim" ako" . Ngadqere: byuphung: mo" re gyaug: ako" . Amung: yao: bam wa Yesu re nha: to: co' mung: phao: lo" ko" ra" .
Ai: thao re yao: bam wa Yesu yao" dao: thoe: yang yao: re taung: nae" qhid' mae" Pharishe qe daqhae: we' Herod byu daqhae: re Yesu jhao" nhao: ke' ako" .
Yao: bam li" mung: Yesu re Mho" Pho" we"- nao wa dangman" ru we' khag' rere: myo, nho makhyin: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re nao wa byugaui maqu" lo: Mao" So: khyo re dang dang za: mho" na: ra" . Roma Khosin" re khang: gai: byid' i? Magai: byid: i?
Ngonhaung" byid: zai: i? Mabyid: zai i? ga: myid' ako" . Yesu kam" wa yao: bam geim kad' rure ba mung: yao: bam re- Naonhaung" ngore pe"mung: jham" qu" ko" i? Ngo jhao" ngaui dakye' cilo: qu" ge,- ngo qu" qu" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa ngaui dakye' cilo: ako" . Yesu wa Cemae khag' sulho we' khag' mang aso: de; ra" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: bam wa yao: re Roma khosin" sulho we' mang aso: de; ra"- ga: tau" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Roma khosin" we' sin" ra" gu: Roma Khosin" re byid: ge,- Mao" So we' sin" ra" gu: Mao" So re byid: ge,- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: bam wa gyai mug' byaug: ako" .
Ai: thao re dam: daui: to" li" khyo majo, ga: ta" na ko" ra" Saduke damyo" Yesu jhao" li" mung:-
Mho" Pho" we"- byu dayaug yaug: yao: mao: wa zo: dau maqo" lo: yao" yham sang myhi" re shid: cug' to: co' ngad: re aiyaug: yao: nhaung: wa yao: mao" cug' mo" re gaug mung: yao: mao" qhid' mae" zo: dau nyaug xo' myhung byid: ca"- ga: Moshe ngonhaung" re tung" to: byid: co' ra" .
Ana"- yao: mao: yao: nhaung: nhad' yaug na: ako" . Mao: mo" yaug wa myi: dayaug lo,xo' yu: ra"- ngadqere: zo: dau maqo" lo: shid: lo" ra" .
Alao" mao: le; yaug cug' dam: gaug: ra"- mao: le; re: zo: dau maqo" lo: shid: lo" ra" . Sam yaug ein: yaug re: ai we' dakhyo: zo: dau maqo" lo: shid: lo" ra" .
Yao: tao ho' nhad' yaug geim" zo: dau maqo" lo: shid: lo" ko" ra" . Lo" thao" mae ai: myiqe: re: shid: lo" ra" .
Shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" rumae ai: myiqe: myhi" wa khoyaug: yham sang myhi" ngad nae" i? Pe"mung: ga"re yao: tao ho' nhad' yaug geim" aiyaug re ceim" ngho" vako" ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" wa Jham: Mugsug' we' Mao" So: qam: so' re maba geyang: shad' nghung" na ko" ra" mangad: i?
Pe"mung: ga"re shid: ra" mo, dam: daui: to" li" lao"- yao: bam wa myibyid: myiyu makad' lo: genae"- yao: bam wa mug: gaung dao mae" mug: lagyo: qe we' dakhyo: ngad: ako" .
Amung: shid: ra" mo, dam: daui: to" li" ra" khyo we' sin: mung: myi: nga" na: ra" thao" paung" we' sin: yang: ta" ra" jham: dau mae Mao" So wa Moshe re ngo wa Abraham nho: Mao" So- Isag nho: Mao" So we' Yaku nho: Mao" So ngad: ga: ta" ra" Jham: dao: re tung" to" ra" Moshe tung" paug' re naonhaung" manghe' qu" ge i?
Mao" So wa shid: jo; ra" mo; nho: Mao" So mangad:- Daui: na: ra" mo; nho: Mao" So angad:- naonhaung" wa gyai yao: shad' nghung" byaug: avako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Tung" Pho" qemae" dayaug wa Yesu we' Saduke bam dayaug we' dayaug jho" ta" ngag: na ko" rure the' gyo" ru we' Yesu yao: bam re shab shab za: tau: byid' rure qu" myao lao"- Yesu jhao" qui" li" mung: yao: re Amyin" dao: alhab' mae" kholam: je: qi"thao" ngad: i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa Israel amyu" we"- tae" gyo: ge,- ai: Asang ngonhaung" Mao" So wa date: za" Asang ngad: ra" .
Ai: Asang ni" Mao" So re ni" aung khug nhag' lam:- myid nyan: ba: ru- gaung dau: qam: so' alhab' we' jhid' de; ca" nae" ngad: ra"- ga" ra" lam: wa qi" thao" amyin" dao: ngad: ra" .
Shid' lam" lam: wa- ni" yham kyo: cao: re naoyao" gaung re we' dakhyo: jhid' de; ca" nae" ngad: ra"- ga" ru ngad: ra" . Ce shid: lam: tho' je: qi" ra" amyin" dao: gatau majo,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" ai: Tung" Pho" wa Yesu re Ngad: ra"- Mho" Pho" we"- Mao" So wa date: za: ngad: ru we' yao: mae" je yang: gatau mana ga: nao ta" ru wa dang: ra" .
Alao" Mao" So re aung khug: nhag' lam: alhab' we' myid nyan: ba: ru alhab' we' gaung dau: qam: so' alhab' we' jhid' de; ca" nae" ngad: ra" ga" ru we' yham kyo: cao: re yao: yao" gaung re we' dakhyo: jhid' de; ca" nae" ngad: ra" ga" ra" amyin" dao: shid' lam: re phug' cao" ru wa phad' nghaui" xeim: alhab' we' xeim: alhab' tho' je: qi" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa aiyaug shab za: phaug' tau" rure ba lao" yao: re- Nao wa Mao" So: Mung"dan: we' mataung" va: lo: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" . Ai: thao Yesu re khag' pe" re: mavae" myid: loko" ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa Mao" So: yham mae mho" shid' na: au:- yao: bam re Meshia wa Davi yao: zo: ngad: ra" ga: Tung" Pho" qe khoru: mung: qo" ta" ko" ra" i?
Ni" gyevo jham re ni" khyid vo: khug mae ngo mato: to: byid: wa- nga" lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo, wa, ga: ai: Asang wa nga" Asang re ta" ra"- ga: Davi wa Gyang" Lho" Byo vao: jaung" mung: ta" ra" .
Airumung: Davi yao: yao: lhao"- Meshia re Asang ga: ta" ngad: re wa Meshia wa khoru: mung: Davi myid: zo: gai: ngad nae" i? ga: ta" ra" . Byuphung: mo" wa Yesu mho" dao: re ngaui bau: za: tae" gyo" yu: ako" .
Amung: Yesu wa mho" shid' zo" re"- Tung" Pho" qere lha" ge,- yao: bam wa bau: qhang ve; pye' mung: su" qin" nug mo, gai jao: gyo: mae lham: phug' myao: byid: nae" o mo,-
Tarha" Jung Yham mae gatau jaung: to" ra" tao" khau" mae zaung nug mo, ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam wa cug' mo" qe: yham zai yokhyao: jham re phyo' zo: lhad' zo" ci mung: su qu" gai nae" geim kad' akyu" qhang sho' mho' mhug' mo, ngad: ako" . Yao: bam wa je: qi" ra" dao: phyid' ru qhug' li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Alu: ban" qhid' au: mae zaung: jo, mung: mo, byu qe aimae Alu: ngaui li" ke' rure qu" na: ra" . Jo,nho" qo" ra" mo, myo: sho' wa Alu: ngaui myo: sho' li" ke' ako" .
Masho: majhin myaung sho" ra" cug' mo" myhi" dayaug re: Alu: ban" jo; khyo li" mung: byad san: dakye' we' man" ra" gyid: ngaui shid' kye' re li" ke' ra" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere khai: yu mung: yao: bam re- Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa Ce: masho: majhin myaung sho" ra" cug' mo" myhi" wa Alu: ban" mae Alu: ngaui li" ke' ra" mo, alhab' tho' mae" Alu: ngaui je: ke' ava" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam alhab' wa yao: bam magan: mago" rumae" jan" ra" gu: re li" ke' byid' ako" . Ce: cug' mo" myhi" kam" wa yao: masho: majhin myaung sho: ngadqere: qo" ra" gu: alhab' yao: zo: nae" alhab' re li" ke' pye' ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham mae" thug' lo" na: ra" au:- yao" mho"zo: qemae" dayaug wa yao: re- Mho" Pho" we"- Qu" wa, khoqhi" gyag: ra" laug zang jham we' laug yham jham ngad: ra" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao: re Nao ce: laug yham qi: jham re myao: i? Ce: laug yham jham mae" laug zang jham dazang re: madang losho' byo; gyo" lo" byaug genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Zhan: lun: bam dao mae yao: za: Caung: pa" Yham shad' khyo myo, nho qang yang: zaung: jo; ra" au:- Petru- Yaku- Yohan we' Andre bam yao: jhao" li" mung:-
Ceru khonhae" boe" li" zai ngad: i? Aijham boe" nae" ngad lao" pe" ja" ve, lho boe" thug' li" nae" laug i? Ngonhaung" re ta" kyo: la, ga: ta" ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" re khag' yang re: majhui" pyag' lo" geshao:- lha" ge,-
Byu myo: sho' nga" mang vin yang: thug' li" mung:- ngo wa Meshia ngad va" ga: ta" yang: byu myo: sho' re jhui" pyag' lo" byaug: li" genae" .
Amung: gyekhe' ru we' gyekhe' lau thoe jham re the' gyo: gelao" naonhaung" dagyo" din ge,- ai: gu: wa boe" li" ca" ra"- ngadqere: ai: lo" thao" ru wa mangad: shingad: ra" .
Byu damyu" we' damyu"- mung"dan: dalam: we' dalam: gye jho" zin" li" genae"- Jo, qo gatau tau mae myid lab: lab' li" nae"- bao" khug' khug' li" nae"- cejham wa qug: khai" ru aqhid ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" kam" wa yao: yao: lha" yang: na ge,- Khorumung: ga" re yao: bam wa naonhaung" re taung" yu mung: tarha" yung" khyo ab byid' pye' li" genae" . Tarha" Jung Yham mae naonhaung" re be; li" genae"- Zug: qe we' kho: kham qere Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: ta" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" nga" mathao mae naonhaung" wa yao: bam: qhid' kheim: mae ye; jo, qo: li" genae" .
Amung: ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re byumyu" alhab' re sao qhid' kho" kyo: ca" nae" ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re taung: mung: tarha" yung" khyo ab: pye' gelao"- pe" ta" nae" laug ein: gau: qhid' khae" yang: damyid: ci ge,- Ayo, joe" lao" naonhaung" re jhau nhao: ru we' dakhyo: jhau ge,- khorumung: gare ai: dao: jham wa naonhaung" jhau: ru mangad: Gyang" Lho" Byo jhau: ru ngad: ra" .
Alao" yao: mao: wa yao: nhaung: re shid nae" khyo jhui" ab: pye' li" genae"- yao: zo: qe wa yao: myhi" yao: pho" qere gye kad' mung: se' nhao: li" genae" .
Amung: nga" mang mathao mae byu alhab' yang naonhaung" re nghang" pye' li" genae" ngadqere: lo" thao" joe" sho' zang: qhao" yaug wa khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" .
Amung: ai: qu" din sho' ra" maca' majhad' wa mato: ang: ra" jo, qo mae to" to" rure naonhaung" the' myao gelao" ( nghe' na yaug wa ba: gyo: vashao: ) Yuda mung" mae na: ra" mo, wa bam khyo tao" phao geshao:-
Yham khaung dao mae na: ra" yaug wa gyo" lo" mung: yham khug mae" zai daja: ja: re lo" yu: ciphao nae" qhid' mae" yham khug khyo mavao lo" loshao:-
Yothaung: din" mae na yaug re: yao" bau: qhang yu: ci nae" qhid' mae" yham khyo madam: tug' lo vashao:-
Ai: ba na gyo: mae gaung la: mo, we' zoshao nug' nau" ci mo, wa gyai qug: genae" .
Airumung: ai: ayo, wa gyo, yo, re mangad: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So re akyu" mho' na ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So phan" to" ra" mug: myid aqhid mae" ana" ba joe" sho' maboe" qu" shi" ru we' thao phyao: re: maboe" nae" ra" qug: khai: khyag' qhui: ru wa ai: ba na gyo: mae boe" thug' li" nae" .
Amung: ai: ayo, ba na jham re Mao" So: yang maqhaung" pye' ngad: re wa khag' re: qo" daui: na nae" mangad:- ngadqere: yao: khyin: yu: to" ra" mo; qhid' mae" ai: ba na jham re Mao" So qhaung" pye' byid' ra" .
Byu dayaug yaug wa naonhaung" re Qu" ge,- cetau mae Meshia na: ra"- thoetau mae Meshia na: ra" ga: ta" ngad: re dalam" ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re Meshia apyag' qe we' Lapa apyag' qe thug' li" li" genae"- gai: boe" ngad: re yao: bam wa khyin: to: va" mo, re lhao"- qo" jhui" pyag' yu nae" qhid' mae" ve, lho jham we' mug' pho: mau" zo" jham kad' qhu" li" genae" .
Naonhaung" kam" wa lha" yang: na ge,- ngo wa maboe" li" shimae" naonhaung" re gau: qhid' khae" yang: cegu: alhab' ta" to: va" .
Amung: ai: qug: khai: khyag' qhui: ru boe" thao re ba wa no; byaug nae"- lho" re: mazho: byaug lo nae" .
Kyi jham mug: gaung mae" byid: gyo" lo" byaug mung:- mug: gaung mae" qam: so' jham laui" nin" li" genae" .
Ailao" Byu: Yao: Zo: wa qam: so' phungbao we' daga" jham thaui: khug mae li" rure yao: bam myao genae" .
Ai: thao Byu: Yao: Zo: wa mug: lagyo: jham re- mug: thao" myid thao"- mug: myid byid khyug geim" khyo nhao: ke' mung: yao" yang khyin: yu: to" ra" mo, re cao" zhang: yu: li" genae" .
Pho' ham" gae re qu" yang: zhao: yu ge,- Pho' ham" gae mae" anyaug thug' li" mung: vho' nau" tad' li" lao"- zin vao kheim: joe" li" na va" rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- aijham boe" lo: na: rure naonhaung" the' myao gelao"- ayo, joe" li" va" rure naonhaung" ba: li" genae" .
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa- Ana" na: jo; ra" byu ceqae" alhab' mashid shire aijham alhab' boe" lo: li" nae" .
Mug: gaung we' myid gaung lai: lo" byaug ngadqere: nga" dao: wa khonhae" re: malai: lo" nae" .
Ngadqere: ai: ba na we' yo, khyin: re Mao" So mae" je yang: khag' re: maba- Mug: gaung dao mae na: ra" mug: lagyo: jham we' ai: Yao: Zo: lhao" maba gengad: ra" .
Ai: ba na we' yo, khyin: khonhae" joe" li" nae" rure naonhaung" maba: to" ruyang lha" mung: gyang: gyang: za: lhaug' na ge,-
Amung: aiwa byu dayaug yao: yao" yham mae" gatau: mung" khyo gyaung: su" lo" nae" ngad lao"- yao" jeim qere dayaug we' dayaug yao" mau" we' yao: yham mau" re pyo: to: byid: co' mung:- kham: lhaug' yaug re lha" yang: lhaug' na nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid: co' ru we' dau: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ai: yham sang wa cad' sham" zo" re la,- gae gaung: myi: re la,- qo, teim: myi: re la,- ne, seim re la,- khonhae" joe" lo nae" ru naonhaung" maba: to" rumung: lha" yang: lhaug' na ge,-
Amung: yham sang nyag din taung" joe" lo: au: naonhaung" yab: myhid' jo; rure malo: myao nae" qhid' mae" lha" ge,-
Ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru we' dakhyo: alhab' re ta" ru wa- lha" yang: lhaug' na ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Lai co' Poe we' Man" Make' Poe joe" nae" shid' ba ca" shi" au:- khinjaung qi: qe we' Tung" Pho" qe wa Yesu re sae za: taung" yu mung: se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" pha,jhi" khyug' na: ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa mo, byu qe malhun" li" geshao:- poe ba na gyo: gu: mae makad' gejhao" ga: jho" ta" ako" .
Yesu wa Bethani mae mao gae: boe" qu" ra" Simon: yham mae zozo" na: au:- myiqe: dayaug wa gyai phug' de; ra" Mu Ra Na: Du: xau laug gyang" thaug' dathaug' cili" mung: Yesu au: mae ai: xau li" vhe' sheim: byid' ra" .
Ai: tau mae na: ra" mo, damyo" wa aire nhag' qu" yo" ru we'- pe"mung: ai: xau re amyid: avho: kad' pye' ra" i?
Ai: xau re ngaui kye' sam yo je mae aung: mung: myaung sho: mo, re qo" gae byid: zai ngad: ra" ga:- yao: cao: jho" ta" ru we' ai: myiqe: re qobo vhin: ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa- yao: yao: sae za: na shao:- naonhaung" yao: re pe"mung: khin jang: na ko" i? Yao: wa ngore gai: ra" mau" kad' byid' ava" .
Pe"mung: ga"re myaung sho" ra" mo, wa khonhae" re: naonhaung" we' daga" za: na: ako" . Ngadqere: ngo wa naonhaung" we' khonhae" re: abang mabyid na: jo, nae" mangad:-
Yao: kam" wa yao: qo" gai: kad' ra" gu: kad' ava"- yao: wa nyhab' pye' nae" qhid' mae" nga" gaung re gau: qhid' khae" yang: xau gyad byid' ava" .
Airumung: ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re kho" kyo" lo" ra" myid gye, geim" khyi" khao: ngo" mae ce: myiqe: re beim: so: nae" qhid' mae" yao: kad' ra" mau" zo" re ta" kyo" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao daxe: shid' yaug mae bo: ra" Yuda Iskarud wa Yesu re ab byid' pye' nae" qhid' mae" khinjaung qi: qejhao" thug' ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: bam wa yao" dao: re the' gyo: gelao" ngaui mung: yao: re ngaui byid: nae" ga: dao: so: byid' ako" . Yuda wa Yesu re ab byid' pye' nae" khoau: yo" nae" rure qho: na: ra" .
Ai: Lai co' poe xeim: yao nau" re se' ra" Man" Make' mug Poe ba na joe" nae" daba kyo shi" au:- yao" mho"zo: qe wa Yesu re Ngonhaung" wa ni" qhid' mae" Lai co' Poe myi" xeim re nao ngonhaung" re khotau mae yenyhang" seim" to: nhao nug: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: shid' yaug re- Ni" shid' zo: vogaung: khug khyo vao ye: ge,- Qid am vo; ci: ra" yauggai dayaug wa ni" shid' zo: re lham: tug: yu: li" nae" .
Yao" thao cao" lo" mung: yao: vao lo" ra" yham mae" yham sang re- ngo nga" mho"zo: qe we' daga" Lai co' Poe myi" xeim zo: nae" bang" do, qe, khai: mae ngad: ra" i? ga: Mho" Pho" myid: nhao: ke' ra" ein: ta" ge,-
Ailao" yao: wa ni" shid' zo: re nyhang" seim" jin" to: va" tho' pyae mae" qe, mo" daqe, re ceim" shid' byid' li" nae" Ai: qe, mae ngonhaung" qhid' mae" myi" xeim yenyhang" to: ge,- ga: pin mung: nhao: ke' ra" .
Mho"zo: shid' zo: wa thug' ye" lo" mung: vogaung: khug khyo vao ye" lo" ko" re- yao: shid' zo: re: Yesu ta" ke' ru we' dakhyo: yemyao gelao"- Lai co' Poe myi" xeim re yenyhang" ako" .
Ana" cad' sham" zo" re Yesu wa mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug we' daga" joe" lo: ra" .
Yao: bam zaung: jo, mung: zozo: jaung: mae zo zo" na ko" au: Yesu wa- ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa- ngo we' zo zo" na: ra" naonhaung" mae" dayaug wa ngore gyevo: lo, khyo ab byid' pye' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa nhag' gyo" kaug' ru we' dayaug: thao dayaug Yesu re- Ai: yaug wa ngo ngad nae" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa Ai: yaug wa daxe: shid' yaug mae bobo mung: ngo we' daga" dakhug' mae za: mug jam zo: yaug ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: Byu: Yao: Zo: wa shid kham: nae"- ngadqere: Byu: Yao: Zo: re gyevo: lo, khyo ab byid' pye' ra" yaug wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' nae"- ai: yaug wa makhau: li" ngad: re yao" qhid' mae" je: gai zai ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: yao: bam zozo" na ko" au: Yesu wa mug re yu: yu yang:- Mao" So re jeju bin: caung: byid: lao" aire cug' phai" mung:- Yu zo: ge,- ce wa nga" gaung ngad: ga: ta" mung: mho"zo: qere gae byid' ra" .
Yesu wa sabyi keim rere: yu: yu mung: Mao" So re jeju bin: caung: byid: lao"- mho"zo: qere byid' ra" . Yao: bam alhab' ai: keim mae" shaug' ako" .
Yesu wa- Ce wa byu myo: sho' mo; qhid' mae" sheim: pye' ra" Mao" So: dao: thang" re dazid thaung" te' to" ra"- nga" sa: ngad: .
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa- Mao" So: Mung"dan: mae sabyi asag' re ngo qhug' shaug' ra" ba na joe" sho' ngo wa ce: sabyi re khonhae" re: dam: shaug' nae" mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao yao: bam wa caung: nghaui" dalam: bin: caung: lao" Zhan: lun: bam khyo thug' ye" lo" ko" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re naonhaung" alhab' mo, ngore to: co' mung: tao" phao: byaug genae"- pe"mung: ga"re Jham: Mugsug' mae Mao" So wa yao zaung" yaug re se' mung: yao jham wa byo: sin" lo" byaug: li" genae"- ga: tung" to" ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo daui: to" li" thao re naonhaung" qhid' au: mae Galile khyo ye" lo" na: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Petru wa- yao: bam alhab' mo, nao re phao: cug' to: co' gengadqere: ngo wa nao re khonhae" re: maphao: cug' to: co' nae"- ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Petru re- ngo nao re ta" ru wa ana" myi yao: qo, shid' kheim: mateim shire nao wa ngore sam lhang ha: pye' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Petru wa- ngo nao we' daga" shid qo: li" ngadqere: nao re ngo maha: pye' nae" ga: je yang: phin" ta" ra" . Mho"zo: gaje alhab' mo, re: ai we' dakhyo: ta" ako" .
Yesu we' mho"zo: qe wa Getseman ga: mhang" ra" jo, qo khyo joe" ye" ako" . Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- ngo akyu" mho' na: au: naonhaung" cemae zaung: jo, lao: ge,- ga: ta" co' ra" .
Amung: yao: wa Petru- Yaku we' Yohan bam re yao: we' daga" jhui" ye" lo" ra" . Yesu wa gyai qi: sho' myid myo: myid laug qug: khai: qhug' ra" .
Alao" yao: wa yao: bam re- Nga" nhag' lam: shid naeqhi" yao: gyai kaug' qhui: ra"- naonhaung" cemae lha" mung: lao" na shige,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa aimae" dajhid' zo: lai: ye: mung:- myid gaung mae yegoe; jo, yang:- Gai: boe" ngad: re wa ai: yo, khyin: lai: lo" shao: ga:-
Aba- Pho" we"- nao wa alhab' re qo" kad' boe" yaug ngad: ra" . Amung: ce: qug: khai: khyag' qhui: ra" keim re ngo mae" yu: pye' byid: la,- ngadqere: ngo o: ra" khyo" mangad:- nao o: ra" khyo" ngad vashao: ga: akyu" mho' ra" .
Yao: dam: tug' lo: re yao: bam yab: myhid' jo; rure lomyao lao"- Yesu wa Petru re- Simon we"- nao yab: myhid' jo; i? Nao wa yo, qug dalam: khalhao" maqo" lhaug' na i?
Naonhaung" wa ju" phyo' ru khyo magyo" lo" nae" qhid' mae" lha" mung: akyu" mho' na ge,- byo wa nug kao bau ngadqere: gaung sho: wa qam: nang" ra" .
Alao" yao: dam: ye: mung: azhao: mae" dao: we' dakhyo: akyu" dam: mho' ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: dam: tug' lo: re- yao: bam wa myo, qid gyai la: geyang: yab: myhid' jo; rure lodam: myao: ra" . Ailao" yao: bam wa Yesu re khoru: dam: phaug' tau: nae" maba logengad: ra" .
Yesu wa sam lhang ein: lhang dam: tug' lo lao"- yao: bam re naonhaung" ana" joe" sho' yab: myhid' mung: no" na genhaung i? Ga" va"- Yo, khyin: joe" va"- Qu" ge,- Byu Yao: Zo: wa qobo jab qenho: lo, khyo ab: pye' ru qhug' ava" .
To" ge,- ngonhaung" ye" lo" gelang: se,- Qu" ge,- ngore ab byid' pye' yaug wa joe" li" na: ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu airu: jhau: na shi" au:- daxe: shid' yaug mae bobo ra" Yuda wa khinjaung qi: qe- Tung" Pho" qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qeyang nhao: ke' ra" shae tam"- thaung kang ci: ra" byuphung: we' daga" joe" li" ra" .
Yesu re ab byid' pye' yaug wa- ngo bobaug baug: ra" yaug wa naonhaung" o: ra" yaug ngad: ra"- yao: re taung" yu mung: nyang" za: zaung" yang: jhui" lo" ge,- ga: yao: bam re ave, byid' to" ra" .
Amung: Yuda wa joe" li" we' Yesu jhao" te' ye" lo" mung:- Mho" Pho" we"- ga: ta" mung: bobaug yebaug: ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa Yesu re taung: mung: tang za: zaui" zag: ci: ako" .
Ai: ayae mae ye; jo; ra" mo, mae" dayaug wa yao" shae pyang: she: yu yang: Khinjaung Yin" nho: jeim pho" dayaug: nokhye' qam" phyid' khyo" pye' byid' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Damya, re taung" ruru: ngore taung: nae" qhid' mae" shae we' thaung kang we' li" ko" i?
Ngo wa ba khao: ngo" Caung: pa" Yham mae mho" shid' mung: naonhaung" we' daga" na ngad yang: re: naonhaung" ngore mataung: ko" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Jham: Mugsug' wa jab byang" lo ca"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" mho"zo: qe alhab' mo, wa Yesu re to: co' mung: tao" phao: lo" byaug: ako" .
Jid: mo" pin: dau za: yang" ci: ra" zolau: dayaug wa Yesu thao cao" ye" lo" ra" . Yao: bam yao: re taung: nae" seim" gelao"-
Yao: wa jid: mo" pin: dau re to: co' mung: gaung pyad' tao" phao: lo" ra" .
Ai: thao yao: bam wa Yesu re Khinjaung Yin" yham khyo jhui" ye" ako" . Khinjaung qi: qe alhab' mo, we' Tung" Pho" qe alhab' wa ai: mae zang" ham: na: bam: ako" .
Petru wa Khinjaung Yin" nho: yham vang" khug khyo joe" sho'- va: va: mae" Yesu thao cao" ye" ra" . Yao: wa khinjaung yin" qe: gug: gam qe we' daga" zaung: jo, mung: myikhyeim" mae myi: bogao: na: ra" .
Khinjaung yin" qe we' Yuda Tarha" qe, do, geim" mae" lau: de, qe alhab' wa Yesu re qo" se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" sagse: qho gengad yang: re: yao: bam mathe' qho ko" ngad: ra" .
Sagse: myo: sho' mo, wa Yesu re gye kad' yang: mhug' ta" ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam: dao: majho" zhaung: ngad: ako" .
Ailao" byu damyo" to" ye; li" mung: yao" khyo re sagse: mhug' kham mung:-
Ceyaug wa byu: lo; yang kad' to" ra" ce: Caung: pa" Yham re phyo' pye' mung: sam ba kyo lao" byu: lo; yang makad' ra" Caung: pa" Yham re ngo kad' nae"- ga: yao: ta" rure ngonhaung" the' gyo: va"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam: sagse: dao: jham re: majho" zhaung: gengad: ra" .
Ailao" Khinjaung Yin" wa mo, phaung gaung: mae" to" li" mung:- Yesu re nao dakheim: re: matau: i? Ni" khyo re yao: bam sagse: kham: na ko" ru wa khoru: i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa dakheim: re: matau: lo: sae za: na: ra" . Alao" Khinjaung Yin" wa Yesu re nao wa ngaui lho" ra" Mao" So: yao: zo: Meshia ngad: i? ga: dam: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa Ngo ngad:- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa phung qam: so' nho: lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo; ru we' mug: gaung: jham thaui: we' daga" li" na: rure the' myao: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Khinjaung Yin" wa yao" adao: bau: qhang lao" cad' pye' mung:- ngonhaung" pe" sagse: qo lo" i?
Yao: Mao" So re jung" gaui: rure naonhaung" the' gyo: vako" ra" . Naonhaung" khoru: myid ko" i? ga: ta" ra" . Yao: bam alhab' wa Yesu re qobo qo" mung: se' pye' qhug' ang: ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Damyo" wa Yesu re khata: phoe" sheim: byid' ako" . Yao" myo,khung: re thab' pye' byid: yang: zhab' thaung: mung: Nao re khag' zhab' thaung" rure tag: qu" wa,- ga: ta" ako" . Khinjaung yin" nho: gug: gam qere: yao: re pyo' ako" .
Petru wa ai: vang" khug mae na: jo; au:- Khinjaung Yin" nho: okaung myiqe: nau" dayaug li" mung:-
Petru myi: gao: na: rure myao lao"- yao: re zhaug' qu" mung: Nao re:- Nazared mae" Yesu we' daga" lhaung" na: ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Petru wa aire ha: pye' mung:- Nao ta" ru ngo maba- Gyo: re: maba: gyo:- ga: ta" ra" . Amung: yao: wa vang" kham: nhad' khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Ai: okaung myiqe: nau" yao: re dam: myao lao"- ayae mae ye; jo; ra" mo, re- Ceyaug re: yao: bam: phung: mae" dayaug ngad: ra"- ga: dam: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Petru wa aire dam: ha: pye' ra" . Ailao" ai: thao dazab gai re- ai: ayae mae ye; jo; ra" mo, wa Petru re- Gaigai: yao: nao wa yao: bam: phung: mae" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re nao wa Galile byu ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ailao" Petru wa nhang: myan" nhang: thoe we' Naonhaung" ta" ra" byu ceyaug re ngo maba- ga: jham tang: yang: ta" ra" .
Ailao" jao" qo, shid' kheim: ein: kheim: teim: ra" . Petru wa Yesu yao: re Qo, shid' kheim: mateim shire nao ngore sam lhang ha: pye' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" dao: re dam: myid: beim" li" mung: ngug: ra" .
Ne, seim no' mae" khinjaung qi: qe wa lau: de, qe- Tung" Pho" qe- Yuda tarha" qe, do, geim" we' hin hin za: byin phyo: jho" qham: ako" . Ai: thao Yesu re taui: mung: Pilad re yeshe: ab byid' ako" .
Pilad wa Yesu re Nao wa Yuda kho: kham ngad: i? ga: myid' ra" . Ailao" Yesu wa yao: re- Aiwa nao ta" ru ngad: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Khinjaung qi: qe wa Yesu re qobo myo: sho' ja: zhaug' ako" .
Aimung: Pilad wa Yesu re- Nao pe" re: maphaug' tau: i? Yao: bam nao re khonho" gye kad' qobo zhaug' na: rure qu" wa,- ga: dam: myid' ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa pe" dakheim: re: maphaug' tau: ngad: ra"- aimung: Pilad wa mug' ra" .
Pilad wa Lai co' Poe khao: ngo" mae- mo,byu qe mho' ra" kyam: byu dayaug yaug re yao: bam: qhid' mae" lhaung" nhao: ke' byid' ra" .
Ai: gyo: mae geim lau to" rumae byu se' mung: thaung: khug mae taung" lhaung" to" ra" geim lau qe: phaung mae Baraba ga: mang: ra" byu dayaug bo: ra" .
Mo, byu qe wa li" mung: Pilad re- yao: khonhae" re: lhaung" kad' byid' ru we' dakhyo: kad' byid: nae" qhid' mae" mho' ako" .
Ailao" Pilad wa yao: bam re- Ngo wa Yuda kho: kham re nhao: ke' byid: nae" naonhaung" o ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re khinjaung qi: qe wa Yesu re myid nug: mung: yao" lo, mae li" ab byid' to: ko" rure yao: ba yang: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: khinjaung qi: qe wa mo,byu qere Yesu atha" Baraba re nhao: ke' byid: nae" Pilad re mho' nae" qhid' mae" poe: to" ako" .
Pilad wa yao: bam re- Airulao"- Yuda kho: kham ga: naonhaung" yang mhang" ra" yaug re ngo khoru: kad' nae" i? ga: dam: myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa- yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' wa,- ga: dam: zag: hug' ako" .
Pilad wa yao: bam re- Pe"mung: i? Yao: pe" ja" qobo shad' lhoe" va" ra" i? ga: ta" ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam alhab' mo, wa- yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' wa,- ga: je: zag: hug' ako" .
Ailao" Pilad wa mo, byu qere nhag' dag nhao nug yang: Baraba re nhao: ke' byid' ra" . Yesu re wa be, mung: pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" ab byid' ke' ra" .
Gyezo: jham wa Yesu re Pretori ga: mhang" ra" mung" zug: pho" yham mo" vang" khug khyo jhui" vao lo" mung:- gyetab geim" re khai: zhang" to" ako" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re bau: qhang amo, vhe' byid: mung: zau: kyao: yang nag: to" ra" maug re yao" au: mae zhaung: byid' ako" .
Amung: yao: bam wa Yuda qenho: kho: kham we"- Kao qhang so' qhang vashao: wo"- ga: jung" nyhe' dao: we' phug' myao: byid' ako" .
Alao" yao: bam wa thao: khyaung" yang Yesu au: re be, mung: khata: phoe" sheim: byid' ru we' pad' thaug' thaug' yang: yao: re goe; pa" ako" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re nug: khyo: bin: jung" pye' lao"- bau: qhang amo, re khyad' pye' byid: mung: yao" mai bau: re dam: vhe' byid' ako" . Amung: yao: bam wa yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" jhui" thug' lo" ko" ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa seyo: vogaung: mae" li" mung: su" lai: lo" na: ra" Simon ga: mang: ra" yaug re Yesu nho: pyao: zang re vo, byid: nae" lham: deim" zag: nhao: ako" . ( Simon wa Kureni mang: byu ngad mung: Alexanda we' Rufu tao: yao: pho" ngad: ra" . )
Yao: bam wa Yesu re Golgotha ga: mhang" ra" jo, qo khyo jhui" ye" ako" . ( Golgotha ga" ru wa- au: gao: gye, jo, qo ga" ru ngad: ra" . )
Yao: bam wa Mura we' lhag' to" ra" sabyi qang: Yesu re byid: jhaug' ako" . Ngadqere: Yesu mashaug' ngad: ra" .
Amung: yao: bam wa Yesu re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' ako" . Yao" mai bau: jham re wa gae bam khyo" to: mung: khoyaug khobam yu ang: rure pha" be, yang: jho" gae: yu: ako" .
Yesu re pyao: zang mae jin" pye' ra" ayo, wa- ne, kao gug yo, qug: mae ngad: ra" .
Pyao: zang dao mae Yuda qe: kho: kham- ga: yao: re qobo zhaug' ra" khyo" tung" te' to" ako" .
Amung: yao: bam wa yao: we' daga" damya, shid' zo: rere: yao" lo, yo shad' mae dayaug- yao" lo, kaung: shad' mae dayaug pyao: zang mae jin" te' to" ako" .
Jham: mugsug' mae Yao: wa tarha" macao" ra" mo; japhin: mae boke' ru qhug' ra"- ga" ra" jham: dao: wa ceru: jab byang" lo: ra" .
Khyo mae su" lai: lo" mo, re: Yesu re jung" ru we' au: nghoe" nghoe" mung:- No"- Caung: pa" Yham re phyo' pye' mung: sam ba gyo: mae dam: kad' nae" ga: yaug we"-
Ni" gaung re naoyao: khyad' yu mung: pyao: zang mae" gyo" lo wa, mhao"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo: khinjaung qi: qe we' Tung" Pho" qere: Yesu re jung" mung: su gaje qere yao: khyad' yu: ra"- ngadqere: yao" gaung re wa yao: maqo" khyad' yu ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" the' myao mung: lam" nae" qhid' mae" Israel kho: kham Meshia wa ai: pyao: zang mae" gyo" lo vashao:- ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" . Yao: we' daga" pyao: zang mae bojin" te' to" ra" damya, shid' zo: re: yao: re jung" pye' ako" .
Amung: ba khaung tau yo, mae" myi" thao sam yo, qug joe" sho' damung" geim" no, sang: kyid mug: cad' byaug: ra" .
Myi" thao sam yo, qug mae Yesu wa thoe qi: we' Eloi- Eloi- Lema sabagthani?- ga: hug' ta" ra" . Aiwa Nga" Mao" So- Nga" Mao" So- Pe"mung: nao ngore shapye' ra" i? ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Amung: ai: nhae mae ye: jo; ra" mo, damyo" aire the' gyo: gelao"- Qu" ge,- yao: wa Elia re khai: na: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Byu dayaug wa tao" ye" lo" mung:- qid mug sad' mae sabyi jhin qang: dag sho' tag' yu mung: gyang: yao: au: mae thug' ze; te' ci yang:- Yesu re byid: jhaug' zo" re" Elia yao: re li" khyo" yu nae" la,- mali" khyo" yu nae" la,- ngonhaung" qu" na gelang:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa thoe qi: zang hug' mung: kao gyo" lo" ra" .
Ailao" Caung: pa" Yham mae" qe, kyo pin: lung: wa aau: mae" aqao: joe" sho' shid' gao go; lo" byaug: ra" .
Yesu airu: kao gyo" lo" rure yao" qhid' kheim: mae ye; jo; ra" gyezo: dayo re eib: ra" gyezug: pho" myao lao"- ceyaug wa gaigai: yao: Mao" So: yao: zo: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Myiqe: qe damyo" wa va: mae" qu" na: bam: ako" . Aibam: phaung mae- yao: Galile mung" mae na shi" au:- yao" thao cao" mung: yao: re caung da" byid' ra" Magadala Mari- Yaku ngai we' Yoseb tao: yao: myhi" Mari we' Salome bam bobo: ako" .
Alao" Yerusalem khyo yao: we' daga" do, lo: ra" gatau myiqe: myo: sho' mo, re: bobo: ako" .
Myi" thao mug: cad' lo" na: au: Arimathe vobyu Yoseb joe" li" ra" . Yao: wa Yuda tarha" qe, do, mae bobo yaug ngad: ru we' phug' myao: tho' ra" byu dayaug ngad: ra" . Mao" So: Mung"dan: joe" li" nae" rure lao" na: ra" yaug re: ngad: ra" .
Ai: ba wa ( Dugno: Ba qhid' mae" ba ) Seim" Jin" ra" Ba na ngad: ruyang Yoseb wa magyaug mavae Pilad jhao" vao ye: mung: Yesu mao gaung re yemho' yu: ra" .
Ailao" Pilad wa Yesu kao gyo" va" rure the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa gyezug: pho" re khai: yu yang: Yesu kao gyo" ru khomyhao" ngad va" rure myid' ra" .
Pilad wa gyezug: pho" ta" kyo" rure the' gyo: lao" Yoseb re yao" mao gaung yu: yu nae" akhang" byid' ke' ra" .
Ailao" Yoseb wa jid: mo" pin: dau vai: yu mung: Yesu mao gaung re yekhyo" yu yang: jid: mo" pin: dau: yang bin: thab' lao"- laug thin mae kyaung" to" ra" laug khyaung lab khug mae ye: vhao" to: mung: laug zang qi: dazang: yang lab kham: re lhang" jhid' to" ako" .
Yesu re nyhab' to" ra" jo, qo re Magadala Mari we' Yoseb: yao: myhi" Mari shid' zo: myao: ako"- .
Dugno: Ba lai lao"- Magadala Mari- Yaku yao: myhi" Mari we' Salome bam wa Yesu mao gaung re gyad byid: nae" qhid' mae" sheim nae pyo" ra" xau vai: yu: ako" .
Yao: bam wa Laban ba ne, seim no' ba thug' so' re lab khyo ye" ako" .
Yao: bam wa ngonhaung" re lab khyaung nhad' mae" laug zang khag' yang tau: lhang" khyo" pye' byid: nae" laug i? ga: khyole; mae yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Yao: bam yequ" ke' ko" re laug zang wa tau: lhang" pye' to: va" rure myao: ako" . Ai: laug zang wa gyai qi" ra" .
Yao: bam lab khyaung khug khyo vao ye: we' mai bau: phyu ve; ra" zolau: dayaug lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo; rure yemyao mung: yao: bam din: mug' byaug: ako" .
Alao" yao: wa yao: bam re- Dadin: mug' ge,- naonhaung" wa pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' ra" Nazared mae" Yesu re qho: na: ako" . Yao: wa daui: to" lo" byaug va"- yao: Cemae mana lo:- yao: re lhang" to" ra" cejo,qo re qu" ge,-
Ngadqere: naonhaung" lo" mung: Petru we' mho"zo: qere- yao: wa Galile mung" khyo naonhaung" qhid' au: mae ye" lo" na: ga"- yao: naonhaung" re ta" to: va" ru we' dakhyo:- aimae naonhaung" yao: re yemyao: li" genae" ga" ein:- lo" ta" kyo: ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa lab khyaung mae" thug' lo mung: tao" phao: lo" ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa din: nin" ru we' mug' hao" byaug: ako" . Yao: bam gyaug geyang: khag' rere: pe" mata" kyo: ko" ngad: ra" .
[ Myiqe: qe wa- Petru we' yao" byin cao: qejhao" ye: mung:- yao: bam re ta" ra" dao: jham alhab' re lang" ra" khyo" yao: bam re yeta" kyo" ako" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere apyad ato khyad' yu: ra" gyang" lho" ru we' khonhae" re: daui: na: ra" lau dao: re ba thug' shad' mae" ba vao shad' jao: sho' yekho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' ra" . ]
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa Yesu daui: na: ga" rure we' Mari wa Yesu re myao va" ga" rure the' gyo: gengad yang: re: aire malam" ko" ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa seyo: vogaung: khyo su" ye" lo" na ko" ra" mho"zo: shid' yaug re gatau ve, bao khyo" yang yao" gaung na: qhu" ra" .
Ailao" yao: shid' zo: wa dam: tug' phao: lo mung: dang: ra" gatau: mho" zo" qere ai: khyo lota" kyo" ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa aire malam" gengad: ra" .
Amung: ai: thao re Yesu wa mho"zo: daxe: dayaug za: zozo" na ko" au:- yao" gaung na: qhu" ra" . Yesu wa yao: bam re yao: shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" thao yao: re the' myao va" mo; dao: re mho"zo: qe malam" ko" ruyang yao: bam: lam khug: myid mabo: ru we' nhag' lam: qao: rure qeim: ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" mug: myid geim" jao: sho' ye" lo" mung: byumyu" cao jab alhab' re ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: yekho" kyo: ge,-
Lam" mung: qid nyhab' kham: yu: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae . Alao" malam" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: dao: phyid' ru qhug' nae" .
Lam" ra" mo, wa- nga" mang khyo" yang yui jham re qo" khe' thug' pye' li" genae" . Amung: gakai: lai mung: ra" dao: jham re qo" jhau: li" genae" .
Yao: bam wa- lhao maui jham re taung" zaui: gengadqere:- shid ja: daug daja: ja: shaug' gengadqere: pe" maca" genae" . Amung: no phyo: qhug' ra" mo; dao mae yao: bam: lo, kai: byid: lao"- no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, gai: shao: lo" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Asang Yesu wa airu: mho"zo: qere bin: ta" lao"- yao: wa mug: gaung khyo to' yu: ru qhug' mung:- Mao" So: lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo; ra" .
Ailao" mho"zo: qe wa thug' ye" lo" mung: jo, qo khyi" khao: ngo" mae cao" kho" kyo" ako" . Asang wa yao: bam we' daga" mau" zaui" qin" mung: mug' pho: ve, lho bobo byid' ra" khyo" yang ai: mungdao: re nyhad' tang byid' ra" . ]
Phug' myao" ra" Theophilu we"- Sao qhid' maqhid mae" yao: bam yao" myo,jid' yang yao: zhaug' the' myao mo, we' ai: mungdao: re kho" kyo" ra" mo; yang-
Ngonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae boe" lai: lo: ra" khyo jham re ngonhaung" re ta" zhao: kyo: vako" ru we' dakhyo:- mhomyi: tung" to: mo, myo: sho' na: ako" .
Airumung: ngore: boe" li" ra" khyo alhab' re athai: atho' bin: myid' zhao: yu mung:-
Nao mho" zhao: yu va" ra" khyo wa gaigai: yao: dang: ra" khyo ngad: rure nao ba vashao:- adai: ato' jo jo za: ni" qhid' mae" tung" vhin: ke' re gai nae"- ein: ngo qo" myid: ra" .
Yuda kho: kham Herod pyad mae khinjaung Abiya phung: mae bobo: ra" Zakari ga: mang: ra" khinjaung dayaug na: ra" . Yao" yham sang myhi" wa Elizabed ga: mang yaug ngad: ra"- Elizabed re: khinjaung Arun" kaung mae" ngad: ra" .
Yao: shid' tao wa Mao" So: amyin" dao: alhab' re mashad' manghung: phug' cao" na: rutao ngad mung:- Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae yao: shid' tao geim" dan: man" ra" byu tao ngad: ako" .
Ngadqere: Elizabed wa bug daung: ngad yang: yao: shid' tao wa zo: dau maqo" ko" ngad: ra"- yao: shid' tao geim" re: mao" avako" .
Daba mae Zakari wa yao: bam: phung: ayab ang mung:- Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae khinjaung mau" kad' na: au:-
Mao" So: qhid' kheim: khyo vao ye: mung: phan dao mae nae pyo" ra" sheim phad' ngaui" byid: nae" qhid' mae" khinjaung qe: thung" jo; ru we' dakhyo:- pha" be, yang: khyin: yu: rumae yao: ang: ra" .
Ai: nae pyo" ra" sheim phad' ngaui" na: ra" yo, khyin: gyo: mae mo, byu qe wa taung gaung shad' mae akyu" mho' yang: na: ako" .
Alao" Asang: mug: lagyo: dayaug wa nae pyo" ra" sheim phad' nghaui" ra" phan lo, yo shad' mae Zakari re li" ye; qhu" ra" .
Zakari wa ai: mug: lagyo: re the' myao lao"- gyaug: din: pye' ra" .
Ngadqere: mug: lagyo: wa Zakari we"- Dagyaug wa,- Mao" So wa ni" akyu" mho' thoe re tae" gyo: byid' ava" . Ni" yham sang myhi" Elizabed wa ni" qhid' mae" yauggai nau" dayaug khau: li" nae" ngad:- nao wa yao" mang re Yohan- ga: mhang" byid: zai ngad: ra" .
Nao wa ngaui bau: ngaui lho" ru qhug' nae"- yao: khau: li" ruyang byu myo: sho' mo, ngaui bau: genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae qi" qhang yaug ngad nae"- yao: wa sabyi qang: we' yhid phai: shaug' nae" mangad:- yao: wa yao: myhi" aung mae" yao: Gyang" Lho" Byo we' byang" jo; li" nae" .
Yao: wa Israel byumyu" myo: sho' re yao: bam: Asang Mao" So jhao" dam: jhui" tug' lo: li" nae" .
Yao: wa lapa Elia we' dakhyo: qam: so' we' Asang Meshia qhid' au: mae ye" lo" na: li" nae"- yao: wa yao: pho" qe we' yao: zo: qe: gyo: mae dam: jho" vang" nhao nae"- Mao" So re geimlau gye kad' ra"mo, re din: man" ra" mo; myid pha,jhi" shad' khyo dam: tug' lo nhao nae"- yao: wa Mao" So: qhid' mae" jin" jin" ngad nae" qhid' mae" Asang: byumyu" re seim" nyhang" to" li" nae"- ga: Zakari re ta" ra" .
Ailao" Zakari wa mug: lagyo: re Ceru: boe" nae" rure ngo khoru: ba nae" i? Pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa mao: va"- nga" yham sang myhi" re: mao: zo: ngad va"- ga: ta"ra" .
Mug: lagyo: wa Ngo wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae ye; jo; ra" mug: lagyo: Gabriela ngad:- nao re ce: ngaui bau" lau dao: ta" kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yang nhao: ke' yaug ngad:-
Qu" wa,- ngo ta" ra" dao: re nao malam" ruyang ceru: boe" li" nae" ra"ayo, joe" sho' nao wa dao: maqo" jhau lo: nhad' jid; jo; li" nae"- amung: ayo, joe" lao"- nga" dao: wa dang: lo: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mo,byu qe wa Zakari re lao" na: ako"- yao: bam wa Zakari Mao" So: yham khug mae myao" sho' yena: byaug: rure myid: mug' ako" .
Zakari Mao" So: yham mae" thug' lo lao"- yao: wa yao: bam re dao: maqo" jhau ngad: ra" . Airumung: yao: bam wa Caung: pa" Yham khug mae yao: wa ve, lho daja: ja: the' myao va" rure yao: bam ba: qu" yu: ako" . Yao: wa dao: dakheim: re: maqo" jhau yang: yao: bam re lo, tu" tu" qhu" ra" .
Caung: pa" Yham khug mae yao: zaui: ang: ra" ayo, gan lao"- Zakari wa yham khyo phao: lo" ra" .
Ai: thao mataung" myao" re Elizabed wa gaung la" li" mung: lho" mo" ngo" khye' lam: lam: khai: mathug' qin" lo: laung" jo; ra" .
Elizabed wa Ana"- Mao" So wa ngore nhag' khyag' yu va"- Su: yang ngore gaui mho jung" khyoe' ta" rure- yao: yu: pye' byid: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Elizabed gaung la" li" ru lho" khyaug' khye' joe" li" lao"- Mao" So wa mug: lagyo: Gabriela re Galile mung" mae" Nazared vogaung: mae na: ra"
Davi kaung mae" Yoseb ga: mang: ra" yaug: yang mho' to" ra" zomyi: gyang" dayaug jhao" nhao: ke' ra"- ai: zomyi: gyang" wa Mari ga: mang yaug ngad: ra" .
Mug: lagyo: wa Mari jhao" li" mung: Ngaui bau: yaug yo vashao:- nao wa ngaui lho" ra"- Mao" So wa nao we' daga" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mari wa ai: mug: lagyo: li" ta" ra" dao: thoe: yang gyai myid: mug' sang: kho: mung:- ce: bang" se" dao: wa pe" ga" ru ngad nae" laug i? ga: myid: qu" na: ra" .
Ailao"- ai: mug: lagyo: wa Mari re Mari we"- dagyaug wa,- nao wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae myo,nho qo" ava" .
Nao wa gaung la" li" mung: yauggai nau" dayaug khau: li" nae"- nao wa yao: re Yesu ein: mhang" byid: zai ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa qi" qhang yaug ngad: li" nae"- yao: wa myhao: thao" ra" Mao" So: yao: Zo: ga: mhang" ru qhug' li" nae"- Asang Mao" So wa yao: pho" Davi nho: kho: kham tao" khau" yao: re ab byid' li" nae",
Yao: wa Yaku myid: zo: qere apyad ato eib: na: li" nae"- yao" mung"dan: wa khonhae" re: mathao" magan nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- Mari wa mug: lagyo: re Ceru wa khoru: gai: boe" li" zai ngad: laug i? Ngo wa yauggai we' mana: qu" shi" ra" zomyi: gyang" dayaug ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Mug: lagyo: wa Gyang" Lho" Byo wa ni" dao mae joe" li" mung:- myhao: thao" ra" Mao" So: qam: so' wa nao re nghoe' qab: to: byid: nae"- Airumung: khau: li" nae" ra" yaug re Mao" So: yao: Zo:- ga: mhang" li" genae" .
Amung: Qu" wa,- ni" amyu" ba nam myhi" Elizabed re: mao: thao re yauggai nau" khau nae" gaung la: va" ra"- Su: yang bug daung:- ga: mhang" ra" yaug wa gaung la" li" mung: ana"- lho" khyaug' khye' ngad: ava" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So maqo" kad' ru pe" re: majo,- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- Mari wa Ngo wa Asang: jeim myhi" ngad:- nao ta" ru we' dakhyo: ngo mae boe" li" vashao:- ga: tau" ra" . Alao" mug: lagyo: wa yao: mae" phao: lo" ra" .
Ai: thao mataung" myao" re Mari wa Yuda mung" mae" bam vogaung: dalam: khyo hin hin za: to" ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: wa Zakari yham khyo vao ye: mung: Elizabed re bang" yese" ra" .
Mari bang" li" se" ra" dao: re Elizabed the' gyo: lao"- yao" aung khug mae" zonau" wa thug' jhu" li" ra" .
Elizabed wa Gyang" Lho" Byo we' byang" jo, mung: thoe qi: we' Nao wa myiqe: alhab' mo, tho' mae ngaui lho" ra"- ni" aung mae" zoshao re: ngaui lho" ra" wo" .
Nga" Asang: yao: myhi" ngojhao" joe" li" ru wa pe" jeju khyo" yang qo" kham: yu li" laug i?
Pe"mung: ga"re Qu" wa,- ni" bang" se" dao: re ngo the' gyo: we' nga" aung mae" zonau" wa ngaui bau: mung:- thug' jhu" li" ra" .
Asang yao: re ta" ra" dao: wa gaigai: jab byang" li" zai ngad:- ga: lam" ra" myiqe: wa ngaui lho" ra" wo"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- Mari wa- Nga" aung khug nhag' lam: ai: Asang re caung: khin" byid' ra" .
Nga" alo zo: re: ngore khyad' yu: ra" Asang Mao" So: khug mae ngaui bau" ra" .
Asang wa nyham: gyo" jo; ra" yao" jeim myhi" re qu" myao: ava"- qu" ge,- Ana" mae" byu qae: khao: ngo" mae" mo, wa ngore ngaui lho" ra" yaug ga: mhang" genaeva" .
Pe"mung: ga"re qam: so' bo: ra" Asang wa qi" qhang: ra" mau" zo" nga" qhid' mae" kad' byid: mung: ngad: ra" . Asang yao" mang wa gyang" lho" ra" .
Asang yao: re gyaug phug' ra" mo; dao mae myid: zo: daqae: mae" daqae: yao" nhag' khyag' ru qhu" byid' na: ra" .
Yao" qam: bo: ra" lo,pau" re yheim" ke' mung: langa: kad' phug mo; nhag' lam: khug mae myid: yaung: to" ra" mau" zo" jham re abyi asin: kad' pye' byid' ra" .
Yao: wa zug: kho: kham qe: aya: khyo" pye' byid: mung: ngai nyham: ra" mo, re tau: to' byid' ra" .
Moe, shab' ra" mo, re gai: ra" ja" yang nhag' shid nhag' dag nhao mung:- jo,nho" qo" mo, re lo, cin nhao: ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" phug' phyid' qere yao: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo:- Abraham we' yao" myid: zo: qere-
Khonhae" re: yao" nhag' khyag' shogu: ru myid: beim: mung:- yao: wa yao" daui daui yaug Israel amyu" re bao" thaug' byid' ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mari wa Elizabed we' daga" lho" mo" sam khye' ko na co' mung: yham khyo dam: phao: lo" ra" .
Alao" Elizabed wa khau nae" ba na nge, mung:- yauggai nau" dayaug khau: ra" .
Ai: Asang wa Elizabed re mug' pho: jeju kad' qhu" va"- ga" rure yao" yham kyo: cao: qe we' ba nam sang: cao: qe the' gyo: gelao" yao: bam wa yao: we' daga" ngaui bau" ako" .
Ai: thao she' ba ein: ba re yao: bam wa zonau" au: qid lhai: poe khyo li" ako" . Yao: bam wa ai: zonau" re yao: pho" mang ru: yao: Zakari- ga: mhang" byid: nug: ako" .
Ngadqere: ai: zonau" yao: myhi" wa airu: mamhang" nae"- Yohan ein: mhang" zai ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Elizabed re Ni"amyu" kaung mae Yohan ga: mang ru dayaug re: mabo- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Alao"- yao: bam wa yao: pho" khoru: mhang" byid: nug: laug- ga: zonau" yao: pho" re lo, tu" tu" yang: myid' qu" ako" .
Zakari wa tung" the: dalam: mho' yu mung:- zonau" mang wa Yohan ngad:- ga: tung" qhu" ra" . Yao: bam alhab' mo, mug' hao" byaug: ako" .
Ailao" jao" Zakari wa dao: dam: gai: jhau: li" mung: Mao" So re caung: khin" ra" .
Yham kyo: cao: qe alhab' mo, wa gyaug: mug' pye' ako"- Airu: boe" ra" lau dao: re Yuda mung" mae" bam mug: khaung: jao: sho' hau" nhao" lo" ako" .
Ai: khyo re the' gyo" ra" mo, alhab' wa- airu re yao: bam: nhag' lam: khug mae xam" to: mung:- ce: zoshao wa khoru" ra" yaug boe" nae" ngad: i? ga: ta" ako" . Ai: Asang: qam: so' wa yao: we' daga" ngad: ra" .
Alao" Yohan yao: pho" Zakari wa- Gyang" Lho" Byo byang" mung: lapa dao: ta" ru wa
Ai: Asang Israel nho: Mao" So wa ngaui lho" vashao: wo"- Yao: wa yao" amyu" qejhao" li" mung:- yao: bam re loe; beim nhao: ava" .
Yao: wa yao" daui daui yaug Davi amyu" mae" qam: so' qi" qhang: ra" khyad' yu: Asang ngonhaung" re byid' ava" .
Amung: yao: wa ganhae" mae" yao" gyang" lho" ra" lapa qe: nhad' khyo" yang-
ngonhaung" re gye jham: lo, mae" re:- ngonhaung" re nhang" ra" alhab' mo; lo, mae" re:- yao: ngonhaung" re khyad' yu nae"- ga: dao: so: byid' to" ra" .
Yao: wa ngonhaung" phug' pho" qere nhag' khyag' shogu: ru qhu" byid: mung: yao" gyang" lho" ra" dao: thang" re myid: beim: nae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae ngonhaung" pyad geim" gyang" lho" ru we' din: man: mo, boe" nae" qhid' mae"-
Ngonhaung" re gye jham: lo, mae" khyad' yu mung:- yao: re magyaug maci" lo: caung da" byid: nhao nae"- ga: ngonhaung" phug' pho" Abraham re jham tang: yang: ta" to" ra" .
Nga" zo: we"- nao wa myhao: thao" ra" Mao" So: lapa- ga: mhang" ru qhug' nae"- Nao wa Mao" So: khyodang re nyhang" to: nae"- Asang: qhid' au: mae ye" lo" mung:-
Asang: byumyu" re yao: bam: qobo re khyad' pye' byid: mung: khyad' yu nae"- ga" rure ta" kyo" li" nae" .
Ngonhaung" Asang Mao" So wa nhag' khyag' shogu: ru byang" jo, yaug ngad: ra"- Yao: wa khyad' yu: ra" jeju ba bao re ngonhaung" dao mae zho nhao mung:-
Shid: ra" aqab khug mae na: jo; ra" mo; dao mae zho: bao byid' li" nae"- Amung: ngonhaung" khyid re yaug yo cae: tae" ra" khyodang khyo jhui" gun: su" ye" li" nae" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Ai: zoshao wa gaung khyao qi" qhang: li" ru we' byo qam: so' bo: li" mung: Israel amyu" qhid' kheim: mae de: de: za: mana: qhu" shire yao: wa din"pyad' yo mae na: ra" .
Ai: ayo, mae- Roma khosin" Augustu wa mung"dan: geim" mae" gaegaung: japhin: re gaug: yu nae" qhid' mae" amyin" dalam: khyo" ke' ra" .
Ai: gaegaung: japhin: gaug: yu: ru wa Suri mung" mae Kureni mang: zug: kad' na: au: sao qhid' lhang gaug: yu: ra" japhin: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: byu yaug khao: ngo" wa mang japhin: ke' nae" qhid' mae" yao: yao" co' phyid' vogaung: khyo lo: ako" .
Alao" Yoseb re: Davi kaung mae" myid: zo: ngad mung:- Galile mung" Nazared vogaung: mae" Yuda mung" mae" Betlehem- ga: mhang" ra" Davi vogaung: khyo-
yao: vhin" yu nae" mho' to" ra" Mari we' daga" mang japhin: ke' nae" qhid' mae" lo: ra" . Mari kam" wa gaung la: gaung ngad: ra" .
Yao: shid' tao Betlehem mae na: jo, ko" au:- khau ba na nge; li" mung:-
Yao: wa zoqhid' yauggai nau" re khau: ra"- Bang" khug yham mae jo, qo majo, yang: ai: zonau" re mai cug' yang thab' mung:- thaung: lhao: dalam: khug mae lhang" to" ra" .
Ai: mang: khaung: mae yao zaung" mo, damyo" wa myi" re pa: din" mae yao: bam: yao kyaung" jham re lhaug' mung: na: jo; ako" .
Asang: mug: lagyo: dayaug wa yao: bam jhao" thug' li" mung: Asang: phungbao wa yao: bam: lhang" gam: mae bao: jo; ra"- Alao" yao: bam wa gyai din: gyaug: pye' ako" .
Mug: lagyo: wa yao: bam re- Dagyaug ge,- Qu" ge,- Byu alhab' mo; qhid' mae" gyai ngaui bau: nae" ra" lau dao: gai ngo naonhaung" jhao" vin: li" ru ngad:-
Ana" ba: ba na mae khyad' yu yaug Asang Khristu wa Davi vogaung: mae naonhaung" qhid' mae" khau: li"va" ra" .
Ceru wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" ave, ngad nae"- zoshao nau" nin" dayaug re mai cug' yang thab' mung: thaung: lhao: khug mae lhang" to" rure naonhaung" yemyao genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: mug: lagyo: nhae mae mug: gaung mae" mo, ajham ataung nyag din taung" thug' li" mung: Mao" So re caung: khin" zo" re"-
Myhao: thao" ra" mug: gaung tho' mae Mao" So wa phungbao qi" qhang: jo, vashao:- Myid gaung dao mae re: yao: o ngaui: ra" mo; dao mae yaug yo cae: tae" ru jo; jo, vashao: wo"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ai: mug: lagyo: jham yao: bam khyi" mae" mug: gaung khyo dam: phao: lo" gethao re yao zaung" mo, wa ngonhaung" wa Betlehem vogaung: khyo ye" lo"gelang:- Asang ngonhaung" re li" ta" kyo" ra" khyo re yequ" qu" gelang:- ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Alao" yao: bam wa hin hin za: ye" lo" mung: Mari we' Yoseb rere: thaung: lhao: khug mae lang" jo; ra" zonau" rere: yemyao: ako" .
Yao zaung" mo, wa ai: zonau" re yemyao gelao"- yao: bam wa ai: zonau" we' sin: mung:- mug: lagyo: pho" yang li" ta" kyo" ra" khyo yao: bam re ta" kyo" ako" .
Yao zaung" mo, ta" rure the' gyo: mo, alhab' wa gyo" mug' ako" .
Ngadqere: Mari wa ai: gu: alhab' re xam" ci mung: yao" aung khug mae myid: qu" na: ra" .
Yao zaung" mo, wa mug: lagyo: ta" ru we' dakhyo:- the' myao: yu ba: yu gemung:- Mao" So: phungbao re caung: khin" zo" re" dam: tug' phao: lo" ko" ra" .
Ai: zonau" wa she' ba byang" mung:- au: qid lhai: yo, joe" lao"- yao: myhi" aung mae mabo shimae" mug: lagyo" yang mhang" byid' ra" mang we' dakhyo:- yao: re Yesu ga: mhang" ako" .
Moshe amyin" dao: re cao" yang: yao: bam: kyang" san: ra" gin khyao kad' nae" ayo, joe" lao"-
Zoqhid' yauggai nau" alhab' re Asang: qhid' mae" jaung: to: ca"- ga: Asang: tarha" mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo:- ai: zoshao re Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae yeqhaug' byid: nae" we'-
Asang: Tarha" mae ta" to" ru we' dakhyo:- phaung" kyug' shid' dau:- mangad: lao"- jid: au shid' dau: re xeim: ngaui" byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mari we' Yoseb wa ai: zoshao re Yerusalem vomo" khyo jhui" ye" ako" .
Ana"- Yerusalem mae Simon ga: mang: ra" byu dayaug na: ra"- yao: wa Mao" So re gyaug phug' ru we' din: man" ra" yaug ngad mung:- Israel amyu" qe khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" myid: lao" na yaug ngad: ra" . Ai: Gyang" Lho" Byo re: yao: we' daga" ngad: ra" .
Amung: yao: wa Mao" So: yang dao: so: byid' to" ra" Meshia re mathe' myao myao wa nao mashid nae"- ga: Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang qhu" byid' ra" ve, lho re myao: to: yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Byo: yang nhug' jhan: byid' ru qhug' mung: Caung: pa" Yham khug khyo vao ye" ra" . Yao: myhi" we' yao: pho" tao wa- kham" to" ra" Tarha" we' dakhyo:- ai: zoshao re au: qid lhai: byid: nae" qhid' mae" Caung: pa" Yham khug khyo jhui" vao li" gelao"-
Simon wa ai: zoshao re yao" lo, khug mae lham: vo; yu yang: Mao" So re caung: khin" zo" re"-
Asang we"- ni" dao: so: jab byang" va" rumung: ana"- ni" jeim pho" ngore yaug yo za: lo" nhao la, se,-
Byumyu" alhab' qhid' kheim: mae nyhang" jaung: to: mung:-
Taung bug qere ni" myid o: ra" khyo" qhu" byid: nae" bo" bao we'-
Ni" amyu" Israel qhid' mae" phungbao ngad: ra" ni" khyad' yu: ra" khyo re nga" myo,jid' yang yao: zhaug' za: the' myao va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: myhi" we' yao: pho" tao wa ai: zoshao: khyo we' sin: mung: Simon ta" ra" dao: jham re the' gyo: gelao" mug' ako" .
Simon wa yao: mho' re shaman" byid: mung: yao: myhi" Mari- re Qu" wa,- ce: zoshao wa Israel amyu" myo: sho' byo; qeim: ru we' myo: sho' mo, khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yang khyin: to" ra" yaug ngad: ra"- Byu myo: sho' mo, yao: re ngag: ha: pye' mung: yao: bam: nhag' lam: khug mae khug' myid: yaung: to" ra" gu: jham myao: thug' li" nae" ra" Mao" So: ve, lho ngad: li" nae" .
Ni" nhag' lam: kheim ce' re shae ceim" yang thug' kyao" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ashe amyu" kaung mae" Penue ga" ra" yaug: yao: zo: Anna- ga: mang: ra" lapa cug' mo" myhi" dayaug na: ra"- yao: wa gyai mao: va" ra" . Zoqae: yo, re yham qo" mung: yao" yham sang pho" we' nhad' zin za: qo" zam" na: ra"- yao" apyad she' xe: byid zin joe" sho' cug' mo" mo" ra" .
Yao: wa Caung: pa" Yham mae" magao: lo:- zo: ve jao" akyu" mho' ru we' myi" re: na" re: Mao" So re caung: pa" yang: na: ra" .
Ai: au: reyao:- Anna wa joe" li" mung: Mao" So re caung: khin" zo" re"- Yerusalem re khyad' yu nae"- ga: myid: lao" na ko" ra" mo, alhab' re ai: zoshao: nho: khyo re ta" kyo" ra" .
Yoseb we' Mari wa ai: Asang Kham" To" Ra" Tarha" we' dakhyo: gin khyao alhab' re bin: kad' gelao"- Galile mae" yao: bam: mug: Nazared vogaung: khyo dam: tug' phao: lo: ako" .
Ai: zoshao wa qi" qhang: li" mung: qam: o: bo: li" ru we' nyan: pha,jhi" bo: li" ra" . Mao" So: shaman" jeju wa yao" dao mae bo: jo; ra" .
Yesu yao: myhi" we' yao: pho" tao wa zin khao: ngo" Yerusalem khyo Lai co' Poe lhaung" ye" ako" .
Yesu daxe: shid' zin byang" lao"- thung" jo; ru we' dakhyo:- yao: mho' wa Yerusalem khyo Lai co' Poe ye" ako" .
Ai: poe bin lao"- Yoseb we' Mari wa yham khyo dam: tug' phao: lo: ako"- ngadqere: zoshao Yesu wa Yerusalem mae thang: na co' ra"- yao: myhi" we' yao: pho" tao wa aire maba ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: tao wa Yesu re vogaung: bao: we' ngad naeva"- ga: myid: jho geyang: daba gyam sho' phao: lo" ako"- Thao re yao: shid' tao wa Yesu re ba nam qe we' byin cao: qe: phaung mae yeqho: ako" .
Yao: tao wa Yesu re mamyao lao"- Yerusalem khyo dam: tug' qho: ye" ako" .
Sam ba ein: ba re yao: tao wa Yesu re Caung: pa" Yham khug mae Yuda amyu" qe: mho" pho" qe: phaung gaung: mae zaung: jo, yang: mho" pho" qe ta" ra" dao: jham re tae" gyo: zo" re"- yao: bam rere: dao: myid: tug' myid: mung: na: jo; rure yao: tao yemyao: ako" .
Yao" dao: re the' gyo: mo, alhab' wa pha,jhi" kung: ra" yao" dao: myid: we' dao: phyid re mug' ako" .
Yao: myhi" we' yao: pho" tao wa yao: re the' myao gelao"- mug' byaug: ako" . Alao" yao: myhi" wa Nga" zo: we"- ni" pho" we' ngotao re nao pe"mung: yang: ceru: kad' i? Ni" pho" we' ngotao wa nao re sang: kho: yang: qho: qin"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: myhi" we' yao: pho" tao re- Naotao ngore pe"mung: qho ko" i? Ngo wa nga" Pho" yham khug mae na ca"- ga" rure naotao maba ko" i? ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: tao wa Yesu ta" ra" dao: re maba: gyo: ko" ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: myhi" yao: pho" tao we' daga" Nazared vogaung: khyo dam: tug' phao: lo mung:- mho dao: gyo: gyo: za: na: ra"- yao: myhi" wa ai: gu: alhab' re yao" aung khug mae xam" ci: ra" .
Amung: Yesu wa gaung khyao qi" qhang: li" ru we' nyan: pha,jhi" bo: li" mung:- byu: qhid' kheim: mae re: Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae re: myo,nho lu: li" ra" .
Roma kho: sin" Tiberiu kho: kham kad' ru daxe: ngo" zin ein: zin re Yuda mung" mae Pontiu Pilad wa- mang: zug:- Galile mung" mae wa Herod- Iturea we' Trakonid mung" mae wa Herod yao: nhaung: Philib- Abilen mung" mae wa Lusania mung" zug: kad' na mung:-
Anna we' Kayapha wa khinjaung yin" kad' na: ako"- ai: yo, re Mao" So: mungdao: wa din"pyad' yo mae na: ra" Zakari yao: zo: Yohan jhao" joe" li" ra" .
Alao" Yohan wa Yodan gyaung: cao" mae" mug: myid gam: sho' khyo ye: mung:- Nhag' lam: tha" pye' mung: qid nyhab' kham: yu ge,- ailao" Mao" So wa naonhaung" qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid' li" nae"- ga: kho" kyo" ra" .
Airu wa- Asang: khyo re nyhang" to: ge,- Yao" khyo re din: za: nyhang" jhao" ge,-
Lao: khaung: alhab' re bam" pye' mung: bam we' bug gaung alhab' re dau" tae" pye' ca" nae" ngad: ra"- Khyo kaui jham re jhao" pye' mung: abau" akhyad' ra" khyodang jham re nyhang" tae" pye' ca" nae" ngad: ra" .
Alao"- xao su byu qe alhab' Mao" So khyad' khyui: yu: ra" khyo re the' myao: li" genae"- ga: din"pyad' yo mae dayaug hug' na: ra"- ga: lapa Esaia Mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Amung: Yohan wa yao" lo, mae qid nyhab' kham: yu nae" ga:- joe" li" ra" mo,byu qere- Lhao maui amyu" qe we"- Joe" lo: na: ra" Mao" So nhag' yo" rumae" qo" phao: loe, nae" naonhaung" re khag' yang li" ta" peim: byid: vako" i?
Myid tha" ru we' man: qi" ra" ashi: zaui: ge,- Abraham wa ngonhaung" yao: pho" ngad:- ein: data" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- Mao" So wa ce: laug baui jham mae" Abraham qhid' mae" yao: zo: jham qo" phan" phaug' thug' ke' ra" .
Ana" yao: lhao" re: ai: vozaung: wa sag' gae jham re apan mae" thau: lhang" pye' nae" qhid' mae" jin" jin" ngad: ava"- Airumung: ashi: gai mazaui" ra" sag' gae alhab' re thau: lhang" ke' mung: myikhyeim" khug khyo pye' zaui: pye' ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- mo, byu qe wa- Yohan re Airu: ngad lao" wa ngonhaung" khoru: kad' zai i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yohan wa tau: mung:- Bau: shid' khye' qo" ra" yaug wa maqo" ra" yaug re dakhye' gae byid: vashao:- Zo: ve qo" yaug re: maqo" ra" yaug re gae zho: vashao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Khang: gaug mo, damyo" re: qid nyhab' kham: yu nae"- ga: joe" li" mung: yao: bam wa Yohan re- Mho" pho" we"- ngonhaung" khoru: kad' zai i? ga: myid' ako" .
Ailao"- Yohan wa naonhaung" gaug: yu ang: ra" gau jho tho' je yang: khang: dagaug: yu ge,- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Gyezo: qere: Aire ngonhaung" wa khoru: kad' zai i? ga: myid' ako" . Alao" Yohan wa yao: bam re naonhaung" wa khag' rere: mangad mangung: qobo dazhaug' ge,- Khag' mae" re: dadeim" zag: lhad' zo: ge,- naonhaung" the' ra" lho" khye' okaung phug' we' nhag' shid nhag' dag yang: na ge,- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Mo, byu qe wa myid: lao" na: ru bo gemung: Yohan wa Meshia ngad va" laug- ga: yao: bam: nhag' lam: khug mae myid: qu" na: ako" .
Airumung: Yohan wa yao: bam alhab' re Ngo wa naonhaung" re qid: yang qid nyhab' byid' ra"- ngadqere: nga" tho' qam: so' je: bo yaug wa nga" thao mae joe" li" nae" ngad:- ngo wa yao" khyid zhaung: taui: pheim byid: nae" lhao" maman: qi"- yao: wa Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang re:- myi" yang re: naonhaung" re qid nyhab' byid' li" nae" .
Yao" lo, mae gaug khyo" nae" qhid' mae" gaug khyo" gaung: zhab' ci: ra" . Amung: yao: wa gaug nao: zam jao: mae" gaug bam re vhag' kyang" pye' mung: gaug mo gu: re wa yao" gaug jhi khug mae gag: zhang: ke' to" li" nae"- gaug seim jham re kam" wa matho' se' ra"myikhyeim" mae ngha" pye' li" nae"- ga: ta" kyo" ra" .
Airumung: Yohan wa ta"peim: ta" kyang" ra" dao: gatau myo: sho' we' re: ai: mo, byu qere Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai kho" kyo" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yohan wa Mung" zug: pho" Herod re- yao: nhaung: Philib yham sang myhi" Herodia re vhin" yu: ra" mathao mae we' gatau shad' lhoe" ra" makhyang" ra" mau" zo" jham: mathao mae qeim: ra" .
Ai: thao Herod wa Yohan re thaung: khug mae taung" lhaung" pye' nhao mung: je: xo: ra" qobo re shad' lhoe" ra" .
Mo, byu qe alhab' qid nyhab' bin: kham: yu gelao"- Yesu re: qid nyhab' kham: yu: ra"- yao: akyu" mho' na: au:-
mug: gaung bung" li" mung: Gyang" Lho" Byo wa phaung" kyug' ru: dao" gyo" li" ra" . Amung: mug: gaung mae"- Nao wa ngo jhid' de; ra"- nga" Zo: ngad:- nao re ngo gyai o ngaui: ra"- ga: thoe jhau: thug' li" ra" .
Yesu wa yao" mau" zo" zaui" qhid: ra" au: re yao" apyad wa sam xe zin ko ngad: ava"- Byu jham yao: re Yoseb: yao: zo: ngad: ga: jho: ako" . Yoseb wa Heli yao: zo:- Heli wa Mathad yao: zo:-
Mathad wa Levi yao: zo:- Levi wa Melkhi yao: zo:- Melkhi wa Yannai yao: zo:- Yannai wa Yoseb yao: zo:- Yoseb wa Matathia yao: zo:- Matathia wa Amo yao: zo:- Amo wa Nahum yao: zo:-
Nahum wa Esli yao: zo:- Esli wa Magai yao: zo:-
Magai wa Maad yao: zo:- Maad wa Matathia yao: zo:- Matathia wa Semein yao: zo:- Semein wa Yoseg yao: zo:- Yoseg wa Yuda yao: zo:-
Yuda wa Yohan yao: zo: Yohan wa Rhesa yao: zo:- Rhesa wa Zerubabela yao: zo:- Zerubabela wa Shealtie yao: zo:- Shealtie wa Neri yao: zo:-
Neri wa Melkhi yao: zo:- Melkhi wa Addi yao: zo:- Addi wa Kusam yao: zo:- Kusam wa Elmadam yao: zo:- Elmadam wa Era yao: zo:-
Era wa Yesu yao: zo:- Yesu wa Elieze yao: zo:- Elieze wa Yorim yao: zo:- Yorim wa Mathad yao: zo:- Mathad' wa Levi yao: zo:-
Levi wa Simon yao: zo:- Simon wa Yuda yao: zo:- Yuda wa Yoseb yao: zo:- Yoseb wa Yonam yao: zo:- Yonam wa Eliakim yao: zo:-
Eliakim wa Melea yao: zo:- Melea wa Mena yao: zo:- Mena wa- Matatha yao: zo:- Matatha wa Nathan yao: zo:- Nathan wa Davi yao: zo:-
Davi wa Yese yao: zo:- Yese wa Obed yao: zo:- Obed wa Bua yao: zo:- Bua wa Salmon yao: zo:- Salmon wa Nashon yao: zo:-
Nashon wa Adminadab yao: zo:- Admin wa Arni yao: zo:- Arni wa Hezron yao: zo:- Hezron wa Pere yao: zo:- Pere wa Yuda yao: zo: .
Yuda wa Yaku yao: zo:- Yaku wa Isag yao: zo:- Isag wa Abraham yao: zo:- Abraham wa Tera yao: zo: Tera wa Naho yao: zo: .
Naho wa Serug yao: zo:- Serug wa Reu yao: zo:- Reu wa Peleg yao: zo:- Peleg wa Eber yao: zo:- Eber wa Shela yao: zo: .
Shela wa Kainan yao: zo:- Kainan wa Arphaxad yao: zo:- Arphaxad wa Shem yao: zo:- Shem wa Noa yao: zo:- Noa wa Lameg yao: zo: .
Lameg wa Methusela yao: zo:- Methusela wa Enog yao: zo:- Enog wa Yared yao: zo:- Yared wa Mahalale yao: zo:- Mahalale wa Kenan yao: zo:-
Kenan wa Enu yao: zo:- Enu wa Sed yao: zo:- Sed wa Adam yao: zo:- Adam wa Mao" So: yao: zo: ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Gyang" Lho" Byo we' byang" mung: Yodan gyaung: mae" dam: thug' lo: au:- Byo: yang din"pyad' yo khyo jhui" ye" ra"- ai: tau mae Yesu wa byid xe ba geim" yui: yang ju" phyo' ru qhug' ra" .
Yesu wa ai: ba na gu: mae pe" re: mazo: ngad: ra"- ai: ba na gu: gan lao"- Yesu wa vae: moe' ra" .
Alao" yui wa Yesu re Nao Mao" So: yao: zo: ngad: re wa ce: laug baui re mug boe" li" nae" amyin" byid: wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yui re Byu wa mug: yang za: kao so' qo" daui: na nae" mangad:- ga: Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Ai: thao yui wa Yesu re jhui" do, lo"mung: mug: myid dao mae" mung"dan: alhab' re damyo, nyag: gyo: mae ceim" shid' mung:-
Ce: kheim: so' we' ai: mung"dan: jham: phungbao alhab' ngo nao re byid: nae"- ai: gu: alhab' wa ngore ab byid' to" ru ngad mung:- ngo byid: nug: ra" yaug khag' re ngadqere: ngo qo" byid' ra" .
Airumung: nao ngore goe; pa" ngad: re wa ai: gu: alhab' ngo nao re byid: nae"- ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Asang ni" Mao" So re za: goe; pa" mung: caung da" wa,- ga: Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ra"- ga: tau" ra" .
Ai: thao re yui wa Yesu re Yerusalem khyo jhui" ye" lo" mung: Caung: pa" Yham mae" je: myhao: thao" ra" jo, qo mae yenha: to: mung: yang:- nao Mao" So: yao: Zo: ngad: re wa-
Mho" khyo byae: gyo" lo" wa,- pe"mung: ga"re Nao re lhaug' zaung" byid: nae" Mao" So wa mug: lagyo: jham re amyin" byid' li" nae" .
Amung: laug baui mae ni" khyid lhao" re: mathe' thaung: sho' yao: bam: lo; yang nao re lham: vo; yu: li" genae"- ga: re: Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ra"- ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa tau: mung:- ai: Asang ni" Mao" So re magai: jham" qu" nae"- ga: re: Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: yui wa Yesu re aja: ja: mae ju" phyo' qu" ru bin lao"- Yesu tau mae" dayo, dataung zo: phao: lo" byaug: ra"- Khoau: agu: dam: yo" nae" rure lao" na: ra" .
Yesu wa Gyang" Lho" Byo qam: so' we' byang" mung: Galile mung" khyo dam: tug' lo: ra" . Yao" khyo re ai: mung" alhab' mae gam: sho' hau" nhao" lo" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam: Tarha" Jung Yham jham mae mho" shid' byid' ra" . Yao: re yaug khao: ngo" caung: khin" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: na: qi" li" ra" Nazared vogaung: khyo joe" lo: ra"- yao: lhaung" kad' ru we' dakhyo:- Dugno: Ba mae Tarha" Jung Yham khyo ye" ra" . Yao: wa Jham: Mugsug' nghe' nae"- ga: to" ye; li" lao"-
Tarha" Jung Yham agyi pho" wa yao: re lapa Esaia Jham: Mugsug' dang: re byid' ke' ra" . Yesu wa ai: Jham: Mugsug' dang: re phung" ke' we' ceru: tung" to" rure myao mung:-
Asang: Byo wa nga" dao mae ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re myaung sho" ra" mo, re Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai kho" kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngore xau gyad byid' to" ra"- taung" lhaung" to" ru qhug' ra" mo, re loe; beim nhao nae" ru we' myo, jid mo, re myo, dam: myao: li" nhao nae"- ga" ra" khyo re kho" kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" re:- deim" zag: yhin" ru qhug' ra" mo, re loe; beim nhao nae"- ga" ru we'
Asang o ngaui: ra" zin na joe" li" va" rure kho" kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao: ngore nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra"- ga: nghe' ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa ai: Jham: Mugsug' dang: re dang: mung: Tarha" Jung Yham agyi pho" re dam: byid' ke' mung: zaung: jo; ra"- ai: Tarha" Jung Yham mae na: ra" mo, alhab' Yesu re zhaug' qu" na: bam: ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Ce: jham: dao: wa ana" ba naonhaung" the' gyo: vako" ru we' dakhyo:- jab byang" li" va" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alhab' mo, yao: re caung: khin" mung:- yao" nhad' thoe mae" jhau: thug' ke' ra" jeju dao: jham re mug' ako" . Amung: yao: bam wa- Ceyaug wa Yoseb yao: zo: mangad: i? ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" wa mocid' sara pho" we"- naoyao" gaung re naoyao: ya: gai: yu wa,- ga" ra" dao: khyo: re tai" yang: Kapena-um re kad' ra" mau" zo" jham re ngonhaung" the' gyo: va" ru we' dakhyo:- ce: naoyao" mug: mae re: kad' wa,- ga: dang za: ngore ta" li" genae"-
Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" ru wa lapa khoyaug rere: yao: yao" mug: mae" mo; yang makhae: yu gengad: ra" .
Tae" gyo: ge,- Lapa Elia pyad mae Israel mung"dan: mae sam zin: lho" khyaug' khye' mug: maqu yang: ai: mung"dan: geim" mae bao" khug' mo" khug' lo: au:- Israel amyu" qemae cug' mo" myo: sho' na: ako" .
Ai ngadqere: Mao" So wa ai bam mae" dayaug jhao" re: lapa Elia re manhao: ke' ngad: ra" . Sidon mung" Zarephad vogaung: mae na: ra" cug' mo" myhi" dayaug jhao" za: nhao: ke' ra" .
Lapa Elisha pyad mae re: Israel amyu" mae mao gae: de, mo, myo: sho' na gengad yang: re:- yao: bam mae" dayaug re: magai: shao: lo" ko"ngad: ra" . Suri amyu" Naman za: gai: shao: lo" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Tarha" Jung Yham mae na: ra" mo,byu qe wa cedao: re the' gyo: gelao"- nhag' gyai yo" ako" .
Alao" yao: bam wa to" li" mung: Yesu re vogaung: khug mae" she: khyad' thug' lo" yang: yao: bam: vogaung: te" to" ra" bam au: thao byo, nhad' mae" yao: re deim" phyid' khyo" ke' nae" ga: she: ye" lo" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam: phaung gaung: khyo" phao: thug' lo" ra" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa Galile mung" mae" Kapena-um vogaung: khyo joe" lo: ra" . Dugno: Ba mae yao: wa ai: vogaung: mae"- mo, byu qere mho" shid' byid' ra" .
Yao: mho" shid' ra" khyo re yao: bam alhab' gyo" mug' ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao" dao: thoe wa kheim: so' bo yang: ngad: ra" .
Ai: Tarha" Jung Yham khug mae makhyang" ra" yui vao: jaung" ra" byu dayaug na: ra"- yao: wa thoe qi: we'-
Nazared mae" Yesu we"- nao ngonhaung" we' pe" jho" sin" i? Ngonhaung" re lhau: phyo' pye' nae" ein: nao cekhyo joe" li" i? Nao khag' ngad: rure ngo ba:- nao wa Mao" So: Gyang" Lho" ra" Lagyo: ngad: ra"- ga: zag: hug' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re Sae za: na wa,- yao: mae" thug' lo" wa,- ga: amyin" byid' ke' ra" . Alao" yui wa aiyaug re mo, phaung gaung: mae be; mho' lhang" ke' mung: yao: re pe" dae mate' lo: yao" khug mae" phao: thug' lo" ra" .
Mo,byu qe alhab' wa mug' yang: Cedao: jham wa pe" ru" ra" dao: kheim: jham ngad: i? Byu ceyaug wa kheim: so' qam: o: we' makhyang" ra" yui jham re amyin" byid' ke' lao" yao: bam phao: thug' lo" ko" ra"- ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Yesu lau thoe wa ai: mung" geim" byang" sho' hau" nhao" lo" ra" .
Yesu wa ai: Tarha" Jung Yham mae" thug' lo" mung: Simon: yham khyo vao ye" ra"- Simon: yaug myhi" wa noqam" bug yang: gyai no: na: ra"- Airumung: yao: bam wa Yesu re bao" yu nae" qhid' mae" lham: mho' ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa ai: myiqe: myhi" nhae mae yeye; jo, mung: Noqam" gai: lo" wa,- ga: amyin" byid' ke' ra"- ai: myiqe: myhi" wa noqam" gai: lo" byaug: ru we' ailao" jao" to" li" mung: yao: bam re bang" da" byid' ra" .
Ba vao: lo" lao"- no phyo: aja: ja: qhug' ra" mo, re Yesu jhao" jhui" li" ako" . Ailao" Yesu wa no phyo: qhug' mo, yaug khao: ngo" dao mae lo, kai: byid: yang: yao: bam alhab' re gai byid' ra" .
Yui jham re: Nao wa Mao" So: yao: zo: ngad: ra"- ga: gyi: hug' mung: byu myo: sho' yaug mae" phao: thug' lo" ko" ra" . Yao: wa Meshia ngad: rure yui jham ba ko" ruyang Yesu wa yui jham re qeim mung: yao: bam re dao: jhau nae" akhang" mabyid: ngad: ra" .
Mug: bo" lao"- ai: vogaung: mae" thug' lo" mung: cae: tae" ra" dajo, qo khyo ye" lo" ra"- Mo, byu qe wa yao: re cao" qho mung:- yao: bam Yesu re qho: myao gelao"- yao: bam mae" mathug' lo" nae" Yesu re tam" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam re Ngo wa Mao" So: mung"dan: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai re gatau: vogaung: jham mae re: yekho" kyo: ca" ra"- pe"mung: ga"re ce: mau" zo" qhid' mae" Mao" So ngore nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
