Airumung: Yesu wa Yuda mung" geim" mae" Tarha" Jung Yham jham mae kho" kyo: byid' ra" .
Dalhang: mae" Yesu Genesared tham: yae mae ye; jo; au:- mo, byu qe wa Mao" So: mungdao: re tae" gyo: nae" ga: Yesu jhao" jhin" vao ye" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa tham: yae mae taui" to" ra" lha shid' khye' re myao: ra" . Ngo: kung" mo, wa ai: lha mae" thug' mung: yao: bam: geim jham re cid' san: na: ako" .
Yesu wa ai: lha shid' khye' mae" Simon: lha khug khyo vao ye: mung: lha re gyagao: mae" tham: gaung: khyo dajhid' zo: qhui" ke' nae" qhid' mae" Simon re ta" ra" . Yesu wa lha dao mae zaung: jo, yang:- mo, byu qere mho" shid' byid' ra" .
Bin lao" Yesu wa Simon re qid no; ra" khyo qui" ye: mung: ngo: myhi" nae" naonhaung" geim jham re khyo" ke' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Simon wa tau: mung:- Asang we"- ngonhaung" wa amyi damyi khyeim mayab macam: kung" yang: re: ngo: dadau: re: mathe' kung"- ngadqere: ni" dao: thoe khyo" yang ngo wa geim jham re khyo" ke' nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa geim jham re khyo" ke' mung: ngo: dajham dataung geim" re the' lhaung" yu: ako"- ngo: saung" laug yang: yao: bam: geim jham lhao" re: alaug laug jad: lo" ra" .
Ailao"- gatau: lha mae na: ra" yao: bam: byin cao: qere li" bao" yu genae" qhid' mae" lo, tu" tu" yang: khai: ako"- yao: bam li" mung: lha shid' khye' geim" alaug laug nab: lo" sho' ngo: ke' ako" .
Ceru re Petru myao lao"- Yesu khyid qao: mae goe, mung:- Asang we"- ngo wa qobo qo" yaug ngad:- ngo khyi" mae" phao: lo" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Petru we' yao" byin cao: qe alhab' wa yao: bam the' kung" to" ra" ngobam ngozao re qu" mug' ako" .
Simon we' ngo: kung" byin cao: ngad ko" ra" Zebede yao: zo: Yaku we' Yohan tao re: ai we' dakhyo: mug' ako"- ailao" Yesu wa Simon re Dagyaug wa,- ana" ba mae" thoegu: nao wa byu kung" yaug ngad: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa lha re qid yae mae lo" thang: to: mung:- alhab' re to" pye' co' yang: Yesu thao cao" ako" .
Dalhang: mae" Yesu wa vogaung: dalam: mae na: jo; au:- ai: vogaung: mae dagaung: geim" mao gae: de; ra" byu dayaug na: ra"- yao: wa Yesu re myao lao" goe; pa" mung: Asang we"- nao o nug: re wa ngore qo" gai: shao: lo" nhao zai ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao" lo, yheim" ke' yang: yao: re tin: byid: zo" re" Ngo o nug: ra"- Gai: shao: lo" wa, ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" jao" mao gae: gai: shao: lo" byaug: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Ce: khyo re khag' rere: data" kyo: wa,- ngadqere: khinjaung pho" jhao" din: za: lo" mung: ni" gaung yao: re lo" qhu" wa,- amung: nao gai: shao: lo" va" khyo mo, byu qe: qhid' mae" sagse: doe, vashao:- Moshe amyin" byid' to" ra"xeim: re lo" ngaui" byid: wa,- ga: ta" ke' ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu lau thoe wa je: je: za: hau" nhao" lo" mung:- mo, byu qe ajham ataung wa yao" mungdao: re tae" gyo" yu nae" we' yao: bam: no phyo: gai nae" qhid' mae" Yesu jhao" zang" li" ako" .
Yesu kam" wa yao: lhaung" kad' ru we' dakhyo: cae: tae" ra" jo, qo khyo ye" lo" mung: akyu" yemho' ra" .
Daba re Yesu mho" shid' byid' na: au:- Yuda mung" we' Galile mung" vogaung: khao: ngo" mae" we' Yerusalem vogaung: mae" joe" li" ko" ra" Pharishe qe we' Tung" Pho"qe wa aitau mae zaung: jo; bam: ako"- No phyo: gai byid: nae" Asang: qam: so' wa Yesu mae bo: ra" .
Alao" Qu" ge,- Byu daqhae: wa yab qo mae lang" jo; ra" gaung jam: shid: ra" byu dayaug re Yesu jhao" dao: li" ko" ra"- yao: bam wa ai: gaung jam: shid yaug re yham khug khyo dao: vao ye: mung:- Yesu qhid' kheim: mae yeqo" dao: to: nae" qam: ke' ako" .
Ngadqere: mo,paug' saung" thau: ruyang yao: bam wa ai: gaung jam: shid yaug re yham khug khyo dao: vao ye: nae" khyo mamyao ko" ngad: ra" . Ailao" yao: bam wa ai: gaung jam: shid yaug re yham khaung dao khyo dao: do, lo" mung:- mhao: mug: zhogam: pye: re tau: qhid' pye' yang: yab qo geim" we' mo, phaung gaung: Yesu qhid' kheim: mae shoe' khyo" ke' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam: lam khug: myid re myao lao"- ai: gaung jam: shid yaug re ba nam pho" we"- ni" qobo re khyad' pye' byid: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Tung" Pho" qe we' Pharishe qe wa Mao" So re ceru: jung" dao: jhau: ra" yaug wa khoru" byu ngad: ra" i? Mao" So dayaug mae" je yang: qobo re khoyaug qo" khyad' byid' i? ga: yao: bam: aung khug mae myid: qu"na: bam: ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam: aung khug mae airu: myid: qu" na ko" rure ba yang: Naonhaung" airu: pe"mung: myid: qu" na ko" i?
Ni" qobo re khyad' pye' byid: va"- ein: ta" nae" je: laui: i? Mangad: lao"- To" ye, yang: su" lo" wa,- ein: ta" nae" je: laui: i?
Ngadqere: byu: yao: zo: wa myid gaung dao mae qobo khyad' byid: nae" kheim: so' qo" yaug ngad: rure qhu" byid: geli"- ga: ta" mung: ai: gaung jam: shid yaug re Ngo nao re ta" li"- To" wa,- ni" yab qo re gaug: vo, mung: yham khyo phao: lo" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" jao"- ai: gaung jam: shid yaug wa yao: bam alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae to" ye; li" mung: yao" yab qo re gaug: vo,yang: Mao" So re caung: khin" zo" re" yham khyo phao: lo" ra" .
Yao: bam wa matho' ta" losho' gyaug: mug' pye' ru we' Ana" ba ngonhaung" mug' pho: mau" zo" re the' myao va"- ga: ta" mung: Mao" So re caung: khin" ako" .
Ai: thao Yesu ai: vogaung: mae" thug' lo" re yao" khang: gaug zaung mae zaung: jo; ra" Levi- ga: mang: ra" khang: gaug byu dayaug re myao: ra"- Yesu wa yao: re Nga" thao cao" la,- ga: khai: ra" .
Levi wa alhab' re to" pye' co' mung: Yesu thao cao" ra" .
Levi wa yao" yham mae Yesu qhid' mae" bang" da" poe aqi: dalam: kad' ra"- ai: poe mae khang: gaug mo, myo: sho' we' gatau bang" vo qe myo: sho' bobo: ako" .
Ailao" Pharishe qe we' yao: bam: phung: mae" Tung" Pho" qe daqhae: wa Yesu mho"zo: qere Naonhaung" wa khang: gaug mo,we' daga" za: pe"mung: zo: shaug' na ko" i? ga: jung" ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Qao" zin" ra" mo, wa mocid' sara maqo ko" ngad: ra"- No mo, za: aqo: ako" .
Ngo wa din: man: mo, re khai nae" qhid' mae" li" ru mangad:- Qobo qo" ra" mo, myid tha" nae" qhid' mae" ngo li" ru angad:- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Byu damyo" wa Yesu re- Yohan mho"zo: qe we' Pharishe qe: mho"zo: qe wa- dazab: makyo zo: ve jao" yang: akyu" lhaung" mho' mho' mung: kad' ako"- ngadqere: ni" mho: zo: qe wa zo: yang: shaug' yang: na: ako"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Lo, xo' poe mae" bang" vo qe wa- pho" sag' we' daga" na: jo, shi" au:- yao: bam re zo: ve qo" jao" nhao genae" i? Maqo" jao" nhao genae" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam: phaung mae" pho" sag' re li" jhui" yu: ra" ba na joe" lo: li" nae"- ailao" kam" wa yao: bam zo: ve jao" li" genae"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu wa dao: tau" ci yang re: yao: bam re- Mai bau: sag' mae" dacug' cad' yu yang: mai bau: xug' mae khag' re: malhaung" pho ko" ngad: ra"- Airu: pho lao" mai bau: asag' khye' jad: lo" li" nae"- ai za: mangad:- Mai bau: asag' cug' we' mai bau: xug' re: majho" dau zai ngad: ra" .
Aimae" sabyi qang: asag' rere: shoqid thaung xug' mae khoyaug re: malhaung" ke' ngad: ra"- Airu: ke' lao"- sabyi qang: asag' yang shoqid thaung xug' re jhin" kho' ke' mung: sabyi qang: yug: sheim: lo" byaug: li" nae" . Alao" shoqid thaung re: qeim: lo" byaug zai ngad: ra" .
sabyi qang: asag' re wa shoqid thaung asag' khug mae ke' to: qo: ra" .
Amung: khag' ngadqere: sabyi qang: axug' re bin: shaug' thao re sabyi qang: asag' re manug: shaug' ko" ngad: ra" . Yao: wa axug' yao: je: gai:- ga: ta" ra" .
Dugno: Ba daba mae Yesu wa jung: gaug yo khyo" su" lai: lo" ra"- yao" mho"zo: qe wa jung: gaug shi: re shan" yu mung: yao: bam: lo, vo: khug mae nai: phaug' yang: zo" ako" .
Pharishe qe daqhae: wa- Naonhaung" pe"mung: Dugno: Ba mae magai: kad' ra" ja: kad' ko" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu yao: bam re phaug' tau: mung:- Davi wa yao: we' yao" byu qe vae: moe; gelao" khoru: kad' ko" rure naonhaung" manghe' qu" ko" i?
Yao: wa Mao" So: yham khug khyo vao ye: mung: khinjaung qemae"je yang: khag' re: magai: zo" ra" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae qhaug' byid' to" ra" mug re yu zo: mung: yao" byu qere re: byid: zho" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa Dugno: Ba: Asang ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Dugno: Ba gatau daba mae Yesu wa Tarha" Jung Yham khyo vao ye: yang: mho" shid' byid' ra"- ai: mae lo, yo lo, shid: ra" byu dayaug na: ra" .
Alao" Tung" Pho" qe we' Pharishe daqhae: wa Yesu re qobo zhaug' nae" khyo qho nug gemung: Dugno: Ba mae no gai byid' ra" la,- magai byid' ra" la,- ga: yao: re nyang" za: jo" qu" na: bam: ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam: nhag' lam: re ba: pye' byid: mung: ai: lo, dashad' shid yaug re- To" mung: ce: qhid' au: mae li" ye, ri:- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" aiyaug wa to" li" mung: yeye; jo; ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- ngo naonhaung" re myid: geli"- Kham" To" Ra" Tarha" wa Dugno: Ba mae gai: ra" mau" zo" kad' nae"- mangad: lao"- magai: ra" mau" kad' nae"- byu: kao: so' re khyad' yu nae"- mangad: lao" se' pye' nae" kholam: re kad' gai:- ga: akhang" byid' to" ra" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re gam: sho' lhang: qu" mung: ai: lo, dashad' shid yaug re- Ni" lo, yheim" ke' wa,- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" aiyaug wa yao" lo, yheim" ke' mung: yao" lo, gai: lo" byaug: ra" .
Yao: bam wa nhag' kyid kyid yo: mung: Yesu re khoru: kad' nae" ra" khyo re yao: bam yao: cao: jho" qham: ako" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa bug gaung dalam: khyo akyu" mho' nae"- ga: do, ye" lo" ra"- ai: mae damyi: geim" Mao" So re akyu" mho' mung: na: ra" .
Mug: bo" lao"- mho"zo: qere yao: jhao" khai: yu mung: yao: bam mae" daxe: shid' yaug re khyin: yu yang: yao: bam re lagyo: qe- ga: mhang" byid' ra" .
Ai: lagyo: daxe: shid' yaug wa- Petru ga: yao: mhang" byid' ra" Simon- Simon: yao: nhaung: Andre- Yaku we' Yohan- Philib we' Batholame-
Mathe we' Thoma- Alphaeu yao: zo: Yaku we' byumyu" jhid' myid qi" ra" Simon-
Yaku yao: zo: Yuda we' thao phyao: yao: re ab byid' pye' nae" yaug boe" li" ra" Yuda Iskarud bam ngad: ako" .
Yesu wa lagyo: qe we' daga" bug gaung mae" gyo" lo mung:- bug gaung khyid- jao: dae mae yao" mho"zo: qe phung: mo" zang we' daga" ye; jo; ra" . Yuda mung"geim" mae" we' Yerusalem mae" re:- panglai: qid yae cao" mae" Ture we' Sidon vogaung: mae" joe" li" ko" ra"- mo, byu qe ajham ataung phung: mo" zang wa Yesu mungdao: re tae" gyo" yu nae" we' yao: bam: no phyo: gai: lo nug geyang: zang" ham: na: bam: ako" .
Makhyang" ra" yui jham: yang yhin" na: ru qhug' ra" mo, re: li" mung: gai byid' ru qhug' ako" .
Yesu gaung mae" qam: so' thug' lo" mung: yao: bam: no phyo: alhab' re gai byid' ruyang mo, byu qe alhab' mo, wa yao: re qo" tin: nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' yang: cao" ako" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere qu" mung: ta" ru wa- Myaung sho" ra" mo, naonhaung" wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: mung"dan: wa naonhaung" mung"dan: ngad: ra" .
Ana" moe, shab' na mo, naonhaung" wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" nhag' shid nhag' dag: ru qhug' li" genae"- ana" kaug' ngug: na mo, naonhaung" wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" qi: li" genae" .
Byu: Yao: Zo" mathao mae byu jham naonhaung" re ngag: ha: pye'- jung" gaui mung: naonhaung" mang re ta" phyo' ta"qheim" ru qhug' gelao"- naonhaung" wa ngaui lho" ko" ra" .
Airu: qhug' gelao"- thug' jhu: sho' bau: ge,- pe"mung: ga"re mug: gaung: mung"dan: dao mae naonhaung" aphug' jhaung qhu" wa- gyai qi" ra"- naonhaung" re airu: kad' ra" mo; phug' phyid' qe wa naonhaung" re kad' ru we' dakhyo:- daba: mae" lapa qere re: airu: kad' vako" ra" .
Ngadqere: jo,nho" qo" ra" mo, naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ko" ra"- pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa myan myan yo yo za: qo" na: avako" .
Ana" zo" gyi: shaug' gyi: mo, naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ko" ra"- Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" vae: moe; genae"- Ana" qi mo, naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ko" ra"- Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" kaug' ngug: li" genae" .
Byu alhab' yang naonhaung" re gai:- ga: caung: khin" gelao"- naonhaung" byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ko" ra"- pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam: phug' phyid' qere: lapa apyag' qere ai we' dakhyo: caung: khin" byid: vako" ra" .
Ngadqere: nga" mungdao: re tae" gyo" yu: ra" mo, naonhaung" re ngo ta" ru wa- Naonhaung" gyevo qere jhid' de; ge,- naonhaung" re manug thug nghang" ra" mo, re gai kad' ge,-
Naonhaung" re nhang" ra" mo, re shaman" byid: ge,- naonhaung" re roe" zo" ra" mo; qhid' mae" akyu" mho' byid: ge,-
Ni" boqae dashad' re pyo' ra" yaug re gatau dashad' rere: khae byid: shi: wa,- ni" adao: bau: re yu: pye' ra" yaug re ni" akhug: bau: rere: yu nhao shi: wa,-
Nao jhao" li" mho' ra" mo, alhab' re byid: wa,- ni" zai yu: pye' ra" yaug mae" dadam: mho' yu wa,-
Su: yang nyhao: re khoru: kad' byid: nae" nyhao: yao: myid: o: ru we' dakhyo:- su rere: ai we' dakhyo: kad' byid: ge,-
Naonhaung" re jhid' de; ra" mo, reza: naonhaung" jhid' de; ko" re wa- naonhaung" wa Mao" So: shaman" jeju khoru: qo" khae: yu genae" i? Qobo qo" ra" mo, lhao" re: yao: bam re jhid' de; ra" mo, re wa jhid' de; ako"
Naonhaung" re gai kad' mo, reza: naonhaung" gai dam: phaug' kad' ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" wa Mao" So: shaman" jeju khoru: qo" khae: yu genae" i? Qobo qo" ra" mo, lhao" re: ai we' dakhyo: kad' ako" .
Dam: qo" xe' byid' li" nae"- ga: myid: lam: ra" mo, re za: naonhaung" jhid' byid: ko" re wa- naonhaung" wa Mao" So: jeju khoru: qo" khae: yu genae" i? Qobo qo" ra" mo, lhao" re: dam: qo" tug' yu nae"- ga: myid: lam yang: qobo qo" ra" mo, yao: cao: jho" jhid' byid' ako" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" kam" wa naonhaung" gyevo qere jhid' de; mung: yao: bam re gai kad' ge,- Pe" rere: nhag' manghae: lo: jhid' byid: ge,- Airu: kad' gelao"- naonhaung" aphug' jhaung qhu" wa qi: nae"- ailao" Myhao: Thao" ra" Mao" So: Yao: Zo: bam re: naonhaung" boe" genae"- pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa jeju maba: beim" ra" mo, we' makhyang" ra" mo, re gai kad' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" Yao: Pho" wa nhag' khyag' shogu: yaug ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re: nhag' khyag' shogu: na ge,-
Su re dao: dakho' ge,- ailao" Mao" So wa naonhaung" re dao: makho' nae"- Su re dao: daphyid' ge,- ailao" Mao" So wa naonhaung" re dao: maphyid' nae"- amung: su re qobo khyad' byid: ge,- ailao" Mao" So wa naonhaung" qobo re khyad' byid' li" nae" .
Su re byid: ge,- Ailao" Mao" So wa naonhaung" re byid' li" nae" . Byang" sheim sho' deim" jhan yang: man" ra" jo, lag: yang naonhaung" lo, mae ke' byid' li" nae" . Gaigai: yao: naonhaung" lo, khug mae qo" yu: li" genae" . Mao" So wa- naonhaung" yang su re lag byid' ra" jo, lag: yang naonhaung" re lag byid: li" nae" .
Yesu wa ce: dao: tau" yang re: yao: bam re- mho" shid' ra" . Myo, jid yaug wa myo, jid yaug re khyoqhid' qo" she nae" i? Yao: airu: khyoqhid' she: ngad: re wa yao: shid' zo: shid' zo" geim" dung: gyan: khug khyo byid: gyo" lo" li" genae" mangad: i?
Mho"zo: wa mho" pho" tho' maje ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: mho"zo: wa cao jab alhab' bin: zhao: yu thao re wa- yao" mho" pho" we' dakhyo: ngad: li" nae" .
Nao wa naoyao" myo,jid' khug mae bo: ra" thao: thaung: re bo thoe magyo: lo:- ni" mao: nhaung: pho" myo,jid' khug mae bo: ra" thao: je; re pe"mung: myao: i?
Nao wa naoyao" myo,jid' khug mae bo: ra" thao: thaung: re lhao" bo thoe magyo: lo:- ni" mao: nhaung: pho" re Mao: nhaung: pho" we"- ni" myo,jid' khug mae" thao: je, re yu: pye' byid: li"-ein: khoru: mung: qo" ta" i? Geim kad' yaug we"- ni" myo,jid' khug mae" thao: thaung: re shi" sao qhid' yu: pye' wa,- airulao" za:- ni" mao: nhaung: pho" myo,jid' khug mae bo: ra" thao: je, re qang: qang: za: myao yang: qo" yu: pye' byid: nae" .
Qam: bo: ra" shi: gae wa malho" ra" ashi: mazaui: ngad: ra"- Qam: mabo: ra" shi: gae re: lho" ra" ashi: maqo" zaui: ngad: ra" .
Zaui" ra" ashi: re qu" yang: shi: gae khao: ngo" re gai: qu" ba: yu: ra"- naonhaung" wa zau: gae mae" pho' ham" shi: maqo" phyo' yu gengad: ra"- amung: zau: bye, mae" re: sabyi shi: maqo" phyo' yu gengad: ra" .
Gai: ra" yaug wa yao: yao" nhag' lam: gai: ra" jo,nho" ban" mae" gai: ra" ja: re phoe' thug' ba: ra" . Amung: magai: ra" yaug re: yao: yao" nhag' lam: magai: ra" jo,nho" ban" mae" magai: ra" ja: re phoe' thug' ba: ra"- pe"mung: ga"re nhad' wa nhag' lam: khug mae byang" jo; rure jhau: thug' ke' ra" .
Naonhaung" wa nga" mho dao: re wa magyo: lo:- ngore Asang we"- Asang we"- ein: pe"mung: ta" ko" i?
Ngo jhao" li" mung: nga" dao: re tae" gyo" yu yang: phug' cao" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa khag' we' dau: rure ngo naonhaung" re ta" kyo: geli" .
Aiyaug wa yham zhaug' ra" au:- no, sho' dau: yang: laug thin dao mae apan zhaug' mung: yham zhaug' ra" yaug we' dau: ra" . Qid je" li" lao" moe bug: yang ai: yham re lodeim: ngadqere: ai: yham wa tang tang za: zhaug' to" ru ngad mung: ai: yham wa malaui: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: nga" dao: re gyo" yu mung: maphug' cao" ra" yaug wa- apan mazao lo: myid cin mae yham zhaug' ra" yaug we' dau: ra" . Moe bug: yang lodeim: we' aijao" yao: byo; gyang: lo" ra"- amung: ai: yham byo; gyang: lo" ru wa phyi yao: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa ai: dao: jham re mo, byu qere bin: ta" lao"- yao: wa Kapena-um vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Ai: vogaung: mae Roma gyezug: pho" dayaug wa yao: gyai ngaui: ra" daui daui okaung pho" dayaug qo" ra"- ai: daui daui okaung pho" wa no yang: alaug laug shid: lo" na: ra" .
Gyezug: pho" wa Yesu khyo re the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa Yuda byu au: jhaung daqhae: re Yesu jhao" nhao: ke' mung:- yao" daui daui okaung pho" re li" gai byid: nae" qhid' mae Yesu re mho' ke' ra" .
Yao: bam Yesu jhao" joe" li" gelao"- yao: bam wa Yesu re Ce: gyezug: pho" wa- nao bao" thaug' yu nae" man: qi" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa ngonhaung" amyu" re jhid' de; mung:- ngonhaung" qhid' mae" Tarha" Jung Yham dalam: re kad' byid: yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" zo" re" kyid kyid ga: mho' ako" .
Airumung: Yesu wa yao: bam we' daga" cao" ye" lo" ra" . Yao: wa ai: yham we' mataung" va" rumae joe" lao"- gyezug: pho" wa yao" ba nam qere nhao: ke' mung:- Yesu re- Asang we"- naoyao" gaung re aqug: akhai: dakad' wa,- nao nga" yham khyo vao li" nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa maman: qi" yaug ngad:-
Ngo yao: nao jhao" li" nae" re: man: qi" nae"-ein: ngo majho- Ni" amyin" dao: dakheim: zo: ta" ke' re nga" daui daui yaug wa gai: lo" li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngore: kheim: so' qo" ra" gyezug: mo" qe: o mae na: ra" byu dayaug ngad:- nga" o mae re: gyezo: qe myo: sho' na: ako" . Gyezo: dayaug re ye: wa,- ein: amyin" byid: lao"- yao: ye" ra"- Gatau dayaug re- lo wa,- ein: amyin" byid: lao"- yao: lo: ra" . Amung: nga" jeim pho" rere:- ce kad' wa,- ein: amyin" byid: lao"- yao: kad' ra"- ga: ta" nhao: ke' ra" .
Yesu wa cedao: re the' gyo: lao" mug' mung:- yao" thao cao" qin" ko" ra"- Mo, byu qere lhang: qu" yang:- naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Israel amyu" mae lhao" re: ce: lam khug: myid qhi" bo: ru ngo mamyao: qu" shi:- ga: ta" ra" .
Gyezug: pho" ba nam qe yao" yham khyo dam: tug' joe" lo ko" re- gyezug: pho" daui daui yaug wa no gai: byaug va" rure yao: bam lomyao: ako" .
Ai: thao mataung" myao" re Yesu wa Nain ga" ra" vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ra"- yao" mho"zo: qe we' byu phung: mo" zang re: cao" ye" ako" .
Vogaung: kyae" kham: mae Yesu joe" ye" lo" au:- byushid mao dai" mo, daphung: yan" thug' li" ako"- ai: byushid mao wa cug' mo" myhi" dayaug: zote: zo: ngad: ra" . Ai: cug' mo" myhi" we' daga" vobyu qe phung: mo" zang re: bocao: dai" li" ako" .
Asang wa ai: cug' mo" myhi" re myao lao"- nhag' gyai qu" khyag' mung: yao: re- Dangug wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa te' sho' qui" ye: mung: ai: gaung: re yetin" ra"- Mao dao mo, re: thang byid' ako" . Alao" Yesu wa- Zolau: zo: we"- nao re ngo ta" li"- To" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" shid yaug wa to" zaung mung: dao: jhau: li" ra"- Yesu wa ai: zolau: zo: re yao: myhi" re dam: ab byid' ra" .
Byu alhab' mo, gyaug: mug' ru we' Mao" So re caung: khin" zo: re"- yao: bam wa- Ngonhaung" phaung gaung: mae lapa aqi: dayaug thug' li" va"- Mao" So wa yao" byumyu" re khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" va"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ce: Yesu lau thoe wa Yuda mung" geim" jao: sho' we' avai: ayae mug: khaung: mae hau" nhao" lo" ra" .
Yohan: mho"zo: re wa ai: khyo alhab' re Yohan re lo" ta" kyo: gelao"-
Yohan wa yao" mho"zo: shid' yaug re khai: yu yang:- Asang jhao" nhao: ke' mung:- nao wa ai: joe" li" nae" yaug ngad va" i? Mangad: lao"- gatau dayaug re ngonhaung" myid: lao" na shizai i? ga: myid: nhao: ke' ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa Yesu jhao" joe" lao"- nao wa ai: joe" li" nae" yaug ngad va" i? Mangad: lao"- gatau dayaug re ngonhaung" myid: lao" na shizai i? ga: qid nyhab' byid: yaug Yohan wa nga" shid' zo: re myid: nhao: ke' ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ai: ayo, mae yao:- Yesu wa byu myo: sho' mo; no phyo: we' no jham re gai byid: mung: makhyang" ra" byo jham re khe' thug' ke' ru we' myo, jid myo: sho' mo, rere: myo, myao: li" nhao: ra" .
Yesu wa Yao: shid' zo: re tau: mung:- ni" shid' zo: the' myao- the' gyo: vako" rure Yohan re lo" ta" kyo: ge,- Myo, jid mo, dam: qo" myao: li" ako"- Khyid qeim mo, khyo qo" su" li" ako"- Mao gae: de, mo, gai: shao: lo" ko" ra"- No: jid mo, no: gyo" li" ako"- Shid mo, dam: daui: to" li" ako"- Myaung sho: mo, wa Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re the' gyo" yu: ako" .
Ngo re maaug' o: yaug wa ngaui lho" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yohan mho"zo: shid' yaug phao: lo" gethao re Yesu wa Yohan: khyo we' sin: yang: byu phung: mo" re- Naonhaung" Yohan jhao" din"pyad' yo khyo ye: ko" au:- naonhaung" pe" re qu" nae"ein: thug' ye: ko" i? La: yang hug' nghan" na: ra" myo, gae jham re qu" nae"ein: ye: ko" i?
Naonhaung" pe" re qu" nae"ein: thug' ye: ko" i? Mai gai bau: gai ve; ra" yaug re qu" nae"ein ko" i? Mai gai bau: gai ve, mung: ngaui qhang dao mae langa: khyo" na: na mo, wa kho: kham kho" mae na: ako" .
Ngo re ta" kyo: gela,- naonhaung" pe" re qu" nae" ein: thug' ye: ko" i? Lapa re qu" nae" ein ko" i? Gaigai: yao: ngad: ra"- naonhaung" wa lapa tho' je: qi" yaug re yemyao: avako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yohan wa Jham: Mugsug' mae- ngo wa ni" khyo re seim" nyhang" to: nae" qhid' mae" lagyo: re ni" qhid' au: mae ngo nhao: ke' nae"- ga: Mao" So ta" to" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Yohan tho' je: qi" ra" xao su byu dayaug re: mana: qu" shi: ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Mao" So: mung"dan: mae je: ngai: thao" ra" yaug wa Yohan tho' je: qi" ra" .
Mo, byu qe alhab' mo, Yesu dao: re gyo" ako"- yao: bam we' khang: gaug mo, wa- je yang: Mao" So nho: din: man" khyo re phug' cao" mo, ngad: ako" . Yao: bam wa Yohan lo, mae qid nyhab' kham: yu va" mo, ngad: ako" .
Ngadqere: Pharishe qe we' Tung" Pho" qe wa yao: bam: qhid' mae" Mao" So myid: yaung: to" rure ngag: pye' ako" . Yao: bam wa Yohan: lo, mae qid nyhab' kham: yu nae" ha: pye' mo, ngad: ako" .
Yesu wa xo' mung:- ana" ceqae" mae" byu qere ngo pe" we' dau tau" nae" i? Yao: bam wa pe" we' dau: i?
Yao: bam wa gai jao: mae zaung: jo, mung: Naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" khalhao: mad ngadqere: mago" gengad: ra"- ngonhaung" ngug yao" yao" ngadqere: naonhaung" makaug' ngug gengad: ako"- ga: daphung: we' daphung: zojhi jhi yang: yao: cao: yao: jho" yao: na ko" ra" zoshao qe we' dau: ako" .
qid nyhab' byid: yaug Yohan wa zo: ve jao" ru we' sabyi qang: mashaug' lo: joe" li" ra" . Alao" naonhaung" wa Yao: wa yui zaung yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Byu: Yao: Zo: wa zo: mung: shaug' mung: joe" li" lao" re:- naonhaung" wa- Ceyaug re qu" qu" ge,- yao: wa zo: shaug' so' kho' nhad' shu yaug- qobo qo" mo, we' khang: gaug mo; byin cao: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So: pha,jhi" wa khae: yu: ra" mo, alhab' khyo" yang dang: rure qhu" byid' ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Pharishe dayaug wa yao: we' daga" myi" xeim zo: nae" qhid' mae" Yesu re khai: ra" . Yesu wa ai: Pharishe yham khyo vao ye: mung: zozo: nae" ga: zaung: jo; ra" .
Ai: vogaung: mae qobo gyai kad' ra" myiqe: dayaug na: ra" . Yao: wa Pharishe pho" yham mae Yesu zozo" na: ga" rure the' gyo: lao"- nae pyo" ra" xau byang" sho' bo: ra" laug gyang" thaug' dathaug' cili" mung:-
Yesu nhaung thao" shad' yao" khyid thao mae li" ngug: ye; jo; ra"- Yesu khyid wa yao" ngug byid jham: yang jhug' lo" byaug: ra" . Alao" ai: myiqe: wa aire yao" xae: yang sad' byid: mung: khyid re bobaug baug yang: nae pyo" ra" xau vhe' gyad byid' ra" .
Ceru re Pharishe pho" myao lao"- ceyaug wa lapa gaigai: ngad dang: re wa yao: re tin" ra" myiqe: wa khag' ngad: rure we' qobo jab ngad: rure ba nae" ngad: ra"- ga: yao" aung khug mae ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Simon we"- nao re ngo ta" nae" daja: jo;- ga: ta" ra" . Simon wa Mho" pho" we"- ngore ta" kyo: la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa ngaui jhid' zo" ra" byu dayaug jhao" jhin de; ra" byu shid' zo: na: ako"- Dayaug wa ngaui thang: the: ngo" yo kye' jhin de, mung:- dayaug wa ngo" xe kye' jhin de; ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa jhin madam: qo" xe' gemung: ai: ngaui sang wa- yao: shid' zo" geim" re jhin khyad' pye' byid' ra"- Alao" ai shid' zo: mae" khoyaug lam: ai: ngaui sang re je: jhid' de; nae" laug i? ga: ta" ra" .
Simon wa- je: laug sho' re khyad' pye' byid: qhug' yaug ngad: ra" ein: ngo jho:- ga: tau" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa myiqe: shad' khyo lhang: lo mung: Simon re- Ce: myiqe re nao myao: i? Ngo ni" yham khyo vao li" re nao wa nga" khyid cid' qid mabyid: ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: yao: wa nga" khyid re yao" ngug byid: yang cid' byid: mung: yao" xae: yang sad' ho byid' ra" .
Nao wa ngore bobaug malham: baug ngad: ra"- ngadqere: yao: wa ngojhao" vao li" mae" nga" khyid re bobaug baug mathang ngad: ra" .
Nao wa nga" au: mae xau magyad byid: ngad: ra"- ngadqere: yao: wa nga" khyid re nae pyo" ra" xau gyad byid' ra" .
Airumung: ngo nao re ta" li"- yao" qobo myo: sho' khyad' pye' byid: qhug' va" ruyang yao: wa jhid' de; myid myo: sho' qhu" byid' ava"- Dajhid' za: khyad' pye' byid: qhug' yaug kam" wa jhid' de; myid dajhid' za: qhu" byid' ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa ai: myiqe: re- Ni" qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Saboe" mae daga" zaung: jo, mo, wa- Qobo jham re lhao" qo" khyad' pye' byid' ra" byu ceyaug wa- khag' ngad: i? ga: yao: bam: aung khug mae ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa ai: myiqe: re- Ni" lam khug: myid wa nao re khyad' yu: ava"- Yaug yo za: phao: lo" se,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao mataung" myao" re Yesu wa vozo: vozang jham khyo gam: sho' du" qin" mung: Mao" So: mung"dan: Lau Dao: Gai re cao" kho" kyo: byid' ra"- Mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug wa Yesu we' daga" bocao" qin" ako" .
Makhyang" ra" yui jham we' no jham mae" gai shao: lo" byaug ko" ra" mo, mae" myiqe: damyo" ngad: ra" yui nhad' dau: re khe' thug' pye' byid' ra" Magadala Mari-
Herod yham mae" zug: pho" Khuza yao: myi: Yoana- Susanna bam we' gatau myiqe: myo: sho' mo, re: yao: bam yao" ngaui qhang: yang Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qere bao" thaug' byid: mung: bocao: qin" ako" .
Mo,byu qe wa vogaung: khao: ngo" mae" zang" ham: li" na mung: byu phung: mo" zang ham: na: bam gelao"- ce: dao: tau" ci yang: yao: bam re ta" kyo" ra" .
( Dalhang: mae- byu dayaug wa myug: shi: sin: nae" qhid' mae" thug' ye" lo" ra" . Yao: wa yo mae myug: shi: yesin" ke' re myug: shi: daqhae: wa khyodang mae gyo" lo" ge mung: byu jham zab: nhe" pye' ru we' ngho' jham: yang gaug zo" pye' ko" ra" .
Myug: shi: daqhae: wa laug qan" myid dao mae gyo" lo" ako"- Agae yaug: thug' li" qere: myid zhai: majhug' yang: kyaug' shid: lo" ko" ra" .
Myug: shi: daqhae: wa zau: bye, gyo: mae gyo" lo" ako"- Zau: gae jham we' daga" yaug: qi" li" mung: zau: gae jham: yang hab' pye' ra" .
Amung: myug: shi: daqhae: wa myid gai dao mae gyo" lo" ako"- Agae yaug: qi" li" gemung:- myug: shi: khao: ngo" anho" dayo nho" nho" ashi: zaui" li" ako"- ga: ta" ra" . ) Alao" Yesu wa No: de, ko" re wa gyo" yu ge,- ga: ta" mung: dao: pin" pye' ra" .
Yao" mho"zo: qe wa ce: dao: tau" pe" re ta" nug: ra" khyo Yesu re myid' ako" .
Yesu wa tau: mung: Naonhaung"wa Mao" So: mung"dan: no; thao" khyo re ba: gyo: nae" akhang" Mao" So wa naonhaung" re byid' to" ra" . Ngadqere: dang: ra" gaje wa yao: bam qu" gengadqere:- mamyao- gyo: gengadqere: maba: gyo: genae" qhid' mae" dao: tau" khyo" yang ta" ru ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Dao: tau" lajheim: wa ceru: ngad: ra"- ai: myug: shi: wa Mao" So: mungdao: ngad: ra" .
Khyodang mae gyo" lo" ko" ra" myug: shi: jham wa ai: mungdao: re gyo" yu gengadqere:- lam" mung: khyad' yu: ru maqhug' genae" qhid' mae" Satan wa li" mung: yao: bam: nhag' lam: khug mae" mungdao: re li" yu: pye' byid' ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Laug qan" myid dao mae gyo" lo" ko" ra" myug: shi: jham wa mungdao: re gyo" yu ge we' ngaui bau: za: khae: yu gengadqere:- agyi: no, sho' macin" ruyang dayo, daban: za: lam khug mung: jham" qu" ru thaung" qhug' lo lao"- dam: phaug' lo" ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Zau: bye, gyo: mae gyo" lo" ko" ra" myug: shi: jham wa ai: mungdao: re gyo" yu gengadqere: myid: qug: myid: ci" ru- jo,nho" qo" nug: ru- cepyad mae pyo: nug: ru jham: yang hab' pye' mung: ashi: lho" mazaui" ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Myid gai dao mae gyo" lo" ra" myug: shi: jham wa ai: mungdao: re gyo" yu mung: gai: ru we' phug' cao" ra" nhag' lam: khug mae tang tang zaui" zag: ci yang: ashi: zaui"ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Myikaug' re te' mung: ban" yang maug: lhaung" to:- mangad: lao"- jaung: gyid' mae khag' malhaung" zhaung: to" qu"- Yham khug khyo vao li" mo, alhab' myibao re myao genae" qhid' mae" myikaug' tao" dao mae lhaung" zhaung: to" ako" .
Nyham" to" ra" ja: pe" ngadqere: myao: thug' li" nae"- amung: nghoe' to" ra" ja: pe" ngadqere: de: de: za: myao: thug' li" nae" .
Airumung: naonhaung" khoru: gyo" yu ko" rure lha" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re qo" ra" yaug khag' re ngadqere: je: laung: byid' li" nae"- ngadqere: maqo" yaug mae" kam" wa- yao: qo"- ga: myid: jho: na: ra" dajhid' za: re lhao" yao: mae" yu: pye' byid' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu yao: myhi" we' yao: nhaung: bam wa Yesu jhao" joe" li" ako"- ngadqere: mo, paug' saung" thau yang: yao: jhao" maqo" joe" vao ye: ngad: ako" .
Byu dayaug wa Yesu re Ni" myhi" we' ni" nhaung: bam nao re qhug' nug mung: taung gaung mae li" ye; jo; ako"- ga: ta" kyo" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam alhab' mo, re- Mao" So: mungdao: re gyo" yu mung: phug' cao" ra" mo, wa- nga" myhi"- nga" nhaung: bam ngad: ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Daba re- Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qe we' daga" lha dakhye' mae yedo; zaung mung: yao: bam re- Nyhao: nhaung"- tham: thoete' khyo gau"de; ye: gelang:- ga: ta" ra" . Airumung: yao: bam wa gau" de; ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: bam gau" de; ye" lo" na ko" au:- Yesu wa yab: myhid' jo; ra" . Ai: tham: mae nyag din taung" la qam" hug' lo mung: lha khug mae qid byang" li" na: ruyang yao: bam wa gyai gyaug: ci" na: ako" .
Mho"zo: qe wa Yesu re yenhug' mung:- Asang we" Asang we"- ngonhaung" jeim" lo" na va"- ga: ta" ako" . Alao" Yesu wa to" li" mung: ai: la we' bang: lhung" re qeim: ke' ra"- La we' bang: lhung" wa yo za: tae" lo" byaug mung:- gyai qi: sho' yo: byaug: ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa mho"zo: qere Naonhaung" lam khug: myid wa khotau mae i? ga: ta" ra" . Yao: bam kam" wa mug' ru we' gyaug mung:- ceyaug wa khag' ngad: i? La we' bang: lhung" re lhao"- yao: amyin" byid: mung: yao" mho dao: gyo" ako"- ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa- Galile mung" we' tau" te' mae" Gerasa mung" khyo gau" de; ye" ako" .
Yesu taung gaung khyo su" do, lo" na: au:- ai: vo mae" yui zaung: ra" byu dayaug yao: re li" qhug' ra"- aiyaug wa gaung pyad' du" qin" ru myao" va" ra"- yao: wa yham mae mana lo:- lab bug khaung: mae na: qin" ra" .
Yao: wa Yesu re myao lao"- zag: hug' mung: Yesu khyid qao: mae gyang: goe, yang:- Myhao: thao" ra" Mao" So: Yao: Zo: Yesu we"- nao we' ngo pe" jho" sin" i? Nao re ngo mho' ra"- ngore dayhin" la,- ga: hug' ta" ra" .
Yao: ceru: ta" ru wa yao" khug mae" ai: makhyang" ra" yui re phao: thug' lo" nae" Yesu amyin" byid' ke' ruyang ngad: ra" . Ai: makhyang" ra" yui wa aiyaug re myo: sho' lhang vao: jaung" va" ra"- yao" khyid lo, jham re jao co" yang taui: mung: kyam: khug mae lhaung" to: sho' ngadqere:- yao: wa jao co: jham re lao" phyid' pye' mung: ai: yui wa yao: re din"pyad' yo khyo cidao" lo" lo" mung: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Ni" mang pe" ngad: i? ga: myid' ra"- Alao" yao: wa- nga" mang wa Legio ngad: ga: tau" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yui myo: sho' yao" khug mae vao: jaung" jo, gemung: ngad: ra" .
Yui jham wa yao: bam re no; thao" ra" jo, qo khyo makhe' khyo" ke' nae" qhid' mae" Yesu re mho' ako" .
Aitau mae vo, dajham mo" zang bug gaung mae bad zo" na: ako"- Airumung: yui jham wa yao: bam re vo, jham: khug mae yevao: jaung" nhao nae" qhid' mae" Yesu re akhang" mho' ako" . Yesu wa yao: bam re akhang" byid' ke' ra" .
Yui jham wa ai: byu mae" phao: thug' lo" mung: vo, jham: khug mae yevao: jaung" ako" . Alao" ai: vo, phung: mo" geim" wa dang" kam" nhad' mae" tham: khug khyo tao" byae: gyo" lo" gemung: nab: shid: pye' ako" .
Airu: boe" rure vo, zam: mo, myao gelao"- yao: bam tao" phao: lo" mung: ai: lau thoe re vogaung: khug mae we' seyo: vogaung: jham khyo hau" nhao" lo" ko" ra" .
Mo, byu qe wa boe" lo: ra" khyo re yequ" nae" qhid' mae" thug' ye" lo" ako" . Yao: bam Yesu jhao" joe" ye: ko" re yao" khug mae" yui jham phao: thug' lo" vako" ra" yaug wa mai bau: ve, yang: Yesu khyid qao: mae nhag' gyang: gyang: za: zaung: jo; rure yemyao gemung:- yao: bam alhab' mo, gyaug: din: pye' ako" .
Aire the' myao: ra" mo, wa- mo, byu qere ai: yui vao: jaung" ra" yaug khoru: gai: lo" byaug: rure lham: ta" kyo" ako" .
Ailao" ai: mang: khaung: mae"- mo, byu qe wa gyai gyaug: nin" pye' geyang: Yesu re yao: bam tau mae" phao: lo" nae" qhid' mae" mho' ako" . Airumung: Yesu wa lha dao yedo; zaung yang: dam: tug' phao: lo" ra" .
Ai: yui jham phao: thug' lo" byaug vako" ra" yaug wa Yesu re- ngore: nao we' daga" cao" nae" qhid' mae"akhang" byid: la,- ga: mho' ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa Ni" yham khyo phao: lo" mung: Mao" So nao re khoqhi" bao" thaug' byid: va" ra" khyo alhab' re lo" ta" kyo: wa,- ga: yao: re ta" mung: nhao: ke' ra" . Ai: yaug wa- Yesu yao: re gai byid: va" khyo re vogaung: gam: sho' ta" hau" lo" ra" .
Yesu tham: thoete' mae" dam: tug' joe" lo lao"- mo, byu qe alhab' mo, yao: re lao" na: bam ko" ruyang mo, byu qe wa yao: re lham: tug: yu: ako" .
Alao" Ya: iru ga: mang: ra" Tarha" Jung Yham agyi pho" dayaug joe" li" ra" . Yao: wa Yesu khyid qao: mae li" goe, mung: Yesu re yao" yham khyo li" nae" qhid' mae" mho' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re daxe: shid' zin ngad va" ra" yao" zote: myiqe: zo: shid: lo" na mung: ngad: ra" . Yesu wa aiyaug jhao" cao" ye" lo" na: au: mo, byu qe wa shad' khao: ngo" khyo" Yesu re the' jhin" ako" .
Aibam: phaung mae daxe: shid' zin lam: lam: sa: sheim no no: ra" myiqe: dayaug bobo: ra" . Yao: wa yao: qo" ra" gu: alhab' mocid' sara qere byid: mung: ya nhao ngadqere:- yao: re khag' maqo" ya: gai byid: gengad: ra" .
Ai: myiqe: wa Yesu nhaung thao" khyo qui" li" mung: Yesu bau: thao mae yetin" ke' ra" . Ailao" jao"- yao" sa: sheim: ru thang: lo" byaug: ra" .
Yesu wa- ngore tin: yaug khag' ngad: i? ga: myid' ra" . Yaug khao: ngo" wa khag' matin:- ga: ha: ako" . Petru wa- Asang we" Mo, byu qe wa nao re lhang" kham" to: mung: nao re the' jhin" zao" ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa- Dayaug yaug ngore tin" kyivako"- pe"mung: ga"re nga" khug mae" qam: so' thug' lo" kyiva" ruyang aire ngo ba:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: myiqe: wa yao: kad' rure beim: va" ra"- ga" rure ba: qu" lao"- yao: wa ko, ko, nin" ru we' Yesu khyid qao: mae li" goe, mung:- yao: pe"mung: Yesu re tin" ra" khyo we' ailao" jao"- yao" no khoru: gai: lo" byaug: ra" khyo re mo, byu qe alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae Yesu re ta" kyo" ra" .
Yesu wa ai: myiqe: re- Nga" myiqe: zo: we"- ni" lam khug: myid wa nao re gai byid' ava"- Yaug yo za: lo" se,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu cedao: ta" na shi" au:- ai: Tarha" Jung Yham agyi pho" yham mae" byu dayaug joe" li" mung:- Ya: iru re- Ni" myiqe: zo: shid: ava"- Mho" Pho" re aqug: akhai: dacekad' lo: wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu aire the' gyo: mung: Ya: iru re- Dagaung yug- Lam" za: lam" wa,- ni" myiqe: zo: dam: gai: li" zai ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Ya: iru yham mae joe" ye: lao"- Petru- Yohan- Yaku we' ai: myiqe: nau" yao: myhi" yao: pho" tao mae" je yang: khag' rere: yham khug khyo yao: we' daga" mavao nhao ngad: ra" .
Ai: tau mae yaug khao: ngo" wa- ai: myiqe: nau" mathao mae kaug' ngug: na: bam: ako"- yao: wa Dangug ge,- ai: zoshao wa mashid- yao: wa yab: myhid' jo; ru angad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam alhab' mo, wa ai: myiqe: nau" shid va"- ga" rure ba geyang:- Yesu re qi: jung" pye' ako" .
Yesu kam" wa ai: myiqe: nau" lo, mae zaui" ci mung:- Zoshao we"- To" wa,- ga: yao: ke' ra" .
Myiqe: nau" wa kao so' dam: daui: li" mung: ailao" jao" to" li" ra"- Yesu wa ai: myiqe: nau" re zo: ve byid: zho: genae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ra" .
Ai: myiqe: nau" yao: myhi" yao: pho" tao wa mug' hao" byaug: ako" . Ngadqere: Yesu wa ai: boe" ra" khyo re khag' rere: mata" kyo: genae" qhid' mae" yao: shid' tao re zug' nhao: ra" .
Yesu wa mho"zo: qe daxe: shid' yaug re khai: zhang" yu mung:- yui alhab' re khe' thug' pye' nae" qam: so' we' no phyo: jham re gai byid: nae" qam: so' byid' ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa yao: bam re Mao" So: mung"dan: akhyo yekho" kyo: genae" we' no mo, re yegai byid: genae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" ai: gyaung: khyo qhid' mae" pe" re: dayu: ci ge,- Zaung: bao" daci ge,- Thaung pyan- zo: ve- Ngaui davin ge,- Bau: lhao" re: ajan" davin ge,-
Naonhaung" re bang" lham: tug: yu: ra" yham kho: yham mae ngadqere: naonhaung" ai: vogaung: mae" dam: thug' lo" yo, joe" sho' ai: yham mae yethang: na ge,-
Naonhaung" re bang" malham: tug: yu ko" re wa ai: vogaung: mae" thug' lo" mung: yao: bam shad' mae sagse: boe" nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" khuvo: mae" phalhug re ko: khyo" to: co' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" lagyo: qe wa thug' ye" lo" mung: vogaung: alhab' khyo jao: sho' du" qin" mung: Lau Dao: Gai re cao" kho" kyo" ru we' khyi" khao: ngo" mae" mo, re gai byid' ako" .
Galile mung" zug: Herod wa ai: boe" na: ra" khyo alhab' re the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa myid gyai gyo" nhaung" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re mo, byu qe daqhae: wa qid nyhab' Yohan kao so' dam: daui: li" ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" na: ako" .
Amung: gatau daqhae: wa Elia po" thug' li" va" ra"- Daqhae: wa ganhae" mae" lapa qemae" dayaug yaug kao so' dam: daui: li" ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" na: ako" .
Alao" Herod wa- Yohan au: re ngo phyid' pye' byid: va" ru ngad:- ngo lau thoe the' gyo" na: ra" ceyaug wa khag' ngad: i? ga: ta" mung: yao: wa Yesu re the' myao nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' na: ra" .
Lagyo: qe wa phao: lo mung:- yao: bam zaui" lo: ra" mau" zo" alhab' Yesu re lota" kyo" ako" . Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re jhui: mung: Bedsaida ga: mang: ra" vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ko" ra" .
Mo, byu qe ai: khyo re the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam wa Yesu thao cao" ye" lo" ako"- Yesu wa yao: bam re lham: tug: yu mung: Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo yao: bam re ta" kyo" ru we' qo ca" ra" mo, re gai byid' ra" .
Ba vao: lo" na lao"- mho"zo: qe daxe: shid' yaug wa Yesu jhao" lo mung:- Mo, byu qere vogaung: jham khyo we' yozao jham khyo lo" mung: yab jo, qo we' zo: ve lo" qho genae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' wa,- pe"mung: ga"re ce: jo, qo wa din"pyad' yo ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" yao:- yao: bam re zo: ve byid: zho: ge,- ga: ta" ra"- Yao: bam wa tau: mung:- ngonhaung" qo" ru wa mug ngo" khai" we' ngo: shid' dau: za: angad:- nao ngonhaung" re ce: mo, byu qe alhab' mo, geim" qhid' mae" zo: ve yevai nhao nug: i? ga: ta" ako" .
( Ai: mae yauggai qe za: ngo" taung ko ngad: ra" . ) Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Daphung: re ngo" xe zo: zo: ko kad' mung: aphung: phung: zaung: jo, nhao ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe airu: bin: kad' gethao re Yesu wa ai: mug ngo" khai" we' ngo: shid' dau: re yu: yu mung:- mug: gaung khyo tau: qu" yang: Mao" So re jeju caung: mung: mug we' ngo: re khyoe' phai" yang: mo, byu qere gae byid: genae" qhid' mae" mho"zo: qere byid' ra" .
Yao: bam alhab' mo, gyi: sho' zo" ako"- Mho"zo: qe wa zo" tang" ra" aje, abai" jham daxe: shid' gyan byang" sho' gaug: zhang: yu: ako" .
Daba mae Yesu wa yao: za: akyu" mho' na: au:- mho"zo: qe wa yao: jhao" lo: ako"- Yesu wa yao: bam re Ngo khag' ngad: ra"- ga: mo, byu qe ta" ako" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa tau: mung: Daqhae: wa nao wa- qid nyhab' Yohan ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" . Amung: daqhae: wa daba ganhae" mae" lapa qemae" dayaug dam: daui: li" ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako"- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- Aire naonhaung" wa ngore khag' ngad: ein: ta" ko" i? ga: myid' ra" . Petru wa tau: mung:- nao wa Mao" So: yang nhao: ke' ra" Meshia ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa cekhyo re khag' rere: mata" kyo: genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re jhaug' za: zug' nhao: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa khyag' qhui: ru myo: sho' kham zo: ca" zai ngad:- Yuda lau de, au: jhaung qe- khinjaung qi: qe we' Jham: Tung" Pho" qeyang ngag: pye' ru qhug' mung: se' pye' li" genae"- ngadqere: sam ba thao re dam: daui: to" li" nhao nae" .
Amung: yao: wa yao: bam alhab' re- Nga" thao cao" nug yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: yao" qhid' mae" ha: pye' ca"- amung: yao: yao" pyao: zang re ba khao: ngo" vo, yang: nga" thao cao" ca" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: yao" kao so' re khyad' yu nug: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: kao so' jeim: nae"- ngadqere: nga" mathao mae yao: yao" kao so' jeim" ra" yaug wa khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" .
Byu wa ce: mug: myid geim" re qo" sang: yu ngadqere:- yao: yao" kao so' jeim" byaug: re wa pe" akyu" bo: i? Pe" akyu" mabo ngad: ra" .
Alao" ngore we' nga" mho dao: re qho' ra" yaug re wa Byu: Yao: Zo: wa yao" phungbao- yao: pho" phungbao- mug: lagyo: qe: phungbao we' joe" li" lao"- Byu: Yao: Zo: re: yao: re qho' li" nae" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- cetau mae na: ra" mo, mae" daqhae: Mao" So: mung"dan: re mamyao myao wa mashid genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Aijham re bin: ta" thao dalaban kyo: re Yesu wa Petru- Yohan we' Yaku bam re jhui: mung: akyu" mho' nae" qhid' mae" bug gaung dalam: khyo do, ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: akyu" mho' na: au:- yao" myo, nho lai" lo" mung: yao" mai bau: jham wa qhui qhui qhag qhag bao: bao: phyu: li" ra" .
Ai: tau mae nyag din taung" byu shid' yaug wa Yesu we' dao: jho" jhau: na: ako"- ai shid' zo: wa- Moshe we' Elia ngad: ako"- yao: shid' zo: wa mug: gaung: phungbao we' thug' li" mung:- Yesu wa mataung" myao" re Yerusalem vogaung: mae shid kham: ra" khyo" yang-
Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo re jab byang" nhao nae" khyo we' sin: mung: Yesu we' jho" jhau: na: ako" .
Petru we' yao" byin cao: qe wa yab nug moe moe mung: nug: ako"- ngadqere: yao: bam so" li" gelao"- Yesu phungbao re we' yao: we' daga" ye; jo; ra" byu shid' zo: re myao: ako" .
Ai shid' zo: Yesu mae" phao: lo" na ko" au:- Petru wa Yesu re Asang we"- ngonhaung" cetau mae na: re gai: ra"- ni" qhid' mae" zaung dalam:- Moshe qhid' mae" dalam:- Elia qhid' mae" dalam: ngonhaung" zaung sam lam: kad' nae"- ga: pe" mabeim: maso: ta" ke' ra" .
Petru airu: jhau: na shi" au:- jham dathaui: thug' li" mung: yao: bam re losham: nghoe' ra"- Mho"zo: qe wa ai: jham thaui: yao: bam: dao mae losham: nghoe' ke' lao"- yao: bam gyaug: din: ako" .
Jham thaui: khug mae"- Ceyaug wa nga" Zo: ngad:- yao: re ngo khyin: to" ru ngad:- yao" mho dao: re tae" gyo: ge,- ga: thoe dathoe jhau: thug' li" ra" .
Ai: thoe jhau: thang: lo" lao"- aitau mae wa Yesu za: thang: jo; ra" . Mho"zo: qe wa yao: bam the' myao: ra" khyo alhab' re ai: ayo, gyo: mae khag' rere: mata" kyo: lo: sae za: na: ako" .
Thao: ba Yesu we' mho"zo: sam yaug wa bug gaung mae" dam: tug' gyo" lo: ako"- Byu phung: mo" zang Yesu re li" tug: yu: ako" .
Byu dayaug wa mo, phaung gaung: mae" hug' mung:- Mho" Pho" we"- nga" zo: zote: zo: re qu" byid: nae" ngo nao re mho' ra" .
Ai: yui yao: re vao: jaung" mung:- nyag din taung" hug' ru we' lao" thin: jab: lo" yang: nhad' mae" nyab dui" athaui: thaui: thug' ra"- no sho' gyai aqug: akhai: kad' yang: lhaung" phao: thug' lo" ra" .
Ai: yui re khe' thug' pye' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa ni" mho"zo: qere mho' ngadqere: yao: bam maqo" khe' thug' ngad: ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa- Lam khug: myid mabo: ru we' shad' nghung" ra" byu qe we"- ngo naonhaung" we' khomyhao" joe" sho' na zai i? Ngo naonhaung" re khomyhao" joe" sho' zang: qhao" zai i? ga: tau" ra" . Ai: thao Yesu wa- aiyaug re Ni" zo: re cekhyo jhui" lo ri:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: yauggai nau" lo: na: au:- yui wa yao: re myid gaung khyo gyang: lang" lo" nhao mung: lao" thin: jab: lang" lo" nhao: ra" . Yesu wa ai: makhyang" ra" yui re amyin" byid: mung:- yauggai nau" re gai byid' ra" . Amung: yao: pho" re dam: ab byid' ke' ra" .
Mo, byu qe alhab' mo, wa Mao" So: qam: so' re mug' hao" byaug: ako" . Mo, byu qe wa Yesu zaui" ra" mau" zo" ja: khao: ngo" re mug' na: bam shiko" au:-
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa byu jham: lo, khug khyo ab byid' pye' ru qhug' li" nae"- Dao: ceru re naonhaung" mato" myhid' lo: xam" ci ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: mho"zo: qe wa cedao: pe" re ta" nug: rure maba: gyo: ko" ngad: ra" . Ai: dao: re yao: bam maba: gyo: vageshao: ga:- nyham" to: byid' ra" . Mho"zo: qe wa ai: khyo we' sin: mung: Yesu re mavae" myid: ngad: ako" .
Mho"zo: qe wa yao: bam mae" qi" thao" ru khoyaug ngad: i? ga: yao: bam yao: cao: jho" ta" ngag: thug' li" ko" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam: aung khug mae pe" myid: na ko" rure ba: ruyang yao: wa zoshao dayaug re jhui" yu mung: yao" ayae mae yhe' to: yang:-
yao: bam re- Nga" mang mathao mae ce: zoshao re khae: yu: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: ngore khae: yu: ra"- ngore khae: yu: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug re khae: yu: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" mae alhab' tho' ngai: thao" ra" yaug wa qi" thao" ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- Yohan wa Asang we"- ni" mang khyo" yang yui jham re khe' thug' na: ra" byu dayaug re ngonhaung" the' myao:- ngadqere: yao: wa ngonhaung" phung: mae" mangad: yang: ngonhaung" yao: re tam" pye' va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Yohan we' gatau mho"zo: qere- Naonhaung" yao: re datam" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" re gye makad' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: naonhaung" shad' mae" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yesu mug: gaung khyo to' yu: ru qhug' nae" ayo, joe" li" na lao"- yao: wa myid: phyid' ci mung:- Yerusalem khyo ye" lo" na: ra" .
Yesu wa yao" qhid' au: khyo lagyo: qere nhao: ke' mung: yao: bam wa- Yesu qhid' mae" ja: khao: ngo" nyhang" seim" byid: nae"qhid' mae" Samari vogaung: dalam: khyo vao ye" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa Yerusalem vogaung: khyo ye" lo" na: ruyang vogaung: bao: wa yao: re makhae: yu ko" ngad: ra" .
Mho"zo: Yaku we' Yohan tao wa ceru re myao gelao"- yao: shid' tao wa- Asang we"- yao: bam re ngha" se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" ngotao mug: gaung mae" myi: khai: khyo" yu nae"- nao qad: i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa lhang: lo mung:- yao: shid' tao re qeim: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa gatau: vogaung: khyo thug' ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: bam khyole; mae su" na ko" au:- byu dayaug wa Yesu re- nao khai: ye: khai: ni" thao ngo cao" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Zag ne jham wa khyaung qo" ako"- Ngho' zo: jham re: asad' qo" ko" ra"- ngadqere: Byu: Yao: Zo: wa au: khug jo, qo lhao" re: maqo" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa gatau dayaug re nga" thao cao" wa,- ga: ta" ra" . Ngadqere: aiyaug wa- Mho" Pho" we"- nga" pho" mao gaung re shi" lo" nyhab' shaung: pye' nae" qhid' mae" akhang" byid: la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa- byushid qe wa yao: bam: byushid qere nyhab' shaung vageshao:- nao wa Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo yehau" kyo: byid: wa,- ga: tau" ra" .
Gatau dayaug wa- Mho" Pho" we"- ngo ni" thao cao" nae"- ngadqere: nga" yham byu qere shi" lo" au" co' nae" akhang" byid: la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Kheim zhaug' mae zaui" ci yang: nhaung thao" khyo lhang: qu" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Mao" So: mung"dan: qhid' mae" akyu" mabo ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Asang wa gatau nhad' xe: shid' yaug re khyin: yu mung:- yao: yao: re: ye: nae" vogaung: jo, qo khao: ngo" khyo shid' zo: dazam" zam" kad' mung: yao" qhid' au: khyo ye" na genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re nhao: ke' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- gaug myo: sho' mhang" jo; ra"- ngadqere: yad: yu nae" mau" zaui: byu malaug ngad: ra" . Airumung: ai: gaug sang wa yao" gaug mhang" yo mae mau" zaui: nae" byu qere nhao: ke' byid: nae" qhid' mae" gaug sang re akyu" mho' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ye: ge,- Zag ne jham: phaung gaung: khyo yao nau" jham re nhao: ke' ru we' dakhyo:- ngo naonhaung" re nhao: ke' ra" .
Ngaui thaung- thaung pyan- khyid zhaung: jham davin ge,- Khyodang mae dayaug yaug re au" nae" qhid' mae" dathang ge,-
Kho: yham mae ngad ngad naonhaung" vao ye: gelao"- Ce: yham ngaui bau: yaug yo vashao: wo"- ein: shi" sao qhid' ta" ge,-
Ai: yham mae ngaui bau: yaug yo: rure kao bau: ra" byu na: ngad: re wa naonhaung" bang" se" shaman" dao: wa aiyaug: dao mae ngad vashao:- Airu" ra" yaug mana ngad: re wa naonhaung" bang" se" shaman" dao: wa naonhaung" jhao" dam: tug' lo: li" nae" .
Ai: yham mae na mung: yao: bam da" byid' rure zo: shaug' ge,- pe"mung: ga"re mau" zaui: yaug wa okaung phug' qo" yu ang: ra"- dayham mae" gatau dayham khyo dakai" na: qin" ge, .
Naonhaung" vogaung: khyo vao ye: khao: ngo" bang" lham: tug: yu ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung"qhid' kheim: mae da" byid' rure zo: ge, .
Aimung: ai: vogaung: mae" no mo, re gai byid: ge,- ai: vogaung: byu qere- Mao" So: mung"dan: wa naonhaung: we' ajhao" mae joe" li" na va" ra"- ein: yao: bam re ta" kyo: ge,-
Ngadqere: naonhaung" vogaung: khao: ngo" khyo vao ye: khao: ngo" bang"malham: tug: yu ko" re wa- hau" mo" khyo jham khyo thug' ye: mung:-
ngonhaung" khyid mae de; ra" naonhaung" vogaung: mae" phalhug re lhao" re: naonhaung" re the nae" khyo" ngonhaung" ko: khyo" to: co' va"- ngadqere: Mao" So: mung"dan: wa naonhaung" we' ajhao" mae joe" li" va" rure beim: ge,- ein: ta" to: co' ge,-
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- Dao: Kho' ra" Ba Na mae Mao" So wa ai: vogaung: re tho' Sodom vogaung: re je yang: nhag' khyag' myid qhu" byid' li" nae" .
O"- Korazin we"- nao byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ra" . O"- Bedsaida we"- nao re: byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ra"- Vogaung: ni" shid' vo mae zaui" qhu" lo: ra" mug' pho: ve, lho jham re Ture we' Sidon shid' vo mae zaui" qhu" ngad: re wa- daba gaco' mae" jid: mo" mai bau: ve,- myiqe, bam mae zaung: jo, yang: yao: bam yao" gaung dao mae myiqe, gag: sheim: mung: yao: bam myid tha" va" khyo re qhu" byid: genaeva" .
Mao" So wa Dao: Kho' ra" Ba Na mae vogaung: ni" shid' vo re tho' Sidon we' Ture shid' vo re nhag' khyag' myid je yang: qhu" byid' li" nae" .
Kapena-um we"- nao re: mug: gaung joe" sho' to' yu nae" o: i? Nao wa movo: mug: khyo joe" sho' khyo" pye' ru qhug' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- naonhaung" dao: re tae" gyo" ra" yaug wa nga" dao: re tae" gyo" ra"yaug ngad: ra"- amung: ngore ngag: pye' yaug wa ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug re ngag: pye' ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: nhad' xe: shid' yaug wa gyai ngaui bau" ru we' dam: tug' joe" lo mung: yao: bam wa- Asang we"- ngonhaung" ni" mang lao: mung: amyin" byid: lao"- yui jham lhao" re: ngonhaung" dao: tae" gyo" ako"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Satan wa lhe' cad' ru: mug: gaung mae" byid: gyo" lo" rure ngo myao va" .
Tae" gyo: ge,- ngo wa naonhaung" re lhao maui jham we' gung gug' jham: dao mae qo" zab: lai: lo" mung: Satan" nho: qam: so' alhab' re aung doe, nae" kheim: so' byid' to: va"- naonhaung" re pe" ja" yang re: dae mate' nae" .
Ngadqere: yui jham naonhaung" mho dao: tae" gyo: geyang: dabau: ge,- naonhaung" mang jham re mug: gaung dao mae tung" xam" to: va" ruyang bau: ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: yo, khyin: mae Yesu wa Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang ngaui bau: nhao mung:- Mug: gaung we' myid gaung Asang Pho" we"- nao wa pha,jhi" bo mo, we' ba jhao mo, mae" nyham" to" rure pha,jhi" mabo: ra" mo, re qhu" byid: va" ruyang nao re ngo jeju caung: byid' ra" . Ngad va"- nga" Pho" we"- ce wa nao o ngaui: ra" khyo" boe" ru ngad: ra" .
Nga" Pho" wa ja: cao jab alhab' ngore ab byid' to" ra" . Yao: zo: wa khag' ngad: rure yao: pho" mae" je yang: khag' maba ngad: ra"- amung: yao: pho" khag' ngad: rure re: yao: zo: we' yao: zo" yang qhu" byid: nae" khyin: yu: ra" yaug mae" je yang: khag' maba ko" ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa yao: bam za: na ko" au:- Yesu wa mho"zo: qe shad' khyo lhang: lo mung:- naonhaung" myao: ra" gu: jham re the' myao: ra" mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- naonhaung" myao: ra" gu: jham re lapa qe we' kho: kham qe myo: sho' mo, myao nug gengad yang: re:- maqhug' myao ko" ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" the' gyo" ra" gu: jham re gyo: nug gengad yang: re: maqhug' gyo: ko"ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" qu" ge,- Jham: Tung" Pho" dayaug to" ye, mung:- Mho" Pho" we"- Apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" ngo pe" kad' ca" ra" i? ga: Yesu re kung" ra" khyo" myid' ra" .
Yesu wa- Tarha" mugsug' mae pe" ru: ta" to" ra" i? Nao khoru: ba: nghe' yu: i? ga: yao: re phaug' ta" ra" .
Alao" ai: Jham: Tung" Pho" wa- Asang ni" Mao" So re ni" aung khug nhag' lam: alhab'- ni" kao so' alhab'- ni" gaung dau: qam: so' alhab'- ni" myid nyan: ba: ru alhab' yang jhid' de; wa,- amung: ni" yham kyo: cao: re nao yao" gaung re we' dakhyo: jhid' de; wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Nao ta" ru jo: ra"- Airu: kad' wa,- ailao" nao apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: ai: Jham: Tung" Pho" wa yao: yao: jo: rure qhu" nug mung: Yesu re- Nga" yham kyo: cao: khag' ngad: i? ga: myid' ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa- Dalhang: mae" byu dayaug wa Yerusalem vogaung: mae" Yerikho vogaung: khyo gyo" lo" ra" au:- damya, jham we' thaung" qhug' ra" . Damya, jham wa ai: yaug re mai bau: khyad' yu: pye' byid: mung:- be, yang: alaug laug shid: ru shapye' to: co' ako" .
Khinjaung dayaug wa khyo ai: gau: khyo" su" gyo" lo" ang: ra"- ngadqere: khinjaung pho" wa ai: yaug re lomyao lao"- gashad' khyo" jao" lai: lo" ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- Levi kaung mae" dayaug re: ai: jo, qo khyo joe" lo mung: ai: yaug re lomyao lao"- gashad' khyo" jao" lai: lo" ra" .
Ngadqere: khyo ai: gau: khyo" Samari byu dayaug gyaung: su" lo: re- ai: damya, qhug' ra" yaug jhao" joe" lo mung:- yao: re lomyao lao" nhag' qu" khyag' ra" .
Yao: wa damya, qhug' yaug jhao" te' ye: mung:- yao" dae khu jham mae xau we' sabyi qang: vhe' gyad byid: yang: thab' byid' ra"- Bin lao"- yao" loze dao mae ai: yaug re vo; zhaung mung:- bang" khug yham dalam: khyo jhui" lo mung: nyhang" caung byid' ra" .
Thao: ba re yao: wa ngaui shid' kye' phoe' yu yang:- bang" khug yham sang re byid: mung:- ceyaug re nyang" za: caung wa,- yao: re caung yang: gan: ra" ngaui gatau alhab' rere: ngo dam: tug' lo lao" nao re ngo lo: xe' byid: shinae"- ga: bang" khug yham sang pho" re pin co' ra" .
Yesu wa ai: Jham: Tung" Pho" re- Ai: byu sam yaug mae" damya, qhug' ra" yaug: nho: yham kyo: cao: khyo" kad' yaug khoyaug lam: ngad: ra"- ein: nao myid: jho: i? ga: myid' ra"
Alao" Jham: Tung" Pho" wa- Ai: damya, qhug' ra" yaug re nhag' khyag' ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" . Yesu wa- Nao re: ai we' dakhyo: lo" kad' wa,- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe su" ye" lo" na ko" au:- vogaung: dalam: khyo joe" lo: ako"- Matha ga: mang: ra" myiqe: dayaug wa Yesu re yao" yham mae bang" lham: tug: yu: ra" .
Yao: wa Mari ga: mang: ra" yao: nhaung: dayaug qo" ra" . Mari wa Asang: khyid qao: mae zaung: jo, mung: Yesu ta" ra" mungdao: re tae" gyo" na: ra" .
Matha wa bang" da" mau" kad' nae" mau" laug: ruyang myid laug sang: kho: mung:- Yesu jhao" lo yang:- Asang we"- nga" nhaung: wa bang" da" mau" alhab' re ngo dayaug reza: shapye' to: byid' rure nao pe" maqu" jho i? Ngo re bao" nae" qhid' mae" yao: re ta" wa,- ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Asang wa Matha re- Matha- Matha- Nao wa mau" myo: sho' ja: re myid: qug: myid: ci" na: ra" .
Ngadqere: qo ca" ru wa daja: za: ngad: ra" . Mari wa jo: ra" ja: re khyin: yu: ava"- ai: rure yao: mae" khag' re: maqo" yu: pye' byid: genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Daba mae- Yesu wa jo, qo dalam: mae akyu" mho' na: ra" . Yao: akyu" bin: mho' lao" yao" mho"zo: qemae" dayaug wa- Asang we"- Yohan wa yao" mho"zo: qere akyu" mho' nae" mho" byid' ru we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" re akyu" mho' nae" mho" byid: la,- ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" akyu" mho' gelao"- ceru: mho' ge,- Pho" we"- Ni" gyang" lho" ra" mang a re phug' myao: vageshao:- Ni" mung"dan: joe" lo vashao:-
Ngonhaung" qo ca" ra" zo: ve ba khao: ngo" ngonhaung" re byid: la,-
Ngonhaung" re shad' ra" mo; qobo re ngonhaung" khyad' byid' ruyang ngonhaung" qobo jham re khyad' byid: la,- Ngonhaung" re gyai qug' ra" ju" phyo' ru khyo dajhui" ye: la,- ein: mho' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Naonhaung" mae" dayaug yaug wa gae gaung: myi: re ba nam pho" yham khyo ye: mung:- Ba nam pho" we"- ngore mug sam khai" ko lhau" jhid' byid: la, .
Nga" ba nam pho" dayaug gyaung: su" rumae" nga" yham khyo joe" vao lo: ra"- yao: re byid: zho: nae" pe" re: maqo"- ga: ta" re-
Ba nam pho" wa- ngore dakhin jang la,- Kham: pyid' pye' va"- ngo we' nga" zoshao qere: yab qo vao va"- Airumung: ngo to" yang: nao re mug maqo" byid:- ga: yham khug mae" ta" li" nae" .
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- nao wa yao" ba nam pho" ngad: ruyang yao: wa to" li" mung: nao re ai: mug jham re mabyid: nae"- ngadqere: nao wa mathang mano: mho' na: ruyang yao: wa to" li" mung: nao qo: ra" mug jham re byid' li" nae" .
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Mho' ge,- ailao" qo" yu: li" genae"- Qho ge,- ailao" naonhaung" qhug' myao genae"- Kham: ko' ge,- ailao" naonhaung" re kham: phung" byid' li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re mho' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: qo" yu: li" nae"- Qho: ra" yaug wa qhug' myao: li" nae"- Kham: ko' yaug re wa kham: phung" byid' li" nae" .
Naonhaung" yao: pho" qe khag' ngadqere: naonhaung" yao: zo: ngo: mho' re- lhao maui byid: nae" i?
Qo, au" mho' re gung gug' byid: nae" i?
Makhyang" ra" mo, naonhaung" lhao" re:- naonhaung" yao: zo: qere gai: ra" ja: byid: nae" ba: ako"- ai: tho' mae" je yang: mug: gaung dao mae" Pho" wa- yao: re mho' ra" mo, re Gyang" Lho" Byo byid' li" nae" mangad: i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa nhad' jid: ra" yui re khe' thug' pye' ra"- ai: yui phao: thug' lo" byaug lao"- nhad' jid: ra" yaug wa dao: jhau: li" ra" . Mo, byu qe wa mug' hao" byaug: ako" .
Ngadqere: byu daqhae: wa yui zug: mo" Bezelbu yang yao: re qam: so' byid: mung: yui jham re khe' thug' pye' ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Byu daqhae: wa Yesu re kung" nug gemung:- Mao" So: qam: so' qo" yaug ngad: rure qhu" byid: nae" mug' pho: ve, lho daja: kad' qhu" nae" qhid' mae" Yesu re mho' ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam: aung khug mae pe" myid: na ko" rure ba yang: yao: bam re- mung"dan: dalam: wa phung: jho" kho' yang: yao: cao: gye jho" se' na ko" ngad: re wa myao" sho' magang" tang: jo; li" nae"- ai we' dakhyo:- ug' khug' dinkhu: dalam: re: yao: cao: nhag' lam: majho" vang" re wa byo; qeim: lo" li" nae" .
Airu: mung: Satan" nho: mung"dan: wa phung: jho" kho' mung: yao: cao: gye jho" se' na ko" re wa khoru: qo" gang" tang: jo, nae" i? Naonhaung" wa ngore Belzebu qam: so' yang yui jham re khe' thug' ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ngo wa Bezelbu qam: so' yang yui jham re khe' thug' ngad: re wa naonhaung" mho"zo: qe wa khag' qam: so' yang yui jham re khe' thug' ko" ra" i? Naonhaung" yao" mho"zo: qe yao: naonhaung" shad' rure sagse: qhu" byid: vako" ra" .
Ceru: angad:- ngo wa Mao" So: qam: so' yang yui jham re khe' thug' pye' ru ngad: ra" . Ce wa naonhaung" jhao" Mao" So: mung"dan: joe" li" va"- ga" ra" sagse: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Qam: bo yaug wa yao" yham re shae lhae cao jab we' zaung" na: au:- yao" jo,nho" jham wa gug: za: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: qam: je: bo: ra" yaug yao: re li" khe' aung: pye' lao"- ai: qam: je: bo: ra" yaug wa- ai: yaug khug ngha: na: ra" shae lhae jham re sham" yu mung: qo" lhad' yu: ra" lanyab rere: gae byid' pye' ra" .
Nga" bo: made; ra" yaug wa ngore gye kad' yaug ngad: ra"- amung: ngo we' daga" masham" zhang: ra" yaug wa abyo asin" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ai: Makhyang" ra" yui wa byu mae" thug' lo" lao"- kyaug' ho: ra" jo, qo khaung: mae yedu" qin" mung: no: qo cao" qho: qin" ra"- No: qo maqhug' lao"- yui wa Azhao ngo na co' ra" yham khyo dam: tug' lo" nae" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airu: mung: yao: dam: tug' joe" lo: re- phyao: sham" pye' mung:- nyang" za: shaung: nyhang" to" rure lomyao: ra" .
Ailao"ai: yui wa thug' ye" lo" mung: yao: tho' je: makhyang" ra" yui nhad' dau: re khai: jhui" lo mung:- yao: bam wa ai: yham mae lona: ako" . Airumung: byu ai: yaug: ave, wa sao qhid' mae" tho' je: qo: byaug: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airu: Yesu bin: ta" lao"- mo, phaung mae" myiqe: dayaug wa Yesu re- Nao re khau mung: nug' jhaug' ra" myiqe: wa ngaui lho" ra" wo"- ga: hug' ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa Mao" So: mungdao: re tae" gyo: mung: phug' cao" ko" ra" mo, kam" wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- ga: tau" ra" .
Mo, byu qe Yesu lhang" gam: zang" ham: na: jo, ko" au:- xo' mung: Ceqae" mae" byu qe wa makhyang: mo, ngad: ako"- yao: bam wa mug' pho: ve, lho re mho' ako"- ngadqere: Yona nho: ve, lho mae" je yang: pe" ve, lho re: yao: bam re qhu" byid: nae" mangad:-
Yona wa Nineve vobyu qe: qhid' mae" ve, lho ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- ai: Byu: Yao: Zo: re: ceqae" mae" byu qe: qhid' mae" ve, lho ngad: li" nae" .
Sheba kho: kham myhi" wa kho: kham Sholamon: pha,jhi" dao: re tae" gyo: nae" qhid' mae" va" ra" mung"dan: mae" joe" lo: ra"- Airumung: dao: kho' ra" ba na mae Sheba kho: kham myhi" wa to" ye, mung: naonhaung" re qobo zhaug' li" nae"- naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- ce: jo, qo mae Sholamon kho: kham tho' je: qi: yaug na: ra" .
Nineve vobyu qe wa- Yona kho" kyo" ra" mungdao: re the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam: qobo mae" myid tha" lo: ako"- Airumung: dao: kho' ra" ba na mae Nineve vobyu qe wa to" ye, mung: naonhaung" re qobo zhaug' li" genae"- cejo, qo mae Yona tho' je: qi" ra" yaug na: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Myikaug' re te' mung: khag' malhaung" nyham" to:- Ban" yang re: khag' malhaung" maug: lhaung" to"qu"- Yham khug khyo vao lo: ra" mo, alhab' re bao byid: nae" qhid' mae" myikaug' tao" dao mae lhaung" zhaung: to" ako" .
Ni" myo,jid' wa gaung khyao: qhid' mae" myibaung: ru" ru ngad: ra" . Ai: ni" myo,jid' qang: qang: za: ngad: re wa ni" gaung geim" bao: jo; li" nae"- ngadqere: ni" myo,jid' athab zang ngad: re wa ni" gaung geim" cad' no; jo; li" nae" .
Airumung: naonhaung" mae bo: ra" bo" bao wa mug: cad' mangad: nae" qhid' mae" lha" ge,-
Ni" gaung mae dakhyi" mae re: macad' jo, lo: gaung geim" bao: jo; ngad: re wa- myibaung: wa bao qhui: ra" bo" yang ni" dao mae bao byid' ru we' dakhyo:- ni" gaung geim" bao: jo; li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu airu: bin: ta" lao"- Pharishe dayaug wa yao: we' zo daga" zo: nae" qhid' mae" Yesu re khai: ra"- Airumung: Yesu wa ai: yaug: yham khyo ye: mung: zozo: nae" ga: yezaung: jo; ra" .
Yesu wa zo mazo: shi: re cid' san: ru makad' rure Pharishe pho"qu" ba lao" mug' ra" .
Airumung: Yesu wa yao: re- Pharishe qe naonhaung" wa naonhaung" ban- keim kang: jham re adao shad' mae za: cid' san: ako"- ngadqere: naonhaung" aung khug mae wa se' da: be, khyad' ru we' makhyang" ru byang" sho' bo: jo; ako" .
Byugo qe we"- Adao shad' re phan" to" ra" Mao" So wa akhug shad' rere: phan" to" ra" mangad: i?
Ngadqere: naonhaung" ban we' keim kang: jham mae bo: ra" zo: ve jham re myaung sho" ra" mo, re byid: ge,- ailao" ja: khao: ngo" naonhaung" qhid' mae" thung" li we' dakhyo: san: lo" li" nae" .
Pharishe qe we"- naonhaung" byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako"- naonhaung" wa shaban- sham: nhang:- ban gya ru" ra" ao: pho' vho' aja: ja: mae" daxe bam mae" dabam Mao" So re qhaug' byid: gengad yang: re: naonhaung" wa tarha" din: vang" ru we' Mao" So re jhid' de; rure to" pye' ko" ra" . Naonhaung" wa daxe bam mae"dabam Mao" So re qhaug' byid' ru za: mangad:- tarha" din: vang" ru we' Mao" So re jhid' de; rure re: mato" pye' co' lo:- ai: gu: alhab' re phug' cao" ang: ako" .
Pharishe qe we"- naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako"- pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa Tarha" Jung Yham jham mae" gakai: lai jaung: to" ra" tao" khau" mae zaung nug mo,- gai jao: gyo: mae su: yang lham: phug' myao: nae" o mo, ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako"- naonhaung" wa axam: aso: majo, lo" ra" lab we' dau: ako"- Byu jham wa lab ngad: rure maba mung:- ai: dao mae su" lai: qin" ko" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Jham: Tung" Pho" dayaug wa- Mho" Pho" we"- nao ceru: ta" ru wa ngonhaung" rere: ta" phoe: ru ngad: ra"- ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- Jham: Tung" pho" qe naonhaung" re: byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako"- naonhaung" wa su gaje qere vin qug' ra" qo jham re vin nhao gemung:- naonhaung" yao: wa ai: qo jham re lo, nyhug' yang re: mabotin: ko" ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako"- naonhaung" wa naonhaung" phug' phyid' qeyang se' pye' ra" lapa qe: lab jham re gyai yaung" sho' zao byid' ako" .
Naonhaung" phug' phyid' qe kad' lo: ra" mau" zo" re naonhaung" bomyid vang" rure naonhaung" yao: sagse: qhu" byid' na: ako" . Naonhaung" phug' phyid' qe wa lapa qere se' mung:- naonhaung" wa yao: bam: lab jham re zao byid' ako" .
Airumung: Mao" So: pha,jhi" ta" ru wa- Lapa qe we' lagyo: qere yao: bam jhao" nhao: ke' byid: nae"- yao: bam wa daqhae: re se' pye' li" genae"- Daqhae: re wa yhin" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: Abela re se' pye' rumae" Gyang" Lho" Jo, qo we' phan: agyo: mae se' pye' qhug' ra" Zakari joe" sho' mae" xao qug: we' mug: myid phan" to" rumae" se' pye' qhug' ra" lapa alhab' mo; xao qug: wa ana" ceqae" mae" byu qe qhug' vin: li" genae" ngad: ra" .
Ngad va"- naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- ai: xao qug: alhab' wa ana" ceqae" mae" byu qe xao qug: qhug' vin: li" genae" .
Jham: Tung" Pho" qe we"- naonhaung" byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ako"- naonhaung" wa ai: pha,jhi" yham kham: thug' re sang: ci gemung:- naonhaung" yao: re: ai: khyo mavao ye:- Vao ye: nae" qam: ke' mo, rere: naonhaung" tam" to" ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu ai: jo, qo mae" thug' lo" lao"- Jham: Tung" Pho" qe we' Pharishe qe wa Yesu re xo sho' gaui mho mung: yao" nhad' thoe: yang jhau: shad' rure qobo taung: nae" qhid' mae" dao: myid: myo: sho' ja: Yesu re myid' ako" .
Mo, byu qe ajham ataung zang" phaung: li" gemung:- yao: cao: jho" zab: khyad' na ko" au:- Yesu wa sao qhid' yao" mho"zo: qere- Geim kad' ru ngad: ra" Pharishe qe: man" re naonhaung" lha" ge,-
Nghoe' to" ra" ja: pe" re: de: de: myao: thug' li" nae"- Zug' to" ra" ja:- ja: khao: ngo" wa- ba: thug' li" nae" .
Amung: mug: cad' yo mae naonhaung" ta" ra" dao: re mug: bo" mae the' gyo" li" genae"- Kug qe, mae naonhaung" dao: so' so' yang: ta" ra" dao: re yham khaung dao mae" hug' ta" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Nga" ba nam qe we"- naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Gaung khyao re qo" se' pye' ngadqere: ai: thao gatau pe" re: maqo" kad' ra" mo, re dagyaug ge,-
Naonhaung" khag' re gyaug ca" ko" rure ngo naonhaung" re ta" shid' geli"- Gaung khyao re se' pye' thao naonhaung" re myiqid tham: khyo pye' zaui: ke' nae" qam: so' qo" ra" Mao" So re gyaug ge,- ngad va"- yao: wa naonhaung" gyaug qo: ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Jokhyao" ngo" dau: re byad san: shid' kye' mae aung" mangad: i? Ngadqere: Mao" So wa ai: jokhyao" dadau: rere: mato" myhid' ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" au: mae" xae khe' alhab' re lhao" re: nghe' to" ra"- Airu: mung: dagyaug ge,- naonhaung" wa jokhyao" myo: sho' dau: tho' je: phug' de; ako" .
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Su: qhid' kheim: mae nga" mho"zo: qe ngad:- ga: lhang: yu yaug khag' re ngadqere: Byu: Yao: Zo: re: Mao" So: lagyo: qe: qhid' kheim: mae yao" mho"zo: qe ngad:- ga: lhang: yu: li" nae" .
Ngadqere: su: qhid' kheim: mae ngore ngag: ha: pye' yaug re kam" wa Byu: Yao: Zo: re: Mao" So: mug: lagyo: qe: qhid' kheim: mae yao: re ngag: ha: pye' li" nae" .
Byu: Yao: Zo: re nhad' dao: thoe: yang shad' ra" yaug wa qobo khyad' byid' ru gai: qhug' ra"- ngadqere: Gyang" Lho" Byo re jung" gaui: ra" yaug kam" wa qobo khyad' pye' ru gai: qhug' nae" mangad:-
Amung: byu qe wa naonhaung" re yung" zaung nae" qhid' mae" Tarha" Jung Yham khyo- zug: qe we' kheim: so' qo" ra" mo; qhid' kheim: khyo jhui" ye: gelao"- khoru: ta" nae" laug ein: damyid: ci" ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re ai: yo, khyin: mae khoru: jhau ang: rure Gyang" Lho" Byo wa naonhaung" re mho" byid' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mo, byu phaung gaung: mae" byu dayaug wa Yesu re- Mho" Pho" we"- ngonhae tao: yao: pho" to: byid: co' ra" jo,nho" jham re ngo we' jho" gae ngho" nae" qhid' mae" nga" mao: re ta" byid: la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Nga" ba nam pho" we"- Dao: kho' nae" akhang"- mangad: lao"- ni" shid' tao: jo,nho" re kho' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngore khag' yang khyin: to" ra" i? ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu wa xo' mung: yao: bam alhab' re- So' kho' obyid: ru aja: ja: re naonhaung" lha" yang: jao" pye' ge,- Byu dayaug: dangman" ra" kao so' wa yao: jo,nho" khonho" qo" yaug ngadqere: yao: qo" ra" jo,nho" mae mabo ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa ce: dao: tau" ci yang: yao: bam re- Dalhang mae- gaug zo maui: lam: gyai thug' ra" yo qo" ra" daizug: dayaug na: ra" .
Yao: wa- yao" aung khug mae Nga" gaug zo maui: lam: jham re ke' to: nae" jo, qo majo, lo:- ngo pe"ru: kad' nae" i? ga: myid: ra" .
Amung: yao: wa- ngo ceru: kad' nae" ngad: ra"- nga" jhi jham re phyo' pye' mung: je: qi" ra" jhi sag' jham re ngo dam: kad' nae"- amung: nga" gaug zo maui: lam: jham we' jo,nho" zai jham re jhi sag' jham mae ke' to: nae"- ga: yao: re yao: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao ngo wa ngoyao" gaung re Zhau: vha: gai yaug we"- nao wa myo: sho' zin: qhid' mae" qo ca" ra" jo,nho" zai jham alhab' qo" ava"- Yo yo za: na wa,- Zo: se,- Shaug' se,- amung: pyo: pyo: na wa,- ein: ta" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So wa yao: re- Byugo we"- ana" myi yao: nao kao gyo" li" nae"- ailao" nao qaung" to" ra" jo,nho" zai jham wa khag' qo" sang nae" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: yao" qhid' mae" jo,nho" abam azao qaung" to: mung:- Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae jo,nho" maqo" ra" mo, wa ceru" ra" yaug we' dau: ra"- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Airumung: naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- naonhaung" kao so' daui: na nae" qhid' mae" qo ca" ra" zo: ve we' naonhaung" gaung khyao: qhid' mae" ve,mai ve,bau: we' sin: mung: damyid: ci" ge,-
Kao so' wa zo: ve tho' myo: sho' je: akhyag mung:- gaung khyao wa ve,mai ve,bau: tho' myo: sho' je: akhyag: ra" .
Kano, jham re qu" ge,- yao: bam wa myug: shi: maqho:- masin:- yad re: mayad: yu ngad: ako"- yao: bam wa zai to: qe, we' gaug jhi jham re: maqo" ngad: ako" . Ngadqere: Mao" So wa yao: bam re zho" na: ra" . Naonhaung" wa ngho' zo: jham tho' gyai myo: sho' je: phug' de; ako" .
Naonhaung" mae" khoyaug myid: ci" ruyang yao: yao" kao dajhid' je: qhang sho' qo"daui: na ko" i?
Airumung: naonhaung" wa- airu" ra" angai athao za: re lhao" maqo" kad' ko" re wa gatau: khyo jham we' sin: mung: pe"mung: myid: ci" ko" i?
Seyo: bin: gae jham khoru: yaug: qi" li" ko" rure qu" ge,- yao: bam wa mau" mazaui:- yao: bam: qhid' mae" mai bau: re: maqo, ko" ngad: ra"- ngadqere: naonhaung" re ngo ta" kyo: geli"- Sholamon kho: kham lhao" re: ai: seyo: bin: gae dagae qhi" yaung" sho' maqo" shaung: ve, ngad: ra" .
Mao" So re lam khug: myid ngai: ra" mo, we"- ana" ba yaug: jo, mung: ne, mo" ba myikhyeim" mae ngha" pye' ra" seyo mae" myo, gae jham re Mao" So wa airu: shaung vhe' byid' to" ngad: re wa- aitho' mago" naonhaung" re je yang: shaung vhe' byid' li" nae" mangad: i?
Airumung: naonhaung" wa pe" zo: pe" shaug' nae" laug ein: damyid: ci" damyid: qug: ge,-
( Pe"mung: ga"re dangman" ra" Mao" So re malam khug: ra" ce: mug: myid dao mae" byumyu" alhab' wa aijham we' sin: mung: khonhae" re: myid: ci" na: ako" ) Aijham re naonhaung" qo ca" rure naonhaung" yao: Pho" ba: ra" .
Ai: atha"- naonhaung" wa Mao" So: mung"dan: re qho ge,- Airu: lao"- Mao" So wa ai: gu: alhab' naonhaung" re byid' li" nae" .
Yao kyaung" ngai we"- Dagyaug wa,- pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" Pho" wa naonhaung" re mung"dan: byid: nug: ra" .
Naonhaung" jo,nho" jham re aung" pye' mung:- myaung sho: mo, re byid: ge,- maqeim: majad: ra" ngaui thaung jham re kad' yu ge,- Khug' hab' maqo" khug' yu mung: nhug: yang maqo" zo" qheim" pye' ra" mug: gaung: dao mae magyid mayeim: ra" naonhaung" jo,nho" jham re qaung" to: ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" jo,nho: jo; ra" tau mae naonhaung" nhag' lam: taui" jo; li" nae" .
Naonhaung" wa pe" boe" lo ngadqere: jin" jin" ngad: na genae" qhid' mae" phyid' cui: cui" ci yang:- naonhaung" myibaung: jham re te' to: ge,-
Lo, xo' poe mae" thug' lo: ra" Asang re lao" na ko" ra" daui daui mo, we' dakhyo: kad' na ge,- Asang joe" lo mung: kham: loko' we' aijao" yao:- yao: bam wa yao: re kham: phung" byid' li" genae" .
Asang dam: tug' joe" lo: ra" au:- jin" jin" za: lhaug' na ko" rure daui daui mo; asang: yang lomyao: ra" daui daui mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- ai: daui daui mo; asang wa yao: bam re zozo: jaung: mae zaung: jo, nhao mung:- yao" bau: qang khyad' pye' yang:- yao: bam re caung da" byid' li" nae" .
Gae gaung: myi: re- mangad: lao"-qo, teim myi: re ngad ngad yao: joe" lo: re jin" jin" za: kad' na ko" rure yao: lomyao: re wa ai: daui daui mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra" .
Yham sang wa khug' hab' vao li" nae" ayo, re yao: ba: ngad: re wa yao" yham khug khyo ai: khug' hab' re cad' vao li" nhao nae" mangad: ein: rure naonhaung" xam" to: ge,-
Aimung: naonhaung" re: jin" jin" kad' to: ge,- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa naonhaung" mamyid: to" ra" yo, khyin: mae joe" li" li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Petru wa- Asang we"- ce: dao: tau" wa ngonhaung" qhid' mae" ta" ru i? Mangad: lao"- yaug khao: ngo" qhid' mae" nao ta" ru ngad: i? ga: Yesu re- myid' ra" .
Asang wa Kyid: ru we' qag yaug khoyaug ngad: i? Yao: wa yao" Asang: yang yao" yham khug: mau" zo" jham re au: jhui" she: kad' nae" we' ayo, joe" lao"- yao" daui daui mo, re zo: ve kho' byid: nae" qhid' mae" san: to" ra" yaug ngad: li" nae" .
Asang dam: joe" lo: au:- ai: daui daui yaug wa byid' to" ra" mau" zo" jham re kyid kyid za: zaui" na: rure yao" Asang lomyao: re wa ai: daui daui yaug wa ngaui lho" ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- Asang wa yao" jo,nho" zai yo alhab' re pyo nae" qhid' mae" ai: daui daui yaug re san: to" li" nae" .
Ngadqere: ai: daui daui yaug wa nga" Asang dam: joe" lo nae" myao" shi"- ga: yao: yao" aung khug mae myid yang:- yao: wa gatau: daui daui yauggai- myiqe: qere be; ru we' zo: shaug' mung: yid: na: ra" .
Ai: daui daui yaug mamyid: to" ra" ba na we' yao: maba mabeim" ra" yo, khyin: mae Asang wa dam: joe" lo: li" nae" . Ailao" yao" Asang wa ai: daui daui yaug re xo sho' qobo dae byid: mung: mho dao: magyo" ra" mo, kham zo" ra" qobo dae re kham zo: nhao: li" nae" .
Khoru: kad' re yao: yao" Asang o: ga" rure ba: to: qere: jin" jin" maseim" to:- Asang myid o: ra" khyo" makad' to" ra" daui daui yaug wa qobo dae myo: sho' be; ru qhug' kham zo" li" nae" .
Ngadqere: yao" Asang pe" o: ga" rure maba lo:- qobo kham zo: man" ra" mau" shad' ra" daui daui yaug kam" wa qobo dae po: nae"- Myo: sho' kham: yu: ra" yaug mae" wa myo: sho' mho' yu: li" nae"- myo: sho' ab byid' to: yaug mae" wa myo: sho' mho' yu: li" nae" .
Ngo wa myid gaung dao re myi: ngha" nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru ngad:- ana" yao: de; nga" re wo"-
Ngo kham: yu ca" ra" qid nyhab' dalam: jo, shi"- ai: mau" zo" mabin bin wa ngo gyai myid myo: myid laug mung: ra" .
Ngo wa ce: mug: myid dao khyo yaug yo nhao nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru ngad: ein: naonhaung" jho ko" i? Mangad:- Ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru mangad:- jho" kho' nhao nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru angad:-
Ana" mae" thoegu:- yham khug byu ngo" zo: na: ra" ug' khug' dinkhu: dalam: mae shid' zo: wa dashad' sam zo" gu: wa dashad' jho" kho' li" genae" .
Yao: pho" qe wa yao: bam: yauggai zo: qe we'- yauggai zo: qe wa yao: pho" qe we'- yao: myhi" qe wa yao: bam: myiqe: zo: qe we'- myiqe: zo: qe wa yao: myhi" qe we'- yao: na bam wa dau mo" qe we'- dau mo" qe wa yao: na bam we' gye jho" boe" mung:- byo; sin" lo" li" genae" .
Yesu wa mo, byu qere- ba vao shad' mae" nhag' qhid' do, lo: na: rure naonhaung" myao gelao"- mug: qu naemyao:- ga: naonhaung" dalhang: dae lhaung" ta" ako"- ai we' dakhyo: re: lhaung" boe" ra" .
Qid bang: shad' khyo" la hug' lo lao"- ba lhe' naemyao:- ga: naonhaung" lhaung" ta" ako"- ai we' dakhyo: re: lhaung" boe" ra" .
Geim kad' mo, we"- naonhaung" wa mug: gaung we' myid gaung re qu" mung: mug: phung: mug: qu nae" ave, ayaug: re qo" ba: kho' ta" ako"- aire ana" pyad qae" mae" ave, ayaug: re naonhaung" pe"mung: maba: kho' qu" ko" i?
Jo: ru kad' nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" yao: pe"mung: dao: maqo" kho' ko" i?
Byu dayaug yaug nao re yug: zhaug' mung: yung" zaung nae" qhid' mae"tarha" yung" khyo jhui" ye" lo" ngad: re- tarha" yung" khyo majoe" ye: shire gai: boe" ra" qhi" yao: we' mang: dae sho' kad' wa, Nao airu: makad' re wa yao: wa nao re tarha" zug: pho" qhid' kheim: khyo she: khyad' ye" lo" li" nae"- ailao" tarha" zug: pho" wa nao re gug: gam pho" lo, khyo ab byid' pye' mung:- nao re thaung: mae lhaung" to" li" nae" .
Nao khyug' ca" ra" ngaui alhab' mabin: khyug' khyug' wa thaung: khug mae" nao qo" thug' lo nae" mangad:- ga: mo, byu qere ta" ra" .
Ai: ayo, mae ai: jo, qo mae na: ra" mo, byu qemae" damyo" wa Galile mang: byu qe Mao" So re xeim: ngaui" byid' na ko" au:- Pilad yang se' pye' ra" mo; khyo re Yesu re ta" kyo" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Ai: Galile mang: byu qe airu: se' pye' qhug' ko" ruyang Galile mang: byu gaje qe alhab' mo, tho' je: xo: ra" qobo qo" mo, ngad ko" ra"-ein: naonhaung" jho ko" i?
Gaigai: yao: airu: mangad:- naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- naonhaung" re: myid matha" ko" re wa ai bam shid ko" ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" alhab' re: shid: li" genae" .
Alao" Siloam mae" gyebyu zaung byo; gyo" lo" mung: lonhai" se' pye' ra" byu daxe: she' yaug wa Yerusalem vobyu alhab' tho' qobo qo" mo, ngad: ako" ein: naonhaung" jho ko" i?
Gaigai: yao: mangad:- naonhaung" re- ngo ta" geli"- naonhaung" re:- naonhaung" qobo jham mae" myid matha" ko" re wa aibam shid: ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re: shid: li" genae" ga: tau" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa ce: dao: tau" ci yang: ta" ra"- Dalhang mae byu dayaug wa yao" sabyi khyae mae pho' ham" gae dagae qho" to" ra" . Yao: wa pho' ham" shi: zaui: va" laug ga: yeqho qho mung: kad' ngadqere: dace' re: mamyao ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yao: wa yao" khyae lhaug' caung yaug re Ngo wa ce: pho' ham" gae re ashi: li" cao" qho: ru sam zin ngad va"- ngadqere: dace' re: ngo mamyao- Ce: pho' ham" gae thau: lhang" pye' wa,- Myid gaung re amyid: avho: pe"mung: kad' to: nae" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: khyae caung yaug wa Asang we"- dazin za: wa yaug: jo, shi: vashao:- Apan gam: sho' khoe' mung: myid xau ke' qu" shinae"-
Airumung: sao nhag' ashi: gai zaui" li" shi: maba- Ashi: mazaui" li" lao" kam" wa thau: lhang" pye' wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Dugno: Ba daba mae Yesu wa Tarha" Jung Yham dalam: khug mae mho" shid' na: ra" .
Aimae makhyang" ra" yui bin: yang: daxe: she' zin geim" no: na: ra" myiqe: dayaug na: ra" . Yao: wa dao nghaug' lo" byaug mung: dajhid' re: maqo" jhao" ke' ngad: ra" .
Yesu yao: re myao lao" yao: re khai: ke' mung: Myiqe: we"- ni" no mae" loe; ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: yao" dao mae lo, kai: byid' ra"- ailao" jao" ai: myiqe: wa yao" dao kao" jao: lo" byaug mung:- Mao" So re caung: khin" ra" .
Airu:- Dugno: Ba mae Yesu no gai byid' ruyang Tarha" Jung Yham au: jhaung pho" wa nhag' yo: mung:- Mo, byu qere Mau" zaui: nae" ba na khyaug' ba jo; ra"- Airumung: ai: ba na gyo" gu: mae no li" ya: gai: yu geri:- Dugno: Ba mae wa dali" ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Asang wa yao: re- Geim kad' mo, naonhaung" we"- naonhaung" mae" khag' ngadqere: Dugno: Ba mae yao" nung: lo:- mangad: lao"- yao" lo ze re qid jhaug' nae" qhid' mae" gug' nyhug' yham mae" lhaung" pheim: ke' ko" ra" mangad: i?
Abraham nho: myiqe: zo: ceyaug wa Satan" yang daxe: she' zin geim" taui" to" ru qhug' ra"- Dugno: Ba mae aimae" yao: re magai: pheim: ke' i? ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu phaug' tau" ra" dao: wa yao: re gye kad' na ko" ra" mo, re qho' ne phyi boe" nhao: ra" . Mo, byu qe wa Yesu zaui" ra" mug' pho: mau" zo" jham: mathao mae ngaui bau" ako" .
Yesu wa- Mao" So: mung"dan: wa pe" we' dau: i? Ngo pe" ja: we' dau tau" nae" i?
Mao" So: mung"dan: wa ceru we' dau: ra" . Byu dayaug wa ao: shi: jid' re yu mung:- yao" yo mae sin" ke' ra" . Ao: shi: wa yaug: qi" li" mung: ngho' jham wa ao: gae akaung jham mae asad' sad' ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa- Mao" So: mung"dan: re ngo pe" we' dau tau" nae" i? Aiwa ceru we' dau: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Myiqe: dayaug man" re yu mung:- cin man" sam phai" mae ke' lao" cin man" bam geim" re bai" do, li" nhao: ra" man" we' dau: ra" .
Yesu wa Yerusalem khyo ye" lo" ra" gyaung: khyo mae mo, byu qere mho" byid: zo" re" vozo: vozang khao: ngo" re su" lai: ye" ra" .
Byu dayaug wa Yesu re- Asang we"- Khyad' yu qhug' ra" mo, dajhid' za: ngad nae" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Lhae" ra" kham: dung: khyo" vao ye: nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" qam: ke' ge,- naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- byu myo: sho' mo, ai: kham: dung: khyo" vao ye: nae" qam: ke' li" genae"- ngadqere: yao: bam maqo" vao ye: genae" .
Yham sang wa ai: kham: re li" pyid' pye' mung: naonhaung" wa ai: taung gaung mae ye; jo, yang: Asang we"- Ngonhaung" re kham: li" phung" byid: la, ga: mho' gelao"- yham sang wa- Naonhaung" khai: mae" joe" li" mo, ngad ko" rure ngo maba- ga: ta" li" nae" .
Alao" naonhaung" wa- Ngonhaung" wa nao we' daga" zo: shaug' mung: na: qu" va" mo, ngad:- nao wa ngonhaung" vogaung: mae mho" shid' byid' qu" va" ra" ga: ta" li" genae" .
