Ngadqere: yham sang wa- Naonhaung" khai: mae" joe" li" mo, ngad ko" rure ngo maba- Makhyang" ra" mo, we"- ngo mae" thug' lo" ge,- ga: tau" li" nae" .
Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: mung"dan: khug mae Abraham- Isag- Yaku we' lapa alhab' re myao gemung:- naonhaung" yao: wa ai: mung"dan: taung gaung shad' khyo khe' thug' pye' ru qhug' gelao"- ai: tau mae naonhaung" wa ngug byid ngug nhe' we' zaui kyag' yang: na: li" genae" .
Byu qe wa ba thug'- ba vao- mug: am:- mug: thao shad' mae" joe" li" mung:- Mao" So: mung"dan: zo: shaug' poe mae li" zaung: jo; li" genae" .
Amung: ana" athao" mae ngad: ra" mo, wa qhid' au: mae ngad: li" genae"- ana" qhid' au: mae ngad: ra" mo, wa athao" mae ngad: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: yo, khyin: mae Pharishe qe daqhae: wa Yesu jhao" li" mung:- nao Cetau mae" gatau dakhyo khyo thug' ye" lo" wa,- pe"mung: ga"re Herod nao re se' pye' nae" seim" na: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- ngo wa ana" ba we' ne, mo" ba gu: mae yui jham re khe' thug' mung:- no phyo: jham re gai byid: yang: na nae"- amung: sam ba: ba re wa nga" mau" zo" re zaui" pin" nae" ga" ein: ai: zagne pho" re lo" ta" kyo: ge,-
Ngadqere: ana" ba- ne, mo" ba- sao pho" ba wa ngo gyaung: xo' ye: ca" shi"- Lapa wa Yerusalem mae" je yang: gatau mae se' pye' qhug' nae" maang ngad: ra" .
Yerusalem we"- Yerusalem we"- Lapa qere se' pye' mung:- Mao" So: yang nhao: ke' ra" lagyo: qere laug baui: yang nao pye' se' ra" . Qo, zang wa qo, nau" jham re yao" daung khug mae zhang" to" ru we' dakhyo:- ngo wa ni" vobyu qere nga" lo, khug mae zhang" to: nae" qhid' mae" ngo khonho" lhang qam: ke' ngadqere: nao maqad ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ni" Caung: pa" Yham re shapye' pye' ru qhug' li" nae" . Nao re ngo ta" nae"- Mao" So: mang we' joe" li" ra" yaug wa ngaui lho" vashao: wo"- ga: nao mata" ta" wa ana" ba mae" nao ngore maqhug' myao lo nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Dugno: Ba daba mae Yesu wa Pharishe au: jhaung dayaug: yham khyo zozo: nae" ga: vao ye" ra" . Mo, byu qe wa Yesu re te' te' za: lhaug' qu" na: bam: ako" .
Khyid lo, qae: mung: no: ra" byu dayaug Yesu jhao" li" joe" na: jo; ra" .
Yesu wa Tarha" Mho" Pho" qe we' Pharishe qere- Ngonhaung" tarha" wa- Dugno: Ba mae no gai: gai byid' ga:- ta" ra" i? Mangad: lao"- magai: gai byid:- ga: ta" ra" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa pe" dakheim: re: matau: ko" ngad: ra" . Ailao" Yesu wa ai: no yaug re jhui" yu yang: gai byid: mung: yao: re phao nhao: ke' ra" .
Amung: Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" mae" dayaug yaug wa yao: zo:- mangad: lao"- nung: lo: dadau: Dugno: Ba mae qid thaung: khug khyo byid: gyo" vao: jo; ngad: re aijao" yao: naonhaung" mashe: thug' yu lo: khag' na genae" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa cedao: re maqo" phaug' tau: ko" ngad: ra" .
Bang" vo qemae" damyo" wa gai: thao" ra" jo, qo re khyin: na ko" rure Yesu qu" ba lao"- yao: wa yao: bam re dao: tau" ci yang:-
Nao re dayaug yaug myi: vhin" poe khyo li" khai lao"- gai: thao" ra" jo, qo mae dazaung wa,-
Nao tho' je: akhyag: ra" yaug rere: khai: to: mung:- ni" shid' zo: geim" re khai: to" ra" poe sang pho wa nao jhao" li" yang: Yao: re- cejo, qo mae zaung nhao wa,- ga: ta" lao"- nao wa qho' phau" ru we' nyham: thao" ra" jo, qo khyo qui" zaung ca" li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: nao re khai gelao"- nyham: ra" zaung jo, qo mae yezaung wa,- ailao" nao re khai: ra" bang" sang pho wa nao jhao" li" mung:- ba nam pho" we"- Je: gai: ra" zaung jo, qo khyo li" zaung wa,- ga: nao re ta" nae"- ailao" nao wa bang" vo alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae nga: ye; li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: yao" gaung re khin" ra" yaug wa nyham: khyo" pye' ru qhug' li" nae"- yao: yao" gaung re nyham: khyo" ra" yaug kam" wa khin" byid' ru qhug' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa yao" bang" sang pho re Nao wa ne, xe: mangad: lao"- myi"xeim re da" zho: nae"ein lao"- ni" ba nam qe- ni" mao: nhaung: qe- ni" ba nam ug zo: qe- ni" yham kyo: cao: sathe" qere dakhai- pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa nao re dam: tug' khai zho: mung: nao re jeju dam: tug' xe' li" genae" .
Airumung: nao wa zo: shaug' poe da" zho: lao"- myaung sho: mo,- gaung dau: qeim mo, khyid gyug: mo, myo, jid mo, re khai zho: wa,-
Alao" nao wa ngaui lho" li" nae"- pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa nao re jeju maqo" dam: xe' ko" ngad: ra" . Din: man" ra" mo, dam: daui: to" li" ra" ba na mae Mao" So wa nao re jeju dam: xe' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Saboe" mae zaung: jo; ra" mo, mae" dayaug wa ai: dao: re the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa Yesu re- Mao" So: mung"dan: mae" zo: shaug' poe mae yeqo" vao zo: nae" yaug wa ngaui lho" ra" wo"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Byu dayaug wa zo: shaug' poe mo" dalam: seim" nyhang" na mung:- yao: wa byu myo: sho' re khai: to" ra" .
Ai: zo: shaug' poe ba na joe" lao"- yao" daui daui byu dayaug re yao: khai: to" ra" mo, jhao" nhao: ke' mung:- Li" gese,- Alhab' jin" va"- ga: yecao" ta" nhao: ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa dayaug: thao dayaug maqo" li" ra" khyo ta" ako" . Sao qhid' mae" yaug wa- ngo yo dakhyao: vai: to"- ai re yequ" ca" ra"- Airumung: ngore akhang" byid: la,- ga: ai: daui daui yaug re ta" ra" .
Gatau dayaug wa- ngo wa nung: jaung lo: ngo" zam" vai: to"- Aijham we' mau" yezaui" jham" qu" ca" ra" . Airumung: ngore akhang" byid: la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: gatau dayaug wa Ngo wa ana" za: shi" myi: yu: to: yang: maqo" li"- ga: ta" ra" .
Daui daui yaug wa dam: tug' lo mung: ai: gu: alhab' yao" asang re lota" kyo" ra"- yao" asang wa nhag' yo: mung:- yao" daui daui yaug re hau" mo" khyodang jham we' yham gyo: khaung: mae" khyodang jham khyo phyad thug' ye: mung: myaung sho" ra" mo,- gaung dau qeim: ra" mo,- myo, jid mo,- khyid gyug: mo, re yekhai: jhui" lo ri:- ga: ta" ra" .
Mataung" myao" re ai: daui daui yaug wa dam: lo mung:- Asang we"- nao ta" ru we' dakhyo: bin: kad' va"- ngadqere: zaung jo, qo gung" jo; ashi"- ga: yao" asang re ta" ra" .
Alao" asang wa yao" daui daui yaug re- Seyo: vogaung: khyo jham khyo phyad thug' ye: mung:- byu qere nga" yham byang" sho' maqad maqui" yekhai: jhui" lo ri:- ga: ta" ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- ngo khai: to" ra" mo, wa nga" myi" xeim re qhug' tau" genae" mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Dalhang: mae" mo, byu qe ajham ataung Yesu we' su" ye" lo" na ko" au:- Yesu wa yao: bam shad' khyo lhang: lo mung:-
Ngo jhao" li" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao" myhi" pho"- yao" myi: zo:- yao" mao: nhaung: nhae: mo" we' yao: yao" gaung re jhid' de; ra" tho' ngore majhid' de; ra" yaug wa nga" mho"zo: maqo" boe" ngad: ra" .
Amung: yao" pyao: zang re tau: vo, mung: nga" thao macao" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: nga" mho"zo: maqo" boe" ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" mae" khag' ngadqere: gyebyu zaung kad' nae" ein lao"- aire bin sho' kad' nae" yao" lo, mae ngaui laug nae" malaug nae" gyo" ang: ra" gau jho re shi" zaung: jo, mung: masun" qu" nae" khag' na: i?
Yao: wa airu: masun" qu" lo:- apan aqao: wa yekad' qhid: to: mung:- ai: gyebyu zaung re maqo" kad' pin" ngad: re wa- aire myao: ra" mo, alhab' wa yao: re qi: jung" pye' li" genae" .
Ceyaug wa apan aqao: wa zhaug' qhid: to: mung: maqo" kad' pin" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" li" genae" .
Amung kho: kham dayaug yaug wa yao: re gye kad' ra" kho: kham dayaug- gyezo: shid' tug we' gye to" li" ra" yaug re yao" gyezo: datug we' thug' ye: mung:- gye yezin: nae" ein lao"- yao: wa gyo" zaung mung:- ai: gatau kho: kham pho" we' gye zin: nae" yao" gyezo: qam: bo mabo: rure shi" sao qhid' mamyid: phyid' qu" ra" kho: kham na nae" i?
Yao: gye maqo" zin: re wa ai: gatau kho: kham pho" va: va: mae ngad shi" au:- yao: wa lagyo: qere nhao: ke' mung:- ai: gatau kho: kham pho" re mang: jho" dae nae" qhid' mae" mho' nhao: ke' li" nae" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" mae" khag' ngadqere: yao: qo" ra" gu: alhab' re mato" pye' co' ra" yaug wa nga" mho"zo: maqo" boe" ngad: ra"- ga: dao: pin" ra" .
Xo: wa gai: ra"- ngadqere: ai: xo: wa ngae: ru shao" byaug lao" wa dam: ngae sho' khoru: madam: gai: kad' ngad: ra" .
Aiwa yo myid gaung qhid' mae" re:- myid xau kad' nae" qhid' mae" re: magai lo: ngad: ra" . Amung: ai: xo: re taung gaung khyo shapye' pye' nae" za: angad: ra" . Amung: nokhye' de; ra" yaug wa tae" gyo" yu vashao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Daba mae khang: gaug mo, myo: sho' we' qobo qo" ra" mo, wa Yesu mungdao: re tae" gyo: nae" ga: Yesu jhao" li" ako" .
Alao" Pharishe qe we' Jham: Tung" Pho" qe wa ceyaug wa qobo qo" ra" mo, re- bang" tug: yu mung: yao: bam we' lhao" re: zo daga" zo" ra"- ga: nyhung: ako" .
Airumung: Yesu wa ce: dao: tau" ci yang:- naonhaung" mae" dayaug yaug wa yao dayo dau: qo" mung:-
Aimae" dadau: byaug: byaug lao"- yao: pe" ru: kad' nae" i? Yao: wa ai: dang: ra" gug xe: gug dau: re mhin: gyo, jao: mae nha: to: co' mung: ai: byaug: lo" ra" yao re myao sho' qho: li" nae" .
Ai: byaug: ra" yao re qho: myao lao"- yao: wa gyai bau" ru we' yao" lo, sin dao mae vo, yang: dam: lo: ra" .
Yham khyo joe" lo lao"- yao: wa yao" ba nam qere we' yham kyo: cao: qere khai: zhang" yu mung:- Byaug: byaug: ra" nga" yao dam: qho: qhug' va"- ngo we' daga" ngaui bau: gelang:- ga: ta" li" nae" .
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- ai we' dakhyo:- myid tha" maca"- ga: myid: na ko" ra" din: man" ra" byu gug xe: gug yaug: mathao mae ngaui bau" ra" tho' qobo qo" ra" byu dayaug myid tha" lo: ra" mathao: yang- mug: gaung dao mae je yang: ngaui bau" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: dakhyo" wa myiqe: dayaug wa- ngaui thang: the: daxe kye' qo" mung:- aimae" dakye' byaug: byaug lao"- yao: wa pe" ru: kad' nae" i? Yao: wa myikaug' te' yang: yham geim" sham: mung: aire myao sho' khyi" khao: ngo" jid' jid' naug naug qho: li" nae" .
Yao: wa ai: ngaui thang: the: re qho: myao lao"- yao" ba nam qe we' yham kyo: cao: qere khai: zhang" yu mung:- Byaug: byaug: ra" nga" ngaui thang: the: kye' dam: myao va"- amung: ngo we' daga" ngaui bau: gelang:- ga: yao: bam re ta" li" nae" .
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- ai we' dakhyo: Mao" So: mug: lagyo: wa qobo qo" ra" byu dayaug myid tha" lo: ra" mathao: yang ngaui bau" ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu xo' yang: ta" ru wa- dalhang: mae" byu dayaug wa yauggai zo: shid' yaug qo" ra" .
Angai yaug wa yao: pho" re- Nga" pho" we"- ngo sang ang: ra" jo,nho" re ana" yao: ngore gae bam khyo" byid: la,- ga: mho' ra" . Ailao" yao: pho" wa yao: zo: tao re yao" jo,nho" gae byid' ra" .
Ai: thao mataung" myao" re yao: zo: angai yaug wa jo,nho" gae bam re aung" pye' mung:- jo,nho" aung: yang: qo" ra" ngaui alhab' re vin mung:- yham mae" thug' lo" ra" . Yao: wa va" ra" mung" khyo ye" lo" mung:- ai: mung"dan: mae pyo: poe" kad' mung: mageim: be, lhu" pye' ra" .
Yao" ngaui alhab' yhung: zo" gan thao re ai: mung"dan: geim" mae bao" khug' mo" zang khug' lo mung:- yao: wa masho: majhin ngad: byaug: ra" .
Airumung:- yao: wa ai: mung" mae" byu dayaug jhao" yecao: khug: na: ra" . Ai: yaug wa yao: re yao" khyae khyo vo, yezam: nae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' ra" .
Yao: wa vo, jham zo" ra" vo, zo shagyao: daung" re lhao"- zo: nug: li" ra" . Ngadqere: yao: re zo: ve khag' re: mabyid: zho: gengad: ra" .
Lo" thao" mae myid: beim" li" mung:- nga" pho" okaung qe alhab' wa magan: mago" qo" zo" ako"- ana" ngo wa cetau mae moe; kyaug' shid: lo" na:-
Ngo wa to" mung:- nga" pho" jhao" lo" mung:- nga" pho" we"- ngo wa Mao" So rere:- nga" pho" nao rere: shad' va"-
Ngo wa ni" zo: ein: ta" nae" lhao" re: maman: qi" lo: ngad: ra"- ni" okaung pho" dayaug we' dakhyo: ngore to: la,-ein: nga" pho" re lo" ta" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: wa to" mung: yao: pho" jhao" phao: lo" ra" . Yao: va: va: mae ngad shi" au: mae" yao: pho" wa yao: re myao mung:- nhag' qu" khyag' ru we' tao" ye: yang:- yao: zo" lang zang: re yege; vo, mung:- bobaug baug: ra" .
Yao: zo: wa nga" pho" we"- ngo wa Mao" So rere:- nga" pho" nao rere: shad' va"- ngo wa ni" zo: ein: mhang" nae" lhao" re: maman: qi" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: pho" wa yao" daui daui mo, re- Gai: thao" ra" bau: qhang phyad yu: lo mung: yao: re lovhe' byid: geri:- yao" lo, mae lo, pin: lopin: byid: geri:- yao" khyid mae khyid zhaung: lozhaung: byid: geri:-
Amung: myhaug' to" ra" nung: jaung nau" se' ge,- amung: ngonhaung" ngaui ngaui bau: bau: za: zo: shaug' poe kad' gelang:-
Pe"mung: ga"re nga" zo: ceyaug wa shid va" ru ngad:- ngadqere: ana" dam: daui: li" va" . Yao: wa byaug: byaug va" yaug ngad:- ana" wa dam: myao va"- ga: ta" ra" . Amung: ngaui ngaui bau: bau: zo: shaug' poe kad' ako" .
Ai: au: zoqhid' yaug wa yo mae ngad: ra" . Yo mae" lo mung:- yham khyo jhao" li" na lao"- yao: wa zang- mao" be, thoe we' go" na ko" ra" thoe re lothe' gyo" ra" .
Airumung: yao: wa daui daui byu dayaug re khai: yu mung:- Pe" kad' na ko" ra" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ai: daui daui yaug wa ni" nhaung: dam: joe" lo mung: ni" pho" wa Ni"- nhaung: pe" maqo byan: byan: za: dam: joe" lo yang: myhaug' to" ra" nung: jaung nau" re se' nhao va" ra"- ga: tau" ra" .
Zoqhid' yaug wa gyai nhag' yo: mung:- yham khug khyo mavao lo" lo: na: ra" . Ailao" yao: pho" wa thug' ye: mung:- yham khug khyo vao lo nae" qhid' mae" yejhu" ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: zo: zoqhid' yaug wa yao: pho" re- Qu" wa,- ngo wa jeim dayaug we' dakhyo: ni" qhid' mae" cenho" zin mau" zaui" lo va"- ni" amyin" dao: re ngo khonhae" re: mangag: qu"- ngadqere: nao ngore pe" daja: byid' qu" i? Nga" byin cao: qe we' pyo: poe" kad' nae" qhid' mae" cad' be, dadau: lhao" re: nao ngore mabyid' qu" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ni" jo,nho" jham re shava myhi" qe we' zam" mung:- mageim: da" sin" pye' ra" ce: ni" zo: dam: joe" lo lao"- nao wa yao" qhid' mae" myhaug' to" ra" nung: jaung nau" se' ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: pho" wa Nga" zo: we"- nao wa khonhae" re: ngo we' daga" za: na: ra"- ngo qo" gu: alhab' ni" mae" ngad: ra" .
Ni" nhaung: wa shid: byaug va" ru ngad:- ngadqere: yao: wa ana" dam: daui: li" va" ra"- yao: wa byaug: byaug va" ru ngad: ra"- ana" wa dam: myao va" . Aimung: ngonhaung" wa ngaui bau: za: zo: shaug' poe kad' gai: ra"- ga: jhu" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Dalhang mae- sathe" dayaug wa yao" jo,nho" re zam: pyo byid' ra" daui daui byu dayaug qo" ra" . Ai: daui daui yaug wa sathe" pho" jo,nho" jham re mageim: da" sin" pye' na: ra"- ga: sathe" pho" re ta" kyo" ako" .
Airumung: sathe" pho" wa yao: re khai: yu yang:- ni" khyo we' sin: mung: ngo the' gyo" ru wa pe" ru: i? Nao zam: pyo: na: ra" nga" jo,nho" japhin: alhab' sho' qhu" la,- pe"mung: ga"re ana" mae" thoegu: zam: pyo mau" kad' zai mangad: lo:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: daui daui yaug wa yao: yao: re- Nga" asang wa ngore zam: pyo mau" mae" phoe' pye' naeva" myao:- ngo pe" ru: kad' nae" i? Myid dau: myid baug nae" qam: o: mabo- Mho' zo: mho' shaug' nae" re: ngo qho' ra" .
Ngo re zam: pyo mau" mae" phoe' pye' lao"- su bam ngore yao: bam: yham mae lham: khae: yu nug gesho' pe" ru: kad' nae" rure ana" ngo ba va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: yao: wa yao" asang re jhin de, ko" ra" mo, alhab' re khai: yu: ra"- yao: wa sao qhid' yaug re- Nao nga" asang re jhin khonho" de; i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ai: yaug wa zhanlun xau yae: dayo jhin de;- ga: ta" ra" . Zam: pyo pho" wa ni" japhin: ce ngad: ra"- Gyo" zaung mung:- ngo" xe ein: tung" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao yao: wa gatau dayaug re Nao re: nga" asang re jhin khonho" de; i? ga: myid' ra" . Ai: yaug wa jung: gaug tang dataung de;- ga: tau" ra" . Zam: pyo pho" wa Ni" japhin: cemae ngad: ra"- Gyo" zaung mung: she' yo ein: tung" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: nhag' lam: madin" ra" zam: pyo pho" wa airu: qag qag za: kad' ruyang yao" asang wa yao: re khin" byid' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ce: myid gaung byu qe wa yao: bam: myid gaung: mau" zo" kad' rumae mug: bo" yao: zo: qe tho' je: qag: ako" .
Yesu wa xo' yang: Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Myid gaung dao: jo,nho" yang naonhaung" yao" ba nam kad' yu ge,- amung: ai: jo,nho" gan: byaug lao"- naonhaung" wa apyad ato: yham mae khae: yu: ru qhug' li" genae" .
Ngai: ra" mau" zo" mae kyid: ra" yaug wa qi" ra" mau" zo" mae re: kyid: li" nae"- Ngai: ra" mau" zo" mae nhag' lam: madin" ra" yaug wa qi" ra" mau" zo" mae re: nhag' lam: din: nae" mangad:-
Airumung: myid gaung dao: jo,nho" we' sin: yang: naonhaung" makyid ko" ngad: re wa dangman" ra" jo,nho" we' sin: yang: naonhaung" re khag' lam genae" i?
Naonhaung" wa su gaje qe sang: ra" jo,nho" we' sin: yang: makyid ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" sang ang: ra" jo,nho" re naonhaung" re khag' byid' li" nae" i?
Daui daui byu okaung khoyaug ngadqere: asang shid' zo" nho: jeim maqo" kad'- yao: wa dayaug re nghang: mung:- gatau dayaug re wa jhid' de; li" nae"- Dayaug re wa phug' myao: mung: gatau dayaug re maphug' makhyad' kad' li" nae" Aimung: naonhaung" wa Mao" So re we' ngaui qhang jo,nho" shid' ja: geim" re jeim maqo" kad' genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: dao: alhab' re ngaui qhang jo,nho" so' kho' mo, ngad ko" ra" Pharishe qe gyo: gelao"- yao: bam wa Yesu re jung" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" wa su gaje: qhid' kheim: mae yao: yao" gaung din: man: mo, ngad: ako"- ga: qu" jho nae" kad' mo, ngad: ako"- ngadqere: Mao" So wa naonhaung" nhag' lam: re ba: ra"- pe"mung: ga"re byu: yang phug' te' ra" ja: wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae phug' made, ngad: ra" .
Moshe Tarha" dao: we' lapa qe: jham: paug' jham wa qid nyhab' Yohan joe" li" ra" ba na joe" sho' kheim: so' bo: jo; ra"- Yohan joe" li" ra" ba na mae" Mao" So: mung"dan: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai wa ta" hau" lo: na mung:- yaug khao: ngo" ai: mung"dan: khug khyo jhin" jhe' vao ye" ako" .
Ngadqere: ai: Tarha" dao: mae" ngai: thao" ra" tung" ce' dace' byaug: lo" nae" laui: ra" tho' mug: gaung we' myid gaung baui" lo"nae" je yang: laui: ra" .
Yao" yham sang myhi" re kao" pye' yang: gatau dayaug re dam: vhin" yu: ra" yaug wa myi: shad' yaug ngad: ra"- Kao" pye' to" ra" myiqe: re vhin" yu: ra" yaug re: myi: shad' yaug ngad: ra" .
Dalhang: mae sathe" dayaug wa phug' thao" ra" ve,mai ve,bau: re ve, yang: ba khao: ngo" zo: pyo: shaug' pyo: yang: na: ra" .
Myaung sho: mung: gaung geim" jad: ra" Lazaru ga: mang: ra" byu dayaug re: sathe" pho" yham kham: dung: mae li" jhui" nha: to: to: kad' ako" .
Yao: wa sathe" pho" saboe" mae" sheim: gyo" ra" zosheim re the' zo: nae" myid: lao" na: ra" . Lakha: jham lhao" re: yao" dae jad: re li" yo, byid' ako" .
Ai: thao re ai: myaung sho" ra" yaug wa shid: lo" mung:- mug: lagyo: qeyang Abraham nho: lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo, nae" vo; lo" byaug: ako"- Sathe" pho" re: shid: lo" mung:- nyhab' shaung: pye' ako" .
Sathe" pho" wa movo: mug: mae gyai dayin dayo: kham zo: mung: tau: qu" ke' re Abraham rere: Abraham nhae mae zaung: jo; ra" Lazaru rere: va: mae" myao: ra" .
Airumung: yao: wa nga" pho" Abraham we"- ngore nhag' khyag' yu la,- ngo wa ce: myikhyeim" khug mae dayin dayo: kham zo" na:- Lazaru wa qid mae yao" lo, nyhug' au: thug' jam: yu yang: nga" sho re li" tag' byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao: re ngojhao" nhao: ke' byid: la,- ga: hug' ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Abraham wa Nga" zo: we"- nao wa daui: na shi" au: ngaui bau: ngaui lho" qhug' kham zo" lo: rure re:- Lazaru wa dayin dayo: masho: majhin kham zo" lai: lo: rure myid: beim: wa,- ana" yao: wa cemae ngaui bau: ngaui lho" qhug' kham zo" na: ra"- nao wa dayin dayo: no kham zo" na: ava" .
Ai: tho' mago" cetau mae" naonhaung" jhao" de; ye: nug mo, maqo" de; ye: genae" we' naonhaung" na: mae" ngonhaung" jhao" maqo" de; li" genae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" we' naonhaung" agyo: mae gyai no; ra" lao: khaung: dalam: jo; ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Sathe" pho" wa Ailao"- nga" pho" Abraham we"- Lazaru re nga" pho" yham khyo nhao: ke' byid: nae" ngo goe; mho' ra" .
Nga" nhaung: bam ngo" zo: na shiko" ra"- yao: bam khalhao" dayin dayo: no kham zo" ra" cejo, qo khyo mali" genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re lo" ta"peim: byid: nhao la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Abraham wa yao: re- Ni" nhaung: bam re ta"peim: byid: nae" Moshe we' lapa qe na: bam: ako"- ni" nhaung: bam wa aibam: dao: re tae" gyo: vageshao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Sathe" pho" wa- Nga" pho" Abraham we"- ai: yang za: maga" nae"- Shid: byaug va" mo, mae" daui: li" ra" dayaug yaug yao: bam jhao" ye" lo" ngad: re wa yao: bam myid tha" lo: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Abraham wa Moshe we' lapa qe: dao: re matae" gyo: ko" re wa shid: rumae" dayaug yaug daui: li" ngadqere: yao: bam lam" genae" mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Byu re nhag' lam: tha" lang: nhao: ra" ja: jham wa khonhae" re: boe" zai ngad: ra"- ngadqere: aijham re boe" nhao: ra" yaug wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ra" .
Ce: ngai: ra" mo, mae" dayaug re nhag' lam: tha" lang: nhao yaug wa yao" lang zang: mae laug lhang taui" lhao: mung: panglai: khug khyo pye' zaui: pye' qhug' ru wa yao" qhid' mae" je: gai: ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung"wa lha" yang: na ge,- ( Ni" mao: nhaung: pho" nao re shad' ngad: re- yao: re qeim wa,- yao: myid tha" lo lao" wa qobo khyad' byid: wa, .
Daba na mae za: yao: wa nao re nhad' lang shad' mung:- nhad' lhang: geim" nao jhao" li" yang: ngo myid tha" va"- ga: ta" lao" wa yao" qobo re khyad' pye' byid: ca" ra"- ga: ta" ra" . )
Alao"- lagyo: qe wa Asang re- ngonhaung" lam khug: myid re je: qi" li" nhao la,- ga: mho' ako" .
Asang wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" lam khug: myid ao: shi: jid' qhi" bo gelao" re:- ce: thaung zo gae re- Agyi: we' daga" apan mae" ban" lo" mung: panglai: mae yeyaug: jo, wa,- ein: ta" gelao" thaung zo gae wa naonhaung" mho dao: re tae" gyo" li" nae" .
Naonhaung" mae" dayaug yaug wa yothaung: phaug' ra" daui daui okaung- mangad: lao"- yao lhaug' ra" daui daui okaung dayaug qo" ein: gelang:- ai: daui daui okaung pho" yothaung: mae" dam: joe" lo lao"- Myi" xeim zo: nae" phyad lozaung ri:- ein: yao: re naonhaung" khag' ta" genae" i?
Naonhaung" mata" genae"- yao: re yaug kam" wa nga" myi" xeim phyad nyhang" jaung wa,- ngo zo: shaug' na: au:- mai bau: nyhang" ve,- lo, cid' pye' yang: ngore caung da" la,- ai bin thao re nao zo: shaug' wa,- ga: naonhaung" ta" genae" mangad: i?
Daui daui yaug wa asang: amyin" dao: re tae" gyo" ruyang yao: re pe" jeju beim: maqo ngad: ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re ta" to" ra" mau" zo" alhab' re bin: zaui: gelao"- ngonhaung" wa mageim: daui daui byu qe angad:- ngonhaung" wa ngonhaung" yao" mau" zo" re zaui: mo, za: angad:- ein: ta" ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Yerusalem vogaung: khyo ye" lo" na: au:- yao: wa Samari mung" we' Galile mung" kyo: khyo" lai: ye" lo" ra" .
Vogaung: dalam: khyo vao ye" lo" re- mao gae: de; ra" byu daxe yaug wa Yesu re li" qhug' ako" .
Yao: bam wa va: va: mae ye; jo, mung:- Asang Yesu we"- ngonhaung" re nhag' khyag' yu la, wo"- ga: zag: hug' ako" .
Yao: bam re Yesu myao lao" yao: wa- Naonhaung" gaung khinjaung qere lo" qhu" byid: ge,- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Yao: bam khyo mae lo" na: au: no gai: shao: lo" byaug ko" ra" . Yao: bam mae" dayaug wa yao: gai: shao: lo" byaug va" rure ba lao"- dam: tug' lo mung:- thoe qi: we' Mao" So re caung: khin" byid' ra" .
Yao: wa Yesu khyid qao: khyo goe; gyo" yang: Yesu re jeju beim: so" ra"- aiyaug wa Samari byumyu" ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa- ( Byu daxe zo: mao gae: gai: shao: lo" byaug vako" ra" mangad: i? Gatau gug zo" gu: khai: lo" ko" ra" i?
Pe"mung: ce: taung bug byu dayaug za: Mao" So: jeju re caung: byid: nae" dam: tug' lo: ra" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- To" mung: lo" se,- ni" lam khug: myid wa nao re gai: shao: lo" nhao: ava"- ga: ta" ra" . )
Pharishe qe daqhae: wa Yesu re Mao" So: mung"dan: khonhae" joe" li" nae" i? ga: myid' ako"- Alao" Yesu wa- Mao" So: mung"dan: wa myo; yang myao: ra" khyo" joe" li" nae" mangad:-
Qu" ge,- Mao" So: mung"dan: wa cetau mae ngad: ra"- Mangad: lao"- thoe: tau mae ngad: ra"- ga: khag' re: maqo" ta" ngad: ra"- pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: mung"dan: wa naonhaung" khug mae ngad: ra"- ga: yao: bam re tau" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- Byu: Yao: Zo" nho: ba na mae" daba re- naonhaung" myao nug kao bau nae" ra" ba na joe" lo: li" nae"- ngadqere: naonhaung"aire maqhug' myao genae" .
Byu daqhae: wa Qu" ge,- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa thoe: tau mae na: ra"- cetau mae na: ra"- ga: ta" gengad yang: re:- naonhaung" daye: qho ge, .
Lhe' cad' wa mug: myid dashad' mae" gatau dashad' joe" sho' mug: gaung mae bao: qhui: lai: lo" ru we' dakhyo:- Byu: Yao: Zo: re: yao" ba na mae airu: ngad: li" nae" .
Ngadqere: Byu: Yao: Zo: wa dayin dayo: myo: sho' kham zo" ru we' ceqae" mae" byu qeyang ngag: ha: pye' rure sao qhid' kham zo: ca" li" nae",
Noa ban: pyad mae boe" ru we' dakhyo:- Byu: Yao: Zo: joe" li" nae" ba na mae re: airu: boe" nae" .
Noa wa qid sang pho khug khyo vao lo" mung: daqid shi" li" yang: alhab' mo, nab: shid: lo" ra" ba na joe" sho' xao su byu qe wa zo: zo: shaug' shaug' myi: byid:- myi: yu mung:- na: ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- Lod ba na mae re: byu qe wa zo: zo: shaug' shaug' zai vai zai aung:- qho: zo: qho: shaug'- yham zhaug' yang: na: ako" .
Sodom vogaung: mae" Lod thug' lo" ra" ba na mae mug: gaung mae" myi: we' vhang qu: gyo" lo mung:- byu alhab' mo, re ngha" se' pye' ra" .
Byu: Yao: Zo: joe" thug' li" ra" ba na mae re: ai we' dakhyo: ngad: li" nae" .
Ai: ba na mae yao" yham khaung dao mae na: ra" yaug wa gyo" lo" mung: yham khug mae" yao" ngaui qhang jo,nho" yu: ci nae" davao lo" shao:- ai we' dakhyo:- yothaung: din" mae na: ra" yaug re:- yham khyo datug' lo" shao:-
Lod nho: yham sang myhi" re myid: beim: ge,-
Yao: yao" kao so' re khyad' yu nug: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: kao so' jeim: nae"- yao: yao" kao so' jeim: yaug wa kao so' khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" .
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- ai: myi re yab qo dalam: mae za: yab: jo, ko" ra" byu shid' zo: re dayaug re wa jhui" lo" mung:- dayaug re wa tang" to: co' li" nae" .
Laug lhang dalam: mae za: daga" gyag: na ko" ra" myiqe: shid' zo: mae" re: dayaug re jhui" yu mung:- dayaug re wa tang" to: co' li" nae" .
( Yo mae mau" daga" zaui" na ko" ra" byu shid' zo: mae" byu dayaug re jhui" yu mung:- dayaug re wa tang" to: co' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" . )
Mho"zo: qe wa Yesu re Asang we"- ai kho: tau mae boe" zai ngad: ra" i? ga: myid' ako" . Yesu wa- sushid mao jo; ra" jo, qo mae nang da ngho' jham zang" ham: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere khonhae" re: akyu" mho' na genae" qhid' mae" we' qam: mashan genae" qhid' mae" dao: tau" ci yang: yao: bam re mho" byid' ra" .
Vogaung: dalam: mae Mao" So rere: magyaug- byu rere: maphug' ra" tarha" zug: dayaug na: ra" .
Ai: vogaung: mae cug' mo" myhi" dayaug re: na: ra"- yao: wa tarha" zug: pho" jhao" dazab: makyo li" mung:- ngo we' tarha" yung" jho" zaung: ra" yaug: agyo: mae nga" shad' mae din: man" ra" khyo" dao: kho' byid: la,- ga: tarha" zug: pho" re mho' ra" .
Ngadqere: tarha" zug: pho" wa ba na myao" sho' dao: makho' byid: lo: na: ra" . Thao re tarha" zug: pho" wa- ngo wa Mao" So rere: magyaug- byu rere: maphug' yaug ngad:-
Ngadqere: ce:- cug' mo" myhi" wa ngore khin jang: na: ruyang tarha" din: vang" ra" khyo" yao" shad' mae ye, yang: dao: kho' byid: nae"- ngo airu: makad' re wa yao: wa ngojhao" dazab zab li" yang: lo" thao" mae ngore gyai myid myaung: nhao: li" nae"- ga: yao" aung khug mae ta" ra" .
Asang wa xo' yang:- ai: madin: man" ra" tarha" zug: pho" ta" ra" dao: re tae" gyo" qu" ge,-
Mao" So wa myi" re: na" re: mho' yao: na ko" ra" yao" byu qe: shad' mae ye, yang: tarha" din: vang" ra" khyo" dao: makho' byid: lo: na nae" i?
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Mao" So wa phyad phyad za: yao: bam: qhid' mae" tarha" din: vang" ra" khyo" dao: kho' byid' li" nae"- ngadqere: Byu: Yao: Zo: joe" li" ra" ba na mae myid gaung dao mae lam khug: myid re li" the' myao shinae" laug?- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: yao" gaung re gai beim: mung: su gaje qere qu" ngai: ra" mo, re ce: dao: tau" ci yang: ta" ra" .
Dalhang mae byu shid' yaug wa akyu" mho' nae" qhid' mae" Caung: pa" Yham khyo ye" ako" . Dayaug wa Pharishe ngad mung:- dayaug wa khang: gaug yaug ngad: ra" .
Pharishe pho" wa yao: za: gatau ye; jo, mung: Pho" Mao" So we"- ngo wa su gaje qe we' dakhyo: so' kho' yaug- nhag' lam: madin: yaug- su: myi: lhad' yaug mangad:- Aitho' mago" thoe: khang: gaug yaug we' dakhyo: re: mangad: mung:- ngo nao re jeju caung: byid' ra" .
Ngo wa dalaban mae shid' ba zo: ve jao" mung: ngo the' ra" gu: alhab' mae" daxe bam mae" dabam nao re byid'- ga: akyu" mho' ra" .
Ngadqere: khang: gaug yaug wa va: mae ye; jo, yang:- mug: gaung khyo lhao" mavae" tau: qu" lo:- yao" qao gao mae theim yang: Pho" Mao" So we"- Qobo jab ngore nhag' khyag' yu la, wo"- ga: akyu" mho' ra" .
Yesu wa Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Pharishe yaug mangad:- khang: gaug yaug kam" wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae din: man: yaug khyo" yham khyo phao: lo" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: yao" gaung re khin" yaug khag' ngadqere: nyham: khyo" pye' ru qhug' li" nae"- yao: yao" gaung re nyham: khyo" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: khin" byid' ru qhug' nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Byu daqhae: wa yao: bam: zonau" qe: dao mae Yesu yao" lo, kai: byid: vashao:- ga: yao: bam: zonau" qere Yesu jhao" jhui" li" ako"- ai: rure mho"zo: qe myao gelao"- yao: bam re qeim: ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa zoshao qere yao: jhao" khai: yu yang:- ai: zoshao qere ngojhao" lo nhao: ke' ge,- yao: bam re datam" to: ge,- pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: mung"dan: wa airu" mo; mung"dan: ngad: ra" .
Cere xam" to: ge,- Khag' ngadqere: Mao" So: mung"dan: re ce: zoshao dayaug we' dakhyo:- makhae: yu: ra" yaug wa ai: mung"dan: khug khyo maqo" vao ye: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yuda au: jhaung dayaug wa Yesu re- Gai: ra" Mho" Pho" we"- Apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" ngo pe" kad' ca" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re Nao ngore- pe"mung: gai: ein: ta" i? Mao" So mae" je yang: gai: ru khag' re: mana-
Nao wa kham" to" ra" tarha" jham mae bo: ra" Myi: shad' lao dashad'- Byu dase'- Dakhug'- Madang: ra" sagse: dakham- Ni" myhi" we' ni" pho" re phug' myao: wa, ga" ra" tarha" dao: re ba gau ngad: ra" mangad: i? ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" ai: yaug wa Yesu re- Ai: kham" to"ra" dao: alhab' re ngo zoshao: yo, mae" phug' cao" lo va"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu cedao: re the' gyo: lao" yao: re- Nao daja: kad' ca"shi" ra"- nao qo" ra" gu: alhab' re aung" pye' mung:- myaung sho: mo, re gae byid: wa,- ailao" nao wa mug: gaung dao mae jo,nho" qo" nae" . Airu: bin: kad' lao"- nga" thao cao" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: ai: yaug wa cedao: re the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa gyai nhag' kaug' lo" byaug: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa jo,nho" gyai qo" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: airu: nhag' kaug' rure Yesu myao mung:- Jo,nho" qo" ra" mo, wa Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo vao ye: nae" gyai qug' ako" .
gola: u wa nghe' no: dung: khyo" lai: lo" nae" qug' ra" tho' jo,nho" qo" ra" yaug: qhid' mae" Mao" So: Mung"dan: khyo vao ye: nae" je: qug' ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ce: dao: re the' gyo" ra" mo, byu qe wa Yesu re- Aire khyad' yu: ru khag' za: qhug' zai i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- Byu: yang maqo" kad' boe" ra" ja: alhab' re Mao" So wa qo" kad' boe" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Petru wa Qu" wa,- ngonhaung" wa ngonhaung" yham dang: yokhyao: to" pye' co' yang: ni" thao cao" va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Ngad va"- naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- Mao" So: mung"dan: mathao mae yao: yao" yham- mangad: lao"- yham sang myhi"- mangad: lao"- mao: nhaung:- mangad: lao"- myhi" pho"- mangad: lao"- zo: dau qere to: co' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere:-
ana" ce: pyad mae myo: sho' nho" qo" khae: yu: li" genae"- amung: thao: pyad mae wa apyad ato: kao so' qo" khae: yu: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug re gatau jhui" yu yang: yao: bam re- Tae" gyo: ge,- ngonhaung" Yerusalem khyo ye" lo" na: ru ngad:- Byu: Yao: Zo: we' sin: yang: lapa qe tung" ra" jham: dao: alhab' jab byang" lo: li" nae" .
Byu: Yao: Zo: re taung bug qe: lo, khyo ab byid' pye' li" genae"- yao: bam wa yao: re jung" mung:- roe" ru we' khata: phoe" sheim" li" genae"-
Yao: bam wa yao: re be, mung: se' pye' li" genae"- ngadqere: sam ba kyo thao re yao: wa dam: daui: to" li" zai ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: mho"zo: qe wa ai: dao: dakheim: rere: maba: gyo: ko" ngad: ra" . Dao: lajheim: re yao: bam maba: gyo: genae" qhid' mae" nyham" to: byid' ruyang Yesu pe" ta" na: rure yao: bam maba: gyo: gengad: ra" .
Yesu Yerikho vogaung: khyo joe" lo: na: au:- myo, jid pho" dayaug wa khyoyae mae zaung: jo, yang: mho' zo" na: ra" .
Yao: wa byu ajham ataung su" lai: lo" na: ra" thoe re the' gyo: lao"- pe" ngad: ra" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa Nazared mae" Yesu su" lai: lo" na: ra"- ga: ta" kyo"ako" .
Ailao" yao: wa Davi yao: zo: Yesu we"- ngore nhag' khyag' yu la, wo"- ga: zag: hug' ra" .
Qhid' au: mae su" ra" mo, wa sae za: na nae" qhid' mae" yao: re qeim: ako"- ngadqere: yao: wa thoe je: to' mung:- Davi yao: zo: we"- ngore nhag' khyag' yu la, wo"- ga: zag: hug' ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa thang mung:- ai: myo, jid pho" re yao: jhao" jhui" lo nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ra"- ai: myo, jid pho" wa Yesu jhao" te' li" lao"-
Yesu wa yao: re- Ni" qhid' mae" ngo pe" kad' byid: nae" o: i? ga: myid' ra" . Myo, jid pho" wa Asang we"- ngo myo, dam: myao nug: ra"- ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Ni" myo, myao: li" vashao:- ni" lam khug: ra" myid wa nao re myo, myao nhao: ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" jao"-yao: wa myo, dam: myao: li" mung: Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" byid: yang:- Yesu thao cao" ra" . Mo, byu qe wa aire myao gelao"- yao: bam alhab' mo, Mao" So re caung: khin" ako" .
Yesu wa Yerikho vogaung: khyo" su" lai: lo" na: ra" .
Ai: vogaung: mae Zake ga: mang: ra" khang: gaug au: jhaung dayaug na: ra"- yao: wa jo,nho" gyai qo" yaug re: ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Yesu khag' ngad: rure qu" nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' na: ra"- ngadqere: yao: wa byulang" ngad: ru we' mo, paug' saung" thau: ruyang Yesu re maqo" the' myao ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yao: wa Yesu re qo" myao nae" qhid' mae" mo, byu qe: qhid' au: khyo tao" lo" mung:- pho' ham" gae dao mae lo" do; zaung: jo; ra" .
Yesu ai: jo, qo mae joe" lo lao"- tau: qu" mung: Zake we"- Phyad gyo" lo wa,- ana" ba ngo ni" yham mae thang zai ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Zake wa phyad za: gyo" lo mung:- gyai ngaui bau" ru we' bang" tug: yu: ra" .
Aire myao: ra" mo, alhab' wa- Byu ceyaug wa qobo qo" ra" yaug: yham mae bang" khug nae"- ga: cao: lo" ava"- ga: ta" nyhung: ako" .
Zake wa to" ye, mung:- Asang we"- nga" jo,nho" agaung: daqi" myaung sho: mo, re ngo gae byid: nae"- Dayaug yaug mae" ngo mhug' zo" ci: ngad: re ngo wa yao: re byid nho" dam: tug' byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Khyad' yu: ru wa ana" ba ceyham mae joe" li" va" ra"- pe"mung: ga"re ceyaug re: Abraham nho: myid: zo: ngad: ra" .
Byu: Yao: Zo: wa byaug: lo" ra" mo, re qho: yu nae" we' khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Mo, byu qe cedao: re tae" gyo" na shiko" au:- Yesu wa Yerusalem khyo jhao" li" na: ru we' mo, byu qe wa Mao" So: mung"dan: wa ana" jao" yao: myao: thug' li" naeva" ga: myid: jho: na ko" ruyang Yesu wa xo' mung:- yao: bam re dao: tau" dalam: ci yang: ta" kyo" ra" .
Dalhang: mae aya: qi" ra" byu dayaug wa kho: kham aya: yetang" yu mung:- dam: lo nae" qhid' mae" va" ra" mung"dan: khyo gyaung: su" lo" nae" seim" to" ra" .
Yao: gyaung: masu: shire- yao" jeim qe daxe yaug re khai: yu mung:- yaug khao: ngo" re qhang thang: the: dakye' kye' byid: yang:- ngo dam: joe" lo sho' ce: yang phaga: kad' ge,- ga: ta" co' ra" .
Yao"mung" byu qe wa yao: re nghang: geyang:- ceyaug kho: kham lokad' nae"rure ngonhaung" ma-o ga:- yao" thao re lagyo: nhao: ke' yang: ta" nhao: ke' ako" .
Ai: yaug wa kho: kham aya: tang" ci mung: dam: tug' lo: ra" . Ailao" jao"- yao: wa yao" jeim qe phaga: gau pai: khonho" ga" the' vako" rure ba nae" qhid' mae" yao" qhid' kheim: khyo vao li" genae" qhid' mae" amyin" khyo" ke' ra" .
Sao qhid' yaug wa li" mung:- Asang we"- ngo wa nao byid' to" ra" qhang thang: the: kye' yang qhang thang: the: daxe kye' the' qho: to: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
kho: kham pho" wa Ngad va"- nao wa jeim gai dayaug ngad: ra" . Nao wa ngai: ra" mau" zo" mae kyid yaug ngad: ruyang nao re ngo wa vogaung: mo" daxe eib zo: nhao nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Shid' yaug ein: yaug re: li" mung:- Asang we"- ngo wa nao byid' to" ra" qhang thang: the: kye' yang qhang thang: the: ngo" kye' gau pai: the' qho: to: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
kho: kham pho" wa ai: yaug rere:- nao re ngo vogaung: ngo" lam: re eib zo: nhao nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Jeim gatau dayaug wa li" mung:- Asang we"- ni" qhang thang: the: ce ngad: ra" . Ngo wa aire pha, jad: yang kag' mung: shaung: to"-
Nao wa gyai qug' ra" yaug ngad: ruyang ngo wa nao re gyaug: ra"- nao wa naoyao: masang: ra" zai jham re gaug: sham" yu: ru we' naoyao: masin: maqho" ra" rumae" ashi: jham" yu nug yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- kho: kham pho" wa yao: re- Jeim gao: we"- ni" nhad' dao: thoe re cao" yang: nao re ngo dao: kho' nae"- ngo wa qug' ra" yaug ngad: rure we' nga" zai mangad' rure gaug: sham" yu yang:- ngo masin: maqho" to" rumae" ashi: jham" yu yaug ngad: rure nao ba gau ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ngo dam: tug' joe" lo lao"- ai: nga" qhang thang: the: wa gau pai: we' daga" dam: qo" yu nae" qhid' mae"- ai: nga" qhang thang: the: re nao pe"mung: ngaui jhi mae maye: ke' to: i? ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: kho: kham pho" wa ai: ayae mae ye; jo; ra" mo, re- Ai: jeim pho" mae" qhang thang: the: yu: yu yang:- qhang thang: the: daxe kye' qo" ra" jeim re byid: ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa kho: kham pho" re- Asang we"- yao: wa qhang thang: the: daxe kye' qo" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ako" .
Alao"- kho: kham pho" wa Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Daja: ja: qo" ra" yaug khag' re ngadqere: je: laug sho' byid: shinae"- ngadqere:- Pe" maqo" ra" yaug mae" kam" wa yao: qo" ra" gu: dajhid' za: mae" lhao" yu: pye' byid: nae" .
Aimung: Ngo kho: kham kad' nae" ma-o: ra" ai: nga" gyevo qere wa ce: khyo jhui" lo mung:- nga"qhid' kheim: mae yao:- yao: bam re se' pye' ge,- ga: dao: kho' ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa ce: dao: jham re bin: ta" lao"- mho"zo: qe: qhid' au: mae Yerusalem khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: wa Zhan: lun: bam mae" Bedphage we' Bethani vogaung: nhae khyo joe"lo lao"- yao" mho"zo: shid' yaug re qhid' khyo nhao: ke' mung:-
Ni" shid' yaug: qhid' au: mae" vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ge,- ni" shid' zo: vogaung: khug khyo vao ye" lo" re khag' re: majui" qu" shi" ra" loze nau" dadau: taui" to" rure yemyao: li" genae"- ai: loze nau" re pheim yang: ce: khyo she: lo geri: .
Dayaug yaug- ni" shid' zo: re Ni" shid' zo: pe"mung: pheim ko" i? ga: myid: lao"- Asang ci qo: ga"- ein: yao: re ta" ge,- ga: pin: ke' ra" .
Amung: yao: shid' zo: ye" lo" re yao: shid' zo: re: Yesu ta" ke' ru we' dakhyo:- yemyao: ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: loze taui: yepheim: na ko" au:- loze sang qe wa- Ni" shid' zo: pe"mung: pheim ko" i? ga: myid' ako"-
Alao" yao: shid' zo: wa- Asang ci qo: ga"- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa loze nau" re Yesu jhao" she: lo mung:- yao: bam: mai bau: jham re loze nau" dao mae nhe: byid: yang:- Yesu re jui: nhao: ako" .
Yesu jui" ye" lo" na: au:- mo, byu qe wa yao: bam: mai bau: jham re khyodang mae myhung: byid' ako" .
Yesu wa Yerusalem vogaung: nhae khyo joe" lo: na: au:- zhanlun bam to' gyo" jo, qo mae joe" lao"- yao" mho"zo: qe ajham ataung wa yao: bam myao: lo: ra" mug' pho: mau" zo" qi: jham: mathao mae thoe qi: we' Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" byid: mung:-
Asang: mang mae joe" li" ra" kho: kham pho" wa ngaui lho" vashao: wo"- Mug: gaung dao mae yaug yo: ru we' Mao" So wa phungbao qi" qhang: jo, vashao: wo"- ga: ta" ako" .
Alao"- mo, phaung mae" Pharishe qe daqhae: wa Yesu re- Mho" Pho" we"- Ni" mho"zo: qere sae za: na genae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid: wa,- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" re ngo ta"geli"- cebam sae za: na gelao" wa- ce: laug bam jham yao: zag: hug' thug' li" genae"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu wa Yerusalem vogaung: nhae khyo te' ye" lo" mung:- vogaung: re the' myao lao"- ai: vogaung" mathao mae Yesu ngug yang:-
Vogaung: nao we"- Yaug yo: ra" khyo boe" nhao: ru pe" ngad: rure ana" ba nao ba: ngad: qa: we"- ngadqere: ana" wa nao maqo" the' myao ngad: ra" .
Ni" gyevo qe wa nao re akham" we' lhang" gam" to: mung:- shad' khao: ngo" khyo" kham" lhaung" pye' ra" ayo, joe" lo: li" nae" .
Yao: bam wa nao we' ni" vang khug mae na: ra" vobyu qe alhab' re mhan" za: kad' pye' li" genae"- Laug baui dabaui lhao" re: yao" jo, qo mae makai" jo, losho' kad' li" genae"- pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So nao re khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" nao jhao" joe" li" ra" ayo, ba na re nao maba mabeim: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham khug khyo ye: mung:- zai aung: zai vai mo, re- Nga" yham re akyu" mho' yham ga: mhang" li" genae"- ga: Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ra" . Ngadqere:-
naonhaung" wa aire damya, khyaung kad' pye' avako"- ga: ta" yang: yao: bam re khe' thug' pye' ra" .
Ba khao: ngo" Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham mae mho" shid' byid' ra" . Khinjaung qi: qe Jham: Tung" Pho" qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qe wa Yesu re se' pye' nug: ako" .
Ngadqere: mo, byu qe alhab' wa Yesu mho" dao: re dakheim: rere: malhai: ke' lo:- tae" gyo" na: bam ko" ruyang yao: bam wa Yesu re khoru: qo" se' pye' nae" khyo mamyao ko" ngad: ra" .
Daba mae Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham mae mo, byu qere Lau Dao: Gai mho" shid' na: ra" au:- khinjaung qi: qe Jham: Tung" Pho" qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qe li" mung:-
Yesu re nao wa ai: mau" zo" jham re pe" kheim: so' khyo" yang kad' i? Nao re ai: kheim: so' khag' yang byid' i? Ngonhaung" re ta" kyo: la,- ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" re shi" ngo dakheim: myid: geli"-
Yohan qid nyhab' byid' ru wa Mao" So: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngad: ra" i? Mangad: lao"- byu: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngad: ra" i? Ngo re ta" kyo: gela,- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yao: bam wa ngonhaung" pe" ru: ta" zai i? Mao" So: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngad: ra"- ein: ngonhaung" ta" lao"- aire naonhaung" pe"mung: Yohan re malam" ko" i? ga: yao: ta" li" nae" .
Byu: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngad: ra" ein: ngonhaung" ta" lao" re:- mo, byu qe alhab' mo, wa Yohan re lapa ngad: ra"- ga: myid: lam" na ko" ruyang yao: bam ngonhaung" re laug baui: yang pye' li" genae"- ga: yao: bam yao: cao: jho" ta" ngag: ako" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa- Ai: kheim: so' khai: mae" ngad: rure ngonhaung" maba- ga: tau" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- Ai: mau" zo" jham re pe" kheim: so' khyo" yang ngo kad'- ga" rure ngore: naonhaung" re mata" kyo: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa mo, byu qere ce: dao: tau" ci yang: ta" kyo" ra"- Dalhang mae byu dayaug wa sabyi khyae dakhyae qho" to: mung:- khyae ngho" zaui: mo, re ngho: byid: co' yang: yao: wa mug: va: khyo gyaung: su" lo" ra" .
sabyi shi: phyo' yo, joe" lao"- yao: wa jeim dayaug re khyae ngho" zaui: mo, jhao" khyae ngho: phug' sabyi shi: mho' nhao: ke' ra" . Ngadqere: ai: khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa ai: jeim pho" re lham: be, mung: akeim lham: dam: nhao: ke' ako" .
Airumung: yao: wa jeim gatau dayaug re dam: nhao: ke' ra"- ngadqere: ai: khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa ai: jeim rere: lham: be, mung: qho' lham: phyo' yang:- akeim dam: tug' nhao: ke' ako" .
Thao re yao: wa jeim sam yaug ein: yaug re dam: nhao: ke' ra" . Khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa yao: rere: dae lham: te' mung:- taung gaung khyo lham: deim" geim: thug' pye' ako" .
Alao" sabyi khyae sang wa Ngo pe" ru: kad' nae" laug i? Ngo wa jhid' de; ra" nga" zo: re nhao: ke' nae"- yao: bam wa yao: re lham: phug' myao: ko" maba- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa yao: re lham: myao gelao"- ceyaug wa khyae sang: yao: zo: ngad: ra"- yao: re se' pye' gelang:- ailao" yao" jo,nho" wa ngonhaung" qo" sang zai ngad: ra"- ga: yao: bam yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Khyae ngho" zaui: mo, wa yao: re sabyi khyae taung gaung shad' khyo deim" geim: thug' lo" mung: se' pye' ako" . Alao" ai: khyae sang wa ai: khyae ngho" zaui: mo, re khoru: kad' li" nae" laug i?
Khyae sang wa ai: khyae ngho" zaui: mo, re li" se' pye' li" nae"- amung: ai: khyae rere: gatau khyae ngho" zaui: mo, re dam: kai" ngho: byid' pye' li" nae"- ga: Yesu ta" ra" . Cedao: re mo, byu qe the' gyo: gelao"- Airu: wa mangad: vashao: wo"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re qu" mung: Yham zhaug' mo, khyin: khyo" pye' ra" laug baui wa yham jheim mae" akhyag: thao" ra" laug baui boe" lo va"- ga" ra" ce: jham: dao: pe" ga" ru ngad: ra" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ai: laug zang dao gyo" lo" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: adau dau gyug' lo" ru qhug' li" nae" . Amung:- dayaug yaug: dao mae ai: laug zang gyo" zag: lo" re wa yao: re aphaui: mhan" pye' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Jham: Tung" Pho" qe we' khinjaung qi: qe wa yao: bam re qang yang: Yesu ce: dao: tau" ta" rure yao: bam ba geyang:- aimae yao: dalhang: dae taung" yu nae" seim" ko" ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa mo, byu qere gyaug: ako" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa agu gai re lao" na: ako"- yao: bam Yesu re kheim: so' qo" ra" Roma mang: zug: pho" lo, khyo qo" ab byid' pye' nae" qhid' mae" Yesu yao" dao: thoe: yang qobo qo" zhaug' sho' yekung" genae" qhid' mae" byu daqhae: re byugai geim kad' nae" khug vag: byid: yang:- Yesu jhao" nhao: ke' ako" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re Mho" Pho" we"- nao ta" ra" dao: we' Nao mho" kyo" ra" khyo wa dang: rure ngonhaung" ba: . Nao wa byu: myo, nho nga: lao: re maqu" lo:- Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo re jo: ra" khyo" mho" shid' byid' rure re: ngonhaung" ba:-
Ngonhaung" wa Roma khosin" re khang: gai: byid' i? Magai: byid: i? Ngonhaung" re ta" kyo: la,- ga: myid' ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam pha,jhi" khyug' rure ba: qu" mung:-
Yao: bam re- Ngore ngaui thang: the: dakye' qhu" gela,- ce: ngaui kye' dao mae khag' sulho we' khag' mang aso: de; ra" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: bam wa Ketha sulho we' mang aso: de; ra"- ga: tau" ako"
Airumung: Yesu wa- Airulao" wa Ketha khosin" we' sin" ra" gu: wa Ketha kho: sin" re byid: ge,- Mao" So we' sin" ra" gu: wa Mao" So re byid: ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae Yesu re qobo maqo" zhaug' ko" ngad: ra" . Airumung: yao: bam wa sae za: na: ako" . Yesu phaug' tau" ra" dao: thoe re mug' hao" byaug: ako" .
Ai: thao re- byu wa shid: rumae" madam: daui: to" li"- ga: ta" ko" ra" Saduke qe daqhae: Yesu jhao" li" mung:-
Mho" Pho" we"- Byu dayaug zo: dau maqo" lo:- yao: myi: re shid: cug' to: co' ngad: re wa yao: nhaung: wa ai: yao: mao" cug' mo" re dam: gaug mung:- yao: mao" qhid' mae" nyaug xo' myhung byid: ca"- ga: Moshe wa ce: tarha" ngonhaung" re tung"to: byid: co' ra" .
Dalhang: mae" yao: mao: yao: nhaung: nhad' yaug na: ako" . Mao: mo" yaug wa yham sang myhi" yu ngadqere: zo: dau maqo" lo:- shid: lo" byaug: ra" .
Ai: thao mao: le; yaug cug' dam: gaug: ra" .
Ai: thao sam yaug ein: yaug re:- cug' dam: gaug: ra" . Yao: tao ho' nhad' yaug geim" dakhyo: za: zo: dau maqo" lo:- shid: lo" ako" .
Lo" thao" mae ai: myiqe: re:- shid: lo" ra" .
Shid: lo" ra" mo, dam: daui: to" li" ra" ba na mae ai: myiqe: wa khoyaug: yham sang myhi" lam: ngad nae" i? Yao: tao ho' nhad' yaug: geim" yao: re ngho" vako" ra"- ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Ce: myid gaung dao mae na: ra" pyad mae xao su byu qe wa ug' khug' dinkhu: te: yang: na: ako" .
Ngadqere: shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" mung:- mug: gaung: mung"dan: mae vao ye: nae" man: qi" ra" mo, wa ug' khug' dinkhu: mate: lo: genae" .
Yao: bam wa mug: lagyo: qe we' dakhyo: ngad mung:- mashid lo: genae" . Yao: bam wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" vako" rumung:- yao: bam wa Mao" So: zo: dau qe ngad: ako" .
Shid: ra" mo, dam: daui: to" li" ra" khyo re Moshe wa de: de: za: sagse: qhu" byid' to" ava"- Myi: nga" na: ra" thao" paung" we' sin: yang: ta" ra" Jham: dau mae Moshe wa Asang re Abraham nho: Mao" So- Isag nho: Mao" So- Yaku nho: Mao" So ngad:- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Mao" So wa shid: jo; ra" mo; nho: Mao" So mangad:- daui: na: ra" mo; nho: Mao" So angad:- pe"mung: ga"re alhab' mo, wa yao" qhid' kheim: mae daui: na: ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Jham: Tung" Pho" qe daqhae: wa Mho" Pho" we"- Gyai gai: ra" dao: phaug' ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa Yesu re pe" daja: re: mavae" myid: loko" ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Meshia wa Davi yao: zo: ngad:- ein: khoru: qo" ta" ko" i?
Pe"mung: ga"re Davi yao: yao: lhao" re: caung: khin" paug' mae- ai: Asang wa nga" Asang re-
Ni" gyevo qere ni" khyid vo: khug mae khyid kai: tao" khyo" ngo mato: byid: byid: wa- nga" lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo, wa,- ga: ta" ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Davi wa yao: re Asang- ga: ta" ra" . Airu: ngad: re- Meshia wa Davi myid: zo: khoru: gai: boe" nae" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Mo, byu qe alhab' mo, yao" dao: re tae" gyo" na ko" au:- Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere-
Jham: Tung" Pho" qere lha" yang: jao" pye' ge,- yao: bam wa bau: qhang ve; pye' mung: su" qin" nug mo,- gai jao: mae su: yang lham: phug' myao: nae" o ngaui mo,- Tarha" Jung Yham mae gatau jaung: to" ra" tao" khau" mae khyin: zaung mo,- poe mae je: gai: ra" zaung jo, qo mae zaung nug mo,-
Cug' mo" qe: yham zai yokhyao: re lhad' zo" ci gemung:- su qu" gai nae" geim kad' yang: akyu" qhang sho' mho' mhug' mo, ngad: ako"- yao: bam: qobo dae wa je: xo genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu cao" qu" ke' re jo,nho" qo" ra" mo, wa Caung: pa" Yham Alu: Ban" khug khyo Alu: ke' na ko" rure myao: ra" .
Gyai myaung sho" ra" cug' mo" myhi" dayaug gyid: ngaui shid' kye' Alu: ke' rure re: yao: myao: ra" .
Yesu wa Ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- ce: myaung sho" ra" cug' mo" myhi" wa gaje qe alhab' mo, tho' Alu: ngaui je: ke' ava" .
Pe"mung: ga"re gaje qe wa yao: bam magan: mago" qo" ra" jo,nho" mae" jan" ra" gu: Alu: ke' ako" . Ngadqere: ce: cug' mo" myhi" wa masho: majhin myaung sho" rumae" yao: zo: nae" ru alhab' re Alu: ke' pye' ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe daqhae: wa Caung: pa" Yham wa yaung" ra" laug baui jham: yang zao: to" ru we' Mao" So re qhaug' byid' to" ra" Alu: zai jham: yang gyai qu" yaung" jo; ra" khyo re ta" na: ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa Ce: naonhaung" the' myao: na: ra" gu: alhab' wa laug baui dabaui re: yao" jo, qo mae makai" jo, losho' byo; gyo" lo" ra" ba na yo, khyin: joe" lo: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Mho" Pho" we"- Airu: khonhae" boe" li" zai ngad: i? Airu: boe" va" ga" rure ba nae" qhid' mae" pe" ja" ve, lho jham thug' li" nae" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa Naonhaung" mhug' pyag' ru maqhug' genae" qhid' mae' lha" yang: na ge,- Byu myo: sho' wa nga" aqid ve, yang: thug' li" mung:- ngo wa ai: Meshia ngad va"- Ayo, joe" va"- ga: ta" li" genae"- ngadqere: yao: bam: thao dacao" ge,-
Naonhaung" wa gyekhe' ru we' tau: lhan: gye to" ra" thoe the' gyo: gelao"- dagyaug ge,- ai: ru alhab' wa sao qhid' boe" li" ca" nae"- ngadqere: ai: lo" thao" ba na wa mangad: shinae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu xo' yang:- Byu damyu" we' damyu"- damang: we' damang: gye jho" zin" li" genae" .
Myid lab: qi: jham lab: li" nae"- Bao" khug' jham thug' li" nae"- Khyi" khao: ngo" mae no phyo: aqam" jham boe" thug' li" nae"- Mug: gaung mae" gakai: lai: ru we' qu" gyaug qu" lhaung sho' ra" ja: jham thug' li" nae .
Cegu: alhab' maboe" shire naonhaung" re taung" yu mung:- yhin" li" genae"- yao: bam wa naonhaung" re dao: phyid' nae" qhid' mae" Tarha" Jung Yham jham khyo ab byid' pye' mung:- thaung: khug mae lhaung" to" li" genae" . Naonhaung" wa nga" mathao mae kho: kham qe we' zug: qe: qhid' kheim: khyo jhui" ye" ru qhug' genae" .
Airu wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" Lau Dao: Gai sagse: kham nae" qhid' mae" akho: akhang" agu gai ngad: li" nae" .
Naonhaung" wa khoru: ta" qid' yu nae" rure gau: qhid' khae" yang: sang kho: sang: lhe' maboe" genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" aung khug mae myid: phyid' to: ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" gyevo qemae" khag' re: maqo" ngag: thaug' nae" ra" nhad' dao: thoe qam: we' pha,jhi" qam: o: ngo naonhaung" re byid: nae" .
Naonhaung" wa naonhaung" yao" myhi" pho" qe- mao: nhaung: qe- ba nam ug zo: qe- naonhaung" ba nam qeyang ab byid' pye' ru qhug' li" genae"- naonhaung" mae" daqhae: wa se' pye' ru qhug' genae" .
Nga" mathao mae yaug khao: ngo" nghang" li" genae" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" au: mae" xae dakhe' lhao" re: mabyaug nae" .
Naonhaung" wa zang: qhao" yang:- tang tang za: ye; jo, ge,- ailao" naonhaung" yao" gaung re qo" khyad' yu: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Yerusalem vogaung: re gyevo qeyang lhang" gam" to" rure myao gelao"- ai: vogaung: wa byo; qeim: lo" nae" jhao" li" va"- ein: rure naonhaung" beim: ge,-
Alao" Yuda mang: mae na: ra" mo, wa bam khyo tao" phao geshao:- Vomo" khug mae na: ra" mo, wa aimae" phao: thug' geshao:- Voyae mae" vogaung: ngai mae na: ra" mo, wa vomo" khug khyo mavao lo" geshao:-
Pe"mung: ga"re ai: ba na jham wa Jham: Mugsug' mae ta" to" gu: alhab' jab byang" nhao: ra" qobo dae byid' ra" ba na jham ngad: li" nae" .
Ai: ba na gyo: mae gaung la: mo, we' nug' nau" jhui: mo, wa gyai qug: khai: genae" . Ce: mung" mae qug: khai: qi: joe" lo: mung: ce: byumyu" qe: dao mae Mao" So: qobo dae byid' ru joe" li" nae" ngad: ra" .
Damyo" re shae: yang se' pye' li" genae"- amung: damyo" wa mung"dan: khao: ngo" khyo kyam: byu khyo" taung" jhui" lo" ru qhug' li" genae" . Tarha" taung bug qe wa yao: bam: ayo, ba na magan gan wa Yerusalem re zab: nhe" pye' li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- ba kyi lho" mo" jham mae ve, lho jham boe" thug' li" nae"- Myid gaung dao mae" byumyu" alhab' wa qid panglai: myang thoe we' bang: lhung" to" li" ra" thoe: yang gyaug mung nhag' lam: thao" li" genae" .
Xao su byu qe wa mug: myid dao geim" mae joe" lo: na: ra" qug: khai: khyag' qhui: ru jham re myid: gyaug yang:- mo; byaug: li" genae" . Pe"mung: ga"re mug: gaung mae" qam: so' jham wa laui" nin" li" genae" .
Alao"- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa qam: so' phungbao qi: we' daga" jham thaui: mae joe" li"rure the' myao: li" genae" .
Cegu: boe" qhid: li" na gelao"- to" ye, mung: naonhaung" au: re tau: qu" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" re khyad' yu nae" ra" ba na wa jhao" li" va" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa yao: bam re ce: dao: tau" ci yang: ta" ra" . Pho' ham" gae we' gatau: sag' gae alhab' khyo re myid: qu" ge,-
Ai: agae jham: avho' tad' li" rure naonhaung" myao gelao"- zin vao kheim: jhao" va" rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- ta" to" ra" gu: boe" na: rure naonhaung" the' myao gelao"- Mao" So: mung"dan: wa joe" li" na va" rure naonhaung" ba ge,-
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- ana" daui: na: ra" mo, alhab' mashid; gan shire ai: gu: alhab' boe" li" zai ngad:-
Mug: gaung we' myid gaung wa lai: lo" byaug: li" nae"- ngadqere: nga" dao: thoe wa khonhae" re: lai: lo" nae" mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Naonhaung" wa zo: pyo: shaug' pyo: lai: ru we' ce: pyad mae na: ra" au: qhid' mae" myid: qug: myid: ci" ru jham mae za: dathaui" yaug: na ge,- Mangad: re wa ai: ba na wa nyag din taung" naonhaung" re lha" we' dakhyo:- myi" li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ai: ba na wa myid gaung xao su byu alhab' mo; dao mae joe" li" zai ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ai: boe" li" nae" qug: khai: khyag' qhui: ru jham re qo" thaug' qhao" nae" qam: o:- qo" nae" we' Byu: Yao: Zo" nho: qhid' kheim: mae qo" ye; jo; ra" mo, boe" genae" qhid' mae" akyu" mho' mung:- khonhae" re: lha" yang: na ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa ai: ba na gyo" gu: mae na" gaung re wa Caung: pa" Yham mae mho" shid' byid' na mung: myi" thao lao" Zhan: lun: bam khyo yena: na mung: ra" .
Ba khao: ngo" ne, seim no' mae" byu alhab' mo, wa- yao" dao: gyo: nae" qhid' mae" Caung: pa" Yham khyo ye" ako" .
Lai co' Poe ga: mhang" ra" Man" Make' Ra" Mug Poe joe" nae" jhao" li" ra" .
Khinjaung qi: qe we' Jham: Tung" Pho" qe wa mo, byu qere gyaug geyang:- Yesu re sae za: se' pye' nae" khyo qho: ako" .
Alao" Satan wa mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug mae bobo: ra" Iskarud ga: mang: ra" Yuda nho: nhag' lam: mae vao ye" ra" .
Airumung: Yuda wa khinjaung qi: qe we' Caung: pa" Yham gug: gam zug: qejhao" ye: mung:- yao: bam: lo, khyo Yesu re yao: khoru: qo" ab byid: nae" khyo re yeqham: ra" .
Yao: bam gyo" ngaui gemung:- yao: re ngaui byid: nae"- ga: dao: so: byid' ke' ako" .
Yuda re: aire myid vang" mung:- mo, byu qe maba mabeim: lo:- Yesu re yao: bam: lo, khyo ab byid: nae" qhid' mae" ayo, khoau: yo" nae" rure qho: na: ra" .
Man" Make' Ra" Mug Poe mae- Lai co' Poe myi" xeim qhid' mae" yao nau" re se' nyhang" nae" ba na joe" lo: ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa Petru we' Yohan re Ngonhaung" zo: nae" Lai co' Poe myi" xeim re yenyhang" seim" to: ge,- ga: ta" mung: nhao: ke' ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa Yesu re- Khojo, qo mae yenyhang" seim" nae" nao o: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa Ni" shid' zo: vogaung: khug khyo vao ye" lo" ko" re- qid am vo; ci: ra" yauggai dayaug wa ni" shid' zo: re lham: tug: yu: li" nae"- yao: vao lo" ra" yham khug khyo vao ye: mung:-
Ai: yham sang re- Nga" mho"zo: qe we' ngo Lai co' Poe myi" xeim zo: nae" khoqe, ngad: ra" i? ga: Mho" Pho" nao re myid: nhao: ke' ra"- ein: ye: ta" ge,-
Alao" yao: wa nyhang" seim" jin" to" ra" tho' pyae mae" qe, mo" daqe, re ni" shid' zo: re ceim" shid' byid' li" nae-" Ni" shid' zo: ai: mae yenyhang" seim" na ge,- ga: ta" ke' ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: thug' ye" lo" ko" re yao: shid' zo: re Yesu ta" ke' ru we' dakhyo:- yemyao gemung:- Lai co' Poe myi" xeim re yenyhang" seim" ako" .
Ayo, joe" lao"- Yesu wa lagyo: qe we' daga" saboe" mae zaung: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- ngo qug: khai: dayin dayo: makham zo: shire ce: Lai co' Poe myi" xeim naonhaung" we' daga" zo: nae" ngo gyai myid: o: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- ce: Lai o' Poe kad' ra" lajheim: Mao" So: mung"dan: mae majab byang" li" li" wa- Lai co' Poe myi" xeim re ngo khonhae" re: mazo: lo nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa sabyi keim re yu: yu mung: Mao" So re jeju bin: caung: byid: lao"- ce: sabyi keim re yu mung:- naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" gae shaug' ge,-
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- Mao" So: mung"dan: majoe" li" li" wa- ce: sabyi qang: re ana" mae" thoegu: ngo mashaug' lo nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa mug rere: yu: yu mung:- Mao" So re jeju bin: caung: byid: lao"- ai: mug re khyoe' phai" yang:- mho"zo: qere byid: mung:- ce wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" byid' pye' ra" nga" gaung ngad: ra"- ngore myid: beim: nae" qhid' mae" ceru kad' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- myi" xeim bin: zo: thao yao: wa sabyi keim rere: yu: yu yang:- yao: bam re byid: mung:- ce: keim wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" sheim: pye' ra" nga" sa" yang dazid thaung" to" ra" Mao" So: dao: thang" asag' ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: qu" ge,- ngore ab byid' pye' nae" yaug wa ngo we' daga" ce: saboe" mae ngad: ra" .
Byu: Yao: Zo: wa Mao" So myid: phyid' to: va" ruwe' dakhyo:- shid kham" li" nae" . Ngadqere: yao: re ab byid' pye' ra" yaug wa byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" mho"zo: qe wa ceru: kad' nae" yao: bam mae" khoyaug lam: ngad nae" i? ga: yao: cao: jho" myid' ako" .
Mho"zo: qe wa yao: bam mae" khoyaug lam: qi" thao" yaug ngad: i? ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ngag: thug' li" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Mao" So re malam: ra" amyu" kho: kham qe wa yao: bam: mung" byu qe: dao mae qam: so' we' eib: ako" . Kheim: so' qo" ra" kho: kham qe wa mung" byu qe: jeju asang qe ga:- mhang" byid: nae" rure o: ako" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa ai we' dakhyo:- magai: ngad- Naonhaung" mae" qi" thao" ra" yaug wa ngai: thao" ra" yaug we' dakhyo:- ngad ca"- Au: jhaung wa daui daui yaug we' dakhyo: ngad ca" .
Saboe" mae zaung: jo, yang: zozo" na yaug we' zozo: yaug re caung da" byid' ra" yaug mae" kho: yaug lam: je: qi" ra" i? Saboe" mae zaung: jo; ra" yaug je: qi" ra" . Ngadqere: ngo wa naonhaung" phaung mae caung da" yaug we' dakhyo: ngad:-
Naonhaung" wa ngo we' daga" ju" phyo' khin jang: ru jham re thaung" qhug' lai: lo va" mo, ngad: ako" .
Nga" Pho" yang ngore eib nae" akhang" byid' to" ru we' dakhyo:- ngore: ai: eib nae" akhang" naonhaung" re byid: nae" .
Naonhaung" wa nga" mung"dan: khug mae- nga" saboe" mae qo" zo: shaug' li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Simon we"- Simon we"- Tae" gyo: wa,- Jung: gaug re amo we' aseim gatau tau hug' kyang" pye' ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" alhab' rere: magai: ru we' gai: ru kyang" pye' nae" qhid' mae" Satan wa akhang" qo" ava" .
Ngadqere: Simon we"- ni" lam khug: myid mabyo; lo" nae" qhid' mae" ngo akyu" mho' byid' to: va"- ngo jhao" nao dam: myid: phaug' lo lao"- nao wa ni" mao: nhaung: qere qam: laung: nyhad' tang byid: ca"- ga: ta" ra" .
Petru wa Asang we"- Ngo wa thaung: laung" nae" khyo ngad: re ngad- Shid nae" ru khyo ngad: re ngad cao" nae" jin" jin" ngad:- ga: Yesu re tau" ra" .
Yesu wa Petru we"- nao re ngo ta" li"- ana" myi yao: qo, mateim shire nao wa ngore maba- ga: sam lhang ha: pye' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere- ngo naonhaung" re ngaui thaung- thaung a:- khyid zhaung: mavin nhao lo:- nhao: ke' ra" au:- naonhaung" daja: ja: qo ca" ko" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: bam wa- Daja: re: maca"- ga: tau" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Ana" kam" wa ngaui thaung- thaung a: qo"ra"yaug wa yu: vin ge,- Shae maqo" ra" yaug wa yao" bau: qhang aung" pye' yang:- shae vai: ci ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re Ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- Jham: Mugsug' mae yao: wa tarha" macao" ra" mo; japhin: mae boke' ru qhug' ra"- ga: tung" to" ru wa ngo mae jab byang" li" ca" ra"- Gaigai: yao:- ai: tung" to" ru wa ngo mae jab byang" li" ca" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" mho"zo: qe wa Asang we"- Qu" wa,- cemae shae shid' khyae: jo; ra"- ga: ta"ako" . Yesu wa Ai: gu: ga" va"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu wa vomo" mae" thug' lo" mung:- yao: khonhae" re: lhaung" ye" ru we' dakhyo: Zhan: lun: bam khyo ye" lo" ra" . Mho"zo: qere: yao" thao cao" ye" ako" .
Ai: jo, qo khyo joe" ye: lao"- yao: wa mho"zo: qere Naonhaung" wa ju" phyo' ru khyo magyo" lo" genae" qhid' mae" akyu" mho' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: yao: wa mho"zo: qemae" laug baui dalhang pye' joe" vha" lai: ye: mung:- pad' thaug' thaug' yang:-
Pho" we"- nao myid: o: ru ngad: re wa- ce: qug: khai: khyag' qhui: ra" keim re ngo mae" yu: pye' byid: la,- ngadqere: ngo myid: o: ra" khyo" mangad:- nao myid o: ra" khyo" boe" lo vashao:- ga: akyu" mho' ra" .
Mug: gaung dao mae" mug: lagyo: Yesu jhao" thug' li" mung:- yao: re qam: li" byid' ra" .
Yesu wa yao" nhag' lam: aung khug mae dayin dayo: kham zo" na: ruyang qam: ke' mung:- akyu" mho' ra" . Yao" gaung mae" bau kyoe: wa sa: we' dakhyo:- myid gaung khyo yug: gyo" lo" ra" .
Yesu wa akyu" mho' rumae" to" mung:- mho"zo: qejhao" dam: tug' lo: re- yao: bam myid: kaug' myid: myaung: geyang: yab: jo; bam ko" rure Yesu lomyao: ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" pe"mung: yab: myhid' jo, ko" i? To" mung:- naonhaung" wa ju" phyo' ru khyo magyo" lo" genae" qhid' mae" akyu" mho' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu airu: jhau: na shi" au:- mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug mae bobo: ra" Yuda yang jhui" li" ra" byu daphung: joe" li" ako" . Yuda wa Yesu re bobaug baug nae" qhid' mae" Yesu jhao" qui" ye" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re Yuda we"- nao wa Byu: Yao: Zo: re bobaug baug yang: ab byid' pye' nae" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Yesu we' daga" na: ra" mho"zo: qe wa boe" li" nae" ra" ave, re ba: qu" geyang:- yao: bam wa Yesu re- Ngonhaung" shae ci naeva" laug i? ga: myid' ako" .
Mho"zo: qemae" dayaug wa Khinjaung Yin" jeim pho" dayaug re qam" ke' mung:- ai: yaug: lo, yo shad' no: khye' byid: lo" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa Airu: dakad'- ga: ta" mung:- jeim pho" nokhye' re yao" lo, tin: byid: yang:- gai byid' ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: re taung: nae" ga: joe" li" ko" ra" . Khinjaung qi: qe- Caung: pa" Yham gug: gam gyezug: qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qere- Naonhaung" wa damya, re taung" ruru: ngore taung: nae" qhid' mae" shae we' thaung kang we' li" ko" i?
Ngo wa Mao" So: yham mae ba khao: ngo" naonhaung" we' daga" na ngad yang: re:- naonhaung" ngore mataung: ko" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ce: yo, khyin: wa naonhaung" yo, khyin:- mug: cad' zug' nho: qam: so' eib: ra" yo, khyin: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re taung: mung:- Khinjaung Yin" yham khug khyo yao: re jhui" ye" ako" . Petru wa va: va: mae" cao" ye" lo" ra" .
Byu daqhae: wa yham vang" agaung: mae myi: mad: gao yang:- zaung: bam: ako" . Petru re: yao: bam: phaung mae yebo: zaung: jo; ra" .
Daui daui okaung myiqe: nau" dayaug wa ai: myikhyeim" mae Petru zaung: jo; rure the' myao lao"- yao: wa Petru re zhaug' qu" mung:- ceyaug re:- Yesu we' daga" na: qin" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Petru wa Myiqe: nao we"- yao: re ngo ba lhao" re: maba- ga: ha: pye' ra" .
Ai: thao dazab re yauggai dayaug wa- Petru re the' myao mung:- nao re: yao: bam: phung: mae" dayaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" . Ngadqere: Petru wa Byu nao we"- yao: bam: phung: mae ngo mabo- ga: tau" ra" .
Amung: dayo, qug ko kyo thao re yauggai gatau dayaug wa ceyaug wa Yesu we' daga" na: qin" yaug ngad: rure aug' o: nae" khyo pe" majo, ngad: ra"- pe"mung: ga"re yao: re: Galile byu dayaug ngad: ra"- ga: qam: ke' yang: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Petru wa- Byu nao we"- nao ta" ra" khyo re ngo maba- ga: phaug' tau" ra" . Yao: airu: ta" na shi" au: yao:- qo, teim: ra" .
Asang wa lhang: lo mung:- Petru re zhaug' qu" ke' ra" . Alao" Petru wa- Ana" myi yao: qo, mateim shi: re nao ngore maba- ga: sam lhang ha: pye' li" nae"- ga: Asang yao: re ta" to" ra" dao: re myid: beim" ra" .
Arumung: Petru wa taung gaung khyo thug' ye: mung:- gyai ye: kaug' ngug: ra" .
Yesu re zaung" na: ra" mo, wa yao: re jung" mung: be; ako" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu myo,khung: re thab' pye' byid: mung:- nao re be, yaug khag' ngad: ra" i? Tag: qu" wa,- ga: ta" ako" .
Amung: yao: bam wa jung" dao: gatau myo: sho' we' yao: re maphug' makhyad' roe" ako" .
Mug: bo" li" lao"- lau: de, au: jhaung qe- khinjaung qi: qe we' Jham: Tung" Pho" qe wa daga" za: zang" ham: na: bam: ako" . Ai: thao yao: bam wa Yesu re Tarha" Qe, Do, khyo jhui" vao ye" ako" .
Yao: bam wa nao Meshia ngad: i? Ngonhaung" re ta" kyo: la,- ga: Yesu re myid' ako" . Yesu wa yao: bam re- ngo ta" kyo: ngadqere: naonhaung" lam" genae" mangad:-
Alao" ngo naonhaung" re dao: myid: ngadqere: naonhaung" phaug' tau: genae" mangad:-
Ngadqere: Byu: Yao: Zo: wa ana" mae" thoegu: phung qam: so' bo: ra" Mao" So: lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo; li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam alhab' mo, wa Aire wa- Nao wa Mao" So: yao: Zo: ngad: i? ga: myid' ako" . Yesu wa yao: bam re Ngo Mao" So: yao: Zo: ngad: ra"- ga: naonhaung" yao: ta" vako" ra"- ga: tau" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Ngonhaung" sagse: gatau pe" qo lo" i? Yao: ta" ra" dao: thoe reyao:- ngonhaung" the' gyo: va"- ga: ta" ko" ra" .
Tarha" qe, do, phung: geim" alhab' mo, to" yang:- Yesu re Pilad qhid' kheim: khyo jhui" vao ye: mung:-
Ceyaug wa mung" byu qere khyonghung: jhui" nghung" na: ra" . Yao: wa Ketha kho: kham re khang: make' nae" qhid' mae" mo, byu qere ta" mung:- yao: yao" gaung rere: Meshia ga" ra" kho: kham ngad:- ga: ta" na: rure ngonhaung" the' gyo: va"- ga: Yesu re qobo zhaug' ako" .
Pilad wa Yesu re- Nao wa Yuda qe: kho: kham ngad: i? ga: myid' ra" . Yesu wa- Aiwa nao ta" ru ngad: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Ai: thao Pilad wa khinjaung qi: qe we' mo, byu qere- ceyaug re dao: phyid' nae" qhid' mae" ngo pe" akhyo mamyao- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa Yao: re- Galile mung" mae" qhid mung:- Yuda mung" geim" gam: sho' we' ce: jo, qo khyo lhao" re: joe" sho' mho" shid' byid: mung:- mo, byu qe lu" to" li" nae" qhid' mae" poe: na yaug ngad: ra"- ga: qam: ke' yang:- tin: tin: ga: qobo zhaug' ako" .
Pilad wa cedao: re the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa Ceyaug Galile byu ngad: ra" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa Herod eib: ra" mung" mae" byu ngad: rure ba lao"- Yesu re Herod jhao" dai" ke' ra" . Herod re: ai: ayo, mae Yerusalem mae lojoe" na: jo; ra" .
Herod wa Yesu re myao lao"- gyai bau" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa Yesu khyo re the' gyo" qu" va" rumung:- Yesu re myao nug: ru myao" ava" . Alao" yao: wa Yesu kad' qhu" ra" mug' pho: ve, lho daja: ja: re myao nae" myid: lao" na: ra" .
Airumung: Herod wa Yesu re dao: myid: myo: sho' ja: myid' ra" . Ngadqere: Yesu wa pe" matau: ngad: ra" .
Khinjaung qi: qe we' Jham: Tung" Pho" qe wa qhid' au: khyo qui" ye: mung:- Yesu re qi: sho' qobo zhaug' ako" .
Herod we' yao" gyezo: qere:- Yesu re jung" mung:- maphug' makhyad' kad' ako" . Ai: thao yao: bam wa Yesu re gyai yaung" phug' de; ra" bau: qhang vhe' byid: yang:- Pilad jhao" dam: tug' dai" ke' ko" ra" .
Ai: ba na mae yao:- Herod we' Pilad wa dam: jho" nyang: ako" . Qhid' phyao: wa yao: shid' zo: dayaug we' dayaug majho" vang" ko" ngad: ra" .
Pilad wa khinjaung qi: qe- lau: de, au: jhaung qe- mo, byu qere khai: zhang" to: mung:-
yao: bam re- ceyaug wa mung" byu qere khyonghung: jhui" nghung: yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" mung:- naonhaung" yao: re ngojhao" jhui" li" ako" . Naonhaung" yao" qhid' kheim: mae yao:- ngo wa yao: re myid' ca: qu" va"- naonhaung" zhaug' ra" qobo daja: re: yao: kad' shad' rure ngo mamyao-
Herod re: Yesu qobo re mamyao ngad: ra"- Airumung: yao: re ngojhao" dam: tug' dai" ke' lo: ra"- ceyaug wa shid man" ra" qobo daja: re: mashad' ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ngo wa yao: re be, yang: nhao: ke' nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Pilad wa Lai co' Poe khao: ngo" mae mo, byu qe: qhid' mae" khonhae" re: kyam: byu dayaug re lhaung" lhoe' ke' byid' ra" .
Mo, byu qe alhab' wa Yao: re se' pye' wa,- ngonhaung" qhid' mae" Baraba re lhoe' ke' byid: la,- ga: zag: hug' ako" .
( Baraba wa vomo" khug mae geim lau to" ru we' byu se' ra"qobo: yang thaung: laung" jo, yaug ngad: ra" . )
Pilad wa Yesu re lhoe' ke' nug yang:- mo, byu qere dam: ta"qu"ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa Yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' wa,- yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' wa,- ga: zag: hug' ako" .
Pilad wa yao: bam re Yao: pe" ja" qobo shad' lhoe" ra" i? Yao: mae shid man" ra" qobo daja: shad' qo re: mamyao- Amung: ngo wa yao: re be, yang:- nhao: ke' nae"- ga: sam lhang ein: lhang ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yao: bam wa Yesu re pyao: zang dao mae jin" se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" thoe myhao: thao" mae" zag: hug' na: ako" . Lo" thao" mae wa yao: bam hug' aung: yu: ako" .
Airumung: Pilad wa yao: bam mho' ko" ruwe' dakhyo:- ngad shao:- ga: Yesu re dao: phyid' ke' ra" .
Ai: thao Pilad wa geim lau to" ru we' byu se' ra" qobo: mathao mae thaung: laung" jo; ra" yaug re yao: bam mho' ru we' dakhyo:- nhao: ke' byid: mung:- Yesu re wa yao: bam o: ra" khyo" kad' genae" qhid' mae" ab: ke' ra" .
Gyezo: qe wa Yesu re jhui" ye" lo" ako"- yao: bam ye" lo" na ko" au:- Seyo: vogaung: mae" vomo" khug khyo lo: na: ra" Simon ga: mang: ra" Kureni mang: byu dayaug re myao: ako" . Yao: bam yao: re taung" yu yang:- pyao: zang re vo, nhao mung:- Yesu nhaung thao" mae su: nhao: ako" .
Mo, byu qe ajham ataung Yesu thao cao" ye" ako" . Ai: mo, byu phaung mae myiqe: qe damyo" wa Yesu qhid' mae" kaug' mung:- ngug byid ngug nhe' we' cao" ye" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam shad' khyo lhang: lo mung: Yerusalem: myiqe: qe we"- nga" qhid' mae"dangug ge,- naonhaung" yao" qhid' mae" we' naonhaung" zo: dau qe: qhid' mae" kam" wa ngug ge,
Pe"mung: ga"re Zo: dau maqo" qu" ra" myiqe:- gaung mala" qu" ra" myiqe:- nug' cug majhaug' qu" ra" myiqe: wa ngaui lho" ra" wo"- ga: ta" genae" ra" ba na joe" lo: na: ra" .
Ai: ba na mae byu qe wa bam jham re- Ngonhaung" dao mae logyo" nhai" gela,- Bug gaung jham re- ngonhaung" re lobam" pye' gela,- ga: ta" li" genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re sag' jam: gae re lhao" re:- ceru: kad' ko" ngad: re wa sag' kyaug' gae re wa khoqhi" sho' kad' genae" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Qobo shad' lhoe" ra" yauggai gatau shid' yaug rere:- Yesu we' daga" se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" jhui" ye" lo" ko" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Au: Gao: Gye,- ga" ra" jo, qo khyo joe" ye: lao"- Yesu we' qobo shad' lhoe" ra" byu shid' yaug re- Yesu lo, yo shad' mae dayaug lo, kaung: shad' mae dayaug pyao: zang mae jin" te' ako" .
Yesu wa- Pho" we"- yao: bam re qobo khyad' byid: wa,- yao: bam wa yao: bam yao: pe" kad' na: rure maba ko" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: bam wa Yesu mai bau: jham re pha" ce' khyo" yang: yao: cao: jho" gae: yu: ako" .
Mo, byu qe aitau mae lhaug' qu" na ko" au:- Yuda lau: de, au: jhaung qe wa- Su gaje qere wa yao: khyad' yu: ra"- yao: wa Mao" So: yang khyin: san: to" ra" Meshia ngad: re wa yao: yao" gaung re khyad' yu vashao:- ga: Yesu re gaui mho: ako" .
Gyezo: qere:- Yesu jhao" qui" ye: gemung:- yhid jhin qang: byid: jhaug' zo" re"-
Nao Yuda qe: kho: kham ngad: re wa naoyao" gaung re khyad' yu wa,- ga: Yesu re jung" ako" .
Amung: yao" au: tho' mae- ceyaug wa Yuda qe: kho: kham ngad: ra"- ga: tung" te' to" ako" .
Pyao: zang mae jin" te' to" ra" damya, shid' zo: mae" dayaug wa- Nao wa Meshia ngad:- mangad: i? Nao yao: re we' nga" shid' zo: rere:- khyad' yu la,- ga: jung" dao: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: gatau dayaug wa Mao" So re nao magyaug i? Nao wa yao: kham: yu: ra" dao: phyid' ra" qobo dae we' daja: za: qobo dae kham: yu: ra" .
Ngadqere: nga" shid' zo: wa nga" shid' zo: yao: shad' lhoe" ra" qobo dae kham zo: man" ru we' dakhyo:- dao: phyid' ru qhug' va" . Ngadqere: yao: wa pe" re: mashad' ngad: ra"- ga: qeim: ra" .
Amung: yao: wa Yesu re- Yesu we" Nao kho: kham khyo" joe" li" lao"- ngore myid: beim: la, wo"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Nao re ngo dang za: ta" li"- ana" ba yao: nao wa ngo we' daga" Pharadisu mae qhug' na: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Na" gaung daxe: shid' yo, qug ko ngad: au: mae"- myi" thao sam yo, qug joe" sho' ba zho: ru thang: lo" mung:- no, sang: kyid mug: cad' cad' lo" byaug: ra" .
Caung: pa" Yham mae" qe, kyo pin: lung: re:- shid' gao go; lo" byaug; ra" .
Alao" Yesu wa Pho" we"- nga" byo ni" lo, mae ab byid' ra"- ga: thoe qi: we' hug' ta" mung:- kao gyo" lo" ra" .
Airu: boe" rure gyezo: dayo eib: ra" gyezug: pho" myao lao"- ceyaug wa gaigai: yao: byugai dayaug ngad nhaung wo"- ga: ta" mung:- Mao" So re caung: khin" byid' ra" .
Ai: tau mae li" zang" ham: qu" na ko" ra" mo, byu qe wa airu: boe" rure myao gelao"- alhab' mo, yao: yao" qao gao re theim yang: kaug' phao: lo" ko" ra" .
Yesu re ba se" ra" mo, alhab' we' Galile mae" yao" thao cao" ko" ra" myiqe: qe wa va: va: mae ye; jo, yang:- qu" na: bam: ako" .
Yuda mung"- Arimathe vobyu Yoseb ga: mang: ra" Yuda Tarha" Qe, Do, phung: mae bobo: ra" byu dayaug na: ra" . Yao: wa phug' myao: tho' ra" din: man" ra" byu dayaug ngad: ru we' Mao" So: mung"dan: joe" li" nae" rure lao" na: ra" yaug ngad: ra"- yao: wa Tarha" Qe, Do, phung: vao byu dayaug ngadqere: Tarha" Qe, Do, phung" yang dao: phyid' ru we' kad' ra"lo, mau" re myid mabovang" ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Pilad qhid' kheim: khyo vao ye: mung:- Yesu mao gaung re yemho' ra" .
Yoseb wa mao gaung re yu: khyo" yu yang:- jid: mo" pin: dau: yang mao gaung re thab' pye' mung:- khag' re: manyhab' qu" shi" ra" laug thin re kyaung" to" ra" laug khyaung lab mae Yesu mao gaung re yeke' to" ra" .
Ai: ba wa ban thug' ngo" ba- nyhang" seim" ra" ba na ngad mung:- Dugno: Ba khyo de; ye: nae" jhao" li" na: ra" .
Galile mae" Yesu thao cao" qin" ko" ra" myiqe: qere:- Yoseb we' daga" ye: mung:- lab re we' Yesu mao gaung re khoru: to" rure yao: bam myao: ako" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa yham khyo tug' phao: lo" mung:- sheim nae pyo" ra" ja: we' Mura xau nyhang" to" ako" . Kham" To" Ra" Tarha" jo; ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam wa Dugno: Ba mae thang: na: ako" .
Laban ba ne, seim no' mug: qab qab bo" li" we' ai: myiqe: qe wa yao: bam nyhang" seim" to" ra" sheim nae pyo" ra" xau jham ci yang:- lab khyo ye" lo" ko" ra" .
Lab khyaung nhad' mae" laug zang tau: lhang" pye' to: va" rure yao: bam yemyao mung:-
Lab khyaung khug khyo vao ye" ako"- ngadqere: Asang Yesu mao gaung re yao: bam maye: myao ko" ngad: ra" .
Ce: khyo re yao: bam mug' ye; jo, ko" au:- Qu" ge,- Qhui qhui qhag qhag mung: bao: ra" mai bau: ve; ci: ra" byu shid' yaug wa yao: bam: nhae mae ye; jo; ako" .
Ai: myiqe: qe wa din: gyaug mung:- myid gaung mae goe; jo; ako" . Ai shid' yaug wa yao: bam re daui: na: ra" yaug re shid: ra" mo; phaung mae naonhaung" pe"mung: qho: na ko" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yao: wa cetau mae mana lo:- Daui: to" lo" va"- yao: Galile mae na shi" au:-
Byu: Yao: Zo: wa qobo shad' lhoe" ra" mo; lo, khyo ab byid' ru qhug' mung:- pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' ru qhug' li" nae"- amung: sam ba thao re dam: daui: to" li" nae" ngad:- ga: yao: naonhaung" re ta" to" ra" dao: re myid: beim: ge,- ga: yao: bam re ta" ako" .
Alao"- ai: myiqe: qe wa Yesu dao: re myid: beim: mung:-
Lab tau mae" dam: phao: lo" mung:- yao: bam wa mho"zo: daxe: dayaug we' gaje qe alhab' mo, re ai: khyo lota" kyo" ako" .
Lagyo: qere ai: khyo lota" kyo" ra" myiqe: qe wa Magadala Mari- Yoana- Yaku yao: myhi" Mari we' yao: bam we' daga" bobo: ra" gatau myiqe: qe ngad: ako" .
Lagyo: qe wa ai: myiqe: qe ta" ra" dao: re dao: keim ngad:- ga: myid gemung:- yao: bam ta" rure malam" ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Petru wa to" yang: lab khyo tao" ye" lo" mung:- lab khyaung re yegam" qu" ke' re- mao gaung re thab' ra" jid: mo" pin: dau reza: yao: myao: ra" . Ailao" yao: wa ai: khyo re myid: mug' mung:- yham khyo dam: tug' phao: lo" ra" .
Ai: ba reyao: Yesu mho"zo: shid' yaug wa Yerusalem vogaung: we' khyo nhad' man: ko va" ra" Ema-u vogaung: khyo ye" lo" na: ako" .
Yao: shid' yaug wa boe" lai: lo: ra" khyo jham re yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Yao: shid' yaug wa yao: cao: jho" ta" jho" myid: mung:- ye" lo" na ko" au:- Yesu wa yao: yao: te' te' su" ye: mung:- yao: shid' zo: we' daga" ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa- Yesu re myao gengad yang: re: daru: zang mung yang: yao: re maqu" se" ko" ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: shid' zo: re- Ni" shid' yaug wa khyo su: zo" mae" pe" nam jho" ta" na ko" i? ga: myid' ra" . Ailao" yao: shid' zo: wa myo, nho sham sham mung: thang: ye; jo; ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: mae" Cleopa ga: mang: ra" yaug wa- Nao wa Yerusalem khyo joe" li" ra" bang" vo qemae" ana" gyo: shi" ai: vogaung: mae boe" lai: lo: ra" khyo re maba: ru nao dayaug za: ngad nhaung i? ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: wa pe" boe" ra" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: shid' zo: wa Nazared mae" Yesu nho: khyo ngad: ra"- ceyaug wa lapa dayaug ngad mung: Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae re: byu alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae re: dao: thoe we' lo, mau" qam: so' bo: ra" lapa ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" khinjaung qi: qe we' zug: ade, qe wa yao: re se' pye' nae" dao: phyid' nae"qhid' mae" ab byid' pye' mung:- yao: wa pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' ru qhug' ra" .
Yao: wa Israel amyu" re lhoe' ke' byid: nae" yaug ngad: ra"- ein: ngonhaung" myid: lao" qu" va"- ai: tho' mago"- ana" wa ai: khyo: boe" va" rulao" re:- sam ba ngad: ava" .
Ngonhaung" phung: mae" myiqe: damyo" wa ngonhaung" re myid: mug' nhao: ako" . Yao: bam wa ne, seim no' mae" lab khyo ye" lo" ko" ra"- ngadqere: Yesu mao gaung re mayemyao ko" ngad: ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa dam: tug' phao: lo mung:- Yesu wa daui: na: ra"- ga: mug: lagyo: qe yao: bam re ta" kyo" ra" bao qab re the' myao va"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ngonhaung" phung: mae" daqhae: re: lab khyo yequ" ko" re ai: myiqe: qe lo: ta" ru we' dakhyo:- khyag' za: ngad: rure ye: myao: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa Yesu re mamyao ko" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" Yesu wa yao: shid' zo: re- Naonhaung" wa lapa qe ta" to" ra" dao: jham re phyad za: manug: lam" ko" ra"- Nhag' magyang" ra" mo, we"-
Meshia wa airu" ra" khyag' qhui: rure kham zo: mung:- yao" phungbao khug mae vao ye: zai ngad: ra" mangad: i? ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: Yesu wa Moshe tung" to" rumae" qhid mung: lapa qe tung" to" ra" Jham: Mugsug' alhab' mae yao" khyo we' sin: mung:- tung" to" ra" Jham: dau jham: lajheim: re yao: shid' zo: re sho' kyo" ra" .
Yao: bam ye" lo" na ko" ra" vogaung: nhae mae joe" lao"- Yesu wa su" lai: ye" lo" nae" seim" ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: shid' zo: wa- Ba vao mug: cad' va" ra" . Nga" shid' zo: we' daga" thang: na gelang:- ga: ta" mung: yao: re tam" ako" . Airumung: Yesu wa yao: shid' zo: we' thang: na nae" qhid' mae" cao" ye" lo" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: shid' zo: we' daga" zozo: nae" zaung: jo, mung:- mug re yu: yu yang:- jeju bin: caung: lao"- khyoe' phai" mung: yao: shid' zo: re byid' ra" .
Alao"- yao: shid' zo: wa myo, bung" li" mung:- Yesu ngad: rure ba: ako" . Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: shid' zo" qhid' kheim: mae" byaug: lo" ra" .
Amung: yao: shid' zo: wa- Khyo mae nga" shid' zo: re yao: dao: jhau: ra" au: we' Jham: dao: lajheim: sho' kyo: byid' ra" au:- nga" shid' zo" nhag' lam: khug mae thug thug ga: laung: li" kyi: mangad: i? ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Ailao" jao" yao: shid' zo: wa to" mung:- Yerusalem khyo dam: tug' phao: lo: ako" . Aimae mho"zo: daxe: dayaug we' zang" ham: na: bam ko" ra" mo, wa-
Ai: Asang wa gaigai: yao: dam: daui: to" li" va" ra"- yao: wa Simon re na: thug' qhu" va"- ga: jho" ta" na ko" rure lo: myao: ako" .
Alao" yao: shid' zo: wa khyo mae boe" ru we' mug khyoe' phai" ra" au:- Asang re yao: shid' zo: qu" ba: se" ra" khyo alhab' yao: bam re ta" sho' kyo" ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: yao: bam re airu: ta" kyo" na shi" au:- nyag din taung" Yesu wa yao" gaung re yao:- yao: bam: phaung mae li" ye; qhu" mung:- naonhaung" ngaui bau: yaug yo vageshao:- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Yao: bam myao: ru wa subyo ngad:- ga: jho mung:- gyaug: nin" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" pe"mung: gyaug: din ko" i? Naonhaung" aung khug mae pe"mung: aug' o: ko" i?
Nga" khyid we' lo, re qu" ge,- naonhaung" myao: ra" yaug wa ngo yao: ngad va"- ngore soe' qu" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re subyo wa gaung sho: we' shoqug: shoqe mabo ngad: ra" . Ngo wa naonhaung" myao: ru we' dakhyo:- gaung sho: we' shoqug: shoqe bo yaug ngad:- ga: ta" mung:-
Yao" wa ceru: ta" mung: mho"zo: qere yao" khyid lo, jham qhu" byid' ra" .
Yao: bam: nhag' lam: mae ngaui bau" ru we' mug' ru saung" byang" jo, gemung:- yao: bam maqo" lam" shiko" ngad: ra"- Airumung: Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" cetau mae zo: nae" daja: ja: qo" ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa ngo: nyo, datam" yao: re byid' ako" .
