Yao: wa aire yu: yu mung:- yao: bam: qhid' kheim: mae zo" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa yao: bam re Moshe Kham" To" Ra" Tarha" Jham: paug'- Lapa qe tung" to" ra" jham: paug' we' Caung: khin" Jham: paug' jham mae nga" khyo we' sin: mung: ta" to" ra" khyo jham wa jab byang" li" ca"- ein: naonhaung" we' ngo daga" na shi" au: mae" ai: gu: alhab' ngo naonhaung" re ta" to: va"- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Jham: Dao: jham re ba: gyo: genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam: myid re yao: phung" byid: mung:-
Yao: bam re Meshia wa khyag' qhui: rure kham zo: mung:- sam ba thao re shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ca" zai ngad:-
Yao" mang re lao: yang:- myid tha" ra" khyo mungdao: we' qobo khyad' byid' ra" khyo re Yerusalem mae" qhid mung:- byumyu" cao jab alhab' re kho" kyo: byid: ca"- ga: Jham: Mugsug' mae ceru: tung" to" ra" .
Naonhaung" wa ai: khyo jham we' sin: mung: myo, myao sagse: qe ngad: ako" .
Airumung: nga" Pho" yang dao: so: byid' to" rure naonhaung" dao mae ngoyao: nhao: ke' byid: nae" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa mug: tho' mae" qam: so' naonhaung" dao mae majoe" gyo" li" li" wa Yerusalem vogaung: mae lao" na ca" ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa mho"zo: qere Bethani vogaung: nhae khyo jhui" ye: mung: yao" lo, shid' shad' re tau yang:- yao: bam re shaman" byid' ra" .
Airu: yao: bam re shaman" byid' na: au:- Yesu wa mho"zo: qemae" gao" lo" mung:- mug: gaung khyo to' yu: ru qhug' ra" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re goe; caung: pa" yang:- gyai ngaui bau" ru we' Yerusalem khyo dam: tug' phao: lo" mung:-
Caung: pa" Yham mae abang mabyid na: jo, yang:- Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" byid' ako" .
Sao qhid' maqhid mae mungdao: jo; ra" . Aimung dao: wa Mao" So we' daga" ngad mung:- mungdao: wa Mao" So ngad: ra" .
Aimung dao: wa sao qhid' maqhid mae" Mao" So we' daga" ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa ai: mungdao: khyo" yang cao jab alhab' re phan" to" ra" . Yao: mabo lo: phan" to" ru daja: re: majo, ngad: ra" .
Aimung dao: wa kao so' ajhaung ngad: ra" . Amung: ai: kao so' wa xao su byu qe: qhid' mae" bo" bao ngad: ra" .
Ai: bo" bao wa mug: cad' khug mae bao: jo, mung:- mug: cad' wa bo" bao re khonhae" re: maqo" aung: pye' ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa Yohan ga: mang: ra" yaug re yao" lagyo: khyo" yang nhao: ke' ra" .
Alhab' mo, wa the' gyo: yang: lam" genae" qhid' mae" Yohan wa ai: bo" bao re ta" kyo: nae" joe" li" ru ngad: ra" .
Yao: yao: wa bo" bao mangad:- Bo" bao: khyo re ta" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru ngad: ra" .
Ai: bo" bao wa myid gaung dao khyo joe" li" mung:- xao su byu alhab' mo; dao mae bao byid' ra" bo" bao agyang" ngad: ra" .
Aimung dao: wa mug: myid mae ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa yao: khyo" yang mug: myid re phan" to: ngadqere: mug: myid wa yao: re maba ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa yao: yao" mug: mang: khyo joe" li" ngadqere: yao: yao" mang: byu qe wa yao: re malham: khae: yu ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngad yang: re: yao: re khae: yu mung: lam" ra" mo, alhab' re Mao" So: zo: dau qo" boe" ra" akhang" byid' ra" .
Ai bam wa xao su byu khyo" khau: li" mung:- yao: yao: za: Mao" So: zo: dau qe boe" li" ru mangad:- Mao" So wa yao: bam: yao: pho" ngad: ra" .
Mung dao: wa xao su byu boe" li" mung:- nhag' myan" ru we' dangman" ru byang" jo, yang:- ngonhaung" phaung mae na: ra" . Yao: pho" nho: zote: zo: dayaug khyo" yao: kham: yu: to" ra" yao" phungbao re ngonhaung" the' myao va" .
Yao" khyo re Yohan ta" ru wa nga" thao mae joe" li" ra" yaug wa ngo tho' je: qi: yaug ngad: ra"- ein: ngo ta" na: ra" yaug wa ceyaug ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa ngo makhau shimae" na: jo, yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao" nho: nhag' myan" ru byang" jo; rumae" yao: wa ngonhaung" alhab' re shaman" jeju daja: thao daja: byid' ra" .
Mao" So wa Moshe khyo" yang tarha" byid: ngadqere: nhag' myan" ru we' dangman" rure wa Yesu Khristu khyo" yang byid' ra" .
Mao" So re khag' re: mamyao: qu" ngadqere: yao: pho" tao: kheim" mae na mung:- Mao" So yao: ru" ra" zote: zo: wa Mao" So re qhu" byid' ava" .
Yerusalem mae na ko" ra" Yuda kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, wa khinjaung qere we' Levi kaung daqhae: re Yohan jhao" nhao: ke' mung:- nao khag' ngad: i? ga: myid: nhao: ke' ako" .
Ailao" Yohan wa- ngo wa Meshia mangad: ga: manyham: mazug' lo: de: de: za: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa- Aire nao khag' ngad: i? Nao wa Elia ngad: i? ga: myid' ako" . Yohan wa ngo mangad: ga: tau" ra" . Ailao" yao: bam wa Nao wa ai: lapa yaug ngad: i? ga: myid' ako" . Yohan wa Ngo mangad: ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa- Nao khag' ngad: rure ngonhaung" re ta" kyo: la,- ngonhaung" re nhao: ke' ra" mo, re lo" dam: ta" kyo: nae" dao: cilo" ca" ra"- naoyao: wa khoru: ta" nae" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Ailao" Yohan wa ngo wa lapa Esaia ta" ru we' dakhyo:- Asang: khyo re din: din: za: nyhang" jhao" ge, ga: din"pyad' yo mae hug' na: ra" thoe ngad: ra" ga: tau" ra" .
Ai: Pharishe qeyang nhao: ke' ko" ra" lagyo: qe Yohan re dam: myid: ko" ru wa-
Nao wa Meshia re: mangad:- Elia re: mangad:- ai: lapa yaug re: mangad: re wa nao wa pe"mung: qid nyhab' byid' i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yohan wa- ngo wa qid mae qid nyhab' byid' ra"- ngadqere: naonhaung" phaung gaung: mae naonhaung" maba: ra" byu dayaug ye; jo; ra" .
Yao: wa nga" thao mae joe" li" ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ngadqere: ngo wa- yao" khyid zhaung: taui: pheim byid: nae" lhao" re: maman: qi"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ce: khyo jham wa Yohan qid nyhab' byid: yang: na: ra" Yodan gyaung: thoete' ba thug' shad' mae" Bethani vogaung: mae boe" ra" khyo jham ngad: ra" .
Thao: ba re Yohan wa yao: jhao" Yesu li" na: rure myao mung:- myid gaung byu qe: qobo re yu: pye' byid' ra" Mao" So: Yao Nau" re qu" ge,-
Yao: wa nga" thao mae joe" li" yaug ngadqere: ngo tho' je: qi: yaug ngad: ra" ein: ngo ta" ra" yaug wa ceyaug ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao wa ngo makhau shimae" na: jo, yaug ngad: ra" .
Qhid' phyao: yao: khag' ngad: rure ngo maba- Qhid' phyao: maba ngadqere: Israel amyu" qe yao: re ba genae" qhid' mae" ngo wa qid mae qid nyhab' byid' ru ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: Yohan wa Byo wa- mug: gaung mae" phaung" kyug' ru: dao" gyo" li" mung:- yao" dao mae li" no" na: rure ngo the' myao va" .
Ngo wa yao: aiyaug ngad: rure qhid' phyao: maba- ngadqere: qid mae qid nyhab' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngore nhao: ke' ra" . Mao" So ngore ta" ru wa Byo wa gyo" li" mung:- byu dayaug: dao mae li" no" na: rure nao the' myao: li" nae"- ai: yaug wa Gyang" Lho" Byo mae qid nyhab' byid' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ai: rure ngo the' myao va"- Airu: mung: yao: wa Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ngad: rure naonhaung" re ngo sagse: kham: kyo" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Thao: ba re Yohan wa yao" mho"zo: shid' yaug we' daga" ye; jo; ra" .
Yao: wa Yesu lai: lo" na: rure myao lao"- Mao" So: Yao Nau" re qu" ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao" mho"zo: shid' yaug wa ai: dao: re the' gyo: gelao"- Yesu thao cao" ye" lo" ako" .
Yesu wa lhang: qu" mung:- yao: shid' zo: yao" thao cao" lo: na ko" rure myao lao"- ni" shid' zo: pe" re qho: na ko" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yao: shid' zo: wa Rabai we"- nao khotau mae na: i? ga: tug' myid' ako" . ( Rabai ga" ru wa mho"pho" ga" ru ngad: ra" . )
Yao: wa Li" qu" geri:- ga: tau" ra" . ( ai: ayo, wa myi" thao byid yo,qug ko ngad: ra" . ) Aimung: yao: shid' zo: wa yao: we' daga"cao" ye" lo" mung:- yao: na: ra" jo, qo re yao: shid' zo: yemyao gelao"- yao: we' daga" ai: ba geim" yena: ako" .
Ai shid' zo: mae" dayaug wa Simon Petru yao: nhaung: Andre ga: yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa ailao"jao"- yao: mao: Simon re myao mung:- nga" shid' zo: Meshia re the' myao va" ga: Simon re ta" ra" . ( Meshia ga" ru wa Khristu ga" ru ngad: ra" . )
Ai: thao yao: wa Simon re Yesu jhao" jhui"lo: ra" . Yesu wa Simon re lham: qu" mung: nao wa Yohan yao: zo: Simon ngad: ra" ngadqere: nao re Kepha ga: mhang" li" genae" ( Kepha we' Petru ga" ru wa dakhyo: za: ngad mung: laung: mo" baui ga" ru ngad: ra" . )
Thao: ba re Yesu wa Galile mung" khyo ye" lo" nae" myid: phyid' ra" . Yao: wa Philib re the' myao mung: yao: re- Nga" thao cao" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
( Philib wa Andre we' Petru shid' nhae na: ra" Bedsaida vogaung: mae" ngad: ra" . )
Philib wa Nathanae re myao mung:- Moshe tarha" jham: paug' mae we' lapa qe: jham: paug' mae tung" to: ko" ra" yaug re ngonhaung" the' myao va" . Yao: wa Nazared mae" Yoseb: yao: zo: Yesu ngad: ra" ga: yao: re ta" kyo" ra" .
Ailao" Nathanae wa Nazared vogaung: mae" gai: ra" ru daja: ja: qo" thug' li" ra" i? ga: ta" ra" . Philib wa li" qu" wa,- ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu wa Nathanae yao: jhao" li" na: rure myao lao"- apyag' asham" mabo: ra" Israel byumyu" agyang" re qu" ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Nathanae wa Nao ngore khoru: ba: i? ga: Yesu re myid' ra" . Yesu wa- nao re Philib mali" khai shire pho' ham" gae qao: mae nao na: jo; ra" au: mae" nao re ngo myao va" ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Nathanae wa mho" pho" we"- nao wa Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ngad: ra"- nao wa Israel nho: kho: kham ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re Pho' ham" gae qao: mae nao na: jo; ra" au: mae" nao re ngo myao va" ein: nao re ta" ruyang za: nao lam" i? Cetho' je: qi" ra" mau" re nao the' myao: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: Yesu wa yao: bam re naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- Mug: gaung wa bung" li" mung:- Mao" So: mug: lagyo: qe wa Byu: Yao: Zo" dao mae do, do, gyo" gyo" kad' na ko" rure naonhaung" the' myao: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao shid' ba kyo thao re Kana vogaung: mae lo, xo' poe dalam: jo, mung:- Yesu yao: myhi" wa ai: poe mae leim: na: ra" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qere re: ai: lo, xo' poe khyo khai: ako" .
sabyi qang: gan: byaug lao"- Yesu yao: myhi" wa Yao: bam sabyi qang: gan: byaug: avako"- ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Ngo pe" kad' ca" rure- nao ta" maqo- Nga" ayo, majoe" shi:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu yao: myhi" wa daui daui mo, re yao: naonhaung" re nhao: ra" ja: alhab' re kad' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yuda qe wa yao: bam: caung: pa" thung" we' sin" ra" cid' san: ra" thung" qo" gemung:- ai: qhid' mae" soe: dayo ko ko vao: ra" laug qid yae: khyaug' lam: aitau mae zhaung: to" ako" .
Yesu wa ai: daui daui mo, re ai: yae: jham mae qid byang" sho' khae: zaui ge,- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: bam wa yae: nhad' joe" sho' khae: zaui: ako" .
Amung: Yesu wa yao: bam re- Ai: yae: mae" qid dajhid' khau" yu mung:- poe eib pho" re lo" byid: ge,- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: bam re: lo" byid' ako" .
Poe eib pho" wa sabyi boe" lo: ra" qid re shaug' tau" qu" ra" . Daui daui mo, wa ai: sabyi qang: khai: mae" qo" rure ba: ako"- ngadqere: poe eib pho" wa maba ngad: ra" . Aimung: yao: wa pho" sag' re khai: yu yang:-
Yaug khao: ngo" wa myho' thao" ra" sabyi qang: re shi" sao qhid' lhaung" byid: jhaug' ko" ra"- Shaug' gyi: gethao reza: mataung" myho' ra" sabyi qang: lhaung" byid: jhaug' ako"- ngadqere: nao wa myho' thao" ra" sabyi qang: re ana" joe" sho' zam" to" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Galile mung" Kana vogaung: mae sao qhid' mug' pho: mau" re kad' mung:- yao" phungbao re aimae qhu" byid' ra" . Aimung: yao" mho"zo: qe wa yao: re lam" ako" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa yao: myhi"- yao: nhaung:- yao" mho"zo: qe we' Kapena-um vogaung: khyo ye: mung:- aimae dayo, zo: yena: ra" .
Lai co' Poe joe" li" na mung:- Yesu wa Yerusalem khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham mae nung: jaung- yao- phaung" kyug' aung: mo, we' ngaui tha" zo: mo, yao: bam: zoboe" mae zaung: jo, ko" rure ye: myao: ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa taui" yang vose: dalam: kad' ci mung:- yao we' nung: jaung- gug' nyhug' jham alhab' re caung: pa" Yham mae" khe' thug' pye' ra"- amung: ngaui tha" zo: mo; ngaui thaung jham rere: gaug: sin" pye' byid: yang:- zaboe" gai" jham re tau: phaug' sin" pye' byid' ra" .
Phaung" kyug' aung: mo, rere: aijham alhab' re cetau mae" yu: thug' lo" ge,- nga" Pho" Yham mae gai jao: dakad' ge,- ga: amyin" byid' ra" .
Ailao" Yao" mho"zo: qe wa Mao" So we"- ni" yham re kao bau nhag' taui" ru wa nga" aung khug mae myi: ru: nga" na: ra"- ga" ra" jham dao: re myid: beim" ako" .
Yuda kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, wa nao ce: mau" zo" re kad' nae" akho: akhang" qo" yaug ngad: rure ba nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" re pe" ja" mug' pho: qo" kad' qhu" nae" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- ce: caung: pa" Yham re phyo' pye' ge,- sam ba: agyo: mae ngo dam: kad' nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re- Ce: caung: pa" Yham wa byid xe: khyaug' zin lam: lam: zhaug' lo: ra" yham ngad: ra" . Nao wa sam ba: agyo: maeza: ce: caung: pa" Yham re dam: qo" zhaug' nae" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu ta" ra" caung: pa" yham wa- yao" gaung re qang yang: ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yao" mho" zo" qe wa Yesu shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ru qhug' thao re yao: ta" to" ra" cedao: re myid: beim: mung:- yao: bam wa jham: mugsug' rere: Yesu ta" ra" dao: rere: lam" ako" .
Ai: Lai co' Poe ba na gyo: Yesu wa Yerusalem mae na: au:- byu myo: sho' mo, wa yao: kad' ra" mug' pho: mau" re the' myao gemung: yao: re lam" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam alhab' mo; khyo re ba: ruyang yao: bam re malam ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam: khyo re khag' yang re: yao: re ta" kyo: maqo ngad: ra"- pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam yao" aung khug nhag' lam: mae pe" bo: rure yao: yao: ba gau ngad: ra" .
Pharishe phung: mae bobo: ra" Nikodi ga: mang: ra" Yuda au: jhaung dayaug na: ra" .
Damyi re yao: wa Yesu jhao" ye: mung:- Rabai we"- nao wa Mao" So: yang nhao: ke' ra" mho" pho" dayaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba:- nao zaui" qhu" na: ra" mug' pho: ve, lho jham wa Mao" So mabo ngad: re khag' re: maqo" kad' ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa nao re ngo dang za: ta" li"- Dam: khau: ra" yaug mangad: re wa khag' re: Mao" So: mung"dan: re maqo" myao genae"- ga: yao: re tau" ra" .
Nikodi wa Qi: thao re khoru: dam: gai: khau nae" i? ga: myid' ra" . Gaigai: yao: yao: wa yao: myhi" aung khyo magai: vao ye" ru we' shid' lhang madam: gai: khau ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa Nao re ngo dang za: ta" li"- Qid we' Byo: yang khau: ke' ra" yaug mangad: re wa Mao" So: mung"dan: khug khyo khag' re: maqo" vao ye: ngad: ra" .
Gaung sho" yang khau: ke' ru wa gaung sho: ngad mung:- Byo: yang khau: ke' ru wa byo ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" alhab' mo, dam: khau ca"- ein: nao re ngo ta" ra" dao: re dagyo" mug'-
La wa yao: nug: ra" shad' khyo hug' ra"- La hug' thoe re nao the' gyo: ngadqere: khokhyo" hug' lo: ru we' khokhyo hug' lo" nae" rure nao maba ngad: ra"- Byo: yang khau: ra" mo, yaug khao: ngo" re: ai we' dau: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Nikodi wa ceru wa khoru: gai: boe" nae" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa tau: mung:- nao wa Israel amyu mho" pho" aqi: dayaug ngad: to: mung:- cekhyo re nao maba i?
Nao re ngo dang za: ta" li"- ngonhaung" wa ngonhaung" yao: ba: ru ta" mung:- ngonhaung" yao: the' myao va" khyo re dam: ta" kyo: byid: ngadqere: ngonhaung mungdao: re naonhaung" khag' re: manug: khae: yu ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" re ce: mug: myid dao: akhyo re ngo ta" kyo" re lhao"- ngo ta" rure malam" ko" ngad: re wa mug: gaung dao: akhyo re ngo ta" lao"- naonhaung" khoru: lam" genae" i?
Mug: gaung dao mae" gyo" li" ra" Byu: Yao: Zo: mae" je yang: mug: gaung dao khyo khag' re: mado, lo" qu" shingad: ra" .
Yao: re lam: ra" mo, yaug khao: ngo" apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" Moshe wa din" pyad yo mae gyid: bo" lhao maui lho re zang au: mae to' to" ru we' dakhyo:- Byu: Yao: Zo: re: to' to" ru qhug' nae" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa- mug: myid byu qere gyai jhid' de; mung:- yao: zo: re lam" ra" mo, yaug khao: ngo" wa mashid lo:- apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu genae" qhid' mae" yao" zote: zo: re byid' pye' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re mug: myid byu qere dao: kho' nae" qhid' mae" Mao: So wa yao: zo: re mug: myid dao khyo nhao: ke' ru mangad:- Mug: myid byu qere khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra" .
Mao" So: Yao: Zo: re lam" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: dao: kho' ru maqhug' ngad: ra" . Ngad yang: re: malam" ra" yaug kam" wa Mao" So: zote: zo: re malam: ruyang dao: kho' ru qhug' ava" .
Dao: kho' ra" khyo wa ceru: mung: ngad: ra"- Bo" bao wa mug: myid dao khyo joe" li" va" ngadqere:- byu qe wa yao: bam: makhyang" ra" mau" zo" jham: mathao: yang bo" bao re tho' mug: cad' re je: jhid' de; ako" .
Makhyang" ra" lo, mau" kad' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: bo" bao re nghang" ra" . Yao: yao" makhyang" ra" mau" zo" mamyao: thug' li" nhao nug: ruyang yao: wa bo" bao khyo mali" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: dangman" ra" mau" zo" re zaui" ra" yaug kam" wa yao: zaui" ra" mau" zo" wa Mao" So o: ra" khyo ngad: rure bo" bao: yang qhu" byid: shao: ga: yao: wa bo" bao khyo li" ra" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qe we' daga" Yuda mung" khaung: khyo thug' ye" lo" mung:- ai: khaung: mae mho"zo: qe we' daga" yena yang: qid nyhab' byid' ra" .
Yohan re: Salim mae" mataung" va" ra" Aenon ga" ra" jo, qo mae qid myo: sho' jo; ruyang qid nyhab' byid: yang: na: ra" . Byu qe wa- yao: jhao" ye: mung:- Yohan wa- yao: bam re qid nyhab' byid' na: ra" .
( Ce wa Yohan thaung: malaung" shire boe" ru ngad: ra" . )
Yohan: mho"zo: qe daqhae: wa caung: pa" thung" we' sin" ra" cid' san: ra" khyo we' sin: mung:- Yuda byu dayaug we' jho" ta" ngag: ako" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa Yohan jhao" ye: mung:- Mho" pho" we"- Yodan gyaung: thoete' ba thug' shad' mae nao we' daga" na mung:- nao sagse: kham byid' ra" yaug re nao mabeim: i? Yao: wa ana"- qid nyhab' byid: yang: na: ra"- Yaug khao: ngo" yao: jhao" ye" ako"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yohan wa- Mao" So: yang za: mabyid: re wa khag' pe" maqo" yu ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngo wa Meshia mangad:- yao" qhid' au: mae nhao: ke' ra" yaug angad: ein: ngo ta" va" ru wa naonhaung" yao: sagse: qe ngad: avako" .
Myhi" sag' re sang: ra" yaug wa pho" sag' ngad: ra" . Pho" sag' nho: ba nam pho" kam" wa- ayae mae ye; jo, yang:- pho" sag' thoe re tae" gyo" ra" . Yao: wa pho" sag' thoe re the' gyo: lao"- gyai ngaui bau" ra" . Airu: ngaui bau" ru wa ngo mae jab byang" li" va" .
Yao: wa myo" laug: li" nae"- ngo kam" wa nang" lo" zai ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Mug: gaung khyo" joe" li" ra" yaug wa alhab' tho' je: qi" ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Myidgaung dao mae" ngad: ra" yaug wa myidgaung byu ngad yang:- myidgaung dao we' sin" ra" khyo jham reza: ta" ra" . Ngadqere: mug: gaung khyo" joe" li" ra" yaug wa alhab' tho' mae" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa yao: the' myao va" ru we' the' gyo: va" ra" khyo re ta" ra"- ngadqere: yao" mungdao: re khag' re: makhae: yu shiko" ngad: ra" .
Yao" mungdao: re khae: yu: ra" yaug kam" wa airu: khae: yu: ra" khyo" yang Mao" So wa dangman" ra" yaug ngad: rure jao dang byid: yaug ngad va" .
Mao" So: yang nhao: ke' ra" yaug wa Mao" So: mungdao: re ta" ra"- pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa aiyaug re yao" Byo byang" sho' byid' ra" .
Yao: Pho" wa yao: zo: re jhid' de; mung:- phung qam: so' alhab' yao" lo, mae byid' to" ra" .
Mao" So: Yao: Zo: re lam: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: apyad ato: kao so' qo" ra" . Mao" So: Yao: Zo" mho dao re maphug' cao" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: kao so' qo" nae" mangad:- yao: wa Mao" So: qobo dae byid' ra" khug mae na: jo; li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Yohan tho' mho"zo: je: qo" poe" yu mung:- qid nyhab' byid' na: ra" ga" rure Pharishe qe the' gyo" ako" .
Gaigai: yao: Yesu yao: yao: wa dayaug rere: qid nyhab' mabyid: ngad: ra" . Yao" mho"zo: qeza: byid' ako" .
Airu Pharishe qe the' gyo: vako" ra" ga" rure Yesu yao: dam: the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa Yuda mung" mae" thug' lo" mung:- Galile mung" khyo dam: tug' lo" ra" .
Yao" gyaung: khyo wa Samari mung" khyo" su" lai: lo" ca" ra" .
Yesu wa Samari mung" mae" Sukha ga" ra" vogaung: khyo joe" lo: ra" . Ai: vogaung: wa ganhae" pyad re Yaku yang yao: zo: Yoseb re byid' to" ra" yo myid nhae mae" Samari vogaung: dalam: ngad: ra" .
Ai: mae Yaku nho: qid thaung: jo; ra" . Yesu wa khyo su" myaung: yang: qid thaung: nhae mae zaung: jo; ra" . Amung: ayo, wa na" gaung ba khaung tau yo, ko ngad: ra" .
Samari myiqe: dayaug wa qid khae nae" ga: joe" li" ra" . Ailao" Yesu wa Ngo re qid byid: jhaug' la,- ga: yao: re mho' ra" .
( Yao" mho"zo: qe wa zo: ve vai nae" qhid' mae" vogaung: khug khyo vao ye" lo" byaug: ako" . )
Samari myiqe: wa Nao wa Yuda byu ngad mung:- ngo wa Samari byu ngad:- Khorumung: nao ngore shaug' qid mho' i? ga: ta" ra" . ( Pe"mung: ga"re Yuda byu qe wa- Samari byu qe ci: ra" keim kang: re malhaung" ci ko" ngad: ra" . )
Ailao" Yesu wa Mao" So byid' ra" jhaung qhu" we' nao re qid mho' shaug' na: ra" yaug khag' ngad: rure nao ba: ngad: re wa- nao wa yao: re mho' mung:- yao: wa nao re daui: ra" kao so' qid byid' li" nae"- ga: yao: re phaug' tau" ra" .
Ai: myiqe: wa- Nhag' bo we"- nao wa qid khae nae" qid pung" re: maqo" ngad: ra"- aimung: qid thaung: re: gyai no; ra"- ai: kao so' qid nao khai: mae" qo" yu nae" i?
Ce: qid thaung: wa ngonhaung" phug' pho" Yaku yang ngonhaung" re byid: co' ra" qid thaung: ngad: ra" . Phug' pho" Yaku yao: yao: re:- yao: zo: qere:- yao" gug' nyhug' jham re: ce: qid thaung: mae" shaug' lai: lo" vako" ra"- nao wa Yaku tho' je: qi" i? ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa ce: qid shaug' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: qid dam: shab' shinae"-
Ngo byid: nae" ra" qid re shaug' ra" yaug kam" wa khonhae" re: qid madam: shab' nae"- yao: re ngo byid: nae" ra" qid wa yao" khug mae kao so' qid thug' boe" mung:- ai wa yao: re kao so' qid we' apyad ato: kao so' byid' li" nae" ga: tau" ra" .
Ai: myiqe: wa Nhag' bo we"- ngo wa qid madam: shab' nae" we'- cekhyo qid mali" khae ca" nae" qhid' mae" ngore ai: qid byid: la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re Ni" yham sang pho" re lo" khai: yu yang: dam: li" ri:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: myiqe: wa Ngo yham sang pho" maqo" ga: tau" ra" . Yesu wa yao: re- ngo yham sang pho" maqo" ga:- nao ta" ru wa jo: ra" .
Nao wa yham sang pho" ngo" yaug qo" qu" va"ra"- ana" nao we' daga" na: ra" yaug wa ni" yham sang pho" mangad: ngad: ra"- nao wa ngore dang: ru ta" ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: myiqe: wa Nhag' bo we"- nao wa lapa ngad: rure ngo ba va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Nga" phug' pho" qe wa ce: bam dao mae Mao" So re caung: pa" lo: ako" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" Yuda byu qe wa Yerusalem vogaung: mae caung: pa" ca" ga: ta" ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re Myiqe: we"- nga" dao: re lam" wa,- ce: bam dao mae re: mangad:- Yerusalem vogaung: mae re: mangad: lo:- Pho" re caung: pa" nae" ayo, joe" lo: li" nae" .
Naonhaung" Samari byu qe wa naonhaung" yao: maba: ra" yaug re caung: pa" ako"- ngadqere: ngonhaung" Yuda byu qe wa ngonhaung" yao: ba: ra" yaug re caung: pa" na:- pe"mung: ga"re khyad' yu: ru wa Yuda byu qemae" joe" li" ra" .
Byu qe wa Mao" So: Byo qam: so' khyo" yang Pho" re dangman" ra" khyo" caung: pa" nae" ra" ayo, joe" lo: na: ra"- ana" lhao" joe" ava" . Mao" So wa airu: caung: pa" mo, re o ngaui: ra" .
Mao" So wa Byo ngad: ra" . Amung: yao: re caung: pa" ra" mo, wa Mao" So: Byo qam: so' khyo" yang za: dangman" ra" khyo" yao: re qo" caung: pa" ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: myiqe: wa Yesu re- Meshia joe" li" nae" rure ngo ba: ra"- yao: joe" li" lao"- ngonhaung" re khyo ja: cao jab li" ta" kyo" li" nae"- ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu wa Nao we' jhau: na: ra" yaug ngo wa yao: ngad va"- ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Ai: ayo, mae mho"zo: qe dam: tug' joe" lo: ako" . Yao: bam wa Yesu re myiqe: dayaug we' jho" jhau: na: rure lomyao gemung:- gyai mug' hao" byaug: ako" . Ngadqere: ai: myiqe: re Nao pe" o: i? ga: re:- Yesu re Nao ai: myiqe: we' pe"mung: dao: jho" jhau ko" i? ga: re:- khag' re: yao: bam mavae" myid: ngad: ako" .
Ailao" ai: myiqe: wa yao" qid yae: re to: co' mung:- vogaung: khyo dam: tug' lo" yang: vobyu qere-
Ngo zaui" lai: lo: ra" khyo alhab' re ngore ta" kyo: yaug re li" qu" geri:- yao: wa Meshia ngad nae" laug? ga: lo" ta" ra" .
Airumung: vobyu qe wa vogaung: mae" Yesu jhao" thug' ye" lo" ako" .
Ai: au: re mho"zo: qe wa Asang we"- zozo: wa,- ga: Yesu re ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa naonhaung" maba: ra" zo: ve ngo qo"- ga: yao: bam re phaug' tau" ra" .
Airumung: mho" zo: qe wa byu dayaug yaug; yang yao: re zo: ve li" byid: vasam" ra" i? ga: yao: bam yao: cao: jho" myid' na: ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Nga" zo: ve wa ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug myid o: ra" khyo re phug' cao" nae" we' yao: zaui: nhao: to" ra" mau" zo" re kyab' sho' zaui: nae" ru ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa gaug yad yo, joe" nae" lho" byid khye' ca" shi" ga: ta: na: ako" mangad: i? Ngadqere: ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- Gaug yo khyo nyang" za: qu" ke' ge,- Gaug wa yad: yu nae" ana" yao: mhang" jo; ava" .
Yad: ra" yaug wa aphug' qo" khae: yu mung:- apyad ato: kao so' ga" ra" gaug zo re qo" jham" yu: ra" . Airu: mung: qho: yaug we' yad: yu yaug wa daga" za: ngaui bau" li" genae" .
Dayaug wa qho: mung: dayaug wa yad: yu: ra"- ga" ra" dao: khyo: wa dang: ra" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re- naonhaung" yao: masin: maqho" ra" yo mae" gaug zo re yad: yu nae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' va" . Gatau damyo" wa ai: yo mae qho: mung:- yao: bam: lo, mau" akyu" mae" naonhaung" qo" kham: yu: ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa Ngo kad' lo: ra" khyo alhab' re ngore ta" kyo: yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ai: myiqe: myhi" yang ta" ruyang ngad: ra" . Ai: vogaung: mae" Samari byu qe myo: sho' mo, Yesu re lam" ako" .
Airumung: Samari byu qe Yesu jhao" joe" li" gelao"- yao: bam wa Yesu re yao: bam we' daga" thang: na nae" qhid' mae" mho' ako" . Aimung: Yesu wa ai: vogaung: mae shid' ba thang: na: ra" .
Yesu mungdao" yang yao: re lam" ra" mo, je: myo" lo: ako" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa ai: myiqe: re Ana"- ngonhaung" lam" va"- Aiwa nao ta" yang: mangad:- yao" mungdao: re ngonhaung" yao: the' gyo" yu va" rumung: lam" ru angad:- yao: wa gaigai: yao: mug: myid dao: mae" khyad' yu: Asang ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba va" ga: ta" ako" .
Ai: vogaung: mae shid' ba bin: na co' thao- Yesu wa ai: vogaung: mae" Galile mung" khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re lapa wa yao: yao" mug; mae nga: maye, ngad: ra"- ga: Yesu yao: yao: ta" to" ra" .
Galile mug: khyo Yesu joe" ye: lao"- Galile mang: byu qe wa yao: re lham: tug: yu: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa Yerusalem mae kad' ra" Lai co' Poe mae yeleim mung:- ai: poe ba na gyo: mae Yesu kad' ra" mau" ja: khao: ngo" re yao: bam the' myao: ako" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa qid re sabyi qang: boe" nhao: ra" Galile mung" mae" Kana vogaung: khyo dam: ye" ra" . Ai: vogaung: mae" Asuya mang: zug: dayaug: yauggai zo: wa Kapena-um vogaung: mae no: na: ra" .
Yesu wa Yuda mung" mae" Galile mung" khyo joe" lo: ra"- ga" rure ai: zug: pho" the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa Yesu jhao" ye: mung:- Kapena-um vogaung: mae no yang: shid: lo" na: ra" yao" yauggai zo: re yegai byid: nae" qhid' mae" Yesu re mho' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Naonhaung" wa ve, lho we' mug' pho: za: mamyao gere wa khag' re: lam" genae" mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: zug: pho" wa Nhag' bo we"- nga" zo: mashid shire li" wa,- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Lo" wa,- ni" yauggai zo: wa daui nae"- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" yao: wa Yesu dao: re lam" yang: dam: lo" ra" .
Yao: phao: lo" na: au:- yao" daui daui mo, joe" li" mung:- ni" zo: daui: na: ra" ga: li" ta" kyo" ako" .
Amung: yao: wa yao: bam re- yao" yauggai zo: khoyo, mae" gai: li" rure myid' ra" . Daui daui mo, wa ayenhe' myi" thao dayo, qug ko re yao: wa no gai: lo" byaug: ra"- ga: tau" ako" .
Ailao" yao: pho" wa ai: ayo, wa- Ni" yauggai zo: wa daui nae"- ga: yao: re Yesu ta" ra" ayo, yao: ngad: rure myid: beim" ra" . Airumung: yao: we' yao" yham byu qe alhab' Yesu re lam" ako" .
Ceru wa Yuda mung" mae" Galile mug: khyo joe" lo thao re shid' lhang ein: lhang Yesu zaui" ra" mug: pho: ve,lho ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Yuda byumyu" qe: caung: pa" thung" dalam: jo, yang:- Yerusalem vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Yerusalem vogaung: mae" Yao Kham: Dung: nhae mae Hebre myan" khyo" Bedzatha ga: mhang" ra" qid kyaung" dalam: jo; ra" . Ai: qid kyaung" lhang" yang: zaung ngo" lam: kad' to" ako" .
Ai: zaung jham: akhug mae myo, jid- khyid qeim mo,- gaung jam: shid: mo,- no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, myo: sho' lang" jo; bam: ako" .
Ai: mae sam xe: she' zin lam: lam: no: ra" byu dayaug na: ra" .
Yao: airu: lang" jo; rure Yesu myao mung:- yao: no: na: ru gyai myao" va" rure Yesu ba: ra" . Aimung: Yesu wa ai: no yaug re- Nao no gai: lo" nug: i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ai: no yaug wa Nhag' bo we"- qid lab: li" ra" au:- qid kyaung" khyo ngore jhui" vao ye: nae" byu cemae ngo maqo"- ngo vao ye: nae" seim" na: au:- nga" qhid' re su gaje dayaug yaug shi" vao ye" lo" byaug byaug mung: ra"- ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re To" wa,- ni" yab qo re gaug: vo, yang:- su" lo" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao"- aiyaug wa gai: lo" mung: yao" yab qo re gaug; vo, yang: su" lo" ra" . Ai: ba wa Dugno: Ba ngad: ra" .
Aimung: kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe wa ai: no gai: lo" yaug re- ana" ba wa Dugno: Ba ngad: ra"- ni" yab qo vo; ru wa ngonhaung" Tarha" re lhoe" ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ailao"- yao: wa Ngo re no gai byid' ra" yaug wa ni" yab qo gaug: vo, yang: su" lo" wa,- ga: ngore ta" ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yao: bam wa yao: re- Nao re ceru: kad' nae" ta" yaug wa khag' ngad: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Ngadqere: ai: no gai: lo" ra" yaug wa Yesu khag' ngad: rure yao: maba ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ai: jo, qo mae mo, byu qe ham: na ko" ru we' Yesu wa sae za: khug' phao: thug' lo" byaug yang: ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa aiyaug re caung: pa" Yham mae the' myao mung: yao: re- Tae" gyo: wa,- nao wa ana" no gai: ava"- Qobo dakad' lo: wa,- airu: mangad: re nao wa cetho' xo: ru qhug' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao"- aiyaug wa thug' lo" mung:- yao: re no gai byid: yaug wa Yesu ngad: rure kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qere lo" ta" kyo" ra" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa Dugno: Ba mae Yesu no gai byid' ruyang yao: re yhin" qhid: li" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Nga" Pho" wa khonhae" re: mau" zaui" na:- amung: ngore: mau" zaui: ca"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ce: dao: thoe: yang kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe wa yao: re se' nae" je yang: myid: phyid' ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa Dugno: Ba: tarha" re lhoe" ruyang za: re: mangad:- Mao" So re yao: Pho" ga: ta" mung:- yao: yao" gaung re Mao" So we' daqi" ngad: ra" khyo" kad' ruyang ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- yao: Zo: wa yao: yao" myid khyo" pe" re: maqo" kad' ngad: ra" . Yao: Pho" kad' na: rure yao: myao: ra" gu: re za: yao: kad' ra"- yao: Pho" kad' rure Yao: Zo: re: kad' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yao: Pho" wa Yao: Zo: re jhid' de; mung: yao: yao: kad' na: ra" mau" zo" alhab' Yao: Zo: re qhu" byid' ra" . Cetho' je: qi" ra" mau" re zaui: nae" lhao" re:- yao: Zo: re qhu" byid' li" nae" . Amung: naonhaung" wa mug' hao" byaug: li" genae" .
Yao: Pho" wa shid: ra" mo, re tau: to' yu mung:- yao: bam re kao so' byid' ru we' dakhyo:- yao: Zo: re: yao: o ngaui: ra" mo, re kao so' byid' ra" .
Yao: Pho" yao: yao: wa khag' rere: dao: makho' ngad: ra" .
Byu alhab' wa Yao: Pho" re phug' te' byid' ru we' dakhyo:- yao: Zo: rere: phug' te' byid: genae" qhid' mae" yao: Pho" wa dao: kho' nae: akho: akhang" alhab' Yao: Zo: re byid' to" ra" . Yao: Zo: re nga: mayhe' byid: yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: Pho" re nga: mayhe' byid: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- nga" dao: thoe re gyo" yu mung:- ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug re lam" ra" yaug wa apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu: ra"- Shid: rumae" kao so' daui: ru khyo lai: lo va" yaug ngad mung: yao: wa dao: kho' ru maqhug' nae" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- shid: jo; ra" mo, wa Mao" So: Yao: Zo" thoe re the' gyo: nae" ayo, joe" lo: li" nae"- ai: ayo, wa ana" lhao" joe" ava" . Aimung: ai: thoe re the' gyo" ra" mo, wa kao so' qo" daui: li" genae" .
Yao: Pho" wa yao: yao: kao so' ajhaung ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- yao: Zo: rere: kao so' ajhaung boe" nhao: to" ra .
Yao: wa Byu: Yao: Zo: ngad: ruyang dao: kho' nae" akho: akhang" yao: re ab byid' to" ra" .
Ceru re damug' ge,- shid; jo; ra" mo, alhab' wa yao" thoe re the' gyo: mung:- yao: bam: lab mae" thug' li" genae" ra" yo, khyin: joe" lo: li" nae" .
Gai: ra" mau" zo" kad' ra" mo, wa kao so' daui: ra" khyo- magai: ra" mau" kad' ra" mo, wa dao: phyid' qhug' nae" ra" khyo- daui: to" li" genae" .
Ngo wa ngoyao" kheim: so' khyo" pe" re: maqo" kad'- Mao" So ngore ta" ru we' dakhyo: za: ngo wa dao: kho' ra" . Amung: nga" dao: kho' ru wa din: vang" ra"- pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa ngoyao: myid: o: ra" khyo" kad' ru mangad:- ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug myid o: rure za: kad' ra" .
Ngo wa ngoyao" gaung re sagse: kham: yu: ngad: re wa nga" sagse: kham: ra" dao: wa tarha" mavao ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: nga" khyo re sagse: kham byid: yaug gatau dayaug na: ra"- yao: kham: ra" sagse: dao: wa dang: rure ngo ba: .
Naonhaung" wa Yohan jhao" naonhaung" lagyo: nhao: ke' mung:- yao: wa dangman" rure sagse: kham byid' ra" .
Aiwa nga" qhid' mae" byu dayaug yaug: yang sagse: kham byid: qo mung: mangad:- ngo ce: dao: re ta" ru wa naonhaung" khyad' yu: ru qhug' genae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Yohan wa myishae de, mung: bao: jo; ra" myibaung: ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" wa yao" bo" bao khug mae dazab za: pyo" na nug: ako" .
Ngadqere: Yohan kham byid' ra" sagse: tho' je: qi" ra" sagse: ngo qo" ra" . Ngo kad' ra" mau" wa Nga" Pho" yang ngore nhao: ra" mau" ngad mung:- aijham wa ngore Nga" Pho" yang nhao: ke' ru ngad: rure sagse: qhu" byid' ra" .
Ngo re nhao: ke' ra" Nga" Pho" yao: re:- nga" khyo re sagse: kham byid' ra" . Naonhaung" wa yao" thoe re khonhae" re: magyo" qu" ru we' yao" myo,khung: re mamyao: qu" ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao" mungdao: re: naonhaung" nhag' lam: khug mae make' to: ngad: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa yao" yang nhao: ke' ra" yaug re malam" ko" ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa jham: mugsug' mae apyad ato: kao so' the' myao: li" nae"- ga: myid: jho geyang: jham: mugsug' jham re nghe' xeim: ako" .
Ai: jham: mugsug' jham yao: re:- nga" khyo re sagse: kham byid' ako" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa kao so' qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" ngojhao" manug: li" ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa byu: yang caung: khin" nae" khyo re maqho-
ngadqere: naonhaung" pe" ru" ra" byu qe ngad ko" rure ngo ba: ra" . Naonhaung" aung khug mae Mao" So re jhid' de; ra" myid mabo ko" rure ngo ba: .
Ngo wa Nga" Pho" kheim: so' we' joe" li" yaug ngad:- ngadqere: naonhaung" ngore malham: khae: yu ko" ngad: ra" . Dayaug yaug yao: yao" kheim: so' we' joe" li" re wa yao: re naonhaung" lham: khae: yu genae" ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa yao: cao: yao" yang caung: khin" rure kham: yu nae" o mo, ngad: ako" . Ngadqere: date: za: ngad: ra" Mao" So: yang caung: khin" rure qo" kham: yu nae" wa naonhaung" qam: make' ko" ngad: ra" . Airu: angad: re wa naonhaung: ngore khoru: qo" lam" genae" i?
Ngadqere: ngo wa naonhaung" re Nga" Pho" qhid' kheim: mae qobo zhaug' nae" yaug ngad: ein: dajho ge,- naonhaung" re qobo zhaug' nae" yaug wa naonhaung: yao: myid: lao" na ko" ra" Moshe yaug angad: li" nae" .
Naonhaung" Moshe re gaigai: yao: lam" vako" ngad: re wa ngo rere: lam" genae" ngad: ra"- pe"mung: ga"re Moshe wa nga" khyo re tung" to" ra" .
Moshe tung" to" rure naonhaung" malam" gere wa naonhaung" nga" dao: re khoru: qo" lam" genae" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa Galile tham: ( Tiberia tham: ga: re: mhang" ako" ) thoete' khyo gau" ye"lo" ra" .
No phyo: qhug' ra" mo, re gai byid' ra" mug' pho: ve, lho jham re mo, byu qe the' myao gemung:- byu phung: mo" zang Yesu thao cao" ako" .
Yesu wa bug gaung dalam: khyo Do, ye: mung:- yao" mho"zo: qe we' daga" yezaung: jo; ra" .
Lai co' Poe kad' nae" ba na jhao" li" na: ava" .
Yesu qu" ke' re mo, byu qe ajham ataung- yao: jhao" li" na ko" rure myao mung:- Philib re ai: mo, byu qere laug: zho: nae" zo: ve ngonhaung" khai: mae yevai zai laug i? ga: myid' ra" .
( Yesu airu: myid' ru wa Philib re jham" qu" ru ngad: ra" . Yao: wa khoru: kad' nae" rure ba: to: gau ngad: ra" . )
Ailao" Philib wa yaug khao: ngo" re dajhid' jhid' za: byid: zho: nae" lhao" re:- ngaui shid' yo: yang vai: re lhao" re: malaug zai ngad: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu mho"zo: qemae" Simon Petru; yao: nhaung: Andre wa
Bale mug ngo" khai" we' ngo: shid' dau: vin: ra" yauggai nau" dayaug cetau mae na: ra"- ngadqere: aigu" yang za: wa mo,byu qe alhab' qhid' mae" laug nae" mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Mo,byu qere zaung nhao ge,- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" . ( Aimae vahau: gyai yaug: ra" ) Aimung: mo,byu qe alhab' zaung: jo; ako"- Yauggai qe ngo" taung ko ngad: ako" .
Yesu wa ai: mug re yu: yu mung: Mao" So re jeju bin: caung: byid: lao"- aimae zaung: jo, ko" ra" mo, byu qere gae byid' ra" . Ngo: rere: ai we' dakhyo: kad' ra"- Mo,byu qe wa yao: bam o: nho" zo" ako" .
Yao: bam alhab' mo, zo" gyi: vagelao"- Yesu wa amyid: avho: maboe" vashao:- zo" tang" ra" aje, aman" jham re gaug: zhang: yu ge,- ga: yao" mho"zo: qere ta" ra" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa alhab' re gaug: zhang: yu ko" re- bale mug ngo" khai" mae" mo, byu qe zo" tang" ko" ra" aje, aman" jham daxe: shid' gyan byang" sho' qo" gaug: zhang: yu: ako" .
Yesu kad' ra" ce: mug' pho: ve, lho re the' myao ko" ra" mo,byu qe wa Ceyaug wa dang za: mug: myid dao khyo joe" li" nae" ga: ta" to" ra" lapa yao: ngad nhaung? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam li" taung" yu yang:- maqad maqui" kho: kham kad' nhao: li" genae" rure ba mung:- bug gaung khyo yao: za: dam: do, ye" lo" ra" .
Myi" thao joe" lao"- Yesu mho"zo: qe wa Galile tham: khyo gyo" ye" lo" mung:-
lha dakhye' dao yedo; zaung yang:- tham: thoete' mae" Kapena-um khyo dam: tug' gau" phao: lo" ako" . Mug: cad' lo ngadqere: Yesu wa yao: bam jhao" majoe" lo shingad: ra" .
Ai: au: re la qam" hug' lo mung:- tham: mae bang: lhung" to" li" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa khyo sam byid man: vha" ko bin: gau" lo" gethao re- Yesu wa qid dao mae khyo su" lo: na mung:- lha khyo te' lo: na: rure yao: bam myao gelao"- yao: bam wa gyaug: din: pye' ako" .
Yesu wa dagyaug ge,- ngo angad: ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Ailao"- yao: bam wa Yesu re ngaui bau: za: lha dao khyo lham: to' yu: ako" . Ailao"jao"- lha wa yao: bam thang nug: ra" jo, qo khyo joe" lo: ra" .
Thao: ba re tham: thoete' mae thang: na geco' ra" mo,byu qe wa aitau mae lha dakhye' za: jo; rure myid: beim" li" ako" . Amung: ai: lha dao mae Yesu maye: bozaung lo:- yao" mho"zo: qeza: gau" lo" ko" rure yao: bam ba: ako" .
Ngadqere: Tiberia te' mae" lha jham wa Yesu jeju bin: caung: byid: thao re mo,byu qe mug zo" gyi: ko" ra" jo, qo nhae khyo joe" lo: ako" .
Mo,byu qe wa aitau mae- Yesu re:- yao" mho"zo: qere: mana loko" ga" rure ba gelao"- yao: bam wa ai: lha jham: dao mae yedo; zaung mung:- Yesu re qho nae" qhid' mae" Kapena-um khyo gau" de; ye" ako" .
Mo,byu qe wa tham: thoete' mae Yesu re yemyao gelao"- yao: bam wa Mho" pho" we"- nao cekhyo khonhae" joe" lo: i? ga: yao: re myid' ako" .
Yesu wa Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- naonhaung" ngore qho ko" ru wa ngo kad' qhu" ra" mug' pho: ve, lho jham: lajheim: re ba: gyo: geyang: mangad: ko" ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" o: ra" nho" mug qo" zo" gyi: geyang: angad ko" ra" .
Bab: qeim: lo" ba: ra" zo: ve qhid' mae" qam: dake' ge,- Mabab maqeim: lo" ra" apyad ato: kao so' zo: ve qhid' mae" qam: ke' ge,- Byu: Yao: Zo: wa ce: zo: ve naonhaung" re byid' li" nae" . Pe"mung: ga"re Pho" Mao" So wa yao: myid vang" ra" aso: dazid re yao" dao mae thaung" te' to" ra" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa Mao" So o: ra" mau" re qo" zaui: nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" khoru: kad' nae" i? ga: Yesu re myid' ako" .
Yesu wa Naonhaung" re zaui: nhao: ra" Mao" So o: ra" mau" wa yao" yang nhao: ke' ra" yaug re lam" nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" ga: tau" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Ngonhaung" nao re lam" nae" qhid' mae" nao ngonhaung" re pe" ve, lho kad' qhu" nae" i? Nao pe" mau" kad' nae" i? ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Jham: mugsug' mae Mao" So wa yao: bam re mug: gaung mae" mug byid: zho" ra"- ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" phug' phyid' qe wa din"pyad' yo mae Mana mug zo: vako" ra" ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Yesu wa Ngo naonhaung" re dang za: ta" geli"- Moshe naonhaung" re byid' ru wa mug: gaung mae" mug mangad:- ngadqere: nga" Pho" wa naonhaung" re mug: gaung mae" mug agyang" byid: yaug ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So byid' ra"ai: zo: ve agyang" wa mug: gaung mae" gyo" li" mung:- Myid gaung byu qere kao so' byid' ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Nhag' bo we"- ngonhaung" re ce: mug khonhae" re: byid' na la,- ga: mho' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Ngo wa kao so' zo: ve ngad:- ngojhao" li" ra" yaug wa khonhae" re: vae: mamoe; nae"- ngore lam" ra" yaug wa khonhae" re: qid mashab' nae"-
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa ngore myao gengadqere: malam" genae"- ein: ngo naonhaung" re ta" va" .
Nga" Pho" yang ngore byid' to" ra" mo, yaug khao: ngo" ngojhao" li" li" genae" . Ngo jhao" li" ra" yaug khag' rere: ngo khonhae" re: manhao: tug' ke' nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa ngoyao: myid o: ra" khyo" kad' nae" qhid' mae" mug: gaung khyo" gyo" li" ru mangad:- ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug: myid o: ra" khyo" kad' nae" qhid' mae" gyo" li" ru angad:-
Ngo re nhao: ke' ra" yaug myid o: ru wa yao" yang ngore byid' to" ra" mo, alhab' mae" dayaug rere: majeim: nhao lo:- lo" thao" ra" ba na mae shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re nga" Pho" myid o: ru wa Yao: Zo: re myao: ra" mo, alhab' wa lam" mung: apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu genae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Amung: ngo wa lo"thao" ra" ba na mae shid: rumae" kao so' daui: to" li" nhao nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa ngo wa mug: gaung mae" gyo" li" ra" mug ngad:- ga: ta" ra" dao" yang mo,byu qe wa nyhung: li" ako" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa ceyaug wa Yoseb: yao: zo: Yesu mangad: i? Yao: pho" yao: myhi" tao rere: ngonhaung" ba: mangad: i? Aire khoru: mung: ngo wa mug: gaung mae" gyo" li" yaug ngad: ga: yao: ta" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa naonhaung" yao: cao: nyhung: na: ru thang: pye' ge, .
Ngo re nhao: ke' ra" Pho" yang ngojhao" malao" te' byid: re khag' re: ngojhao" maqo" te' li" ngad: ra" . Ngo wa ngojhao" li" ra" yaug re lo" thao" ra" ba na mae shid: rumae" daui: to" li" nhao nae"-
Byu yaug khao: ngo" wa Mao" So: yang mho" byid' ru qhug' li" genae"- ga: lapa qe tung" to" ako" . Nga" Pho" ta" ra" dao: re the' gyo: mung:- zhao: yu: ra" yaug wa ngojhao" li" ra" .
Ceru: ta" ru wa Mao" So re myao: qu" byu dayaug yaug na: ein: khyo" ngo ta" nug: ru mangad:- Mao" So mae" joe" li" ra" yaug za: Pho" re myao: qu" ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- Lam" ra" yaug wa apyad ato: kao so' qo" ra" .
Ngo wa kao so' mug ngad:-
Naonhaung" phug' phyid' qe wa din"pyad' yo mae Mana mug re zo: gengad yang: re:- yao: bam shid: lo" byaug: ako" .
Ngadqere: mug: gaung mae" gyo" li" ra" ce: mug re zo" ra" yaug wa mashid nae" .
Ngo wa mug: gaung mae" gyo" li" ra" kao so' mug ngad:- ce: mug re zo" ra" yaug wa apyad ato kao so' daui: na: li" nae"- ngo byid: nae" ra" mug wa myid gaung byu qe daui: na nae" qhid' mae" nga" gaung sho: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa- ngonhaung" re yao" gaung sho: khoru: qo" byid: zho: nae" ga" laug i? ga: ta" mung: yao: bam yao: cao: ayo: athaung" jho" ta" ngag: qhid: li" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- naonhaung" wa Byu: Yao: Zo" nho: gaung sho: re mazo:- yao" sa: re mashaug' ko" re wa naonhaung" yao" khug mae kao so' mabo genae"-
Nga" gaung sho: re zo: mung:- nga" sa: re shaug' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: apyad ato: kao so' qo" ra" . Aimung: lo" thao" ra" ba na mae ngo wa yao: re shid: rumae" daui: li" nhao nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re nga" gaung sho: wa zo: ve agyang" ngad:- nga" sa: re: shaug' ja: agyang" ngad:-
Nga" gaung sho: re zo: mung:- nga" sa: re shaug' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa nga" khug mae kao so' daui mung:- ngore: yao: mae kao so' daui: na: ra" .
Daui: na: ra" nga" Pho" wa ngore nhao: ke' mung: yao" mathao: yang ngo wa kao so' daui: na: ru we' dakhyo:- nga" gaung sho: re zo" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: nga" mathao: yang kao so' daui: na: li" nae" .
Ce: mug wa mug: gaung mae" gyo" li" ra" zo: vae ngad: ra"- naonhaung" phug' phyid' qe zo: mung:- thao re shid: lo" ba: ra" ai: mug ru" ru mangad:- ce: mug re zo" ra" yaug wa apyad ato kao so' daui: na: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ceru wa Kapena-um vogaung: mae" Tarha" Jung Yham mae mho" shid' na: ra" au:- Yesu ta" ra" dao: ngad: ra" .
Yao" thao cao" ra" mo, myo: sho' wa cedao: re the' gyo: gelao"- ce: mho" shid' khyo wa saung" qug' ra"- Khag' qo" kham: yu nae" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yao: bam airu: nyhung: na ko" rure Yesu ba mung: yao: bam re- Ce: dao" yang naonhaung" qam: shan vako" i?
Byu: Yao: Zo: wa azhao yao: na: ra" jo, qo khyo dam: do, lo" rure naonhaung" myao gelao"- khoru: ein genae" i?
Kaoso' daui nhao: ru wa Mao" So: Byo ngad: ra"- Byu: qam: so' yang pe" maqo" kad' ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" re ngo ta" kyo" ra" mungdao: jham wa kao so' daui nhao: ra" Mao" So: Byo re qo" nhao: ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" mae" damyo" wa malam" ko" ngad: ra"- ( Malam" ra" mo, khobam ngad ko" ru we' yao: re ab byid' pye' nae" yaug khag' ngad: rure re:- Yesu yao: sao qhid' mae" ba: to: va" ra" . )
Byu dayaug re Pho" yang ngojhao" li" nae" khyo" makad' byid: ngad: re wa khag' re: ngojhao" qo" li" genae" mangad:- ein: naonhaung" re ngo ta" ru wa cemung: yang: ta" ru ngad: ra"- ga: Yesu xo' ta" ra" .
Ce: dao: thoe: yang Yesu nho: thao cao" mo, myo: sho' wa dam: phaug' phao: lo" gemung:- yao" thao macao" lo: gengad: ra" .
Aimung: Yesu wa mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug re- Naonhaung" re: phao: lo" nug ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Simon Petru wa Asang we"- ngonhaung" khag' jhao" ba: lo" nae" i? Nao wa apyad ato kao so' daui nhao: ra" mungdao: qo" yaug ngad: ra" .
Nao wa Mao" So mae" joe" li" ra" Gyang" Lho" ra" yaug ngad: rure ana" ngonhaung" lam" mung: ba: bam va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Naonhaung" daxe: shid' yaug re ngo khyin: yu: mangad: i? Ngadqere: naonhaung" mae" dayaug wa Min: Yui ngad: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu wa Simon Iskarud yao: zo: Yuda; khyo re ta" na: ru ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Yuda wa mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug mae" dayaug ngad sho' ngadqere:- yao: re ab byid: nae" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Galile mung" khaung: mae su" gam" qin" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe wa- Yesu re se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" seim" na geyang:- yao: wa Yuda mung" khaung: mae manug: su" qin" ru ngad: ra" .
Yuda qe: Zaung Khyae: Poe kad' nae" ba na jhao" li" na: ra"- aimung: Yesu yao: nhaung: bam wa-
Nao kad' ra" mau" zo" jham re ni" mho"zo: qe the' myao: lo" genae" qhid' mae" cemung" mae" thug' mung:- Yuda mung" khyo ye" lo" wa, .
Mang qi: nug: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: kad' ra" mau" re anyham: avho' mae pe" re: malhaung" kad' gengad: ra"- nao wa ai: mau" jham re kad' na: ruyang ni" khyo re mug: myid byu qe alhab' mo,- ba sho' kad' wa, ga: ta" ako" .
( Yesu yao: nhaung: bam lhao" re:- yao: re malam" ko" ngad: ra" . )
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Nga" ayo, majoe" shi:- naonhaung" ayo, kam" wa khonhae" re: ngad: ako" .
Mug: myid byu qe wa naonhaung" re magai: nghang: ngad: ra" . Ngo re kam" wa nghang" ako"- pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa yao: bam: lo, mau" magai: rure ta" na: ruyang ngad: ra" .
Ai: poe khyo naonhaung" ye: ge,- nga" ayo, majoe" shimung:- ngo wa poe khyo maye: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa airu: ta" mung:- Galile mung" mae thang: na: jo; ra" .
Ai: poe khyo yao: nhaung: bam ye" lo" gethao re Yesu re: ai: poe khyo anyham: avho' kad' mung: sae za: ye" lo" ra" .
Kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe wa- poe mae Yesu re qho mung:- yao: khai: mae ngad: ra" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Mo,byu qe: phaung mae Yesu khyo re sae sae za: gyai jho" ta" na: ako" . Mo,byu qe daqhae: wa Yao: wa byugai ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" . Ngadqere: gatau daqhae: wa Byugai mangad:- yao: wa mo, byu qere khyonghung: jhui" nghung" na yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa- kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qere gyaug geyang:- Yesu khyo re de: de: za: mata" ko" ngad: ra" .
Poe ba na agaung: ba lai lao"- Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham khyo ye: mung:- mho" shid' qhid: na: ra" .
Yuda kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, wa qi: sho' mug' hao" byaug ko" ru we' Ceyaug wa dalhang re: mamho" zhao: yu: qu" ru khoru: mung: ceqhi" sho' ba: ra" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa Ngo mho" shid' ra" khyo wa ngoyao" mho" shid' khyo mangad:- ai wa ngore nhao: ke' ra" Mao" So mae" li" ra" mho" shid' khyo ngad: ra" .
Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo re kad' nae" kao bau: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere:- ngo mho" shid' ru wa Mao" So mae" li" ra" mho" shid' khyo ngad: ra" i? Ngoyao" mho" shid' khyo ngad: ra" i? ga" rure ba: kho' yu: li" nae" .
Yao: yao" akho: akhang" khyo" jhau: ra" yaug wa yao: yao" phungbao qo" nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' ra" . Ngadqere: yao: re nhao: ke' ra" yaug: phungbao qo" nae" qhid' mae" myid o: ra" yaug wa din: man" ra" yaug ngad: ra"- yao: mae mhug' pyag' ru pe" mabo ngad: ra" .
Moshe wa naonhaung" re Tarha" byid' ra" mangad: i? Ngadqere: naonhaung" mae" dayaug re: ai: Tarha" re maphug' cao" ko" ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" wa ngore pe"mung: se' pye' nae" seim" na ko" i? ga" ta" ra" .
Ailao"- mo,byu qe wa Nao wa yui vao: jaung" yaug ngad: ra"- nao re se' pye' nae" khag' seim" na: ra" i? ga: tau" ako" .
Yesu wa Ngo Dugno: Ba mae mug' pho: ve,lho dalam: za: kad' qhu" re naonhaung" alhab' mo, mug' hao" byaug: ako"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Moshe wa naonhaung" yauggai zo: qere au: qid lhai: nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re amyin" byid' to" ra"- ( gaigai: yao: ga" re wa Dugno: Ba mae au: qid lhai" ru kad' ako"- aire qhid yaug wa Moshe mangad:- naonhaung" phug' phyid' qe ngad: ako" . ) Airumung: naonhaung" wa Dugno: Ba mae yauggai zo: re au: qid lhai: khyo kad' byid' ako" .
Airu: naonhaung" wa Moshe Tarha" re mashad' lhoe" nae" qhid' mae" Dugno: Ba mae yauggai nau" dayaug re au: qid lhai: khyo byid: ko" re wa ngo Dugno: Ba mae byu dayaug re no saug za: gai byid' ruyang naonhaung" wa ngore pe"mung: nhag' yo: ko" i?
Adao: pyae ave, re qu" yang: dao: dakho' ge,- Dangman" ra" khyo" dao: kho' ge,- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Yerusalem mae" mo, byu qe daqhae: wa Kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, se' pye' nae" seim" ko" ra" yaug wa ceyaug mangad: i?
Qu" ge,- yao: wa de: de: za: kho" kyo" na: ra"- yao: bam wa yao: re khag' pe" maga: genhaung i? Yao: wa Meshia ngad: ra" ga" rure yao: bam gaigai: yao: ba geyang: ngad: laug i?
Ceyaug khai: mae" ngad: rure wa ngonhaung" ba: ra" . Ngadqere: Meshia joe" li" re wa yao: khai: mae" joe' li" rure khag' re: maba genae"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham mae mho" shid' na: au:- thoe qi: we' Naonhaung" ngore gaigai: yao: ba: ako"- ngo khai: mae" ngad: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" . Ngo wa ngoyao" akho: akhang" khyo" joe" li" ru mangad:- ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug wa dangman" ra" yaug ngad: ra"- naonhaung" wa yao: re maba ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo wa yao: mae" joe" li" yaug ngad: ru we' yao: wa ngore nhao: ke' yaug ngad: ruyang ngo wa yao: re ba: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa Yesu re taung" yu nae" seim" ako" . Ngadqere: yao" ayo, majoe" shiyang: yao: re khag' re: maqo" taung: ko" ngad: ra" .
Mo,byu qemae" myo: sho' mo, Yesu re lam" ko" ru we' Meshia joe" li" lao"- yao: wa ceyaug kad' qhu" ra" ve,lho tho' je: myo: sho' ve,lho kad' qhu" li" li" nae" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Mo,byu qe Yesu khyo re airu: jho" so' na: rure Pharishe qe the' gyo: ge mung:- yao: bam: khinjaung qi: qe wa Yesu re taung: nae" qhid' mae" gug: gam gyezo: qe damyo" re nhao: ke' ako" .
Yesu wa Ngo wa naonhaung" we' dayo, zo: na mung:- ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug jhao" dam: lo" zai ngad:-
Ailao" naonhaung" wa ngore qho: li" genae"- ngadqere: naonhaung" ngore mamyao genae"- pe"mung: ga"re ngo na: ra" jo, qo khyo naonhaung" maqo" ye: geyang: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe wa- Ngonhaung" maqho: myao losho'- yao: wa khai: khyo ye: nae" ga" laug i? Ngonhaung" Yuda byu qe na: ra" Greeg vogaung: jham khyo ye: mung:- Greeg byumyu" qere yemho" shid' byid: nae" ga" laug i? ga: yao: cao: jho" myid' ako" .
Yao: wa ngonhaung" yang yao: re qho ngadqere: maqhug' genae" . Aimung: yao: joe" na: jo, nae" jo, qo khyo ngonhaung" maqo" ye: genae"- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: pe" ga: nug: laug i? ga: jho" ta" ako" .
Poe lo" thao" ba- poe mae" je: akhyag: ra" ba na mae Yesu wa to" ye, mung:- Qid shab' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: ngojhao" lo mung: shaug' ge,
Jham: mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo:- ngore lam" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao" aung khug nhag' lam: mae" kaoso' qid zo: gyaung: yug: thug' li" na: ra"- ga: thoe qi: we' ta" ra" .
Yesu airu: ta" ru wa yao: re lam" ra" mo, qo" khae: yu genae" ra" Byo re qang yang: ta" ru ngad: ra" . Ai: ayo, re Yesu wa phungbao byid' ru maqhug' shimung: yang: Byo mabyid' to: shingad: ra" .
Mo, phaung mae" mo, byu qe damyo" wa ce: dao: re the' gyo: gelao"- ceyaug wa gaigai: yao: lapa ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Amung: gatau damyo" wa Yao: wa Meshia ngad: ra" ga: ta" mung:- gatau damyo" wa- Dang za: Meshia wa Galile mung" mae" thug' li" nae" mangad:-
Jham: mugsug' mae Meshia wa kho: kham myid: zo: ngad: li" nae"- Davi na: lo: ra" Betlehem vogaung: mae khau: li" zai ngad:- ga: ta" to" ra" mangad: i? ga: ta" ako" .
Aimung: mo,byu qe wa Yesu mathao mae majho" vang" gemung:- phung: jho" kho' lo" ako" .
Damyo" wa Yesu re taung: nug: ako"- ngadqere: khag' re: yao: re maqo" zaui: ko" ngad: ra" .
Gug: gam gyezo: qe dam: tug' joe" lo gelao"- khinjaung qi: qe we' Pharishe qe wa yao: bam re- yao: re naonhaung" pe"mung: mataung" lo ko" i? ga: lham: myid' ako" .
Yao: bam wa ceyaug re" ru: khag' re: mamho" byid' qu" gengad: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Ailao" Pharishe qe wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" rere: yao" yang lham: mhug' pyag' vanhaung i?
Kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, we' Pharishe qemae" yao: re lam" ra" byu dayaug yaug na: ga" rure naonhaung" gyo" qu" ko" i?
Ce: mo,byu qe wa Moshe Tarha" re maba gemung:- Mao" So: nhang: kheim: qao: mae ngad: ako"- ga: ta" ako" .
Qhid' phyao: Yesu jhao" yeqhug' qu" ra" Nikodi ga" ra" Pharishe dayaug na: ra" .
Nikodi wa ngonhaung" tarha" jo; ru we' dakhyo: ga" re byu dayaug re sao qhid' shi" maca: qu" lo: yao: re dao: maqo" phyid' ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Nao re:- Galile byu ngad: i? Jham: mugsug' mae xeim: qu" wa,- Galile mung" mae" lapa dayaug re: mathug' li" qu" rure nao myao: li" nae"- ga: yao: re ta" ako" .
( Ai: thao yao: bam alhab' mo, yao: yao" yham khyo phao: lo" ako" . Ngadqere: Yesu wa Zhan: lun: bam khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Thao: ba ne, seim no' mae" Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham khyo dam: ye" lo" ra" . Mo,byu qe alhab' mo, wa Yesu jhao" zang" ham: li" gemung:- Yesu wa zaung: jo, yang: yao: bam re mho" shid' byid' ra" .
Jham: Tung" Pho" qe we' Pharishe qe wa- su: lao we' shad' na: au: the' taung" yu: ra" myiqe: dayaug re jhui" li" mung:- yao: bam alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae ai: myiqe: re yhe' to" ako" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa Yesu re- Mho" pho" we"- ce: myiqe: wa su: lao we' shad' na: au: yao: khyag' myao yang: taung" to" ako" .
Airu" ra" myiqe: re wa laug baui: yang pye' se' pye' ca"- ga: Moshe wa Kham" To" Ra" Tarha" mae amyin" byid' to" ra"- ana" nao wa khoru: ein: ta" nae" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yao: bam ceru: ta" ko" ru wa Yesu re qobo qo" zhaug' nae" qhid' mae" ta" ru ngad: ako" . Yesu kam wa gam" mung: yao" lo,nyhug' yang myid gaung mae khyang" tung" na: ra" .
Ai: tau mae ye; jo; ra" mo, wa Yesu re dao: myid: paug' myid: mung: kad' ako" . Ailao" Yesu wa tau: qu" ke' mung:- yao: bam re Naonhaung" mae" qobo mashad' ra" yaug: yang shi" sao qhid' ai: myiqe: re laug baui: yang pye' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa dam: gam" lo" mung: myid gaung mae thug' khyang" na: ra" .
Yao: bam wa cedao: re the' gyo: gelao"- qi: mo, shi" sao qhid' ai: tau mae" thug' lo" mung:- yao: bam alhab' mo, dayaug: thao dayaug thug' lo" byaug: ako" . Yesu za: dang: jo, mung:- ai: myiqe: wa aimae ye; jo; ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa tau: qu" ke' mung: myiqe: re- yao: bam khai: lo" vako" ra" i? Nao re dao: phyid' nae" dayaug re: mana i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ai: myiqe: wa Nhag' bo we"- dayaug re: mana ga: tau" ra" . Ailao" Yesu wa Ngo re:- nao re dao: maphyid' nae"- Lo" se,- qobo dadam: kad' lo- ga: ai: myiqe: re ta" ke' ra" . )
Yesu wa Pharishe qere Ngo wa mug: myid dao: nho: bo" bao ngad:- nga" thao cao" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: kao so' bo" bao qo" yu mung:- mug: cad' mae khonhae" re: masu: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Pharishe qe wa Yesu re- Nao wa naoyao" khyo re sagse: kham: na: ra"- aimung: ni" sagse: kham: ru wa tarha" mavao ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa Ngo wa- ngoyao" khyo re ngoyao: sagse: kham ngadqere: nga" sagse: kham dao: wa tarha"vao: ra"- pe"mung: ga"re ngo khai: mae" li" ru ngad: ru we' khai: khyo lo" zai ngad: rure ngo ba:- naonhaung" wa ngo khai: mae" joe" li" mung:- Khai: khyo lo" nae" rure maba ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa xao su byu: li khyo" za: dao: kho' ako"- ngo wa khag' rere: dao: maphyid'-
Ngadqere: ngo dao: phyid' ngad: re wa ngo dayaug za: dao: phyid' ru mangad:- ngore nhao: ke' ra" Nga" Pho" we' daga" dao: phyid' ru ngad mung:- nga" dao: phyid' ru wa dangman" ra" .
Sagse: shid' yaug: dao: jho" zhaung: lao" wa Tarha" vao:- ga: naonhaung" tarha" mae tung" to"ako" .
Ngo wa ngoyao" khyo re sagse: kham: ra"- amung: ngore nhao: ke' ra" Nga" Pho" re: nga" khyo re sagse: kham: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Ni" pho" khai: mae i? ga: yao: re myid' ako" . Ailao" Yesu wa naonhaung" ngo rere:- nga" Pho" rere: maba ngad: ako"- naonhaung" ngore ba ko" ngad: re wa Nga" Pho" rere: naonhaung" ba genae" ngad: ra"- ga: yao: bam re tau" ra" .
Ce: dao: jham alhab' wa Yesu Caung: pa" Yham mae" alu: ngaui ban" jham zhaung: to: ko" ra" qe, mae mho" shid' na: ra" au: ta" ra" dao: jham ngad: ra" . Yao" ayo, majoe" shiyang: yao: re khag' yang re: mataung: ko" ngad: ra" .
Aimung: Yesu yao: bam re dam: ta" ru wa- ngo wa phao: lo" zai ngad:- naonhaung" wa ngore qho: li" genae"- ngo ye" lo" ra" jo, qo khyo naonhaung" maqo" ye: ko" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe wa Ngo ye"lo" ra" jo, qo khyo naonhaung" maqo" joe" genae" ga: yao: ta" ra" . Ce wa yao: yao" gaung re yao: yao: se' shid nae"- ga: ta" nug: ru laug i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa Naonhaung" wa ce: o: gye, mug: myid we' sin" ra" mo, ngad: ako"- ngo kam" wa tho' mae" joe" li" ru ngad:- naonhaung" wa ce: mug: myid mae" mo, ngad: ako" . Ngadqere: ngo wa ce: mug: myid mae" mangad:-
Aimung: naonhaung" wa yao: yao" qobo mae shid: li" genae"- ein: naonhaung" re ngo ta" va" . Ngo wa Ngo- ga: yaug ngad: rure naonhaung" malam" ko" re wa naonhaung" wa yao: yao" qobo mae shid: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Nao khag' ngad: i? ga: yao: re myid' ako" . Ailao" Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" re ngo sao qhid' mae" ta" kyo" to: gau ngad va"- ga: tau" ra" .
Naonhaung" khyo re ngo ta" nae" khyo myo: sho' jo; ra"- naonhaung" re dao: phyid' nae" rure: myo: sho' jo; ra" . Ngadqere: ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug wa dangman" ra" yaug ngad mung:- ngo wa yao: mae" the' gyo" yu: ra" gu: reza: mug: myid byu qere ta" kyo" ru ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Pho" khyo re ta" kyo" na: rure yao: bam maba: gyo: ko" ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yao: wa Byu: Yao: Zo: re naonhaung" tau: to' to: gelao"- Ngo wa Ngo ga: yaug ngad: rure naonhaung" ba: li" genae" . Ailao" ngo wa Nga" Pho" yang mho" byid' to" gu: reza: ta" mung:- ngo wa ngoyao" kheim: so' khyo" yang pe" daja: re: makad' rure ba: li" genae"- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Amung: ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug wa ngo we' daga" ngad: na: ra"- ngo khonhae" re: yao: o ngaui: rure zaui" na: ruyang yo: wa ngoyao: reza: mashapye' to: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu ta" ra" dao: aijham re the' gyo" ra" mo, myo: sho' wa yao: re lam" ako" .
Airumung: Yesu wa yao: re lam" ko" ra" mo, re- Naonhaung" nga" mho" shid' dao: re phug' cao" ko" re wa naonhaung" wa nga" mho"zo: gyang" qe ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa ai: dangman" rure ba: li" genae"- amung: ai: dangman" ru wa naonhaung" re lhoe' ke' byid' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa Ngonhaung" wa Abraham nho: myid: zo: qe ngad: ra"- ngonhaung" wa khag' jeim re: madoe; qu"- aire naonhaung" re lhoe' ke' byid' li" nae"- ga: nao ta" ru wa pe" re ta" nug: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- Qobo kad' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: qobo: nho: jeim ngad: ra" .
Jeim wa dinkhu: mae khonhae" re: maqo" na ngad: ra"- yao: zo: kam" wa khonhae" re: qo" na: ra" .
Yao: zo" yang naonhaung" re lhoe' ke' byid' ngad: re wa loe; beim: li" genae" .
Naonhaung" wa Abraham: nho: yao: zo: qe ngad: rure ngo ba:- ngadqere: naonhaung" wa nga" mho dao: re makhae: yu nug gemung: yang: ngore se' pye' nae" seim" na: ako" .
Ngo wa Pho" yang ngore qhu" byid' ra" gu: re ta" ra"- naonhaung" kam" wa naonhaung" yao: pho" yang ta" ra" gu: re kad' ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Ngonhaung" pho" wa Abraham ngad:- ga: yao: re tau" ako" . Yesu wa naonhaung" wa Abraham nho: myid: zo: qe gaigai: yao: ngad ko" ngad: re wa Abraham kad' ra" mau" jham re naonhaung" kad' li" genae" .
Ngo kad' ra" gu: alhab' wa Mao" So mae" the' gyo" yu: ra" khyo re naonhaung" re ta" kyo" na: ru ngad: ra"- ngadqere: naonhaung" wa ngore se' pye' nae" seim" na: ako" . Abraham wa airu: makad' lai: lo ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa naonhaung" yao: pho" kad' lai: lo: ru we' dakhyo:- kad' na: ako"- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: bam wa- Mao" So yao: za: nganhaung" nho: dayaug za" Pho" ngad mung: ngonhaung" wa yao" yauggai zo: agyang" qe ngad:- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- Mao" So wa naonhaung" yao: pho" ngad: re wa ngore jhid' de; genae" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa Mao" So mae" joe" li" mung:- ana" cemae ngad va"- ngo wa ngoyao" akho: akhang" khyo" joe" li" ru mangad:- Mao" So wa ngore nhao: ke' ra" .
Ngo ta" ra" dao: re naonhaung: pe"mung: maba: gyo: ko" i? Pe"mung: ga"re aiwa nga" mungdao: naonhaung" maqo" tho' tae" gyo" yu geyang: ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa naonhaung" yao: pho" ai: min: yui: nho: myid: zo: qe ngad gemung:- naonhaung" yao: pho" myid: o: ra" khyo re cao" nug mo, ngad: ako" . Yao: wa sao qhid maqhid mae" byu se' yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: mae dangman" ru mabo: ruyang yao: wa dangman" ra" shad' mae khonhae" re: mana: qu" ngad: ra" . Yao: mungdao: ta" lao" yao: wa yao" ave, ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- kad' na: ru ngad: ra"- pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa mhug' hab' ngad mung: mhug' hab' qe alhab' mo; yao: pho" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo wa dangman" ru ta" mung: ai: mathao: yang naonhaung" ngore malam" ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa qobo qo" yaug ngad: rure naonhaung" mae" khoyaug lam: sagse: qo" kham ko" i? Ngo wa dangman" ru ta" re pe"mung: naonhaung" ngore malam" ko" i?
Mao" So mae" ngad: ra" yaug wa Mao" So: dao: jham re tae" gyo" ra"- ngadqere: naonhaung" wa Mao" So mae" mangad: gemung: naonhaung" matae" gyo: ngad: ako" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa Nao wa Samari byu ngad: ra"- amung: yui zaung: ra" yaug ngad: ein: ngonhaung" ta" ru wa dang: mangad: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa Ngo wa yui zaung yaug mangad:- ngo wa Nga" Pho" re phug' te' yaug ngad: ra"- ngadqere: naonhaung" wa ngore phug' mate' ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa ngoyao" gaung re phug' te' byid: genae" rure qho: na yaug mangad:- ngadqere: aire qho byid' na yaug we' nga" bo: de, yang: dao: kho' byid' na ru dayaug na: ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- nga" mho" shid' dao: re phug' cao" ra" yaug wa khonhae" re: mashid nae"- ga: tau" ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa Nao wa gaigai: yao: yui zaung yaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" ana" khyag' za: ba va" . Abraham wa shid: byaug va"- Lapa qere: shid: byaug vako" ra"- ngadqere: nao wa nga" mho" shid' dao: re phug' cao" ra" yaug wa khonhae" re: mashid nae"- ga: ta" ra" ga: ta" ako" .
Ngonhaung" yao: pho" Abraham wa shid: byaug: ava"- nao wa Abraham tho' je: qi: yaug ngad: i? Lapa qere: shid: byaug: avako"- nao wa khag' ngad: ein: myid: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu tau: mung:- ngo wa ngo yao" gaung re phug' te' nga: yhe' byid' ngad: re wa ai: phug' te' byid' ru wa akeim ngad: ra"- ngore nga: yhe' byid: yaug wa nga" Pho" ngad: ra"- aiyaug reyao: ngonhaung" Mao" So ngad: ga: naonhaung" ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa yao: re maba ko" ngad: ra"- ngo kam" wa yao: re ba:- ngo wa yao: re maba ein: ta" ngad: re wa ngo wa naonhaung" we' dakhyo: mhug' hab' ngad: li" nae" . Ngadqere: ngo wa yao: re ba mung:- yao" dao: re ngo phug' cao" ra" .
Naonhaung" yao: pho" Abraham wa ngo joe" li" nae" ba na re the' myao nae" rure ngaui: ra"- yao: wa aire the' myao mung: ngaui bau" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re Nao wa apyad ngo" xe zin lhao" re: madau shingad: ra"- Abraham re nao myao va" ga" o? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa- Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- Abraham mana shimae" ngo na va"- ga: tau" ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa Yesu re pye' nae" ga: laug baui jham gaug: yu: ako"- ngadqere: Yesu wa phao: vho' mung: Caung: pa" Yham mae" thug' lo" ra" .
Yesu khyo su" lo" na: ra" au:- khau: mae" myo, jid: ra" byu dayaug re yao: myao: ra" .
Yao" mho"zo: qe wa yao: re Mho" Pho" we"- Aiyaug khau: mae" myo, jid: ru wa khag' qobo: yang i? Yao: yao" qobo: yang ngad: ra" i? Mangad: lao" yao: myhi" yao: pho" nho: qobo ngad: ra" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa Yao: myo, jid: ru wa yao" qobo: yang re: mangad:- yao: myhi" yao: pho" tao: qobo: yang re: mangad:- yao: myo, jid: ru wa Mao: So: qam: so' myao: thug' li" nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Ngo re nhao: ke' yaug: mau" re na" ngad shi" au:- ngonhaung" zaui: ca" ra" . Khag' re: mau" magai: zaui" ra" myi" ayo, joe" lo: li" nae" .
Ngo wa mug: myid dao mae na: jo; au:- mug: myid: dao: nho: bo" bao ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ceru: bin: ta" lao"- Yesu wa myid gaung mae khata: phoe" mung: tham: bab dajhid' lhag' yu yang:- ai: myo, jid pho" nho: myo,jid' re gyad byid: mung:-
Siloam qid tham: mae ni" myo,khung: yecid' pye' wa,- ga: ta" ra" . ( Siloam ga" ru wa nhao: ke'- ga" ru ngad: ra . ) Airumung: ai: myo, jid pho" wa yao" myo,khung: yecid' yu yang: myo, myao mung: dam: phao: lo" ra" .
Ailao" yao" yham kyo: cao: qe we' qhid' phyao: yao: mho' zo" na: rure myao: qu" va" ra"- mo,byu qe wa Ceyaug wa lhaung" mho' zo" zaung: jo, yaug mangad: i? ga: ta" ako" .
Damyo" wa Ngad: ra"- ga: ta" mung: gatau damyo" wa Ceyaug mangad:- yao: we' dau yaug ngad: ra-" ga: ta" ako" . Aimung: aiyaug wa yao: yao:- ngo wa ai: myo,jid yaug ngad va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa nao ana" khoru: myo, qo" myao: lo: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yao: wa Yesu ga: mang yaug wa tham: bab dajhid' lhag' yu yang: nga" myo,jid' re gyad byid: mung:- Siloam qid tham: mae nga" myo,khung: yecid' pye' nhao: ra"- ngore: ye" lo" mung:- myo,khung: yecid' pye' we' nga" myo, myao: li" ra"- ga: tau" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Yao: wa khai: mae ngad: ra" i? ga: myid' ako" . Ailao" yao: wa Ngo maba- ga: tau" ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa qhid' phyao: myo, jid: ra" yaug re Pharishe qejhao" jhui" ye" ako" .
Yesu tham: bab lhag' yu mung: ai: myo, jid pho" re myo, myao nhao: ra" ba na wa Dugno: Ba ngad: ra" .
Pharishe qe wa ai: myo, myao: li" va" yaug re yao" myo, dam: myao: li" ra" khyo re dam: myid' ako" . Aimung: yao: wa yao: bam re Yao: wa nga" myo,jid' mae tham: bab: gyad byid' ra"- nga" myo,khung: yecid' pye' lao"- nga" myo, myao: li" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Pharishe qemae" damyo" wa Ai: yaug wa Dugno: Ba: tarha" re phug' cao" yaug mangad' ruyang Mao: So mae" joe" li" ra" yaug wa magai: boe" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" mung: gatau damyo" wa Qobo qo" ra" byu dayaug wa airu" ra" mug' pho: ve,lho jham re khoru: qo" kad' nae" i? ga: ta" ako" . Aimung: yao: bam yao: cao: myid majho" vang" ngad: ako" .
Aimung: Pharishe qe wa ai: myo, myao: li" ra" yaug re- yao: wa ni" myo,jid' re myao nhao: ra"- ga: nao ta" ra" . Yao" khyo re nao khoru: ein: ta" nae" i? ga: dalhang dam: myid' ako" . Ailao" yao: wa Aiyaug wa lapa ngad: ra" ga: tau" ra" .
Ngadqere: kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe wa aiyaug qhid' phyao: myo, jid yaug ngad: ga" rure we' ana" yao: myo, myao: li" rure manug: lam" ko" ngad: ra" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa yao: myhi" we' yao: pho" tao re khai: yu yang:- ceyaug wa ni" shid' tao: nho: yauggai zo: ngad: i? Khau: mae" myo, jid ngad: ga: ni" shid' tao ta" ako"- aire ana" yao: khoru: myo, myao: li" ra" i? ga: yao: shid' tao re myid' ako" .
Yao: myhi" yao: pho" tao wa Yao: wa nga" shid' tao: nho: yauggai zo: ngad: ru we' khau: mae" myo,jid ngad: rure nga" shid' tao ba: .
Ngadqere: yao: ana" khoru: myo, myao: li" ra" khyo we' yao" myo,jid' re khag' yang myao nhao: rure wa nga" shid' tao maba- yao: re: apyad qi: va"- aimung: yao: re myid: ge,- yao" khyo re yao: yao: qo" ta" naeva"- ga: tau" ako" .
Yao: myhi" yao: pho" tao ceru: tau: ko" ru wa kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qere gyaug geyang: ngad: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re Yesu re Meshia ngad: ra" ga: lam" ra" yaug khag' re ngadqere: Tarha" Jung Yham mae" phoe' pye' nae" qhid' mae" kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe myid vang" to: vako" ra" .
Ce: mathao: yang yao: myhi" yao: pho" tao wa Yao: re: apyad qi: va"- yao: re myid' qu" ge,- ga: ta" ru ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam wa ai: khau: mae" myo, jid: ra" yaug re shid' lhang ein: lhang dam: khai: yu gemung:- Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae dangman" ra" dao: ta" wa,- nao re myo, myao nhao: ra" yaug wa qobo qo" ra" yaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba:- ga: ta" ako" .
Ailao" aiyaug wa Yao: wa qobo qo" yaug- maqo" yaug ngad: rure ngo maba- Ana" ngo myo, myao va"- ein: ce daja: za: ngo aba: ga: tau" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Yao: wa nao re pe" kad' byid' ra" i? Ni" myo,jid' re khoru: kad' yang: myao nhao: ra" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Ailao" aiyaug wa Naonhaung" re ngo ta" kyo: gau ngad va"- naonhaung" manug: tae" gyo: ko" ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" pe"mung: dam: gyo: nug ko" i? Ngo qu" re naonhaung" re: yao" mho"zo: qe boe" nug gesam" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa aiyaug re Nao yaug lam: aiyaug: mho"zo: ngad: ra"- ngonhaung" kam" wa Moshe nho: mho"zo: qe ngad:-
Mao" So wa Moshe re mungdao: byid' rure ngonhaung" ba:- ngadqere: aiyaug re wa yao: khai: mae" li" yaug ngad: rure lhao" re: ngonhaung" maba ga: ta" mung:- yao: re jung" ako" .
Ai: myo, myao: li" yaug wa Yao: wa ngore myo, myao: li" nhao: ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ngadqere: naonhaung" wa yao: khai: mae" joe" li" rure maba ko" ru wa mug' ja: yao: ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa qobo jab qe: akyu" mho' thoe re matae" gyo: ngad: ra" . Yao: re phug' myao" ra" mo, we' yao: myid o: ra" khyo" phug' cao" ra" mo; akyu" mho' thoe re wa Mao" So tae" gyo: byid' rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Khau: mae" myo, jid: ra" yaug re myo, myao: li" nhao: ra" byu dayaug na:- ga" rure mug: myid dao mae mug: thug' sao peim mae" ana" joe" sho' magyo" qu" shi:-
Ceyaug wa Mao" So mae" joe" li" yaug mangad: re wa yao: wa pe" daja: re: maqo" kad' nae" ngad: ra" ga: tau" ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa- Nao ru" qobo khug mae khau mung: qi" li" ra" yaug: yang ngonhaung" re mho" shid' nae" seim" na: i? ga: ta" mung: yao: bam wa yao: re Tarha" Jung Yham mae" khe' thug' pye' ako" .
Ai: myo, myao: li" ra" yaug re airu: khe' thug' pye' ko" rure Yesu the' gyo" ra" . Yesu wa yao: re myao lao"- Byu: Yao: Zo: re nao lam" i? ga: yao: re myid' ra" .
Aiyaug wa Nhag' bo we"- ngo wa yao: re qo" lam" sho' yao: khag' ngad: rure ngore ta" kyo: la,- ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re Nao wa yao: re myao: qu" ava"- yao: wa ana" nao we' jho" jhau: na: ra" yaug yao: ngad: ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Aiyaug wa Asang we"- ngo lam" va"- ga: pad' thaug' thaug' yang: Yesu re goe; pa" ra" .
Yesu wa Ngo wa myo, jid qe myo, myao: li" genae" re:- myo, myao mo, myo, jid: lo" genae" qhid' mae" re:- ce: mug: myid dao khyo dao: kho' nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: mae bo: ra" Pharishe qe damyo" wa ce: dao: re the' gyo: gelao"- ngonhaung" re: myo, jid qe ngad ko" ra" ein: nao ta" nug: i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa Naonhaung" myo, jid qe ngad ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" qobo qo" mo, mangad: genae"- ngadqere: ana" naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" myo, myao: ga: ta" ko" ruyang naonhaung" wa qobo qo" jo; ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- yao yham khyo kham: dung: khyo" mavao lo:- gatau khyo" do; lhoe" vao: ra" yaug wa khug' hab' damya, ngad: ra" .
Kham: dung: khyo" vao ye" ra" yaug wa- yao lhaug' yaug ngad: ra" .
Kham: lhaug' yaug wa yao: re kham: phung" byid' ra" . Yao jham re: yao" thoe re tae" gyo: gemung: yao: wa yao" yao jham re mang lao: yang khai mung: taung gaung khyo jhui" thug' lo" ra" .
Yao jham re taung gaung khyo bin: jhui" thug' lo" lao"- yao: wa yao jham: qhid' au: mae ye" lo" ra" . Yao jham wa yao" thoe re ba geyang: yao" thao cao" ye" lo" ako" .
Su gaje dayaug: thao khyo" wa yao jham macao" genae" . Pe"mung: ga"re- yao jham wa aiyaug: thoe re maba gemung: yang: aiyaug mae" tao" phao: lo" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa ce: dao: tau" re yao: bam re ta" kyo" ke' ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa dao: tau" lajheim: re maba: gyo: ko" ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Yesu wa Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- ngo wa yao jham vao: ra" kham: dung: ngad: .
Nga" qhid' re joe" li" ko" ra" gaje alhab' wa khug' hab' qe we' damya, qe ngad: ako" . Yao jham wa yao: bam: thoe re matae" gyo: ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa kham: dung: ngad:- ngo khyo" vao: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" . Yao: wa thug' thug' vao vao kad' mung: mhin: gyo, jao: myao: li" nae" .
Khug' hab' wa khug' nae" se' tam" pye' nae" qhid' mae" za: li" ra" . Ngo wa naonhaung" kao so' qo" yu mung: magan: mago" ra" kaoso' mae qo" daui: na genae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru ngad:
Ngo wa yao jham: qhid' mae" kao so' byid' pye' ra" gai: ra" yao lhaug' yaug ngad: .
O: kaung wa yao lhaug' yaug mangad:- yao jham re sang yaug re: mangad: mung:- zag ne li" na: rure the' myao lao" yao: wa yao jham re to: co' mung: tao" phao: lo" ra" . Airumung: ai: zag ne wa bin" cad' zo: mung:- yao jham re khe' sin" ke' ra" .
Okaung wa okaung za: ngad: ruyang yao jham re pe" sang: makho: lo: tao" phao: lo" ra" .
Ngo wa gai: ra" yao lhaug' yaug ngad: . Nga" Pho" wa ngore ba mung: ngo wa nga" Pho" re ba: ru we' dakhyo: ngo wa nga" yao jham re ba mung:- yao jham re: ngore ba: ako" . Aimung: ngo wa yao jham: qhid' mae" kao so' byid: nae" qo" dan: pye' ra" .
Amung:- ce: yao jham mae mabo: ra" ngo sang: ra" yao gatau na shi" ra" . Ngo wa ai: yao jham rere: jhui" yu ca" ra" . Yao: bam wa nga" thoe re tae" gyo" li" genae" . Ailao" ai: yao jham wa dakyaung" za: yao lhaug' yaug dayaug za: ngad: li" genae" .
Ngo wa kao so' re dam: qo" khae: yu genae" qhid' mae" nga" kao so' re qo" dan: pye' ruyang nga" Pho" wa ngore jhid' de; ra" .
Kao so' re khag' re: ngo mae" maqo" yu: pye' ngad: ra" . Ngo wa nga" kao so' re ngoyao" myid khyo" byid' pye' ru ngad: ra" . Ngo wa nga" kao so' re byid' pye' ru we' dam: tug' yu nae" akho: akhang" qo" yaug ngad:- ceru: kad' nae" nga" Pho" wa ngore amyin" byid' to: va" .
Ce: dao: jham: mathao mae mo,byu qe: phaung mae yao: cao: majho" vang" lo: dam: boe" li" ko" ra" .
Yao: bam mae" myo: sho' mo, wa Yao: wa yui zaung: ra" ago ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" pe"mung: yao" dao: re tae" gyo: ko" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: damyo" wa yui zaung: ra" yaug wa ceru" ra" dao: maqo" jhau ngad: ra" . Yui wa myo, jid re khoru: myo, qo" myao nhao zai i? ga: ta" ko" ra" .
Yerusalem vogaung: mae" Caung: pa" Yham re Qhaug' Byid' ra" Poe kad' na: ako" . Ai: ayo, wa gyo, yo, ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa Caung: pa" Yham mae" Sholamon zaung mae su" qin" ra" .
Mo,byu qe wa Yesu lhang" gam: mae zang" ham: li" mung: Nao wa ngonhaung" re khomyhao" joe" sho' lao" nhao nae" i? Nao wa Meshia ngad: i? Ngonhaung" re de: de: za: ta" kyo: la, ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa- Ngo naonhaung" re ta" kyo" to: gau ngad va" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" ngore malam" ko" ngad: ra" . Nga" Pho" kheim: so' khyo" yang ngo zaui" ra" mau" zo" jham wa nga" atha" dao: jhau: na: ako" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa nga" yao jham mangad: gemung: naonhaung" malam" ko" ngad: ra" .
Nga" yao jham wa nga" thoe re tae" gyo" ako" . Ngo wa yao: bam re ba mung:- yao: bam wa nga" thao cao" ako" .
Ngo wa yao: bam re apyad ato: kao so' byid: mung: yao: bam wa khonhae" re: mashid genae" . Yao: bam re nga" lo, mae" khag' re: maqo" lhad' yu genae" .
Nga" Pho" yang ngore byid' to" ru wa cao jab alhab' tho' je: qi" rumung:- yao: bam re nga" pho" lo, mae" maqo" lhad' yu ko" ngad: ra" .
Nga" Pho" we' ngo wa dadang: dalam: za: ngad: ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Alao" mo, byu qe yao: re ceim" pye' genae" ga: laug baui gaug: yu: ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Ngo wa nga" Pho" kad' nhao: ra" gai: ra" mau" zo" myo: sho' re naonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae kad' va" . Ai: mau" zo" kholam" mathao mae naonhaung" ngore laug baui: yang pye' se' nug ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa- Gai: ra" lo, mau" daja: ja" mathao: yang ngonhaung" nao re laug baui: yang pye' se' nug: ru mangad:- nao wa xao su byu angad: ru naoyao" gaung re Mao" So we' daqi" za: kad' nae" seim" yang: Mao" So re jung" dao: jhau: ruyang ngonhaung" ceim" pye' nug: ru ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ako" .
Yesu wa Naonhaung" Mao" So re ngag: ako" ga: Mao" So ta" to" ra" dao: re Naonhaung" yao" Tarha" jham: paug' mae tung" to" ra" .
Jham: mugsug' mae ta" to" ra" dao: jham wa dapyad daqae: dangman" jo; ga" rure naonhaung" ba: ako" . Mao" So wa yao" mungdao: re byid' to" ra" mo, re so qe- ga: ta" ra" .
Nga" Pho" wa ngore khyin: yu mung:- mug: myid dao khyo nhao: ke' ra" . Airu: mung: ngo wa Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ngad: ein: ta" ruyang- ngo wa Mao" So re jung" dao: ta" ra" ga: naonhaung" khoru: mung: qo" ta" ko" i?
Nga" Pho" zaui: nhao: ra" mau" re- mazaui" ru ngad: re wa naonhaung" ngore dalam" ge, .
Ngadqere: ai: mau" zo" jham re ngo zaui: yang: ngad: re wa ngore malam" gesho' ngadqere: nang" thao" nga" lo, mau" jham re khalhao" lam" ge,- ailao" nga" Pho" wa nga" khug mae na mung: ngo wa nga" Pho" khug mae na: rure naonhaung" phyid' phyid' kho' kho' ba: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re taung: nae" dalhang dam: seim" ako" . Ngadqere: Yesu wa- yao: bam: lo, mae" phao: loe; lo" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Yodan gyaung: thoete' mae" qhid' phyao: Yohan qid nyhab' byid' ra" jo, qo khyo dam: gau" de; ye: mung: aitau mae yena: ra" .
Mo, byu qe myo: sho' yao: jhao" joe" li" mung: yao: bam wa Yohan wa mug' pho: ve, lho jham makad' qhu" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ceyaug we' sin: mung: Yohan ta" ru alhab' wa dang: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Aitau mae" mo, byu qe myo: sho' Yesu re lam" ako" .
Bethani vogaung: mae Lazaru ga: mang: ra" byu dayaug na: ra" . Yao: wa no: na: ra" . Bethani vogaung: wa Mari we' yao: bai: Matha tao na: ra" vogaung: ngad: ra" .
( Mari ai: yaug wa Asang: khyid mae sheim nae pyo" ra" xau gyad byid: mung:- yao" xae: yang sad' byid' ra" yaug ngad: ra" . No: na yaug Lazaru wa- yao: maung ngad: ra" . )
Yao: nhae tao wa Asang we"- nao jhid' de; ra" ba nam pho" wa no: na: ra"- ga: Yesu re dao: pyang: ke' ako" .
Yesu wa aire the' gyo: lao"- ce: no wa shid no mangad: ngad: ra"- Mao" So: phungbao bao: thug' li" nae" qhid' mae" no: ru ngad mung:- ce: no khyo" yang Mao" So: Yao: Zo: re: phungbao bao: thug' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Matha- Mari- Lazaru maung nhae tao ho' re jhid' de; ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa Lazaru no: na: ga" rure the' gyo: thao re yao: na: ra" jo, qo mae shid' ba jan" thang: na: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Ngonhaung" Yuda mung" khyo dam: tug' ye: gelang:- ga: yao" mho"zo: qere ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa Mho" Pho" we"- aimung" mae" mo, byu qe wa ana" gyo: za: lhao" re: laug baui: yang pye' nae" seim" ko" ra"- ana" re: aikhyo dam: ye: shinae" ein: i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa Daba mae daxe: shid' yo, qug bo: ra" mangad: i? Aimung: na" gaung re khyo su" ra" yaug wa ce: mug: myid dao: bo" bao re myao mung: matha" lang: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: mug: cad' yo mae khyo su" ngad: re wa bo" bao maqo" yang: yao: wa tha" lang" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa ceru: bin: ta" thao re xo' mung:- ngonhaung" ba nam pho" Lazaru wa yab: myhid' jo; ra"- yao: re yenhug' nae" qhid' mae" ngo ye: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa Asang we"- yao: yab: myhid' jo; ru angad: re wa yao: wa byan" so" li" li" nae"- ga: tau" ako" .
Yesu wa Lazaru shid va"- ga: ta" ru ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: mho"zo: qe wa gaigai: yao: yab: myhid' jo; rure ta" ru ngad: ga: jho: ako" .
Aimung: Yesu wa yao: bam re Lazaru wa shid: ava" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" lam" genae" qhid' mae" ngo ai: jo, qo mae mana: ang: ruyang naonhaung" qhid' mae" ngo bau" ra" . Yao: jhao" ngonhaung" ye" lo" gelang:- ga: de: de: za: ta" ra" .
( Zozam ga" ra" ) Thoma wa Ngonhaung" yebocao: shid nae" qhid mae" mho"pho" we' daga" ngonhaung" alhab' mo, cao" ye: gelang:- ga: yao" byin cao: mho"zo: qere ta" ra" .
Yesu joe" ye" lo" re Lazaru re nyhab' pye' ru byid ba ngad va" rure yemyao: ra" .
Bethani vogaung: wa Yerusalem mae" khyo shid' man: ko za: va" ra" .
Yuda byu myo: sho' mo, wa Matha we' Mari shid' nhae: nho: yao: maung shid yang: yao: nhae tao re nhag' tang" byid: nae" joe" li" ako" .
Yesu li" na: ra" ga" rure Matha the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa Yesu re yetug: yu nae" qhid' mae" thug' ye" lo" ra" . Ngadqere: Mari wa yham khug mae na: jo; ra" .
Matha wa Yesu re Asang we"- nao cemae na: ngad: re wa nga" maung mashid zai ngad: ra" .
Ana" ngadqere: Mao" So wa nao mho' ra" ja: pe" ngadqere: nao re byid' li" nae" ein: rure ngo ba:- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa- Ni" maung dam: daui: li" zai ngad:- ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Ailao" Matha wa Lo" thao" ra" ba na mae yao: dam: daui: to" li" nae" rure wa ngo ba: ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu wa Ngo wa- dam: daui: to" li" ru we' kao so' ngad: . Ngo re lam" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa shid ngadqere: daui: na: li" nae" .
Khag' ngadqere: daui: na mung: ngore lam" ra" yaug wa khonhae" re: mashid lo nae"- cedao: re nao lam" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Matha wa Asang we"- ngo lam" ra"- nao wa mug: myid dao khyo joe" li" nae" ra" Mao" So: Yao: Zo: Meshia ngad: rure ngo lam" va"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
