Matha wa ceru: bin: ta" lao"- yao: wa lo" mung: yao: nhaung: Mari re sae za: lo" khai mung:- Mho" Pho" wa cetau mae li" joe" na: ra"- amung: yao: wa nao re myid' na: ra"- ga: Mari re ta" ra" .
Cedao: re Mari the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa phyad za: to" li" mung: Yesu jhao" thug' ye" lo" ra" .
( Yesu wa vogaung: khug khyo majoe" ye: shingad: ra"- Matha yetug: yu: ra" jo, qo mae na: jo; ashi" )
Yham khug mae Mari we' daga" na mung: yao: re nhag' tang" byid' na ko" ra" mo, byu qe wa Mari phyad za: to" li" mung: thug' ye" lo" rure myao gelao"- yao" thao cao" ye" ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mari wa lab khyo yengug nae" qhid' mae" thug' ye" lo" sam" ra"- ga: yao: bam jho: ako" .
Mari wa Yesu na: ra" jo, qo mae joe" ye: mung: yao: re myao we' Yesu khyid qao: mae goe, mung: yang:- Asang we"- nao cetau mae na: ngad: re wa nga" maung mashid: byaug zai ngad: ra"- ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Mari ngug: rure we' yao: we' daga" cao" li" ra" mo,byu qere: ngug ko" rure the' myao lao"- Yesu wa yao" nhag' lam: mae zao" mung: nhag' lam: mamyan: makhyad' kham zo" ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa Yao: re khai: mae nyhab' to: ko" i? ga: yao: bam re myid' ra" . Yao: bam wa Asang we"- li" mung: qu" qu" wa,- ga: tau" ako" .
Yesu ngug byid gyo" ra" .
Mo,byu qe wa Qu" ge,- yao: wa Lazaru re gyai jhid' de; nhaung- ga:" ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam mae" damyo" wa yao: wa myo, jid re myo, myao nhao: ra" yaug mangad: i? Yao: wa Lazaru rere: mashid losho' maqo" tam" to: nhaung i? ga: ta" ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa nhag' lam: mamyan: makhyad' dam: kham zo: mung: lab khyo ye" lo" ra" . Ai: lab wa laug khyaung lab ngad mung:- lab nhad' mae laug zang: yang jhid' to" ako" .
Yesu wa Ai: laug zang re qhui" pye' ge,- ga: amyin" byid' ra" . Ailao" shid yaug: yao: bai: Matha wa Asang we"- Bab sheim nae naeva"- yao: re nyhab' to" ru byid ba ngad va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa- Nao lam" ngad: re wa Mao" So: phungbao re nao the' myao: li" nae" ein: nao re ngo ta" va" mangad: i? ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" yao: bam wa ai: laug zang re yu: pye' ako" . Yesu wa mug: khyo tau: qu" mung:- nga" Pho" we"- nao wa nga" akyu" mho' thoe re tae" gyo: byid' ruyang nao re jeju caung: byid' ra" .
Nao wa nga" akyu" mho' thoe re khonhae" re: tae" gyo: byid' rure ngo ba: . Ngadqere: ngo wa nao: yang nhao: ke' yaug ngad: rure yao: bam lam" genae" qhid' mae" cemae na: ra" mo; akyu" mathao mae ngo ceru: ta" ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: wa airu: bin: ta" lao"- Lazaru we"- Thug' lo wa,- ga: thoe qi: we' khai: ke' ra" .
Ailao" Lazaru wa yao" khyid lo, mae pin: cug' yang thab' to" ru we' myo,khung: re pin: cug' yang thab' to: gau yao: thug' lo: ra" . Yesu wa yao: bam re- yao: re thab' to" ra" pin: cug' jham re pheim: pye' byid: mung: nhao: ke' ge,- ga: ta"ra" .
Aimung: Mari jhao" li" ko" ra" mo,byu qe myo: sho' mo, wa yao: kad' ra" lo, mau" re the' myao gelao"- yao: bam wa Yesu re lam" ako" .
Ngadqere: damyo" wa Pharishe qejhao" tug' phao: lo" mung:- Yesu zaui" ra" mau" re lo" ta" kyo" ako" .
Aimung: Pharishe qe we' khinjaung qi: qe wa Yuda Tarha" Qe, Do, Phung: zabphaung khai: qham mung:- Qu" ge,- ceyaug wa mug' pho: ve,lho jham myo: sho' kad' qhu" na: ava"- ngonhaung" pe" kad' zai i?
Ngonhaung" wa yao: re ceru: xo' yang: nha: to: lao" wa yaug khao: ngo" yao: re lam" byaug genae"- aimung: kheim: so' qo" ra" Roma zug: qe wa akhyag: li" yu mung: ngonhaung" nho: Caung: pa" Yham re we' ngonhaung" amyu" re li" phyo' pye' li" genae"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yao: bam mae" aizin re Khinjaung Yin" kad' na: ra" Kayapha ga: mang: ra" yaug wa- Naonhaung" pe" ba mo, mangad:-
Byumyu" damyu" geim" jeim" lo" nae" tho' ai: byumyu" geim" qhid' mae" byu dayaug shid; ru wa je: gai: rure naonhaung" mamyid: beim: ko" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: airu: ta" ru wa gaigai: yao: yao" myid khyo" ta" ru mangad:- yao: wa ai: zin qhid' mae" Khinjaung Yin" ngad mung:- Yesu wa Yuda byumyu" alhab' qhid' mae" shid kham" li" nae" ga" rure we'
yao: bam: qhid' mae" za: mangad:- byo: sin" na: ra" Mao" So: byumyu" qe alhab' re dadang: dalam: za: boe" nhao nae" qhid' mae" re: Yesu shid kham: byid: nae" ra" khyo re lapa pa: ru ngad: ra" .
Ai: ba na mae" kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe wa Yesu re se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" pha,jhi" khyug' ako" .
Aimung: Yesu wa Yuda mung" mae de: de: za: gyaung: masu" qin" lo: ngad: ra" . Din" pyad' yo nhae mae" Ephrim ga" ra" vogaung: khyo thug' ye" lo" mung:- ai: mae yao" mho"zo: qe we' yena: jo; ra" .
Lai co' Poe ba na jhao" li" na mung:- seyo: vogaung: vojhe' khaung: mae" mo,byu qe wa poe majoe" shire yao: yao" gaung re caung: pa" thung" khyo" kyang" san: ru kad' nae" qhid' mae" Yerusalem vogaung: khyo do, ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re qho: na: ako" . Yao: bam wa Caung: pa" Yham mae yezang" ham: na: bam gemung:- naonhaung" pe" ru: myid ko" i? Yao: wa gaigai: yao: poe khyo mali" nae" laug i? ga: yao: bam yao: cao: jho" myid' na: ako" .
Khinjaung qi: qe we' Pharishe qe wa yao: bam Yesu re qo" taung" yu nae" qhid' mae" Yesu na: ra" jo, qo re ba yaug khag' ngadqere: lota" kyo: ca"- ga: amyin" khyo" to" ako" .
Lai co' Poe joe" nae" khyaug' ba ca" shi" au:- Yesu wa shid: rumae" yao" yang dam: daui: li" nhao: ra" Lazaru na: ra" Bethani vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu re myi" xeim lham: nyhang" zho" ako" . Matha wa zo: ve da" byid' na: ra"- Yesu we' vae: zo: jaung: mae daga" zaung: jo; ra" mo, mae Lazaru re: bobo: ra" .
Ailao" Mari wa gyai phug' de; ra" sheim nae pyo" ra" Nard xau gyang" daxe laung ko yu: yu yang: Yesu khyid mae vhe' gyad byid: mung:- yao" xae: yang sad' pye' byid' ra" . Ai: xau wa dayham geim" mae byang" sho' nae: jo; ra" .
Yao: re ab byid' pye' nae" yaug ngad: ra" Yesu mho"zo: Yuda Iskarud wa
Ce: sheim nae pyo" ra" xau re pe"mung: ngaui sam yo kye' mae aung: yang: ai: ngaui re myaung sho" ra" mo, re magae byid: i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: ceru: ta" ru wa myaung sho: mo; qhid' mae" myid: ci" yang: ta" ru mangad:- yao: wa khug' hab' ngad mung: ta" ru ngad: ra" . Yao: wa ngaui thaung vin yaug ngad mung:- aimae" lhaung" khug' phoe' aung: zo: yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa Yao: re dakhin jang wa,- ngore nyhab' shaung: pye' ra" ba na qhid' mae" ai: sheim nae pyo" ra" xau re yao: vai: to" ru ngad: ra" .
Myaung sho" ra" mo, wa khonhae" re: naonhaung" we' daga" za: na: ako" . Ngadqere: ngo wa naonhaung" we' daga" khonhae" re: na: jo, nae" mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Mo,byu qe myo: sho' mo, wa Bethani vogaung: mae Yesu na thoe re the' gyo" ako"- aimung: yao: bam wa Yesu mathao: yang za: re: mangad:- Shid: rumae" Yesu yang daui: li" nhao: ra" Lazaru rere: myao nae" qhid' mae" Bethani vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ako" .
Aimung: khinjaung qi: qe wa Lazaru rere: se' pye' nae" pha,jhi" khyug' ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Lazaru mathao mae Yuda byu qe wa khinjaung qi: qere to: co' mung:- Yesu re lam" lo" geyang: ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao: ba re Lai co' Poe khyo joe" li" ko" ra" mo,byu qe myo: sho' mo, wa Yerusalem khyo Yesu li" na: ra"- ga" rure the' gyo" ako" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa Zhunpalun akaung jham re yu yang: yao: re tug: yu nae" qhid' mae" ye" lo" ako" . Amung: yao: bam wa Mao" So re caung: khin" byid: ge,- Asang: mang we' joe' li" ra" yaug wa ngaui lho" vashao: wo"- Israel kho: kham wa ngaui lho" vashao: wo"- ga: zag: hug' ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa loze re myao mung: ai: dao mae do; zaung: ra" .
Aiwa Ziun vomo" we"- Dagyaug- Ni" kho: kham pho" wa loze nau" dao mae zaung yang: joe" li" ra"- ga: jham: mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Yao" mho"zo: qe wa ce: khyo jham re ai: au: maba: gyo: ko" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Yesu wa phungbao re qo" khae: yu lao" yao: bam wa ce: jham: dao: wa yao" khyo re ta" to" rure re:- yao: bam wa yao" qhid' mae" ceru: kad' byid: ko" rure re:- dam: myid: beim" li" ako" .
Lazaru re lab khug mae" khai: thug' yu yang:- shid: rumae" daui: li" nhao: ra" au:- Yesu we' daga" na ko" ra" mo,byu qe wa boe" lo: ra" khyo re ta" kyo" ako" .
Aimung: mo,byu qe wa yao: re li" tug: yu: ako"- pe"mung: ga"re yao: ce: mug' pho: ve, lho kad' ra" ga" rure yao: bam the' gyo: geyang: ngad: ra" .
Ailao" Pharishe qe wa Ngonhaung" wa khoru: re: maaung lo: ngad: ra"- Qu" ge,- mug: myid geim" yao" thao cao" byaug: avako"- ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Poe ba na gyo: mae caung: pa" nae" qhid' mae" Yerusalem khyo ye" lo" ko" ra" mo,phaung mae Greeg byumyu" damyo" bobo: ako" .
Yao: bam wa ( Galile mung" mae" Bedsaida vobyu ) Philib jhao" ye: mung:- Nhag' bo we"- ngonhaung" wa Yesu re myao nug: ra"- ga: yeta" ako" .
Ailao" Philib wa Andre re yeta" kyo: mung: yao: shid' zo: wa Yesu jhao" ye: yang: yeta" kyo" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: shid' zo: re- Byu: Yao: Zo: phungbao qi: qo" khae: yu nae" yo, khyin: ana" joe" ava" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- Jung: gaug ce' wa myid gaung mae ke' yang: nyhab' pye' ru maqhug' ngad: re wa dace' mae" je yang: gatau mamyo" li" ngad: ra" . Nyhab' pye' ru qhug' ngad: re wa ashi: myo: sho' zaui" li" ra" .
Yao: yao" kao so' re qhaung: ra" yaug wa kao so' jeim: nae"- ce: mug: myid dao mae yao: yao" kao so' re mabyag: ra" yaug kam" wa apyad ato: kao so' re shaung: to" li" nae" .
Ngo re caung da" nug: ra" yaug wa nga" thao cao" ca" ra"- amung: ngo na: ra" jo, qo mae nga" daui daui yaug re: na: li" nae"- nga" Pho" wa ngore caung da" ra" yaug re phug' te' nga: yhe' li" nae"- ga: tau" ra" .
Ana"- nga" nhag' lam: mae myid: qug: myid: ci" na: ra"- ngo pe" ta" nae" i? Nga" Pho" we"- ce: yo, qug nga" dao mae dajoe" li" nhao wa,- ein: ta" nae" laug i? Ngadqere: ngo ce: qug' khai: khyag' qhui: rure kham zo: nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru ngad: ra" .
Nga" Pho" we"- ni" mang re phungbao bao: li" nhao wa,- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" mug: gaung mae" thoe dathoe jhau: thug' li" mung:- ngo phungbao bao nhao va"- ana" re: ngo wa phungbao dam: bao nhao shinae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: mae ye; jo; ra" mo,byu qe wa ai: thoe re the' gyo: geyang:- yao: bam mae" damyo" wa Mug: dam: dam" ru ngad: ra" ga: ta" gemung:- damyo" wa Mug: lagyo: yao: re dao: jhau: ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re ce: dao: thoe wa nga" qhid' mae" jhau: thug' li" ru mangad:- naonhaung" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Ce: mug: myid re dao: kho' ru wa ana" ngad: ava"- ce: mug: myid dao: zug: pho" re ana" khe' thug' pye' ru qhug' naeva" myao:-
Ngo wa myid gaung mae" tau: to' to" ru qhug' lao"- ngo wa yaug khao: ngo" re- ngojhao" lao" yu nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
( Ceru: ta" ru wa yao: wa shid: rure khoru: kham zo: nae" ga" rure ta" shid' ru ngad: ra" )
Mo,byu qe wa Ngonhaung" nho: tarha" mae Meshia wa apyad ato daui: na: li" nae"- ga: ta" to" ra" . Aire nao wa Byu: Yao: Zo: wa to' to" ru qhug' ca" ra"- ga: khoru: mung: qo" ta" i? Byu: Yao: Zo: wa khag' ngad: ra" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Ai: bo" bao wa naonhaung" phaung mae dazab myao" sho' na shizai ngad: ra"- Mug: cad' wa naonhaung" dao mae macad' nghoe' lo vashao:- naonhaung" wa bo" bao qo" jo, shiko" au: re xo' su" na ge,- pe"mung: ga"re mug: cad' khug mae su" lhau: ra" yaug wa yao: khokhyo ye" lo" na: rure maba ngad: ra" .
Aimung: naonhaung" wa bo" bao: nho: zo: dau qe boe" genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" wa bo" bao ajo; jo, shi" au: re ai: bo" bao re lam" ge,- ga: ta" ra" . Cedao: re bin: ta" lao"- Yesu wa thug' lo" mung: yao: bam mae" phao: vho' lo" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam: qhid' kheim: mae mug' pho: ve, lho jham ainho" kad' qhu" ngadqere: yao: bam wa yao: re malam" ko" ngad: ra" .
Airu: malam" ko" ru wa Asang we"- ngonhaung" ta" ra" mungdao: re khag' lam" ra" i? Asang wa yao" qam: so' re khag' re qhu" byid' ra" i? ga: lapa Esaia ta" to" ru jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Ai: tho' mago" Esaia wa yao: bam: myo,jid' mamyao geshao:- yao: bam: nhag' lam: maba: gyo: geshao:- ngo yao: bam re gai byid: nae" yao: bam ngojhao" matug' lo geshao:- ga: Mao" So wa yao: bam: myo,jid' re jid nhao mung:- yao: bam: nhag' lam: rere: nhag' cad' cad' nhao: ra"- ga: Mao" So ta" ra"- ga: re: ta" to" ruyang yao: bam maqo" lam" ko" ngad: ra" .
Esaia wa Yesu phungbao re the' myao yang: Yesu khyo we' sin: mung:- ceru: ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Ailao" kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe myo: sho' Yesu re Lam" ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam re Pharishe qe- yang Tarha" Jung Yham mae" phoe' pye' ru maqhug' nae" qhid' mae"- yao: bam wa aikhyo re de: de: za: mata" ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa Mao" So: yang caung: khin" ru tho' byu: yang caung: khin" rure je: o: ako" .
Yesu wa thoe qi: we' Ngo re lam" ra" yaug wa ngore za: mangad:- ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug rere: lam" yaug ngad: ra" .
Aimung: ngore myao: ra" yaug wa ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug rere: myao: ra" .
Ngo re lam" ra" mo, alhab' wa mug: cad' yo mae mana: jo, nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa bo" bao khyo" ce: mug: myid dao khyo joe" li" va" .
Nga" mungdao: re gyo" yu mung: maphug' cao" ra" yaug re wa ngo wa- yao: re dao: makho' nae" . Ngo wa mug: myid byu qere dao: kho' nae" qhid' mae" joe' li" ru mangad:- Khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ru ngad: ra" .
Ngo re ha: pye' mung: nga" mungdao: re makhae: yu: ra" yaug re dao: kho' nae" dayaug na: ra" . Amung: ngo ta" to" ra" dao: thoe wa lo" thao" ra" ba na mae yao: re dao: kho' ra" tarha" zug: ngad: li" nae"
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa ngoyao" akho: akhang" khyo" ta" ru mangad:- ngore nhao: ke' ra" Nga" Pho" wa ngo pe" ta" pe" jhau nae" rure ngore amyin" byid' to" ra" .
Yao" amyin" dao: wa apyad ato: kao so' re qo" nhao: rure ngo ba: . Aimung: ngo ta" ru wa Nga" Pho" yang ngore ta" nhao: to" ra" gu: re ta" ru ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ayo, wa Lai co' Poe joe" nae" daba ca" shi" au: ngad: ra" . Yesu wa ce: mug: myid dao mae" yao: Pho" jhao" phao: lo" nae" yo, khyin: joe" li" va" rure ba: ra" . Yao: wa ce: mug: myid dao mae na: ra" yao" byu qere jhid' de; mung:- lo" thao" yo, joe" sho' yao: bam re jhid' de; ra" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa myi"xeim zo" na: ako" . Ai: yui wa Simon Iskarud yao: zo: Yuda nho: nhag' lam: khug mae Yesu re ab byid: nae" qhid' mae" myid ke' to: byid' ava" .
Yesu wa yao: Pho" yang yao: re kheim: so' alhab' ab byid' to: va" rure: yao: wa Mao" So mae" joe" li" mung: Mao" So jhao" dam: phao: lo" zai ngad: rure: ba: ra" .
Aimung: yao: wa vae: zo: jaung: mae" to" yang: yao" adao: bau: qhang re khyad' pye' mung: pha, jad: yang yao" phyid' dam: re yag: ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa jarung: dalam: mae qid vhe' ke' yang: mho"zo: qe: khyid re cid' byid; mung:- yao" phyid' dam: mae yag: ci: ra" pha, jad: yang sad' pye' byid' ra" .
Simon Petru jhao" cid' joe" lo lao"- Petru wa Asang we"- nao nga" khyid re cid' byid: nae" ein: i? ga: Yesu re myid' ra" .
Yesu wa Petru re- Ngo pe" kad' na: rure ana" wa nao maba: gyo: ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: thao phyao: nao ba: gyo" li" nae"- ga: tau" ra" .
Ailao" Petru wa Nga" khyid re khonhae" re: nao maqo" cid' nae"- ga: ta" ra" . Yesu wa Ni" khyid re ngo maqo" cid' ngad: re wa nao wa nga" mho"zo: mangad: lo nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Petru wa Asang we"- nga" khyid reza: mangad:- nga" lo . we' au: rere: cid' byid; la,- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu wa Gaung bin: cid' va" yaug wa gaung geim" san sin" va" rumung: yao" khyid za: cid' qo: ra" . Dayaug mae" je yang: naonhaung" alhab' mo, wa san sin" vako" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
( Yesu wa yao: re ab byid' pye' nae" yaug khag' ngad: rure ba: to: gau ngad: ruyang yao: wa dayaug mae" je yang: naonhaung" alhab' mo, wa san sin" vako" ra"- ga: ta" ru ngad: ra" . )
Yesu wa mho"zo: qe: khyid re bin: cid' byid: thao re yao" adao: bau: qhang dam: ve, mung:- yao" zaung jo, qo mae lo" dam: zaung: ra" . Aimung: yao: wa Ana" shi" za: ngo naonhaung" re kad' ra" lo,mau" re naonhaung" ba: gyo: ko" i?
Naonhaung" wa ngore Mho" Pho" we' Asang ga: mhang" ako"- ngore: ngad va" ruyang naonhaung" mhang" ko" ru wa jo: ra"-
Ngo wa naonhaung" Asang we' Mho" Pho" ngad sho' qere: ngo lhao" re: naonhaung" khyid re cid' byid: va"- aimung: naonhaung" re: naonhaung" yao: cao: khyid jho" cid' byid: gai: ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo kad' byid: va" ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re: kad' genae" qhid' mae" ave, aso: qhu" to: byid: va" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- Jeim wa yao" jeim sang tho' maje: qi: ngad: ra" . Aimung: lagyo: re: yao: re nhao: ke' ra" yaug tho' maje: qi: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa ce: dangman" rure ana" ba: avako" . Aimung: naonhaung" aire phug' cao" ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" wa khoqhi" sho' ngaui lho" genae" i?
Ngo wa naonhaung' alhab' re ein: ta" na: ru mangad:- ngo khyin: yu va" mo, re wa ngo ba: ra" . Ngadqere: nga" zo re bocao: zo" ra" yaug wa ngore gye tug' kad' ra"- ga" ra" jham: dao: wa jab byang" li" ca" ra" .
Airu: boe" li" lao"- Ngo wa Ngo ga: yaug ngad: rure naonhaung" lam" genae" qhid' mae" ana" maboe" li" shimae" naonhaung" re ngo ta" kyo" to: va" .
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- ngo: yang nhao: ke' ra" yaug re lham: khae: yu: ra" yaug wa ngo rere: khae: yu yaug ngad: ra" . Aimung: ngore khae: yu: ra" yaug wa ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug re khae: yu yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa cedao: re bin: ta" lao"- yao: wa gyai myid: ci" mung:- naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- naonhaung" mae" dayaug wa ngore gyevo qe: lo, khyo ab byid' pye' naemyao:- ga: de: de: za: ta" ra" .
Mho"zo: qe wa yao: khag' re ta" nug: rure maba: gyo: myid: mug' gemung:- yao: bam yao: cao: jho" qu" ako" .
Ailao" Yesu jhid' de; ra" mho"zo: yaug wa Yesu we' te' te' zaung: jo; ra" .
Simon Petru wa Yesu khag' re ta" na: rure myid: nae" qhid' mae" aiyaug re ave, byid' ke' ra" .
Aimung: ai: mho"zo: wa Yesu jhao" te' te' qui" ye: yang:- Asang we"- ai: yaug wa khag' ngad: ra" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa Mug dakhai" re xeim: qang: khug' mae jam yang: ngo byid' ra" yaug wa ai: yaug ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ra" . Aimung: Yesu wa mug dakhai" re yu: yu mung: xeim: qang: khug' mae jam yang: Simon Iskarud yao: zo: Yuda re byid' ra" .
Yuda wa ai: mug re bin: yu zo: we' Satan wa yao" khug khyo vao ye" ra" . Aimung: Yesu wa Nao kad' ca" ra" mau" re phyad kad' wa,- ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Yuda re pe"mung: ceru: ta" rure vae: zo: jaung: mae zo" na mo, dayaug re: maba: gyo: ko" ngad: ra" .
Yuda wa ngaui thaung zam: yaug ngad: ruyang Yesu wa yao: re poe mae ca" ra" zai yevai nae" we' myaung sho: mo, re daja: ja: yegae byid: nae" qhid' mae" ta" ke' ru ngad: ga: mho"zo: qe damyo" jho: ako" .
Yuda wa ai: mug dakhai" re yu zo: mung:- ailao" jao" taung gaung khyo thug' lo" ra" . Ai: yo, khyin: wa myi" mug: cad' yo, ngad: ra" .
Yuda bin: thug' lo" thao re Yesu wa Byu: Yao: Zo" nho: phungbao ana" bao: jo, va"- Byu: Yao: Zo: khyo" yang Mao" So: phungbao re: ana" bao: jo; ava" .
Mao: So wa Byu: Yao: Zo: khyo" yang yao" phungbao bao va" ngad: re wa Mao" So wa yao: khyo" yang Byu: Yao: Zo" phungbao rere: bao nhao: li" nae" . Yao: wa ana" yao: jao" bao nhao: li" nae" .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" byin cao: qe we"- ngo wa naonhaung" we' myao" sho' mana lo nae"- naonhaung" wa ngore qho: li" genae"- ngo lo" ra" jo, qo khyo naonhaung" maqo" ye: genae" ein:- kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda byu qere ngo ta" va" ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" rere: ngo ta" ra" .
Dayaug we' dayaug jho" jhid' de; ge,- ngo naonhaung" re jhid' de; ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" yao: cao: re: jho" jhid' de; ca" ra" . Ce: tarha" asag' ana" ngo naonhaung" re byid' ra" .
Amung: naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" wa nga" mho"zo: qe ngad: rure yaug khao: ngo" ba: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Simon Petru wa Asang we"- nao khai: khyo ye" lo" nae" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yesu wa ngo ye" lo" ra" khyo re nao wa ana" maqo" cao" nae"- ngadqere: thao phyao: wa nao nga" thao cao" li" nae"- ga: tau" ra" .
Petru wa Asang we"- ana" ngo ni" thao pe"mung: maqo" cao" zai i? Ngo wa ni" qhid' mae" shid nae" jin" jin" ngad:- ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu wa- Nao wa gaigai: yao: nga" qhid' mae" shid nae" jin" jin" ngad: i? Nao re ngo dang za: ta" li"- Qo, mateim shi: re nao wa ngore maba- ga: sam lhang ha: pye' li" nae"- ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" nhag' lam: damyid: ci" ge,- Mao" So re lam" ge,- ngo rere: lam" gela,-
Nga" Pho" yham mae na jo, qo myo: sho' jo; ra"- naonhaung" qhid' mae" na jo, qo lo" nyhang" to: nae" qhid' mae" ngo lo" zai ngad: ra" . Airu: mangad: re wa naonhaung" re ngo ceru: ta" nae" mangad:-
Ngo wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" na jo, qo lo" bin: nyhang" to: mung: ngo na: ra" jo, qo mae naonhaung" qhug' na genae" qhid' mae" ngo dam: li" mung: naonhaung" re li" jhui" yu nae" .
Ngo lo" nae" ra" jo, qo khyo joe" ra" khyodang re naonhaung" ba: ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Thoma wa Asang we"- nao khai: khyo ye" lo" nae" rure ngonhaung" maba- Khorumung: ngonhaung" wa khyodang re qo" ba nae" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- ngo wa khyodang ngad:- Dangman" ru we' kao so' re: ngad:- ngo khyo" za: mangad: re wa Nga" Pho" jhao" khag' re: maqo" joe" ye: ngad: ra"- ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" wa ana" ngore ba: avako"- nga" Pho" rere: naonhaung" ba: li" genae" . Aimung: ana" mae" thoegu: naonhaung" wa yao: re ba mung:- myao re: the' myao: avako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Philib wa Asang we"- Pho" re ngonhaung" re qhu" byid: la,- ailao" wa ngonhaung" alhab' mo, nhag' dag naeva"- ga: Yesu re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Philib we"- ngo wa naonhaung" we' daga" cemyhao" joe" sho' na: lo ngadqere: ngore nao maba i? Ngo re myao: qu" va" yaug wa Pho" rere: myao: qu" va" yaug ngad: ra" .
Philib we"- ngo wa Pho" we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad mung:- Pho" re: ngo we' dadang" dalam: za: ngad: rure nao malam" i? ga: myid' ra" . Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qere Naonhaung" re ngo ta" kyo: va" mungdao: jham wa nga" mungdao: jham mangad:- ngo we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad: ra" Pho" zaui: so" ra" yao" mau" zo" ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa Pho" mae Pho" wa nga" khug mae na: ein:- ngo ta" rure lam" ge,- ngo ta" rure malam" gelao" re: ngo zaui" ra" mau" zo" jham: mathao: yang lam" ge,-
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- ngore lam" ra" yaug wa ngo zaui" ra" mau" zo" re qo" zaui" li" nae" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa Pho" jhao" phao: lo" zai ngad: ra" .
Yao: Zo: khyo" yang Pho" nho: phungbao bao: thug' li" nae" qhid' mae" nga" mang re lao: yang: naonhaung" mho' ra" gu: alhab' re ngo byid: nae" ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" nga" mang re lao: yang: ngore pe" mho' gengadqere: naonhaung" re ngo byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Amung: naonhaung" ngore jhid' de; ko" ngad: re wa nga" amyin" dao: jham re naonhaung" phug' cao" li" genae" .
Ngo wa Pho" re mho' nae"- ailao" yao: wa naonhaung" we' daga" apyad ato na nae" bao" thaug' yaug gatau dayaug re naonhaung" jhao" nhao" ke' byid' li" nae" .
Ai: yaug wa Mao" So: khyo re dangman" ra" khyo" qhu" byid' ra" dangman" ra" Byo ngad: ra" . Mug: myid byu qe wa yao: re mamyao maba ko" ruyang maqo" khae: yu ko" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ai: Byo wa naonhaung" we' daga" na mung:- naonhaung" nhag' lam: khug mae yena: jo; ruyang naonhaung" wa yao: re ba: ako" .
Ngo phao: lo" lao"- naonhaung" reza: masho: majhin cug' zo: qere ru: nha: to: co' nae" mangad:- naonhaung" jhao" ngo dam: li" nae" .
Dazab zo: ngad lao" mug: myid byu qe wa ngore mathe' myao lo: genae" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa ngore the' myao genae"- pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa daui: na: ruyang naonhaung" wa daui: na: li" genae" .
Ai: ba na joe" lo lao"- ngo wa nga" Pho" we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad mung:- ngo wa naonhaung" we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re: ngo we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad: rure naonhaung" ba: li" genae" .
Nga" amyin" dao: jham re khae: yu mung: phug' cao" ra" yaug wa ngore jhid' de; ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Ngo re jhid' de; ra" yaug khag' rere: nga" Pho" yang yao: re jhid' de; li" nae" . Ngo re: yao: re jhid' de; mung:- yao: re ngoyao" gaung qhu" byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
( Yuda Iskarud mangad: yaug ) Yuda wa Asang we"- naoyao" gaung re mug: myid byu qere maqhu" byid: lo:- ngonhaung" re naoyao" gaung qhu" byid: nae" ru wa khoru: gai: boe" nae" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa ngore jhid' de; ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: nga" mho" shid' dao: re phug' cao" li" nae" . Pho" wa yao: re jhid' de; li" nae" . Ailao" nga" Pho" we' ngo wa yao: jhao" li" mung: yao: we' daga" na zai ngad: ra" .
Ngo re majhid' de; ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: nga" mho" dao: re maphug' cao" ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" the' gyo: vako" ra" mho" shid' dao: wa nga" mho" shid' dao: mangad:- ngore nhao: ke' ra" Pho" nho: mho" shid' dao: ngad: ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" we' daga" na shi" au: mae" cegu: re ngo naonhaung" re ta" kyo" to: va" .
Pho" yang nga" mang mae nhao: ke' byid: nae" ra" ai: bao" thaug' yaug Gyang" Lho" Byo wa naonhaung" re ja: khao: ngo" mho" byid: mung:- naonhaung" re ngo ta" to" ra" dao: alhab' re myid: beim: nhao: li" nae" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re yaug yo: ru to: byid: co' . Nga" nho: yaug yo: ruyao: ngo naonhaung" re byid' . Mug: myid: yang byid' ruru: ngo byid' ru mangad:- naonhaung" nhag' lam: damyid: ci" ge,- Gyaug re: dagyaug ge,-
Ngo wa phao: lo" nae"- ngadqere: naonhaung" jhao" ngo dam: li" nae"- ein: naonhaung" re ngo ta" to" ra" dao: re naonhaung" the' gyo" avako" . Naonhaung" ngore jhid' de; ko" ngad: re wa Pho" jhao" ngo phao: lo" rure naonhaung" bau: gezai ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa ngo tho' je: qi: yaug ngad: ra" .
Airu: boe" li" lao"- naonhaung" wa ngore lam" genae" qhid' mae" ai: gu: maboe" li" shimae" naonhaung" re ngo ta" kyo" to: va" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" we' dao: myao" sho' maqo" jhau lo nae" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ce: mug: myid: zug: pho" wa joe" li" na: ava"- yao: wa ngore eib nae" qam: so' bo nae" mangad:-
Ngadqere: Pho" re ngo jhid' de; rure mug: myid byu qe ba ca" . Ai: mathao mae ngo wa yao" yang amyin" byid' to" ru we' dakhyo:- ja: khao: ngo" re ngo zaui" ra" . Sage,- cejo, qo mae" ye" lo" gelang: se,- ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Yesu wa Ngo wa sabyi naui agyang" ngad:- amung: nga" Pho" wa khyae mau" zaui: yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa ngo mae ashi: mazaui" ra" akaung khao: ngo" re cu: pye' mung:- ashi: zaui" ra" akaung khao: ngo" re wa ashi: je: zaui" li" nae" qhid' mae" sho' pye' byid' ra" .
Naonhaung" wa ngo kho" kyo: byid: va" mungdao: khyo" yang gyao: gyao: za: ngad: avako" .
Ngo we' xo' de; jo, ge,- ngore: naonhaung" we' xo' de; jo, nae" . sabyi kaung wa sabyi naui dai we' maxo' made, lo: yao: za: ashi: maqo" zaui" ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re: ngo we' maxo' made, re wa naonhaung" yao: za: ashi: maqo" zaui: ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa sabyi naui dai ngad:- aimung: naonhaung" wa sabyi akaung jham ngad: ako" . Ngo we' xo' de; jo; ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: ngore: yao: we' xo' de; jo, mung:- yao: wa ashi: myo: sho' zaui" li" li" nae" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngo we' gao: yang: naonhaung" pe" re: maqo" kad' ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngo we' maxo' made; jo; ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: akaung re we' dakhyo:- shapye' pye' ru qhug' mung: kyaug' lo" ra" . Airu" ra" akaung jham re wa su: yang li" gag: vo; yu mung:- myikhyeim" mae pye' zaui: ngha" pye' ako" .
Naonhaung" wa ngo we' xo' de; jo, mung: nga" mungdao: re: naonhaung" khug mae bo: jo; ngad: re wa naonhaung" o: ra" ja: pe" mho' gengad yang: re: qo" yu: li" genae" .
Naonhaung" ashi: myo: sho' zaui" ra" khyo" yang nga" Pho" nho: phungbao bao: thug' li" ra" . Cekhyo" yang naonhaung" wa nga" mho"zo: boe' lo: ako" .
Pho" wa ngore jhid' de; ru we' dakhyo:- ngore: naonhaung" re jhid' de; ra" . Nga" jhid' de; myid mae zaug: jo, ge,-
Ngo wa nga" Pho" nho: amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" mung:- yao" jhid' de; myid mae zaug: jo; ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re: nga" amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" wa nga" jhid' de; myid mae zaug: jo; li" genae" .
Nga" ngaui bau" ru wa naonhaung" mae bo: jo, mung:- naonhaung" ngaui bau" ru byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" ngo naonhaung" re cedao: ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo jhid' de; ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re: dayaug we' dayaug jho" jhid' de; na ge,- ce wa nga" amyin" dao: ngad: ra" .
Yao" ba nam qe: qhid' mae" yao: yao" kao so' re dan: pye' sho' jhid' de; ru wa qi" thao" ra" jhid' de; myid ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo amyin" byid' ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" kad' ko" ngad: re naonhaung" wa nga" ba nam qe ngad: ako" .
Ana" mae" thoe gu: ngo wa naonhaung" re jeim qe ein: mamhang" lo nae"- pe"mung: ga"re daui daui yaug wa asang kad' ra" mau" re maba ngad: ra" . Ai: atha" ngo naonhaung" re ba nam qe ein: amhang" lo nae"- pe"mung: ga"re nga" Pho" mae" ngo the' gyo" yu: ra" gu: alhab' re ngo naonhaung" re ta" kyo: va" .
Naonhaung" wa ngore khyin: yu ko" ru mangad:- ngo yaug lam: naonhaung" re khyin: yu: ru ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" thug' ye" lo" mung: gang" tang: ra" ashi: myo: sho' zaui" jo, genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re ngo khyin: san: to" ru ngad: ra" . Aimung: nga" mang re lao: yang: naonhaung" yao: re pe" ja: mho' gengadqere: Pho" wa naonhaung" re byid' li" nae" .
Naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; na ge,- ein: ce: amyin" dao: ngo naonhaung" re byid' ra" .
Mug: myid: yang naonhaung" re nghang: ko" re wa ai wa ngore shi" sao qhid' nghang: va" rure naonhaung" myid: beim: ge,-
Naonhaung" wa mug: myid dao we' sin" ra" mo, ngad ko" re wa mug: myid wa yao: yao" ba nam ug zo: qere we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re jhid' de; li" genae" . Ngadqere: ngo wa naonhaung" re ce: mug: myid dao mae" khyin: yu mung:- naonhaung" wa ce: mug: myid dao we' masin: ko" ngad: ra" . Ce: mathao: yang mug: myid wa naonhaung" re nghang" ra" .
Jeim wa- yao" asang tho' maje: qi: ngad: ra" ein: naonhaung" re ngo ta" rure myid: beim: ge,- yao: bam ngore yhin" ko" re wa yao: bam wa naonhaung" rere: yhin" li" genae" . Amung: yao: bam nga" mho" shid' dao: re tae" gyo: ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" mho" shid' dao: rere: tae" gyo" li" genae" .
Naonhaung" wa nga" byu qe ngad ko" ruyang yao: bam wa naonhaung" re airu: kad' li" genae" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug re maba yang: ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam re ngo mali" kho" kyo: byid: ngad: re yao: bam wa qobo maqo" genae" . Ana" wa yao: bam: qobo loe, khyo ta" pyo' nae" khyo mabung" lo: gengad: ra" .
Ngo re nghang" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: nga" Pho" rere: nghang" ra" .
Yao: bam: phaung mae su gaje khag' re: makad' qu" ra" mau" re ngo makad' lo: ngad: re wa yao: bam qobo qo" nae" mangad:- ana" wa ngo kad' ra" mau" re yao: bam the' myao: yu: avako" . Ngadqere: ngo rere:- nga" Pho" rere: yao: bam nghang" ako" .
Ngadqere: ce wa pe" yug: mabo: rumae yao: bam ngore nghang: ko" ra"- ga: yao: bam: Tarha" mae tung" to" ra" jham: dao: jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa dangman" ra" khyo re qhu" byid' ra" . Ai: Bao" Thaug' Yaug ga" ra" Byo wa Pho" mae" joe" li" zai ngad: ra" . Ngo wa yao: re Pho" mae" nhao: ke' nae"- ailao" yao: wa nga" khyo re sagse: li" kham byid' li" nae" .
Naonhaung" wa sao qhid' mae" ngo we' daga" na: lo vako" rumung:- naonhaung" re: nga" khyo re sagse: kham byid' li" genae" .
Naonhaung" lam khug: myid mabyo; lo" genae" qhid' mae" ngo wa naonhaung" re cegu: ta" to: va" .
Naonhaung" wa Tarha" Jung Yham jham mae" khe' thug' pye' ru qhug' li" genae" . Aimung: naonhaung" re se' ra" yaug wa yao: naonhaung" re se' ru wa Mao" So: mau" re vin vo; na: ru ngad: ga:- myid: jho: yu nae" ra" ba na joe" lo: li" nae" .
Yao: bam wa Pho" rere: maba ko" ruyang naonhaung" re airu: kad' li" genae" .
Ngadqere: airu: kad' nae" yao: bam: ba na joe" lo lao" naonhaung" wa ngo ta" to" rure myid: beim: genae" qhid' mae" ngo naonhaung" re cedao: ta" to: byid: va" . Qhid' phyao: wa ngo naonhaung" we' daga" za: na: jo, shiyang: aijham re ngo mata" kyo" qu"-
Ana" kam" wa ngore nhao: ke' ra" yaug jhao" ngo phao: lo" zai ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ngo khokhyo phao: lo" nae" rure naonhaung" mae" khag' re: ngore mamyid: ko" ngad: ra" .
Ana" wa ngo naonhaung" re ta" kyo: va" rumung: naonhaung" nhag' lam: khug mae nhag' kaug' ru byang" sheim: jo; avako" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- ngo phao: lo" ru wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" je: gai: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngo maphao: lo" re wa ai: Bao" Thaug' Yaug re: naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" nae" mangad: . Ngadqere: ngo phao: lo" lao" kam" wa ai: Bao" Thaug' Yaug re naonhaung" jhao" ngo lo" nhao: ke' byid: nae" .
Ai: Bao" Thaug' Yaug joe" li" lao"- yao: wa mug: myid byu qere qobo we' sin: yang: yao: bam myid: shad' ra" khyo rere:- Din: man" ra" khyo rere:- Mao" So: dao: kho' ra" khyo rere:- li" ceim" shid' byid' li" nae" .
Yao: bam: qobo we' sin: yang: shad' ko" ru wa yao: bam wa ngore malam" geyang: ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam jo: ru we' sin: yang: yao: bam shad' ko" ru wa- ngo wa Pho" jhao" lo" nae" ngad mung:- naonhaung" ngore mamyao lo nae" ngad: ruyang ngad: ra" .
Dao: kho' ru we' sin: yang: yao: bam shad' ko" ru wa ce: mug: myid dao: zug: pho" wa dao: kho' ru qhug' va" ruyang ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re ngo ta" nae" khyo myo: sho' jo, shi"- ngadqere: ana" naonhaung" aire maqo" khae: yu shiko" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So: dangman" ra" khyo re qhu" byid' ra" ai: Byo joe" li" lao"- yao: wa dangman" ra" khyo alhab' khyo re naonhaung" re jhui" ye" li" nae" . Yao: wa yao: yao" kheim: so' khyo" majhau nae"- yao: wa yao: the' gyo" ra" gu: re jhau mung:- thao phyao: boe" li" nae" ra" khyo jham naonhaung" re ta" kyo" li" nae" .
Yao: wa nga" mungdao: re gaug: yu yang: naonhaung" re ta" kyo" li" nae"- aimung: yao: wa nga" phungbao re bao: thug' li" nhao nae" .
Nga" Pho" qo" ra" gu: alhab' wa nga" mae" ngad: ra" . Aimung: ai: Byo wa nga" mungdao: re gaug: yu mung: naonhaung" re ta" kyo" li" nae"- ein: ngo ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Dazab zo: ngad lao"- naonhaung" wa ngore mamyao lo: genae" . Amung: dazab kyo thao re naonhaung" wa ngore dam: myao: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao" mho"zo: qemae" damyo" wa dazab zo: ngad lao" yao: re mamyao lo: genae"- amung: dazab zo: kyo thao re ngonhaung" yao: re dam: myao genae"- ga: yao: ngonhaung" re ta" ra" . Aiwa- Pho" jhao" ngo lo" yang: ngad: ra"- ga: re: yao: ngonhaung" re ta" ra" . Ceru wa pe" re ta" nug: laug i? ga: yao: bam yao: cao: jho" myid' ako" .
Dazab zo: ngad lao"- ga" ru wa pe" re ta" nug: ru laug i? Yao: pe" ja" khyo re ta" na: rure ngonhaung" maba: gyo: ga: jho" ta" ako" .
Yesu yao" mho"zo: qe yao: re dao: myid: myid; nug ko" rure ba mung: yao: bam re- Naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" myid' na ko" ru wa dazab zo: ngad lao"- naonhaung" ngore mamyao lo: genae"- amung: dazab zo: kyo thao re naonhaung" ngore dam: myao: li" genae"- ein: naonhaung" re ngo ta" ra" khyo mangad: i?
Naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- naonhaung" wa ngugbyid ngugnhe' we' kaug' ngug: li" genae"- ngadqere: mug: myid byu qe wa ngaui bau" li" genae"- naonhaung" wa kaug' li" genae"- ngadqere: naonhaung" kaug' ru wa ngaui bau: ngaui lho" ru dam: tha" lo" li" nae" .
Myiqe: dayaug wa zo: khau nae" ba na loe" lao"- zo: khau no no: rure kham zo: nae" yo, qug joe" lo yang: nhag' kaug' nhag' ngai: ra" . Ngadqere: zo: bin: khau lao"- ce: mug: myid dao khyo zonau" dayaug re qo" myhung: ke' va" ruyang ngaui bau: mung: yao: kham zo" lo: ra" zo: khau no re yao: to"myhid' pye' ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo: naonhaung" re: ana" wa kaug' na: ako" . Ngadqere: ngo wa naonhaung" we' dam: jho" myao mung: naonhaung" nhag' lam: wa ngaui bau: ngaui lho" ru byang" sheim: jo; li" genae" . Ai: ngaui bau: ngaui lho" rure khag' re: naonhaung" mae" maqo" yu: pye' byid: genae" .
Ai: ba na joe" lo lao"- naonhaung" wa ngore pe" re: mho' lo: genae" mangad:- naonhaung" re ngo dang za: ta" geli"- naonhaung" wa nga" mang re lao: yang: yao: re pe" mho' gengadqere: Pho" wa naonhaung" re byid' li" nae" .
Ana" joe" sho' nga" mang re lao: yang: naonhaung" wa pe" daja: re: mamho' shiko" ngad: ra"- naonhaung" ngaui bau" ru jab byang"li" nae" qhid' mae" mho' ge,- mho' ru we' dakhyo: qo" khae: yu: li" genae" .
Cegu: re ngo wa naonhaung" re dao: tau" khyo" ta" kyo" ru ngad: ra"- Dao: tau" khyo" mangad: lo: Pho" khyo re de: de: za: naonhaung" re ta" kyo: nae" ra" ba na joe" lo: li" nae" .
Ai: ba na joe" lo lao"- naonhaung" wa nga" mang re lao: yang: yao: re mho' li" genae" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" gaung tha" Pho" re ngo mho' byid: nae"- ein: ngo ta" to" ru mangad:
Pe"mung: ga"re Pho" yao: yao: re: naonhaung" re jhid' de; ra" . Naonhaung" wa ngore jhid' de; ko" ru we' ngo wa Mao" So mae" joe" li" yaug ngad: rure naonhaung" lam" vako" ruyang yao: wa naonhaung" re jhid' de; ru ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa Pho" mae" ce: mug: myid dao khyo joe" li" ru ngad: ra" . Aimung: ana" ngo wa ce: mug: myid dao mae" thug' lo" yang: Pho" jhao" dam: phao: lo" zai ngad: ra" .
Ailao" yao" mho"zo: qe wa Yesu re- ana" wa dao: tau" maci lo:- de: de: za: nao ta" na: ava"-
Nao wa ja: khao: ngo" alhab' re ba yaug ngad: rure ana" ngonhaung" ba va" . Nao re khag' yang re: dao: myid: mamyid: ca" lo: ngad: ra" . Aimung: nao wa Mao" So mae" joe" li" yaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" lam" va"- ga: ta" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Ana" naonhaung" lam" vako" i?
Naonhaung" alhab' mo, wa yao: yao" yham khyo phao: byo: sin" lo" gemung: ngore naonhaung" alhab' yang phao: cug' to: co' li" genae" ra" ba na joe" lo: li" nae" . Ana" lhao" joe" jo; ava" . Ngadqere: ngo wa gaigai: ngoyao: za: mangad:- pe"mung: ga"re Pho" wa ngo we' daga" na: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa ngo we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad: na: ra" khyo" yang ngaui pyo: yaug yo: rure naonhaung" qo" yu genae" qhid' mae" ngo naonhaung" re ce: dao: ta" ru ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" wa mug: myid dao mae khyag' qhui: ru kham zo: qo: li" genae"- ngadqere: nhag' lam: dagyug: ge,- ngo wa ce: mug: myid re aung: pye' va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa cedao: jham re bin: ta" lao"- mug: gaung khyo tau: qu" mung:- nga" Pho" we"- yo,qug joe" lo: ava" . Yao: zo: wa Yao: Pho" re phungbao byid: nae" qhid' mae" ni" zo: re phungbao byid: wa,
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: zo: re nao byid' to" ra" mo, alhab' re apyad ato: kao so' qo" byid: nae" qhid' mae" nao wa yao: re xao su byu alhab' mo; dao mae eib: ra" kheim: so' byid' to" ava" .
Apyad ato: kao so' ga" ru wa date: za: ngad: ra" dangman" ra" Mao" So re ba: ru we' nao: yang nhao: ke' ra" Yesu Khristu re ba: ru ngad: ra" .
Nao ngore kad' nhao: ra" mau" zo" re ngo bin: zaui: va" . Aimung: mug: myid dao mae ni" phungbao re bin: qhu" byid: va" .
Nga" Pho" we"- Mug: myid re maphan" shimae" ngo nao we' daga" qo" to" ra" phungbao re ni" qhid' kheim: mae ana" ngore byid: la,-
Mug: myid dao mae" nao: yang ngore ab byid' to" ra" mo, nao re ba gesho' ngo qhu" byid: va" . Nao wa yao: bam re sang mung: yao: bam re nao ngore byid' to" ra" . Yao: bam wa ni" mungdao: re phug' cao" avako" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa nao: yang ngore byid' ra" gu:- ja: khao: ngo" nao mae" thug' li" ru ngad: rure ana" yao: bam ba: avako" .
Nao: yang ngore byid' to" ra" mungdao: re ngo wa yao: bam rere: ai: mungdao: byid: mung:- yao: bam wa ai: mungdao: re khae: yu: ako" . Ngo wa nao mae" joe" li" yaug ngad: ru dang: rure re:- yao: bam lam" ako" .
Ngo wa yao: bam: qhid' mae" akyu" mho' ra" . Ngo wa mug: myid byu qe: qhid' mae" akyu" mamho' . Ngadqere: ngore ab byid' to" ra" mo; qhid' mae" ngo akyu" mho' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa nao sang: ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Ailao" ngo qo" ra" gu: alhab' ni" mae" ngad mung:- nao qo" ra" gu: alhab' re: nga" mae" ngad: ra" . Yao: bam: mathao mae nga" phungbao bao: li" ra" .
Ana" ngo wa nao jhao" phao: lo nae" ngad mung:- mug: myid dao mae mana lo nae"- ngadqere: yao: bam wa mug: myid dao mae na: jo, gezai ngad: ra" . Gyang" lho" ra" Pho" we"- nao we' ngo wa dadang: dalam: za: ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam re: dadang: dalam: za: ngad genae" qhid' mae" nao ngore byid' ra" ni" mang qam: so' khyo" yang yao: bam re gug: gam byid: wa,-
Ngo wa yao: bam we' daga" na shi" au:- nao ngore byid' to" ra" ni" mang qam: so' khyo" yang yao: bam re ngo gug: gam byid: va" . Ngo wa yao: bam re gug: gam byid' lo va" ruyang jham: mugsug' jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" byaug: jeim" lo" ca" ra" dayaug mae" je yang: yao: bam mae" dayaug re: mabyaug: jeim" lo" gengad: ra" .
Ngo wa ana" nao jhao" phao: lo zai ngad: ra" . Amung: yao: bam wa nga" ngaui bau" rure yao: bam: nhag' lam: khug mae byang" sho' qo" yu genae" qhid' mae" mug: myid dao na shi" au: re cedao: jham re ngo ta" ra" .
Ngo wa yao: bam re ni" mungdao: byid' ra" . Ngo wa mug: myid we' sin" ra" yaug mangad' ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam re:- mug: myid we' sin" ra" mo, mangad: ko" ruyang mug: myid wa yao: bam re nghang" ra" .
Yao: bam re mug: myid dao mae" jhui" yu nae" qhid' mae" ngo mamho'- ngadqere: ai: makhyang" ra" yaug: lo, mae" yao: bam re gug: gam zam: so: byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngo nao re mho' ra" .
Ngo wa mug: myid we' sin" ra" yaug mangad' ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam re: mug: myid we' sin" ra" mo, mangad: ko" ngad: ra" .
Dangman" ru khyo" yang yao: bam re naoyao" qhid' mae" kyang" san: yu: to: wa,- ni" mungdao: wa dangman" ru ngad: ra" .
Nao wa ngore mug: myid khyo nhao: ke' ru we' dakhyo:- ngore: yao: bam re mug: myid khyo nhao: ke' va" .
Yao: bam re dang za: ni" qhid' mae" kyang" san: to" ra" mo, boe" li" genae" qhid' mae" ngoyao" gaung re ngo kyang" san: to: va" .
Ngo wa yao: bam: qhid' mae" za: akyu" mho' ru mangad:- yao: bam kho" kyo" ra" mungdao: khyo" yang ngore lam" lo ko" ra" mo; qhid' mae" re:- mho' ra" .
Yao: bam wa dadang: dalam; za: boe" genae" qhid' mae" ngo akyu" mho' ra" . Nga" Pho" we"- nao wa ngo we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad mung:- ngore: nao we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam rere: nga" shid' pha: we' dadang: dalam: za: boe" nhao wa,- ngo wa nao: yang nhao: ke' yaug ngad: rure mug: myid byu qe lam" nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re dadang: dalam: za: boe" nhao la,-
Nao we' ngo wa dadang: dalam: za: ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam re: dadang: dalam: za: ngad genae" qhid' mae" nao: yang byid' to" ra" phungbao reyao: ngo wa yao: bam re byid: va" .
Ngo wa yao: bam we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad mung:- nao wa ngo we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad: ruyang yao: bam wa jab byang" sho' dadang: dalam: za: boe" li" mung:- ngo wa nao: yang nhao: ke" ru ngad: rure we' nao wa ngore jhid' de; ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam re nao jhid' de; rure mug: myid wa ba nae" ngad: ra" .
Pho" we" Nao wa yao: bam re nga" lo, mae ab byid' to" ava" . Nao ngore byid' to" ra" phungbao re yao: bam qu" myao genae" qhid' mae" ngo na: ra" jo, qo mae yao: bam ngo we' daga" qo" na: jo, nae" rure ngo o: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re mug: myid re maphan" shimae" nao ngore jhid' de; ra" .
Din: man" ra" Pho" we' mug: myid byu qe wa nao re maba gengadqere: ngo wa nao re ba: ra" . Aimung: nao: yang ngore nhao: ke' rure cebam ba: ako" .
Nao ngore jhid' de; ra" jhid' de; myid wa yao: bam: khug mae bo: jo, mung:- ngore: yao: bam: khug mae qo" bo: jo, nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa ni" khyo re yao: bam re ba nhao va"- Xo' yang: re: ba nhao shinae" ngad: ra"- ga: mho' ra" .
Yesu wa airu: akyu" bin: mho' thao re yao" mho"zo: qe we' daga" ai: jo, qo mae" thug' ye" lo" mung:- Kidron qid gyaung: zo: thoete' khyo gau" de; ye" lo" ra" . Aimae khyae dakhyae: jo; ra" . Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa ai: khyae khug khyo vao ye" ako" .
Yesu we' yao" mho"zo: qe wa ai: jo, qo khyo myo: sho' lhang lhaung" ye" qu" vako" ruyang yao: re ab byid' pye' nae" yaug Yuda wa ai: jo, qo re ba: ra" .
Aimung: Yuda wa Roma gyezo: daphung: we'- khinjaung qi: qe we' Pharishe qeyang nhao: ke' ra" Caung: pa" Yham gug: gam gyezo: damyo" rere: jhui" li" ra" . Yao: bam wa myibaung:- myidam jham we' shae lhae ci yang: ai: jo, qo khyo li" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: mae boe" li" na: ra" khyo alhab' re ba mung: yao: wa qhid' au: khyo qui" ye: yang:- naonhaung" khag' re qho: na ko" i? ga: yao: bam re myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa Nazared mae" Yesu re qho: na: ga: tau" ako" . Ailao" Yesu wa- Aiyaug wa ngo ngad va"- ga: tau" ra" . Yao: re ab byid' pye' nae"yaug Yuda wa yao: bam we' daga" aimae ye; jo; ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Ngo wa aiyaug ngad va"- ga: tau" ke' lao"- yao: bam wa naung zad: zad' lo" mung: myid gaung khyo gyang: lang" lo" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re Naonhaung" khag' re qho: na ko" i? ga: dam: myid' ke' ra" . Yao: bam wa Nazared mae" Yesu re qho: na: ga: dam: phaug' tau" ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa- Aiyaug wa ngo ngad va: ein: naonhaung" re ta" va" . Aimung: naonhaung" ngore qho: na ko" ru ngad: re wa ce: gatau qegu: wa phao: lo" vageshao:- ga: ta" ra" .
( Yao: ceru: ta" ru wa Pho" we"- nao: yang ngore ab byid' to" ra" mo, mae" dayaug re lhao" re:- ngo maci: phyaug'- ga: ta" to" ra" dao: jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" ta" ru ngad: ra" . )
Simon Petru wa shae dakhyae: vin: ci mung:- she: yu yang: Khinjaung Yin" nho: jeim pho" dayaug re shaqam" ke' re ai: jeim pho" nho: lo, yo shad' nokhye' qam" phyid' khyo" ke' byid' ra" . Ai: Jeim pho" mang wa Malakhu ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa Petru re Ni" shae re shae byao mae dam: ke' to: wa,- ngo wa nga" Pho" yang byid' to" ra" ai: dayin dayo: khyag' qhui: ra" keim re mashaug' li" nae" ein: nao jho: i? ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re Roma gyezo: qe we' yao: bam: gyezug: pho" we' Yuda gug: gam gyezo: qe wa Yesu re taung" yu mung: taui: yang:-
Anna jhao" sao qhid' jhui" ye" ako" . Anna wa ai: zin mae Khinjaung Yin" kad' na: ra" Kayapha nho: yaug pho" ngad: ra" .
Amung: Kayapha wa byu alhab' mo; qhid' mae" byu dayaug za: shid: ru wa je: gai: ra"- ga: kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qere pha,jhi" byid' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Simon Petru we' gatau: mho"zo: dayaug wa Yesu thao cao" ye" ako" . Gatau: mho"zo: yaug wa Khinjaung Yin" we' jho" se" mung: khinjaung yin" yham mo" vang" khug khyo Yesu we' daga" vao ye" lo" ra" .
Petru wa taung gaung shad' vang" kham: nhae mae na: jo; ra" . Ailao" ai: khinjaung yin" pho" we' jho" se" ra"gatau: mho"zo: yaug wa taung gaung shad' khyo dam: thug' lo mung:- kham: dung: lhaug' ra" myiqe: nau" re ta" yang: Petru re akhug shad' khyo jhui" vao lo" ra" .
Kham: dung: lhaug' ra" myiqe: nau" wa Petru re- Nao re: aiyaug: mho"zo: qemae" dayaug ngad: ra" mangad: i? ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" Petru wa ngo mangad:- ga: tau" ra" .
Daui daui mo, we' gyezo: qe wa gyo, geyang: vha: myikhyeim" mad: to: yang: myikhyeim" lhang" gam: ye; jo, mung: myi: gao: na: bam: ako" . Alao" Petru wa ai: khyo ye: mung: yao: bam we' daga" ye; jo, yang: myi: yebogao: na: ra" .
Khinjaung Yin" wa Yesu re yao" mho"zo: qe: khyo re we' yao" mho" shid' ra" khyo re myid' ra" .
Yesu wa Ngo wa khonhae" re: byu alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae de: de: za: ta" lo va" . Aimung: mo,byu qe alhab' mo, zang" ham: na: ra" Tarha" Jung Yham mae we' Caung: pa" Yham mae ngo mho" shid' lo va" . Ngo wa khonhae" re: anyham: avho' mae daja: re: mata" qu"-
Aire naonhaung" ngore myid: ko" i? Nga" mho" dao: re tae" gyo" ra" mo,byu qere myid' qu" ge,- ngo pe" ta" lo: rure yao: bam re myid: ge,- ngo pe" ta" rure yao: bam ba: ako"- ga: tau" ra" .
Yesu ceru: ta" lao"- gug: gam qemae" dayaug wa Yesu re bopyo' pyo' mung:- khoru: mung: nao wa Khinjaung Yin" re airu: vae" ta" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- ngo dakheim: kheim: jhau: shad' re wa cemae na: ra" mo, alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae kho: kham shad' rure ceim" shid' la,- ngadqere: ngo ta" ra" khyo dang: ngad: re wa pe"mung: ngore pyo' i? ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re Anna wa airu: taui" to: lo, qo malhai: lo: Yesu re Khinjaung Yin" Kayapha jhao" dai" nhao: ke' ra" .
Petru wa myi: gao yang: ai: tau mae ye; jo; ashi"- aimung: gatau damyo" wa Nao re: ai: yaug: mho"zo: qemae" dayaug ngad: ra" mangad: i? ga: ta" ako" . Ngadqere: Petru wa Ngo mangad: ga: ha: pye' ra" .
Petru yang nokhye' qam" phyid' khyo" pye' byid' ra" Khinjaung Yin" nho: jeim pho" we' ba nam dau: ra" jeim gayaug re:- nao re: ai: khyae khug mae yao: we' daga" na: rure ngo myao:- mangad: i? ga: ta" ra" .
Petru wa Ngo mangad:- ga: dam: ha: pye' ra" . Ailao"jao" qo, teim: ra" .
Ne, seim no' Yesu re Kayapha yham mae" Roma mung" zug: pho" yham khyo jhui" dai" ye" ako" . Kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe wa Lai co' Poe myi" xeim re qo" zo: nae" qhid' mae" yao: yao" gaung re caung: pa" thung" khyo" yang san sin" jo, nug geyang: yham mo" khug khyo mavao ye: ko" ngad: ra" .
Aimung: Pilad wa taung gaung khyo thug' ye: yang: naonhaung" ceyaug re pe" ja" qobo zhaug' ko" i? ga: yao: bam re myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa Ce: yaug qobo daja: ja: kad' shad' yang: mangad: re wa ni" qhid' kheim: khyo ngonhaung" jhui" li" zai mangad:- ga: tau" ako" .
Pilad wa Airulao" wa yao: re naonhaung" yao: jhui" lo" mung:- naonhaung" yao" tarha" jo; ru we' dakhyo:- yao: re dao: lo" kho' ge,- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" . Yao: bam wa Ngonhaung" wa byuse' nae" akhang" maqo"- ga: tau" ako" .
( Yao: bam airu: ta" ko" ru wa Yesu yao: khoru: shid: li" nae"- ga: ta" shid' to" ra" dao: jham jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . )
Pilad wa yham mo" khug khyo dam: vao lo" mung: Yesu re khai: yu yang:- nao wa Yuda qe: kho: kham ngad: i? ga: Yesu re myid' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Ce: dao: myid: wa naoyao" myid khyo" myid' ru i? Mangad: lao" nga" khyo re su gaje qe: yang nao re ta" kyo: vako" ra" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Pilad wa Nao ngore Yuda byu dayaug ngad: ein: jho: i? Nao re nga" lo, khyo li" ab byid: ko" ra" mo, wa naoyao" amyu" qe we' khinjaung qi: qe ngad: ako"- nao pe" kad' shad' va" i? ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yesu wa Nga" mung"dan: wa ce: mug: myid mae" mangad:- nga" mung"dan: wa ce: mug: myid mae" angad: re wa Yuda kheim: so' qo" ra" mo; lo, khug khyo ngo mavao lo" sho' nga" byu qe khe' khyad' yu: li" genae" . Nga" mung"dan: wa cemae mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: Pilad wa yao: re- Airu: ngad: re wa nao wa kho: kham ngad: i? ga: myid' ra" . Yesu wa Nao wa ngore kho: kham ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" . Ngo wa dangman" ra" khyo re ta" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" khau: li" mung: ce: mug: myid khyo joe" gyo" li" ru ngad: ra" . Dangman" ru we' sin" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: nga" dao: re tae" gyo" ra"- ga: tau" ra" .
Ailao" Pilad wa dangman" ru wa pe" ngad: i? ga: myid' ra" . Ai: thao Pilad wa taung gaung shad' khyo mo,byu qejhao" dam: thug' ye: mung: yao: bam re- ngo wa yao: re dao: phyid' nae" akhyo: pe" mamyao-
Ngadqere: naonhaung" thung" jo; ru we' dakhyo:- Lai co' Poe gyo: mae kyam: byu dayaug yaug re ngo wa khonhae: re: lhaung" lhoe' ke' byid' ra" . Aimung: naonhaung" qhid' mae" Yuda qe: kho: kham re lhoe' ke' byid: nae" naonhaung" o ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa- Aiyaug re dalhoe' ke'- Baraba re lhoe' ke' byid: la,- ga: yao: re zag: hug' ako" . ( Baraba wa damya, ngad: ra" . )
Pilad wa Yesu re jhui" thug' lo" mung:- be, nhao: ra" .
Gyezo: qe wa zau: kyao: yang ba maug: dalam: kad' yu mung: Yesu au: mae zhaung: byid' ako" . Ai: thao re yao: bam wa Yesu re bau: qhang ane vhe' byid' ako" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu jhao" qui" li" mung:- Yuda qe: kho: kham we"- Kao qhang so' qhang vashao: wo"- ga: ta" yang: Yesu re bopyo' pyo' ako" .
Pilad wa taunggaung shad' khyo dalhang dam: thug' ye: mung: mo,byu qere- Qu" ge, Ngo wa yao: re dao: phyid' nae" akhyo pe" daja: rere: mamyao: rure naonhaung" re ba nhao nae" qhid' mae" yao: re ngo ce: jo, qo khyo jhui" thug' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa zau: kyao maug zhaung:- bau: qhang ane ve; pye' yang: taunggaung shad' khyo thug' lo: ra" . Pilad wa Qu" ge, Ceyaug ngad: ra" ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Khinjaung qi: qe we' Caung: pa" Yham gug: gam qe Yesu re myao gelao" yao: bam wa Yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' wa,- yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' wa,- ga: zag: hug' ako" . Pilad wa yao: bam re Airu: lao" wa yao: re naonhaung" jhui" lo" mung: pyao: zang mae lo" jin" se' pye' ge,- ngo wa yao: re dao: phyid' nae" akhyo pe" daja: rere: mamyao- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" mo, byu qe wa- Yao: wa Mao" So: yao: Zo: ngad: ga: yao: yao" gaung re ta" na: ruyang yao: wa shid man" ra" yaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" tarha" mae ta" to" ra"- ga: dam: phaug' tau" ako" .
Pilad wa ai: dao: re the' gyo: lao" je yang: gyaug: li" ra" .
Yao: wa yham mo" khug khyo dam: vao lo" mung: Yesu re Nao khai: mae" ngad: i? ga: myid' ra" . Ngadqere: Yesu wa pe" re: matau: ngad: ra" .
Alao" Pilad wa Yesu re- Nao ngore majhau nae" i? Ngo wa nao re lhoe' ke' nae" kheim: so' re:- pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' nae" kheim: so' re: qo" yaug ngad: rure nao maba i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yesu wa- Ai: kheim: so' wa Mao" So: yang nao re byid' to: yang: za: nao qo" ru ngad: ra" . Aimung: ngore ni" lo, khyo ab byid' ra" yaug wa je yang: qobo qo" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Pilad wa ce: dao: re the' gyo: lao" Yesu re lhoe' ke' nae" khyo qho: ra" . Ngadqere: mo, byu qe wa- Nao yao: re lhoe' ke' lao" wa Roma khosin" pho" ba nam mangad: lo: ngad: ra"- yao: Yao" gaung re kho: kham ngad: ga: ta" yaug wa Roma khosin" pho" re tau: lhan: yaug ngad: ra"- ga: hug' ako" .
Ai: dao: jham re Pilad the' gyo: lao" yao: wa Yesu re taunggaung shad' khyo jhui" thug' ye: mung:- Laug Myhung: Jao: ga: mhang" ra" jo, qo mae" tarha" zug: pho" zaung tao" dao mae zaung: ra" . ( Hebre myan" khyo" Gabatha ga: mhang" ako" . )
Ai: ayo, wa Lai co' Poe ba qhid' ba- ba khaung tau: li" na: ra" ayo, ngad: ra" . Pilad wa mo,byu qere- Naonhaung" kho: kham pho" re qu" ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Yao: re- se' pye' wa,- yao: re se' pye' wa,- yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' wa,- ga: zag: hug' ako" . Ailao" Pilad wa yao: bam re- Ngo: yang naonhaung" kho: kham re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' nae" rure naonhaung" nug ko" i? ga: myid' ra" . Khinjaung qi: qe wa Ngonhaung" qo" ra" kho: kham wa Roma khosin" dayaug za: angad:- ga: tau" ako" .
Ai: thao Pilad wa Yesu re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam: lo, khug khyo ab byid' ke' ra" . Aimung: yao: bam wa Yesu re jhui" thug' lo" ako" .
Yesu wa Au: Gao: Gye, ga" ra" jo, qo khyo yao" pyao: zang re vo, yang: ye" lo" ra" . ( Hebre myan" khyo" Golgotha ga: mhang" ako" . )
Yao: bam wa ai: mae yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' ako" . Byu gatau shid' yaug rere: Yesu re agaung: mae to: mung:- dashad' mae dayaug pyao: zang mae jin" te' to" ako" .
Pilad wa aso: tung" ce' tung" mung: Yesu nho: pyao: zang dao mae te' to: nhao: ra" . Aiwa- Yuda qe: kho: kham Nazared vobyu Yesu- ga" ru ngad: ra" . Aso: tung" ce' re Hebre- Latin- Greeg myan" jham kkyo" tung" te' to" ako" .
Yesu re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' ra" jo, qo wa vomo" mae" mataung" va" ruyang byu myo: sho' mo, aire myao: nghe' ako" .
Ailao" khinjaung qi: qe wa Pilad re- Yuda qe: kho: kham ein: datung"- ceyaug wa Ngo wa- Yuda qe: kho: kham ngad: ga:- ta" ra" ein: kam" tung" wa,- ga: ta" ako" .
Pilad wa Ngo tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad va"- ga: tau" ra" .
Gyezo: qe wa Yesu re pyao: zang mae bin: jin" te' pye' gelao"- yao" mai bau: re yu: yu mung:- byid bam khyo" yang: dayaug dabam jho" gae: yu: ako" . Yao: bam wa bau: qhang rere: yu: ako" . Ai: bau: qhang wa khyab' khyo: made, lo: qo; to" ra" bau: ngad: ra" .
Aimung: gyezo: qe wa ce: bau: re wa macad' gejhao"- Khag' qo" yu nae" rure pha" be, gelang:- ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" . Gyezo: qe airu: ta" ko" ru wa Yao: bam wa nga" mai bau: re yao: bam yao: cao: jho" gae: yu mung:- Nga" bau: qhang qhid' mae" pha" ce' khyo" ako"- ga" ra" jham: dao: jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" boe" ru ngad: ra" . Gyezo: qere: ai we' dakhyo: kad' ako" .
Yesu nho: pyao: zang nhae mae yao: myhi"- yao: myhi" nho: yao: nhaung:- Klopa nho: yham sang myhi" Mari- Magadala Mari bam ye; jo; ako" .
Yesu wa yao: myhi" we' yao: jhid' de; ra" mho"zo: ai: mae ye; jo, ko" rure myao mung:- Yesu wa yao: myhi" re Yao: wa ni" zo: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa ai: mho"zo: re- yao: wa ni" myhi" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" . Ai: ba mae" ai: mho"zo: wa Yesu yao: myhi" re yao" yham khyo lo" jhui" nha: to" ra" .
Yesu wa mau"zo" alhab' bin va" rure ba mung:- Jham: mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo:- jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" Ngo qid shab' kyi:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: mae sabyi qang: jhin byang" sho' bo: ra" jarung: dalam: jo; ra" . Aimung: yao: bam wa sabyi qang: jhin mae qid mug sad' jam: yu yang:- Husub kaung mae thug' ze; te' mung: Yesu nhad' khyo to' byid' ako" .
Yesu wa ai: sabyi qang: jhin re bin: shaug' mung:- Mau" bin va"- ga: ta" yang: yao" au: goe; lo" mung: kao gyo" lo" ra" .
Ai: thao kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qe wa pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' ra" mo; khyid jham re khyug' pye' mung:- pyao: zang dao mae" mao gaung jham re yu: khyo" yu nae" qhid' mae" Pilad re akhang" mho' ako" . Yao: bam ceru: mho' ko" ru wa ai: ba wa ban thug' ngo" ba: ba ngad mung:- Dugno: Ba re pyao: zang jham mae mao gaung jham re malao" jo, nhao nug geyang: ngad: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re ai: Dugno: Ba wa je: gyang" lho" ra" ba na ngad: ra" .
Aimung: gyezo: qe wa ye" lo" mung:- Yesu we' daga" pyao: zang mae jin" te' to: qhug' ra" sao qhid' yaug: khyid re be; khyug' pye' mung:- thao mae" yaug: khyid rere: be; khyug' pye' byid' ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa Yesu jhao" joe" lo gelao"- Yesu shid va" rure lomyao gemung:- yao" khyid re wa mabe; khyug' ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: gyezo: dayaug wa lhae tad' yang Yesu nae dan: mae yethug' ke' we' aijao" sa: we' qid yug: thug' li" ra" .
( Naonhaung" re: ce: khyo re lam" genae" qhid' mae"ceru: boe" rure yao" myo; yang yao: the' myao: ra" yaug yao: ta" ru ngad: ra" . Yao: ta" ru wa dang: ra"- aimung: yao: wa dangman" ra" dao: ta" ru ngad: rure yao: yao: ba: ra" . )
Ceru: boe" ru wa- yao" shoqug: dakhe' re: khyug' ru maqhug' nae"- ga: ta" to" ra" jham: dao: jab byang" li" ru ngad: ra" .
Amung: jham: mugsug' gatau dalam: mae re:- yao: bam: yang lhae tad' yang thug' ra" yaug re yao: bam ceim" qu" li" genae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Ai: thao Arimathe vogaung: mae" Yoseb wa Yesu nho: maogaung re yu: yu nae" qhid' mae" Pilad re akhang" yemho' ra" . ( Yoseb wa kheim: so' qo" ra" Yuda qere gyaug yang: anyham: avho' khyo" Yesu mho"zo: boe" na yaug ngad: ra" . ) Ailao" Pilad wa Yoseb re akhang" byid' ke' ra" . Yoseb wa ye" lo" mung:- mao gaung re yeyu: yu: ra" .
Qhid' phyao: myi" ayo, re Yesu jhao" li" ra" Nikodi wa Mura we' Ajho: lhag' ra" sheim nae pyo" ra" ja: sam xe: ngo" joe: ko yu: vin mung:- Yoseb we' daga" cao" ye" ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa Yesu mao gaung re yu: yu mung:- Yuda byu qe: nyhab' shaung nae" mao gaung re nyhang" shaung: ra" thung" we' dakhyo:- sheim nae pyo" ra" ja: gyad mung: jid: mo" pin" yang mao gaung re thab' ako" .
Yesu re pyao: zang mae jin" se' ra" jo, qo mae khyae dalam: jo; ra" . Aimung: ai: khyae mae khag' re: manyhab' qu" shi" ra" lab asag' dalam: re: jo; ra" .
Ai: ba wa Dugno: Ba qhid' ba- seim" jin" ra" ba na ngad: ru we' lab re: ajhao" mae jo; ruyang yao: shid' zo: wa Yesu nho: mao gaung re ai: lab khug mae yeke' to" ako" .
Laban ba ne, seim no' myo, mamyao shire- Magadala Mari wa lab khyo ye" lo" ra" . Yao: wa lab nhad' mae" laug zang tau: qhui" pye' to: va" rure yemyao: ra" .
Aimung: yao: wa Simon Petru we' Yesu jhid' de; ra" gatau: mho"zo: jhao" tao" ye: mung:- yao: bam wa Asang re lab mae" yu: pye' vagenhaung- Khai: mae yeto" pye' vako" laug? Ngonhaung" maba lo: ga: yeta" ra" .
Ailao" Petru we' ai: gatau: mho"zo: qe wa lab khyo ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: shid' zo" geim" tao" ye" lo" ako" . Ngadqere: gatau: mho"zo: yaug wa Petru tho' je: qao mung:- lab khyo qhid' joe" ye" ra" .
Yao: gam" qu" ke' re jid: mo" pin: lung: jham bam: jo; rure myao: ra" . Ngadqere: yao: wa lab khug khyo mavao ye: ngad: ra" .
Simon Petru wa yao" thao mae joe" li" mung:- lab khyaung khug khyo khyao za: vao ye" lo" ra" . Yao: wa jid: mo" pin: lung: jham bam: jo; rure we' Yesu au: mae thab' ra" pin: dau re yemyao: ra" .
Yesu au: mae thab' ra" pin: dau wa jid: mo" pin: lung: jham we' daga" majo, lo:- yao: yao: za: gatau mae kheim" bam: jo; ra" .
Ai: thao re lab khyo sao qhid' joe" ye" ra" gatau: mho"zo: re:- lab khug khyo vao ye" lo" mung:- ai: rure yao: yao: yemyao yang: lam" ra" .
( Yesu wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ca"- ga" jham: dao: re yao: shid' zo: maba: gyo: shiko" ngad: ra" . )
Ai: thao mho"zo: shid' yaug wa yham khyo phao: lo" ko" ra" .
Mari wa lab taunggaung shad' mae ngug: ye; jo; ra" . Yao: wa airu: ngug zo" re" lab khyaung khug khyo gam" qu" ke' re-
Mai bau: phyu ve; ci: ra" mug: lagyo: shid' yaug re Yesu nho: mao gaung mhao" to" ra" jo, qo mae- au: tho' shad' mae dayaug- khyid thao shad' mae dayaug zaung: jo, ko" rure myao: ra" .
Lagyo: shid' zo: wa Myiqe: we"- nao pe"mung: ngug: na: i? ga: myid' ako" . Ailao" Mari wa Yao: bam wa nga" Asang re yu: pye' mung:- khai: mae yeto" pye' ko" rure ngo maba yang: ngad:- ga: yao: shid' zo: re tau" ra" .
Airu: ta" mung: lhang: lo: re Yesu aimae ye; jo; rure myao: ra" . Ngadqere: Yesu ngad: rure yao: maba ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa Myiqe: we"- nao pe"mung: ngug: na: i? ga: yao: re myid' ra" . Ailao" Mari wa Yesu re khyae lhaug' yaug ngad: ga: jho mung:- Nhag' bo we"- yao" mao gaung re nao vo; yu: pye' ngad: re wa nao khai: mae yeto" rure ngore ta" kyo: la,- ngo wa yao: re yeyu: yu nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re Mari we"- ga: yao: ra" . Mari wa Yesu shad' khyo lhang: lo mung: Hebre myan" khyo" Raboni ga: tau" ra" . ( Raboni ga" ru wa mho"pho"- ga" ru ngad: ra" . )
Yesu wa yao: re- ngore dazaui: la,- pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa Pho" jhao" mado, lo" shi:- ngadqere: nga" mao: nhaung: qejhao" lo" mung:- yao: bam re- ngo wa nga" Pho" we' yao: bam: Yao: Pho" ngad: ra" nga" Mao" So we' yao: bam: Mao" So jhao" dam: do, lo" nae" ngad: ra"- ein: lo" ta" kyo: byid: la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Aimung: Magadala Mari wa lo" yang: Asang re yao: the' myao va" ru we' Asang yao: re pyang: ke' ra" dao: jham re mho"zo: qere yeta" kyo" ra" .
Laban ba myi" thao mug: sham" sham" cad' lo" yo, re mho"zo: qe wa Yuda kheim: so' qo" mo, re gyaug geyang: yham khug mae kham: pyid' pye' mung: zang" ham: na: bam: ako" . Ailao" Yesu wa joe" li" mung: yao: bam: phaung gaung: mae li" ye; jo, yang:- naonhaung" ngaui pyo: yaug yo vageshao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Airu: bin: ta"lao"- Yesu wa yao" lo, we' nae dan: re yao: bam re qhu" byid' ra" . Ailao" mho"zo: qe wa Asang re the' myao gemung:- gyai ngaui bau" ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" ngaui bau: yaug yo vageshao:- Pho" wa ngore nhao: ke' ru we' dakhyo:- ngore: naonhaung" re nhao: ke' ra" ga: dam: ta' ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa mho"zo: qe: dao mae so' she: ke' mung:- Gyang" Lho" Byo re khae: yu ge,-
Qobo qo" ra" mo, re naonhaung" qobo khyad' byid: ko" re wa yao: bam wa qobo khyad' byid' ru qhug' li" genae"- naonhaung" qobo makhyad' byid: ko" re wa yao: bam wa qobo khyad' byid' ru maqhug' genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu li" ra" au: re mho"zo: daxe: shid' yaug mae bobo: ra" ( zozam ga: mang: ra" ) Thoma wa mho"zo: qe we' daga" mana: ang ngad: ra" .
Aimung: gatau: mho"zo: qe wa ngonhaung" wa Asang re myao va"- ga: ta" kyo" ako" . Ailao" Thoma wa ngo wa yao" lo, mae" ze,jin" khu re myao mung:- ai: dae khu jham re nga" lo, nyhug' yang yao: soe' qu" yang:- nga" lo; yang yao: yao" nae dan: re maqo" soe' re wa ngo malam" nae"- ga: yao: bam re tau" ra" .
Dalaban kyo thao re mho"zo: qe wa yham khug mae dam: zang" ham: na: bam: ako" . Thoma re: yao: bam we' daga" na: jo; ra" . Kham: jham re pyid' to" ako"- ngadqere: Yesu wa joe" li" mung:- yao: bam: phaung gaung: mae li" ye; jo, yang:- naonhaung" ngaui pyo" na vageshao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Yesu wa Thoma re- Ni" lo, nyhug' yang nga" lo, re tin" qu" wa,- nga" lo, rere: qu" wa,- amung: ni" lo, yheim" ke' yang: nga" nae dan: mae re: soe' qu" wa,- Aug' o: myid dabo- lam" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Thoma wa Yesu re- Nga" Asang we' Nga" Mao" So- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa yao: re- Nao wa ngore the' myao yang: lam" i? Ngo re mathe' myao lo:- ngore lam" mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ce: jham: paug' mae mabo: tung" to" ra" gatau mug' pho: ve, lho jham myo: sho' re: Yesu wa yao" mho"zo: qe: qhid' kheim: mae zaui" qhu" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa Mao" So: yao: Zo: Meshia ngad: rure naonhaung" lam" genae" qhid' mae" we' yao: re lam khug: ra" khyo" yang naonhaung" wa kao so' qo" yu genae" qhid' mae" ce: jham: paug' re tung" to" ru ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao re Yesu wa Tiberia tham: mae yao" mho"zo: qere yao" gaung na: qhu" byid' ra" .
Boe" ra" khyo wa ceru: ngad: ra" . Simon Petru- ( zozam ga: mang yaug ) Thoma- ( Galile Ka Na vobyu ) Nathanae- Zebede yao: zo: tao we' Yesu mho"zo: gatau shid' yaug wa daga" za: na: bam: ako" .
Simon Petru wa gatau mho"zo: qere Ngo ngo: kung" ye: nae"- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" yao: bam wa Ngonhaung" re: cao nae"- ga: yao: re ta" ako" . Ai: mung: yao: bam wa lha dakhye' mae do; zaung mung:- ngo: yekung" ako" . Yao: bam wa ai: myi damyi: geim" kung" gengad yang: re:- ngo: dadau: re: mathe' ko" ngad: ra" .
Ba thug' li" lao" Yesu wa qid yae mae yeye; jo; ra" . Ngadqere: mho"zo: qe wa Yesu ngad: rure maba ko" ngad: ra" .
Ailao" Yesu wa Zolau: bam we"- ngo: mathe' kung" ko" i? ga: yao: bam re myid' ke' ra" . Yao: bam wa dadau: re: mathe' kung"- ga: tau" ako" .
Aimung: Yesu wa Naonhaung" nho: geim re lha lo,yo shad' khyo khyo" ke' ge,- naonhaung" the' li" genae"- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" . Ailao" yao: bam wa Yesu ta" ru we' dakhyo:- geim re khyo" ke' ko" re- ngo: myo: sho' re the' myhi" yu yang: geim re lhao" matho' she: to' yu loko" ngad: ra" .
Yesu jhid' de; ra" mho"zo: wa Petru re- Asang ngad: ra"- ga: ta" kyo" ke' ra" . Petru wa Asang ngad: ra"- ga" rure the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa yao" adao: bau: qhang re gaung mae gaug: yang" mung:- qid tham: khyo byae: gyo" ye" ra" . ( Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa gaung pyad' ngad: ra" . )
Gatau: mho"zo: qe wa gyagao: yo we' gyai mataung" va: lo:- gad' dayo za: kyo loyang:- ngo: byang" sho' myi" jo; ra" geim re she zo" re" tham: yae khyo lha we' joe" lo: ako" .
Yao: bam gyagao: yo khyo joe" lo gelao"- myi: gyoe: dao mae kao: to" ra"ngo: jham re we' mug jham re lomyao: ako" .
Ailao" Yesu wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" the' kung" to" ra" ngo: daqhae: cilo geri:- ga: ta" ra" .
Simon Petru wa lha khug khyo vao ye: mung:- ngo: qi: jham byang" sho' myi" jo; ra" geim re gyagao: yo khyo yeshe: to' yu: ra" . Ngo: dayo: ngo" xe: sam dau: myi" ngadqere: geim majad ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Lozo: geri:- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: bam wa Asang ngad: rure ba geyang:- nao khag' ngad: i? ga:- mho"zo: qe khag' dayaug re: Yesu re mavae" myid: ngad: ako" .
Aimung: Yesu wa yao: bam jhao" ye: mung:- mug rere: yu: yu yang:- yao: bam re byid' ra"- ngo: rere: ai we' dakhyo: byid' ra" .
Yesu wa yao: shid; rumae" dam: daui: to" li" thao- mho"zo: qere yao" gaung na: qhu" byid' ru celhang wa sam lhang ein: lhang ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam bin: zo: gethao re Yesu wa Simon Petru re- Yohan nho: yauggai zo: Simon we"- Gaje qe ngore jhid' de; ko" ra" tho' nao ngore je: jhid' de; i? ga: myid' ra" . Petru wa Asang we"- nao re ngo jhid' de;- nao re ngo jhid' de; rure nao ba: ra"- ga: tau" ra" . Ailao" Yesu wa yao: re Nga" yao nau" jham re khau wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa shid' lhang ein: lhang Petru re- Yohan nho: yauggai zo: Simon we"- nao ngore jhid' de; i? ga: dam: myid' ra" . Petru wa Asang we"- ngo jhid' de;- nao re ngo jhid' de; rure nao ba: ra"- ga: tau" ra" . Yesu wa yao: re Nga" yao jham re zam: wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa sam lhang ein: lhang Petru re- Yohan nho: yauggai zo: Simon we"- nao ngore jhid' de; i? ga: myid' ra" . Ailao" Petru wa Nao ngore jhid' de; i? ga: sam lhang yao: taung" myid' ruyang nhag' gyo" kaug' mung:- Asang we"- nao wa alhab' re ba yaug ngad: ra"- nao re ngo jhid' de; rure nao ba: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" . Yesu wa yao: re- Nga" yao jham re khau: na wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Nao re ngo dang za: ta" li"- nao wa zolau: yo, re ni" gaung re naoyao: seim" jin" mung:- naoyao: ye: nug: ra" khyo qo" ye" ra"- ngadqere: nao mao" lo" lao" wa ni" lo, shid' shad' geim" yheim" ke' mung:- su gaje: yang taui: yang:- nao manug: ye" ra" jo, qo khyo nao re jhui" ye" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
( Airu: ta" ru wa Petru wa khokhyo" shid mung: Mao" So: phungbao bao: thug' li" nae"- ga" rure Yesu ceim" shid' yang: ta" ru ngad: ra" . ) Ai: thao Yesu wa Petru re- Nga" thao cao" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Petru lhang: qu" ke' re- yao" thao mae Yesu jhid' de; ra" gatau: mho"zo: re the' myao: ra" . Ai: yaug wa myi" xeim zo" na ko" au:- Yesu we' te' te' zaung: nga: jo, yang:- Asang we"- nao re ab byid' pye' nae" khoyaug ngad: ra"i? ga: Yesu re myid' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Petru wa aiyaug re myao lao"- Asang we"- ceyaug: khyo we' sin: yang: khoru: i? ga: Yesu re myid' ra" .
Yesu wa Petru re- ngo joe" li" ra" ba na joe" sho' yao: re ngo daui: na nhao nug ngadqere:- ai wa nao we' pe" sin" i? Nga" thao cao" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Aimung: ai: mho"zo: wa mashid nae"- ga" ra" lau dao: wa mho"zo: qe: phaung mae hau" nhao" lo" ra"- ngadqere: Yesu wa ai: mho"zo: mashid nae"- ga: ta" ru mangad:- yao: ta" ru wa Ngo joe" li" ra" ba na joe" sho' yao: re ngo daui: na nhao nug ngadqere:- aiwa nao we' pe" sin" i? ga: ta" ruza: angad: ra" .
Mho"zo: aiyaug wa ce: khyo jham re sagse: kham mung:- cera" khyo jham re tung" xam" to" ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: sagse: kham: to" ru wa dangman" ru ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Yesu zaui" ra" mau" zo" gatau myo: sho' jo, shi" ra"- ai: gu: alhab' re azo" tai" tung" xam" to: nae" ngad: re wa ce: mug: myid geim" mae lhao" re:- ai: mugsug' paug' jham to: nae" jo, qo qui" nae" mangad:- ein: ngo myid: jho: ra" .
Phug' myao" ra" Theophilu we"- Yesu wa yao" mau" zo" re zaui" qhid: ra" ba na mae" yao: re mug: gaung khyo to' yu: ru qhug' ra" ba na joe" sho' Yesu zaui: so" lo: ru we' mho" shid' lo: ra" khyo alhab' re nga" tung" paug' sao qhid' paug' mae botung" to: va" .
Yesu wa mug: gaung khyo to' yu: ru maqhug' shimae" yao" lagyo: qe ga:- yao: khyin: yu: to" ra" mo, re yao: wa Gyang" Lho" Byo: qam: so' khyo" yang pin dao: jham byid: co' ra" .
Yao: shid kham thao byid xe ba gyo: mae yao: wa myo: sho' lhang lagyo: qejhao" yena: qhu" mung:- yao: daui: na: ra" khyo re lam ga" ra" sagse: jham qhu" byid' ra" . Lagyo: qe wa Yesu re the' myao mung:- Yesu wa yao: bam re Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo re ta" kyo" ra" .
Yao: bam zang" ham: na ko" au:- Yesu wa lagyo: qere- Yerusalem vogaung: mae" dathug' lo" ge,- naonhaung" re ta" kyo" to: gau ngad: ra" nga" Pho" dao: so: byid' to" ra" jhaung qhu" re lao" na ge, .
Yohan wa qid: yang qid nyhab' byid' ra"- ngadqere: khonho" ba mangad: re naonhaung" wa Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang qid nyhab' byid' rure qhug' li" genae"- ga: amyin" byid' ra" .
Lagyo: qe wa Yesu we' daga" zang" ham: na ko" au:- yao: bam wa Yesu re Asang we"- Israel byu qere ai: mung"dan: ce: akhyin: mae nao dam: te: byid: nae" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Yesu wa yao: bam re- Nga" Pho" yao" kheim: so' khyo" yang mhai" so" to" ra" ba na we' yo, khyin: khonhae" ngad: rure naonhaung" ba maqo ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" dao mae Gyang" Lho" Byo joe" li" lao"- naonhaung" wa qam: so' byang" lo: li" genae" . Amung: naonhaung" wa Yerusalem vogaung:- Yuda mung" geim"- Samari mung" we' myid gaung thao" sho' mae nga" khyo re sagse: kham byid: mo, ngad: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ceru: bin: ta" thao lagyo: qe qu" na: reyao:- Yesu wa mug: gaung khyo to' yu: ru qhug' ra" . Ai: thao yao: bam: myo,jao: mae" jham thaui: wa yao: re nghoe' cilo" ra" .
Lagyo: qe wa Yesu do, lo" na: au:- mug: gaung khyo zhaug' qu" na shiko" au: re mai bau: phyu ve; ra" byu shid' yaug nyag din taung" yao: bam: nhae mae li" ye; ke' gemung:-
Galile byu qe we"- naonhaung" ai: tau mae pe"mung: mug: gaung khyo qu" ye; jo; bam ko" i? Naonhaung" mae" mug: gaung khyo to' yu: ru qhug' ra" Yesu wa- naonhaung" myao: na: au: mug: gaung khyo do, lo" ru we' dakhyo:- airu: dam: joe" gyo" li" nae" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ai: thao re lagyo: qe wa Yerusalem we' khyoman: agaung: daqi" ko za: jho" va" ra" Zhan: lun: bam mae" Yerusalem khyo dam: phao: lo" ako" .
Yao: bam wa vomo" khug khyo vao lo" mung:- Yao: bam thang: na: ra" yham- tho' pyae: qe, khyo do, lo" ako" . Yao: bam wa Petru- Yaku- Andre- Philib- Thoma- Batholame- Mathe- Alphaeu yao: zo: Yaku- byumyu" jhid' myid qi" ra" Simon we' Yaku yao: zo: Yuda bam ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam wa Yesu yao: myhi" Mari we' gatau myiqe: qe we' re:- Yesu yao: nhaung: bam we' re:- dazab makyo ham: phaung mung:- akyu" mho' yang: na: ako" .
Ai: thao mataung" myao" re lam khug: ra" mo, dayo: shid' xe zo: ko zang" ham: na: bam: ako" . Ailao" Petru wa to" ye, mung:-
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Yesu re taung" ra" mo, re khyo jhui" ra" yaug Yuda we' sin: yang: Gyang" Lho" Byo wa Davi nhad' dao: thoe khyo" ta" to" ra" jham: dao: jab byang" li" nae" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yuda wa ngonhaung" we' daga" mau" zaui: nae" khyin: yu: to" ra" yaug ngad yang: yao: wa ngonhaung" phung: mae bobo: ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
( Yao: wa makhyang" ra" lo,mau" khyo" yang the' ra" ngaui: yang yo myid dakhyao: vai: yu mung: ai: yo myid mae atug' khyo" byid: gyo" shid: ra" . Yao" vae: dug: baug: go; lo" mung:- au jham alhab' baug: thug' lo" byaug: ra" .
Yerusalem vogaung: mae na: ra" mo, alhab' wa ai: khyo re the' gyo" ako" . Airumung: yao: bam wa ai: yo myid cug' re yao: bam yao" myan" khyo" Akeladama ga: mhang" ako" . Akeladama ga" ru wa- Sa: Mug: Myid ga" ru ngad: ra" . )
Pe"mung: ga"re Caung: khin" paug' mae- Yao" yham wa cae: jhug tag boe" mung: aimae khag' re: mana vageshao:- ga: re:- yao" aya: rere: gatau dayaug yu: pye' vashao:- ga: re: tung" to" ra" .
Aimung: Asang Yesu wa shid: ru mae" dam: daui: to" li" ra" khyo re ngonhaung" we' daga" sagse: kham nae" byu gatau dayaug ngonhaung" qo: ra" . Ai: yaug wa Yohan Qid nyhab' kham byid: mung:- mungdao: kho" qhid: ra" ba na mae" ngonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae" Yesu mug: gaung khyo to' yu: ru qhug' ra" ba na joe" sho' Asang Yesu ngonhaung" we' daga" su" qin" du" qin" na: qin" rumae yo, byang" bobo: ra" yaug ngad ca" ra" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa Yustu ga: re: mang zo: qo" mung: Barsaba ga: mang: ra" Yoseb we' Mathia tao mae" dayaug yaug re dam: khyin: yu nae" qhid' mae" dao: vhao" ako" .
Ai: thao re yao: bam wa- Asang we"- Nao wa yaug khao: ngo" nho: nhag' lam: re ba yaug ngad: ra" . Yuda wa yao: we' sin" ra" jo, qo khyo ye" lo" nae" to: co' ra" Yuda khu mae lagyo: dayaug khyo" mau" zo" vin vo; nae" qhid' mae" ce shid' yaug mae" khoyaug lam: re nao khyin: yu va" rure ngonhaung" re qhu" byid: la,- ga: akyu" mho' ako" .
Alao" yao: bam wa ai shid' yaug mae" khyin: yu nae" pha" ce' khyo" ako" . Mathia re pha" ce' ang mung: yao: wa ai: lagyo: daxe: dayaug: phaung mae bobo: ra" .
Pentikoti ba na joe" lao"- lam khug: ra" mo, alhab' wa dajo,qo mae za: zang" ham: na: bam: ako" .
La qam" hug' ra" thoe we' dau: ra" thoe dathoe mug: gaung mae" nyag din taung" myang: thug' li" mung: yao: bam na: ra" yham geim" mae ai: thoe byang" jo; ra" .
Ai: thao yao: bam wa nga" byo: sin" jo; ra" myishae jham we' dau: ra" myishae jham wa yao: bam yaug khao: ngo" au: dao mae de; jo; rure myao: ako" .
Yao: bam alhab' mo, wa Gyang" Lho" Byo byang" mung: ai: Byo: yang qo" jhau nhao: ru we' dakhyo:- gatau myan" aja: ja: jhau: thug' li" ako" .
Mug: myid dao mae jo; ra" mung"dan: khao: ngo" mae" joe" li" ko" ra" Mao" So re gyaug phug' ra" Yuda byu qe wa Yerusalem vogaung: mae na: bam: ako" .
Ceru: myang: ra" thoe re the' gyo: gelao"- mo,byu qe zang" ham: li" ako" . Yao: bam yaug khao: ngo" wa lam khug: ra" mo, jhau: na: rure yao: yao" myan" khyo" ba: gyo" yu gemung:- mo, byu qe alhab' mo, din: mug' ako" .
Yao: bam wa mug' hao" byaug gemung:- Ceru: jhau: na: ra" mo, wa Galile byu qe ngad ko" ra" mangad: i?
Aire ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa yao: bam jhau: rure ngonhaung" yao" myan" khyo" ba: gyo" yu: ru wa khoru: i?
Ngonhaung" wa Pathia mung"- Media mung"- Elam mung"- Mesopotamia mung"- Yuda mung"- Kapadokia mung"- Pontu mung"- Asia mung"-
Phrugi mung"- Pamphulia mung"- Egutu mung"- Kureni nhae mae" Libya mung" khaung: mae" joe" li" ra" mo, ngad: ra" .
Amung: ngonhaung" mae" daqhae: wa Roma mae" li" ra" Yuda qe we' Yuda caung: pa" thung" khyo" phaug' lo: ra" Taung Bug Byu qe ngad: ra" . Alao" ngonhaung" mae" daqhae: wa Krete we' Arebia mung" mae" mo, ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Mao" So zaui" bin va" ra" mau" zo" jham: khyo gyo" yu: ru wa khoru: laug i? ga: ta" ako" .
Yao: bam alhab' mo, wa mug' hao" byaug gemung:- Ceru wa pe" ru: ga" ru ngad: ra" i? ga: yao: bam yao: cao: jho" myid' ako" .
Ngadqere: daqhae: wa ai: lam khug: ra" mo, re- Ai: byu qe wa yhid yid mo, ngad: ako"- ga: qi: jung" pye' ako" .
Ailao" Petru wa lagyo: daxe: dayaug we' daga" to" ye; jo, mung: thoe to' yang:- Mao: nhaung: Yuda byu qe we' Yerusalem vobyu qe alhab' mo, we"- nga" dao: re tae" gyo" yu ge,- ce: khyo we' sin: yang: naonhaung" re ta" kyo: geli" .
Ce: byu qe wa naonhaung" jho: ru we' dakhyo:- yhid yid mo, mangad: ko" ngad: ra" . Ana" ne, kao gug yo, qug za: shi" angad: ra" .
Ce: khyo wa Lapa Yoela ta" to" ra" khyo ngad: ra" .
Yoela wa Mao" So ceru: ta" ra"- Ngo wa lo" thao" ra" ba na mae byu yaug khao: ngo" dao mae nga" Byo vhe' sheim: byid: nae"- naonhaung" yauggai zo: qe wa nga" mung dao: re kho" kyo" li" genae" . Naonhaung" nho: zolau: qe wa ve, lho myao: li" genae"- amung: naonhaung" nho: mao: zo: qe wa yab mo, myao: li" genae" .
Ngad va"- ai: ba na mae nga" daui daui mo,- yauggai myiqe: alhab' mo; dao mae lhao" re:- nga" Byo vhe' sheim: byid: nae" . Ailao" yao: bam wa nga" mungdao: re ta" hau" li" genae" .
Ngo wa mug: gaung tho' mae mug' pho: vhe, lho kad' qhu" mung:- o: myid gye, dao mae mug' pho: mau" zo" kad' qhu" nae" . Sa: re:- myi: re: thau: ra" myikhug' thaui: jham re: kad' qhu" nae" .
Phungbao qi" qhang: ra" Asang: Ba Na majoe" li" shimae" ba wa cad' sham: no; lo" mung:- lho" wa sa: ru: ne: lo" byaug: li" nae" .
Ailao"- bao" thaug' yu nae" qhid' mae" Asang re mho' yaug khag' ngadqere:- khyad' yu: ru qhug' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Israel mao: nhaung: qe we"- ce: dao: re tae" gyo" qu" ge,- Nazared mae" vobyu Yesu wa Mao" So: kheim: so' qo" yaug ngad: rure Mao" So wa Yesu nho: lo, khyo" yang kad' ra" mug' pho: ve,lho jham we' mug' pho: mau" zo" jham khyo" yang sagse: qhu" byid' ava" . Ce: khyo jham wa naonhaung" phaung mae boe" lai: lo va" ruyang naonhaung" yao: aire ba: ako" .
Mao" So wa yao: yaung: to" ru we' dakhyo: Yesu re naonhaung" lo, khyo ab byid' pye' nae" myid: phyid' to: gau ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" wa qobo jab qe: lo; yang yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' nhao: ako" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So wa yao: re shid: ra" qam: so' mae" lhoe' ke' byid: mung: shid: ru mae" dam: daui: li" nhao: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re shid: ru wa yao: re zaui" lhaung" ci nae" magai: boe" ngad: ra" .
Yao" khyo we' sin: yang: Davi wa- Ngo wa Asang re yo, khyin: khao: ngo" nga" qhid' kheim: mae the' myao: na: ra" Yao: wa nga" nhae mae na: jo, yang: ngo wa qug: khai" ru qhug' nae" mangad:-
Airumung: nga" aung khug mae ngaui bau" ru byang" jo; ru we' nga" nhad' dao: thoe wa ngaui bau: ngaui yao: ru byang" jo; ra" . Ngo wa shid ba: ra" ja: byu ngad sho' ngadqere: myid: lao" mung: nhag' lam: myan myan za: daui: na: li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re nao wa ngo re shid: ra" movo: mug: mae shapye' to: nae" mangad: . Nao wa kyid: ra" ni" daui daui yaug re lab khug mae bab: jo, nhao nae" mangad: ngad: ra" .
Nao wa ngo re kao so' daui: ru khyo joe" ye" ra" khyodang ceim" shid' byid' ava" . Nao wa ngo we' daga" na: ruyang ngo re ngaui bau: nhao: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Suhau: qi" ra" ngonhaung" phug' pho" kho: kham Davi khyo re de: de: za: ta" kyo: geli"- Yao: wa shid: byaug mung: yao: re naonhaung" nyhab' shaung: pye' avako" . Yao" lab wa ana" ba joe" sho' ce: ngonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae yao: jo; ra" .
Yao: wa lapa ngad mung:- Mao" So: yang yao: re dao: so: byid' to" rure yao: ba: ra" . Mao" So wa Davi kho: kham we' dakhyo:- Kho: kham kad' nae" yao" kaung mae" kho: kham thug' li" nhao nae"- ga: jham tang" to" ra" .
Davi wa joe" lo nae" ba na mae Mao" So pe" kad' nae" rure ba: to: mung:- Meshia shid: ru mae" dam: daui: to" li" nae" ra" khyo re Davi ta" ru wa- Yao: wa shid: ra" movo: mug: mae shapye' to: maqhug' ngad: ra"- Yao" gaung khyao re lab khug mae mabab: lo" nhao ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mao" So wa ai: Yesu re yao: daui: to" li" nhao: ava"- amung: ngonhaung" wa ce: khyo we' sin: yang: sagse: qe ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Yao: Pho" Mao" So: lo,yo shad' mae zaung: jo, nae" tau: to' ke' ru qhug' mung: yao: pho" yang dao: so: byid' to: va" ru we' dakhyo:- yao: pho" mae" Gyang" Lho" Byo qo" khae: yu: ava" . Ana" ngonhaung" myao: ru we' the" gyo" ra" ai: gyang" lho" byo re yao: wa ngonhaung" dao mae vhe" sheim: byid' ava" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Davi wa mug: gaung khyo mado, lo" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Davi wa-
Ni" gye qere ni" khyid zab tao" khyo"- ni" khyid qao: mae ngo mato: byid: byid: wa- nga" lo,yo shad' mae zaung: jo, wa, ga:- ai: Asang wa nga" Asang re ta" ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" yang pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' ko" ra" ai: Yesu wa Mao" So: yang Asang we' Meshia khyo" san: to: va" yaug ngad: rure Israel byumyu" alhab' geim" khyag' za: ba: yu ge, wo"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mo,byu qe wa ai: dao: re the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam: nhag' lam: mae qi: sho' gyo" zao" gemung:- Petru we' lagyo: gaje qere- Mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" pe" ru: kad' bam nae" i? ga: ta" ako" .
Petru wa yao: bam re- Naonhaung" alhab' mo, myid tha" pye' ge,- naonhaung" qobo jham khyad' pye' byid' ru qhug' genae" qhid' mae" Yesu Khristu mang mae naonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" qid nyhab' kham: yu ge, . Airu: lao"- Mao" So: jhaung qhu" Gyang" Lho" Byo re naonhaung" qo" khae: yu: li" genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Gyang" Lho" Byo byid: nae" ga" ra" Mao" So: dao: so: wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" re:- naonhaung" nho: myid: zo: qe: qhid' mae" re:- va: mae na ko" ra" ngonhaung" Asang Mao" So yao" yang khai: yu: ra" mo, alhab' qhid' mae" re: byid' to" ra" .
