Ailao" Petru wa gatau: dao: thoe myo: sho' we' yao: bam re ta" peim: ta" kyang: byid: zo" re"- naonhaung" wa ce: makhyang" ra" byu qe: dao mae joe" li" na: ra" qobo dae mae" loe; beim ge,- ga: ta" peim: byid' ra" .
Mo,byu qemae" myo: sho' mo, wa Petru kho" kyo" ra" mungdao: re lam" yang: Qid nyhab' kham yu gemung:- ai: ba na mae lam khug: ra" mo, sam taung ai: phaung mae laung" lo: ako" .
Yao: bam wa lagyo: qe: dao: re zhao: yu- daga" za: bozam" khug: na- mug khyoe' phai" ra" khyo re kad'- daga" za: akyu" mho' mung:- yo, khyin: ba na re gan: lo" nhao: ako" .
Lagyo: qe khyo" yang mug' pho: ve,lho jham we' mug' pho: mau" zo" jham re myo: sho' qhu" byid' ruyang byu yaug khao: ngo" wa gyaug: mug' byaug: ako" .
Lam khug: ra" mo, wa daga" za: zam" khug: na mung:- yao: bam qo" ra" zai jham re daga" za: jho" ceim" myho" ci yang: na: ako" .
Yao: bam wa yao: bam: jo, nho" zai yo jham re aung" pye' mung:- ai: ngaui re khoyaug khoru: qo ca" rure cao" yang: yao: bam yao: cao: jho" byid' ako" .
Yao: bam wa ba khao: ba ngo" Caung: pa" Yham mae ham: phaung yang: yao: bam yao" yham khug mae mug khyoe' phai" mung:- nyham: khyo" ra" nhag' lam: we' ngaui bau: ngaui lho" daga" za: zo: ve zo" ako" .
Yao: bam wa Mao" So re caung: khin" byid: mung:- byu alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae nga: ye; ako" . Asang wa khyad' yu: ru qhug' ra" mo, re ba khao: ba ngo" yao: bam: phung: mae laung: byid' ra" .
Daba re Petru we' Yohan wa myi" thao sam yo, qug mae" akyu" mho' yo, khyin: mae Caung: pa" Yham khyo ye" lo" ako" .
Yaung" Lho" ga: mhang" ra" Kham: Dung: mae khau: mae" khyid qeim: ra" byu dayaug na: ra" . Ai: khyid qeim re Caung: pa" Yham khyo vao ye" lo" ra" mo, mae" ngaui mho' zo: shao: ga: ba khao: ngo" ai: kham: dung: mae yedao: nha: to: to: kad' ako" .
Ai: khyid qeim wa Petru we' Yohan- Caung: pa" Yham khyo vao li" rure myao lao"- yao: shid' zo: re ngaui mho' ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa ai: khyid qeim yaug re zhaug' qu" mung: Petru wa- Nga" shid' zo: re qu" la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: ai: khyid qeim yaug wa yao: shid' zo: mae" ngaui kye' ngaui thao the' nae" laug ga: myid mung: yao: shid' zo: re qu" ra" .
Petru wa yao: re- Ngo wa ngaui dakye' re: maqo"- ngad qere: ngo qo" ja: nao re ngo byid: nae"- Nazared mae" Yesu Khristu mang we' ngo nao re amyin" byid' ra"- To" ye, mung: khyo su: wa, ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Petru wa ai: khyid qeim yaug: lo, yo lo, mae zaui: yang: she: to" ke' ra" . Ailao" jao"- ai: khyid qeim yaug: khyid we' khyid myo; qam: bo: li" mung:
yao: wa byae: to" yang:- yao: yao: za: ye, mung: khyo su" qu" ra" . Ai: thao re yao: wa thug' jhu: mung: Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" zo" re" lagyo: shid' zo: we' daga" Caung: pa" Yham khyo vao ye" lo" ra" .
Ai: tau mae na: ra" mo, byu qe wa- yao: airu: Mao" So re caung: khin" byid: yang: su" ye" lo" rure myao: ako" .
Amung: yao: bam wa- yao: re Yaung" Lho" Kham: Dung: mae zaung: jo, yang:- lhaung" mho' zo" na: ra" yaug ngad: rure qu" se" gemung:- yao: mae boe" ra" mau" zo" re yao: bam alhab' mo, mug' hao" byaug: ako" .
Ai: yaug wa Sholamon Zaung Yham ga: mhang" ra" zaung yham mae Petru we' Yohan shid' zo: na shi" au:- mo,byu qe wa yao: bam jhao" ai: zaung yham khyo tao" ye" lo" ako" .
Petru wa mo,byu qere myao lao"- Israel mao: nhaung: qe we"- Naonhaung" pe" mung: ceru: mug' ko" i? Naonhaung" pe" mung: nga" shid' zo: re zhaug' qu" ko" i? Ceyaug re khyo qo" su" li" nhao: ru wa nga" shid' zo: yao" qam: so' khyo" yang mangad:- nga" shid' zo" nho: Mao" So: khyo re phug' cao" ra" qam: so' khyo" yang ngad: ein: naonhaung" jho ko" i? .
Abraham- Isag we' Yaku nho: Mao" So ngad: ra" ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe: Mao" So wa yao" Daui Daui Yaug Yesu re phungbao byid' to" ava" . Ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa yao: re kheim: so' qo" ra" mo; lo, khug khyo ab byid' pye' gemung:- Pilad wa yao: re lhoe' ke' nae" bin: myid: phyid' to: thao re lhao" re:- naonhaung" wa Pilad qhid' kheim: mae yao: re ngag: ha: pye' ako" .
Yao: wa gyang" lho" ru we' gai: ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Amung: naonhaung" wa yao: re ngag: ha: pye' ako" . Ai: byu se' ra" yaug re lhoe' ke' byid: nae" Pilad re naonhaung" mho' ako" .
Naonhaung" wa kao so' asang yaug re se' pye' ako" . Ngadqere: Mao" So wa shid: ru mae" yao: re daui: to" li" nhao: ava" . Ngonhaung" wa cera" sagse: ngad va" .
Ai: yao" mang qam: so' we' ce: khyid qeim yaug re qam: ke' byid' ava" . Yao" mang re lam khug: ra" khyo" yang naonhaung" myao: ru we' ba: ra" khyo" boe" va" ra" . Naonhaung" the' myao: ru we' dakhyo: ai: Yesu re lam khug: ra" myid wa ce: khyid qeim yaug re nyang" za: gai: lo" nhao: ava" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Naonhaung" we' naonhaung" au: jhaung qe Yesu re kad' lai: lo: ra" mau" wa- maba mabeim: yang: ngad: rure ngo ba va" .
Mao" So yao" yang san: to" ra" Meshia wa dayin dayo: qug: khai: kham zo: ca" nae" ga:- Mao" So wa ganhae" mae" lapa qe alhab' mo; nhad' dao: thoe khyo" yang ta" hau" to: gau ngad: ra" . Amung: Mao" So wa ai: lapa dao: re ceru: boe" ra" khyo" yang jab byang" li" nhao: ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" myid tha" ge,- Mao" So jhao" lhang: lo geri:- ailao" yao: wa naonhaung" qobo re khyad' pye' byid' li" nae" .
Naonhaung" airu: kad' ko" re wa- Asang mae" byo: qam: so' joe" li" nae" yo, khyin: joe" li" mung:- Asang wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" khyin: to: byid: gau ngad: ra" Meshia ga" ra" Yesu re nhao byid' li" nae" .
Mao" So wa daba: pyad mae" yao" gyang" lho" ra" lapa qe: nhad' dao: thoe khyo" yang ta" to" ru we' dakhyo:- ja: khao: ngo" alhab' asag' dam: kad' ra" yo, majoe" joe" wa- yao: wa mug: gaung dao mae na: jo, ca" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Moshe wa- naonhaung" nho: Asang Mao" So wa ngo re nhao: ke' ru we' dakhyo:- lapa dayaug naonhaung" re nhao: ke' byid' li" nae" . Amung: yao: ta" ra" mung dao: alhab' re naonhaung" phug' cao" ca" genae" .
Ai: lapa ta" ra" mung dao: re maphug' cao" ra" yaug wa Mao" So: byumyu" mae" kho' khyo" pye' ru qhug' mung:- phyo' qheim" pye' ru qhug' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- Samuela we' yao" thao re thug' li" ra" Mao" So mae" mungdao: qo" ko" ra" lapa qe alhab' mo, re: ce: ba na mae boe" na: ra" khyo jham re lapa pa: lai: lo: avako" .
Ai: lapa qe: nhad' dao: thoe khyo" yang byid' to" ra" Mao" So: dao: so: jham wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa naonhaung" phug' pho" qe we' to" to" ra" dao: thang" mae bobo: ra" mo, re: ngad: ako" . Mao" So wa Abraham re- Ngo wa ni" myid: zo: qe khyo" yang myidgaung xao su byu alhab' re shaman" byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" re makhyang" ra" lo, mau" jham mae" dam: tug' lo nhao: ra" khyo" yang naonhaung" re shaman" byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa yao" daui daui yaug re daui: to" li" nhao mung: naonhaung" jhao" yao: re sao qhid' nhao: ke' byid: va" ra"- ga: kho" kyo" ra" .
Petru we' Yohan wa mo,byu qere airu: kho" kyo" na shiko" au: khinjaung qe daqhae:- Caung: pa" Yham gug: gam zug: qe we' Saduke qe joe" li" ako" .
Lagyo: shid' zo: wa mo,byu qere- Yesu shid: ru mae" dam: daui: to" li" va" ra" khyo mho" shid' na: ako" . Airu wa shid: byaug va" ra" mo, dam: daui: li" nae" ga" ra" dao:- dang: rure sagse: kham byid' ru boe" yang: yao: bam nhag' yo" ako" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa lagyo: shid' zo: re taung" yu: ako" . Ngadqere: mug: cad' lo" na: ruyang thao: ba ne, seim joe" sho' lagyo: shid' zo: re thaung: khug mae lhaung" to" ako" .
Ngadqere: mungdao: re the' gyo" ra" mo, myo: sho' wa lam" ako" . Amung: lam khug: ra" mo, ngo" taung ko myo" laug: li" ra" .
Thao: ba re Yuda au: jhaung qe lau: de, qe we' jham: tung" pho" qe wa Yerusalem mae zang" ham: ako" .
Yao: bam wa khinjaung yin" Anna we' Kayapha- Yohan- Alexanda we' gatau Khinjaung Yin" dinkhu: khug mae bobo ko" ra" mo, we' jho" qham: ako" .
Yao: bam wa lagyo: shid' zo: re yao: bam: qhid' kheim: mae yhe' to: mung:- Ni" shid' zo: wa ceru re ni" shid' zo: khoru: kad' ko" i?- Pe" ja" qam: so'- khag' mang khyo" yang ceru: kad' ko" i? ga: myid' ako" .
Ailao" Petru wa- Gyang" Lho" Byo byang" jo, mung:- yao: bam re mo,byu qe: au: jhaung qe we' lau: de, qe we"-
Khyid qeim yaug re gai kad' byid' ra" khyo we' yao: khoru: gai: shao: lo" byaug: ra" khyo we' sin: yang: nga" shid' zo: myid' ca: qu" ru qhug' ngad: re wa-
naonhaung"- yao: re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' mung:- Mao" So: yang shid: ru mae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ra" ai: Nazared mae" Yesu Khristu mang qam: so' khyo" yang ai: khyid qeim wa nyang" za: gai: shao: lo" byaug mung: cetau naonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae ye; jo; rure naonhaung" alhab' mo, we'- Israel byumyu" qe alhab' ba: yu ge, .
Yesu wa naonhaung" yham zhaug' mo, khyin: shalhaui" pye' ra" laug baui wa je: akhyag: thao" ra" laug baui boe" lo: ra"- ga: jham: mugsug' mae ta" to" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Khyad' yu: ru wa yao: dayaug khyo" yang za: gai: qo" yu: ra" . Mug: myid geim" mae yao: mae" je yang: ngonhaung" re qo" khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So byid' to" ra" yaug gaje khag' re: mana ngad: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Yuda tarha" qe,do, mae bobo: ra" mo, wa- Petru we' Yohan shid' zo" nho: vae" ra" myid re myao mung: yao: shid' zo: wa pha,jhi" mabo: ra" yu" yu" byu za: ngad ko" rure ba geyang: mug' hao" byaug: ako" . Ai: thao re yao: bam wa Petru we' Yohan shid' zo: wa qhid' phyao: Yesu byin zam" qe ngad: rure myid: beim" ako" .
Ngadqere: khyid gai: lo" byaug: ra" yaug wa Petru- Yohan we' daga" ai: tau mae ye; jo; rure myao geyang: yao: bam pe" dakheim: re: maqo" ta" ko" ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa yao: shid' zo: re tarha" qe, do, mae" thug' lo" nhao mung: yao: bam yao: cao: byin phyo: jho" qham: ako" .
Ceshid' zo: re ngonhaung" pe" ru: kad' zai i?- Yao: shid' zo" yang mug' pho: ve, lho qi: sho' boe" va" rure Yerusalem vogaung: mae" mo, yaug khao: ngo" ba: ako" . Ngonhaung" aire maqo" ha: pye' lo: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: mo,byu qe: phaung khyo ce: lau dao: je yang: mabyo: lo" vashao: ai shid' zo: re Yesu mang lao: yang: khonhae" re: khag' rere: madam: ta" genae" qhid' mae" ta" peim: gelang:- ga: ta" to" ako" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa lagyo: shid' zo: re dam: khai: vhao" yu mung: Yesu mang lao: yang: pe" re: data"- pe" re: damho" shid' ge, ga: yao: shid' zo: re ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Petru we' Yohan wa yao: bam re- Mao" So: mho dao: re gyo: zai i? Mangad: lao" naonhaung" mho dao: re gyo: zai i? Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae kholam: jo: rure naonhaung" yao: yao: dao: phyid' ge,
pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa- ngonhaung" yao: the' myao va" ru we' the' gyo" yu: ra" khyo jham re mata" lo: maqo" na- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Aimung: Yuda tarha" qe, do, mae" mo, wa- yao: shid' zo: re je: yang: qao: ra" khyo" ta" peim: yang: nhao: ke' ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re mo, byu qe alhab' mo, wa boe" lai: lo: ra" khyo mathao mae Mao" So re caung: khin" byid' na ko" ruyang- yao: bam wa lagyo: shid' zo: re qobo dae byid: nae" magai: boe" rure ba: qu" ako" .
Ce: mug' pho: ve, lho boe" yang: gai shao: lo" ra" yaug: apyad wa byid xe zin je ngad: ava" .
Petru we' Yohan wa yao: shid' zo: re nhao: ke' ge we'- yao: bam: phaung khyo dam: tug' lo mung:- khinjaung qi: qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qe yao: shid' zo: re ta" ke' ra" dao: jham re yao: bam re lodam: ta" kyo" ako" .
Lam khug: ra" mo, wa ai re the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam wa nhag' lam: dadang: za: qhan: mung: akyu" mho' ko" ru wa- Mug: gaung myid gaung qid mung" panglai: we' ai: gu: mae na: ra"- jo; ra" gu: alhab' re phan" phaug' to: yaug Asang we"-
Nao wa ni" jeim pho" ngad: ra" ngonhaung" phug' pho" Davi nhad' dao: thoe khyo" Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang ta" ra" au:- Taung bug byumyu" qe wa pe" mung: nhag' jam: yo" na ko" i? Byumyu" alhab' pe" mung: akeim mae pha,jhi" khug' khyug' na: ako" i?
Asang we' yao" yang nhao: ke' ra" Meshia re gye kad' nae" qhid' mae" Myidgaung kho: kham qe seim" nyhang" to: mung: Zug: ade, qe daga" za: zang" ham: na: ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- gaigai: yao:- Herod we' Pontu Pilad wa- Taung bug byu qe we' re:- Israel byu qe we' re:- Nao: yang xau gyad yang: san: to" ra" Meshia Ni" Gyang" Lho" ra" daui daui yaug Yesu re gye kad' nae" qhid' mae" ce: vomo" khug mae jho" qham: avako" .
Yao: bam wa ni" qam: so' we' ni" myid o: ra" khyo" myid: phyid' to: gau ngad: ra" boe" li" ca" ra" mau" zo" jham ja: khao: ngo" re kad' nae" qhid' mae" airu: zang" ham: ru ngad: avako" .
Asang we"- ana" yao: bam kyaug' tin" ra" khyo re qu" beim: byid: la,- amung: ni" daui daui mo, re mazag mavae lo: ni" mungdao: re kho" kyo: nhao byid: la, .
No gai byid: nae" qhid' mae" ni" lo, yheim" thug' ke' wa, Ni" Gyang" Lho" ra" daui daui yaug Yesu mang khyo" yang mug' pho: we' mug' pho: ve, lho jham boe" thug' li" nhao wa,- ga: mho' ako" .
Yao: bam akyu" bin: mho' gelao" yao: bam phaung: na: ra" jo, qo wa laui" nan" li" ra" . Yao: bam alhab' mo, wa Gyang" Lho" Byo we' byang" mung:- Mao" So: mungdao: re vae" vae" za: ta" hau" ako" .
Lam khug: ra" mo, wa myid aung khug nhag' lam: dakhe' za: ngad: ako" . Khag' re: yao: bam sang: ra" jo, nho" re nga" mae" ngad: ga: mata" gelo:- yao: bam qo" ra" gu: alhab' re daga" za: qhan" ci: ako" .
Lagyo: qe wa Yesu dam: daui: to" li" ra" khyo re qam: so' qi: we' sagse: kham: ako" . Mao" So wa yao: bam alhab' mo; dao mae shaman" jeju vhe' sheim: byid' ra" .
Yao: bam: phung: mae qo ca" ru khag' re: mana ko" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re- yokhyao: yomyid qo" ra" mo, mangad: lao"- yham qo" ra" mo, wa aung" pye' mung: qo" aung" ra" ngaui re cili" mung:- lagyo: qe: lo, khug mae li" ab byid' ako" .
Lagyo: qe wa ai: ngaui jham re- yaug khao: ngo" re yao: bam: qo ca" rure cao" yang: gae byid' ako" .
Alao"- lagyo: qeyang Banaba ga: mhang" ra" ( Banaba ga" ru wa qam: byid: yaug ga" ru ngad: ra" ) Kupru qid gyo: mung" mae khau: ra" Levi amyu" Yoseb wa-
yao: qo" ra" yo myid gaung re aung: mung: qo" aung" ra" ngaui jham re lagyo: qejhao" cili" mung: qhaug' byid' ra" .
Anania ga: mang: ra" byu dayaug we' yao" yham sang myhi" Saphira wa yao: shid' zo: sang: ra" yo myid gaung daqhae: re aung" pye' ako" .
Ngadqere: yao" yham sang myhi" nho: myid vang" ru we' yo phug' ngaui mae" damyo" re yao: yao" qhid' mae" myho" to: yang: dang: ra" gu: re lagyo: qe: lo, khug khyo yeqhaug' byid' ra" .
Petru wa Anania we"- Nao wa yo myid gaung phug' ngaui daqhae: re myho" to" ra" khyo" yang Gyang: Lho" Byo re mhug' ava" . Ni" gaung pe" mung: Satan re eib nhao: i?
Ai: yo myid gaung wa maaung: shi" rere: aire nao sang: ra" . Aung" pye' thao rere: ai: yo myid gaung phug' ngaui wa ni" ngaui ngad: ra" . Ai re nao pe" mung: airu: kad' nae" myid: phyid' i? Nao wa byu re mhug' ru mangad:- Mao" So re mhug' ru ngad: ra"- ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Anania wa ce: dao: re the' gyo: we' dalhang: dae shid: lang" lo" ra" . Ai: khyo re the' gyo" ra" mo, alhab' wa gyai gyo" gyaug: ako" .
Zolau: qe li" yang: Anania mao gaung re pin: dau: yang thab' mung: taung gaung khyo dao: thug' lo" mung: yenyhab' pye' ako" .
Sam yo, qug ko kyo thao re Anania yham sang myhi" wa pe" boe" va" rure maba lo: joe" vao li" ra" .
Ailao" Petru wa ni" shid' tao yo myid gaung aung" ra" ngaui cegu: alhab' ngad va" i? Ngo re ta" kyo: la,- ga: yao: re lham: myid' ra" . Alao" yao: wa ngad va"- aigu: alhab' ngad va"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Airumung: Petru wa Ni" yham sang pho" we' ni" shid' zo: wa Mao" So: Byo re jham" qu" nae" qhid' mae" pe" mung: myid jho" vang" yang: myid: phyid' ko" i? Ni" yham sang pho" re yedao: nyhab' pye' ko" ra" mo, wa ana" kham: dung: nhad' mae joe" lo: avako" . Yao: bam wa nao rere: taung gaung khyo dao: thug' lo" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" jao" ai: myiqe: wa Petru khyid qao: mae shid: lang" lo" ra" . Zolau: qe joe" vao lo: re- ai: myiqe: myhi" shid: jo; rure lomyao mung:- yao: bam wa ai: myiqe: myhi" mao gaung re taung gaung khyo vo; thug' lo" mung: yham sang pho" nhae mae yenyhab' pye' ako" .
Ai: phung: geim" we' ai: khyo re the' gyo" ra" mo, wa gyai gyo" gyaug: ako" .
Lagyo: qe: lo, khyo" yang mo,byu qe: phaung mae mug' pho: ve, lho jham myo: sho' we' mug' pho: mau" jham myo: sho' kad' qhu" ako" . Lam khug: ra" mo, alhab' wa- Sholamon zaung yham mae daga" za: ham: phaung: na: ako" .
Mo,byu qe yao: bam re gyai khin" ta" gesho' ngad yang: re:- gaje qe wa khag' re: yao: bam we' mavae" zam" ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So re lam khug: ra" yauggai- myiqe: qe wa ai: phaung mae je yang: laung" li" ra" .
Petru su" lai: lo" re no phyo: qo" mo, damyo" mae yao" bao qab khalhao" qab: zao" vashao: ga:- no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, re hau" mo" khyodang jham khyo dao: thug' li" mung:- yab qo jham phaung: thin jham: dao mae li" lhang" to" ako" . Yao: bam airu: kad' ko" ru wa lagyo: qe kad' ra" lo, mau" gai jham: nho: ashi: ngad: ra" .
Yerusalem lhang" gam: vogaung: jham mae" mo,byu qere: no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, makhyang" ra" yui zaung: ra" mo, re jhui" li" ako" . Yao: bam alhab' mo, gai shao: lo" byaug: ako" .
Ailao"- Khinjaung Yin" we' yao" byin zam" qe ngad: ra" Saduke phung: qe wa lagyo: qere gyai myid nug' li" mung:- yao: bam wa lagyo: qere akhyag yu nae" myid: phyid' ako" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa lagyo: qere taung" yu mung: thaung: khug mae lhaung" to" ako" .
Ngadqere: ai: myi re Asang: nho: mug: lagyo: dayaug wa thaung: kham: dung: jham re phung" pye' yang:- lagyo: qere taung gaung shad' khyo jhui" thug' lo" mung:-
Naonhaung" ye" lo" ge,- Caung: pa" Yham mae yeye; jo, yang: ce: kao so' daui: ra" khyo asag' khyo alhab' re mo,byu qere ta" kyo: ge, ga:- yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Lagyo: qere: mho dao: gyo: mung:- yao: bam wa ne, kao mug: bo" zo" re Caung: pa" Yham khyo vao ye: yang: mho" shid' byid' ako" . Khinjaung Yin" we' yao" nho: byin zam" cao: qe wa Yuda tarha" qe, do, zabphaung kad' nae" qhid' mae" Yuda au: jhaung lau: de, qere khai: zhang" to" ako" . Ai: thao yao: bam wa- lagyo: qere yao: bam: qhid' kheim: khyo jhui" vao li" nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid: yang: thaung: khyo nhao: ke' ako" .
Ngadqere: gug: gam gyezug: qe joe" ye: ko" re- yao: bam wa thaung: khug mae lagyo: qere maye: myao gelao" tarha" qe, do, phung: khyo dam: tug' lo mung:-
Ngonhaung" thaung: khyo joe" ye" re- thaung: kham: dung: wa tang tang za: pyid' to" ru we' zaung" mo, re: kham: dung: re nyang" za: zaung" na ko" rure ngonhaung" yemyao:- ngadqere: ngonhaung" thaung: kham: re yephung" ke' re akhug mae khag' rere: mathe' myao- ga: lau thoe lota" kyo" ako" .
Khin jaung qi: qe we' Caung: pa" Yham gug: gam gyezug: qe wa ce: dao: re the' gyo: gelao"- ce: lagyo: qe wa pe" boe" vako" laug i? ga: mug' ako" .
Ai: thao byu dayaug joe" li" mung:- Tae" gyo" qu" ge,- naonhaung" thaung: mae lhaung" to" ra" byu qe wa Caung: pa" Yham mae mo,byu qere mho" shid' na: ako"- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Alao" Caung: pa" Yham gug: gam zug: pho" wa yao" gyezo: qe we' thug' ye" lo" mung:- lagyo: qere yedam: jhui" tug' lo: ra" . Ngadqere: mo,byu qe yao: bam re laug baui: yang pye' genae" rure gyaug gemung: lagyo: qere maqad maqui" makad' ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa Lagyo: qere jhui" vao li" mung:- Tarha" qe, do, phung: qe: qhid' kheim: mae ye; jo, nhao: ako" . Khinjaung Yin" pho" wa lagyo: qere dao: myid: jham myid' ra" .
Yao: wa- aiyaug: mang re lao: yang: naonhaung" pe" re: mamho" shid' nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re ngonhaung" jhaug' za: amyin" byid' to: va"- ngadqere: qu" ge,- Naonhaung" wa Yerusalem vogaung: geim" mae naonhaung" mho" shid' ra" khyo za: byang" sho' kad' to" avako" . Amung: naonhaung" wa yao: shid: ra" xao qug: ngonhaung" au: dao mae vhin nug: ako"- ga: lagyo: qere ta" ra" .
Petru we' lagyo: qe wa- Ngonhaung" wa byu: mho dao: re tho' Mao" So: mho dao: re je: gyo: ca"- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe: Mao" So wa naonhaung" yang pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' ra" Yesu re shid: ru mae" daui: to" li" nhao: ava" .
Israel byumyu" re myid tha" nae" we' yao: bam: qobo khyad' pye' byid' ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa yao: re khyad' yu yaug we' au: jhaung khyo" yao" lo, yo shad' mae tau: to' to" ava" .
Ai: khyo jham we' sin: mung: ngonhaung" wa sagse: qe ngad: ra" . Mao" So: mung dao: re phug' cao" ra" mo, re byid' ra" Mao" So: jhaung qhu" Gyang" Lho" Byo re: sagse: ngad: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Tarha" qe, do, phung: mae" mo, cedao: re the' gyo: gelao"- gyai nhag' gyo" yo: gemung:- yao: bam wa lagyo: qere se' pye' nug: ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam mae" mo,byu qe alhab' mo; yang phug' myao" ra" jham: tung" pho" Gamale ga: mang: ra" Pharishe dayaug wa tarha" qe, do, phung: mae" to" ye; li" mung:-
Lagyo: qere taung gaung shad' khyo jhui" thug' lo" nae" amyin" byid' ke' yang:- Tarha" qe, do, phung: mae" mo, re- Israel mao: nhaung qe we"- cebam re naonhaung" pe" ru: kad' nae" rure lha" yang: kad' ge, .
Pe"mung: ga"re qhid' phyao: mataung" myao" shire Thuda ga: mang: ra" yaug wa yao: yao" gaung re au: jhaung qi: dayaug ngad: ga: ta" mung:- thug' li" ra" au:- byu byid yo ko yao" thao cao" ako" . Ngadqere: yao: re se' pye' thao re yao" thao cao" ra" mo, wa dayaug dakhyo byo: sin" lo" byaug gemung: yao" mau" zo" baui" lo" byaug: ra" .
Ai: thao re gae gaung: japhin: re gaug: yu: ra" yo, gyo: mae Galile byu Yuda thug' li" mung:- mo,byu qere yao" thao cao" genae" qhid' mae" poe: ra" . Yao: re: se' pye' ru qhug' mung: yao" thao cao" ra" mo, wa dayaug dakhyo byo: sin" lo" byaug: ako" .
Airu: mung: naonhaung" re ngo ta" geli"- cebam re naonhaung" akhyag dayu ge, . Yao: bam re sae za: qu" to: ge,- yao: bam yaung: to" ru we' kad' ra" mau" zo" wa xao su byu qemae" qhid: ru ngad: re wa ai wa baui" lo" byaug: li" nae" .
Ngadqere: ai: gu: wa Mao" So mae" ngad: re wa naonhaung" yao: bam re maqo" gai: aung: pye' genae" . Naonhaung" wa Mao" So re gye kad' ru doe; li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" . Yuda tarha" qe, do, phung: mae" mo, wa Gamale nho: pha,jhi" byid' rure khae: yu: ako" .
Yao: bam wa lagyo: qere khai: vhao" yu mung: yao: bam re be, yang:- Yesu mang re lao: mung: khonhae" re: dadam: kho" kyo: ge, ga: yao: bam re amyin" byid' ako" . Ai: thao re yao: bam wa lagyo: qere nhao: ke' ako" .
Lagyo: qe wa Yesu mathao mae qho' phyo' rure kham zo: nae" man" ra" mo, khyo" Mao" So wa yao: bam re sun" yu byid: va" ruyang yao: bam wa ngaui bau" ru we' Yuda tarha" qe,do, mae" thug' lo" ako" .
Ba khao: ba ngo" Caung: pa" Yham mae re: mo, byu qe: yham mae re: yao: bam wa Yesu wa Meshia ngad: ga" ra" Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: gai re xo' yang: mho" shid' kho" kyo: byid' ako" .
Ai: thao mataung" myao" re mho"zo: qe wa myo" laug: li" mung:- Heleni myan" jhau: ra" Yuda qe we' Yuda myan" jhau: ra" Yuda qe: agyo: mae myan" myo: nae" thug' li" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Heleni myan" jhau: ra" Yuda qe wa- yao: bam: cug' mo" myhi" qere ba khao: ngo" gae byid' ra" zao: kho ngaui o" sho' magae byid: ko"- ga: ta" ako" .
Airumung: lagyo: qe daxe: shid' yaug wa lam khug: ra" mo, phung: geim" re khai: zhang" yu mung:- Ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: mung dao: re kho" kyo: nae" mau" zo" re qhui" to: mung: Alu ngaui zam: pyo byid' ra" mau" re zaui" ru wa majo ngad: ra" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- Airumung: Gyang" Lho" Byo byang" ru we' pha,jhi" bo: ra" byu nhad' yaug re naonhaung" phaung mae" khyin: yu ge,- ce: mau" zo" re asang kad' yang: zaui: nae" ngonhaung" yao: bam re san: to: nae" .
Ngonhaung" yao: kam" wa akyu" mho' ru we' kho" kyo" ra" mau" zo" vin vo; ru mae yo, byang" ayo, byid: zai ngad:- ga: ta" ako" .
Lam khug: ra" mo, phung: geim" wa lagyo: qe ta" rure gyo" ngaui: ako" . Ai mung: yao: bam wa lam khug: myid qi" ru we' Gyang" Lho" Byo byang" ra" Stephan ga" ra" yaug- Philib- Prokuru- Nikano- Timon- Parmena we' Nikola- bam re khyin: yu: ako" . Nikola wa Antioki vogaung: mae" Yuda caung: pa" thung" khug khyo" phaug' vao lo: ra" Taung bug byu ngad: ra" .
Phung: byu qe wa ai: khyin: yu: to" ra" mo, re lagyo: qe: qhid' kheim: mae nha: to" ako" . Lagyo: qe wa akyu" mho' mung: ai bam: dao mae lo, kai: byid' ako" .
Aimung: Mao" So: mungdao: wa xo' yang: xo' yang: hau" nhao" lo" ra" . Yerusalem mae" mho"zo: qe wa je: je: za: myo" laug: li" mung: khinjaung qi: qe myo: sho' re: lam khug: lo: ako" .
Stephan wa Mao" So: yang magan: mago" ra" shaman" jeju we' qam: so' byang" sho' byid' to: mung:- mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae mug' pho: ve, lho we' mug' pho: mau" zo" qi: sho' kad' qhu" byid' ra" .
Ngadqere: Alexanda we' Kureni vogaung: mae" Yuda byu qere: bobo: ra" loe; beim mo; tarha" jung yham phung: mae bobo: ra" mo, daqhae: wa Stephan re ngag: thaug' ako" . Yao: bam we' Kiliki- Asia mang: khaung: mae" Yuda qe damyo" wa Stephan we' jho" ta" ngag: ako" .
Ngadqere: Byo wa Stephan re pha,jhi" qi: byid' to" ruyang Stephan: jhau: ke' ra" dao: re yao: bam maqo" phaug' ko" ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa byu damyo" daqhae: re khug vag: byid: yang:- ceyaug wa Moshe rere: jung" gaui: ra" dao: jhau: na: ru ngonhaung" the' gyo: va"- ga: ta" nhao: ako" .
Airu: kad' mung: yao: bam wa mo, byu qe lau: de, au: jhaung qe we' Jham: tung" pho" qere lu" to" li" nhao: ako" . Yao: bam wa Stephan re taung" yu mung: tarha" qe, do, phung: qe: qhid' kheim: khyo jhui" yu: to" ako" .
Ai: thao re yao: bam wa Stephan nho: khyo rere: mhug' yang: sagse: kham: ta" nae" byu daqhae: rere: khai: to" ako" . Ai: sagse: qe wa byu ceyaug wa- ai: Gyang" Lho" ra" Caung: pa" Yham re we' Moshe Tarha" re khonhae" re: jung" gaui yang: ta" ra" .
Nazared mae" Yesu wa ai: Caung: pa" Yham re phyo' pye' mung: Moshe yang ngonhaung" re byid' to" ra" thung" tarha" alhab' re tha" pye' li" nae"- ga: ceyaug ta" rure ngonhaung" the' gyo: va"- ga: sagse: kham: ako" .
Tarha" qe, do, mae zaung: jo; ra" mo, alhab' Stephan re ceim" zhaug' qu" na ko" re- Stephan nho: myo,khung: wa mug: lagyo" nho: myo,khung: we' dau: rure myao: ako" .
Khinjaung Yin" wa Stephan re- Ce: qobo zhaug' ra" dao: gaigai: dang: i? ga: myid' ra" .
Ailao" Stephan wa- Mao: nhaung: qe we' nhag' bo qe we"- Tae" gyo" qu" ge,- ngonhaung" phug' pho" Abraham wa Haran vogaung: khyo maye: na shire Mesopotamia mung" mae na shi" au: phungbao qi" qhang: ra" Mao" So wa yao: re na: qhu" mung:-
Mao" So wa yao: re Ni" ba nam ug zo: ni" mung"dan: re to: co' mung:- nao re ngo ceim" shid' nae" ra" mung" khyo ye" lo" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai mung: Abraham wa yao" mung"dan: re to: co' mung:- Haran vogaung: mae yena: ra" . Abraham nho: yao: pho" shid thao re Mao" So wa- ana" naonhaung" na: jo; ra" ce: mung" khyo Abraham re zaug byaung" na nhao: ra" .
Ai: ayo, mae Mao" So wa Abraham re ai: mung"dan: mae" mug: myid re yao" sudgan jo,nho" khyo" dalo, maug qhi" lhao" re: mabyid: ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ai: mung"dan: re yao: re we' yao" myid: zo: qere byid: nae" ga:- Mao" So wa dao: so: byid' to" ra" . Mao" So ce: dao: so: re byid' ra" au: Abraham wa zo: dau dayaug re: maqo" ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa Abraham re- Ni" myid: zo: qe wa taungbug: mung" mae yena mung: jeim kad' ru qhug' ru we' zin lam: byid yo- dayin dayo: yhin" ru qhug' li" genae" .
Ngadqere:- yao: bam re jeim kad' nhao zo" ra" byumyu" qe: dao mae ngo dao: phyid' nae" . Ai: thao re yao: bam wa ai: mung"dan: mae" thug' lo" mung:- ce: jo, qo mae ngo re goe; pa" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re Mao" So wa- dao: thang" to" ra" aso: lho khyo" au: qid lhai" ra" khyo Abraham re byid' ra" . Airumung: Abraham wa Isag re khau thao she' ba ein: ba Isag re au: qid lhai: khyo kad' byid' ra"- Isag wa yao: zo: Yaku re- Yaku wa lahau: qi" ra" ngonhaung" byumyu" phug' pho" qe ngad: ra" yao: zo: daxe: shid' yaug re au: qid lhai: khyo kad' byid' ra" .
Yaku yao: zo: qe wa yao: bam: yao: nhaung: Yoseb re myid nug: gemung: Egutu mung" khyo jeim kad' nhao: nae" qhid' mae" Yoseb re aung" ke' ako" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So wa yao: we' daga" ngad mung:- yao: re qug khai: qug: khai: ru alhab' mae" loe, nhao: ra" . Mao" So wa Yoseb re Egutu kho: kham qhid' kheim: mae myo,nho nga: lao: qo" nhao: ru we' pha,jhi" byid: mung:- Egutu kho: kham wa Yoseb re mung"dan: geim" dao mae re: kho: kham kho" geim" rere: zug: kad' nhao: ra" .
Ailao" Egutu mung" we' Khanan mung" khaung: geim" mae bao" khug' qi: zang thug' li" mung:- qug: khai: qhug' ko" ra" . Ngonhaung" phug' pho" qere: zo: ve gan: byaug yang: zo: ve maqo" qho loko" ngad: ra" .
Yaku wa Egutu mung" mae gaug zo jo;- ga" ra" thoe re the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe ngad ko" ra" yao: zo: qere sao qhid' lhang Egutu mung" khyo nhao: ke' ra" .
Shid' lhang ein: lhang re Yoseb wa yao: mao: bam re yao: khag' ngad: rure ta" kyo" ra" . Alao" Egutu kho: kham pho" wa Yoseb yham byu qe: khyo re ba: li" ra" .
Aimung: Yoseb wa yao: pho" Yaku re- yham byu nhad' xe: ngo" yaug geim" alhab' Egutu mung" khyo zaug byaung" li" genae" qhid' mae" dao: pyang: ke' ra" .
Alao" Yaku wa Egutu mung" khyo yebyaung" na mung:- aimae yao: yao: we' yao: zo: qe yeshid: pye' ako" .
Yao: bam: mao gaung jham re Shekhem khyo dao: lo mung:- Hamo yao: zo: bam mae" Abraham ngaui byid: yang: vai: yu: ra" lab mae lonyhab' ako" .
Mao" So wa Abraham re byid' to" ra" dao: so: jab byang" nae" ba na joe" li" na lao"- Egutu mung" mae na: ra" ngonhaung" amyu" wa qi: sho' je" li" ko" ra" .
Lo" thao" mae Yoseb re maba mase" ra" kho: kham dayaug Egutu mung" mae kho: kham kad' ra" .
Ai: kho: kham pho" wa ngonhaung" phug' pho" qere pha,jhi" khyug' yang: yao: bam re yhin" ra" . Yao: bam: zonau" qere shid nae" qhid' mae" yham taung gaung khyo maqad maqui" yeshapye' to: nhao: ra" .
Ce: yo, mae gyai yaung" ra" zonau" Moshe wa khau: li" ra" . Yao: re yham mae lho" mo" sam khye' khau: to: mung:-
Moshe wa yao" yham mae" taung gaung khyo shapye' pye' ru qhug' lao" kho: kham myiqe: zo: wa yao: re yao: zo: khyo" khau: qhi" yu: ra" .
Aimung: Moshe wa Egutu byu qe: pha,jhi" alhab' re mho" zhao: yu mung: nhad' dao: thoe qam: lo, mau" bo: ra" yaug boe" li" ra" .
Moshe apyad byid xe zin ngad lao"- yao: wa yao" Israel mao: nhaung: qe khoru: qug: khai: qhug' na ko" rure qu" nae" qhid' mae" myid: phyid' ra" .
Yao: wa Israel byu dayaug re Egutu byu dayaug: yang yhin" na: rure yethe' myao mung: Egutu byu re yese' pye' yang: lage, bao" phaug' byid' ra" .
( Yao: bam Israel byumyu" qe: loe; beim nae" khyo mae Mao" So wa yao: re cili" nae"- ga" rure yao" byu qe ba: gyo: genae" ga:- Moshe myid: jho: ra" . Ngadqere: ai re yao: bam maba: gyo: ko" ngad: ra" . )
Ai: thao: ba re Israel byumyu" shid' zo: myan" myo: mung: jho" se' na ko" rure Moshe yemyao mung:- yao: shid' zo: re mo, byo, kao: yang:- tae" gyo" qu" ge,- ni" shid' zo: wa Israel mao: nhaung: yao: cao: angad: re pe" mung: airu: jho" se' na ko" i? ga: yeta" ra" .
Ngadqere: byin cao: pho" re mo, byo, o: lhaung: ra" yaug wa Moshe re deim" qhui" pye' mung:- nga" shid' zo" mau" re dao: kho' nae" qhid' mae" nao re khag' yang zug: we' Tarha" agyi kad' nhao: to" i?
Nao wa Egutu byu dayaug re ayenhe' se' pye' ru we' dakhyo: ngo rere: nao se' pye' nug: i? ga: Moshe re myid' ra" .
Moshe ce: dao: re the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa Egutu mung" mae" phao: thug' lo" mung:- Midian mung" mae yephao: na: ra" . Yao: wa ai: mung" mae yauggai zo: shid' yaug re myhung: ra" .
Zin lam: byid xe zin lai: lo" thao re Sina bam nhae din"pyad' yo mae myi: nga" na: ra" thao" paung" mae mug: lagyo: dayaug wa Moshe re na: qhu" byid' ra" .
Moshe wa ai re the' myao yang:- mug' hao" byaug mung: nyang" za: yequ" nae" ga: ai: thao" paung" khyo qui" ye" lo" ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: wa- Ngo wa naonhaung" phug' pho" qenho: Mao" So- Abraham nho: Mao" So Isag nho: Mao" So Yaku nho: Mao" So ngad: ga" ra" Asang: nho: thoe re yethe' gyo" ra" . Alao" Moshe wa gyaug: nin" mung: mavae" qu" ngad: ra" .
Asang wa yao: re- Ni" khyid zhaung: khyad' pye' wa,- pe"mung: ga"re nao ye; jo; ra" jo, qo wa gyang" lho" ra" myid gaung ngad: ra" .
Nga" byumyu" qe Egutu mung" mae dayin dayo: qug: khai: kham zo" na: rure ngo the' myao va"- ngo wa yao: bam: nokyang: thoe re the' gyo: va" . Aimung: yao: bam re khyad' yu nae" ein: ngo joe" li" ru ngad:- ana" li" wa, nao re ngo Egutu mung" khyo nhao: ke' nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Moshe wa Israel byumyu" qeyang ngag: ha: pye' va" byu dayaug ngad: ra" . Nao wa ngonhaung" dao mae agyi kad' nae" we' dao: kho' nae" tarha" zug: khag' yang kad' nhao: to" ra" i? ga: yao: bam yao: re myid' ako" . Moshe wa myi: nga" na: ra" thao" paung" mae yao: re na: qhu" byid' ra" mug: lagyo" yang bao" thaug' byid' ru we' Israel byu qere eib nae" we' yao: bam re loe; beim nhao nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yang nhao: ke' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Egutu mung" mae re: tham: ne mae re:- din"pyad' yo mae re:- zin lam: byid xe mug' pho: ve, lho we' mug' pho: mau" jham kad' qhu" yang: Israel byumyu" qere Egutu mung" mae" jhui" thug' lo" ra" .
Moshe wa- Mao" So wa ngo re nhao: ke' ru we' dakhyo: lapa dayaug re naonhaung" jhao" nhao: ke' byid' li" nae" . Yao: wa naonhaung" yao" byumyu" mae" ngad: li" nae"- ga: Israel byumyu" qere ta" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa din"pyad' yo mae Israel byumyu" qe we' daga" ham: na yang: ai: mae ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe we' re: Sina bam dao mae yao: we' dao: jhau: ra" mug: lagyo: we' daga" na: lo yaug ngad mung: ngonhaung" re au: qid lhai: byid: nae" kao so' daui: ra" Mao" So: mung dao: re qo" khae: yu: ra" yaug re: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe wa yao" mho dao: re ngag: pye' ako" . Yao: bam wa Moshe re ngag: pye' mung: Egutu mung" khyo tug' lo" nug: ra" myid bo: ako" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa Arun re- Ngonhaung" re au: jhui" she nae" ra" so jham re ngonhaung" qhid' mae" kad' byid: la,- ngonhaung" re Egutu mung" mae" jhui" thug' lo: ra" Moshe ga" ra" yaug pe" boe" byaug: rure ngonhaung" maba lo:- ga: ta" ako" .
Amung: yao: bam wa- nung: jaung lo: lho dalam: sheim: mung:- Ai: sulho re zho: byid: yang: poe kad' caung: khin" byid' ako" .
Aimung: lapa qe: tung" paug' mae Israel byumyu" qe we"- Din" pyad' yo mae zin lam: byid xe geim" naonhaung" ngaui" xeim: gug' nyhug' jham se' yang: xeim: ngaui" byid: ko" ru wa ngo re byid' ru mangad: ko" ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" yao: goe; pa" nae" kad' to" ra" solho jham ngad: ra"- Moleg so phan we' naonhaung" nho: Rephan ga" ra" kyi solho re naonhaung" dao: qin" ako" . Amung: ngo wa naonhaung" re Babelon lai sho' taung" jhui" lo" nhao: ke' nae"- ga: tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: Mao" So yao: bam mae" myo,khung: phaug' lo" mung: mug: gaung mae" kyi jham re goe; pa" genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re shapye' pye' va"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe wa din"pyad' yo mae yao: bam we' daga" Mao" So bobo: rure sagse: qhu" byid' ra" Zaung re qo" yu: ako" . Moshe re Mao" So ta" ra" akhyao we' dakhyo:- ai: zaung re kad' ako" .
Thao re yao: bam: yao: pho" qemae" ai: zaung re xo' khae: yu: ra" ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe wa- Mao" So: yang khe' pye' ra" byumyu" qe: mung"dan: khyo Yoshu we' daga" vao ye" lo" ko" ra" au: re ai: zaung re dao: ye" lo" ako" . Ai: zaung wa Davi pyad joe" sho' ai: mung"dan: mae jo; jo; ra" .
Davi kho: kham wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae myo,nho qo" mung: Yaku nho: Mao" So na: jo, nae" jo, qo kad' nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So re akhang" lhaung" mho' ra" .
Mao" So: qhid' mae" yham kad' yaug wa Sholamon kho: kham angad: ra" .
Ngadqere: myhao: thao" ra" Mao" So wa byu: lo; yang kad' ra" yham khug mae mana ngad: ra" . Ai: khyo re lapa pho" wa Mug: gaung wa nga" zaung tao"-
ngad mung:- myid gaung wa nga" khyid zab tao" ngad: ra" . Nao nga" qhid' mae" pe" ru" ra" yham qo" kad' byid: nae" i? Nga" qhid' mae" na jo, qo khotau mae ngad: ra" i?
Ai: gu: alhab' re ngoyao: phan" to" mangad: i?- ga: Asang ta" ra"- ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Stephan wa xo' yang:- Naonhaung" nhag' lam: gyai qao: ako" . Naonhaung" nhag' lam: aung khug mae Mao" So mabo ko" ngad: ra" . Mao" So: mung dao: re mathe' gyo" ra" nojid mo, ngad: ako" . Naonhaung" wa naonhaung" phug' pho" qe we' dakhyo: Gyang" Lho" Byo re khonhae" re: ngag: pye' mo, ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" phug' pho" qeyang mayhin" qu" ra" lapa khoyaug na: ra" i? Yao: bam wa Mao" So: din: man" ra" daui daui yaug joe" lo nae" ga" rure ta" hau" kyo" ra" Mao" So: lagyo: qere se' pye' ako" . Ana" naonhaung" wa ai: yaug re ab byid' pye' mung: se' pye' avako" .
Naonhaung" wa mug: lagyo: qe: nhad' thoe khyo" yang Mao" So: tarha" re qo" khae: yu: ra" mo, ngad: ako" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" ai re maphug' cao" ko" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yuda Tarha" Qe, Do, Phung: mae" mo, wa ai: dao: re the' gyo: gelao" yao: bam nhag' lam: zab zab zhau: li" sho' gyo" yo: mung:- Stephan re zaui kyag' kyag' yang: zhaug' qu" na: bam: ako" .
Ngadqere: Stephan wa Gyang" Lho" Byo byang" jo, mung:- mug: gaung khyo tau: qu" ke' re Mao" So: phungbao we' Yesu wa Mao" So: lo, yo shad' mae ye; jo; rure myao: ra" .
Ailao" Stephan wa- Qu" ge, Mug: gaung bung" li" mung: Byu: Yao: Zo: wa Mao" So: lo, yo shad' mae ye; jo; rure ngo the' myao va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa zag: hug' mung: yao: bam yao" nokhye' re lo; yang jhid' pye' yang: alhab' mo, dalhang: dae Stephan jhao" tao" ye" lo" mung:-
Yao: re vogaung: taung gaung khyo deim" geim: thug' lo" mung: laug baui: yang yepye' ako" . Sagse: qe wa yao: bam: adao: bau: qhang jham re Sholu ga: mang: ra" Zolau: pho" re zam: nhao: ako" .
Yao: bam airu: Stephan re laug baui: yang pye' na ko" au:- Stephan wa Asang Yesu we"- Nga" byo re khae: yu byid: la, ga:- Asang re mho' yao: ra" .
Yao: wa pad' thaug' thaug' yang: thoe qi: we' Asang we"- yao: bam: qobo re daxam" to: byid: wa, wo"- ga: hug' ra" . Ce: dao: bin: ta" lao" Stephan kao gyo" lo" ra" .
Sholu wa Stephan re se' ru mae bomyid vang" ra" . Ai: ba mae Yerusalem mae na: ra" lam khug: ra" phung: byu qe wa dayin dayo: yhin" ru qi: sho' qhug' ako" . Lagyo: qemae" je yang: lam khug: ra" mo, alhab' wa Yuda mung" we' Samari mung" khaung: khyo gam: sho' phao: byo: sin" lo" ako" .
Lam khug: myid kao bau: ra" mo, daqhae: wa Stephan re yenyhab' shaung: pye' mung: yao" mathao mae gyai kaug' ngug: ako" .
Ngadqere: Sholu wa phung: re phyo' qheim" pye' nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' ra" . Yao: wa dayham bin dayham khyo cao" vao ye: mung:- lam khug: ra" mo, myiqe: yauggai alhab' re yeshe: khyad' thug' yu yang: yao: bam re thaung: mae lhaung" to" ra" .
Jo, qo khao: ngo" khyo byo: sin" lo" ra" lam khug: ra" mo, wa- joe" ra" jo, qo khao: ngo" mae mung dao: re cao" kho" kyo" ako" .
Philib wa Samari mung" mae" vomo" khyo ye: mung: ai: vobyu qere Meshia khyo we' sin: yang: yekho" kyo" ra" .
Mo, byu qe wa Philib ta" ra" dao: re tae" gyo: yang:- yao: kad' qhu" ra" mug' pho: ve, lho jham re myao gelao"- yao: bam wa nhag' lam: zaug zaug za: yao" mung dao: re tae" gyo" yu: ako" .
Makhyang" ra" yui jham wa mo, byu qe myo: sho' mae" gyi: hug' yang: phao: thug' lo" ko" ra" . Amung: gaung jam: shid mo, myo: sho' we' khyid qeim mo, myo: sho' mo, gai shao: lo" byaug: ako" .
Ai mung: vomo" khug mae" byu qe gyai ngaui bau" ako" .
Ai: vogaung: mae Simon ga: mang: ra" byu dayaug wa yao" vha" ra" pha,jhi" yang Samari byu qere mug' nhao: ra" .
Simon yao: yao" gaung re gyai boe" yaug ngad: ga: phug: ta" to: yang: byu angai aqi: alhab' mo, yao" dao: re nhag' lam: zaug zaug za: tae" gyo" ako" . Yao: wa qi" ra" qam: so' ga" ra" Mao" So: qam: so' qo" yaug ngad: ra" ga: yao: bam ta" ako" .
Yao: wa yao" vha" ra" pha,jhi" yang yao: bam re mug' nhao: lo: ru myao" va" ru: yang yao: bam wa airu: yao: re nhag' lam: zaug zaug za: tae" gyo" ako" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So: mung"dan: Lau Dao: Gai we' Yesu Khristu khyo we' sin: yang: Philib kho" kyo" ra" mung dao: re yao: bam lam" gemung:- yao: bam wa myiqe: yauggai alhab' mo, Qid nyhab' kham yu: ako" .
Simon yao: re: lam" mung: Qid nyhab' kham bin: kham: yu thao re Simon wa Philib thao cao" mung:- Philib kad' ra" mug' pho: ve, lho jham re we' mug' pho: mau" jham re the' myao lao"- yao: wa gyai mug' hao" byaug: ra" .
Yerusalem mae na: ra" lagyo: qe wa Samari byu qe Mao" So: mung dao: re khae: yu vako" ra" ga" ra" thoe re the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam wa Petru we' Yohan shid' zo: re yao: bam jhao" nhao: ke' ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: joe" ye: gelao:- lam khug: ra" mo, Gyang" Lho" Byo qo" khae: yu genae" qhid' mae" yao: shid' zo: wa yao: bam: qhid' mae" akyu" mho' byid' ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam dayaug: dao mae re: Gyang" Lho" Byo majoe" gyo" li" shi: ngad: ra" . Yao: bam wa Asang Yesu mang mae qid nyhab' kham: yu: to" ru shi" za: angad ko" ra" .
Aimung: Petru we' Yohan shid' zo: wa yao: bam: dao mae yao: shid' zo" lo, kai: byid: mung:- yao: bam wa Gyang" Lho" Byo qo" khae: yu: ako" .
Lagyo: shid' zo" lo, yao: bam: dao mae kai: byid: lao"- lam khug: ra" mo, Gyang" Lho" Byo qo" khae: yu ko" rure Simon the' myao lao"- yao: wa Petru we' Yohan shid' zo: re ngaui byid: mung:-
Nga" lo, kai: byid' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Gyang" Lho" Byo qo" khae: yu nae" qhid' mae" ai: qam: so' ngo rere: byid: gela, ga:- mho' ra" .
Ngadqere: Petru wa yao: re- Nao wa Mao" So: jhaung qhu" re ngaui: yang qo" vai nae" ga: myid: jho: na: ruyang- nao we' ni" ngaui wa myiqid tham: khyo vao ye: geshao: ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Ni" nhag' lam: wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae madin" ruyang ngonhaung" mau" zo" mae maqo" bo ngad: ra" .
Aimung:- ce: makhyang" ra" lo, mau" mae" myid tha" wa,- airu: myid: jho: shad' ra" qobo re khyad' pye' byid: nae" qhid' mae" Asang re akyu" mho' wa,-
pe"mung: ga"re nao wa myid nug: myid khyad' ru xo sho' we' qobo: yang taui" jab: to" ra" byu dayaug ngad: rure ngo qu" myao: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Simon wa Petru we' Yohan shid' zo: re- Ni" shid' zo: ta" ra" gu: pe" daja: re: nga" au: dao mae majoe" li" vashao:- nga" qhid' mae" Mao" So re akyu" bao" mho' byid: gela,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa Yesu khyo we' sin: yang: sagse: kham: kyo: mung: Asang: mung dao: re bin: kho" kyo: lao"- Petru we' Yohan wa Yerusalem khyo dam: phao: lo" ako" . Yao: shid' zo: wa phao khyo mae jo; ra" Samari vogaung: jham myo: sho' mae Lau Dao: Gai cao" kho" kyo" lo: ako" .
Asang: Mug: Lagyo: dayaug wa Philib re- To" wa,- Yerusalem mae" Gaza khyo joe" ra" khyo khyo" qid bang: shad' khyo ye" lo" wa,- ga: ta" ra" . ( Ce: khyodang wa din"pyad' yo khyodang ngad: ra" . )
Ai mung: Philib wa to" ye" lo" ra" . Ana" Ethiopia mung"dan: re eib: na: ra" kho: kham myhi" Kandake nho: jo, nho" alhab' re zam" ra" au: jhaung: zug: pho"- unug re: ngad: ra" Ethiopia zug: pho" dayaug wa yao" yham khyo phao: lo" na: ra" . Yao: wa Yerusalem khyo ye: mung: Mao" So re ye: caung: pa" bin yang: yao" myao: lhin" dao mae zaung: jo, mung: lapa Esaia jham: paug' re nghe' na: ra" .
Gyang" Lho" Byo wa Philib re ai: myao: lhin" khyo te' te' ye" lo" wa, ga: ta" ra" .
Philib tao" ye" lo" re ai: zug: pho" wa lapa Esaia jham: paug' mae" jham: dau re nghe' na: rure yao: yethe' gyo: mung:- Philib wa ai: zug: pho" re- Nao nghe' na: ra" jham: dao: re nao ba: gyo" i?- ga: myid' ra" .
Ai: zug: pho" wa Lajheim: pheim: kyo: yaug mana re- ngo khoru: qo" ba: gyo: nae" i?- ga: tau: mung:- myao: lhin" khug khyo do, li" mung: yao: we' daga" li" zaung nae" qhid' mae" Philib re lhaung: ra" .
Yao: nghe' na: ra" jham dau wa- Se' pye' nae" yao re we' dakhyo:- Yao: re jhui" she: ye" lo" ako" . Yao mug' qaug: ra" au: sae za: tae" to" ra" yao nau" we' dakhyo:- yao: wa dao: dakheim: re: majhau ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa nyham: khyo" pye' ru qhug' mung:- madin: man" ra" khyo" dao: kho' ru qhug' ra" . Yao" kao so' re myid gaung dao mae" yu: pye' byid: yang: yao" myid: zo: byuxag' re khag' re: maqo" she' ngad: ra"- ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Ailao" ai: zug: pho" wa Philib re- Lapa pho" wa khoyaug: khyo re ta" ru ngad: ra" i?- Yao: yao" khyo re i?- Mangad: lao" gatau dayaug: khyo re ta" ru ngad: ra" i?- ngo re ta" kyo: la, ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao Philib wa- ai: jham: dau mae" qhid mung: Yesu khyo we' sin: yang: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai yao: re kho" kyo: byid' ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: airu: su" gyo" lo ko" au: qid jo; ra" jo, qo khyo joe" lo: ako" . Ailao" ai: zug: pho" wa- Qu" wa, cetau mae qid jo; ra"- Ngo qid nyhab' kham: yu nae" ru mae kham" to: nae" pe" ja: jo; ra" i?- ga: myid' ra" .
( Philib wa yao: re nao wa Yesu Khristu re ni" nhag' lam: aung khug alhab' we' lam va" ngad: re wa nao Qid nyhab' kham gai: kham: yu: ra" ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" ai: zug: pho" wa- Yesu Khristu wa Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ngad: rure ngo lam" ra"- ga: tau" ra" . )
Ailao" ai: zug: pho" wa myao: lhin" re thang nae" amyin" byid: mung:- yao: shid' zo" geim" qid khyo gyo" ye: mung:- Philib wa ai: zug: pho" re qid nyhab' kham: byid' ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: qid mae" do, lo lao"- Asang: Byo wa Philib re jhui" lo" byaug: ra" . Ai: zug: pho" wa Philib re madam: myao lo: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa ngaui bau" ru we' yao" gyaung: khyo mae dam: xo' phao: lo" ra" .
Philib wa Azotu vogaung: mae lo" joe" rure myao: ra" . Amung: yao: wa Kesarea khyo ye" lo" ra" gyaung: khyo cao" yang: vogaung: khao: ngo" mae Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai re cao" kho" kyo: byid' ra" .
Ai: gyo: re Sholu wa Asang: thao cao" ra" mo, re se' da be, khyad' kad' nae" qhid' mae" kyaug' na: ra" . Yao: wa Khinjaung Yin" jhao" ye: mung:-
Asang: nho: khyo re phug' cao" na: ra" yauggai myiqe: qere myao: ngad: re- yao: bam re taung" yu mung:- Yerusalem khyo dam: jhui" tug' lo nae" qhid' mae" khinjaung pho" jhao" ye: mung:- Damasku vogaung: mae" Yuda tarha" jung yham jham khyo bang" se" byid' ra" akho: akhang" mugsug' re mho' yu: ra" .
Sholu Damasku vogaung: nhae mae joe" ye" lo" au: nyag din taung" mug: gaung mae" bo" bao wa avai: ayae mae bao: thug' li" ra" .
Sholu wa myid gaung khyo gyang: goe; lo" ra" . Ai: thao yao: wa Sholu- Sholu- nao ngo re pe" mung: yhin" i? ga" ra" thoe dathoe re the' gyo" ra" .
Sholu wa Asang we"- Nao khag' ngad: i? ga: myid' ra" . Ai: thoe wa- Ngo wa nao yhin" na: ra" yaug Yesu ngad:-
Ngadqere: to" mung: vogaung: khyo vao ye" lo" wa, . Ai mae nao kad' ca" ra" khyo re nao re ta" kyo" li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Sholu we' daga" gyaung: su" na: ra" mo, wa dao: dakheim: re: majhau lo: thang: jo; ako" . Yao: bam wa thoe re the' gyo: gengadqere: khag' dayaug rere: mathe' myao ko" ngad: ra" .
Sholu wa myid gaung mae" to" li" mung:- yao" myo, phung" ke' ra"- ngadqere: pe" rere: mayao lo: ngad: ra" . Amung: Sholu re lo, mae" she yang: Damasku vogaung: khyo jhui" vao ye" lo" ako" .
Sholu wa sam ba lam: lam: myo, mamyao ngad: ra" . Ai: ba na gyo: mae yao: wa pe" re: mazo: mashaug' lo: na: jo; ra" .
Damasku vogaung: mae Anania ga: mang: ra" lam khug: ra" byu dayaug na: ra" . Qhu" lho mae Asang wa yao: re Anania we" ga: ta" re- Anania wa Asang we"- ngo cemae na: wo"- ga: tau" ra" .
Ailao" Asang wa yao: re- To" mung:- Khyodin: thaung:- ga" ra" hau" mo" khyodang khyo ye" lo" wa,- amung: Yuda nho: yham mae Tarshu vobyu Sholu ga" ra" yaug re yeqho: myid: wa,- yao: wa akyu" mho' yang: na: ra" .
Yao: wa qhu" lho mae- Anania ga" ra" byu dayaug vao li" mung: yao: myo, dam: myao: li" nae" qhid' mae" yao" au: mae lo, kai: byid' rure myao: ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Anania wa- Asang we"- Ceyaug wa Yerusalem vogaung: mae na: ra" au: ni" byu qere qu" gyaug qu" lhaung yhin" lai: lo: ra"- ga" ra" lau dao: re byu myo: sho' mo; nhad' mae" the' gyo: va" .
Ai: tho' mago"- nao re caung: pa" ra" mo, alhab' re taung" yu nae" qhid mae" khinjaung qi: qemae" kheim: so' mugsug" vin yang: ce: Damasku vogaung: khyo joe" li" ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Asang wa Anania re- Ye" lo" wa,- pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa taung bug qere re: kho: kham qere we' Israel amyu" qere re: nga" mang cao" ta" hau" kyo: nae" we' ngo re caung da" nae" qhid' mae" ngo khyin: yu: to: yaug ngad: ra" .
Nga" mang mathao mae yao: dayin dayo: kham zo: ca" ra" gu: alhab' re yao: re ngo qhu" byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: Anania wa Sholu na: ra" yham khyo vao ye: yang:- Sholu dao mae yao" lo, yekai: byid: mung: Mao: nhaung: pho" Sholu we"- nao ce: vogaung: khyo li" na: ra" au: khyodang mae nao re qhu" byid' ra" Asang Yesu yao" yang yao: ngore nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra" . Yao: wa nao myo, dam: myao: li" nae" qhid' mae" we' Gyang" Lho" Byo byang" vashao:- ga: ngo re nao jhao" nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra"- ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Ailao" jao" yao:- Sholu nho: myo, jid' mae" ngokye' ru" ra" akye' jham qid' gyo" lo" mung:- yao: wa myo, dam: myao: li" ra" . Alao" yao: wa to" li" mung:- Qid nyhab' kham yu: ra" .
Ai: thao yao: wa zo: ve dam: zo: mung: qam: dam: byang" li" ra" .
Sholu wa Damasku vogaung: mae lam khug: ra" mo, we' daga" dayo, zo: na: jo; ra" . Yao: wa Yuda tarha" jung yham jham khyo din: za: ye: mung:- Yesu wa Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ngad: ra"- ga" rure kho" kyo" ra" .
Yao" dao: re the' gyo" ra" mo, alhab' wa gyai mug' hao" byaug: ru we' Byu ceyaug wa Yerusalem vogaung: mae ai: Yesu ga" ra" yaug re caung: pa" ko" ra" mo, re lhaung" se' ra" yaug ngad: ra" mangad: i? Ai bam re taung" yu yang: khinjaung qi: qejhao: jhui" lo" nae" qhid' mae" ce: vogaung: khyo joe" li" yaug mangad: i?- ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Sholu wa kho" kyo" ru mae je yang: qam: bo: li" mung:- Yesu wa Meshia ngad: ra"- ga" rure sagse: we' khyag' khyag' kho" kyo: byid' ruyang Damasku vogaung: mae na: ra" Yuda byu qe wa yao" dao: re maqo" phaug' ko" ngad: ra" .
Myo: sho' ba lai: lo" thao re- Yuda byu qe wa Sholu re se' nae" qhid' mae" pha,jhi" khyug' ako" .
Ngadqere: ai re Sholu ba: pye' ra" . Yuda byu qe wa Sholu re se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" vogaung: kham: dung: mae myi" re: na" re: lham: na: ako" .
Ngadqere: damyi re Sholu nho: mho"zo: qe wa yao: re jhui" yu mung:- gyan khug mae zaung nhao yang: vang khinqae bao: zo: kham: khyo" yao: re shoe' khyo" ke" ako" .
Sholu wa Yerusalem vogaung: khyo joe" ye: lao"- mho"zo: qe we' zam" khug nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa yao: wa mho"zo: dayaug ngad va" ga" rure malam" gemung:- yao: bam alhab' mo, Sholu re gyaug: ako" .
Ai: thao re Barnaba wa Sholu re lagyo: qejhao" jhui" ye: mung:- khyodang mae Sholu Asang khoru: qhug' ra" khyo rere: Asang Sholu re khoru: dao: jhau va" rure re:- Sholu wa Damasku vogaung: mae Yesu mang re lao: yang: khoru: mazag mavae kho" kyo" lo: ra" khyo jham rere: lagyo: qere ta" kyo" ra" .
Airumung: Sholu wa lagyo: qe we' daga" ye: daga" na mung:- Yerusalem vogaung: mae lagyo: qe we' daga" Asang: mang re lao: yang: mazag mavae cao" kho" kyo" ra" .
Sholu wa Greeg myan" jhau: ra" Yuda byu qe we' re: jho" ta" ngag: ra" . Yao: bam kam" wa Sholu re se' pye' nae" seim" ako" .
Cekhyo re- lam khug: ra" phung: byu qe ba gelao"- yao: bam wa Sholu re Kesarea vogaung: khyo jhui" ye" lo" mung: aimae" Tarshu khyo yao: re nhao: ke' ako" .
Aimung: Yuda mung" Galile mung" we' Samari mung" khaung: geim" mae" phung: qe wa yhin" ru maqhug' lo: dayo, zo: yaug yo za: qo" na: ako" . Phung: wa Asang re gyaug phug' ru we' kao so' daui mung:- Gyang" Lho" Byo bao" thaug' ruyang phung: qam: bo: lo: ru we' phung: byu qe je yang: myo" laug: li" ako" .
Petru wa jo, qo khyi" khao: ngo" khyo cao" du" kam" qin" mung: dalhang mae Luda vogaung: mae na: ra" Mao" So: byu qejhao" dalhang yedu" kam: co' ra" .
Ai: vogaung: mae gaung jam: shid mung: she' zin lam: lam: yab qo mae" maqo" to" lo" ra" Ainea ga: mang: ra" byu dayaug re Petru myao: ra" .
Ailao" Petru wa ai: gaung jam: shid yaug re- Ainea we"- Yesu Khristu wa nao re gai byid' ava"- To" mung:- ni" yab qo nyhang" wa,- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" jao" Ainea wa to" li" ra" .
Luda vogaung: mae we' Sharon vogaung: mae na: ra"- mo, byu qe alhab' wa Ainea re myao gelao"- Asang: shad' khyo phaug' lo: ako" .
Yopa vogaung: mae Tabitha ga: mang: ra" lam khug: ra" myiqe: dayaug na: ra" . ( Yao" mang wa Greeg myan" khyo" Dorka ga" ru ngad mung:- Dorka ga" ru wa Xe' ga" ru ngad: ra" . ) Yao: wa khonhae" re: gai: ra" mau" zo" kad' na mung:- myaung sho" ra" mo, re bao" thaug' na: ra" myiqe: ngad: ra" .
Ai: ayo, mae yao: wa no mung: shid: lo" ra" . Yao" mao gaung re cid' shaung: pye' mung: tho' pyae: qe, mae mhao" to" ako" .
Yopa vogaung: wa Luda vogaung: we' mataung" jho" va: ngad: ra" . Amung: Yopa vogaung: mae na: ra" lam khug: ra" mo, wa Luda vogaung: mae Petru joe" na: ra" ga" ru the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam wa byu shid' yaug re Petru jhao" nhao: ke' mung:- Ngonhaung" jhao" phyad phyad li" la, ga"- ga: ta" nhao: ke' ako" .
Airumung: Petru wa to" mung: ai shid' zo: we' daga" cao" ye" lo" ra" . Petru joe" ye: lao"- yao: bam wa Petru re tho' pyae: qe, khyo jhui" do, lo" ako" . Cug' mo" qe alhab' wa ngug yang: Petru lhang" gam: mae zang" ham: na mung:- Dorka yao: daui: na shi" au: re khyab' to: co' ra" mai bau: jham alhab' re Petru re ci: qhu" ako" .
Ailao" Petru wa yao: bam alhab' mo, re taung gaung khyo thug' lo" nhao mung: pad' thaug' thaug' yang: akyu" mho' ra" . Ai: thao re mao gaung shad' khyo lhang: lo mung:- Tabitha we" to" wa,- ga: ta" ra" . Dorka wa myo, phung" ke' mung:- Petru re the' myao lao" yao: wa to" zaung: ra" .
Petru wa yao" lo, yheim" ke' mung: yao: re she: to" ke' ra" . Ai: thao Petru wa cug' mo" qe we' daga" lam khug: ra" mo, alhab' re khai: yu yang: Dorka re adaui yao: bam re ab byid' ra" .
Ce: lau dao: wa Yopa vogaung: geim" byang" sho' hau" nhao" lo" mung:- byu myo: sho' mo, Asang re lam" ako" .
Petru wa Yopa vogaung: mae shoqid mau" kad' ra" Simon ga: mang: ra" yaug we' daga" myo: sho' ba thang: na: ra" .
Kesarea vogaung: mae Itali tab ga" ra" Roma gyetab datab re eib: ra" gyezug: pho" Koneliu ga: mang: ru dayaug na: ra" .
Yao: wa Mao" So: khyo re kao bau yaug ngad mung:- yao: we' yao" yham khug: byu alhab' mo, wa Mao" So re caung: pa" ako" . Yao: wa myaung sho" ra" Yuda qere myo: sho' bao" thaug' byid: mung: Mao" So re abang mabyid akyu" mho' na: ra" .
Daba mae" myi" thao sam yo, qug ko re Mao" So: mug: lagyo: dayaug wa yao: jhao" li" mung:- Koneliu we"- ga: yao: re li" khai: rure qhu" lho mae de: de: za: the' myao: ra" .
Yao: wa gyaug: ru we' ai: mug: lagyo: re zhaug' qu" mung:- Nhag' bo we"- ai wa pe" ngad: i?- ga: myid' ra" . Mug: lagyo: wa yao: re- Mao" So wa ni" akyu" mho' thoe re we' ni" aung lam Alu: gae byid' rure ngaui mung:- ni" mho' thoe re tau: byid: nae" jin" jin" ngad: ra" .
Amung: ana"- Yopa vogaung: khyo byu nhao: ke' mung: Simon Petru ga: mang: ra" yaug re yekhai: jhui" yu nhao wa,
yao: wa panglai: yae mae" shoqid mau" kad' ra" Simon ga: mang: ra" yaug: yham mae thang: na: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mug: lagyo: phao: lo" byaug thao re Koneliu wa yao" yham mae" daui daui o: kaung shid' yaug re we' Mao" So: khyo re kao bau: ra" yao" kao lhaug' gyezo: pho" dayaug re khai: yu mung:-
boe" lai: lo" ra" khyo alhab' yao: bam re ta" kyo: yang:- yao: bam re Yopa vogaung: khyo nhao: ke' ra" .
Ai: thao: ba re yao: bam ye" lo" mung:- Yopa vogaung: nhae khyo joe" ye" lo" na: ako" . Ba khaung tau yo, ko re Petru wa akyu" mho' nae" qhid' mae" yham khaung dao: pyae khyo do, lo" ra" .
Yao: wa vae: moe' li" mung:- zo: ve zo: nug: li" ra" . Zo: ve nyhang" jaung: na: ra" au:- yao: wa qhu" lho dalam: re myao: ra" .
Ai: qhu" lho mae mug: gaung bung" li" mung:- byid khyug geim" mae" zaui" ci: ra" mai pho' we' dau: ra" ru daja: myid gaung khyo shoe' khyo" ke' byid' rure yao: myao: ra" .
Ai: khug mae byid khyid de; ra" gug' nyhug' ja: cao jab- yoe" du" lhau: ra" gug' nyhug' ja: cao jab we' ngho' jhid' ngho' zo: ja: cao jab alhab' bo: ra" .
Ailao" Petru we"- To" yang: se' zo: wa,- ga: thoe dathoe jhau: thug' li" ra" .
Ngadqere: Petru wa Asang we"- dajhid' re: magai: boe" ngad: ra" . Ai: maca' majhad' ja: ngo khonhae" re: mazo:- ga: tau" ra" .
Ai: thoe wa- Mao" So: yang san sin" ra" ga" rure masan masin" ein: nao data" wa,- ga: dam: jhau: thug' li" ra" .
Sam lhang airu: boe" mung:- thao re ai: rure mug: gaung khyo dam: to' yu: pye' ra" .
Petru wa ce: qhu" lho: lajheim: re myid: mug' na shi" au:- Koneliu yang nhao: ke' ra" mo, wa Simon yham re qho: myid' yu yang:- yao: bam wa yham kheim: kham: dung: mae lo: ye; jo; ako" .
Yao: bam wa- Simon Petru ga: mang: ra" bang" vo dayaug mana i? ga: yao yang: myid' ako" .
Petru ai: qhu" lho we' sin: mung: myid: qu" na: shi" au:- Gyang" Lho" Byo wa yao: re- Qu" wa,- cetau mae byu sam yaug wa nao re qho: na: ako" .
Aimung: seim" nyhang" yang: gyo" lo" wa,- pe"mung: ga"re ngoyang nhao: ke' ru ngad mung:- aug' o: myid mabo lo:- yao: bam: thao cao" ye" lo" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: Petru wa- gyo" lo" mung:- yao: bam re Naonhaung" qho: na: ra" yaug wa ngo ngad:- naonhaung" pe" mung: joe" li" ko" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa- Ngonhaung" re gyezug: pho" Koneliu yang nhao: ke' ru ngad:- Yao: wa byugai dayaug ngad mung:- Mao" So re caung: pa" ra" yaug ngad: ru we' Yuda byu qe alhab' yang phug' myao" ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Ni" mung dao: re yao: qo" tae" gyo" yu nae" qhid' mae" mug: lagyo: dayaug wa nao re yao" yham khyo khai: yu nae" yao: re ta" ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ailao" Petru wa yao: bam re khai: vhao" yu mung:- Ai: myi yab genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re lhaung: ra" . Thao: ba re yao: wa seim" jin" yu mung: yao: bam we' daga" cao: lo" ra" . Yopa vogaung: mae na: ra" lam khug: ra" mo, daqhae: re: Petru we' daga" cao" ye" lo" ako" .
Ai: thao: ba re yao: wa Kesarea khyo joe" ye" ra" . Aimae Koneliu wa yao" amyu" ba nam zo: qe we' yao: khai: to" ra" ba nam qe we' daga" Petru re lao" na: ra" .
Petru joe" vao lo lao"- Koneliu wa yao: re yetug: yu mung: Petru: khyid qao: mae goe; gyo" lo" mung: yao: re goe; pa" ra" .
Ngadqere: Petru wa- To" ye, wa,- Ngoyao: re: byu za: angad:- ga: ta" mung:- yao: re she: to" ke' ra" .
Petru we' Koneliu jho" jhau zo" re" yham khug khyo vao lo" ko" re yham khug mae- mo, byu qe myo: sho' mo, zang" ham: na: rure Petru lo" myao: ra" .
Petru wa yao: bam re- Yuda byu dayaug wa Taung bug byu qe we' daga" magai: na magai: zam" khug ga:- yao" caung: pa" thung" khyo" yang tam" to" rure naonhaung" yao: nyang" za: ba gau ngad: ako" . Ngadqere:- khag' re ngad qere: caung: pa" thung" khyo mae masan masin" ru mangad: lao"- maca' majhad' ru ngad: ra" ga: magai: myid: rure Mao" So wa ngo re qhu" byid' ava" .
Airumung:- nao ngo re khai nhao: ke' ra" au:- ngo wa pe" maha lo: cao" li" va"- amung: nao ngo re khai nhao: ke' ra" khyo re ta" kyo: la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Koneliu wa- Lai: lo" ra" sam ba mae myi" thao sam yo, qug ko re ngo wa yham khug mae akyu" mho' yang: na: au: nyag din taung"- bao qhui: ra" mai bau: ve; ra" byu dayaug nga" qhid' au: mae li" ye; jo, mung:-
Koneliu we"- Ni" akyu" mho' thoe re Mao" So the' gyo" ava"- ni" aung lam Alu: gae byid' ra" mau" zo" jham rere: the' myao: ava" .
Airumung: Yopa vogaung: khyo byu nhao: ke' yang: Simon Petru ga" ra" yaug re khai nhao: ke' wa, . Yao: wa panglai: yae mae" shoqid mau" kad' ra" Simon ga: mang: ra" yaug: yham mae bang" na: ra"- ga: ngo re ta" ra" .
Airumung: ngo wa ailao" jao" nao jhao" byu nhao: ke' ra" . Nao joe" li" mung: gyai gai va"- yao: nao re ta" nhao: ke' ra" mung dao: alhab' re tae" gyo" yu nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae ana" ngonhaung" alhab' mo, cetau mae lao" na: bam va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Petru wa- Mao" So wa yaug khao: ngo" re myo, nho nga: lao: makhyin lo: dakhyo: za: kad' rure ngo ana" dang za: ba va" .
Pe" ja" byumyu" ngadqere: yao: re caung: pa" mung: din: man" ra" khyo re phug' cao" ra" yaug re wa Mao" So khae: yu: ra" .
Alhab' mo; Asang ngad: ra"- Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang Israel byumyu" qere Mao" So ta" hau: byid' ra" ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ra" Lau Dao: Gai mung dao: re naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Yohan wa yao: Qid nyhab' kham mung dao: re bin: kho" kyo: thao Galile mung" mae" qhid mung: Israel mung"dan: geim" jao: sho' boe" lo: ra" mau" zo" khyo re naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Amung: Nazared mae" Yesu re Mao" So wa Gyang" Lho" Byo we' qam: so' khoru: vhe' sheim: byid' ra" khyo rere: naonhaung" ba: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa yao: we' daga" ngad mung:- yao: wa jo, qo khyi" khao: ngo" khyo cao" du" qin" yang: gai: ra" mau" zo" re kad' mung:- yui: qam: so' qao: mae na: ra" mo, alhab' re cao" gai byid' ra" .
Yerusalem vogaung: mae we' Israel mung"dan: geim" Yesu kad' ra" lo, mau" alhab' we' sin: yang:- ngonhaung: wa sagse: qe ngad: . Ai: thao yao: bam wa Yesu re pyao: zang mae jin" se' pye' ako" .
Ngadqere: sam ba kyo thao re Mao" So wa yao: re shid: ru mae" daui: to" li" nhao mung: yaug khao: ngo" re mangad: lo:-
Sagse: qe ga:- Mao" So: yang khyin: to" ra" mo,- yao: dam: daui: to" li" thao yao: we' daga" zo: shaug' ra" ngonhaung" re za: qhu" byid' ra" .
Yao: wa byu alhab' mo, re Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: kho" kyo: byid: nae" we' yao: wa kao so' daui: na: ra" mo, re dao: kho' nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yang san: to" ra" tarha" agyi ngad: rure sagse: kham byid: nae" qhid' nae" ngonhaung" re yao: amyin" byid' to" ra" .
Yao: re lam: ra" mo, yaug khao: ngo" wa yao" mang kheim: so' khyo" yang qobo khyad' pye' byid' ru qhug' li" nae" ga:- yao" khyo we' sin: mung: lapa qe alhab' mo, ta" ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: Petru jhau: na shi" au:- yao" mungdao: re tae" gyo" na ko" ra" byu alhab' mo; dao mae Gyang" Lho" Byo joe" gyo" li" ra" .
Taung bug byu qe: dao mae re: Mao" So wa yao" Gyang" Lho" Byo jhaung qhu" re vhe' sheim: byid' ruyang- Yopa vogaung: mae" Petru we' daga" joe" li" ko" ra" Yuda byumyu" lam khug: ra" mo, wa mug' hao" byaug: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa myan" aja: ja: jhau mung:- Mao" So nho: qi" qhang: ra" khyo qi: sho' caung: khin" byid' na: rure yao: bam the' gyo: yang:- ngad: ra" .
Ailao" Petru wa- Cebam wa ngonhaung" we' dakhyo:- Gyang" Lho" Byo re qo" khae: yu: avako" . Amung: yao: bam qid: yang qid nyhab' kham: yu nae" rure khag' qo" tam" ko" i?- ga: ta" thug' ke' ra" .
Aimung: Petru yao: bam re Yesu Khristu mang mae qid nyhab' kham: yu genae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ra" . Ai: thao re yao: bam wa Petru re yao: bam we' daga" dayo, zo: thang: na nae" qhid' mae" mho' ako" .
Taung bug byu qere:- Mao" So: mungdao: re khae: yu vako" ra"- ga" rure lagyo: qe we' Yuda mung" geim" mae na: ra" lam khug: ra" mo, the' gyo" ako" .
Petru Yerusalem vogaung: khyo joe" lo lao"- Taung bug byu qe au: qid lhai" ra" thung" re kham: yu ca" ga: ngaui: ra" mo, wa Petru re-
Nao wa au: qid malhai" ra" Taung bug byu qe: yham khyo lae" ye: mung: yao: bam we' lhao" re: daga" zo: shaug' ra"- ga: qobo vhin: ako" .
Airumung: Petru wa boe" lo: ra" khyo re aqao: mae" athao jao: sho' yao: bam re ta" kyo" ra" .
Ngo wa Yopa vogaung: mae akyu" mho' na: au:- qhu" lho dalam: re the' myao:- byid khyug geim" mae zaui" ci: ra" mai pho' we' dau: ru daja: mug: gaung mae" shoe' khyo" ke' byid' rure ngo myao: . Ai: ru wa nga" nhae mae thang: jo; ra" .
Ai: khug khyo ngo nyang" za: qu" ke' re mai" ru we' kyao: ra" byid khyid de; ra" gug' nyhug' jham- yoe" du" lhau: ra" gug' nyhug' jham- ngho' jhid' ngho' zo: alae" jham re ngo myao: .
Ai: thao re- Petru we" to" wa,- Se' zo: wa,- ga: jhau: ra" thoe re ngo the' gyo" .
Ngadqere: ngo wa- Asang we" dajhid' re: magai: boe"- ai: caung: pa" thung" khyo" maca' majhad' ra" ja: mangad: lao"- masan masin" ra" zo: ve re ngo khonhae" re: mazo" qu" ein: phaug' tau" .
Ai: thao wa- Mao" So: yang san sin" ra" gu: rere: masan masin" ein: nao data" wa, ga: mug: gaung mae" dam: jhau: thug' li" ra" .
Sam lhang airu: boe" mung: thao re- ai: rure mug: gaung khyo dam: to' yu: pye' ra" .
Ai: au: re yao: Kesarea vogaung: mae" ngo jhao" nhao: ke' ra" byu sam yaug ngo na: jo; ra" yham khyo joe" li" ako" .
Gyang" Lho" Byo wa dajhid' re: maaug' o: lo: yao: bam: thao cao" ye" lo" nae" ngo re ta" ra" . Yopa vogaung: mae" ai: lam khug: ra" byu khyaug' yaug re: ngo we' daga" Kesarea vogaung: khyo bocao" li" ako" . Ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa Koneliu yham khyo vao ye" .
Korneli wa- yao" yham khug mae mug: lagyo: dayaug li" ye; jo; rure the' myao: ra" khyo rere:- ai: mug: lagyo: pho" wa- Yopa vogaung: khyo byu nhao: ke' yang: Simon Petru ga: mang: ra" yaug re yekhai: jhui" yu wa, .
Ai: yaug wa nao we' ni" yham khug: byu qe khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" ra" mungdao: re kho" kyo" li" nae" ga: yao: re ta" ga" rure re: ngonhaung" re ta" kyo" ra" .
Amung: ngo dao: jhau: qhid we' Gyang" Lho" Byo wa qhid' phyao: ngonhaung" dao mae joe" gyo" li" ru we' dakhyo: yao: bam: dao mae re: joe" gyo" li" ra" .
Ailao"- Yohan wa qid: yang qid nyhab' kham: byid' ra"- ngad qere: naonhaung" wa Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang qid nyhab' kham: yu: li" genae"- ga: Asang ta" ra" dao: re ngo myid: beim" li" ra" .
Asang Yesu re ngonhaung" lam lao"- Mao" So ngonhaung" re byid' ra" jhaung qhu" wa ai: Taung bug byu qere re: byid' ru wa de: de: za: ngad: ra" . Airumung:- ngo wa pe" ru" yaug ngad yang: Mao" So re qo" tam" nae" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa ai: dao: re the' gyo: gelao"- Petru re yao: bam qobo vhin: ru thang: pye' mung:- Mao" So re caung: khin" mung:- Mao" So wa Taung bug byu qere re: myid tha" yang: kao so' qo" daui: na nae" akho: akhang" byid' to: vanhaung ga: ta: ako" .
Lam khug: ra" mo, wa- Stephan re se' ru mae" boe" li" ra" yhin" ru mathao mae phao: byo: sin" lo" ko" ra" . Yao: bam daqhae: wa- Phoenikia- Kupru we' Antioki vogaung: jham khyo byo: sin" lo" mung:- ai: mungdao: re Yuda byu qere za: ta" kyo" ako" .
Ngadqere: ai: lam khug: ra" mo, mae" Kupru we' Kureni mung" mae na: ra" mo, daqhae: wa Antioki vogaung: khyo joe" ye: mung:- Taung bug byu qere re: Asang Yesu ngaui bau" lau dao: re yekho" kyo" ako" .
Asang: nho: qam: so' yao: bam we' daga" ngad: ruyang- byu myo: sho' mo, lam mung:- Asang jhao" phaug' lo: ako" .
Ce: lau thoe re Yerusalem vogaung: phung: byu qe the' gyo: gelao" yao: bam wa Barnaba re Antioki vogaung: khyo nhao: ke' ako" .
Barnaba wa Antioki vogaung: khyo joe" ye: mung:- mo, byu qere Mao" So khoru: shaman" byid' to: va" rure yethe' myao lao" qu" ngaui bau: mung:- Asang re yao: bam: aung khug nhag' lam: mae tang tang zaui" ci mung: vin tang: za: phug' cao" na genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam alhab' mo, re qam: byid' ra" .
Barnaba wa byugai ngad: ru we' Gyang: Lho" Byo byang" mung: lam khug: myid qi" ra" yaug ngad: ruyang byu myo: sho' mo, re Asang shad' khyo phaug' lo nhao: ra" .
Ai: thao re Barnaba wa Sholu re yeqho: yu nae" qhid' mae" Tarshu vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: wa Sholu re yeqho: myao lao"- Antioki vogaung: khyo jhui" lo mung:- yao: shid' zo: wa dazin: geim" ai: phung: byu qe we' zam" khug: na mung: yang: byu myo: sho' mo, re mho" shid' byid' ako" . Aimung: lam khug: ra" mo, re Khristan qe ga: sao qhid' mhang" byid' ru wa Antioki vogaung: mae ngad: ra" .
Ai: ayo, gyo: re lapa qe daqhae: wa Yerusalem vogaung: mae" Antioki vogaung: khyo ye" ako" .
Yao: bam mae" Agabu ga: mang: ra" yaug wa to" ye, mung:- Byo qam: so' khyo" yang myid gaung dao geim" mae bao" khug' no, khug' li" zai ngad: ra"- ga: lapa pa: ra" . ( Ai: bao" khug' no, wa Roma Khosin" Klaudiu- pyad mae gaigai: joe" lo: ra" . )
Mho"zo: qe wa yao: bam yaug khao: ngo" qo" gai: boe" ra" qhi" Yuda mung" mae na: ra" yao: bam: lam khug: ra" mao: nhaung: qere bao" thaug' ru vhin: ke' byid: nae" qhid' mae" myid: phyid' ako" .
Ai: thao yao: bam wa bao" thaug' ngaui re Barnaba we' Sholu lo, khyo" phung: lau: de, qe: lo, khug khyo vhin: ke' ako" .
Ai: ayo, mae Herod kho: kham wa phung: byu qe daqhae: re yhin" qhid: li" ra" .
Yao: wa Yohan yao: mao: Yaku re shae: yang se' pye' nhao: ra" .
Airu: kad' rure Yuda byu qe qu" ngaui ko" rure Herod myao lao" yao: wa Petru rere: taung" yu: ra" . ( Ceru: boe" ru wa Man" Make' Mug Poe ba na gyo: mae ngad: ra" . )
Herod wa Petru re bin: taung" yu lao"- thaung: khug mae lhaung" to: mung: gyezo: byid yaug bo: ra" gyezo: phung: byid phung: re zaung" nhao: to" ra" . Herod wa Petru re Lai co' Poe baui: thao re mung" byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae dao: phyid' nae" seim" to" ra" .
Airumung: Petru wa thaung: khug mae laung" jo; ra" . Ngadqere: phung: byu qe wa Petru qhid' mae" Mao" So re qam: ke' yang: akyu" mho' na: ako" .
Herod wa Petru re mung" byu qe: qhid' kheim: khyo jhui" thug' ye: nae" ra" qhid' myi re Petru wa gug: gam gyezo: shid' yaug: agyo: mae yab: myhid' jo; ra" . Yao: re jao co: shid' khe' yang taui" to" ako" . Thaung: kham: dung: mae re: gug: gam gyezo: qe zaung" na: bam: ako" .
Asang: mug: lagyo: dayaug wa nyag din taung" Petru nhae mae li" ye; ke' mung:- thaung: qe, geim" mae bao: jo; ra" . Ai: mug: lagyo: wa Petru re lo, sin mae zaui: yang: nhug' mung:- phyad phyad to" wa, ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" jao" Petru lo, mae" jao co: taui: jham beim: gyo" lo" ako" .
Ai: thao re mug: lagyo: wa- Phyid' cui: cui: mung: khyid zhaung: zhaung: wa,- ga: ta" ra" . Petru re: mug: lagyo: ta" ru we' dakhyo: kad' ra" . Alao" mug: lagyo: wa- Ni" bau: qhang gaug: ve, yang: nga" thao cao" wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Petru wa thaung: qe, mae" thug' mung:- yao" thao cao" ye" lo" ra" . Ngadqere: Petru wa mug: lagyo: kad' na: ra" mau" zo" wa gai gai: yao: ngad: ga" rure yao: maba ngad: ra" . Yao: wa qhu" lho myao: ru ngad: ga: jho: ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa zaung" ra" jo, qo sao qhid' lam: we' shid' lam: ein: lam: re lai: thug' lo" mung:- vogaung: khyo joe" ra"- jo, to' kham: dung: khyo joe" thug' lo" ako" . Ai: kham: dung: wa yao: za: bung" lo" ra" . Yao: shid' zo: wa ai: khyo thug' lo" mung:- hau" mo" khyo dakhe' mae su" lo" na ko" au:- ai: mug: lagyo: wa nyag din taung" Petru mae" gao" lo" byaug: ra" .
Ai: thao re Petru wa yao: mae boe" ra" khyo re beim" li" mung:- Mao" So wa yao" mug: lagyo: re nhao: ke' yang: Herod lo, mae" re:- Yuda byumyu" qe: myid: lao" na: ra" ja: alhab' mae" re: ngo re khyad' yu va" rure dang za: ngo ana" ba va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: khoru: boe" lai: lo: rure nyang" za: beim" li" lao"- yao: wa Yohan Marku yao: myhi" Mari yham khyo vao ye" lo" ra" . Ai: yham mae byu myo: sho' mo, daga" za: ham: phaung: na mung: akyu" mho' na: ako" .
Petru wa taung gaung shad' mae" kham: re lo" ko' ke' ra" . Alao" Rhode ga: mang: ra" daui daui okaung myiqe: nau" wa kham: phung" byid: nae" qhid' mae" ye" lo" ra" .
Yao: wa Petru thoe re gyo" xam: mung:- gyai ngaui bau: yang: kham: maphung" byid: shilo:- yham khug khyo dam: tug' vao lo" mung:- Taung gaung mae Petru ye; jo; ra"- ga: lo" ta" kyo" ra" .
Yao: bam wa nao go: ava"- ga: ta" ako" . Ngadqere: yao: wa dang yao: ngad: ga: kyid kyid ga: ta" ra" . Airu: mung: yao: bam wa yao: re Ai wa Mug: Lagyo: ngad nae"- ga: tau" ako" .
Petru wa mathang lo: kham: ko' na: ra" . Lo" thao" mae yao: bam wa kham: yephung" ke' mung:- yao: bam Petru re myao gelao"- mug' hao" byaug: ako" .
Petru wa yao: bam re sae za: na genae" qhid' mae" lo, tu" tu" mung:- Asang wa yao: re thaung: khug mae" khoru: jhui" thug' lo: ra" khyo re yao: bam re ta" kyo" ra" . Alao" Petru wa Ce: khyo re Yaku we' lam khug: ra" mo, gaje qere re: ta" kyo: ge, ga: ta" mung:- yao: wa ai: tau mae" gatau khyo thug' ye" lo" ra" .
Ne, kao mug: bo" li" lao" thaung: yham zaung" ra" gug: gam gyezo: qe wa- Petru khai: lo" byaug va" laug i? ga: mo, thaui: mo, yaug gyaug: nin" na: ako" .
Herod kho: kham wa Petru re qho nae" qhid' mae" amyin" khyo" ke' ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa Petru re maqho: myao ko" ngad: ra" . Airumung: Herod kho: kham wa ai: gug: gam gyezo: qere myid: ca: qu" mung: yao: bam re se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" amyin" khyo" ke' ra" . Ai: thao re Herod kho: kham wa Yuda mung" mae" thug' lo" mung: Kesarea vogaung: mae dayo, kho yena: ra" .
Herod wa Ture we' Sidon vogaung: byu qere gyai nhag' yo" ra" . Aimung: ai vogaung: shid' lam: mae" mo, wa daphung: za: kad' mung: kho: kham pho" jhao" ye" lo" ako" . Yao: bam wa kho: kham kho" geim" re eib: ra" Blastu re yao: bam re bao" thaug' yu nae" sao qhid' re yemho' ako" . Ai: thao re yao: bam wa Herod jhao" vao ye: mung:- ngaui pyo: yaug yo khyo yemho' ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam: mung"dan: wa kho: kham mung"dan: mae" zao: kho qo" yu: na geyang: ngad: ra" .
Herod wa dang: to" ra" ba na mae yao" kho: kham mai bau: re ve; pye' mung: yao" kho: kham tao" khau" dao mae zaung: jo, yang: mung" byu qere dao: jhau: ra" .
Alao" mung" byu qe wa Ce: jhau thoe wa xao su byu: jhau thoe mangad:- So jhau thoe angad: ra"- ga: hug' ta" ako" .
Herod kho: kham wa Mao" So re nga: mayhe' byid' ruyang aijao" yao: Asang: mug: lagyo: wa yao: re be; lhang" ke' ra" . Yao: wa laug daung: jham: yang zo" se' pye' ru qhug' ra" .
Mao" So: mung dao: wa xo' byo: sin" lo" mung:- lam khug: ra" byu je: myo" laug: li" ra" .
Barnaba we' Sholu wa yao: shid' zo: mau" zo" bin: zaui: lao" Yohan Marku re jhui: yang: Yerusalem mae" dam: phao: lo" ako" .
Antioki vogaung: mae" phung: khug mae lapa qe daqhae: we' mho" pho" qe daqhae: bobo: ako" . Ai bam wa Barnaba Nigara ga" ra" Simon- Kureni byu Lukai mung" zug: pho" Herod we' daga" na: lo: ra" Manaen we' Sholu bam ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam wa Asang re caung: pa" yang: zo: ve jao" yang: na ko" au:- Gyang" Lho" Byo wa yao: bam re Barnaba we' Sholu shid' zo: re nga" mau" vin vo, nae" qhid' mae" gatau khyin: san: to: ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa zo: ve jao" yang: akyu" mho' mung:- yao: shid' zo" dao mae yao: bam: lo, kai: byid: yang: mau" zo" vin vo, nae" qhid' mae" yao: shid' zo: re nhao: ke' ako" .
Airu: Gyang: Lho" Byo: yang nhao: ke' ru we' dakhyo: Barnaba we' Sholu wa Seleukia vogaung: khyo ye" lo" mung: ai: vogaung: mae" Kupru gagyo: kao" khyo lha we' gau" ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa Salami vogaung: khyo joe" ye: gelao"- Tarha" jung yham mae Mao" So: mungdao: re kho" kyo: byid' ako" . Yao: shid' zo: re bao" thaug' byid: nae" Yohan Marku re jhui" ye" ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa ai: gagyo: kao" re gau" lai: ye: mung:- Papho vogaung: khyo joe" ye" ako" . Ai: vogaung: mae Yuda byu lapa apyag' ngad mung:- Vha" Ba: Ra" Yesu ga: mang: ra" byu dayaug re the' myao: ako" .
Yao: wa ai: gagyo: kao" mae" mung" zug: pho" Sergiu Polu nho: byin cao: pho" ngad: ra" . Mung" zug: pho" wa nhag' lam: suzo: du" ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Ai: mung" zug: pho" wa Mao" So: mungdao: re tae" gyo: nug: ruyang Barnaba we' Sholu shid' zo: re yao" qhid' kheim: khyo khai: vhao" yu: ra" .
Ngadqere: Greeg myan" khyo" Eluma ga: mang: ra" vha" yaug wa Yesu khyo re mung" zug: pho" malam" vashao: ga:- Barnaba we' Sholu shid' zo: re ngag: thaug' ra" .
Airumung: Polu ga: re: mang: ra" Sholu wa Gyang" Lho" Byo we' byang" mung:- yao: wa ai: vha" yaug re din: din: za: zhaug' qu" to: yang:-
Yui Satan" nho: yao: zo: we"- nao wa din: man" ru we' gai: ra" ja: alhab' nho: gyevo apyag' asham" aja: ja: we' to, za: byang" jo; ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Nao wa khonhae" re: Asang: nho: dangman" ra" khyo re mhug' pyag' dao: boe" sho' kad' na yaug ngad: ra" .
Ana" yao: Mao" So: lo, wa ni" dao mae joe" li" mung:- Ni" myo, jid: lo" byaug: li" nae"- nao wa dayo, ko ba bao re mathe' myao nae" ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" jao" Eluma wa myo, jid: lo" byaug mung: dayaug yaug: yang yao" lo, mae" she yang: jhui" yu geshao: ga: soe' qho: qin" ra" .
Mung" zug: pho" wa airu: boe" rure myao lao" Yesu re lam" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Asang: khyo we' sin: yang: mho" shid' byid' rure yao: wa xo sho' mug' hao" byaug: ra" .
Polu we' yao" byin cao: qe wa Papho vogaung: mae" lha jui: yang: Pamphulia mung" mae" Perga vogaung: khyo joe" ye" ako" . Yohan Marku wa ai: vogaung: mae" yao: bam re to: co' mung:- Yerusalem khyo dam: tug' phao: lo" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Perga mae" xo' ye" lo" mung: Pisidia mung" mae" Antioki vogaung: khyo joe" ye" ako" . Yao: bam wa Dugno: Ba mae Yuda tarha" jung yham khug khyo vao ye: mung:- yezaung: jo; ako" .
Moshe tarha" we' lapa qe: tung" paug' re bin: nghe' lao"- tarha" jung yham agyi qe wa- Mao: nhaung: qe we' mo, byu qere qam: byid: nae" mungdao: naonhaung" qo" ko" ngad: re wa li" ta" geri: ga: byu nhao: ke' yang: ta" nhao: ra" .
Alao" Polu wa to" ye, mung:- lo, tu" tu" yang:- Israel byumyu" qe we"- cemae na ko" ra" Mao" So re caung: pa" ko" ra" Taung bug byu qe we"- tae" gyo: ge,-
Israel byumyu" qe: Mao" So wa ngonhaung" phug' pho" qere khyin: yu mung:- Egutu mung" mae yao: bam bang" vo khyo" na ko" ra" gyo: mae byumyu" qi: boe" li" nhao: ra" . Mao" So wa yao" qam: so' mo" we' yao: bam re Egutu mung" mae" jhui" thug' lo mung:-
Din" pyad' yo mae byid xe zin lam: lam: Mao" So wa yao: bam: dao mae zang: kham byid' ra" .
Yao: wa Khanan mung" mae na: ra" byumyu" nhad' myu" re phyo' sin" pye' mung: ai: mung"dan: re yao" byumyu" qere sang nhao: ra" .
Ceru: boe" sho' zin lam: byid yo: ngo" xe zin myao" ra" . Ceru: bin: boe" thao re Mao" So wa Lapa Samuela pyad joe" sho' yao: bam re tarha" agyi jham byid' to" ra" .
Amung: yao: bam kho: kham mho' gelao"- Mao" So wa yao: bam re Benyamin amyu" kaung mae" Kisha yao: zo: Sholu re san byid' ra" . Sholu wa yao: bam: kho: kham byid xe zin kad' ra" .
Ai: thao Mao" So wa Sholu re khyo" pye' mung:- Davi re yao: bam: kho: kham dam: kad' nhao: ra" . Mao" So wa Davi we' sin: yang:- Yese yao: zo: Davi wa ngo o: ra" yaug ngo zaui: nhao: ra" mau" alhab' re zaui: nae" yaug ngad: rure ngo myao va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mao" So wa yao" dao: so: byid' to" ru we' dakhyo:- Davi myid: zo: qemae" ngad: ra" Yesu re Israel byumyu" qe: khyad' yu yaug boe" li" nhao: ra" .
Yesu yao" mau" zo" re maqhid shire Yohan wa Israel byumyu" alhab' mo, re yao: bam: qobo mae" myid tha" lo mung: qid nyhab' kham: yu genae" qhid' mae" kho" kyo: byid' ra" .
Amung: Yohan wa yao: re nhao: to" ra" mau" zo" re bin: zaui" lo" na lao"- mo, byu qere Ngo khag' ngad: ra" ein: naonhaung" jho ko" i? ngo wa ai: naonhaung" lao" na: ra" yaug mangad:- Yao: wa nga" thao mae joe" li" zai ngad: ra" . Ngo wa yao" khyid zhaung: re khyad' byid: nae" lhao" re: maman: qi" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Abraham myid: zo: qe ngad: ra" nga" mao: nhaung: Israel byumyu" qe we"- Cemae na: ra" Mao" So re caung: pa" ko" ra" Taung bug byu qe we'- ce: khyad' yu: ra" khyo mungdao: re Mao" So wa ngonhaung" jhao" vhin ke' ava" .
Yerusalem mae na: ra" mo, we' yao: bam: au: jhaung qe wa- Yesu wa khyad' yu: ra" yaug ngad: rure maba- Dugno: Ba ba khao: ngo" yao: bam nghe' ra" lapa qe: jham: dao: jham rere: yao: bam maba: gyo: ko" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa Yesu re dao: phyid' ra" khyo" lapa qe: jham: dao: jham re jab byang" li" nhao: ra" .
Yao: bam wa yao: re shid man" ra" qobo dae dao: phyid' nae" akhyo mamyao gengadqere: yao: re se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam wa Pilad re mho' ako" .
Yao: bam wa yao: we' sin: yang: jham: mug sug' mae bo: ru we' dakhyo: alhab' yao: re bin: kad' gelao"- yao: bam wa yao: re pyao: zang dao mae" khyo" yu mung: lab dalam: khug mae yeke' to" ako" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So wa yao: re shid: rumae" daui: to" li" nhao mung:-
Galile mung" mae" Yerusalem vogaung: khyo yao: we' daga" ye" lo" ko" ra" mo, re yao" khyo re sagse: kham byid' ra" sagse: qe ngad: ako" .
Caung: khin" mugsug' aqi: shid' lam: mae- Nao wa nga" Zo: ngad: ra"- ana" ba ngo wa ni" Pho" boe" lo va"- ga: tung" to" ru we' dakhyo:- Mao" So wa Yesu re daui: to" li" nhao: ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" phug' pho" qere byid' to" ra" dao: so: wa yao: bam: myid: zo: qe ngad: ra" ngonhaung" re zaui: byid' ava" . Amung: ngonhaung" wa ce: lau dao: gai re naonhaung" re ta" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" ce: jo, qo khyo joe" li" ru ngad: ra" .
Yao: khonhae" re: madam: shid lo nae"- ga" rure shid: rumae" Yao: re dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru we' sin: yang: Mao" So wa- Ngo Davi re byid: nae" ein: dao: so: byid: to" ra" gyang" lho" ru we' gang" tang: ra" shaman" jeju ngo naonhaung" re byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Gatau caung: khin" dalam: mae re:- Nao wa dao: so: dang: ra" ni" daui daui yaug re lab khug mae bab: qeim: lo" nhao nae" mangad:- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Davi wa yao: daui: na: ra" gu: mae Mao" So myid: yaung: to" ra" mau" zo" jham re zaui: so: mung:- shid: lo" byaug: ra" . Yao: wa yao" phug' pho" qe: lab nhae mae nyhab' shaung: pye' ru qhug' mung:- yao" mao gaung wa lab khug mae bab: qeim: lo" byaug: ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So: yang shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ra" yaug wa airu: maba: qeim: lo" ngad: ra" .
Airumung:- nga" Israel mao: nhaung: qe we"- ai: Yesu khyo" yang qobo khyad' byid' ru qhug' ra" khyo we' sin: mung:- naonhaung" re kho" kyo" na: rure- Yesu re lam: ra" mo, alhab' wa Moshe tarha" yang maqo" lhoe' ke' ra" qobo alhab' mae" qo" loe, beim: ra" khyo rere: naonhaung" re ngonhaung" ba nhao nug: ra" .
Aimung:- Qu" ge,- Jung" gaui mo, we"- mug' yang: shid: lo" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re ana" ba ngo kad' nae" mau" zo" dalam: re dayaug yaug: yang naonhaung" re ta" sho' kyo: byid: sho' ngadqere: naonhaung" ai re lam" genae" mangad:- ga: lapa qe ta" to" ra" jham: dao: wa naonhaung" mae maboe" li" nae" qhid' mae" lha" ge,- ga: kho" kyo: ra" .
Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: wa tarha" jung yham mae" thug' lo" na ko" au: mo, byu qe wa- thao: Dugno: Ba mae re: dam: li" mung: ai: khyo we' sin: yang: li" dam: kho" kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao: shid' zo: re mho' ako" .
Ham phaung mae"- mo, byu qe byo: lo" gethao re Yuda byu qe myo: sho' mo, we' Yuda caung: pa" thung" shad' khyo phaug' vao lo vako" ra" Taung bug byu qe myo: sho' mo, wa Polu we' Barnaba thao cao" ako" . Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: wa Mao" So nhag' myan" ra" khug mae xo' yang: kao so' daui: na genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re qam: byid: dao: ta" ako" .
Ai: thao Dugno: Ba mae Mao" So: mungdao: re tae" gyo: nae" qhid' mae" vobyu alhab' ein nae" qhi" joe" li" ako" .
Yuda byu qe wa ai: mo, byu qere li" the' myao gelao"- yao: bam wa myid nug: gemung: Polu kho" kyo" ra" mungdao: re ngag mung: yao: re maphug' makhyad' roe" yang: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: wa je yang: mazag mavae- Mao" So: mungdao: naonhaung" re shi" sao qhid' ta" kyo: nae" wa khyo ang: ra" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa ai: mungdao: re ha: pye' mung:- ai: apyad ato: kao so' we' maman: qi" ga: naonhaung" yao: yao: dao: phyid' yu gemung: nga" shid' zo: wa naonhaung" re to: co' mung: Taung bug qejhao" ye" lo" zai ngad:-
