pe"mung: ga"re Asang wa ngonhaung" re Myidgaung dao mae na: ra" mo, alhab' khyad' yu: ru qhug' yu genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re Taung bug qe: qhid' mae" bo" bao boe" nhao va"- ga: amyin" byid' to" ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Taung bug byu qe wa ce: dao: re the' gyo: gelao"- gyo" ngaui ko" ru we' Mao" So: mung dao: re caung: khin" byid' ako" . Apyad ato kao so' qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" khyin: yu: to: qhug' va" mo; gu: Yesu re lam khug: lo: ako" .
Mao" So: mungdao: wa ai: mung" geim" mae hau" nhao" lo" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yuda qe wa Mao" So re caung: pa" mo, ngad: ra" byuna azhao" myhao: ra" Taung bug byu myiqe: qere we' ai: vogaung: mae" au: jhaung kad' mo, re lhau: zhung" to" ke' ako" . Alao" yao: bam wa Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: re yhin" mung: yao: shid' zo: re yao: bam: mung" mae" khe' thug' ke' ako" .
Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: wa yao: bam re ngag: ha: pye' ra" ave, khyo" yao: shid' zo" khyid vo: mae" phalhug jham re ko: khyo" co' mung:- Ikoni vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ako" .
Antioki vogaung: mae na: ra" lam khug: ra" mo, wa gyai ngaui bau" ru we' gyang" lho" Byo we' byang" jo; ako" .
Ikoni vogaung: mae re: gatau vogaung: mae we' dakhyo: boe" ra" . Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: wa Ikoni vogaung: mae re: tarha" jung yham khug khyo vao ye: mung: ai we' dakhyo: kho" kyo: gelao" Yuda byu qe myo: sho' mo, we' Taung bug byu qe myo: sho' mo, wa Yesu re lam: lo: ako" .
Ngadqere: malam ko" ra" Yuda byu qe wa Taung bug byu qere lhau: zhung" to" ke' mung: lam khug: ra" mo, re gye doe, nhao: ako" .
Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: wa ai: vogaung: mae dajhid' myao" sho' thang: na mung:- Asang: khyo re mazag mavae ta" kyo" ako" . Asang wa yao: shid' zo" lo, khyo" yang mug: pho" mau" zo" jham we' mug' pho: ve, lho jham re kad' qhu" nae" qam: so' byid: mung:- yao" nho: nhag' myan" ru we' sin" ra" mungdao: wa dangman" ru ngad: rure sagse: qhu" byid' ra" .
Ai: vogaung: byu qe wa shid' phung: jho" kho' lo" mung:- damyo" wa Yuda byu qe shad' khyo de, mung: damyo" wa lagyo: shid' zo: shad' khyo de; ako" .
Aimung: taung bug byu qe Yuda byu qe we' yao: bam: au: jhaung qe wa- lagyo: shid' zo: re yhin" nae" we' laug baui: yang pye' nae" qhid' mae" myid: phyid' ako" .
Lagyo: shid' zo: wa ai: khyo re ba gelao"- Lukaonia mung"- Lustra vogaung: we' Derbe vogaung: avai: ayae jo, qo jham khyo phao: ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa ai: jo, qo khaung: mae Lau Dao: Gai re kho" kyo" ako" .
Lustra vogaung: mae khau: mae" khyid qeim mung: khyo khonhae" re: maqo" su" ra" byu dayaug na: ra" .
Yao: wa zaung: jo, mung: Polu kho" kyo" ra" mungdao: re tae" gyo" na: ra" . Polu wa ai: yaug wa yao: gai shao: lo" nae" qhi" lam khug myid bo yaug ngad: rure ba: qu" mung:- Polu wa ai: khyid qeim yaug re zhaug' qu" to: mung:-
To" mung: din: za: ye, wa,- ga: ai: yaug re thoe qi: we' ta" ke' ra" . Alao"- ai: khyid qeim yaug wa byae: to" li" mung:- khyo su" qin" ra" .
Mo, byu qe wa Polu kad' ru re the' myao gelao"- yao: bam wa yao: bam: Lukaonia myan" khyo" So jham wa byu doe, mung:- ngonhaung" jhao" joe" gyo" li" va" ra"- ga" zag: hug' ako" .
Yao: bam wa Barnaba re Zeu au: she yang: kho" kyo: yaug ngad mung: Polu re wa Herma ga: mhang" byid' ako" .
Ai: vogaung: taung gaung mae jo; ra" Zeu so yham mae" khinjaung pho" wa nung: jaung lo: we' bin: kheim" jham re vogaung: kham: zang khyo cili" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: we' mo, byu qe wa Lagyo: shid' zo: re xeim: ngaui" byid: nug: ako" .
Yao: bam airu: xeim: ngaui" byid: nae" seim" na ko" rure Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: the' gyo: gelao"- yao: shid' zo: wa yao: shid' zo" mai bau: lao" cad' pye' yang: mo, byu qe: phaung gaung: khyo tao" vao ye" lo" mung:-
Byu naonhaung" we"- pe" mung: naonhaung" ceru: kad' na ko" i? Nga" shid' zo: wa naonhaung" we' dakhyo:- xao su byu za: angad:- ai: akyu" mabo: ra" ja: jham re caung: pa" byid' rumae mug: gaung we' myidgaung- qid panglai: we' aijham: khug mae na: ra"- jo; ra" ja: alhab' re phan" to" ra"- daui: na: ra" Mao" So shad' khyo phaug' lo genae" qhid' mae" ai: Lau Dao: Gai re naonhaung" re ta" hau" kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" nga" shid' zo: cekhyo joe" li" ru ngad: .
Lai: lo" ra" pyad mae" Mao" So wa xao su byu alhab' re yao: bam yao: o: ra" khyo: kad' nae" akhang" byid' to" ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So wa yao: na: jo; rure khonhae" re:- gai: ra" mau" zo" kad' ra" khyo"- sagse: qhu" byid' na: ra" . Yao: yao" ayo, mae yao: wa mug: gaung mae" mug: qu: li" nhao mung:- gaug zo maui: lam: re mhang" li" nhao: ra" ve, vo: re byid' to: mung: naonhaung" re zo: ve byid: yang: naonhaung" nhag' lam: re ngaui bau" ru we' byang" sheim: jo, nhao: ra"- ga: zag: hug' yang: ta" ako" .
Lagyo: shid' zo: airu: zag: hug' ta" re lhao" re:- yao: shid' zo: re xeim: ngaui" byid: nae" seim: ko" ra"- mo, byu qere lagyo: shid' zo: wa maqo" tam" pye' sho' ngad: ra" .
Pasidia mung" Antioki vogaung: we' Ikoni vogaung: mae" Yuda byu qere yao: bam shad' khyo li" qo" ngaug: te' yu: ako" . Ai: thao yao: bam Polu re laug baui: yang pye' mung:- shid va" ga: jho mung: vogaung: taung gaung khyo yeshe: thug' to" ako" .
Ngadqere: yao" avai: ayae mae lam khug: ra" mo, yao: re li" lhang" gam" na gelao"- yao: wa to" li" mung:- vogaung: khug khyo dam: vao lo" ra" . Ai: thao: ba re Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: wa Derbe vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ako" .
Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: wa lau dao: gai re Derbe vogaung: mae kho" kyo: byid: mung:- byu myo: sho' mo, mho"zo: qe boe" lo: ako" . Ai: thao re yao: shid' zo: wa Lustra vogaung:- Ikoni- Pasidia mung" mae" Antioki vogaung: khyo dam: tug' lo" ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa lam khug: ra" mo, re qam: byid: yang: lam khug: ra" khyo mae din: za: ye; jo, genae" qhid' mae" we' yao: bam re ta" peim: ta" kyang: byid: mung: ngonhaung" wa- Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo vao ye: nae" qhid' mae" qug: khai" ru myo: sho' ja: re lai: phyid' ye: ca" ra"- ga: kho" kyo" ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa phung: khao: ngo" mae phung: lau: de, qe san: to: mung: yao: bam lam khug: na: ra" Asang: lo, khug mae zo: ve jao" yang: akyu" bin: mho' yang: ai bam re qhaug' byid' ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa Pisidia mung" khyo" lai: jao" lo" mung:- Pamphulia mung" khyo joe" ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa Perga vogaung: mae mung dao: kho" kyo: mung: ai: thao re yao: shid' zo: wa Atali vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa ai: vogaung: mae" lha jui: yang: Antioki vogaung: khyo dam: tug' lo: ako" . Ai wa ana" yao: shid' zo: bin: kad' vako" ra" mau" zo" re zaui" qhid nae"- Mao" So nhag' myan" ra" jeju mae yao: shid' zo: re qhaug' byid' ra" jo, qo ngad: ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa Antioki vogaung: khyo joe" lo gelao"- phung: byu qere khai: zhang" yu mung:- yao: shid' zo: khyo" yang Mao" So khoru: mau" zaui" ra" khyo alhab' re we' Mao" So wa Taung bug byu qere Yesu re lam: lo genae" qhid' mae" khoru: phungbao byid: va" ra" khyo alhab' rere: yao: bam re ta: kyo" ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa ai: vogaung: mae lam khug: ra" mo, we' daga" myao" sho' thang: na: ako" .
Byu daqhae: wa Yuda mung" mae" Antioki vogaung: khyo joe" li" mung: lam khug: ra" mo, re- Naonhaung" wa Moshe ta" to" ra" Tarha" we' dakhyo: au: qid lhai: khyo makad' ko" re wa khyad' yu: ru magai: qhug' ngad: ra"- ga: yemho" shid' ako" .
Polu we' Barnaba shid zo: wa ce: khyo we' sin: yang: yao: bam we' gyai jho" ta" ngag: ako" . Aimung:- Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: we' gatau damyo" wa ce: khyo we' sin: yang: lagyo: qe we' phung: lau: de, qe we' jho" ta" qham nae" qhid' mae" Yerusalem vogaung: khyo ye: nae" qhid' mae" myid: phyid' ako" .
Phung: byu qe wa yao: bam re yedai" ke' ako" . Yao: bam wa Phoenikia mung" we' Samari mung" khyo" su" lai: lo" zo" re"- Taung bug byu qe khoru: Mao" So shad' khyo phaug' lo ko" ra" khyo re ai: khaung: mae" mo, rere: zhao: kyo" ako" . Ce: lau dao: wa lam khug: ra" mo, alhab' re gyai gyo" ngaui bau: nhao: ra" .
Yao: bam Yerusalem vogaung: khyo joe" ye: gelao"- aimae" phung: byu qe we' daga" lagyo: qe we' phung: lau: de, qe wa yao: bam re lham: tug: yu: ako" . Alao" Polu wa yao: bam: lo, khyo" Mao" So khoru: mau" zo" zaui" na: ra" khyo alhab' re yao: bam re zhao: kyo" ra" .
Ngadqere: Pharishe qe: phung: mae bobo: ra" lam khug: ra" mo, damyo" wa to" ye, mung:- Taung bug byumyu" qe wa au: qid lhai: khyo kham: yu ca" . Amung: Moshe Tarha" re phug' cao" nae" yao: bam re ta" ca"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ai mung: lagyo: qe we' phung: lau: de, qe wa ce: khyo re myid: qu" nae" qhid' mae" zabphaung kad' ako" .
Dazab myao" sho' bin: jho" ta"- bin: jho" myid: gethao re- Petru wa to" ye, mung: Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Taung bug byumyu" qe the' gyo: mung: lam genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa daba myao" mae" Taung bug byu qere lau dao: gai yekho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" ngo re naonhaung" phaung mae" khyin: yu: to: va" rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Byu yaug khao: ngo" nho: nhag' lam: aung khug re ba: ra" Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re gyang" Lho" Byo byid: va" ru we' dakhyo: Taung bug byu qere re: Gyang" Lho" Byo byid' ra" khyo" yang yao: bam rere: o ngaui: ra" khyo re qhu" byid' ava" .
Mao" So wa ngonhaung" we' Taung bug qe: agyo: mae gatau makho' to: ngad: ra" . Yao: bam yao: re: lam khug ko" ruyang Mao" So wa yao: bam: qobo alhab' re khyad' pye' byid' ava" .
Aimung: ngonhaung" phug' pho" qere: maqo" vin- ngonhaung" yao: re: maqo" vin vo' ra" qo re lam khug: ra" mo; dao mae vhin byid' ra" khyo" yang ana" naonhaung" pe" mung: Mao" So re lag yu: qu" nug ko" i?
Ngonhaung" re: yao: bam we' dakhyo: lam" mung:- Asang Yesu nho: nhag' myan" ra" khyo" yang khyad' yu: ru qhug' va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Barnaba we' Polu shid' zo: wa- yao: shid' zo" lo, khyo" yang Taung bug byu qe: phaung gaung: mae Mao" So kad' qhu" ra" mug' pho: mau" zo" jham we' mug' pho: ve, lho jham: khyo re ta" kyo: byid' na: au: zab phaung: na: ra" mo, alhab' wa sae za: tae" gyo" na: ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: bin: jhau lao"- Yaku re: Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- nga" dao: re tae" gyo: ge, .
Mao" So wa Taung bug byu qe: phaung mae" damyo" re yao" amyu" boe" nae" qhid' mae" khyin: yu: ra" khyo" yang Taung bug byu qere yao: gun caung: ra" khyo re sao qhid' khoru: qhu" byid: va" ra" khyo re Simon ta" sho' kyo" ava" .
Lapa qe ta" to" ra" mungdao: jham we' re: ceru wa alhab' jho" zhaung" ra" .
Jham: mug sug' mae Ce: thao re ngo dam: tug' li" mung: Davi nho: mung"dan: re dam: te: byid: nae"- byo; qeim: jo; rure ngo dam: nyhang" kad' nae" . Amung: ai re qam: dam: bo: li" nhao nae" .
Ailao" dang: jo; ra" byu alhab' wa nga" amyu" qe boe" nae" qhid' mae" ngo mang mhang" yu: ra" Taung bug byu qe alhab' mo, wa ngo jhao" joe" li" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ceru re daba ganhae" gaco' mae" ba nhao: na: ra" Asang wa ceru: ta" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yaku xo' yang: ta" ru wa Mao" So shad' khyo phaug' lo ko" ra" Taung bug byu qere ngonhaung" aqug: akhai: magai: kad' nhao ngad: ra" .
Ai: atha" So sulho re ngaui" byid: yang: caung: pa" thung" khyo" masan masin" ngad: ra" zo: ve re mazo: genae"- gintho' zaung: ru makad' nae"- lang zang: nai: se' ra" gug' nyhug' sho: we' sa: re mazo: genae" qhid' mae" kam" wa mugsug' tung" mung: yao: bam re kyo" ke' gai: ra" ein: ngo myid: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Moshe Tarha" re Dugno: Ba khao: ngo" mae tarha" jung yham mae daba ganhae" mae" nghe' na gemung:- vogaung: khao: ngo" mae yao" tarha" re kho" kyo" na: avako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" lagyo: qe phung: lau: de, qe we' phung: byu qe alhab' mo, wa jho" qham mung: yao: bam mae" byu damyo" re khyin: yu yang: Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: we' daga" Antioki vogaung: khyo nhao: ke' nae" qhid' mae" myid: phyid' ako" . Ai mung: yao: bam wa lam khug: ra" mo, alhab' yang phug' myao" ra" Barnaba ga: mang: ra" Yuda we' Sila shid' zo: re khyin: yu mung:- yao: shid' zo" lo, mae vhin tung" dakhye' tung" vhin: ke' ako" .
Ai: vhin tung" mae- Naonhaung" mao: nhaung: qe ngad: ra"- ngonhaung" lagyo: qe we' phung: lau: de, qe wa- Antioki vogaung: we' Suri mung" Kiliki mung" mae na ko" ra" Taung bug byu mao: nhaung" qere au" ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" phung: mae daqhae: wa ngonhaung" yang pe" re: mapyang: ke' ru naonhaung" jhao: joe" li" mung: myid: qug: nae" dao: aja: ja: ta" yang: naonhaung" re qug: khai: jham re boe" nhao ko" ra" ga" thoe re ngonhaung" the' gyo: va" .
Aimung: ngonhaung" wa jho" qham yang:- lagyo: kad' nae" byu damyo" re khyin: yu mung: naonhaung" jhao" nhao: ke' nae" qhid' mae" alhab' mo, jho" myid vang" bam va" .
Yao: bam wa ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu mau" zo" qhid' mae" yao: yao" kao so' re lhao" o: mabyid lo: zaui: so" lo ko" ra" ngonhaung" jhid' de; ra" Barnaba we' Polu shid' zo: we' daga" naonhaung" jhao" cao: li" li" genae" .
Aimung: ngonhaung" wa Yuda we' Sila shid' zo: re naonhaung" jhao" nhao: ke' ra" . Yao: shid' zo: wa vhin tung" mae ngonhaung" tung" to" ra" gu: re yao: shid' zo" nhad' yang re: naonhaung" re ta" kyo" li" genae" .
So sulho re ngaui" byid: va" ra" zo: ve- sa: we' lang zang: nai: se' ra" gug' nyhug' sho: dazo: ge,- Gin tho' zaung: ra" mau" zo" re dakad' ge, ein: ru mae" je yang: naonhaung" re qo gatau mavhin nae" qhid' mae" Gyang" Lho" Byo mae ngonhaung" myid jho" vang" va" .
Naonhaung" ai: rure jao" pye' gelao" wa- qao" zin" vageshao:- ga: tung" ke" ako" .
Alao"- lagyo: qere airu: nhao: ke' mung: lagyo: qe wa Antioki khyo ye" lo" mung: lam khug: ra" mo, alhab' re khai: zhang" yu yang: yao: bam re ai: vhin tung" phoe' byid' ako" .
Ai: vhin tung" re yao: bam bin: nghe' gelao"- ai: qham: phyid' ra" mung dao: mathao mae yao: bam wa gyai ngaui bau" ako" .
Yuda we' Sila shid' zo: wa lapa ngad mung: lam khug: ra" mo, re myao" sho' qam: byid: mung dao: ta" peim: ta" kyang: byid' ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa ai: vogaung: mae dayo, zo: thang: na mung: ai: thao re lam khug: ra" mo, wa- yao: shid' zo: re yaug yo za: au" yang: dam: nhao: ke' ako" . Yao: shid' zo: re nhao: ke' ra" mo, jhao" dam: tug' lo" ako" .
Ngadqere: Sila wa ai: mae thang: na nae" myid: phyid' ra" .
Polu we' Barnaba shid' zo: wa Antioki vogaung: mae dayo, zo: na mung:- Mao" So: mungdao: re gaje qe we' daga" mho" shid' kyo: byid' ako" .
Dayo, kyo thao re Polu wa Barnaba re Mao" So: mung dao: re ngonhaung" kho" kyo: co' va" ra" vogaung: khao: ngo" mae mao: nhaung: qe khoru: ngad ko" laug yekam" qu" nae" qhid' mae" nga" shid' zo: yao: bam jhao" dam: tug' ye" lo" lang:- ga: ta" ra" .
Barnaba wa yao: shid' zo: we' daga" Marku ga" ra" Yohan re jhui: nug: ra" .
Ngadqere: Polu wa yao: shid' zo" nho: sasana mau" mae thao" sho' mabo: zaui: lo:- yao: shid' zo: re to: co' mung: Pamphulia vogaung: mae" dam: tug' phao: lo" yaug ngad: ruyang Marku re jhui: nae" magai ga: myid: ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa ce: khyo we' sin: yang: qi: sho' jho" ngag mung: jho" gao" lo" ko" ra" . Alao" Barnaba wa Marku re jhui: yang: Kupru qid gagyo: kao" khyo lha jui: mung: ye" lo" ko" ra" .
Polu wa Sila re khyin: yu mung: lam khug: ra" mo, wa Polu re Asang: nhag' myan" ru mae bin: qhaug' byid: gethao to" lo" ra" .
Aimung: Polu wa Suri mung" we' Kiliki mung" khyo" lai: jao" ye: mung: phung: byu qere lam khug: myid nyhad' tang byid' ra" .
Polu wa Derbe we' Lustra vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ra" . Lustra vogaung: mae Timothi ga" ra" Khristan byu dayaug na: ra" . Yao: myhi" wa Yuda byumyu" Khristan ngad mung: yao: pho" wa Greeg byu ngad: ra" .
Timothi wa Lustra vogaung: we' Ikoni vogaung: mae na ko" ra" lam khug: ra" mo, alhab' yang khin" ko" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Polu wa Timothi re yao: we' daga" jhui" qin" nug yang: yao: re au: qid lhai" ra" thung" kad' byid' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: pho" wa Greeg byu ngad: rure ai: khaung: mae" mo, ba geyang:- Polu airu: kad' byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa vogaung: jham khyo lai: jao" ye: mung:- Yerusalem vogaung: mae na: ra" lagyo: qe we' phung: lau: de, qeyang qham: phyid' to" ra" lam khug: ra" mo, phug' cao" nae" tarha" re yao: bam re byid: mung:- ai: tarha" jham re phug' cao" nae" ta" ako" .
Airumung: phung: byu qe wa ai: lam khug: ra" khyo mae je: gang" tang: li" mung:- ba khao: ngo" phung: byu qe myo" laug: li" ako" .
Alao"- Gyang" Lho" Byo yao: bam re Asia mung" khaung: mae mung dao: kho" kyo: byid: nae" akhang" mabyid' ruyang yao: bam wa Phrugi mung" we' Galile mung" khaung: khyo" su" lai: ye" lo" ko" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Musia mung" mug: kyo: khyo joe" ye: gelao"- Bithunia mung" khyo ye" lo" nae" seim" ako" . Ngadqere: Yesu nho: Byo wa yao: bam re akhang" mabyid: ngad: ra" .
Aimung: yao: bam wa Musia mung" re lai: ye" lo" mung: Troa vogaung: khyo joe" ye" ako" .
Polu wa myi" re qhu" lho mae Makedoni byu dayaug wa ye; jo, yang:- Makedoni mung" khyo gau" li" mung: ngonhaung" re li" bao" yu la,- ga: mho' na: rure yao: myao: ra" .
Polu ce: qhu" lho re bin: myao we' ai jao"- ngonhaung" Makedoni mung" khyo ye" lo" nae" qhid' mae" nyhang" seim" bam va"- Pe"mung: ga"re Makedoni mung" mae na ko" ra" mo, re lau dao: gai kho" kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re khai: yu: ru ngad va" ein: ngonhaung" myid: jho yang: ngad: ra" .
Amung: ngonhaung" wa lha khyo" Troa mae" Samothrake qid gyo: kao" khyo din: za: gau" phyid' ye" lo" mung:- Thao: ba re Neapoli vogaung: khyo joe" ye" lo" bam va" .
Ngonhaung" wa ai: vogaung: mae" Roma qe eib: ra" Makedoni mung" nho: vomo" ngad: ra" Philipi vogaung: khyo taung khyo" ye" lo" va" .
Dugno: Ba mae ngonhaung" wa- Yuda byu qe zang" ham yang: akyu" mho' ra" jo, qo jo, nae" ein: myid: jho: ra" vogaung: taung gaung qid yae khyo thug' ye" lo" mung:- yezaung: jo, yang:- aimae zang" ham: li" ko" ra" myiqe: qere kho" kyo: byid' bam va" .
Ai bam: phaung mae Thuatira vogaung: mae" Pin: ne phaga: kad' ra" Ludia ga: mang: ra" myiqe: dayaug bobo: ra" . Yao: wa Mao" So re caung: pa" ra" myiqe: dayaug ngad mung: Polu kho" kyo" na: ra" mung dao: re nhag' lam: myid zaug zaug za: tae" gyo" yu nae" qhid' mae" Asang wa yao" nhag' lam: myid kham: re phung" byid' ra" .
Yao: we' yao" yham byu qe Qid nyhab' kham bin: kham: yu thao re Ludia wa- Ngo wa Asang re gaigai: yao: lam khug: ra" ein: naonhaung" myid: lam ko" ngad: re wa nga" yham khyo bang" li" khug: na geri:- ga: ngonhaung" re lhaung: ra" . Aimung: yao: wa ngonhaung" re qo" ngaug: aung: yu: ra" .
Daba na mae ngonhaung" wa ai: akyu" mho' jo, qo khyo ye" lo" na: au:- makhyang" ra" yui vao: jaung" mung:- geim phan" qo" phan" ra" jeim myhi" dayaug we' ngonhaung" jho" qhug' bam:- yao: wa geim phan" phan" yang: jeim sang re ngaui myo: sho' kaung byid' na: yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Polu we' ngonhaung" thao mae cao" mung:- Cebam wa myhao: thao" ra" Mao" So: daui daui mo, ngad: ako"- yao: bam wa ngonhaung" khoru: khyad' yu: ru qo" yu nae" khyo re ta" hau" kyo" ra" mo, ngad: ako"- ga: zag: hug' ra" .
Ai: myiqe: nau" wa airu: myo: sho' ba kad' na: ruyang Polu wa nhag' gyai yo" li" mung:- lhang: lo yang: Yesu Khristu mang re lao: mung:- ngo nao re amyin" byid: li"- yao" khug mae" phao: thug' lo" wa,- ga: ai: makhyang" ra" yui re ta" ke' ra" . Ailao" jao" ai: yui wa myiqe: nau" khug mae" phao: thug' lo" byaug: ra" .
Ai: myiqe: nau: nho: jeim sang wa yao: ngaui qho khyo jid' byaug va" rure ba lao"- yao: bam wa Sila we' Polu shid' zo: re taung" yu mung:- gai jao: mae na ko" ra" kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, jhao" jhui" she: khyad' ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: bam wa- yao: shid' zo: re Roma zug: qe: qhid' kheim: khyo jhui" vao ye: mung:- Ceshid' yaug wa Yuda byu qe ngad mung:- yao: shid' yaug wa ngonhaung" vogaung: byu qere aqug: akhai: boe" nhao: na: ako" .
Ngonhaung" tarha" re gye doe, nhao: ra" thung" li jham re yao: shid' zo: mho" shid' na: ako" . Ngonhaung" wa Roma mung" byu qe ngad mung:- ce: thung" li jham re maqo" khae: yu maqo" phug' cao"- ga: ta" ako" .
Ailao"- mo, byu qere: ai bam: thao bode, mung: Polu we' Sila re gye kad' mung: lhe" ako" . Airumung: zug: qe wa Polu we' Sila shid' zo: re mai bau: lao" khyad' pye' byid: yang: qam thaung" yang be, nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ke' ako" .
Airu: yao: shid' zo: re dae xo sho' bin: be, gethao re thaung: khug mae yelhaung" to" ako" . Yao: shid' zo: re tang za: pyid' lhaung" to: nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam: thaung: agyi pho" re amyin" khyo" to" ako" .
Thaung: agyi pho" wa ai: amyin" re qo" yu lao"- yao: shid' zo: re thaung: yham akhug qe, mae ke' mung: khyid kyam: ke' yang: lhaung" to" ra" .
Gae gaung: myi: ko re- Polu we' Sila shid' zo: wa- akyu" mho' mung: Mao" So re caung: nghaui" na: ako" . Thaung: byu gaje qe wa ai re tae" gyo: yang: na: ako" .
Alao" nyag din taung" myid lab: qi: sho' lab' li" mung:- thaung: yham apan laui" nan" li" ra" . Ailao" jao"- kham: dung: alhab' bung" li" mung:- thaung: byu qe alhab' mo, mae" jao cao: taui: jham gyad: gyo" lo" byaug: ra" .
Thaung: agyi pho" wa yab: jo; ru mae" so" li" mung: thaung: yham kham: dung: jham bung" jo; rure li" the' myao lao"- yao: wa thaung: byu qe alhab' mo, phao: thug' lo" byaug va" ga: myid: jho yang:- yao" shae pyang: she: yu mung: yao: yao: thug' shid nae" seim" ra" .
Ngadqere: Polu wa- yao" thoe myhao: thao" mae" zag: hug' mung:- Nao yao" gaung re pe" dakad' wa,- ngonhaung" alhab' mo, cetau mae ana: bam:- ga: ta" ra" .
Thaung: gyi pho" wa myi: dam mho' yu mung: tao" vao li" yang:- Polu we' Sila shid' zo" khyidqao: mae ko, ko, nin" ru li" goe; ra" .
Ai: thao re yao: wa yao: shid' zo: re taung gaung khyo jhui" thug' lo mung: Nhag' bo shid' zo: we"- ngo khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" pe" ja: kad' ca" i? ga: myid' ra" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa- Asang Yesu re lam wa,- Ailao" nao we' ni" yham khug: byu qe alhab' mo, khyad' yu: ru qhug' genae"- ga: phaug' tau" ako" .
Ai: thao re yao: shid' zo: wa yao: re we' yao" yham byu qe alhab' mo, re Asang: mung dao: kho" kyo" ako" .
Ai: myi re yao:- thaung: gyi pho" wa yao: shid' zo: re jhui" yu mung:- yao: shid' zo" dae khu jham re cid' san: pye' byid' ra" . Yao: we' yao" yham byu qe alhab' mo, wa ai jao" yao: qid nyhab' kham: yu: ako" .
Ai: thao re yao: wa Polu we' Sila shid' zo: re yao" yham khyo jhui" lo" mung: zo: ve da" zho" ra" . Thaung: gyi pho" we' yao" yham byu qe wa Mao" So re qo" lam va" ruyang gyai ngaui bau" ako" .
Thao: ba ne, kao re Roma kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, wa pya: da: zug: pho" qere ai shid' zo: re lhoe' ke' wa, ga" ra" amyin" we' daga" nhao: ke' ako" .
Airumung: ai: thaung: agyi pho" wa Polu re zug: qe wa nao we' Sila re lhoe' ke' nae" amyin" khyo" ke' avako" . Airumung: ni" shid' zo: yaug yo za: phao: lo" ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Polu wa- ai: pya: da: zug: qere- Nga" shid' zo: wa Roma mung"dan: byu qe ngad:- yao: bam wa nga" shid' zo: re pe" qobo maqo" ceim: gelo:- mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae qam thaung" yang be, yang: thaung: khug mae lhaung" ke' geli"- amung: ana" ngad lao" wa- yao: bam wa nga" shid' zo: re sae za: nhao: ke' nug genhaung i? Khai: mae" gai nae"- Roma zug: qe yao: bam yao: cekhyo li" mung: nga" shid' zo: re li" phoe' yu geshao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Pya: da: zug: qe wa ai: dao: re Roma zug: qere lo" ta" kyo" ako" . Yao: bam wa Polu we' Sila shid' zo: wa Roma mung" byu ngad: ko" rure the' gyo: gelao"- gyo" gyaug: ako" .
Ailao: yao: bam wa ye: mung: Polu we' Sila shid' zo: re thaung: khug mae" yejhui" thug' yu mung:- ai: vogaung: mae" phao: lo" nae" qhid' mae" yao: shid' zo: re mho' ako" .
Polu we' Sila shid' zo: wa thaung: mae" thug' lo" mung: Ludia nho: yham khyo ye" lo" ako" . Ai mae lam khug: ra" mo, we' jho" qhug' mung:- yao: bam re qam: byid: dao: bin: ta" lao"- yao: shid' zo: wa- ai: vogaung: mae" thug' lo" ako" .
Polu we' Sila shid' zo: wa Ampipholi we' Apoloni vogaung: re su" lai: ye" lo" mung: Thesaloni vogaung: khyo joe" ye" ako" . Ai: vogaung: mae Yuda tarha" jung yham dalam: jo; ra" .
Polu wa yao: khonhae" re: lhaung" kad' ru we' dakhyo:- Yuda tarha" jung yham khyo ye" ra" . Ai: mae Dugno: Ba sam ba geim" jham: mugsug' re cao" yang: mo, byu qe we' jho" ta" keim" mung:-
Meshia wa dayin dayo: kham zo: ca" nae" khyo we' shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nae"- ga" ra" khyo re jham: mugsug' re ceim" shid' yang: phyid' phyid' kho' kho' za: yao: bam re ta" sho' kyo" ra" . Polu wa- Naonhaung" re ngo ta" kyo" na: ra" ce: Yesu wa Meshia yao: ngad: ava"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam mae" damyo" wa lam" gemung:- Polu we' Sila shad' khyo de; ako" . Mao" So re caung: pa" ko" ra" Greeg byu qe myo: sho' mo, we' akhyag: ra" myiqe: au: jhaung qe myo: sho' mo, re: yao: shid' zo: shad' khyo bode; lo: ako" .
Ngadqere: Yuda byu qe wa myid nug: gemung:- khyodang khaung: mae" byujad: byugao: jham re khai: zhang" yu mung: byu phung: dalam: kad' yu: ako" . Yao: bam vogaung: geim" re lhau: zhung" ke' gemung:- Yason ga: mang: ra" yaug: yham khyo yelhe: yang:- Polu we' Sila shid' zo: re mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: khyo she: khyad' thug' yu nae" qhid' mae" yepoe: ako" .
Yao: bam maqho: myao gelao"- yao: bam wa Yason we' lam khug: ra" mo, damyo" re ai: vogaung: mae" kheim: so' qo" ra" mo; qhid' kheim: khyo she: khyad' li" mung:- Cebam wa jo, qo khyi" khao: ngo" mae qug: khai: boe" nhao: lo mo, ngad: ako" . Ana" ngonhaung" vogaung: khyo re: joe" lo: avako" . Yason wa yao" yham mae yao: shid' zo: re khae: yu: to" ra" .
Yao: bam alhab' wa Yesu ga" ra" kho: kham dayaug na:- ga: ta" mung: Kho: sin" tarha" jham re shad' lhoe" na: ako"- ga: zag: hug' ako" .
Ce: dao: re the' gyo: gelao" mo, byu qe we' vogaung: mae" kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, wa gyai yhai: li" ako" .
Kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, wa Yason we' gaje qere pakham: ngaui khyug' nhao mung: yao: bam re nhao: ke' ako" .
Mug: cad' lo we' lam khug: ra" mo, wa Polu we' Sila shid' zo: re Beria vogaung: khyo nhao: ke' ako" . Ai: vogaung: khyo joe" ye: gelao"- yao: shid' zo: wa Yuda tarha" jung yham khyo ye" ako" .
Beria vobyu qe wa Thesaloni vobyu qe tho' je yang: suzo: du: mo, ngad: ako" . Yao: bam wa mung dao: re nhag' lam: zaug zaug za: tae" gyo" yu mung:- Polu kho" kyo" ra" mung dao: dang madang: rure ba nae" qhid' mae" ba khao: ngo" jham: mugsug' re nghe' xeim: yu: ako" .
Yao: bam mae" myo: sho' mo, lam" ako" . Byuna azhao" myao: ra" Greeg myiqe: qe myo: sho' mo, we' Greeg yauggai myo: sho' mo, re: lam" ako" .
Ngadqere: Polu wa Beria vogaung: mae re: Mao" So: mungdao: re kho" kyo" na: ra"- ga" thoe re Thesaloni vogaung: mae" Yuda byu qe the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam Beria vogaung: khyo joe" li" mung:- mo, byu qere lu" to" li" nae" poe: ako" .
Lam khug: ra" mo, wa ailao" jao"- Polu re panglai: qid yae joe" sho' yedai" ke' ako" . Ngadqere: Sila we' Timothi shid' zo: wa Beria vogaung: mae thang: na: ako" .
Polu re yedai" ke' ko"mo, wa- Athen vogaung: joe" sho' Polu we' daga" cao" ye: mung:- Sila we' Timothi shid' zo: re gai: boe" ra" qhi" phyad za: yao: jhao" cao" li" nhao ge,- ga: Polu pyang: ke' ra" dao: vin yang: Beria vogaung: khyo dam: phao: lo" ako" .
Polu wa Athen vogaung: mae Sila we' Timothi re lao" na: au:- yao: wa ai: vogaung: geim" mae solho za: byang" sheim: jo; rure myao mung:- yao" nhag' lam: mae gyai mamyan ngad: ra" .
Amung: Polu wa Yuda tarha" jung yham mae Yuda byu qe we' re:- Mao" So re caung: pa" ra" Taung bug byu qe we' re:- ba khao: ngo" shava gai jao: mae su" lai: qin" ra" mo, byu qe we' re:- jho" ta" keim" ako" .
Epikuri we' Stoi myid pha,jhi" mho" pho" qe daqhae: re: Polu we' gyai jho" ta" ngag: ako" . Yao: bam mae" damyo" wa ce: ba pyad' pyad' yaug pe" re ta" nug: na: laug- ga: ta" mung: gatau damyo" wa- Gatau: byumyu" qenho: so jham: khyo re ta" na sam" ra"- ga: tau" ako" . Yao: bam ceru: ta" ko" ru wa- Yesu khyo re we' dam: daui: to" li" ra" khyo re Polu kho" kyo: yang: ngad: ra" .
Amung: yao: bam wa Aripagu bug gaung- vogaung" nho: tarha" yung" qhid' kheim: khyo Polu re jhui" do, ye: mung:- Nao ta" na: ra" ce: mho" shid' khyo asag' we' sin: yang: ngonhaung" ba nug: ra" .
Nao mho" shid' ra" khyo jham daqhae: wa ngonhaung" qhid' mae" dao: bang" ru: ga" ra" . Aijham: lajheim: re ngonhaung" ba nug: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
( Pe"mung: ga"re Athen vobyu qe we' ai: mae na ko" ra" gatau: mung"dan: byu qe wa lau dao: asag' jham: khyo re ta" yang:- tae" gyo: yang: yao: bam: yo, khyin: jham re zai" lhai: ke' nug: ako" . )
Polu wa vogaung" tarha" yung" qhid' kheim: mae ye; jo, yang:- Athen vobyu qe we"- naonhaung" wa caung: pa" thung" re gyai kao bau mo, ngad ko" rure khyo khao: ngo" re qu" yang: ngo ba: yu va" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Ngo naonhaung" nho: vogaung: khug mae su" qin" mung: naonhaung" caung: pa" ko" ra" jo, qo jham re cao" qu" au:- Ngonhaung" maba: ra" Mao" So: qhid' mae"- ga: tung" te' to" ra" phan dalam: re ngo the' myao va" . Airu: naonhaung" maba lo:- caung: pa" na ko" ra" Mao" So: khyo- ngo ana" naonhaung" re ta" kyo: geli" .
Mug: myid we' ai: mae na: ra"- jo; ra" gu:- alhab' re phan" to" ra" Mao" So wa mug: gaung we' myid gaung: Asang ngad mung:- byu: lo; yang kad' to" ra" Caung: pa" Yham khug mae mana ngad: ra" .
Ai: Asang yao: yao:- yaug khao: ngo" re kao so' we' so' she: ru we' gatau qo ca" ra" gu: alhab' re byid' to: yaug ngad: ruyang daja: ja: qo ca" ra" yaug reru: yao: re byu: lo; yang caung da" byid: maca" ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa xao su byu dayaug re shi" phan" mung: ai: yaug mae" byumyu" cao jab na: thug' li" nhao yang: myid gaung geim" mae na nhao: ra" . Yao: bam na nae" qhid' mae" yo, khyin:- zin na we' jo, qo- mug: kyo: jham re gau: qhid' khae" yang: kyo: so" to: byid' ra" .
Mao" So ceru: kad' to" ru wa- yao: bam yao: re qho mung:- yao: re myao: re myao ga: yao: re soe' qho: qin" genae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Byu dayaug ta" to" ru we' dakhyo"- ngonhaung" wa yao: mae kao so' daui: na:- lab: na mung: na: jo; bam:- ga: ta" ra" . Naonhaung" re: yao" myid: zo: qe ngad:- ga: dao: zham" zham" to: ko" ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: zo: dau qe ngad: ruyang Mao" So wa byu: lo, mau" pha,jhi" yang kad' to" ra" qhang- ngaui sulho- laug sulho we' dau: ein: ra" khyo" magai: jho ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa xao su byu qe yao: re maba mabeim: lo: na: lai: lo: ra" ba na yo, khyin: gu: alhab' re qu" lhai: ke' byid' ava" . Ngadqere: ana" wa- khyi" khao: ngo" mae" xao su byu qe alhab' mo, re yao: bam: makhyang" ra" mau" zo" jham mae" myid tha" genae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid: va" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: khyin: yu: to" ra" yaug: lo, khyo" yang yao: wa mug: myid geim" re din: nyang: ra" khyo" dao: kho' nae" ba na re mhai" so" to" ava" . Ce: khyo we' sin: mung: gaigai: yao: boe" nae" ngad: rure yaug khao: ngo" re sagse: qhu" byid' ra" khyo" yao: re shid: rumae" daui: to" li" nhao: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ra" khyo we' sin: yang: Polu ta" rure the' gyo: gelao"- Yao: bam mae" damyo" wa Polu dao: re qi: jung" pye' byid' ako" . Ngadqere: damyo" wa- Ce: khyo we' sin: yang: nao ta" rure ngonhaung" dam: gyo: nug shi"- ga: ta" ako" .
Aimung: Polu wa ai: phaung mae" phao: lo" ra" .
Byu damyo" wa Polu thao cao" mung: Yesu re lam: lo: ako" . Aibam mae" Dionusiu ga: mang: ra" Aripagu tarha" yung" phung: mae bobo: ra" tarha" agyi pho"- Damari ga: mang: ra" myiqe: dayaug we' byu gaje qere: bobo: ako" .
Ai: thao re Polu wa- Athen vogaung: mae" thug' lo" mung: Korinthu vogaung: khyo joe" ye" lo" ra" .
Ai: vogaung: mae Pontu mung" byu Akula ga: mang: ra" Yuda byu dayaug we' Yao" yham sang myhi" Priskila shid' tao we' yejho" qhug' ra" . Yuda byumyu" qe alhab' mo, Roma vogaung: mae" thug' lo" ca"- ga: Roma Kho: sin" Klaudiu amyin" khyo" ke' ruyang yao: shid' tao wa mataung" myao" shire Itali mung" mae" joe" li" ru shid' tao ngad: ako" .
Polu wa yao: shid' tao jhao" yena mung: mau" daga" yebo: cao: zaui" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Polu re: yao: shid' tao we' dakhyo: mug: go pin: zaung kad' zo: yaug ngad: ra" .
Polu wa Dugno: Ba khao: ngo" Yuda tarha" jung yham mae Yuda byu qe we' Greeg byu qe we' jho" ta" keim" mung:- yao: bam lam khug: lo gesho' ta" ngaug: yu: ra" .
Sila we' Timothi shid' zo: Makedoni mung" mae" joe" li" gelao"- Polu wa yao" ayo, alhab' re mung dao: kho" kyo" rumae za: qam: ke' pye' mung:- Yesu wa Meshia ngad: ra"- ga: Yuda byu qere sagse: kham byid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa yao: re maphug' makhyad' ngag: ta" gelao"- Polu wa yao" mai bau: jham mae" badan jham re ko: khyo" pye' mung:- Naonhaung" jeim" byaug ko" re wa naonhaung" yao" qo za: angad lo"- nga" au: dao mae pe" qo majo, lo:- ana" ba mae" thoegu: ngo wa Taung bug byu qere mung dao: kho" kyo: nae" ye" lo" naeva"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Polu wa yao: bam mae" thug' lo" mung:- Mao" So re caung: pa" ra" Titu Yustu ga: mang: ra" Taung bug byu dayaug: yham mae yethang: na: ra" . Ai: yaug: yham wa Yuda tarha" jung yham we' te' te' ngad: ra" .
Amung: tarha" jung yham agyi pho" Krispu we' yao" yham byu qe alhab' mo, wa Asang re lam khug: lo: ako" . Korinthu vobyu qe myo: sho' mo, re: ai: mung dao: re the' gyo: gelao" lam" mung: qid nyhab' kham: yu: ako" .
Damyi re Polu wa qhu" lho dalam: re myao: ra" . Ai: qhu" lho mae Asang wa Polu re dagyaug wa,- xo' yang: kho" kyo: wa,- qam: dashan wa,- pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa nao we' daga" ngad: .
Nao re khag' re: dae maqo" te' genae"- Ce: vogaung: mae ngo re lam khug nae" mo, myo: sho' na: bam: ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: Polu wa ai: vogaung: mae dazin: lho" khyaug' khye' na: na mung:- mo, byu qere Mao" So: mungdao: kho" kyo" ra" .
Ngadqere: Galio ga" ra" yaug Akhaia mung" zug: boe" li" lao"- Yuda byu qe wa zang" phaung mung: Polu re taung" yu yang: tarha" yung" khyo jhui" ye" ako" .
Yao: bam wa ceyaug wa tarha" we' majho" zhaung" ra" khyo" Mao" So re caung: pa" nae" qhid' mae" mo, byu qere jhui" poe: na: ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Polu phaug' tau: nae" seim" we'- Galio wa Yuda byu qere gaigai: yao: ce: mau" zo" wa makhyang" ra" mau" zo"- mangad: lao"- shad' lhoe" ra" mau" zo" ngad: re wa- ngo wa naonhaung" qobo zhaug' ra" khyo re nyang" za: tae" gyo: byid: zai ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ce: mau" zo" wa myan" dao: thoe we' mang we' naonhaung" yao" tarha" we' sin: yang: za: jho" ta" ngag: ra" khyo ngad: ruyang naonhaung" yao: nyhang" yu ca" ako" . Ceru" ra" mau" zo" mae ngo wa tarha" agyi makad' nae"- ga: Yuda byu qere ta" ra" .
Amung: yao: wa yao: bam re tarha" yung" mae" khe' thug' ke' ra" .
Yao: bam wa Tarha" jung yham agyi pho" Sostheni re taung" yu mung: tarha" yung" qhid' au: mae be; ako" . Ngadqere: Galio wa ai re pe" shui manho ngad: ra" .
Polu wa Korinthu vogaung: mae lam khug: ra" mo, we' daga" myo: sho' ba thang: na shi" ra" . Ai: thao yao: bam re au" co' mung:- lha khyo" Priskila we' Akula shid' tao we' daga" Suri mung" khyo gau" ye" lo" ako" . Kenkhrea vogaung: mae" qid sang pho mato" shire Polu wa Mao" So re jham tang" to: va" ruyang yao" au: xae qaug: pye' ra" .
Yao: bam Ephesu vogaung: khyo joe" ye: gelao"- Polu wa Priskila we' Akula shid' tao re ai: vogaung: mae nha: to: co' ra" . Amung: yao: wa Yuda tarha" jung yham khyo ye: yang: Yuda byu qe we' dao: yejho" jhau: ra" .
Mo, byu qe wa myao" sho' thang: na nae" qhid' mae" Polu re mho' ako"- Ngadqere: yao: maqad ngad: ra" .
Mao" So myid o: ru ngad: re wa naonhaung" jhao" dam: li" shinae"- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" . Amung: Polu wa Ephesu vogaung: mae" lha gau: mung: to" lo" ra" .
Polu wa Kesarea vogaung: khyo gau" joe" ye: lao"- Yerusalem vogaung: khyo ye" lo" mung: phung: byu qere ye: au" co' yang:- Antioki vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Ai: vogaung: mae dayo, zo: yethang: na mung: aimae"- yao: wa Galati mung" we' Phrugi mung" khaung: khyo" lai: jao" ye: mung: lam khug: ra" mo, re nyhad' tang byid' ra" .
Ai: yo, mae Alexanda vobyu Apolo ga: mang: ra" Yuda byu dayaug wa Ephesu vogaung: khyo joe" ye" ra" . Yao: wa dao: jhau gai yaug we' jham: mugsug' gyai ba jhao: ra" byu dayaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Asang: khyo re zhao: yu: to: va" yaug ngad mung: Yesu nho: khyo we' sin: yang: akhyo: jo jo za: gyai kao bau taung" kho" kyo" ra" . Ngadqere: yao: wa Yohan nho: Qid nyhab' kham khyo re shi" ba: ra" .
Yao: wa Yuda tarha" jung yham mae mazag mavae kho" kyo" ra" . Priskila we' Akula shid' tao yao" mungdao: re the' gyo: gelao"- Apolo re ai shid' tao: yham khyo khai: yu mung:- Mao" So: khyo re je yang: jo jo za: yao: re ta" sho' kyo: byid' ako" .
Apolo wa Akhaia mung" khyo ye" lo" nae" myid: phyid' ra"- Aimung:- Ephesu vogaung: mae" lam khug: ra" mo, wa Akhaia mung" mae na ko" ra" lam khug: ra" mo, jhao" Apolo re lham: khae: yu nae" qhid' mae" jhan: byid' ra" bang" se" vhin tung" tung" yang: yao: re bao" thaug' byid' ako" . Yao: wa Akhaia mung" khyo joe" ye: lao"- Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" khyo" yang lam khug: lo ko" ra" byu myo: sho' mo, re gyai yebao" thaug' byid' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yesu wa Meshia yao: ngad va"- ga" rure jham: mugsug' mae" sagse: jham re khyag' khyag' za: ceim" shid' byid: mung: mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae Yuda byu qere ta" aung: pye' ra" .
Apolo wa Korinthu vogaung: mae na: jo; au:- Polu wa xo' yang: ai: mung" gaung: cao" yang: su" lai: lo" mung: Ephesu vogaung: khyo joe" lo: ra" . Ai: vogaung: mae yao:- yao: wa lam khug: ra" mo, damyo" re yemyao mung:-
yao: bam re Naonhaung" wa lam khug: ra" mo, boe" lo gelao"- Gyang" Lho" Byo qo" khae: yu vako" i?- ga: myid' ra" . Yao: bam wa Gyang" Lho" Byo na: ga" rure lhao" re: ngonhaung" mathe' gyo" qu"- ga: tau" ako" .
Alao" Polu wa- Aire naonhaung" pe" ja" qid nyhab' kham: yu ko" i?- ga: myid' ra" . Yao: bam wa Yohan nho: Qid nyhab' kham re kham: yu:- ga: tau" ako" .
Polu ta" ru wa- Yohan wa myid tha" ru we' sin" ra" qid nyhab' kham re byid' ra" . Yao" thao mae joe" li" ra" yaug Yesu re lam" genae" qhid' mae" ta" ra" .
Ce: dao: re yao: bam the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam wa Asang Yesu mang mae qid nyhab' kham: yu: ako" .
Polu lo, yao: bam: dao mae kai: byid: lao"- Gyang" Lho" Byo wa yao: bam: dao mae joe" li" mung:- yao: bam wa myan" abang" jhau: li" gemung: Mao" So: mungdao: rere: lapa pa mung: ta" ako" .
Yao: bam wa yauggai daxe: shid' yaug ko ngad: ako" .
Polu wa lho" mo" sam khye' geim" Yuda tarha" jung yham khyo man: man: ye: mung: mo, byu qe we' mazag mavae jho" ta" ngag mung:- Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo re ba: khae: yu genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re kho" kyo: byid' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam mae" damyo" wa nhag' lam: qao mung: malam" ko" ngad: ra" . Amung: yao: bam wa mo, byu qe alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae Asang: khyo re magai: ra" khyo" ta" phoe: pye' ako" . Airumung: Polu wa lam khug: ra" mo, re jhui: mung: yao: bam mae" thug' lo" mung: Turannu ga" ra" yaug: pha,jhi" jung yham mae ba khao: ngo" mungdao: jho" ta" keim" ra" phaung kad' ra" .
Ceru: shid' zin lam: lam: kad' mung: Asia mung" mae na ko" ra" Yuda byu qe we' Taung bug byu qe alhab' mo, wa Asang: mung dao: re the' gyo" ako" .
Mao" So wa Polu khyo" yang gakai: lai: ra" mug' pho: ve, lho jham re kad' qhu" byid' ra" .
Polu ci: ra" pha, jad we' gacoe: jham re za: lhao" re: no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, we' yui vao: jaung" ra" mo, jhao" ciye: lao"- no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, wa gai: shao: lo" mung:- yui jham re: yao: bam vao: jaung" ra" mo, mae" phao: thug' lo" ako" .
Yui jham re cao" khe' thug' qin" ko" ra" Yuda byu qe damyo" re: yui jham re khe' thug' pye' nae" qhid' mae" Asang Yesu mang re lao: yang: kad' qu" ako" . Yao: bam wa Polu kho" kyo" ra" Yesu mang re lao: yang: nao re ngo amyin" byid: li"- ga: makhyang" ra" yui jham re ta" ako" .
Yuda Khinjaung Yin" Skeva nho: yauggai zo: tao ho' nhad' yaug re: ai ru: kad' ako" .
Ngadqere: makhyang" ra" yui wa yao: bam re- Yesu re ngo ba:- Polu rere: ngo ba: naonhaung" lam: wa- khag' ngad ko" i?- ga: myid' ra" .
Ai: yui vao: jaung" ra" yaug wa- yao: bam re se' da: be, khyad' kad' yang: yao: bam alhab' re aung: pye' ra" . Yao: bam wa dae de' ru we' gaung pyad' ai: yham mae" tao" phao: lo" ako" .
Ephesu vogaung: mae na ko" ra" Yuda byu qe we' Taung bug byu qe alhab' wa ai: khyo re the' gyo: gelao"- yao: bam alhab' mo, gyaug mung: Asang Yesu mang re je yang: caung: khin" byid' ako" .
Lam khug: ra" mo, myo: sho' re: joe" li" mung:- yao: bam kad' shad' lo: ra" khyo jham re mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae de: de: za: lhang: yu: ako" .
Vha" zo" ra" mo, myo: sho' wa yao: bam: mugsug' paug' jham zhang: cili" mung: mo, byu qe: qhid: kheim: mae li" ngha" pye' ako" . Ai: mugsug' paug' jham: gau jho re sun" qu" re ngaui thang: the: ngo" tug kye' man" ra" .
Ce: khyo" yang Asang: mungdao: wa qam: so' thin: ra" khyo" hau" nhao" je" lo" mung: je yang: qi" qhang: lo" ra" .
Cejham bin: boe" thao re Polu wa Makedoni mung" we' Akhaia mung" khyo su" lai: ye" lo" mung: Yerusalem khyo ye" lo" nae" qhid' mae" myid: phyid' to" ra" . Yao: wa Ngo ai: vogaung: khyo bin: joe" ye: thao Roma vogaung: khyo re: ngo yejoe" qu" ca"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: Polu wa- yao: re bao" thaug' ko" ra" Timothi we' Erastu re Makedoni mung" khyo nhao: ke' mung: yao: wa Asia mung" mae dayo, dataung thang: na: jo; ra" .
Ai: yo, re Asang: khyo mathao: yang Ephesu vogaung: mae qug: khai: gyai qi: sho' boe" thug' li" ra" .
Demetri ga: mang: ra" jang kham" ngaui be, su dayaug wa- Atemi so myhi" nho: ngaui yham khyao anau" jham re kad' mung:- yao" mau" zo" yang lo, mau" zaui: mo, re ngaui gyai qo" nhao: ra" .
Aimung: yao: wa yao" mau" zo" mae lo, mau" zaui" ra" mo, gatau alhab' mo, re khai: zhang" yu mung:- Byin cao: qe we"- ngonhaung" wa ce: lo, mau" kad' zo: yang: na: qo" na: dai: na: bam: rure naonhaung" yao: ba gau ngad: ako" .
Ana" wa ce: Polu ga" ra" yaug pe" kad' na: ra" khyo re naonhaung" yao: the' gyo: the' myao: na: avako" . Yao: wa byu: lo; yang kad' ra" so sulho jham wa So mangad: ga: ta" mung: ce: Ephesu vogaung: mae" mo, re we' Asia mung" geim" mae na: ra" mo, alaug alhab' re lam" gesho' ta" aung: yu: ava" .
Airumung: ce: ngonhaung" mau" zo" re mang zai" qheim" pye' nae" gyaug ca" ra" . Ai za: mangad: qi" qhang: ra" so myhi" Atemi nho: so yham wa pe" mangad: lo nae" . Alao" Asia mung" mae" mo, alhab' we' mug: myid geim" yang ceim" goe; pa" ra" so myhi" nho: qi" qhang: rure phoe: lo" byaug nhao: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: dao: jham re the' gyo: gelao"- ai: lo, mau" kad' zo: mo, wa nhag' yo" li" gemung: Ephesu vogaung: byu qe: nho: Atemi wa qi" qhang: ra" wo"- ga: zag: hug' ako" .
Ai: mo, thaui: mo, yaug yhai: ru wa davo geim" mae je" lo" mung: byu jham wa Polu we' gyaung: su: byin cao: ngad ko" ra" Makedoni mung" byu Gaiu we' Aristaku shid' zo: re taung" yu mung: poe go" jao: khyo phyad za: jhui" vao ye" lo" ako" .
Polu yao: yao: wa mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: khyo ye: nug: ra" . Ngadqere: lam khug: ra" mo, wa yao: re maye: nhao ko" ngad: ra" .
Polu yao" ba nam qe ngad ko" ra" mung"dan: kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, damyo" re: poe go" jao: mae mayena: qhu" nae" qhid' mae" byu nhao: ke' mung: Polu re mho' ke' ako" .
Ai: ayo, mae mo, byu qe wa- mo, thaui: mo, yaug yhai: na: bam mung: mo, byu qe wa damyo" daja: ga: hug' na: bam: ako" . Yao: bam mae" myo: sho' mo, wa yao: bam pe" mung: zang" ham: na: rure lhao" re: maba ngad: ako" .
Yuda byu qe wa Alexanda re mo, byu qe: qhid' au: khyo ye: nhao: ke' ko" ruyang mo, byu qe damyo" wa- Alexanda re mo, thaui: mo, yaug yhai: li" ra" khyo we' sin: yang: ngad nae"- ga: jho: ako" . Alao"- Alexanda wa mo, byu qere sae za: na genae" qhid' mae" lo, tu" tu" mung: yao: mashad' rure ta" qid' yu nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: wa Yuda byu ngad: rure mo, byu qe ba: qu" gelao" Ephesu vogaung: nho: Atemi wa qi" qhang: ra" wo"- ga: yo, qug shid' lam: yao: bam alhab' daga" zag: hug' ako" .
Lo" thao" mae vogaung: jere" pho" wa- mo, byu qere sae za: na nhao mung:- Ephesu vobyu qe we"- Ephesu vogaung: wa qi" qhang: ra" Atemi so yham re we' mug: gaung mae" gyo" li" ra" gyang" lho" ra" laug zang re zam" na: ra" vogaung: ngad: rure yaug khao: ngo" ba: ako" .
Khag' re: ce: khyo re maqo" ha: pye' ngad: ra" . Airumung: naonhaung" wa sae za: na: re gai: ra" . Daja: ja: re mamyid: qu" lo: kad' nae" maang ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa- ce shid' zo: re- so yham re lhad' zo" rure: mangad:- Naonhaung" so myhi" re ta" phoe byid' rure: mangad: ko" rure ce: jo, qo khyo jhui" li" ako" .
Demetri we' yao" lo, mau" zaui: mo, wa dayaug yaug re qobo zhaug' nug ko" ngad: re wa tarha" yung" phung" to" ru we' kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, re: na: ako" . Tarha" yung" mae qobo gai: zhaug' ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" ai: tho' mae" jeyang: daja: ja: ta" nug ko" re wa- vobyu qe tarha" vao phaung: ra" zabphaung mae ta" phyid' yu ca" nae" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ana" ba boe" ra" mo, thaui: mo, yaug yhai: ra" mau" zo" mathao mae ngonhaung" re qobo zhaug' genae" rure gyaug ca" ra" . Ceru: mo, thaui: mo, yaug yhai: ra" khyo pe" mung: boe" rure ceim" shid' nae" we' sho' kyo: nae" akhyo jhaug' za" ru ngonhaung" maqo"- ga: ta" ra" .
Cedao: bin: ta" thao re yao: wa- mo, byu qere phao nhao: ke' ra" .
Ai: mo, thaui: mo, yaug yhai: ru tae" lo" thao re Polu wa lam khug: ra" mo, re khai: zhang" yu mung: qam: byid: dao: ta" ra" . Ai: thao yao: bam re au" co' mung: Makedoni mung" khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Ai: mung" khaung: khyo" su" lai: ye" lo" mung:- lam khug: ra"- mo, byu qere qam: byid: mung: dao: myo: sho' ta" ra" . Ai: thao re yao: wa Akhaia mung" joe" ye: mung:-
Ai: mae lho" mo" sam khye' yethang: na: ra" . Yao: wa Suri mung" khyo ye" lo" nae" seim" na: au:- Yuda byu qe yao: re se' nae" pha,jhi" khug' khyug' yang: kung" na ko" ra" khyo re yao: ba lao"- Polu wa Makedoni mung" khyo" dam: tug' phao: lo nae" myid: phyid' pye' ra" .
Beria vobyu Purhu nho: yao: zo: Sopata- Thesaloni vogaung: mae" Aristaku we' Sekundu- Derbe vogaung: mae" Gaiu Asia mung" mae" Tukhiku we' Trophimu we' Timothi bam wa yao: we' daga" bocao: ye" lo" ako" .
Yao: bam wa qhid' khyo ye" lo" mung:- Troa vogaung: mae ngonhaung" re yelao" na: ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa Man" make' ra" mug Poe baui: thao re Philipi vogaung: mae" lha jui: yang: ngo" ba thao Troa vogaung: mae yao: bam we' lojho" qhug' mung: ai: vogaung: mae ngonhaung" wa dalaban thang: na: bam va" .
Ngonhaung" wa ban thug' khyaug' ba myi" thao re zam" khug: ra" myi" xeim zo: nae" qhid' mae" zang" ham: na: bam:- Polu wa thao: ba to" lo" nae" ngad mung: gae gaung: myi: joe" sho' phung: byu qere kho" kyo" na: ra" .
Ngonhaung" zabphaung: na: ra" tho' pyae: qe, mae myikaug' myo: sho' te' to" ako" .
Utukhu ga: mang: ra" zolau: wa bao: zo: kham: mae zaung: jo; ra" . Polu dao: xo' yang: dao: jhau: na: au: Utukhu wa yab nghoe" nghoe" yang: yab: mo; lo" mung:- yao: wa lo" thao" re sam pyae myhao: ra" yham dao mae" myid gaung khyo yab: byid: gyo" lo" ra" . Yao: bam yao: re lo" tau: vo; qu" ko" re Utukhu wa shid: byaug: ava" .
Ngadqere: Polu wa myid gaung khyo gyo" lo" mung:- Utukhu re lo" po: ci yang: yao: wa Dasang: kho: ge,- Yao: kao so' daui: na: ashi" ga: ta" ra" .
Polu wa yham dao khyo dam: do, lo" mung: mug re khyoe' phai" yang: zo" ra" . Polu wa mug: bo" sho' yao: bam we' dao: jhau: ra"- ai: thao re ai: vogaung: mae" to" lo" ra" .
Lam khug: ra" mo, wa kao so' daui: ra" zolau: re yham khyo jhui" lo" mung: nhag' lam: yaug yo: ru myo: sho' qhug' ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa lha khyo qhid' ye" lo" mung: Asu vogaung: mae Polu re lham: jhui" zhaung: yu nae" seim" to: yang:- Asu vogaung: khyo gau" ye" lo" bam:- Pe"mung: ga"re Polu yao: wa taung khyo" ai: vogaung: khyo ye: nae" seim" to: yang: ngonhaung" re ceru: kad' nae" ta" to" ra" .
Asu vogaung: mae yao: ngonhaung" re li" qhug' lao"- ngonhaung" wa yao: re lha mae jhui" zhaung: yu mung: Mitulene khyo gau" ye" lo" bam va" .
Ngonhaung" wa ai: tau mae" gau" ye" lo" mung: thao: ba re Ki- u gagyo: kao" tau" te' jo, qo khyo joe" ye: mung: thao: ba re Samo qid gyo: kao" khyo joe" ye: mung: thao: ba re Miletu vogaung: khyo joe" ye" lo" bam va" .
Polu wa Asia mung" mae ayo, ba na mazai" gan nug mung: Ephesu vogaung: nhae khyo" gau" lai: lo" nae" myid: phyid' to" ra" . Gai: boe" ngad: re wa Pentikoti poe mae myhi sho' Yerusalem vogaung: khyo joe" ye: nae" yao: hin: na: ra" .
Polu wa Miletu vogaung: mae" Ephesu vogaung: khyo byu nhao: ke' mung: phung: lau: de, qere yao: jhao" li" genae" qhid' mae" khai nhao: ke' ra" .
Yao: bam joe" li" gelao"- Polu wa yao: bam re- Ngo Asia mung" khyo sao qhid' joe" lo: ra" ba na mae" naonhaung" we' daga" ngo khoru: na: lo: ra" khyo re naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Yuda byu qeyang pha,jhi" khug' khyug' mung: kad' ra" mau" mathao mae qug: khai: qhug' na: ra" gyo: mae nhag' lam: nyham: khyo" mung: ngug byid ngug nhe' gyo" yang: Asang: nho: daui daui yaug khyo" ngo mau" zaui" lai: lo va" .
Mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae we' naonhaung" yham jham mae ngo kho" kyo: mho" shid' byid' ra" au: naonhaung" qhid' mae" akyu" bo: ra" dao: dakheim: rere: ngo matang" to" ru re naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Yao: bam qobo mae" myid tha" pye' yang: Mao" So shad' khyo phaug' lo genae" we' Asang Yesu re lam: lo genae" qhid' mae" ngo wa Yuda qe we' Taung bug byu qere dakhyo: za: qam: ke' yang: ta" peim" lo va" .
Ana"- ngo wa Gyang" Lho" Byo: mho dao: re gyo: yang: Yerusalem khyo ye" lo" zai ngad:- Ai: vogaung: mae ngo pe" yeboe" nae" rure ngo maba .
Thaung: laung" ru we' qug: khai: ru wa ngo re lao" na: ako"- ga: vogaung: khao: ngo" mae Gyang" Lho" Byo wa ngo re ta" peim" to" rure za: ngo ba: ra" .
Ngadqere: nga" kao so' re ngo pe" o: mabyid . Ngo wa dang: to" ra" mau" zo" zaui" pin" nae" we' Asang Yesu yang ngo re byid' to" ra" mau" zo" ngad: ra" Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" khyo Lau Dao: Gai re ta" hau" kyo" ra" mau" zo" re kyab' sho' zaui: nae" rure za: kao bau: ra" .
Ngo wa Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo naonhaung" jhao" cao" kho" kyo" qin" va" . Ana" wa naonhaung" mae" khag' re: ngo re khonhae" re: dam: qhug' myao logenae" mangad' rure ngo ba: .
Airumung: naonhaung" mae" dayaug yaug kao so' jeim" lo" ngad: re nga" au: dao mae qo mabo: rure ana" ba ngo naonhaung" re jhaug' za: ta" geli" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa Mao" So myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo alhab' re pe" re: matang" to: lo: naonhaung" re ngo hau" kyo: byid: va" .
Airumung: naonhaung" yao" gaung re we' Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang naonhaung" lo, mae ab byid' to" ra" yao kyaung" re qu" gun caung: na ge,- yao: zo" nho: sa" yang yao: sang: ra" phung: kad' yu: ra" Mao" So: phung: re lhaug' zaung" ra" yao lhaug' mo, doe; na ge,-
ngo thug' lo" thao re makhyang" ra" zag ne jham naonhaung" phaung gaung: khyo vao li" mung: yao kyaung" re phyo' zo" pye' li" genae" rure ngo ba: .
Naonhaung" phung: mae" yao:- byu damyo" wa mhug' pyag' dao: ta" mung: lam khug: ra" mo, re yao: bam: thao khyo jhui" pyag' lo" li" nae" ba na joe" lo: li" nae" .
Airumung: ngo naonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" re sam zin lam: lam: myi" re: na" re: ngug byid ngug nhe' myo: sho' gyo" yang: kho" kyo: mho" shid' byid' rure myid: beim: mung: lha" yang: na ge, .
Ana" ngo wa naonhaung" re Mao" So gun caung: ra" lo, khug mae re: naonhaung" re tau: to' qi" qhang: li" nhao: ra" Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" mung dao: mae re: ngo ab byid' ra" . Mao" So wa yao" byu qe alhab' re byid: nae" jaung: to" ra" shaman" jeju jham naonhaung" re byid' li" nae"
Amung: ngo wa khag' ngaui qhang mai bau: rere: myo, manyad: qu" .
Ce: nga" lo; yang yao: mau" zaui: mung:- ngo yao: we' nga" mau" zaui: byin cao: qe qo ca" ci qo: ra" gu: alhab' re qho: ci: lo: rure naonhaung" yao: ba gau ngad: ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa mau" zaui: qam: ke' mung: qam: nang" ra" mo, re bao" thaug' ca" ein: ra" khyo re naonhaung" re gaigai: yao: ai ru: kad' qhu" va" . Alao" Asang Yesu yao:- kham: yu: ru tho' byid' ru wa je: yang: ngaui lho" ra"- ga: ta" co' ra" dao: re myid: beim: ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Polu wa ai ru: bin: ta" lao"- yao: bam we' daga" pad' thaug' thaug' yang: akyu" mho' ra" .
Yao: bam alhab' mo, ngug zo" re" Polu re po yang: bobaug baug mung: au" ke' ako" .
Polu wa thao phyao: yao: re yao: bam madam: the' myao lo: genae"- ga: ta" ruyang yao: bam wa je yang: nhag' kaug' ako" . Airumung: yao: bam wa yao: we' daga" lha khyo ye" lo" ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao: bam re au" co' mung: lha khyo" din: za: gau" ye" lo" re Kosa gagyo: kao" khyo ye" lo" bam va" . Ai: thao: ba re ngonhaung" wa Rhode gagyo: kao" khyo joe" lo mung:- ai: tau mae" Patara vogaung: khyo joe" lo: bam va" .
Ai: vogaung: mae Phoenikia mung" khyo gau" ye: nae" ra" lha dakhye' re ngonhaung" myao mung: ai: lha dao mae yedo; zaung mung: gau" ye" lo" bam va" .
Ngonhaung" wa Kupru gagyo: kao" re lo" the' myao lao"- ai: gagyo: kao" mug: thao shad' khyo" gau" gyo" lo" mung:- Suri mung" khyo gau" ye" lo" bam va" . Gai xan: jham re khyo" nae" qhid' mae" Ture vogaung: gau: khung: mae lothang: bam va" .
Ngonhaung" wa ai: vogaung: mae lam khug: ra" mo, damyo" re lothe' myao mung: yao: bam we' dalaban lothang: na: bam va" . Ai: lam khug: ra" mo, wa Gyang" Lho" Byo: qam: so' khyo" yang Polu re Yerusalem khyo maye: nae" qhid' mae" ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam we' qo" thang: na: ra" ayo, ba na gan lao"- ngonhaung" wa ai: tau mae" thug' mung: xo' ye" lo" bam va" . Yao: bam alhab' mo, wa yao: bam: yham sang myhi" bam- yao: bam: zoshao qe we' daga" vogaung: taung gaung qid yae joe" sho' ngonhaung" re li" dai" ke' ako" . Ai: tau mae ngonhaung" alhab' mo, pad' thaug' thaug' yang: akyu" mho' bam va" .
Ai: thao ngonhaung" wa dayaug we' dayaug yao: cao: jho" bin: au" lao"- ngonhaung" wa lha khug khyo yedo; zaung mung: yao: bam wa yham khyo dam: tug' phao: lo" ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa Ture vogaung: mae" xo' yang: gau" ye" lo" mung:- Ptolemai vogaung: khyo joe" lo: bam va" . Ngonhaung" wa ai: vogaung: mae" lam khug: ra" mo, re bang" se" lo, zaui: zaui: mung:- yao: bam we' daba yethang: na: bam va" .
Ai: thao: ba re ngonhaung" wa ai: vogaung: mae" to" lo" mung:- Kesarea vogaung: khyo joe" lo: bam va" . Ngonhaung" wa Yerusalem vogaung: mae bao" thaug' mo, khyo" byu nhad' yaug khyin: yu: to" rumae" dayaug ngad mung: ngaui bau" lau dao: gai kho" kyo: yaug ngad: ra" Philib yham mae yethang: bam va" .
Philib wa yham maqo" shiko" ra" myiqe: zo: byid yaug qo" ra" . Yao: bam wa Mao" So: mung dao: re ta" hau" kyo: mo, ngad: ako" .
Ngonhaung" ai: yham mae myao" sho' thang: na thao re Yuda mung" mae" Agabu ga: mang: ra" lapa dayaug joe" lo: ra" .
Yao: wa ngonhaung" jhao" joe" li" mung:- Polu nho: phyid' cui: re yu: yu mung: ai: yang yao" khyid lo, jham re taui" ra" . Amung: yao: wa Ce: phyid' cui: sang re Yuda byu qe: yang Yerusalem vogaung: mae ceru: taui: mung: yao: bam wa yao: re Taung bug byu qe: lo, khyo ab byid' pye' li" genae"- ga: Gyang" Lho" Byo ta" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ce: dao: re ngonhaung" the' gyo: lao"- ngonhaung" we' ai: tau mae na mo, damyo" wa Polu re Yerusalem vogaung: khyo maye: nae" qhid' mae" ceim" mho' bam va" .
Ngadqere: Polu wa Naonhaung" pe" mung: ceru: ngug mung: nga" nhag' lam: re sho: byo, nhao: na ko" i? Ngo wa Asang Yesu mathao mae Yerusalem vogaung: mae taui" ru qhug' nae" ruza: mangad:- shid nae" lhao" re: jin" jin" ngad va"- ga: tau" ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao: re no: vao sho' maqo" ta" lomung: Mao" So o: ra" khyo" za: ngad vashao: ein: ta" mung: sae za: na: pye' bam va" .
Dayo, zo: kyo thao re ngonhaung" nho: zai jham re seim" nyhang" mung: Yerusalem khyo ye" lo" bam va" .
Kesarea vogaung: mae" mho"zo: qe damyo" re:- ngonhaung" we' daga" cao" li" mung: no' mae" lam khug: ra" phung: byu boe" na va" ra" Kupru gagyo: kao" mae" Mnason ga: mang: ra" yaug: nho: yham khyo yethang nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" re jhui" vao ye" ako" .
Yerusalem vogaung: khyo ngonhaung" joe" ye: lao"- lam khug: ra" mo, wa ngaui ngaui bau: bau: za: ngonhaung" re lham: tug: yu: ako" .
Ai: thao: ba re Polu wa ngonhaung" we' daga" Yaku re yeqhug' ra" . Phung: lau: de, qe alhab' mo, re: ai: tau mae na: bam: ako" .
Polu wa yao: bam re bang" se" dao: ta" mung:- yao: zaui: so" ra" mau" zo" khyo" yang Taung bug byu qe: phaung mae Mao" So kad' va" ra" mau" zo" jham ja: khao: ngo" re jab sho' lau thoe ta" kyo" ra" .
Polu ta" ra" lau thoe re bin: the' gyo: gethao re- yao: bam alhab' mo, wa Mao" So re caung: khin" byid' ako" . Ai: thao yao: bam wa- Polu re Mao: nhaung: Polu we"- Yuda byu qemae" lam khug: lo: ra" mo, khonho" taung ngad: rure we' yao: bam alhab' mo, wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" re khoqhi" sho' phug' cao" nae" kao bau mo, ngad ko" rure nao ba: myao gau ngad: ra" .
Nao wa Taung bug mung"dan: mae na ko" ra" Yuda byu alhab' mo, re yao: bam: myid: zo: qere au: qid lhai: khyo makad' genae" we' Yuda byu qe: thung" li jham re macao" genae" qhid' mae" ta" mung:- Moshe Tarha" re to" pye' genae" qhid' mae" nao mho" shid' lo: ra"- ga" rure yao: bam the' gyo" ci: avako" .
Ana" pe" ru: kad' nae" i? Nao joe" lo va" ra"- ga" rure yao: bam gaigai: the' gyo: genaeva" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa nao re ceru: kad' nhao nug: ra" . Ngonhaung" tau mae Mao" So re dao: so: to" ra" byu byid yaug na: ako" .
Yao: bam re jhui" lo" mung: kyang" san: ra" khyo re yao: bam we' daga" lo" kad' wa,- yao: bam au: qo" myhaug' pye' genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam: kyang" san: ra" khyo kad' ru mae gyo" ang: ra" aphug' re nao bobyid: wa,- ceru: kad' ruyang ni" khyo we' sin: yang: yao: bam the' gyo" ra" lau dao: jham wa madang nhaung ga" rure we' naoyao: yao: re: Moshe kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" na yaug ngad nhaung ga" rure yaug khao: ngo" ba: li" genae" .
Ngadqere: lam khug: lo ko" ra" Taung bug byu qe: qhid' mae" kam" wa- so solho re ngaui" byid' ra" zo: ve we' sa:- lang nhag' se' ra" gug' nyhug' sho: we' gintho' zaung: ra" khyo re jao" pye' genae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" myid: phyid' yang: yao: bam re vhin tung" dakhye' tung" vhin: ke' bam va"- ga: ta" ako" .
Airumung: Polu wa thao: ba re ai: byu byid yaug re jhui" yu mung: yao: bam we' daga" kyang" san: ra" khyo re kad' yu: ra" . Ai: thao re yao: wa Caung: pa" Yham khyo vao ye: mung: kyang" san: ra" khyo kad' ra" ayo, ba na khoyo, gan zai ngad: rure we' yao: bam yaug khao: ngo" qhid' mae" ngaui" xeim: ngaui" byid: nae" khoyo, ngad nae" rure ta" kyo" to: co' ra" .
Ngadqere: ba na nhad' ba byang" li" na lao"- Asia mung" mae" Yuda byu qe damyo" wa Polu re Caung: pa" Yham mae the' myao: ako" . Yao: bam wa mo,byu phung: mo" geim" re lhau: pug: to" ke' mung: Polu re taung" yu: ako" .
Yao: bam wa Israel byu qe we"- bao" yu gela,- byu ceyaug wa khyi" khao: ngo" cao" du" qin" yang: yaug kho: ngo" re Israel byumyu" rere: Moshe nho: Tarha" rere:- ce: Caung: pa" Yham rere:- gye kad' yang: mho" shid' byid' qin" yaug ngad: ra" . Amung: ana" re: yao: wa Caung: pa" Yham khyo Taung bug byu damyo" re jhui" vao li" mung:- ce: Gyang" Lho" ra" jo, qo re masan masin" kad' pye' ava"- ga: zag: hug' ako" .
( Yao: bam ceru: ta" ko" ru wa- Polu re Ephesu vobyu Trophimu ga" ra" yaug we' daga" vogaung: khug mae yao: bam the' myao geyang: ai: yaug re Caung: pa" Yham khyo jhui" vao li" ru ngad:- ga: yao: bam jho geyang: ngad: ako" . )
Vogaung: geim" mae- mo, thaui: mo, yaug boe" li" yang:- mo, byu qe alhab' mo, wa tao" zang" li" mung:- Polu re zaui: yang: Caung: pa" Yham taung gaung shad' khyo she: khyad' thug' lo" ako" . Ailao" jao" Caung: pa" Yham kham: dung: jham re pyid' pye' ako" .
Airu: mo, byu qe Polu re se' pye' nae" seim" na ko" au:- Yerusalem vogaung: geim"- mo, thaui: mo, yaug lu" na: ako"- ga" ra" lau thoe re Roma gyezug: mo" re lo" ta" kyo" ako" .
Ailao" jao"- gyezug: mo" wa gyezug: qe damyo" we' gyezo: qere jhui: mung:- mo, byu qe na ko" ra" jo, qo khyo tao" ye" lo" ra" . Mo, byu qe wa gyezug: mo" we' gyezo: qere lham: myao gelao"- yao: bam wa Polu re be; ru thang: pye' ako" .
Gyezug: mo" wa Polu jhao" ye" lo" mung:- taung" yu yang: jao cao: shid' khe' yang taui" to: nae" qhid' mae" amyin" khyo" ke' ra" . Ai: thao re gyezug: mo" wa Ceyaug khag' ngad: ra" i?- Yao: pe" kad' shad' va" ra" i?- ga: myid' ra" .
Mo, byu qe wa daphung: daja: ga: zag: hug' ako" . Airu: hug' yhai: na ko" ruyang gyezug: mo" wa boe" lo: ra" khyo re khyag' za: maqo" ba mung:- yao" byu qere Polu re gyetab khyo jhui" lo" genae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ke' ra" .
Yao: bam gyetab zam thao joe" lao"- mo, byu qe se' da: be, khyad' kad' li" ko" ruyang gyezo: qe wa Polu re yao: bam: lo, phyo: mae vo; do, lo" ako" .
Mo, byu qe wa- yao: re se' pye' ge,- ga: yao" thao cao" li" mung: zag: hug' ako" .
Gyetab khug khyo Polu re jhui" vao lo" nae" ngad lao"- Polu wa gyezug: mo" re Nao re ngo dao: shid' dakheim: gai: jhau nae" i? ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" gyezug: mo" wa- Nao Greeg myan" ba: jhau: i?
Amung: mataung" myao" shi: re geimlau to" mung: gyezo: byid taung re au: jhaung kad' yang: din"pyad' yo khyo jhui" ye" lo" ra" ai: Egutu byu mangad: i?- ga: Polu re myid' ra" .
Polu wa- Ngo wa Kiliki mung" Tarshu vogaung: mae khau: ra" Yuda byu dayaug ngad:- Akhyag: ra" vogaung: qi: mae" vobyu dayaug ngad:- jeju we' mo, byu qere dao: jhau nae" akhang" byid: la,- ga: ta" ra" .
Gyezug: mo" wa yao: re akhang" byid' ra" . Airumung: Polu wa zam thao au: mae ye; jo, mung: mo, byu qere sae za: na genae" qhid' mae" lo, tu" tu" ra" . Mo, byu qe tae" lo" gelao"- Polu wa yao: bam re Hebre myan" khyo"-
Myhi" pho" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo naonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae ta" qid' yu: ra" dao: re tae" gyo" yu ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Hebre myan" khyo" yao: bam re jhau: rure the' gyo: gelao" je yang: tae" lo" ko" ra"- alao" Polu wa xo' yang:-
Ngo wa Kiliki mung" Tarshu vogaung: mae khau: li" ra" Yuda byu dayaug ngad:- ngadqere: ce: Yerusalem vogaung: mae Gamale nho: jung nau" dayaug khyo" na: qi" li" yaug ngad:- ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe: Tarha" khug mae thin: ra" khyo" mho" shid' rure ngo kham: yu: lo va" . Ana" ba cemae na ko" ra" naonhaung" alhab' mo, we' dakhyo:- ngo re: Mao" So: qhid' mae" kao bau: lo yaug ngad: .
Ngo wa Khyo ce: khe' re cao" ra" mo, re shid sho' yhin" lo: ra" byu dayaug ngad: . Ngo wa yauggai myiqe: qere taung" yu mung: thaung: lhaung" lo yaug ngad:-
Ngo ta" na: ra" dao: thoe dang: rure Khinjaung Yin" pho" we' Tarha" Qe, Do, geim" mae" mo, sagse: qo" kham: ako" . Ngo wa yao: bam: lo, mae" Damasku vogaung: mae na ko" ra" Yuda mao: nhaung: qere tung" vhin: ke' ra" mug sug' re khae: yu mung: ai: mae na ko" ra" mo, re qobo dae byid: nae" taung" yu mung: Yerusalem vogaung: khyo taui" she: lo nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa Damasku vogaung: khyo ye" lo" va" .
Ngo airu: ye" lo" na: au:- Damasku vogaung: khyo jhao" li" lao" ba khaung tau ayo, ko re mug: gaung mae" bao qhui: ra" bo" bao dalam: wa nyag din taung" nga" avai: ayae mae bao: li" ra" .
Alao" ngo wa myid gaung khyo gyang: lang" lo" mung:- Sholu- Sholu- Nao ngo re pe" mung: yhin" ra" i?- ga: ngo re jhau: ra" thoe re the' gyo: va" .
Ngo wa- Asang we"- Nao khag' ngad: i?- ein: myid' ke' lao"- yao: wa- Ngo wa nao yhin" na: ra" Nazared mae" Yesu ngad:- ga: ngo re ta" ra" .
Ngo we' daga" ngad: ra" mo, wa ai: bo" bao re the' myao gengad yang: re: ngo re dao: jhau: na: ra" yaug: thoe mathe' gyo: ko" ngad: ra" .
Alao"- ngo wa Asang we"- ngo pe" ru: kad' zai i?- ein: myid' ke' lao" Asang wa- To" mung: Damasku vogaung: khug khyo vao ye" lo" wa,- nao kad' nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So san: to" ra" mau" zo" alhab' ai: vogaung: mae nao re ta" kyo" li" genae"- ga: ngo re ta" ra" .
Ai: bao qhui: ra" bo" bao: yang ngo wa myo, jid: lo" byaug mung: nga" byin cao: qe wa ngo re lo; yang she mung: Damasku vogaung: khug khyo jhui" she: vao ye: ko" ra" .
Ngonhaung" Tarha" re phug' cao" yaug we' Mao" So: khyo re kao bau yaug ngad mung: ai: vogaung: mae na ko" ra" Yuda byu qe alhab' mo; yang re: phug' myao: ko" ra" Anania ga:- mang: ra" byu dayaug wa ngo jhao" li" ra" .
Yao: wa nga" nhae mae li" ye; jo, mung:- Mao: nhaung: pho" Sholu we"- ni" myo, dam: myao: li" vashao:- ga: ta" ra" . Ailao" jao"- nga" myo, dam: myao: li" mung: yao: re qu" ke' re-
Anania wa- Nao wa ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe: Mao" So: myid o: ra" khyo re ba nae" re:- Mao" So: din: man" ra" daui daui yaug re the' myao nae" re:- yao" jhau thoe re the' gyo: nae" qhid' mae" re:- Mao" So wa nao re khyin: yu: to" ava" .
Pe"mung: ga"re nao wa nao yao: the' myao va" ra" khyo we' the' gyo: va" ra" dao: re byu yaug khao: ngo" re ta" kyo: byid: nae" ai: Asang: qhid' mae" sagse: boe" lo: li" nae" .
Nao ana" pe" mung: yam" na: i? To" mung: qid nyhab' kham: yu wa,- ni" qobo cid' shao: pye' ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" Asang re akyu" mho' wa,- ga: ngo re ta" ra" .
Ngo wa Yerusalem khyo dam: joe" lo mung:- Caung: pa" Yham mae akyu" mho' yang: na: au:- qhu" lho dalam: re ngo myao:-
Ai: qhu" lho mae Asang re ngo the' myao mung:- Yao: wa ngo re- Nao Yerusalem vogaung: mae" phyad za: thug' lo" wa,- Pe"mung: ga"re ce: vogaung: mae" mo, byu qe wa nga" khyo we' sin: yang: nao sagse: kham: ra" dao: re makhae: yu genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" ngo wa Asang we"- ngo wa tarha" jung yham jham khyo vao ye: mung: Nao re lam khug: ra" mo, re taung" yu yang: be, yaug ngad: rure yao: bam ba: ako" .
Amung: ni" sagse: pho" Stephan re se' ra" au: rere: ngoyao: re: aimae na mung: bocao: myid vang" ru we' yao: re se' ra" mo; mai bau: jham re bo: zam: byid' lo va"- ein: phaug' tau" ke' .
Alao" Asang wa- Ye" lo" wa,- pe"mung: ga"re ngo nao re Taung bug byu qe na: ra"- va" ra" mung" khyo nhao: ke' nae"- ga: ta" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mo, byu qe wa ceru: ta" ru joe" sho' tae" gyo" yu: ako" . Ngadqere: ai: thao re yao: bam wa yao: re yu: pye' ge,- Se' pye' ge,- yao: wa daui: na nae" maman: ngad: ra"- ga: yao: bam: thoe myhao: thao" mae" zag: hug' to" li" ako" .
Yao: bam wa zag: hug' ru we' yao: yao" mai bau: jham re vhag' mung:- phalhug gag: sin: yang: na: ako" .
Ailao"- Roma gyezug: mo" wa Polu re gyetab khug khyo jhui" vao lo" mung:- yao: re ceru: Yuda byu qe gye kad' yang: zag: hug' na ko" ra" khyo ba nae" qhid' mae" Polu re be, yang: myid: nae" qhid' mae" yao" byu qere amyin" byid' ke' ra" .
Yao: bam Polu re be, genae" ga: taui: gelao"- Polu wa ayae mae ye; jo; ra" gyezug: pho" re- Roma mung"dan: byu dayaug re qobo mamyid' ca: qu" lo: be, nae" qhid' mae" tarha" vao: i? ga: myid' ke' ra" .
Ce: dao: re gyezug: pho" the' gyo: lao"- yao: wa gyezug: mo" jhao" ye" lo" mung:- Zug: mo" we"- Nao pe" nam kad' na: ru ngad: i? Byu ceyaug wa Roma mung"dan: byu dayaug ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: gyezug: mo" wa- Polu jhao" lo mung: yao: re- Nao Roma mung"dan: byu ngad: i? ngo re ta" kyo: la,- ga: myid' ra" . Polu wa ngad: ga: tau" ra" .
Gyezug: mo" pho" wa- Ngo wa ngaui myo: sho' byid: yang: Roma mung"dan: byu boe" lo yaug ngad:- ga: ta" lao"- Polu wa ngo wa khau: li" mae" boe" va"- ga: tau" ra" .
Ailao" jao"- yao: re myid' ca: qu" nae" ga: seim" mo, wa naung zad: zad' lo" ako" . Gyezug: mo" wa Polu wa Roma mung"dan: byu ngad: ga" rure ba lao"- yao: re jao co: vhe' shad' va" ruyang gyaug: din: pye' ra" .
Gyezug: mo" wa Polu re Yuda byu qe pe" khyo" yang qobo zhaug' ko" ra" khyo re khyag' za: ba nug: ra" . Airumung: yao: wa thao: ba re Polu re taui" to" ra" jao co: pheim: pye' nhao mung: khinjaung qi: qe we' Yuda tarha" qe, do, phung: mae bo: ra" mo, alhab' re zang" ham: na genae" qhid' mae" amyin" khyo" ke' ra" . Ai: thao re yao: wa Polu re jhui" lo mung: yao: bam: qhid' kheim: mae yhe' to" ra" .
Polu wa Yuda Tarha" qe, do, geim" mae" mo, re zhaug' qu" mung:- Nga" mao: nhaung: Israel byu qe we"- ana" ba joe" sho' ngo wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae nhag' lam: gyang: gyang: za: kao so' daui: lo va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Khinjaung Yin" Anania wa Polu nhae mae ye; jo; ra" mo, re- Polu nhad' re be, byid: nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ra" .
Alao"- Polu wa- Laug phyu gyad: to" ra" khinqae we"- Mao" So nao re gaigai: yao: be; li" nae"- nao wa ai: Tarha" we' dakhyo: ngo re dao: kho' nae" qhid' mae" ai: mae zaung: jo, sho' ngadqere: Tarha" re shad' lhoe" mung:- ngo re be, nae" amyin" byid' ra" ga: ta" ra" .
Polu nhae mae te' na: ra" mo, wa Polu re Nao wa Mao" So: Khinjaung Yin" re roe" dao: jhau: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Alao" Polu wa Mao: nhaung: Israel byu qe we"- yao: Khinjaung Yin" ngad: rure ngo maba ga: tau" ra" . Jham: mugsug' mae ni" byumyu" re zug: kad' ra" yaug re magai: ra" khyo" magai: jhau- ga: ta" to" ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Polu wa- Tarha" Qe, Do, phung: mae bobo: ra" mo, mae" damyo" wa Pharishe qe ngad mung:- damyo" wa Saduke qe ngad ko" rure myao lao"- Mao: nhaung: Israel byu qe we"- ngo wa Pharishe dayaug ngad mung: Pharishe dayaug: yao: zo: re: ngad:- shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nae" rure ngo myid: lao" na: ra" khyo mathao: yang ngo wa cetau mae myid' ca: qu" ru qhug' na: ru ngad: ra"- ga: tarha" qe, do, mae hug' ra" .
Polu ce: dao: ta: ke' we'- Pharishe qe we' Saduke qe wa jho" ta" ngag: byo; thug' li" gemung: tarha" qe, do, phung: wa shid' phung: jho" kho' lo" ako" .
( Pe"mung: ga"re Saduke qe wa byu wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ru majo,- mug: lagyo: qe ga" ru mana- byo jham re: mana- ga: ta" mo, ngad: ako" . Ngadqere: Pharishe qe wa ai sam ja" geim" jo;- na: ga: lam: ako" . )
Hug' ra" thoe wa je: qi" li" mung:- Pharishe qe: shad' khyo bobo: ra" jham: tung" pho" qe daqhae: wa- to" ye; li" mung:- byu ceyaug mae pe" shad' ru ngonhaung" mamyao- Byo: yang la, mangad: lao"- mug: lagyo" yang la,- yao: re gaigai: yao: jhau: ru ngad: re gai: ngad naeva"- ga: ta" ako" .
Airu: jho" ta" ngag: ra" khyo je: xo: li" mung: Polu re adau atam" kad' pye' li" genae" rure gyezug: pho" gyaug: ra" . Airumung: yao: wa yao" gyezo: qere mo, phaung khyo gyo" ye: yang: Polu re yao: bam: lo, mae" yejhui" yu mung: gyetab khug khyo jhui" lo genae" qhid' mae" amyin" khyo" ke' ra" .
Ai: myi re Mao" So wa Polu nhae mae li" ye; jo, mung:- Dagyaug- Nao wa ce: Yerusalem vogaung: mae nga" khyo re sagse: qo" kham byid' ava" . Ai we' dakhyo:- Roma vogaung: mae re: sagse: kham byid: ca" shi: nae" ga: ta" ra" .
Thao: ba ne, kao re Yuda byu qe daqhae: wa jho" qham mung: pha,jhi" khyug' ako" . Yao: bam wa Polu re maqo" se' pye' pye' wa pe" re: mazo: mashaug' nae"- ga: jham tang" to" ako" .
Ceru: pha,jhi" khyug' ra" mo, wa byid xe zo: je ngad: ako" .
Ai: thao re- yao: bam wa khinjaung qi: qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qejhao" ye: mung: Ngonhaung" wa Polu re maqo" se' se' wa pe" re: mazo: mashaug' nae" ein: gyai ein: jham tang" to" bam va" .
Airumung:- ngonhaung" we' Tarha" Qe, Do, Phung: qe wa Polu khyo re je yang: ba nug geim kad' yang: Polu re naonhaung" jhao" jhui" gyo" lo nae" qhid' mae" Roma gyezug: pho" re dao: pyang: ke' ge,- Naonhaung" jhao" yao: majoe" gyo" lo shire ngonhaung" wa yao: re se' nae" qhid' mae" jin" jin" lao" na: bam nae"- ga: yeta" ako" .
Ngadqere: ai: pha,jhi" khyug' to" ra" khyo re Polu yao: nhae: mo" nho: yauggai zo: the' gyo: mung:- yao: wa gyetab khyo vao ye: yang: Polu re yeta" kyo" ra" .
Airumung: Polu wa- gyezug: pho" dayaug re khai: yu mung:- Ce: zolau: re gyezug: jhao" jhui" ye: wa,- Gyezug: pho" re ta" kyo: nae" daja: yao: qo" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Gyezug: pho" ai: zolau: re jhui" yu yang: gyezug: mo" jhao" jhui" vao ye: mung:- Thaung: byu Polu wa ngo re khai: yu yang: ce: zolau: nau" re nao jhao" jhui" li" nhao: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re zolau: pho" wa nao re ta" kyo: nae" dao: daja: qo" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" gyezug: mo" wa yao: re lo, mae" she yang: dadug khyo jhui" ye: mung:- Nao ngo re pe" ja: ta" kyo: nug: i?- ga: myid' ra" .
Ailao"- ai: zolau: pho" wa- Yuda kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, wa- Polu khyo re je yang: ba nug geim kad' gemung: yang:- ne, kao Polu re Tarha" Qe, Do, khyo jhui" gyo" lo nae" qhid' mae" nao zug: mo" re mho' nae" ga:- jho" qham: myid vang" to" avako" .
Yao: bam: dao: re datae" gyo: wa,- pe"mung: ga"re byu byid' xe zo: je wa khyole; mae vho' jo, mung:- yao: re lao" na: li" genae" . Yao: bam wa Polu re za: maqo" se' pye' pye' wa pe" re: mazo: mashaug' nae" ga: jham tang" to" avako" . Ana" yao: bam wa Polu re se' nae" nyhang" jin" to: mung: ni" dao: phyid' reza: lao" na: bam: ako"- ga: ta" ra" .
Gyezug: mo" wa- Nao ngo re ceru: li" ta" kyo" ra" khyo re khag' rere: data" kyo: ga: ta" mung: ai: zolau: pho" re phao nhao: ke" ra" .
Ai: thao re gyezug: mo" wa- yao" gyezug: shid' zo: re khai: yu mung:- Kesarea vogaung: khyo ye: nae" qhid' mae" gyezo: shid' yo- myao: jui: byu nhad' xe- lhae ci gyezo:- shid' yo- ana" myi gug yo, qug re to" nae" seim" jin" to: ge,
Amung: Polu zaung nae" myao: re nyhang" byid: mung: mang: zug: pho" Felig jhao" joe" sho' gug: gug: za: yedai" ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- gyezug: mo" pho" wa- ceru: ga: vhin tung" dakhye' tung" mung: byid' ke' ra" .
Phug' myao" tho' ra" mang: zug: pho" Felig re Klaudiu Lusia au" ke' ra" .
Yuda byu qe wa byu ceyaug re taung" yu mung: se' pye' nae" seim" ako" . Yao: wa Roma mung"dan: byu ngad: rure ngo ba mung: ngo wa nga" gyezo: qe we' ye: mung: yao: re yekhyad' yu: to: va" .
Ngo wa- yao: re Yuda byu qe pe" qobo zhaug' ko" ra" khyo re ba nug yang: yao: re Yuda Tarha" Qe, Do, khyo jhui" gyo" ye: va" .
Yao: re qobo zhaug' ra" khyo wa yao: bam yao" tarha" we' sin: yang: qobo zhaug' ru ngad mung:- yao: wa shid man" ra" qobo- mangad: lao" thaung: lhaung" ke' man" ra" qobo yao: pe" daja: rere: mashad' rure ngo myao: .
Amung: yao: re se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" pha,jhi" khug' khyug' na ko" ra" khyo re ngo re ta" kyo: gelao"- yao: re nao jhao" dai" ke' nae" ai jao" yao: ngo myid: phyid' va" . Amung: yao: re qobo zhaug' ko" ra" mo, rere: ni" qhid' kheim: mae yejho" ta" genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re ngo ta" ke' va"- ga: tung" ke' ra" .
Gyezo: jham re: amyin" we' dakhyo: kad' ako" . Yao: bam wa Polu re yejhui" yu mung: ai: myi reyao:- Antipatri vogaung: joe" sho' yedai" ke' ako" .
Ai: thao: ba re khyid tab gyezo: jham wa gyetab khyo dam: tug' lo mung:- myao: tab gyezo: qe wa Polu we' daga" ye" lo" nae" qhid' mae" nha: to: co' ako" .
Ai: myao: tab gyezo: qe wa Polu re Kesarea vogaung: joe" sho' yedai" mung:- mang: zug: pho" lo, mae ai: vhin tung" re yedai" yang:- Polu re ye: ab byid' ako" .
Mang: zug: pho" wa ai: vhin tung" re nghe' mung: Polu re- Nao kho: mung" mae" ngad: i?- ga: myid' ra" . Mang: zug: pho" wa- Polu re Kiliki mung" mae" ngad: rure ba lao"-
Yao: wa- Nao re qobo zhaug' ko" ra" mo, joe" li" gelao"- ngo wa ni" nho: mau" re gyo: byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" . Ai: thao re mang: zug: pho" wa- Herod kad' ra" yham mo" khug mae zaung" ra" gug: gam gyezo: qe we' daga" Polu re nha: to: nae" amyin" byid' ke' ra" .
Ai: thao- ngo" ba re Khinjaung Yin" Anania wa- lau: de, au: jhaung qe daqhae: we' daga" tarha" zug: Tertulu ga" ra" yaug re jhui: mung: Kesarea vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ra" . Yao: bam wa Felig qhid' kheim: khyo vao ye: mung:- Polu re qobo zhaug' ra" khyo re ye: kug: ako" .
Ailao" Polu re khai: vhao" yu mung:- Tarha" zug: pho" Tertulu qobo zhaug' dao: ta" ru wa- Phug' myao: tho' ra" zug: pho" Felig we"- pha,jhi" kung: ra" ni" au: she: ra" aqab mae ngonhaung" wa zin na myao" sho' ngaui pyo: yaug yo za: qo" na: bam va"- Nao wa ngonhaung" mung"dan: qhid' mae" qo ca" ra" gai: ra" mau" zo" myo: sho' re kad' byid' na yaug ngad: ra" .
Amung: ngonhaung" wa ceru re jo, qo khyi" khao: ngo" mae khonhae" re: kham: yu mung:- nao re jeju gyai beim: so" na:-
Ngo wa zug: pho" ni" yo, khyin: re myo: sho' mayu nug . Airumung: lang" ra" khyo" ngonhaung" ta" ra" dao: re tae" gyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" mho' ra" .
Byu ceyaug wa aqug: akhai: boe" nhao yaug ngad: ru we' mug: myid geim" mae" Yuda byu qere mo, thaui: mo, yaug boe" nae" poe yaug ngad mung: Nazared phung: mae" au: jhaung dayaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" the' myao va" .
Yao: wa Caung: pa" Yham rere: masan masin" boe" nhao nae" seim" na: ruyang ngonhaung" yao: re taung" yu: ru ngad: .
Asang nao yao: byu ceyaug re myid' ca: qu" re wa- Ngonhaung" yao: re qobo zhaug' ra" khyo alhab' nao yao: the' gyo" li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yuda byu qe wa ce: dao: alhab' dang: ra"- ga: ceim" ta" ako" .
Alao" ai: mang: zug: pho" wa lo, tu" tu" yang: Polu re dao: jhau nhao: ke' ra" . Polu wa Zug: pho" nao wa ce: byumyu" qe: dao mae zin na myo: sho' dao: kho' yang: na: lo: rure ngo ba: . Amung: ngo wa ni" qhid' kheim: mae ngo yao" gaung re qo" ta" vha: yu yang: gyai ngaui bau" ra" .
Ngo wa Yerusalem vogaung: khyo Mao" So re caung: pa" nae" qhid' mae" ye" ru ana" daxe: shid' ba maje shi" rure zug: pho" naoyao: qo" gai: qin" yu: ra" .
Ngo wa Caung: pa" Yham mae dayaug we' re: jho" ta" ngag: na: rure aimae na: ra" mo, mamyao ko" ngad: ra" . Ai: tho' mago" Yuda tarha" jung yham mae re: vogaung: khug mae re: mo, byu qe lu" to" li" nhao nae" qhid' mae" poe: na: rure: yao: bam mathe' myao ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa ana" ni" qhid' kheim: mae qobo zhaug' na ko" ra" khyo rere: sagse: maqo" ceim" shid' ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam shad' nghung" ra"- ga: jho ko" ra" khyo khyo" yang ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe Mao" So re caung: pa" ra" khyo celam: re wa ni" qhid' kheim: mae ngad va" ein: ngo tau" yu: ra" . Ngadqere: ngo wa Moshe kham" to" ra" Tarha" dao: alhab' re we' Lapa qe: jham: paug' mae tung" to" ra" gu: alhab' rere: ngo lam: ra" .
Ngo wa yao: bam we' dakhyo:- xao su byu qe alhab' mo, wa gai: ra" mo, magai: ra" mo, alhab' dakhyo: za: shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nae" ngad: ein:- Mao" So mae myid: lao" na yaug ngad: .
Airumung: ngo wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae re: byu: qhid' kheim: mae re:- nhag' lam: gyang: gyang: za: ngad nae" qhid' mae" khonhae" re: gai: boe" qhi" qam: ke' na: ru ngad: .
Ngo wa Yerusalem vogaung: mae" thug' lo: ru myo: sho' zin ngad thao re- nga" byumyu" qe: qhid' mae" Alu: ngaui vin: ye: nae" qhid' mae" we' Mao" So re xeim: ngaui" byid: nae" qhid' mae" ai: vogaung: khyo joe" lo va" .
Yao: bam wa ngo kyang" san: ra" khyo bin: kad' thao- Caung: pa" Yham mae xeim: ngaui" byid' na: au: re- ngo re the' myao: ako" . Ai: au: re ngo we' daga" mo, byu qe- mo, thaui: mo, yaug pe" maboe" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ai: tau mae Asia mung" mae" joe" li" ra" Yuda byu qe daqhae: na: ako" . Yao: bam ngore qobo zhaug' nae" daja: ja: jo, ko" ngad: re wa yao: bam yao" gaung yao: ni" qhid' kheim: khyo vao li" mung: yao: bam: qobo zhaug' ra" khyo re li" ta" genae" ang: ra" .
Mangad: lao" re:- ana" cemae na ko" ra" byu qe ana" gyo: ngo wa Tarha" Qe, Do, phung: qhid' kheim: mae ye; jo; ra" au:- yao: bam ngo re pe" ja" qobo myao ko" ngad: re wa- ai re ta" vageshao:-
Ai: phaung mae yao: bam: qhid' kheim: mae ngo ye; jo; au: ana" ba ngo wa- shid: ra" mo, dam: daui: to" li" ko" ra" ga" ra" lam khug: ra" khyo mathao mae ngo dao: kho' ru qhug' na: ra"- ein: ru kam" wa ngo hug' ta" va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re Felig wa ai: khyo we' sin: yang: nyang" za: ba: to: yaug ngad mung: myid' ca: qu" ra" khyo re thang: pye' ra" . Alao" yao: wa gyezug: mo" Lusia joe" lo lao"- ngo naonhaung" mau" re dao: phyid' byid: nae"- ga: yao: bam re ta" ra" .
Amung: mang: zug: pho" wa Polu re zaung" ngadqere: gyai ajhe' ajhin: mangad: lo:- yao" ba nam byin cao: qe: yang yao: qo ca" ra" gu: re li" caung da" byid: ko" rure akhang" byid: nae" qhid' mae" gyezug: pho" re amyin" byid: ke' ra" .
Dayo, kyo thao re Felig wa Yuda myiqe: Drusila ga: mang: ra" yao" yham sang myhi" we' daga" joe" li" ra" . Yao: wa Polu re khai: yu nhao mung: Yesu Khristu re lam khug: ra" khyo we' sin: yang: Polu kho" kyo" ra" mung dao: re tae" gyo" yu: ra" .
Ngadqere: Polu wa gai shab: ra" khyo- yao: yao" gaung re khang" ra" khyo- joe" li" nae" ra" dao: kho' ra" ba na we' sin" ra" khyo re kho" kyo: byid: lao"- Felig wa gyaug: li" mung:- Ana" nao lo" se,- thao phyao: agu yo" lao"- ngo nao re dam: khai nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Polu wa yao: re khug vag: byid' li" maba ga:- myid: lao" mung:- Felig wa Polu re dazab: makyo khai: yu nhao mung: dao: jhau: ra" .
Ai: thao shid' zin lao"- mang: zug: pho" Felig khu mae Poku Festu ga: yaug mang: zug: dam: tha" kad' ra" . Felig wa Yuda byu qere myo, nho qo" nhao nug mung: yao: wa- Polu re thaung: mae nha: to: co' ra" .
Festu wa ai: mung" khyo joe" lo thao sam ba re yao: wa Kesarea vogaung: mae" Yerusalem vogaung: khyo ye" lo" ra" .
Khin jaung qi: qe we' Yuda lau: de, au: jhaung qe wa Polu re qobo zhaug' ra" khyo myo: sho' li" ta" kyo" ako" .
Yao: bam wa Polu re khyole; mae lham: khug' se' pye' nae" pha,jhi" khyug' to: gemung:- yao: bam re jeju kad' ra" khyo" Polu re Yerusalem vogaung: khyo jhui" li" byid: nae" qhid' mae" Festu re mho' ako" .
Festu wa yao: bam re- Polu wa Kesarea vogaung: mae thaung: laung" jo; ra" . Mataung" myao" re ngo yao: re: ai: khyo dam: tug' phao: lo" zai ngad: .
Airumung: naonhaung" au: jhaung qe wa ngo we' daga" cao" li" mung:- Polu yao: daja: ja: shad' va" ngad: re wa- yao: re qobo li" zhaug' vageshao:- ga: tau" ra" .
Festu wa yao: bam we' daga" ba na she' ba la, daxe ba la, thang: na mung:- Kesarea vogaung: khyo phao: lo" ra" . Ai: thao: ba re yao: wa dao: kho' ra" tarha" yung" mae zaung: jo, mung:- Polu re jhui" vao lo nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ke' ra" .
Polu joe" vao lo lao"- Yerusalem mae" joe" li" ko" ra" Yuda byu qe wa- Polu re lhang" gam" to: mung:- Polu re yao: bam sagse: maqo" ceim" shid' ra" gyai qi" ra" qobo jham myo: sho' ja: zhaug' ako" .
Ngadqere: Polu wa- Ngo wa Yuda byu qe: tarha" rere: Caung: pa" Yham rere: Roma Kho: sin" rere: qobo shad' ru daja: re: makad' ga: yao: yao" gaung re ta" vha: yu: ra" .
Ngadqere: Festu wa Yuda byu qere myo, nho kad' nug mung:- Polu re- Nao wa Yerusalem vogaung: khyo lo" mung: nga" qhid' kheim: mae ce: qobo zhaug' ra" khyo jham re myid' ca: qu" nae" nug: i?- ga: myid' ra" .
Alao" Polu wa- Ngo wa ai: mae ngo re dao: kho' ang: ra" Kho: sin" pho" nho: dao: kho' ra" tarha" yung" mae ye; jo, va" . Nao yao: nyang" za: ba: ru we' dakhyo:- ngo wa Yuda byu qere pe" qobo mashad' qu"-
Ngo wa tarha" re shad' lhoe" mung: shid man" ra" qobo qo" yaug ngad: re wa- loe; beim nae" qhid' mae" ngo mamho' ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam ngo re qobo zhaug' ko" ra" khyo jham madang: ru ngad: re wa loe; beim nae" qhid' mae" ngo mamho' ngadqere: yao: bam: lo, khyo ngo re khag' re: maqo" ab byid: ngad: ra" .
