Ngo re kho: sin" pho" qhid' kheim: khyo lhai: to' ke' byid: nae" mho' ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Festu wa yao" pha,jhi" byid: lau: de, qe we' bin: jho" qham thao re Nao kho: sin" pho" jhao" lhai: to' ke' byid: nae" mho' va" rumung: kho: sin" pho" jhao" nao ye: ca" li" nae"- ga: tau" ra" .
Dayo, kyo thao re- kho: kham Agripa we' Bernike shid' zo: wa zug: pho" Festu re bang" se" tug: yu nae" qhid' mae" Kesarea vogaung: khyo joe" lo: ako" .
Ai: vogaung: mae yao: bam myo: sho' ba na thao re- Festu wa Polu khyo we' sin: yang: kho: kham pho" re zhao: kyo" ra" . Festu wa kho: kham pho" re cemae Felig yang lhaung" to: co' ra" thaung: byu dayaug na: ra" .
Ngo Yerusalem vogaung: khyo joe" ye" ra" au:- Yuda khinjaung qi: qe we' lau: de, au: jhaung qe wa yao: re qobo zhaug' mung: yao: re dao: phyid' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngo re mho' ako" .
Ngadqere: ngo wa yao: bam re qobo zhaug' ru qhug' ra" yaug wa yao: re qobo zhaug' ko" ra" khyo we' sin: yang: yao: yao" gaung re ta" vha: ra" dao: jhau nae" akhang" mabyid: lo: khag' rere: qobo qo" ein: ab byid' ke' nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" Roma thung" tarha" mae majo, ein: ta" co' va" .
Airumung: yao: bam ce: vogaung: khyo joe" li" gelao"- ngo wa akhyin: mazai" kan" lo:- thao: ba re yao:- dao: kho' ra" tarha" yung" mae zaung: jo, mung: ai: yaug re khai: jhui" vao lo nae" amyin" byid' ke' va" .
Yao" nho: gyevo qe wa to" ye, mung:- yao: re qobo zhaug' ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa ngo myid: jho: ra" makhyang" ra" qobo jham yao: re mazhaug' ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa yao: bam yao" caung: pa" thung" we' sin: yang: shid: byaug va" ra" Yesu ga: mang: ra" yaug we' sin: yang: za: yao: we' jho" ta" ngag: na: ru ngad: ako" . Polu wa Yesu daui: na:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngo wa ce: mau" zo" we' sin: yang: khoru: mha" yu nae" rure matho' ba loyang:- Yerusalem vogaung: khyo ye: mung: ai: qobo zhaug' ko" ra" khyo re myid' ca: qu" rure yekham: yu nug: i?- ein: ngo yao: re myid' .
Ngadqere: Polu wa kho: sin" pho" jhao" lhai: to' ke' byid: nae" mho' ra" . Yao: wa airu: lhaung" to: mung: kho: sin" pho" yao: dao: phyid' vashao:- ga: ta" ra" . Airumung: yao: re kho: sin" pho" jhao" dai" ke' ra" yo, joe" sho' yao: re lhaung" to: nae" qhid' mae" ngo amyin" byid' to: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ailao" Agripa wa Festu re Ai: yaug: dao: re ngo yao: re: tae" gyo: nug: ra"- ga: ta" ra" . Festu wa nao ne,kao yao" dao: re the' gyo" li" nae"- ga: tau" ra" .
Thao: ba re Agripa we' Bernike wa gyai gyag: ra" khin khyo" gyezug: qe we' vogaung: mae" au: jhaung qe we' daga" shava phaung phaung: ra" yham mo" khug khyo vao lo: ako" . Amung: Festu amyin" byid' ke' lao"- Polu re jhui" vao lo ko" ra" .
Alao" Festu wa kho: kham Agripa we' cetau mae phaung: na ko" ra" mo, alhab' we"- Yerusalem vogaung: we' ce: vogaung: mae na ko" ra" Yuda byu qe qobo zhaug' yang: ngo re li" ta" kug: to: ko" ra" yaug wa ceyaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" . Alao" yao: bam wa- Yao: re adaui nha: to: nae" maang ga: ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: wa shid man" ra" qobo pe" kad' shad' rure re: ngo mamyao- amung: yao: wa kho: sin" pho" jhao" to' ke' byid: nae" qhid' mae" mho' ruyang ngo wa yao: re dai" ke' nae" myid: phyid' to" ru ngad: .
Ngadqere: ngo wa Roma kho: sin" pho" re yao" nho: mau" we' sin: yang: nyang" za: mugsug' tung" mung: sho' kyo: nae" pe" re: majo,- airumung: ngo wa yao: re naonhaung" qhid' kheim: khyo jhui" lo: ru ngad: ra" . Yao: re kho: kham pho" bin: myid' ca: qu" lao"- ngo wa kho: sin" pho" jhao" mugsug' tung" vhin: ke' nae" khyo dakheim: daqo: qo" nae" qhid' mae" je yang: kho: kham Agripa qhid' kheim: khyo jhui" lo: ru ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re thaung: byu dayaug re dai" ke' re yao: re qobo zhaug' ra" khyo jhaug' za: ceim" shid' mung: matung" ke' re wa- khyo majo nae" ein: ngo jho: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Agripa wa Polu re nao yao" gaung re ta" vha: yu: ra" dao: jhau nae" akhang" qo" ra"- ga: ta" ra" . Alao" Polu wa yao" lo, re yheim" ke' mung:- yao: yao" gaung re ta" vha: yu: ra" .
Kho: kham Agripa we"- Ngo wa Yuda byu qe qobo zhaug' ko" ra" khyo alhab' re ana" ba ni" qhid' kheim: mae ngo yao" gaung re qo" ta" vha: yu: ru wa nga" qhid' mae" gyai qi" ra" akho: akhang" ngad: ra" ein:- ngo myid: ra" .
kho: kham nao wa- Yuda byu qe: thung" li jham we' jho" ta" ngag: ra" khyo jham alhab' re nyang" za: ba yaug ngad: ra" . Airumung: nga" dao: thoe re nhag' lam: qhang qhang za: tae" gyo" yu byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngo mho' ra" .
Ngo wa zoqae: yo, mae" khoru: kao so' daui: lo va" rure Yuda byu alhab' ba: ako" . Ngo wa sao qhid' dau re ngo yao: khau: li" ra" mung" mae na mung:- ai: thao re Yerusalem vogaung: mae nga" pyad dapyad geim" na: lo: rure yao: bam ba: ako" .
Aqhid mae" ngo wa ngonhaung" caung: pa" thung" mae" je: qao: ra" Pharishe phung: vao byu dayaug khyo" kao so' daui: lo yaug ngad: rure yao: bam khoru" rere: ba: to: gau ngad gemung: nga" khyo rere: yao: bam sagse: kham nug ko" ngad: re wa yao: bam qo" kham: ako" .
Mao" So: yang ngonhaung" phug' pho" qere byid' to" ra" dao: so: re ngo myid: lao" na: ruyang ana" ngo wa ce: jo, qo mae ye; jo, mung: myid' ca: qu" ru qhug' na: ra" .
Daxe: shid' kaung mae" ngonhaung" byumyu" qe wa ai: dao: so: re qo" khae: yu nae" myid: lao" mung: myi" re: na" re: Mao" So re caung: pa" ako" . Kho: kham Pho" we"- ce: myid: lao" ra" khyo mathao mae ngo wa Yuda byu qeyang qobo zhaug' ru qhug' na: ru ngad: ra" .
Mao" So: yang sushid re daui: to" li" nhao: rure magai: lam" ein: cetau mae na: ra" Yuda byu qe naonhaung" pe" mung: jho ko" i?
Ngo yao: re: Nazared mae" Yesu mang re gye kad' ra" mau" zo" re ngo qo" kad' ra" ja: alhab' re kad' ang: ein: myid: jho: lo yaug ngad:-
Ngo wa Yerusalem vogaung: mae airu: yao: kad' lai: lo va"- ngo khinjaung qi: qemae" kheim: so' yu: ci yang: Mao" So: byu qere thaung: taui" lhaung" mung: yao: bam re se' pye' nae" dao: kho' rumae re: myid vang" lo, botau: lo va" .
Yuda tarha" jung yham mae re: yao: bam re myo: sho' lhang qobo dae byid: mung:- yao: bam: lam khug: ra" khyo re ha: pye' genae" qhid' mae" ngo gyai qam: ke' va" . Ngo wa yao: bam re nhag' saung" yo: mung: gatau: mung"dan: mae" vogaung: jham khyo lhao" re: ye: mung: yao: bam re yeyhin" qu" va" .
Airu: kad' nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa khinjaung yin" qemae" kheim: so' amyin" yu: ci mung: Damasku vogaung: khyo ye" lo" va" .
Khyole; mae ye" lo" na: au:- na" gaung ba khaung tau yo, re kho: kham pho" we"- ba tho' je: zho: ra" bo" bao dalam: mug: gaung mae" bao: thug' li" mung:- nga" lhang" gam: mae we' ngo we' daga" ngad: ra" mo; lhang" gam: mae zho: jo; rure ngo the' myao: .
Ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa myid gaung khyo gyang: lang" lo" bam mung: Hebre myan" khyo" Sholu- Sholu- Nao ngo re pe" mung: yhin" na: i? Nung: jaung lo: wa yao: re be, nae" yao" asang: nho: vose: zau: au: mae khyid pag' pag' yu: ru we' dakhyo:- nao wa ngo re gye kad' yang: nao yao" gaung re nao yao: no nhao: ra"- ga: ngo re jhau: ra" thoe the' gyo" .
Alao"- ngo wa Asang we"- Nao khag' ngad: i? ein: myid' ke'- Asang wa- Nao yhin" na: ra" Yesu ngad:- ga: tau" ra" .
Ngadqere: to" mung: ye; jo, wa,- nao re nga" daui daui yaug khyo" san: to: nae" qhid' mae" nga" gaung nao re qhu" byid: va" . Ana" ba nao ngo re pe" nam qhu" byid: va" ra" khyo re we' thao phyao: ngo nao re qhu" byid: nae" ra" khyo re nao wa su gaje qere sagse: kham byid: ca" nae" ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa Israel byu qe: lo, mae" re:- nao re ngo nhao: ke' nae" ra" Taung bug byumyu" qe: lo, mae" re: nao re khyad' yu nae" .
Nao wa yao: bam: myo, re bung" li" nhao mung:- yao: bam re mug: cad' khug mae" mug: bo" khug khyo re:- Satan" ra" qam: so' yang eib: na: ra" khug mae" Mao" So: qam: so' yang eib: ra" khug khyo re:- phaug' lo nhao: li" nae" . Amung: yao: bam wa ngo re lam khug: ra" khyo" yang yao: bam: qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid' ru qhug' mung:- Mao" So khyin: yu: to" ra" mo; phaung mae bo: qo" bo mo, boe" li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: kho: kham Agripa we"- Ngo wa mug: gaung mae" qhu" byid' ra" qhu" lho re mangag: pye'-
Ngo wa sao qhid' mae Damasku vogaung: mae- Yerusalem vogaung: mae- ai: thao re Yuda mung" geim" mae we' Taung bug byu qere yao: bam: qobo mae" myid tha" lhang: lo mung: Mao" So shad' khyo phaug' lo yang:- yao: bam myid tha" va"- ga" rure qhu" byid' ra" lo, mau" ave, zaui: so: ca" ein: ngo cao" kho" kyo: byid: va" .
Ce: khyo mathao mae Yuda byu qe wa- ngo Caung: pa" Yham mae na: jo; au: li" taung" yu mung: ngo re se' pye' nae" seim" ako" .
Ngadqere: ana" ba joe" sho' Mao" So ngo re bao" thaug' byid: yang: cemae ye; jo, mung: aqi: angai maein yaug khao: ngo" alhab' re sagse: qo" kham byid' na: ru ngad: ra" .
Meshia wa dayin dayo: kham zo: ca" nae"- amung: yao: wa shid: ru mae" sao qhid' daui: to" li" yaug ngad: ru we' khyad' yu: ra" bo" bao re Yuda byu qere we' Taung bug byu qere ta" hau" kyo: byid' li" nae"- ga: Moshe we' lapa qe ta" to: co' ko" ru we' dakhyo: za: ngo kho" kyo: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Polu ceru: yao" gaung re ta" vha: na: au:- Festu wa Polu we"- Nao go: ava"- nao wa pha,jhi" saung" zhao: ba: yu mung: go: byaug vanhaung ga: hug' ta" ra" .
Alao"- Polu wa Myhao: thao" ra" zug: pho" we"- Ngo wa mago- ngo wa dangman" ra" khyo re gyang: gyang: za: ta" na: ru ngad: .
kho: kham Agripa we"- Ai: khyo jham re nao ba: ruyang ngo wa ni" qhid' kheim: mae mazag mavae lo: jhau: na: ru ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ce: mau" zo" wa- ajheim ajhe' mae anyham: avho' boe" ra" khyo mangad: yang: ai: khyo alhab' re kho: kham pho" nao yao: ba: to: gau ngad naeva"- ein: ngo myid: lam: ra" .
kho: kham Agripa we"- Lapa qe: jham: dao: jham re nao lam" i?- Nao lam" rure ngo ba:- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" Agripa wa Polu re Dazab daso' gyo: mae za: lhao" re: nao ngo re Khristan phung: byu qo" toe' yu nae" ein: nao jho: i?- ga: ta" ra" .
Polu wa dazab daso' za: ngad ngad- myao" sho' ngad ngad akhyag mangad:- kho: kham pho" nao we' daga" ana" ba nga" dao: re tae" gyo" na ko" ra" mo, alhab' wa ce: nga" jao co: taui: mae" je yang:- ngo we' dakhyo: boe" lo genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So re ngo akyu" mho' ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" .
Ai: thao re- kho: kham pho"- mang: zug: pho"- Bernike we' gatau alhab' mo, wa to" ye, mung:-
Yao: bam wa ai: jo, qo mae" thug' lo" gethao re- Byu ceyaug wa shid man" ra" qobo- mangad: lao"- thaung: laung" nae" qobo pe" re: mashad' ngad: ra"- ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Agripa wa Festu re byu ceyaug wa Khosin"" pho" jhao" lhai: to' ke' byid: gela, ga: yao: mamho' to: ngad: re wa yao: re gai: pheim: nhao: ke' ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngonhaung" re Itali mung" khyo qid sang pho khyo" dai" ke' nae" qhid' mae" bin: myid: phyid' lao"- Polu we' gatau thaung: byu daqhae: re Khosin"" pho" gyetab ga" ra" Roma gyetab dalam: mae" gyezug: pho" Yuliu lo, khyo yao: bam ab byid' ke' ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa Asia mung" tham: yae gau: khung: jham khyo gau" ye" lo" nae" seim" na: bam: . Adramutium mae" qid sang pho dao mae yedo; zaung yang: gau" ye" lo" bam va" . Thesaloni vogaung: mae" Makedoni byu Aristaku wa ngonhaung" we' daga" ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao: ba ngonhaung" wa Sidon vogaung: khyo joe" ye" lo" bam va" . Yuliu wa Polu re nhag' khyag' ruyang Polu re yao" ba nam byin cao: qejhao" ye: qhug' mung: yao: qo ca" ra" gu: re ba nam qe: yang da" byid: rure kham: yu nhao: ra" .
Ngonhaung" aimae" to" lo" re la mayo" mung: Kupru gagyo: kao" yang la go: ra" shad' khyo" gau" ye" lo" bam va" .
Kiliki mung" we' Pamphulia mung" we' tau" te' panglai: tham: re gau" phyid' ye" lo" mung:- Lukia mung" mae" Mara vogaung: khyo joe" ye" lo" bam va" .
Gyezug: pho" wa ai: vogaung: mae Itali mung" khyo ye" lo" nae" Alexanda vogaung: mae" qid sang pho re ye: myao mung:- yao: wa ngonhaung" re ai: dao khyo do; zaung nhao: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa myao" sho' ba yin yin za: gau" ye" lo" mung: aqug: akhai: gyai qhug' ru we' lo" thao" re wa Kidu vogaung: tau" te' khyo joe" ye" lo" bam va" . La mayo" ruyang qhid' au: khyo maqo" xo' gau" ye: mung: ngonhaung" wa Salmone akhyug nhae khyo" gau" phyid' lai: ye: yang:- Krete gagyo: kao" yang la go: ra" khyo" gau" ye" lo" bam va" .
Gagyo: kao" qid yae te' te' khyo" gau" ye" lo" re aqug: akhai: gyai qhug' ru we' Lasea vogaung: mae" mataung" va" ra" Gug' Ra" Gau: Khung:- ga" ra" jo, qo khyo joe" ye" lo" bam va" .
Ngonhaung" wa ai: jo, qo mae myao" sho' ba thang: na: bam mung: Zo: Ve Jao" ra" Poe ba na lhao" re: lai: lo" byaug va" ruyang qid sang pho khyo" gyaung: su: nae" gyaug qo: ra" ayo, joe" lo: ra" . Airumung: Polu wa yao: bam re lau: de, zokho' qe we"- ngonhaung" cemae"-
Xo' gau" ye" lo" re wa gyaug ca" nae"myao:- qid sang pho we' gai xan: jham jeim" byaug: ru we' ngonhaung" kao so' lhao" re: jeim" lo" nae" khyo jo; rure ngo myao:- ga: pha,jhi" byid: ta" peim" ra" .
Ngadqere: gyezug: pho" wa Polu ta" ra" dao: re tho' qid sang pho khang" yaug we' qid sang pho asang ta" ra" dao: re je: lam" ra" .
Ai: gau: khung: wa gyo, yo, lai sho' thang: na nae" qhi" magai: ruyang byu myo: sho' wa ai: gau: khung: mae" to" mung:- gai: boe" ngad: re- Phoenig vogaung: khyo joe" sho' qam: ke' gau" ye" lo" mung:- ai: vogaung: mae gyo, yo, gu: re yethang: na nug: ako" . Phoenig gau: khung: wa Krete gagyo: kao" mae ngad mung: ba vao mug: thao shad' we' ba vao mug: am: shad' khyo myo, nho qhang: to" ra" gau: khung: ngad: ra" .
Mug: thao shad' mae" la cae: hug' lo lao"- qid sang pho gau: mo, wa yao: bam myid: yaung: to" ru we' dakhyo: qo" kad' nae" myid: jho gemung: yao: bam wa jo, to' nghoe: re she: to' yu mung: qid sang pho re Krete gagyo: kao" ayae khyo" cao" yang: qo" te' ra" qhi" te' mung: gau" ye" lo" ako" .
Ngadqere: mamyao" shire Ba Thug' mug: am: La Qam" ga: mhang" ra" gyai qam: bo: ra" la qam" wa gagyo: kao" taung gaung shad' khyo" hug' gyo" lo: ra" .
Ai: la qam" wa qid sang pho re lo: deim: mung:- qid sang pho wa la qam" re maqo" lham: thaug' qhao" ruyang ngonhaung" wa qam: ke' ru thang: pye' mung: la: yang deim" lo" ra" khyo cao: myung: lo" bam va" .
Kauda ga" ra" gagyo: kao" ngai mug: thao shad' khyo lai: joe" ye: lao"- la qam" dae mae" dajhid' zo: ago aqab qo" yu: bam va" . Ai: tau mae qid lha mabyo; qeim: lo" nae" qhid' mae" aqug: akhai: qo" zaui" tam" ci: bam va" .
Yao: bam wa ai: lha re qid sang pho dao khyo she: to' yu mung: taui: jham: yang qid sang pho we' tang za: taui" te' ako" . Yao: bam wa Surti ga" ra" ma dam: mae qid sang pho lo" kai" jo, nae" rure gyaug gemung:- qid sang pho pin: lung: jham re o khyo khyo" yu mung: la: yang deim" ra" khyo bocao: myung: lo" ako" .
Thao: ba rere: la qam" xo' yang: hug' na: ruyang yao: bam wa qid sang pho dao mae" aung: xan: jham daqhae: re phoe' khyo" pye' ako" .
Airumung: ai: thao: ba re yao: bam wa qid sang pho we' sin" ra" zai jham rere: phoe' khyo" pye' ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa myo: sho' ba- ba we' kyi jham re mathe' myao . La qam" wa xo' yang: gyai thin: ra" khyo" hug' na: ra" . Airumung: lo" thao" re ngonhaung" wa kao so' loe; beim nae" khyo majo, lo: ein: myid qam: shan: pye' bam va" .
Qid sang pho zaung: ra" mo, wa zo: ve mazo: lo: ba na myo: sho' na gethao re Polu wa yao: bam: qhid' kheim: mae to" ye, mung:- Lau: de, zokho' qe we"- naonhaung" nga" dao: re tae" gyo: mung: Krete gagyo: kao" mae" magau" lo ngad: re wa ngonhaung" wa ceru: seim" ru we' byo; qeim: ru qhug' bam nae" mangad:- ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: nhag' dangai ge,- naonhaung" khag' dayaug re: kao so' majeim: genae"- qid sang pho za: seim" byaug: li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re nga" Asang ngo caung: pa" na: ra" Mao" So: mug: lagyo: dayaug wa amyi ngojhao" joe" li" mung:-
Polu we"- dagyaug wa,- nao wa khosin" pho" qhid' kheim: mae qo" ye; jo; li" nae" . Mao" So wa nao re nhag' khyag' gai kad' mung: nao we' daga" qid sang pho zaung: lo ko" ra" mo, re kao so' loe; beim nhao: li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: lau: de, zokho' qe we"- Nhag' dangai ge,- pe"mung: ga"re ngo re li" ta" to: va" ru we' dakhyo: boe" lo: li" nae"- ein: ngo wa Mao" So re lam khug: na: .
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" nho: qid sang pho wa gagyo: kao" dalam: mae lo" hug' kai" to" ru qhug' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Daxe: byid myi ein: myi re ngonhaung" qid sang pho wa panglai: tham: mo" mae" la qam" yang deim" ra" shad' khyo bocao: myung: qin" ra" . Myi" gae gaung: myi: ko re ngonhaung" wa qid yae dajo, qo khyo te' na: kyi: ga: qid sang pho khang" mo, myid: ako" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa qid ka" qu" ako" . Shid' xe ye, no; rure myao: to" ako" . Thao dazab kyo thao re dam: ka" qu" ko" re daxe: ngo" ye, za: no; rure myao: ako" .
Yao: bam wa laug zang we' qid sang pho lo" thaung: nae" rure ci" gemung: qid sang pho dao mae" jo, to' nghoe: byid lam: khyo" ke' mung:- mug: phyad bo" li" sho' ga: akyu" mho' ako" .
Ai: thao re sang pho kau: mo, wa qid sang pho qhid' au: mae" lha ngai re she: khyo" ke' yang: qid sang pho qhid' au: mae" jo, to' nghoe: jham daqhae: re khyo" ke' geim kad' mung: yao: bam wa qid sang pho mae" phao: loe; lo" nae" seim" ako" .
Ngadqere: Polu wa gyezug: pho" we' gyezo: qere ai: qid sang pho kau: mo, wa ce: qid sang pho dao mae mana: jo, lo: gelao" wa- naonhaung" kao so' loe; beim nae" myid: lao" khyo majo, lo: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai mung: gyezo: qe wa lha ngai re taui" ra" taui: jham re zhe' phyid' pye' mung: lha re myhung: ke' ako" .
Mug: bo" zo" re Polu wa yao: bam alhab' mo, re zo: ve zo: genae" qhid' mae" poe mung:- Naonhaung" wa khoru: boe" nae" laug- ga: zo: ve pe" re: mazo: lo: lao" na ko" ru wa ana" daxe: byid ba lam: lam: ngad: ava" .
Airumung: naonhaung" kao so' qo" daui: na genae" qhid' mae" zo: ve daja: ja: zo: ge,- naonhaung" au: dao mae" xae dakhe' lhao" re: mabyaug nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ce: dao: bin: ta" thao re Polu wa mug daqhae: re yu: yu mung: yao: bam alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae Mao" So: jeju re caung: byid: yang: khyoe' phai" mung: zo" ra" .
Alao"- yao: bam alhab' mo, re: qam: qo" li" mung:- yao: bam yaug khao: ngo" re: zo: ve zo" ako" .
Qid sang pho dao mae ngonhaung" wa byu alhab' shid' yo: nhad' xe: khyaug' yaug ngad:-
Yao: bam yaug khao: ngo" bin: zo" gyi: thao re- qid sang pho seim: nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam wa jung: cin alhab' re panglai: khyo vo; khyo" pye' ako" .
Mug: bo" lao"- qid sang pho kau: mo, wa yao: bam kho: tau joe" na ko" rure maxam: ngad: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa gyagao: yo khyo sang pho ye: gau" de, nae" myid: phyid' ako" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa jo, to' nghoe: jham re panglai: khug khyo zhe' phyid' zaui: ke' mung:- ai: au: yao: je, khao: jham mae" taui: jham rere: pheim: pye' ako" . Ai: thao re yao: bam wa sang pho qhid' au: shad' mae" pin: lung: jham re to' ke' mung: gyagao: yo khyo khang" lo: ako" .
Ngadqere: sang pho wa ma dam: mae lothaung: mung: loqe" jo; ra" . Qid sang pho au: maqo" lab: ru we' sang pho thao shad' khyo wa qid bang: lhung" jham: yang lobe, ko" ruyang adau dau byo; sin" lo" na: ra" .
Alao"- gyezo: qe wa- thaung: byu qe qid qhe' qhe' yang: phao: loe; lo" genae" rure sang: kho: gemung:- thaung: byu qe alhab' re se' pye' nae" seim" ako" .
Ngadqere: gyezug: pho" wa- Polu re khyad' yu nug yang:- yao: wa gyezo: qere airu: makad' genae" qhid' mae" tam" pye' ra" . Airumung: gyezug: pho" wa qid qhe' ba: qhe' ko" ra" mo, re shi" sao qhid sang pho dao mae" byae: gyo" nhao mung: gyagao: yo khyo qhe' de; lo" nhao: ra" .
Amung: dang: ra" mo, damyo" re sag' pye: re we' damyo" re wa sang pho byo, mae" adau jham re zaui: mung: qhe' de; ye: genae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ke' ra" . Ngonhaung" alhab' wa airu: gyagao: khyo pe" maqo lo: joe" de; ye" bam va" .
Ngonhaung" wa gyagao: yo taung gaung khyo nyang" za: joe" ye: lao" za: ai: gagyo: kao" wa Malta ga" ru ngad: rure ngonhaung" ye: ba: bam va" .
Ai: gagyo: kao" mug: mae" byu qe wa ngonhaung" re gyai nhag' lham: khyag' ako" . Mug: qu mung: gyo; ruyang yao: bam wa myi: mad mung: ngonhaung" alhab' mo, re bang" lham: tug: yu: ako" .
Alao" Polu wa thao: kyao: dadang: gaug: yu mung: myi: khyeim" mae ngha" ke' ra" . Myiso' laung: li" lao"- ai: thao: dang: khug mae" lhao maui yoe" thug' li" mung:- Polu nho: lo, mae thoe" zhaung' ci yang: de; jo; ra" .
Airu: Polu nho: lo, mae lhao maui de; lao" jo; rure ai: mug: mae" byu qe the' myao gelao"- Byu ceyaug wa byu se' yaug ngad yao: ngad: ra"- qid panglai: mae" loe; lo ngadqere: dangman" ra" tarha" wa yao: re daui: na nae" akhang" mabyid: nhaung- ga: yao: cao: jho" ta" ako" .
Ngadqere: Polu wa yao" lo, mae" lhao maui re myikhyeim" khug khyo ko: ngha" zaui: ke' mung: pe" maqo lo: na: jo; ra" .
Yao: bam wa Polu re gaung geim" qae" li" nae"- mangad: lao"- dalhang: dae shid: lang" lo" li" nae"- ga: zhaug' qu" na: bam: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam airu: gyai myao" sho' zhaug' qu" na gengad yang: re: Polu wa pe" re: maqo: li" rure myao gelao"- yao: bam wa myid lhai" pye' mung- Ce: yaug wa So ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Aimae" mataung" va" rumae gagyo: kao" mug: agyi pho" Publiu sang: ra" yo myid dajhid' jo; ra" . Ai: agyi pho" wa ngonhaung" re nyang" za: bang" lham: tug: yu mung: sam ba geim" bang" da" byid' ra" .
Publiu nho: yao: pho" wa noqam" we' vae: ne no mung: yab qo mae no: lang" jo; ra" . Alao" Polu wa ai: yaug: qe, khyo vao ye: yang: akyu" mho' mung:- ai: yaug: dao mae yao" lo, kai: byid: yang: yao: re gai byid' ra" .
Ceru: bin: boe" thao re ai: gagyo: kao" mug: mae" no phyo: qhug' ra" mo, geje alhab' mo, re: Polu jhao" li" mung: yao: bam gai: shao: lo" ako" .
Yao: bam wa ngonhaung" re jhaung qhu" myo: sho' byid' ako" . Ngonhaung" dam: gau" lo" nae" seim" lao" re:- ngonhaung" gyaung: khyo mae qo ca" ra" zao: kho jham re sang pho dao mae ke' byid' ako" .
Lho" mo" sam khye' kyo thao re ai: gagyo: kao" mae gyo, yo, lo: khug: na: ra" Alexanda vogaung: mae" So zo: zam ga: mang: ra" sang pho dao khyo yedo; zaung yang: gau" ye" lo" bam va" .
Ngonhaung" wa Surakuse vogaung: khyo joe" ye" lo" mung: ai: vogaung: mae sam ba yethang: na: bam va" .
Ai: vogaung: mae" ngonhaung" dam: xo' gau" ye" lo" re Rhegium vogaung: khyo joe" ye" lo" bam va" . Thao: ba re mug: thao la hug' lo mung: shid' ba thao re Puteoli vogaung: khyo joe" ye" lo" bam va" .
Ngonhaung" wa ai: vogaung: mae lam khug: ra" mo, damyo" re ye: myao mung: yao: bam wa- ngonhaung" re yao: bam we' daga" dalaban thang: na nae" qhid' mae" mho' ako" . Ai: thao re ngonhaung" wa Roma vogaung: mo" khyo ye" lo" bam va" .
Roma vogaung: mae" lam khug: ra" mo, wa ngonhaung" khyo re the' gyo: gemung: Api gai jao: joe" sho' we' bang" khug yham sam lam:- ga" ra" jo, qo khyo joe" sho' joe" li" mung: li" tug: yu: ako" . Polu wa yao: bam re myao lao"- yao: wa Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" mung: myid qam: qi: sho' bo: li" ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Roma vogaung: khyo joe" ye" lo" bam lao" Polu wa zaung" ra" gyezo: dayaug we' yao: yao: za: na nae" akhang" qo" ra" .
Sam ba thao re Polu wa ai: vogaung: mae" Yuda lau: de, au: jhaung qere khai: yu: ra" . Yao: bam zang" li" gelao"- Nga" Israel mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo wa ngonhaung" byumyu" qere re:- ngonhaung" phug' pho" qemae" xo' khae: yu: ra" thung" li jham rere:- shad' lhoe" yang: pe" daja: re: makad' ngadqere: Yerusalem vogaung: mae ngo re thaung: lhaung" mung: Roma byu qe: lo, khyo ab byid' pye' ako" .
Ngo re bin: myid' ca: qu" gethao re shid man" ra" qobo ngo pe" daja: re: mashad' rure yao: bam myao geyang:- Roma byu qe wa ngo re pheim: ke' nug: ako" .
Ngadqere: Yuda byu qe airu re ngag: thaug' ko" ra" au: ngo yao" byu qere pe" qobo zhaug' nae" majo, ngadqere:- ngo wa Khosin"" pho" jhao" lhai: ke' byid: genae" qhid' mae" mho' va" .
Airumung: ngo wa naonhaung" we' jho" qhug' jhau nae" qhid' mae" khai: yu: ru ngad: ra" . Ngo ceru: jao co" yang taui" ru qhug' ru wa Israel byumyu" qe myid: lao" na ko" ra" yaug: mathao mae ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao" yao: bam wa Ngonhaung" wa ni" khyo we' sin: yang: Yuda mung" mae" vhin tung" dakhye' daqo: re: maqhug' yu- amung: aimae" ngonhaung" byu qe dayaug re: joe" li" mung: ni" khyo re magai: ra" lau dao: mali" ta" ko" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ce: nao bobo: ra" phung: qe khyi" khao: ngo" mae"- mo, byu qe ngag: thaug' ko" rure ngonhaung" ba:- ngadqere: nao myid: ra" khyo rere: ngonhaung" tae" gyo: nug: ra"- ga: ta" ako" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa Polu we' ba na jho" dang: yu: ako" . Jho" dang: to" ra" ba na mae Polu thang: na: ra" jo, qo khyo byu myo: sho' mo, joe" li" ako" . Polu wa ne, kao mae" mug: cad' sho' yao: bam re Mao" So: mung"dan: we' sin" ra" mung dao: jham mho" kyo: byid: mung: Moshe Tarha" mae" we' lapa qe: jham: dao: jham re ngha yang: Yesu khyo re yao: bam lam" li" gesho' kho" kyo" ra" .
Yao: bam mae" damyo" wa Polu ta" rure lam" ako" . Ngadqere: damyo" wa malam" ko" ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yao: bam yao: cao: majho" vang" lo: thug' lo" na ko" au: Polu ta" ru wa Gyang: Lho" Byo wa Lapa Esaia nhad' khyo" naonhaung" phug' pho" qere ta" ra" dao: wa gyai yao: jo: ra" .
Yao: ta" ru wa- Nao wa ai: byumyu" qejhao" ye: mung: ta" kyo: wa,- Naonhaung" wa tae" gyo: gengadqere: maba: gyo: genae"- naonhaung" qu" gengadqere: mamyao genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ce: byumyu" qe: nhag' lam: wa nhag' cad' cad' jo, mung:- yao: bam: nokhye' jham wa jid' jo; ru we' yao: bam: myo, jham cam" ci geyang: ngad: ako" . Airu: mangad: ko" re wa yao: bam: myo, jham wa myao mung:- yao: bam: nokhye' jham wa the' gyo: yang: yao: bam: nhag' lam: mae ba: gyo: gemung: yao: bam wa ngo shad' khyo phaug' lo: li" genae"- ga: Mao" So ta" ra" . Alao" ngo wa yao: bam re gai byid: nae" ga" ru ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Alao"- Polu wa dao: pin" khyo"- Mao" So: khyad' yu: ra" khyo mung dao: re Taung bug byu qe khyo byid' pye' mung: yao: bam wa ai: mung dao: re tae" gyo" yu: li" genae" rure naonhaung" ba: to: ge,- ga: ta" ke' ra" .
Polu wa shid' zin lam: lam: yao: ngho" na: ra" yham mae na yang:- yao: jhao" li" ra" mo, alhab' re bang" lham: tug: yu mung:-
Yao: wa Mao" So: mung"dan: khyo re kho" kyo" ru we' Asang Yesu khyo re mazag mavae galin: gago:- mho" shid' kho" kyo" na: ra" .
Lau Dao: Gai re hau" pyo: kyo: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yang khai: yu mung: lagyo: dayaug khyo" khyin: yu: to" ra" Khristu Yesu jeim pho" ngo wa mugsug' tung" ke' ra" .
Ganhae"- Mao" So wa Yao" Lapa qe: nhad' dao: thoe khyo" yang Lau Dao: Gai re byid: nae" ga: dao: so: byid' to: va" ra" khyo re Gyang" lho" ra" Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ra" .
Ai: Lau Dao: Gai wa Mao" So: Yao: Zo:- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu khyo ngad: ra" . Yao: wa xao su byu khyo"- Davi myid: zo: kaung mae khau: li" ra" .
Amung: yao: wa Mao" So khyo"- Mao" So: Yao: Zo: ngad: rure qam: so' mo" we' shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ra" khyo" yang qhu" byid' ava" .
Byumyu" cao jab alhab' mo, wa Yesu re lam khug: lo mung: phug' cao" genae" qhid' mae" au: jhui" she nae" Mao" So wa ai: Asang khyo" yang Khristu mathao mae ngore ai: lagyo: aya: byid' ra" .
Amung: Roma vogaung: mae na ko" ra" mo, naonhaung" re: Yesu Khristu byu qe boe" genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yang khai: yu: to: va" mo, ngad ko" ruyang ai bam: phung: mae bobo: ako" .
Airumung: Mao" So jhid' de; yang: yao" amyu" boe" nae" qhid' mae" khai: yu: to" ra" Roma vogaung: bao: alhab' re ngo mugsug' tung" ke' ra" . Ngonhaung" Pho" Mao" So we' Asang Yesu Khristu wa nhag' myan" ru we' yaug yo: ru naonhaung" re shaman" byid: vageshao: wo" .
Asang Yesu re naonhaung" lam khug ko" ra" khyo re mug: myid geim" mae hau" nhao" jo; ruyang ngo wa naonhaung" alhab' mo; qhid' mae" Yesu Khristu mathao mae sao qhid' Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" ra" .
Ngo ta" ra" dao: dangman" rure Yao: Zo" nho: Lau Dao: Gai re ta" hau" kyo" ra" khyo" yang nga" aung khug nhag' lam: alhab' yang ngo caung da" byid' na: ra" Mao" So yao: yao: nga" sagse: ngad: ra" .
Ngo akyu" mho' khao: ngo" naonhaung" re ngo myid: beim" na: ra" khyo re Mao" So yao: ba: ra" . Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo jo; ngad: re wa celhang wa naonhaung" jhao" ngo qo" li" nae" khyo phung" byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So re ngo akyu" mho' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" nhag' lam: re qam: bo nhao nae" qhid' mae" Byo we' sin" ra" shaman" jeju naonhaung" re gae byid: nug: ruyang ngo wa naonhaung" we' gyai jho" myao nug: ra" .
Ngo ta" nug: ru wa naonhaung" wa nga" lam khug: myid khyo" yang- ngo wa naonhaung" lam khug: myid khyo" yang dayaug we' dayaug qam: jho" bao" thaug' ru qhug' yu: li" nae" ein: ru ngad: ra" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo wa naonhaung" jhao" li" nae" qhid' mae" myo: sho' lhang seim" qu" va"- ngadqere: daja: ja" yang khonhae" re: kaung: kag' mung:- naonhaung" jhao" maqo" li" ru ngad: ra" khyo re naonhaung" myid: beim: byid: gela,- ngo wa gatau Taung bug byu qe: phaung mae qo" kho" aung: yu: ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" phaung mae re: qo" kho" aung: yu nug: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa byuyin- byujam:- pha,jhi" ba: ra" byu- pha,jhi" maba: ra" byu alhab' mo; dao mae qo qo" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" Roma vobyu qere re: Lau Dao: Gai kho" kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngo kao bau: na: ra" .
Ngo wa ai: Ngaui Bau: Lau Dao: re myo, cam: tang lam: ra" . Aiwa sao qhid' re Yesu re lam" ko" ra" Yuda byu qe alhab' ai: thao re Yesu re lam" ko" ra" Taung bug byu qe alhab' re khyad' yu: ra" Mao" So: qam: so' ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ai: Ngaui Bau: Lau Dao: wa xao su byu qere Mao" So: yang jo: ra" yaug ngad: ga: khoru: sun" yu: ra" khyo re qhu" byid' ra" . Ai: ru wa aqhid mae" lo" thao" sho' lam khug: ra" khyo" yang sun" yu: ra" khyo ngad: ra" . Airumung: Jham: Mugsug' mae- lam khug: ra" khyo" Mao" So: yang jo: ra" yaug ngad:- ga: sun" yu byid' ru qhug' ra" yaug wa kao so' daui: na: li" nae"- ga: tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Ai: dangman" ra" khyo myao: thug' li" na: ra" khyo mae tam" to" ra" makhyang" ra" mau" zo" aja: ja: we' qobo alhab' dao mae Mao" So: nhag' yo" rure mug: gaung mae" qhu" byid' ava" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa yao: yao" khyo re yao: bam re de: de: za: qhu" byid' ava" . Airu: mung: yao: bam wa Mao" So: khyo we' sin: yang: gai: ba: ra" gu: re de: de: za: ba: yu: avako" . Ce: mathao mae Mao" So wa yao: bam re qobo dae byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa Mao" So: yang phan" to: va" ra" ja: jham re qu" mung:- myid gaung re Mao" So phan" ra" ba na mae" maqo" gai: myao: ra" yao" qam: o: we' yao" Mao" So: ve, khyao re de: de: za: qu" ba: yu: avako" . Airu: mung: yao: bam wa yao: yao" qhid' mae" ta" qid' yu nae" akhyo majo, loko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa Mao" So re ba gengad yang: re: Mao" So re caung: khin" phug' te' byid: ang: ru we' dakhyo:- macaung: khin" byid: ko" ru we' Mao" So re jeju re: mabeim: so: ngad: ako" . Ai: atha" yao: bam myid: ra" khyo jham wa akeim boe" pye' mung: yao: bam maba mabeim" ra" nhag' lam: re: mug: cad' cad' no; jo; ra" .
Yao: bam wa yao: bam yao: pha,jhi" bo: ga:- ta" gengadqere: yao: bam wa adu: adae: mo, ngad: ako" .
Shid no maba: ra" Mao" So re caung: pa" byid: nae" atha"- yao: bam wa shid no ba: ra" byu- ngho' jham- gug' nyhug' jham we' yoe" du" lhau: ra" ja: gug' nyhug' jham we' dau: ra" khyo" kad' to" ra" sulho jham re caung: pa" byid' ako" .
Airumung: Mao" So wa ai: byu qere yao: bam: nhag' lam: kao bau: ra" masan masin" mau" zo" re kad' genae" qhid' mae" we' yao: bam yao: cao: aqho' aqhid mau" zo" kad' genae" qhid' mae" shapye' to" ra" .
Yao: bam wa Mao" So: dangman" ra" khyo re mhug' pyag' ru we' tha" yu: pye' gemung: phan" Asang Mao" So yao: re caung: pa" byid: nae" atha"- Mao" So: yang phan" to" ra" ja: re yao: bam caung: pa" byid: yang: caung da" byid: na: ako" . Phan" Asang wa apyad ato caung: khin" byid' ru qhug' vashao: wo" . Amen .
Yao: bam ceru: kad' ko" ruyang Mao" So wa aqho' aqhid mung: ra" gaung sho" ra" shab' mhin: ru shad' khyo ab: pye' ava" . Myiqe: qe lhao" re: gaung sho: jho" zam" na: ra" khyo re yauggai qe we' mangad: lo:- akhyo mangad' ra" khyo" jho" zam" ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo: yauggai qere: gaung sho: jho" zam" ra" khyo re myiqe: qe we' mangad: lo:- akhyo mangad' ra" khyo" gaung sho: shab' ra" khyo yao: cao: jho" qho: ako" . Yauggai qe wa yao: cao: aqho' aqhid mau" zo" kad' ko" ruyang yao: bam shad' lhoe" ra" magai: mau" zo" we' man: qi" ra" qobo dae re yao: bam yao: gag: vo; yu: ako" .
Ai: byu jham wa Mao" So re Mao" So khyo" mamyid gemung:- Mao" So wa yao: bam mazaui: maso: ang: ra" mau" zo" re zaui: so: genae" qhid' mae" nhag' cad' noyaug myid khyo yao: bam re jhan: byid' ke' ra" .
Yao: bam wa makhyang: mashab: ru- makhyang" ra" mau" zo" aja: ja:- so' kho' obyid: ru- maca' majhad' ru byang" sheim: jo; ako" . Amung: yao: bam wa myid nug' ru- byu se' ru- nhag' lam: kaui: ru- mhug' pyag' ru- mo, byo, qho: ru byang" sho' ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam wa gaui mho mung: dayaug we' dayaug makhyang" ra" dao: jho" ta" ako" . Yao: bam wa Mao" So re nghang" ra" mo,- yao: cao: jho" roe" mung: ngad beim" ru we' phug mo, ngad: ako" . Amung: yao: bam wa aphaug' alhag' kad' mo,- yao: bam: myhi" pho" mho dao: re magyo" ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam wa akyang qeim mo,- dao: so: madang mo,- su gaje re nhag' khyag' myid- kao taui: myid mabo: ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Ceru: kao so' daui: ra" mo, wa shid man" ra"- ga: Mao" So: tarha" mae ta" to" rure yao: bam ba gau ngad: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa yao: bam yao: ceru: kao so' daui ko" ru za: mangad:- Airu: kao so' daui: ra" mo, gaje qere re:- jo: ga: qam: byid' ako" .
Nga" ba nam pho" we"- nao wa su gaje re dao: kho' nae" akhang" qo" i? Nao wa khoru" ra" yaug ngadqere: dao: kho' ra" akhang" dajhid' re: maqo" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re nao wa su gaje qere dao: kho' mung: yao: bam shad' lhoe" ra" qobo re naoyao: re: shad' lhoe" re wa naoyao" gaung naoyao: dao: phyid' yu: ru ngad: ra" .
Airu: makhyang" ra" mau" zo" zaui: so" ra" mo, re Mao" So: dao: kho' ru wa tarha" ru ngad: ru ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Ngadqere: su gaje qere dao: kho' ra" qobo re naoyao: shad' lhoe" ra" yaug nga" ba nam pho" we"- Mao" So: dao: kho' rumae" qo" phao: loe, nae" ein: nao jho: i?
Airu: mangad: lao"- nao wa Mao" So: qi" qhang: ra" nhag' khyag' shogu ru- zang: kham: ru we' nhag' lam: qhang: ru jham re nao maphug' makhyad' kad' i? Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa nao re myid tha" lo sho' khyoqhid' au: she: na: ruyang Mao" So wa nhag' khyag' shogu: yaug ngad: rure gaigai: yao: nao ba: ra" .
Ngadqere: nao wa nhag' lam: qao yang: myid matha" ruyang Mao" So: nhag' yo" ru de" thug' li" nae" ra" ba na- din: man" ra" khyo" dao: kho' nae" ra" ba na mae kham zo: nae" qobo dae re je: qi: naekhyo" nao qaung" na: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa ngonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" re yao: yao" lo, mau" re cao" yang:- aphug' jhaung qhu" byid' li" nae" .
Gai: ra" mau" zo" zaui: so" na mung: phungbao- phug' te' nga: yhe' nae" we' maba: shid: ra" kao so' re qho: ra" mo, re Mao" So wa apyad ato: kao so' byid' li" nae" .
Yao: yao" qhid' mae" za: myid yang: jo: ra" khyo re ngag: pye' mung: shad' ra" khyo cao" ra" mo; dao mae Mao" So wa yao" nhag' gyid' nhag' yo" ra" dae byid' li" nae" .
Sao qhid' Yuda byu qe- amung: ai: thao re- Taung bug byu qere:- makhyang" ra" mau" zo" zaui: so" ra" byu qe alhab' wa- dayin dayo: no: ru we' qug: khai: qhug' kham zo" li" genae" .
Ngadqere: din: man" ra" khyo re zaui: mo, alhab' Yuda byu qeshi" sao qhid'- amung: ai: thao re Taung bug byu qere re: Mao" So wa phungbao- phug' te' nga: yhe' ru we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru byid' li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- Mao" So wa yaug khao: ngo" re myo, nho nga: lao: makhyin lo: dao: kho' ra" .
Moshe kham" to" ra" Tarha" re maba ko" ra" Taung bug byu qe qobo shad' lhoe" gelao"- yao: bam wa Tarha" khyo" mangad: lo:- jeim" shid: lo" ako" . Tarha" ba: ra" Yuda byu qe qobo shad' lhoe" gelao"- yao: bam wa tarha" khyo" dao: kho' ru qhug' ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re xao su byu re Mao" So: yang jo:- ga: sun" yu byid' ru wa- ai: Tarha" re gyo" yu: ruyang za: mangad:- ai: Tarha" mae amyin" byid' to" ra" gu: re phug' cao" ra" khyo" sun" yu byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Taung bug byu qe wa ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" maqo" ko" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ai: Tarha" mae bo: ra" amyin" dao: jham re yao: bam: nhag' lam: aung khug mae yao: yao: ba mung: phug' cao" gelao"- yao: bam wa Tarha" maqo" gesho' ngadqere: ai: aung khug mae ba: ru wa yao: bam: Tarha" ngad: ako" .
Ai: Tarha" mae bo: ra" dao: jham wa yao: bam: nhag' lam: aung khug mae tung" to" ra" khyo re yao: bam: lo, mau" yang qhu" byid' ako" . Yao: bam: nhag' lam: akhug myid re: ceru dangman" ra" khyo re shid' byid' na: ra" . Dalhang lhang yao: bam: nhag' lam: wa yao: bam re qobo zhaug' mung: dalhang lhang wa yao: bam re jo: ra"- ga: khin" byid' ra" .
Airumung: ngo kho" kyo" ra" lau dao: gai we' dakhyo:- ai: dao: kho' ra" ba na mae Mao" So wa Yesu Khristu khyo" yang byu alhab' mo; nho: nhag' lam: khug mae nyham" to" ra" mau" zo" jham re airu: dao: kho' li" nae" .
Nao khoru: i? Nao wa naoyao" gaung re Yuda byu ngad:- ga: ta" ra" . Amung: nao wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" re lam khug: ru we' Mao" So re ngha yang: phug: ra" .
Nao wa Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo re ba yaug ngad: ra"- amung: kham" to" ra" tarha" mae" jo: ru we' shad' rure ba: khyin: yu nae" qhid' mae" zhao: yu va" yaug ngad: ra" .
Amung: nao wa myo, jid jham: qhid' mae" khyo jhui: yaug- mug: cad' khug mae na: ra" mo; mug: bo" ngad:- adu: adae: mo, re mho" shid' ra" yaug- maba mabeim" ra" mo; mho" pho" ngad:- ga: nao gaigai: myid: jho: ra" .
Kham" to" ra" Tarha" mae laba lajhao we' dangman" ru byang" sho' bo: ga" rure nao gaigai: ba: ra" .
Nao wa su gaje qere mho" byid: mung: naoyao" gaung re pe"mung: mamho" peim: i? Nao wa su gaje qere magai: khug' ga: mho" kyo: mung: naoyao: wa pe"mung: khug' i?
Nao wa su: myi: magai: shad' ga:- ta" mung: naoyao: wa pe"mung: su: myi: re shad' i? Nao wa so sulho jham re ca' mung: naoyao: wa ai: sulho yham mae" pe"mung: lhad' zo" na: i?
Amung: nao wa- ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re ngha yang: phug: ta" mung:- yao" Tarha" re shad' lhoe" ra" khyo" nao pe"mung: Mao" So re qho' phyo' i?
Yuda byu qe: mathao mae Taung bug byu qe wa Mao" So: mang re makhyang: mayao: ra" khyo" jung" gaui: ako"- ga: jham: mugsug' mae ta" to" ra" .
Amung: nao wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" yaug ngad: re wa- ni" nho: au: qid lhai" ra" khyo wa phug' de; ra" . Ngadqere: nao wa ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re maphug' cao" yang: ngad: re wa- khonhae" re: au: qid malhai" ru wa je: gai: ra" .
Au: qid lhai" ra" khyo makham: yu: ra" Taung bug byu dayaug wa ai: kham" to" ra" amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" ngad: re wa- Mao" So wa aiyaug re au: qid lhai" ra" khyo kham: yu: ra" yaug khyo" sun" yu byid' li" nae" mangad: i?
Yuda byu ngad: ra" nao wa tung" to" ra" Tarha" re qo" ru we' au: qid lhai" ra" khyo re kham: yu sho' ngadqere: nao wa ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re shad' lhoe" ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Airu: mung: Taung bug byu qe wa naonhaung" Yuda byu qere dao: kho' li" genae"- pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa gaung sho: we' sin: yang: au: qid lhai" ra" khyo makham: yu gengadqere: yao: bam wa ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ako" .
Au: qid lhai: kham: ra" Yuda agyang" wa khoyaug lam: ngad: ra" i? Gaung sho: we' sin: yang: au: qid lhai" ra" khyo re kham: yu mung: adao shad' mae za: Yuda byu ngad: ra" yaug wa Yuda byu agyang" mangad:-
Yuda byu agyang" wa- nhag' lam: khug mae au: qid lhai" ra" khyo re kham: yu: ra" yaug za: ngad: ra" . Yao: re Yuda byu agyang" boe" nhao: ru wa ai: tung" to" ra" Tarha" yang boe" nhao: ru mangad:- ai wa Mao" So: Byo: yang aung khug nhag' lam: mae Yuda byu boe" nhao: ru ngad: ra" . Airu" ra" yaug wa byu: yang caung: khin" byid: qhug' yaug mangad:- Mao" So: yang caung: khin" byid: qhug' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Airulao" wa Yuda byu qe wa Taung bug byu qe tho' gatau pe" je: ra" i? Yao: bam au: qid lhai: khyo kham: yu: ru wa pe" akyu" bo: i?
Khyo khao: ngo" mae akyu" bo: ra" . Sao qhid' mae Mao" So wa Yuda byu qere lam mung: yao" mungdao: byid' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam mae" damyo" wa makyid ko" ra" mangad: i? Yao: bam makyid: ruyang Mao" So re makyid ein: gai: ta" genae" i?
Dajhid' re: airu: mangad:- Byu yaug khao: ngo" mhug' gengad yang: re: Mao" So wa jo: ra" . Amung: Jham: Mugsug' mae- Nao dao: jhau: au: nao jo: rure qhu" ca" ra" . Amung: nao dao: phyid' ru qhug' lao" re: nao aung ca" ra"- ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" nho: makhyang" ra" mau" zo" wa- Mao" So: dangman: gai shab: rure je yang: de: de: za: qhu" byid' ra" mangad: i? ga: myid' li" genae" . Ngonhaung" khoru: tau: nae" i? Mao" So ngonhaung" re qobo dae byid' ru wa shad' ru ngad: ra" ein:- tau: nae" i? ( ga" ra" dao: myid: wa byu shad' khyo" ngo myid' ra" dao: myid: ngad: ra" . )
Mao" So shad' ra" ein: khokhyo" re: maqo" ta" ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa- matarha" ra" yaug ngad: re wa- yao: wa mug: myid re khoru: dao: qo" kho' nae" i?
Amung: nga" nho: madangman" ru wa Mao" So: dangman" ra" khyo re je yang: de: de: za: qhu" byid' ru ngad: re wa- pe"mung: ngo wa qobo qo" ra" byu dayaug we' dakhyo: dao: phyid' ru kham zo" na ca" shilo" i?
Airulao" gai: ru boe" thug' li" nae" qhid' mae" makhyang" ru ngonhaung" kad' gelang: ein: ta" nae" i? Gai gai: yao: byu damyo" wa cedao: re ngo ta" ru ngad: ra"- ga: ngore qobo zhaug' yang: maphug' makhyad' ta" phoe: pye' ako" . Airu" mo, wa yao: bam kham zo: ang: ru we' dakhyo: dao: phyid' ru qhug' li" genae" .
Airu: ngad: re wa- ngonhaung" Yuda Byu qe wa Taung bug byu qe tho' je: gai: ra" akhyo mae jo; i? Dajhid' re: mangad:- Yuda byu qe we' Taung bug byu qe wa alhab' mo, dakhyo: za: qobo: nho: qam: so' qao: mae na: jo; rure ngo ta" shid' to: gau ngad va" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae- Din: man" ra" byu dayaug re: mana- Pha,jhi" ba: ra" byu dayaug re: mana-
Mao" So re caung: pa" ra" yaug re: dayaug re: mana ngad: ra" .
Byu alhab' mo, wa Mao" So re nhaung thao" phaug' lo" byaug: avako" . Yao: bam alhab' mo, shad' nghung" lo" byaug: avako"- Din: man" ra" khyo re cao" ra" byu mana- dayaug lhao" re: mana ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam: nhad' dao: thoe wa su re shid nhao: ra" apyag' asham" dao: jham za: byang" sheim: jo; ra" . Yao: bam: sho jham wa aphaug' alhag' mhug' pyag' ako" . Lhao maui daug ru" ru gyaug pho: yao: bam: nhad' qid mae bo: ako" .
Yao: bam: nhad' khug mae nhang: kheim: nhang: thoe za: byang" sheim: jo; ako" .
Yao: bam wa su re dae te' nae" we' byu se' nae" rumae phyad mo, ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam joe" ra" jo, qo khao: ngo" mae byo; qeim: ru we' lhau: phyo' lhau: sin" ru kad' to: co' ako" .
Yao: bam wa ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ra" khyodang re maba ko" ngad: ra" .
Amung: yao: bam wa Mao" So re gyaug phug' ra" myid re: mabo ko" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Xao su byu alhab' mo; nho: ceru:- mhoru: ga: ta" rure tam" pye' nae" we' mug: myid geim" Mao" So: dao: kho' ra" qao: mae ngad nae" qhid' mae" kham" to" ra" Tarha" gu: alhab' wa Tarha" khug mae na: ra" mo; qhid' mae" ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re khag' re: ai: Tarha" phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae jo: ra" yaug maqo" boe" ngad: ra" . Ai: Tarha" wa byu re yao: qobo shad' lhoe" va" rure ba nhao: ra" .
Ngadqere: ana" wa- Mao" So: yang xao su byu qere jo:- ga: khoru: sun" yu: ra" khyo re qhu" byid' ava" . Ngadqere: Mao" So wa byu re jo: ra"- ga: sun" yu: ru wa Tarha" we' dajhid' re: masin: ngad: ra" . Ce: Moshe Tarha" we' lapa qe: mugsug' wa ce: khyo re sagse: kham byid' avako" .
Xao su byu qere jo: ra"- ga: Mao" So sun" yu: ru wa Yesu Khristu re yao: bam lam khug: ra" myid khyo" yang ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa Yesu re lam khug: ra" mo, alhab' re ceru: sun" yu: ruyang yao: cao: dajhid' re: majho" shai" ngad: ako" .
Yaug khao: ngo" qobo shad' lhoe" gemung: Mao" So: khyad' yu: ra" phungbao mae" va" kyo: byaug: ako" .
Ngadqere: xao su byu qere lhoe' ke' byid' ra" Yesu Khristu khyo" aphug' mayu lo: byid' ra" Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju jhaung qhu" yang xao su byu alhab' mo, re jo: ra"- ga: Mao" So sun" yu: ra" .
Yao: shid kham: ra" khyo" yang xao su byu qe wa qobo mae" loe; beim khyo qo" genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa Yesu re xeim: khyo" san: to" ra" . Xao su byu qe wa yao: re lam khug: ra" khyo" yao: bam: qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid' ru qhug' yu: ako" . Mao" So ceru: kad' ru wa- yao: wa din: man" ra" yaug ngad:- ga" rure qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" kad' ru ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa lai: lo" va" ayo, mae nhag' lam: qhang- zang: kham byid: mung: xao su byu qe: qobo jham re maxam: byid: ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ana" ceyo, mae wa yao" din: man" rure qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa yao: bam: qobo jham re akhyag xam" yu: ra" . Ceru: kad' mung: Mao" So yao: yao: din: man" ra" yaug ngad: rure we' Yesu re lam" ra" mo, yaug khao: ngo" re din: man" ra" ga: yao: sun" yu: ra" khyo re qhu" byid' ra" .
Aire wa- ngonhaung" pe" ru: gai: qo" phug nae" i? Ngonhaung" phug nae" khyo majo,- pe"mung: ngad: i? Ai: Tarha" re ngonhaung" phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang ngad: i? Mangad:- ngonhaung" lam" ra" khyo" yang ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re byu wa Tarha" mae amyin" byid' to" rure phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang mangad: lo:- lam khug: ra" khyo" yang za: Mao" So wa jo: ra"- ga: sun" yu: ru ngad: rure ngonhaung" khae: yu: to" ra" .
Mao" So wa Yuda byu qe: Mao" So za: ngad: i? Mao" So wa Taung bug byu qe: Mao" So re: ngad: ra" mangad: i? Gai gai: ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa date: za: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa Yuda byu qere yao: bam: lam khug: ra" apan aqao: khyo" yang jo: ra" ga: sun" yu: li" nae"- amung: Taung bug byu qere re:- yao: bam: lam khug: ra" khyo" yang jo: ra"- ga: sun" yu: li" nae" .
Ngonhaung" wa ce: lam khug: ra" khyo" yang kham" to" ra" tarha" re to" pye' naeva" i? Dajhid' re: magai: to" pye'- ai: atha" ngonhaung" wa ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" na: ru ngad: ra" .
Airulao" wa ngonhaung" phug' pho" ajhaung Abraham nho: khyo re khoru: ta" nae" i? Yao: thaung" qhug' lo: ra" khyo wa pe" ru: i?
Abraham wa yao: zaui: so" lo: ra" lo, mau" mathao: yang jo: ra" ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu: ru qhug' ngad: re wa yao: wa phug nae" khyo jo; ra" . Ngadqere: Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae mangad:-
Jham: Mugsug' mae- Abraham wa Mao" So re lam khug: ra"- ai: yao" lam khug: ra" myid mathao: yang Mao" So wa yao: re din: man" ra" yaug- ga: khae: yu: ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Mau" zaui" ra" byu dayaug wa aphug' qo" khae: yu: ra" . Ngadqere: ai: aphug' wa jhaung qhu" khyo" mangad:- yao: qo" kham: yu ang: ra" mau" zaui: phug' ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: yao" mau" zo" lo, mau" re makhug ngha lo:- yao" lam khug: ra" myid re khug ngha mung: qobo qo" ra" yaug re qobo maqo"- ga: ta" hau" ke' ra" Mao" So re lam khug: ra" yaug re wa- yao" lam khug: ra" myid mathao: yang Mao" So wa yao: re jo: ra" ga: sun" yu: ra" .
Byu dayaug wa lo, mau" mathao: yang mangad: lo:- Mao" So: yang din: man" ra" yaug khyo" khae: yu: ru qhug' ra" yaug wa ngaui lho" ra" khyo re yao: ta" au:- Davi wa-
Tarha" shad' lhoe" rure qobo khyad' byid: qhug' ru we' yug: no qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid: qhug' ra" mo, wa ngaui lho" ako" .
Yao: yao" qobo re Mao" So: yang maxam" to: byid: nae" yaug wa ngaui lho" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Davi ta" ra" ce: ngaui lho" ru wa au: qid lhai: khyo re kad' ra" mo; qhid' mae" za: ngad: ra" i? Dajhid' re: mangad: ngad: ra" . Ai: ngaui lho" ru wa au: qid lhai" ra" khyo makham: yu: ra" mo; qhid' mae" re: ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re- Abraham wa Mao" So re lam khug: ra" . Aimung: yao" lam khug: myid mathao: yang Mao" So wa yao: re din: man" ra" yaug khyo" khae: yu: ra"- ein: ngonhaung" Jham: Mugsug' re ngha yang: ta" va" .
Ceru wa khonhae" boe" ru ngad: i? Abraham wa au: qid lhai: khyo makham: yu shire ngad: i? Mangad: lao"- au: qid lhai" ra" khyo re kham: yu thao re ngad: ra" i? Au: qid lhai" ra" khyo kham: yu thao re mangad:- Au: qid lhai" ra" khyo makham: yu shimae" ngad: ra" .
Abraham wa- au: qid lhai" ra" khyo re ai: thao re kham: yu: ra"- ai: au: qid lhai" ra" khyo re kham: yu: ru wa- Mao" So wa Abraham nho: lam khug: myid mathao mae ai: au: qid lhai" ra" khyo makham: yu shimae" Abraham re din: man" ra" yaug khyo" sun" yu: ra" khyo re qhu" byid' ra" ave, ngad: ra" . Airumung: Abraham wa ai: au: qid lhai" ra" khyo re makham: yu gesho' ngadqere: Mao" So re lam khug: ra" myid mathao mae din: man" ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ra" mo, alhab' nho: yao: pho" ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa au: qid lhai" ra" khyo re kham: yu: ra" mo; yao: pho" re: ngad: ra" . Aiwa yao: bam: au: qid lhai" ra" khyo re kham: yu ko" ruyang za: mangad:- ngonhaung" phug' pho" Abraham yao: au: qid lhai" ra" khyo re makham: yu shire Mao" So re lam khug yang: kao so' daui: lo: ra" lo, mau" we' dakhyo:- yao: bam kao so' daui geyang: ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa Abraham we' yao" myid: zo: qere- mug: myid re sang nhao nae"- ga: dao: so: byid' to" ra" . Airu: dao: so: byid' to" ra" au:- Abraham wa kham" to" ra" tarha" re phug' cao" yang: mangad:- yao: wa Mao" So re lam khug mung: Mao" So: yang yao: re din: man" ra" yaug khyo" sun" yu byid' ruyang ngad: ra" .
Mao" So: dao: so: wa ai: kham" to" ra" tarha" re phug' cao" ra" mo; qhid' mae" za: ngad: re wa- lam khug: ru wa aje amyid ngad mung:- Mao" So: dao: so: re: pe" phug' made, ngad: ra" .
Kham" to" ra" tarha" wa Mao" So: nhag' yo" rure boe" nhao: ra"- ngadqere: ai: kham" to" ra" tarha" majo, re wa tarha" shad' lhoe" rure: majo, ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ai: dao: so: wa Abraham nho: myid: zo: qe alhab' re aphug' mabyid: ca" lo: byid' ra" Mao" So: jeju jhaung qhu" ngad: ra" khyo re gang" tang: jo, vashao:- lam khug: rumae apan te" to" ra" khyo re qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" dao: so: ngad: ra" . Ai: dao: so: wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" mo; qhid' mae" za: mangad:- Abraham we' dakhyo: Mao" So re lam khug: ra" mo; qhid' mae" re: ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re jham: mugsug' mae- ngo wa nao re byumyu" myo: sho' mo; yao: pho" boe" nhao va"- ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo:- Abraham wa Byo we' sin" ra" ngonhaung" alhab' mo; yao: pho" ngad: ra" . Airu: mung: ai: dao: so: wa Abraham lam khug: ra" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae gai: ra" . Ai: Mao" So wa sushid re kao so' daui: li" nhao: ru we' azhao majo; rure jo; li" nae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ra" Mao" So ngad: ra" .
Abraham wa myid: lao" nae" khyo agu majo; au: lhao" re: Mao" So re lam khug mung: myid: lao" ra"- Airumung: yao: wa byumyu" myo: sho' mo; yao: pho" boe" lo: ra" . Jham: Mugsug mae- ni" myid: zo: qe wa kyi ce' nho" je" li" nae"- ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Yao" apyad dayo zin ko byang" li" na mung: yao" gaung dau: wa ashid ru" ru ngad: byaug va" rure re:- Sarah wa zo: dau maqo" khau lo" rure ba ngadqere: yao" lam khug: myid wa manang" lo" ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Mao" So re lam khug: ra" myid mato" pye' ngad: ra" . Mao" So: dao: so: rere: aug' o: myid mabo ngad: ra"- yao" lam khug: myid wa yao: re qam: so' pyang" byid: mung: yao: wa Mao" So re caung: khin" byid' ra" .
Mao" So wa yao: dao: so: byid' to" ru we' dakhyo:- qo" kad' boe" yaug ngad: rure Abraham wa myo, cam: tang lam: ra" .
Abraham wa airu: Mao" So re lam khug: ruyang Mao" So: yang yao: re din: man" ra"- ga: khae: yu byid' ra" .
Mao" So wa yao: re din: man" ra" yaug khyo" khae: yu: ra"- ga" ra" dao: wa Abraham yao: dayaug reza: qang yang: tung" to" ru mangad:-
Ngonhaung" Asang Yesu re shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ra" Mao" So re lam khug: ra" mathao mae Mao" So: yang din: man" ra"- ga: khae: yu qhug' ra" mo, ngonhaung" rere: qang yang: tung" to" ru ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- Asang Yesu wa ngonhaung" qobo mathao mae shid kham: byid: nae" ab: pye' ru qhug' mung:- ngonhaung" re Mao" So: yang jo: ra"- ga: khae: yu nae" qhid' mae" yao: wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' ra" .
Ana"- ngonhaung" wa lam khug: ra" myid khyo" yang jo: ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu: ru qhug' mung:- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang Mao" So we' ngonhaung" agyo: mae yaug yo: ru qhug' yu: ra" .
Ana" ngonhaung" daui: na: ra" Mao" So: jeju re kham zo" ra" kao so' mae yao: ngonhaung" re lam khug: ru khyo" yang jhui" lo: ra" . Airumung: Mao" So: phungbao re qo" bokhae: yu nae"- myid: lao" yang: ngonhaung" ngaui bau: ngaui yao phug: na: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa qug: khai" rumae re: ta" phug: na:- pe"mung: ga"re qug: khai" ru wa zang: qhao" rure- boe" nhao: ra" .
Zang: qhao" ru wa Mao" So: yang myid bovang" byid' rure boe" nhao: ra" . Asang Mao" So: yang myid bovang" byid' ru wa myid: lao" rure boe" nhao: rure- ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Ai: myid: lao" ru wa ngonhaung" re qam: shan nhao nae" mangad:- pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" re byid' ra" jhaung qhu"- Gyang" Lho" Byo khyo" yang Mao" So wa yao" jhid' de; myid ngonhaung" nhag' lam: khug mae vhe' zaui byid' to" ra" .
Ngonhaung" khug ngha qo majo, shi" au:- Khristu wa Mao" So: yang dang: to" ra" yo, khyin: mae makhyang: mashab; ra" mo; qhid' mae" shid kham: byid' ra" .
Din: man" ra" byu dayaug: qhid' mae" byu dayaug yaug shid kham: byid: nae" wa qug' ra" mau" ngad: ra" . Byugai dayaug: qhid' mae" vae" shid kham: byid: nae" byu kam" wa- dayaug yaug bo maba-
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa qobo gaung qe ngad: jo; bam shi" au:- Khristu wa ngonhaung" qhid' mae" shid kham: byid' ru wa Mao" So ngonhaung" re khoqhi" jhid' de; ra" khyo ngonhaung" re qhu" byid' ava" .
Ana" ngonhaung" wa Khristu shid kham: byid' ra" khyo" yang jo: ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu: ru qhug' mo, ngad mung: Mao" So: nhag' yo" rumae" Khristu mathao mae khyad' yu: ru je yang: qhug' nae" ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: gyevo qe ngad: bam ngadqere: Mao" So: yao: zo: shid kham: byid' ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" re yao" ba nam kad' yu: ra" . Ana" ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: ba nam qe ngad va" ruyang kao so' daui: na: ra" Khristu kao so' mathao mae ngonhaung" wa khyad' yu: ru je yang: qhug' nae" ngad: ra" .
Ana" ngonhaung" re Mao" So: ba nam boe" nhao: ra" Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang Mao" So kad' va" ra" mau" zo" mathao mae ngonhaung" ngaui bau" na: .
Qobo wa byu dayaug khyo" yang mug: myid khyo vao li" mung: yao" qobo mathao mae shid: ru boe" li" ra" . Airumung: byu alhab' mo, wa qobo shad' lhoe" ko" ruyang shid: ru wa xao su byu alhab' mo; dao mae byo: lo" ra" .
Kham" to" ra" Tarha" majo, shimae"- qobo wa mug: myid dao mae jo; ra" . Ngadqere: ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" majo; ra" yo, mae qobo jham re xam" to" ra" khyo majo, ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: shid: ru wa Adam nho: pyad mae" Moshe nho: pyad mae joe" sho' xao su byu alhab' mo; dao mae eib; to" ra" . Mao" So: amyin" dao: re mho dao: magyo" ra" khyo"- Adam: shad' lhoe" ra" qobo ru" rure mashad' lhoe" ko" ra" mo; dao mae lhao" re:- shid: ru wa eib: jo; ra" . Adam: wa joe" li" nae" ra" yaug: ve, lho ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ai shid' yaug wa majho" dau ngad: ako"- pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: jeju jhaung qhu" wa Adam nho: qobo we' madau ngad: ra" . Byu dayaug qobo shad' lhoe" ra" mathao: yang byu myo: sho' mo, shid: ru qhug' ko" ru wa dang: ra" . Ngadqere: Mao" So: nhag' myan" ru we' Yesu Khristu ga" ra" byu dayaug: nho: nhag' myan" ra" khyo" yang byu myo: sho' mo, re byid' ra" Mao" So: jeju jhaung qhu" wa je yang: qi" qhang: ra" .
Mao" So byid' ra" jeju jhaung qhu" we' byu dayaug shad' lhoe" ra" qobo dae wa majho" dau ngad: ra" . Qobo daja: thao re qobo qo" ra"- ga: dao: kho' ru joe" ra" . Ngadqere: qobo myo: sho' thao mae qobo maqo" ga: ta" pyo: ra" maman: maqi" ra" khyo" khae: yu: ra" jeju jhaung qhu" thug' li" ra" .
Byu dayaug shad' lhoe" ra" qobo mathao mae shid: ru wa ai: byu dayaug: mathao mae byu alhab' mo, re eib: na: ru wa dang: ra" . Ngadqere:- Yesu Khristu ga" ra" byu dayaug khyo" yang kad' thug' ke' ra" akyu" wa khoqhi" sho' je: qi: nae" i? Mao" So: magan: mago" ra" nhag' myan" ru jeju re qo" khae: yu: ra" mo, we' Mao" So: yang jo: ra"- ga: sun" yu qhug' ra" mo, wa Khristu khyo" yang qam: bo bo za: kao so' daui: li" genae" .
Airumung:- byu dayaug qobo shad' lhoe" ruyang byu alhab' mo, dao: kho' ru qhug' ruwe' dakhyo: byu dayaug din: man" ra" mau" zo" zaui: so" ruyang byu alhab' mo, re loe; beim nhao mung:- yao: bam re kao so' byid' ra" .
Byu dayaug mho dao: magyo" ra" mathao mae byu alhab' mo, qobo shad' lhoe" ra" mo, ga: sun" pye' ru we' dakhyo:- byu dayaug mho dao: gyo" ruyang byu alhab' mo, re din" man" ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' li" genae" .
Shad' lhoe" ra" qobo myo" laug: li" nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" re byid' to" ra" . Ngadqere: shad' lhoe" ra" qobo myo" laug: li" lao"- Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju re: jeyang: myo" laug: li" ra" .
Airumung: qobo wa shid: ra" qam: so' yang eib: na: ru we' dakhyo:- Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju re: din: man" ru we' eib khang" na mung:- ngonhaung" nho: Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang ngonhaung" re apyad ato: kao so' re qo" yu nhao: ra" .
Airulao"- ngonhaung" pe" ru: ta" nae" i? Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju myo" laug: li" nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" wa qobo khug mae xo' yang: kao so' daui nae" i?
Gaigai: airu: mangad:- Qobo we' shid: gao: va" mo, ngonhaung" wa qobo khug mae khoru: mung: kao so' qo" gai: daui nae" i?
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa Yesu Khristu we' dagaung dasho: za: doe, nae" qhid' mae" qid nyhab' kham: yu: ra" au:- yao: we' daga" boshid kham va" rure naonhaung" gaigai: yao: ba: ako" .
Airumung: Yesu wa yao: Pho" phungbao qam: so' khyo" yang shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' ru we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" re: kao so' daui khyo asag' re kao so' qo" daui: na nae" qhid' mae"- ngonhaung" qid nyhab' kham: yu: ra" khyo" Yesu yao" shid kham" rumae bobo mung: yao: we' daga" nyhab' pye' ru qhug' bam va" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa yao: we' daga" yao" shid: rumae yao: we' boshid va" ru we' dakhyo:- yao: re daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' rumae ngonhaung" re: yao: we' daga" daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' nae" ngad: ra" .
Amung: qobo kad' nae" kao bau: ra" myid qam: so' re se' pye' mung: ngonhaung" wa qobo: nho: jeim maboe" na lo nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" nho: qobo gaung byuxug' wa Khristu we' daga" pyao: zang dao mae bose' pye' ru qhug' va" rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" . Airumung: ngonhaung" wa qobo: nho: jeim magai: boe" na lo: ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re byu dayaug yaug wa shid: au:- yao: wa qobo: qam: so' lo, mae" lhoe' ke' byid' ru qhug' ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Yesu we' daga" shid kham: va" ruyang ngonhaung" re: yao: we' daga" kao so' daui: li" nae" ein: myid: lam: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Khristu wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' va" rumung:- thao phyao: khonhae" re: madam: shid lo nae" . Shid: ru wa yao: re maqo" eib lo nae" rure ngonhaung" ba: .
Airumung: yao: shid kham: va" ruyang qobo wa yao" dao mae maqo" eib: na lo: ngad: ra" . Ana"- yao: wa Mao" So we' zam" khug yang: kao so' daui: na: ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo: qobo we' sin: yang: ta" gelang: ga" re- naonhaung" yao" gaung re shid va" khyo" myid: jho: yu ca" ako" . Ngadqere: Yesu Khristu khyo" yang Mao" So we' zam" khug: daui: na: ein: myid: jho: na ge, .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa naonhaung" yao" gaung sho: obyid: ra" khyo re cao" ye: sho'- qobo wa naonhaung" shid ba: ra" gaung dau re ana" mae" daeib nhao loge,-
Naonhaung" yao" gaung dau khodau rere: makhyang" ra" khyo mae dadaui nhao ge, . Naonhaung" wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" va" mo, ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" gaung geim" re Mao" So re qhaug' byid: mung: din: man" ra" khyo re ci nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" yao" gaung dau re Mao" So re ab byid: ge,-
Qobo re naonhaung" Asang dakad' nhao ge,- pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" qao: mae na mo, mangad:- Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju qao: mae na: ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Airulao" wa- ngonhaung" wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" qao: mae mana lomung:- Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju qao: mae na mo, ngad va" ruyang qobo kad' nae" i? Airu: dajhid' re: mangad:-
Dayaug yaug jhao" mho dao: gyo: nae"- ga: naonhaung" yao" gaung re jeim khyo" yesang nhao: pye' lao"- naonhaung" wa naonhaung" mho dao: gyo: byid' ra" yaug; nho: jeim qe ngad ko" rure gaigai: yao: naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re daba naonhaung" wa qobo: nho: jeim qe boe" qu" vako" ra"- ngadqere: ana" wa- mho" shid' rumae naonhaung" kham: yu: ra" dangman" ra" khyo re naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: alhab' we' phug' cao" vako" ruyang Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" byid' ra" .
Naonhaung" wa qobo: nho: jeim boe" na: rumae" lhoe' ke' byid' ru qhug' mung: din: man" ru nho: jeim qe boe" lo: avako" .
( Naonhaung" wa gaung sho: shad' mae azhao: mae" yao: laba lajhao mae qam: nang: mo, ngad ko" ruyang ba: gyo: laui: ra" dao: jham re ngo ci: ru ngad: ra" . ) Ganhae" naonhaung" wa- naonhaung gaung dau: alhab' re makhyang" ra" lo,mau" qhid' mae" masan masin" ru we' makhyang: mashab: ru: nho: jeim qe kad' nhao: lo: avako" . Ai we' dakhyo:- ana"- naonhaung" gaung dau: alhab' re gyang" lho" ra" lo, mau" jham: qhid' mae" din: man" ra" khyo: nho: jeim qe kad' nhao ca" ko" ra" .
Naonhaung" wa qobo: nho: jeim qe doe; na shiko" au:- din: man" rumae" loe; jo; ako" .
Ana" naonhaung" myid: qho' na ko" ra" naonhaung" kad' qu" vako" ra" mau" zo" jham mae" pe" ja" akyu" qo" kham: yu vako" i? Ai: mau" zo" jham: nho: athao wa shid: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa ana"- qobo: lo, mae" lhoe' ke' byid' ru qhug' mung:- Mao" So: jeim qe boe" lo: avako" . Naonhaung" qo" kham: yu: ra" akyu" wa- Mao" So: qhid' mae" yao: yao" gaung dau: geim" re qhaug' byid' ru we' apyad ato: kao so' qo" yu: ru ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re qobo: nho: aphug' wa shid: ru ngad: ra" . Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju jhaung qhu" kam" wa ngonhaung" Asang Khristu Yesu we' dagaung dasho: boe" rumae apyad ato: kao so' ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" wa tarha" khyo we' sin: yang: ba: to: mo, ngad ko" ruyang ana" ngo ta" kyo: nae" ra" khyo re naonhaung" nyang" za: ba: gyo" li" genae" . Tarha" wa byu kao so' daui: na: ra" gu: mae za: eib: jo; ra" .
Dao: tau" tau" re- lo, xo' xo' va" ra" myiqe: dayaug wa yao" yham sang pho" daui: na: ra" gu: mae lo, xo' xo' ra" tarha" qao: mae yham sang pho" we' zham" to: qhug' ra" . Ngadqere: yham sang pho" shid: byaug lao" wa- ai: lo, xo' ra" tarha" qao: mae" yham sang pho" we' zham" to: qhug' rumae" loe; beim: ra" .
Airumung: yao" yham sang pho" daui: na shi" au:- gatau: yauggai we' zam" na: ngad: re wa lao shad' ra" yaug- ga: yao: re mhang" li" genae"- ngadqere: yao" yham sang pho" shid thao re kam" wa tarha" vao su: myi: mangad' ra" myiqe: ngad mung: yauggai gatau dayaug we' dam: lo, xo' yu ngadqere: lao shad' yaug mangad: lo: ngad: ra" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" re: ceru we' dakhyo: ngad: ako"- Tarha" we' sin: yang: ta" gelang: ga" re naonhaung" re: shid va" mo, ngad: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa Khristu nho: gaung dau qe ngad: ako" . Ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: mau" zo" mae akyu" bo: ra" mo, boe" nae" qhid' mae" ana" naonhaung" wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ra" Khristu nho: byu qe boe" lo: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa byu xao su gaung dau: shad' re cao" yang: kao so' daui: ra" au:- kham" to" ra" Tarha" yang nhug' byid: qhug' ra" qobo shad' lhoe" nug: ra" myid we' ngonhaung" kao so' daui: lo: bam va" . Amung: ngonhaung" kad' ra" lo, mau" alhab' wa shid: rumae thao" lo" byaug va" .
Daba ngonhaung" re taui" lhaung" to" rumae" ngonhaung" shid: gao: va" ruyang ana" ngonhaung" wa- kham" to" ra" Tarha" mae" loe; beim: bam va" . Airu: mung: ngonhaung" wa tung" to" ra" tarha" khyo axug' re macao" lo:- Gyang" Lho" Byo: nho: khyo asag' mae Mao" So re caung da" byid' na: ru ngad: ra" .
Airulao"- kham" to" ra" Tarha" airu yao: wa qobo ngad: ra"- ein: ngonhaung" ta" nae" i? Airu: magai: ta"- ngadqere: qobo ga" ru pe" ja: ngad: rure kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa ngore ba nhao: ra" . Su gaje qe sang: ra" zai re myo, nyad o: dabyid wa,- ga: kham" to" ra" Tarha" mae mata" to: ngad: re wa myo, nyad obyid ru ga" ru pe" ja: ngad: rure ngo ba nae" mangad:-
Ngadqere: qobo wa ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" mae agu gai yu mung: nga" aung khug nhag' lam: mae kao bau obyid: ra" mau" zo" aja: aja: re boe" thug' li" nhao: ra" . Tarha" majo, ngad: re wa qobo wa ashid ngad: ra" .
Daba wa ngoyao: re:- Tarha" re maba lo: kao so' daui: na: lo: qu" va"- ngadqere: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re ba lao" qobo wa daui: thug' li" mung: ngo wa shid: lo" ra" .
Kao so' daui nhao nae" qhid' mae" byid' ra" kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa nga" qhid' mae" wa shid: rure byid' ra" .
Qobo wa agu qho: yu mung: ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" khyo" yang ngore mhug' pyag' mung: yang: ngore se' pye' ra" .
Airu: mung: kham" to" ra" Tarha" yao: yao: wa gyang" lho" ra" . Ai: amyin" dao: re: gyang" lho" ru we' dangman: mung: gai: ra" .
Airu: ngad: re wa- gai: ra" tarha" wa ngore shid nhao: ra" i? Mashid nhao ngad: ra"- ngore shid nhao: ru wa qobo ngad: ra" . Qobo wa azhao: mae" yao: yao" ave, re qhu" shid' byid: nae" qhid' mae" gai: rure ci mung: ngore shid nhao: ru ngad: ra" . Airumung: kham" to" ra" tarha" wa qobo wa matho' ka" losho' ngad: ra" magai: rure qhu" byid' ra" .
Kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa Byo we' sin" ra" khyo ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra"- ngadqere: ngo wa qobo: nho: jeim shid ba: ra" byu dayaug ngad: ra" .
Ngoyao: kad' ra" lo, mau" re ngoyao: maba: gyo:- pe"mung: ga"re ngo kad' nug: ra" lo, mau" re ngo makad'- ngo nghang" ra" lo, mau" re za: kad' na yang: ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa ngoyao: manug: kad' ra" lo, mau" re kad' na: ruyang ce: lo, mau" wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa jo: ra"- ga" rure ngo bomyid vang" byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ce: lo, mau" re kad' ra" yaug wa gaigai: yao: wa ngo mangad:- nga" khug mae bo: ra" qobo yaug kad' ru ngad: ra" .
Nga" gaung sho: nhag' lam: khug mae gai: ra" ru mabo: rure ngo ba:- pe"mung: ga"re nga" khug mae gai: ra" ja: kad' nae" kao bau myid bo: jo, ngadqere: maqo" zaui: ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa gai: ra" lo, mau" re kad' nug ngadqere: ngo makad' lo:- ngo manug: kad' ra" makhyang" ra" lo, mau" re za: ngo kad' ra" .
Ngo manug: kad' ra" lo, mau" re ngo kad' re wa- ce: lajheim: wa ai: lo, mau" re kad' ra" yaug wa ngo mangad:- nga" nhag' lam: khug mae bo: ra" qobo yaug kad' ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung:- ngo kad' ra" mau" mae tarha" daja: re ngo the' myao: ra" . Ai: tarha" wa gai: ra" mau" re ngo zaui: nug: ra" au:- magai: rure za: qo" khyin: yu: ra" .
Nga" aung khug nhag' lam: wa Mao" So: tarha" re ngaui bau: ngaui yao za: khae: yu: ra" .
Ngadqere: nga" gaung dau: khug mae nga" myid: yang ngaui: ra" tarha" re gye kad' na: ra" mange; ra" tarha" dalam: bo: jo; rure ngo the' myao: ra" . Ai: tarha" wa nga" khug mae mau" zaui: mung: ngore qobo tarha" nho: kyam: byu kad' nhao: ra" .
Dayin dayo: khyag' qhui: ra" ngoru" yaug we"- ngore shid: ru khyo jhui" ye" lo" naeva" ce: gaung khyao mae" ngore khag' yang khyad' yu naeva" laug i?
Ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang ngore khyad' yu: ra" Mao" So: jeju wa qi" qhang: jo, vashao: wo"- Airumung: ngo boe" na: ra" khyo re ta" gelang: ein: re- ngo wa nga" myid khyo" yang za: Mao" So: tarha" re qo" caung da" byid: mung:- nga" nho: byu: gaung sho: shad' khyo" wa qobo: nho: tarha" re caung da" byid' ra" .
Yesu Khristu we' dagaung dasho: za: ngad: na: ra" mo; qhid' mae" wa dao: phyid' ru pe" majo, ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yesu Khristu we' dagaung dasho: za: kao so' daui nhao: ra" Byo: nho: tarha" wa qobo: nho: tarha" mae" we' shid: ra" tarha" lo, mae" ngore lhoe' ke' byid' ra" .
Byu xao su qam: nang: yang: ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" yang maqo" kad' byid' ra" mau" zo" re Mao" So: yang zaui: so: byid' ra" . Mao" So wa qobo vin: pye' byid: nae" ngonhaung" we' dakhyo: qobo qo" ra" xao su byu qobo gaung khyao ve, vin: ra" yao" yao: zo: re nhao: ke' byid: mung: byu: gaung sho: mae qobo re dao: phyid' ra" .
Mao" So airu: kad' ru wa- ngonhaung" wa xao su byu: ave, khyo" mangad: lo:- Byo: nho: myid o: ra" khyo" kao so' daui: ra" mo, ngonhaung" mae kham" to" ra" Tarha" yang ta" to" ra" din: man" ra" khyo jham re jab byang" sho' boe" thug' li" nae"qhid' mae" kad' ru ngad: ra" .
Byu xao su gaung sho: o: ra" khyo" kao so' daui: ra" mo, wa- gaung sho: we' sin" ra" ja: re za: nhag' nghae" jo; ako" . Byo o: ra" khyo" kao so' daui: ra" mo, wa- Byo we' sin" ra" ja: re za: nhag' nghae" jo; ako" .
Gaung sho: we' sin" ra" ja: re nhag' nghae" ra" mo, wa shid: ru khyo joe" ako" . Byo we' sin" ra" ja: re nhag' nghae" ra" mo, wa kao so' daui: ru we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ra" khyo re qo" yu: ako" .
Airumung: gaung sho: we' sin" ra" ja: re nhag' nghae" ra" yaug wa Mao" So: gyevo boe" li" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa Mao" So: tarha" re maphug' cao" ngad: ra"- gaigai: ga" re yao: wa aire maqo" phug' cao" ngad: ra" .
Gaung sho: o: ra" khyo re cao" ra" mo, wa Mao" So re maqo" ngaui nhao ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So: Byo naonhaung" khug mae daui: na: ngad: re wa- naonhaung" wa gaung sho: o: ra" khyo" kao so' madaui lo:- Byo o: ra" khyo" kao so' daui: ako"- Khag' ngadqere: Khristu nho: Byo maqo" ra" yaug wa Khristu we' masin: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" khug mae Khristu na: jo; ngad: re wa- qobo: mathao mae naonhaung" gaung dau: shid: lo" ca" nae" ngadqere: Byo wa kao so' daui: na nae" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa- Mao" So: yang din: man" ra"- ga: sun" yu: ru qhug' avako" .
Yesu re shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ra" Mao" So: Byo naonhaung" khug mae na: ngad: re wa Khristu re shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ra" Mao" So wa naonhaung" khug mae na: jo; ra" Yao" Byo khyo" yang naonhaung" shid ba: ra" gaung khyao rere: kao so' daui nhao: li" nae" .
Airumung:- Mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" wa qo qo" ra" mo, ngad: ra"- ngadqere: ai wa ngonhaung" gaung sho: o: ra" khyo" kao so' daui nae" ra" qo mangad:-
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa gaung sho: o: ra" khyo" kao so' daui: ngad: re wa- naonhaung" wa shid: li" genae" . Ngadqere: yao" Byo: yang naonhaung" qobo lo, mau" jham re se' pye' ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" kao so' daui: na: li" genae" .
Mao" So: Byo: yang khyoqhid' au: she byid: qhug' ra" mo, wa Mao" So: zo: dau qe ngad: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: yang naonhaung" re byid' to" ra" Byo wa naonhaung" re jeim boe" nhao: ru mangad:- Gyaug: ra" myid rere: maboe" nhao ngad: ra" . Ai: atha" Ai: Byo wa ngonhaung" re Mao" So: yao: zo: qe boe" nhao yang:- ai: Byo: nho: qam: so' khyo" yang ngonhaung" wa Mao" So re- Pho" we"- nga" Pho" we"- ga: qo" yao: ra" akhang" re qo" yu ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: zo: dau qe ngad: rure sagse: kham byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: Byo yao: re: ngonhaung" byo we' daga" qhan: yang: sagse: kham byid' ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Mao" So yao" zo: dau qe ngad: ruyang yao" byu qe: qhid' mae" jaung: to" ra" shaman" jeju re ngonhaung" qo" sang: yu: li" nae" . Khristu qhid' mae" Mao" So jaung: to: byid' ra" phungbao rere: yao: we' daga" ngonhaung" qo" sang: yu: li" nae" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa Khristu nho: dayin dayo: kham zo" rumae bobo: ngad: re wa yao" phungbao mae re: ngonhaung" qo" bokham: yu: li" nae" .
Ana"- ce: pyad mae ngonhaung" dayin dayo: kham zo" ru wa thao phyao: ngonhaung" re qhu" byid: nae" ra" phungbao we' dajhid' re: maqo" tho' gai: tau"- ein: ngo myid: ra" .
Phan" to" ra" gu: alhab' wa- Mao" So: zo: dau qe de: de: qhu" byid' thug' li" nae" rure mamyan: makhyad' kao bau yang: lao" na: bam: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re phan" to" ra" gu: alhab' wa akeim boe" nae" qhid' mae" dao: phyid' ra" . Airu: boe" ru wa phan" to" ra" gu alhab' nho: myid o: ra" khyo" boe" ru mangad:- Mao" So: myid o: ra" khyo" boe" nhao: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: phan" to" ru wa daba na re byo; qeim: lo" ra" khyo mae" loe; beim: ru qhug' mung: Mao" So: zo: dau qere: phungbao bo: ra" loe; beim khyo re qo" bokham: yu: li" nae"- ga" rure myid: lao" nae" jo; ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re phan" to" ra" gu: alhab' wa ana" ba joe" sho' zo: khau no we' dakhyo:- no mung: nokyang: kyang" na: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Ngadqere: phan" to" ra" gu: za: nokyang: kyang" na: ru mangad:- Mao" So: sao qhid' jeju jhaung qhu" ngad: ra" Byo re qo" kham: yu: ra" mo, ngonhaung" re:- Mao" So: yao: zo: toe' yu: ru qhug' nae" we' ngonhaung" gaung geim" khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" rure lao" mung: nokyang: kyang" na: bam: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa myid: lao" ra" khyo" yang khyad' yu: ru qhug' ra"- ngadqere: ngonhaung" myid: lao" rure ngonhaung" qo" myao: ngad: re wa ngonhaung" myid: lao" ru wa gaigai: myid: lao" ru mangad:- pe"mung: ga"re qo" myao: ra" ja: re khoyaug myid: lao" ra" i?
Ngonhaung" wa maqo" myao: ra" ja: re myid: lao" na: ngad: re wa- ngonhaung" wa aire nhag' lam: qhang qhang za: lao" na: ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo: Byo re: qam: nang" ra" ngonhaung" re bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" ra" . Ngonhaung" wa akyu" khoru: mho' ca" rure maba- nhad' dao: thoe: yang maqo" ta" thug' ra" nokyang: kyang: thoe we' ai: Byo yao: ngonhaung" qhid' mae" Mao" So re bao" mho' byid' ra" .
Ngonhaung" nhag' lam: re myao: kyao" ra" Mao" So wa Byo: nho: myid rere: ba: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Byo wa Mao" So myid o: ru we' dakhyo:- yao" byu qe: qhid' mae" Mao" So re mho' yao byid' ra" .
Mao" So wa yao: yao: re jhid' de; ra" yao" myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo re cao" yang: khai: yu: ru qhug' ra" ngonhaung" we' daga" ja: khao: ngo" mae gai: ra" khyo" boe" sho' bokad' na: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Yao: Zo: wa mao: nhaung: qe myo: sho' phaung mae mao: mo" boe" nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa yao: khyin: yu: to: va" ra" mo, re yao: Zo: we' dakhyo: dau: ru boe" li" nae" gatau khyin: san: yu: to" ava" .
Airumung: Mao" So wa yao: gatau khyin: san: yu: to: va" ra" mo, re khai: yu: ra" . Airu: khai: yu: ra" mo, rere: Mao" So wa yao: bam re din: man" ra"- ga: sun" yu byid' ra" . Amung: yao" phungbao rere: yao: bam re bomyho" kham zo: nhao: ra" .
Cegu: alhab' re qu" yang: ngonhaung" pe" ta" nae" i? Mao" So wa ngonhaung" shad' mae na yang: ngad: re wa ngonhaung" re gye khag' qo" kad' nae" i? Mao" So wa gai: gai: yao: ngonhaung" re gye kad' nae" mangad:
Mao" So wa yao" yao: Zo: re lhao" re: o: mabyid lo:- ngonhaung" alhab' mo; qhid' mae" yao: re ab byid' pye' ava" . Ngonhaung" qhid' mae" yao: Zo: re lhao" re: ab byid' pye' ra" yaug wa- ja: khao: ngo" rere: mabyag lo: ngonhaung" re byid' li" nae" mangad: i?
Mao" So khyin: yu: to" ra" mo, re qobo khag' qo" zhaug' nae" i? Yao: bam qobo maqo" rure Mao" So yao: ta" hau" pye' ava" .
Airumung:- yao: bam re khoyaug dao: qo" phyid' nae" i? Khristu Yesu wa ngonhaung" re dao: phyid' nae" mangad: . Shid kham: byid: mung: shid: rumae" daui: to" li" ra" Yesu Khristu wa Mao" So: lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo, yang: ngonhaung" qhid' mae" Mao" So re mho' yao byid' na: ra" .
Airumung: Khristu nho: jhid' de; myid mae" ngonhaung" re khag' qo" kao" pye' byid: nae" i? Qug: khai: qhug' ru- myid: qug: myid: ci" qhug' ru- yhin" qhug' ru- moe, shab' qhug' ru- myaung sho" ru we' se' pye' qhug' ru jham wa Khristu nho: jhid' de; myid mae" ngonhaung" re qo" kao" pye' nae" i?
Jham: Mugsug' mae- Ni" mathao mae ngonhaung" wa ba khao: ba ngo" mae shid gyan nogyan we' jho" qhug' na: ra"- Se' pye' nae" jaung: to" ra" yao jham re we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" re kad' to" ako"- ga: tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" re maqo" kao" pye' nae"- ngonhaung" re jhid' de; ra" Khristu khyo" yang ai: gu: alhab' re ngonhaung" wa nyang" za: aung doe; pye' va" ru ngad:-
Pe"mung: ga"re- yao" jhid' de; myid mae" pe" ja" yang re: ngonhaung" re maqo" kao" pye' ngad: ra" . Shid: ru ngadqere:- daui: ru ngadqere:- mug: lagyo: jham ngadqere:- Mug: gaung kheim: so' qo" mo, ngadqere:- ana" pyad ngadqere:- joe" lo nae" pyad ngadqere:-
mug: gaung tho' pyae ngadqere:- myid gaung o: pyae ngadqere:- phan" to" ra" gu: alhab' pe" ja" yang ngadqere:- ngonhaung" re ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang qhu" byid' ra" Mao" So: jhid' de; myid mae" maqo" kao" pye' byid' rure ngo jhaug' za: ba: ra" .
Ngo wa din: man" ra" dao: re jhau: na: ra" . Ngo wa Khristu yang sang yaug ngad mung: mamhug' . Nga" nhag' lam: khug mae nga" byumyu"- nga" sho:- nga" sa: qe: qhid' mae" khoqhi" sho' kaug' ru we' mathang mano: dayin dayo: no: ra" khyo re- ta" au: ngo mamhug' rure Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang eib: ra" nga" aung khug myid: yang re: ngore jhaug' za: ba nhao: ra" .
Yao: bam khyad' yu: ru aqhug' genae" ngad: re wa ngo yao: wa Mao" So: nhang: kheim: re kham: yu mung: Khristu mae" kao" pye' ru qhug' nae" rure lhao" re: ngo kham: yu nug: ra" .
Yao: bam wa Mao" So: byu qe ngad: ako" . Mao" So wa yao: bam re yao: zo: toe' yu: ru we' yao" phungbao yao: bam re qhu" byid' ra" . Yao: wa yao: bam we' dao: thang" to: mung: yao: bam re Tarha" byid' ra" . Yao: bam wa jo: ra" caung: pa" khyo re we' Mao" So: dao: so: jham re qo" khae: yu: ako" .
Yao: bam wa mang qi" ra" Hebre phug' pho" qemae" myhung: gyo" li" mo, ngad: ako" . Khristu wa xao su byu khyo" yao: bam: byumyu" kaung mae bobo: ra" . Alhab' re eib: na: ra" Mao" So wa khonhae" re: caung: khin" byid' ru qhug' vashao:- Amen .
Mao" So: dao: so: wa akeim boe" byaug: ra" ein: ngo ta" na: ru mangad:- pe"mung: ga"re Israel byumyu" alhab' wa Mao" So: byumyu" qe mangad: ko" ngad: ra" .
Abraham mae" gyo" li" ra" mo, alhab' ngadqere: Mao" So: zo: dau qe mangad:- Mao" So wa Abraham re- Nao wa Isag khyo" yang nao re ngo dao: so: byid' to" ra" myid: zo: qe qo" li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ceru: ga" ru wa gaung sho: khyo khyo" khau: li" ko" ra" zo: dau qe wa Mao" So: zo: dau qe mangad: ko" ngad" ra" . Ai: atha" Mao" So: dao: so: khyo" yang khau: li" ko" ra" zo: dau qere za:- zogyang" dau gyang" khyo" sun" yu: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa- ayo, byang" lao"- ngo dam: joe" li" nae"- aimung: Sarah wa yauggai zo: khau: li" li" nae"- ga: re: dao: so: byid' to" ra" .
Cetho' mae- Rebekha nho: yauggai zo: tao wa yao: pho" dayaug za: qo" ako" . Aiwa ngonhaung" nho: phug' pho" Isag ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: yauggai zo: dayaug re khyin: yu: ru wa- Mao" So: myid: yaung to" ra" khyo" za: ngad: rure qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao: wa Rebekha re- mao: mo" yaug wa yao: nhaung: yaug re caung da" byid' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: ceru ta" ru wa- yao: shid' tao makhau shimae" yao: shid' tao agai- aqeim pe" re: maba: kad' shi: gere ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So: yang khyin: yu: ru wa- yao" yang khai: yu: rumae apan to: mung: yao: bam pe" kad' va" rumae apan mato: ngad: ra" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae ngo wa Yaku re jhid' de; ngadqere: Eso re wa ngo nghang" ra"- ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So wa matarha" ngad: ra" ein: ngonhaung" ta" nae" i? Dajhid' re: magai: ta" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa Moshe re ngo wa ngoyao: nug: ra" yaug re jeju kad' nae"- ngoyao: nug: ra" yaug re nhag' khyag' nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: ja: khao: ngo" wa byu myid o: ra" rumae we' byu: lo, mau" dao mae apan aqao: mato: ngad: ra" . Mao" So: nhag' khyag' shogu: rumae za: apan aqao: to" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Jham: Mugsug' mae Egutu kho: kham re- Nao re ngo kho: kham kad' nhao: ru wa nga" qam: so' re qhu" byid: nae" rumae ci nae" we' mug: myid geim" mae nga" mang hau" nhao" ke' nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So wa yao: nug: ra" yaug re jeju kad' byid: mung:- yao: nug: ra" yaug re nhag' lam: qao nhao: ra" .
Ceru: ngad: re wa- Mao" So wa byu dayaug yaug re khoru: qobo qo" vhin nae" i? Mao" So: myid o: rure khag' thaug' tam" nae" i? ga: naonhaung" mae" dayaug yaug ngore ta" li" genae" .
Nga" ba nam pho" we"- nao wa khag' ngad mung:- Mao" So re airu: dao: tau: tau" i? Zhogam: ug' wa yao: re kad' ra" yaug re nao ngore pe"mung: ceru: kad' to" i? ga: mamyid: ngad: ra" .
Ta" gelang: ein: re zhogam: ug' kad' ra" yaug wa myid zhai: re yao: o nug: ra" khyo" kad' nae" we'- yao: wa myid zhai: dathaung: mae" za: zhogam: ug' shid' lam: kad' mung:- dalam: re wa akhyag: rumae ci nae"- dalam re wa yu" yu" ci nae" qhid' mae" kad' nae" akhang" jo; ra" .
Mao" So re: ai we' dakhyo: kad' to" ra" . Yao" nhag' yo" rure qhu" byid: mung: yao" qam: so' re ba nhao nug: ra" . Ngadqere: yao" nhag' yo" rure kham zo: mung: jeim" lo" nae" mo; dao mae yao: wa gyai nhag' lam: qhang: ru we' zang: kham byid' ra" .
Yao: wa yao" magan: mago" ra" phungbao rere: qhu" byid: nug: ra" . Aiwa- yao" phungbao re qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" yao: nyhang" jaung: to" ra" yao" nhag' khyag' shogu: rure khae: yu: ra" ngonhaung" dao mae vhe' sheim" ke' ra" phungbao ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa yao" yang khai: yu: to" ra" mo, ngad: ra" . Yao: wa Yuda byu qemae" za: mangad:- Taung bug byumyu" qemae" re: khai: yu: ra" .
Mao" So wa Hosea Mugsug' mae- Nga" amyu" kaung mangad' ra" mo, re ngo wa nga" amyu" kaung qe ein: mhang" nae" . Ngo majhid' de; ra" byumyu" re nga" jhid' de; ra" byumyu" ein: ngo mhang" nae" .
Naonhaung" wa nga" amyu" kaung qe mangad:- ga: naonhaung" re ta" ko" ra" jo, qo mae yao:- yao: bam wa kao so' daui: ra" Mao" So: yao: zo: qe ga: mhang" ru qhug' li" genae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Amung: Esaia wa- Israel byumyu" khyo we' sin: yang:- Israel byumyu" qe wa panglai: qid yae mae" ma coe nho" myo" laug gesho' ngadqere: yao: bam mae" damyo" za: khyad' yu: ru qhug' genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- Asang wa myid gaung byu qe alhab' mo, re phyad za: dao: kho' nae" ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: ru wa qam: so' bo: thao" ra" Asang wa ngonhaung" myid: zo: qe damyo" re matang" to: byid: ngad: re wa- ngonhaung" wa Sodom vogaung: we' Gomora vogaung: byu qe we' dakhyo: qobo dae qo" kham zo: nae" ngad: ra" ga: qhid' phyao: Esaia ta" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" ta" ru wa- jo: ra"- ga: Mao" So sun" yu byid' ru qhug' nae" qam: make' ko" ra" Taung bug byu qe wa lam khug: ra" khyo" yang jo: ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' ako" .
Mao" So: amyu" kaung qe wa jo: ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' nae" ra" tarha" re cao" gengadqere: ai: tarha" re mamyao ko" ngad: ra" .
