Pe"mung: mamyao ko" ra" i? Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa lam khug: ra" myid re mangha lo: yao: bam: lo, mau" re ngha gemung: yang: ngad: ra" . Airumung: yao: bam wa Jham: Mugsug ta" to" ra"- tha" lang: laug baui mae tha" lang" ako" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae- Qu" wa, Ngo wa Ziun bam mae byu qe tha" lang: genae" ra" laug baui dabaui to: byid' ra" . Byu qe wa ai: laug baui mae tha" lang: yang: gyang: lang" lo" li" genae" . Ngadqere: yao: re lam" ra" yaug wa qam: gyug: qam: shan: ru maqhug' nae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Nga" Mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngoyao" byumyu" qe khyad' yu: ru qhug' genae" qhid' mae" nga" aung khug nhag' lam: alhab' we' gyai o ngaui kao bau: na mung:- yao: bam: qhid' mae" Mao" So re gyai akyu" bao" mho' ra" .
Yao: bam wa Mao" So re gyai phug' myao: kao bau mo, ngad: rure ngo naonhaung" re zhaug' za: sagse: qo" kham byid' ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam: phug' myao: kao bau: ru wa jo: ra" laba lajhao dao mae apan mato: ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa jo: ra"- ga: Mao" So sun" yu byid' ra" khyo re maba ko" ngad: ra" . Ai: atha"- yao: bam yao: kad' yu: ra" khyo re qam: ke' cao" ako" . Airumung: yao: bam wa jo: ra"- ga: Mao" So sun" yu byid' ra" khyo re yao: bam makhae: yu ko" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- lam" ra" mo, yaug khao: ngo" wa jo: ra"- ga:- Mao" So: yang sun" yu: ru qhug' yu genae" qhid' mae" Khristu wa ai: kham" to" ra" tarha" re thao" lo" nhao: ava" .
Moshe wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang Mao" So: yang jo: ra"- ga: sun" yu: ru qhug' ra" khyo we' sin: mung:- ai: kham" to" ra" amyin" dao: re phug' cao" ra" yaug wa kao so' daui: na: li" nae"- ga: tung" to" ra" .
Ngadqere: lam khug: ra" khyo" yang jo: ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ra" khyo we' sin: mung: Jham: Mugsug' mae- mug: gaung khyo khag' do, lo" nae" i?
Movo: mug: khyo khag' gyo" lo" nae" i? ein: naonhaung" yao" aung khug mae damyid ge,- ga: ta" to" ra" . Amung: lajheim: wa- Khristu re ngonhaung" jhao" khyo" yu nae" mug: gaung khyo khag' qo" do, lo" nae" i? Amung: Khristu re shid: rumae" tau: to' yu nae" movo: mug: khyo khag' qo" gyo" lo" nae" i? ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Jham: dao: ta" nug: ru wa- Mao" So: mungdao: wa nao we' te' te' mae ngad: ra"- ni" nhad' qid mae we' ni" nhag' lam: khug mae ngad: ra"- aimung dao: wa ngonhaung" kho" kyo" ra" lam khug: ra" mungdao: ngad: ra" .
Khristu wa Asang ngad: ra"- ga: nao lhang: yu mung: Mao" So wa yao: re shid: rumae" daui: to" li" nhao: ra"- ga" rure nao lam" ngad: re wa nao wa khyad' yu: ru qhug' li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa ngonhaung" lam khug: myid khyo" yang jo: ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' mung:- ngonhaung" nhad' dao: thoe: yang lhang: yu: ru khyo" yang khyad' yu: ru qhug' yu: ra" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae- yao: re lam" ra" yaug wa qam: gyug: qam: shan qhug' nae" mangad:- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Ceru wa yaug khao: ngo" re ta" ru ngad: ra"- pe"mung: ga"re Yuda byu qe we' Taung bug byu qe: gyo: mae pe" jho" shai" ru majo, ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa alhab' mo; dao mae" dakhyo: za: Asang ngad mung: yao: re mho' yao: ra" mo, alhab' re magan: mathao" ra" shaman" jeju byid' ra" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae- Asang re bao" thaug' mho' yao: ra" mo, yaug khao: ngo" wa khyad' yu: ru qhug' li" genae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam malam" ko" ngad: re wa- yao: bam wa Asang re khoru: qo" mho' yao genae" i? Amung: yao: bam ai: mungdao: re mathe' gyo: gere wa- yao: bam khoru: lam" genae" i? Ailao"- ai: mungdao: re makho" kyo: re- yao: bam khoru: qo" the' gyo: genae" i?
Mungdao: kho" kyo: nae" mo, re manhao: ke' re wa- ai: mung: dao: re khoru: qo" kho" kyo: nae" i? Jham: Mugsug' mae- lau dao: gai vin: ra" lagyo: qe joe" li" ru wa khoqhi" sho' gai: ra" i? ga: ta" to" ra" .
Ngadqere: ai: Lau Dao: Gai re alhab' mo, makhae: yu ko" ngad: ra" . Esaia yao: yao: re:- Asang we"- ngonhaung" mungdao: re khag' lam" ko" ra" i? ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: lam khug: ru wa mungdao: re the' gyo" yu: ra" khyo" yang ngad mung:- aimung dao: wa Khristu ra" khyo re kho" kyo" ra" khyo" yang the' gyo" yu: ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam ai: mungdao: re mathe' gyo: ga" ru wa dang: i? ein: ngo myid: nug: ra" . Yao: bam wa gaigai: yao: the' gyo" yu: avako"- pe"mung: ga"re Jham: Mugsug' mae- Ai: dao: re kho" kyo: ko" ra" mo; thoe wa mug: myid geim" mae byang" sheim: jo; ava" . Yao: bam: nhad' dao: thoe wa myid gaung thao" sho' khyo joe" ava"- ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Amung:- Israel byu qe maba: gyo: genhaung i? Ein: ngo dam: myid: nae"- Mao" So wa Moshe yao: khyo" yang- Ngo wa pe" mangad' ra" byumyu" re ci mung: nga" byumyu" re myid nug: nhao nae"- Atug' akhyug mung: ra" byumyu" khyo" yang Nga" byumyu" re nhag' yo: nhao nae"- ga: sao qhid' phaug' tau" ra" .
Alao"- Esaia wa je: mazag mavae lo:- Ngo re maqho ko" ra" mo, wa ngore myao: ako"- Nga" khyo re mamyid: maqin" ra" mo, re nga" gaung qhu" byid: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Israel byumyu" we' sin: mung:- ngo wa mho dao: magyo" ru we' gye kad' ra" byumyu" re pang" yu nae" qhid' mae" nga" lo, daba gyam geim" yheim" to" ra"- ga: yao: ta" ra" .
Airumung:- ngo myid: nae"- Mao" So wa yao" byumyu" qere shapye' pye' va" ra" i? Gai gai: yao: mashapye' ngad: ra" . Ngoyao" gaung yao: re: Israel byu dayaug ngad mung: Abraham: nho: myid: zo:- Benyamin: kaung mae bobo: ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa aqhid mae" yao: khyin: yu: ra" byumyu" re mashapye' pye' ngad: ra"- Elia wa Israel byumyu" qere qobo vhin mung:
Asang we"- yao: bam wa ni" lapa qere se' pye' avako" . Ni" nho: phan jham rere: phyo' sin" pye' avako"- ngo dayaug za: adang lo"- yao: bam wa ngo rere: se' pye' nae" seim" na: ako"- ga: Mao" So re mho' yao: ra" jham: dau re naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Mao" So wa yao: re pe" ru: phaug' tau: byid' ra" i? So apyag' Ba la re macaung: pa" ko" ra" yauggai nhad' taung gu: re wa ngoyao" qhid' mae" tang" to: va"- ga: Mao" So phaug' tau: byid' ra" .
Ana" re:- ai we' dakhyo: ngad: ra"- yao" nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" yang yao: khyin: yu: ra" byu dajhid' zo: dang: jo; ashi"-
Mao" So yao: bam re khyin: yu: ru wa- yao: bam: lo, mau" re aqao: to: mung: khyin: yu: ru mangad:- yao" nhag' myan" ra" jeju re aqao: to: mung: khyin: yu: ru ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: khyin: yu: ru wa- byu: lo, mau" re aqao: to: mung: yang: ngad: re wa- yao" nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa agyang" mangad: ngad: ra" .
Airulao" wa khoru: i? Israel byumyu" qe wa yao: bam qho: ra" ja: re mamyao ko" ngad: ra"- Mao" So: yang khyin: yu: ra" mo, dajhid' za: aire the' myao: yu: ako" . Dang: ra" mo, wa Mao" So khai: ra" thoe re mathe' gyo:- no: jid: jo; ako" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae- Mao" So wa yao: bam: myid we' nhag' lam: re vhao: lo" nhao: ra" . Ana" ba joe" sho' yao: bam maqo" myao- maqo" gyo: ko" ngad: ra" .
Davi re:- Yao: bam: zo: shaug' poe jham wa yao: bam myi" ra" taui: we' lha" boe" vageshao:- Yao: bam lang" lo" mung: qobo dae kham zo: vageshao:-
Yao: bam mamyao genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam: myo, jid: byaug vageshao:- Yao: bam wa yao: bam: qug' khai: qola: vin yang: khonhae" re: jang: nghaug' jo, vageshao:- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: ngo myid: nae"- Yuda byu qe wa tha" lang: gelao" yao: bam byo; qeim: lo" vako" ra" i? Airu: dajhid' re: mangad:- Taung bug byu qere yao: bam myid nug: genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam qobo shad' lhoe" ko" ruyang khyad' yu: ru wa Taung bug byu qejhao" joe" li" va" ra" .
Yuda byu qe: qobo wa mug: myid byu qere magan: mago" ra" shaman" jeju kham zo: nhao: ra" . Amung: yao: bam: Byo we' sin: yang: myaung sho" ru wa Taung bug byu qere magan: mago" ra" shaman" jeju kham zo: nhao: ra" . Airumung: Yuda byu qe jab sho' bobo gelao" shaman" jeju wa khoqhi" sho' qi" ru ngad nae" i?
Ngo wa ana" Taung bug byu qe naonhaung" re dao: jhau: na:- ngo wa Taung bug byu qejhao" nhao: ke' qhug' ra" lagyo: ngad: na: gu: mae nga" mau" zo" mae ngo nga: yu nae" .
Ngo wa ngo yao" byumyu" qere qu" myid nug: nhao yang: yao: bam mae" daqhae: khyad' yu: ru qhug' yu: re qhug' yu: li" genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam shapye' ru qhug' gelao"- xao su byu qere Mao" So: gyevo qe ngad: rumae" yao" ba nam qe boe" lo nhao: ra" . Airumung: Yuda byu qere Mao" So dam: khae: yu lao"- khoru: ngad nae" i? Aiwa shid: ra" mo; qhid' mae" kao so' ngad: li" nae" .
Sao qhid' mae" mug je, re Mao" So re qhaug' byid: va" ngad: re wa mug akhai" geim" re: yao" ngad: ava"- amung: sag' gae agyi: re Mao" So re qhaug' byid: va" ngad: re wa- sag' kaung jham alhab' re: yao" ngad: ava"-
Zhanlun gae agai mae" akaung jham damyo" re cu: pye' mung: zhanlun gae alae" mae" akaung re aimae xo' to" ra" . Taung bug byu qe naonhaung" wa ai: zhanlun gae alae" we' dau: ako"- amung: ana" Yuda byu qenho: Byo we' sin" ra" qam: bo: ra" kao so' daui khyo re qo" bomyao: kham: yu: ako" .
Airumung: cu: khyo" pye' ra" akaung jham we' dau ko" ra" Yuda byu qere daqu" ngai ge,- naonhaung" khoru: qo" gai: phug genae" i? Naonhaung" wa akaung qeza: angad: ako"- naonhaung" wa agyi: re bao" thaug' byid: mo, mangad:- Agyi: jham wa naonhaung" re bao" thaug' byid' ako" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa- ngonhaung" re xo' nae" qhid' mae" ai: akaung jham re cu: pye' ru mangad: i? ga: ta" li" genae" .
Ai: ru wa dang: ra" . Yao: bam malam" ko" ruyang yao: bam wa cu: pye' ru qhug' ako" . Naonhaung" wa lam" gemung: yang: qo" de; jo; ako"- ngadqere: aire nhag' lam: damyid: qi: ge,- ai: atha" gyaug lha" yang: na ge,-
Mao" So wa azhao: mae" yaug gau akaung gyang" ngad ko" ra" Yuda byu qere lhao" re: matang" to: ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa nao re tang" to" li" nae" ein: jho: i?
Cemae Mao" So wa khoqhi" nhag' khyag' yaug ngad: rure we' khoqhi" thin: ra" yaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" qu" ba: yu: ra" . Mao" So wa qobo shad' lhoe" ra" mo; dao mae gyai thin ngadqere: naonhaung" wa yao" nhag' khyag' ru khug mae kao so' xo' daui: na ko" re wa yao: wa naonhaung" re nhag' khyag' li" nae" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" airu: kao so' madaui ko" re wa naonhaung" re: cu: pye' ru qhug' li" genae" .
Amung: Yuda byu qe yao: bam: malam khug: ra" myid re to" pye' ko" re wa azhao: mae" yao: bam: angad mae dam: te' byid' ru qhug' li" genae" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa ai: mau" zo" re qo" kad' ra" .
Zhanlun lae" qe ngad ko" ra" naonhaung" Taung bug byu qere azhao: mae" naonhaung" yao" zhanlun lae" akaung mae" cu: yu mung: azhao: mae" yao: yao: boe" jo; ra" tarha" re lhoe" yang: azhao naonhaung" yao" akaung mangad' ra" zhanlun gyang" akaung mae xo' to" ru we' dau: ra" . Yuda byu qe wa ai: zhanlun agyang" gae we' dau: ako" . Amung: yao: bam: agae yao: mae" cu: pye' ra" akaung jham re yao: yao" agae mae dam: xo' te' ke' byid: nae" ru wa Mao" So: qhid' mae" je" laui: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- No; thao" ra" dangman" ra" khyo dalam: re ngo naonhaung" re ba nhao nug: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ai: dangman" ra" khyo wa naonhaung" re pha,jhi" ba beim" ra" myid mabo losho' gug: gam byid' li" nae" . Ai: ruwa Israel byu qenho: nhag' lam: qao: ru wa apyad ato ngad nae" mangad:- Taung bug byu qemae" Mao" So jhao" lo: ru jab yo, joe" sho' za: yao: bam: nhag' lam: qao: jo; li" genae" .
Alao"- Israel byu qe alhab' mo, wa khyad' yu: rure ceru: qhug' li" genae" . Jham: Mugsug' mae- Khyad' yu: Asang wa Ziun mae" thug' li" mung:- Yaku myid: zo: qera" makhyang" ra" khyo alhab' re yu: pye' li" nae" .
Ngo wa yao: bam: qobo jham re yu: pye' byid: lao"- Yao: bam we' ce: dao: thang" re ngo to: nae"- ga: ta" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" Taung bug byu qe: mathao mae Yuda byu qe wa Lau Dao: Gai re ha: pye' gemung:- yao: bam wa Mao" So: gyevo qe boe" pye' ako" . Ngadqere: Mao" So: yang khyin: yu: ra" mo, ngad mung: yao: bam: phug' pho" qe: mathao mae yao: bam wa Mao" So: ba nam qe ngad: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa yao: khyin: yu mung: shaman" byid' ra" yaug we' sin: yang: yao" myid re malhai: ngad: ra" .
Taung bug byu qe ngad: ra" naonhaung" wa lai: lo" ra" yo, re Mao" So: mho dao: re: magyo: mo, ngad: ako" . Ngadqere: ana" wa Yuda byu qe mho dao: magyo: ko" ruyang Mao" So: nhag' khyag' shogu: rure naonhaung" qo" khae: yu: avako" .
Airu: Mao" So: nhag' khyag' shogu: rure naonhaung" qo" khae: yu vako" ru we' dakhyo: Yuda byu qere: Mao" So: nhag' khyag' shagu: rure qo" khae: yu genae" qhid' mae" Yuda byu qe wa ana" Mao" So: mho dao: re matae" gyo: ko"ru ngad: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa byu alhab' mo; re nhag' khyag' shogu: ru qo" qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" byu alhab' mo, re mho dao: magyo" ra" kyam: byu qe boe" nhao: pye' ra" .
Mao" So wa khoqhi" sho' jo,nho" qo" yaug ngad: i? Yao" pha,jhi" we' laba lajhao wa khoqhi" sho' no; i? Mao" So: myid: phyid' to"rure khag' qo" sho' kyo" i? Yao" khyo re khag' qo" ba: i?
Jham: Mugsug' mae- Asang: myid re khag' ba: i? Yao: re khag' pha,jhi" qo" byid' i?
Yao" yang dam: xe' qo sho' Yao: re khag' pe" byid' qu" ko" i?
Pe"mung: ga"re cao jab alhab' wa yao" yang phan" to: mung:- cao jab alhab' wa yao: khyo" yang we' yao" qhid' mae" boe" jo; ru ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa apyad ato mae phungbao qi" qhang: jo, vashao: wo"- Amen .
Airumung: nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju yang ngo naonhaung" re mho' ke' ra" . Naonhaung" gaung khyao re Mao" So: mau" zo" mae qhaug' byid: mung: Mao" So o ngaui: ra"- daui: na: ra" xeim: khyo" Mao" So re qhaug' byid: ge,- ceru wa naonhaung" caung da" ang: ra" jo: ra" khyo ngad: ra" .
Amung: naonhaung" ave, re ce: myid gaung dao mae" ave, azhao" we' dau datau" yu ge,- naonhaung" myid alhab' geim" tha" pye' yang: Mao" So re naonhaung" nhag' lam: asag' lhai" pye' byid: nhao ge,- ailao"- gai shab: ru- yao: o ngaui: ru- jab byang" ru ga" ra" Mao" So myid o: ru pe" ja: ngad: rure naonhaung" ba: li" genae" .
Mao" So: yang ngore byid' ra" jeju jhaung qhu" re ngha yang: naonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" re ngo ceru: ta" ra" . Naonhaung" yao" gaung re ang: ra" tho' mae je yang: damyid: qi" yu ge,- ai: atha"- naonhaung" myid: ra" khyo mae nau" nhae" ave, de, ge,- naonhaung" gaung re Mao" So: yang byid' ra" lam khug: ra" khyo re cao" yang: dao: kho' yu ge,-
Ngonhaung" gaung khyao dalam: mae gaung dau jham myo: sho' de, mung: ai: gaung dau jham alhab' wa yao: yao" mau" qo" ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" wa myo: sho' ngadqere:- Khristu mae dagaung dasho: za: boe" mung: gaung khyao dalam: mae za: de; jo, mo, ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa gaung khyao dalam: mae yao: cao: jho" xo' ra" gaung dau jham ngad: ra" .
Airumung:- Mao" So: yang ngonhaung" re byid' to" ra" nhag' myan" ra" jeju jhaung qhu" re cao" yang:- majho" dau: ra" ngonhaung" nho: jeju jhaung qhu" jham re ci yhung: qo: ra" . Ngonhaung" nho: jeju jhaung qhu" wa- Mao" So: mungdao: re kho" kyo: nae" ru ngad: re wa ngonhaung" qo" ra" lam khug: myid re cao" yang: ai: mau" re kad' qo: ra" .
Caung da" byid: nae" jhaung qhu" ngad: re wa ngonhaung" caung da" byid: qo: ra" . Mho" shid' byid: nae" jhaung qhu" ngad: re wa ngonhaung" mho" shid' byid: qo: ra" .
Amung: su gaje qere qam: byid: nae" jhaung qhu" ngad: re wa- ngonhaung" airu: qam: byid: qo: ra" . Su gaje qere gae byid: nae" yaug khag' ngadqere: magan: mago" gae byid: qo: ra" . Au: she nae" kheim: so' qo qo" yaug wa- qam: ke' yang: au: she- eib khang" qo: ra" . Nhag' khyag' myid qhu" byid: ba: ra" yaug wa- ngaui bau: ngaui yao qhu" byid: qo: ra" .
Jhid' de; myid mae jab byang" sho' gyang" shao qo: ra"- makhyang" rure nghang" pye' mung: gai shab: rure zaui" zag: ci ge, .
Dayaug we' dayaug Khristu mae jho" jhid' de; ge,- dayaug we' dayaug jho" phug' jho" myao: nae" kao bau ge, .
Mau" zaui" rumae qam: ke' ge,- danoe" dashoe ge,- ai: Asang re aung khug nhag' lam: alhab' we' kao bau yang: caung da" byid: ge, .
Naonhaung" wa ngaui bau: taung" myid: lao" na ge,- Qug: khai: qhug' rumae zang: qhao" ge,- Ayo, khao: ngo" akyu" mho' na ge, .
Naonhaung" jo,nho" jham re qo ca" ko" ra" naonhaung" Khristan: mao: nhaung: qere gae byid: ge,- naonhaung" maba mase" ra" bang" vo qere naonhaung" yham mae bang" da" byid: ge, .
Naonhaung" re yhin" ra" mo, re shaman" byid: nae" Mao" So re mho' ge,- ngad va"- Nhang: byid: nae" qhid' mae" mangad:- Shaman" byid" nae" qhid' mae" yao: re mho' ge, .
Ngaui bau" ra" mo, we' daga"- ngaui bau: ge,- ngug: ra" mo, we' daga" ngug ge,-
Yaug khao: ngo" re dakhyo: za: myid: sang: kho: byid: ge,- dangad beim: ge,- nyham: ra" mau" zo" re zaui: ge,- naonhaung" yao" gaung re pha,jhi" ba: ra" yaug khyo" damyid: jho ge, .
Naonhaung" re dayaug yaug: yang magai kad' re- yao: re lage, dadam: phaug' ge,- Yaug khao: ngo" yang gai: ga" ra" mau" re qam: ke' kad' ge, .
Yaug khao: ngo" we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo za: qo" na nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" shad' khyo" gai: boe" ra" gu: alhab' re kad' ge, .
Ba nam qe we"- Khonhae" re: lage, daphaug' ge,- ai: atha" Mao" So nhag' yo" ruyang lage, phaug' vashao:- pe"mung: ga"re jham: mugsug' mae Asang wa- ngo lage, phaug' nae"- ngo dam: tug' xe' nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: lage, phaug' nae" atha"- Jham: Mugsug' mae- Ni" nho: gyevo vae: moe' ngad: re- yao: re zo: ve byid: zho: wa,- yao: qid shab' ngad: re yao: re qid byid: jhaug' wa; Nao ceru: kad' lao"- yao: re nao gyai qho' nhao: li" nae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Makhyang: mashab: ruyang nao re daaung: pye' nhao . Ai: atha" gai shab: ruyang makhyang: mashab: rure aung: pye' wa, .
Byu yaug khao: ngo" wa mung"dan: eib khang" nae" kheim: so' qo" ra" mo; mho dao: re tae" gyo: ca" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: akhang" maqo" lo: eib nae" kheim: so' majo, ngad: ra"- Eib khang" nae" kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, wa Mao" So: yang san: to" ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Khag' ngadqere: eib khang" nae" kheim: so' qo" ra" yaug re ngag: thaug' ra" yaug wa- Mao" So: yang jaung: san: to" rure ngag: thaug' ra" yaug ngad: ra"- Airu: kad' ra" yaug wa dao: phyid' ru qhug' li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- gai: ra" mau" zaui: mo, wa zug: qere gyaug maca" ngad: ra"- Makhyang" ra" mau" zaui: mo, kam" wa zug: qere gyaug ca" ako" . Nao wa kheim: so' qo" ra" yaug re gyaug maca" lo:- na nug: i? Gai: ra" mau" zo" re zaui: so: wa,- Alao"- yao: wa nao re caung: khin" li" nae"-
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa nao re gai kad' byid: nae" qhid' mae" san: to" ra" Mao" So: daui daui yaug ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: nao makhyang" ra" mau" zaui" ru ngad: re wa- yao: re gyaug wa,- pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa gaigai: yao: qobo dae byid: nae" qam: so' qo" ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: wa Mao" So: daui daui yaug ngad mung: makhyang" ra" mau" zaui: mo, re Mao" So: qobo dae byid' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Cerumung:- naonhaung" wa eib nae" kheim: so' qo" ra" mo; mho dao: re tae" gyo: ca" ra" . Mao" So: yang qobo dae byid: nae" rure gyaug yang: za: mangad:- ni" nho: aung khug nhag' lam: mae myid ba: kin yang:- kheim: so' qo" ra" mo; mho dao: re tae" gyo: ca" ra" .
Ai: mathao mae naonhaung" wa khang: ke' ru ngad: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, yao: bam: mau" zo" re kyab' sho' zaui" ru wa- Mao" So re mau" zaui: byid' na: ru ngad: ako" .
Airumung:- naonhaung" wa yao: bam re byid: ca" ra" gu: re byid: ge,- khang: ke' byid: ca" ra" gu: alhab' re ke' byid: ge,- kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, alhab' re phug' myao: mung:- nga: yhe' byid: ge,-
Naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; nae" jhin mae" je yang: khag' we' re: pe" jhin dade, ge,- Su re jhid' de; ra" yaug wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" mae su: myi:- su: lao dashad'- byu dase' wa,- dakhug' wa, su gaje qe: zai re myo, nyad o: dabyid wa,- ga" ra" tarha" jham we' gatau jo; ra" tarha" jham alhab' ni" yham kyo: cao: re naoyao" gaung re jhid' de; ru we' dakhyo: jhid' de; wa,- ga" rumae bovao: ava" .
Dayaug yaug re nao jhid' de; ngad: re wa- nao wa yao: re khonhae" re: magai: ru makad' ngad: ra"- Airu: mung: jhid' de; ru wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" alhab' geim" re phug' cao" ru ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa yab: myid' jo; rumae" yab so: to" li" ca" va" ra" yo, khyin: joe" va" rure ba geyang: ceru re naonhaung" phug' cao" ca" ko" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" ra" ba na wa- ngonhaung" sao qhid' Yesu re lam" qhid; ra" ba na tho' ana" je: jhao" li" na: ra" .
Myi" wa lai: lo" kaung: mung:- na" gaung wa joe" li" na: ava" . Airumung: ngonhaung" wa mug: cad' we' sin" ra" mau" zo" jham re to" pye' yang: mug: bo" mae gyekhe' nae" shae lhae jham re yu: ci gelang:-
Ngonhaung" wa- na" gaung mug: bo" yo mae su" ra" mo, we' dakhyo:- dau shab: ra" khyo" zaui: so: ca" ra" . Zo: pyo: shaug' pyo: kad' ru- yhid yid: ru- gintho' zaung: ru- akyang qeim: ru- myan" myo: jho" byo; ru- myid nug: obyid: ru jham re jao" pye' ca" ra" .
Asang Yesu Khristu nho: shae lhae jham re yu: ci ge,- gaung sho: myid: o: ra" mau" zo" jham re we' airu re nhag' shid nhag' dag nhao: ra" mau" zo" jham re to" pye' ge, .
Lam khug: ra" myid mae qam: nang" ra" yaug re pang" yu ge,- ngadqere: yao" myid: ra" khyo jham we' sin: yang: yao: we' dajho" ngag ge,-
dayaug yaug: nho: lam khug: myid wa- zo: ve alhab' re gai: zo" ra" khyo" lam" ra" . Ngadqere: lam khug: ra" myid mae qam: nang" ra" yaug wa- ao: pho' myiqui: za: zo" ra" .
Zo: ve alhab' zo" ra" yaug wa mazo" ra" yaug re daqu" jung" wa,- amung: ao: pho' myiqui: za: zo" ra" yaug re:- zo: ve alhab' re zo" ra" yaug re dao: magai: phyid' ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa yao: re khae: yu: ava" .
Nao wa khag' ngad mung: su gaje qera" daui daui yaug re dao: phyid' ra" i? Yao: myo, nho qo" nae" maqo" nae" ga" ru wa yao" Asang yao: dao: kho' li" nae" . Yao: myo, nho qo" li" nae"- pe"mung: ga"re Asang wa yao: re myo, nho qo" nhao: ra" .
Byu dayaug yaug wa ba na daba ba re- ba na gatau myo: sho' mae tho' je: akhyag:- ga: myid: jho: ra"- amung: gatau dayaug yaug wa- ba na alhab' wa dakhyo: za: ngad:- ga: myid: jho: ra" . Yaug khao: ngo" wa yao: yao" myid re tang za: myid: phyid' ci qo: ra" .
Ba na re jo" kho' qu" ra" yaug wa Asang re nga: yhe' byid: nae" qhid' mae" qu" ru ngad: ra" . Amung: zo: ve alhab' re zo" ra" yaug re: Asang re nga: yhe' nae" qhid' mae" zo" ru ngad: ra"- pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa ai: zo: ve qhid' mae" Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" ra" . Zo: ve daqhae: re jao" ra" yaug re: Asang re nga: yhe' nae" qhid' mae" airu: mazo" ru ngad: ra" . Amung: yao: wa Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" byid' ra" .
Ngonhaung" khag' dayaug re:- yao: yao" gaung qhid' mae" za: kao so' daui: na: ru mangad:- amung: ngonhaung" khag' dayaug re: yao: yao" gaung qhid' mae" za: shid: ru mangad:-
Ngonhaung" daui: na: re wa- Asang: qhid' mae" ngonhaung" daui: na: ru ngad: ra" . Alao"- ngonhaung" shid: re wa- Asang: qhid' mae" ngonhaung" shid: ru ngad: ra" . Airumung: ngonhaung" wa daui: na ngadqere:- shid ngadqere: ai: Asang we' sin" ra" mo, ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Khristu wa shid mo, we' daui: na: ra" mo; Asang boe" nae" qhid' mae" shid mung: dam: daui: to" li" va" ra" .
Airumung:- ao: pho' myiqui: za: zo: ko" ra" mo, naonhaung" wa naonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" re pe"mung: dao: kho' ko" i? Amung: zo: ve alhab' re zo: ko" ra" mo, naonhaung" re: naonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" re pe"mung: qu" jung" ko" i? Ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa dao: kho' ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae ye; jo; li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Jham: Mugsug' mae- Asang wa- ngo dang za: daui: na: ra" Mao" So ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- Yaug khao: ngo" wa nga" qhid' kheim: mae pad' thaug' thaug' mung:- Yaug khao: ngo" wa ngo Mao" So ngad:- ga" rure- lhang: yu: li" genae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Airumung:- ngonhaung" mae" yaug khao: ngo" wa Mao" So re yao: yao" mau" zo" japhin: ta" sho' kyo: qo: li" nae" .
Airumung:- yao: cao: dao: jho" kho' rure ngonhaung" to" pye' gelang: . Naonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" re tha" lang: nhao nae" mangad: lao"- qobo shad' nghung: nhao nae" ra" lo, mau" jham re khonhae" re: makad' nae" rure kam" wa naonhaung" myid: phyid' ge, .
Asang Yesu we' dadang: dalam: za: kao so' daui yang: ngo khyag' za: ba: ra" khyo wa- zo: ve daja: ja: wa yao: yao: caung: pa" thung" khyo" masan masin" boe" ga" ru majo, ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: zo: ve daqhae: wa masan masin" ngad: ga: nao lam" yang: ngad: re ai: zo: ve wa ni" qhid' mae" masan masin" ru boe" ra" .
Nao zo" ra" zo: ve daja: ja: khyo" yang ni" mao: nhaung: pho" re no nhao: ngad: re wa- nao wa jhid' de; myid khyo" kao so' daui yaug mangad: lo: ngad: ra" . Khristu wa yao" qhid' mae" bin: shid kham: byid: va" ruyang nao zo" ra" zo: ve: yang yao: re dabyo; qeim: lo" nhao wa, .
Naonhaung" gai:- ga: myid: jho: ra" ja: re dajung" pye' nhao wa, .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: mung"dan: wa zo" ru shaug' ru we' masin: lo: Gyang" Lho" Byo khyo" yang byid' ra" din: man" ru- yaug yo: ru- ngaui bau" ru we' sin" ru ngad: ra" .
Khristu re cekhyo" caung da" byid' ra" yaug wa Mao" So re o ngaui nhao mung: su: yang re: caung: khin" ru qhug' ra" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa ai: ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru boe" nhao nae" rure we' yao: cao: qam: bo nhao nae" ra" khyo jham re khonhae" re: au: qang mung: qam: ke' na ca" ra" .
Zo: ve mathao: yang Mao" So kad' to" ra" mau" zo" re daphyo' pye' wa, . Zo: ve alhab' wa gai: zo: ngadqere:- su gaje qere qobo shad' nghung: nhao: ra" zo: ve re zo" ru wa shad' ra" .
Ni" mao: nhaung: pho" re shad' nghung: nhao nae" ngad: re wa- sho: zo" ru- sabyi qang: shaug' ru mangad: lao"- gatau pe" ja: ngadqere: jao" pye' ru wa jo ang: ra" khyo ngad: ra" .
Ce: khyo we' sin: yang: nao lam" ru we' dakhyo: zaui" zag: ci wa,- Aiwa Mao" So we' ni" agyo: mae ngad vashao:- dayaug yaug jo: ga: khae: yu: ra" mau" re qobo qo" thoe magyo: lo: kad' ra" yaug wa ngaui lho" ra" .
Ngadqere: aug' o" ra" myid we' zo: ve re zo" ra" yaug re Mao" So wa yao: re dao: phyid' li" nae" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao" lo, mau" wa lam khug: myid re apan mato: yang: ngad: ra" . Amung:- lam khug: ra" myid re apan mato: lo: kad' ra" ja: pe" ja: ngadqere: qobo ngad: ra" .
Lam khug: ra" myid qi" ra" mo, ngonhaung" wa- lam khug: ra" myid qam: nang" ra" mo; nho: qo jham re vin nae" rure bobao" thaug' byid: nae" ang: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa ngonhaung" yao" gaung re ngaui nhao nae" maang ngad: ra" .
Ai: atha" ngonhaung" wa lam khug: myid mae yao: bam re zao: to' byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam yao" akyu" qhid' mae" qu" mung:- ngonhaung" nho: mao: nhaung: qere ngaui nhao nae" ang: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Khristu wa yao: yao" gaung re ngaui nae" makad' yu ngad: ra" . Ai: atha"- Jham: Mugsug' mae- nao re maphug' makhyad' jung" gaui: ra" dao: jham wa nga" dao mae gyo" zao" shaung" yu: ra"- ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Jham: Mugsug' yang ngonhaung" re byid' to" ra" qam: byid' ru we' zang: kham: ru khyo" yang ngonhaung" wa myid: lao" ra" khyo re ngonhaung" qo" nae" qhid' mae" Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ra" gu: ja: khao: ngo" wa ngonhaung" re mho" shid' nae" tung" to" ru ngad: ra" .
Aimung: zang: qhao" ru we' myid qam: so' byid' ra" khyo: ajhaung Mao" So wa Khristu Yesu nho: lag re qu" mung: naonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" nhag' lam: jho" vang" na nae" qam: o: byid: vashao: .
Airumung: naonhaung" alhab' mo, daga" za: ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: Yao: Pho" ngad: ra" Mao" So re danhad' dathoe we' za: qo" caung: khin" nae" ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So: phungbao qhid' mae" Khristu wa naonhaung" re khae: yu va" ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" re: yao: cao: jho" khae: yu ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli"- Khristu nho: caung da" byid' ra" kao so' daui khyo wa Yuda byu qe: qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Airu wa Mao" So: dao: so: zaung: rure qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae"- yao: bam: phug' pho" qere Mao" So: yang byid' to" ra" dao: so: jham re zaui" pyang" nae" we' Taung bug byu qere lhao" re: Mao" So: nhag' khyag' shogu: ra" jeju khyo" yang yao: re caung: khin" byid: nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Amung:- Jham: Mugsug' mae- Taung bug byu qe we" Mao" So: byumyu" we"- Ngaui bau: ge,- ga: dam: ta" ra" .
Amung: Taung bug byu qe alhab' mo, we"- Asang re caung: khin" byid: ge,- Byumyu" alhab' we"- yao: re caung: khin" byid: ge,- ga: re: ta" to" ra" .
Ailao"- Esaia wa- Yese myid: zo: kaung mae" dayaug na: thug' li" li" nae"- Yao: wa Taung bug byumyu" re eib nae" qhid' mae" joe" li" yaug ngad: li" nae"- Amung: Taung bug byu qe wa yao: mae myid: lao" na: li" genae"- ga: dam: ta" ra" .
Myid: lao" ru byid' ra" yaug ajhaung ngad: ra" Mao" So wa naonhaung" lam khug: myid khyo" yang ngaui bau" ru we' yaug yo: ru byid: vashao: wo" . Airulao" Gyang" Lho" Byo: qam: so' khyo" yang naonhaung" myid: lao" ru wa xo' yang: qi" qhang: li" nae" ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" wa gai shab jab byang" jo; ru we' laba lajhao to, ngad: jo, gemung: naonhaung" yao: cao: qo" jho" mho" shid' mo, ngad ko" rure ngoyao: jhaug' za: myid: ba: ra" .
Ngadqere: ce: vhin tung" mae khyo daqhae: we' sin: yang: ngo naonhaung" re ta" peim: ta" kyang" rumae dajhid' zo: ve" vae" tung" ke' ra" . Mao" So wa ngore Taung bug byu qe: qhid' mae" mau" zaui: nae" Yesu Khristu nho: daui daui yaug qo" boe" ra" akho: akhang" byid' to" ruyang airu: vae" vae" tung" ke' ru ngad: ra" .
Taung bug byu qe wa Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang Mao" So re qhaug' byid' ra" Mao" So khae: yu: ra" ngaui" xeim: qe boe" lo genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So mae" lau dao: gai re kho" kyo: byid' rumae ngo wa khinjaung dayaug ru: caung da" byid' ra" .
Airumung: ngo wa Khristu we' dagaung dasho: za: boe" na mung: Mao" So: mau" zo" re ngo qo" vin vo' ruyang ngo qo" phug: ra" .
Taung bug byu qe Mao" So: mho dao: re tae" gyo" lo genae" qhid' mae" Khristu wa ngore ci yang: mau" zaui" lo: ra" khyo re za: ngo wa phug: ta" nae" .
Khristu wa nhad' dao: thoe we' lo, mau" yang re: mug' pho: ve, lho jham we' mug' pho: ve, lho jham: nho: qam: so' khyo" yang re: Mao" So: Byo: qam: so' khyo" yang re: ngo wa Yerusalem: vogaung: mae" Iluri mung" jao: sho' du" qin" yang: Khristu nho: khyo Lau Dao: Gai re bin sho' cao" kho" kyo: byid: va" .
Su gaje: yang zao: to" ra" apan aqao: dao mae paug' zao: ru maboe" vashao:- ngo kao bau: ru wa ai: Khristu nho: khyo re magyo" qu" shiko" ra" jo, qo khao: ngo" mae Lau Dao: Gai cao" kho" kyo: byid: nae" ru ngad: ra" .
Jham: Mug: Sug' mae- Yao" khyo re khag' yang re: makyo" qu" ko" ra" mo, wa- yao: re the' myao: li" genae" . Amung: mathe' gyo" qu" ko" ra" mo, wa- ba: gyo" li" genae"- ga: ta" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Airu: mung: naonhaung" jhao" ngo joe" li" nae" seim" rumae myo: sho' lhang tam" pye' ru qhug' ra" .
Ngadqere: ana" wa- ai: mang: khaung: mae nga" mau" zo" re kyab' sho' bin: zaui: va" . Amung: naonhaung" jhao" li" qhug' nae" myo: sho' zin mae" kao bau: na va" ruyang-
Ana" wa naonhaung" jhao" qo" joe" li" naeva"- ein: ngo myid: lao" ra" . Ngo Spain mung" khyo ye" lo" au:- naonhaung" jhao" li" vao: qhug' co' nug: ra" . Naonhaung" jhao" dayo, zo: li" thang: na yang: ngaui bau: taung" zam" khug co' mung: naonhaung" bao" thaug' ruyang Spain mung" khyo ye" lo" nug: ra" .
Ngadqere: ana" ngo wa Mao" So: byu qere caung da" byid: nae" qhid' mae" Yerusalem vogaung: khyo ye" lo" nae" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Makedoni mung" we' Akhaia mung" mae" phung: jham wa Yerusalem mae na ko" ra" Mao" So: byu qemae" myaung sho" ra" mo, re bao" thaug' nae" aung lam Alu: byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngaui bau: taung" myid: phyid' to: vako" ruyang ngad: ra" .
Aiwa yao: bam yao: yao: myid: phyid' ru ngad: ako" . Gai gai: yao: re:- yao: bam wa Yerusalem mae" Mao" So: byu qere bao" thaug' byid: nae" khyo ang mo, ngad: ako" . Yuda byu qe wa yao: bam: Byo we' sin" ra" shaman" jeju re Taung bug byu qere myho" gae byid: vako" ruyang Taung bug byu qere: yao: bam: jo,nho" jham: yang Yuda byu qere bao" thaug' byid: nae" ang: ako" .
Amung:- ngo wa ce: mau" zo" re bin mung: yao: bam: qhid' mae" qo" gaug: yu: ra" Alu: ngaui alhab' re Yao: bam: lo, khug mae bin: ke' byid: lao"- Spain mung" khyo ye" lo" nae" au: naonhaung" jhao" li" vao: qhug' to: co' nae" .
Ngo naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" lao"- ngo wa Khristu nho: shaman" jeju byang" sho' we' joe" li" nae" ngad: rure ngo ba: ra" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang re:- Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang byid' ra" jhid' de; myid khyo" yang re:- akyu" mho' rumae ngo we' qhan: mung: nga" qhid' mae" Mao" So re qam: ke' yang: boceim" mho' byid: genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re jhan" ke' ra" .
Ngo wa Yuda mung" mae na ko" ra" Yesu re malam khug: ra" mo; lo, mae" loe; beim mung: nga" nho: caung da" bao" thaug' byid' ra" mau" zo" re Yerusalem vogaung: mae na ko" ra" Mao" So: byu qere lham: khae: yu genae" qhid' mae" akyu" mho' ge,-
Airumung:- Mao" So myid o: ru ngad: re wa ngo wa naonhaung" jhao" ngaui bau: ngaui yao we' byang" yang: joe" li" mung:- naonhaung" we' daga" ngaui bau: ngaui lho" taung" qo" zam" khug: na: li" nae" .
Ngonhaung" nho: ngaui: pyo: yaug yo: ru apan ajhaung ngad: ra" Mao" So wa naonhaung" alhab' mo, we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo"- Amen .
Kenkhrea vogaung: phung: mae caung da" byid' na: ra" ngonhaung" nhae: mo" Phobe ra" khyo re ngo naonhaung" re bobao" thaug' ta" ke' ra" .
Mao" So: byu qe kad' ang: ru we' dakhyo:- Asang: mang mae naonhaung" yao: re lham: pang" yu mung:- yao: qo ca" ra" gu: mae yao: re bao" thaug' byid: ge, . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa byu myo: sho' mo, re bao" thaug' byid: yaug ngad: ru we' ngo rere: bao" thaug' byid: yaug ngad: ra" .
Yesu Khristu mau" zo" mae nga" mau" vin cao: qe ngad ko" ra" Priskila we' Akula shid' tao re ngo au" ke' ra" .
Yao: shid' tao wa yao: shid' tao: nho: kao so' re nga" qhid' mae" dan: pye' yang: ngore khyad' yu: qu" va" ru tao ngad: ako" . Ngo dayaug za: yao: shid' tao re jeju beim: so" ru mangad . Taung bug byu qe: phung: jham alhab' re: yao: shid' tao re jeju beim: so" ako" .
Yao: shid' tao: yham mae zang" ham yang: caung: pa" na ko" ra" phung: byu qere re: ngo au" ke' ra" khyo re ta" kyo: ge,- Amung: Asia mung" mae Khristu re sao qhid' lam" yaug ngad: ra" ngo jhid' de; ra" Epaenetu rere: au" ke' ra" .
Naonhaung" qhid' mae" qam: ke' yang: mau" zaui: byid' ra" Mari re au" byid: gela,-
Ngo we' daga" thaung: laung" lo: ra" Yuda mao: nhaung: tao ngad: ra" Androniku we' Yunia shid' zo: rere: au" ke' ra" . Yao: shid' yaug wa lagyo: qe: phaung mae mang qi" ru we' nga" qhid' re Khristan boe" lo: ra" shid' yaug ngad: ako" .
Asang: khug mae ngo jhid' de; ra" ba nam pho" Ampliatu re au" ke' ra" .
Khristu mau" zo" mae ngonhaung" mau" vin cao: ngad: ra" Obanu re we' ngo jhid' de; ra" Staku rere: au" ke' ra" .
Khristu shad' mae vin tang: ngad: jo; ra" Apele re au" ke" ra"- amung: Aristobulu nho: yham byu qere au" ke' ra" .
Nga" Yuda amyu" Herodion re au" ke' ra" . Nakisu nho: yham byu qemae" Khristan mao: nhaung: qere au" ke' ra" .
Asang: mau" zo" re zaui: so: ko" ra" Truphaena we' Truphosa re au" ke' ra: . Amung: Asang: qhid' mae" mau" myo: sho' zaui" lo yaug ngad: ra" nga" jhid' de; ra" ba nam pho" Persia re au" ke' ra" .
Asang: mau" zo" vin vo; rumae baug thug' yaug ngad: ra" Rufu re we' ngore yao: zo: dayaug rere" ru: gun caung: ra" ai: yao: myhi" rere: ngo au" ke' ra" .
Asunkristu- Phlegon- Herme- Patroba- Herma- bam we' yao: bam we' daga" ngad ko" ra" Khristan mao: nhaung: alhab' mo, re au" ke' ra" .
Alao"- Philologu- Yulia- Nereu we' yao: nhae: mo" rere:- Olumpa we' yao: bam we' daga" ngad: ra" Mao" So: byu qe alhab' mo, re au" ke' ra" .
Naonhaung" yao: cao: dayaug we' dayaug mao: nhaung: jhid' de; myid we' bobaug baug yang: jho" au" ge,- Khristu nho: phung: jham alhab' wa naonhaung" re au" ke' ko" ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" kham: yu: ci vako" ra" mho" shid' ra" khyo re ngag: thaug' mung:- phung: kho' lo" nhao: ru we' lam khug: ra" khyo mae" khyonghung: nghung" lo" nhao: ra" mo, re lha" yang: jao" pye' genae" qhid' mae" ngo naonhaung" re jhan" ke' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re airu: kad' ra" mo, wa ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu re caung da" byid: mo, mangad: ko" ngad: ra" . Yao: bam: nhad' re za: myid mo, ngad: ako" . Yao: bam: dao: yaung"- nhad' cug: ra" dao: thoe jham khyo" yang pe" maba: ra" mo, re yao: bam mhug' pyag' pye' ako" .
Ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re vin tang: za: naonhaung" lam" na ko" ra" khyo re yaug khao: ngo" the' gyo" avako"- Airumung: ngo wa naonhaung" khyo re ngaui bau: nhao: ra" . Ngo wa naonhaung" re gai shab: rumae pha,jhi" ba: ra" mo,- makhyang" rumae wa qobo maqo" mo, boe" nhao nug: ra" .
Amung: ngonhaung" nho: ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru ajhaung ngad: ra" Mao" So wa mataung" myao" re Satan re naonhaung" khyid qao: mae zab: khyoe' pye' li" nae" . Ngonhaung" nho: Asang Yesu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa naonhaung" we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo"-
Nga" nho: mau" vin byin cao: Timothi we' nga" Yuda amyu" ngad ko" ra" Lukai- Yason we' Sosipata bam wa naonhaung" re au" ke' ko" ra" .
Ce: vhin tung" re tung" yaug ngo Tertiu wa Asang: khug mae naonhaung" re au" ke' ra" .
Nga" bang" sang pho ngad mung: phung: byu qe zang" ham yang: caung: pa" ko" ra" yham mae" yham sang re: ngad: ra" Gaiu wa naonhaung" re au" ke' ra" . Vomo" mae" ngaui zam: yaug ngad: ra" Erastu we' ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" Kuatu shid' zo: re: naonhaung" re au" ke' ako" . ( Lo, tung" jham: Mugsug' daqhae: mae adau ngai
mae- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa- naonhaung" alhab' mo, we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo"- Amen ga: tung" laung" to" ako" . )
Ngonhaung" wa Mao" So re phungbao caung: byid: gelang:- Yesu khyo we' sin: yang: ngo kho" kyo" ra" Lau Dao: Gai re cao" yang: re:- daba ganhae" gaco' pyad mae nyham" to" ra" no; thao" ra" dangman" ra" khyo re qhu" byid' rumae cao" yang: re: Mao" So wa naonhaung" lam khug: rumae gang: tang za: qo" ye; jo, nhao: ra" .
Ngadqere: ana" wa ai: nyham" to" ra" dangman" ru wa lapa jham: paug' jham khyo" yang de: de: za: qhu" byid' ava" . Byumyu" cao jab Mao" So re lam" mung: yao" mho dao: re tae" gyo: genae" qhid' mae" apyad ato daui: na: ra" Mao" So: amyin" khyo" yang byumyu" alhab' re ba nhao: ava" .
Date: za: ngad mung: Pha,jhi" bo: thao" yaug ngad: ra" Mao" So wa Yesu Khristu khyo" yang apyad ato phungbao jo; jo, vashao: wo"- Amen .
Mao" So myid o: ru we' dakhyo: Khristu Yesu nho: lagyo: khyo" khyin: san: to" ru qhug' ra" ngo Polu we' ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" Sostheni mae"-
Korinthu vogaung: mae na ko" ra" Mao" So: phung:- Mao" So: gyang" lho" byu qe boe" genae" qhid' mae" khai: yu qhug' ko" ra" mo,- Khristu Yesu we' dagaung dasho: boe" ra" khyo" yang Mao" So: byu qe boe" lo ko" ra" mo, we' ngonhaung" Asang we' yao: bam: Asang ngad: ra" Asang Yesu Khristu re caung: pa" ko" ra" khyi" khao: ngo" mae" byu qere mugsug' tung" ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" nho: Pho" Mao" So we' Asang Yesu Khristu mae" nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru wa naonhaung" we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo"-
Mao" So naonhaung" re Yesu Khristu khyo" yang nhag' myan" ra" jeju byid' to: va" ruyang ngo wa khonhae" re: nga" Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa Khristu we' dagaung dasho: boe" mung: nhad' dao: thoe alhab' mae re: laba lajhao khyo alhab' mae re: khyo khe' khao: ngo" mae na: dai: li" qam: bo: li" avako" .
Khristu nho: khyo ai: mungdao: wa- naonhaung" khug mae gyai tang sho' agyi: zaug: jo; ava" .
Airumung: Asang Yesu Khristu myao: thug' li" nae" rure naonhaung" lao" na: ra" au: naonhaung" wa Byo: shaman" jeju daja: rere: malhoe' lo: qo" kham zo" ako" .
Ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: Ba Na mae re: qobo vhin: ru maqhug' genae" qhid' mae" athao" joe" sho' yao: wa naonhaung" re nyhad' tang byid' li" nae" .
Yao: Zo: ngad: ra" ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu we' zam" khug: na nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" yaug Mao" So wa lam ga" ra" yaug ngad: ra" wo" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" phaung mae phung: jho" kho' ru majo, genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" jhau: ra" dao: thoe jho" vang" genae" rure ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: kheim: so' khyo" yang naonhaung" alhab' mo; re ngo mho' ke' ra" . Danhag' lam:- myid: qang: ru dalam: za: we' mung: bin sho' dadang: dalam: boe" na ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" phaung mae yao: cao: jho" byo; na ko" ra" khyo re Kaloe nho: yham byu qe daqhae" yang ngore lota" kyo" ako" .
Ngo ta" nug: ru wa naonhaung" dayaug daja: ta" na: ako" . Dayaug wa ngo wa Polu thao cao" yaug ngad:- Gatau dayaug wa- ngo wa Apolo thao cao" yaug ngad:- Dayaug wa ngo wa Petru thao cao" yaug ngad:- amung: gatau dayaug wa ngo wa Khristu thao cao" yaug ngad:- ga: ta" na: ako" .
Khristu re phung: myo: sho' khyo" kho' sin" to: va" i? Polu wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" pyao: zang dao mae shid kham: byid' ra" i? Naonhaung"wa Polu mang re lao: yang: qid nyhab' kham: yu: avako" i?
Krispu we' Gaiu shid' zo: mae" je yang: dayaug rere: ngo qid nyhab' makham byid' ruyang ngo wa Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" ra" .
Airumung: nga" mang re lao: yang: qid nyhab' kham: yu va" ga:- khag' re: maqo" ta" ngad: ako" .
( Stephan re we' yao" yham byu qere re: ngo qid nyhab' kham byid: va"- ngadqere: ngo wa gayaug khag' rere: qid nyhab' kham byid' ein: ngo mamyid: beim: ngad: ra" . )
Khristu wa qid nyhab' kham byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngore manhao: ke' ngad: ra" . Yao: wa ngore Lau Dao: Gai re kho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' ra" . Pyao: zang dao mae Yesu shid kham" ra" qam: so' akeim maboe" byaug vashao: xao su byu: nho: pha,jhi" dao: re maci lo:- ai: Lau Dao: Gai re kho" kyo: nae" ngore nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- pyao: zang dao mae Khristu shid kham" ra" khyo we' sin" ra" mungdao: wa- ai: jeim" lo" mo; qhid' mae" pe" lajheim: mabo ngadqere: khyad' yu: ru qhug' ra" ngonhaung" qhid' mae" wa Mao" So: qam: so' ngad: ra" .
Jham: mugsug' mae Ngo wa pha,jhi" ba: ra" mo; pha,jhi" re phyo' pye' byid: mung: ba jhao: ra" mo; laba lajhao re kye" pye' byid: nae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Airumung:- pha,jhi" ba: ra" yaug khai: mae i? Ba jhao mo, khai: mae i? Ce: mug: myid dao mae" dao: jhau mung ban" qe khai: mae i? Mao" So wa ce: mug: myid: nho: pha,jhi" adu: adae: ngad: rure qhu" byid' ava" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa xao su byu qe yao: bam: pha,jhi" khyo" yang yao: re maqo" gai: ba genae" qhid' mae" yao: yao" pha,jhi" yang kad' to" ra" . Ai: atha"- pe" lajheim: mabo ga: xao su byu: yang jho: pye' ra"- ngonhaung" kho" kyo" ra" mungdao: khyo" yang Mao" So wa lam khug: ra" mo, re khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" myid: phyid' ava" .
Yuda byu qe wa mug' pho: ve, lho mho' ako"- Greeg byu qe wa pha,jhi" re qho: ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa pyao: zang dao mae jin" se' pye' ra" Khristu nho: khyo re kho" kyo" ra" . Aimung dao: wa Yuda byu qe: qhid' mae" nhag' lam: tha: nae" ru ngad mung: Taung Bug Byu qe: qhid' mae" wa lajheim: mabo: ra" mungdao: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So: yang khai: yu: to: mo, ngad: ra" Yuda byu qe we' Taung Bug Byu qe alhab' mo; qhid' mae" Khristu wa Mao" So: qam: so' we' pha,jhi" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: adu: adae: ngad nhohab: ru wa xao su byu qe: pha,jhi" tho' je: ra"- Mao" So: qam: nang" ru wa xao su byu qe: qam: o: tho' je: qam: bo: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Mao" So naonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" au:- naonhaung" pe" ru" mo, ngad ko" rure myid: beim: ge,- Xao su byu shad' khyo" qu" re- naonhaung" mae pha,jhi" ba mo,- kheim: so' qo" ra" mo,- azhao" myhao: ra" mo, wa dajhid' za: ngad: ako" .
Pha,jhi" ba: ra" mo, qho' phau: genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa ce: mug: myid byu qeyang pe" lajheim: mabo ga:- jho: ra" ja: re thaug khyin: yu: ra" . Amung: yao: wa qam: so' bo mo, qho' phau: genae" qhid' mae" mug: myid byu qeyang qam: nang" ra" ga: myid: jho: ra" ja: re khyin: yu: ra" .
Ce: mug: myid: byu qeyang akhyag ngad:- ga: myid: jho: to" ra" mau" re phyo' pye' nae" qhid' mae" mug: myid byu qeyang qu" ngai qu" nyham: ra" ja: qu" ca' qu" jung" ra" ja:- pe" mangad:- ga: myid: jho: ra" mau" re Mao" So khyin: yu: ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae khag' re: phug nae"made, ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So wa naonhaung" re Khristu Yesu we' dagaung dasho: za: boe" nhao mung: Mao" So wa Khristu re ngonhaung" nho: pha,jhi" boe" nhao: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa Yesu khyo" yang Mao" So: yang jo: ra"- ga: sun" yu byid' ru qhug' mung: Mao" So: gyang" lho" ra" byu qe boe" li" ru we' lhoe' ke' byid' ru qhug' bam va" .
Airumung: Jham: Mugsug' mae ta" to" ru we' dakhyo:- khag' ngadqere: phug nug: ngad: re wa- Mao" So zaui: so: va" ra" mau" zo" mathao mae za: phug: na shao: .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Mao" So: no; thao" ra" dangman" ra" Mungdao: re kho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" ngo naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" au:- dao: zang dao: qi: jham we' myhao: ra" pha,jhi" dao: jham re ci yang: makho" kyo:-
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" we' daga" na: jo; au: ngo wa- Yesu Khristu khyo we' yao" pyao: zang dao mae shid kham: ra" khyo mae" je yang:- gatau: khyo alhab' re to" pye' nae" ein: ngo myid: phyid' to: va" .
Airumung: naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" ra" au: ngo wa qam: nang" ru we' gyaug: nin" zo" re" mungdao: re kho" kyo: mho" shid' ra" au: xao su byu qenho: ba jhao: ra" pha,jhi" mungdao: we'
kho" kyo: byid' ru mangad:- Mao" So: Byo: qam: so' bo mung: dangman" ra" khyo sagse: qo" qhu" byid' ra" dao: thoe we' kho" kyo: byid' ru ngad: .
Airumung: naonhaung" lam khug: ru wa xao su byu qenho: pha,jhi" mae ngha: ru mangad:- Mao" So: qam: so' mae za: ngha: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo wa Mao" So Byo we' sin: yang: zoqao" qe ngad ko" ra" mo, re pha,jhi" mungdao: kho" kyo" ra"- ngadqere: ai: pha,jhi" wa ce: mug: myid: nho: pha,jhi" mangad:- ce: mug: myid re eib: ra" qam: so' bo: ra" mo; pha,jhi" re: mangad: mug: myid re eib: ra" mo; qam: so' wa byo; qeim: lo" nae" ngad: ra" .
Ngo kho" kyo" ra" pha,jhi" wa xao su byu qe mamyao sho' nyham" to: mung: mug: myid re lhao" re: maphan" shimae" ngonhaung" phungbao qhid' mae" san: to: byid' ra" ai: Mao" So: no; thao" ra" pha,jhi" ngad: ra" .
Ce: mug: myid re eib ko" ra" zug: qe khag' re:- ce: pha,jhi" re maba ko" ngad: ra" . Yao: bam aire ba geyang: ngad: re wa- yao: bam wa ai: phungbao bo: ra" Asang re pyao: zang dao mae jin" se' pye' genae" mangad:
Ngadqere: jham: mugsug' mae- Khag' re: mamyao: qu"- magyo" qu"- gai: boe" nae"- ga: khag' re: majho: qu" ra"ja: re yao:- Mao" So wa yao: re jhid' de; ko" ra" mo; qhid' mae" nyhang" jaung: to: byid' ra"- ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So wa ce: khyo jham re yao" Byo khyo" yang ngonhaung" re qhu" shid' byid' ava"- ai: Byo wa ja: khao: ngo" re paui: qho: na: ra"- Mao" So: no; thao" ra" myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo re lhao" re: paui: qho: ra" .
Byu dayaug: nho: khyo alhab' re wa- yao" khug mae bo: ra" yao: yao" byo za: aba: ra" . Ai we' dakhyo: Mao" So" khyo alhab' re wa Mao" So: Byo za: aba: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa ce: mug: myid: yang sang: to" ra" byo re kham: yu: ra" mo, mangad:- ai: atha" Mao" So: yang ngonhaung" re byid' to" ra" jeju alhab' re qo" ba nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yang nhao: ke' ra" Byo re qo" kham: yu: ra" mo, ngad va" .
Airumung:- ngonhaung" wa xao su byu: nho: nyan: pha,jhi" khyo" yang mho" shid' byid' ra" dao" yang ta" kyo: byid' ru mangad:- Byo re qo" khae: yu va" mo, re Byo we' sin" ra" ai: dangman" ra" khyo jham re ta" sho' kyo: byid' rumae Byo khyo" yang mho" shid' byid' na: ru ngad: ra" .
Byo re maqo" khae: yu: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Mao" So: Byo: yang byid' ra" jeju jhaung" qhu" jham re maqo" khae: yu ngad: ra" . Airu" yaug wa Byo we' sin" ra" jeju khyo re gaigai: yao: maba: gyo: ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ai: jeju jham: nho: aphug' re Byo mae apan aqao: to: yang: za: dao: qo" gai: phyid' ruyang ai: gu: wa yao" qhid' mae" pe" lajheim: mabo ngad: ra" .
Byo re qo" khae: yu: ra" yaug kam" wa ja: Khao: Ngo" nho: aphug' re dao: qo" phyid' ra"- ngadqere: yao: re wa khag' re: dao: maqo" phyid' ngad: ra" .
Jham: mugsug' mae- Asang: nho: myid re khag' qo" ba byid: nae" i? Yao: re khag' pha,jhi" qo" byid: nae" i? ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo:- ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ngonhaung" kam" wa Khristu nho: laba lajhao myid qo" ra" mo, ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Gai gai: yao: ein: re- ngo wa naonhaung" re Byo re qo" khae: yu vako" ra" mo, re ta" kyo" ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re maqo" gai: ta" kyo: ngad: ra" . Ngo wa naonhaung" re ce: mug: myid: we' sin" ra" byu qe we' dakhyo: re:- Khristan lam khug: rumae zoshao doe; na mo, re we' dakhyo: ta" kyo: qo: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa qao: ra" zo: ve re maqo" zo: shiko" ruyang ngo naonhaung" re zo: ve aqao mazho:- Nug' za: naonhaung" re jhaug' ra" . Ana" lhao" re: naonhaung" qao: ra" zo: ve zo: nae" majin" shiko" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa ce: mug: myid: nho: ave, lo, mau" we' dakhyo:- kao so' daui: na: ako" . Naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" myid nug' ru we'- naonhaung" yao: cao: myan" myo: jho" byo; na ko" ru ce wa- mug: myid byu: suna azhao" khyo" naonhaung" kao so' daui: na ko" rure sagse: qhu" byid' na: ru mangad: i?
Naonhaung" mae" dayaug wa- ngo wa Polu thao cao" yaug ngad:- gatau dayaug wa- ngo wa Apolo thao cao" yaug ngad:- ga: ta" gelao"- naonhaung" wa mug: myid: byu qenho: ave, lo, mau" we' dakhyo: kad' na ko' ru mangad: ge i?
Dang za: ta" gelang: ga" re- Polu wa khag' ngad: i? Amung: Apolo wa khag' ngad: i? Nga" shid' zo: wa naonhaung" re lam khug: lo sho' jhui" au: she byid' ra" Mao" So: daui daui okaung tao za: angad: ra" . Mao" So: yang nga" shid' zo: re dayaug re daja: kho' byid' ra" mau" re zaui: so" ru shid' yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa ai: myug: shi: re qho: yaug ngad: ra"- Apolo wa ai: agae re qid sheim: yaug: ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ai: agae re yaug: li" nhao yaug wa Mao" So ngad: ra" .
Myug: shi: re qho: yaug we' qid sheim" ra" yaug wa akhyag mangad: ngad: ra"- Agae yaug: thug' li" nhao ra"- Mao" So yaug lam: akhyag ngad: ra" .
Ai: myug: shi: re qho" ra" yaug we' qid sheim" ra" yaug: nho: myid: lao" khyo wa daja: za: ngad: ra" . Yao: yao: zaui: so" ra" mau" zo" re cao" yang: Mao" So wa yaug khao: ngo" re jhaung qhu" byid' li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re nga" shid' zo: wa Mao" So: qhid' mae" mau" zaui: byid' ra" mau" zaui: cao: ngad: ra" . Amung: naonhaung" wa Mao" So: yo myid jham ngad: ako"- Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: yham re: ngad: ako" .
Mao" So: yang ngore byid' ra" jeju jhaung qhu" re ci yang:- ba jhao: ra" yham kad' yaug we' dakhyo: apan aqao: zhaug' to: va" . Gatau dayaug wa ai: apan aqao: dao mae xo' zao: ra"- ngadqere: xo' zao: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: khoru: zao: rure lha" ca" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa- Yesu Khristu re Date: za: ngad: ra" apan aqao: khyo" zhaug' to: gau ngad va" ruyang apan aqao: gatau dalam: maqo" gai: zhaug' ngad: ra" .
Ai: apan aqao: dao mae byu daqhae: wa- qhang- mangad: lao"- ngaui- mangad: lao"- daqhae: wa phug' de; ra" laugsin" jham re ci yang: xo' zao: li" genae" . Amung: gatau daqhae: wa- sag'- mangad: lao"- mhin: mangad: lao"- khovho jham we' xo' zao: li" genae" .
Ai: byu qe dayaug we' dayaug: nho: lo, mau" khoru: ngad: rure Khristu joe" li" ra" ba na mae myao: thug' li" nhao nae"- pe"mung: ga"re ai: ba na mae myi: wa byu yaug khao: ngo" nho: lo, mau" re qhu" byid' li" nae" ngad: ra" . Ai: myi: wa yaug khao: ngo" nho: lo, mau" re jham" kin: kho' mung: yao: yao" gao: aman" re qhu" byid' li" nae" .
Ai: apan aqao: dao mae xo' zao: ra" yham vo:- myi: dae re qo" kham: ngad: re wa- yham zhaug' ra" yaug wa aphug' jhaung qhu" qo" khae: yu: li" nae" .
Byu dayaug yaug: nho: yham nga" pye' ngad: re wa- yao: wa seim" byaug: li" nae"- ngadqere: yao: yao" gaung yao: kam" wa myishae gyo: mae" phao: loe, yaug we' dakhyo:- khyad' yu: ru qhug' li" nae" .
Naonhaung" wa caung: pa" yham ngad mung:- Mao" So: Byo wa naonhaung" khug mae na: ra" khyo re naonhaung" dang za: ba gau ngad: ako" .
Airumung: Mao" So: yham re phyo' qheim" pye' ra" yaug khag' re ngadqere:- Mao" So wa yao: re phyo' qheim" pye' li" nae" . Pe"mung: ga"re caung: pa" yham wa gyang" lho" ru we' naonhaung" yao" gaung wa yao" yham ngad: ako" .
Khag' re: yao: yao" gaung re damhug' pyag' ge, Naonhaung" phaung mae" dayaug yaug ce: mug: myid: nho: azhao" khyo" cao" yang: yao: wa pha,jhi" bo yaug ngad:- ga: myid jho: yu: ngad: re wa- yao: gaigai: pha,jhi" bo yaug boe" li" nae" qhid' mae" adu: adae: yaug shi" boe" qo: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ce: mug: myid byu qe pha,jhi" ngad:- ga: myid: jho: ra" ja: wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae wa adu: adae: ja: ngad: ra" . Jham: mugsug' mae Pha,jhi" bo: ra" mo, re Mao" So: yang yao: bam: ba: jhao: rumae yao:- myi" nhao: ra"- ga: ta" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Alao"- jham: dao: gatau dalam: mae- Pha,jhi" bo: ra" mo, myid: to" ra" ja: pe" phug' made; rure Mao" So ba: ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Airumung: khag' ngadqere: khyoqhid' au: she byu qe qo" kad' ru we' sin: yang: daphug shao:- Gai gai: yao: ga" re naonhaung" wa ja: khao: ngo" re naonhaung" sang: ako" .
Polu- Apolo- Petru- mug: myid ceru- kao so' daui: ru we' shid: ru- ana" qae: we' joe" lo nae" ra" qae:- alhab' re naonhaung" sang: ako" .
Airumung: naonhaung" re sang yaug wa Khristu ngad mung:- Khristu re sang yaug wa Mao" So ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa nga" shid' zo: re Mao" So: no; thao" ra" dangman" ra" khyo jham re zam: pyo byid' na: ra" Khristu nho: daui daui mo, ngad: ra" khyo" myid: jho: yu nae" ang: ako" .
Airu" nho: daui daui yaug mae bo ang: ra" ave, daja: wa- yao" asang re nhag' lam: jhaug' zaug myid bo: ra" ave, ngad: ra" .
Ana" ngo wa naonhaung" yang- mangad: lao" xao su byu khag' nho: azhao" re cao" yang: ngad ngad dao: kho' ru qhug' nae" ngo dajhid' re: sang: kho: gaung mayug- Ngoyao" gaung re ngoyao: lhao" re: dao: kho' ra" khyo ngo makad' .
Nga" aung khug nhag' lam: wa- gyang: gyang: za: ngad: ra"- ngadqere: airu wa ngo qobo gaigai: maqo"- ga: sagse: maqo" kad' qhu" ngad: ra" . Asang wa ngore myid' kho' yaug ngad: ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa ayo, majoe" shire khag' rere: dao: kho' nae" ma- ang ngad: ra" . Lo" thao" ra" dao: kho' ru wa Asang joe" li" sho' lao" qo: ra"- yao: wa mug: cad' khug mae nyham" to" ra" ja: re we' byu: aung khug nhag' lam: mae khug' myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo re myao: thug' li" nhao nae" . Ailao"- yaug khao: ngo" wa- yao: yao: man: qi" ru we' dakhyo:- Mao" So: yang caung: khin" ru qhug' li" genae" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- dau ang: ra" tarha" re phug' cao" ge,- ga" ra" dao: khyo: lajheim: re ba: zhao: yu genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" akyu" mathao mae Apolo we' nga" khyo alhab' re ve, so: khyo" bota" ke' ru ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" mae" khag' ngadqere: dayaug re nga: yhe' mung: dayaug re maphug' makhyad' dakad' ge,-
Khag' yang nao re su gaje tho' je nhao: ra" i? Naonhaung" qo" ra" ja: alhab' wa- Mao" So: yang byid' to" ru mangad: i? Aire naonhaung" qo" gu: alhab' wa Mao" So: jeju jhaung qhu" mangad:' ruru: naonhaung" khoru: qo" gai: phug ko" i?
Naonhaung" qo ca" gu: alhab' qo" vako" i? Naonhaung" jo,nho" qo" vako" i? Nga" shid' zo: lhao" re: kho: kham maboe" re naonhaung: kho: kham boe" vako" i? Naonhaung" kho: kham boe" gelao"- nga" shid' zo: re: naonhaung" we' daga" kho: kham bokad' nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" kho: kham gaigai: boe" genae" rure ngo kao bau: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re mug: lagyo: qe we' myid gaung byu qe alhab' zhaug' qu" genae" qhid' mae" mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae se' pye' nae" dao: phyid' qhug' ko" ra" mo, rere" ru: nyham: thao" ra" jo, qo re byid' to: va" khyo" ngo the' myao: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa Khristu mathao mae adu: adae: mo, ngad: ra"- ngadqere: naonhaung" wa Khristu we' dagaung dasho: za: doe, mung:- pha,jhi" bo mo, ngad: ako" . Ngonhaung" wa qam: nang: mo,- naonhaung" wa qam: bo mo,- ngonhaung" wa jung" pye' qhug' mo,- naonhaung" wa nga: yhe' qhug' mo, ngad: ako" .
Ana" joe" sho' yao: ngonhaung" vae: moe; qid shab' na mung:- mai jad: bau: jad: ve; na: . Ngonhaung" wa be; ru qhug' ru we' damae" damae du" lae" qin" mo, ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" yao" lo; yang yao: qam: ke' myaung: dug mung: mau" khao" zo" bam va"- nhang" ru qhug' lao"- shaman" byid:- yhin" ru qhug' lao"- ngonhaung" zang: kham: bam va" .
Ngonhaung" maphug' makhyad' kad' ru qhug' lao"- ngonhaung" dao: gai phaug' tau" ra"- ngonhaung" wa ana" joe" sho' yao: myidgaung: nho: basad jham we' maca' majhad' we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re qho' phyo' nug yang: ngo ceru: tung" ke' ru mangad:- ngadqere: ngo jhid' de; ra" nga" zo: qere we' dakhyo: mho" nug yang: ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- naonhaung" Khristan kao so' daui khyo mae khyoqhid' au: she mho" shid' byid: nae" byu tug khyo" na gengadqere: naonhaung" wa pho" dayaug za: qo" ako"- ngo wa ai: Lau Dao: Gai naonhaung" re kho" kyo: byid' ra" khyo" yang naonhaung" re Khristu we' dagaung dasho: za: doe; lo: ra" khyo mae naonhaung" yao: pho" boe" lo: ra" .
Airumung:- nga" ave, aso: re cao" genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re ngo mho' ra" .
Ce: mathao mae ngo wa- Khristu mae lam ga" ru we' nga" zo: ru: jhid' de; ra" Timothi re naonhaung" jhao" nhao: ke' ra" . Yao: wa Yesu Khristu we' dagaung dasho: doe; ra" kao so' daui khyo asag' mae ngo phug' cao" ra" tarha" jham ngad: ra"- khyi" khao: ngo" mae" phung: alhab' re ngo mho" byid' ra" tarha" re naonhaung" re dam: myid: beim: nhao: li" nae" .
Naonhaung" mae" daqhae: wa- ngo naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" nae" mangad: lo:- ga: myid: jho yang: nga: kad' phug: na: ako" .
Ngadqere: Asang myid o: ngad: re wa- mataung" myao" re ngo naonhaung" jhao" li" nae"- ailao"- airu: nga: kad' phug: ra" mo; nhad' dao: thoe reza: mangad:- yao: bam: qam: so' rere: ngoyao: myao: ba: yu: li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: mung"dan: wa nhad' dao: thoe mae bo: ru mangad:- Qam: so' mae bo: ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" jhao" vose: ci yang: joe" li" nae" o ko" i? Mangad: lao"- jhid' de; nau" nhae" ra" myid khyo" joe" li" nae" o ko" i? Naonhaung" kholam: re o ko" i?
Taung bug byu qe lhao" re: makad' ra" gyo" gyaug sho' ra" gaung sho" ra" gintho' mau" zo" jham naonhaung" phaung mae xo: na ko"- ga: khyag' ta" hau" na ko" rure ngo the' gyo" ra" . Yauggai dayaug yao: myhi" nhaung: we' zam" na: ra"- ga" ra" thoe re ngo the' gyo: va" .
Naonhaung" wa nga: kad' phug: na: ako"- naonhaung" wa kaug' qhui nae" she, ang mung: airu: kad' ra" yaug re naonhaung" phaung mae" phoe' thug' pye' ca" ra" .
Ngo wa gaung khyao khyo" naonhaung" we' va" kyo: na ngadqere:- nhag' lam: byo khyo" wa- naonhaung" we' daga" ngad: ra" . Ngoyao: naonhaung" jhao" joe" na: ra" khyo" ai: qu" ca' qu" yao: ra" lo,mau" kad' ra" yaug re ngonhaung" Asang Yesu mang mae ngo dao: kho' va" .
Naonhaung" daga" zang" ham: na: au:- ngore: nhag' lam" byo khyo" naonhaung" we' daga" bobo: na: au: re- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu qam: so' we' ai: yauggai re-
Yao" gaung byo; qeim: lo" shao: Satan nho: lo, khyo ab: pye' ge,- aimung: Asang: Ba Na mae yao" byo khyad' yu: ru qhug' vashao:-
Naonhaung" nga: kad' phug: ru wa magai ngad: ra" . Man" dajhid' za" ru wa cin man" phaui: alhab' re baung" je" li" nhao: ra"- ga" ra" dao: khyo: re naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Naonhaung" bin sho' gyang" shao: li" geshao:- naonhaung" wa man" axug' ngad: ra" qobo re yu: pye' ca" ako" . Aimung: naonhaung" wa man" mabo: ra" cin man" phaui: asag' we' dakhyo:- boe" genae" . Gai gai: yao: naonhaung" ai we' dakhyo: ngad ko" rure ngo ba: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ana" ngonhaung" Lai co' Xeim: yao nau" ngad: ra" Yesu re xeim: bin: ngaui" to: byid: va" ruyang ngonhaung" nho: Lai co' Poe re kad' nae" jin" jin" ngad va" .
Airumung: ai: man" axug' ngad: ra" qobo we' makhyang: mashab: ra" lo, mau" bo: ra" mug we' mangad: lo:- man" mabo: ra" mug ngad: ra" gyang" san: ru we' dangman" ra" mug we' Lai co' Poe kad' gelang:-
Gaung sho" ra" gintho' mau" qho: ra" mo, we' naonhaung" mazam" genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" jhao" ngo vhin tung" tung" ke' va" .
Ngadqere: ngo wa ce: mug: myid dao mae" gaung sho" nho: gintho' mau" kad' ra" mo,- myo, no, so' kho' mo,- khug' mo,- sulho re caung: pa" ra" Taung bug byu qe we' dazam" ge, ein: ta" nug: ru mangad:- Airu" mo, re jao" pye' nae" ga: lao" wa- naonhaung" wa ce: mug: myid mae" bin sho' thug' lo" ca" genae" ngad: ra" .
Ngo ta" nug: ru wa- yao: yao" gaung re Khristan mao: nhaung: ngad: ga: ta" mung:- gaung sho" nho: gintho' mau" qho: ra" mo,- myo, no, so' kho' ru- sulho re caung: pa" ru- su re gaui mho: ru- yhid shaug' ya" ru- khug' yaug we' dazam" ge,- ein: ru angad: ra" . Airu" yaug we' wa daga" zaung yang: zo: ve lhao" re: dazo: dashaug' ge,-
Phung: byu mangad' ra" mo, re dao: kho' nae" ru wa nga" mau" mangad: ngad: ra" . Yao: bam re wa- Mao" So yao: dao: kho' li" li" nae"- ngadqere: naonhaung" wa- naonhaung" yao" phung: byu qere dao: kho' ang ko" ra" mangad: i? Jham: mugsug' mae ta" to" ru we' dakhyo:- ai: makhyang" ra" yaug re naonhaung" phaung mae" phoe' pye' ge,
Naonhaung" mae" Khristan mao: nhaung: dayaug yaug wa- Khristan yao: cao: we' mung khyo jho" ta" nae" bo: ngad: re pe"mung: Mao" So: byu qere mata" sho' nhao lo:- ai: Khristan mangad: ko" ra" tarha" zug: qe: qhid' kheim: khyo yao: vae" ye" ra" i?
Mao" So: byu qe wa mug: myid re dao: kho' nae" ngad: rure naonhaung" maba ko" i? Airu: mug: myid re dao: kho' genae" ra" mo, naonhaung" wa ngai: ra" mung mau" re lhao" dao: maqo" kho' ko" i?
Ngonhaung" wa mug: lagyo: jham re dao: kho' nae" ngad: rure naonhaung" maba ko" i? Airumung: ce: pyad mae" mung mau" re khoqhi" je yang: dao: qo" kho' genae" i?
Airu" mung mau" bo: thug' li" lao"- Khristan phung: mae mang maqo" thao" ra" mo; yang ta" sho' vhang" nae" qhid' mae" aijham re ciye: genae" i?
Naonhaung" qhid' nae" aqho' axag' ngad: ra" . Khristan mao: nhaung: yao: cao" agyo: mae mung mau" bo: thug' li" lao"- aire ta" kho' byid: nae" pha,jhi" bo: ra" byu dayaug khalhao" naonhaung" phaung mae gaigai: yao: qo" ko" mangad: i?
Ai: atha" Yesu re malam khug: ra" tarha" zug: pho" yang dao: kho' byid: nae" qhid' mae" Khristan mao: nhaung: yao: cao: yung" jho" do, genhaung i?
Airu: naonhaung" yung" jho" do, ko" ru yao: Khristan qenho: ave, lo, mau" re naonhaung" gyoe; gyo" lo" nhao: ru ngad: ako" . Ai: atha" matarha" ra" khyo kad' rure kham zo" ru wa- naonhaung" qhid' mae" je: gai: ra" mangad: i? Lhad' zo: qhug' ru wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" je: magai: i?
Airu: kham zo: nae" atha" naonhaung" wa Khristan mao: nhaung: yao: cao: yao: lhao" re: matarha" ru kad' mung: jho" lhad' zo" na: ako" .
Makhyang" ra" mo, wa Mao" So: mung"dan: re maqo" sang genae" rure- naonhaung" jhaug' za: ba: ako" . Aimung: naonhaung" gaung re dapyag' vhan" ge,- Gaung sho" nho: gintho' mau" cao" mo,- sulho re caung: pa" ra" mo,- su: myi: shad' mo,- yauggai yao: cao: myiqe: yao: cao: gaung sho: jho" zam" ra" mo,-
Khug' mo,- myo, no, so' kho' ra" mo,- yhid shaug' ya: mo,- su re gaui mho mo,- khug' hab' qe- khag' ngadqere: Mao" So: mung"dan: re qo" sang genae" mangad: .
Naonhaung" mae" damyo" wa airu" ra" mo, ngad: lo: ako"- ngadqere: naonhaung" wa qobo kyang" shao: pye' ru qhug' avako" . Mao" So re qhaug' byid' to: va" mo, ngad: ako"- naonhaung" wa Asang Yesu Khristu nho: mathao mae re: ngonhaung" Mao" So: Byo mathao mae re: jo: ra" mo, ngad:- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' va" mo, ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" mae" dayaug yaug wa- ngo wa pe" ja: kad' nae" akhang" re: qo" yaug ngad:- ga: ta" li" nae" . Ngadqere: ja: khao: ngo" wa ni" qhid' mae" akyu" mabo ngad: ra"- ngo pe" ja: kad' ngadqere: maqo ein: qo" ta" ngadqere:- nga" gaung re ngo kad' ra" mau" daja: ja" nho: jeim doe, nhao nae" mangad: .
Gatau dayaug wa- zo: ve wa vae: dug' qhid' mae" ngad mung: vae: dug: wa zo: ve: qhid' mae" ngad: ga: ta" li" nae" . Ngad: ra"- ngadqere: Mao" So wa ai shid' ja" geim" re jeim" lo" nhao nae"- Gaung khyao wa gaung sho" ra" gintho' mau" cao" nae" qhid' mae" mangad:- Asang re caung da" byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Asang wa ai: gaung khyao qo ca" ra" gu: re bao" thaug' byid: yaug ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa- Asang re shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru we' dakhyo:- yao: wa ngonhaung" rere: yao" qam: so' khyo" yang dam: daui: to" li" nhao: li" nae" .
Naonhaung" gaung khyao jham wa- Khristu nho: gaung khyao: nho: gaung dau jham ngad ko" rure naonhaung" ba: ako" . Ngo wa Khristu nho: gaung khyao- gaung dau dalam: re yu: yu mung:- shava myhi" nho: gaung khyao- gaung dau kad' pye' byid: nae" i? Dajhid' re: magai: boe" ngad: ra" .
Yao" gaung khyao re shava myhi" we' zam" khug: ra" yaug wa gaung sho: khyo" yang ai: shava myhi" we' dagaung dasho: za: boe" rure naonhaung" ba ko" mangad: i? Jham: mugsug' wa- yao: shid' zo: wa dagaung dasho: za: doe; li" genae"- ga: de: de: za: ta" to" ra" .
Ai: Asang we' zam" khug: ra" yaug wa- byo khyo" yang ai: Asang we' dagaung dasho: za: boe" lo: ra" .
Gaung sho" nho: gintho' mau" re jao" pye' ge,- Byu kad' ra" qobo myo: sho' wa byu: gaung khyao re mazao" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: gaung sho" nho: gintho' mau" cao" ra" yaug wa yao: yao" gaung khyao re qobo de, nhao: ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" gaung khyao wa- Mao" So: yang byid' to: mung: naonhaung" khug mae na: jo; ra" Gyang" Lho" Byo: nho: yham mo" ngad ko" rure naonhaung" maba ko" i? Naonhaung" wa naonhaung" yao" gaung khyao re masang ko" ngad: ra"- Mao" So she, asang: ra" .
Yao: wa naonhaung" re aphug' byid: yang: vai: yu: to" ra" . Airumung: naonhaung" gaung khyao re Mao" So: phungbao bao: thug' li" nae" qhid' mae" ci yhung" na ge, .
Ana"- naonhaung" mugsug' tung" yang: myid' ke' ra" khyo jham we' sin: yang: yauggai wa myi: mayu: ru wa gai ru ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: gaung sho" gintho' mau" yao: xo: jo; ruyang yauggai yaug khao: ngo" wa yham sang myhi" qo" ca" mung: myiqe: yaug khao: ngo" re: yham sang pho" qo" ca" ra" .
Yauggai wa yao" yham sang myhi" we' gaung sho: zam" mung:- myiqe: re: ai we' dakhyo: yao" yham sang pho" we' airu: gaung sho: zam" na qo: ra" . Airumung: dayaug we' dayaug qo: rumae yao: cao: nhag' jho" dag nhao byid: qo: ra" .
Yham sang myhi" wa yao: yao" gaung re yao: masang ngad: ra" . Yao" yham sang pho" yaug asang: ra" . Ai we' dakhyo:- yham sang pho" re: yao: yao" gaung re yao: masang ngad: ra"- yao" yham sang myhi" yaug asang: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa akyu" mho' rumae ayo, byid: nae" qhid' mae" sao qhid' mae" jho" myid vang" to" ra" ayo, gyo: mae" lai yang: gaung sho: jho" zam" nae" yao: cao: dajho" ha ge,- ngadqere: akyu" mho' ra" yo, khyin: gan lao" wa- azhao: mae" ru: dam: jho" zam" ge, . Alao" za: naonhaung" yao" gaung re maqo" zang: geyang: Satan yang ju" phyo' rumae gyo" vao lo" nae" khyo mae" naonhaung" qo" loe, genae" .
Ngo naonhaung re ceru: ta" ru wa- amyin" byid' ra" khyo" ta" ru mangad:- Akhang" byid' ru za: angad:-
Gai gai: yao: ga" re ngo wa- naonhaung" alhab' mo, re ngo we' dakhyo: za: boe" nhao nug: ra" . Ngadqere: byu dayaug we' dayaug wa Mao" So: lo, mae" gatau tau: jeju jhaung qhu" dayaug daja: ja: qo" yu: ra" .
Ai: dinkhu: mate: mo, re we' cug' mo" qere ngo ta" ru wa- ngo we' dakhyo: dayaug za: qo" na: ru wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" je: gai: ako" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" maqo" zang: ko" ngad: re wa lo, xo' mung: na ge,- Shab' mhin: na: rutho' mae lo, xo' ru wa je: gai: ra" .
Lo, xo' to: va" mo; qhid' mae" ngo yao" amyin" dao: mangad:- Asang: nho: amyin" dao: daja: ja: ngo qo" ra" . Yham sang myhi" wa yham sang pho" we' magai: gao: ngad: ra" .
( Gao" lin: na: ngad: re wa yao: yao: za: xo' na: jo, ca" ra"- Mangad: lao"- yao" yham sang pho" we' dam: jho" vang" mung: zam: na ca" ra" . Yham sang pho" re: yham sang myhi" re magai: kao" pye' ngad: ra" . )
Gaje qere Asang ta" ru mangad: lo:- ngoyao: khyo" ta" ru wa- Khristan phung: byu dayaug wa malam makhug: ra" yham sang myhi" qo" mung: ai: yham sang myhi" wa yao: we' xo' mung: zam" na nug yang: ngad: re wa- yham sang pho" wa yao: re magai: kao" pye'- ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Amung: Khristan phung: byu myiqe: dayaug wa- malam makhug: ra" yauggai dayaug we' lo, xo' lo" mung:- ai: yham sang pho" wa yao: we' xo' yang: zam" na nug yang: ngad: re wa- yao" yham sang myhi" wa yao: re magai: kao" pye' ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ai: malam makhug: ra" yham sang pho" wa Khristan ngad: ra" yao" yham sang myhi" we' zam" khug: ra" khyo" yang- Mao" So khae: yu man" ra" yaug boe" lo: ra" . Malam khug: ra" yham sang myhi" wa- Khristan ngad: ra" yao" yham sang pho" we' zam" khug: ra" khyo" yang Mao" So khae: yu man" ra" yaug boe" lo: ra" . Ceru: mangad: re wa- yao: bam: myid: zo: qe wa Mao" So mabo: ra" mo, re" ru: boe" genae"- ngadqere: ana"- yao: bam wa Mao" So khae: yu man: mo, boe" lo: ako" .
Ngadqere: malam makhug: ra" yham sang myhi"- mangad: lao"- yham sang pho" wa- Khristan phung: byu ngad: ra" yham sang myhi"- mangad: lao"- yham sang pho" we' gao: nug: ngad: re wa- yao: re kao" pye' ge,- Khristan: phung: byu ngad: ra" yham sang myhi"- mangad: lao"- yham sang pho" wa- ce: khyo re galin: gago: qo" kad' ra" akhang" jo; ra" . Mao" So wa- yaug yo za: na nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re khai: yu: to: va" ra" .
Khristan phung: byu ngad: ra" yham sang myhi" nao we"- nao wa naoyao" yham sang pho" re maqo" khyad' yu nae"- ein: khoru: qo" ta" i? Khristan phung: byu ngad: ra" yham sang pho" nao we"- nao wa naoyao" yham sang myhi" re maqo" khyad' yu nae" ein:- khoru: qo" ta" i?
Byu yaug khao: ngo" wa- Asang: yang yao: re byid' to" ra" jhaung qhu" we' dakhyo:- Mao" So yao: khai: yu: ra" au: yao: khoru: ngad: re airu: xo' yang: kao so' daui qo: ra" . Ceru wa phung: alhab' re ngo mho" byid' ra" tarha" ngad: ra" .
Au: qid lhai: kham: au: mae" Mao" So khai: rure khae: yu va" yaug ngad: re wa- yao: wa ai: au: qid lhai" dae jho: jham byaug nae" qhid' mae" qam: dake' . Amung: au: qid lhai: khyo makham: yu loza: Mao" So khai: rure khae: yu va" ngad: re wa- yao: wa au: qid lhai: khyo kham: yu maqo ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re au: qid lhai: khyo re kham: yu makham: yu: ru wa pe" akhyag mangad: ngad: ra" . Mao" So: amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" ru za: akhyag ngad: ra" .
Byu yaug khao: ngo" wa Mao" So khai: rure yao: khae: yu: ra" au: re yao: ngad: na: ru we' dakhyo: na: jo, qo: ra" .
Mao" So nao re khai: yu: ra" au:- nao wa su: jeim ngad: i? Pe" maca"- ngadqere: ai: su: jeim mae" nao loe; beim nae" agu jo; ngad: re wa aire ci yhung: wa,-
Pe"mung: ga"re Asang: yang khai: yu qhug' ra" jeim wa- Asang: yang jeim mae" lhoe' ke' byid: yaug ngad: ra"- ai we' dakhyo: jeim mangad' ra" yaug Khristu yang khai: yu qhug' ra" yaug wa Khristu nho: jeim ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa naonhaung" re aphug' byid: yang: vai: yu: to" ra"- Airumung: byu: jeim dadoe, loge, .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" wa- Asang: yang khai: yu qhug' ra" au: re ngad: ra" ave, ayaug: we' dakhyo: Mao" So we' zam" khug yang: na: jo, qo: ra" .
Ana" lo, maxo' ra" mo, we' sin: yang: naonhaung" tung" ke' ko" ra" khyo re- Asang mae" amyin" dao: maqo" to: ngadqere: Asang: nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" yang lam ga" ra" byu dayaug ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- ngo myid: thug' ra" khyo re ta" ke' ra" .
Ana" thaung" qhug' na: ra" qug' khai: qug: khai: jham re beim: yang: ta" gelang: ga" re yauggai dayaug wa ana" yao: na: ra" khyo" na: jo; re wa je: gai nae" ein:- ngo myid: ra" .
Nao yham sang myhi" qo" va"yaug ngad: i? Ailao" wa yham sang myhi" re dashapye' pye' . Nao lo, maxo' shi" yaug ngad: i? Aire wa yham sang myhi" daqho lo:-
Ngadqere: nao lo, xo' ru wa pe" qobo shad' ru mangad: ngad: ra"- aimung: lo, maxo' shi" ra" myiqe: dayaug- lo, xo' ngad: re yao: pe" qobo mashad' ngad: ra" . Ngadqere:- dinkhu: te: lo, xo' ra" mo, wa qug: khai: rure thaung" qhug' li" genae" . Ngo wa naonhaung" re airu: mathaung" qhug' nhao nug ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo ta" nug: ru wa ceru: ngad: ra" . Ayo, myo: sho' madang lo" ruyang ana" mae" thoegu: myi: qo" ra" mo, wa- myi: maqo" ra" mo, ru: na qo: ra" .
Ngug: ra" mo, wa nhag' makaug' mo, ru:- Qi: ra" mo, wa mabau: mo, ru:- Zai vai: ra" mo, wa yao: bam vai: ra" zai re masang: ra" mo, ru:-
Myid gaung: jo,nho" zai yo we' phaga: kad' zo: mo, wa ai: yang phaga: makad' zo: mo, re" ru:- na qo: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ana" ru" ra" mug: myid wa ana" re" ru:- myao" sho' jo; jo, lo nae" mangad: lo: ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re myid: qug: myid: ci" rumae" loe; beim nhao nug: ra" . Myi: mayu: ra" yaug wa Asang re ngaui bau: nhao nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' na: ruyang yao: wa Asang: mau" zo" mae nhag' zaug: jo; ra"
Ngadqere: myi: yu: ra" yaug wa- yao" yham sang myhi" re ngaui bau: nhao nug: ruyang yao: wa myid gaung we' sin" ra" khyo mae nhag' lam: zaug: jo; ra" .
Airumung: yao: wa nhag' lam: shid' gao boe" jo; ra" . Lo, maxo' ra" myiqe:- mangad: lao"- zomyi: gyang" ngad yaug wa- Mao" So re yao" gaung dau: we' byo shid' ja" geim" re qhaug' byid: nug: ruyang yao: wa Asang: mau" zo" mae nhag' zaug: jo; ra" . Ngadqere: lo, xo' va" ra" myiqe: wa yao" yham sang pho" re ngaui bau: nhao nug: ruyang yao: wa- myid gaung we' sin" ra" khyo jham mae nhag' lam: zaug: jo; ra" .
Ngo ceru: ta" ru wa ngo naonhaung" re bao" nug yang: ta" ru ngad: ra" . Ngo wa naonhaung" re zaui" zag: ci nug yang: ta" ru mangad:- ai: atha" naonhaung" re jo ang: ra" khyo" zaui: so: genae" qhid' mae" we' Asang: mau" zo" qhid' mae" naonhaung" gaung dau: alhab' bin sho' qhaug' byid: yang: caung da" byid: genae" rure ngo o yang: ta" ru ngad:
Bin: jho" mho' to: yang: lo, maxo' nae" qhid' mae" shid' zo" myid vang" to" ra" khyo we' sin: yang: yauggai yaug wa- myiqe: nau" dao mae to" ra" yao" ave, wa majo maang: ra" khyo" ngad:- ga: yao: myid: li" yang: ngad ngad- gaung sho: we' sin: mung: zang: yang: ngad ngad- lo, xo' ca"- ga: yao: myid: jho yang: ngad: re yao: myid: o: ru we' dakhyo: yao: shid' zo: wa lo, xo' vageshao:- ceru mae qobo maboe" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: yauggai yaug wa- khag' yang re: majhan: lo: lo, maxo' nae"- ga: yao: yao" nhag' lam" yang tang za: myid: phyid' yang:- yao: yao" nhag' lam: re nyang" za: qo" zang: mung:- yao: yao" nhag' lam: mae myid: phyid' to: gau ngad: re wa yao: ai: myiqe: nau" re lo, maxo' nae" kad' ru wa gai: ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung: lo, xo' ra" yauggai wa- gai: ra" khyo re kad' ra" . Ngadqere: lo, maxo' ra" yaug wa je: gai: ra" khyo re kad' ra" .
Myhi" zang dayaug wa yao" yham sang pho" za: adaui: na na wa- din khu: dao mae taui" to" ru qhug' ra" . Ngadqere: yao" yham sang pho" shid: byaug yang: ngad: re wa- yao: nug: ra" yaug khag' jhao" ngadqere: yham gai: qo" lo" ra" . Ngadqere: Khristan phung: byu yauggai we' za: lo, gai: xo' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: wa lo, madam: xo' lo:- airu: yao: na: jo; ngad: re wa- je: ngaui pyo" li" nae"- ceru wa ngo myid: jho: ra" khyo ngad: ra" . Ngo re:- Mao" So: Byo qo" yaug ngad:- ein: myid: lam: ra" .
Ana"- sulho jham re kug' byid' ra" zo: ve we' sin: yang: naonhaung" tung" ke' ko" ra" khyo re pheim: kyo: byid: nae" . Ngonhaung" alhab' wa laba lajhao bo mo, ngad:- ga: yao: bam ta" ko" ra" dao: gaigai: dang: ra" . Ngadqere: airu" laba lajhao wa byu re ngad beim: phug: li" nhao: ra" . Jhid' de; myid kam" wa byu re gang" tang qi" qhang nhao: ra" .
Byu dayaug yaug wa daja: ja: re ba beim" ra" myid bo: ngad: re yao: wa gaigai: yao: ba ca" ru we' dakhyo: maba shingad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So re jhid' de; ra" yaug re wa Mao" So: yang yao: re ba nhao: ra" .
Airumung: sulho jham re kug' byid' ra" zo: ve re zo" ra" khyo we' sin: yang: ta" re- sulho ga" ru wa gaigai: yao: mana majo; ra" daja" ja" sulho za: ngad: rure re: Mao" So wa date: za: ngad mung: yao: mae" je yang: gatau mana: rure re: ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Mug: gaung we' myidgaung mae so jham ga: sun" to: mo, na mung: so jham myo: sho' we' asang jham myo: sho' na gesho' ngadqere:-
ngonhaung" qhid' mae" wa Pho" ga" ra" Mao" So date: za: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa ja: khao: ngo" re Phan" Yaug ngad: ra" . Yao" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" kao so' daui: na: bam: . Ngonhaung" wa Yesu Khristu ga" ra" Asang dayaug za: aqo" . Ai: Asang: yang ja: khao: ngo" alhab' wa phan" to: qhug' mung: yao: khyo" yang ngonhaung" kao so' qo" daui: na: bam: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: yaug khao: ngo" ce: dangman" ra" khyo re maba ko" ngad: ra" . Byu damyo" wa sulho re caung: pa" rumae min" jo, gemung: ana" joe" sho' zo: ve re zo: gelao"- ai wa sulho re kug' byid' ra" zo: ve ngad:- ga: myid yang: zo" na: ako" . Yao: bam: aung khug: nhag' lam: qam: nang: geyang: yao: bam re zo: ve khyo" yang ai wa masan masin" boe" nhao:- ga: myid: ako" .
Zo: ve wa Mao" So we' ngonhaung" zam" khug: ra" khyo re je: gai: li" nhao nae" mangad:- ngonhaung" mazo: ngadqere: Mao" So we' ngonhaung" zam" khug: ra" khyo byo; lo" nae" mangad:- ngonhaung" zo: ngadqere: gatau pe" akyu" je: qo" nae" mangad: .
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" nho: galin: gago: zo: shaug' ra" lo, mau" wa- lam khug: ra" khyo mae qam: nang" ra" mo, re qobo mashad' nghung: nhao nae" qhid' mae" lha" ge,-
Ce: khyo we' sin: yang: aung khug nhag' lam: qam: nang" ra" byu dayaug yaug wa- Ba Jhao Myid ga" ru qo" ra" nao re sulho re kug' byid' ra" phan yham mae zo: ve zo: shaug' na: rure yao: qe the' myao: ngad: re- ni" lo, mau" wa yao: re sulho re kug' byid' ra" zo: ve re vae" zo: nhao: li" nae" mangad: i?
Ailao" ni" laba lajhao mathao mae Khristu shid kham: byid' ra" lam khug: myid mae qam: nang" ra" ni" mao: nhaung: pho" wa byo; qeim: lo" ru qhug' li" nae" .
Aimung: naonhaung" wa Khristan mao: nhaung: qere qobo shad' lhoe" ru we' qam: nang" ra" yao: bam: aung khug: nhag' lam: rere: dae te' byid: gemung:- Khristu re shad' ra" mo, naonhaung" boe" genae" .
Airumung: zo: ve: mathao: yang nga" mao: nhaung: pho" re qobo shad' nhao yang: ngad: re wa- nga" mao: nhaung: pho" qobo mashad' vashao:- ngo wa ana" mae" khonhae" re: sho: mazo: lo nae" .
Ngo wa ngoyao: nug: khyo" qo" na yaug mangad: i? Ngo wa lagyo: dayaug mangad: i? Ngonhaung" Asang Yesu re myao: qu" va" yaug mangad: i? Naonhaung" wa ngo Asang: mau" zo" re zaui" rumae" thug' li" ra" ashi: jham mangad: ge i?
Gaje qeyang ngore lagyo: dayaug khyo" makhae: yu gesho' ngadqere: naonhaung" wa ngore gaigai: yao: khae: yu genae" mangad: i? Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" Asang we' dagaung dasho: za: doe, yang: kao so' daui: na ko" ru wa naonhaung" gaung yao: ngo lagyo: ngad: ra" sagse: ngad: ra" .
Su bam ngore qobo zhaug' yang: ta" gelao"- ngo ceru: ta" vha: yu: ra" .
Nga" mau" zo" mathao mae ngo wa zo: ve shaug' pho: re khae: yu nae" akhang" majo, i?
Ngo wa Lagyo: gaje qe- Asang: nho: yao: nhaung: qe we' Petru nho: lag re cao" mung: lam khug: ra" yham sang myhi" jhui: yang: du" qin" nae" akhang" maqo" i?
Mangad: lao" Baraba we' nga" shid' zo: za: ve: dug: khau mau" kad' zo" ra" khyo" mau" vin qo: i?
Gyezo: khoyaug yao: yao" zokho zo: yang: gye mau" kad' qu" i? Khyae kad' zo: byu khoyaug yao: yao" khyae mae" sabyi shi: maphyo' zo: lo: na: i? Yao zam: zo: byu khoyaug yao: yao: zam" ra" yao mae" nug' mashaug' lo: na: i?
Ce: yu" yu" dao: tau" jham we' za: ta" pin" gai: ru mangad:- pe"mung: ga"re kham" to" ra" tarha" re: dakhyo: za: ta" to" ra" .
Moshe kham" to" ra" tarha" mae gaug nao" ra" nung: lo" nhad' re gyan dazhaung: byid:- ga" rure ngonhaung" qhug' nghe' ra" . Ana"- Mao" So wa nung: lo: jham: khyo re myid: ci" ra" i?
Yao: airu: ta" ru wa- gaigai: ngonhaung" qhid' mae" ta" ru mangad: i? She, angad: wo"- ai wa ngonhaung" qhid' mae" tung" to: byid' ru ngad: ra" . Yo phaug' yaug we' gaug yad: yu yaug wa yao: yao" gae bam gaug re qo" yu nae" myid: lao" zo" re" mau" zaui: qo: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" phaung mae byo we' sin" ra" myug: shi: re sin: va" . Aimung:- ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" mae" gaung sho: khau nae" zokho re jham" yu: ngad: re wa- ngonhaung" saung" xo: ru ngad: i?
Su gaje qe- ce: akho: akhang" re naonhaung" mae" qo" yu ko" ngad: re wa- ngonhaung" wa akho: akhang" je yang: lhao" qo" yu ang: mangad: i? Ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa ai: akho: akhang" re maci yhung:- ai: atha" Khristu nho: khyo Lau Dao: Gai byo: sin" lo" nae" ra" khyo mae kaung: kag' ru majo, vashao:- ein: ngonhaung" wa ja: khao: ngo" re zang: kham: lo: bam va" .
Caung: pa" Yham mae mau" zaui" ra" mo, wa yao: bam: zo: ve re Caung: pa" Yham mae" qo" yu mung:- phan mae xeim: ngaui" byid' ra" mo, wa- ai: xeim: mae" yao: bam: gae bam qo" yu ko" rure naonhaung" dang za: ba: ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai re kho" kyo" ra" mo, wa- Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: khyo" yang yao: bam: kao so' khau nae" qo" yu ca"- ga: Asang amyin" byid' to: co' ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo wa- ai: akho: akhang" jham daja: rere: mayu lo: airu" akho: akhang" jham re mho' yu nae" qhid' mae" ana" ce: mugsug' re tung" ke' ru mangad:- Airu: kad' nae" tho' shid: ru wa nga" qhid' mae" je: gai: ra" . Khag' re: nga" khyo re akeim qo" kad' pye' nae" mangad: .
Ngo wa ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re kho" kyo" ra" mathao mae za: phug nae" akho: akhang" ngo maqo" ngad: ra"- aire kad' nae" wa amyin" we' ngo khae: yu: to" ru ngad: . Ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re ngo makho" kyo: ngad: re wa ngo khoqhi" byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' nae" i?
Ce: mau" zo" re ngoyao" myid: yang zaui" ru ngad: re wa- aphug' re qo" myid: lao" nae" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ngo yao" myid: yang zaui" ru mangad: re wa Mao" So ngore lam mung: ab: to: byid' ruyang- qo khyo" ngo zaui: so" ra" .
Aire ngo pe" aphug' qo" yu nae" i? Ai: aphug' wa- Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re kho" kyo" ra" mau" zo" qhid' mae" akho: akhang" pe" mayu lo:- Lau Dao: Gai re aphug' mayu lo: qo" kho" kyo: byid' ra" akhang" ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa loe; na: ra" byu dayaug ngad:- Khag' jeim re: mangad: . Ngadqere: gai: boe" ra" qhi" byu myo: sho' mo, re qo" ge; aung: yu nae" qhid' mae" byu yaug khao: ngo" nho: jeim ngo kad' ra" .
Yuda byu qe: phaung mae mau" zo" vin vo; ra" au:- yao: bam re qo" ge; aung: yu nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa Yuda byu dayaug we' dakhyo: na ye; ra" . Ngoyao" gaung wa Moshe nho: tarha" re phug' cao" yang: kao so' daui yaug mangad:- ngadqere: ai: tarha" re phug' cao" ra" mo, re qo" ge; aung: yu nae" qhid' mae" tarha" re phug' cao" yaug we' dakhyo: na ye; ra" .
