Ai we' dakhyo:- Taung Bug Byu qe: phaung mae mau" zo" vin vo; na: ra" au:- ai: Taung Bug Byu qere qo" ge; aung: yu nae" qhid' mae" Yuda tarha" re maphug' cao" lo:- Taung Bug Byu dayaug we' dakhyo: na ye; ra" . Ceru: ta" ru wa ngo wa Mao" So: tarha" re maphug' cao"- ein: ta" ru mangad:- ngo wa gaigai: yao: Khristu nho: tarha" re phug' cao" yaug ngad: .
Lam khug: rumae qam: nang" ra" mo; phaung mae ngad lao"- yao: bam re qo" ge; aung: yu nae" qhid' mae" qam: nang" ra" dayaug we' dakhyo: na ye; ra" . Airumung: byu damyo" re yao: bam mae" gai: boe" ra" khyo khyo" qo" khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa byu alhab' mo; phaung mae yao: bam: khyo aja: ja: khyo" na ye; ra" .
Ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao" nho: shaman" jeju re qo" khae: yu nae" qhid' mae" Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao" nho: mathao mae ngo cegu: alhab' re kad' ru ngad: .
Jho" tao: poe mae byu myo: sho' mo, tao: gengadqere: tao" aung: ra" jhaung qhu" re dayaug za: qo" yu: rure naonhaung" nyang" za: ba: ako" . Airumung: naonhaung" re: jhaung qhu" re aqo" yu nae" qhid' mae" tao: ge,-
Jho" tao: poe vao nae" qhid' mae" min: sho' kad' na: ra" sab' jhi mo, yaug khao: ngo" wa byo; qeim: lo" ba: ra" bin: kheim" re qo" zhaung" yu nae" qhid' mae" sab' jhi mo; nho: thin: ra" tarha" re phug' cao" ako" . Ngonhaung" kam" wa apyad ato mabyo, maqeim: ra" bin: kheim" re qo" zhaung" yu nae" qhid' mae" kad' na: ru ngad:-
Airumung: ngo wa bin: zang khyo din: din: za: tao" ra" . Aimung: ngo wa jho" thaung: poe mae lo, zhab' aje amyid mathaung" pye' ra" jho" thaung: poe vao: ra" sulhe: yaug we' dau: ra" .
Ngo wa su gaje qere ai: mai jho" qhi" ra" poe mae vao nae" qhid' mae" khai: to: mung:- ngoyao: wa ai: jho" lhoe" poe mae maqo" vao: ra" yaug maboe" nae" qhid' mae" ngoyao" gaung re qao sho' kad' mung: bin sho' zang: yang jao" to: va" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Moshe thao cao" ko" ra" ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe khoru: boe" lai: lo ko" ra" khyo re ngo naonhaung" re myid: beim: nhao nug: ra" . Yao: bam wa jham thaui" yang khyoqhid' au: she gug: gam byid' ra" qao: mae su: mung:- yao: bam alhab' mo, ai: Tham: Ne khyo" pe" maqo lo: qo" lai: phyid' lo" ako" .
Yao: bam alhab' mo, wa- jham thaui: we' Tham: Ne mae Moshe nho: mho"zo: qekhyo" qid nyhab' kham: yu: ako" .
Yao: bam alhab' mo, wa byo zo: ve daja: re za: zo: mung:- byo shaug' pho: daja: re za: shaug' lo: ako" .
Yao: bam we' daga" su: mo, alhab' wa- byo we' sin" ra" laung: mo" baui mae" qid shaug' ako"- ai: laung: mo" baui wa Khristu yao: ngad: ava" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam mae" myo: lo bug re Mao" So ma- o mangaui mung:- yao: bam wa din"pyad' yo mae shid: myi" sin" lo" ako" .
Ana"- cejham alhab' wa yao: bam we' dakhyo:- makhyang" ra" mau" jham re kao mabau: nae" qhid' mae" we' yao: bam mae" damyo" we' dakhyo:- sulho re macaung: pa" nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" re ta" peim: byid' ra" ve, so: ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam sulho re caung: pa" ko" ru we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" wa sulho re macaung: pa" nae" qhid' mae" re:- ngonhaung" re ta" peim: byid' ra" ve, so: ngad: ra" . Byu jham wa zo: shaug' zaung: jo, mung:- shaug' yid: to" li" yang: go" pyo: mung: gaung sho: jho" zam" ako"- ga: jham: mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao: bam mae" damyo" re" ru: gaung sho" nho: gintho' mau" magai: cao" ngad: ra" . Daba na mae za: yao: bam mae" byu shid' tug: sam taung gyang: shid: lo" byaug: ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao: bam mae" damyo"- Moshe re jham" qu" ko" ru we' dakhyo:- Asang re lag magai: yu: qu" ngad: ra"- yao: bam wa lhao maui: yang thoe" se' pye' ru qhug' ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao: bam mae" damyo" re" ru: magai: nyhung ngad: ra" . Yao: bam wa Shid: ru: Lagyo: Pho" lo; yang se' pye' ru qhug' ako" .
Yao: bam mae boe" lo: ja: ai: gu: alhab' wa gaje qe: qhid' mae" ve, so: ngad mung:- ai: gu: wa ngonhaung" re ta" peim: byid' ra" khyo" tung" to" ru ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa- lo" thao" ba na jhao" li" na: ra" ayo, mae kao so' daui: na: bam yang: ngad: ra" .
Tang za: ye; jo, yaug ngad:- ga:- myid: jho: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: magyang: lang" lo" nae" qhid' mae" lha" qo: ra" .
Naonhaung" thaung" qhug' ko" ra" jham" qu" ra" ja: wa- byu alhab' mo, thaung" qhug' qu" ra" jham" qu" ra" ja: za: angad: ra" . Mao" So wa yao: yao" dao: so: re jhaug' zaug yaug ngad mung:- naonhaung" qo" kham: ra" qam: tho' je yang: yao: naonhaung" re jham" qu" ru qhug' nhao nae" mangad:- naonhaung" jham" qu" ru qhug' ra" ba na mae- yao: wa naonhaung" re qo" zang: qhao" nae" qam: o: byid' li" nae"- Airumung: ai: jham" qu" rumae"- naonhaung" loe; beim nae" pyi" phung" byid' li" nae" .
Airumung: nga" jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- Sulho re caung: pa" ra" khyo re jao" pye' ge, .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re pha,jhi" bo: ra" mo, re we' dakhyo:- ta" na: ru ngad:- ngo ta" na: ra" dao: re naonhaung" yao: gyo" kho' yu ge,-
Ngonhaung" wa Asang: myi" xeim zo: poe keim re jeju caung: khin" yang: aimae" ngonhaung" shaug' lao"- ngonhaung" wa Khristu sa: mae zam" khug: na: ru ngad: ra" . Aimung: ai: mug re phai" yang: ngonhaung" zo: lao" re:- ngonhaung" wa Khristu nho: gaung we' zam" khug: ru ngad: ra" .
Mug wa dakhai" za: ngad mung:- ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa myo: sho' ngadqere: ai: mug dakhai" mae za: zam" khug: na: ruyang- ngonhaung" wa dagaung dasho: za: ngad: ra" .
Israel byumyu" qere myid: qu" ge,- Ngaui" byid' ra" xeim: sho: zo" ra" mo, wa- ai: phan dao mae Mao" So re ngaui" byid' rumae bobo: ako" .
Airumung:- sulho- mangad: lao" sulho re kug' byid' ra" zo: ve wa akhyag ngad: ein: ngo ta" nug: ra" i?
Airu: mangad:- ngo ta" na: ru wa Mao" So re malam khug: ra" mo; phan mae kug' byid' ra" xeim: jham wa yui jham re kug' byid' ra" xeim: jham ngad mung:- Mao" So re ngaui" byid' ra" xeim: jham mangad: ein: rure ngo ta" nug: ru ngad: ra" . Ngo naonhaung" re yui jham we' zam" khug: ra" mo, maboe" nhao nug-
Naonhaung" wa Asang: nho: sabyi keim we' yui: nho: keim re daga" za: magai: shaug' ngad: ako"- amung: naonhaung" wa Asang: nho: zojaung: mae we' yui: zojaung: mae daga" za: magai: zo: ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Asang re myid nug: nhao nae" i? Ngonhaung" wa Asang tho' je: qam: bo mo, ngad: ein: myid nae" i?
Byu: tarha" dao: wa- ngonhaung" pe" ja: re: gai: kad'- ga: ta" ako" . Aiwa dang: ra" . Ngadqere: ja: khao: ngo" wa gai: ru mangad: ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa pe" ja: re: gai: kad' ra" akhang" qo" ngadqere:- ja: khao: ngo" wa ngonhaung" re akyu" mabyid: ngad: ra" .
Khag' ngadqere: yao: yao" akyu" re za: daqho ge,- Su gaje: qhid' mae" kam" wa qho ge,
Gai jao: mae aung" to" ra" pe" ja" sho: re ngadqere: naonhaung" galin: gago: gai: zo" ako" . Naonhaung" nho: aung khug nhag' lam: aug' o: yang: aire damyid: daca ge,
Pe"mung: ga"re jham: mugsug' mae- Myid gaung we' aimae" ja: khao: ngo" wa ai: Asang: nho: ngad: ra" ga: ta" to" ra" .
Malam khug: ra" byu dayaug yaug: yang naonhaung" re zo: poe khai mung: naonhaung" ye: nae" myid: phyid' gelao" wa- ye: ge, . Naonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae da" byid' ra" gu: alhab' re zo: ge,- naonhaung" myid aug' o: yang: dao: myid: pe" damyid: daca ge,-
Ngadqere: dayaug yaug wa- Ce: sho: wa sulho re kug' byid' ra" sho: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" lao" wa- airu: ta" kyo: byid' ra" yaug: mathao mae we' aung khug nhag' lam: aug' o: myid mazai" qheim" byid: shao:- ai: sho: re dazo: ge, .
Airu wa naonhaung" aug' o: myid re ta" ru mangad: . Gatau dayaug: nho: aug' o: myid re ta" ru ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" mae" dayaug yaug wa- aire nga" galin: gago: akhang" re gatau dayaug: nho: aug' o: myid: yang pe"mung: kham" pye' ang nae" i? ga: myid: ba: ra" .
Ngo wa nga" zo: ve qhid' mae" Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" yang: zo" ra" . Pe"mung: yang: ngo jeju caung: khin" ra" zo: ve we' sin: yang: ngore gaui mho nae" de; i? ga: myid' li" nae" .
Gai va"- naonhaung" wa zo: ngadqere:- shaug' ngadqere:- pe" kad' ngadqere: Mao" So: phungbao qhid' mae" kad' ge,-
Yuda byu qere ngadqere:- Taung Bug Byu qere ngadqere:- Mao" So: phung: re ngadqere:- aqug: akhai: maboe" nhao lo: kao so' daui ge,-
Ngo kad' ru we' dakhyo: cao" kad' ge,- ai ru: ngo wa byu jham khyad' yu: ru qhug' genae" qhid' mae" ngo kad' ra" mau" zo" alhab' mae nga" akyu" re mamyid lo:- alhab' mo; akyu" re myid yang: yaug khao: ngo" re ngaui nhao va" .
Airumung: ngo wa Khristu lag re qu" yu: ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" wa ngore lag qu" yu ge, .
Naonhaung wa ngore khonhae" re: myid: beim: mung:- ngo ab byid: co' ra" ai: mho" shid' khyo re phug' cao" na ko" ruyang- ngo naonhaung" re khin" ra" .
Khristu wa yauggai yaug khao: ngo" nho: au: jhaung- yham sang pho" wa yao" yham sang myhi" nho: au: jhaung- Mao" So wa Khristu nho: au: jhaung ngad:- ga" rure kam" wa ngo naonhaung" re ba: gyo: nhao nug: ra" .
Airumung: caung: pa" ra" yo, khyin: mae yao" au: re nghoe' ci yang: akyu" mho'- mangad: lao"- mungdao: ta" ra" yauggai wa- Khristu re qho' phyo' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Amung: caung: pa" yo, khyin: mae- yao" au: re manghoe' lo: akyu" mho'- mangad: lao"- mungdao: ta" ra" myiqe: wa- yao" yham sang pho" re qho' phyo' ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: wa au: daung: myhaug' ci: ra" myiqe: we' pe" mashai" ngad: ra" .
Myiqe: wa yao" au: re manghoe' nae" ngad: re wa- yao" xae re myhaug' pye' ca" ra" . Amung: myiqe: wa yao" au: myhaug pye' ru- yao" xae phyid' pye' ru wa yao" qhid' mae" qho' ja: ngad: re wa- yao" au: re nghoe' ci qo: ra" .
Yauggai wa Mao" So: khyao dau sulho we' phungbao- bao tang" ngad: ruyang yao" au: re nghoe' nae" madau ngad: ra" . Myiqe: kam" wa yauggai: phungbao- bao tang" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yauggai wa myiqe: mae" phan" to" ru mangad:- Myiqe: re kam" wa yauggai mae" phan" to" ru ngad: ra" .
Alao"- yauggai wa myiqe" nho: mathao mae phan" to" ru mangad:- Myiqe: kam" wa yauggai: mathao mae phan" to" ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung: mug: lagyo: qe: mathao mae myiqe: wa yao" yham sang pho" eib: ra" kheim: so' qao: mae na: rure qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao" au: re nghoe" ci qo: ra" .
Ngadqere: Asang mae zam" khug: na: ra" ngonhaung" kao so' daui khyo mae yauggai wa myiqe: re ngha yang: na ca" ruwe' dakhyo:- myiqe: re: yauggai re ngha yang na ca" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re myiqe: re wa yauggai mae" phan" to" ru we' dakhyo:- yauggai wa myiqe" yang khau: ru ngad: ra" . Ja: khao: ngo" re boe" jo, nhao: ra" yaug kam" wa Mao" So ngad: ra" .
Myiqe: wa yao" au: re manghoe' cilo:- caung: pa" phaung mae Mao" So re akyu" mho' nae"- dau nae" madau nae"- ein: rure naonhaung" yao: myid: kho' yu ge,-
Xae qhang to" ru wa yauggai: qhid' mae" myo, nho nga: lao: sham: ra" khyo ngad: rure re:-
ngadqere: myiqe" qhid' mae" kam" wa xae qhang to" ru wa yaung" shab: ru ngad: ra" ga: azhao: mae" naonhaung" re mho" byid' to" ra" . Xae qhang: ru wa myiqe: re au: nghoe' khyo" byid' to" ru ngad: ra" .
Ce: khyo we' sin: yang: ngag nug: ra" byu dayaug yaug na: ngad: re wa- ngo wa yao: re- ngonhaung" re:- Mao" So: phung: jham re:- caung: pa" rumae airu: au: nghoe' ra" thung" mae" je yang: gatau: nho: thung" majo,- ein: za: ta" nae" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: o mae" mho" shid' khyo jham mae naonhaung" re makhin" nae"- pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" caung: pa" ra" phaung wa agai tho' aqeim re je: boe" nhao: na geyang: ngad: ra" .
Sao qhid' maqhid khyo"- naonhaung" phung: ham phaung jham mae majho" vang" ra" aqug: akhai: bo: rure ngo the' gyo" ra" .
( naonhaung" mae" jo: ra" mo, khag' ngad ko" ru de: de: za: myao: thug' li" nae" qhid' mae" ai: phung: jho" kho' ru wa naonhaung" phaung mae boe" thug' li" ca" ra" . )
Naonhaung" daga" zang" ham: phaung: na ko" au:- Asang: nho: myi" xeim zo: poe re zo: nae" qhid' mae" phaung: na ko" ru mangad: ko" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" zo" ra" ayo, mae- yaug khao: ngo" nug yaug nug: khyo" yao: yao" myi" xeim re zo: mung:- vae: moe; mo, wa moe;- shaug' yid mo, wa shaug' yid mung: na: ako" .
Naonhaung" airu: zo: shaug' nae" qhid' mae" yao: yao" yham maqo" ko" i? Mangad: lao"- Mao" So: phung: re maphug' makhyad' kad' mung:- myaung sho" ra" mo, re qho' phyo' nug ko" i? Cekhyo we' sin: yang: ngo naonhaung" re pe" ru: ta" li" nae" rure myid: lao" ko" i? Ngo naonhaung" re khin" nae" i? Gaigai: yao: ngo makhin" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo naonhaung" re ab byid' ru wa- Asang mae" ngo khae: yu: ra" mho" shid' khyo ngad: ra" . Asang Yesu wa ab: pye' ru qhug' ra" myi re mug yu: yu mung:-
Mao" So re jeju bin: caung: lao"- khyoe' phai" yang:- ce wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" byid' pye' ra" nga" gaung ngad: ra" . Ngo re myid: beim: nae" qhid' mae" ceru kad' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo: myi" xeim bin: zo: thao re yao: wa keim re yu: yu mung:- ce: keim wa- nga" sa" yang dazid thaung" te' to" ra" Mao" So: dao: thang" asag' ngad: ra"- naonhaung" ai: re shaug' khao: ngo" ngore myid: beim: nae" qhid' mae" ceru: kad' ge,- ga: ta" ra" .
Naonhaung" ce: mug re zo: mung:- ce: keim mae" shaug' khao: ngo" Asang: nho: shid kham: byid' ra" khyo re yao: dam: joe" li" ra" yo, joe" sho' naonhaung" ta" hau: byid' ako" .
Airumung: khag' ngadqere: maman: maqi" lo:- Asang: mug re zo: mung:- Asang: keim mae" sabyi qang: re shaug' ngad: re wa- yao: wa Asang: nho: gaung re we' sa: re shad' lhoe" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yaug khao: ngo" wa yao: yao" gaung re shi" sao qhid' ca: qu" yang: mug re zo: mung: ai: sabyi' qang: re shaug' vageshao:-
Pe"mung: ga"re mug re zo: mung: sabyi qang: re shaug' ra" au: Asang: gaung lajheim: re maba: kho' lo:- zo: shaug' ra" yaug wa- yao: yao" gaung re dao: kho' ra" khyo" zo: shaug' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" mae" myo: sho' wa qam: nang" ru we' no phyo: qhug' mung:- myo: sho' mo, wa shid: byaug: ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao: yao" gaung re shi" sao qhid' ca: qu" ngad: re wa- Mao" So: yang dao: kho' ru maqhug' genae" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: dao: kho' qhug' ru we' Asang: yang qobo dae byid' ru qhug' ru wa myid gaung: byu qe we' daga" ngonhaung" dao: phyid' ru maqhug' nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Airumung:- nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" wa Asang: nho: Myi" Xeim zo: nae" qhid' mae" ham: phaung gelao"- naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" lao" ge,-
Naonhaung" ham: phaung: na gelao"- Mao" So: dao: kho' ru naonhaung" maqhug' genae" qhid' mae" vae: moe' ra" yaug wa yao: yao" yham mae zo" yu vashao:- gatau: khyo jham we' sin: yang: wa ngo joe" li" lao" za: li" sho' nae" .
Ana" nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" tung" ke' ko" ra" Gyang" Lho" Byo: nho: jeju jhaung qhu" jham: khyo we' sin: yang: dangman" ra" khyo ngo naonhaung" re ba nhao nug: ra" .
Naonhaung: wa Khristan: phung: byu maboe" shigere lai aja: ja: khyo" khyonghung: nghung: mung:- kao so' mabo: ra" sulho jham re caung: pa" lo ko" rure naonhaung" yao: ba gau ngad: ako" .
Mao" So: Byo: yang au: jhui" she: ru qhug' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Asang Yesu wa nhang: kheim: zao" vashao: ga: ta"nae" mangad:- amung: Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang khyo shid' ru qhug' ra" yaug za: mangad: re Yesu wa Asang ngad: ra" ga:- khag' re: maqo" lhang: yu ngad: ra" .
Byo: nho: jeju jhaung qhu" aja: ja: jo; ra" . Ngadqere: ai: jeju jhaung qhu" jham alhab' re Byo dagaung: yang za: byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Caung da" byid' ra" mau" aja: ja: ngadqere:- caung da" byid: nae" ra" Asang wa dayaug za: ngad: ra" .
Mau" zo" vin vo, nae" qam: o: aja: ja: bo ngadqere:- yao: yao" mau" zo" re vin vo, nae" qhid' mae" byu yaug khao: ngo" re yao: we' yao:- qam: o: byid' ra" yaug wa Mao" So dayaug za: ngad: ra" .
Byu myo: sho' nho: akyu" qhid' mae" yaug khao: ngo" mae Byo na: jo; ra" khyo re- khyo dakhe' khe' khyo" qhu" byid' na: ra" .
Amung: Byo wa dayaug re- nyan: pha,jhi" byang" ra" mung: dao:- ai: Byo yao: gatau dayaug re laba lajhao we' byang" ra" mungdao:- byid' to" ra" .
Ai: date: za: ngad: ra" Byo dagaung: yang dayaug re Mao" So re wa lam khug: ra" myid- gatau dayaug re wa no phyo: re gai byid: nae" qam: so' byid' ra" .
Byo wa dayaug re- mug' pho: ve, lho mau" jham re qo" zaui" qhu" ra" qam: so'- gatau dayaug re wa Mao" So: mungdao: re kho" kyo" ra" jeju jhaung qhu"- dayaug re wa- ai: jeju jhaung qhu" jham wa ai: Byo mae" joe" li" ru ngad- mangad' rure ba: kho' ta" ra" qam: so' byid' to" ra" . Gatau dayaug re wa myan" aja: ja: ba: jhau: ra" qam: so'- dayaug re wa myan" aja: ja: re qo" pheim: sho' kyo" ra" qam: so' re byid' to" ra" .
Ngadqere: ce: qam: so' alhab' re byid' ra" yaug wa- date: za ngad mung: Byo dagaung za: ngad: ra" . Byo wa yao: myid: o: ru we' dakhyo:- yaug khao: ngo" re yao: we' yao: jho" shai" mung:- jeju jhaung qhu" jham re byid' ra" .
Khristu wa gaung dau jham myo: sho' de; ra" gaung khyao we' dau: ra" . Byu: gaung khyao wa gaung dau jham myo: sho' ngadqere: dagaung za: ngad: ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" alhab' wa Yuda byu ngadqere:- Taung Bug byu ngadqere:- jeim ngadqere:- jeim mangad: yaug ngadqere:- dagaung dasho: za: boe" nae" qhid' mae" Byo dagaung mae qid nyhab' kham: yu va" mo, ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" alhab' wa ai: Byo dagaung re za: qid shaug' ru we' dakhyo: khae: yu va" mo, ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re gaung khyao wa gaung dau dalam: we' za: kad' to" ru mangad:- Gaung dau jham myo: sho' we' kad' to" ru ngad: ra" .
Khyid wa- ngo wa lo, mangad: yang: gaung we' ngo pe" masin: ga:- ta" ngadqere: airu: ta" yang: gaung we' masin" byaug: ru mangad:-
No: khye' wa- ngo wa myo,jid' mangad: yang: gaung khyao we' pe" masin:- ga: ta" ngadqere:- airu: ta" yang: gaung khyao we' masin" byaug: ru mangad:-
Amung: gaung geim" myo,jid' za: ngad: re wa- khoru: qo" gyo: nae" i? Alao"- gaung geim" no: khye' za: ngad: rere: sheim khoru: qo" nae: gyo: nae" i?
Ngadqere: ana" Mao" So wa yao: myid o: ru we' dakhyo:- gaung khyao mae jho" shai" ra" gaung dau khao: ngo" re te' to: byid' ra" .
Alhab' wa gaung dau daja: za: ngad: re wa- gaung khyao qo" boe" nae" mangad: .
Ana" wa gaung dau jham myo: sho' ngadqere: gaung khyao wa dagaung za: ngad: ra" .
Aimung:- myo,jid' wa lo, re ngo nao re maci qo ein: magai: ta"- au: ngadqere: khyid re ngo nao re maci qo ein: magai: ta" ngad: ra" .
Airu: ta" nae" atha" qam: je: nang" ra" ga: qu" jho: ra" gaung dau jham wa- mabobo re magai: ra" gaung dau jham ngad: ako" .
Akhyag mataung" ngad ein: ngonhaung" myid: jho: ra" gaung dau jham re ngonhaung" wa je yang: gun caung: ra" . Madau mayaung" ra" gaung dau jham re ngonhaung" je yang: nyhang" shaung: ra" .
Dau yaung" ra" gaung dau jham re kam" wa nyhang" shaung maca" ngad: ra" . Ai: phug' de, nga: maye; ra" gaung dau jham je yang: phug' de, nga: ye, nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So yao: yao: ai: gaung dau jham re airu: nyhang" jaung: to" ra" .
Airumung: gaung khyao mae nao- ngo ga: jho" kho' ru mabo lo:- gaung dau jham alhab' wa- yao: cao: dakhyo: za: jho" gun caung: na: ako" .
Gaung dau dalam: dayin dayo: no kham zo: lao"- gatau: gaung dau jham alhab' re: dakhyo: za: ai we' daga" dayin dayo: no: rure bokham zo" ako" . Gaung dau dalam: caung: khin" ru qhug' lao"- gatau: gaung dau jham alhab' re:- ai we' dakhyo: za: bongaui bau" ako" .
Naonhaung" alhab' wa Khristu nho: gaung khyao ngad mung:- yaug khao: ngo" wa- ai: gaung khyao: nho: gaung dau jham ngad: ako" .
Mao" So wa Phung: khug mae da ein nae" rumae- lagyo: qe- shid' ein nae" rumae lapa qe- sam ein nae" rumae mho" pho" qere- ai: thao mug' pho: ve, lho qo" zaui: mo,- no phyo: gai byid' ra" qam: so' qo" ra" mo,- su re bao" thaug' byid: ba: ra" mo,- su re khyoqhid' au: ba: she mo,- myan" aja: ja: ba: jhau: ra" mo, alhab' re yao" jo, qo mae yao: san: to: byid' ava" .
Yao: bam wa alhab' mo, lagyo: qe mangad:- Alhab' mo, lapa qe mangad:- Alhab' mo, mho" pho" qe mangad:- Alhab' mo, mug' pho: ve, lho mau" qo" zaui: mo, mangad:-
Alhab' wa no phyo: gai byid' ra" qam: so' qo" mo, mangad:- Alhab' wa myan" aja: ja: ba: jhau: ra" mo, mangad:- Myan" aja: ja" lajheim: re ba: phaug' kyo: mo, mangad: ko" ngad: ra" .
Airumung: je: akhyag: ra" jeju jhaung qhu" jham re kam" wa nhag' nghae" na ge,- Ngadqere: alhab' tho' je: ra" khyo dalam: ngo naonhaung" re ta" kyo: shinae" .
Ngo wa byu: myan" jham we' mug: lagyo: qenho: myan" jham re qo" jhau ngadqere:- jhid' de; myid mabo ngad: re wa ngo wa- thoe myang: ra" mao"- mangad: lao" jhe' cang" we' dakhyo: za: ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa lapa qo" pa mung: laba lajhao alhab' we' no; thao" ra" ja: alhab' re ba: ru we' bam re qo" qhui" pye' sho' ra" lam khug: myid bo sho' ngadqere:- jhid' de; myid mabo re wa- ngo wa pe" mangad:-
Ngo wa ngo qo" ra" jo,nho" alhab' su re gae byid' pye' mung: nga" gaung khyao re lhao" re: ngha" pye' nae" qhid' mae" ab: pye' sho' ngadqere:- jhid' de; myid mabo re wa akyu" mabo ngad: ra" .
Jhid' de; myid wa nhag' lam: qhang mung:- su re nhag' khyag' ba: ra" . Jhid' de; myid wa myid nug' ra" myid mabo ngad: ra"- maphug ngad: ra"- ngad beim" ra" myid mabo ngad: ra" .
Jhid' de; myid wa yao: myid: rumae" maqhui: makad' ngad: ra" . Yao: yao" akyu" maqho ngad: ra"- nhag' yo: nhag' gyid' makad' ngad: ra"- su: qobo re maxam" to: ngad: ra" .
Jhid' de; myid wa makhyang" rumae mabobau: ngad: ra"- ngadqere: dangman" rumae bobau" ra" .
Jhid' de; myid wa khonhae" re: qam: mashan ngad: ra"- khonhae" re: lam khug: na: ra"- khonhae" re: myid: lao" na: ra"- khonhae" re: nhag' lam: qhang: ra" .
Jhid' de; myid wa apyad ato ngad: ra" . Lapa qo" pa: ru wa dayo, daban: za: ngad: ra" . Myan" aja: ja: re qo" jhau: rure: thang: lo" byaug: li" nae"- Pha,jhi" laba lajhao re: baui" lo" li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" nho: pha,jhi" laba lajhao we' lapa qo" pa: ru wa majab byang" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ai: jab byang" ru joe" li" lao"- ai: atam" adau za: ngad: ru wa byaug: li" nae" .
Ngo zoshao ngad shi" au:- Zoshao we' dakhyo: jhau: ra" . Zoshao we' dakhyo: kham zo" ra"- zoshao we' dakhyo: myid: ra" . Ana" ngo lau: de, boe" lo lao"- ngo wa zoshao: ave, akyang re shapye' pye' ra" .
Ana" ngo wa bao tang" mae thab thab mung: myao: ra" bao lho re myao: ru we' dakhyo: za: myao: ra" . Ngadqere: azhu" lao" wa- myo,khung: zhaug' za: qo" myao: li" li" nae" . Ana" ngo ba: ru wa atam" adau za: ngad: ra"- azhu" lao" wa- Mao" So wa jab byang" sho' ngore ba: ru we' dakhyo: ngore: jab byang" sho' ba nae" . Ana" ngonhaung" myao: ruwa gyid: bao tang" mae" phabao re qab qab za: the' myao: ru we' dau: ra" ai: au: ngonhaung" wa myo, khung: te' jho" zhaug' qu" myao nae" .
Ana"- lam khug: myid- myid: lao" myid- jhid' de; myid ga" ra" gang" tang: jo; ra" ce: sam ja: jo; rumae" je: qi" thao" ru wa jhid' de; myid ngad: ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa jhid' de; myid bo nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' ge,- Byo: nho: jeju jhaung qhu" jham re kao bau obyid: na ge,- Je yang: Mao" So: mungdao: re hau" kyo" ra" Byo: jhaung qhu" re qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" kao bau obyid ge,-
Gakai: lai myan" aja: ja: jhau: ra" yaug wa- byu re jhau: ru mangad:- Mao" So re jhau: ru ngad: ra" . Yao: jhau: rure khag' maba: gyo: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa Byo: nho: qam: so' khyo" yang no; thao" ra" dangman" ra" khyo re jhau: na: ra" .
Mao" So: mungdao: re ta" hau" ra" yaug wa su re bao" thaug' byid' ra" dao:- qam: byid' ra" dao:- nhag' tang" ra" dao: re jhau: ra" .
Gakai: lai myan" aja: ja: re jhau: ra" yaug wa- yao: yao" gaung re za: bao" thaug' byid' ra" . Ngadqere: lapa pa: ra" yaug wa- ai: phung: geim" re bao" thaug' byid' ra" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" alhab' mo; gakai: lai myan" aja: ja: qo" jhau genae" rure myid: o: ra" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" lapa qo" pa genae" rure ngo je: myid: o: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re gakai: lai ra" myan" aja: ja: jhau: ra" yaug wa- Phung: geim" re bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao: jhau: ra" dao: lajheim: re pheim: kyo: byid: nae" byu mana ngad: re wa- ai: lapa qo" pa: ra" yaug jhau: ru wa gakai: lai myan" jhau: ru tho' akyu" je: qi" ra" .
Airumung:- nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo wa naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" yang: gakai: lai: ra" myan" dao: li" jhau: kyo" ngad: re wa pe" akyu" bo nae" i? Ngo ta" ra" dao: wa Mao" So: yang qhu" byid' ra" dao:- laba lajhao dao:- Byo: yang jaung" yang: ta" ra" mungdao:- mho" shid' ra" mungdao: mabo re wa dajhid' re: akyu" mabo ngad: ra" .
Khalhao:- tang: ru" ra" kao mabo: ra" zai jham re qu" ge,- aijham mae" thoe boe" boe" za: mamyang: thug' li" re wa khoyaug ai: tang:- khalhao: thoe re qo" kho' nae" i?
Ailao"- labo" re mad: ra" yaug re: thoe boe" boe" za: mamad ngad: re wa- gyekhe' poe vao nae" qhid' mae" khoyaug seim" nyhang" nae" i?
Ai we' dakhyo: nao gakai: lai myan" dao: jhau: rumae boe" boe" za: majhau re wa- nao pe" ta" na: rure khag' khoru: gai: ba: gyo: nae" i? Ni" dao: wa pe" lajheim: mathug' ngad: ra" .
Mug: myid dao mae majho" zhaung" ra" myan" dao: myo: sho' ja: jo, ngadqere:- khoja" myan" re: lajheim: mabo: ru majo, ngad: ra" .
Ngo maba: gyo" ra" myan" re jhau: ra" yaug wa- nga" qhid' mae" taung bug byu ngad mung:- ngore: yao" qhid' mae" taung bug byu ngad: li" nae"- ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Byo: nho: jeju jhaung qhu" re qo" khae: yu nae" gyai kao bau mo, ngad ko" ruyang ai: phung: qi" qhang: li" nae" rure qo" bao" thaug' byid' ra" jeju jhaung qhu" jham re qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" qam: je: ke' ge,-
Airumung: gakai: lai myan" dao: re qo" jhau: ra" yaug wa- yao: jhau: ra" dao: lajheim: re qo" pheim: kyo: nae" jeju jhaung qhu" re qo" khae: yu nae" qhid' mae" akyu" mho' ca" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa gakai: lai myan" dao: khyo" akyu" mho' ra" au:- nga" byo wa gaigai: yao: akyu" mho' ra"- ngadqere: nga" laba lajhao myid wa mabo: bo ngad: ra" .
Airulao"- ngo khoru: kad' nae" i? Nga" byo we' akyu" mho' re- nga" myid we' re: akyu" mho' nae" ngad: ra" . Nga" byo we' Nghaui"caung: re- nga" myid we' re: nghaui"caung: nae" ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa byo khyo" yang za: jeju caung: akyu" mho' ko" re wa- ai: phaung mae bobo: ra" yu" yu" byu dayaug wa- naonhaung" pe" ta" na ko" rure yao: maba lo:- naonhaung" jeju caung: akyu" mho' ra" dao: re Amen- ga: khoru: qo" bota" nae" i?
Naonhaung" Mao" So re jeju caung: akyu" mho' ra" dao: wa gyai gai sho' ngadqere:- su gaje qe: qhid' mae" dajhid' re: akyu" mabo ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa gakai: lai myan" dao: myo: sho' ja: re naonhaung" tho' je yang: qo" jhau: ruyang Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" ra" .
Ngadqere: phung: caung: pa" phaung mae gakai: lai: myan" dao: thoe taung khyo" jhau nae" tho' su gaje qere qo" mho" shid' nae" qhid' mae" qo" gai: ba: gyo" ra" mho" shid' dao: ngo" kheim: re ngo je: jhau nug: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" wa myid: qu" ra" khyo mae zoshao we' dakhyo: daboe" ge, . Makhyang" ra" khyo mae wa zoshao qe we' dakhyo: boe" mung:- myid: qu" ra" khyo mae kam" wa- lau: de, zo: qao" qe we' dakhyo: boe" ge,-
Jham: Mugsug' mae- Ngo wa nga" byu qere- gakai: lai: myan" dao: khyo" jhau nae"- Taung bug byu qe: nhad' khyo" jhau nae"- Airu: kad' re lhao" re: nga" byu qe wa- Nga" dao: re tae" gyo: genae" mangad:- ga: Asang ta" ra"- ga: tung" to" ra" .
Aimung: gakai: lai myan" dao: qo" jhau: ra" jeju jhaung qhu" wa- malam khug: ra" mo; qhid' mae" ve, so: ngad mung:- lam khug: ra" mo; qhid' mae" mangad: ngad: ra" . Mao" So: mungdao: re ta" hau" ra" jeju jhaung qhu" kam" wa- malam khug: ra" mo; qhid' mae" mangad:- lam khug: ra" mo; qhid' mae" ve, so: ngad: ra" .
Aimung: phung: geim" mae" phung: byu qe zang" ham: na yang:- yaug khao: ngo" mae gakai: lai myan" dao: jhau: na ko" au:- yu" yu" byu qe damyo"- mangad: lao"- malam khug: ra" mo, damyo"- vao li" ko" re wa- naonhaung" alhab' re ago qe ga: mata" genae" i?
Ngadqere: yaug khao: ngo" wa- Mao" So: mungdao: kho" kyo: ko" au:- malam khug: ra" byu dayaug yaug- mangad: lao"- yu" yu" byu dayaug vao li" re- mungdao: gyo" yu: ra" mathao mae- yao: yao: qobo qo" yaug ngad: rure ba: beim" li" nae" ngad: ra" . Yao: gyo" yu: gu: alhab' wa yao: re beim: nhao: li" nae" .
Yao" aung khug: nhag' lam: mae nyham" to" ra" khyo alhab' myao: thug' li" nae"- aimung:- yao: wa- Mao" So wa ce: naonhaung" phaung gaung: mae dang yao: na nhaung- ga: tau" lhang: yu yang:- goe; gyo" mung: Mao" So re caung: pa" li" nae" ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" Mao" So re caung: pa" nae" zang" ham: na gelao"- dayaug wa caung: khin" dao:- gatau dayaug wa mho" shid' dao:- dayaug wa Mao" So mae" qhu" lho byid' ra" mungdao:- gatau dayaug wa gakai: lai myan" dao: re jhau- dayaug wa ai: dao: jham: lajheim: re pheim: kyo" ra" dao: jham re jhau yang: caung: pa" genae" rure ngo ta" nug: ru ngad:- Kad' ra" khyo ja: khao: ngo" wa ai: phung: re bao" thaug' akyu" byid' ru ngad ca" ra" .
Dayaug yaug gakai: lai myan" dao: jhau nae" lao" shid' yaug- mangad: lao"- sam yaug mae" malai lo:- dayaug: thao dayaug jhau mung:- gatau dayaug wa ai: myan" dao: lajheim: re pheim: kyo: vashao:-
Ngadqere: ai: phung: mae myan" dao: re qo" pheim: kyo" ra" yaug mabo ngad: re wa- lag lai" myan" dao: jhau: ra" yaug wa sae za: na mung:- yao: yao: za: jhau yang:- Mao" So we' jhau: na vashao:-
Shid' yaug mangad: lao"- sam yaug Mao" So: mungdao: ta" mung:- gaje qe wa yao: bam pe" ta" na: rure gyo" kin: na vageshao:-
Ngadqere: ai: ham phaung mae zaung: jo; ra" byu dayaug yaug Mao" So mae" mungdao: qo" khae: yu: ngad: re azhao sao qhid' jhau: na: ra" yaug wa thang vashao:-
Yaug khao: ngo" wa zhao: yu: rumung:- qam: qo" genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" alhab' mo; dayaug: thao dayaug Mao" So: mungdao: ta" kyo: ge, .
Mungdao: kho" kyo" ra" jeju jhaung qhu" wa- mungdao: ta" ra" yaug: nho: eib: ra" qao: mae ngad: jo, ca" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re abyi asin: boe" nhao nug yaug mangad:- Jho" nyang: rure we' yaug yo: rure o yaug ngad: ra" . Mao" So: phung: alhab' mae phug' cao" ra" lai we' dakhyo:-
Myiqe: qe wa caung: pa" phaung mae sae za: na: jo, vageshao:- yao: bam wa dao: jhau nae" akhang" maqo" ngad: ako" . Yuda byu qe: tarha" mae ta" to" ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam wa au: she mo, magai: boe" ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam daja: ja" khyo re ba nug geyang: ngad: re wa- yham mae yao: bam: yham sang pho" qere myid' yu vageshao:- pe"mung: ga"re myiqe: dayaug phung" nho: phaung mae dao: jhau: ru wa aqho' axag' ngad: ra" .
Mao" So: mungdao: wa naonhaung" jhao" mae" sao qhid' thug' li" ru ngad: ra" i? Mangad: lao"- ai wa naonhaung" jhao" za: joe" li" ru ngad: ra"i?
Khag' ngadqere: yao: yao" gaung re Mao" So: lagyo: ngad:- ga: myid: jho: ra" yaug- mangad: lao"- Byo: nho: jeju jhaung qhu" re qo" yaug ngad:- ga: myid: jho: ra" yaug ngad: re wa- ngo wa ce: vhin tung" re Mao" So: amyin" khyo" tung" ke' ru ngad:- ga" rure ba beim: vashao:-
Ngadqere: yao: wa ce: mugsug' re pe" xan: masun: ngad: re wa yao: ta" rure datae" gyo: ge,-
Amung: nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Mao" So: mungdao: ta" hau" rure naonhaung" nhag' lam: mae kao bau obyid: na ge, . Alao"- gakai: lai myan" dao: re jhau: rure re: datam" pye' ge,-
Ja: khao: ngo" re nyang: vang" ru we' dau: ra" khyo" phug' cao" na ge, .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo naonhaung" re kho" kyo: byid: yang: naonhaung" khae: yu mung: gang: gang: tang tang khyo" lam khug: lo ko" ra" ai: Lau Dao: Gai re ngo naonhaung" re dam: myid: beim: nhao nug: ra" .
Aiwa ngo naonhaung" re kho" kyo" ra" mungdao: ngaui bau" lau dao: ngad: ra"- naonhaung" wa ai: ngaui bau" lau dao: re tang za: zaui" ci ko" ngad: re wa- ai: khyo" yang naonhaung" khyad' yu: ru qhug' li" genae" . Airu: mangad: re wa naonhaung" lam khug: ru wa akeim za: ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa ngoyao: qo" khae: yu: ra" akhyag: thao" ra" khyo re naonhaung" jhao" kai" byid' ke' ru ngad: ra" . Airu wa Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo:- Khristu wa ngonhaung" qhid' mae" shid kham: byid: va" ra" .
Yao: wa nyhab' shaung: pye' ru qhug' mung:- Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo:- sam ba thao re yao: wa dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' ava" .
Yao: wa Petru re na: qhu" mung:- ai: thao lagyo: daxe: shid' yaug re na: qhu" byid' ra" .
Ai: thao yao: wa yao" thao cao" ko" ra" mo, byu ngo" yo zo: re dalhang: dae na: qhu" byid' ra" . Ai bam mae" myo: phyao: ana" ba joe" sho' daui: na: ashiko" . Daqhae: kam" wa shid: byaug: avako" .
Amung: ai: thao re Yaku re yao" gaung na: qhu" mung:- ai: thao lagyo: qe alhab' mo; re na: qhu" byid' ra" .
Lo" thao" mae ba na mange; ru khau: li" ra" yaug we' dau: ra" ngo rere: na: qhu" byid' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa lagyo: qe alhab' mae ngai: thao" ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Mao" So: phung: re yhin" lo yaug ngad: ruyang ngo wa lagyo: ein: mhang" nae" lhao" re: man: qi" yaug mangad:-
Ngadqere: Mao" So: jeju khyo" yang ngo wa ana" ru: boe" na: ru we' yao: ngore byid' ra" nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa- aje amyid maboe" pye' ngad: ra" . Ngo wa lagyo: gaje qe tho' qam: ke' yang: mau" zaui: so" ra"- Airu: qo" zaui: so" ru wa- ngoyao" qam: so' khyo" yang mangad:- Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" yang za: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ngokhyo" ngad: re ngad- lagyo: gaje qe yao: bam khyo" ngad: re ngad- ngonhaung" alhab' mo, kho" kyo" ru wa- ceru ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" re: ce: rure lam" avako" .
Ana" Khristu wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ra" khyo re ngonhaung" mungdao: kho" kyo" na: re- naonhaung" mae" daqhae: wa- shid: ra" mo, dam: daui: to" li" nae" khyo majo,- ga: khoru: mung: ta" na ko" i?
Ai: khyo gaigai: dang: ngad: re wa Khristu wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao ru maqhug' shingad: ra" .
Yesu wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru maqhug' shingad: re wa- ngonhaung" kho" kyo: nae" pe" majo; ru we' naonhaung" lam" nae" re: pe" majo, ngad: ra" .
Aitho' mago" shid: ra" mo, wa dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru majo, ga" ra" dao: dang: ngad: re wa- Mao" So wa Khristu re shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao nae" mangad:- Airumung: Mao" So wa Khristu re shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao ava" ga:- kho" kyo: mo, ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: khyo re mhug' ta" ra" mo, ngad: ru de: de: ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re shid: ra" mo, dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru maqhug' ngad: re wa- Khristu re: dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' nae" mangad: .
Khristu wa dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru maqhug' ngad: re wa- naonhaung" lam khug: rure: shad' nghung" ru we' naonhaung" wa naonhaung" yao" qobo khug mae nab; jo; ashiko" .
Ailao"- Khristu re lam khug yang: shid: lo" byaug ra" mo, re: jeim" byaug va" ga" ra" lajheim: thug' ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa- ana" ce: pyad mae za: Khristu khug mae myid: lao" nae" khyo qo" bam: ngad: re wa- mug: myid dao mae" byu gaje yaug khao: ngo" tho' mae jeyang: sho: jhin: ra" mo, ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: dangman" ru wa- Khristu wa shid: rumae" dang za: dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' ava"- amung: Khristu mae yab; pyo" jo; ra" mo, re: dam: daui: to" li' nae" ngad:- ga" rure pakham: qo" nhao: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re shid: ru wa byu dayaug: mathao mae boe" li" ru we' dakhyo:- byu dayaug: mathao mae shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ru boe" li" ra" .
Byu alhab' mo; wa Adam: we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, geyang:- shid ko" ru we' dakhyo:- Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, ko" ra" khyo" yang alhab' mo; wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' li" genae" .
Ngadqere: yaug khao: ngo" wa yao: yao" agu ang: ra" khyo" daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' li" genae" . Khristu wa sao qhid' mae daui: to" li" mung:- ai: thao re Khristu dam: joe" li" ra" ba na mae wa yao: we' sin" ra" yao" byu qe dam: daui: to" li" genae" ngad: ra" .
Ai: thao re- lo" thao" ba na joe" li" li" nae" . Ailao"- Khristu wa eib: na: ra" byo jham alhab'- kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, alhab'- qam: so' bo: ra" mo, alhab' re aung doe; pye' mung:- Mung"dan: re Mao" So: lo, khyo ab byid' li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa gyevo alhab' re aung: pye' yang:- yao: bam re Khristu nho: khyid vo: qao: mae to: byid' ra" ba na joe" sho' Khristu eib: na ca" ra" .
Lo" thao" khyo" aung: pye' nae" ra" gyevo wa- shid: ru ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- jham: mugsug' mae Mao" So wa ja: khao: ngo" re yao" khyid qao: mae ke' to: byid' ra"- ga: bo: ra" . Ja: khao: ngo" ga" ra" dao: mae- ja: khao: ngo" re Khristu khyid qao: mae ke' byid' ra" Mao" So yao: yao: mabobo: ru wa de: de: za: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ja: khao: ngo" re Khristu eib: ra" qao: mae to: byid: thao re Yao: Zo: yao: yao: re: ja: khao: ngo" re yao" khyid qao: mae ke' byid' ra" Mao" So: qao: mae na mung:- Mao" So wa alhab' dao mae bin sho' eib: na: li" nae" .
Shid: ra" mo; qhid' mae" gaung tha"- qid nyhab' kham: yu: ra" mo; khyo wa khoru i? Pe" akyu" qo" nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam myid: lao" yang:- airu: kad' ako" i? Su daqhae: ta" ko" ru we' dakhyo:- shid: ra" mo, wa madam: daui: to" li" lo genae"- ga" ra" dao: dang: ngad: re wa- shid: ra" mo; qhid' mae" gaung tha"- yao: bam pe"mung: qid nyhab' kham: yu ko" laug i?
Ngonhaung" yao: ngonhaung" re qu" gelang: ga" re pe"mung: yo, qug khao: ngo" mae- kao so' re dan: pye' yang: shid gyan nogyan re thaung" qhug' na zo" re" qam: ke' na geli" i?
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo wa shid ru we' ba khao: ba ngo" thaung" qhug' na: ra" . Ngonhaung" Asang Khristu Yesu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe; ra" kao so' daui khyo mae ngo naonhaung" mathao mae qo" phug: ruyang cedao: ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa byu xao su: shad' khyo" ta" gelang: ga" re- Ephesu vogaung: mae gug' nyhug' lae" we' ngo jho" se' ru wa- pe" akyu" bo nae" i? Shid: ra" mo, madam: daui: to" li" nae" ngad: re wa- dao: khyo: we' dakhyo:- Zo: gelang:- shaug' gelang:- ngonhaung" ne, mo" ba shid zai ngad:-
Damyid: nghung: ge,- magai ra" byin cao: qe wa gai: ra" ave, akyang re phyo' qheim" pye' byid' ako" .
Dam: beim: so: ge,- Qobo lo, mau" jham re thang: pye' ge,- naonhaung" mae" damyo" wa Mao" So re maba ngad: ako" . Naonhaung" gyo" qho' geshao:- ein: ngo ceru: ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Dayaug yaug wa- Aire- shid: ra" mo, khoru: qo" dam: daui: to" li" nae" i? Yao: bam khoru" ra" gaung khyao we' ngad genae" i? ga: myid' li" nae" .
Ago we"- myid gaung mae nao qho" ke' ra" myug: shi: wa- maqeim: lo" byaug: re wa maqo" yaug: thug' li" ngad: ra" .
Nao qho" ke' ra" myug: shi: wa- jung: gaug shi:- mangad: lao"- gatau qhovo: shi: daja: ja: za: ngad: ra"- thao re yaug: li" nae" ra" agae re yao: nao maqho: ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa ai: myug: shi: re yao: myid: o: ra" agae azang byid' ra" . Yao: wa myug: shi: ce' khao: ngo" re yao: we' dau: ga" ra" agae azang byid' ra" .
Gaung sho: bo yang: daui: na: ra" ja: na mana alhab' wa sho: daja: za: mangad: ngad: ako" . Xao su byu qe: sho: daja:- gug' nyhug' jham: sho: daja:- ngho' jham: sho: daja:- ngo: sho: wa gatau daja: ngad: ra" .
Amung:- mug: gaung we' sin" ra" gaung khyao jham we' myid gaung we' sin" ra" gaung khyao jham ga:- jo; ra" . Mug: gaung we' sin" ra" gaung khyao jham: yaung" shab: ru we' myid gaung we' sin" ra" gaung khyao jham yaung" shab ru majho" dau ngad: ako" .
Ba yaung" shab: ru dakhyo"- lho" yaung" shab: ru daja:- kyi jham: yaung" shab: ru wa gatau daja: ngad: ra" . Kyi jham: phaung mae lhao" re:- dace' we' dace' yaung" shab: ru majho" dau ngad: ako" .
Shid: ra" mo, dam: daui: to" li" nhao: rumae re:- ce we' dakhyo: ngad: li" nae" . Gaung khyao wa nyhab' pye' ru qhug' ra" au:- shid ba: ra" gaung khyao ngad: ra" . Dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' lao" wa- shid maba: ra" gaung khyao ngad: li" nae" .
Nyhab' ke' ra" au: wa- qu" cae: qu" yao ngad: ru we' qam: nang" ra" . Dam: daui: to" li" nhao lao" wa- yaung" shab: ru we' qam: bo: ru ngad: li" nae" .
Nyhab' ke' ra" au: wa- gaung sho: gaung khyao ngad: ra" . Dam: daui: to" li" lao" wa- byo gaung khyao ngad: li" nae" . Gaung sho: gaung khyao jo; ru we' dakhyo:- byo gaung khyao re: jo, nae" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re jham: mugsug' mae- sao qhid' mae" byu Adam: wa kao so' daui: ra" byu boe" li" ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" . Thao mae" Adam: wa kao so' byid' ra" Byo ngad: ra" .
Byo we' sin" ra" gaung khyao shi" sao qhid' boe" ru mangad:- gaung sho: we' sin" ra" gaung khyao shi" sao qhid' boe" mung:- thao re byo we' sin" ra" gaung khyao boe" ru ngad: ra" .
Sao qhid' Adam re wa myid zhai" yang phan" to: mung:- myid gaung mae" li" ra" . Thao mae" Adam wa mug: gaung: mae" li" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ai: myid gaung we' sin" ra" byu qe wa- myid zhai" yang phan" to" ra" yaug we' dau: ako" . Mug: gaung we' sin" ra" byu qe wa- mug: gaung mae" li" ra" yaug we' dau: ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa myid zhai" yang phan" to" ra" yaug we' dau: ra" akhyao re zhaung" ve; ci: ru we' dakhyo:- mug: gaung mae" li" ra" yaug we' dau: ra" akhyao rere: ngonhaung" zhaung" ve; cili" nae" ngad: ra" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo naonhaung" re ta" geli" . Sho: we' sa: wa Mao" So: mung"dan: re maqo" sang: yu ngad: ra" . Shid: qeim: lo" ba: ra" akhyao wa shid: qeim: lo" maba: ra" akhyao re maqo" sang: yu ngad: ra" .
Ce: no; thao" ra" dangman" ra" khyo re tae" gyo" yu ge,- ngonhaung" alhab' wa- mashid nae"-
Lo" thao" ra" labo" myang: thug' li" lao"- damyo, nyag mae ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa tha" lo" byaug nae" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ai: labo" thoe myang: thug' li" lao"- shid: ra" mo, wa dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' mung:- khonhae" re: madam: shid logenae" . Ngonhaung" alhab' wa tha" lo" byaug nae" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re bab: qeim: lo" ba: ru wa- maba: bab: qeim: lo" ru khyo- shid ba: ru wa- maba: shid: ru khyo tha" lo" li" nae" .
Bab: qeim: lo" ba: ru wa- maba: bab: qeim: lo" ru khyo- shid ba: ru wa- shid: maba: ru khyo tha" lo" byaug lao"- shid: ru wa aung doe; ruyang myug: pye' ru qhug' ava"- ga: ta" ra" jham: dao: jab byang" lo: li" nae" .
Shid: ru we"- ni" aung doe; ru wa khai: mae i? Shid: ru we"- ni" daug wa khai: mae ngad: ra" i?
Shid: ru: nho: daug wa qobo ngad: ra" . Qobo wa kham" to" ra" tarha" mae" qam: so' qo" yu: ra" .
Ngadqere: Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang ngonhaung" re aung doe; ru byid' ra" Mao" So: jeju wa qi" qhang: jo; ra" wo" .
Airumung: nga" jhid' de; ra" mao: nhaung: qe we"- gang: tang za: ye; jo, ge,- Asang: nho: mau" zo" re vin vo; ru wa- aje amyid mangad' rure beim: mung:- Asang: qhid' mae" khonhae" re: qam: ke' na ge, .
Ana"- Yuda mung" mae na ko" ra" Mao" So: byu qere bao" thaug' nae" qhid' mae" Alu: ngaui khyui nae" ru we' sin: yang: Galati mung" mae" phung: jham re ngo pyang: to: co' ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re: kad' ge,-
Ngo joe" li" ra" au: re Alu: ngaui khyui: zhang" yu maqo nae" qhid' mae"- Laban ba- ba khao: ngo" mae naonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" wa- yao: yao" vao ngaui myo" ru- nang" rure cao" yang: Alu: ngaui qaung" to: lao: ge,-
Ngo joe" li" lao"- bang" se" mugsug' tung" yang: naonhaung" san: to" ra" mo, re naonhaung" byid' ra" Alu: ngaui jhaung qhu" jham re Yerusalem khyo dai" nhao: ke' nae" .
Ngo yao: ye" lo" nae" qhid' mae" ang yang: ngad: re wa- yao: bam ngo we' daga" qo" ye" lo" li" genae" .
Ngo wa Makedoni mung" khyo" naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" nae" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngo Makedoni mung" khaung: khyo" kho' lai: ye" lo" ca" ra" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" we' dayo, daban: ko qo" na maba . Gyo, yo, geim" ngad: re ngad nae" . Ai: thao re ngo dam: xo' ye" lo" nug: ra" jo, qo khyo ye" lo" ra" gyaung: khyo qhid' mae" naonhaung" ngore qo" bao" thaug' ke' li" genae" .
Ngo wa- naonhaung" we' su" lai: lo" zo" dazab zo: za: jho" qhug' nae" manug . Mao" So qad: ngad: re ngo naonhaung" we' daga" dayo, daban: ko qo" na nae" rure ngo myid: lao" ra" .
Ana" wa ngo- ce: Ephesu vogaung: mae Pentikoti poe joe" lo sho' thang: na nae" .
Ce: vogaung: mae ngore gye kad' ra" mo, myo: sho' na yang: re:- mau" zo" zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" gaigai: yao: gyai qi" ra" agu gai jo; ra" .
Timothi naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" yang: ngad: re lalam lanyoe: lham: tug: yu ge,- pe"mung: ga"re yao: re: ngo we' dakhyo:- Asang: mau" zo" re vin vo; yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: re khag' re: daqu" ngai ge,- yao: ngojhao" yaug yo za: dam: qo" tug' joe" lo nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" wa yao" gyaung: khyo re bao" thaug' byid: ge,- pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa- mao: nhaung: qe we' dam: tug' joe" lo nae" rure ngo myid: lao" na: ra" .
Ana"- mao: nhaung: pho" Apolo khyo we' sin: yang:- ngo wa yao: re gatau: mao: nhaung: qe we' daga" naonhaung" jhao" li" qhug' nae" qhid' mae" re: khyao ta" jhan: va" . Ngadqere:- ana" au: ye: maang shi:- ga: yao: myid: ra" . Thao re agu ang lao" yao: li" li" nae" .
Lha" yang: na ge,- lam khug: myid mae tang za: ye; jo, ge, . Mazag mavae myid bo ge, . Qam: bo ge, .
Naonhaung" nho: mau"zo" alhab' re jhid' de; myid we' zaui: so: ge,-
Naonhaung" wa Stephan: we' yao" yham byu qere ba: ako" . Yao: bam wa Akhaia mung" mae" sao qhid' phaug' lo: ra" Khristan phung: byu qe ngad mung:- Mao" So: byu qere caung da" ra" mau" zo" re zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam yao" gaung re qhaug' byid' to" ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" wa airu" ra" byu qe- jhui" au: she: ra" qao: mae re:- yao: bam we' daga" mau" bovin vo; ra" mo; qao: mae re: na mung: yao: bam: ceim" shid' ra" khyo mae phug' cao" genae" qhid' mae" ngo naonhaung" re mho' ke' ra" .
Ngo wa Stephan- Fotunatu- Akhaiku bam joe" lo gemung: ngaui bau" ra" . Yao: bam wa naonhaung" maqo" kad' ra" ja: kad' byid' ako" .
Yao: bam wa naonhaung" re bau: nhao: ru we' dakhyo:- ngo rere: bau: nhao: ako" . Airu" mo, wa phug' te' byid: nae" man: qi" ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Asia mung" khaung: mae" phung: jham naonhaung" re au" ke' ako"- Akula we' Priskila tao we' yao: shid' tao: yham mae caung: pa" ham: phaung: na ko" ra" phung: byu qere:- Khristan jhid' de; myid we' au" ke' ako" .
Cetau mae na ko" ra" mao: nhaung: qe alhab' mo, re: au" ke' ako" . Naonhaung" yao: cao: gyang" lho" ra" bobaug baug: ra" lai we' jho" au" ge,-
Ngo Polu wa- ngoyao" lo; yang yao: Polu mae" au" dao: ein: tung" ke' ra" .
Asang re majhid' de; ra" yaug khag' ngadqere:- yao" au: dao mae nhang: kheim: zao" vashao:- Marana tha- Ngonhaung" Asang we" joe" li" ri:-
Asang Yesu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa- naonhaung" we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao:-
Nga" jhid' de; myid wa- Yesu Khristu khug mae naonhaung" alhab' we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" . Amen .
Mao" So myid o: ru khyo" yang Khristu nho: lagyo: dayaug ngad: ra" ngo Polu we' ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" Timothi wa- Korinthu vogaung: mae na ko" ra" Mao" So: phung: byu qere we' Akhaia mung" geim" mae" Mao" So: byu qe alhab' re Mugsug' tung" ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" pho" Mao" So we' Asang Yesu Khristu wa nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' yaug yo: ru naonhaung" re shaman" byid: vageshao: wo"-
Bao" thaug' khyo alhab' re byid' ra" Pho"- nhag' khyag' shogu: ra" Pho"- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu yao: Pho" ngad: ra" Pho" Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" gelang:-
Ngonhaung" yao: qo" khae: yu va" ra" Mao" So mae" joe" li" ra" bao" thaug' byid' rure ci yang: qug: khai: aja: ja: qhug' ko" ra" mo, re qo" bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa ngonhaung" qug: khai: qhug' ra" khyo alhab' mae bao" thaug' byid' ava" .
Ngonhaung" wa Khristu kham zo" ra" qug: khai: dayin dayo: myo: sho' re bokham zo" ru we' dakhyo:- Khristu khyo" yang Mao" So nhag' tang" byid' rure re: bokham: yu: bam va" .
Ngonhaung" wa ai: qug: khai: dayin dayo: re kham zo" ru ngad: re ai: ru wa naonhaung" bao" thaug' byid' ru we' khyad' yu: ra" khyo qhug' yu nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Bao" thaug' byid' rure ngonhaung" qo" kham: yu: ngad: re wa- naonhaung" re: bao" thaug' byid' ru qhug' mung:- aijham ngonhaung" kham zo" ra" qug: khai: dayin dayo: nhag' lam: qhang: ru we' re: qo" zang: kham: ra" qam: so' qo" yu genae" .
Naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" kham zo" ra" qug: khai: dayin dayo: re bokham zo: vako" ru we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" qo" kham: yu: ra" nhag' tang" byid' rure re: naonhaung" boqo" kham: yu vako" rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" . Airumung: naonhaung" mae ngonhaung" nho: myid: lao" ru wa khonhae" re: gyag maqui: ngad: ra" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- Asia mung" mae ngonhaung" khoru" ra" qug: khai: kham zo" lo: ra" khyo ngonhaung" naonhaung" re ta" peim: kyo: nug: ra" . Ngonhaung" dao mae kai" jo; ra" qo wa aiqhi" saung" la: yang: kao so' xo' daui: na nae" lhao" re: matho' the' myid ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa shid nae" dao: phyid' qhug' mo, ngad: ra" khyo" yao: yao" gaung re myid: jho: to: va" . Ngadqere: ceru: boe" ru wa- ngonhaung" nho: qam: re malam mangha lo:- shid: ra" mo, re daui: to" li" nhao: ra" Mao" So re ngonhaung" lam ngha nae" qhid' mae" boe" ru ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa airu" ra" gyaug ci" ca" ra" shid gyan nogyan mae" ngonhaung" re khyad' yu: ava" . Thao rere: Ngonhaung" re dam: khyad' yu: li" nae" . Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" akyu" bao" mho' byid' ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" re joe" lo nae" ayo, mae dam: khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" yao: mae ngonhaung" myid: lao" na: ra" .
Amung: ngonhaung" qhid' mae" myo: sho' akyu" bao" mho' byid' ra" thoe re tau: byid: mung: Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re shaman" byid: yang: ngonhaung" qo" kham: yu: ra" shaman" jeju mathao mae byu myo: sho' mo, wa Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" byid' li" genae" .
Byu: Pha,jhi" khyo" mangad: lo:- Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju qam: so' khyo" yang- ngonhaung" ce: mug: myid dao mae kao so' daui: na: au:- je yang: ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" we' zam" khug: na: rumae Mao" So: yang byid' ra" nhag' lam: phyu jao din: man" ru de: de: za: jhau: ra" ave, re cao" yang: ngonhaung" we' zam" khug: na: bam: ra" khyo re ngonhaung" aung khug mae de: de: za: phug nae" khyo jo; ra" .
Naonhaung" qo" ba: nghe' mung:- ba: gyo" ra" khyo re za: ngonhaung" tung" ke' ra" .
Ngadqere: ana"- naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" ta" ru dakhyae: dapho za: ba: gyo" ako" . Ngadqere: ngonhaung" ta" ra" khyo jab sho' naonhaung" ba: gyo" li" genae" qhid' mae" ngo myid: lao" ra" . Aimung: ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Ba Na mae ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" mathao mae qo" phug mo, ngad nae" ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re: ngonhaung" mathao mae qo" phug mo, ngad: li" genae" .
Ceru re ngo gyai nhag' lam: nyo, beim: mung:- naonhaung" shid' lhang kai" yang: shaman" jeju qo" kham zo: genae" qhid' mae" sao qhid' ngo naonhaung" re li" qhug' nae" qhid mae" byin seim" pye' va" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- Makedoni mung" khyo ye" lo" zo" mae" naonhaung" re vao: qhug' co' yang:- dam: phao: lo phyao: lodam: vao mung: Yuda mung" khyo lo" ra" nga" gyaung: khyo qhid' mae" naonhaung" mae" bao" thaug' ru mho' nae"- ein: ngo myid: to"-
Ceru: seim" to" ra" khyo wa nga" myid atug' akhyug kad' qhu" ru ngad: i? Ngo seim" to" ra" au:- ngoyao" qhid' mae" za: myid yang:- ayo, dalam: mae za: nga" dao: wa ngad:- ga: ta" mung: mangad:- ga: shid' gao ta" ru ngad: i?
Gaigai: Mao" So wa dangman" ra" dao: re jhau yaug ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- ngo naonhaung" re byid' ra" dao: so: re: ngad:- mangad: ga" ra" dao: shid' gao mangad:-
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" phaung mae ngo yao: we' Sila- Timothi kho" kyo" ra" Mao" So: yao: zo: Yesu Khristu wa- ngad: ru we' mangad' ru ga: dalhang: dae ta" yaug mangad:- yao: wa Mao" So: ngad:- ga" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yao: wa- Mao" So: dao: so: alhab' nho: ngad:- ga" ra" atha" ngad: ra" . Airu: mung: Mao" So: phungbao bao: thug' li" nae" qhid' mae" Yesu Khristu re khug ngha yang:- Amen ein: ta" na: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" we' naonhaung" re daga" Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: kao so' daui nhao: ra" yaug wa- Mao" So yao: yao: ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" re gakai: lai khyin: san: yu mung:- yao" byu qekhyo" dazid thaung" te' to" ra" yaug we' ngonhaung" qhid' mae" yao: zam" to: byid' ra" shaman" jeju alhab' qhid' mae" ama, kham: khyo"- ngonhaung" nhag' lam: khug mae Gyang" Lho" Byo ke' to: byid: yaug re: Mao" So yao: ngad: ra" .
Ngo Korinthu vogaung: khyo mali" nae" myid: phyid' ru wa- naonhaung" qhid' mae" ku yang: ngad: rure Mao" So nga" sagse: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa nga" nhag' lam: re ba byid' ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" pe" re lam khug ca"- ein: ra" khyo re amyin" byid: nae" qam: ke' na: ru mangad:- naonhaung" wa lam khug: rumae tang tang za: ye; jo, mo, ngad ko" rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" . Amung: ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" yao" ngaui bau: khyo qhid' mae" naonhaung" we' daga" mau" zaui" na: ru angad: .
Airumung:- naonhaung" nhag' kaug' khyo mathug' nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" jhao" madam: li" nae" ngo myid: phyid' to: va" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo naonhaung" re nhag' kaug' nhao: ngad: re wa- ngoyang nhag' kaug' nhao: ra" yaug mae" je yang:- ngore khag' yang bau: nhao lo nae" i?
Ngo re ngaui bau: nhao nae" ang ko" ra" mo, khyo" yang ngore nhag' makaug' nhao genae" qhid' mae" ai: mugsug' re ngo naonhaung" jhao" tung" vhin: ke' ru ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngo bau: lao" wa- naonhaung" alhab' mo, re: bau: genae" rure ngo khyag' ba: ra" .
Ngo wa gyai qi: sho' myid: qug: myid: ci" ru we' ngug byid myo: sho' gyo" yang:- naonhaung" jhao" mugsug' tung" ke' ru ngad:- ngo myid: qang: ru wa naonhaung" re nhag' kaug' nhao nae" qhid' mae" mangad:- naonhaung" alhab' mo, re ngo khoqhi" sho' jhid' de;- ga" rure naonhaung" re myid: beim: nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Ana" byu dayaug yaug ngore kaug' nhao: ru wa- ngore za: mangad:- naonhaung" alhab' mo, re nang" thao" daja: ja: khyo" yang kaug' nhao: ru ngad: ra" . ( Ngo ceru: ta" ru wa yao: re qobo la: sho' vhin nug yang: mangad: )
Naonhaung" myo: lo bug: yang yao: re airu: qobo dae byid: vako" ru wa- yao" qhid' mae" ga" va" ra" .
Ana" kam" wa aiyaug gyai nhag' lam: gyoe, sho' makaug' byaug nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" wa yao: re qobo khyad' pye' byid: mung:- yao: re qam: byid:- nhag' tang" byid: ge,-
Airumung: naonhaung" yao: re gaigai: yao: jhid' de; rure yao: re ba nhao genae" qhid' mae"ngo naonhaung" re mho' ke' ra" .
Ngo naonhaung" re ai: mugsug' tung" vhin: ke' ru wa- naonhaung" wa ai: jham" qu" rure khoqhi" sho' qo" kham ko" rure re:- nga" mho dao: re phug' cao" nae" khonhae" re: jin" jin" ngad- mangad: ko" rure ngo ba nug yang: tung" ke' ru ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" dayaug yaug re yao: shad' ra" qobo khyad' byid: yang: ngad: re ngore: yao: re qobo khyad' byid' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re dayaug yaug re ngo dang za: daja: ja: qobo khyad' byid: qo yang: ngad: re naonhaung" qhid' mae" Khristu nho: qhid' kheim: mae ngo khyad' pye' byid' ra" .
Airu: kad' ru wa Satan wa ngonhaung" re maaung: pye' nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa satan" nho: myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo jham re ba: ra" .
Khristu nho: khyo Lau Dao: Gai re kho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" Troa vogaung: khyo ngo joe" ye" lo" re- Asang wa ai: mae mau" zo" zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" khyo kham: phung" to: byid' rure ngo myao: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo wa- ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" Titu re mayemyao yang:- gyai myid myo: myid: ci" pye' ra" . Airumung: ngo wa- ai: vogaung: mae" mo, re au" to: co' yang: Makedoni mung" khyo xo' ye" lo" va" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" ge, Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, nhao yang:- kyam: byu qekhyo"- Khristu nho: aung doe; poe mae- poe gaung: mae jhui" yan" lhau: ra" kyam: byu qere ru: khonhae" re: ngonhaung" re bojhui" yan" lhau: ra" . Mao" So wa Khristu we' sin" ra" laba lajhao re nae pyo" ra" sheim we' dakhyo:- khyi" khao: ngo" mae nae: hau" lo" nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" re ci yhung" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa- khyad' yu: ru qhug' ra" mo; phaung mae re:- byaug: lo" ra" mo; phaung mae re:- nae: hau" lo" ra" Khristu yang qhaug' byid' ra" nae pyo" ra" sheim we' dau: ra" .
Byaug; lo" na: ra" mo; qhid' mae" ai: sheim wa- shid nhao: ra" bab sheim ngad mung:- khyad' yu: ru qhug' ra" mo; qhid' mae"- ai: sheim wa kao so' daui nhao: ra" nae pyo" ra" sheim ngad: ra" . Airulao" ceru" ra" lo, mau" re khag' qo" kad' i?
Ngonhaung" wa gaje qe myo: sho' we' dakhyo:- Mao" So: mungdao: re gau xoe" ra" xan: re we' dakhyo:- phaga: ga: aung: zo: mo, mangad:- ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: yang nhao: ke' mo, ngad yang:- Khristu nho: daui daui mo, khyo" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae Mungdao: re dang dangman: man: za: kho" kyo" ra" mo, ngad: .
Ceru: ta" ru wa- ngonhaung" wa ngonhaung" yao" khyo re phug: ru ngad: ra" i? Gaje qe we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" jhao" pakham: mugsug' cili" qo: i? Mangad: lao"- naonhaung" mae" pakham: mugsug' ngonhaung" mho' yu qo: i?
Naonhaung" wa byu alhab' mo, ba: nghe' mung: ba: gyo" yu nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: mae tung" to" ra" ngonhaung" qo" ra" pakham: mugsug' yao: ngad: ako" .
Mugsug' ceru re Khristu yao: tung" mung:- ngonhaung" lo, khyo" vhin: ke' ru ngad: ra" khyo de: de: za: ngad: ra" . Ai: tung" ce' wa mhaug' yang tung" ru mangad:- Kao so' daui: ra" Mao" So: Byo: yang tung" to" ru ngad: ra" . Ai: tung" ce' wa laug pye: dao mae tung" to" ra" tung" ce' mangad:- Xao su byu: aung khug nhag' lam: mae tung" to" ra" tung" ce' ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" ceru: ta" ru wa- ngonhaung" wa Khristu khyo" yang Mao" So: khug mae lam: na mo, ngad yang:- ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa ce: mau" zo" re qo" zaui: so: mo, ngad: ein:- ta" nae" khyo ngonhaung" mae pe" qam: o: mabo ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" qo" ra" qam: o: wa Mao" So byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa ngonhaung" re ai: dao: thang" asag' nho: daui daui mo, boe" nae" qhid' mae" qam: o: byid' to" ra" . Ai: dao: thang" asag' wa- tung" to" ra" tarha" mangad:- Byo: nho: tarha" ngad: ra" . Ai: tung" to" ra" tarha" wa shid nhao: ra" . Byo kam" wa kao so' byid' ra" .
Laug pye: dao mae kyaung: yang: tung" te' to" ra" tarha" re byid' ra" au:- Mao" So: phungbao bao: thug' li" ra"- ai: bao qhui: ru wa- Moshe nho: myo,nho mae" sham: lo" na sho' ngadqere:- Myo: sho' bao qhui: na shi" ruyang Israel byumyu" qe wa yao: re maqo" zhaug' qu" ngad: ako" . Shid nhao: ra" tarha" re byid' ra" au: re lhao"- airu" ra" phungbao we' qam: so' we' ngad: re wa-
Byo: nho: lo, mau" we' sin" ra" phungbao wa- khoqhi" sho' je yang: bao nae" i?
Byu re dao: phyid' ra" tarha" wa phungbao we' byang" jo; ngad: re wa- khyad' yu: ra" khyo re byid' ra" lo, mau" wa- khoqhi" sho' je yang: phungbao byang" jo, nae" i?
Ana" je: bao: thao" ra" phungbao mathao mae lai: lo" ra" yo, mae" gyai bao: ra" phungbao wa byaug: lo" byaug: ava" ein: gai: ta" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re dazab za: kham: ra" ja: mae phungbao bao: ngad: re wa- apyad ato dang: jo; ra" ja: mae wa khoqhi" sho' je yang: phungbao bao nae" i?
Ceru" ra" myid: lao" nae" rure ngonhaung" qo" yang:- ngonhaung" wa mazag mavae kad' ru ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Moshe we' madau- Moshe wa yao: myo,nho sham: lo" byaug: rure Israel byu qe mathe' myao genae" qhid' mae" yao" myo,khung: re pha, jad; yang nghoe' ci: ra" .
Gaigai: yao: yao: bam: nhag' lam: go: to: qhug' ako" . Ana" ba joe" sho' ai: dao: thang" axug' re nghe' gelao"- yao: bam: nhag' lam: wa ai: pha, jad: yang nghoe' to: byid' qhug' ako" . Khristu we' xo' taui: lao" za:- ai: pha, jad re khyad' pye' byid' ru qhug' ra" .
Ana" ba joe" sho' lhao" re: Moshe tarha" re yao: bam nghe' khao: ngo"- ai: pha, jad wa yao: bam: nhag' lam: re nghoe' to: byid' ashi"-
Jham: Mugsug' mae Moshe we' sin: yang: Asang shad' khyo phaug' lo lao" wa yao" pha, jad wa qhid' pye' byid' ra"- ga: tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: ai: pha, jad re qhid' pye' byid: gai: ra" ja: ngad; ra" .
Ana" cedau mae Asang ga" ru wa- Byo re ta" ru ngad: ra" . Asang: Byo na: ra" jo, qo mae loe, beim khyo jo; ra" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa- myo,khung: nghoe' re qhid' pye' mung:- Asang: nho: phungbao re tug' bao byid' ra" Byo ngad: ra" . Asang mae" byid' ra" phungbao yao: ngonhaung" re je yang: qi" ra" phungbao khyo tha" lo" byaug nhao: ra" .
Mao" So wa yao" nhag' khyag' shogu: ru we' ce: mau" zo" re zaui: so: nae" akhang" ngonhaung" re ab byid' to: mung: ngonhaung" qam: mashan .
Ngonhaung" wa anyham: avho' kad' ra" aqho' aqhid lo, mau" re to"pye' mung:- apyag' asham" lo, mau" rere: ngonhaung" makad' lo:- Mao" So: mungdao: rere: madang maman" ra" khyo" makho" kyo:- ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae dangman" ra" bo" bao khug mae kao so' daui mung:- byu yaug khao: ngo" yang lam" ra" mo, boe" nae" qhid mae" qam: ke' mung: kao so' daui: ra"
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" kho" kyo" ra" Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: wa nghoe' nyham" to" ru ngad: re wa- jeim" lo" ra" mo; qhid' mae" za: nghoe' nyham" to" ra" .
Ce: mug: myid: nho: so ngad: ra" makhyang" ra" Satan" yang yao: bam: nhag' lam: re mug: cad' mae zang" nghoe' to: byid: yang:- yao: bam malam" ko" ru ngad: ra" . Satan wa- Mao" So: khyao we' te' za: dau: ra" Khristu phungbao khyo Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: mae" bao: thug' li" mung:- yao: bam: dao mae zho: bao: jo; ra" bo" bao re yao: bam mamyao genae" qhid' mae" go: nghoe' to: byid' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa- ngonhaung" yao" khyo re kho" kyo" ru mangad:- Yesu Khristu wa Asang ngad: ra" khyo- ngonhaung" wa Yesu mathao mae naonhaung" re daui daui byid: mo, ngad: ra" khyo re ngonhaung" kho" kyo: byid' ra" .
Mug: cad' khug mae" bo" bao zho: thug' li" nae"- ga: ta" ra" Mao" So wa Khristu nho: myo, khung: mae zho: bao: jo; ra" Mao" So: phungbao: laba lajhao re ba nae" ngonhaung" nhag' lam: khug mae bao nhao: ra" yaug yao: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere:- myhao: thao" ra" qam: so' wa- ngonhaung" mae" mangad:- Mao" So mae" ngad: rure qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" ce: Byo we' sin" ra" jo,nho" qo" ra" mo, ngonhaung" wa- zhogam: ug' jham we' dau: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa dazab zab qug: khai" ru qhug' ngadqere: nhag' lam: magyug:- dalhang lhang aug' o: ngadqere:- khonhae" re: nhag' lam: mathao" .
Gyevo myo: sho' na ngadqere:- ngonhaung" wa khonhae" re: ba nam mamyaung- gyai no sho' qhug' ngadqere:- byo; qeim sho' maqhug' .
Yesu wa ngonhaung" gaung dau: mae kao so' daui: na: ru myao: thug' li" nae" qhid' mae" Yesu shid kham" ra" khyo re ngonhaung" nho: shid ba: ra" gaung khyao mae khonhae" re: vin: ci: ra" .
Yesu wa ngonhaung" nho: ce: shid ba: ra" gaung mae kao so' daui: na: ra" khyo myao: thug' li" nae" qhid' mae" Yesu mathao mae ngonhaung" wa pyad geim" khonhae" re: shid gyan nogyan qhug' ba: ra" mau" mae kao so' dan: pye' yang: kao so' daui: na: .
Ngo ta" nug: ru ceru wa- ngonhaung" mae shid: ru wa mau" zaui" na mung:- naonhaung" mae kam" wa- kao so' daui: ru mau" zaui" na: ra" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae- ngo wa lam" yang: ta" ru ngad:- ga: ta" ru we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" re: ai: lam khug: myid nho: Byo mae yao" yang ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Asang Yesu re daui: to" li" nhao: ra" Mao" So wa- ngonhaung" rere: Yesu we' daga" daui: to" li" nhao mung: naonhaung" we' daga" yao" qhid' kheim: khyo jhui" vao lo" nae" rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Cegu: alhab' wa naonhaung" akyu" qhid' mae" boe" ru ngad: ra" . Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju qo" kham zo" ra" mo, je: myo" laug; li" ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam wa Mao" So: phungbao re caung: khin" byid' ra" akyu" mho' thoe jham je yang: myo: sho' qhaug' byid' li" genae" .
Cekhyo mathao mae- ngonhaung" wa khonhae" re: qam: mashan- Ngonhaung" gaung dau: wa- zo" mae" mae" byo; qeim: lo" na ngadqere:- ngonhaung" Byo wa daba we' daba qam: sag' bo: lo: na: ra" .
Ce:- ta" mathae: ru we' dazab daso' za: ngonhaung" kham zo" ra" qug: khai: wa- ai: qug: khai: tho' qi" qhang: ra" apyad ato: phungbao re je: laug sho' kham zo: nhao: li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa myo; yang the' myao: ra" ja: jham re nhag' nghae" na: ru mangad:- myo; yang mathe' myao: ra" ja: jham re nhag' nghae" na: ra" . Myo; yang the' myao: ra" ja: jham wa dazab daso' qhid' mae" za: ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: myo; yang mathe' myao: ra" ja: jham wa apyad ato qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- ce: myid gaung mae ngonhaung" na: jo; ra" yham zaung ngad: ra" ngonhaung" gaung khyao byo; qeim: lo" lao"- mug: gaung dao mae Mao" So yao: ngonhaung" na nae" qhid' mae" kad' to: byid' ra" apyad ato: yham ngonhaung" re byid' li" nae" rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Ana"- ngonhaung" nokyang: kyang" na mung:- mug: gaung dao mae" ngonhaung" gaung khyao yham re qo" zhaung" ve; yu nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" gyai kao bau: na: ra" .
Airu: qo" zhaung" ve; yu lao"- ngonhaung" wa gaung pyad' ngad: nae" mangad:-
Ngonhaung" wa ce: myid gaung mae" yham zaung mae na: jo; au:- dayin dayo: nokyang: kyang" na: ra" . Airu: ngonhaung" nokyang: kyang" na: ru wa- ce: ngonhaung" myid gaung dao mae" gaung khyao re khyad' pye' nug yang: mangad:- shid ba: ru wa kao so' daui: ra" khyo akhyao khyo tha" lo" ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" mug: gaung dao mae" gaung khyao re ngonhaung" qo" kham: yu nug yang: ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa ceru: tha" lo" nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" re nyhang" jaung: to: byid: yaug ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" qhid' mae" yao: qaung" to" ra" ja: alhab' qhid' mae" pakham: byid' ra" khyo" yao: wa ngonhaung" re yao" Byo byid' ava" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa vae" ra" myid khonhae" re: bo: jo; ra"- ce: gaung khyao yham mae ngonhaung" ana: jo, jo, wa Asang na: jo; ra" jo, qo we' va" kyo: na: jo; rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" nho: kao so' daui: na: ru wa- myo; yang myao: ra" ja: re ngha: ru mangad:- lam khug: ra" myid mae ngha: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa vae" ra" myid to, ngad: jo, mung: ce: gaung khyao yham re to: co' mung: Asang we' daga" na nae" je yang: o ngaui: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa cetau mae na ngadqere:- thoetau mae na ngadqere:- Asang re ngaui nhao nae" qhid' mae" gaja: re tho' ngonhaung" je: o: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa- yao" yang dao: kho' ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" Khristu qhid' kheim: mae yeye; jo, qo: ra" . Lo, mau" gai: ru magai: rure cao" yang:- yao" voman: yao: man: qi" ra" khyo"- yaug khao: ngo" qo" kham: yu: bam zai ngad:-
Ngonhaung" wa Asang re gyaug: ru wa pe" ngad: ga" rure ba mung:- su gaje qere re: ta" ngaug: aung: yu nae" ngonhaung" qam: ke' ra" . Mao" So wa ngonhaung" khyo re jab sho' ba: ra" . Naonhaung" re: nga" khyo re naonhaung" yao" aung khug mae ba genae"- ein:- ngo myid: lam: ra" .
Ngo ceru: ta" ru wa- ngonhaung" yao: gai: ra" khyo re naonhaung" re dam: ta" phug: kyo" na: ru mangad:- ngonhaung" dao mae naonhaung" qo" phug nae" akhyo gai ngonhaung" naonhaung" re byid' ru ngad: ra" . Airulao"- byu: nho: ave, akyang re maqu" lo:- adao shad' myo,nho re za: qu" yang: phug ko" ra" mo, re dao: qo" tau: byid: genae" ngad: ra" .
Gaigai: ngonhaung" go va" i? Ngonhaung" go: re wa Mao" So: qhid' mae" go: ru ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" gyang" ru ngad: re wa- naonhaung qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Khristu nho: jhid' de; myid wa ngonhaung" re eib: na: ra"- Byu dayaug yaug wa gaje yaug khao: ngo" qhid' mae" shid kham: byid' re ngonhaung" alhab' boshid va" ga" ra" lajheim: re khyag' za: ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Pe"mung: alhab' mo; qhid' mae" Yesu shid kham: byid' ru wa- kao so' daui: ra" mo, wa yao: yao" akyu" qhid' mae" kao so' madaui lo:- yao: bam: qhid' mae" shid kham: mung: dam: daui: to" li" ra" Asang: akyu" qhid' mae" za: kao so' daui genae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Airumung:- ngonhaung" wa khag' rere:- xao su byu: azhao" re cao" yang: qu" lo nae" mangad:- ganhae"- Khristu re xao su byu: azhao" re cao" yang: qu" bam va" . Ngadqere: airu: dam: qu" lo nae" mangad:-
Byu dayaug yaug Khristu we' dagaung dasho: za: doe; byaug lao"- yao: wa byu sag' boe" li" ra" . Axug' wa lai: lo" byaug mung:- asag' boe" lo: ra" .
Ceru alhab' wa- Mao" So: yang kad' ru ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re gyevo qe ngad: rumae" yao" ba nam qe boe" sho' Khristu khyo" yang ngonhaung" re tha" lo" nhao mung:- gaje qere re: yao" ba nam qe boe" sho' kad' nae" mau" ngonhaung" re byid' ra" .
Ngonhaung" kho" kyo" ra" mungdao: wa- Mao" So wa Yesu Khristu khyo" yang byumyu" cao jab re yao" ba nam qe boe" nhao: ra"- ga" ru ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa yao: bam: qobo re maxam" to: byid: ngad: ra" . Yao: bam re khoru: yao" ba nam qe boe" lo nhao: ra" ga" ra" mungdao: re ngonhaung" re byid' to" ava" .
Airumung:- ngonhaung wa Khristu: nho: lagyo: qe boe" yang: jhau: na: ru ngad: ra" . Mao" So yao: yao:- ngonhaung" nhad' dao: thoe khyo" naonhaung" re mho' na: ra" . Naonhaung" wa gyevo qe ngad: rumae" Mao" So: ba nam qe boe" lo geri:- ein: Khristu gaung tha" ngonhaung" mho' ra" .
Khristu wa qobo maqo" yaug ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, mung: Mao" So: din: man" rumae qo" boleim nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa- ngonhaung" mathao mae Khristu re ngonhaung" qobo mae boleim nhao: ra" .
Airumung:- ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: mau" vin vo; na zo" re" Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju re qo" khae: yu va" mo, naonhaung" re- aire aje amyid dakad' pye' ge,- ein: naonhaung" re gyai mho' ke' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Ngo nao re nhag' khyag' myid qhu" byid: nae" ayo, joe" au:- ni" mho' yao thoe re tae" gyo: byid: va"- ngo wa nao re khyad' yu nae" ayo, joe" au: rere:- nao re bao" thaug' byid: va" ga: Mao" So ta" ra" . Tae" gyo: ge, Mao" So: nhag' khyag' ra" jeju re khae: yu nae" ayo, wa- ana" yao: ngad: ra" . Ana" ba wa- khyad' yu: ru gai: qhug' ra" ba na ngad: ra" . ga: Mao" So ta" rure gyo: ge,
Ngonhaung" mau" zo" re khag' re: qobo qho genae" rure ngonhaung" ma-o mung:- khag' nho: qhid' au: mae re: kaung: kag' ru ngonhaung" mato: byid: .
Airu: kad' nae" atha"- sho: jhin: ru- aqug: akhai: qhug' ru- qug: khai: qhug' ru jham re nhag' lam: qhang qhang za: zang: qhao" ra" khyo" yang ja: khao: ngo" mae ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: daui daui mo, ngad: rure qhu" byid' na: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa- be; ru- thaung: lhaung" ru- qhug' mung:- mo, thaui: mo, yaug kad' ru qhug' lo va" . Ngonhaung" wa matu" maka" mau" zaui: ca" ru we'- mayab macam:- mazo: mashaug' na: lo: ra" .
Gyang" san: ru- laba lajhao ba: ru- nhag' lam: qhang: ru- nhag' khyag' ru khyo" yang re: Gyang" Lho" Byo khyo" yang re:- ngonhaung" nho: dangman" ra" jhid' de; myid khyo" yang re:- ngonhaung" kho" kyo" ra" dangman" ra" mungdao: khyo" yang re:-
Mao" So: qam: so' khyo" yang re:- ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: daui daui mo, ngad: rure qhu" byid' lo va" . Ngonhaung" wa gyekhe' rumae re:- ngonhaung" yao" gaung re gug: gam: rumae re:- din: man" ru wa ngonhaung" nho: shae lhae ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa phug' te' nga: yhe' rure:- maphug' makhyad' kad' rure re: qhug' ra" . Gaui mho: rure re: caung: khin" rure re: qhug' ra"- ngonhaung" re mhug' hab' qekhyo" jho gengadqere:- ngonhaung" wa dangman" ra" dao: re jhau: ra" .
Khag' yang maba mabeim: mo, ru" ru ngadqere: alhab' yang ba: ra" mo, ngad: ra" . Shid: lo" na mo, ru: ngadqere:- naonhaung" myao: ru we' dakhyo:- kao so' daui: na mo, ngad: ra" . Qobo dae byid' rure kham zo: sho' ngadqere:- se' pye' ru maqhug'-
Kaug' ru qhug' sho' ngadqere- khonhae" re: ngaui bau" na: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa myaung sho: nhohab ngadqere:- byu myo: sho' re qo" nhao mo, ngad: ra" . Pe" maqo" nhohab ngadqere:- ja: khao: ngo" re sang mo, ngad: ra" .
Korinthu vogaung: mae" jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- ngonhaung" wa de: de: za: naonhaung" re ta" kyo: va" . Naonhaung" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: lae lae za: phung" to: byid: va" .
Ngonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: re naonhaung" qhid' mae" pyid' pye' ru mangad:- naonhaung" lam: kam" wa- ngonhaung" qhid' mae" pyid' pye' avako" .
Ana"- ngo wa naonhaung" re nga" zo: dau qere we' dakhyo:- ta" geli" . Naonhaung" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" qhu" byid' ra" jhid' de; myid aire yao: naonhaung" re qhu" byid: gela,- naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: re lae lae phung" to: ge, .
Malam khug: ra" mo, we' qham yang: yao: bam we' dakhyo: za: ngad: ra" khyo" mau" dazam" zaui: ge,- pe"mung: ga"re airu: mau" magai: zaui: ngad: ra" . Jo: ru we' shad' ru wa khoru: byin zam" gai: boe" nae" i? Mug: bo" we' mug: cad' khoru: qo" gai: zam" na nae" i?
Khristu we' Satan khoru: myid gai: jho" vang" nae" i? Lam khug: ra" yaug wa malam khug: ra" yaug we' dakhyo: za: dau: ra" khyo pe" jo; ra" i?
Mao" So: yham wa so sulho jham we' khoru: qo" jho" nge, nae" i? Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa kao so' daui: na: ra" Mao" So: yham ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa- Ngo wa- nga" byu qe: phaung mae nga" yham kad' mung:- Yao: bam we' daga" na: jo, nae"- Ngo wa yao: bam: Mao" So boe" mung:- Yao: bam wa nga" byumyu" qe ngad: li" genae"- ga: ta" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So wa- naonhaung" yao: bam: phaung mae" thug' lo" ca"- Yao: bam we' naonhaung" gao" pye' ge:- Masan masin" ra" ja: pe" re: dakad' ge,- Ailao" ngo naonhaung" re khae: yu nae" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" yao: Pho" ngad nae"- Amung: naonhaung" wa nga" yauggai zo: myiqe: zo: qe ngad: li" genae"- ga: Qam: bo: thao" ra" Mao" So ta" ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngo jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- ce: dao: so: jham alhab' wa- ngonhaung" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Airumung: ngonhaung" yao" gaung dau: re we' Byo re masan masin" boe" nhao: ra" maca' majhad' ja: khao: ngo" re kyang" san: pye' mung:- Mao" So re gyaug phug' ra" khyo"- gyang" lho" thao" ra" khyo mae su" na gelang:-
Naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: mae ngonhaung" re khae: yu gela,- ngonhaung" wa khag' rere: mashad' qu"- khag' rere: byo; qeim sho' ngonhaung" makad' qu"- khag' mae" re: matarha" ra" khyo" ngonhaung" gau pai: macab' zo" qu" .
Naonhaung" re dao: phyid' nae" qhid' mae" ngo ce ta" ru mangad:- pe"mung: ga"re- qhid' phyao: ngo ta" va" ru we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" wa khonhae" re:- naonhaung" we' shid ngadqere: daga"- daui ngadqere: daga" ngad sho' naonhaung" re gyai jhid' de; yang: ngad: .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re gyai lam: ra" . Amung: naonhaung" mathao mae ngo gyai phug: na:- ngo wa qug: khai: aja: ja: qhug' sho' ngadqere: qam: byang" jo, mung:- matho' ta" losho' ngaui bau" na: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Makedoni mung" khyo joe" ye: thao re lhao" re:- ngonhaung" dugno: yo, maqo" ngad: ra" . Khyi" khao: ngo" mae qug: khai: sho: jhin: ru- su gaje qe we' myan" myo: jho" byo; ru- aung khug nhag' lam: mae gyaug ci" ru jham we' thaung" qhug' ra" .
Ngadqere: nhag' lam: thao" mo, re qam: byid' na: ra" Mao" So wa- Titu re ngonhaung" jhao" joe" li" nhao: ra" khyo" ngonhaung" re qam: qo" nhao: ra" .
Yao: joe" li" ruyang za: ngonhaung" re qam: qo" nhao: ru mangad:- naonhaung" khoru: yao: re qam: byid' ke' ko" ra" lau thoe rere: the' gyo: yang:- ngonhaung" re qam: qo" nhao: ra" . Naonhaung" ngore khoru: myao nug ko" ra" khyo- naonhaung" khoru: myid qo" tha" ko" ru- naonhaung" khoqhi" ngore qhaung: yu nug ko" ra" khyo jham re Titu wa ngonhaung" re lota" kyo: mung:- ana" ngo wa je yang: ngaui bau" ra" .
Ai: nga" mugsug' yang naonhaung" re nhag' kaug' nhao sho' ngadqere:- ngo wa ai: mugsug' re tung" yang: nhag' makaug' ngad: ra" . Ai: mugsug' yang naonhaung" re dazab zo: nhag' kaug' nhao: rure ngo myao: au:- ngo nhag' kaug' ngadqere:-
Ana" wa- ngo ngaui bau: va"- ai: ru wa naonhaung" re ngo nhag' kaug' nhao: ruyang mangad:- naonhaung" nhag' kaug' ru wa naonhaung" nhag' lam: re tha" pye' nhao: ruyang ngo ngaui bau" ru ngad: ra" . Ai: nhag' kaug' rure Mao" So: yang ci: ra"- ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" re pe" re: mano nhao ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: yang ci: ra" nhag' kaug' ru wa khyad' yu: rure qo" yu nhao: ra" myid tha" rure boe" nhao: ra" . Airumung: aimae nhag' kaug' ru majo, ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: xao su byu: myid khyo" za: nhag' kaug' ru wa- shid nhao: ra" .
Ce: naonhaung" nhag' kaug' rure Mao" So khoru: ci yhung" rure qu" ge,- ai: ruyang naonhaung" re nhag' lam: to" nhao: ru- naonhaung" qobo maqo" rure qhu" byid: nae" khoqhi" kao bau: na: ra" khyo- nhag' jam: yo" ru- nhag' lam: lha" na: ru- kham zo" ra" myid aja: ja: thaung" qhug' ru lam khug: myid kao bau nhao: ru wa qobo qo" yaug re qobo dae byid: nae" jin" jin" ngad nhao: ra" khyo jham naonhaung" re boe" nhao: ra" . Ja: khao: ngo" mae naonhaung" qobo maqo"- ga" ra" khyo re naonhaung" yao" gaung yao: qhu" byid' avako" .
Ai: mugsug' re ngo airu: tung" ke' sho' ngadqere:- shad' ra" mau" kad' yaug: mathao: yang re: mangad:- shad' ra" mau" re kham zo" ra" yaug: mathao mae re: mangad: ngad: ra"- ai: atha" naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" re khoqhi" jhid' de; kao bau: na ko" rure qhid' kheim: mae naonhaung" yao: de: de: nyang" za: myao nae" qhid' mae" myid yang: tung" ke' ru angad: ra" .
Ceru: mung: ngonhaung" qam: qo" bam va" . Ngonhaung" wa qam: qo" ru za: mangad:- naonhaung" alhab' mo, Titu re khoru: bau: nhao gemung:- ai: ru: mathao mae yao: khoqhi" ngaui bau" ra" khyo- ngonhaung" ba: yu yang: ngonhaung" re: khoqhi" sho' ngaui bau" na: bam: i?
Ngo wa Titu re naonhaung" khyo phug: kyo: va" . Naonhaung" re: ai: mathao mae ngore qho' maphyo' ko" ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa khonhae" re: naonhaung" re dang: ra" dao: za: jhau: lo: ra" . Ai we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" yang Titu re naonhaung" khyo phug: kyo" to" ru we' dakhyo: dang: rure sagse: qhu" byid' avako" .
Naonhaung" alhab' yao" dao: re tae" gyo: genae" jin" jin" ngad: na ko" rure re:- naonhaung" wa khoqhi" gyaug: nin" ru we' yao: re lham: tug: khae: yu ko" rure re:- yao: myid: beim: yang: naonhaung" re jhid' de; ra" yao" jhid' de; myid je yang: qi" qhang: li" ra" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re jab byang" sho' qo" lam va" ruyang gyai ngaui bau" ra" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- Makedoni mung" mae" phung: jham re Mao" So byid' ra" nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo re ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" re ba nhao nug: ra" .
Yao: bam wa khyag' qhui: ru jham: yang dae xo sho' jham" qu" ru qhug' lai: lo: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa gyai myaung sho" na ngadqere: gyai ngaui bau: zo" re" Alu: ngaui maqhag' losho' ke' avako" .
Yao: bam qo" ke' ra" qhi" Alu: ke' avako" . Ai: tho' lhao" re: je yang: Alu: ke' vako" ra" khyo re ngo naonhaung" re sagse: qo" kham: ra" .
Yao: bam Yuda mung" mae" Mao" So: byu qere bao" thaug' byid' ra" mau" zo" mae bobo nae" akhang" qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam yao" myid khyo" yang- ngonhaung" re kyid kyid ga: mho' ako" .
Yao: bam wa ngonhaung" myid: to" ru tho' je yang: Alu: ke' ko" ra" . Sao qhid' yao: bam yao" gaung dau: Asang re qhaug' byid' ako" . Ai: thao re Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo"- yao: bam yao" gaung dau: re ngonhaung" re bao" thaug' ra" mau" mae re: qhaug' byid' ako" .
Aimung: ce: mau" zo" re zaui" qhid: lo: ra" Titu wa- ce: jhid' de; aung lam Alu: mau" zo" re xo' yang: naonhaung" aung lam Alu: byid' ra" mau" re bin sho' naonhaung" re bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" yao: re jhan" na: ru ngad: .
Naonhaung" wa lam khug: rumae- dao: jhau: rumae- laba lajhao ba: rumae- su re bao" thaug' nae" kao bau: rumae- ngonhaung" re jhid' de; rumae gyai qo" mo, ngad: ako" . Airumung:- ce: jhid' de; myid aung lam Alu: ke' ra" mau" zo" mae re:- mabyag maqhag' lo: Alu: ke' ra" mo, boe" nhao nug: ra" .
Amyin" byid' ra" khyo" ta" ru wa mangad:- ngadqere: ngo wa su gaje qenho: Alu: ke' ru khoqhi" kao bau: ra" khyo re ta" kyo: yang: naonhaung" jhid' de; myid khoqhi" ngad: rure ba nae" qhid' mae" ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Asang Yesu Khristu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju re ba: ako" . Yao" myaung sho" ru khyo" yang naonhaung" re qo" nhao nae" qhid' mae" yao: wa qo" yaug ngadqere:- naonhaung" mathao mae yao: yao" gaung re myaung sho: yaug boe" na ge,-
Nga" myid khyo" ta" gelang: ein: re- naonhaung" anhag' mae" zaui" qhid: to: ko" ra" mau" zo" re ana" zaui" pin" ko" re je: gai: ra" . Naonhaung" wa ai: mau" zo" re sao qhid' zaui" qhid: ru za: mangad:- nug kao bau: ra" myid bo: ra" sao qhid' mae" phung: jham ngad: ako" .
Airumung:- ai: mau" zo" re xo' yang: zaui" pin" pye' ge,- naonhaung" ai: mau" zo" re myid: yaung: ra" au: re nhag' lam: to" ko" ru we' dakhyo:- zaui" pin" nae" re: kao bau ge,- naonhaung ana" qo" to" rure cao" yang: zaui: so" ye: ge,
Naonhaung"- Alu: ke' nae" myid kao bau ko" re wa- Mao" So wa naonhaung" maqo" ke' ko" rure cao" yang: mangad:- naonhaung" qo" ke' ra" qam: re cao" yang: ke' byid' ra" Alu: jhaung qhu" re khae: yu byid' li" nae" .
Ngowa naonhaung" dao mae qola: kai: byid: yang:- su gaje qere bao" thaug' ru qo" nhao mae" qhid' mae" kad' na: ru mangad:- naonhaung" wa ana" au: magan: mago" qo" ko" ruyang ai: qo ca" ra" mo, re naonhaung" bao" thaug' byid: ang: ako" . Ailao"-naonhaung" qo ca" ra" au: re yao: bam: qo" ru wa naonhaung" re bao" thaug' byid' li" genae"- ceru: kad' mung: shid' shad' geim" nyang nyang za: boe" nhao: ra" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae- myo: sho' gaug: zhang: yu yaug re: myo: sho' maqo"- dajhid' za: gaug; zhang: yu yaug re: gyai malaug lo: mamung ga:- tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re bao" thaug' byid: nae" ngonhaung" nhag' lam: to" ru we' dakhyo:- Titu rere: nhag' lam: to" nhao: ra" Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" ra" .
Titu wa ngonhaung" nhao: ra" dao: re khae: yu: ru za: mangad:- naonhaung" re bao" thaug' byid: nae" gyai kao bau mung:- naonhaung" jhao" ye: nae" qhid' mae" yao: yao" myid: yang myid: phyid' yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re kho" kyo" ra" mathao mae phung: khao: ngo" yang gyai phug' myao: byid' ru qhug' ra" mao: nhaung: pho" dayaug re Titu we' daga" naonhaung" jhao" ngonhaung" nhao: ke' ra" .
Ai: tho' mago" mao: nhaung: pho" wa- Mao" So: phungbao bao: li" nae" qhid' mae" we' ngonhaung" bao" thaug' byid: nug: ra" myid re ba nhao nae" qhid' mae" ce: jhid' de; aung lam Alu: ngaui khyui: ra" mau" zo" zaui: so" rumae ngonhaung" we' daga" gyaung: su" qin" nae" phung: jham: yang khyin: san: to" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Mabyag maqhag' lo: qhaug' byid: ko" ra" ce: Alu: jhaung qhu" jham re zam: pyo: ra" mau" zo" mae khag' yang re: qobo vhin jung" gaui: pye' ru maqhug' nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" gyai lha" yang: zaui: so" na: .
Ngonhaung" au: qang khyo wa- Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae za: mangad:- Byu: qhid' kheim: mae re: jo: ra" lo, mau" re za: kad' nae" ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung ngonhaung" wa- yao: shid' zo: we' daga" ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" dayaug rere: bonhao: ke' ra" . Ngonhaung" wa yao: re myo: sho' lhang jham" qu" mung:- khonhae" re: bao" thaug' mau" zo" mae gyai nhag' lam: to" yaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" . Ana" yao: ngonhaung" re myid: lam: ru je: qi" li" va" rumung: bao" thaug' nae" myid je: kao bau: li" ra" .
Titu nho: khyo we' sin: yang: ta" gelang: ein: re- yao: wa nga" mau" vin cao: we' naonhaung" re bao" thaug' byid' ra" mau" zo" mae ngo we' daga" mau" zaui: cao: ngad: ra" . Yao: we' daga" bocao ko" ra" mao: nhaung: gatau shid' yaug wa- phung: jham: nho: gaung tha" lagyo: tao ngad mung:- Khristu nho: phungbao re bao: thug' li" nhao ko" ra" byu shid' zo: re: ngad: ako" .
