Naonhaung" khyo re ngonhaung" phug: ta" na: ra" khyo dang: rure- phung: jham alhab' dang za: ba: lo genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re naonhaung" jhid' de; myid qhu" byid: ge, .
Yuda mung" mae" Mao" So: byu qere bao" thaug' ra" khyo re ngo naonhaung" re mugsug' tung" ke' maqo ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa bao" thaug' byid: nae" o nug kao bau mo, ngad ko" rure ngo ba: . Amung: ngo wa naonhaung" khyo re Makedoni byu qere phug: kyo: byid: va" . Akhaia mung" mae" mao: nhaung: qe wa anhag' mae" lhao" re: Alu: ke' nae" qhid nae" jin" jin" nyhang" jaung: to" avako"- ein: yao: bam re ngo ta" va" . Naonhaung" byid: nug kao bau: ra" myid wa yao: bam myo: phyao: re kao bau myid lhau: zhung" to" ke' byid' ra" .
Naonhaung" khyo ngonhaung" phug: ta" ra" dao: jham akeim maboe" nae" qhid' mae" ce: mao: nhaung: qere naonhaung" jhao" nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra" . Ngo ta" to: va" ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" bao" thaug' byid' ra" Alu: ngaui re jin" jin" seim" nyhang" to: genaeva"-
Ngadqere: Makedoni byu damyo" ngo we' daga" bocao: li" mung:- naonhaung" jin" jin" makad' to: ko" rure li" myao ko" ngad: re wa- naonhaung" khoqhi" qho' thug' genae" rure za: data" shi: ge,- naonhaung" re ngonhaung" yang khoqhi" myid: lam: pye' yang: khoqhi" sho' qho' thug' nae" i?
Airumung: naonhaung" dao: so: byid' to" ra" Alu: ngaui jhaung qhu" re qo" nyhang" jin" to: genae" qhid' mae" ce: mao: nhaung: qere gau: qhid' khae" yang:- naonhaung" jhao" ye: nhao: ke' ca"- ein: ngo myid: ra" . Ngo joe" li" ra" au:- ai: Alu: ngaui wa jin" jin" bin: zhang: to: gau ngad: li" nae" . Amung: naonhaung" wa ai: Alu: ngaui re jhan: qhug' yang: byid' ra" khyo" mangad:- naonhaung" yao: myid nug kao bau yang: byid: ko" ru ngad: ga" ru wa- de: de: za: ngad: li" nae" .
Myug: shi: dajhid' za: sin" ra" yaug wa- dajhid' za: qo" jham" yu: li" nae" . Myug: shi: myo: sho' sin" ra" yaug wa- ashi: myo: sho' qo" jham" yu: li" nae" ngad: rure myid: beim: ge,-
Airumung: yaug khao: ngo" wa- yao: yao" aung khug mae myid: phyid' to" ru we' dakhyo:- Alu: byid: qo: ra" . Amyid: avho: myid we' re:- byid: nae" qo bo: ga" ra" myid we' re:- Alu: magai: byid: ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa ngaui bau" ra" myid we' Alu: byid' ra" yaug re jhid' de; ra" .
Mao" So wa ngonhaung" qo ca: gu: alhab' mae jan" sho' qo" byid: yaug ngad: ruyang naonhaung" qo ca" ra" ja: khao: ngo" qhid' mae" khyao qo" na: ru za: mangad:- gai: ra" khyo khe' khao: ngo" mae byid: nae" qhid' mae" re: laug sho' qo" li" genae" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae Yao: wa myaung sho" ra" mo, re mabyag maqhag' lo:- gae byid' ava" . Yao" nhag' khyag' shogu: ru wa- apyad ato dang: jo; ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Myug: shi: sin" ra" yaug re myug: shi: we' zo: ve byid' ra" yaug Mao" So wa- naonhaung" qo ca" ra" myug: shi: alhab' rere:- byid: mung: aire yaug: qi" li" nhao: li" nae" . Naonhaung" nho: byid: nug kao bau: ra" mau" zo" mae" ashi: myo: sho' qo" jham" yu nhao: li" nae" .
Naonhaung" wa ayo, khao: ngo" mae- byid: nug kao bau taung" qo" gae byid: genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa naonhaung" re khonhae" re:- qo" nhao: li" nae" . Ailao"- ngonhaung" lo, mae" naonhaung" Alu: jhaung qhu" re lham: qo" khae: yu ko" ra" mo, myo: sho' wa- Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" byid' li" genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" ce: mau" zo" re zaui: so" na ko" ra" ce: mau" wa- qo ca" na ko" ra" Mao" So: byu qere bao" thaug' byid' ru za: mangad:- Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" byid' ra" thoe rere: byang" sheim: li" nhao: ra" .
Naonhaung" bao" thaung' byid' ra" ce: mau" zo" re qu" yang:- byu myo: sho' wa naonhaung" lhang: yu ko" ra" Khristu nho: khyo Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re jhaug' zaug za: phug' cao" na ko" ruyang re:- yao: bam re we' gaje yaug khao: ngo" re naonhaung" byid: nug kao bau taung" gae byid: ko" ra" mau" zo" mathao mae Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" byid' li" genae" .
Naonhaung" wa gakai: lai mung: Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju re qo" kham zo: geyang: yao: bam wa naonhaung" re gyai jhid' de; kao taui" ra" myid we' naonhaung" re akyu" mho' byid' li" genae" .
Aphug' matho' ta" ra" yao" jeju jhaung qhu" mathao mae Mao" So re ngonhaung" caung: khin" byid: gelang:-
Naonhaung" we' daga" ngad: au: re nhag' lam: khyo" mung: va" ra" jo, qo mae" ngad lao" wa gyai thin: ra" yaug ngad: ra" ga: ta" ko" yaug Ngo Polu wa naonhaung" re mho' ke' ra" .
Ngo joe" li" lao" gyai thin: ra" yaug maboe" qo nae" qhid' mae" Khristu nho: nau" nhae" ra" myid we' ngo naonhaung" re mho' ke' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re- mug: myid: nho: ave, lo, mau" khyo" zaui: so" na mo, ngad: ako"- ga: ta" ko" ra" mo, re thin: ra" khyo" ngo qo" kad' yang: ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" mug: myid dao mae kao so' daui: na: bam: ru wa dang: ra" . Ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa- mug: myid: gaung sho" ra" ave, re cao" yang: mang: khe' na: ra" mo, mangad:-
Ngonhaung" mang: khe' rumae ci: ra" shae lhae wa- mug: myid dao: nho: shae lhae jham mangad:- gyetab jham re qo" phyo' pye' ra" Mao" So: qam: so' bo: ra" shae lhae jham ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa madang maman" ra" jho" ta" ngag: ra" khyo jham rere:- Mao" So: laba lajhao re kaung: kag' tam" to" ra" ngad beim: phug: ru alhab' rere:- phyo' pye' va" . Myid: yaung: to" ra" gu: ja: khao: ngo" re- taung" lhaung" pye' mung:- Khristu mho dao: re tae" gyo: nhao: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" dao: re jab byang" sho' mho dao: gyo: phug' cao" vako" rure ba lao"- ngonhaung" wa mho dao: magyo: tau: lhan" ra" mo, re qobo dae byid: nae" jin" jin" ngad: li" nae" .
Naonhaung" wa adao: pyae reza:- qu" mo, ngad: ako" . Naonhaung" phaung mae yao: yao" gaung re Khristu nho: byu ngad:- ga: myid: lam: to" ra" byu dayaug yaug bo: i? Bo: ngad: re wa- yao: Khristu nho: byu ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" re: Khristu nho: byu qe ngad: ga" rure yao: myid: beim: vashao:-
Pe"mung: ga"re Asang: yang ngonhaung" re byid' to" ra" kheim: so' we' sin: yang:- ngo gyai phug: ta" sho' ngadqere:- ngo wa maqho'- ai: kheim: so' wa naonhaung" re phyo' pye' nae" qhid' mae" mangad:- ai wa naonhaung" re tau: to' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Nga" vhin tung" mugsug' jham: yang naonhaung" re kyaug' nae" seim" na: ruru:- lajheim: thug' nae" rure ngo ma-o ngad: ra" .
Byu damyo" wa- Polu nho: vhin tung" jham wa- thin mung: qam: bo: ra" dao: thoe bo: ra" mugsug' jham ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ngonhaung" we' daga" na: au:- yao: wa qam: nang: yaug ngad: ru we' yao" dao: jham wa pe" mangad: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" li" genae" .
Ngonhaung" wa va: mae na: au: vhin tung" mae tung" zaui: to" ru we' dakhyo:- ai: khyo ngonhaung" yao" gaung yao: joe" li" lao" re: ai: vhin tung" mae bo: ru we' mashai" lo:- lo, mau" zaui: so: nae" ngad: rure airu: ta" ra" mo, ba: gyo" to: geshao:-
Ngonhaung" wa yao: bam yao" gaung re gyai ta" phug ta" myhao: ra" byu qe: azhao" mae bobo nae" re: ngonhaung" gaung re yao: bam we' dau tau" nae" re: mavae" ngad: ra" . Yao: bam wa yao" bam yao: kad' yu: ra" aka" yang:- yao: bam: yao" gaung re ka" mung:- yao: bam so" to" ra" azhao" yang yao: bam yao" gaung re dao: phyid' mo, ngad: ako" . Yao: bam khoqhi" go: ako" i?
Ngonhaung" kam" wa akyo lai sho' maphug nae" . Mao: So: yang zaui: so: nae" tu" ka" to: byid' ra" akyo qho" gu: mae za: ngonhaung" phug: ra" . Naonhaung" phaung mae ngonhaung" zaui" ra" ai: mau" mae bobo: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: yang tu" ka" to: byid' ra" akyo qho" mae bobo mo, ngad geyang:- Khristu nho: khyo Lau Dao: Gai re naonhaung" jhao" ngonhaung" vin: li" au:- ngonhaung" kyodam: lai: ru mangad: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa- Mao" So: yang ngonhaung" qhid' mae" tu" ka" to: byid' ra" mau" zo" alhaung" nho: taung gaung mae su gaje qe zaui" to" ra" mau" mae phug mo, mangad: . Ai: atha" ngonhaung" wa- naonhaung" lam khug: myid qi" qhang: li" mung: khonhae" re:- Mao" So: yang ngonhaung" re tu" ka" to: byid' ra" akyo qho" gu: mae naonhaung" phaung mae mau" zo" qi: sho' je yang: qo" zaui: so: nae" rure nhag' anghae" na: .
Ai: thao- ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" na jo, qo re lai: to: co' yang:- gatau: mung"dan: jham mae Lau Dao: Gai re qo" kho" kyo: byid: nae" ngad: rumung: su gaje qe: mau" zaui: jao: mae bin: zaui" to: va" ra" mau" zo" mathao mae maphug nae" .
Ngadqere: Jham: Mugsug' mae- phug nug: ra" yaug wa Asang zaui" to: va" ra" lo, mau" mathao mae za:- phug vashao:- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re- Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae myo, nho qo" yaug wa- yao: yao" gaung re phug: ra" yaug mangad:- Asang: yang phug: ra" yaug lam: ngad: ra" .
Ngo dajhid' zo: go: rure naonhaung" zang: kham byid: genae" rure ngo o: ra" . Jeju khyo" zang: kham byid: gela,-
Mao" So ngonhaung" dao mae myid qu" nug' ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" dao mae myid qu" nug' ra" . Naonhaung" wa Khristu ga" ra" yauggai dayaug we' za: lo, xo' nae" qhid' mae" ngo mho' to: byid: va" ra" zomyi: gyang" we' dau: ako" .
Eva wa lhao maui: nho: mhug' pyag' ra" pha,jhi" yang mhug' pyag' ru qhug' ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re: nhag' lam: qeim: li" mung: Khristu re bin sho' jhid' de; kao taui" ru we' gyang" lho" ra" myid shapye' pye' geli" nae" rure ngo myid: ci" na: .
Pe"mung: ga"re dayaug yaug naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" mung: ngonhaung" makho" kyo" qu" ra" Yesu gatau dayaug: nho: khyo li" kho" kyo: byid' rure naonhaung" ngaui ngaui bau: bau: za: zang: kham yang: khae: yu: ako" . Amung: naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" mae" qo" khae: yu ko" ra" Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: we' dajhid' re: madau: ra" ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: we' Gyang" Lho" Byo mangad' ra" byo gatau re naonhaung" khae: yu: ako" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" tho' kai mae" lagyo: qi: qe ga: mhang" ko" ra" mo, tho' mae dajhid' re: je: ngai yaug ngad:- ein: khyo" ngo mamyid: jho-
Ngo wa dao: jhau: rumae vae" yaug- lhe: yaug mangad: sho' ngadqere:- laba lajhao khyo mae wa- ba jhao yaug ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa yo, khyin: khao: ngo" mae we' khyo khe' khao: ngo" mae ce: khyo re de: de: za: naonhaung" re ba nhao va" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re nga: ye, nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngo yao" gaung re nyham: khyo" pye' mung:- naonhaung" re Mao" So: khyo Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: pe" aphug' mamho' lo:- kho" kyo" lo: ra" . Ceru: kad' ru wa ngo shad' ra" i?
Naonhaung" phaung mae ngo mau" zaui" na: au:- gatau: phung: jham: yang ngore bao" thaug' byid' ako" . Amung ngo wa naonhaung" re bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ai: phung: jham mae" lhad' zo" na: ra" ein: gai: ta" ra" .
Amung: ngo naonhaung" we' daga" na: ra" gyo: mae- ngaui qhang qo ca" ra" au:- bao" thaug' byid: genae" qhid' mae" ngo naonhaung" re phabau mapau"- Makedoni mung" mae" joe" li" ko" ra" mao: nhaung: qe wa ngo qo ca" ra" gu: alhab' re vin: li" byid' ako" . Lai: lo" ra" yo, mae we' dakhyo:- joe" lo nae" ayo, mae re:- ngo wa khonhae" re: naonhaung" re qola: mavin nhao nae" .
Nga" khug mae bo: ra" Khristu nho: dangman" ru we' ngo ceru: phug: rure Akhaia mung" jao: sho' mae khag' re: qo" tam" pye' genae" mangad:- ein: ngo dao: so: byid' ra" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re majhid' de, yang: ceru: ta" ru ngad: ra" i? Ngo naonhaung re jhid' de; ra" khyo re Mao" So ba: ra" .
Ngonhaung" zaui: so" ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam re: zaui: so"- ga: ai: gatau lagyo: jham phug: ta" nae" agu maqo" genae" qhid' mae" ngo wa ana" kad' na: ru we' dakhyo:- xo' yang: kad' ye" lo" nae" .
Yao: bam wa lagyo: aman" qe mangad:- lagyo: apyag' qe ngad: ako" . Yao: bam yao" gaung re Khristu nho: lagyo: aman" qe we' dakhyo:- aqid ve, geim kad' mung:- mhug' pyag' ra" mau" zo" zaui: so: mo, ngad: ako" .
Aiwa mug' nae" khyo mabo ngad: ra"- Satan lhao" re: bo" bao: nho: mug: lagyo: we' dau sho' yao: yao" gaung re geim qo" kad' ra" .
Airumung:- yao" daui daui mo, wa- din: man" ru: daui daui mo, we' dau sho' yao: bam yao" gaung re geim kad' ko" ru wa gyai mug' nae" made, ngad: ra" . Lo" thao" mae ai geim" yao:- yao: bam: lo, mau" we' man: qi" ra" aphug' re qo" khae: yu: li" genae" .
Khag' re: ngore ago dajho gela,- ein: ngo dam: paug' ta" ra" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" ngore ago jho geyang: ngad lao" re:- ngo dajhid' dathao qo" phug nae" qhid' mae" nang" thao" ago dayaug khyo" ngore khae: yu shi: gela,-
Ngo ana" phug: ta" na: ru wa- Asang ta" nhao: ra" khyo" mangad: lo:- ago dayaug we' dakhyo: ngo phug: ta" na: ru ngad: ra" .
Byu myo: sho' mo, wa xao su byu qenho: qam: so' lo, mau" re cao" yang: phug ko" ruyang ngore: airu: phug nae" .
Naonhaung" wa gyai pha,jhi" ba mo, ngad gemung: ago qere ngaui ngaui bau: bau: za: zang: kham byid' ako" .
Naonhaung" wa- naonhaung" re amyin" byid: yam" zo" ra" yaug naonhaung" amag re khyug' zo" ra" yaug- naonhaung" re kung" zo" ra" yaug- naonhaung" re qu" nyham: ra" yaug- naonhaung" myo,khung: re pyo' yaug- re naonhaung" zang: kham byid' ako" .
Qho' ru we' naonhaung" re ta" geli" . Ngonhaung" wa aijham re kad' nae" gyai mavae" ra" gyaug hab' qe ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: dayaug yaug daja: ja" khyo we' sin: mung: vae" phug: ngad: re wa- ngore: airu: vae" phug nae" ngad: ra" . Ngo wa ceru re ago dayaug we' dakhyo: ta" na: ru ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa Hebre vo qe ngad: ako" i? Ngo re: ai we' dakhyo: ngad:- yao: bam Israel byu qe ngad: ako" i? Ngo re: ai we' dakhyo: ngad:- yao: bam wa Abraham: nho: myid: zo: qe ngad: ako" i? Ngo re: ai we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa Khristu nho: daui daui mo, ngad: ako" i? Ago yaug ru: ngo ta" na: ra" . Ngadqere: ngo wa yao: bam tho' je: gai: ra" daui daui yaug ngad: ra" . Ngo wa mau" je yang: zaui" lo yaug ngad: ra" . Ngo wa je: myo: sho' lhang thaung: taung" lhaung" ru qhug' lo yaug ngad: ra"- ngo wa be; rure je: myo: sho' lhang qhug' lo yaug ngad: ra" . Je: myo: sho' lhang alaug laug shid: ru qhug' lo yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa Yuda byu qeyang sam xe: gug dae dae mung: be; rure ngo" lhang qhug' lo: ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Roma byu qeyang sam lhang taui" be; ru qhug' lo: ra" . Amung: laug baui: yang pye' ru dalhang qhug' lo: ra" . Ngo wa qid sang pho qeim: rumae sam lhang bobo: lo mung:- qid tham: dao mae shid' xe: byid yo, qug myung: lhau: ru dalhang qhug' lo: ra" .
Nga" gyaung: khyo myo: sho' mae qid gyui gyui yang: qhug' ra" shid gyan nogyan- damya, qhug' ra" shid gyan nogyan- nga" mao: nhaung: Israel byumyu" qe: lo, mae qhug' ra" shid gyan nogyan- Taung bug byu qe: lo, mae qhug' ra" shid gyan nogyan- vomo" jham mae qhug' ra" shid gyan nogyan- seyo segae: mae qhug' ra" shid gyan nogyan- panglai: qid tham: dao mae qhug' ra" shid gyan nogyan- ba nam apyag' qeyang kad' ra" shid gyan nogyan jham re ngo qhug' lai: lo: ra" .
Mau" zo" re dug myaung: taung" zaui" lo va" . Dazab makyo yab maqhug' zo" ru- vae: moe; qid shab' ru thaung" qhug' lo: ra"- Dazab makyo zo: ve gyi: sho' maqo" zo:- khug ngha nae" jo, qo majo,- mai bau: gug: sho' maqhug' ve; lo ngad: ra" .
Khag' mata" thug' ru qug: khai: khyag' qhui: ra" gatau myo: sho' ja: tho' mago"- ngo wa ba khao: ngo" Phung: jham alhab' qhid' mae" sang: kho: myid: ci" ruyang nhai" bam" to" ru qhug' na: ra" .
Dayaug yaug qam: nang: yang: ngad: re- ngo re: qam: nang" ra"- dayaug yaug qobo: yang ju" phyo' rure- ngo wa gyai gaung yug myid: ci" byid' ra" .
Ngo phug ca" ngad: re wa- ngoyao" gaung yao: qam: khonho" nang" ra" khyo re ceim" shid' yang: ngo phug nae" .
Ngo mamhug' rure Asang Yesu nho: Pho" ngad: ra" Mao" So ba: ra" . Yao" mang wa- apyad ato mae ngaui lho" vashao: wo" .
Ngo Damasku vogaung: mae na: au:- kho: kham Areta nho: mung" zug: pho" wa- ngore taung: nae" qhid' mae" vomo" kham: dung: mae gyezo: qere zaung" nhao: to" ra" .
Ngadqere: ngore gyan khug mae ke' mung:- vang bao: zo: kham: khyo"- shoe' khyo" ke' byid: geyang: ngo wa- ai: mung" zug: pho" lo, mae" loe; beim: lo va" .
Phug: ru wa akyu" mabo ngadqere:- ngo phug ca" shi" ra" . Ana"- ngo wa Asang: yang qhu" byid' ra" ve, lho jham we' qhu" lho jham: nho: khyo re ta" nae" .
Lai: lo" va" ra" daxe: byid zin mae Khristan phung: byu dayaug wa- myhao: thao" ra" mug: gaung pyae gye, khyo jhui" do, lo" ru qhug' ra" khyo re ngo ba: ra" . ( Ceru wa gaigai: yao: boe" ru ngad: laug? Mangad: lao"- yao: wa ve, lho re the' myao: ru ngad: laug- ngo nyang" maba- Mao" So za: ba: ra" . )
Ai: yaug wa Pharadisu khyo jhui" do, lo" ru qhug' mung:- yao: wa byu: nhad' dao: thoe
khyo" maqo" ta" ra" dao:- byu: nho: thoe we' maqo" ta" thug' ra" dao: thoe jham re the' gyo" rure ngo ba: ein: ra" khyo re ngo dam: paug' ta" ra" . ( Ceru wa gaigai: yao: boe" ru ngad: laug? Mangad: lao"- yao: wa- ve, lho re the' myao: ru ngad: laug- ngo nyang" maba- Mao" So za: ba: ra" . )
Airumung: byu ceyaug: khyo we' sin: yang: wa- ngo phug nae" . Ngadqere: ngoyao" khyo we' sin: yang: wa- ngoyao: khoqhi" qam: nang: yaug ngad: rure qhu" byid' rumae" je yang:- pe" maphug nae" .
Ngo phug nug yang: ngadqere: ngo ago doe, nae" mangad:- pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa dangman" ra" dao: re ta" na: ru ngad nae"- khag' ngadqere: nga" khyo re yao: ngo kad' rumae the' myao: ru we' ngo ta" rumae the' gyo" yu: ru tho' matag: myao: to: nhao nug yang: ngo wa maphug nae" .
Ngadqere: ngo the' myao: ra" mug' pho: ve, lho jham myo: sho' mathao mae ngad beim: phug: ra" myid mabo: li" nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa gaung sho: dayin dayo: khai" no: ra" nodae daja: re kham zo" na: ra" . Ai: nodae wa Satan" nho: lagyo: khyo" ngore be; na mung:- nga" nho: ngad beim: phug: ra" myid re tam" to: byid' ra" .
Ce: nodae re yu: pye' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa Mao" So re sam lhang khyo" yang: akyu" mho' qu" va" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So wa- nga" nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa nao qo ca" ra" gu: alhab' qhid' mae" ga" laug: ra" . Nao qam: nang" ra" au: nga" qam: so' wa- qam: bo: thao" ru ngad: ra"- ga: phaug' tau" ra" . Airumung: nga" au: dao mae Khristu nho: qam: so' yang gug: gam byid' rure qo" kham: yu nae" qhid' mae" nga" nho: qam: nang" rure ngo gyai ngaui bau: yang: phug: ra" .
Ngo wa Khristu nho: mathao mae- qam: nang" ru- roe" ru- dayin dayo" ru- yhin" ru- qug: khai: jham qhug' rumae nhag' shid nhag' dag: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngo qam: nang" ra" au:- ngo wa qam: bo: jo; ra" .
Ngo wa ago we' dakhyo: kad' na: ra"- naonhaung" wa ngore ago doe, nhao: na: ako" . Naonhaung" wa nga" bo: de, ang: ra" mo, ngad: ako"- pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa pe" mangad: sho' ngadqere:- naonhaung" lagyo: qi: qekhyo" jho: to" ra" mo, tho' dajhid' re: ngai nyham yaug mangad:-
Ngo wa lagyo: dayaug ngad: ra" khyo re mug' pho: ve, lho jham- mug' pho: mau" zo" jham myo: sho' re naonhaung" phaung gaung: mae nhag' lam: qhang qhang za: zaui" qhu" mung:- sagse: qhu" byid' lo va" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re ngaui qhang we' sin" ra" bao" thaug' khyo re qo mala: nhao: rumae" je yang:- gatau: Phung: jham: o mae khyo" yang: naonhaung" re zam" khug: lo: ra" i? Ceru: naonhaung" dao mae matarha" ra" khyo" kad' rure jeju khyo" ngore qobo khyad' byid: gela, .
Ana" ngo wa sam lhang ein: lhang naonhaung" jhao" li" qhug' nae" jin" jin" ngad va" . Naonhaung" re ngo pe" re: qo mabyid: nae" . Ngo wa naonhaung" ngaui qhang re o yang: mangad:- naonhaung" re o yang: ngad: ra" . Myid: zo: qe wa myhi" pho" qe: qhid' mae" ngaui qhang qaung" to: byid: nae" maang ngad: ra" . Myhi" pho" qe kam" wa yao: bam: myid: zo: qe: qhid' mae"- ngaui qhang qaung" to: byid: ang: ako" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re bao" thaug' nae" qhid' mae" ngo qo" ra" ja: alhab' re we' ngoyao" gaung dau: qam: o: alhab' rere: ngaui bau: za: ci yhung" pye' nae" . Ngo naonhaung" re gyai jhid' de; re- naonhaung" ngore nang" ra" khyo" jhid' de; genae" i?
Airumung: ngo wa naonhaung" re qo mala: nhao lo" ra" khyo re naonhaung" khae: yu genae" za: ngad: . Ngadqere: dayaug yaug wa- ngore nhag' lam: sham" yaug- naonhaung" re mhug' pyag' zo: yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" li" nae" .
Aire khoru: mhug' pyag' lo: ra" i? Naonhaung" jhao" ngo nhao: ke' ra" lagyo: qe khoyaug: lo, khyo" naonhaung" anyaug re khyug' zo" ra" i?
Ngo wa Titu re naonhaung" jhao" ye: nae" qhid' mae" xo sho' mho' mung: Khristan mao: nhaung: dayaug rere: yao: we' daga" ngo nhao: ke' ra" . Titu wa naonhaung" anyaug re khyug' zo" lo: ra" ein:- ta" genae" i? Yao: we' ngo wa nhag' lam: lo, mau" daja: za: we' mau" zaui: so" na: ru mangad: i?
Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae dayao: dayang ngonhaung" yao" gaung re ta" qid' na: ru ngad: ako" ga:- naonhaung" jho: re jho genae" . Airu: mangad:- ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae Khristu ngonhaung" re ta" nhao nug: ru we' dakhyo:- ta" na: ru ngad:- Jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- ngonhaung" zaui: so" lo: ra" gu: ja: khao: ngo" wa naonhaung" re bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" angad: .
Ngo naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" lao"- ngo o ngaui: ru we' shai" yang: naonhaung" re li" myao nae" ru we'- naonhaung" o ngaui: ru we' shai" yang: ngore naonhaung" the' myao genae" rure ngo gyai myid: ci" na: lhe" . Ngo wa- jho" myan" myo" ru- myid nug' ru- nhag' yo" ru- yao: yao" akyu" qho: ru- maphug' makhyad' kad' ru- gaui mho: ru- ngad beim" ru- mo, thaui: mo, yaug boe" ru jham re myao nae" rure myid: ci" na: ra" .
Thao dalhang naonhaung" jhao" dam: li" re- nga" Mao" So wa naonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae ngore qho' nhao nae" laug . Amung: lai: lo" ra" ayo, mae qobo shad' lhoe" ra" mo, myo: sho' wa ana" joe" sho' yao: bam: myid matha" lo:- gaung sho: jho" zam" ra" mau" zo"- gintho' zaung: ra" mau" zo" we' qhae ka ka: ra" qobo mae nab: shid: jo; ra" mo; qhid' mae" ngo ngug byid gyo" nae" we' myid: gyaug myid: ci" na: .
Ana" ngo wa- sam lhang ein: lhang naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" nae" ngad:- Jham: Mugsug' mae ta" ru we' dakhyo:- qobo zhaug' ra" mung- pe" ja" mung mae ngadqere:- Sagse: shid' yaug we' sam yaug; nhad' mae" thug' ra" dao: thoe: yang jao dang yu ca" ra" .
Shid' lhang ein: lhang ngo naonhaung" jhao" li" co' au:- thao: lhang ngo naonhaung" jhao" dam: joe" li" re wa- khag' rere: matang" to: lo: qobo dae byid: nae"- ein: qhid' phyao: qobo shad' lhoe" ra" mo, re we' gatau alhab' mo; re ta" peim" to: gau ngad va" . Ana" re: ai we' dakhyo:- ngo wa va: mae" naonhaung" re dam: paug' yang: ta" peim" ke' nae" .
Khristu wa nga" nhad' dao: thoe: khyo" yang dao: jhau: na: ra" ga" ra" naonhaung" o: ra" sagse: alhab' naonhaung" qo" li" genae"- Khristu wa naonhaung" re mho" shid' ra" au:- qam: nang: yaug mangad: ngad: ra" . Ai: atha" yao: wa naonhaung" phaung mae yao" qam: so' qhu" byid' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa qam: nang: zo" re" pyao: zang dao mae jin" se' pye' ru qhug' sho' ngadqere:- Mao" So: qam: so' khyo" yang yao: wa kao so' daui: na: ra" . Ngonhaung" re: yao: we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad: jo, mung:- qam: nang" ra" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" we' ngonhaung" daga" zam" khug: rumae Khristu kao so' daui: khyo mae bo: ra" Mao" So: qam: so' khug mae ngonhaung" boqhug' leim nae" ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa lam khug: rumae kao so' daui: na mo, ngad: la, mangad: la,- naonhaung" yao" gaung re nyang" za: jham" qu" mung: ca: qu" ge,- naonhaung" khug mae Khristu na: jo; rure- naonhaung" gaigai: yao: ba ko" i? Airu: mangad: re wa- naonhaung" jham" qu" rumae alhab' seim" byaug: ra" lajheim: thug' jo; ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa- ai: jham" qu" rumae seim" mo, mangad' rure naonhaung" ba genae"- ein: ngo myid: lam: ra" .
Naonhaung" pe" mashad' genae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" wa- Mao" So re akyu" mho' ra" . Airu: akyu" mho' ru wa- ngonhaung" wa jham" qu" rumae aung doe, mo, ngad: rure qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" mangad:- ngonhaung" wa jham" qu" rumae seim" ra" mo, we' dau nhohab ngadqere: naonhaung" wa jo: rure qo" zaui: so: genae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa dangman" ru we' shai" yang:- daja: re: maqo" kad'- ai: dangman" rure za: ngonhaung" qo" kad' ra" .
Ngonhaung" qam: nang: mung: naonhaung" qam: bo gelao"- ngonhaung" wa ngaui bau" ra" . Aimung:- naonhaung" wa jab byang" mo, boe" li" genae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" akyu" mho' ra" .
Ngo joe" li" lao"- Asang: yang ngore byid' to" ra" kheim: so' re ci yang:- gyai thin: ra" khyo" mali" mho" qo nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa- ce: mugsug' re naonhaung" we' jho" va" na shi" au: mae" tung" ke' ru ngad: ra" . Asang ngore byid' to" ra" kheim: so' wa- naonhaung" re phyo' qheim" pye' nae" qhid' mae" mangad:- zao: to' ke' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- airu: va" lhe"- qao" zin" na geshao:- jab byang" mo, boe" sho' qam: ke' ge,- nga" nho: mho' ra" dao: re tae" gyo: ge,- naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" vang" ge,- ngaui pyo: yaug yo za: na ge,- jhid' de; ru we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ra" Mao" So wa- naonhaung" we' daga" ngad: jo; li" nae" .
Naonhaung" yao: cao: mao: nhaung: jhid' de; myid we' jho" au" ge, Mao" So: byu qe alhab' mo, wa- naonhaung" re au" ke' ako" .
Asang Yesu Khristu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju- Mao" So: jhid' de; myid we' Gyang" Lho" Byo: nho: zam" khug: ru wa- naonhaung" alhab' mo, we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" .
Byu mae" lagyo: aya: qo" yang: mangad:- byu: yang san: to: qhug' yaug re: mangad:- Yesu Khristu we' yao: re shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ra" Pho" Mao" So: yang lagyo: dayaug khyo" khyin: san: yu qhug' ra" lagyo: ngo Polu we'-
ngo we' daga" na ko" ra" mao: nhaung: alhab' wa- Galati mung" mae" Phung: jham re mugsug' tung" vhin: ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" Pho"- Mao" So we' Asang Yesu Khristu wa nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru naonhaung" re byid: vageshao: wo" .
Ngonhaung" Pho" Mao" So: myid o ngaui: ru we' dakhyo:- mho dao: gyo: mung: Khristu wa naonhaung" re ana" ce: makhyang" ra" qae" mae" khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" nho: qobo: qhid' mae" yao: yao" gaung re byid' pye' ava" .
Mao" So wa apyad ato mae phungbao qi" qhang: jo, vashao: wo"- Amen .
Khristu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" yang naonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" yaug re aiqhi" sho' phyad: ra" khyo" naonhaung" shapye' pye' to: co' mung: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: gatau dalam: re naonhaung" khae: yu ko" ruyang ngo wa- naonhaung" re mug' ra" .
Gai gai: yao: ga" re Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: wa gatau dalam: majo, lo: ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Khristu nho: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re tha" pye' nae" seim" na mo, damyo" wa- naonhaung" myid re lhau: sad' byid' ra" byu na ko" ruyang ngo ceru: ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" re ngonhaung" kho" kyo: byid' lo: ra" ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: we' shai" yang: gatau Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re kho" kyo" ngad: re wa- ngonhaung" ngad sho' ngadqere:- mug: gaung mae" mug: lagyo: ngad sho' ngadqere:- yao: wa- myiqid tham: khyo ye: nae" dao: phyid' ru qhug' vashao:-
Naonhaung" khae: yu vako" ra" ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: we' shai" ra" Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re kho" kyo" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere:- myiqid tham: khyo ye: nae" dao: phyid' ru qhug' vashao:- ein: ngonhaung" qhid' mae ta" va" ru we' dakhyo:- ngo ana" re: dam: ta" na: .
Ngo ceru: ta" ru wa- byu: yang ngore ngaui nae" rure qam: ke' na: ru ngad: ra" i? Airu: dajhid' re: mangad:- ngo o: ru wa Mao" So: yang ngore ngaui nae" ru ngad: ra" . Ngo wa byu: qhid' kheim: mae myo, nho lu nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' na: ra" i? Ngo wa byu: yang o nae" rure za: qam: ke' na: ru ngad: re wa- ngo wa Khristu nho: daui daui yaug maboe" ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo kho" kyo" ra" Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: wa- xao su byu: yang myid: thug' ke' ru mangad' rure ngo naonhaung" re ta" kyo: geli" .
Ngo wa ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re xao su byu khag' dayaug mae" re: mho" ru makham: yu- Aire khag' yang re: ngore mamho" byid: ngad: ra" . Yesu Khristu yao: ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re ngore qhu" byid: yang: qo" kham: yu: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa Yuda caung: pa" thung" re caung: pa" kao bau yaug ngad: ra" au:- ngo khoru: kao so' daui: lo: ra" khyo re naonhaung" the' gyo" ci gau ngad: ako" . Ngo wa Mao" So: phung: re dajhid' re: nhag' makhyag' lo:- yhin" ru we' phung: re phyo' sin" pye' nae" qhid' mae" ngoyao: qam: bo: thao" mae" qam: ke' lo yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa Yuda caung: pa" thung" re phug' cao" rumae nga" qae: qam" Yuda mao: nhaung: qe myo: sho' mo, tho' mae je yang: qam: ke' phug' cao" lo mung:- ngonhaung" phug' pho" qenho: thung" li re gyai kao bau: ra" khyo" phug' cao" lo yaug ngad: .
Ngadqere: Mao" So yao" nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" yang ngo makhau: li" shimae" yao: re caung da"byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngore khai: yu: ra" .
Taung bug byu qere yao: zo: khyo" Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re ngo qo" kho" kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa yao: zo: re ngore qhu" byid: nae" myid: phyid' ra" au:- ngo wa khag' dayaug jhao" re: pha,jhi" maye mho' yu-
nga" qhid' re lagyo: boe" na ko" ra" mo, we' yeqhug' nae" qhid' mae" Yerusalem khyo re: ngo maye:- Airu: kad' nae" atha"- ngo wa dalhang: dae Arabia mung" khyo ye" lo" mung:- ai: thao re Damasku vogaung: khyo dam: tug' lo: .
Sam zin kyo thao re ngo wa Petru we' yejho" qhug' jhau nae" qhid' mae" Yerusalem khyo ye" lo" mung:- ai: mae yao: we' shid' laban yethang: na: .
Ngadqere: Asang: yao: nhaung: Yaku mae" je yang: lagyo: gatau khoyaug we' re:- mayejho" qhug' .
Ngo tung" ke' ra" khyo cegu: alhab' wa- jo: ru ngad mung:- ngo mamhug' rure Mao" So ba: ra" .
Ai: thao re ngo wa Suri we' Kiliki mang: jham khaung: khyo ye" lo" va" .
Ai: ayo, mae Yuda mung" mae" Phung: byu qe wa ngore myo, nho te' mamyao: qu" shiko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa- qhid' phyao: ngonhaung" re yhin" lo: ra" yaug wa- ganhae" yao: phyo' pye' nae" qam: ke' lo: ra" ai: lam khug: ra" khyo re ana" wa- yao: kho" kyo" na: ra"- ga: su ta" na ko" rure za: ba: ako" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa nga" mathao mae Mao" So: re jeju caung: khin" byid' ako" .
Daxe: byid zin kyo thao re ngo wa Barnaba we' daga" Titu re jhui: mung: Yerusalem vogaung: khyo dam: do, lo" va" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa ngore airu: ye" lo" nae" qhu" lho byid: yang: ngad: ra" . Ngo wa au: jhaung qe we' gathaung: san zab phaung phaung mung: Taung bug byu qere ngo kho" kyo: byid: va" Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: mungdao: re ta" sho' kyo: byid' va" . Ngo airu: ta" sho' kyo: byid' ru wa- lai: lo" va" yo, mae we' ana" ceyo, mae ngo zaui" ra" mau"zo" re aje amyid maboe" nhao nug yang: ngad: ra" .
Damyo" wa ngonhaung" byin cao: pho" Titu re au: qid lhai: khyo re kham: yu nhao nug: ako" . Yao: wa Greeg byu dayaug ngad sho' ngadqere: au: qid lhai: khyo re maqad maqui" yao: re makham: yu nhao ngad: ako" .
Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe; ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" qo" yu: ra" ai: loe; beim khyo re jo" qu" nae" qhid' mae" ai: byu qe wa jin" byu khyo" lam khug: ra" mao: nhaung: ngad geim kad' yang: ngonhaung" phung: khug khyo jhug' vao li" ako" . Yao: bam wa ngonhaung" re jeim toe' pye' nug: ako" .
Ngadqere: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao" nho: dangman" ra" khyo re naonhaung" qhid' mae" zaui" zag: ci nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" wa yao: bam re dajhid' re: maqhui" byid: .
Au: jhaung mang vin mo, wa khoru" ra" mo, ngad geqere:- nga" qhid' mae" akhyag mangad: ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa adao shad' myo, nho re qu" yang: dao: kho' yaug mangad: ngad: ra" . Ai: au: jhaung qe wa ngore pha,jhi" asag' pe" daja: re: mabyid: ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa ngore pha,jhi" byid: nae" atha"- Mao" So wa Petru re Yuda byumyu" qere Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: kho" kyo: byid: nae" mau" zo" byid' ru we' dakhyo:- ngo rere:- Taung bug byu qere Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: kho"kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" mau" zo" byid' to" rure yao: bam ba: lo: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Petru wa Mao" So: qam: so' khyo" yang Yuda byu qe: qhid' mae" lagyo: khyo" san: to" ru we' dakhyo:- Mao" So wa ngo rere: Taung bug byu qe: qhid' mae" lagyo: dayaug khyo" san: to" ra" .
Au: jhaung qe ngad ko" ra" Yaku- Petru we' Yohan bam wa- Mao" So: yang ngore ce: gakai: lai mung: ra" mau" byid: to" rure xam: so" yu: ako" . Airumung: ngonhaung" alhab' wa- mau" zaui: cao: qe ngad: rure sagse: qhu" byid' ra" khyo"- yao: bam wa- Barnaba we' ngore lo, zaui: zaui" ako" . Barnaba we' ngo wa Taung bug byu qe: phaung mae mau" zaui: mung:- yao: bam wa Yuda byu qe: phaung mae mau" zaui: nae" rure ngonhaung" myid jho" vang" bam va" .
Yao: bam ngonhaung" re mho' ra" khyo dakhe' za: ngad: ra" . Aiwa yao: bam mae myaung sho: mung: qo ca" ra" phung: byu qere bao" thaug' byid: nae" rure mato" myhid' nae" qhid' mae" za: ngad: ra" . Ai: mau" wa ngo gyai kao bau: lo: ra" mau" yao: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Petru- Antioki vogaung: khyo joe" lo lao"- yao: shad' ru de: de: za: ngad mung:- mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae yao: re ngo qobo ceim: yang: qeim: pye' va" .
Yaku yang nhao: ke' ra" mo, aimae majoe" li" shire Petru wa- Taung bug byu mao: nhaung: phung: byu qe we' daga" zo: shaug' yang: na: ra" . Ngadqere: ai bam joe" li" thao re wa- Taung bug byu qe we' daga" zo: shaug' na: rumae" re: thang: pye' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa- Taung bug byu qere au: qid lhai: khyo kham: yu nhao nug ko" ra" ai: byu qere gyaug yang: ngad: ra" .
Lam khug: ra" Yuda byu- phung: byu qe gaje qere:- Petru we' dakhyo: sang: po" ra" lo, mau" khyo re bocao" qhid: li" ako" . Barnaba lhao" re:- yao: bam: sang: po" ra" lo, mau" khyo mae bocao" lo" na: ra" .
Yao: bam wa Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao" nho: dangman" ru we' dau te' vang" vang" za: masu: ko" rure ngo myao lao"- ngo wa Petru re- yao: bam alhab' mo; qhid' kheim: mae- nao wa Yuda byu dayaug ngad: to: mung:- Yuda byu dayaug we' madau lo:- Taung bug byu dayaug we' dakhyo: na: lo: ra" . Aire Taung bug byu qere Yuda byu qe we' dakhyo: kao so' daui nae" maqad maqui" nao khoru: qo" kad' nhao nae" i? ein: ngo ta" va" .
Ngonhaung" wa khau: li" mae" Yuda byu agyang" ngad mung:- qobo qo" ra" Taung bug byu qe mangad:- ga: mhang" ru qhug' mo, ngad: .
Ngadqere:- byu wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang mangad:- Yesu Khristu re lam khug: ra" khyo" yang za: din: man" ra" ga:- Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' rure ngonhaung" ba: . Ngonhaung" re: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang mangad:- Khristu re lam khug: ru khyo" yang din: man" ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" Yesu Khristu re lam khug: bam va" . Pe"mung: ga"re kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang byu wa khag' re: din: man" ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' rure maqhug' ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa- Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe; ra" khyo" yang din: man" ra" ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" qam: ke' rumae- Taung bug byu qe we' dakhyo:- qobo shad' lhoe" ra" mo, ngad: rure myao: ngad: re- Khristu wa qobo shad' lhoe" rure qam: byid' ra"- ein: gai: ta" i? Khokhyo" re: magai: ta"-
ngoyao: phyo' pye' ra" tarha" khyo re ngo dam: zao: to' yang: ngad: re wa- ngo wa ngoyao" gaung re kham" to" ra" Tarha" re shad' lhoe" ra" yaug ngad: rure qhu" byid: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa Mao" So: qhid' mae" kao so' qo" daui nae" qhid' mae" ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" yang se' pye' qhug' mung: kham" to" ra" Tarha" we' sin: yang: ngo wa byushid ngad: ra" . Ngo wa Khristu we' daga" pyao: zang dao mae jin" se' pye' ru qhug' va" .
Airumung: ngo wa- kao so' madaui lo:- Khristu wa nga" khug mae kao so' daui: na: ra" . Ana" ngo kao so' daui: na: ru wa- ngore jhid' de; mung: nga" qhid' mae" yao" kao so' re byid' pye' ra" Mao" So: yao: zo: re lam khug: ra" khyo" yang ngo kao so' daui: na: ru ngad: .
Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju re ngo ha: pye' nae" mangad: . Ngadqere: byu wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" khyo" yang din: man" ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' ngad: re wa- Khristu shid kham: byid' ru wa aje amyid ngad: ra" .
Galati phung: byu ago qe we"- naonhaung" re khag' nho: man: dan" yang maung: to" ra" i? Pyao: zang dao mae Yesu Khristu shid kham" ra" bao qab re de: de: za: myao: jo, nae" naonhaung" myo, khung: mae te' to: byid: va" .
Mao" So: Byo re naonhaung" qo" khae: yu ko" ru wa- ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" khyo" ngad ko" i? Mangad: lao"- Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re the' gyo" yu mung: aire lam" geyang: qo" khae: yu ko" ru ngad: i? Ce: dao: kheim: ngore ta" kyo" qu" gela,-
Naonhaung" aiqhi" sho' go ko" i? Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: Byo khyo" yang zaui" qhid mung:- ana" wa- naonhaung yao" qam: so' khyo" yang zaui" pin" nug ko" i?
Naonhaung" thaung" qhug' kham zo" lo: ra" khyo jham alhab' wa- akeim ngad va" i? Gai gai: yao: daja: ja: wa lajheim: thug' nae" za: ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa naonhaung" re Byo byid: mung:- mug' pho: ve, lho mau" zo" naonhaung" phaung mae zaui" qhu" ru wa- kham" to" ra" Tarha" re naonhaung" phug' cao" geyang: ngad: ra" i? Mangad: lao"- Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re naonhaung" the' gyo" yu mung: lam" geyang: ngad: ra" i?
Abraham thaung" qhug' kham zo" lo: ra" khyo re myid: qu" ge,- Jham: Mugsug' mae- Abraham wa Mao" So re lam khug: ra"- yao" lam khug: myid mathao mae Mao" So wa yao: re din: man" ra" yaug khyo" khae: yu: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Airumung: lam khug: myid bo: ra" mo, wa- Abraham nho: myid: zo: gyang" qe ngad: rure naonhaung" ba beim: qo: ako" .
Mao" So wa Taung bug byu qere lam khug: ru khyo" yang din: man" ra"- ga: sun" yu byid' li" nae" rure Jham: Mugsug' wa geim phan" phan" to" ava" . Airumung: Jham: Mugsug' mae- Mao" So wa nao khyo" yang xao su byu alhab' mo, re shaman" byid' li" nae"- ga: Abraham re Lau Dao: Gai ta" hau: byid: ra" .
Abraham wa Mao" So re lam khug mung: shaman" byid' ru qhug' ra" . Amung: lam khug: ra"mo, alhab' wa- Abraham we' dakhyo: shaman" byid' ru qhug' ako"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Kham" to" ra" Tarha" phug' cao" rure lam yang: kao so' daui: ra" mo, wa- nhang: kheim: zao" na: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re Jham: Mugsug' mae- Kham" to" ra" Tarha" mugsug' mae tung" to" ra" Tarha" lam: khao: ngo" re maphug' cao" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Mao" So: nhang: kheim: zao" ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae byu wa- lam khug: ru khyo" yang din: man" ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' ra" yaug za:- kao so' daui: na: li" nae"- ga: Jham: Mugsug' ta" to" ruyang- byu wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang din: man" ra"- ga: khag' dayaug rere: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru maqhug' ra" khyo wa de: de: za: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Jham: Mugsug' mae- kham" to" ra" Tarha" phug' cao" ra" yaug wa kao so' daui: na: li" nae"- ga: ta" to" ruyang kham" to" ra" Tarha wa ai: lam khug: ru we' pe" majho" sin: ngad: ra" .
Sag' zang mae jin" se' lhao" to: qhug' ra" yaug wa- Mao" So: nhang: kheim: zao" ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo:- Khristu wa ngonhaung" qhid' mae" nhang: kheim: zao" yaug boe" mung:- Kham" to" ra" Tarha" yang boe" nhao: ra" nhang: kheim: zao" nae" rumae" ngonhaung" re khyad' yu byid' ava" .
Khristu ceru: kad' ru wa Taung bug byu qe wa- Yesu Khristu khyo" yang Abraham re Mao" So: dao: so: byid' to" ra" shaman" jeju re qo" kham: yu genae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Ailao"- ngonhaung" wa lam khug: ra" khyo" yang Mao" So: dao: so: byid' to" ra" Byo re qo" kham: yu nae" ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- xao su byu shad' khyo" ngo ta" nae"- byu shid' yaug wa khyo daja: ja: mae myid vang" mugsug' tung" to: lao" wa- khag' re: aire maqo" phyo' pye' . Mangad: lao" pe" re: magai: laung: ngad: ra" .
Ana" Mao" So wa yao" dao: so: jham re Abraham we' yao" myid: zo: qhid' mae" byid' to" ra" Jham: dao: mae myo: sho' re ta" nug: ra khyo" myid: zo: qe- ga: mata" ngad: ra" . Dayaug re za: ta" nug: ra" khyo" myid: zo:- ga: ta" ra" . Ai: yaug wa Khristu ngad: ra" .
Ngo ta" nug: ru wa- Mao" So wa Abraham we' dao: thang" to: mung:- ai: dao: thang" re phug' cao" nae" dao: so: byid' to" ra" zin na byid yo: sam xe zin kyo thao re qo" yu: ra" kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa dao: thang" re maqo" phyo' pye' ngad: ra" . Mao" So: dao: so: rere: maqo" zai" phyo' pye' ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: jeju jhaung qhu" wa ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" mae ngha yang: ngad: re wa- ai: jeju jhaung qhu" wa- yao" dao: so: mae ngha lo nae" mangad: ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Mao" So wa- yao" dao: so: mathao mae Abraham re ai: jeju jhaung qhu" byid' ra" .
Aire- ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" au: qang: ru wa pe" ngad: i? Ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa- shad' lhoe" rure qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" byid' to" ru ngad: ra" . Aimung:- Kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa- dao: so: re kham: yu: ra" yaug ngad: ra" Abraham nho: myid: zo: joe" li" ra" ayo, joe" sho' za: jo; jo; ra" . Ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re mug: lagyo: qeyang agyo: mae ta" qham byid' ra" byu dayaug: lo, khyo" yang byid' to" ava" .
Ngadqere: dayaug: yang dashad' mae za: zaui: so" ra" mau" mae ta" qham byid' ra" yaug maca" lo: ngad: ra"- Mao" So wa date: za: ngad: ra" .
Airu: ngad lao"- kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa Mao" So: dao: so: jham we' tug' shai" ra" i? Dajhid' re: mangad:- pe"mung: ga"re xao su byu qe wa- kao so' byid' ra" kham" to" ra" Tarha" re qo" khae: yu ko" ngad: re wa- yaug khao: ngo" wa ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang din: man" ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' rure qhug' genae" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Jham: Mugsug' mae- mug: myid geim" wa qobo: nho: qam: so' yang eib: ra" qao: mae ngad: jo; ra" ga:- ta" to" ra" . Airumung: Yesu Khristu re lam khug: rumae apan aqao: to" ra" dao: so: jeju jhaung qhu" wa- lam khug: ra" mo, re byid' to" ra" .
Ai: lam khug: ra" khyo mathug' li" shi" ra" qhid' re- ce: lam khug: ra" khyo joe" li" ra" ayo, joe" sho' kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa ngonhaung" alhab' mo, re kyam: byu qekhyo" taui" lhaung" to" ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa lam khug: ru khyo" yang din: man" ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa- Khristu joe" li" sho' ngonhaung" re mho" jhui" lo: ava" .
Ana" wa- lam khug: ra" khyo joe" li" va" rumung:- Kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa ngonhaung" re mho" shid' mho" jhui: byid: maqo lo: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" alhab' wa- lam khug: ru khyo" yang Yesu Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, mung:- Mao" So: yao: zo: qe doe; ako" .
Naonhaung" wa Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, nae" qhid' mae" qid nyhab' re kham: yu vako" ruyang ana" naonhaung" wa- Khristu nho: kao so' daui khyo re bau: we' dakhyo: ve; ci: avako" .
Airumung: Yuda byu qe we' Taung bug byu qe: agyo: mae re:- jeim qe we' jeim mangad: ra" mo; agyo: mae re:- yauggai we' myiqe: qe: agyo: mae re:- pe" jho" kho' ru majo, lo: ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" alhab' mo; wa- Khristu khug mae yao: we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad: avako" .
Naonhaung" wa Khristu yang sang: ra" mo, ngad ko" re wa- naonhaung" wa Abraham nho: myid: zo: qe ngad geyang:- Mao" So byid' to" ra" dao: so: re qo" khae: yu: ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Xo' yang: ta" gelang: ein: re- yao: pho" nho: jo,nho" ma re kham: yu nae" ra" yao: zo: wa- alhab' re gaigai: yao: sang: ra" yaug ngad sho' ngadqere:- yao: ngai shi" ra" au: re wa- jeim we' dakhyo: kad' rure qhug' myao: ra" .
Yao: pho" yang dang: to" ra" ayo, joe" sho'- yao: ngai shi" ra" au: re yao: re gun caung jhui" ra" mo, we' yao" mau" zo" re zaui: pyo byid' ra" mo; qao: mae na: ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" re: Byo we' sin" ra" khyo mae zoqao" maboe" shi" au:- mug: kin geim" re eib: ra" byo jham: yang eib: ra" jeim qe doe; lo: ra" .
Ngadqere: lo" thao" mae ayo, joe" lao"- Mao" So wa yao" yao: zo: re nhao: ke' byid' ra" . Ai: yao: zo: wa- ngonhaung" re Mao" So yao: zo: qe boe" geshao:- kham" to" ra" Tarha" qao:
mae na: jo; ra" mo, re khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" byu xao su myiqe: mae" khau: li" mung: Yuda kham" to" ra" Tarha" qao: mae kao so' daui: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa yao" yao: zo: ngad: rure ceim" shid' nae" Mao" So wa- Pho" we"- nga" Pho" we"- ga: ta" ra" yao: zo" nho: Byo ngonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: khug khyo nhao: ke' byid' ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa- jeim mangad: loko" ngad: ra" . Yao: zo: ngad: avako"- naonhaung" wa yao: zo: qe ngad ko" ruyang Mao" So wa yao: zo: qe: qhid' mae" jaung: to" ra" ma alhab' naonhaung" re ab byid' li" nae" .
Qhid' phyao:- naonhaung" wa- Mao" So re maba geyang: So mangad: ko" ra" mo; jeim doe; lo: ako" .
Ngadqere: ana" naonhaung" wa- Mao" So re ba: avako" . Je: yo" ra" khyo" ta" re- Mao" So wa naonhaung" re ba: ava"- Airumung:- naonhaung" wa qam: nang: yang:- ko, ko, nin" ra" yui jham eib: ra" khug khyo khoru: mung: naonhaung" dam: phaug' vao lo" nug ko" i? Pe"mung: yang: naonhaung" wa yao: bam: jeim dalhang dam: tug' boe" nug ko" i?
Naonhaung" wa ba na lho" khye'- ve, vo: we' zin na daqhae: gu: re gakai: lai khyo" akhyag to" ako" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" khyo we' sin: yang: gaung yug myid: ci" byid' ra" . Naonhaung" qhid' mae" ngo zaui: so" lo: ra" mau" zo" alhab' wa- akeim boe" pye' genae" laug i?
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" wa ngo we' dakhyo: ngad genae" qhid' mae" ngo naonhaung" re mho' ra" . Aitho' mago" ngo wa naonhaung" we' dakhyo: yao: ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" ngore pe" mashad' ko" ngad: ra" .
Sao qhid' lhang ngo naonhaung" re Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: kho" kyo: byid' ra" khyo pe"mung: ngad: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" . Ngo no phyo: qhug' yang: ngad: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Nga" gaung dau: maqao" zin" ruyang naonhaung" qhid' mae" gyai aqug: akhai: doe, sho' ngadqere: naonhaung" wa ngore maphug' makhyad' makad'- manug makhyad' re: makad' gengad: ra" . Airu: kad' nae" atha"- naonhaung" wa ngore mug: gaung mae" mug: lagyo: re we' dakhyo:- Yesu Khristu re we' dakhyo: re:- lham: khae: yu: ako" .
Naonhaung" gyai ngaui bau" avako" . Ana" pe" boe" na ko" i? Naonhaung" wa gai: boe" ngad: re- naonhaung" yao" myo,jid' jham re lhao" kyaung" thad' yu mung: ngore byid: nug: ra" myid bo ko" rure: ngo yao: qo" ta" ra" .
Ana" ngo dangman" ra" khyo naonhaung" re ta" kyo: byid: yang:- naonhaung" gyevo boe" byaug va" i?
Ai: su gaje qe wa naonhaung" dao mae gyai myid vao zo" rure qhu" byid' ako"- ngadqere: yao: bam: myid: qang: ru jham wa- agai mangad: ko" ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" dao mae nhag' lam: gai ko" ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam: dao mae re: naonhaung" nhag' lam: dam: tug' gai genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam wa naonhaung" re ngo we' xo' taui" rure phyid' pye' byid: nae" qhid' mae" za: ngad: ra" .
Myid: qang: ru gai yang: ngad: re wa- airu: nhag' lam: gai: ru wa gai: ra" . Ceru" ra" khyo wa naonhaung" we' daga" na: au: re za: mangad:- khonhae" re: dangman" jo, gai: ra" .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" zo: dau qe we"- naonhaung" mae Khristu nho: ave, bo: li" sho'- zo: khau: ra" myiqe: we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" qhid' mae" zo: khau no no: ru dalhang dam: kham zo" na: .
Ngo naonhaung" we' daga" qo" na mung: naonhaung" re thoe gatau khyo" qo" jhau nae" ngo myid: na: lhe" . Naonhaung" we' sin: yang: ngo wa phabau: phaxe' myid myaung" na: .
Kham" to" ra" Tarha" qao: mae na nug ko" ra" mo, naonhaung" re myid: geli" . Ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" mae pe" ta" rure naonhaung" mathe' gyo" qu" ko" i?
Ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" mugsug' mae- Abraham wa yauggai zo: shid' yaug qo" ra" . Dayaug wa jeim myhi" khyo" qo" ra" yaug ngad mung: gatau dayaug wa jeim myhi" mangad' ra" yaug khyo" qo" ra" yaug ngad: ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Jeim myhi" khyo" qo" ra" yao: zo: wa- gaung sho: khyo" cao" yang: khau: li" yaug ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: jeim mangad' ra" yaug khyo" qo" ra" Abraham: yao: zo: wa- Mao" So: dao: so: we' dakhyo:- khau: li" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ce: rure wa- dao: tau" khyo" qo" ba: gyo" ra" . Ai: myiqe: shid' yaug wa- dao: thang" shid' lam: re ta" nug: ru ngad: ra" . Myiqe: dayaug wa Hagara ngad mung:- yao" yang khau: ke' ra" zo: dau qe wa jeim boe" pye' ako" . Yao: wa Sina bam mae to" ra" dao: thang" re alho vin: ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Hagara wa- Arabia mung" mae" Sina bam khyo" ngad: ra"- yao: wa yao" vobyu qe alhab' we' daga" jeim doe; na: ra" ana" jo; jo; ra" Yerusalem vogaung: we' dau: ra" .
Ngadqere: mug: khaung: mung"dan: mae" Yerusalem vogaung: wa loe; beim: ra" vogaung: ngad mung:- yao: wa ngonhaung" yao: myhi" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Jham: Mugsug' mae- Zo: dau makhau: ra" bug daung: myhi" we"- Ngaui bau: wa,- Zo: khau no mano: qu" ra" myiqe: we"- Ngaui bau: ngaui yao thoe we' hug' wa,- yham sang pho" yang shapye' to: qhug' ra" myiqe: wa- yham sang pho" qo" ra" myiqe: myhi" tho' zo: dau je: qo" li" nae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" wa Isag we' dakhyo:- Mao" So yao" dao: so: we' dakhyo: khau: li" ra" Mao" So: yao: zo: qe ngad: ako" .
Ai: ayo, mae gaung sho: khyo" cao" yang:- khau: li" ra" yaug wa- Mao" So: Byo khyo" khau: li" ra" yaug re yhin" ra" . Ana" re: ai we' dakhyo: za: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Jham: Mugsug' mae pe" ru: ta" ra" i? Ai: jeim myhi" we' yao: zo: re khe' ke' wa,- pe"mung: ga"re jeim myhi" yao: zo: wa jeim myhi" mangad' ra" yaug: yao: zo: we' daga" yao: pho" nho: jo,nho" ma re qo" kham: yu nae" mangad:- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Airumung: nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" wa jeim myhi" yao: zo: qe mangad:- jeim myhi" mangad' ra" yaug: yao: zo: qe ngad: ako" .
Khristu wa ngonhaung" re loe; beim nhao va" ruyang- ngonhaung" wa loe; beim khyo qo" bam va" . Airumung: loe, beim: ra" byu qekhyo" ye; jo, mung:- naonhaung" yao" gaung re jeim dadam: boe" nhao ge,-
Tae" gyo: ge,- naonhaung" yao" gaung mae au: qid lhai: khyo dam: kham: yu: ngad: re wa- Khristu wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" dajhid' re: pe" akyu" mabo ga" ra" khyo" ngad: ra"- ein: ngo Polu naonhaung" re ta" va" .
Yao: yao" gaung mae au: qid lhai: khyo re kham: yu: ra" yaug wa- kham" to" ra" Tarha" alhab' re phug' cao" nae" qo bo: ra" yaug ngad: rure ngo dalhang dam: paug' yang: ta" peim: byid' ra" .
Kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang din: man" ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' rure qhug' nug: ra" mo, naonhaung" wa- Khristu we' gao" byaug: avako" . Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju taung gaung shad' khyo na: ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Ngonhaung" kam" wa- ngonhaung" Mao" So: Byo: nho: lam khug: rumae mau" zaui" na: ra" qam: so' khyo" yang din: man" ra"- ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' ru qhug' li" nae" rure ngonhaung" myid: lao" ru ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, lao" wa- au: qid lhai: khyo kham: yu: ru- makham: yu: ru wa- pe" akhyag mangad: ngad: ra"- Akhyag wa- jhid' de; myid khyo" lo, mau" zaui" qhu" ra" lam khug: myid ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa gyai aung doe; ra" khyo" kao so' daui: lo: avako" . Ai: dangman" ra" khyo re phug' cao" rumae" naonhaung" re khag' yang tam" pye' ra" i? Yao: wa naonhaung" re khoru: ju" phyo' ngaug: yu: ra" i?
Ai: ju" phyo' ru wa naonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" Mao" So khyo" yang boe" nhao: ru mangad: ngad: ra" .
Cin man" dabam geim" re bai" li" nhao nae" qhid' mae" man" dajhid' za: aqo: ra"- ga: ta" ko" ra" dao: khyo: we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo wa ana" ba joe" sho' naonhaung" re myid: lam: na shi" . Ngonhaung" wa Asang we' dadang: dalam: za: doe; na: ruyang naonhaung" wa shai" ra" khyo gatau re khae: yu genae" mangad:- ein: ngo myid: lam: ra" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" re khin jang kad' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa Mao" So: yang byid' ra" qobo dae re qhug' kham zo" li" nae" .
Ngadqere: nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo wa au: qid lhai: khyo re kham: yu qo: ra"- ein: xo' yang: kho" kyo" na: ngad: re wa- pe"mung: ngo yhin" ru qhug' na shi" ra" i? Airu: kho" kyo" ru dang: ngad: re wa- Khristu nho: pyao: zang khyo re ngo kho" kyo" ru wa- qug: khai: pe" boe" nhao nae" mangad:-
Naonhaung" re khin jang kad' ra" mo, wa- au: qid lhai: khyo re za: makham: yu lo:- yao: bam yao" gaung re zhe' pye' ko" re wa khoqhi" je: gai genae" i?
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" loe; beim: ru qo" yu genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re khai: yu: to" ru ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ce: loe; beim khyo re naonhaung" gaung sho: myid o: rure cao" yang: daci ge,- ai: atha" jhid' de; myid we' naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" caung da" byid: ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re naoyao" gaung re jhid' de; ru we' dakhyo:- ni" yham kyo: cao: re jhid' de; wa,- ga" ra" amyin" dao: dalam: re phug' cao" ru wa- kham" to" ra" Tarha" dao: alhab' re phug' cao" ru we' daqi" za: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa seyo: gug' nyhug' jham we' dakhyo:- yao: cao: jho" bin: mung: dae jho" te' na ko" ngad: re wa- lha" ge,- mangad: lao" wa- naonhaung" yao: cao: dayaug we' dayaug jho" phyo' yang: alhab' shid: dam: genae" .
Ngo ta" ru wa ceru: ngad: ra"- naonhaung" wa Byo: yang khyo shid' ra" khyo" kao so' daui ge, . Ailao"- gaung sho: myid: o: ra" khyo re naonhaung" nhag' dag genae" mangad: .
Pe"mung: ga re gaung sho: shad' khyo" o: ru wa- Mao" So: Byo o: rure gye kad' ra" . Gaung sho: shad' khyo" o: ru we' Mao" So: Byo o: ru wa- yao: cao: gyevo ngad: ako" . Airumung: naonhaung" kad' nug: ra" ja: re naonhaung" maqo" kad' ko" ngad: ra" .
Byo: yang naonhaung" re khyoqhid' au: she byid' ngad: re wa- naonhaung" wa kham" to" ra" Tarha" qao: mae mana loko" ngad: ra" .
Gaung sho" nho: mau" zo" wa- de: de: za: ngad: ra"- aijham wa- gaung sho: gintho' mau" zo"- maca' majhad' ru- maqu" dau: ra" ave,-
So alho re caung: pa" ru- mandan: vha" ru- manug thug: ru- myan" myo: jho" byo; ru- myid nug' ru- nhag' jam: yo" ru- yao: yao" qhid' mae" so' kho' ru- myid majho" vang" ru- phung: jho" kho' ru-
myo, no, obyid: ru- yhid yid: ru- zo: pyo: shaug' pyo" ru we' aijham we' dau: ra" lo, mau" jham ngad: ra" . Qhid' phyao: ta" peim: va" ru we' dakhyo:- ana" re: ngo naonhaung" re dam: ta" peim: byid: geli" . Airu: kad' mo, wa- Mao" So: mung"dan: re maqo" sang: yu: li" genae" .
Ngadqere:- Mao" So: Byo: yang zaui: nhao: ra" ashi: wa- jhid' de; ru- ngaui bau" ru- ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru- nhag' lam: qhang: ru- nhag' khyag' ru- gai shab; ru- vin tang: jhaug' zaug: ru .
Nhag' lam: nyham: ru we' yao: yao" gaung re qo" khang" ru jham ngad: ra" . Ai: gu: re ngag: tam" pye' nae" pe" Tarha" re: majo, ngad: ra" .
Yesu Khristu re Asang khyo" lhang: yu: ra" mo, wa- yao: bam: gaung sho: myid we' gaung sho: shad' khyo" kao bau myid o: ru jham alhab' re pyao: zang dao mae bojin" se' pye' avako" .
Ai: Mao" So: Byo wa naonhaung" re kao so' byid' to" ava"- amung: yao: wa ngonhaung" nho: kao so' daui khyo rere: khang" byid: qo: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa ngad beim" ra" myid magai: bo- yao: cao: pyi magai: qho- yao: cao: magai: jho" myid nug: ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- dayaug yaug wa qobo daja: ja: shad' na: rure naonhaung" the' myao geyang: ngad: re- Byo qam: so' bo: ra" mo, naonhaung" wa- nau" nhae" za: yao: re jo: ra" shad' khyo jhao" byid: ge, Naonhaung" yao: re: ju" phyo' ra" khyo magyo" vao lo" genae" qhid' mae" lha" na ge,-
dayaug: qo re dayaug yao: cao: jho" bao" vin vo; byid: mung: ceru: naonhaung" wa- Khristu nho: tarha" re phug' cao" na ge,-
byu dayaug yaug wa gaigai: yao: ga" re yao: pe" akhyag yaug mangad' rure- akhyag yaug ngad: ra" khyo" myid: jho: re- yao: wa yao: yao" gaung re mhug' pyag' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yaug khao: ngo" wa yao: yao" lo, mau" re kin: kho' qu" qo: ra" . Ai: lo, mau" gai yang: ngad: re wa- gatau dayaug: nho: lo, mau" we' dau tau" qu" maqo lo:- yao: yao" lo, mau" mae qo" phug: li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yaug khao: ngo" wa yao: yao" qo re vin vo; qo: ra" .
Khristan: mungdao: re mho" zhao: yu: ra" yaug wa- yao" mho" pho" re gai: ra" ja: alhab' yang bao" thaug' byid: qo: ra" .
Naonhaung" damyid: nghung: ge,- Mao" So re khag' re: maqo" mhug' ngad: ra" . Byu wa yao: sin" ke' ra" ja: re yao:- ashi: jham" yu: li" nae" .
Gaung sho: myid o: rumae sin" ra" yaug wa- yao: ai: gaung sho: mae" shid: rure qo" jham" yu: li" nae" . Byo myid o: rumae sin" ra" yaug kam" wa- ai: Byo mae" apyad ato: kao so' re qo" jham" yu: li" nae" .
Ngonhaung" wa gai: ra" mau" zo" zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" mamyaung: madug gejhao"- pe"mung: ga"re airu: ngonhaung" qam: mashan- nhag' lam: magyug: yang: ngad: re wa- ayo, joe" li" lao"- ngonhaung" wa ashi: qo" jham" yu nae" ngad: ra" .
Airumung:- ngonhaung" wa agu qo" khao: ngo"- byu yaug khao: ngo" re gai: ra" mau" zo" zaui: byid: qo: ra" . Je yang: wa- lam khug: ra" ngonhaung" yham khug: byu qere zaui: so: byid: gelang:
Ngoyao" lo; yang yao: khoqhi" qi" ra" tung" ce' jham we' ngo naonhaung" jhao" tung" ke' rure qu" qu" ge,-
Naonhaung" re au: qid lhai: khyo re kham: yu genae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' yang: maqad maqui" deim" zag: jhan" na ko" ra" mo, wa- adao: pyae myao: ra" ja: re langa: kad' phug: qhu" nug mo, ngad: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa- Khristu nho: pyao: zang khyo: mathao mae yhin" ru maqhug' genae" qhid' mae" airu: kad' ru ngad: ako" .
Ai: au: qid lhai: khyo re kham: yu ko" ra" mo, lhao" re:- Kham" to" ra" Tarha" re maphug' cao" ngad: ako" . Naonhaung" au: qid lhai: khyo re kham: yu: rumae yao: bam qo" phug nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam wa- naonhaung" re au: qid lhai: khyo kham: yu nhao nug: ako" .
Ngadqere: ngo kam" wa- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: pyao: zang khyo we' sin: yang: za: ngo phug nae" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao" pyao: zang khyo" yang mug: myid wa nga" qhid' mae" shid: jo, mung: ngore: mug: myid: qhid' mae" shid va" .
Byu dayaug wa au: qid lhai: khyo kham: yu: ru makham: yu: ru pe" akhyag mangad:- byusag' boe" ru za: akhyag ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam: kao so' daui: rumae ce: khyo re phug' cao" ra" mo; dao mae re:- Mao" So: byu qe alhab' mo; dao mae re:- ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru we' nhag' khyag' shogu: ru wa- yao: bam alhab' we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo"-
Dao: pin" khyo" ta" nug: ru wa ana" mae"- khag' yang re: ngore qug: khai: mabyid: lo: vashao:- pe"mung: ga"re nga" gaung mae de; ra" dae jho: jham wa- ngo Yesu nho: jeim pho" ngad: rure sagse: qhu" byid' na: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa- naonhaung" alhab' mo, we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo"- Amen .
Mao" So: myid o: ru we' dakhyo:- Khristu Yesu nho: lagyo: ngad: ra" ngo Polu wa- Ephesu vogaung: mae" Mao" So: byu qe ngad ko" ra"- Khristu khug mae jhaug' zaug za: kaoso' daui: na: ra" mo, re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" Pho" Mao" So we' Asang Yesu Khristu wa naonhaung" re nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru byid: vageshao:-
Ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu yao: Pho"- Mao" So re ngonhaung" jeju caung: khin" byid: gelang:- pe"mung: ga"re- Mao" So wa mug: khaung mung"dan: mae Byo we' sin" ra" shaman" jeju ja: khao: ngo" re Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad: ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" re shaman" byid' to" ava" .
Ngonhaung" wa Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad: ra" khyo" yang yao" qhid' kheim: mae qo mabo mo, we' gyang" lho" ra" mo, boe" nae" qhid' mae" mug: myid maphan" shimae" lhao" re:- Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re khyin: yu: to" ava" .
Mao" So wa yao" jhid' de; myid mathao mae Yesu Khristu khyo" yang ngonhaung" re yao: zo: toe' nae" qhid' mae"- myid: phyid' khyin: yu: to: gau ngad; ava" . Ceru wa yao: o ngaui: ru we' yao" myid: qang: to" ru ngad: ra" .
Yao" jhid' de; ra" yao: zo: khyo" yang ngonhaung" re aphug' mamho' lo: byid' ra" . Mao" So: phungbao byang" jo; ra" nhag' myan" ra" jeju qhid' mae" ngonhaung" wa- Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" byid: gelang:-
Pe"mung: ga"re Khristu shid kham: byid' ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" wa loe; beim: ru qhug' bam va"- Airu wa qobo khyad' pye' byid: qhug' ru ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" re ai nho" myo: laug sho' byid' ra" Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa- khoqhi" sho' qi" qhang: jo; ra" i? Mao" So wa yao" laba lajhao nyan: pha,jhi" alhab' we' yao: myid: qang: to" ra" mau" zo" re zaui: so" ra" .
Yao: wa Khristu khyo" yang zaui" pin" nae" yao: myid: phyid' to: gau ngad: ra" no; thao" ra" myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo- ngonhaung" re ba nhao: ava" .
Ayo, joe" lao" zaui" pin" nae" Mao" So myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo ceru wa Khristu re au: jhaung to: mung:- Mug: gaung we' myidgaung dao mae jo; ra" phan" to" ra" gu: alhab' re daga" za: qhan" zhang: to: nae" ru ngad: ra" .
Ja: khao: ngo" wa Mao" So myid: yaung: ru we' myid' phyid' to" ru we' dakhyo:- boe" jo; ra" . Mao" So wa yao: myid: qang: ru we' dakhyo:- sao qhid' mae" yao: myid: phyid' to: va" rure cao" yang:- ngonhaung" re Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: boe" nhao mung:- Yao" byu qekhyo" Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re khyin: yu: to" ava" .
Airumung: Khristu re sao qhid' myid: lao" lo mo, ngad: ra" ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: phung bao re caung: khin" byid: gelang: .
Naonhaung" re khyad' yu: ru qhug' nhao: ra" ai: Lau Dao: Gai ga" ra"- dangman" ra" mungdao: re the' gyo" yu gelao"- naonhaung" re: Mao" So: byu qe boe" lo: ako" . Naonhaung" Khristu re lam khug mung:- Mao" So wa yao: dao: so: byid' to" ra" Gyang" Lho" Byo naonhaung" re byid' ra" khyo"- Asang ngad: ra" aso: ga" ra" dazid thaung" te' to" ava" .
Airu: Byo wa Mao" So yao" byu qere byid: nae" ga: dao: so: byid' to" ra" jeju jhaung qhu" re ngonhaung" qo" khae: yu nae" ngad: rure pakham: byid' ru ngad: ra" . Ce: khyo Mao" So wa yao" byu qere- jab sho'- loe; beim nhao nae"- ga" rure ngonhaung" myid mae nyhad' tang byid' ra" yao" phungbao re ngonhaung" caung: khin" gelang:-
Airumung:- naonhaung" wa Asang Yesu re lam khug: na ko" ra" khyo re we' Mao" So: byu alhab' mo, re jhid' de; na ko" ra" khyo re ngo the' gyo" ra" ba na mae"-
naonhaung" mathao mae ngo wa Mao" So re mathang mano: jeju caung: khin" ra" . Ngo wa naonhaung" re akyu" beim" mho' byid' na mung:-
Naonhaung" wa Mao" So re ba: li" genae" qhid' mae"- pha,jhi" ba nhao: ru we' Mao" So re qhu" byid: nae" yaug ngad: ra" Gyang" Lho" Byo naonhaung" re byid: vashao:- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: Mao" So- phungbao qi" qhang: jo; ra" Pho" re ngo mho' ra" .
Yao: naonhaung" re khoru" ra" myid: lao" khyo khyo khai: yu: ra" khyo yao" byu qere yao: dao: so: byid' to" ra" mug' pho: shaman" jeju jham wa- khoqhi" sho' qi" qhang: jo; ra" khyo-
Lam khug: ra" mo, naonhaung" khug mae khoqhi" sho' qi" qhang: ra" yao" qam: so' yang yao" mau" re zaui" na: rure:- naonhaung" ba genae" qhid' mae" yao" bo" bao re myao nae" naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: myid re phung" byid: vashao:- ngo akyu" mho' ra" . Ngonhaung" khug mae mau" zaui" na: ra" ce: qam: so' wa-
Khristu re shid: rumae" daui: li" nhao mung:- Mug: khaung: mung"dan: dao mae yao" lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo, nhao: ra" Mao" So: qi" qhang: thao" ra" qam: so' yao: ngad: ra" .
Ai: mug: khaung: mung"dan: dao mae Khristu wa- mug: gaung re eib: ra" mo,- kheim: so' qo" ra" mo,- phung qam: so' bo: ra" mo, we' asang qe alhab' mo; dao mae au: jhaung khyo" eib: ra" . Khristu wa ce: mug: myid pyad qae: mae we' joe" lo nae" pyad qae: mae kheim: so' qo" ra" mo; mang alhab' tho' mae je: myhao: thao" ra" mang qo" yaug ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa ja: cao jab alhab' re Khristu nho: khyid vo: qao: mae ke' to: byid: mung: phung" nho: qhid' mae" ja: cao jab alhab' dao mae myhao: thao" ra" Asang au: jhaung khyo" yao: re byid' to" ra" .
Ai: Phung: wa Khristu nho: gaung khyao ngad mung:- Ja: cao jab alhab' re jab byang" nhao: ra" Khristu wa ai: gaung khyao mae jab byang" jo; ra" .
Qhid' phyao: naonhaung" wa Mao" So: mho dao: magyo" ru we' qobo shad' lhoe" geyang:- Byo we' sin: yang: ashid ngad: ako" .
Ai: ayo, mae naonhaung" wa myidgaung dao mae" makhyang" ra" qobo mau" zo" thao naonhaung" cao" lo: ako" . Naonhaung" wa mug: le; phyo: mae" qam: so' bo: ra" ai: byo jham re eib: ra" yaug: nho: mho dao: re tae" gyo" lo: avako" . Ai: byo wa ana" Mao" So: mho dao: re magyo" ra" byu qere eib zo" na: ra" .
Gaigai: yao: ganhae" wa ngonhaung" re: yao: bam we' dakhyo: ngad: lo: ra" . Gaung sho: shad' khyo" ngonhaung" nho: myid kao bau: ru re cao" yang:- ngonhaung" gaung dau: we' myid nhag' lam: o ngaui kao bau: ru we' dakhyo:- kaoso' daui: lo: ra"- Airumung: ngonhaung" re: azhao: mae" khyo" sun" re su gaje qe we' dakhyo:- Mao" So: nhag' yo" rure kham: yu man" ra" mo, ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa- magan: mago" ngad: ru we' ngonhaung" re jhid' de; ra" yao" jhid' de; myid gyai qi" qhang: jo, yang:-
ngonhaung" mho dao: magyo: mung: byo mae ngonhaung" shid: jo; ra" au:- Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re Khristu we' daga" kaoso' daui: li" nhao: ra" . Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" yang khyad' yu: ru qhug' ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe; ruyang Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re mug: khaung: mung"dan: mae yao: we' daga" eib nae" qhid' mae" Khristu we' daga" daui: to" li" nhao ava" . Khristu we' daga" daui: to" li" nhao mung:- Yao: we' daga" mug: khaung: mung"dan: mae eib: na nhao: ra" .
Yao: ceru re kad' ru wa Khristu Yesu khyo" yang ngonhaung" re jhid' de; myid qhu" byid' rumae yao" nhag' myan" ra" jeju matho' mho losho' qi" qhang: jo; rure thao: qae" mae" mo, alhab' re qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa lam khug: ra" khyo" yang Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" khyad' yu: ru qhug' avako" . Aiwa naonhaung" yao" lo, mau" yang mangad:- Mao" So: jeju jhaung qhu" ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" yao: qam: ke' yang: qo" yu: ru mangad" rumung:- khag' re: magai: phug ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao" lo,mau" yang boe" na mo, ngad: ra"- Amung: ngonhaung" wa Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, yang: Mao" So: yang nyhang" jaung: to: gau ngad: ra"- gai shab: ra" mau" zo" re zaui: so: geshao: ga:- Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re phan" to" ra" .
Qhid' phyao:- Gaung sho: shad' khyo" ga" re naonhaung" wa taung bug qe ngad ko" rure myid: beim: ge,- Thung" li re cao" yang: au: qid lhai: khyo re kham: yu: ra" mo, wa naonhaung" re au: qid lhai: khyo makham: yu: ra" mo,- ga: mhang" ako" .
Ai: ayo, mae naonhaung" wa Khristu we' gao" lin: jo; ako" . Naonhaung" wa Taung bug byu qe ngad mung:- Mao" So: yang khyin: yu: to" ra" byumyu" mae mabobo ko" ngad: ra" . Yao" byumyu" qere Mao" So byid' to" ra" dao: so: mae zao: to" ra" dao: thang" mae naonhaung" mabobo ngad: ako"- Naonhaung" wa- ce: mug: myid dao mae myid: lao" nae" ru maqo"- Mao" So maqo" lo: na: lo: ako" .
Ngadqere: ana" kam" wa Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe; na va" ruyang qhid' phyao: Mao" So we' gao" lin: na: lo: ra" mo, naonhaung" wa Khristu shid kham: byid' ra" khyo" yang Mao" So we' te' lo: avako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Khristu wa Yuda byu qere we' Taung bug byu qere byumyu" damyu" za: boe" nhao mung:- ngonhaung" re ngaui pyo: yaug yo mang: dae byid' ra" . Yao: wa yao" gaung re shid kham: byid: yang:- gyevo qekhyo" byumyu" jho" kho' to: byid' ra" akyo re phyo' khyo" pye' byid' ra" .
Khristu wa ai: byumyu" shid' ja: re yao: we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, nhao yang: byumyu" asag' daja: re phan" phaug' ke' nae" qhid' mae" Yuda qe: thung" li tarha" jham we' daga"- ai: nho: amyin" dao: jham we' tarha" jham re yu: pye' ava" . Ceru: khyo" yang yao: wa shid' shad' geim" re ngaui pyo: yaug yo mang: dae byid' ra" .
Khristu wa pyao: zang dao mae shid: kham: byid' ra" khyo" yang yao: bam yao: cao: majho" nug: rure yu: pye' byid: yang:- ai: byumyu" shid' ja: re dadang: dalam: doe, nhao mung:- Mao" So jhao" yao: bam re jhui" vao lo: ava" .
Airumung:- Qhid' phyao: Mao" So we' gao" lin: na: lo: ra" mo, ngad ko" ra" naonhaung" Taung bug byu qere re:- Mao" So we' te' na: lo mo, ngad ko" ra" Yuda byu qere re: Khristu wa joe" li" mung: mang: dae byid' ra" Lau Dao: Gai mungdao: naonhaung" alhab' re kho" kyo: byid' ava" .
Taung bug byu qe we' Yuda byu qe ngad ko" ra" ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa- Gyang" Lho" Byo dayaug we' za: Pho" qhid' kheim: khyo qo" vao ye" lo" bam va" .
Airumung: ana"- naonhaung" Taung bug byu qe wa taung bug lamai: we' bang" vo qe mangad: loko" ngad: ra" . Mao" So: mung"dan: byumyu" mae bobo mung: Mao" So: yham byu qe ngad: avako" .
Naonhaung" re:- lagyo: qe we' lapa qeyang zao: qhid: to" ra" apan aqao: dao mae xo' zao: to: mo, ngad: ako" . Khristu yao: wa- ai: yham jheim mae" akhyag: thao" ra" laug baui ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa yham geim" re gang: tang sho' daga" za: jho" zaui" ci nhao: ra" yaug we' ai: yham re Mao" So re qhaug' byid' to" ra" gyang" lho" ra" Mao" So: yham boe" sho' qi" qhang: li" nhao yaug ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re: Khristu we' dadang: dalam: doe, mung:- su gaje qe alhab' we' daga"- zao: to" rure qhug' gemung:- Mao" So wa Byo khyo" na: ra" jo, qo boe" lo: ako" .
Ceru: yang naonhaung" Taung bug byu qe: mathao mae Yesu Khristu nho: kyam: byu ngad: ra" ngo Polu wa Mao" So re akyu" mho' ra" .
Mao" So wa yao" nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" yang naonhaung" qhid' mae" ngore ce: mau" byid' to" ra" khyo re naonhaung" the' gyo: gau ngad: ako" .
Mao" So wa yao" no; thao" ra" myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo ngore de: de: za: qhu" shid' byid' ra" . Ce: khyo we' sin: yang: ngo wa lang" ra" khyo" mugsug' tung" ke' va" .
Ngo tung" ke' rure naonhaung" nghe' ko" ngad: re wa- naonhaung" wa Khristu nho: no; thao" ra" myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo re ngo ba: gyo" ra" yaug ngad: rure naonhaung" qo" ba: yu: li" genae" .
Qhid' phyao: lai: lo: ra" ayo, gu: mae ce: no; thao" ra" myid: yaung: to" rure xao su byu qere maqhu" byid: ngad: ra" . Ngadqere:- Ana"- Mao" So wa ai: khyo re- yao" gyang" lho" ra" lagyo: qe we' lapa qere Byo khyo" yang qhu" byid' ava" .
Ai: no; thao" ra" myid: yaung: to" ru wa Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: khyo" yang Taung bug byu qe wa Mao" So: shaman" jeju jham re Yuda byu qe we' daga" qo" kham: yu: ako" . Yao: bam wa gaung khyao dalam: mae" gaung dau jham za: ngad mung:- Yesu Khristu khyo" yang Mao" So byid' to" ra" dao: so: rere: qo" kham: yu vako" ra"- ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Mao" So: qam: so' mau" zaui" ra" khyo" ngore byid' ra" Mao" So gakai: lai mung: ra" jeju jhaung qhu" wa ngore Lau Dao: Gai: nho: daui daui yaug boe" lo nhao: ra" .
Ngo wa Mao" So: byu qe alhab' mo, tho' je yang: ngai: thao" ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Mao" So wa Khristu nho: magan: mago" qo" ra" khyo we' sin" ra" Lau Dao: Gai Taung bug byu qere yekho" kyo: nae" we'-
Mao" So: no; thao" ra" myid: yaung: to" ru wa khoru: boe" thug' li" nae" rure mo, byu qere qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" ce: gakai: lai ngore byid' ra" . Ja: cao jab alhab' re phan" yaug Mao" So wa- yao" no; thao" ra" myid: yaung: to" rure qhid' phyao: lai: lo: ra" qae" mae" nyham" to: byid' ra" .
Yao: airu: kad' ru wa mug: khaung dao mae eib: ra" mug: lagyo: qe we' kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, wa Mao" So: pha,jhi" laba lajhao akhyo aja: ja: re ai: phung" nho: daui lab: ra" khyo" yang ba: yu genae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa yao" apyad ato: myid: qang: to" ru we' dakhyo:- ce: rure ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang zaui" boe" ru ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, mung:- Yao: re ngonhaung" lam khug: ra" khyo" yang Mao" So: qhid' kheim: khyo vae" vae" lam lam za: qo" vao ye" ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" qhid' mae" ngo kham zo" ra" qug: khai: mathao mae naonhaung" nhag' lam: mabyo, genae" qhid' mae" ngo mho' ke' ra" . Airu: kham zo" ru wa- naonhaung" alhab' mo; qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Ce: khyo mathao mae mug: gaung dao mae we' myid gaung dao mae" ug' khug' dinkhu: alhab' qo" khae: yu: ra" dangman" ra" mang byid' ra" .
Pho" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae ngo pad' thaug' thaug' mung: akyu" mho' ra" .
Ngo wa yao" phungbao mae" naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: qam: bo: li" nae" qhid' mae" yao" Byo khyo" yang naonhaung" re qam: so' byid: vashao:- Ngo Mao" So re akyu" mho' ra" .
Alao"-naonhaung" lam khug: ru khyo" yang Khristu wa naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: khug mae yao" na jo, qo toe' vashao:- ngo akyu" mho' ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Khristu nho: jhid' de; myid qhang phyao:- lae phyao:- myhao phyao:- no, phyao:- khoqhi" qi" qhang: jo; rure Mao" So: byu qe alhab' mo, we' daga" ba: gyo" ra" qam: so' qo" yu genae" qhid' mae" jhid' de; ra" myid mae naonhaung" apan aqao:- agyi: taui" na geshao:- ngo akyu" mho' ra" .
Ngad va"- Khristu nho: jhid' de; myid re jab byang" sho' magai: ba: gyo: ngadqere:- yao" jhid' de, myid re naonhaung" ba: li" mung:- Mao" So: jab byang" ra" ave, we' dakhyo: yao:- naonhaung" jab byang" li" geshao:- akyu" mho' ra" .
Ngonhaung" khug mae mau" zaui" na: ra" yao" nho: qam: so' khyo" yang ngonhaung" mho' yao: ra" ja: we' myid: ra" ja: tho' re je yang: qo" zaui" boe" ra" Mao" So wa-
Ai: Phung: mae we' Yesu Khristu mae apyad ato phungbao qi" qhang: jo, vashao: wo"- Amen .
Airumung: Asang re caung da" byid: yaug kyam: byu ngad: ra" ngo wa Mao" So: yang naonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" au:- Yao: mhai" to: byid' ra" azhao" re myhi: ra" kaoso' daui khyo mae kaoso' daui genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re jhan" ke' ra" .
Khonhae" re: nhag' lam: nyham: khyo" mung: nau" nhae" ru we' nhag' lam: qhang ge,- dayaug we' dayaug jho" zang: kham byid' ra" khyo" naonhaung" jhid' de; myid re jho" qhu" ge,-
Ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru khyo" yang naonhaung" re dadang: dalam: za: boe" nhao: ra" ai: Byo: yang byid' ra" myid jho" vang" rure nyang" za: zaui" zag: ci ge, .
Naonhaung" re Mao" So khai: yu: rumae myid: lao" nae" ru daja: za: mae khai: yu: ru ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" gaung khyao dalam: we' Byo dayaug za: ngad: ra" .
Asang dayaug za:- lam khug: khyo dalam: za:- qid nyhab' dalam: za: ngad: ra" .
Xao su byu alhab' mo; yao: Pho" ngad: ra" Mao" So re: date: za: ngad: ra"- Yao: wa byu alhab' mo; dao mae Asang kad' na mung:- byu alhab' mo, re ci yang: mau" zaui" na: ru we' byu alhab' mo; khug mae na: jo; ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Khristu byid' ra" gakai: lai: ra" jeju jhaung qhu" re dano" no" za: ngonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" qo" khae: yu: bam va" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae Yao: wa gyai myhao: ra" jo, qo khyo do, lo" ra" au:- Yao: we' daga" kyam: byu myo: sho' re jhui" do, lo" mung:- Yao: wa xao su byu qere jeju jhaung qhu" byid' ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Ana" ce:- yao: do, lo" ra" ga" ru wa- pe" re ga" ru ngad: ra" i? Airu wa- yao: wa nyham: thao" ra" myid gaung pyae khyo sao qhid' joe" gyo" li" rure ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Airu: gyo" li" ra" yaug wa mug: gaung myid gaung alhab' mae yao" phungbao we' byang" nhao nae" qhid' mae" mug: gaung pyae myo: sho' khyo lai: do, lo" ra" yaug yao: ngad: ava" .
Xao su byu qere jeju jhaung qhu" jham gae byid' ra" yaug re: yao: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa damyo" re wa lagyo:- damyo" re lapa- damyo" re ngaui bau" lau dao: kho" kyo: mo,- damyo" re Phung: jhui: mo, we' mho" pho" qekhyo" san: to" ra" .
Yao: ceru: kad' ru wa Khristu nho: gaung khyao re zao: to' nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: byu alhab' mo, re Khristan: mau" zo" jid: zo" qhid' mae" seim" nyhang" byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Aimung: ngonhaung" nho: lam khug: myid we' Mao" So: yao: zo: re ngonhaung" ba jhao: ra" khyo mae ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa- dadang: dalam: za: doe, mung:- Khristu nho: qi" qhang jab byang" ra" azhao" re myhi: ra" qi" qhang: ra" zoqao" qe boe" nae" ngad: ra" .
Ailao"- ngonhaung" wa Pha,jhi" khyug' yang: su re khyonghung: nghung: nhao: ra" mhug' pyag' ra" mo; mho" shid' dao:- la hug' khoru: hug' re khoru: bang: lhung" khug mae bomyung: qin" ra" zoshao qe we' dau lo nae" mangad:-
Ai: atha" ngonhaung" wa dangman" ra" dao: re jhid' de; myid we' jhau mo, boe" mung:- ja: khao: ngo" mae au: ngad: ra" Khristu shad' khyo qi" qhang: li" nae" ngad: ra" .
Khristu yao" yang eib khang" ra" qao: mae majho" dau: ra" gaung dau jham wa yao: yao: vin vo; ang: ra" mau" re vin vo; gelao"- gaung khyao geim" qi" qhang: li" mung:- jhid' de, myid: yang gang" tang: li" nhao: ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa Mao" So re maba mo, we' dakhyo:- xo' yang: kaoso' madaui genae" qhid' mae" ngo wa Asang: mang re lao: yang: naonhaung" re ta" peim: byid' ra" . Yao: bam myid: ra" khyo jham wa akeim ngad mung:- yao: bam: myid nyan: re: cad' jo; ako" .
Yao: bam wa maba mabeim: nhag' cad' noyaug ngad mung: nhag' lam: qao ko" ruyang- Mao" So byid' ra" kaoso' daui khyo mae mabo: bo ko" ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa qho' gyaug myid dajhid' re: mabo logeyang:- Yao: bam: gaung re gaung sho: shab' mhin: rumae au: am: mung:- masan masin" ra" mau" zo" aja: ja: re lo, lae vha zaui" ako" .
Airu wa Khristu we' sin: yang: naonhaung" zhao: yu: ra" khyodang mangad: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Khristu nho: khyo re gaigai: yao: the' gyo" qu" mung:- yao" mho"zo: qe khyo" Yesu nho: dangman" ra" khyo re naonhaung" mho" zhao: yu: avako" .
Airumung:- qhid' phyao: naonhaung" kad' min" lo ko" ra" ave, xug' jham re yu: pye' ge, . Mhug' pyag' ba: ra" gaung sho: obyid kao bau: ruyang phyo' qheim" pye' ba: ra" kaoso' daui khyo axug' re shapye' pye' ge,-
Naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: we' myid wa alhab' asag' kad' pye' qo: ra" .
Mao" So: ve, lho we' dau: ra" khyo" phan" ru qhug' mung: kaoso' daui: ra" khyo mae dang man" rure qhu" byid' ra" dangman" ru we' gyang" lho" ra" ve,khyao asag' re naonhaung" zhaung" ve; yu ca" ra" .
Airumung:- damhug' loge,- Ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa- Khristu nho: gaung khyao mae" gaung dau jham ngad: ruyang yaug khao: ngo" wa lam khug: ra" yao" mao: nhaung: pho" re dang: ra" dao: za: ta" na ca" ra" .
Naonhaung" nhag' yo: gengadqere:- qobo dakad' ge,- ba gyam sho' nhag' dayo: ge,-
Satan re jo, qo daqhui" ge, .
Khug' zo" qu" ra" yaug wa khug' zo" ra" mau" zo" re thang: pye' mung:- myaung sho" ra" mo, re qo" bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" we' yao: yao" gaung re kaoso' khau nae" qhid' mae" din: din: man: man: za: yao" lo; yang mau" zaui: vashao: .
Su re nhag' no nhao: ra" dao: qeim dajhau ge,- su re akyu" byid' ra" dao:- qo ca" ru mae bao" thaug' tau: to' byid' ra" dao: jham re za: jhau ge, . Ailao" za:- naonhaung" dao: re gyo" yu: ra" mo; qhid' mae" akyu" bo: li" nae" .
Amung:- Mao" So: Gyang" Lho" Byo re dakaug' nhao ge,- pe"mung: ga"re ai: Byo wa- naonhaung" re Mao" So sang: ra"- ga" ra" aso: dazid ngad mung:- lo" thao" ba na joe" li" lao"- Mao" So wa naonhaung" re loe; beim nhao nae"- ga" ra" pakham: aso: re: ngad: ra" .
Airumung:- nhag' no: jo; ru- nhag' yo" ru- nhag' lam: lang" ru- zag: shad' ru- su re roe" ru- su re nghang" ra" ja:- alhab' re shapye' pye' ge, .
Amung:- naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" jhid'- jho" nhag' khyag' na ge,- Mao" So wa Khristu khyo" yang naonhaung" qobo re khyad' byid: va" ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" yao: cao: re: dayaug we' dayaug: qobo re jho" khyad' byid: ge, .
Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: jhid' de; ra" zo: dau qe ngad ko" ruyang yao: we' dau sho' qam: ke' qo: ako" .
Khristu wa ngonhaung" re jhid' de; mung:- ngonhaung" qhid' mae" yao" kaoso' re Mao" So ngaui: ra" sheim nae pyo" ra" ngaui" xeim: khyo" xeim: ngaui" byid' ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" kaoso' daui: ra" khyo mae re:- jhid' de; myid: yang khyo shid' khang" ra" khyo" kaoso' daui ge, .
Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: byu qe ngad ko" ruyang gaung sho: gintho' mau" zo" maqu" dau: ra" ave,- aja: ja: we' so' kho' obyid: ru we' sin: yang:- naonhaung" phaung gaung: mae ta" lhao" data" thug' ge, .
Dao: co' dao: qeim- ako" asho: dao:- nghin" she' dao: jham re: naonhaung" majhau ang ko" ngad: ra" . Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" byid' ra" dao: za:- naonhaung" jhau ang: ako" .
Gaung sho" nho: gintho' mau" zaui" ra" yaug- maqu" dau: ra" ave,- so' kho' obyid: ra" yaug- khag' ngadqere: Khristu we' Mao" So: mung"dan: re khonhae" re: maqo" khae: yu nae" ru re naonhaung" nyang" za: ba: ako" . ( so' kho' obyid: ru wa solho re goe; pa" ru daja: ngad: ra" )
Dao: je dao: keim: yang naonhaung" re khag' damhug' pyag' nhao ge, . Ai: mathao mae Mao" So: mho dao: re matae" gyo" ra" mo; au: dao mae Mao" So: nhag' yo" ru joe" li" li" nae" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa airu" mo, we' dajhid' re: dazam" ge,-
Naonhaung" yao: re: qhid' phyao: wa mug: cad' khug mae na: lo mo, ngad: ako" . Ngadqere: ana" naonhaung" wa Asang: nho: byu qe boe" lo vako" ruyang mug: bo" khug mae ngad: avako" . Airumung: mug: bo" khug mae" byu qe we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" re: kaoso' daui ge, .
Pe"mung: ga"re mug: bo" wa- gai shab: ru aja: ja:- din: man" ru- dangman" ru- jham re myo" laug: li" nhao: ra" .
Asang o ngaui: ru pe" ja: ngad: rure qam: ke' yang: zhao: yu ge, .
Mug: cad' khug mae na ko" ra" mo, kad' ko" ra" lo,mau" jham re macao" kad' lo:- ai: lo, mau" jham re mug: bo" shad' khyo phoe' qhu" byid: ge, .
( Yao: bam anyham: avho' mae kad' ko" ra" ai: lo,mau" jham re ta" nae" lhao" re:- gyai yao: aqho' axag' ngad: ra" . )
Ja: khao: ngo" wa bo" bao shad' khyo ci thug' qhu" byid' ru qhug' lao"- yao: bam yao" lo, mau" ave, gyang" wa- de: de: za: myao: thug' li" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re de: de: za: ci: qhu" to" ra" ja: pe" ngadqere:- bo" bao boe" lo: ra" . Airumung: yab: jo; ra" yaug we"- To" wa,- Shid: rumae" daui: to" li" wa,- Khristu wa nao re bao byid' li" nae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" khoru: kaoso' daui ko" ra" khyo re ku yang: lha" ge,- adu: adae: mung mo, re" ru: mangad:- Pha,jhi" bo: ra" mo, re" ru:- kaoso' daui ge, .
Ce: ayo, ba na jham wa makhyang" ra" ayo, ba na jham ngad: ruyang naonhaung" qo" ra" akho: akhang" khao: ngo" re akyu" bo: ra" khyo" ci ge, .
Airumung: dago dapyan ge,- Asang naonhaung" re pe" ja: kad' nhao nug: rure qam: ke' yang: pha: qho ge, .
Yhid dashaug' yid ge,- Aiwa naonhaung" re byo; qeim: lo" nhao: li" nae" . Ai: atha" Gyang" Lho" Byo we' byang" jo, ge,-
caung: khin" dao:- nghaui" caung: dao:- caung: pa" ru we' sin" ra" nghaui" caung: dao jham we' naonhaung" yao: cao:- jho" jhau mung:- naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: mae Asang re jeju caung: khin" zo" re"nghaui"caung: dao: we' caung: khin" dao: khyo" nghaui" caung: khin" na ge, .
Naonhaung" wa Yesu Khristu mang a re lao: yang:- ja: khao: ngo" qhid' mae" khonhae" re: Pho" Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" ge, .
Naonhaung" wa Khristu re phug' myao: mo, ngad ko" ruyang- dayaug myid o: rure dayaug myid jho" cao" byid: ge, .
Yham sang myhi" qe we"- Asang eib khang" ru re kham: yu ko" ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" yham sang pho" qe: eib khang" rure kham: yu ge, .
Pe"mung: ga"re Khristu wa ai: Phung: dao mae kheim: so' qo" yaug ngad: ru we' dakhyo: yham sang pho" wa yham sang myhi" dao mae kheim: so' qo" yaug ngad: ra" . Khristu yao: yao: wa- yao" gaung khyao ngad: ra" ai: Phung" nho: khyad' yu: ra" Asang ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Phung: wa Khristu eib khang" ru kham: yu: ru we' dakhyo:- yham sang myhi" qere: yao: bam: yham sang pho" qeyang eib khang" rure bin sho' kham: yu ca" ra" .
Yham sang pho" qe we"- Khristu wa ai: Phung: re jhid' de; mung: ai: Phung" qhid' mae" yao" kaoso' re byid' pye' ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" yham sang myhi" qere jhid' de; ge, .
Khristu yao" kaoso' re byid' pye' ru wa ai: Phung: re qid mae bin: cid' san: pye' lao"- yao" mungdao" yang Mao" So re qhaug' byid: mung:-
