ai: Phung: wa gyang" san: ru we' pe" maqo: ru- abe, alhau: pe" khu madung- anyhaung ajhoe' mabo- majab byang" ru pe" mabo lo:- yaung" lho" ru we' Khristu yao: re qhaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Yauggai qe wa yao: bam yao" gaung re yao: bam jhid' de; ru we' dakhyo- yao: bam: yham sang myhi" qere jhid' de; qo: ako" . Yham sang myhi" re jhid' de; ra" yaug wa- yao: yao" gaung re jhid' de; ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
( Khag' re: yao: yao" gaung re nghang" ra" yaug mana ngad: ra" . Nghang: nae" atha"- Khristu wa ai: Phung: re zo: ve: yang khau mung: gun caung: ru we' dakhyo:- aiyaug wa yao" gaung re zo: ve: yang khau mung: gun caung: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa Khristu nho: gaung khyao mae" gaung dau jham ngad: ra" . )
Jham: Mugsug' mae ce: khyo mathao mae yauggai wa yao: pho" we' yao: myhi" re to: co' yang:- yao: yao" yham sang myhi" we' yezam" khug mung: yao: shid' zo: wa- dagaung dasho: za: boe" byaug: li" genae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ce: Jham: dao: mae gyai no; thao" ra" dang man" ra" khyo re qhu" byid' ru ngad mung:- Khristu we' Phung: re qang yang:- ta" ru ngad: ra" khyo" ngo ba: gyo" ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" rere: qang yang: ta" ru ngad: ra" . Yham sang pho" yaug khao: ngo" wa- yao" yham sang myhi" re yao: yao" gaung re we' dakhyo:- jhid' de; ca" ra" . Amung: yham sang myhi" yaug khao: ngo" wa yao: yao" yham sang pho" re phug' myao: ca" ra" .
Zo: dau qe we"- Naonhaung" nho: myhi" pho" qe: mho dao: re tae" gyo: ge, . Pe"mung: ga"re airu wa Khristan: Phung: byu qe zaui: ang: ra" mau" zo" ngad: ra" .
Nao- na: qo" na: dai mung:- ai: mung"dan: mae kao qhang sho' qo" na nae" qhid' mae" ni" myhi" we' ni" pho" tao re phug' myao: wa,-
ga" ra" amyin" dao: wa- sao qhid' mae" dao: thang" bo: ra" amyin" dao: ngad: ra" .
Myhi" pho" qe we"- Naonhaung" nho: zo: dau qere nhag' dazai" yho: ge,- Ai: atha" yao: bam re Khristan: tarha" we' dakhyo:- mho" shid' mho" peim: byid: mung:- khau: qhi: ge,-
Jeim qe we"- Khristu nho: mho dao: re tae" gyo" ru we' dakhyo:- gyaug: nin" zo" re" nhag' lam: dapyae za: vin mung:- naonhaung" asang qe: mho dao: re tae" gyo: ge, .
Asang qe qu" na ko" au: yao: bam o ngaui nae" khyo" za: makad' lo:- Khristu nho: jeim qe ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- Mao" So o ngaui: ra" khyo" naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: alhab' we' caung da" byid: ge, .
Byu re caung da" byid' ra" khyo" za: mangad:- Asang re caung da" byid' ra" khyo"- naonhaung" mau" zo" re bau: bau: za: vin vo; ge,-
Asang wa jeim re ngadqere:- jeim mangad: yaug re ngadqere:- yaug khao: ngo" re yao: zaui: so" ra" gai: ra" mau" zo" qhid' mae" jhaung qhu" byid: nae" ngad: rure myid: beim: ge,-
Asang qe we"- Naonhaung" re: ai we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" jeim qere zam" khug ge,- kyaug' nhin" ra" dao: re thang: pye' ge,- Naonhaung" we' naonhaung" jeim qe wa mug: gaung dao mae Asang dayaug za: ngad mung:- ai: Asang wa yaug khao: ngo" re mai qhi" yang: dao: kho' ra" yaug ngad: rure naonhaung" myid: beim: ge, .
Asang we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, mung:- yao" qam: bo: thao" ra" qam: so' khyo" yang naonhaung" qam: bo: jo, genae" qhid' mae" dao: pin" khyo" ngo ta" nug: ra" .
Yui: yang mhug' pyag' ra" makhyang" ra" pha,jhi" khyug' rure naonhaung" qo" thaug' kham" pye' genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So byid' ra" gyekhin alhab' re yu: ve; ci ge, .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa xao su byu qe we' gye jho" khe' na: ru mangad:- mug: gaung mae" makhyang" ra" byo jham we' re:- zug: qe we' re: kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, we' re:- ce: mug: cad' myid gaung re eib: ra" mo, we' re:- gye jho" khe' na: ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung:- Mao" So: gyekhin re yu: ve, ge,- makhyang" ra" ba na joe" lo lao"- naonhaung" wa gyevo qere qo" thaug' kham" pye' li" genae" . Gye bin: khe' aung: pye' thao rere:- naonhaung" wa tang za: qo" ye; jo; li" genae" .
Amung: naonhaung" phyid' dam: mae dangman" ru ga" ra" phyid' cui: re tang za: cui" ci mung:- dinman" ru ga" ra" qao nghoe' re nghoe' ci yang:-
ngaui pyo: yaug yo: runho: Lau Dao: Gai re kho" kyo: nae" jin" jin" ngad: ra" khyid zhaung: re zhaung" ci ge, .
Lam khug: ru ga" ra" go re khonhae" re: zaui" ci ge,- Naonhaung" wa ai: go: yang makhyang" ra" yaug ngad: ra" yui: yang bag: ke' ra" myishae de; ra" myo: jham alhab' re qo" se' pye' li" genae" .
Khyad' yu: rure khae: yu: ru ga" ra" jo,to' maug re zhaung: mung:- Byo: yang byid' ra" Mao" So: mungdao: ga" ra" shae pyang: re yu: vin: ci ge,-
Mao" So: yang bao" thaug' byid' rure qo" kham: yu genae" qhid' mae" khonhae" re: akyu" mho' na ge,- Byo: yang khyoqhid' au: she: ru we' dakhyo:- yo, gin khao: ngo" mae akyu" mho' ge,- beim: so: lha" na mung:- qam: dashan ge,- Mao" So: byu qe alhab' qhid' mae" khonhae" re: akyu" bao" mho' byid' na ge,-
Ngo mungdao: kho" kyo" ra" au: re- Mao" So wa ngore mungdao: byid: nae" qhid' mae" we' ngo wa Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao" nho: no; thao" ra" lajheim: re mazag mavae qo" pheim: kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae"- nga" qhid' mae" re: akyu" bao" mho' byid: gela, .
Ngo wa ana" thaung: laung" jo, ngadqere:- ce: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: mathao mae ngo wa lagyo: dayaug ngad: ra" . Ngo wa ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: khyo re kho" kyo: ang: ru we' dakhyo:- vae" vae" za: kho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" akyu" bao" mho' byid: gela, .
Ngo khoru: ngad: na: rure naonhaung" qo" ba: yu geshao:- ai: Asang: mau" vin rumae vin tang: kyid yaug ngad: ra" ngonhaung" jhid' de; ra" mao: nhaung: pho" Tukhiku wa- naonhaung" re nga" khyo alhab' jab jab za: li" ta" kyo" li" nae" .
Aimung:- ngonhaung" alhab' mo; khyo re naonhaung" re ta" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" we' naonhaung" re qam: byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa yao: re naonhaung" jhao" nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra" .
Pho" Mao" So we' Asang Yesu Khristu wa Khristan: Phung: byu qe alhab' mo, re- ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru- jhid' de; ru we' lam khug: ru shaman" byid: vashao:-
Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa khonhae" re: mabyo, maqeim: ra" jhid' de; myid we' Asang Yesu Khristu re jhid' de; na ko" ra" mo; dao mae jo, jo, vashao: wo" .
Khristu nho: jeim tao ngad: ra" Polu we' Timothi wa Philipi vogaung: mae na ko" ra" phung: zam: qe we' Phung: tau qe bobo yang: Yesu Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: ngad: na ko" ra" Mao" So: byu qe alhab' re mugsug' tung" vhin: ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" Pho" Mao" So we' Asang Yesu Khristu wa- nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ra" jeju naonhaung" re shaman" byid: vageshao: wo" .
Naonhaung" re myid: beim: khao: ngo"- ngo wa Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai mau" zo" mae qhid: ra" ba na mae" ana" ba joe" sho' bobao" thaug' byid: geyang:-
Ngo wa naonhaung" alhab' mo; qhid' mae" akyu" mho' khao: ngo" ngaui bau" ru we' akyu" mho' ra" .
Aimung:- naonhaung" mae ce: gai shab: ra" mau" re zaui" qhid: ra" Mao" So wa- Yesu Khristu nho: ba na joe" sho' ai: mau" zo" re bin sho' zaui" li" nae"-ein: ngo myid: lam: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa khonhae" re: nga" nhag' lam: khug mae bo: jo; ako" . Amung: ngo naonhaung" khyo re ceru: myid: lam: ru wa nga" qhid' mae" gai ang: ra" khyo ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ana" ngo thaung: laung" na: au: re we' Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai re galin: gago: ta" vha mung:- aire zhaug' tang: rumae naonhaung" wa Mao" So: yang ngore ab byid' to" ra" ce: gakai: lai ngad: ra" akho: akhang" mae naonhaung" alhab' ngo we' bovin vo; lo mo, ngad: ako" .
Ngo wa Yesu Khristu nho: jhid' de; kao taui: myid we' naonhaung" re myid: na: ru dang: ra" khyo nga" sagse: wa Mao" So ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa gai: thao" ra" ja: re qo" ba: khyin: yu genae" qhid' mae" dangman" ra" laba lajhao we' ba: kho' ba: kin: ra" myid pha,jhi" jab byang" mung:- naonhaung" jhid' de, myid xo' yang: qi" qhang: ra" tho' je: qi" qhang: li" vashao:- ngo akyu" mho' ra" .
Airulao"- naonhaung" wa Khristu nho: Ba Na mae qobo vhin: rumae" we' masan masin" ru alhab' mae" naonhaung" loe; beim: li" genae" .
Naonhaung" wa phungbao bao nae" we' Mao" So re caung: khin" byid: nae" qhid' mae" Yesu Khristu za: ashi: qo" zaui: nhao: ra" dangman: gai lho" ra" gao: qam: jham byang" sheim: jo; li" genae" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo mae boe" ra" khyo jham wa- Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: je: byo: sin" lo" nae" khyo re gaigai: yao: bao" thaug' byid' rure ngo naonhaung" re ba nhao nug: ra" .
Ngo wa Khristu nho: daui daui yaug ngad yang:- thaung: mae laung" jo; rure kho: kham kho" zaung" ra" gyetab tab geim" we' cetau mae na ko" ra" mo, alhab' ba: ako" .
Airu: ngo thaung: laung" ra" mathao mae lam khug: ra" Khristan mao: nhaung: qe myo: sho' wa- Asang re lam khug: myid je yang: bo: li" mung:- yao: bam wa Mao" So: mungdao: kho" kyo" rumae re:- magyaug maci" lo:- je: vae" li" ako" .
Yao: bam mae" damyo" wa- myid nug' ra" myid we' myan" myo: nug: ra" myid: yang Khristu nho: khyo re kho" kyo" ako" . Ngadqere: damyo" wa- gyang" ra" kao bau myid we' kho" kyo" ako" .
Ngo wa Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re gug: gam qhaung byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yang san: to: yaug ngad: rure yao: bam ba geyang:- aibam wa jhid' de; myid we' kho" kyo" ako" .
Damyo" wa- Khristu nho: khyo re nhag' lam: din: din: za: mangad: lo:- yao: yao" qhid' mae" za: so' kho' ra" myid we' kho" kyo" ako" . Yao: bam wa ngo thaung: laung" na: ra" au:- ngore qug: khai: je: laug sho' kad' nae"- ga: myid: ako" .
Airu wa akhyag mangad:- geim kad' myid we' kho" kyo" ru ngad: re ngad- nhag' lam: din: din: za: kho" kyo" ru ngad: re ngad- gai: boe" ra" khyo khe' khao: ngo" mae Khristu nho: khyo re kho" kyo" ru ngad yang: ngo ngaui bau" ra"- xo' yang: ngaui bau" na nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" akyu" mho' dao: mathao: yang re:- Khristu Yesu nho: Byo: yang bao" thaug' byid' ra" khyo" yang re:- ngo loe; beim: na: rure ngo ba yang: ngad: ra" .
Nga" kao bau: ru we' myid: lao" ru wa- ngo wa vin vo; ang: ra" ngoyao" qo re vin vo' rumae qho' maphau: nae" we' khonhae" re: ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- ana" re: je yang:- ngo wa kaoso' daui ngadqere:- shid ngadqere:- nga" dao: thoe lo, mau" alhab' yang Khristu re phug' te' nga: yhe' byid: nae" qhid' mae" mazag mavae myid bo nae" ru ngad: ra" .
Ta" gelang: ga" re kaoso' daui: ga" ru wa- nga" qhid' mae" wa- Khristu ngad: ra" . Airumung: shid: ga"ru wa nga" qhid' mae" je: akyu" bo: li" nae" .
Ngadqere:- ngo wa kaoso' xo' daui: na: ra" khyo" yang mau" zo" je: qo" zaui: so: nae" ngad: re wa kaoso' daui: ru we' shid: ru shid' ja: mae" khoja: re khyin: yu nae" rure ngo khyag' maba ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa nhag' lam: shid' gao boe" jo; ra"- ngo wa ce: kaoso' daui: na: ra" qae" mae" gao: mung: Khristu we' daga" gyai na nug: ra" . Airu wa je: gai: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" akyu" qhid' mae" ngo kaoso' daui: na shinae" ru wa- je yang: akhyag: ra" .
Ceru re ngo nyang" za: ba mung:- ngo xo' yang: dam: na nae" rure ngo ba:- naonhaung" qi" qhang: li" ru we' lam khug: rumae ngaui bau" rure myo" laug: li" nhao nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" we' daga" xo' yang: ngo dam: na shinae" .
Airumung: ngo naonhaung" jhao" dam: joe" li" lao"- Khristu we' naonhaung" dadang: dalam: za: doe; rumae" nga" khyo we' sin: mung:- phug nae" akhyo naonhaung" je: qo" li" genae" .
Ana" akhyag: ru wa- Khristu nho: Ngaui Bau" Lau dao: we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" kaoso' daui nae" ru ngad: ra" . Airumung: ngo naonhaung" re li" qo" qhug' ngadqere:- maqo" li" qhug' ngadqere:- naonhaung" wa myid: qang: ru daja: mae za:- kao bau myid o: ru daja: za: we' naonhaung" tang za: ye; jo, mung:- qam: ke' yang: myid: kao bau: ra" daja: za:- ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: we' sin" ra" lam khug: ra" gyekhe' na ko" rure ngo the' gyo" ra" .
Naonhaung" gyevo qere dagyaug ge,- khonhae" re: mazag mavae na ge,- ceru wa- yao: bam wa seim" nae" ngad: ru we' naonhaung" wa aung doe, nae" ngad: rure sagse: qhu" byid' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" re aung doe, nhao: ra" yaug wa Mao" So ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa Khristu re lam khug: ra" khyo" za: mangad:- yao" qhid' mae" khyag' qhui: ru kham zo" ra" khyo" re:- Khristu re caung da" byid: nae" qhid' mae" gakai: lai: ra" agu re qo" kham: yu: ako" .
Ana" naonhaung" wa gyekhe' poe mae ngo we' daga" qo" bobo: avako" . Ai: gyekhe' poe wa qhid' phyao: ngo gyekhe' na: au: naonhaung" the' myao mung:- ana" re: gyekhe' na: rure naonhaung" the' myao: ra" gyekhe' poe yao: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" Khristu we' kaoso' daui: ru wa naonhaung" re qam: bo: li" nhao mung:- yao" jhid' de; myid wa naonhaung" re nhag' tang" byid' ra" . Naonhaung" wa ai: Byo we' qo" zam" khug gemung:- naonhaung" wa yao: cao: jho" nhag' khyag' shono myid bo: ako" .
Airumung:- naonhaung" myid: ru daja: za:- yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; ra" myid daja: za: we' nhag' lam: myid jho" qhan" ra" khyo" yang- ngore jab byang" sho' ngaui bau: nhao gela,- ein: ngo naonhaung" re jhan" ke' ra" .
Yao: yao" qhid' mae" za: so' kho' ra" myid- mangad: lao"- langa: kad' yang: phug nug: ra" myid we' pe" ja: re: dakad' ge,- Yao: cao: nhag' lam: jho" nyham: khyo" mung:- byin cao: qere khonhae" re: yao: yao: tho' je: ra" yaug ngad: ra" ein: myid: yu ge, .
Yao: yao" qhid' mae" za: akyu" maqho lo:- yao: cao: dayaug we' dayaug: akyu" qhid' mae" qho ge,-
Yesu Khristu mae bo: ra" myid wa naonhaung" mae re: bo nhao ge, .
Yao: wa Mao" So: ave, akhyao khonhae" re: bo: jo, yaug ngadqere:- maqad maqui" deim" zag: ra" khyo" yao: wa Mao" So we' daqi" za: boe" nae" qhid' mae" qam: make' ngad: ra" .
Airu: kad' nae" atha"- yao: wa yao: yao" myid re nyham: khyo" yang: yao: qo" ra" gu: alhab' re to" pye' mung:- daui daui yaug: nho: ave, akhyao re kham: yu: ra" . Yao: wa xao su byu we' dau: li" mung:- xao su byu: ave, akhyao re kham: yu: ra" .
Yao: wa yao: yao" gaung re nyham: khyo" pye' mung:- shid nae" rumae joe" sho' mho dao: gyo" ra" . Pyao: zang dao mae shid sho' mho dao: tae" gyo" ra" .
Ce: mathao mae Mao" So wa- yao: re myhao: thao" ra" jo, qo joe" sho' tau: to' byid: mung:- Mang alhab' tho' qi" qhang: ra" mang a re ab byid' ra" .
Airumung:- Mug: gaung- myidgaung we' myidgaung mae na: ra" mo, alhab' wa- Khristu nho: mang a re phug' myao: goe; pa" mung:-
Yesu Khristu wa Asang ngad: ra"- ga: de: de: za: ta" hau" kyo: gemung:- Pho" Mao" So: phungbao re bao nhao: li" genae" .
Airu: mung:- jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- ngo naonhaung" we' daga" na: au:- nga" mho dao: re naonhaung" khonhae" re: tae" gyo: ko" ru we' dakhyo:- ana" ngo naonhaung" we' va" kyo: na: au: re: nga" mho dao: re naonhaung" tae" gyo: nae" gyai akhyag: ra" .
Mao" So yao"myid o: ra" khyo re phug' cao" nug: ra" myid we' qo" phug' cao" nae" qam: so' Mao" So: yang khonhae" re: ke' byid' na: ruyang- naonhaung" wa khyad' yu: rure jab byang" sho' qo" kham: yu nae" qhid' mae" gyaug: nin" ra" myid we' zaui: so" na ge,-
Ja: khao: ngo" re majho" nyhung- majho" ngag lo: zaui: so: ge,-
airu: lao"- naonhaung" wa- makhyang: mashab: akyang qeim qobo shad' lhoe" ra" mo, na: ra" ce: mug: myid dao mae Mao" So: jab byang" ra" zo: dau qe khyo"- qobo vhin nae" made; ru we' yaung" shab: ra" mo, ngad: li" genae" . Amung: naonhaung" wa yao: bam re kaoso' mungdao: kho" kyo: byid: zo" re"- mug: gaung mae kyi bao: jo; ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam: phaung gaung: mae naonhaung" bao byid: ca" ko" ra" .
Naonhaung" airu: kad' ko" ngad: re wa- ngo qam: ke' zaui: so" lo: ra" mau" zo" alhab' wa- aje amyid mangad' rure qhu" byid' li" nae" ngad: ruyang- Khristu joe" li" ra" Ba Na mae ngo wa naonhaung" mathao mae phug nae" akhyo qo" li" nae" .
Naonhaung" nho: lam khug: myid: yang Mao" So re qhaug' byid' ra" ngaui" xeim: dao mae nga" kaoso' sa: re vhe' sheim: nae" ga: ngadqere: ngo wa ngaui bau" ra" . Ngo we' daga" naonhaung" alhab' mo, rere: bobau: nhao nug: ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo: naonhaung" re: ngaui bau: ge,- amung: naonhaung" we' daga" ngo rere: ngaui bau: nhao gela, .
Asang myid: o yang: ngad: re ngo wa naonhaung" lau thoe re the' gyo: yang:- qam: qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" mataung" myao" re Timothi re naonhaung" jhao" qo" nhao: ke' li" nae"- ein: ngo myid: lao" na: .
Timothi dayaug za: ngo we' nhag' lam: jho" zhaung: yaug ngad mung:- yao: wa gaigai: yao: naonhaung" gai nae" rure myid byid' na yaug ngad: ra" .
Gaje qe yaug khao: ngo" wa Khristu we' sin" ra" khyo mae mangad:- yao: yao: we' sin" ra" khyo mae za:- gaung yug sang: kho" ako" .
Timothi wa mau" zaui: khoqhi" kyid yaug ngad: rure we' yao: we' ngo wa yao: pho" we' yao: zo: ru: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: pyo: ra" mau" zo" mae daga" za: khoru: zaui: so" lo: rure naonhaung" yao: ba: ako" .
Airumung: nga" khyo we' sin: yang:- khoru: ngad nae" rure ba lao" jao"- yao: re naonhaung" jhao" ngo qo" nhao: ke' li" nae"- ein:- myid: lao" na: .
Amung:- ngoyao" gaung yao: re:- mataung" myao" re naonhaung" jhao" qo" joe" li" nae"- ein: Asang: khug mae ngo myid: lam: na: .
Nga" mau" zaui: cao:- ngo we' daga" gyekhe' lo: ra" yaug- naonhaung" lagyo: khyo" ngore caung da" byid: yaug ngad: ra" naonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" Epaphrodi re naonhaung" jhao" nhao: ke' byid: ca" ra"- ein: ngo myid: to: va" .
Yao: wa naonhaung" alhab' mo, we' gyai jho" myao nug: na: ra" . Yao: no: ra" lau thoe re naonhaung" the' gyo: vako" ruyang yao: gyai myid myo" na: ra" .
Dang za: yao: wa- alaug shid sho' no: pye' ava" . Ngadqere: Mao" So wa- yao: re nhag' khyag' byid' ra" . Mao" So wa yao: re za: nhag' khyag' byid' ru mangad:- ngo rere: nhag' khyag' mung: je: qi" ra" kaug' qhui: ru ngore maqhug' nhao ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yao: re naonhaung" dam: myao gelao"- ngaui bau: genae" qhid' mae" we' nga" nho: kaug' qhui: ra" khyo re: baui" byaug vashao:- yao: re naonhaung" jhao" nhao: ke' byid: nae" nga" aung khug mae je yang: myid: kao bau: na: .
Amung: naonhaung" wa yao: re- Asang: khug mae mao: nhaung: dayaug we' dakhyo:- ngaui ngaui bau: bau: za: lham: khae: yu ge,- airu" mo, re phug' myao: ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa naonhaung" yao" gaung: yang maqo" bao" thaug' byid' rure ngo re qo" bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao" kaoso' re dan: pye' mung:- Khristu nho: mau" zo" qhid' mae" alaug laug shid sho' zaui: so" lo: ava" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- dao: pin" khyo" ta" nae"- Asang we' dadang: dalam: doe; rumae ngaui bau: ge,- azhao ngo bin: tung" ke' va" khyo re za:- dam: paug' yang: tung" ke' nae" ngo pe" qo la: thoe magyo:- naonhaung" qhid' mae" je yang: gug: gam: ra" khyo ngad: ra" .
Makhyang" ra" lo, mau" kad' mo, rere:- ai: lakha: byu qere re:- gaung khyao re phyid' lhai: ca"- ga: qam: ke' ta" ra" mo, rere:- lha" ge, .
Dangman" ra" au: qid lhai: khyo re kham: yu va" mo, wa- yao: bam mangad:- ngonhaung" lam: angad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa- Byo khyo" yang Mao" So re caung: pa" mung:- Yesu Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: kaoso' daui yang: ngaui bau" ra" mo, ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa- adao shad' mae" ali aso: re khug ngha: ra" mo, mangad: .
Airu" ra" ja: jham re ngo khug ngha ca" yang: ngad: re wa ngo khug ngha nae" qo" ra" . Adao shad' mae" ali aso: jham re qo" khug ngha:- ga: myid: ra" byu dayaug yaug na yang: ngad: re wa- ngo wa airu: myid nae" akhyo je: qo" ra" .
Ngo wa khau: li" thao dalaban ngad: au:- au: qid lhai: khyo kham: yu: lo yaug ngad: . Ngo wa Israel byumyu"- Benyamin kaung mae" Hebre sa: gyang" ngad: ra" myhi" pho" qemae" khau: li" ra" yaug ngad:- Kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ru we' sin: yang: ta" re ngo wa Pharishe dayaug ngad: .
Lam khug: khyo re gyai nhag' lam: to" yaug ngad mung:- Phung: re yhin" lo yaug ngad: . Kham" to" ra" amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" ra" khyo"- din: man" ru qhug' yu nae"- aga" re wa ngo wa pe" qobo made, yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: nga" qhid' mae" gau pai: ein: khyo" ngo qo" sun" yu: ra" ai: gu: alhab' re ana" wa- Khristu mathao mae aseim" khyo" ngo myid: yu: ra" .
Aigu: za: mangad:- nga" Asang Yesu Khristu re qo" ba qo" se" ru wa- ja: khao: ngo" tho' mae" je yang: phug' de; ru ngad mung:- ja: khao: ngo" re aseim" khyo" ngo myid: ru ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re- yao" mathao mae ngo wa ja: khao: ngo" re to" pye' va"- ngo wa Khristu re qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" we' yao: we' dadang: dalam: za: jab byang" sho' qo" doe, nae" qhid' mae" ai: gu: alhab' re basad ruza: ngo myid: pye' ra" .
Ngo wa Kham" To" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang din: man" rure maqhug' kham: yu lo: ngad: ra" . Ana" ngo wa ai: din: man" ru re Khristu re lam khug: ra" khyo" yang za:- qo" kham: yu: ra" . Ai: din: man" rure qo" kham: yu: ru wa- Mao" So: yang byid' ra" je" ju" ngad mung:- lam khug: ra" myid mae aqao: to" ru ngad: ra" .
Ngo o: ra" khyo ajhaung wa ngoyao" gaung yao: shid: rumae" kaoso' daui: ra" khyo kaoso' daui nhao: ru qhug' nae" rure myid: lao" zo" re" Khristu re ba nae"- yao" shid: rumae" dam: daui: to: li" ra" qam: so' re ba: yu nae"- yao" dayin dayo: kham zo" rure bokham zo: nae" we' yao" shid kham" ru we' dakhyo:- boqo" shid kham: nae" ru jham ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa aung doe, va"-jab byang" va"-ein: mata" nug- ngadqere: Yesu Khristu wa- yao" qhid' mae" boe" nae" ngore aung: yu va" ruyang ai: jhaung qhu" re qo" zaui" yu sho' ngo qam: ke' na: .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo wa aire qo" yu va"- ein: mamyid . Ngadqere: ngo kad' ru daja: wa nga" nhaung thao" mae" rure to" myhid' pye' to: co' mung:- qhid' au: mae jo; ra" ja: re joe" myhi sho' qam: bo: thao" mae" phin: yang: qam: ke' na: .
Airumung: ngo wa mug: gaung: mung"dan: mae kaoso' qo" daui nae" qhid' mae" Yesu Khristu khyo" yang Mao" So khai: yu: ra" ai: jhaung qhu" re qo" yu sho' bin: zang shad' khyo myo,khung: qang yang: din: din: tao" ra" .
Byo we' sin: yang: zoqao" ngad va" mo, naonhaung" alhab' wa ceru" ra" myid bo qo: ra" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" mae" damyo" wa shai" ra" myid bo yang: ngad: re wa- Mao" So wa ce: khyo we' sin: yang:- naonhaung" re sho' kyo" li" nae" .
Airu: ngad sho' ngadqere:- ngonhaung" wa ana" ba joe" sho' bin: cao" lo va" ra" azhao" we' dakhyo:- qhid' au: khyo xo' ye: gelang: .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- nga" ave, re xo' yang: qu" yu ge,- Ngonhaung" qhu" byid' ra" ave, gai re cao" ra" mo, re qu" xam" yu ge,-
ngo wa ce: khyo re qhid' phyao: myo: sho' lhang naonhaung" re ta" qu" va" . Ngo wa ana" re: ngug byid we' dam: paug' ta" ra" . Khristu nho: pyao: zang dao mae shid kham: rure gye kad' mung: kaoso' daui: ra" mo, myo: sho' na: ako" .
Yao: bam: so wa yao: bam: gaung sho: myid o kao bau: ru ngad geyang: yao: bam wa myiqid tham: mae jeim" lo" li" genae" . Yao: bam wa qho' phau: ang: ra" ja: mae phug: ako" . Yao: bam wa ce: mug: myid we' sin" ra" ja: jham re za: myid: ako" .
Ngonhaung" kam" wa mug: khaung: mung"dan: nho: mung" byu qe ngad mung:- mug: gaung dao mae" ngonhaung" nho: khyad' yu: Asang ngad: ra" Asang Yesu Khristu joe" li" nae" rure kao bau taung" lao" na: ru ngad: ra" .
Khristu wa ja: cao jab alhab' re yao: eib: ra" qao: mae qo" to" pye' ra" qam: so' khyo" yang qam: nang: mung: shid ba: ra" ngonhaung" nho: gaung khyao jham re phungbao byang" jo; ra" yao" gaung khyao we' dau sho' tha" pye' byid' li" nae" .
Airumung: nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngo wa naonhaung" re gyai jhid' de; mung:- gyai myid: lhe"- Naonhaung" wa ngore gyai ngaui bau: nhao gemung:- ngo wa naonhaung" mathao mae gyai phug: ra" . Amung: jhid' de; ra" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Naonhaung" wa Asang: khug mae kaoso' daui: rumae tang za: ye; jo, ang: ako" .
Eodia we' Suntuki tao we"- Asang mae yao: bai: yao: nhaung: we' dakhyo: nhag' lam: jho" vang" sho' qam: ke' genae" qhid' mae" jeju khyo" ngo mho' ke' ra" .
Amung: nga" mau" vin cao: ngad: ra" nao re:- ai: myiqe: shid' tao re jho" vang" nae" khyo re bao" thaug' byid: wa, . Pe"mung: ga"re Kelemen we' Mao" So: kaoso' mugsug' mae japhin: bo: ra" nga" mau" vin cao: gatau alhab' mo, we' daga" Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: re ta" hau" ra" mau" zo" mae ngo we' daga" qam: ke' vako" ra" shid' tao ngad: ako" .
Asang mae dadang: dalam: za: khonhae" re: ngaui bau" na vageshao:- ngo dam: ta" ra"- ngaui bau: ge, .
Yaug khao: ngo" re nau" nhae" ra" myid qhu" byid: ge,- Asang wa joe" li" na: ava" .
Pe"ja" khyo rere: damyid: ci" ge,- khyo khe' khao: ngo" mae khonhae" re: jeju caung: khin" zo" re" akyu" mho' mung:- naonhaung" qo ca" ra" ja: Mao" So re mho' yao ge, .
Ailao"- xao su byu qe ba: gyo" ra" myid nyan: tho' je: ra" Mao" So: ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru wa- naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: we' myid: ra" khyo re Khristu khug mae gug: gam byid' li" nae" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- dao: pin" khyo" ta" re- gai shab: ra" ja: jham we' caung: khin" man: qi" ra" ja: jham ngad: ra" dangman" ru- phug' de; ru- jo: ru- gyang" san: ru- jhid' de; taung" ru we' phug' myao: tho' ru jham re naonhaung" aung khug mae ke' to: ge,-
ngo mae" naonhaung" zhao: yu mung:- khae: yu vako" ra" nga" dao: thoe jham we' lo, mau" jham re lo, joe" kad' cao" ge,- ngonhaung" re ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru byid' ra" Mao" So wa naonhaung" we' daga" na: jo, vashao: wo" .
Ayo, cemyhao" myao" thao re naonhaung" wa- nga" qhid' mae" khoqhi" myid: gaung yug: na: rure qhu" byid: nae" agu dalhang dam: qo" yu ko" ruyang ngo wa Asang: khug mae gyai ngaui bau" ra" . Naonhaung" nga" qhid' mae" mamyid: ci" ko" ngad: ra" ein: ngo ta" ru mangad:- Naonhaung" aire qhu" byid: nae" agu maqo" ko" rure ngo ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" ngore mageim: qu" to: ko" ra" ein:- ngo myid yang: cedao: re ta" ru mangad:- pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa ngoyao: qo" ra" gu: mae nhag' dag yang: ba: na nae" rure zhao: yu: to: va" .
Myaung sho" rure re: ngo ba: ra"- magan: mago" qo" rure re: ngo ba:- ngo wa- vae: gyi: ngadqere:- myaung sho: ngadqere:- khoyo, khotau mae na na nhag' ba: dag: yu nae" khyo re ngo zhao: yu: to: va" .
Khristu yang ngore byid' ra" qam: so' khyo" yang ngo wa- boe" jo; ra" ayaug: ja: khao: ngo" re qo" zang: qhao" nae" qam: so' qo" ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo qug: khai: qhug' au: naonhaung" ngore bao" thaug' byid: ko" ru wa- gai shab: ra" lo, mau" kad' ru ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Philipi bao: we"- ngo wa Makedoni mung" mae" thug' mung: Lau Dao: Gai re kho" qhid: li" ra" au:- naonhaung" Philipi Phung: dalam: za: ngore bao" thaug' byid: ko" ru we' nga" nho: seim" ru jham we' myad: ru jham mae naonhaung" za: ngo we' daga" bokhae: yu vako" rure naonhaung" yao: ba gau ngad: ako" .
Thesaloni vogaung: mae na: au:- ngo qo ca" ra" gu: re naonhaung" wa dalhang za: mangad:- bao" thaug' ru ngore vhin: ke' byid' ako" .
Ngo wa ai: jhaung qhu" jham re za: khae: yu nug yang: ta" ru mangad:- Naonhaung" vin vo; lo: ra" gai: ra" mau" zo" japhin: mae je: gai: ra" lo, mau" laung" li" ra" khyo re myao nug yang: ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Ailao"- naonhaung" ngore vhin: ke' byid' ra" Alu: jhaung qhu" jham alhab' re ngo qo" khae: yu va" khyo re cemae botung" ke' ra" . Aijham wa- magan: mago" ngad: ava"- naonhaung" jhaung qhu" jham alhab' re Epaphrodi wa ngojhao" vin: joe" li" byid: mung:- ana" ngo wa qo ca" gu: alhab' qo" va" . Ai: jhaung qhu" jham wa sheim nae pyo" ra" xeim:- Mao" So khae: yu nug: ru we' ngaui: ra" xeim: we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: nga" Mao" So wa magan: mago" jo, nho" qo" yaug ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- Yesu Khristu khyo" yang naonhaung" qo ca" ra" gu: alhab' re byid' li" nae" .
Ngonhaung" Pho"- ngad: ra" Mao" So wa apyad ato khonhae" re: phungbao bao: jo, vashao: wo" . Amen .
Yesu Khristu yang sang: ra" mo, ngad ko" ra" Mao" So: byu qe yaug khao: ngo" re au" ke' ra" . Cemae ngo we' daga" na ko" ra" mao: nhaung: qe wa- naonhaung: re au" ke' ako" .
Cemae"- Mao" So: byu qe alhab' wa naonhaung" re au" ke' ako"- je yang: khosin" pho" nho: kho: kham kho" mae na ko" ra" Mao" So: byu qe wa naonhaung" re au" ke' ako" .
Asang Yesu Khristu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa naonhaung" alhab' we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" .
Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo" yang Yesu nho: lagyo: ngo Polu we' ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" Timothi wa-
Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe; rumae kyid: ra" ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: qe ngad ko" ra" Kolose vogaung: mae" Mao" So: byu qere mugsug' tung" ke' ra" . Ngonhaung" nho: pho" Mao" So wa nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru naonhaung" re shaman" byid: vashao: wo" .
Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" akyu" bao" mho' byid: khao: ngo" khonhae" re: ngonhaung" Asang Khristu nho: yao: pho"- Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" byid' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Khristu Yesu re naonhaung" lam khug myid bo ko" rure we' Mao" So: byu qere naonhaung" jhid' de; ko" ra" khyo re ngonhaung" the' gyo" bam va" .
Dangman" ra" mungdao: ngad: ra" Lau Dao: Gai naonhaung" jhao" sao qhid' joe" li" au:- ai: yang byid' ra" myid: lao" khyo re naonhaung" the' gyo" yu: avako" . Airumung: naonhaung" lam khug: myid we' jhid' de; myid wa mug: gaung dao mae naonhaung" qhid' mae" shaung: to: byid' ra" naonhaung" myid: lao" khyo mae apan zaug: jo; ra" .
Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo re naonhaung" the' gyo" yu ko" ra" ba na mae" aire jhaug' za: ba: kham zo" yu gemung:- ai: Lau Dao: Gai wa naonhaung" mae byo: sin" lo" ru we' dakhyo:- ngaui bau" Lau Dao: Gai wa shaman" jeju byid: yang: mug: myid jao: sho' byo: sin: lo" ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" khyo re naonhaung" jhid' de; ra" daui daui cao: ngad mung:- ngonhaung" gaung tha" jhaug' zaug za: Khristu mau" zo" re vin vo; yaug ngad: ra" Epaphra mae" zhao: yu: ru ngad: ako" .
Byo: yang naonhaung" re byid' to" ra" jhid' de; myid khyo re yao: wa ngonhaung" re ta" kyo" ra" .
Ce: khyo mathao mae ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" khyo re the' gyo: mae" khonhae" re: naonhaung" qhid' mae" akyu" bao" mho' byid' ra" . Yao: bam: yang byid' ra" nyan: pha,jhi" alhab' we' laba lajhao we' daga" yao: myid o: rure ba jhao: ra" laba lajhao wa naonhaung" re pyang" byid: vashao:- ngonhaung" wa Mao" So re mho' ra" .
Airulao" naonhaung" wa Asang o: ru we' dakhyo: kaoso' daui mung:- khonhae" re: yao: re ngaui nhao: ra" mau" zo" re qo" zaui: so" li" genae" . Naonhaung" kaoso' daui: ru wa gai: ru aja: ja: re qo" zaui" thug' ke' mung:- Mao" So re ba: jhao" ra" laba lajhao khug mae qi" qhang: li" li" genae" .
Naonhaung" wa ja: khao: ngo" re nhag' lam: qhang qhang za: qo" zang: qhao" geshao:- yao" phungbao qi" qhang: ra" qam: so' alhab' yang qam: bo nhao vashao:- amung: mug: bo" mung"dan: khug mae yao" byu qe: qhid' mae" Mao" So jhaung qhu" to: byid' ra" naonhaung" gae bam re qo" khae: yu nae" man: qi" ra" mo, boe" nhao: ra" Pho" re ngaui bau: ngaui yao we' jeju caung: khin" byid: geshao .
Yao: wa mug: cad' nho: qam: so' khug mae" naonhaung" re khyad' yu mung:- yao" jhid' de; ra" yao: zo" nho: mung"dan: khug khyo gug: gug: za: jhui" vao ye" ava" .
Ai: yao: zo: khyo" yang ngonhaung" wa loe; beim qhug' ra" . Airu wa ngonhaung" qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Khristu wa myo; yang magai: myao: ra" Mao" So: gaung khyao we' dau: ra" myo; yang gai: myao: ra" khyao dau ngad: ra" . Yao: wa zoqhid' ngad mung: phan" to" ra" ja: alhab' tho' mae qi" qhang: thao" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa yao: zo: khyo" yang mug: gaung we' myidgaung jo; ra" gu: alhab' we' myo; yang gai: myao: ru we' myo; yang magai: myao: ra" ja: alhab' Byo qam: so' jham- Asang zug: we' kheim: so' qo" mo, rere: bophan" to" ra" . Mao" So wa mug: kin myid kin alhab' geim" re yao: zo: khyo" yang phan" to: mung: yao: zo" qhid' mae" phan" to" ra" .
Khristu wa ja: cao jab majo, shimae" na: jo, yaug ngad: ra" . Ja: cao jab wa Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe; jo, mung:- yao: bam we' dau ga" ra" jo, qo qo" avako" .
Khristu wa yao" gaung khyao ngad: ra" ai: phung" nho: au: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa zoqhid' ngad mung: yao: dayaug za: cao jab alhab' au: dao mae qo" na nae" qhid' mae" shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So yao: yao: myid: phyid' ru khyo" yang- yao: zo: wa Mao" So: ve, yaug: byang" sho' kham: yu: to" ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So wa yao: zo: khyo" yang mug: kin we' myid kin alhab' geim" re yao: we' dam: jho" nyang: lo nhao nae" qhid' mae" myid: phyid' ra" . Mao" So wa yao" yao: zo: pyao: zang dao mae shid kham: ra" khyo" yang mang: dae mau" kad' mung:- myidgaung we' aimae jo; ra" gu: alhab' re yao: we' dam: jho" nyang nhao: ra" .
Lai: lo" va" ayo, mae naonhaung" wa Mao" So mae" va" na: ra" mo, ngad: lo ko" ru we' makhyang" ra" myid lo,mau" re kad' cao" geyang: naonhaung" wa Mao" So: gyevo qe boe" qu" avako" .
Ngadqere: ana" Mao" So wa yao: zo" nho: gaung khyao shid: kham byid' ra" khyo" yang naonhaung" re yao" ba nam kad' yu: ava" . Naonhaung" re gyang" lho" yaung" shab: ru we' yug: no made, lo: yao" qhid' kheim: khyo qo" vao ye: genae" qhid' mae" airu: kad' ru ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa gang" tang: ra" aqao: apan mae xo' yang: tang za: ye; jo, qo: ako" . Naonhaung" wa ai: Ngaui Bau: Lau Dao: Gai re the' gyo" yu ko" au:- qo" yu ko" ra" ai: myid: lao" ru khyo mae" naonhaung" yao" myid re dalaui: nhao ge,- ngo Polu wa mug: myid byu yaug khao: ngo" re bin: kho" kyo: byid: va" ra" Lau Dao: Gai ceru: nho: daui daui yaug boe" lo: ra" .
Ana" ngo wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" ngo qug: khai: kham zo" ruyang ngaui bau" ra" . Yao" gaung khyao ngad: ra" phung" nho: gaung tha" qug: khai: kham zo: nae" dang: jo, shi" ra" Khristu nho: qug: khai: kham zo" rure nga" gaung khyao mae qug: khai: kham zo" ra" khyo" yang bobao" pin" byid' na: ru ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" akyu" qhid' mae ce: mau" zo" re zaui so: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yang daui daui byid: yaug khyo" yang ngore san: to: byid' ra" . Nao re byid' to" ra" mau" zo" wa yao" mungdao: re bin sho' ta" hau" kyo: nae" ru ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa ai: no; thao" ra" mungdao: re lai: lo: ra" pyad gu: mae byu alhab' mo, re maba nhao lo: nyham" to" lo ngadqere: ana" wa yao" byu qere ai: mungdao: qhu" byid' ava" .
Mao" So myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo wa byu alhab' mo, qhid' mae" jaung: to" ra" magan: mago" ru we' phungbao bo: ra" no; thao" ra" mungdao: khyo re yao" byu qere qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Ai: no; thao" ra" mungdao: wa naonhaung" khug mae Khristu na: jo; ga" ru ngad: ra" . Aimung: naonhaung" wa Mao" So: phungbao mae qo" bokham: yu genae"- ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa byu yaug khao: ngo" re Khristu nho: khyo kho" kyo: byid' ra" . Yaug khao: ngo" re Khristu mae zoqao" khyo" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: khyo qo" jhui" vao ye: nae" qhid' mae" nyan: pha,jhi" bo: ra" gu: alhab' we' yao: bam re ta" peim: ta" kyang: yang: yao: bam re mho" shid' byid' ra" .
Ce: mau" zo" re qam: ke' yang: qo" zaui: so" ru wa Khristu yang byid' ra" qi" qhang: ra" qam: so' yang ngad: ra" . Ai: qam: so' wa ngo mae bo: jo, mung: mau" zaui" na: ra" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" re:- Ladoki vobyu qe: qhid' mae" we' ngore mamyao maba: ra" gatau alhab' mo; qhid' mae" re: khoqhi" sho' qam: ke' yang: mau" zaui" lo: rure naonhaung" re ngo ta" kyo: geli" .
Ngo ceru: kad' ru wa yao: bam qam: zaug qam: qo" mung: jhid' de; myid mae yao: cao: nhag' jho" de; jo, genae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Alao" yao: bam wa dangman" ra" laba lajhao mae" thug' li" ra" lam ga" ru jab byang" sho' qo" yu: li" genae" . Cekhyo" yang Mao" So: no; thao" ru ngad: ra" Khristu re yao:- yao: bam ba: li" genae" .
Khristu wa Mao" So: nyham" to" ra" jo,nho" ngad: ra" pha,jhi" we' laba lajhao alhab' re phung" nae" ra" kham: thug' ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ngo naonhaung" re ta" kyo: geli"- Khonho" jo nhohab ngad: ra" mhug' pyag' ra" dao: jham: yang khag' yang re: naonhaung" re damhug' pyag' nhao ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa gaung dau: khyo" naonhaung" we' mana ngadqere: myid mae wa naonhaung" we' daga" na: ra" . Naonhaung" wa Khristu mae naonhaung" lam khug: rumae dadang: dalam: za: doe, yang: tang za: ye; jo, ko" rure ngo myao yang: ngaui bau" ra" .
Naonhaung" Khristu Yesu re Asang khyo" khae: yu vako" ruyang yao: we' dadang: dalam: za: kaoso' daui ge,
naonhaung" wa mho" shid' byid: qhug' vako" ru we' dakhyo: Asang: khug mae agyi: no, sho' cin" mung: yao" dao mae yao: yao" kaoso' daui khyo re zao: to' yang: naonhaung" lam khug: myid re je yang: qam: bo: li" nhao ge,- jeju beim: so" ra" myid byang" jo, nhao ge, .
Airumung: Khristu mae" mangad: lao"- byu: yang xo' mho" gyo" lo: ra" thung" li mae" we' mug: kin re eib: ra" byo jham mae" re:- joe" li" ra" aphug' made; ra" xao su byu: nho: pha,jhi" khyo" yang naonhaung" re khag' yang re:- jeim matoe' nae" rure lha" yang: na ge,-
pe"mung: ga" re Khristu nho: xao su gaung khyao kaoso' daui: rumae Mao" So: ve, khyao byang" sho' bo: jo; ra" .
Naonhaung" wa yao: we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, mung: jab byang" ra" kaoso' daui khyo re qo" yu: avako" . Yao: wa byo agyi zug: we' kheim: so' qo" mo, alhab' dao mae eib: ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, yang: au: qid lhai" khyo re kham: yu: lai: lo: ako" . Aiwa byu: yang byid' ra" au: qid lhai: khyo mangad: lo:- ce: qobo kad' kao bau: ra" qam: so' mae" loe; beim nhao: ru ngad: ra" Khristu yang byid' ra" au: qid lhai: khyo re kham: yu: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" qid nyhab' kham: yu ko" au: naonhaung" wa Khristu we' daga" nyhab' shaung: pye' qhug' ako" . Amung: shid: rumae" Khristu re daui: to" li" nhao: ra" Mao" So: qam: so' mau" re naonhaung" lam khug ko" ra" khyo" yang naonhaung" re qid nyhab' kham: yu: ra" khyo" Khristu we' daga" daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' avako" .
Naonhaung" wa qhid' phyao: lai: lo: ra" ayo, mae naonhaung" qobo jham: mathao mae we' kham" to" ra" tarha" maqo" ra" Taung bug byu qe ngad ko" ruyang byo we' sin: yang: ashid qe ngad: lo: ako" . Ngadqere: Mao" So wa naonhaung" re ana" Khristu we' daga" kaoso' daui: li" nhao: ava" . Ngonhaung" qobo jham alhab' re Mao" So wa khyad' pye' byid: mung:-
yao: wa ngonhaung" re qobo xam" to" ra" jhin japhin: rere: ai we' sin" ra" thung" tarha" rere: pyao: zang dao mae ze,jin" yang: be; jin" ru qhug' mung: alhab' re bin sho' sad' pye' ava" .
Ai: pyao: zang dao mae Khristu wa Byo we' sin: yang: eib: ra" zug: qe we' kheim: so' qo" ra" mo; qam: so' re qab: pye' byid: mung:- yao" aung doe; poe jin: yan" qin" rumae kyam: byu qekhyo" yao: bam re jhui" qin" yang: mo, byu qere qhu" byid' ra" .
Airumung: zo: shaug' we' poe ba na jham mangad: lao"- lho" xin: ba na mangad: lao"- Dugno: Ba we' sin: yang: naonhaung" qhid' mae" khag' rere: thung" tarha" dakad' nhao ge, .
Airu" ra" ja: jham wa joe" lo nae" ayo, mae" qab bao za: angad: ra" . Gaigai: yao: ngad: ra" khyo ajhaung wa Khristu ngad: ra" .
Nhag' lam: re shad' ra" khyo" deim" cam" nae" qhid' mae" we' mug: lagyo: jham re caung: pa" ra" khyo cao" ca" ga: ta" mung:- gakai: lai mung: ra" ve, lho jham re the' myao yang:- yao: yao" gaung re myhao: thao" ra" khyo" ta" yu: ra" mo; yang naonhaung" re dao: daphyid' nhao ge,- airu" ra" yaug wa yao: yao" xao su byu khyo" za: myid: ruyang aje mae nhag' lam: myid myo" na: ra" .
Yao: wa gaung khyao: nho: au: ngad: ra" Khristu re mazaui" ci ngad: ra" . Akhyao axag' jham we' shoqug: shoqe jham: yang jho" xo' de; jo; ra" gaung khyao geim" wa au: ngad: ra" Khristu khyo" yang zo: ve khau byid: mung:- Mao" So o ngaui: ru we' dakhyo: qi" qhang: li" ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Khristu we' daga" shid gemung: mug: kin re eib: ra" byo jham: lo, mae" lhoe' ke' qhug' va" mo, ngad: ako" . Aire naonhaung" wa pe"mung: ce: mug: myid we' sin" ra" mo, we' dakhyo: kaoso' daui ko" i?
Pe"mung: yang: ceru re dazaui: wa,- airu re datau" qu"- aijham re datin: wa,- ga" ra" tarha" jham re phug' cao" na ko" i?
Ai: thung" Tarha" jham alhab' wa dalhang ci thao re magai: ci: byaug: ra" zai jham we' sin" ra" khyo jham ngad: ra" . Ai: Tarha" jham wa byu: yang kad' to" ra" thung" Tarha" jham we' mho" shid' khyo jham za: angad: ra" .
Ai: thung" Tarha" kad' thug' ke' ra" mo, wa mug: lagyo: qere caung: pa" ca"- ga: maqad maqui" ta" ra" mo,- nhag' lam: re shad' ra" khyo" deim" cam"- mhug' ra" khyo cao" ra" mo,- yao: yao" gaung dau: re dae xo sho' yhin" yu: ra" mo, ngad mung:- pha,jhi" re apan aqao: to: yang: kad' ru ngad nhohab ngadqere: aijham wa gaung sho: myid kao bau: ra" khyo jham re zaui" tam" nae" rumae pe" aphug' mabo ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Khristu we' daga" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' vako" ruyang Khristu wa yao" zaung tao" dao Mao" So: lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo; ra" jo, qo mug: gaung: mung"dan: mae" zai jham re naonhaung" nhag' nghae" na ge-
myidgaung dao mae jo; ra" zai jham re nhag' manghae: lo:- mug: gaung dao mae" zai jham re naonhaung" nhag' nghae" na ge,-
pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa shid: byaug va" mo, ngad gemung: naonhaung" kaoso' wa Mao" So: khug mae Khristu we' daga" shaung: to: byid' ra" .
Naonhaung" nho: kaoso' agyang" wa Khristu ngad mung: yao: na: thug' li" lao"- naonhaung" re: yao: we' daga" za: na: thug' li" yang: yao" phungbao re bokham: yu: li" genae" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa gaung sho" nho: gintho' mau" zo" jham- mashab mayaung" ra" lo, mau"- gaung sho: shab' ru- makhyang" ra" lo, mau" kad' nae" kao bau: ru- ( so' kho' ru wa solho re caung: pa" ra" akhyao daja: ngad: ra" ) jham ru" ra" naonhaung" khug mae mau" zaui" na: ra" gaung sho: kao bau myid o: ru jham re se' pye' ca" ako" .
Airu"ra" khyo jham: mathao mae yao" mho dao: re matae" gyo" ra" mo; dao mae Mao" So: nhag' yo" ru joe" li" li" nae" .
Qhid' phyao: naonhaung" wa airu" ra" khyo jham: yang naonhaung" kaoso' daui khyo re eib: na: au: airu" ra" gaung sho: kao bau myid o: rure cao" yang: naonhaung" kaoso' daui: lo: ako" .
Ngadqere: ana" naonhaung" wa nhag' yo: nhag' gyid' ru- su re qu" roe" pyi qho: ru- kheim: co' jhau: ru jham re naonhaung" nhad' mae" khonhae" re: dathug' nhao ge,
Yao: cao: dajho" mhug' ge,- pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa magai: ra" ave, we' daga" byu xug' re khyad' pye' mung: byu sag' re ve; yu: avako" .
Ce: byu sag' naonhaung" re phan" to: yaug Mao" So wa naonhaung" re je: jab byang" sho' ba jhao: li" genae" qhid' mae" yao" gaung khyao we' je: dau sho' asag' dam: byao: yu: ra" .
Ai: byu sag' boe" rumae Taung bug byu qe we' Yuda byu qe au: qid lhai: khyo re kham: yu: ra" mo, we' aire makham: yu: ra" mo, Taung bug byu qe- byu jam: qe- jeim qe we' jeim mangad: ra" mo; agyo: mae pe" jho" shai" ru majo, lo: ngad: ra" . Khristu wa alhab' ngad mung: alhab' mae Khristu ngad: jo; ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: byu qe ngad: ako" . Yao: naonhaung" re jhid' de; mung: yao" qhid' mae" khyin: san: yu: to" ra" mo, ngad: ako" . Airumung: naonhaung" yao" gaung re su: qhid' mae" jhid' de; sho: bono: ru- nhag' khyag' nhag' lam: nyham: khyo" ru nau" nhae" ru we' nhag' lam: qhang: ru jham re mai bau: we' dakhyo: ve; ci ge, .
Naonhaung" yao: cao: qobo jho" vhin nae" de, gelao"- dayaug we' dayaug jho" zang: kham yang: qobo jho" khyad' byid: ge,- Asang naonhaung" re qobo khyad' byid: va" ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" yao: cao: qobo jho" khyad' byid: ge, .
Airumung: aijham alhab' dao mae alhab' re jab byang" sho' dadang: dalam: za: myag: dang" to" ra" jhid' de; myid re laung" ci ge,
pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa gaung khyao dalam: khyo za: ai: ngaui pyo: yaug yo: rure qo" khae: yu geshao: ga:- naonhaung" re khai: yu: to" ra" . Airumung: jeju caung: khin" ge,-
magan: mago" jab byang" ra" Khristu nho: mungdao: re naonhaung" aung khug mae na: jo, nhao ge,- nyan: pha,jhi" alhab' we' yao: cao: jho" mho" shid' mung: jho" ta" kyang" na ge, caung: khin"nghaui"caung: we' gyang" lho" ra" nghaui" thoe jham re nghaui" zo" re" naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: mae jeju beim: so" ra" nhag' lam" yang Mao" So re caung: khin" ge, .
Airumung: naonhaung" kad' ra" mau" zo" mangad: lao"- jhau: ra" dao: thoe ja: khao: ngo" mae Asang Yesu mang re lao: yang: kad' ge,- yao: khyo" yang Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" ge, .
Yham sang myhi" qe we"- naonhaung" yham sang pho" qe eib: ra" qao: mae na ge,- pe"mung: ga"re airu wa Khristan qekhyo" naonhaung" kham: yu ang: ra" khyo ngad: ra" .
Yham sang pho" qe we"- naonhaung" yham sang myhi" qere jhid' de; mung: yao: bam re ayo: athin dakad' ge,-
Zo: dau qe we"- naonhaung" myhi" pho" qe: mho dao: re tae" gyo" ru wa Khristan qe: qo ngad: ra"- pe"mung: ga"re airu wa Mao" So o ngaui: ra" khyo ngad: ra" .
Myhi" pho" qe we"- naonhaung" zo: dau qere pyi daqho ge,- Mangad: re yao: bam nhag' lam: gyug qam: shan: li" genae" .
Jeim qe we"- naonhaung" jeim sang qe: dao: re ja: khao: ngo" mae mho dao: gyo: ge,- yao: bam: yang ngaui genae" rure o yang: za: yao: bam qu" na myao: na: au: mho dao: gyo" ru mangad: lo:- Asang re naonhaung" gyaug phug' ra" khyo" nhag' lam: din: din: za: yao: bam: mho dao: re tae" gyo: ge, .
Pe" mau" zaui: gengadqere: byu: qhid' mae" zaui: byid' ra" khyo" mangad:- Asang re zaui: byid' ra" khyo" naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: alhab' we' qam: zaug thag zaui: so: ge,-
Asang wa yao" byu qe: qhid' mae" zam" to" ra" mo, re jhaung qhu" khyo" naonhaung" re byid' li" nae" rure naonhaung" beim: ge,- pe"mung: ga"re Khristu wa naonhaung" caung da" byid' ra" jeim sang agyang" ngad: ra" .
Makhyang" ra" mau" kad' ra" yaug wa yao: kad' ra" makhyang" ra" mau"zo" aphug' qobo dae re qhug' kham zo" li" nae" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa khag' rere: myo, nho makhyin lo: dao: kho' ra" .
Asang qe we"- naonhaung" jeim qere din: vang" Tarha" nyang: ra" khyo" zam" khug: na ge,- naonhaung" re: mug: gaung dao mae Asang qo" mo, ngad ko" rure myid: beim: ge,-
Akyu" mho' qam: ke' ge,- Akyu" mho' zo" mae" so: so: za: na mung: Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" na ge,-
Khristu nho: no; thao" ra" yao" mungdao: khyo re kho" kyo: nae" agu gai Mao" So ngonhaung" re byid' li" nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" akyu" mho' au: ngonhaung" qhid' mae" re: akyu" bomho' byid: gela,- ce: mathao mae ngo ana" thaung: laung" jo; ra" .
Airumung: mungdao: kho" kyo" rumae ngo ta" ang: ru we' dakhyo: sho' sho' de: de: qo" kho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" akyu" bao" mho' byid: gela, .
Naonhaung" qo" yu: ra" agu gai alhab' re gai yo" ra" khyo" ci yhung: mung: malam khug: ra" mo, re pha,jhi" bo bo za: zam" khug: na ge, .
Naonhaung" dao: thoe wa khonhae" re: gyo" ngaui taung" ngad mung: gyo: nug dataung" ngad qo: ra" . Yaug khao: ngo" re jo jo za: khoru: phaug' tau: nae" rure naonhaung" ba: to: ca" ra" .
Asang: mau" mae jhaug' zaug yaug we' ngonhaung" mau" vin cao: ngad: ra" ngonhaung" jhid' de; ra" mao: nhaung: pho" Tukhiku wa ngo we' sin" ra" lau dao: alhab' re ta" kyo: byid' li" nae" .
Ngonhaung" khoru: boe" na: ra" khyo re naonhaung" re lau dao: ta" kyo: yang: naonhaung" re ngaui bau: nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa yao: re naonhaung" jhao" nhao: ke' ra" .
Aimung: naonhaung" byu ngad: ra" naonhaung" jhid' de; ru we' jhaug' zaug: ra" mao: nhaung: pho" Onesimu re: yao: we' bocao: lo: li" nae" . Yao: shid' zo: wa cetau mae boe" na: ra" khyo ja: khao: ngo" naonhaung" re li" ta" kyo" li" genae" .
Ngo we' daga" thaung: laung" cao: Aristaku wa naonhaung" re au" ke' ra" . Amung: Barnaba yao: ug Marku re:- naonhaung" re au" ke' ra" . ( Marku naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" re yao: re bang" lham: tug: yu nae" pyang: ke' ra" dao: re naonhaung" the' yu: to: gau ngad: ako" . )
Yustu ga: re: mhang" ra" Yoshu re:- naonhaung" re au" ke' ra" . Yuda thung" mae" phaug' lo ko" ra" Khristan qemae" Mao" So: qhid' mae" ngo we' daga" mau" zaui" na mo, wa ce sam yaug za: ngad: ako" . Yao: bam wa ngore myo: sho' bao" thaug' lo mo, ngad: ako" .
Aimae" naonhaung" phung: byu ngad mung: Khristu Yesu nho: daui daui yaug ngad: ra" Epaphra re: naonhaung" re au" ke' ra" . Yao: wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" qam: zaug thag akyu" bao" mho' byid' na: ra" . Naonhaung" wa Mao" So myid: o: ra" khyo mae re:- jab byang" sho' mho dao: gyo: mung: lam khug: myid gang" tang: ru we' zoqao" khyo" tang za: qo" ye; jo, genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" qhid' mae" Mao" So re akyu: bao" mho' byid' ra" .
Yao: wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" re:- Ladoki vogaung: we' Herapoli byu qe: qhid' mae" re:- gyai qam: ke' yang: mau" zaui" lo yaug ngad: ra" khyo re ngo yao: sagse: qo" kham: ra" .
Ngonhaung" gyai jhid' de; ra" mocid' sara Luka we' Dema shid' zo: re:- naonhaung" re au" ke' ako" .
Ladoki vogaung: mae" lam khug: ra" mao: nhaung: qere we' Numpha we' yao" yham mae ham: phaung yang: caung: pa" na ko" ra" phung: byu qere ngonhaung" au" ke' ra" khyo re kai" yang: ta" kyo: byid: gela, .
Ce: vhin tung" re naonhaung" bin: nghe' gelao" Ladoki phung: byu qere re:- nghe' nhao ge,- Ladoki phung: byu mao: nhaung: qe: lo, khyo" kai" vhin: ke' geli" nae" ra" vhin tung" rere: naonhaung" nghe' ge,-
yao: re byid' to" ra" Asang: mau" zo" re bin kyab' sho' zaui: wa,- ga" ein:- Arkhipu re ta" ge, .
Ce: vhin tung" re nga" lo; yang yao: tung" ru ngad:- tung" yaug Polu . Ngo thaung: laung" jo; rure dato" myhid' ge,- Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa naonhaung" we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" .
Polu, Sila, we' Timothi bam wa Pho" Mao" So we' Yesu Khristu nho: byu qe ngad ko" ra" Thesaloni phung: byu qere vhin tung" tung" ke' ra" . Nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: rure naonhaung" qo" yu vageshao: wo" .
Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" alhab' mo; qhid' mae" khonhae" re: Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" byid: mung: ngonhaung" akyu" mho' rumae khonhae" re: naonhaung" qhid' mae" akyu" bomho' byid' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" lam khug: myid re khoru: lo, joe" zaui: so" na ko" rure ngonhaung" Pho" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae myid: beim" na: ra" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- Mao" So wa naonhaung" re jhid' de; mung: yao" qhid' mae" boe" genae" qhid' mae" khyin: yu: to: va" rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai re nhad' dao: thoe za: mangad: lo: Gyang" Lho" Byo: qam: so' we' ai: Lau Dao: Gai wa dangman" ru ngad: rure jhaug' za: myid: lam: ru we' ngonhaung" naonhaung" jhao" vin: li" ru ngad: . Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" we' daga" na: au: naonhaung" akyu" qhid' mae" khoru: kaoso' daui: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" ave, re we' Asang: ave, re qu" yu: ako" . Naonhaung" wa dayin dayo: myo: sho' qhug' kham zo: gesho' ngadqere: Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang byid' ra" ngaui bau" ra" myid we' ai: mungdao: re naonhaung" khae: yu: ako" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa Makedoni mung" we' Akhaia mung" mae na ko" ra" phung: byu qe alhab' mo; qhid' mae" ave, qu" yu nae" mo, boe" lo: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" lo, mau" mathao mae Asang: nho: khyo mungdao: wa Makedoni mung" we' Akhaia mung" jao: sho' za: hau" nhao" lo" ru mangad: Mao" So re naonhaung" lam khug ko" ra" khyo- lau thoe re khyi" khao: ngo" khyo hau" nhao" lo" ra" . Airumung: naonhaung" re pe" ta" maca" lo: ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" au: re naonhaung" khoru: ngonhaung" re lham: khae: yu ko" ra" khyo rere: kao: so' daui: ru we' dangman" ra" Mao" So re caung da" byid: nae" qhid' mae" we' mug: gaung dao mae" yao" yao: Zo: joe" li" nae" qhid' mae" sulho jham re to" pye' mung: Mao" So shad' khyo naonhaung" khoru: phaug' lo ko" ra" khyo rere: ai: byu qe alhab' mo, ta" na: ako" .
Ai: yao: zo: wa shid: rumae" yao" yang dam: daui: to" li" nhao mung: joe" li" nae" Mao" So: nhag' yo" rumae" ngonhaung" re khyad' yu: ra" yaug Yesu ngad: ra" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" jhao" ngo joe" li" ru wa naonhaung" yao: ba: ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa Thesaloni vogaung: khyo naonhaung" jhao" majoe" li" shire Philipi vogaung: mae yhin" ru we' maphug' makhyad' roe" ru khoru: qhug' lo: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" . Airu: gye kad' ru myo: sho' qhug' ngadqere: ngonhaung" Mao" So wa Yao" Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: naonhaung" re kho" kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" mazag mavae: ra" nhag' lam: ngonhaung" re byid' ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa shad' nghung" ru we' nhag' lam: kaui myid bo yang: naonhaung" re ta" peim: ta" kyang: byid' ru mangad:- ngonhaung" wa khag' dayaug rere: mhug' pyag' nae" qam: make' .
Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re man: qi" ra" mo, ngad: rure ca: myao: ba: to: mung: ai: Lau Dao: Gai re kho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" lam: to: qhug' va" ruyang Mao" So ngonhaung" re ta" nug: ru we' dakhyo: khonhae" re: ngonhaung" re ta" ra" . Ngonhaung" wa byu: yang ngaui nae" rure qam: make' . Ngadqere: ngonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: re jham" qu" yaug ngad: ra"- Mao" So: yang ngaui nae" rure za: ngonhaung" qam: ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa khin" dao: majhau . So' kho' obyid: rure ta" nghoe' pye' ra" dao: thoe majhau: rure naonhaung" yao: nyang" ba: ako" . Mao" So wa ngonhaung" sagse: ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Khristu nho: lagyo: qe ngad: ra" khyo" ngonhaung" mae" akho: akhang" qo" mho' yu mo, ngad sho' ngadqere:-
naonhaung" yang caung: khin" nae" rure su gaje qeyang caung: khin" genae" rure re: khag' yang caung: khin" genae" rure re: ngonhaung" qam: make' . Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" we' daga" na: au: re- yao: zo: qere gun caung: ra" yao: myhi" we' dakhyo: nau" nhae" za: na: lo va" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" re jhid' de; ruyang Mao" So: lau dao: gai naonhaung" re ba nhao nae" ru za: mangad:- ngonhaung" kaoso' re lhao" re: naonhaung" re gae byid' pye' nae" jin" jin" ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" gyai jhid' de; ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" khoru: mau" zaui" lo: rure we' dug myaung" lo: rure naonhaung" gaigai: yao: myid: beim" ako" . Naonhaung" khag' dayaug rere: qo mala: nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" wa myi" re: na" re: mau" zaui: zo: mung: Mao" So: Ngaui Bau: Lau Dao: Gai re naonhaung" re kho" kyo" lo va" .
Lam khug: ra" mo, ngad: ra" naonhaung" re ngonhaung" zam" khug: lo: ra" lo, mau" wa man" ru- jo: ru we' qobo vhin khyo mabo: rure naonhaung" yao: we' Mao" So wa ngonhaung" sagse: ngad: ra" .
Yao: pho" wa yao: zo: qere qu" gun caung: ru we' dakhyo: ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" re qu" gun caung: lo: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" re abang mabyid qam: byid' lo: ra" . Naonhaung" re nhag' tang" byid' lo: ra" . Yao" mung"dan: khyo qo" vao ye: nae" akhang" we' Yao" phungbao re qo" khae: yu nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" Mao" So o ngaui: ra" ave, lo, mau" we' kaoso' daui genae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" re ta" jhan: byid' lo va" .
Naonhaung" wa khonhae" re: Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" na: ra" khyo gatau dalam: jo; ra" . Airu wa ngonhaung" li" kho" kyo" ra" Mao" So: mungdao: re xao su byu: nho: mungdao: khyo" mangad:- gaigai: yao: Mao" So: mungdao: ngad: ra" khyo" lham: gyo" yu mung:- lham: khae: yu geyang: ngad: ra" . Aiwa gaigai: yao: Mao" So: mungdao: ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa lam khug: ra" mo, ngonhaung" phaung mae mau" zaui" na yang: ngad: ra" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" mae bo: ra" khyo wa Yesu Khristu byu qe ngad: ra" Yuda mung" mae" Mao" So: phung: jham mae bo: ru we' dakhyo: yao: bam re:-
Asang Yesu re we' lapa qere se' pye' mung: ngonhaung" re yhin" lo mo, ngad: ra" Yuda byu qeyang yhin" rure kham zo" lo: ako" . Yao: bam wa Mao" So re khoqhi" sho' mangaui nhao mo, ngad: avako" i?
Yao: bam wa Taung bug byu qere khyad' yu: ru qhug' nhao: ra" ai: mungdao: re Taung bug byu qere ngonhaung" kho" kyo" ra" mau" zo" re lhao" re: tam" pye' nae" qam: ke' ako" . Ceru: kad' ko" ra" khyo" yao: bam wa khonhae" re: shad' lhoe" lo ko" ra" qobo jham mae" lo" thao" mae" qobo re zaui" pyang" pye' avako" . Airumung: ana" lo" thao" mae Mao" So: nhag' yo" ru wa yao: bam: au: dao mae joe" jo; ava" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" we' dazab zo: jho" gao" na: bam: au:- gaung dau: za: jho" gao" na: ru ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: mae wa naonhaung" re myid: beim" na: . Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" re gyai myid yang: naonhaung" re dam: qhug' myao nae" qhid: mae" gyai qam: ke' bam va" .
Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" jhao" dam: joe" li" nug: ra" . Ngoyao: re: naonhaung" jhao" dam: joe" li" nae" ein: myo: sho' lhang qam: ke' yang: seim" qu" va" . Ngadqere: Satan wa ngonhaung" khyo re kaung: kag' pye' byid' ra" .
Ngonhaung" Asang Yesu dam: joe" li" nae" ra" au:- ngonhaung" wa dang za: yao" qhid' kheim: mae ngonhaung" nho: myid: lao" khyo- ngonhaung" nho: ngaui bau: khyo we' ngonhaung" nho: aung doe; ru we' sin: yang: phug nae" akhyo ngad: ako" . Ngonhaung" re phug nhao: ra" mo,- myid: lao" nhao: ra" mo, ngaui bau: nhao: ra" mo, mae naonhaung" re: bobo: ako" .
Gaigai: yao: naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" nga: ye, jao: we' ngaui bau: khyo ngad: ako" .
Lo" thao" mae ngonhaung" wa mathan" zang" na loyang: ngonhaung" yao: za: Athen vogaung: mae thang: gyo" co' nae" myid: phyid' mung:-
Khristu nho: khyo Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai re kho" kyo" ra" mau" zo" mae ngonhaung" we' daga" Mao" So: mau" vin yaug ngad: ra" ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" Timothi re naonhaung" jhao" ngonhaung" nhao: ke' va" .
Naonhaung" mae" khag' dayaug re: ai: yhin" ru jham: mathao mae naonhaung" lam khug: myid malab malaui: geshao: nyhad' tang byid: nae" we' naonhaung" re qam: byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" wa yao: re nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra" . Airu" ra" yhin" rure ngonhaung" kham zo" ru wa ngonhaung" qhid' mae" Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo ngad: rure naonhaung" yao: ba: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa yhin" rure kham zo: ca" nae" ngad: rure ngonhaung" we' daga" na: au: mae" gau: qhid' khae" yang: ngonhaung" naonhaung" re ta" va" . Airuyao: boe" lo va" rure naonhaung" yao: nyang" za: ba: ako" .
Aimung: yang: ngo wa Timothi re naonhaung" jhao" nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra" . Ngo wa mathan" zang" na loyang: naonhaung" lam khug myid khoru: ngad: na ko" rure ba nug mung: yao: re ngo nhao: ke' ru ngad: ra" . Ai: yui wa ngonhaung" re ju" phyo' yu: pye' mung: ngonhaung" qam: ke' lo: ra" mau" zo" alhab' aje amyid boe" pye' nae" laug ein: ngo myid: ci" ra" .
Ana" Timothi wa naonhaung" mae" dam: tug' joe" lo mung: naonhaung" lam khug: myid we' jhid' de; myid we' sin" ra" lau dao: ngonhaung" jhao" vin: lo byid' ra" . Naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" re khonhae" re: kao bau myid: beim" na gemung: naonhaung" re ngonhaung" khoqhi" sho' myao nug: na: ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" re: ngonhaung" re myao nug na ko" ra" khyo re Timothi wa ngonhaung" re lo: ta" kyo" ra" .
Arumung: mao: nhaung: qe we"- Ngonhaung" wa qug: khai" ru we' dayin dayo: kham zo" na: au: naonhaung" lau thoe re the' gyo: lao"- ngonhaung" wa qam: sag' qo" yu: bam va" . Naonhaung" nho: lam khug: myid wa ngonhaung" re qam: qo" yu nhao: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa Asang: khug mae tang za: ye; jo, ko" ngad: re wa ana" gaigai: yao: ngonhaung" so' qo" she: ra" .
Ana" ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" mathao mae ngonhaung" Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" ra" . Naonhaung" mathao: yang yao" qhid' kheim: mae ngonhaung" qo" yu: ra" ngaui bau" ru qhid' mae" Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" ra" .
Naonhaung" we' gaung dau: myo, nho jho" qhug' myao mung: naonhaung" lam khug: ra" khyo mae qo ca" shiko" ra" gu: re li" qo" bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" wa myi" re: na" re: aung khug nhag' lam: alhab' we' Mao" So re akyu" mho' ra" .
Ngonhaung" Pho" Mao" So yao: we' ngonhaung" Asang Yesu wa naonhaung" jhao" li" nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" re khyo qid nyhang" byid: vashao: .
Asang wa yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; ra" naonhaung" jhid' de; myid re we' su alhab' re jhid' de; ra" naonhaung" jhid' de; myid re je: myo" li" nhao mung: naonhaung" re ngonhaung" jhid' de; ra" myid qhi" qi" qhang: li" nhao vashao: .
Ce: khyo" yang yao: wa ngonhaung" re qam: bo nhao: li" nae"- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu wa yao" gyang" lho" ra" mo, alhab' we' daga" joe" li" ra" au: ngonhaung" Pho" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae ngonhaung" wa qobo vhin khyo mabo: ru we' gyang" lho" ra" mo, boe" li" li" genae" .
Alao" ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Mao" So re o ngaui nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" khoru: kaoso' daui ang: ra" khyo re ngonhaung" mae" naonhaung" zhao: yu: avako" . Gaigai: yao: ga" re naonhaung" airu: kaoso' daui: lo: avako" . Ai: tho' je: ra" khyo" kaoso' daui genae" qhid' mae" ana" ngonhaung" wa Asang Yesu mang mae naonhaung" re jhan" ke' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Asang Yesu nho: kheim: so' khyo" yang ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" re mho" shid' ra" khyo jham re naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Mao" So wa naonhaung" re gyang"lho" mo, boe" genae" rure we' gaung sho: shab' ra" gintho' mau" zo"mae" jab byang" sho' loe; beim mo, boe" genae" qhid' mae" o ngaui: ra" .
Yauggai yaug khao: ngo" wa gyang" lho" ru we' phug' de, nga: ye; ra" khyo" yao" yham sang myhi" we' khoru: zam" na nae" rure ba qo: ra" .
Mao" So re maba macaung: pa" ko" ra" mo, we' dakhyo: gaung sho: shab' ra" myid re cao" yang: magai: daui ngad: ra" .
Airumung: cekhyo mae byu khag' ngadqere: yao" Khristan mao: nhaung: pho" re qobo magai: shad'- mangad: lao"- yao" qam: nyaug re magai: khyug' zo: ngad: ra" . Asang wa ceru: kad' mo, re qobo dae byid: nae" ngad: ra" khyo ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" re qao qao za: ta" peim: byid: va" . Ngonhaung" wa ce: khyo re qhid' phyao: mae" naonhaung" re ta" to: gau ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa gaung sho: shab' ra" gintho' mau" zo" mae kaoso' daui nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" re khai: yu: ru mangad: . Gyang" lho" rumae kaoso' daui nae" qhid' mae" khai: yu: ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ce: mho" shid' ra" khyo re ngag: pye' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: byu re ngag: pye' ru mangad:- yao" Gyang" Lho" Byo ngonhaung" re byid: yaug ngad: ra" Mao" So re ngag: pye' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" nho: lam khug: ra" mao: nhaung: qere jhid' de; nae" khyo we' sin: yang: naonhaung" re tung" ke' maca" ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" yao: cao: khoru: jho" jhid' de; ca" ra" khyo Mao" So: yang mho" shid' byid' rure naonhaung" yao: zhao: yu: to" avako" .
Naonhaung" wa ai we' dakhyo: yao:- Makedoni mung" geim" mae na ko" ra" mao: nhaung: qe alhab' mo, re jhid' de; avako" . Airumung: mao: nhaung: qe we"- ai: tho' je: gai sho' kad' genae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" naonhaung" re mho' ke' ra" .
Qhid' phyao: ngonhaung" naonhaung" re ta" lo: ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" kao bau myid qang: ru wa yaug yo: ra" khyo" kaoso' daui nae" we' su: khyo re mabokaung: kag' lo: naonhaung" vae: dug: naonhaung" yao: qo" khau nae" qhid' mae" kao bau myid: qang ge,-
Cekhyo" yang naonhaung" wa malam khug: ra" mo; yang phug' myao: byid' rure qo" khae: yu: li" genae" . Ailao" naonhaung" wa naonhaung" qo ca" ra" gu: qhid' mae" khag' rere: khug ngha ca" genae" mangad: .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- Myid: lao" khyo maqo" ra" mo, we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" makaug' genae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" wa shid: byaug va" mo; khyo we' sin: yang: dangman" ra" khyo naonhaung" re ba nhao nug: ra" .
Yesu wa shid mung: dam: daui: to" li" rure ngonhaung" lam" ra" . Airumung: Mao" So wa- Yesu re lam mung: shid: byaug: ra" mo, rere: Yesu we' daga" dam: tug' jhui" yu: li" nae" ga" rure ngonhaung" lam" ra" .
Ana" ngonhaung" naonhaung" re mho" shid' na: ru wa Asang: nho: mho" shid' dao: ngad: ra" . Asang joe" li" ba na mae kaoso' daui: na mo, ngonhaung" wa ai: shid: lo" byaug ko" ra" mo; qhid' khyo ze: ye: genae" mangad:-
Amyin" byid' ra" hug' thoe- mug: lagyo" nho: thoe- Mao" So: labo" mad thoe thug' li"li" nae" . Alao" Asang yao:- mug: gaung mae" gyo" li" li" nae"- Khristu re lam" mung: shid: lo" ko" ra" mo, wa sao qhid' dam: daui: to" li" genae" .
Ai: thao ai: ayo, mae kaoso' daui: na: ra" mo, ngonhaung" wa mug: le; phyo: mae Asang we' jho" qhug' nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam we' daga" jham thaui: mae to' yu: ru qhug' nae" ngad: . Airumung ngonhaung" wa Asang we' daga" khonhae" re: qo" na: jo; li" nae" .
Airumung: ce: dao: jham: yang naonhaung" yao: cao: nhag' jho" tang" byid: ge, .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- Asang joe" li" nae" ba na yo, khyin: khyo we' sin: yang: naonhaung" re tung" ke' maqo ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Asang: Ba Na wa myi" re khug' hab' li" ru we' dakhyo: joe" li" nae" ngad: rure naonhaung" yao: jhaug' za: ba: ako" .
Ja: khao: ngo" yaug yo cae: tae" ru we' gug: gug: za: ngad: ga: byu qe ta" au: qug: khai: gyaug ci" ru wa nyag din taung"- yao: bam: dao mae joe" li" nae" . Aiwa gaung la" ra" myiqe: nyag din taung" zo: khau no no: li" ru we' dakhyo: joe" lo: li" nae" . Byu jham wa qo" phao: loe, genae" mangad: .
Ngadqere: mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" wa mug: cad' khug mae na mo, mangad: ko" ngad: ra" . Amung: ai: ba na wa khug' hab' we' dakhyo: nyag din taung" naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" nae" mangad: .
Naonhaung" alhab' mo, wa mug: bo" yao: zo: qe- na" nho: yao: zo: qe ngad: ako" . Ngonhaung" wa myi" we' sin" ra" mo, re:- mug: cad' we' sin" ra" mo, re: mangad: .
Airu: mung: ngonhaung" wa su gaje qe we' dakhyo: magyang: maso: yab: jo, nae" maang ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa gyang: gyang: za: so" na yang: lha" na qo: ra" .
Byu qe wa myi" re yab: myhid' ako" . Yao: bam wa myi" re yhid yid: ako" .
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa na" we' sin" ra" mo, ngad: ra" . Amung: ngonhaung" wa gyang: gyang: za: ngad qo: ra"- ngonhaung" wa lam khug: ru we' jhid' de; myid re qao nghoe' khyo" ve; ci mung: ngonhaung" nho: khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" myid: lao" rure jo, to' maug we' dakhyo: zhaung" ci gelang: .
Mao" So wa yao: nhag' yo" rure kham zo: geshao: ga:- ngonhaung" re khyin: san: yu: ru mangad:- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang khyad' yu: rure qo" sang: yu geshao: ga: khyin: san: to" ru ngad: ra" .
Yao: joe" li" ra" au: ngonhaung" wa daui: na ngadqere:- shid: jo, ngadqere: yao: we' daga" kaoso' daui: na nae" qhid' mae" shid kham: byid' ra" .
Airu: mung: naonhaung" ana" kad' na vako" ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" yao: cao: qam: jho" byid:- jho" bao" thaug' byid: ge, .
Ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" phaung mae mau" zaui: mung: naonhaung" re khyoqhid' au: she: ra" mo, we' Khristan kaoso' daui khyo re mho" shid' byid: ko" ra" mo, re naonhaung" phug' myao: genae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" mho' ke' ra" .
Yao: bam zaui: so" ra" mathao mae yao: bam re myo: sho' phug' myao: byid: mung: jhid' de; na ge, . Naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" vang" yang: yaug yo za: na ge, .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- Mau" zaui: noe" mo, re ta" peim: ta" kyang: byid: ge,- gyaug hab' qere qam: byid: ge,- qam: nang: mo, re qam: byid: ge,- yaug khao: ngo" dao mae nhag' lam: qhang ge, .
Khag' re: magai: rure magai: ruyang madam: phaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" lha" ge,- yao: cao: we' byu alhab' mo; qhid' mae" gai: ra" lo, mau" zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" khonhae" re: myid: qang: to: ge, .
Khonhae" re: ngaui bau" na ge, .
Mathang mano: akyu" mho' ge,
boe" ra" ayaug: khao: ngo" mae jeju caung: khin" byid: ge, . Ceru wa Yesu Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, mung: naonhaung" kaoso' daui: rumae" Mao" So o: ra" ru ngad: ra" .
Gyang" Lho" Byo myi: de; ru dase' pye' ge, .
Gyang" Lho" Byo vao: jaung" yang: ta" ra" mungdao: re maphug' makhyad' dakad' ge, .
Ja: khao: ngo" re ca: qu" ge,
gai: ra" ja: re kham: yu phug' cao" mung: makhyang" ra" ja: alhab' re jao" pye' ge, .
Naonhaung" re ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru byid' ra" Mao" So wa jab byang" sho' naonhaung" re gyang" lho" nhao vashao:- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu joe" li" ra" au: re naonhaung" byo alo zo: gaung khyao geim" re qobo vhin nae" mabo losho' lhaug' zam: byid: vashao:-
Naonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" yaug wa ai: mau" re kad' byid' li" nae" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa lam ga" kyid yaug ngad: ra" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" qhid' mae" re: akyu" bao" mho' byid: gela, .
Lam khug: ra" mao: nhaung: alhab' mo, re mao: nhaung: jhid' de; myid we' au" byid: gela, .
Ngo wa vhin tung" ce: rure lam khug: ra" mo, alhab' re nghe' kyo: genae" qhid' mae" Asang: yang byid' to" ra" kheim: so' khyo" yang naonhaung" re tung" jhan" ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa naonhaung" we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" .
Polu- Sila we' Timothi bam wa ngonhaung" Pho" Mao" So we' Asang Yesu yang sang: ra" mo, ngad ko" ra" Thesaloni phung: byu qere mugsug' tung" vhin: ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" pho" Mao" So we' Asang Yesu Khristu wa nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru naonhaung" re byid: vageshao: wo" .
Ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: qe we" Ngonhaung" wa yo, khyin: khao: ngo" mae naonhaung" qhid' mae" Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" na: bam ca" ra" . Airu: jeju caung: khin" byid' ru wa ngonhaung" qhid' mae" ang: ra" mau" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" lam khug: myid wa je: qi" li" ru we' gaje qere jhid' de; ra" naonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" nho: jhid' de; myid wa je: qi"qhang: li" na: ruyang ngad: ra" .
Ce: mathao mae Mao" So: phung: jham mae bo ko" ra" naonhaung" khyo we' sin: yang: ngonhaung" yao: phug: ta" na va" . Naonhaung" thaung" qhug' na ko" ra" yhin" ru we' qug: khai: khyo alhab' re xo' yang: naonhaung" khoru: zang: qhao" ko" ru we' lam khug: na: ko" rure ngonhaung" yao: phug: ta" na: bam va" .
Cegu: alhab' wa Mao" So: dao: kho' ru wa din: vang" rure qhu" byid: mung: ai: mathao khyo" naonhaung" wa yao" mung"dan: mae man: qi" ra" mo, boe" li" genae" . Naonhaung" wa ai: mung"dan: qhid' mae" qug: khai: kham zo" na: ako" .
Mao" So wa jo: ra" khyo" kad' li" nae"- yao: wa ngonhaung" re qug: khai: nhao: ra" mo, re qug: khai: kham zo: nhao: li" nae" .
Qug: khai: qug: khai: kham zo" na ko" mo, naonhaung" re we' daga" ngonhaung" rere: myaung: ngho" ru byid' li" nae" . Asang Yesu wa yao" qam: bo: ra" mug: lagyo: qe we' daga" myishae we' mug: gaung mae" thug' li" ra" au:-
Mao" So wa yao: re ngag: pye' mo, we' ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: khyo Lau Dao: Gai re matae" gyo" ra" mo, re qobo dae byid' li" nae" .
Yao: wa yao" byu alhab' mo; yang byid' ra" phug' te' nga: yhe' rure khae: yu nae" ra" ba na mae joe" li" au: yao: bam wa Asang: qhid' kheim: mae" re: yao" qam: so' bo: ra" phungbao mae" re: kao" pye' ru qhug' mung: apyad ato byo; qeim: ra" qobo dae kham zo" li" genae" . Naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" ta" ra" dao: re lam" vako" ruyang ai: Asang re phungbao byid' ra" mo; phaung mae naonhaung" re: bobo: li" genae" .
Ai: mathao mae ngonhaung" wa khonhae" re: naonhaung" qhid' mae" akyu" mho' ra" . Naonhaung" re yao: khai: yu: to" ra" kaoso' daui khyo we' man: qi" ra" mo, boe" nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" nho: Mao" So re ngonhaung" akyu" mho' ra" . Yao: wa gai shab: rure naonhaung" kao bau: ra" gu: alhab' re we' naonhaung" lam khug mau" zo" re yao" qam: so' khyo" yang jab byang" byid: vashao: .
Airu: ngonhaung" Mao" So we' ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" yang ngonhaung" Asang Yesu mang wa naonhaung" mathao mae phungbao bao: li" mung: yao" mathao mae naonhaung" re: phungbao bao: li" genae" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" Asang Yesu dam: joe" li" nae" khyo ngonhaung" yao: we' daga" zang" ham: na nae" ra" khyo we' sin: yang: ngo ta" nug: ru wa-
ai: Asang: ba na bin: joe" va"- ga: ta" ko" ra" dao" yang ngonhaung" nhag' lam: gyai laui laui za: athaui: anhaung" maboe" genae" we' nhag' lam: mamyan: makhyad' maboe" genae" qhid' mae" ngo naonhaung" re mho' ke' ra" . Ce: dao: wa ngonhaung" lapa pa: au: ta" ra" dao: ngad:- mangad: lao"- tarha" kho" ra" dao:- mangad: lao" ngonhaung" vhin tung" mae botung" ke' ra" dao: ngad: ga: myid: jho: re myid: jho vako" laug?
Naonhaung" re pe" khyo" re: khag' yang re: damhug' pyag' nhao ge,- pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So re lo" thao" gye kad' tau: lhan" ru maboe" shire we' myiqid tham: khyo gyo" nae" yaug ngad: ra" ai: Makhyang" Ra" Yaug mathug' li" li" wa ai: ba na joe" li" nae" mangad: .
Yao: wa so ga: mhang" ra" gu: alhab' re mangad: lao"- caung: pa" ra" ja: alhab' re gye kad' mung: aijham: tho' mae yao: yao" gaung re je: qi: yaug ga: kham: yu: li" nae" . Yao: wa Mao" So: Caung: pa" Yham khug mae lhao" re: yevao: zaung: jo, mung: Mao" So ngad:- ga: ta" li" nae" .
Ngo naonhaung" we' daga" na shi" au: cegu: alhab' re ngo naonhaung" re ta" va" rure naonhaung" mamyid: beim: ge i?
Ana" ceru: boe" nae" ngadqere: maboe" nhao shilo: tam" to" ru daja: ja: jo; ra" . Ai: ja: pe" ngad: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" . Airumung: ai: Makhyang" Ra" Yaug wa ayo, dau lao" thug' li" li" nae" .
Ai: mug: pho: makhyang: mashab: ru wa boe" na: jo, gau ngad: ava" . Ngadqere: tam" to" ra" yaug re mayu: pye' pye' wa ai: boe" li" nae" ra" khyo wa boe" li" nae" mangad: .
Ailao" ai: Makhyang: Mashab: Ra" Yaug wa myao: thug' li" li" nae" . Ngadqere: Asang Yesu joe" li" lao" yao: wa aiyaug re yao" nhad' mae" so' yang se' pye' mung: yao" bao qhui: ra" bag bao: yang phyo' qheim" pye' li" nae" .
Ai: Makhyang: Mashab: Ra" Yaug wa Satan" nho: qam: o: we' joe" li" mung: mug' pho: ve, lho apyag' aja: ja: re kad' qhu" ru we' mug' pho: mau" zo" jham re zaui" qhu" li" nae" .
Amung: ai: shid: jeim" lo" nae" ra" mo, re makhyang: mashab: ra" mhug' pyag' ru ja: khao: ngo" ci yang: mhug' pyag' li" nae" . Yao: bam wa khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" ai: dangman" rure jhid' de; kao bau taung" malham: pang" yu ko" ruyang shid: jeim" lo" li" genae" .
Yao: bam ai: mhug' pyag' ra" dao: re lam" geshao: ga:- Mao" So wa yao: bam: khug mae mau" zaui: nae" qhid' mae" shad' nghung" ra" qam: so' re nhao: ke' ra" .
Dangman" rure malam" lo:- qobo khug mae na: ngaui: ra" mo, alhab' wa dao: phyid' ru qhug' li" genae" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- Asang re jhid' de; mo, ngad ko" ra" naonhaung" mathao mae ngonhaung" yo, khyin: khao: ngo" Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" na: bam ca" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Byo: nho: qam: so' khyo" yang naonhaung" re yao" gyang" lho" ra" byu qe boe" nhao nae" we' dangman" rure naonhaung" lam khug: ra" myid khyo" yang naonhaung" khyad' yu: ru qhug' genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa aqhid mae" ngonhaung" re khyin: san: yu: ra" .
Mao" So wa ngonhaung" kho" kyo" ra" lau dao: gai khyo" yang re: Mao" So wa cekhyo mae naonhaung" re khai: yu: to" ra" . Yao: wa ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: phungbao gae bam re naonhaung" qo" sang: yu geshao: ga: naonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" .
Airumung: mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" kho" kyo: yang: re:- ngonhaung" vhin tung" khyo" yang re: naonhaung" re ngonhaung" mho" shid' lo: ra" ai: dangman" ra" khyo jham re jhaug' za: zaui" zag: ci yang: tang za: ye; jo, ge, .
Ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu yao: we' ngonhaung" re jhid' de; mung:- yao" nhag' myan" ra" jeju mae magyid mayeim: ra" mazag mavae: myid we' gang" tang: ra" myid: lao" khyo re ngonhaung" re byid' ngonhaung" pho" Mao" So wa-
naonhaung" khonhae" re: gai: ra" dao: jhau nae" we' gai: ra" mau" re zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re mazag mavae: myid we' qam: so' ke' byid: vageshao: wo" .
Ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Asang: mungdao: wa ngonhaung" phaung mae we' dakhyo: xo' yang: phyad phyad byo: lo" mung:- phungbao bao nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" re akyu" bao" mho' byid: gela, ein: lo" thao" khyo" pyang: ke' ra" .
Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re magai mashab: ra" mo, we' makhyang" ra" mo; lo, mae" khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" re: akyu" bao" mho' byid: gela,- pe"mung: ga"re byu yaug khao: ngo" wa ai: mungdao: re malam ko" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Asang wa lam ga"- kyid yaug ngad mung: yao: wa naonhaung" re qam: bo nhao: ru we' ai: Makhyang" Ra" Yaug mae" gug: gam byid' li" nae" .
Asang wa ngonhaung" re naonhaung" dao mae myid: lam: to: nhao: ra" . Amung ngonhaung" ta" rure zaui: so" na mung: xo' yang: re: zaui: so" li" genae" rure ngonhaung" khyag' za: myid: lam va" .
Asang wa Mao" So: jhid' de; myid re je yang: no, sho' ba: gyo" yu nae" we' Khristu byid' to" ra" zang: qhao" myid re qo" yu sho' naonhaung" re khyo qhid' au: she byid: vashao: wo" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- Anoe" ashoe kaoso' daui: na ko" ra" mo, mao: nhaung: qe alhab' mo, we' ngonhaung" mho" shid' ra" dao: re matae" gyo" ra" mo, alhab' we' majho" zam" khug genae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" wa Asang Yesu Khristu nho: mang mae naonhaung" re amyin" byid' ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" mau" zaui" lo: ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" re: mau" zaui: ang ko" rure naonhaung" yao: nyang" za: ba: ako" . Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" we' daga" na: au: anoe" ashoe kaoso' daui: lo mo, mangad: .
Ngonhaung" wa aphug' mabyid: lo: khag' dayaug: nho: bao" thaug' zai re: makhae: yu: lo- Airu: khae: yu nae" atha" ngonhaung" wa qam: ke' yang: mau" zaui" bam va" . Naonhaung" mae" khag' dayaug re: ngonhaung" qhid' mae" qo mala: nae" khyo" ngonhaung" wa myi" re: na" re: qam: ke' yang: mau" zaui" lo: bam va" .
Ngonhaung" ceru: kad' lo: ru wa ngonhaung" re bao" thaug' byid: nae" rure mho' yu nae" ngonhaung" mae akho: akhang" maqo" yang: mangad:- ngonhaung" ceru: kad' ru wa naonhaung" cao" nae" qhid' mae" ve, so: doe, shao: ein: airu: kad' lo: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" we' daga" na: au: mau" manug: khao" ra" yaug wa vae: mazo: vashao: ein: naonhaung" re lhaung" ta" va" .
Ngonhaung" ceru: ta" ru wa naonhaung" phaung mae anoe" ashoe kaoso' daui: ra" mo, we' su gaje: mau" zo" mae za: bocao: be; baung: mung: pe" makad' mo, na ko" rure ngonhaung" the' gyo" ruyang ngad: ra" .
Airu" ra" mo, wa sae za: na mung: mau" khao" zo: genae" qhid' mae" Asang Yesu Khristu mang mae ngha yang: ngonhaung" ta" peim: ta" kyang" ke' ra" .
Ngadqere: mao: nhaung: qe we"- gai shab: ra" mau" zo" zaui: so" rumae damyaung: dadug ge,-
Naonhaung" ce: vhin tung" mae botung" ke' ra" mungdao: re matae" gyo" ra" byu dayaug yaug na: re na nae" . Airu: na yang: ngad: re wa yao: qho' ne phyi qhug' vashao: . Yao: re xam" to: mung: dazam" khug ge,-
ngadqere: gyevo we' dakhyo: wa yao: re dakad' ge,- Gyevo ru: kad' nae" atha"- mao: nhaung: dayaug re we' dakhyo: yao: re ta" peim: ta" kyang: ge, .
Ngonhaung" nho: ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru ajhaung ngad: ra" Asang yao: yao: yo, khyin: khao: ngo"- khyo khe' khao: ngo" mae ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru naonhaung" re byid: vashao: wo" . Asang wa naonhaung" alhab' mo, we' daga" ngad vashao: wo" .
Ce: vhin tung" re nga" lo; yang yao: tung" ru ngad: . Tung" yaug Polu . Vhin tung" khao: ngo" mae nga" mang ceru: tung" ra"- ceru: ngo lhaung" tung" va" .
Ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa naonhaung" alhab' mo; we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" .
Ngonhaung" khyad' yu: Asang Mao" So we' ngonhaung" myid: lao" khyo ngad: ra" Khristu Yesu nho: amyin" khyo" yang Khristu Yesu nho: lagyo: dayaug ngad: ra" ngo Polu wa-
Lam khug: rumae nga" zo: gyang" ngad: ra" Timothi re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" . Pho" Mao" So we' ngonhaung" Asang Khristu Yesu wa nhag' myan" ra" jeju nhag' khyag' shogu: ru we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru nao re byid: vashao: wo" .
Ngo Makedoni mung" khyo ye" lo" au: re nao re ngo ta" co' ru we' dakhyo: nao Ephesu vogaung: mae xo' na: jo, nae" rure ngo o: ra" . Ai: vogaung: mae mho" shid' khyo apyag' re mho" shid' na ko" ra" mo, byu damyo" na gemung: nao wa yao: bam re ai: khyo thang: pye' genae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid: ca" ra" .
Jho" ta" ngag nae" rure za: boe" thug' li" nhao: ra" mhomyi: saung: seim jham re ta" ru we' dayao: dayang ngad: ra" byuxag' she' ra" khyo jham re to" pye' genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re ta" wa, . Lalam lakhug khyo" qo" ba: yu: ra" Mao" So myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo re aijham: yang pe" maqo" zaui: so: byid: ngad: ra" .
Ceru: amyin" byid' runho: au: qang khyo wa- gyang" lho" ra" aung khug nhag' lam: gyang" san: ra" aung khug nhag' lam: we'- yaung" san: ra" lam khug: myid mae" thug' li" ra" jhid' de; myid re pug: to" ke' nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Byu damyo" wa cekhyo jham mae" phaug' lo" byaug mung: akyu" mabo: ra" ja: mae jho" ta" ngag yang: khyonghung: nghung" byaug: ako" .
Yao: bam wa Mao" So: tarha" mho" pho" qe boe" nug: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa yao: bam yao" dao: thoe jham re maba: gyo:- mangad: lao"- yao: bam gyai lam lam za: ta" na: ra" khyo jham re maba: gyo: ko" ngad: ra" .
Ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa jo ang: ra" khyo" ci: ngad: re wa gai: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Tarha" jham wa byu gai qe: qhid' mae" khyo" to" ru mangad:- Tarha" shad' lhoe" ra" mo, we' tarha" re tau: lhan" ra" mo; qhid' mae" Mao" So mabo: ra" mo, we' qobo shad' lhoe" ra" mo; qhid' mae"- lam khug khyo re malam" ra" mo,- mangad: lao" Byo we' sin" ra" khyo macao" ra" mo; qhid' mae"- yao: bam: yao: pho" qe- mangad: lao"- yao: myhi" qere se' ra" mo; qhid' mae"- byu se' mo; qhid' mae"
gaung sho: gintho' mau" zo" qho: ra" mo; qhid' mae"- yauggai yao: cao:- myiqe: yao: cao: gaung sho: jho" zam" ra" mo; qhid' mae"- byu khug' ra" mo; qhid' mae"- mhug' ra" mo, we' madang maman" ra" sagse: kham: ra" mo, mangad: lao"- gai: ra" mho" shid' khyo we' tug' shai" ra" mo; qhid' mae" Tarha" khyo" to" ru ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: yu ca" ra" .
Ai: mho" shid' khyo phungbao we' byang" jo, mung: ta" shid' kyo: nae" ngore lam: to" ra" ngaui lho" ra" Mao" So mae" thug' li" ra" Lau Dao: Gai mae the' myao: ra" .
Nga" mau" zo" re qo" zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" ngore qam: o: byid: yaug ngad: ra" ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu re ngo jeju beim: so: caung: khin" ra" . Ngo wa lai: lo" ra" ayo, mae yao: re jung" gaui: lo yaug- yhin" lo yaug- roe" lo yaug ngad sho' ngadqere: yao: wa ngore man: qi" yaug ngad: ra" khyo" sun" yu mung:- yao: re caung da" byid: nae" qhid' mae" san: yu: to" ruyang ngo wa yao: re jeju beim: so: caung: khin" ra" . Ngadqere: ngo wa lam khug myid mabo shi" ru we' ngo kad' ra" mau" zo" re ngo maba: ruyang Mao" So wa ngore nhag' khyag' shogu: ru byid' ra" .
Ngonhaung" Asang wa yao" magan: mago" ra" nhag' myan" ra" jeju ngore vhe' sheim: byid: mung: Khristu Yesu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe; rumae ngonhaung" qo" yu: ra" lam khug myid we' jhid' de; myid ngore byid' ra" .
Khristu Yesu mug: myid dao khyo joe" li" ru wa qobo jab qere khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" ngad:- ga" ra" dao: wa dangman" ra" dao: ngad mung: jab byang" sho' khae: yu mung: lam" nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Ngo wa ai bam mae" je: xo: thao" yaug ngad: .
Ngadqere: thao phyao: Khristu re lam mung: apyad ato kaoso' re qo" khae: yu genae" mo; qhid' mae" ve, so: khyo" Khristu Yesu wa yao" byang" sheim: jo; ra" nhag' lam: qhang qhang zang: kham: rure qobo jab qe alhab' mo, tho' mae je: xo: thao" yaug ngad: ra" ngore qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa ngore nhag' khyag' shogu: ru byid' ra" .
Apyad ato: kho: kham shid maba: ru we' myo; yang magai: myao: ra" date: za: ngad: ra" Mao" So re apyad ato mae khonhae" re: phug' te' nga: yhe' byid' ru we' phungbao bo: jo, vashao wo"- Amen .
