Nga" zo: Timothi we"- lai: lo" ra" ayo, mae ni" khyo re lapa pa: to" ra" dao: jham re cao" yang: ngo wa ce: amyin" akhang" nao re byid' to" ra" . Nyang" za: khe' zin: nae" qhid' mae" ai: Lapa dao: jham re shae lhae khyo" ci wa,-
alao" ni" lam khug: myid re zaui" zag: ci yang: aung khug nhag' lam: gyang: gyang: to: wa,- byu damyo" wa yao: bam: aung khug nhag' lam: ta" ra" khyo re matae" gyo: gemung: yao: bam: lam khug myid re byo; qeim: lo" nhao: ako" .
Ai bam: phaung mae Humenaeu we' Alexanda tao bobo: ako" . Ngo wa yao: shid' yaug re Satan" nho: qam: so' lo, khyo ab byid' pye' ra" khyo" qobo dae byid: va" . Ceru wa yao: shid' zo: Mao" So re jung" gaui: ra" dao: majhau genae" rure mho" shid' byid' li" nae" .
Arumung: byu alhab' mo; qhid' mae" Mao" So re goe; mho' ru- akyu" mho' ru- bobao" mho' yao: ru we' jeju caung: khin" byid' ru kad' genae" qhid' mae" sao qhid' mae ngo nao re jhan" ke' va" .
Ngonhaung" wa ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ra" Mao" So re gyaug phug' zo" re"- gai ang: ra" ave, lo, mau" we' kaoso' qo" daui nae" qhid' mae" kho: kham qe we' kheim: so' qo" ra" gatau byu gaje qe: qhid' mae" re: akyu" mho' byid: wa, .
Ceru" ra" akyu" mho' ru wa gai: ra" khyo ngad mung: ngonhaung" nho: khyad' yu: ra" Mao" So re ngaui nhao: ra" lo, mau" ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa byu yaug khao: ngo" khyad' yu: rure qhug' yu genae" ru we' dangman" ra" khyo re ba: lo genae" qhid' mae" yao: o ngaui: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa date: za: na mung: Mao" So we' byu: agyo: mae mang: dae tae" byid: yaug re: byu ve, vin: ra" Khristu Yesu dayaug za: na: ra" .
Yao: wa xao su byu alhab' mo, re khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" yao: yao" gaung re byid' pye' ra" . Airu wa ayo, dau lao" byu yaug khao: ngo" khyad' yu qhug' genae" rure Mao" So o ngaui: ra" khyo re sagse: qhu" byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Arumung: ngo wa lagyo: dayaug khyo" we' Taung bug byu qe: mho" pho" khyo" lam khug khyo we' dangman" ra" khyo mungdao: re ta" hau" kyo: byid: nae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' ru qhug' ra" . Ngo wa mamhug'- ngo wa dangman" rure ta" na: .
Ngo wa yauggai qere caung: pa" phaung khao: ngo" mae akyu" mho' genae" rure o: ra" . Mao" So re qhaug' byid: to: va" yauggai qe wa nhag' yo" ru we' jho" ta" ngag: ru mabo lo: yao: bam: lo, re tau yang: akyu" mho' genae" rure ngo o ngaui: ra" .
Myiqe: qere: xae nag au: zaung shaung: ru- mangad: lao" qhang zai jham- palhe" jham- mangad: lao" phug' de; ra" ve, mai ve,bau: jham: yang gaung mashaung lo:- ave, de, de, za: ve,mai ve,bau: re dau yaung" ra" khyo" shaung ve; genae" rure ngo o: ra" .
Mao" So re caung: pa" ra" myiqe: qe ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- dau ang: ra" khyo" dau shab: ra" lo, mau" we' yao: yao" gaung re shaung: ci geshao: .
Myiqe: qe wa nhag' lam: nyham: khyo" ra" myid we' sae za: na yang: zhao: yu qo: ra" .
Mho" shid' nae" mangad: lao" yauggai qere eib khang" nae" rure ngo wa myiqe: qere akhang" mabyid:- yao: bam wa sae za: na qo: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Adam: wa sao qhid' phan" to: qhug' mung:- Eva wa thao re phan" to: qhug' ra" .
Mhug' pyag' qhug' yaug wa Adam: mangad: ngad: ra" . Ai: myiqe: yaug lam: mhug' pyag' ru qhug' mung: Mao" So: tarha" re shad' lhoe" pye' ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: wa ave, de, de, za: lam khug: ru jhid' de; ru we' gyang" lho" rumae xo' yang: kaoso' daui: ngad: re wa myiqe: qe wa zo: dau myhung: ra" khyo" yang khyad' yu: ru qhug' li" genae" .
Phung: au: jhaung boe" nug: ra" myid kao bau: ra" yaug wa gai shab: ra" mau" zo" re kao bau yaug ngad: ra"- ga" ra" dao: khyo: wa dangman" ra" dao: ngad: ra" .
Phung: au: jhaung kad' yaug wa qobo mabo: ra" yaug- yham sang myhi" dayaug za: qo" yaug- yhid mayid yaug- yao: yao" gaung re qo" khang" yaug- ave, de, yaug- bang" da" nug yaug- mho" shid' byid: ngau: bo yaug ngad ca" ra" .
Yao: wa yhid ya:- byu qan yaug magai: ngad ngad: ra" . Nau" nhae" ru we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: rure kao bau yaug ngad qo: ra" . Yao: wa ngaui qhang re au: am: yaug magai: ngad ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa yham byu qere nyang" za: qo" eib khang" yaug ngad mung: yao" zo: dau qeyang phug' myao: taung" mho dao: gyo: byid' ra" yaug ngad qo: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: yao" yham byu qere khoru: eib khang" nae" maba: ra" yaug wa Mao" So: phung: re khoru: qo" gun caung nae" i?
Yao: wa ngad beim: myid bo: thug' li" mung: Satan re"ru: dao: phyid' ru maqhug' nae" qhid' mae" yao: wa lam khug: rumae zoqao" ngad qo: ra" .
Yao: wa jung" gaui: pye' ru maqhug' nae" we' Satan nho: lha" khug khyo magyo" vao nae" qhid' mae" yao: wa phung: taung gaung shad' mae" byu qeyang phug' myao: byid: qhug' ra" yaug ngad qo: ra" .
Phung: tau qe re: nhag' lam: din: man" ru we' gai: ra" ave, de, mo, ngad qo: ra" . Yao: bam wa sabyi qang: re au: maam: mo,- mangad: lao" ngaui qhang re so' kho' myid mabo mo, ngad ca" ra" .
Yao: bam wa ai: qhu" byid' to: va" ra" dang"man" ra" lam khug khyo re aug khug nhag' lam: qang: qang: za: zaui" zag: ci mo, ngad qo: ako" .
Yao: bam wa sao qhid' jham" qu" rure kham: yu mung: yao: bam re qobo vhin nae" khyo pe" mabo ngad: re wa phung: tau mau" re vin vo, caung da" byid: vageshao: .
Yao: bam: yham sang myhi" qere: ave, gai mo, ngad qo: ra" . Gaui mho- lau hab' mo, magai: ngad ngad: ra" . Yao: bam wa yhid mayid: ru we'- ja: khao: ngo" mae nhag' lam: jao lam ga" mo, ngad qo: ra" .
Phung: tau pho" wa yham sang myhi" dayaug za: qo" yaug ngad mung:- yao" zo: dau qere we' yao" yham byu qere nyang" za: qo" eib khang" yaug ngad qo: ra" .
Yao: bam yao" mau" zo" re nyang" za: aung doe, sho' vin vo; ra" phung: tau qe wa- nga: ye, mung: Khristu Yesu khug mae yao: bam: lam khug: ra" khyo re mazag mavae qo" ta" hau" ako" .
Ngo wa nao jhao" ce: vhin tung" re tung" ke' ra" ayo, mae- mataung" myao" re nao jhao" li" qhug' nae" rure ngo myid: lao" ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo myao" na yang: ngad: re wa kaoso' daui: na: ra" Mao" So: phung: ngad mung: dangman" ru: nho: zang baung: we' apan aqao: ngad: ra" Mao" So: yham byu qe ngonhaung" khoru: na ye; ang: ra" khyo re ce: vhin tung" wa nao re ba nhao: li" nae" .
Ngonhaung" lam: ra" caung: pa" thung" wa gyai no; thao" ru ngad: rure khag' dayaug re: maqo" ha: pye' ru wa o mae ta" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa xao su byu: ve, vin yang: po" li" mung: Byo: yang jo: ra" yaug ngad: ga: qhu" byid: qhug' yaug ngad: ra" . Mug: lagyo: jham: yang re: yao: re myao: avako" . Yao" khyo re byumyu" cao jab: phaung mae kho" kyo: byid: mung:- Mug: myid jao: sho' mae" mo, yao: re lam" avako" . Yao: wa mug: gaung khyo to' yu: ru qhug' ava" .
Ai: atha" yao: bam wa je yang: lhao" re: ai bam re caung da" byid' na vageshao:- pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam zaui: so" ra" mau" zo" akyu" re qo" khae: yu: ra" mo, wa yao: bam jhid' de; ra" lam khug: ra" mao: nhaung: qe ngad: ako" .
Airu" ra" mho" shid' khyo jham wa jo, to' laung: yang phad' khyad' pye' re sho: shid: jo; ru we' dakhyo: aung khug nhag' lam: shid: jo; ra" mhug' pyag' ra" mo; yang mho" pyo: ke' ra" mho" shid' khyo ngad: ra" .
Airu" ra" mo, wa ug' khug' dinkhu: de: lo, xo' xo' ra" khyo we' zo: ve daqhae: re zo: shaug' ru wa shad' ra" khyo ngad:- ga: mho" shid' byid' ako" . Ngadqere: lam khug: ra" mo, we' dangman" ra" khyo re ba va" mo, wa jeju caung: akyu" mho' yang: zo: shaug' nae" qhid' mae" ai: zo: ve jham re Mao" So phan" to" ra" .
Mao" So phan" to" ra" ja: khao: ngo" wa gai: ru ngad mung: pe" ja: rere: ngag: jao" pye' nae" made, ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ja: khao: ngo" re jeju caung: yang: kham: yu qo: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: mungdao" yang we' akyu" mho' ru wa ai: rure Mao" So: yang khae: yu man" ru boe" nhao: ra" .
Nao wa ce: mho" shid' khyo jham re mao: nhaung: qere mho" byid: yang: ngad: re wa nao phug' cao" ra" dangman" ra" mho" shid' khyo we' lam khug: khyo: nho: mungdao: jham nao yao" gaung re byo zo: ve khau: ra" khyo" yang Khristu Yesu nho: gai: ra" daui daui yaug dayaug nao boe" lo: li" nae" .
Ngadqere: ta" nae" maman" ra" Mao" So mabo: ra" mhomyi: saung: seim jham re jao" pye' wa,- Mao" So bo: ra" kaoso' daui khyo: qhid' mae" naoyao" gaung re zhao: min" yu wa, .
Gaung khyao we' sin: yang: zhao: min" yu: ru wa akyu" dajhid' bo: ra" . Ngadqere: Byo we' sin: yang: zhao: min" yu: ru wa khyo khe' khao: ngo" mae akyu" bo nhao: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re airu wa ana" pyad- joe" lo nae" pyad qhid' mae" kaoso' re byid: nae" ngad: ra" .
Ceru wa dangman" ra" dao: ngad mung: jab byang" sho' khae: yu mung: lam" tho' ra" dao: ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa ngonhaung" nho: myid: lao" rure byu alhab' mo; khyad' yu: Asang ngad: ru we' je yang: lam khug: ra" mo; khyad' yu: Asang ngad: ra" kaoso' daui: ra" Mao" So: khug mae ngonhaung" to" to: va" ruyang ngonhaung" wa qam: ke' yang: mau" zaui" ra" .
Ce: pyang dao: jham mae" mho" shid' khyo jham yao: bam re mho" byid: wa,
nao wa zolau: ngad: ruyang khag' yang re: nao re daqu" ngai nhao wa,- ni" dao: jhau: rumae- ni" lo, mau" mae- ni" jhid' de; rumae- ni" lam khug: khyo mae- ni" gyang" san: rumae lam khug: ra" mo; qhid' mae" ve, so: gai boe" nhao wa, .
Ngo joe" li" sho' mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae jham: mugsug' nghe' mung: kho" kyo: byid: yang: mho" shid' byid: mung: ni" yo, khyin: we' ni" qam: o: re byid: yang: qam: ke' na wa,-
Lapa qeyang ta" thug' mung: phung: lau: de, qe ni" dao mae lo, kai: byid' ra" au:- nao re byid' to: qhug' ra" ni" khug mae bo: ra" Byo we' sin" ra" jeju jhaung qhu" re pe" shui manho lo: dakad' wa, .
Byu alhab' mo; yang ni" nho: qi" qhang aung doe; li" ra" khyo re myao genae" qhid' mae" ai: khyo jham re naoyao: kao bau qam: zaug taung" lo, qaung: kad' cao" wa,-
naoyao" gaung re lha" yang: na mung: ni" mho" shid' khyo rere: lha" wa,- ai: khyo jham re nao xo' yang: kad' cao" na: ngad: re wa naoyao" gaung re we' ni" mungdao: re gyo" ra" mo, alhab' re khyad' yu: li" nae" .
Phug' mao: qere daqeim wa,- ngadqere: yao: bam re ni" pho" re we' dakhyo: ta" peim: ta" kyang: wa,- ni" o mae" zolau: qere ni" nhaung: bam re we' dakhyo:-
phyid' mao: qere ni" myhi" bam re we' dakhyo: ni" o mae" zomyi: qere ni" nhae: mo" bam re we' dakhyo:- gyang" san: ra" myid we' zam" khug wa, .
Gaigai: yao:- yao: yao: za: ngad: ra" cug' mo" myhi" qere gun caung wa, .
Ngadqere: ai: cug' mo" myhi" wa yauggai myiqe: zo:- mangad: lao"- yao: myid: qe qo" yang: ngad: re wa yao: bam wa yao: bam yao" ug' khug' dinkhu: we' sin" ra" yao: bam: caung: pa" thung" qo jham re shi" sao qhid' lo, joe" kad' zhao: yu ang: ako" . Cekhyo" yang yao: bam: myhi" pho" qe we' phug' phyid' qere jeju dam: tug' byid' ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re ai: mau" zo" wa Mao" So o ngaui: ra" mau" zo" ngad: ra" .
Yao: dayaug za: ngad mung: yao: re gun caung nae" mana: ra" cug' mo" wa yao" myid: lao" khyo Mao" So mae to: mung: mathang mano: akyu" mho' ru we' Mao" So: yang bao" thaug' byid: nae" rure myi" re: na" re: mho' yao: ra" .
Ngadqere: akyang qeim mung: pyo: khyo cao" na: ra" cug' mo" myhi" wa yao: daui: na sho' ngadqere: shid: jo, gau ngad: ava" .
Yao: bam re khag' yang re: qobo vhin khyo made, nae" qhid' mae" cekhyo jham re yao: bam re ceim" shid' byid: wa, .
Ngadqere: byu dayaug yaug wa yao: yao" ba nam ug zo: qere we'- je yang: yao: yao" ug khug' dinkhu: byu qere magun caung yaug ngad: re wa yao: wa ai: lam khug: ra" khyo re ha: pye' ra" yaug ngad mung: malam khug yaug tho' je: magai yaug ngad: ra" .
Apyad khyaug' xe zin majoe" shi" ra" cug' mo" khag' rere: cug' mo" japhin: mae dake' ge,- yao: wa dalhang za: lo, xo' qu" yaug ngad ca" ra" .
Amung: gai: ra" lo, mau" qhid' mae" mang qi" ra" yaug ngad ca" ra" . Yao" zo: dau qere nyang" za: khau: qhi" lo yaug- bang" da" lo yaug- Khristan mao: nhaung: qere khyid cid' byid' lo yaug- qug: khai: qhug' ra" mo, re bao" thaug' lo: ra" yaug- gai shab: ra" mau" zo" re kao bau taung" zaui: so" lo yaug ngad ca" ra" .
Ngadqere: apyad ngai: ra" cug' mo" myhi" qere cug' mo" myhi" japhin: mae dake' ge,- pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam gaung sho: myid kao bau: ruyang ug' khug' dinkhu: vai" nug gelao"- yao: bam wa Khristu mae" phaug' lo" byaug: ako" .
Airumung: Asang re sao qhid' byid' to" ra" yao: bam: dao: so: re phyo' pye' gemung: qobo qo" mo, boe" lo: ako" .
Yao: bam wa dayham mae" dayham khyo lae" lhau mung: yao: bam: yo, khyin: re mageim: na: pye' ba: ako" . Ai: tho' je: xo: ru wa yao: bam wa gaui mho lau hab' mung: su: khyo re kaung: kag' ru we' yao: bam majhau ang: ra" dao: jhau ba: ako" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" gyevo qe wa ngonhaung" khyo we' sin: yang: magai makhyang" ra" dao: jhau nae" agu maqo" genae" qhid' mae" apyad ngai: ra" cug' mo" qe wa ug' khug dinkhu: vai"- zo: dau khau mung: yao: bam: yham khug: dinkhu: re gun caung yang: na genae" rure ngo je yang: o ngaui: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re cug' mo" qe damyo" wa khyonghung: nghung" byaug mung: Satan" nho: thao cao" byaug: avako" .
Ngadqere: Khristan myiqe: dayaug yaug yao" yham byu qe mae" cug' mo" qe bo yang: ngad: re wa yao: wa ai bam re gun caung byid: qo: ra" . Phung: re qo magai: la: nhao ngad: ra" . Ailao" yao: yao: za: ngad: ra" cug' mo" qere phung" yang qo" gun caung byid: nae" ngad: ra" .
Au: jhaung qekhyo" mau" nyang" vin vo; ko" ra" phung: lau: de, qe wa aphug' shid' zhao" kham: yu man" ra" mo, ngad: ako" ein: myid: yu qo: ra" . Je yang: mungdao: kho" kyo" ra" mau" zo" we' mho" shid' byid' ra" mau" zo" re qam: ke' yang: zaui: so" ra" mo, wa airu" ra" aphug' re kham: yu man" ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re jham: mugsug' mae nao gaug nao" ra" au: re ci: ra" nung: jaung lo" nhad' re gyan dazhaung: byid:- amung: mau" zaui: yaug wa yao" mau" zaui: phug' re khae: yu man" ra" ga: ta" ra" .
Sagse: shid' yaug- mangad: lao"- ai tho' je: ra" sagse: qeyang mata" re wa- phung: lau: de, pho" re qobo zhaug' ta" ra" dao: re dabotae" gyo: wa, .
Gaje dang: ra" mo, gyaug geshao:- qobo shad' ra" yaug re mo, byu qe: qhid' kheim: mae qeim: mho" wa, .
Cekhyo jham re nao wa khag' rere: myo, nho nga: lao: makhyin- khag' bo: made, lo: nao zaui so: phug' cao" na vashao: Mao" So: qhid' kheim:- Khristu Yesu qhid' kheim:- gyang" lho" ra" mug: lagyo: jham: qhid' kheim: mae ngo wa nao re no: mae lao: yang: ta" ra" .
Khag' rere: lo, dahin: kai: byid: wa,- Su gaje qe qobo kad' rumae dacao: bo wa,- naoyao" gaung gyang: gyang: za: na wa, .
Nao wa dazab makyo vae: dug: no no mung: ruyang qid za: dashaug' wa,- zo: ve pyag' rumae bao" byid: nae" sabyi qang: rere: dajhid' jhid' boshaug' wa, .
Byu damyo" nho: qobo jham wa de: de: za: the' myao mung: yao: bam: qobo jham wa- dao: kho' nae" yao: bam: gau: qhid' mae de" thug' jo; ra" . Ngadqere: gatau damyo" nho: qobo jham wa thao re za: myao: thug' li" ba: ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo: gai: ra" lo, mau" jham re wa de: de: za: the' myao mung:- airu: de: de: za: mamyao: ra" ja: rere: maqo" gai: nyham" to: ngad: ra" .
Jeim ngad: ra" mo, wa yao: bam: asang qere phug' myao: byid: man: qi" ra" mo, khyo" myid: jho: yu qo: ra" . Ailao" za: Mao" So: mang a re we' ngonhaung" mho" shid' ra" khyo re khag' dayaug: yang re: majung" genae" .
Khristan phung: byu asang qo" ra" jeim qe wa- yao: bam wa yao: bam: mao: nhaung: qe ngad: ein: khyo" yang yao: bam re maphug' makhyad' dakad' ge,- ai: atha" yao: bam wa je yang: lhao" re:- ai bam re caung da" byid' na vageshao: . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam zaui: so" ra" mau" zo" akyu" re qo" khae: yu: ra" mo, wa yao: bam jhid' de; ra" lam: khug: ra" mao: nhaung: qe ngad: ako" . Nao wa cekhyo jham re mho" shid' byid: mung: kho" kyo" na qo: ra" .
Tug' shai" ra" mho" qhid khyo re mho" shid' byid' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: dangman" ra" mungdao: jham we' ngonhaung" caung: pa: thung" nho: mho" shid' ra" dao: jham we' majho" zhaung" ra" yaug wa-
Yao: yao" gaung re ngad beim: mung: pe" maba yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: wa dao: kheim: jham: lajheim: we' sin: yang: jho" ta" ngag nae" we' ta" byo, nae" kao bau yaug ngad: ra" . Ceru wa myid nug' ru- jho" ta" ngag: ru- su re ta" phoe: ru- makhyang" ra" khyo" su re myid: jho: ru we' adu: adae: mo, we' abang mabyid jho" ngag: byo; ru jham re boe" nhao: ra" .
Ceru" ra" mo, wa nhag' lam: atug' akhyug: ru ngad gemung: dangman" ra" khyo re maba mabeim" ra" mo, ngad: ako" . caung: pa" thung" wa jo,nho" qo" li" nae" khyo ngad: khyo" yao: bam myid: jho: yu: ako" .
Gai va"- yao: wa yao: qo" ra" gu: mae nhag' shid nhag' dag: na: ngad: re wa caung: pa" thung" wa byu re jo,nho" gyai qo" li" nhao: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa mug: myid dao khyo pe" ci: li" i? Pe" maci: li" . Ngonhaung" wa mug: myid dao mae" pe" qo" ciphao: lo" i? Pe" maqo" ciphao: lo" .
Aimung: ngonhaung" wa zo: ve we' ve,mai ve,bau: qo" yang: ngad: re wa- ngonhaung" qhid' mae" ga" va" ra" .
Ngadqere: jo,nho" qo" nug: ra" mo, wa ju" phyo' rure qhug' mung: gyai adu: adae" ru we' shid gyan nogyan boe" nhao: ra" kao bau obyid: ra" lha" mae myi" pye' ako" . Airu" ra" kao bau obyid myid wa yao: bam re byo; qeim: lo" ru khyo lao" khyo" pye' va" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngaui qhang re jhid' de; kao bau obyid: ru wa makhyang" ra" ja: alhab' nho: ajhaung ngad: ra" . Byu damyo" wa saung" qo" nug kao bau obyid geyang:- lam khug: ra" khyo mae" yao: bam khyonghung: nghung" lo" byaug mung: kaug' qhui: ru myo: sho' yang yao: bam: nhag' lam: re khyoe' pye' avako" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So: byu we"- nao kam" wa- ai: khyo jham alhab' re jao" pye' wa,- din: vang" ru- Mao" So: khyo re kao bau: ru- lam khug: ra" khyo- jhid' de; ru- zang: kham: ru we'- nau" nhae" ru jham re qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' na wa, .
Lam khug: ra" khyo we' sin" ra" jho" tao: poe mae naoyao" qam: bo: thao" ra" qhi" qam: ke' yang: tao: wa,- amung: apyad ato: kaoso' re qo" zaui" yu sho' kad' wa,- ai: qhid' mae" Mao" So nao re khai: yu: ra" au:- nao wa sagse: myo: sho' mo; qhid' kheim: mae ni" lam khug: ra" khyo re jhaug' za: ta" lhang: yu: ava" .
Ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu joe" thug' li" nae" ba na joe" sho' nao re byid' to" ra" amyin" jham re phug' cao" mung: qo mabo lo: kyid kyid za: zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" ja: cao jab alhab' re kaoso' byid' ra" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae re: Pontiu Pilad qhid' kheim: mae yao" lam khug: ra" khyo re jhaug' za: ta" lhang: yu: ra"- Khristu Yesu qhid' kheim: mae re: ngo nao re amyin" byid' ra" .
Ngaui lho" ru we' date: za: ngad: ra" zug: kho: kham qe: kho: kham- Asang qe: Asang ngad: ra" Mao" So: yang dau ang: ra" yo, khyin: mae Khristu nho: na: thug' li" rure boe" nhao: li" nae" .
Yao: dayaug za: shid maba ngad: ra"- yao: wa khag' re: maqo" te' ye" ra" mug: bo" khug mae daui: na: ra" . Yao: re khag' re: mamyao: qu" ngad: ra" . Yao: re khag' re: maqo" gai: myao ngad: ra" . Yao: mae phungbao we' apyad ato kheim: so' bo: jo, vashao: wo"- Amen .
Cepyad mae jo,nho" qo" ra" mo, re ngad beim: myid mabo genae" qhid' mae" ta" peim: byid: wa,- yao: bam myid: lao" ru wa airu" ra" byo; qeim: lo" ba: ra" jo,nho" qo" rumae mato: lo:- ngonhaung" myid pyo: nae" qhid' mae" ja: khao: ngo" re mabyag maqhag' lo: byid' ra" Mao" So mae to: genae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid: wa, .
Yao: bam re gai: ra" mau" zaui: nae" we' gai: ra" mau" zaui: so" rumae jo,nho" qo" mo, boe" nae"- byag qhag' ra" myid mabo lo:- su gaje qere gae: myho" byid: ba nae" jin" jin" ngad genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re amyin" byid: wa, .
Ceru: kad' ra" khyo" yang yao: bam wa- joe" lo nae" pyad qhid' mae" gang" tang: ra" jo,nho" ngad nae" ra" jo,nho" jham re yao: bam yao" qhid' mae" qaung" to" ru ngad: li" nae" . Ailao" dangman" ra" kaoso' ngad: ra" kaoso' re yao: bam qo" khae: yu: li" genae" .
Timothi we"- nao re lam: to" ra" mau" zo" re nyang" za: zaui" zag ci wa,- dao: qeim dao: co' jhau: ru we' byu damyo" yang shad' nghung" ra" khyo" laba lajhao ga: mhang" ko" ra" khyo we' sin: yang: adu: adae: jho" ta" ngag: rure jao" pye' wa, .
Pe"mung: ga"re byu damyo" wa ai: laba lajhao re qo" yu: to: mo, ngad: ga: khyag' khyag' ta" ako" . Ai: mathao khyo" yang lam khug: khyo mae yao: bam khyonghung: nghung" lo" byaug: avako" . Mao" So nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa naonhaung" alhab' we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" .
Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo" yang Yesu Khristu nho: lagyo: dayaug ngad mung:- Khristu Yesu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe; ra" khyo" ngonhaung" qo" yu: ra" dao: so: byid' to" ra" kaoso' khyo re ta" hau" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' qhug' yaug ngo Polu wa-
Ngo jhid' de; ra" nga" zo: re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" . Pho" Mao" So we' ngonhaung" Asang Khristu Yesu wa nhag' myan" ra" jeju- nhag' khyag' shogu: ru we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru nao re byid: vageshao: wo" .
Ngo wa nga" phug' pho" qe caung da" byid' lo vako" ru we' dakhyo: nhag' lam: gyang: gyang: za: ngo caung: da" byid' na: ra" Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" byid' ra" . Myi" re: na" re: nga" akyu" mho' thoe mae ngo nao re khonhae" re: bomyid: beim: zo" re"- yao: re jeju caung" ra" .
Ngo wa ni" ngug byid jham re myid: beim: byid' ra"- amung: ngo gyai ngaui bau" ru qhug' nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa nao re gyai qhug' nug: ra" .
Ni" phyid' Lui we' ni" myhi" Uni shid' ma: mae re: bo: ra" ni" nho: din: man" ra" lam khug: myid re ngo myid: beim" na: . Airu" ra" lam khug: myid ni" khug mae re: bo: ein: ngo myid: lam: ra" .
Ce: mathao mae ni" dao mae ngo lo, kai: byid' au:- nao re Mao" So byid' ra" jeju jhaung qhu" re xo' yang: de; jo, nhao nae" qhid' mae" nao re ngo ta" peim" ke' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So ngonhaung" re byid' to" ra" Byo wa ngonhaung" re magyaug: xu: jo, nhao ngad: ra" . Ai: atha" yao" Byo wa ngonhaung" re qam: so' we'- jhid' de; myid we'- yao: yao" gaung re qo" khang" ru ngonhaung" re ke' byid' ra" .
Airu: mung: ngonhaung" wa Asang: khyo re sagse: kham: rumae daqho' wa,- Khristu nho: mathao mae kyam: byu ngad: ra" nga" mathao mae re: daqho' wa,- ai: atha" Mao" So: qam: so' re kham: yu mung: Lau Dao: Gai qhid' mae" dayin dayo: kham zo" rumae bobo wa,-
Yao: ngonhaung" re khyad' yu mung: yao" byu qe boe" nae" qhid' mae" khai: yu: ru wa ngonhaung" qo" zaui: so" ra" mau" zo" mathao khyo" yang mangad:- yao" myid: yaung: to" ru we' nhag' myan" ra" jeju mathao khyo" yang ngad: ra" . Yao: wa mug: thug' sao mapeim: shimae" Khristu Yesu khyo" yang ce: nhag' myan" ra" jeju ngonhaung" re byid' ra" .
Ngadqere: ai: rure ngonhaung" khyad' yu: Asang Khristu Yesu joe" li" ra" khyo" yang ana" ngonhaung" re qhu" byid' ava" . Yao: wa shid: ru nho: qam so' re pin" pye' mung: Lau Dao: Gai khyo" yang shid maba: ra" kaoso' re qhu" byid' ava" .
Mao" So wa Lau Dao: Gai re byid: nae" qhid' mae" lagyo: we' mho" pho" khyo" ngore aya: tang" to: byid' ra" .
Ce: mathao mae ngo wa aijham re dayin dayo: kham zo" na: ru ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ngo wa myid: lam: ru byang" sho' bo: jo, shi"- pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa khag' re myid: lam khug ngha: na: rure ngo ba mung: yao: ngore lam: to" ra" khyo re lo" thao" ra" ba na joe" sho' yao: qo" zam" to: byid' rure ngo nyang" za: ba: ra" .
Ngo nao re mho" byid' ra" ai: dangman" ra" mungdao: jham re phug' cao" nae" qhid' mae" ve, so: khyo" tang za: zaui" zag: ci mung: Khristu Yesu we' ngonhaung" dadang: dalam: za: doe, yang: qo" yu: ra" ngonhaung" nho: lam khug: myid we' jhid' de; myid mae tang za: zaui" ci wa, .
Nao re lam: to" ra" ai: gai: ra" ja: jham re ngonhaung" khug mae na: jo; ra" Gyang" lho" Byo: qam: so' khyo" yang zam" ci wa,-
Phugelu we' Heramoge bobo yang: Asia mung" mae" mo, yaug khao: ngo" ngore shapye' to: co' ko" rure nao ba: ra" .
Asang wa Onesiphuru nho: yham byu qere nhag' khyag' shogu: ru qhu" byid: vashao:- pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa ngore myo: sho' lhang myid pyo: nhao: ra" . Yao: wa ngo thaung: laung" rure maqho' ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Roma vogaung: khyo joe" li" we' ngore maqhug' re qhug' sho' qho: ra" .
Asang wa lo" thao" ra" ba na mae yao" nhag' khyag' shogu: ru yao: re qhu" byid: vashao:- Ephesu vogaung: mae yao: khoqhi" sho' ngore caung da" byid: va" rure nao nyang" za: ba: ra" .
Nao kam" wa nga" zo: we"- Khristu we' ngonhaung" dadang: dalam: za: doe, yang: qo" yu: ra" nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" yang qam: bo: jo, wa,-
sagse: myo: sho' mo; qhid' kheim: mae ngo kho" kyo: mung: nao wa ngo mae" the' gyo" yu: ra" ai: mho" shid' dao: re su gaje qere qo" mho" shid' nae" ra" lam ga" ra" mo, rere: kai" ab byid: wa, .
Nao wa Khristu Yesu nho: jhaug' zaug: ra" gyezo: dayaug khyo" ai: qug: khai: dayin dayo: kham zo" rumae bokham zo: wa,-
gye mau" zo" vin vo; na: ra" gyezo: pho" wa yao" gyezug: pho" re ngaui nhao nae" qhid' mae" o mung: gye we' masin" ra" mau" zo" jham mae macao: lhag' zaui: ngad: ra" .
Jho" tao: poe mae bobo: ra" tao: sab' ra" byu dayaug wa ai: tarha" re maphug' cao" lo: bin: kheim" jhaung qhu" re maqo" ve; yu ngad: ra" .
Qam: ke' yang: mau" zaui" lo: ra" yo kad' yaug wa gaug zo maui: lam: ameim" re qo" zo: ang: ra" .
Ngo ta" ra" dao: re myid: qu" wa,- pe"mung: ga"re Asang wa ai: gu: alhab' nao re ba: gyo: nhao: li" nae" .
Ngo kho" kyo" ra" ai: Lau Dao: Gai mae mho" shid' ru we' dakhyo: shid: rumae" daui: to" li" nhao: ru qhug' ru we' Davi myid: zo: ngad: ra" Khristu Yesu re myid: beim: wa,-
ngo wa ai: Lau Dao: Gai re kho" kyo: yang: qug: khai: dayin dayo: kham zo: mung: tarha" shad' lhoe" ra" yaug re we' dakhyo: jao co" yang taui" to: qhug' ra" . Ngadqere: Mao" So: mungdao: re wa maqo" taui" to: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: khyin: yu qhug' ra" mo, wa- Khristu Yesu khyo" yang khyad' yu: rure qo" kham: yu mung: apyad ato: phungbao re qo" kham: yu genae" qhid' mae" ngo wa Mao" So: yang khyin: san: yu qhug' ra" mo; mathao mae ja: khao: ngo" mae zang: kham: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao: we' daga" shid va" ngad: re wa yao: we' daga" re: ngonhaung" kaoso' daui: li" nae" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao: we' daga" zang: kham: ngad: re wa- yao: we' daga" re: eib: li" nae" . Ngonhaung" wa yao: re ha: pye' ngad: re wa- yao: re: ngonhaung" re ha: pye' li" nae" .
Ngonhaung" jhaug' mazaug ngad yang: re: yao: wa jhaug' zaug yaug ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa yao: yao" gaung re maqo" mhug' ngad: ra" ga" ra" ce: dao: wa dangman" ra" dao: ngad: ra" .
Cekhyo re ni" byu qere ta" peim: byid: wa,- amung: dao: thoe jham we' sin: yang: majho" ta" ngag genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae jhaug' za: yao: bam re ta" peim: byid: wa,- Airu" ra" jho" ta" ngag: ra" khyo wa agai maboe" nhao lo:- aire tae" gyo" ra" mo, re byo; qeim: lo" nhao: ra" .
Yao" mau" zo" mae qho' nae" mabo: ra" mau" vin yaug khyo" re:- Mao" So: dangman" ra" mungdao: re jo jo za: mho" shid' byid: yaug khyo" re:- Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae nga: ye, sho' naoyao" qam: bo: thao" mae" phin: yang: zaui: so: wa, .
Byu re Mao" So we' je: va: sho' za: khe' ke' ra" khyo ngad: ra" Mao" So mabo: ru we' adu: adae: jho" jhau: ra" dao: jham re jao" pye' wa,-
airu" ra" mho" shid' khyo wa gaung sho: re zo" pye' ra" ye, bab no we' dau: ra" . Airu" khyo re Humenaeu we' Philetu shid' zo: mho" shid' byid' ako" .
Yao: shid' zo: wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ru wa ana" boe" va" ga: ta" ra" khyo" yang dangman" ra" khyo mae" nghung" lo" byaug gemung: lam khug: ra" mo, damyo" nho: lam khug: ra" myid re byo, nhao: ako" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So zhaug' to" ra" gang" tang: ra" apan aqao: wa maqo" gai: laui: ngad: ra" . Ai: apan aqao: dao mae Asang wa yao: sang: ra" gu: re ba mung: Asang: bo: de, yaug ngad: ga: ta" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa magai makhyang" ra" lo, mau" re jao" pye' ra" ga: tung" to" ra" .
Yham mo" dayham mae keim kang: myo: sho' ja: jo; ra" . Daqhae: re wa ngaui we' qhang: yang kad' to: mung:- gatau daqhae: re wa sag' we' zhogam" yang kad' to" ra" . Amung: daqhae: re wa mang a- qhid' mae" ci nae" qhid' mae" ngad mung: damyo" re wa ne, qug ci nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Dayaug yaug yao: yao" gaung re ai: makhyang" ra" ja: jham jhad' za: jao" pye' ra" yaug ngad: re wa yao: wa yao" Asang qhid' mae" akyu" bo mung: gai: ra" mau" ja: khao: ngo" qhid' mae" ci nae" qhid' mae" jin" jin" ngad yaug ngad: ruyang yao: wa gakai: lai je: akhyag: ra" myid: yaung: to" rumae ci yhung" ru qhug' li" nae" .
Amung: ve, qae" myid shab' kao bau: rure jao" pye' wa,- gyang" san: ra" nhag' lam: we' bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" Asang re mho' yao: ra" mo, we' daga" din: man" ru- lam khug: ru- jhid' de; ru we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: rure qam: ke' yang: qho wa,-
ngadqere: adu: adae" ru we' nhag' cad' noyaug mung: ra" jho" ta" ngag: ra" khyo jham re jao" pye' wa,- ai: jham wa myan" myo: jho" byo, yang: thang ja: ngad: rure nao ba gau ngad: ra" .
Asang: nho: daui daui yaug wa myan" myo: jho" byo, magai: ngad ngad: ra" . Yao: wa byu alhab' mo, re nhag' khyag' mung: gai: ru we' nhag' lam: qhang: ra" mho" pho" ngad qo: ra" .
Yao" gyevo qere mho" shid' ra" au: nau" nhae" yaug re: ngad qo: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa yao: bam re myid tha" lo mung: dangman" rure ba: lo genae" qhid' mae" akho: akhang" agu gai: byid' re byid' li" maba .
Airumung: yao: bam beim: so" li" mung: yao: bam re taung" to: yang: yao" myid o: ra" khyo re phug' cao" nhao: ra" Satan yui: nho: lha" mae" loe; beim: lo: li" genae" .
Lo" thao" ba na jham mae qug' ra" ayo, ngad nae" rure myid: beim: wa,-
byu qe wa yao: yao" qhid' mae" za: myid mo,- so' kho' mo,- phug: ru we' ngad beim: mo,- ngad: li" genae"- yao: bam wa maphug' makhyad' roe" mo,- yao: bam: myhi" pho" qe: mho dao: magyo: mo,- jeju maba: beim: mo,- Mao" So malam mo,- ngad: li" genae" .
Yao: bam wa nhag' khyag' myid mabo mo,- nhag' mashid qad mo,- gaui mho lau mho mo,- se' da: be, khyad' kad' mo,- byuqan qe ngad: li" genae" .
Yao: bam wa gai: rure nghang" ra" mo, ngad: li" genae" . Yao: bam wa lam maga" aphaug' alhag' kad mo,- mamyid: qu" lo: kad' mo,- ngad beim: myid qi" ra" mo, ngad: li" genae" . Yao: bam wa Mao" So re tho' mug: myid pyo: khyo re je: jhid' de; mo, ngad: li" genae" .
Yao: bam wa adao shad' mae ngonhaung" nho: caung: pa" thung" mang vin mo, ngad: li" genae" . Ngadqere: ai: caung: pa" thung" nho: qam: so' aman" re yao: bam ha: pye' li" genae"- Airu" ra" mo, re jao" pye' wa,-
yao: bam mae" damyo" wa su: yham jham khyo vao ye: mung: yao: bam: qobo qo: yang nhai" to: qhug' ru we' myid o kao bau: ru ja: khao: ngo" re cao" kad' na ko" ra"-
ai: qam: nang" ra" myiqe: qere eib: yu: pye' ako" . Ai: myiqe: qe wa khonhae" re: mho" zhao: yu nae" qam: ke' na gengadqere: dangman" ra" khyo re khonhae" re: maqo" gai: ba: yu ko" ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Yanne we' Yambre shid' zo: wa Moshe re gye kad' ko" ru we' dakhyo:- ai: byu qere: dangman" rure gye kad' ako" . Yao: bam myid: sun" qu" ga" ru mabo mung: lam khug: ra" myid byo; qeim: lo" ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa gyai qi: sho' mau" maqo" kad' genae"- pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam khoru: go: joe; rure yaug khao: ngo" the' myao: li" genae" . Airu wa Yanne we' Yambre shid' zo: mae boe" ru we' dakhyo: yao: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: nao wa nga" mho" shid' khyo nga" ave, lo, mau"- nga" kaoso' daui: ra" au: qang khyo jham re phug' cao" ava" . Nao wa nga" lam khug: ra" khyo nga" nhag' lam: qhang: ru- nga" jhid' de; myid- nga" zang: kham: ra" khyo- ngo yhin" ru qhug' ru jham-
ngo kham zo" ra" qug: khai: jham re myao: ava" . Antioki- Ikoni- Lustra vogaung: jham mae qu" gyaug qu" lhaung: ra" yhin" ru jham re ngo zang: kham: lo: ra" khyo alhab' re nao ba: ra" . Ngadqere: Asang wa aijham alhab' mae" ngore khyad' yu: ra" .
Khristu Yesu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, mung: Mao" So: khyo re phug' cao" ra" yaug khao: ngo" wa yhin" ru qhug' li" genae" .
Makhyang" ra" mo,- geim kad' pyag' ra" mo, wa magai: ru je: xo sho' kad' li" mung: su gaje qere mhug' pyag' mung: yao: bam yao: mhug' pyag' li" genae" .
Ngadqere: nao kam" wa- nao zhao: yu mung: jhaug' za: lam" ra" dangman" khyo re xo' yang: tang za: zaui" zag: ci wa,- ni" mho" pho" qe khag' ngad ko" rure nao ba: ra" .
Khristu re lam khug: ra" khyo" yang khyad' yu: ru qhug' sho' nao re pha,jhi" qo" byid' ra" gyang" lho" ra" jham: mugsug' jham re zoshao: mae" nao ba va" rure myid: beim: wa,-
Mao" So: mau" vin yaug wa- jab byang" sho' qo" zaui: yaug ngad: li" mung: gai shab: ra" mau" ja: khao: ngo" re qo" zaui: so: nhao nae" qhid' mae"-
Mao" So: yang jaung" yang: tung" to" ra" Jham: mugsug' alhab' wa dangman" rure mho" shid' ru- qeim: mho" ru- shad' rure mho" kyang" ru- jo: ra" kaoso' daui khyo qhid' mae" mho" shid' byid' ru qhid' mae" akyu" bo: ra" .
Shid: ra" mo, re we' daui: na: ra" mo, re dao: kho' nae" ra" Khristu Yesu we' Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae yao: wa Kho: kham khyo" eib nae" joe" li" na: ruyang-
yo, khyin: dau ngadqere: madau ngadqere: ai: mungdao: re qam: ke' yang: kho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" ngo nao re qam: ke' yang: jhan" ke' ra" . Kho" kyo" ra" au:- qobo ceim" shid' yang: qeim: mho" wa,- qam: byid: wa, . Nhag' lam: qhang qhang za: mho" shid' byid: wa,
byu qe wa jo yang: gai: ra" mho" shid' khyo re manug: tae" gyo: lo:- yao: bam yao" myid o kao bau: rure cao" yang: yao bam: no: mae phan: sho' tae" gyo: nug: ra" dao: jham re mho" shid' byid' ra" mho" pho" myo: sho' qho genae" ayo, joe" lo: li" nae" .
Yao: bam wa dangman" ra" dao: re tae" gyo: nae" qhid' mae" ngag: pye' mung:- mhomyi: saung: seim jham re tae" gyo" li" genae" .
Ngadqere: nao wa ve, yaug: aja: ja: mae naoyao" gaung re qang: za: khang" wa,- qug: khai: re zang: kham wa,- Lau Dao: Gai kho" kyo" ra" mau" zo" re zaui: so: wa,- Mao" So: daui daui yaug khyo" nao yao" qo alhab' re zaui: so" na wa, .
Ngo kam" wa xeim: re we' dakhyo: ngaui" byid: qhug' nae" ayo, joe" ava"- ce: mug: myid mae" thug' lo" nae" yo, khyin: joe" li" na: ava" .
Ngo wa jho" tao: poe mae ngoyao" qam: bo: ra" qhi" tao: va" . Ngo wa khyo thao" sho' tao: va" . Lam khug: ru we' dakhyo: ngo kaoso' daui va" .
Ana" wa din: man" ra" khyo" kaoso' daui: ra" mo, re byid' ra" aung doe; jhaung qhu" wa ngore lao" na: ra" . Din: man" ra" tarha" zug: ngad: ra" Asang wa dao: kho' ra" ba na re ai: jhaung qhu" ngore byid' li" nae" . Ngo re za: mangad: Asang joe" li" re jhid' de; kao bau myid we' lao" na ko" ra" mo, alhab' rere: byid' li" nae" .
Ngo jhao" phyad qo" joe" li" nae" gai: boe" ra" qhi" qam: ke' wa,-
Dema wa ana" ce: mug: myid qae: re jhid' de; yang: ngore shapye' co' mung: Thesaloni vogaung: khyo ye" lo" byaug: ra" . Kreken wa Galati khyo ye" lo" byaug mung: Titu wa Dalmati khyo ye" lo" byaug: ra" .
Luka dayaug za: ngo we' daga" na: ra" . Marku re qho: yu mung: nao we' daga" jhui" li" byid: la,- pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa nga" mau" zo" re qo" bao" thaug' byid: yaug ngad: ra" .
Tukhiku re ngo Ephesu vogaung: khyo ye: nhao: ke' va" .
Nao li" lao" Troa vogaung: mae Karpu nho: lo, mae ngo to: co' ra" nga" bau: qhang we' mugsug' paug' jham je yang: shoqid mugsug' paug' jham rere: boyu: vin: li" byid: la, .
To' be, zo: yaug ngad: ra" Alexanda wa ngore qug: khai: gyai byid: va"- yao: kad' lo: rure cao" yang: Asang wa lage, phaug' byid: shao:-
nao yao: aiyaug rere: lha" na wa,- pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa ngonhaung" nho: mungdao: re gyai aqan alan gye kad' yaug ngad: ra" .
Sao qhid' lhang ngo myid' ca: qu" qhug' ra" au: nga" shad' mae ye, mung: khag' re: mabao" ta" byid: ko" ngad: ra" . Alhab' mo, ngore phao: cug' to: co' ako" . Mao" So wa yao: bam re qobo dae mabyid: vashao: wo" .
Ngadqere: ngo wa Taung bug byu qe alhab' mo; the' gyo: gesho' jab byang" ra" mungdao: re qo" kho" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" Asang wa ngo we' daga" na mung: ngore qam: o: byid: ra" . Amung: ngo wa shid nae" dao: phyid' rumae" khyad' yu: ru qhug' va" .
Asang wa makhyang" ra" ja: alhab' mae" ngore khyad' yu mung: yao" mug: khaung: mung"dan: mae gug: gug: za: jhui" vao lo" li" nae" . Asang wa apyad ato khonhae" re: phungbao bao: jo, vashao: wo"- Amen .
Priskila we' Akula shid' tao we' Onesiphuru nho: yham byu qere ngo au" ke' ra" .
Erastu wa Korinthu vogaung: mae thang: na: ra" . Trophimu wa no yang: Miletu vogaung: mae ngo nha co' va" .
Gyo, yo, majoe" shimae" nao qo" joe" li" sho' qam: ke' wa,- Eubulu- Puden- Linu- Klaudia bam we' gatau Khristan mao: nhaung: qe wa naonhaung" re au" ke' ako" .
Asang wa ni" byo we' daga" ngad vashao: wo"- Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa naonhaung" alhab' we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" .
Mao" So: daui daui yaug we' Yesu Khristu nho: lagyo: ngo Polu wa mugsug' tung" ke' ra" . Mao" So: yang khyin: san: yu: ra" mo; nho: lam khug: myid qi" qhang: li" sho' bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" we' ngonhaung" nho: caung: pa" thung" yang mho" byid' ra" dangman" ra" khyo re ba: li" gesho' yao: bam re khyoqhid' au: she nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa ngore khyin: san: to" ra" .
Ai: caung: pa" thung" wa apyad ato kaoso' re myid: lao" rure apan aqao: to" ru ngad: ra" . Maba: mhug' pyag' ra" Mao" So wa mug: thug' sao mapeim shimae" ngonhaung" re kaoso' byid: nae" dao: so: byid' to" ra" .
Yao: wa ayo, joe" lao"- ai: kaoso' re yao" mungdao: khyo" yang qhu" byid' ra" . Mao" So wa ce: mungdao: ngore ab byid' to: mung: ngonhaung" khyad' yu: Asang pho" Mao" So: amyin" khyo" yang ngo wa ai: mungdao: re kho" kyo" ru ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" daga" ceim" lam khug: na: ra" lam khug: rumae nga" zo: gyang" Titu re ngo mugsug' tung" ke' ra" . Ngonhaung" Pho" Mao" So we' ngonhaung" khyad' yu: Asang Yesu Khristu wa nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru nao re byid: vageshao: wo" .
Nao zaui: so: vin vo; ca" na shi" ra" mau" zo" jham re adai: ato' jo jo za: qo" zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" we' vo khao: ngo" mae phung: lau: de- qere cao" khyin: san: to: byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngo wa nao re Krete gagyo: kao" mae nha: to: co' ru ngad: ra" . Nga" pin dao: jham re myid: beim: wa,-
Phung: lau: de, kad' yaug wa qobo vhin nae" made, yaug- yham sang myhi" dayaug za: qo" yaug ngad qo: ra" . Yao" zo: dau qe alhab' re: Yesu re lam khug: ra" mo, ngad ca" ru we' akyaung athin- ave, kyao- mho dao: magyo" rumae mang qi" ra" yaug magai: ngad ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re phung: au: jhaung kad' yaug wa Mao" So: mau" zo" re jhui" pyo yaug ngad mung:- yao: wa qobo vhin nae" made, yaug ngad ca" ra" . Yao: wa ngad beim: yaug- nhag' lam: lang" yaug- yhid ya: boe" yaug- se' da: be, khyad' kad' yaug- ngaui qhang so' kho' yaug magai: ngad ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa bang" da" kao bau yaug- gai shab: ra" ja: re jhid' de; kao bau yaug- ngad qo: ra" . Yao: wa yao: yao" gaung re qo" khang" yaug- din: man: yaug- gyang" lho" yaug- cao" khyo: tarha" re cao" ra" yaug ngad ca" ra" .
Yao: wa mho" shid' khyo we' jho" zhaung: mung:- lam ga" ra" mungdao: re tang za: zaui" zag: ci yaug ngad qo: ra" . Ce: khyo" yang su gaje rere: dangman" ra" mho" shid' khyo ci yang: qam: byid: mung: ai: dangman" ra" mho" shid' khyo re gye kad' ra" mo, shad' ra" khyo rere:- qo" ceim" shid' byid' li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re tau: lhan: mung: yao: bam: pe" akyu" mabo: ra" dao: keim jham: yang su gaje qere mhug' pyag' na: ra" mo, myo: sho' na: bam: ako" . Je yang: Yuda caung: pa" thung" mae" Khristan caung: pa" thung" shad' khyo phaug' lo: ra" mo, myo" ako" .
Yao: bam: mho" shid' khyo re tam" pye' ca" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa aqho' axag' ngad: ra" ngaui qhang re so' kho' ra" khyo re mho" shid' geyang: ug' khug' dinkhu: jham re abyi asin: kad' pye' ako" .
Krete gagyo: kao" byu yao: bam: lapa qemae" dayaug yao: ta" ru wa- Krete gagyo: kao" mae" mo, wa khonhae" re:- mhug' hab' qe makhyang" ra" gug' nyhug' lhe: jham- byunoe" byushoe zo: so' kho' mo, ngad:- ga: ta" ra" . Yao: ta" ru we' dakhyo: dang: ako" .
Ce: mathao mae yao: bam wa dangman" ra" lam khug: myid bo: li" mung: Yuda qe: mhomyi: saung: seim jham re we' dang: ra" khyo re ngag: ha: pye' ko" ra" mo, mae" thug' li" ra" xao su byu qe: amyin" dao: jham re to" pye' genae" qhid' mae" nao wa yao: bam re thin thin za: qeim wa, .
Yao: bam yao" gaung yao: san sin" ra" mo; qhid' mae" ja: khao: ngo" wa san sin" ra" . Ngadqere: masan masin" ra" mo, we' malam khug: ra" mo; qhid' mae" wa pe" ja: re: masan masin" boe" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam: myid we' aung khug nhag' lam: wa masan masin" boe" jo; ako" .
Yao: bam wa Mao" So re ba: ga: ta" gengad yang: re:- yao: bam: ave, wa aire ha: pye' ako" . Yao: bam wa byunghang: qe mho dao: magyo: mo,- gai: ra" mau" zo" daja: re kad' nae" re: madau mo, ngad: ako" .
Ngadqere: nao wa jo: ra" khyo we' dau ang: ra" khyo jham re mho" shid' byid: ca" ra" .
Apyad qi" ra" phug' mao: qere gyang: co: yo na genae"- ave, de, genae"- yao: yao" gaung re qo" khang" genae" qhid' mae" mho" byid: wa,- amung: yao: bam: lam khug: myid jo, genae" we' jhid' de; myid bo genae" qhid' mae" re: mho" byid: wa, .
Ai we' dakhyo: apyad qi" ra" phyid' mao: qere Khristan phyid' mao: qe: ave, de, genae" qhid' mae" mho" byid: wa,- yao: bam wa gaui mho hab' qe- yhid kha: qe- magai: ngad ngad: ra" khyo re mho" byid: wa,- yao: bam wa gai shab: ra" khyo re ba: mho" byid: mo, ngad ca" ra" .
Yao: bam wa yao: bam tho' apyad ngai: ra" myiqe: qere yao: bam: yham sang pho" qere we' zo: dau qere ba: jhid' de; mo,-
yao: yao" gaung re qo" khang" mo,- san sin" mo,- yao: bam: yham sang pho" qe eib: ra" qao: mae ba: na: ra" myi" zang gai qe boe" geshao: gai shab: ra" ja: re mho" byid: ca" ako" . Alao" Mao" So: mungdao: re khag' re: gaui mho ta" phoe genae" mangad: .
Ai we' dakhyo: zolau: qere: yao: bam yao" gaung re qo" khang" genae" qhid' mae" jhan: byid: wa,-
ja: khao: ngo" mae naoyao" gaung yao: gai shab: ra" lo, mau" nho: lag boe" ca" ra" . Ni" mho" shid' khyo re nhag' lam: din: man" ru we' akhyag qi: to: yang: mho" shid' byid: wa,-
ni" gyevo qe wa ngonhaung" khyo re magai: ru ta" nae" daja: re: maqo" yang: qho' phau: genae" qhid' mae" gai magai ga: maqo" ta" ra" jo: ra" dao: jham re ci yang:- mho" shid' byid: wa, .
Jeim qe wa yao: bam: asang qe: mho dao: re tae" gyo: mung: ja: khao: ngo" mae yao: bam: asang qere ngaui nhao qo: ra" . Yao: bam wa jeim asang qere dao: tau: magai: tau: ngad: ako" .
Mangad: lao" asang qe: zai magai: khug' yu ngad: ra" . Airu: kad' nae" atha" yao: bam zaui: so" ra" mau" zo" ja: khao: ngo" mae ngonhaung" khyad' yu: Asang pho" Mao" So: mho" shid' khyo mungdao: re nga: ye; li" nhao nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam khonhae" re: gai shab: ru we' kyid mo, ngad: ra" khyo re qhu" byid' na ca" ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa byu alhab' mo, khyad' yu: ru qhug' ra" khyo yao" nhag' myan" ra" jeju re qhu" byid' ava" .
Ngonhaung" nho: qi" qhang: ra" Mao" So we' ngonhaung" nho: khyad' yu: ra" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: phungbao bao: thug' li" nae" ra" ngonhaung" myid: lao" na: ra" ai: ngaui lho" Ba Na re ngonhaung" lao" na: au:- Mao" So re malam: ra" kaoso' daui khyo re we' mug: myid dao we' sin" ra" kao bau myid o: ra" khyo jham re shapye' pye' mung:- yao: yao" gaung re qo" khang" yang: din: man" ru we' Mao" So: khyo re kao bau taung" ce: mug: myid: dao mae kaoso' daui: na nae" qhid' mae" ai: nhag" myan" ra" jeju wa ngonhaung" re mho" shid' byid' na: ra" .
Yao: wa makhyang" ra" lo, mau" alhab' mae" ngonhaung" re khyad' yu nae" we' ngonhaung" re yao: za: sang: ra" gyang" san: ra" byu jham toe' yu mung:- ai: shab: ra" mau" zo" zaui: so: nae" kao bau: ra" mo, boe" genae" qhid' mae" yao: yao" gaung re ngonhaung" qhid' mae" byid' pye' ra" .
Ce: khyo jham re mho" byid: wa,- nao qam: byid' ru we' qeim: mho" au:- ni" kheim: so' alhab' re ci wa,- yao: bam mae" khag' dayaug: yang re: nao re daqu" ngai nhao wa, .
Mung"dan: eib: ra" zug: qe we' kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, eib: ra: qao: mae na mung: yao: bam: mho dao: re tae" gyo: yang: ja: khao: ngo" mae agai kad' nae" jin" jin" ngad: na genae" qhid' mae" ni" byu qere ta" peim: wa,-
Khoyaug rere: gaui mamho lo:- ngaui pyo: yaug yo jhid' de; taung" jho" zam" khug: na mung: khonhae" re: yaug khao: ngo" re nau" nhae" ra" ave, jho" qhu" byid: genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re ta" wa,-
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" yao: re: ganhae" wa adu: adae: mo,- mho dao: magyo: mo, shad' nghung: mo, ngad: lo: bam va" . Ngonhaung" wa gaung sho: kao bau obyid: ru we' pyo: khyo aja: ja" nho: jeim boe" lai: lo: bam va" . Ngonhaung" kaoso' daui khyo mae makhyang: pyi qho- myid nug: myid khyad' na: lai: lo va" . Ngonhaung" wa su re nghang: mung: su wa ngonhaung" re nghang" ako" .
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" khyad' yu: Asang pho" Mao" So: nhag" khyag' ru we' jhid' de; myid myao: thug' li" lao"-
yao: wa ngonhaung" re khyad' yu: ra" . Yao: airu: ngonhaung" re khyad' yu: ru wa ngonhaung" yao: zaui: so" lo: ra" gai: ra" lo, mau" daja: ja: khyo" yang mangad:- yao: yao" nhag' khyag' shogu: ru mathao mae qid: yang cid' san: byid: yang: asag' dam: khau byid' ru we' kaoso' daui khyo asag' re boe" nhao: ra" gyang" lho" Byo khyo" yang yao: ngonhaung" re khyad' yu: ru ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao" nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" yang Mao" So: yang din: man" ra" mo, ga: sun" yu byid' ru qhug' mung: ngonhaung" myid: lao" ra" apyad ato: kaoso' re qo" sang: yu nae" qhid' mae"-
Mao" So wa ngonhaung" nho: khyad' yu: Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang ngonhaung" dao mae Gyang" Lho" Byo magan: mago" vhe' sheim: byid' ra" .
Ce: dao: wa dangman" ra" dao: ngad: ra" . Mao" So re lam khug: ra" mo, wa yaug khao: ngo" qhid' mae" gai: ru we' akyu" bo: ra" gai shab: ra" lo, mau" jham zaui: so" rumae yo, khyin: byid: ca" rure ba beim" li" genae" qhid' mae" ai: khyo jham re nao je yang: akhyag to: mung: ta" peim: byid: nae" rure ngo o: ra" .
Ngadqere: adu: adae: jho" ta" ngag: ra" khyo- dayao: dayang byuxag' she' ra" khyo- myan" jho" myo" ra" khyo- kham" to" ra" Tarha" we' sin: yang: jho" ta" byo; ra" khyo jham re jao" pye' wa,- Airu" ra" mau" zo" jham wa akyu" mabo aphug' made; ra" mau" zo" jham ngad" ra" .
Phung: jho" kho' ru boe" nhao: ra" yaug re nang" thao" shid' lhang ta" peim: wa,- ai: thao lao" yao: we' dajhid' re: dazam" lo: wa, .
Airu" ra" yaug wa thoekhyo phaug' cekhyo phaug' kad' yaug ngad: rure nao ba: ra" . Yao" qobo jham wa yao: shad' nghung" na: rure sagse: qhu" byid' ra" .
Ngo wa Artema mangad: lao"- Tukhiku re nao jhao" nhao: ke' lao"- Nikopoli vogaung: khyo nao yao: gai: boe" ra" qhi" qam: ke' yang: ngojhao" li" la,- pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa ai: vogaung: mae gyo, yo, na: lai: pye' nae" myid: phyid' to: va" .
Tarha" zug: pho" Zena we' Apolo shid' zo: gyaung: qo" su" lo" sho' nao gai: boe" ra" qhi" bao" thaug' byid: wa,- yao: shid' zo: qo ca" ra" gu: alhab' re qo mabo losho' bao" ke' wa .
Ngonhaung" byu qe wa gaigai: yao: qo ca" ra" mo, re qo" bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam: yo, khyin: re gai ra" mau" zo" mae ba: ci yhung: genae" khyo re zhao: yu ca" ko" ra" . Yao: bam wa akyu" mabo lo: kaoso' magai: daui ngad: ra" .
Ngo we' daga" na: ra" mo, alhab' naonhaung" re au" ke' ako" . Lam khug: ra" ngonhaung" ba nam qere ngonhaung" au" ke' ra" dao" bota" kyo: byid: gela,- Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa naonhaung" alhab' mo, we' ngad: jo, vashao: wo" .
Yesu Khristu mathao mae kyam: byu ngad: ra" ngo Polu we' naonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" Timothi wa- Ngonhaung" mau" zaui: cao: ba nam pho" Philemon rere:-
Philemon: yham mae ham phaung: ra" phung: rere:- ngonhaung" nhae: mo" Aphia rere:- ngonhaung" gyezo: byin cao: Arkhipu rere:- mugsug' tung" vhin: ke' ra" .
Ngonhaung" Pho" Mao" So we' Asang Yesu Khristu wa nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru naonhaung" re byid: vageshao: wo" .
Nga" nhaung: Philemon we"- ngo akyu" mho' khao: ngo" ni" qhid' mae" ngo akyu" bomho' byid: mung: nga" Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" byid' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: byu alhab' mo, re nao jhid' de; ra" khyo we' Asang Yesu re nao lam khug: ra" khyo re ngo the' gyo" ra" .
Lam khug mo, ngad: ra" khyo" nao we' ngonhaung" jho" zam" khug: ru wa Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, yang: qo" yu: ra" shaman" jeju khao: ngo" re je: no, sho' ba: gyo" li" nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngo akyu" mho' ra" .
Jhid' de; ra" nga"nhaung: we"- ni" jhid' de; myid wa ngore gyai qi: sho' ngaui bau: nhao: ru we' qam: qo" nhao: ava" . Nao wa Mao" So: byu qe alhab' mo; nhag' lam: rere: bau: nhao: ava" .
Ce: khyo mathao mae ngo wa Khristu mae ni" mao: nhaung: dayaug khyo" nao zaui: so: ang: ra" mau" zo" re zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" mazag mavae nao re amyin" byid: nae" akhang" qo" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ana"- Yesu Khristu nho: mathao mae thaung: laung" jo, yaug ngad mung: Khristu Yesu nho: lagyo: dayaug ngad sho' ngadqere: nao re ngo jhid' de; ruyang goe; mho' ke' ru ngad: .
Airumung: Khristu khug mae nga" zo: yao: ngad: ra" Onesimu nho: gaung tha" ngo nao re goe; mho' ke' ra" . Thaung: laung" na: ra" gyo: mae ngo wa yao" byo we' sin" ra" yao: pho" boe" lo va" .
Yao: wa qhid' phyao: ni" qhid' mae" akyu" mabo yaug boe" lo ngadqere: ana" yao: wa nao we' nga" shid' zo" qhid' mae" akyu" bo: ra" yaug ngad: ava" .
Ana" ngo wa yao: re nao jhao" dam: tug' nhao: ke' ra" . Yao: we' daga" nga" nhag' lam: re: bocao: bo: lo" ra" .
Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: Gai: mathao mae ngo thaung: laung" na: ra" gyo: mae ni" gaung tha" ngore bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao: re ngo we' daga" cemae jhui" na nug: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo wa nao re deim" zag yang: ngore bao" thaug' byid: nhao nug: ra" myid mabo ngad: ra" . Naoyao: myid o: ra" khyo" kad' nae" rure je yang: ngo o: ra" . Airumung: ngo wa nao myid mavang" lo:- pe" daja: re: makad' nae" .
Onesimu wa nao we' khonhae" re: abang mabyid qo" na nae" qhid' mae" nao we' dazab daso' gao" na: ru angad maba .
Amung: yao: wa ana" jeim dayaug khyo" za: mangad: lo: ngad: ra" . Jeim tho' mae gyai je: ra" yaug ngad: ava" . Yao: wa Khristu mae jhid' de; ra" mao: nhaung: pho" ngad: ava" . Yao: wa nga" qhid' mae" gyai yao: phug' de; ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: wa ni" qhid' mae" jeim dayaug khyo" re:- Asang: khug mae mao: nhaung: dayaug khyo" re:- je yang: phug' de; ra" yaug ngad: li" nae" .
Airumung: nao wa ngore ni" mau" zaui: cao: dayaug ngad: ra" khyo" myid: jho: ngad: re wa nao ngore tug: yu: ru we' dakhyo:- yao: re dam: lham: tug: yu wa, .
Yao: wa nao re daja: ja: shad' yang:- mangad: lao" daja: ja: jhin de, yang: ngad: re wa ai: gu: alhab' ngore vhin la,-
ngo Polu yao: ai: jhin re dam: xe' byid: nae" ein: cemae ngoyao" lo; yang yao: tung" ke' ra" . ( Nao yao: re: jhin de; rure ngo nao re ta" peim: maqo nae" . )
Airumung: nga"nhaung: we"- Asang: nho: myo, nho re tau yang: jeju khyo" airu: kad' byid: la,- Khristu khug mae mao: nhaung: ngad: ra" khyo" ngore bau: nhao la, .
Ngo mho' ru we' dakhyo: nao kad' li" nae" rure myid lam zo" re" ce: mugsug' re tung" ke' ru ngad: ra" . Ai: tho' lhao" je yang: nao kad' nae" rure ngo gaigai: yao: ba: ra" .
Aitho' mago" ngo li" bang" na nae" qhid' mae" qe, daqe, nyhang" jaung: to: byid: la,- pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa naonhaung" alhab' mo; akyu" mho' thoe re tae" gyo: byid: mung:- ngore naonhaung" jhao" dam: jhui" tug' lo byid' li" nae" ein: ngo myid: lao" ra" .
Yesu Khristu mathao mae ngo we' daga" thaung: laung" jo; ra" Epaphra wa nao re au" ke' ra" .
Aimung: nga" mau" vin cao: qe ngad ko" ra" Marku- Aristaku- Dema- Luka bam re: nao re au" ke' ako" .
Asang Yesu Khristu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa naonhaung" alhab' mo, we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" .
Daba: pyad mae Mao" So wa ngonhaung" phug' pho" qere myo: sho' lhang we' khyo aja: ja: mae lapa qe: nhad' dao: thoe khyo" yang dao: jhau: lo: ra" .
Ngadqere: ce: lo" thao" ra" ba na gu: mae wa Mao" So wa yao: zo: khyo" yang ngonhaung" re dao: jhau: ava" . Mao" So wa ai: yao: Zo: khyo" yang mug: kin myid kin alhab' re phan" phaug' mung: lo" thao" mae ja: khao: ngo" alhab' re sang: yu nhao nae" qhid' mae" yao: re khyin: san: to" ava" .
Yao: wa Mao" So: phungbao bao: qhui: na: ru we' Mao" So: gaung khyao ave, vin mung: yao" qam: so' bo: ra" dao: thoe: yang mug: kin re zaui" ci: ra" . Amung: xao su byu qe: qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid' ra" mau" zo" bin: zaui: thao re yao: wa mug: gaung dao mae qam: bo: thao" ra" Mao" So: lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo; ra" .
Mao" So: yang yao: re byid' to" ra" mang wa- mug: lagyo: qe: mang tho' je: qi" ra" khyo" byid' to" ru we' dakhyo:- yao: Zo: wa mug: lagyo: qe tho' je: qi" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa yao" mug: lagyo: qemae" khoyaug rere:- Nao wa nga" Zo: ngad: ra"- ana" ba ngo wa ni" Pho" boe" lo va" ga: re:- ailao" Mao" So wa mug: lagyo: khoyaug rere: Ngo wa yao" yao: pho" boe" nae"- amung: yao: wa nga" Zo: boe" lo: li" nae" ga: re: khonhae" re: mata" qu" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So wa yao" zoqhid' yauggai Zo: re mug: myid dao khyo nhao: ke' nae" au: re- Mao" So: mug: lagyo: qe alhab' yao: re caung: pa" ca"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Mug: lagyo: qe: khyo we' sin: yang:- Mao" So wa yao" mug: lagyo: qere la boe" nhao mung: yao" daui daui mo, re myishae boe" nhao: ra" ga: Mao" So ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: Yao: Zo" khyo we' sin: yang: Mao" So we"- Ni" mung"dan: wa apyad ato jo; jo; li" nae" wo"- Nao wa nao yao" byu qe: dao mae din: nyang: ra" khyo" eib: ra" . Nao wa jo: rure jhid' de; mung: shad' rure nghang" ra" .
Airu: mung: Mao" So- ni" Mao" So wa nao re khyin: yu mung: ni" byin cao: qe tho' nao re je: phug' te' mung: ngaui bau" ru nao re byid' ava" ga: Mao" So ta" ra" .
Amung: Mao" So wa Asang we"- nao wa sao qhid' maqhid mae mug: myid re phan" to: mung: nao yao" lo; yang mug: gaung re phan" to" ra" .
Ai: gu: wa byo; qeim: lo" li" genae"- ngadqere: nao wa dang: jo; li" nae" . Ai: gu: alhab' wa mai bau: jham we' dakhyo: qeim" lo" byaug: li" genae" .
Nao wa adao: bau: qhang re dang" lham" ru we' dakhyo: aijham re dang" lham" pye' li" nae"- Aijham wa mai bau: re tha" pye' ru we' dakhyo: tha" pye' ru qhug' li" genae" . Ngadqere: nao wa khonhae" re: dakhyo: za: ngad: jo, mung: ni" kaoso' wa apyad ato khonhae" re: mathao" ngad: ra"- ga: re: ta" ra" .
Mao" So wa yao" mug: lagyo: qemae" khoyaug rere: Ni" gyevo qere ni" khyid zab tao" we' dakhyo: ni" khyid qao: mae ngo mato: byid: byid: wa ce: nga" lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo, wa,- ga: khonhae" re: mata" qu" ngad: ra" .
Airulao"- mug: lagyo: qe wa pe" ru" mo, ngad: ako" i? Yao: bam wa khyad' yu: ru qhug' yu nae" ra" mo, re bao" thaug' byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yang nhao: to" ra" Mao" So re caung da" byid' ra" byo jham ngad: ako" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa cidao" lo" byaug: ru maqhug' genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" the' gyo" yu vako" ra" ai: dangman" ra" khyo re je yang: tang za: zaui" zag: ci qo: ra" .
Mug: lagyo: qekhyo" yang ngonhaung" phug' pho" qere byid' to" ra" ai: mungdao: wa dangman" ru ngad mung: aire maphug' cao" ra" yaug wa qobo dae re kham: yu nae" man: qi" ra" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa ai qhi" qi" qhang: ra" khyad' yu: ra" khyo re pe" shui manho lo: na: bam: ngad: re wa ai: qobo dae kham zo: nae" rumae" ngonhaung" khoru: qo" phao: loe; bam nae" i? Ce: khyad' yu: ra" khyo re Asang yao: shi" sao qhid' ta" hau" kyo: mung: aire the' gyo" yu: ra" mo, wa ai: dangman" rure ngonhaung" re sagse: kham byid' ako" .
Aitho' mago"- Mao" So yao: re: mug' pho: ve, lho aja: ja: mug' pho: mau" zo" jham re zaui" qhu" ru we' Gyang" Lho" Byo: jeju jhaung qhu" jham re yao" myid o: ru we' dakhyo: gae byid' ra" khyo" yang yao: bam: sagse: kham: rumae bolaung: mung: sagse: qhu" byid' ra" .
Mao" So wa- ana" ngonhaung" ta" na: ra" mug: myid ngad: ra" thao phyao: joe" lo nae" ra" mug: myid asag' re mug: lagyo: qere maeib nhao: to: ngad: ra" .
Ai: atha" Jham: Mugsug' datau mae- Mao" So we"- nao beim" na: ra" xao su byu we' nao qu" gun caung: na: ra" byu wa pe" ru" yaug ngad: ra" i?
Nao wa yao: re dayo, daban: za: mug: lagyo: qe: o mae khyo" to" ra" . Amung: phungbao we' phug' te' nga: yhe' ru yao: re zhaung: byid: mung: Cao jab alhab' re eib: ra" zug: kad' nhao: ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Jham: Mugsug' mae Mao" So wa byu re cao jab alhab' re eib nae" zug: kad' nhao: ra"- ga: ta" ru wa ja: khao: ngo" re bota" ru ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa ana"- cao jab alhab' re byu: yang eib: na: rure mathe' myao ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo" yang byu yaug khao: ngo" qhid' mae" qo" shid kham: byid: nae" qhid' mae" dayo, daban: za: mug: lagyo: qe: o mae khyo" to: byid' ru qhug' ra" Yesu re the' myao: bam va" . Yao: dayin dayo: kham zo: mung: shid kham: byid: va" ruyang phungbao we' phug' te' nga: yhe' ru zhaung" ci: rure ngonhaung" yao: re ana" the' myao va" .
Cao jab alhab' re phan" to: mung: zaui" ci: na: ra" Mao" So wa zo: dau myo: sho' re yao" phungbao qo" kham: yu nhao nae" qhid' mae" dayin dayo: kham zo: nhao: ra" khyo" yang Yesu re jab byang" nhao: ru wa Mao" So kad' ru gai ang: ra" khyo ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Yesu wa yao: bam re khyad' yu: ru qhug' sho' jhui" ye" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa byu qere yao: bam: qobo mae" kyang" san: pye' byid' ra" . Amung: yao: we' yao" yang kyang" san: pye' ru qhug' va" ra" mo, alhab' wa Pho" dayaug za: ngad: ako" . Airumung: Yesu wa yao: bam re yao" mao: nhaung: qe ga: mhang" nae"- maqho' ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Mao" So re- Ngo wa nao zaui" lo: ra" lo, mau" re nga" mao: nhaung: qere ta" kyo: nae"- Yao: bam: zabphaung mae ngo nao re caung: khin" byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Yesu wa ngo wa Mao" So re khug ngha: na nae"- ga: re:- amung: Mao" So: yang ngore byid' to" ra" zo: dau qe we' daga" ngo ce: jo, qo mae na: jo;- ga: re: ta" ra" .
Ai: zo: dau qe wa sa: sho: bo: ra" mo, ngad ko" ruyang Yesu yao: yao: re: yao: bam we' dakhyo: xao su byu: nho: ve, khyao re kham: yu: ra" . Yao: ceru: kham: yu: ru wa yao: shid kham: ra" khyo" yang shid: rure eib: na: ra" Satan re phyo' pye' nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Ce: khyo khyo" yang shid: rure gyaug yang: yao: bam: dapyad geim" jeim boe" na ko" ra" mo, re loe; beim nhao: ke' byid' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa mug: lagyo: qere bao" thaug' byid: yaug mangad:- Jham: Mugsug' mae ta" to" ru we' dakhyo: yao: wa Abraham: nho: myid: zo: qere bao" thaug' byid' ra" yaug ngad: ru wa de: de: za: ngad: ra" .
Ceru wa yao: wa byu qenho: qobo jham re qo" khyad' pye' byid: nae" jhaug' zaug: ru we' nhag' khyag' shogu: myid bo: ra" yao: bam: Khinjaung Yin" kad' yang: Mao" So: mau" zo" re caung da" byid: nae" qhid' mae" khyo khe' khao: ngo" mae yao" mao: nhaung: qe we' dakhyo: dau sho' tau" yu ca" ra" ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Amung: ana" wa- yao: yao: re: ju" phyo' ru qhug' mung: qug: khai: dayin dayo: kham zo" qu" va" yaug ngad: ruyang yao: wa ju" phyo' ru qhug' ra" mo, re qo" bao" thaug' byid' ra" .
Mao" So: yang khai: yu qhug' ko" ra" nga" Khristan mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" lhang: yu: ra" lalam lakhug: nho: Khinjaung Yin" kad' nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yang nhao: ke' ra" Yesu re myid: qu" ge,-
Moshe wa Mao" So: yham mae yao" mau" zo" mae lam ga" kyid yaug ngad: ru we' dakhyo: Yesu wa ce: mau" zo" re zaui: nae" qhid' mae" yao: re khyin: san: yu: ra" Mao" So: qhid' mae" lam ga" kyid yaug ngad: ra" .
Yham kad' ra" yaug wa ai: yham re tho' je yang: phug' te' nga: yhe' byid' ru qhug' yu: ra" . Ai we' dakhyo: Yesu wa Moshe tho' je yang: phug' te' nga: yhe' byid' ru qhug' yu nae" man: qi" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yham wa byu dayaug yaug: yang kad' to" ru ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa ja: cao jab alhab' re kad' to: yaug ngad: ra" .
Moshe wa daui daui yaug ngad mung: Mao" So: yham mae lam ga" kyid mung: joe" lo nae" ayo, mae Mao" So ta" nae" khyo jham re yao: jhau: ra" .
Ngadqere: Khristu wa Mao" So: yham mae eib: ra" Yao: Zo: we' dakhyo: lam ga" kyid yaug ngad mung:- ngonhaung" wa vae" ru we' ngonhaung" myid: lao" ra" ja: re tang za: zaui" ci: ngad: re wa ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: yham ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Gyang" Lho" Byo ta" ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" ana" ba- Mao" So: thoe re the' gyo: ko" ngad: re wa- ai: ba na mae
naonhaung" phug' pho" qe wa din"pyad' yo mae Mao" So re geim lau to" mung: yao: bam wa yao: re jham" qu" ko" ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" nhag' lam: daqao ge,-
Yao: bam wa byid xe zin lam: lam: ngo zaui: so" ra" lo, mau" re bin: the' myao: lo gesho' ngad yang: re: yao: bam wa ngore geim lau to" mung:- jham" qu" ko" ra"- ga: Mao" So ta" ra" .
Airumung: ngo wa ai: byumyu" re nhag' yo: mung: yao: bam wa ngore khonhae" re: ngag: pye' mung: nga" amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" nae" qhid' mae" ha: pye' ako"- ein: ngo ta" .
Ngo wa nhag' yo: mung: Yao: bam wa khonhae" re: ngo byid' to" ra" ai: dugno: re qo" kham: yu nae" ra" mung"dan: khyo maqo" vao ye: genae" ein: ngo jham tang" to: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Lam khug: ra" mo, ngad: ra" nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Kaoso' daui: na: ra" Mao" So mae" phaug' lo" sho' malam makhug: ru we' gyai makhyang" ra" nhag' lam: wa naonhaung" phaung mae" dayaug mae re: mabo genae" qhid' mae" lha" ge,-
Ai: atha"- naonhaung" mae" khag' ngadqere: qobo: yang ju" phyo' ru qhug' mung: nhag' lam: qao: li" na mo, maboe" genae" qhid' mae" Jham: Mugsug' mae ta" to" ra" ana" ba- ba na ayo, ngonhaung" qhid' mae" ajo, jo, wa ba khao: ngo" naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" bao" thaug' na qo: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa aqhid mae" khug ngha: lo: rure lo" thao" sho' zaui" zag: ci: ngad: re wa ngonhaung" wa Khristu we' mau" zam" zaui" ra" mo, ngad: ra" .
Ceru wa Jham: Mugsug' mae- Naonhaung" wa ana" ba Mao" So: thoe re the' gyo: ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" phug' pho" qe Mao" So re gye kad' yang: geim lau to" ko" ra" au: we' dakhyo: nhag' lam: daqao ge,- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Mao" So: thoe re the' gyo" yu mung: Mao" So re gye kad' geim lau to" ra" mo, wa khag' bam ngad: ako" i? Yao: bam wa Moshe yang Egutu mung" mae" jhui" thug' lo: ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Byid xe zin lam: lam: Mao" So: yang nhag' yo" ru qhug' ra" mo, wa khag' bam ngad: ako" i? Qobo shad' lhoe" geyang: din"pyad' yo mae gyang: shid: lang" lo" ko" ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam wa ngo byid' to" ra" ai: myaung: ngho" ra" mung"dan: khyo khonhae" re: maqo" vao ye: genae" ga:- Mao" So jham tang" ru wa khag' bam re qang yang: tang" ru ngad: ra" i? Mao" So re geim lau to" ra" mo, re qang yang: jham tang" ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yao: bam wa malam" ko" ruyang ai: mung"dan: khyo maqo" vao ye: ko" rure ngonhaung" the' myao: bam va" .
Ana" ai: dugno: re naonhaung" qo" kham: yu nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa naonhaung" re dao: so: byid' to" ava" . Airumung: naonhaung" dayaug re: dao: so: byid' to" ra" ai: dugno: re qo" kham: yu nae" rure mazai" lhag' ke' nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" lha" gelang:-
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa yao: bam we' dakhyo: ai: Lau Dao: Gai re the' gyo" yu: bam va" . Yao: bam wa ai: mungdao: re the' gyo" yu gengadqere: ai: mungdao: re lam khug: ra" myid we' malham: khae: yu gemung: ai: mungdao: wa yao: bam: qhid' mae" pe" akyu" mabo ngad: ra" .
Aire lam" ra" mo, ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: dao: so: byid' to" ra" ai: dugno: re qo" kham: yu: bam va" . Airu wa Ngo wa nhag' yo: mung: yao: bam wa dug no" yu genae" qhid' mae" ngo byid: nae" ein: dao: so: byid' to" ra" mung" khyo khonhae" re: qo" vao ye: genae" mangad: ein: ta" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa mug: myid re phan" ra" au: re yao" mau" zo" re bin: zaui: ngadqere: Mao" So wa cedao: re ta" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Jham: Mugsug' datau mae ai: nhad' ba ein: ba we' sin: yang: Mao" So wa nhad' ba ein: ba re yao" mau" zo" alhab' re to" pye' yang: no" na: ra"- ga: ta" to" ra"-
Yao: bam dug no" na genae" qhid' mae" ngo byid' ra" mung"dan: khyo khonhae" re: qo" vao ye: genae" mangad:- ga: ce: khyo re yao: dam: ta" na: ra" .
Lau Dao: Gai re sao qhid' the' gyo" yu: ra" mo, wa aire malam" ko" ruyang ai: dugno: re maqo" kham: yu ko" ngad: ra" . Airumung: ai: dugno: re qo" kham: yu nae" Mao" So: yang akhang" byid' ra" mo, gaje qe qo" kham: yu: ako" .
Ceru wa ana" ba ga: mhang" ra" gatau daba na re Mao" So jaung: to: byid' ra" khyo" yang qhu" byid' ra" . Jham: Mugsug' mae ngha yang: ta" va" ru we' dakhyo:- Mao" So wa zin na myo: sho' kyo thao re Davi nhad' dao: thoe khyo" ai: ba na re ceim: yang- Naonhaung" ana" ba Mao" So: dao: thoe re the' gyo: ko" ngad: re wa nhag' lam: daqao ge, ga: ta" ra" .
Mao" So dao: so: byid' to" ra" dug no" ra" khyo re Yoshu yang byu qere byid' to: va" ngad: re Mao" So wa thao re gatau ba na daba na: nho: khyo re ta" nae" mangad:-
Ngadqere: nhad' ba ein: ba mae Mao" So wa dugno: thang: na: ru we' dakhyo: Mao" So: byu qe: qhid' mae" Dugno: Ba na daba jo; ashi" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: yang dao: so: byid' to" ra" ai: dugno: re qo" kham: yu: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Mao" So wa yao" mau" zo" mae" dugno: thang: na: ru we' dakhyo: yao" mau" zo" mae" dugno: thang: na: li" nae" .
Airumung: yao: bam lam khug: myid mabo: ruyang shid: dam" lo" ko" ru we' dakhyo: ngonhaung" mae" dayaug re: maboe" vashao:- ngonhaung" wa ai: dugno: re qo" kham: yu nae" qhid' mae" qam: bo: thao" qhi" qhao: gelang:-
Mao" So: dao: thoe wa daui: na: ru we' kad' boe" ra" qam: so' bo mung:- shae su: shid' shad' geim" tho' ra" pe" ja" shae tho' re: je: tho' ra" . Amung: alo zo: we' byo jho" qham: ra" mae joe" sho' re:- shoqug: shoqae we' qug: khyao jho" qham: rumae joe" sho' re:- alhab' re qo" thug' kyao" lai: lo" ra" . Byu: aung khug nhag' lam: mae myid: ru we' o kao bau: rure kin byid' ra" .
Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae mamyao losho' pe" ja: rere: maqo" nyham" to: ngad: ra" . Phan" to" ra" gu: ja: khao: ngo" wa yao" myo, kheim: mae de: de: za: ngad: jo; ra" . Ngonhaung" alhab' wa yao: yao" khyo we' sin: yang: Mao" So re japhin: qhaug' byid: ca" nae" ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa ngonhaung" yao: lhang: yu: ra" ai: lam khug: ra" khyo re tang tang zaui" zag: ci gelang:- pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: khyo joe" vao lo" ra" Mao" So: yao: zo: Yesu ga" ra" qi" qhang: ra" Khinjaung Yin" dayaug qo" bam va" .
Ngonhaung" nho: Khinjaung Yin" wa ngonhaung" qam: nang" rure nhag' maba: khyag' yaug mangad:- Ja: khao: ngo" mae ngonhaung" re" ru: ju" phyo' ru qhug' qu" yaug ngadqere: qobo maqo" ra" Khinjaung Yin" ngonhaung" qo" bam va" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" vae" vae" za: Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" tao" khau" khyo qui" vao ye: gelang:- ailao" ngonhaung" qo ca" ra" au: ngonhaung" re bao" thaug' byid: nae" nhag' khyag' shogu: ru we' nhag' myan" ra" jeju re ngonhaung" qo" khae: yu: li" nae" ngad: ra" .
Byu mae" khyin: yu: ra" Khinjaung Yin" yaug khao: ngo wa yao" byin cao: qemae" khyin: yu: ru ngad: ra" . Ngaui" xeim: jham we' qobo khyad' xeim: re ngaui" byid: nae" qhid' mae" xao su byu qe: gaung tha" Mao" So re caung da" byid: nae" khyin: san: to" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: yao: re: myo: sho' ja: mae qam: nang: yaug ngad: ruyang yao: wa nhag' cad' noyaug mung mo, we' shad' nghung" ra" mo; qhid' mae" ba: bomyid byid' ra" .
Yao: yao: re: qam: nang: yaug ngad: ruyang qobo khyad' xeim: re mo, byu qe: qobo qhid' mae" za: mangad:- yao" qobo: qhid' mae" re: qobo khyad' xeim: ngaui" byid: qo: ra" .
Khag' re: yao: yao" gaung re Khinjaung Yin" aya: maqo" san: yu ngad: ra" . Mao" So wa Arun re Mao" So: khinjaung yin" aya: mae khyin: san: yu: ru we' dakhyo:- Mao" So: yang khyin: yu: ra" yaug za: Khinjaung Yin" gai: boe" ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo: Khristu wa Khinjaung Yin" aya: mang re yao: yao: za: kai" yu: ru mangad: ngad: ra" . Ai: atha" Mao" So wa yao: re- Nao wa nga" Zo: ngad: ra"- Ana" ba ngo wa ni" Pho" boe" lo va"- ga: re:-
Yao: wa gatau jham: dau dalam: mae re:- Nao wa Melkhizedeg nho: khu mae xo' zaui: nae" ra" apyad ato: khinjaung yin" ngad: li" nae"- ga: re: ta" to" ra" .
Yesu wa mug: myid dao mae kaoso' daui: na shi" ra" au:- yao: re shid: rumae" qo" khyad' yu: ra" Mao" So re mho' yao mung: ngug byid ngug nhe' we' akyu" gyi: hug' mho' ra" . Mao" So wa yao" akyu" mho' thoe re tae" gyo: byid' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa nhag' lam: nyham: khyo" ru we' Mao" So re gyaug phug' ruyang tae" gyo: byid' ra" .
Yao: wa Mao" So: yao: Zo: lhao" re ngad sho' ngadqere: qug: khai: dayin dayo: re kham zo" ra" khyo" yang Mao" So: mho dao: re ba: tae" gyo: nae" zhao: yu: ra" .
Amung: yao: wa jab byang" yaug boe" lo lao"- yao" mho dao: re tae" gyo" ra" byu alhab' mo; qhid' mae" apyad ato: khyad' yu: ra" Asang boe" lo: ra" .
Ailao" Mao" So wa yao: re Melkhizedeg khu mae xo' zaui: nae" Khinjaung Yin" ga: mang mhang" ta" hau: byid' ra" .
Melkhizedeg khyo we' sin: yang: ngonhaung" ta" nae" khyo myo: sho' jo; ra" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa phyad za: ba: gyo: mo, mangad: ko" ruyang naonhaung" re ta" sho' kyo: nae" qhid' mae" qug' ra" .
Ayo, khyo" tau" ke' re naonhaung" wa mho" pho" qe boe" gai yo, ngad: avako" . Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa Mao" So: mungdao: mae" sao qhid' zhao: yu ca" ra" khyo re lhao" re: dayaug yaug: yang naonhaung" re mho" byid: qo: ashiko" . Qao: ra" zo: ve zo: nae" atha" naonhaung" wa nug' shaug' ca" shi" mo, za: boe" na: ako" .
Nug' shaug' shi" ra" yaug wa zonau" ngad: ashi"- jo: ru we' shad' rure ba: kho' kin nae" qhid' mae" thaung" qhug' qu" ru maqo" shi" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: qao: ra" zo: ve wa zoqao" qe: qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Yao: bam wa myid: qu" ra" khyo mae min: mo, ngad geyang: gai: ru we' magai: rure qo" ba: kho' yu mo, ngad: ako" .
Airumung: Khristan mungdao" nho: sao qhid' zhao: yu: ra" khyo re nhaung thao" mae to: co' mung:- qao" ra" mho" shid' mungdao: re kham: yu nae" qhid' mae" qhid' au: khyo khe' ye: gelang:-
Ngonhaung" wa akyu" mabo: ra" lo, mau" jham re to" pye' mung: Mao" So re lam khug: ra" khyo- qid nyhab' kham: yu: ru we' sin" ra" mho" shid' khyo- lo, kai: byid' ra" khyo- shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ra" khyo- apyad ato: nho: dao: kho' ra" khyo jham: nho: apan aqao: re ngonhaung" dam: to: byid: maang ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa qhid' khyo jhin" ye: gelang:- amung: Mao" So qad: ngad: re wa ngonhaung" ceru: kad' bam zai ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam: lam khug: myid mae" phaug' lo" ko" mo, re myid dam: tha" lo gesho' khoru: qo" kad' nae" i? Yao: bam wa Mao" So: bo" bao khug mae dalhang kaoso' daui: qu" ru we' mug: gaung: jhaung qhu" re meim" qu" va" mo, ngad mung: Gyang" Lho" Byo re kham: yu: qu" va" mo, ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam wa Mao" So: mungdao: gai: rure we' joe" lo nae" ra" pyad we' sin" ra" qam: so' jham rere: thaung" qhug' ba: lo mo, ngad: ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa yao: bam: lam khug: ra" khyo mae" phaug' lo" byaug vako" ra" . Yao: bam wa Mao" So: yao: Zo: re pyao: zang mae dam: jin" se' pye' na: ru we' qho' phyo' na ko" ruyang yao: bam re nhag' lam: dam: tha" lo nhao nae" magai: boe" ngad: ra" .
Yao" dao mae ana" na" za: qu: sheim: byid' ra" mug: qid re qo" yu: ra" myid gaung re Mao" So shaman" byid: mung: ai: myid gaung wa qhovo: qhoshi: qho: mo, re akyu" bo: ra" gaug zo maui: lam: qo" nhao: ra" .
Ngadqere: ai: yo myid wa zau: we' myo, gae jham reza: yaug: thug' li" nhao: ngad: re wa ai wa pe" phug' made, lomung: Mao" So: yang nhang" pye' ru qhug' ru we' myi" yang ngha" pye' ru qhug' li" nae" .
Mao: nhaung: qe we"- ngonhaung" ceru: ta" sho' ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" khyo re gaigai: yao: ba: ra" . Naonhaung" nho: khyad' yu: ru we' sin" ra" je: gai: ra" shaman" jeju jham naonhaung" qo" ko" rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Mao" So wa tarha" madin: nyang: ra" yaug mangad: ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" zaui: so" lo: ra" mau" rere:- yao: re jhid' de; rure qhu" byid' ra" naonhaung" bao" thaug' byid' rure re:- naonhaung" Khristan mao: nhaung: qere ana" joe" sho' bao" thaug' byid' na ko" rure re: Mao" So wa to" myhid' li" nae" mangad: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" yaug khao: ngo" wa naonhaung" myid: lao" na: ra" ja: jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" lo" thao" joe" sho' mathang mano: nhag' lam: zhau: to" na genae" rure ngonhaung" gyai o ngaui: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa naonhaung" re noe" shoe: ra" mo, maboe" nhao nug- Lam khug mung: zang: kham yang: Mao" So byid' to" ra" dao: so: re qo" khae: yu: ra" mo, we' dakhyo: kam" wa boe" nhao nug: ra" .
Mao" So wa Abraham re yao" dao: so: to" ra" au:- jham tang: yang: dao: so: to" ra" . Yao: tho' je: qi" ru khag' mana yang: yao: wa yao: yao" mang re lao: mung: jham tang: yang: dao: so: to" ra" .
Mao" So wa ngo nao re shaman" byid: nae"- Myid: zo: myo: sho' nao re ngo byid: nae"- ga" rure nao re dao: so: byid: va"- ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Abraham wa nhag' lam: qhang qhang za: zang: kham: lo: ruyang yao: wa Mao" So: dao: so: byid' to" rure qo" khae: yu: ra" .
Byu wa jham tang" ra" au: yao: tho' je: qi" ra" byu dayaug yaug: mang re lao: yang: jham tang: ba: ra" . Airu: jham tang" ru wa jho" ngag: byo; ra" khyo alhab' re athao yab: lo" nhao: ra" .
Mao" So wa yao" myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo re yao: khonhae" re: matha" pye'- ga" rure yao: byid' to" ra" dao: so: re khae: yu nae" ra" mo, re de: de: za: qhu" byid: nug: ra" . Airumung: yao: wa jham tang: yang: dao: so: byid' ra" .
Aimung: ce shid' ja: re- maqo" gai: tha" pye' ngad: ra" . Ce we' sin: yang: Mao" So wa maqo" mhug' ngad: ra" . Airumung: yao" khug mae gug: gug: za: khug ngha: ru qhug' ra" mo, ngonhaung" wa ngonhaung" qhid' kheim: mae byid' to" ra" myid: lao" rure tang za: zaui" zag: ci nae" qi: sho' qam: byid' ru qhug' yu: ra" .
Ce: myid: lao" ru wa ngonhaung" nho: kaoso' daui: ra" khyo qhid' mae" jo,to' nghoe: we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" . Airu wa gug' ru we' lam ga" ru ngad mung: mug: gaung: yham zang mae" qe, kyo pin: lung: re lai: vao ye" lo" yang: akhug shad' gyang" lho" ra" jo, qo khyo joe" ye" ra" .
Yesu wa Melkhizedeg nho: khu mae xo' zaui" ra" apyad ato: Khinjaung Yin" boe" thao re ngonhaung" gaung tha" ai: jo, qo khyo ngonhaung" qhid' khyo vao ye" lo" ava" .
Ce: Melkhizedeg wa Salem kho: kham ngad mung: Myhao: Thao" Ra" Mao" So: Khinjaung pho" ngad: ra" . Abraham wa kho: kham byid yaug re gyekhe' aung: pye' yang: dam: tug' phao: lo: ra" au: re Melkhizedeg wa yao: re tug: yu mung: shaman" byid' ra" .
Alao" Abraham wa yao: sham" lo: ra" lanyab alhab' mae" daxe bam mae" dabam re yao: re qhaug' byid' ra" . ( Melkhizedeg nho: sao qhid' mae" mang lajheim: wa din: man" ra" kho: kham ga" ru ngad: ra" . Amung: Salem: vogaung: mae" kho: kham re: ngad: ruyang yao" mang wa yaug yo: ra" kho: kham ga" rure: ngad: ra" . )
Melkhizedeg nho: yao: myhi" yao: pho"- yao" phug' pho" qe: byuxag' tung" xam: re:- yao: khau: li" ru we' yao: shid: ra" khyo tung" xam: re: pe" majo, ngad: ra" . Yao: wa Mao" So: yao: Zo: re"ru:- apyad ato: Khinjaung boe" jo; ra" .
Airumung: yao: wa khoqhi" qi" qhang yaug ngad: rure naonhaung" qu" ge,- Lahau: qi" ra" ngonhaung" phug' pho" Abraham wa gyekhe' jao: mae" yao: qo" sham" yu: ra" lanyab alhab' mae" daxe bam mae" dabam yao: re qhaug' byid' ra" .
Israel amyu" wa Abraham mae" myhung: li" mo, ngad mung: khinjaung Levi amyu" nho: mao: nhaung: amyu" qeza: ngad gesho' ngadqere: khinjaung aya: qo" yu ko" ra" Levi kaung mae" myid: zo: qe wa daxe bam mae" dabam alu: re yao: bam mae" gaug zo: nae" qhid' mae" Tarha" khyo" yang amyin" byid' to" ra" .
Melkhizedeg' wa Levi kaung mae" gyo" li" yaug mangad: ngadqere: Abraham mae" daxe bam mae" dabam alu: re kham: yu mung: Mao" So: dao: so: re qo" kham: yu: ra" yaug ngad: ra" Abraham re shaman" byid' ra" .
Airumung: shaman" byid' ra" yaug wa shaman" byid' ru kham: yu: ra" yaug tho' je: qi: yaug ngad: rure pe" aug' o: nae" khyo majo, ngad: ra" .
Khinjaung qe: mau" mae daxe bam mae" dabam re shid ba: ra" xao su byu qekhyo" gaug: yu: ru ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Jham: Mugsug' mae tung" to" ru we' dakhyo:- Melkhizedeg nho: khyo mae daxe bam mae" dabam re kaoso' daui: na yaug khyo" gaug: yu: ra" .
Ceru: re: gai: ta" ra" . Daxe bam mae" dabam re gaug yu: ra" Levi yao: yao: re: Abraham khyo" yang daxe bam mae" dabam re byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Abraham we' Melkhizedeg jho" qhug' ko" ra" au: re Levi wa makhau: li" shi: ngadqere: yao" phug' pho" Abraham nho: gaung khyao khug mae bo: jo; ein: gai: ta" ra" .
Israel byumyu" qere tarha" byid' ru wa Levi khinjaung qere aqao: to: yang: byid' ru ngad: ra" . Levi khinjaung re wa yao: bam: mau" zo" re mashad' lo: kyab' sho' zaui: vako" ru ngad: re wa Arun nho: khinjaung aya: agu khyo" mangad: lo: Melkhizedeg nho: khu mae xo' zaui" ra" khinjaung gatau dayaug po" thug' li" maca" lo: ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re khinjaung amyu" kaung re tha" pye' lao" wa ai: tarha" rere: tha" pye' ca" ra" .
Ceru: ta" to: qhug' ra" yaug ngonhaung" Asang wa gatau: amyu" kaung mae bobo yaug ngad mung: yao" amyu" kaung mae" khag' re: khinjaung mau" mazaui" qu" ngad: ako" .
Yao: wa Yuda amyu" kaung mae" khau: li" yaug ngad: ru wa de: de: za: ngad: ra" . Moshe wa khinjaung aya: we' sin: yang: ta" ra" au: ce: amyu" kaung re pe" re: mata" ngad: ra" .
Melkhizedeg we' dau: ra" khinjaung gatau dayaug po" thug' li" va" rumung: khinjaung amyu" kaung tha" va" ra" khyo wa je: lhao" re: de: de: za: ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa ai: khinjaung aya: re xao su byu qe: thung" tarha" khyo" yang kham: yu: ru mangad:- Mathao" magan: ra" kaoso' qam: o: khyo" yang kham: yu: to" ru ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Jham: Mugsug' mae nao wa Melkhizedeg khu mae xo' zaui" ra" apyad ato: khinjaung ngad: li" nae"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Airumung: kham" to" ra" tarha" xug' wa qam: nang" ru we' akyu" mabo: ruyang to" pye' ru qhug' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Moshe Tarha" wa pe" rere: bin sho' maqo" jab byang" nhao ngad: ra" . Amung: ngonhaung" wa ana"- je: gai: ra" myid: lao" khyo re the' yu va" rumung: ai: myid: lao" ru khyo" yang Mao" So jhao" qui" te' ye" bam va" .
Aitho' mago" Mao" So: dao: thang" jham tang" ra" dao: re: jo; ra" . Gaje qere khinjaung aya: jaung byid' ra" au:- airu" dao: thang" jham tang" ru majo, ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu re khinjaung khyo" san: to" ra" au: re- Mao" So wa yao: re- Nao wa apyad ato: khinjaung ngad: li" nae"- ga: Asang wa jham tang" to" ava" . Asang wa yao" myid re lhai" pye' nae" mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ceru: jho" shai" ruyang Yesu wa je: gai: ra" dao: thang" re pakham: kham: byid: yaug ngad: ra" .
Alao" gatau jho" shai" ru daja: jo; ashi"- ai wa khinjaung qe wa shid: rure maqo" lai geyang: yao: bam: khinjaung mau" zo" re maqo" xo' zaui: ko" ngad: ra" . Amung: khinjaung gatau myo: sho' na qo: ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa apyad ato kaoso' daui: na yaug ngad: ruyang yao" khinjaung aya: wa gatau dayaug: lo, khyo malai: lo" lo: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: yao: wa yao: khyo" yang Mao" So jhao" vao lo ko" ra" mo, re ayo, maqho lo: qo" khyad' yu byid' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa ai bam: qhid' mae" Mao" So re mho' yao byid: nae" apyad ato kaoso' daui: na yaug ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Yesu wa ngonhaung" nho: qo ca" ra" khyo re qo" bao" thaug' byid' ra" Khinjaung Yin" ngad: ra" . Yao: wa gyang" lho" ru we' qobo mho qo mabo: ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: wa qobo qo" ra" mo, mae" gatau san san kho' to: qhug' mung: mug: gaung mae khin" to' to: qhug' yaug ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa khinjaung qi: qe gatau we' dakhyo:- ba khao: ngo" yao: yao" qobo qhid' mae" shi" sao qhid' xeim: ngaui" byid: maqo yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: wa yao: yao" gaung re qhaug' byid' pye' ra" au: re dalhang: dae mae za: bin sho' qhid' mae" xeim: ngaui" byid' ava" .
Moshe tarha" wa majab byang" ra" byu qere khinjaung agyi qekhyo" san: to" ra" . Ngadqere: ai: kham" to" ra" tarha" thao mae Mao" So jham tang" to" ra" dao: so: wa apyad ato jab byang" jo; ra" yao: Zo: re khinjaung qi: khyo" san: to" ra" .
Ngonhaung" ta" lo: ra" dao: alhab' gu: mae" je: akhyag: ra" ajhaung wa- ngonhaung" wa airu" Khinjaung Yin" re qo" ra" mo, ngad: ra" . Yao: wa mug: gaung dao mae phung qab bao qi" qhang: ra" Mao" So: zaung tao" lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo, yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa byu: yang mangad:- Mao" So: yang kad' to" ra" ai: zaung agyang" khug mae" gyang" lho" thao" ra" jo, qo mae Khinjaung Yin" dayaug khyo" caung da" byid' na: ra" .
Khinjaung Yin" yaug khao: ngo" wa Mao" So re xeim: jham we' gug' nyhug' xeim: jham re phad' ngaui" byid: nae" qhid' mae" san: to: qhug' yaug ngad: ra" . Airumung: ngonhaung" nho: khinjaung yin" yaug mae re: ngaui" byid: nae" xeim: ngaui" daja: ja: qo" ca" ra" .
Yao: myidgaung dao mae qe na: jo; ngad: re wa yao: wa khinjaung yin" dayaug dajhid' re: gai: boe" nae" mangad:- pe"mung: ga"re Yuda Tarha" khyo" yang jhaung qhu" xeim: jham re ngaui" byid: nae" qhid' mae" khinjaung qe na: bam geyang: ngad: ra" .
Khinjaung qe zaui: so" ra" lo, mau" jham wa mug: gaung dao mae boe" na: ra" khyo: nho: lho dau we' bao qab za: ngad: ra" . Airu wa Moshe kad' lo: ru we' dakhyo: za: ngad: ra" . Moshe wa ai: dao: thang" Zaung re kad' nae" seim" ra" au:- Mao" So wa- bam dao mae Nao re ngo qhu" byid' ra" akhyao we' dakhyo:- ja: khao: ngo" re kad' nae" qhid' mae" lha" yang: kad' wa,- ga: yao: re ta" ra" .
Ngadqere: ana" wa- je: gai: ra" Mao" So: dao: so: jham: dao: mae aqao: kad' yang: Mao" So we' xao su byu qe: agyo: mae Yesu nyhang" jaung byid' ra" dao: thang" wa je: gai: ru ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- khinjaung khyo" Yesu caung da" ra" mau" zo" wa ai: khinjaung qe caung da" byid' ra" mau" zo" tho' je: gai: ra" .
Sao qhid' mae" dao: thang" mae pe" qo mabo ngad: re wa dao: thang" shid' lam: ein: lam: to: nae" khyo majo, ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Mao" So wa yao" byu qere qobo vhin yang: ta" ru wa- Israel amyu"- Yuda amyu" qe we'- ngo dao: thang" asag' to: nae" ba na joe" lo: li" nae" .
Ai: dao: thang" wa yao: bam: phug' pho" qere lo; yang she mung: Egutu mung" mae" ngo jhui" thug' lo: ra" au: re yao: bam we' ngo to" ra" dao: thang" we' dau nae" mangad:- Yao: bam wa ngo we' yao: bam: agyo: mae to" ra" ai: dao: thang" re jhaug' mazaug geyang: ngo wa yao: bam re to" pye' va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Mao" So wa joe" lo nae" ba na mae Israel amyu" qe we' ngo to: nae" ra" dao: thang" wa nga" tarha" re yao: bam: aung khug nhag' lam: mae ngo ke' byid: nae" . Yao: bam: nhag' lam: mae tung" te' to: byid: nae" . Ngo wa yao: bam: Mao" So boe" lo: li" nae" . Amung: yao: bam wa nga" byumyu" qe boe" lo: li" genae" .
Yao: bam mae" dayaug re: yao: yao" byumyu" yao: cao: re ngad ngad- yao: yao" kaung mae" mao: nhaung: qere ngad ngad Asang re ba wa,- ga: mho" byid: qo nae" mangad:- Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa ngai: thao" yaug mae" qi" thao" yaug joe" sho' ngore ba: li" genae" .
Ngo wa yao: bam: qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid: mung: yao: bam: shad' nghung" rure xam" to: byid: lo nae" mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
