Mao" So wa ai: dao: thang" asag' khyo re ta" ra" khyo" yang sao qhid' mae" dao: thang" lam: re axug' boe" lo" nhao: ra" . Xug' lo" byaug: ra" ja: pe" ngadqere: dazab re baui" lo" byaug: li" nae" .
Sao qhid' mae" dao: thang" re phug' cao" nae" qhid' mae" caung: pa" thung" li we' byu: yang kad' to" ra" caung: pa" nae" jo, qo re: jo; ra" .
Gyang" Lho" ra" jo, qo ga: mang: ra" zaung sao qhid' mae" qe, kad' ca" ra" . Ai: qe, mae myikaug' tao" we' Mao" So re qhaug' byid' to" ra" mug jaung: re to" ako" .
Ai: shid' lam: ein: ra" qe,kyo pin: lung: nhaung thao" mae" qe, re wa Gyang" Lho" Thao" Ra" Qe, ga: mhang" ako" .
Ai: qe, mae wa sheim nae pyo" ra" xau ngha" ra" qhang phan we' alhab' qhang: yang thab' to" ra" dao: thang" ban" jo; ra" . Ai: ban" khug mae Manna mug ke' to" ra" qhang yae:- anyaug tad' ra" Arun nho: zaung: bao" we' kham" to" ra" amyin" dao: jham tung" to" ra" laug pye: shid' pye: bo: ra" .
Ai: ban" dao mae kherubin alho shid' lam: de; ra" . Ai: kherubin wa Mao" So na: jo; ga" ra" lajheim: ngad: ra" . Kherubin daung jham wa qobo khyad' pye' ra" jo, qo dao mae mug' nghoe' jo; ako" . Ngadqere: ana" ce wa cejham: lajheim: re adai: ato' sho' kyo: nae" ayo, mangad: ngad: ra" .
Ai: gu: re bin: nyhang" jaung: to: lao"- khinjaung qe wa yao: bam: caung da" byid' ra" mau" zo" re zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" ba khao: ngo" ai: zaung sao qhid' mae" qe, khyo vao ye" ako" .
Ngadqere: zaung shid' qe, ein: qe, akhug qe, khyo wa khinjaung yin" yao: dayaug za: yao: yao" qobo qhid' mae" we' mo,byu qe maba mabeim: lo: shad' lhoe" ko" ra" qobo qhid' mae" ngaui" byid: nae" sa: ci yang: dazin re dalhang za: qo" vao ye" ra" .
Zaung sao qhid' mae" qe, ajo, jo, wa ai: gyang" lho" thao" ra" zaung akhug qe, khyo vao ye: nae" qhid' mae" khyo pyid' jo; rure ai: Gyang" Lho" Byo wa de: de: za: mho" shid' byid' ra" .
Ceru wa ana" pyad re ceim" shid' na: ra" alho dalam: ngad: ra" . Mao" So re xeim: ngaui" we' gug' nyhug' ngaui" xeim: re ngaui" byid' ru wa caung: pa" ra" mo; nhag' lam: re jab byang" sho' maqo" kad' byid: ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re aijham wa zo: shaug' yang cid' san: pye' ra" thung" tarha" agin akhyao aja: aja: we' sin" ru ngad: ra" . Ai: gu: alhab' wa adao shad' we' sin" ra" thung" li jham ngad mung: Mao" So wa ja: khao: ngo" re asag' kad' pye' nae" ra" ayo, joe" sho' gai: ci: ra" thung" tarha" ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: Yesu wa cemae jo, gau ngad: ra" gai lho" ra" ja: jham: nho: Khinjaung Yin" khyo" joe" li" ava" . Yao: caung da" mau" zo" zaui: so" na: ra" zaung wa je: qi" qhang mung: jab byang" ru ngad: ra" . Ai: zaung wa byu: lo; yang kad' ra" zaung mangad:- ce: phan" to" ra" mug: myid we' masin: ngad: ra" .
Yesu wa Gyang" Lho" Thao" Ra" Jo, Qo khyo dalhang mae za: alhab' bin: kyab' sho' vao ye" ra" au: re xeim: ngaui" byid: nae" yao: wa cad' be, sa:- nung: jaung sa: re ci yang: mavao ye: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa yao" sa: re ci yang: vao ye: mung: ngonhaung" qhid' mae" apyad ato khyad' yu: ru qo" byid' ra" .
Cad' be, sa:- nung: jaung lo: sa: we' nung: jaung bae: myimhab re caung: pa" thung" khyo" masan: ra" mo; dao mae pyi" sheim: byid: lao" caung: pa" thung" masan: rure ceyang gyang" san: lo" nhao: ra" .
Ceru dang: ngad: re wa Yesu sa" yang wa khoqhi" je yang: kyang" san: pye' nhao nae" i? Yao: wa apyad ato: Byo khyo" yang yao: yao" gaung re qo mabo jab byang" ra" xeim: khyo" Mao" So re xeim: ngaui" byid' ava" . Kaoso' daui: na: ra" Mao" So re ngonhaung" qo" caung da" byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao" sa: wa akyu" mabo: ra" caung: pa" thung" yang moe: jo; ra" ngonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: re kyang" san: pye' nhao: li" nae" .
Airumung: Mao" So: yang khai: yu qhug' vako" ra" mo, wa Mao" So dao: so: byid' to" ra" apyad ato: shaman" jeju re qo" kham: yu genae" qhid' mae" Khristu wa ai: dao: thang" asag' re nyhang" jaung byid: yaug ngad: ra" . Ceru: qo" kad' ru wa sao qhid' mae" dao: thang" jo; jo, shi" au: yao: bam shad' lhoe" ra" qobo jham mae" lhoe' ke' byid: nae" qhid' mae" byu dayaug shid va" ruyang ngad: ra" .
Ma qhaug' mugsug' jao dang boe" nae" qhid' mae" ma qhaug' mugsug' tung" ra" yaug wa gaigai: shid va" ga" rure sagse: qhu" byid: qo: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ma qhaug' mugsug' tung" ra" yaug kaoso' daui: na shi" au: re- ai: ma qhaug' mugsug' wa jao dang magai: yu ngad: ra" . Airu wa yao: shid thao re za: jao dang gai: yu: ra" .
Airumung: ai: sao qhid' mae" dao: thang" lhao" re: sa: ci: ra" khyo" yang za: jao dang boe" ra" .
Sao qhid' Moshe wa ai: kham" to" ra" tarha" mae bo: ru we' dakhyo: amyin" dao: jham alhab' re mo, byu qere ta" kyo" ra" . Ai: thao re Moshe wa yao mug' ane te' ra" Husub kyao re ci yang: nung: jaung lo: sa:- cad' be, sa: re qid we' lhag' yu mung: ai: tarha" mugsug' paug' dao mae re:- mo, byu qe alhab' mo; dao mae re: pyi" sin: byid' ra" .
Alao" Moshe wa ceru wa Mao" So: yang naonhaung" re phug' cao" genae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' to" ra" dao: thang" re dazid thaung" te' to" ra" sa: ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo: Moshe wa ai: caung: pa" Zaung rere: caung: pa" rumae ci: ra" zai ja: cao jab alhab' dao mae re:- ai: sa: re pyi" sin" ra" .
Kham" to" ra" Tarha" we' dakhyo: alaug ja: khao: ngo" ein nae" gu: wa sa" yang kyang" san: pye' ru qhug' ako"- Sa: sheim: gyo" lao" za: qobo khyad' byid' ru gai: qhug' ra" .
Cekhyo" yang mug: khaung dao mae jo; ra" ja: jham: nho: lho dau jham re qo" kyang" san: pye' ra" . Ngadqere: mug: khaung dao mae" zai jham re kyang" san: pye' nae" ru je: gai: ra" xeim: re ngaui" byid: qo: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Khristu wa ai: gyang" lho" ra" jo, qo agyang" nho: lho dau ngad: ra" byu: lo; yang kad' to" ra" Gyang" Lho" ra" jo, qo khyo mavao ye: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa mug: gaung dao khyo khyao- vao ye: mung: ngonhaung" gaung tha" ana" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae yena: qhu" ra" .
Yuda khinjaung yin" wa gug' nyhug' sa: re ci yang: Gyang" Lho" Thao" ra" jo, qo khyo zin khao: zin ngo" vao ye: qo: ra" . Ngadqere: Khristu wa yao" gaung re airu: xeim: ngaui" byid: nae" qhid' mae" myo: sho' lhang mavao ye: ngad: ra" .
Yao: airu: vao ye" ngad: re wa mug: myid re Mao" So phan" to" ra" au: mae" ga" re yao: wa myo: sho' lhang qug: khai: dayin dayo: kham zo: qo nae" ngad: ra" . Ai: atha" ana" wa pyad ban: thao" lo" nae" jhao" li" na lao" yao: yao" gaung re xeim: ngaui" ngaui" byid' ra" khyo" yang qobo re yu: pye' nae" qhid' mae" yao: wa dalhang za: po" thug' li" ava" .
Byu yaug khao: ngo" wa dalhang za: shid ca" mung: ai: thao re Mao" So: yang dao: kho' ru qhug' ra" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- Khristu re: byu myo: sho' mo; nho: qobo khyad' pye' byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao: yao" gaung re dalhang za: xeim: ngaui" ngaui" byid' ra" . Amung: yao: wa qobo re yu: pye' nae" qhid' mae" mangad: lo:- yao: re lao" na ko" ra" mo, re khyad' yu nae" qhid' mae" shid' lhang ein: lhang de" thug' li" nae" ngad: ra" .
Yuda qe: kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa ai: zai: agyang" jham: nho: azung akhyao we' shab za: jho" dau: ra" khyao dau mangad: ngad: ra"- ai wa joe" lo nae" ra" gai shab: ra" ja: jham: nho: thab thab mung: ra" bao qab za: ngad: ra" . Ai: xeim: re yao: za: dazin we' dazin khonhae" re: ngaui" byid: qo: ra" . Airumung: kham" to" ra" tarha" wa Mao" So jhao" te' lo: ra" mo, re ai: xeim: jham re ngaui" byid' ra" khyo" yang khoru: qo" jab byang" nhao nae" i?
Mao" So re caung: pa" ko" ra" mo, wa yao: bam: qobo mae" dang za: kyang" san: pye' byid' ru qhug' vako" ngad: re wa yao: bam wa qobo qo" ga: mamyid: jho lomung: xeim: jham ngaui" byid' ru alhab' rere: thang: pye' gezai ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ana"- ai: xeim: jham re ngaui" byid' ru wa dazin we' dazin yao: bam: qobo jham re myid: beim: nhao: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re nung: jaung lo: jham: sa: we' cad' be, jham: sa: wa qobo jham re maqo" khyad' pye' byid: ngad: ra" .
Ce: mathao mae Khristu wa ce: mug: myid dao khyo gyo" li" nae" au:- Yao: wa Mao" So re Nao wa xeim: we' xeim: ngaui" byid' rure ma o ngad: ra" Ngadqere: nao wa nga" qhid' mae" gaung khyao re nyhang" jaung byid' to" ava"-
Gug' nyhug' jham re phan dao mae gaung geim" phad' ngaui" byid' rure re:- qobo khyad' byid' ra" xeim: rere: nao ma o ngad: ra" .
Alao" kham" to" ra" Tarha" mugsug' mae nga" khyo re tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: Mao" So we"- Ni" myid o: ra" khyo re zaui: so: nae" ngo cetau mae na: ein: ngo tau: va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Sao qhid' mae yao: wa xeim: jham- ngaui" xeim: jham- gug' nyhug' jham re gaung geim" phan dao mae phad' ngaui" ru- qobo khyad' ra" xeim: jham re nao ma o ngad: ra" . Cejham re kham" to" ra" Tarha" we' dakhyo:- ngaui" byid: ngad sho' ngadqere: aigu: re nao ma o mangaui ngad: ra"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re yao: wa Mao" So we"- ni" myid o: ra" khyo re zaui: so: nae" ngo cetau mae na:- ga: ta" ra" . Airumung: Mao" So wa daba: mae" xeim: ngaui" byid' ra" khyo axug' alhab' re to" pye' mung: ai: khu mae Khristu nho: xeim: ngaui" byid' ra" khyo re tha" ke' byid' ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Yesu Khristu wa Mao" So yao: re zaui: so: nhao nug: ra" khyo re cao" yang:- yao: yao" gaung re dalhang mae za: bin: kyab' bin sho' xeim: ngaui" byid' ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa qobo mae" kyang" san: pye' byid' ru qhug' bam va" .
Yuda khinjaung yaug khao: ngo" wa yao: yao" mau" zo" re ba khao: ba ngo" zaui: so: mung: ai: xeim: re yao: za: myo: sho' lhang ngaui" byid' ako" . Ngadqere: ai: xeim: jham wa qobo jham re khonhae" re: maqo" khyad' pye' byid: ngad: ako" .
Ngadqere: Khristu wa qobo khyad' ra" xeim: re apyad ato gang" tang: jo; ra" xeim: dalam: ngaui" byid' ra" . Ai: thao re yao: wa Mao" So: lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo; ra" .
Yao: wa yao" gyevo qere khyid zab tao" khyo" yao" khyid qao: mae Mao" So: yang to: byid' ra" ayo, joe" sho' lao" na: ra" .
Airumung: yao: wa xeim: dalhang ngaui" byid' ru we' qobo mae" kyang" san: pye' byid: qhug' ra" mo, re apyad ato jab byang" ra" mo, boe" nhao: ra" .
Alao" Gyang" Lho" Byo re: ngonhaung" re sagse: kham byid' ra" .
Sao qhid' mae yao: ta" ru wa- Ceru wa joe" lo nae" ra" ayo, mae yao: bam we' ngo to: nae" dao: thang" ngad: ga: Asang ta" ra" . Ngo wa yao: bam: nhag' lam: khug mae nga" tarha" ke' byid: mung: ai: tarha" jham re yao: bam: aung khug mae tung" to: byid: nae"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: thao re yao: wa ngo wa yao: bam: qobo jham re we' makhyang" ra" mau" zo" jham re myid: beim: byid: lo nae" mangad:- ga: dam: ta" ra" .
Airu: qobo khyad' pye' byid' ra" khyo jo, lao" wa- qobo khyad' ra" xeim: re: ngaui" byid: maqo lo: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Yesu shid kham: byid' ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" wa ai: Gyang" Lho" thao" ra" jo, qo khyo vao ye: nae" galin: gago: loe; beim: ru qo" yu: bam va" .
Yesu wa yao: yao" gaung ngad: ra" qe,kyo pin: lung" yang kaoso' daui: ra" khyo asag' ngonhaung" qhid' mae" phung" byid' ava" .
Mao" So: yham mae eib: ra" qi" qhang: ra" khinjaung pho" ngonhaung" qo" bam va" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa yao: yao" aung khug mae qobo qo" jho: ra" aung khug nhag' lam: re kyang" san: pye' mung: ngonhaung" gaung khyao re qid gyang" yang cid' san: pye' yang: gyang" phyu: ra" nhag' lam:- gang" tang: ra" lam khug: myid we' Mao" So: qhid' kheim: khyo qui" vao ye: gelang:-
Mao" So wa yao" dao: so: re boe" sho' kad' yaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" qo" lam khug yang: ngonhaung" lhang: yu: ra" myid: lao" rure tang za: zaui" zag: ci gelang:-
Ngonhaung" wa dayaug we' dayaug sho: jho" no mung: yao: cao: jho" bao" thaug' byid' ru we' jhid' de; myid jho" qhu" byid: mung: gai: ra" lo, mau" re zaui: so" na gelang:-
Yao: cao: daga" lhaung" jho" ham: phaung: ra" khyo re su damyo" to" pye' ko" ru we' dakhyo: ngonhaung" wa mato" pye' lo:- Asang: nho: ba na jhao" li" na va" rure naonhaung" ba vako" ruyang ngonhaung" wa yao: cao: je yang: qam: jho" byid' na gelang: .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa ai: dangman" ra" khyo re bin: ba thao thaug qobo shad' lhoe" na: ngad: re wa- ngonhaung" qobo re khyad' pye' byid' ra" xeim: gatau jo, lo nae" mangad:-
Ngonhaung" wa ai: joe" lo nae" ra" dao: kho' rure we' Mao" So re gye kad' ra" mo, re ngha" jheim" pye' nae" ra" laung: thao" ra" myi: re gyaug: nin" ru we' lao" na nae" za: angad lo" ra" .
Moshe kham" to" ra" Tarha" re maphug' cao" ra" yaug khag' re ngadqere:- sagse: shid' yaug- mangad: lao"- ai: tho' je: ra" sagse: qe ta" thug' mung: qobo qo" rure myao lao" nhag' makhyag' lo: se' pye' ru qhug' ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So: yao: Zo: re pe" xan: masun" ra" yaug- yao: yao" qobo re kyang" san: pye' byid' ra" Mao" So: dao: thang" sa: re phug' mate' ra" yaug- Gyang" Lho" Byo: nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju re maphug' makhyad' kad' ra" yaug wa khoqhi" la" ra" qobo dae kham zo: man" ra" yaug ngad nae" rure myid: qu" ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re ngo wa lage, phaug' byid: nae"- qobo phug' dam: tug' byid: nae" ga: re:- Asang wa yao" byumyu" re dao: kho' li" nae" ga: ta" ra" yaug khag' ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: .
Kaoso' daui: na: ra" Mao" So: lo, khug khyo gyo" vao lo" ru wa gyai gyaug ca" ru ngad: ra" .
Qhid' phyao: mae" ba na jham mae naonhaung" khoru: boe" lo ko" rure myid: beim: ge,- Lai: lo: ra" ayo, mae naonhaung" wa Mao" So: mug: bo" re bin: qo" kham: yu gemung: ai: thao re qug: khai: dayin dayo: myo: sho' ja: kham zo" lo gengadqere: aseim" mabyid: tang za: ye; lo: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa su myo: sho' mo; qhid' kheim: mae maphug' makhyad' roe" ru we' gaui: ru qhug' mung: airu: maphug' makhyad' roe" ru we' jung" gaui: ru qhug' lo ko" ra" mo; bo: bode; lo: ra" mo, re: ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa thaung: laung" ra" mo; qhid' mae" sho: bono mung: naonhaung" jo,nho" jham re lhad' yu: ru qhug' ra" au: re ngaui bau: taung" za: zang: kham: pye' ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa aijham tho' je: gai mung: khonhae" mabaui mabyo; ra" jo,nho" jham re qo" sang: jo, shiko" rure naonhaung" ba geyang: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" qam: dashan ge,- pe"mung: ga"re airu wa naonhaung" re aphug' jhaung qhu" qi: qo" yu nhao: li" nae" .
Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo re zaui: so: nae" we' yao" dao: so: re qo" kham: yu nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" wa zang: qhao" ra" myid qo: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Jham: Mugsug' mae Dazab zo: lao" joe" li" nae" ra" yaug wa li" nae" ngad: ra" . Yao: wa yam" na nae" mangad:-
Nga" nho: din: man" ra" byu qe kam" wa lam khug mung: daui: na: li" genae" . Ngadqere: yao: bam mae" dayaug yaug naung zad: zad' lo" re wa ngo yao: re ngaui nae" mangad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa naung zad: zad' lo" mung: jeim" lo" byaug: ra" mo, mangad:- Lam khug: myid bo mung: khyad' yu: ru qhug' mo, kam" wa ngad: ra" .
Lam khug: myid bo: ga" ru wa ngonhaung" myid: lao" ra" ja: jham re gaigai: yao: nhag' dag: ru we' maqo" myao: ra" ja: jham re gaigai: yao: ba: to" rure ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Ganhae" mae" byu qe wa yao: bam: lam khug: myid mathao mae Mao" So: yang o ngaui myid vang" byid' rure qo" kham: yu: ako" .
Mamyao: rumae" qo" myao: ra" ja: boe" thug' li" nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: mungdao" yang mug: kin re phan" to" ru ngad: rure lam khug: ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" ba: yu: ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Abela wa Ka-in ngaui" byid' ra" xeim: tho' je: gai: ra" xeim: Mao" So re ngaui" byid' ra"- Abela wa yao" lam khug: ru khyo" yang din: man" ra" byu dayaug khyo" Mao" So: yang o ngaui myid vang" byid' rure qo" kham: yu: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao" jhaung qhu" re Mao" So: yang khae: yu byid: yang: ngad: ra" . Abela wa shid: byaug ngadqere yao" lam khug: ru khyo" yang dao: jhau: na: ashi" .
Lam khug: ru khyo" yang Enog wa shid: ru maqhug' lo: adaui phe, Mao" So jhao" to' yu: ru qhug' ra" . Mao" So: yang yao: re to' yu: ru ngad yang:- yao: re khag' re: maqo" myao ngad: ako" . Mao" So: yang yao: re mato' yu shi" ra" au: re- yao: wa Mao" So ngaui: ra" yaug ngad: ra" ga: Jham: Mugsug' mae ta" to" ra" .
Lam khug: myid mabo: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Mao" So re maqo" o ngaui nhao ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So jhao" qui" lo: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Mao" So na: jo; rure we' yao: re qho: na: ra" mo, re jhaung qhu" byid: yaug ngad: rure lam khug ca" ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Noa wa joe" lo nae" ayo, mae" yao: maqo" myao: ra" khyo we' sin: yang: Mao" So: yang ta" peim: byid' ra" dao: re the' gyo" ra" . Yao: wa Mao" So: mho dao: re tae" gyo: mung: qid sang pho dalam: zhaug' yang: ai: khug mae yao: we' yao" yham byu qe khyad' yu: ru qhug' ako" . Aimung: mug: myid re dao: phyid' ra" au: re yao: wa lam khug: myid khyo" yang din: man" ra" ga: Mao" So: yang sun" yu byid' rure qo" khae: yu: ra" .
Abraham wa lam khug: ruyang Mao" So khai: ra" au: mho dao: gyo: mung: Mao" So: yang byid: nae" ga: dao: so: byid' to" ra" mung"dan: khyo thug' ye" lo" ra" . Abraham wa yao: khai: ye" lo" nae" rure maba lo: yao: yao" mung"dan: mae" thug' lo" ra" .
Lam khug: ru khyo" yang Abraham wa Mao" So: yang yao: re dao: so: byid' to" ra" mung"dan: mae bang" vo dayaug khyo" yena: ra" . Yao: wa Mao" So: dao: so: re dakhyo: za: qo" khae: yu: ra" . Isag- Yaku we' dakhyo: za: zaung jham: khug mae na: jo; ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Abraham wa Mao" So: yang nyhang" jaung yang: zao: to" ra" gang" tang: ra" apan we' te" to" ra" vogaung: mo" re myid: lao" na: ra" .
Abraham wa gyai mao" byaug: ru we' Sarah re: zo: dau maqo" khau lo: ngadqere:- yao: wa lam khug: ruyang zoshao: yao: pho" boe" lo: ra" . Mao" So wa yao" dao: so: re dao: so: zaung yaug ngad: rure yao: lam khug: ra" .
Abraham wa sa: sho: khyo" yang yauggai ashid ru: ngadqere: yao: dayaug mae" za: mug: gaung mae" kyi jham we' panglai: qid yae ma dam: mae" matho' nghe' ra" ma coe jham nho" na: je" ra" myid: zo: qe myo" laug: li" ko" ra" .
Byu ai: gu: alhab' wa Mao" So re lam khug yang: shid: lo" vako" ra" . Yao: bam wa Mao" So: dao: so: byid' to" ra" ja: re maqo" khae: yu ko" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: va: mae" the' myao mung: tug: yu: ako" . Yao: bam wa myid gaung dao mae taung bug qe we' phao: khug: na mo, za: ngad: rure de: de: za: lhang: yu: ako" .
Airu: lhang: yu: ra" mo, wa yao: bam yao: sang: ra" mung"dan: re qho: na mo, ngad: ko" rure de: de: za: myao: ra" .
Yao: bam to: co' ra" mung"dan: re yao: bam mamyid: beim" na loko" ngad: ra" . Yao: bam airu: myid: beim" na yang: ngad: re wa- ai: khyo dam: tug' phao: lo" nae" akho: akhang" yao: bam qo" ako" .
Ai: atha" yao: bam wa je: gai: ra" mung"dan: ngad: ra" mug: khaung: mung"dan: re nhag' nghae" na: ako" . Airumung: Mao" So wa Yao: bam: Mao" So ngad:- ga: mhang" rure maqho' ngad: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa yao: bam: qhid' mae" vogaung: mo" dalam: nyhang" te" to: byid' ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Abraham wa Mao" So yao: re jham" qu" ra" au: yao: zo: Isag re xeim: khyo" Mao" So re ngaui" byid' ra" . Abraham wa Mao" So: yang dao: so: byid' to" ra" yaug ngadqere: yao: wa yao" zote: zo: re xeim: khyo" ngaui" byid: nae" jin" jin" ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa Abraham re Nao wa Isag khyo" yang myid: zo: qo" li" nae" ga: ta" to" ra" .
Mao" So wa Isag re shid: rumae" dam: qo" daui: li" nhao yaug ngad: ga: Abraham myid: yu: ra" . Airumung: Abraham wa Isag re shid: rumae" dam: qo" khae: yu: ru ngad: ra"- ein: gai: ta" ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Isag wa joe" lo nae" ayo, qhid' mae" Yaku we' Eso tao re shaman" byid' ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Yaku wa yao: shid qid re Yoseb yao: zo: tao re shaman" byid' ra" . Yao: wa yao" zaung: bao" nyaug re nga yang: Mao" So re goe; pa" ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Yoseb wa yao: shid: lo" na lao" Israel byu qe Egutu mung" mae" phao: thug' lo" nae" khyo re ta" mung:- yao" mao gaung we' sin: yang: khoru: kad' nae" rure dao: pyang: to: co' ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Moshe nho: yao: myhi" yao: pho" tao wa yao: khau thao re lho" mo" sam khye' lam: lam: nyham" to" ako" . Moshe wa gyai yaung" ra" zonau" ngad: rure yao: shid' tao myao mung: yao: shid' tao wa kho: kham amyin" dao: re ngag: pye' nae" magyaug ko" ngad: ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Moshe wa yao: qi" li" lao"- kho: kham myiqe: zo" nho: yauggai zo: ga: mhang" nae" rure ha: pye' ra" .
Yao: wa dazab daso' qobo mae pyo" na nae" tho' Mao" So: byumyu" we' qug: khai: dayin dayo: kham zo: nae" rure je: nug ngaui: ra" .
Meshia qhid' mae" maphug' makhyad' jung" pye' ru qhug' ru wa Egutu mung" mae" jo,nho" alhab' tho' mae je: phug' de; ru ngad: ga: yao: myid: yu: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa joe" lo nae" ayo, mae qo" khae: yu nae" ra" jhaung qhu" re nhag' nghae" na yang: ngad: ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Moshe wa kho: kham pho" nhag' yo" rure magyaug lo: Egutu mung" mae" thug' lo" ra" . Yao: wa myo; yang maqo" gai: myao: ra" Mao" So re the' myao: ruru:- dam: tug' lo" nae" khyo re ha: pye' ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Moshe wa Israel byumyu" qe: zoqhid' yauggai zo: qere Se' ra" Mug: Lagyo" yang mase' pye' nae" qhid' mae" Lai co' Poe re kad' qhid: to: mung: kham: zang jham mae sa: pyi" sheim" te' to: genae" qhid' mae" amyin" byid' ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Israel byumyu" qe wa ai: Tham: Ne mae taung gaung we' dakhyo: qo" su" lai: lo" ko" ra" . Egutu byu qe airu: su" lai: lo" ko" au: yao: bam alhab' re ai: qid: yang myug: pye' ra" .
Lam khug: ruyang Israel byumyu" qe wa Yerikho vogaung: re nhad' ba lam: lam: bin su" gam: gethao re Yerikho vogaung: vang byo; gyang: lo" nhao: ako" .
Lam khug: ruyang shava myhi" Rahab wa Israel jin" byu tao re nyang" za: lham: tug: yu: ruyang Mao" So: mho dao: matae" gyo" ra" mo, we' daga" se' pye' ru maqhug' ngad: ra" .
Ngo xo' ta" qo shinae" i? Gidon- Barag- Samson- Yebtha- Davi- Samuela we' lapa qe: khyo re ta" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" nga" ayo, matho' laug ngad: ra" .
Lam khug: ru khyo" yang yao: bam wa mung"dan: jham re gyekhe' aung: pye' ako" . Din: man" ra" mau" zo" re yao: bam zaui: so: mung: Mao" So byid' to" ra" dao: so: re qo" kham: yu: ako" . Yao: bam wa khang khyi nhad' re pyid' pye' ako" .
Laung: thao" ra" myi: re se' pye' ako" . Shae: yang se' pye' nae" rumae" loe; beim: ako" . Yao: bam wa qam: nang: gengadqere: qam: bo: li" ako" . Yao: bam wa gyekhe' rumae gai lo: boe" mung: taung bug mung"dan: gyetab re aung: pye' ako" .
Lam khug: ra" khyo" yang myiqe: qere: shid: byaug vako" ra" yao: bam: ba nam qe kaoso' dam: daui: li" rure qo" kham: yu: ako" . Gatau damyo" wa loe; beim nae" khyo re makhae: yu lo: ha: pye' gemung: je: gai: ra" kaoso' daui khyo re qo" khae: yu nae" qhid' mae" yhin" rure kham zo: mung: shid: lo" ko" ra" .
Damyo" wa jung" gaui: pye' ru we' be; ru qhug' ako" . Amung: damyo" wa jao co" yang taui" ru qhug' mung: thaung: khug mae lhaung" to" ru qhug' ako" .
Yao: bam wa laug baui: yang pye' se' ru- sag' qhag' yang shid' dau qhag' phyid' ru- shae: yang se' pye' ru qhug' ako" . Yao: bam wa sho: jhin: ru qhug' ru we' yhin" ru- maphug' makhyad' kad' ru qhug' mung: yao qid- cad' be, qid ve, yang: na: qin" ako" .
Mug: myid wa yao: bam we' maman: qi" ngad: ra" . Yao: bam wa laug aug' jham mae we' myid khung: jham mae na mung: din"pyad' yo mae we' bug gaung khaung: mae phao: khug: na: qin" mo, we' dakhyo: na: lae" qin" ako" .
Cebam alhab' mo, wa yao: bam: lam khug: ru khyo" Mao" So: yang o ngaui myid vang" byid' rure qo" kham: yu: ako" . Ngadqere: yao: bam wa Mao" So byid' to" ra" dao: so: re maqo" khae: yu ko" ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa ngonhaung" qhid' mae" je: lhao" re: gai: ru myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo re myid: phyid' to: byid' ava" . Yao: myid: yaung: to" ra" khyo wa ngonhaung" we' daga" ngad lao" za: yao: bam wa jab byang" ru qo" yu: li" genae"- ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Ceru: myo" laug: ra" lam khug: ra" mo; sagse: jham wa ngonhaung" re lhang" kham" to" ra" . Airumung: ngonhaung" wa akaung: akag' ru ja: khao: ngo" re we' ngonhaung" mae tang za: kyin" de; jo; ra" qobo re qhid' pye' mung: ngonhaung" qhid' au: mae" bin: zang khyo joe" sho' myid: phyid' pye' yang: tao" ye: gelang:-
Ngonhaung" lam khug: ru apan aqao: we' athao" ngad: ra" Yesu re ngonhaung" zhaug' qu" to: gelang:- yao: wa pyao: zang: mathao mae qam: mashan ngad: ra" . Ai: atha" yao: re lao" na: ra" ngaui bau: ngaui yao: ru: mathao mae- pyao: zang dao mae shid kham: rure aqho' aqhid ngad: ra" khyo" yao: majho lo: shid: kham: mung: ana" yao: wa Mao" So: zaung tao" lo, yo shad' mae zaung: jo; ra" .
Qobo qo" ra" mo; yang gyai nghang" pye' rure yao: khoqhi" dayin dayo: kham zo" lo: rure myid: qu" mung:- naonhaung" qam: dashan- nhag' lam: dathao" ge,-
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa qobo we' gye jho" khe' rumae se' pye' ru joe" sho' mathaung" qhug' shiko" ngad: ra" .
Ai: tho' mago" Nga" zo: we"- Asang nao re mho" ra" dao: re nyang" za: tae" gyo: wa,- Yao: nao re qeim: ra" au: nhag' lam: dathao" wa,-
Pe"mung: ga"re Asang wa yao: jhid' de; ra" yaug re mho" mung: yao: zo: khyo" khae: yu: ra" yaug re qobo dae byid' ra" ga:- Mao" So wa naonhaung" re yao: zo: qere we' dakhyo: qam: byid: dao: ta" to" rure naonhaung" to" myhid' pye' ko" i?
Naonhaung" qug: khai: kham zo" ru wa yao: pho" qobo dae byid' ru ngad: ra" khyo" zang: kham ge,- naonhaung" qug: khai: kham zo" ru wa Mao" So wa naonhaung" re yao" yao: zo: qere khyo" kad' na: rure ceim" shid' byid' ra" . Yao: pho" yang qobo dae mabyid' ra" yauggai zo: khag' na: ra" i?
Yao: zo: qere we' dakhyo: qobo dae byid' ru naonhaung" maqhug' ko" re wa naonhaung" wa yao: zo: agyang" qe mangad:- nin gyid qe ngad: ako" .
Ngonhaung" xao su byu: yao: pho" qe wa ngonhaung" re qobo dae byid: mung: ngonhaung" wa yao: bam re phug' myao" ra" . Airumung: ngonhaung" wa je yang: byo we' sin" ra" ngonhaung" Pho" qao: mae na mung: kaoso' daui: na nae" ang: ra" mangad: i?
Ngonhaung" nho: xao su byu: yao: pho" qe wa- dayo, daban: za: yao: bam gai ang: ru we' dakhyo:- ngonhaung" re qobo dae byid' ako" . Ngadqere: Mao" So wa yao" Gyang" Lho" rure ngonhaung" qobo khae: yu geshao:- ga: ngonhaung" akyu" qhid' mae" ai: rure kad' ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa qobo dae byid: qhug' ra" au: re mangaui bau:- ai: au: re kaug' ja: khyo" myid: jho: yu ngadqere: airu: qobo dae byid: yang: mho" ru qhug' va" mo, wa- thao re din: man" ra" kaoso' ga" ra" ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ra" jhaung qhu" re qo" jham" yu: li" genae" .
Myaung: dug: ra" naonhaung" lo, jham re tau: ke' mung: qam: nang" ra" pad' laug jham re qam: bo nhao ge,-
Qeim: ra" khyid wa mapyan" jo, lo: gai: li" nae" qhid' mae" din" ra" khyodang mae xo' yang: su" ye" lo" ge,-
Yaug khao: ngo" we' yaug yo za: qo" na nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' ge,- Gyang" lho" ra" khyo" kaoso' qo" daui nae" qhid' mae" qam: ke' ge,- pe"mung: ga"re airu: kaoso' madaui lo: khag' re: Asang re maqhug' myao genae"-
Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju mae" maphaug' lo" nae" qhid' mae" lha" ge,- Kho" ra" agae wa yaug: qi" li" mung: yao" daug: yang qug: khai: myo: sho' re boe" nhao: ru we' dakhyo: khag' re: airu: maboe" nae" qhid' mae" lha" ge,-
Zoqhid' aya: re zo damyo: we' za: tha" aung: zo" pye' ra" Eso we' dakhyo: shad' nghung" ru we' Mao" So re magyaug maphug' ra" yaug khag' re: maboe" nae" qhid' mae" lha" ge,-
Ai: thao Eso wa yao: pho" yang shaman" byid' rure khae: yu nug: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" . Ngadqere: maqo" khae: yu ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: kad' lai: lo: ra" lo, mau" re lhai" pye' nae" khyo re ngug byid ngug nhe' we' khyo qho ngadqere: maqhug' loyang: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa Israel byumyu" qe we' dakhyo: lo; yang qo" the' tin" ra" myi: nga" na: ru we' no, sang: kyid mug: cad' cad' jo, mung: la qam" we' labo" mad thoe myang mung:-
Thoe hug' na: ra" Sina bam khyo joe" qu" mo, mangad: ko" ngad; ra" . Mo, byu qe wa ai: thoe re the' gyo: gelao" ai: thoe re madam: the' gyo: nae" qhid' mae" Moshe re mho' yao: ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa gug' nyhug' re lhao" re:- ai: bam re the' tin: lao" wa laug baui: yang pye' se' ca"- ga" ra" amyin" dao: re maqo" kham geyang: ngad: ako" .
Ai: myao jao: wa gyai qu" gyaug sho' ru ngad mung: Moshe lhao" re: Ngo wa gyaug: nin" pye' va"- ga: ta" ra" .
Ai: atha" naonhaung" wa Ziun bam we' kaoso' daui: na: ra" Mao" So: vogaung: mo" ngad: ra" mug: lagyo: qe tug tig ajham ataung na: ra" mug: gaung mae" Yerusalem khyo joe" na: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa mug: gaung dao mae" japhin: mae bo: ra" Mao" So: zoqhid' qe ngaui bau: ngaui yao ham: phaung: na ko" ra" jo, qo mae joe" na: ako" . Naonhaung" wa byu alhab' mo; nho: dao: kho' zug: ngad: ra" Mao" So jhao" re: qo mabo jab byang" vako" ra" byugai qenho: byo jham jhao" re: joe" na: ako" .
Amung: naonhaung" wa dao: thang" asag' re nyhang" jaung: to: byid' ra" Yesu jhao" re:- Abela nho: sa" yang byid' ra" tho' je: gai: ra" ja: jham re pakham: kham: byid' ra" pyi" sheim" ra" sa: khyo re: joe" na: ako" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa ai: mungdao: ta" ra" yaug re tae" gyo: nae" ha: pye' ra" mo, maboe" genae" qhid' mae" lha" ge,- Myidgaung dao mae Mao" So: mungdao: re ta" ra" yaug: dao: re tae" gyo: nae" ha: pye' ko" ra" mo, wa maloe, ko" ngad: ra" . Airumung: ngonhaung" wa mug: gaung mae" ta" ra" yaug re nhaung thao" phaug' pye' ngad: re wa je yang: maqo" loe, nae" mangad: i?
Ai: ayo, re Mao" So: thoe wa myidgaung re laui" nin" nhao: ra" . Ngadqere: ana" Mao" So wa Ngo wa ana" dalhang myidgaung reza: mangad:- mug: gaung rere: laui" nin" li" nhao shinae"- ga: dao: so: to" ra" .
Amung: dalhang dam:- ga" ra" dao: kheim: wa maqo" laui" nin" ra" ja: jham wa dang: jo, nae" qhid' mae" ai: phan" to" ra" ja: jham wa laui" nin" ru qhug' mung:- yu: pye' ru qhug' li" nae"- ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung: maqo" laui" nin" ra" mung"dan: re ngonhaung" qo" kham: yu: bam va" ruyang Mao" So: jeju re caung: khin" gelang:- ngonhaung" wa jeju beim: so: mung: gyaug phug' ru we' Mao" So re o ngaui nhao: ra" lo, mau" khyo" caung: pa" byid: gelang:-
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" nho: Mao" So wa nga" jeim" lo" nhao: ra" myi: yao: ngad: ra" .
Khristan mao: nhaung: qe ngad: ru we' dakhyo: khonhae" re: naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; na ge,-
Naonhaung" yham mae bang" vo qere bang" da" byid: nae" dato" myhid' ge,- Airu: bang" da" byid' ra" mo, damyo" wa mabeim: maso: lo: mug: lagyo: qere bang" qhug' da" byid' ako" .
Naonhaung" wa thaung: laung" jo; ra" mo, we' daga" thaung: bolaung" jo; ra" khyo" myid: yu mung: thaung: khug mae laung" jo; ra" mo, re myid: beim: ge,- naonhaung" yao: re: bokham zo" ra" khyo" myid: yu mung: qug: khai: kham zo" na: ra" mo, re myid: beim: ge,-
Byu yaug khao: ngo" lo, xo' rure phug' te' qo: ra" . Yham sang pho" we' yham sang myhi" wa dayaug we' dayaug yao: cao: dao: so: dang ca" ra" . Mao" So wa shad' nghung" ra" mo, we' myi: lao shad' ra" mo, re dao: kho' li" nae" .
Ngaui qhang re dajhid' de, ge,- naonhaung" qo" ra" gu: re nhag' dag: na ge,- pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa Ngo wa naonhaung" re khonhae" re: mato: co' nae"- ngo wa naonhaung" re khonhae" re: mashapye' nae" ga: ta" to" ra" .
Aimung: Asang wa ngore bao" thaug' yaug ngad: ra" . Ngo wa gyaug nae" mangad:- Ngo re khag' pe" qo" kad' nae" i? ein: ngonhaung" wa mazag mavae ta" gelang:-
Naonhaung" re Mao" So: mungdao: ta" kyo" lo ko" ra" qhid' phyao: mae" naonhaung" au: jhaung qere myid: beim: ge,- yao: bam khoru: kaoso' daui: lo ko" rure we' khoru: shid: lo" byaug ko" ra" khyo re dam: tug' myid: qu" mung:- yao: bam: lam khug: ra" khyo re lag qu" yu ge,-
Yesu Khristu wa ayenhe' ana" ba apyad ato dakhyo: za: ngad: jo; ra" .
Mho" shid' ra" khyo abang" aja: ja" yang ai: jo: ra" khyo mae" naonhaung" re dajhui" nghung" lo" nhao ge,- Zo: ve jham we' sin" ra" kham" to" ra" Tarha" jham re phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang mangad: lo: Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju mae" aung khug nhag' lam: qam: o: qo" kham: yu nae" ru wa gai: ra" . Ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" ra" mo, wa akyu" maqo" kham: yu ko" ngad: ra" .
Yuda qe: caung: pa" ra" jo, qo mae caung da" byid: ko" ra" khinjaung qe wa ngonhaung" nho: phan dao mae" pe" xeim: rere: zo: nae" akhang" maqo" ngad: ra" .
Yuda khinjaung yin" wa gug' nyhug' jham: sa: re qobo khyad' ra" xeim: khyo" Gyang" Lho" thao" ra" jo, qo khyo civao ye" ra" . Ngadqere: ai: xeim: mao gaung jham re wa jamu taung gaung shad' mae ngha" pye' ako" .
Ce: khyo mathao mae Yesu re: yao: yao" sa" yang xao su byu qe: qobo kyang" san: pye' byid: nae" qhid' mae" vogaung: taung gaung shad' mae shid kham: ra" .
Airumung: jamu taung gaung shad' yao: jhao" thug' ye: mung: yao: kham zo" ra" qho' phyo' rure yebokham zo: gelang:-
Pe"mung: ga"re ce: myidgaung dao mae ngonhaung" qhid' mae" mabaui mabyo; ra" vogaung: majo, ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa ai: joe" lo nae" ra" vogaung: re qho: na: bam:-
Airumung: naonhaung" wa Yesu re ngonhaung" nho: Asang khyo" lhang: yu: ra" nhad' yang jeju caung: khin" ra" xeim: re Yesu khyo" yang Mao" So re khonhae" re: xeim: ngaui" byid' na gelang:-
Gai: ra" mau" zo" zaui: so: nae" we' naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" bao" thaug' byid' ra" khyo re dato" myhid' ge,- pe"mung: ga"re ai: ngaui" xeim: jham wa Mao" So o ngaui: ra" ngaui" xeim: jham ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" nho: au: jhaung qe: dao: re tae" gyo: mung: yao: bam ta" ru we' dakhyo: kad' cao" ge,- yao: bam wa yao: bam yao: zaui: so" ra" mau" zo" qhid' mae" japhin: qhu" byid: nae" mo, ngad ko" ruyang naonhaung" yaug nhag' lam: re abang mabyid mathang qu" gun caung: na: ako" . Yao: bam: mho dao: re naonhaung" tae" gyo: ko" ngad: re wa yao: bam wa mau" zo" re ngaui bau: za: zaui: so" li" genae" . Airu: mangad: re wa yao: bam wa mau" zo" re kaug' ru we' zaui" li" genae"- ailao"wa naonhaung" qhid' mae" pe" akyu" bo nae" mangad: ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" qhid' mae" khonhae" re: akyu" bao" mho' byid' na gela,- ngonhaung" nho: aung khug nhag' lam: wa gyang: gyang: za: ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yo, khyin: khao: ngo" ngonhaung" wa jo: ra" khyo" kad' nae" o nug yang: ngad: ra" .
Mataung" myao" re Mao" So wa ngore naonhaung" jhao" dam: tug' nhao: ke' nae" qhid' mae" akyu" bao" mho' byid: gela,- ein: ngo wa naonhaung" re qam: ke' yang: mho' ke' ra" .
Ngaui" xeim: khyo" yao: shid kham yang: apyad ato: nho: dao: thang" re dazid thaung" te' ra" khyo" yang yao kyaung" jham: nho: Yao Zam: Aqi: ngad: ra" ngonhaung" Asang Yesu re Mao" So wa shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ava" .
Ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ra" Mao" So wa yao" myid o: ra" khyo re qo" zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" qo ca" ra" gai shab: ra" ja: alhab' naonhaung" re byid: vashao:- amung: Yesu Khristu khyo" yang yao" myid o ngaui: ra" khyo" ngonhaung" mae zaui: so: vashao:- Khristu wa apyad ato phungbao qab qi" qhang: jo, vashao: wo"- Amen .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ce: qam: byid: mungdao: re zang: kham yang: tae" gyo" yu genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re ngo mho' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngo naonhaung" re tung" ke' ra" ce: vhin tung" wa gyai maqhang ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" Timothi wa thaung: mae" loe; thug' lo" byaug va" rure naonhaung" re ngo ba nhao nug: ra" . Yao: phyad za: ngojhao" joe" lo: ngad: re wa ngo naonhaung" re li" qhug' ra" au: re ngo we' daga" yao: re jhui" li" nae" .
Naonhaung" au: jhaung alhab' mo, re we' Mao" So: byu qe alhab' re ngonhaung" au" ke' ra" khyo ta" kyo: byid: gela,- Itali mung" mae" mao: nhaung: qere: naonhaung" re au" ke' ako" .
Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa naonhaung" alhab' mo, we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" .
Pho" Mao" So we' Asang Yesu Khristu nho: daui daui yaug ngad: ra" ngo Yaku wa mug: myid geim" mae byo: sin" na ko" ra" Mao" So: byu alhab' mo, re au" ke' ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- jham" qu" ru aja: ja: re thaung" qhug' gelao" naonhaung" zhau: vha: gai mo, ngad: ra" khyo" myid: jho: yu ge,-
pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" lam khug: myid wa airu: jham" qu" ru jham re thaung" qhug' aung: pye' lao"- zang: kham: ra" qam: o: bo: li" rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa daja: re: makyo: lo: bin sho' jab byang" li" nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" zang: kham: ru wa naonhaung" re mashad' manghung: lo: khyo jao: sho' jhui" ye" li" nae" rure ba ge, .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" phaung mae" dayaug yaug nyan: pha,jhi" kyo: yang: ngad: re yao: wa Mao" So re akyu" mho' vashao:- Mao" So wa yao: re nyan: pha,jhi" byid' li" nae" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa byu alhab' mo, re mabyag maqhag' lo: nhag' myan: taung" byid' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" akyu" mho' gelao"- aug' o: myid dajhid' re: mabo lo: lam" ra" myid bo ca" ra" . Aug' o: myid bo: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa la: yang deim"qhui" lhau: ra" bang: lhung" we' dau: ra" .
Airu" ra" nhag' lam: shid' gao bo yaug- yao: yao" nhag' lam: re maqo" myid: phyid' mung: yao" mau" zo" alhab' re mamyid: phyid' ra" yaug wa Asang: lo, mae" daja: ja: qo" khae: yu: li" nae" ein: yao: magai: myid ngad: ra" .
Myaung sho" ra" Khristan wa yao: re Mao" So: yang tau: to' ke' lao" ngaui bau: ca" ra" .
Amung: jo,nho" qo" ra" Khristan wa yao: re Mao" So: yang khyo" ke' lao" ngaui bau: qo: ra" . Pe"mung: ga' re jo,nho" qo" yaug wa seyo: bin: bu" we' dakhyo: sham: lo" byaug: li" nae" .
Ba wa zho: laung: thug' li" mung:- ai: bin: gae re lhe' mhai: pye' ra" . Alao" ai: bin: gae mae" bin: bu" jham sham: byid: gyo" lo" mung: yao" yaung" shab: ru alhab' byo; qeim: lo" byaug: ra" . Ai we' dakhyo: jo,nho" qo" ra" yaug re: yao" phaga: mau" zo" re zaui" na: au: phyo' qheim" pye' ru qhug' li" nae" .
Jham" qu" qhug' rure malaui: lo: tang za: qhao" ye; jo; ra" yaug wa ngaui lho" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa airu" ra" jham" qu" qhug' rure zang" aung: pye' lao" Mao" So wa yao: re jhid' de; ra" mo, re byid' nae"- ga: dao: so: byid' to" ra" kaoso' jhaung qhu" re yao: qo" khae: yu: li" nae" .
Byu dayaug yaug wa airu" ra" jham" qu" qhug' ruyang ju" phyo' ru qhug' yang: ngad: re yao: wa- ceru wa Mao" So: yang ju" phyo' ru ngad:- ein: magai: ta" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re makhyang: mashab: ruyang Mao" So re maqo" gai: ju" phyo' ngad: ra" . Amung: yao: wa khag' rere: maju" phyo' ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: yao" makhyang" ra" kao bau myid o: ra" shad' khyo cao" bo: lo" mung: ai: yang myhi" pye' ru qhug' lao"- yao: wa ju" phyo' qhug' ru ngad: ra" .
Ai: yao" makhyang" ra" kao bau myid: o: ru wa zo: de; li" mung: qobo re khau: ke' ra" . Ai: qobo wa qi" qhang: li" lao" shid: rure khau: ke' ra" .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" mao: nhaung: qe we"- damyid: nghung: ge,-
gai: ra" jeju jhaung qhu" we' jab byang" ra" jhaung qhu" ja: khao: ngo" wa mug: gaung mae" ngad: ra" . Aiwa mug: gaung: mug: bo" re phan" to: yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: wa malai: matha"- mangad: lao"-lhang: na: ruyang mug: cad' maboe" nhao ngad: ra" .
Mao" So yao" yang phan" phaug' to" ra" ja: cao jab alhab' mae zoqhid' boe" genae" qhid' mae" yao: yao" myid o: ru we' dakhyo: dangman" ra" mungdao: khyo" yang ngonhaung" re myhung: ke' ra" .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" mao: nhaung: qe we"- ceru re xam" ci ge,- yaug khao: ngo" wa tae" gyo: nae" qhid' mae" phyad ca" ra" . Ngadqere: dao: jhau nae" we' nhag' yo: nae" rumae wa magai: phyad ngad: ra" .
Byu: nho: nhag' yo" ru wa Mao" So: din: man" ra" myid: yaung: ra"khyo re maqo" zai" boe" ngad: ra" .
Airumung: masan masin" ra" ave, ja: khao: ngo" re we' makhyang" ra" lo,mau" alhab' re shapye' pye' ge,- Mao" So: yang eib: rure kham: yu mung: Mao" So: yang naonhaung" aung khug: nhag' lam: mae qho" to: byid' ra" mungdao: re khae: yu ge,- ai wa naonhaung" re qo" khyad' yu: ra" .
Yao" mungdao: re gyo: za: tae" gyo" ra" khyo" naonhaung" yao" gaung re damhug' pyag' pye' ge,- ai: atha" ai: mungdao: re lo, joe" phug' cao" ge,-
Aimung dao: re gyo: za: tae" gyo" yu mung: lo, joe" maphug' cao" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: yao" myo,khung: re bao tang" mae qu" mung:- yao: yao" gaung re myao: ra" yaug we' dau ra" .
Yao: wa yao: yao" gaung re nyang" za: qu" yu yang: thug' ye" lo" mung: ai lao" jao" yao: yao" bao lho re to" myhid' pye' ra" .
Ngadqere: byu re loe; beim nhao: ra" jab byang" ra" tarha" re tin: te' qu" zhao: yu yang: aire xo' yang: qu" te' to: mung: ai: mungdao: reyao: tae" gyo" yu yang: ai: thao re mato" myhid' pye' lo: lo, joe" phug' cao" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa Mao" So: khug mae yao: zaui: so" ra" lo,mau" mathao mae shaman" byid' ru qhug' li" nae" .
Byu dayaug yaug yao: wa caung: pa" thung" kao bau lam khug yaug ngad: khyo" myid: jho: ra" i? Yao" sho re makhang" ngad: re wa yao" caung: pa" thung" wa akeim ngad mung: yao: yao" gaung re mhug' pyag' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Pho" Mao" So: yang sun" yu: ra" san sin" ru we' caung: pa" thung" aman" wa ceru ngad: ra" . Aiwa qug: khai: qhug' na: ra" cug' zo: qere we' cug' mo" qere gun caung byid: mung:- yao: yao" gaung re myidgaung dao mae" masan masin" ruyang abe, alhau: maboe" nhao lo: lha" ra" khyo ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Phungbao: Asang ngad: ra" ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu re lam khug: ra" mo, ngad: ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" wa yao: bam: adao: pyae myo, nho re qu" yang: byu qere magai: zam" khug ngad: ra" .
Jo,nho" qo" ra" yaug wa naonhaung" ham phaung khyo qhang lo, pin: pin" ci- mai gai bau: gai ve, yang: li" mung: myaung sho" ra" yaug re: mai jad: bau: jad: ve, yang: joe" li" ein gelang:-
Naonhaung" wa ai: mai gai bau: gai ve, yaug re phug' myao: taung" lham: tug: yu yang:- ce: gai: thao" ra" zaung tao" mae zaung wa,- ga: yao: re ta" mung:- myaung sho" ra" yaug re wa- thoe: tau mae ye; jo, wa,- mangad: lao"- ce: ngonhaung" khyid thao mae zaung wa, ein: ta" ngad: re wa-
naonhaung" wa- naonhaung" yao" phaung gaung: mae jho" kho' ra" qobo qo" mung: makhyang" ra" myid ave, mae aqao: apan to: yang: dao: phyid' ru ngad: ako" .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" mao: nhaung: qe we"- tae" gyo: ge,- lam khug: rumae qo" mo, boe" nhao nae" qhid' mae" we' yao: re jhid' de; ra" mo, re byid: nae" dao: so: byid' to" ra" ai: mung"dan: re qo" sang: yu genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa ce: mug: myid dao mae" myaung sho" ra" mo, re khyin: yu: ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa myaung sho" ra" mo, re maphug' makhyad' kad' genhaung i? Naonhaung" re deim" zag zo" ra" yaug we' tarha" zug: qe: qhid' kheim: khyo naonhaung" re she: khyad' ye: yaug wa khag' ngad: ra" i? Aiwa jo,nho" qo" yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa naonhaung" re mhang" byid' to" ra" ai: mang yaung" mang gai re jung" gaui dao: ta" mo, ngad: ako" .
Nao yao" gaung re jhid' de; ru we' dakhyo:- ni" yham kyo: cao: re jhid' de; wa- ga: jham: mugsug' mae bo: ra" . Ai: mung"dan: ra" tarha" re naonhaung" phug' cao" ko" ru ngad: re wa naonhaung" wa jo ang: ra" khyo" kad' mo, ngad: li" genae" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa byu qere yao: bam: adao: pyae myo,nho re qu" yang: zam" khug ko" re wa naonhaung" wa qobo shad' lhoe" ra" mo, ngad mung: ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" wa Tarha" shad' lhoe" mo, ngad: ra" khyo" naonhaung" re dao: phyid' li" nae" .
Kham" to" ra" amyin" dao: daja: re shad' lhoe" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: alhab' re shad' lhoe" ra" qobo qo" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re su: myi: lao dashad'- ga: ta" ra" yaug yao: byu dase'- ga: re: ta" to" ra" . Nao wa su: myi: lao re mashad' sho' ngadqere: byu se' ra" qobo shad' lhoe" yang: ngad: re wa nao wa ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re shad' lhoe" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" re lhoe' ke' byid' ra" ai: Tarha" yang dao: kho' nae" mo, ngad: ru we' dakhyo: dao: jhau mung: lo, mau" kad' ge,-
pe"mung: ga" re Mao" So wa nhag' khyag' shogu: myid mabo: ra" yaug re yao: dao: kho' ra" au:- nhag' khyag' shogu: myid qhu" byid' nae" mangad: ngad; ra" . Ngadqere: nhag' khyag' shogu: ru wa dao: kho' rure aung: pye' ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- byu dayaug yaug yao: wa lam khug: myid bo:- ga: ta" ngadqere: aire yao" lo, mau" khyo" sagse: maqhu" byid: ngad: re wa pe" akyu" bo nae" i? Ai: lam khug: myid wa yao: re qo" khyad' yu nae" i?
Ve,mai ve,bau: we' zo: ve moe; kyo" na: ra" mao: nhaung: mangad: lao"- nhae: mo" jham na: ein gelang:-
Naonhaung" wa yao: bam re Mao" So naonhaung" re shaman" byid: vashao:- lam lam za: na ge,- gyi: gyi: zo: ge, ga: ta" mung: kaoso' daui: rumae qo ca" ra" ja: yao: bam re mabyid: ko" ngad: re wa pe" akyu" bo nae" i?
Lam khug: rumae re: airu: ngad: ra" . Lo, mau" mabo: ra" lam khug: myid wa ashid ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: dayaug yaug wa- byu dayaug mae wa lam khug: myid bo mung gatau dayaug wa lo, mau" bo: ra" ga: ta" li" genae" . Alao" ngo wa- lo, mau" mabo lo: lam khug: myid gai: qo" bo: rure ngore qhu" byid: la,- ngo wa nga" lo, mau" khyo" nga" lam khug: myid nao re qhu" byid: nae" ein: phaug' tau: nae" .
Mao" So date: za: ngad: rure nao lam" i? Gai va"- Min: yui jham re: airu: lam" mung: gyaug: nin" na: ako" .
Byugo we"- Lo, mau" mabo: ra" lam khug: myid wa akeim ngad: rure nao ba nug: i?
Ngonhaung" phug' pho" Abraham wa Mao" So: yang din: man" ra" ga: khoru: sun" yu byid: qhug' ra" i? Yao" yauggai zo: Isag re phan dao mae xeim: qhaug' byid: lao"- yao" lo, mau" khyo" yang airu: sun" yu byid: qhug' ru ngad: ra" .
Yao" lam khug: myid we' yao" lo,mau" wa daga" za: mau" kad' ra" . Yao" lam khug: myid wa yao" lo,mau" khyo" yang jab byang" lo: rure nao mamyao i?
Amung: Abraham wa Mao" So re lam khug: ra" . Yao" lam khug: myid mathao: yang Mao" So wa yao: re din: man" ra" yaug khyo" khae: yu byid' ra" ga: ta" to" ra" Jham: Dao: wa jab byang" lo: ra" . Airumung: Abraham wa Mao" So: ba nam pho"- ga: mhang" byid' ru qhug' ra" .
Airu: ngad mung: byu re Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae din: man: nhao: ru wa yao" lam khug: myid khyo" yang za: mangad:- yao" lo, mau" khyo" yang ngad: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Shava myhi" Rahab khyo re: ai we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" . Israel byumyu" jin" byu qere lham: tug: yu mung: khyo gakhe' khyo" phao: loe; lo" genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re bao" thaug' byid: mung: yao" lo,mau" khyo" yang Mao" So: yang din: man" ra" ga: sun" yu byid' ru qhug' ra" .
Airumung: gaung khyao mae byo mabo re wa ashid ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- lam khug: myid mae re: lo,mau" mabo: ra" lam khug myid wa ashid ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" mae" myo: sho' mo, mho" pho" daboe" ge,- naonhaung" ba: ru we' dakhyo: ngonhaung" mho" pho" qe wa su gaje qe tho' je: thin: ra" khyo" dao: kho' ru qhug' nae" ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" alhab' mo, wa dazab: makyo shad' ba: ra" mo, ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: dao: jhau: rumae khonhae" re: mashad' ra" yaug wa jab byang" ra" yaug ngad mung: yao" gaung geim" re qo" khang" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" mho dao: re gyo: nhao nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" wa myao: nhad' mae nhad' kho' ke' byid: mung: ngonhaung" ye: nhao nug: ra" jo, qo khyo qo" ye: nhao: ra" .
Mangad: lao" qid sang pho re myid: qu" ge,- ai qhi" qi" ra" qid sang pho wa qam: thin: ra" la qam" yang hug' tao" lhau: au: gyai ngai: ra" lha gau: je, khao" yang qo" khang" mung: lha khang" yaug myid o: ra" shad' khyo qo" gau" lo" ra" .
Sho re: airu: ngad: ra"- ai wa ngai ngadqere: qi" qhang: ra" khyo jham re qo" ta" phug: ra" . Danyhan: za" ra" myi: daje; yang khoqhi" mo" ra" sag mo" yo re khoru: qo" nga" pye' rure myid: beim: ge,-
amung: sho wa myi: we' dau: ra" . Ai: sho wa shad' nghung" ra" mug: myid ngad mung: airu wa ngonhaung" nho: gaung dau dalam: khyo" de; jo, yang: ngonhaung" gaung geim" khyo" yang makhyang" ru byo: sin" lo" nhao: ra" . Myi qid tham: mae" te' yu: ra" myi" yang ai: sho wa ngonhaung" nho: pyad geim" re ngha" pye' byid' ra" .
Byu wa gatau: gug' nyhug' ngad ko" ra" gug' nyhug' kyao jham- ngo: jham- yoe" lhau: ra" ja: jham we' ngho' jham alhab' re qo" mhai" yu mung: alhab' re mhai" to" avako" .
Ngadqere: sho re wa khag' re: maqo" mhai" yu ngad: ako" . Ai: sho wa makhyang" ru we' matho' qo" khang" mung: shid nhao: ra" daug byang" sho' bo: jo; ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa ai: sho: yang ngonhaung" Asang Pho" Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" mung: Mao" So: khyao we' dakhyo: za: phan" to" ra" ngonhaung" byu yao: cao: rere: ai: sho: yang yao: nhang" ra" .
Nhad' danhad' mae" za: jeju caung: khin" dao: jham we' nhang: dao: jham thug' li" ra" . Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we" Ceru: magai: boe" nhao ngad: ra" .
Qid thug' dadung: mae" za: qid cug we' qid kho: mayug: thug' li" ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we" pho' ham" gae wa zhanlun shi: magai: zaui: ngad: ra" . sabyi bye, re: pho' ham" shi: magai: zaui: ngad: ra" . Ai we' dakhyo: xongae qid wa qid cug magai: boe" ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" phaung gaung: mae pha,jhi" we' laba lajhao ba yaug khag' na ko" i? Yao: wa yao" pha,jhi" ba: ra" khyo re gai: ra" kaoso' daui khyo khyo" yang re:- nhag' lam: nyham: khyo" ru we' nyan: pha,jhi" ba: ra" ave, lo, mau" khyo" yang kad' thug' ke' ra" yao" gai: ra" mau" yang re: sagse: qhu" byid: vashao:-
Ngadqere: naonhaung" aung khug mae myid nug' ru- nhag' lam: no: jo; ru- yao: yao" qhid' mae" za: myid: ru bo: jo, yang: ngad: re wa pha,jhi" ba phug: ra" khyo" yang dangman" rure qobo dashad' ge, .
Airu" ra" pha,jhi" wa mug: gaung mae" gyo" li" ru mangad:- Mug: myid dao: pha,jhi"- Byo we' sin" ra" pha,jhi" mangad: lo:- Satan" nho: pha,jhi" ngad: ra" .
Myid nug' ra" myid we' yao" qhid' mae" za: myid: ra" jo, qo mae mavang" manyang: ru we' makhyang" ru ja: khao: ngo" re: bo: jo; ra" .
Ngadqere: mug: tho' mae" pha,jhi" wa azhao sao qhid' mae wa gyang" san: ru ngad: ra" . Aiwa ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru- nau" nhae" ru we' jho" vang" jho" nge; ru jham rere: boe" nhao: ra" . Airu wa jhid' de; nhag' khyag' myid byang" jo, mung: gai: ra" lo, mau" ga" ra" ashi: jham re zaui" thug' li" nhao: ra" . Ai: pha,jhi" wa myo,nho khyin: ru we' geim kad' rure yu: pye' byid' ra" .
Mang: dae tae" ra" mo, ngaui pyo: yaug yo za: qho" ke' ra" ashi: jham mae" zaui" li" nhao: ra" ashi: jham wa gai: shab: ra" lo, mau" jham ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" phaung mae myan" myo: jho" byo; ru we' jho" khe' jho" zin" ru khai: mae" boe" thug' li" ra" i? Aijham wa naonhaung" khug mae" abang mabyid lhau: na: ra" naonhaung" gaung sho: pyo: khyo qhid' mae" kao bau myid o: ra" myid mae" boe" thug' li" ru ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa zai jham o gengadqere: ai: zai jham re maqo" yu ko" ngad: ra" . Amung: byu se' nae" jin" jin" ngad: ako"- naonhaung" wa zai jham re gyai myid: o kao bau gengadqere: aijham re naonhaung" maqo" yu ko" ngad: ra" . Airu: mung: naonhaung" myan" myo: jho" byo; ako" . Naonhaung" o: ra" ja: re naonhaung" maqo" yu ko" ru wa ai: qhid' mae" Mao" So re naonhaung" mamho' geyang: ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" mho' yao gengadqere: naonhaung" aire maqo" khae: yu ko" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" myid: yaung: ra" khyo magai yang: ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" wa naonhaung" yao" gaung sho: pyo: khyo mae ci nae" qhid' mae" ai: zai jham re mho' ako" .
Nhag' lam: mazaung" ra" mo, we"- Mug: myid we' ba nam kad' ra" yaug wa Mao" So: gyevo ngad rure naonhaung" maba ko" i? Mug: myid we' ba nam kad' nug: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: yao" gaung re Mao" So: gyevo boe" nhao: ra" .
Ngonhaung" khug mae Mao" So ke' to: byid' ra" Byo wa gyai xo sho' kao bau myid o: ru we' byang" jo; ra" ga" ra" jham: dao: wa akeim ngad: ein: dajho ge, .
Ngadqere: Mao" So byid' ra" nhag' myan" ra" jeju wa je yang: qam: bo: ra" . Jham: mugsug' mae- Mao" So wa ngad beim: mo, re ngag: tam" pye' mung: nyham: khyo" ra" mo, re kam" wa nhag' myan" ra" jeju byid' ra"- ga: ta" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So eib: ra" qao: mae na: ge,- aimung: Satan re thaug' ngho' ge,- yao: wa naonhaung" mae" phao: lo" li" nae" .
Mao" So jhao" te' ye: ge,- ailao" Mao" So wa naonhaung" jhao" te' lo: li" nae" . Qobo kad' ra" mo, we"- naonhaung" lo, re cid' pye' ge,- geim kad' mo, we"- naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam re san sin" nhao: ge,-
nhag' kaug' nhag' yao mung ge,- gyi: ngug ge,- naonhaung" qi thoe re ngug thoe- naonhaung" bau" rure nhag' kaug' nhag' ngai: ru shad' khyo phaug' pye' ge,-
Asang: qhid' kheim: mae naonhaung" yao" gaung re nyham: khyo" pye' ge,- ailao" yao: wa naonhaung" re tau: to' ke' li" nae" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" yao: cao: gaui dajho" mho ge, Khristan mao: nhaung: pho" re gaui mho: ra" yaug- mangad: lao" dao: kho' ra" yaug- khag' ngadqere: ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re gaui mho mung: dao: kho' yaug ngad: ra" . Ai: kham" to" Tarha" re nao dao: kho' yang: ngad: re wa- nao wa ai: kham" to" ra" Tarha" re phug' cao" yaug mangad: lo:- aire dao: kho' yaug ngad: ra" .
Mao" So dayaug za: Tarha" byid: yaug ngad mung: dao: kho' yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: dayaug za: qo" khyad' yu yaug we' qo" se' tam" pye' yaug ngad: ra" . Ni" mao: nhaung: pho" re dao: kho' yaug nao wa khag' ngad: ein: myid: i?
Ana" ba- mangad: lao" ne, mo" ba vogaung: dalam: lam: khyo ye: mung: ai: mae dazin yena mung: phaga: yekad' yang: ngaui qhang myo: sho' yeqho gelang: ga: ta" ra" mo, we"- ngo ta" rure tae" gyo: ge,-
Naonhaung" wa ne, mo" ba naonhaung" kaoso' pe" boe" nae" ru lhao" re: maba ko" ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" wa dazab za: thug' li" mung: dam: byaug: lo" ra" ngaui" we' dau: ako" .
Asang myid o: ngad: re ngonhaung" wa kaoso' daui: na mung: ceru: mangad: lao" thoeru: kad' nae" ngad: ra" ga: kam" wa naonhaung" ta" ang: ako" .
Ngadqere: ana" naonhaung" wa ngad beim: gemung: phug: ako" . Airu" ra" phug: ta" ru alhab' wa shad' ru ngad: ra" .
Airumung: gai: ra" mau" zo" kad' ang: rure yao: yao: ba gau makad' ra" yaug wa qobo qo" ra" .
Ana" jo,nho" qo" mo, we"- ngo ta" ra" dao: re tae" gyo" yu ge,- naonhaung" dao mae joe" li" na: ra" khyag' qhui qug: khai: ru qhid' mae" ngug byid ngug nhe' we' kaug' ngug: na ge,-
Naonhaung" jo,nho" jham wa baui" lo" byaug: li" nae" . Naonhaung" nho: mai bau: jham wa nhug: yang zo" pye' li" nae" .
Naonhaung" nho: ngaui qhang jham mae zu zo" li" nae"- ai: zu wa naonhaung" shad' mae sagse: doe, yang: myi: we' dakhyo: naonhaung" gaung sho: re nga" jeim" lo" nhao: li" nae" . Ce: lo" thao" ra" ba na mae naonhaung" wa jo,nho" jham qaung" to" avako" .
Naonhaung" wa naonhaung" yo mae mau" zaui: byid' ra" okaung qere okaung phug' mabyid: ko" ngad: ra" . Yao: bam: nyhung thoe re tae" gyo: ge,- naonhaung" gaug zo maui: lam: jham re jham: byid: ko" ra" mo; gyi: ngug: ra" thoe wa qam: bo: thao" ra" Asang Pho" Mao" So: no: khye' mae joe" vao lo" ava" .
Naonhaung" wa ce: myidgaung mae langa: khyo" pyo: pyo: na: lo: ako" . Naonhaung" se' pye' ru qhug' genae" ra" ba na qhid' mae yao: yao" gaung re zo" xau: ci: avako" .
Naonhaung" wa pe" qobo maqo" ra" mo, re dao: phyid' mung: se' pye' ako" . Yao: bam wa naonhaung" re madam: tug' lhe: ko" ngad: ra" .
Airumung: nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Asang joe" li" yo, joe" sho' zang: qhao" na ge,- yo kad' yaug wa yao: yao" yo mae" phug' de; ra" gaug zo maui: lam: ashi: zaui" thug' li" nae" rure yao: khoqhi" zang: qhao" yang: lao" na: rure qu" ge,- yao: wa zin mug: we' xaung: mug: re zang: qhao" yang: lao" ra" .
Naonhaung" re: zang: qhao" ca" ra" . Asang joe" li" nae" ra" ba na jhao" li" va" ruyang naonhaung" yao" myid: lao" ra" khyo re zaui" zag: ci ge, .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" yao: cao: dajho" nyhung ge,- ailao" za: Mao" So wa naonhaung" re dao: makho' nae"- dao: kho' yaug jhao" li" na mung:- na: qhu"- de" thug' li" nae" jin" jin" ngad: ava" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we" Asang: mang we' kho" kyo" lo ko" ra" lapa qere myid: beim: ge,- Qug: khai: qug: khai: qhug' au: nhag' lam: qhang qhang za: zang: qhao" lai: lo ko" rure ve, so: khyo" qu" yu ge,-
yao: bam zang" kham: lo ko" ruyang ngonhaung" wa yao: bam re ngaui lho" ra" mo, ein: mhang" byid' ra" . Yoba nho: zang: qhao" myid re naonhaung" gyo" qu" vako" ra" . Lo" thao" mae Asang wa yao: re khoru: bao" thaug' byid' ra" khyo rere: naonhaung" ba: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re Asang wa nhag' khyag' shogu: myid byang" sho' bo: ra" Asang ngad: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- je yang: naonhaung" dao: so: to" ra" au: jham datang: ge,- Mug: gaung re lao: yang: re: mangad: lao" myidgaung re- mang lao: yang: re: jham datang: ge,- pe" ja: rere: mang lao: yang: jham datang: ge,- naonhaung" dao: wa ngad lao" wa ngad va"- ein: mangad: lao" wa mangad: ein: za: ta" ge,- ai lao" naonhaung" wa Mao" So: yang dao: kho' ru maqhug' genae" .
Naonhaung" phaung mae qug: khai: qhug' ra" byu dayaug yaug na: i? Yao: wa akyu" mho' ang: ra" . Ngaui bau: yaug dayaug yaug na: i? Yao: wa jeju caung: nghaui" ang: ra" .
No phyo: qhug' ra" byu dayaug yaug bo: i? Yao: wa phung: lau: de, qere yekhai: yu nhao ang: ra" . Yao: bam wa Asang: mang re lao: yang: yao: re zhanlun xau gyad byid: mung: yao" qhid' mae" akyu" mho' byid' li" genae" .
Ce: lam khug: myid we' akyu" mho' ru wa no yaug re gai: shao: lo" nhao: li" nae" . Asang wa yao: re dam: qao" zin" li" nhao mung: yao: shad' nghung" lai: lo: ra" qobo jham rere: khyad' pye' byid' li" nae" .
Airumung: naonhaung" qobo jham re naonhaung" yao: cao: jho" lhang: yu mung: yao: cao: akyu" jho" mho' byid: ge,- airu: lao"- naonhaung" gai: shao: lo" li" genae" . Din: man" ra" yaug: akyu" mho' thoe wa qo" boe" nhao: ra" qam: so' gyai bo: ra" .
Elia wa ngonhaung" we' dakhyo: xao su byu dayaug za: ngad: ra" . Yao: wa mug: maqu nae" qhid' mae" kyid kyid za: akyu" mho' re myid gaung dao mae sam zin: lho" khyaug' khye' mug: maqu ngad: ra" .
Akyu" dam: mho' lao" mug: gaung wa mug: qu: khyo" ke' byid' mung: myidgaung wa gaug zo: maui: lam: qo" li" nhao: ra" .
Nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" mae" dayaug yaug wa dangman" ra" khyo mae" nghung" lo" byaug mung: gatau dayaug: yang dam: jhui" tug' lo: re-
Qobo qo" yaug re yao: shad' nghung" rumae" dam: jhui" tug' lo yaug wa qobo qo" yaug: nho: alo zo: re shid: rumae" khyad' yu mung: qobo myo: sho' re khyad' pye' byid: qhug' nhao yaug ngad nae" rure beim: ge, .
Yesu Khristu nho: lagyo: pho" ngo Petru wa Puntiu mung"- Galati mung"- Kapadokia mung"- Asia mung" we' Bithunia mung" khaung: mae yekhug: na: byo: sin" qin" ko" ra" Mao" So: yang khyin: yu: ra" mo, re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" .
Yesu Khristu: mho dao: re tae" gyo: mung: yao" sa" yang kyang" san: pye' ru qhug' genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" wa Pho" Mao" So: nho: myid: yaung: to" rure cao" yang: khyin: san: yu: ru qhug' ru we' yao" Byo: yang gyang" lho" ra" byu qe toe' yu: ru qhug' ra" mo, ngad: ako" . Nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru naonhaung" mae byang" jo, vashao: wo" .
Ngonhaung" wa ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: yao: Pho" Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" gelang:- Yao" nho: qi" qhang: ra" nhag' khyag' shogu: ru mathao mae Yesu Khristu re shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao: ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" re kaoso' daui khyo asag' byid' ra" . Ceru wa ngonhaung" re kaoso' daui: ra" myid: lao" khyo ke' pyang" byid' ra" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa yao" byu qe: qhid' mae" Mao" So zam" to: byid' ra" mathao" magan: ra" shaman" jeju jo,nho" re qo" sang: yu nae" myid: lao" bam: ra" . Mao" So wa ai jham re mabyo, maqeim masham lo: mug: gaung dao mae naonhaung" qhid' mae" zam" to: byid' ra" .
Lo" thao" ra" ba na yo, khyin: mae yao: thug' li" nae" jin" jin" ngad: ra" khyad' yu: ra" khyo qo" khae: yu nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: qam: so' khyo" yang naonhaung" lam: khug: ru mathao mae naonhaung" re gug: gam: to: byid' ra" .
Naonhaung" wa ju" phyo' jham" qu" ru myo: sho' qhug' geyang: ana" au: dazab daso' nhag' kaug' nhag' ngai: na: jo, qo sho' ngadqere: ce: khyo: mathao mae ngaui bau: ge, .
Ai: ju phyo' jham" qu" ru jham wa naonhaung" nho: lam khug: myid agyang" ngad: rure sagse: qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" . Byo; qeim: lo" ba: ra" qhang re lhao" re:- myi" yang jham" qu" qhug' ra" . Ai we' dakhyo: qhang tho' je: phug' de; ra" naonhaung" lam khug: myid re qo" khae: yu nae" qhid' mae" jham" qu" ru qhug' ca" ra" . Ailao" za:- Yesu Khristu myao: thug' li" ra" ba na mae caung: khin" byid' ru- phungbao byid' ru we' phug' te' nga: yhe' byid' ru naonhaung" qo" khae: yu: li" genae" .
Naonhaung" wa yao: re mamyao: qu" gesho' ngad yang: re: yao: re jhid' de; ako" . Ana" naonhaung" wa ana" yao: re mathe' myao gesho' ngadqere: yao: re lam khug: ako" . Airumung: naonhaung" wa qi" qhang: ru we' phungbao bo: ra" nhad' dao: thoe khyo" maqo" ta" thug' losho' gyai ngaui bau" ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa byo khyad' yu: rure qo" khae: yu: ako" . Airu wa naonhaung" lam khug: myid mae" thug' li" ra" akyu" ngad: ra" .
Lapa qe wa ce: khyad' yu: ru we' sin: yang: jhaug' za: qin: yang: qho: ako" . Yao: bam wa Mao" So: yang naonhaung" re byid: nae" ra" ce: jeju jhaung qhu" khyo re lapa pa: ako" .
Yao: bam wa khoyo, mae khoru: boe" li" nae" rure qam: ke' yang: qho: lo: ako" . Yao: bam: khug mae na: ra" Khristu nho: Byo wa- ce: ba na ayo, mae Khristu zang: qhao" kham zo: ca" ra" qug: khai: dayin dayo: jham rere:- thao re qo" kham: yu nae" ra" phungbao we' sin: yang: re: ceim" shid' yang: lapa pa: to" ako" .
Lapa qe yao: bam zaui: so" ra" mau" zo" wa yao: bam yao" akyu" qhid' mae" mangad:- naonhaung" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" khyo re Mao" So wa ai: lapa qere qhu" byid' ra" . Yao: bam ta" lai: lo ko" ra" khyo jham re yao: mug: gaung mae" nhao: ke' ra" Gyang" Lho" Byo qam: so' khyo" yang lau dao: gai re ta" hau" qin" mo, ngad ko" ra" lagyo: qe: nhad' thoe mae" ana" naonhaung" the' gyo" yu: avako" . Ai: khyo jham we' sin: yang: mug: lagyo: qe lhao" re: ba: gyo" yu nug: ako" .
Airumung: ave, lo, mau" we' kaoso' daui nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" myid re jin" jin" seim" ci ge,- Yesu Khristu myao: thug' li" ra" ba na mae naonhaung" qo" khae: yu nae" ra" shaman" jeju re aung khug nhag' lam: alhab' we' lha" yang: myid: lao" na ge,-
Mao" So: mho dao: re phug' cao" ge,- Naonhaung" maba mabeim: shi" au:- kaoso' daui: qu" ra" ai: kao bau myid o: ra" ja: jham: yang naonhaung" kaoso' daui khyo re dakhang" nhao ge,-
Naonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" yaug Mao" So wa gyang" lho" yaug ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" zaui: so" ra" lo, mau" alhab' mae gyang" lho" ge,-
Ngo wa gyang" lho" yaug ngad yang: naonhaung" re: gyang" lho" ge,- ga: jham: mug sug' mae ta" to" ra" .
Yaug khao: ngo" re myo, nho nga: lao: makhyin lo:- yao: yao" lo, mau" ave, re cao" yang: dao: kho' byid' ra" Mao" So re naonhaung" akyu" mho' gelao"- naonhaung" wa yao: re Pho" we"- ga: mho' yao: ako" . Airu mung: ce: myid gaung dao mae kaoso' daui: na qo shi" ra" ayo, gu: mae yao: re gyaug phug' ge, .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" phug' pho" qeyang to: byid: co' ra" aphug' made; ra" kaoso' khyo lo, mau" mae" pe" aphug' yang naonhaung" re loe; beim nhao: ra" khyo re naonhaung" ba: ako" . Airu wa ngaui qhang ru" ra" byo; qeim: lo" ba: ra" ja: mangad:
Aiwa pe" qo mabo no made; ra" Yao Nau" we' daui: ra" phug' de; ra" Khristu nho: kaoso' sa: re xeim: ngaui" byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa ce: mug: myid maphan" shimae" Mao" So: yang khyin: san: to: qhug' yaug ngad mung: ai: naonhaung" akyu" mathao mae ai: lo" thao" ra" ba na jham mae myao: thug' li" nhao: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa yao: re shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" nhao mung:- phungbao ab byid' ra" Mao" So re yao: khyo" yang lam khug: ako" . Airumung: naonhaung" lam khug: myid we' myid: lao" ru wa Mao" So mae zaug: jo; ra" .
Ana" naonhaung" wa dangman" ra" khyo re phug' cao" ko" ruyang naonhaung" yao" gaung re kyang" san: pye' va" rumung: naonhaung" lam khug: ra" mao: nhaung: qere din: man" ra" jhid' de; myid naonhaung" aung khug myid alhab' we' qo" jhid' de; avako" . Airumung: naonhaung" yao: cao: aung khug nhag' lam: alhab' we' kyid kyid ein: jho" jhid' de; ge .
Pe"mung: ga"re shid ba: ra" yaug mangad:- shid maba: ra" yaug ngad: ra" Asang: yao" zo: dau qekhyo" naonhaung"kaoso' daui: na mung: apyad ato dang: jo; ra" Mao" So: mungdao" yang dam: khau: li" va" mo, ngad: ako" .
Jham: mugsug' mae xao su byu qe alhab' wa mhin: zo: we' dau mung: yao: bam: phungbao alhab' re: seyo: bin: bu" we' dau: ako" . Ai: mhin: zo: wa mai: jhoe' lo" mung: bin: bu" jham re: shu: gyo" lo" ako" .
Ngadqere: Asang: mungdao: wa apyad ato dang: jo; ra" ga: ta" ko" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" . Ai: mungdao: wa naonhaung" re kho" kyo" ra" ai: Lau Dao: Gai ngad: ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa makhyang: mashab: ra" khyo alhab'- mhug' pyag' ru- geim kad' ru- myid nug' ru we' maphug' makhyad' shad' ra" dao: jham re to" pye' ge,-
Nau" nin" qe wa Byo we' sin" ra" nug' agyang" re khonhae" re: moe, shab' na: ru we' dakhyo: ngad ge, . Ai: nug' re shaug' yang: naonhaung" qi" qhang: li" ru we' khyad' yu: ru qhug' ge,-
Jham: mugsug' mae Asang wa khoqhi" nhag' khyag' shogu: myid bo yaug ngad: rure naonhaung" yao: ba: avako"- ga: ta" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Asang jhao" lo geri:- ai: Asang wa byu: yang aphug' made,- ga: ngag: ha: pye' gengadqere: phug' de;- ga: Mao" So: yang khyin: yu: ra" kaoso' daui: ra" laug zang ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa kaoso' daui: ra" laug jham khyo" lo geri:- Amung: naonhaung" yao" gaung re byo we' sin" ra" yham mo" zhaug' ra" yham vo: boe" ge,- ai: yham mo" mae naonhaung" wa Mao" So khae: yu man" ra" byo we' sin" ra" xeim: re Yesu Khristu khyo" yang qhaug' byid' ra" gyang" lho" ra" khinjaung amyu" qekhyo" aimae caung da" byid' li" genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Jham: mugsug' mae- Ngo wa phug' de; ra" laug zang dazang re khyin: yu mung: aire Ziun bam dao mae Ajheim mae" laug zang khyo" Ngo to" to: va"- Yao: re lam khug: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Khonhae" re: nhag' lam: mathao" magyug: nae" ga: ta" ra" .
Ce: laug zang wa lam khug: ra" mo; qhid' mae" gyai aphug' de; ra" . Ngadqere: malam khug: ra" mo; qhid' mae" kam" wa- yham zhaug' ra" mo; yang akyu" mabo ga: khyin: pye' ko" ra" laug zang wa Alhab' tho' mae phug' de; ra" laug zang boe" lo: ra"- ga: ta" to" ra" .
Alao" gatau jham: mugsug' mae Ce: laug zang wa byu qere tha" thaung: nhao mung: gyang: lang" lo" nhao: ra" laug baui ngad: li" nae"- ga: ta" to" ra" . Yao: bam wa mungdao: re malam" geyang: khyid au: the' thaung" ako" . Airu wa yao: bam: qhid' mae" Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa khyin: yu qhug' ra" byumyu" qe ngad: ako" . Kho: kham: nho: khinjaung qe- gyang" lho" ra" byumyu" Mao" So sang: ra" byumyu" ngad: ako"- Naonhaung" re mug: cad' khug mae" khai: thug' yu mung: yao" mug' pho: bo" bao shad' khyo khai: vhao" yu: ra" Mao" So: mug' pho: lo, mau" jham re ta" hau" kyo: nae" qhid' mae" khyin: san: yu: ru ngad: ra" .
Qhid' phyao: naonhaung" wa Mao" So: byumyu" mangad: ko" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ana" naonhaung" wa- yao" byumyu" ngad: avako" . Qhid' phyao: naonhaung" wa Mao" So: nhag' khyag' shogu: rure maba ko" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ana" naonhaung" wa yao" nhag' khyag' shogu: rure qo" khae: yu: avako" .
Nga" ba nam qe we"- naonhaung" myid nhag' lam: we' khonhae" re: gye jho" khe' na: ra" gaung sho: myid o kao bau: ra" khyo re dacao" ge,- ein: ce: mug: myid dao mae bang" vo qe we' dazab lhau" khug: na: ra" mo, we' dakhyo: ngad ko" ra" naonhaung" re ngo mho' ke' ra" .
Mao" So re malam khug: ra" mo; yang magai makhyang" ra" mau" kad' mo, ngad: ako" ga: naonhaung" re qobo zhaug' na ko" au:- naonhaung" wa ai: Mao" So re malam khug: ra" mo; phaung mae naonhaung" ave, lo, mau" gyai gai sho' kad' qo: ra" . Alao" yao: bam wa naonhaung" gai: ra" ave, lo, mau" jham re qu" ngaui: khae: yu mung: Mao" So joe" li" ra" ba na mae yao: re caung: khin" li" genae" .
Asang: mathao mae kheim: so' qo" ra" xao su byu yaug khao: ngo" yang eib: ra" qao: mae na ge,- Khosin" pho" re kheim: so' ajhaung apan qo" yaug ngad: khyo"-
mang: zug: pho" qe wa makhyang" ra" mau" kad' mo, re qobo dae byid: mung: gai shab: ra" mau" kad' mo, re wa caung: khin" nae" qhid' mae" Khosin" pho" yang mau" byid' to: qhug' yaug ngad: ra" khyo" khae: yu ge, .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" zaui: so" ra" gai: ra" mau" zo" jham khyo" yang pe" maba: ra" dao: jhau: ra" byugo qe: nhad' dao: thoe re pyid' pye' byid: nae" rure Mao" So o: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa loe; beim: na mo, we' dakhyo: kaoso' daui ge, . Ngadqere: naonhaung" loe; beim: rure makhyang" ra" mau" daja: ja: re nghoe' pye' nae" qhid' mae" daci ge,- Mao" So: jeim qe we' dakhyo: kaoso' daui: na ge, .
Yaug khao: ngo" re phug' myao: ge,- lam khug: ra" naonhaung" mao: nhaung: qere jhid' de; ge,- Mao" So re gyaug ge,- amung: khosin" pho" re phug' myao: ge, .
Daui daui mo, we"- naonhaung" Asang qeyang eib: ra" qao: mae na mung: nhag' ba: khyag' ru we' ba: myid nhag' bo mo, reza: mangad:- ayo: athin mung: ra" mo, rere: gyai phug' myao: byid: ge,-
Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: myid o: rure ba gemung: makham zo: man" ra" qug: khai: jham dayin dayo: zang: qhao" yang: naonhaung" kham zo: ko" re wa ce: mathao mae Mao" So wa naonhaung" re shaman" byid' li" nae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa yao: yao: kad' shad' ra" qobo qhid' mae" kham zo: nae" man: qi" ra" qobo dae jham re zang: qhao" kham zo: yang: ngad: re wa pe" khin" nae" de; ra" i? Ngadqere: jo: rure kad' yang: qug: khai: khyag' qhui: rure naonhaung" kham zo: yang: ngad: re wa Mao" So wa ai: qhid' mae" naonhaung" re shaman" byid' li" nae" .
Ceru: kad' genae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa naonhaung" re khai: yu: to" ru ngad: ra" . Khristu yao: yao: re: naonhaung" qhid' mae" qug: khai: khyag' qhui: ru kham zo" lo mung: yao" khyid khu re naonhaung" qo" cao" gesho' ga: naonhaung" re azung aso: to: byid: co' ra" .
Yao: wa qobo mashad' ngad: ra" . Yao" nhad' mae" mhug' ra" dao: thoe khag' khonhae" mathe' gyo" qu" ngad: ako" .
Yao: maphug' makhyad' roe" ru qhug' lao"- yao: madam: tug' roe" ngad: ra" . Yao: qug: khai: dayin dayo: kham zo: lao" re: yao: makyaug' nhin" ngad: ra" . Din: man" ra" khyo" dao: kho' yaug ngad: ra" Mao" So: lo, mae kam" wa yao" khyo alhab' re myid: lam: to" ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa qobo we' sin: yang: shid mung: din: man" ra" khyo" kaoso' daui nae" qhid' mae" Khristu yao: yao: ngonhaung" qobo jham re yao" gaung mae pyao: zang dao mae vin: pye' byid' ra" . Naonhaung" wa yao" dae mathao: yang gai: shao: lo" qhug' avako" .
Naonhaung" wa khyonghung: nghung" lo" byaug ko" ra" yao jham we' dau: lo" ako" . Ngadqere: ana" naonhaung" wa yao zam: yaug we' naonhaung" alo zo: re lhaug' zaung" yaug jhao" dam: jhui" tug' lo byid' ru qhug' avako" .
Ai we' dakhyo: yham sang myhi" qe we"- naonhaung" yham sang pho" qeyang eib khang" ra" qao: mae na ge,- ailao" za: naonhaung" yham sang pho" qemae" Mao" So: mungdao: re malam khug mo, dayaug yaug bo gengadqere: naonhaung" lo,mau" wa yao: bam re ai: mung dao: re lam khug: lo nhao: li" genae" .
Naonhaung" wa nhad' dao: thoe dakheim: ta" qo genae" mangad: . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa naonhaung" khoqhi" sho' yaung" gyang" ra" khyo re we' khoqhi" sho' Mao" So re gyaug phug' ra" naonhaung" lo, mau" jham re the' myao: li" genae" .
Naonhaung" gaung yaung" nae" qhid' mae" adao: pyae xae kyo' nag: shaung: ru- mangad: lao"- qhang laug zai ci: ru- mangad: lao"- ve,mai ve,bau: shaung ve; ru khyo" dashaung ge, .
Ai: atha" naonhaung" gaung yaung" shab: ru wa naonhaung" yao" nhag' kao" mae bo: ra" khonhae" re: yaung" jo; ra" nau" nhae" ru we' xam: mag: ra" nhag' lam: mae bo: jo; ra" . Ai: ru wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae phug' de; thao" ra" ja: ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam: myid: lao" rure Mao" So: lo, mae ke' to: mung: yao: bam yao" yham sang pho" qeyang eib khang" ra" qao: mae na yang: caung: pa" thung" re phug' cao" lai: lo ko" ra" myiqe: we' dakhyo:- yao: yao" gaung re shaung kin kad' ako" .
Sarah wa airu" yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: wa Abraham nho: mho dao: re tae" gyo: mung: yao" asang ga: Abraham re mhang" ra"- naonhaung" wa pe" rere: magyaug lo: gai: ra" mau" zo" re zaui: so: ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" wa yao" myiqe: zo: qe ngad: ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo: yham sang pho" qe we"- naonhaung" yham sang myhi" qere naonhaung" tho' qam: nang" ra" mo, ngad: ra" khyo" yao: bam: qhid' mae" bomyid byid: yang: naonhaung" yham sang myhi" qe we' zam" khug: na ca" ra" . Yao: bam re phug' myao: taung" zam" khug ge,- Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam re: Mao" So: kaoso' jhaung qhu" re naonhaung" we' daga" qo" khae: yu: li" genae" . Naonhaung" akyu" mho' thoe re pe" yang re: makaung: kag' nae" qhid' mae" ceru: kad' ge, .
Lo" thao" ta" nug: ru wa aitho' mago"- naonhaung" alhab' wa nhag' lam: dalam: we' kham zo" ra" myid daja: za: ngad ca" ra" . Yao: yao" mao: nhaung: qe we' dakhyo: yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; ge,- yao: cao: jho" nhag' khyag' ru we' jho" nyham: khyo" yang: na ge, .
Makhyang" rure makhyang" ruyang- mangad: lao" nhang" rure nhang" ruyang dadam: phaug' ge,- airu: kad' nae" atha"- dam: tug' shaman" byid: ge,- pe"mung: ga"re ai: shaman" jeju wa Mao" So naonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" au:- naonhaung" re byid: nae" qhid' mae" dao: so: byid' to" ra" shaman" je" ju" ngad: ra" .
Jham: mugsug' mae Kaoso' daui: rure jhid' de; mung:- gai: ra" ba na yo, khyin: jham re myao nae" kao bau: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: makhyang: mashab: ra" dao: majhau nae" we' mhug' dao: mata" nae" qhid' mae" zaui" ci qo: ra" .
Yao: wa makhyang" rure to" pye' mung: gai: ra" mau" kad' ca" ra" . Yao: wa ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru qhid' mae" Yao" aung khug nhag' lam: alhab' we' qam: ke' ca" ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Asang wa din: man" ra" mo, re lhaug' caung byid: mung: yao: bam: akyu" mho' thoe jham re tae" gyo: byid' ra" . Ngadqere: makhyang" ra" mau" kad' mo, re wa Yao: ngag: thaug' pye' ra"- ga: ta" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" wa gai: ra" mau" kad' nae" kao bau: na ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" re dae khag' qo" te' genae" i?
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa jo: rure kad' yang: ai: mathao mae qug: khai: kham zo: yang: ngad ko" re wa- naonhaung" ngaui lho" ko" ra" . Naonhaung" khag' rere: dagyaug ge,- Pe" re: damyid: ci" ge,
Naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: mae Khristu re phug' myao: mung: Asang khyo" phug' te' nga: yhe' ge,- Naonhaung" qo" khae: yu: ra" myid: lao" ru khyo re li" myid' ra" yaug khag' re ngadqere: ayo, makhyin lo: ta" sho' kyo: nae" qhid' mae" jin" jin" kad' na ge, .
Ngadqere: aire nau" nhae" za: phug' myao: zo" re" sho' kyo: ge,- naonhaung" wa Khristu nho: thao cao" mo, ngad: ra" khyo" naonhaung" gai: ra" lo, mau" re ta" phoe mung: maphug' makhyad' roe" dao: ta" ra" mo, qho' geshao:- naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: re gyang: gyang: za: to: ge,-
amung: ce: khyo wa Mao" So: khyo ngad: re wa makhyang" ra" mau" kad' nae" tho' gai: ra" mau" kad' yang: qug: khai: kham zo: nae" ru wa je: gai: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Khristu wa qobo qo" ra" mo; qhid' mae" dalhang: dae za: bin sho' shid kham: pye' ava" . Naonhaung" re Mao" So jhao" jhui" ye: byid: nae" qhid' mae" qobo jab: qe: ra" gaung tha" byugai yaug shid: kham: byid' ra" . Yao: wa gaung khyao se' pye' qhug' ngad qere: Byo mae kaoso' daui: na: ra" .
Ai: Byo khyo" yang yao:- Khristu wa thaung: laung" jo, ko" ra" byo jham re yekho" kyo: byid' ra" .
Ai: byo jham wa Noa yao" qid sang pho re zhaug' na: ra" ba na gyo: mae nhag' lam: qhang qhang za: yao: lao" na: au: Mao" So: mho dao: re matae" gyo: ko" ra" mo; byo jham ngad: ako" . Qid: yang khyad' yu qhug' ra" mo, wa qid sang pho dao mae dajhid' za: ngad mung: alhab' wa she' yaug za: ngad: ako" .
Airu wa ana" naonhaung" re khyad' yu: ra" qid nyhab' re ceim" shid' ra" ve, so: ngad: ra" . Airu: qid nyhab' kham: yu: ru wa gaung khyao mae de; ra" abe, alhau: qhid' re cid' shao: pye' ru mangad:- Aung khug nhag' lam: gyang: gyang: we' Mao" So re dao: so: to" ra" khyo ngad: ra" . Yesu Khristu shid: rumae" dam: daui: to" li" ru khyo" yang ai: qid nyhab' kham: yu: ru wa naonhaung" re khyad' yu: ra" .
Yesu Khristu wa mug: gaung khyo do, lo" byaug mung: Mao" So: lo, yo shad' mae na: jo, yang: mug: lagyo: alhab' mug: gaung: kheim: so' qo" ra" mo, we' phung qam: so' qo" mo, mae eib: na: ra" .
Khristu wa gaung khyao qug: khai: dayin dayo: kham zo" lo: ruyang- naonhaung" re: yao: myid: ru we' dakhyo: kham: yu mung: naonhaung" yao" gaung re qam: bo nhao qo: ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re gaung khyao qug: khai: dayin dayo: kham zo" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: qobo khug mae mabo: cao: bo loyang: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ana" mae" thoegu:- myidgaung dao mae kaoso' daui nae" dang shi" ra" ayo, mae xao su byu qe: kao bau myid: o: ra" ja" yang khang" ra" khyo re macao" lo:- Mao" So: yang khang" ra" khyo mae naonhaung" kaoso' daui qo: ako" .
Naonhaung" wa lai: lo" ra" ayo, gu: mae malam khug: ra" tarha" Taung bug byu qe we' dakhyo: kad' yang: myao" sho' na: lo: avako" . Naonhaung" kaoso' daui khyo mae ave, made, kad' ru- shab' ru- yhid shaug' yid: ru- pyo: poe kad' ru- yhid shaug' poe kad' ru we' qu" ca' taung" ra" so alho jham re goe; pa" ra" khyo jham re kad' lo: ako" .
Ana" naonhaung" wa yao: bam we' daga" kyao: ru we' nug: khyo: kaoso' daui: rumae mabo: bo gelao"- malam makhug: ra" Taung bug byu qe wa mug' gemung: yao: bam wa naonhaung" re jung" gaui: ako" .
Ngadqere: yao: bam wa kaoso' daui: ra" mo, re we' shid: ra" mo, re dao: kho' nae" jin" jin" ngad: ra" Mao" So re yao: bam yao" khyo we' sin: yang: japhin: qhu" byid: qo: li" genae" .
Ce: mathao mae Ngaui Bau: Lau Dao: wa shid: ra" mo, rere: kho" kyo: byid' ra" . Ai: shid: ra" mo, wa yao: bam: gaung khyao we' kaoso' daui: na shiko" gu:- byu yaug khao: ngo" we' dakhyo: dao: phyid' ru qhug' ako" . Ai: Ngaui Bau" Lau Dao: yao: bam re kho" kyo" ra" khyo wa yao: Byo kaoso' mae Mao" So kaoso' daui: na: ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam kaoso' qo" daui: na nae" qhid' mae" ngad: ra" .
Cao jab alhab' qhid' mae" lo" thao" ba na jhao" li" ava" . Airumung: naonhaung" wa akyu" qo" mho' na genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" yao" gaung re khang" mung: so: so: za: gyang" na ge,
Alhab' tho' mae je: akhyag: ra" khyo wa yao: cao: kyid za: jho" jhid' de; ge,- pe"mung: ga"re jhid' de; myid wa qobo myo: sho' re qo" nghoe' byid' ra" .
Naonhaung" wa manyhung lo:- yao: cao: bang" jho" da" byid: ge,
yaug khao: ngo" wa Mao" So: jeju jhaung qhu" aja: ja: re zam: pyo yaug we' dakhyo: Mao" So: lo, mae" yao: qo" khae: yu: to" ra" gakai: lai: ra" jeju jhaung qhu" re su gaje qenho" gai: ra" khyo qhid' mae" ci yhung: qo: ra" .
Tarha" kho" kyo" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Mao" So: mungdao: re kho" kyo: ca" ra" . Caung da" byid' yaug wa Mao" So yao: re byid' to" ra" qam o: we' caung da" byid: ca" ra" . Ailao" za: ja: cao jab alhab' mae Yesu Khristu khyo" yang Mao" So re qo" caung: khin" li" nae" . Yesu Khristu wa apyad ato mae phungbao we' qam: so' bo: jo; ra" . A men .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- Ana" naonhaung" re jham" qu" ra" qug: khai: dayin dayo: xo sho' kham zo" na ko" ra" khyo re damug' ge, . Naonhaung" mae maboe" qu" ra" ja: boe" sho' ngadqere: damug' ge,-
Khristu nho: qug: khai: dayin dayo: re naonhaung" qo" bokham zo" na ko" ruyang kam" wa ngaui bau: ge,- ailao" za: Khristu nho: phungbao myao: thug' li" au: naonhaung" wa gyai ngaui bau" ru qhug' li" genae" .
Naonhaung" wa Khristu nho: thao cao" mo, ngad geyang: maphug' makhyad' kad' ru qhug' ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" wa ngaui lho" ko" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: Byo ngad: ra" phungbao byang" jo; ra" Byo wa naonhaung" dao mae na: jo; ru ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" mae" dayaug yaug byu se' yaug mangad: lao"- khug' yaug mangad: lao"- yug: qo" yaug mangad: lao"- su gaje qe: khyo mae bocao: kaung: kag' yaug ngad: ruyang qug: khai: dayin dayo: dakham zo: nhao ge, .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa Khristan phung: byu qe ngad geyang: qug: khai: dayin dayo: kham: zo: ko" ngad: re wa ai: mathao mae daqho' ge,- naonhaung" wa Khristu nho: mang re vin ko" ruyang Mao" So re jeju caung: khin" ge, .
Dao: kho' nae" qhid' mae" ayo, joe" ava" . Mao" So: byu qe sao qhid' dao: kho' ru qhug' qo: ako" . Naonhaung" mae" dao: kho' qhid: ngad: re wa Mao" So mae" thug' li" ra" lau dao: gai re malam" ko" ra" mo; qhid' mae" khoru: boe" thao" nae" laug i?
Jham: mugsug' mae Din: man" ra" byu qe: qhid' mae" khyad' yu: ru qhug' nae" qug' ra"- aire Mao" So re malam: ra" qobo jab qe wa pe" boe" genae" i? ga: tung" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So myid o: ra" khyo" yang qug: khai: dayin dayo: kham zo: ko" ra" mo, wa- yao: bam: gaung re dao: so: zaung yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: bam: phan" Asang re yao: bam yao" gaung ab byid: mung:- gai shab: ra" ave, lo,mau" re xo' kad' na vageshao: .
Ngoyao: re: phung: lau: de, dayaug ngad: ra" . Ngo wa mao: nhaung: phaung mae" phung: lau: de, qere mho' ke' ra" . Ngo wa Khristu nho: qug: khai: dayin dayo: kham zo" rure myo, myao sagse: dayaug ngad mung:- myao: thug' li" nae" ra" phungbao re bokham zo: nae" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re Mao" So ab byid' to" ra" yao kyaung" re manug masho: myid we' mangad: lo: Mao" So o: ru we' dakhyo: kao bau taung" gun caung lhaug' zaung" genae" qhid' mae" yao zam: mo, naonhaung" re ngo mho' ke' ra" . Aphug' jhaung qhu" qhid' mae" za: mangad:- gaigai: yao: kao bau: ra" myid we' naonhaung" mau" zo" re vin vo; ge,-
Naonhaung" re ab byid' ra" mo; dao mae eib zo: nae" qam: dake' ge,- yao kyaung" qhid' mae" ve, so: gai kam" wa qhu" byid: ge,-
Yao zam: Au: jhaung Pho" thug' joe" li" lao"- bao qhui: ru khonhae" re: masham nae" ra" phungbao ba maug: re naonhaung" qo" khae: yu: li" genae" .
Ai we' dakhyo: apyad ngai: ra" mo, naonhaung" lau: de, qe: qao: mae na ge,- yao: cao: jho" caung da" byid: nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" alhab' mo, wa nhag' lam: nyham: khyo" ru ga" ra" qhid' go pin: cug' re thab' ci ge,- pe"mung: ga"re jham: mugsug' mae Mao" So wa ngad beim" ra" mo, re tam" pye' mung:- nhag' lam: nyham: khyo" ra" mo, re kam" wa jeju byid' ra" ga: ta" to" ru we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So wa yao" ayo, gai mae naonhaung" re tau: to' byid: nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: qam: so' bo: ra" lo, qao: mae naonhaung" yao" gaung re nyham: khyo" yang: na ge,-
Mao" So wa naonhaung" re gun caung yaug ngad: ruyang naonhaung" myid: qug: myid: ci" ru jham alhab' re yao" lo, mae qhaug' to: byid: ge,
Gyang: so: za: na ge,- lha" yang: lhaug' na ge,- naonhaung" gyevo Satan wa dayaug yaug re qo" myug: pye' nae" qhid' mae" khang khyi we' dakhyo: kyid' qho: lhang: qin" ra" .
Naonhaung" lam khug: myid re tang za: zaui" ci mung: ai: Satan re thaug' ngho' pye' ge,- pe"mung: ga"re mug: myid: dao mae" naonhaung" nho: Khristan mao: nhaung: qere: ai: qug: khai: qug: khai: khyo daja: reza: kham zo" lo ko" ru naonhaung" ba: ako" .
