Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa dazab zo: qug: khai: qug: khai: rure bin: kham zo: gethao re nhag' myan" ra" jeju alhab' bo: ra" Mao" So- Khristu we' dadang: dalam: za: doe, nhao yang: apyad ato: phungbao re kham zo: nhao nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" Mao" So wa naonhaung" re jab byang" nhao mung: nyhad' tang byid' ru we' qam: bo nhao yang: gang" tang: ra" apan aqao: byid' li" nae" .
Yao: wa apyad ato khonhae" re: phung qam: so' bo: jo, vashao: wo"- A men .
Ngo wa vhin tung" lang" zo: re Khristu mae mao: nhaung: dayaug khyo" ngo myid: lam: ra" Sila yang bao" thaug' byid: yaug naonhaung" re tung" vhin: ke' ru ngad: ra" . Ngo wa naonhaung" re qam: byid: nug: ru we' ceru wa dangman" ra" Mao" So: nhag' myan" jeju ngad: rure sagse: kham: kyo: nae" qhid' mae" tung" ke' ru ngad: ra" . Ai: jeju mae tang za: ye; jo, ge,-
Mao" So: yang khyin: san: yu: to" ra" Babelon vogaung: mae" phung: byu qere: naonhaung" re au" ke' ako" . Ai we' dakhyo: nga" zo: Marku re: naonhaung" re au" ke' ra" .
Naonhaung" yao: cao: dayaug we' dayaug Khristan jhid' de; myid we' bobaug jho" baug yang: jho" au" ge, . Ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru wa Khristu yang sang: ra" mo, ngad: ra" naonhaung" alhab' we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" .
Yesu Khristu nho: daui daui yaug we' lagyo: ngad: ra" ngo Simon Petru wa- ngonhaung" Mao" So we' ngonhaung" khyad' yu: Asang Yesu Khristu nho: din: man" ra" khyo" ngonhaung" we' dakhyo: phug' de; ra" lam khug: myid qo" yu: to: ko" ra" mo, re mugsug' tung" vhin: ke' ra" .
Pho" Mao" So we' ngonhaung" Asang Yesu re ba jhao: ra" naonhaung" laba lajhao khyo" yang nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru wa byang" sho' naonhaung" qo" kham zo: vageshao: wo" .
Yao: yao" phungbao re we' gai shab: rure qo" bokham zo: nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" re khai: yu: ra" yaug: nho: laba lajhao khyo" yang Mao" So: phung qam: so' wa dangman" ra" caung: pa" thung" lam khug: khyo mae kaoso' daui nae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" re qo ca" ra" ja: cao jab byid' to" ra" .
Ceru:- yao: wa dao: so: byid' to" ra" gyai qi" qhang mung: phug' de; ra" jeju jhaung qhu" dao: so: ngonhaung" re byid' to" ra" . Ai: jeju jhaung qhu" khyo" yang ce: mug: myid dao mae" byo; qeim: lo" ba: ra" gaung sho: shab' ra" khyo mae" naonhaung" phao: loe, mung: Mao" So: ve, khyao re naonhaung" qo" bokham: yu: ako" .
Ce: khyo mathao mae naonhaung" wa gai: boe" thao" mae" qam: ke' yang: naonhaung" lam khug: myid mae gai shab: ra" lo, mau"- gai shab: ra" lo, mau" mae laba lajhao-
naonhaung" laba lajhao mae yao: yao" gaung re qo" khang" ru- naonhaung" yao" gaung re qo" khang" rumae zang: qhao" ru- naonhaung" zang: qhao" rumae Mao" So: khyo re phug' cao" ru .
Naonhaung" nho: Mao" So: khyo re phug' cao" rumae mao: nhaung: jhid' kao myid- naonhaung" mao: nhaung: jhid' kao myid mae jhid' de; myid laung" ke' byid: ge,-
aijham wa naonhaung" qo" ca" ra" ja: jham ngad mung:- aijham re naonhaung" magan: mago" qo" yu: to: ko" ngad: re wa ai: gao: jham wa naonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu re ba jhao: ra" naonhaung" laba lajhao mae naonhaung" re lo, mau" zaui" thug' li" nhao mung:- zao" sho' akyu" byid' li" nae" .
Aijham maqo" ra" yaug wa va: sho' mamyao: ra" myo, qeim myo,jid yaug ngad mung: lai: lo" ra" ayo, mae yao" qobo jham kyang" san: pye' byid: qhug' ra" khyo re to" myhid' pye' ra" .
Airumung: nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- naonhaung" re Mao" So khai: yu: ru we' khyin: yu: rure gang" tang nhao nae" qhid' mae" je yang: qam: ke' ge,- naonhaung" airu: kad' re wa naonhaung" wa khonhae" re: naonhaung" yao" lam khug: myid re shapye' genae" mangad: .
cekhyo" yang naonhaung" wa ngonhaung" Asang we' khyad' yu: ra" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: apyad ato: mung"dan: khug khyo qo" vao ye nae" qhid' mae" akho: akhang" jab byang" sho' qo" khae: yu: li" genae" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa ai: gu: re ba gau ngad: ru we' naonhaung" qo" khae: yu: to: vako" ra"- ai: dangman" rumae tang za: apan zaug: jo, vagesho' ngadqere: ngo wa ai: khyo jham we' sin: yang: khonhae" re: naonhaung" re ta" peim: ta" kyang: nug: ra" .
Ngo kaoso' daui: na shi" gyo: mae ai: khyo jham re naonhaung" myid: beim" na gesho' naonhaung" re lhau: zhung" ke' byid: nae" ru wa ngo kad' ang: ru ngad: ein: myid: jho: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu yang ngore de: de: za: ta" to: gau ngad: ru we' dakhyo:- ngo wa khomyhao" makyo re ce: shid ba: ra" gaung khyao re qhid' pye' co' nae" ngad: rure ngo ba: ra" .
Airumung: ngo shid thao re naonhaung" wa khonhae" re: ai: khyo jham re myid: beim" na genae" qhid' mae" gai: boe" ra" qhi" ngo bao" thaug' byid: nae" .
Phung qam so' we' ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu joe" li" ra" khyo naonhaung" re ba nhao: rumae ngonhaung" wa ta" yu: ra" mhomyi: re ngha yang: ta" ru mangad:- yao" qi" qhang: ra" phung qam: so' re ngonhaung" yao" myo; yang yao: the' myao: ra" mo, ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa Pho" Mao" So: yang phug' te' nga: yhe' byid' ru qhug' mung:- Myhao: Thao" ra" Phungbao khug mae"- ceyaug wa ngo o ngaui mung: jhid' de; ra" nga" zo: ngad: ga: jhau thoe yao: jhao" joe" li" au:- ngonhaung" wa aitau mae na: lo mo, ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao: we' daga" ai: Gyang" Lho" ra" bam dao mae na: jo; au:- mug: gaung mae" joe" li" ra" ce: thoe re ngonhaung" yao" nokhye' yang yao: the' gyo" lo: va" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa Lapa qeyang ta" hau" lo" ra" mungdao: re je yang: myid: lam: ra"- ai: mungdao: re phug' cao" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re ai wa mug: bo" li" sho' mug: cad' yo mae bao byid' ra" myibaung: we' dau mung: naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: mae bao byid' ra" bo" myhung we' dau: ra" .
Ngadqere: alhab' tho' mae Jham: Mugsug' mae bo: ra" lapa dao: re khag' ngadqere: yao: yao" myid khyo" lajheim: maqo" phaug' ta" rure naonhaung" beim: ge,-
pe"mung: ga"re pe" lapa mungdao: re: byu myid: o: ra" khyo" yang khonhae" re: mathug' li" qu" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Gyang" Lho" Byo: yang jaung" ra" byu qe wa Mao" So mae" mungdao: re yao: bam ta" ako" .
Ganhae" byu qe: phaung gaung: mae lapa apyag' qe po" thug' lai: lo ko" ru we' dakhyo: naonhaung" phaung gaung: mae re: mho" pho" apyag' qe po" thug' li" li" genae" . Yao: bam wa byo; qeim: lo" nhao: ra" madangman" ra" mho" shid' khyo jham vin: li" mung: yao: bam re khyad' yu: ra" Asang re ngag: ha: pye' li" genae" . Airumung: yao: bam wa yao: bam yao" dao mae nyag din taung" byo; qeim: lo" nhao: li" genae" .
Airu: ngad sho' ngadqere: byu myo: sho' mo, wa ai bam: gaung sho" ra" gintho' mau" zo" khyo mae bocao" lo" li" genae" . Yao: bam kad' ra" lo, mau" mathao mae su gaje qe wa ai: dangman" ra" Khyo re ta" phoe: pye' li" genae" .
Ai: mho" pho" apyag' qe wa yao: bam: so' kho' o: byid: rure cao" mung: naonhaung" re mhomyi: mhug' ta" mung: gau pai: qho: yu: li" genae" . Ganhae" ayo, mae" yao: bam re dao: kho' nae" Tarha" Zug: Pho" wa jin" jin" ngad: jo; ava" . Yao: bam re Phyo' Pye' Nae" Yaug wa gyang: gyang: za: so" na: ra" .
Mao" So wa qobo shad' lhoe" ra" mug: lagyo: jham re lhao" re: matang" to: lo: yao: bam re myiqid tham: khyo pye' zaui: pye' ra" . Yao: bam wa ai: mug: cad' yo mae jao co" yang taui" to: qhug' Mung dao: Kho' ra" Ba Na re lao" na: bam nhao: ra" .
Mao" So wa ganhae" gaco' mae" mug: myid rere: matang" to: ngad: ra" . Mao" So malam: ra" mug: myid byu qere daqid shi: byid' ra"- din: man" ra" khyo re kho" kyo" ra" Noa re we' gatau nhad' yaug reza: Mao" So khyad' yu: ra" .
Mao" So wa Sodom we' Gomora shid' vo re dao: phyid' mung: yao: bam re myi" yang ngha" pye' ra" . Cekhyo" yang Mao" So re malam: ra" mo, qobo dae khoru: qhug' kham zo: genae" ngad: rure ve, so: khyo" kad' qhu" ra" .
Tarha" maci: ra" mo; nho: gaung sho: gintho' lo, mau" mathao: yang myid: qug: nhag' lam: thao" na: ra" byugai Lod re wa Mao" So khyad' yu: ra" .
Ai: byugai pho" wa yao: bam: phaung mae na mung: ba khao: ba ngo" yao: bam: magai: lo, mau" re the' myao- the' gyo: yang: yao: wa nhag' lam: myid qug: myid ci" dayin dayo: kham zo" na: ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So: khyo re phug' cao" ra" mo, re yao: bam thaung" qhug' na: ra" jham" qu" rumae" khoru: khyad' yu nae" khyo re Asang ba: ru we' yao: bam: gaung sho: shab' ra" maca' majhad' lo, mau" re cao" mung: Mao" So: kheim: so' re maphug' makhyad' kad' ko" ra" mo, rere: Dao: Kho' Ba Na qhid' mae"-
qobo byid: yang: khoru: zam" to: nae" rure yao: ba: ra" . Ai: mho" pho" apyag' qe wa vae" ru we' nhag' lam: qi: ngad beim: mung: phungbao qi" ra" mug: tho' mae" mo, re maphug' myao: lo:- ai: atha" maphug' makhyad' kad' ako" .
Ai: mho" pho" apyag' qe tho' qam: so' phung qab je: bo: ra" mug: lagyo: qe lhao" re: yao: bam re Asang: qhid' kheim: mae maphug' makhyad' dao: mata"- qobo mazhaug' ko" ngad: ra" .
Ai: byu qe wa taung" yu qhug' mung: se' pye' nae" qhid' mae" xao" li" ra" seyo: gug' nyhug' jham we' dakhyo:- azhao: mae" ba gau myid: yang jhan" ako" . Yao: bam maba: gyo" ra" ja: alhab' re gye kad' yang: jung" pye' ako" . Yao: bam wa gug' nyhug' jham we' dakhyo:- jeim" lo" li" genae" .
Yao: bam su re dayin dayo: no nhao: ru we' dakhyo:- yao: bam re: airu: dayin dayo: no kham zo" li" genae" . Na" gaung na" yao mae yao: bam: gaung sho: shab' ra" o nug: rure nhag' dag nhao nae" lo, mau" kad' ru wa yao: bam: pyo: khyo ngad: ako" . Yao: bam wa naonhaung" we' li" bozo: shaug' na yang: aqho' aqhid maphug' makhyad' kad' ako" . Yao: bam wa apyag' asham" khyo mae pyo: thoe gyo: mo, ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam wa gaung sho: gintho' mau" kad' nug: ra" myiqe: qere za: qu" ako" . Yao: bam: qobo: nho: shad' nghung" ra" myid khonhae" re: masham ko" ngad: ra" . Yao: bam wa qam: nang" ra" byu qere lha" mae myi" nhao: ako" . Yao: bam: nhag' lam: wa so' kho' obyid: ru qhid' mae" mho" zhao: yu: ci: ako" . Yao: bam wa Mao" So: nhang: kheim: zao" mo, ngad: ako" .
Yao: bam wa khyodin: re to" pye' co' geyang: khyonghung: nghung" lo" byaug: avako" . Yao: bam wa madin: maman: kad' yang: qo" ra" aphug' ngaui re jhid' de; yaug ngad: ra" Beo nho: yao: zo: Balam: nho: khyo re cao" avako" .
Balam: wa yao" qobo mathao mae qeim: ru qhug' ra" . Yao" lo ze wa byu: myan" jhau: thug' li" mung: ai: lapa: nho: adu: adae: mau" zo" re tam" pye' ra" .
Ai: byu jham wa kin" kyaug' lo" byaug: ra" qid thug'- la qam" yang hug' tao" pye' ra" jham thaui: we' dau: ako" . Mao" So wa yao: bam: qhid' mae" no; thao" ra" mug: cad' khug mae jo, qo jaung: to: byid' ra" .
Yao: bam wa ngad beim" ru we' ako" asho: dao: ta" ako" . Shad' nghung" ra" khyo" kaoso' daui: ra" mo; phaung mae" ana" za: phao: loe; thug' lo mo, re gaung sho" ra" gintho' mau" zo" re cao" qhu" yang: khyonghung: nghung: nhao: ako" .
Yao: bam yao: lhao" re: byo; qeim: jeim" lo" ba: ra" ave, lo, mau" nho: jeim doe; na geyang: yao: bam re loe; beim nhao nae" dao: so: byid' ako" . Pe"mung: ga"re byu wa yao: yao: re aung: nghoe' to" ra" ja: alhab' nho: jeim doe; na yang: ngad: ra" .
Byu qe wa ngonhaung" Asang we' khyad' yu: ra" Asang Yesu Khristu re yao: bam ba jhao: ra" khyo" yang mug: myid dao: nho: maca' majhad' ra" qam: so' mae" phao: loe, gethao re ai: maca' majhad' yang dalhang dam: myhi" ru qhug' mung: aijham: yang dam: nghoe' pye' yang: ngad: re wa airu" ra" mo; thao mae" ayaug: wa sao qhid' mae" ayaug: tho' je: xo: lo" ra" .
Din: man" ra" khyo re ba: yu thao re yao: bam qo" khae" yu: to" ra" gyang" lho" ra" amyin" dao: re to" pye' co' ru tho'- ai: din: man" rure khonhae" re: manhae" ba: ru wa yao: bam: qhid' mae" je: gai: ra" .
Lakha: wa yao: daug: phoe" pye' va" rure dam: zo: ba ra" . Amung: bin: cid' san: pye' va" vo, wa tham: bab: bam mae dam: lhau: ba: ra" ga" ra" dao: zham" dangman" rure yao: bam mae boe" ra" mau" zo" yang qhu" byid' ra" .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- ana" ce: vhin tung" wa ngo naonhaung" re shid' lhang ein: lhang tung" vhin: ke' ra" mugsug' ngad: ra" . Vhin tung" shid' lam" geim" mae cejham: khyo we' sin: yang naonhaung" re ta" peim: byid' ra" khyo" yang naonhaung" myid mae san sin" ra" khyo" ba: myid genae" qhid' mae" ngo qam: ke' yang: ta" ru ngad: ra" .
Gyang" Lho" ra" lapa qeyang ganhae" ta" to: co' ko" ra" mungdao: jham re we' naonhaung" lagyo: qeyang byid' to: co' ra" Asang we' khyad' yu: ra" Asang: amyin" dao: re naonhaung" re ngo myid: beim: nhao nug: ra" .
Ai: lo" thao" ra" ba na mae yao: bam yao" gaung sho: shab' ra" khyo: yang khang" mung: kaoso' daui: ra" byu qe na: thug' li" genae" ngad: rure naonhaung" sao qhid' ba: to: ca" ako" . Yao: bam wa naonhaung" re jung" gaui mung:-
yao: wa dam: li" nae" ga: dao: so: byid' to: co' ra" mangad: i? Yao: khai: mae ngad: i? Ngonhaung" phug' pho" qe wa shid: byaug avako" . Ngadqere: ja: khao: ngo" wa ana" joe" sho' mug: myid re phan" to" ra" au: we' dakhyo: za: ngad: ra"- ga: naonhaung" re myid' li" genae .
Ganhae" Mao" So wa amyin" byid: mung: mug: gaung we' myid gaung re phan" to" ru we' myid gaung re qid: yang kyae yang: qid khug mae" thug' li" nhao mung:-
ganhae" mae" ai: mug: myid xug' rere: qid: yang yao: daqid shi: yang nhai" pye' ra" khyo re yao: bam wa thaug yao: maba geim kad' ako" .
Ngadqere: ana" jo; jo; ra" mug: gaung we' myid gaung re myi" yang ngha" pye' nae" qhid' mae" azhao: mae" Mao" So: amyin" dao" yang tang" to: byid' ra" . Mao" So: khyo macao" ra" mo, dao kho' qhug' ru we' phyo' pye' qhug' ra" ba na joe" sho' aijham re zam" to" ra" .
Ngadqere: nga" jhid' de; ra" mao: nhaung: qe we"- Asang: nho: qhid' kheim: mae daba wa zin na dataung we' dakhyo: zin na dataung wa daba za: ngad: rure dato" myhid' ge, .
Damyo" myid: jho ko" ru we' dakhyo:- Mao" So wa yao: dao: so: byid' to" rure kad' nae" mayam" ngad: ra"- ai: atha" yao: wa naonhaung" re nhag' lam: qhang qhang to: byid' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: wa naonhaung" dayaug rere: jeim" lo" byaug genae" rure yao: mangaui ngad: ra" . Byu alhab' mo, re yao: bam: qobo jham mae" phaug' lo genae" rure kam" wa yao: o: ra" .
Asang: Ba Na wa khug' hab' we' dakhyo: joe" li" nae" . Ai: Ba Na mae mug: gaung wa- lao thao wa shau ga: myang yang: byaug: lo" li" nae" . Mug: gaung mae" ba kyi lho" mo" jham wa nga" jeim" lo" byaug; li" genae"- mug: myid dao mae" ja: khao: ngo" wa baui" byaug; lo" li" genae" .
Ai: ja: cao jab alhab' wa cekhyo" byo; qeim: lo" li" genae" ngad mung: naonhaung" wa khoru" ra" mo, ngad ca" ko" i? Naonhaung" wa Mao" So: Ba Na re lao" na mung: ai: ba na phyad joe" li" nae" qhid' mae" gai: boe" ra" qhi" qam: ke' na ko" au:-
naonhaung" kaoso' daui khyo wa gyang" lho" ru we' Mao" So re qhaug' byid' to: qo: ako" . Ai: Ba Na mae mug: gaung wa nga" jeim" lo" byaug: li" nae"- mug: gaung mae" ba kyi lho" mo" jham wa laung so' yang kao: yhug' pye' ru qhug' li" genae" .
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: dao: so: byid' to" ra" din: man" mo, na nae" yham jo; ra" mug: gaung sag' we' myid gaung sag' re lao" na: bam: ra" .
Airumung: nga" ba nam qe we"- ai: Ba Na re naonhaung" lao" na ko" au:- Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae gyang" san: ru we' qo mabo lo: yao: we' mang: dae yaug yo nae" qhid' mae" gai: boe" ra" qhi" qam: ke' ge,-
Ngonhaung" jhid' de; ra" mao: nhaung: pho" Polu wa Mao" So byid' ra" nyan: pha,jhi" re ci yang: naonhaung" re mugsug' tung" ke' ru we' dakhyo: ngonhaung" Asang: nhag' lam: qhang: ru wa naonhaung" khyad' yu: ru qhug' genae" qhid' mae" akho: akhang" agu byid' na: ru ngad: ra" khyo re ba: yu ge,-
Polu wa cekhyo we' sin: yang: yao: tung" vhin: ke' ra" vhin tung" alhab' mae ce: khyo" tung" to" ra" . Polu vhin tung" jham mae ba: gyo: qug' ra" khyo jham daqhae: bo mung: adu: adae: mo, we' lam khug: myid maqo" ra" mo, wa aijham re gatau: Jham: dau jham we' dakhyo: lajheim: shad' ra" khyo" ta" pye' ako" . Airumung: yao: bam wa yao: bam yao" gaung re phyo' qheim" yu: ako" .
Ngadqere: nga" ba nam qe we"- ce: khyo re naonhaung" ba gau ngad: ako" . Airumung: naonhaung" wa tarha" macao" ra" byu qe shad' ra" khyo" yang naonhaung" re majhui" nghung" lo" genae" qhid' mae" we' gang" tang: jo; rumae" magyang: lo" genae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" lha" ge, .
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" Asang we' khyad' yu: Asang Yesu Khristu nho: nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' laba lajhao mae xo' yang: qi" qhang: li" ge,- Asang wa ana" mae" apyad ato phungbao qi" qhang: jo, vashao: wo"- Amen .
Ngonhaung" wa sao qhid' maqhid mae" jo; jo; ra" kaoso' mungdao: khyo re naonhaung" re tung" vhin: ke' ra" . Aimung dao: re ngonhaung" the' gyo: va"- ngonhaung" yao" myo; yang yao: the' myao va"- ngad: va"- ai re ngonhaung" the' myao va"- ngonhaung" yao" lo; yang yao: aire the' tin: va" .
Ce: kaoso' myao: thug' li" au: ngonhaung" myao: lo: bam va" . Airumung: ai: khyo re ngonhaung" jhau mung: Pho" we' daga" na yang: ngonhaung" re qhu" byid' ra" apyad ato: kaoso' khyo we' sin: yang: naonhaung" re ta" hau" kyo: byid' ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Pho" we' yao" Yao: Zo: Yesu Khristu we' jho" zam" khug: ra" khyo qo" yu va" rumae naonhaung" re: ngonhaung" we' daga" qo" bobo genae" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" the' myao va" ru we' ngonhaung" the' gyo" yu va" gu: re naonhaung" rere: ta" hau" kyo: byid' ra" .
Ngonhaung" nho: ngaui bau" ru jab byang" sho' boe" nae" qhid' mae" ce: vhin tung" re ngonhaung" tung" ke' ru ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa bo" bao ngad: ru we' yao: mae mug: cad' dajhid' re: mabo ga" ra" ce: mungdao: re yao" Yao: Zo: mae" ngonhaung" the' gyo" yu mung: naonhaung" re ngonhaung" ta" hau" ra" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" wa yao: we' daga" zam" khug: na: ru ngad: ga: ta" ngadqere: mug: cad' khug mae na: jo; ngad: re wa ngonhaung" wa nhad' dao: thoe we' lo, mau" shid' ja" geim" mae mhug' na mo, ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: yao: wa mug: bo" mae na: ru we' dakhyo: ngonhaung" wa mug: bo" mae na: bam: ngad: re ngonhaung" wa yao: cao: jho" zam" khug: na mo, ngad: ra" . Amung: yao" Yao: Zo: Yesu Khristu nho: sa" yang qobo ja: khao: ngo" mae" ngonhaung" re kyang" san: pye' byid' ra" .
Ngonhaung" qobo maqo" ein: ta" bam: ngad: re ngonhaung" wa yao: yao" gaung re mhug' pyag' mo, ngad mung: ngonhaung" khug mae dangman" ru mabo ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" nho: qobo jham re lhang: yu: bam: ngad: re kam" wa yao: wa yao" dao: so: re dang sho' kad' mung: din: vang" ra" khyo" kad' li" li" nae" . Yao: wa ngonhaung" nho: qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid: mung: ngonhaung" shad' nghung" ra" qobo jham alhab' rere: kyang" san: pye' byid' li" nae" ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa qobo makad' lai: lo ein: ta" bam: ngad: re ngonhaung" wa Mao" So re mhug' hab' khyo" toe' pye' yang: yao" dao: wa ngonhaung" khug mae mabo ngad: ra" .
Nga" zo: dau qe we"- naonhaung" qobo makad' genae" qhid' mae" ce: vhin tung" naonhaung" re tung" ke' ra" . Ngadqere: dayaug yaug qobo kad' yang: ngad: re ngonhaung" gaung tha" Pho" re bobao" goe; mho' byid' ra" byu dayaug qo: ra" . Ai: yaug wa din: man: yaug Yesu Khristu ngad: ra" .
Khristu wa Ngonhaung" qobo jham: qhid' mae" qobo jhin xe' pye' byid: mung: ngonhaung" qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid' ra" . Ngonhaung" qobo jham: qhid' mae" za: mangad:- yaug khao: ngo" qhid' mae" re: qobo jhin xe' pye' byid: yaug ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" ngad: re wa yao: re ngonhaung" ba se" rure ngonhaung" zhaug' za: ba: ra" .
Byu dayaug yaug wa Mao" So re ba: ga: ta" ngadqere: yao" amyin" dao: jham re maphug' cao" ngad: re wa airu" ra" yaug wa mhug' hab' ngad mung: yao" khug mae dangman" ru mabo ngad: ra" .
Mao" So: mungdao: re phug' cao" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao" khug mae" Mao" So: jhid' de; myid wa gaigai: yao: jab byang" sho' qhu" byid' ava" . Ngonhaung" wa Mao" So we' dagaung dasho: za: doe; na: rure cekhyo" yang ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Yao: wa Mao" So we' dagaung dasho: za: doe; na yaug ngad: ga: ta" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Yesu Khristu kaoso' daui: ru we' dakhyo:- kaoso' daui ca" ra" .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- ngo naonhaung" re tung" vhin: ke' ra" ce: amyin" dao: wa asag' mangad:- ai: aqhid mae" naonhaung" qo" yu: to" ra" amyin" dao: axug' ngad: ra" . Ai: amyin" dao: axug' wa naonhaung" gyo" qu" vako" ra" mungdao: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ngo ana" naonhaung" re tung" ke' ra" amyin" dao: wa Asag' ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ai: amyin" dao" nho: dangman" ru wa Khristu mae the' myao mung: naonhaung" mae re: the' myao: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re mug: cad' wa lai: lo" byaug mung: mug: bo" agyang" wa zho: bao: na: ava" .
Yao: wa mug: bo" khug mae na yaug ngad: ga: ta" ngadqere: yao: yao" mao: nhaung: pho" re nghang" ra" yaug wa ana" joe" sho' ai: mug: cad' khug mae na: jo, yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: yao" mao: nhaung: pho" re jhid' de; ra" yaug wa mug: bo" khug mae na: ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: wa khag' rere: yao" mathao mae qobo shad' nhao nae" mangad: .
Ngadqere: yao: yao" mao: nhaung: pho" re nghang" ra" yaug wa mug: cad' khug mae na: jo, yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: wa ai: mug: cad' khug mae su" na mung: yao: khai: ye" lo" na: ru maba ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ai: mug: cad' wa yao: re myo, jid boe" nhao: ra" .
Nga" zo: dau qe we"- naonhaung" wa Khristu mathao mae naonhaung" qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid: qhug' vako" ruyang ngo naonhaung" re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" .
Pho" qe we"- naonhaung" wa sao qhid' maqhid mae" na: jo; ra" yaug re ba mo, ngad ko" ruyang ngo naonhaung" re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" . Zolau: qe we"- naonhaung" wa ai: Makhyang" ra" Yaug re aung: pye' vako" ruyang ngo naonhaung" re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" .
Nga" zo: dau qe we"- naonhaung" wa ai: Pho" re ba ko" ruyang ngo naonhaung" re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" . Pho" qe we"- naonhaung" wa sao qhid' maqhid' mae" na: jo; ra" yaug re ba ko" ruyang ngo naonhaung" re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" . Zolau: qe we"- naonhaung" wa qam: bo ko" ruyang re:- Mao" So: mungdao: wa naonhaung" khug mae kaoso' daui: na: ruyang re:- naonhaung" wa ai: makhyang" ra" yaug re aung: pye' vako" ruyang re: ngo naonhaung" re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" .
Mug: myid re dajhid' de, ge,- mangad: lao" ai: mug: myid we' sin" ra" ja: re dajhid' de, ge,- naonhaung" ai: mug: myid re jhid' de; ko" ngad: re wa Pho" re majhid' de, ko" ngad: ra" .
Gaung sho: shab' ru- myo; yang myao mung: kao bau myid: o: ru- ce: mug: myid dao: byu qe mae phug nhao: ra" ja: ru" ra" ce: myid gaung we' sin" ra" ja: daja: re: ai: Pho" mae" joe" li" ru mangad: ngad: ra" . Ai: gu: alhab' wa mug: myid mae" thug' li" ru ngad: ra" .
Mug: myid we' ai: mae na: ra" byu qe kao bau myid: o: ra" ja: alhab' wa lai: lo" na: ra" . Ngadqere: Mao" So myid o: rure phug' cao" ra" yaug wa apyad ato kaoso' daui: na: ra" .
Nga" zo: dau qe we"- lo" thao" ayo, wa jhao" va" ra" . Naonhaung" re ta" kyo" to" ra" Khristu nho: Gyevo wa joe" li" nae" ngad: ra" . Ana" yao: Khristu nho: gyevo qe myo: sho' mo, thug' joe" na: bam: avako" . Airumung: lo" thao" ayo, wa jhao" va" rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Ai: byu qe wa ngonhaung" nho: phaung mae" mo, mangad: ko" rumung: yao: bam wa ngonhaung" mae" thug' lo" byaug: avako" . Yao: bam wa ngonhaung" nho: phaung mae" mo, ngad ko" re wa yao: bam ngonhaung" we' daga" na genae" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: yao: bam mae" dayaug re: ngonhaung" nho: phaung mae" mo, mangad' rure de: de: za: myao: thug' li" nae" qhid' mae" yao: bam wa ngonhaung" mae" thug' lo" byaug: ako" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" wa Khristu yang Gyang" Lho" Byo vhe' sheim: byid' ru qhug' avako" . Aimung: naonhaung" alhab' mo, wa ai: dangman" rure ba: ako" .
Ai rumung: ai: dangman" rure naonhaung" maba geyang: ngo naonhaung" re mugsug' tung" ke' ru mangad:- ai: atha" ai: dangman" rure naonhaung" ba ko" ru we' ai: dangman" rumae" mhug' ru khonhae" re: mathug' li" rure re: naonhaung" ba geyang: ngo naonhaung" re tung" ke' ru ngad: ra" .
Airulao"- mhug' hab' khag' ngad: ra" i? Ai: mhug' hab' wa Yesu re Meshia mangad: ga: ta" ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Airu" yaug wa Khristu nho: Gyevo ngad mung: yao: wa yao: Pho" we' yao: Zo: re ngag: ha: pye' ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: Zo: re ngag: ha: pye' yaug wa yao: Pho" rere: ngag: ha: pye' yaug ngad: ra" . Airumung: yao: Zo: re khae: yu: ra" yaug wa yao: Pho" rere: khae: yu: ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
Airumung: sao qhid' maqhid mae" naonhaung" the' gyo" yu ko" ra" ai: mungdao: re naonhaung" aung khug nhag' lam: mae ke' to: ge,- ai: mungdao: re naonhaung" nhag' lam: mae ke' ci ko" ngad: re wa naonhaung" wa yao: Zo: we' re: yao: Pho" we' re: dagaung dasho: za: khonhae" re: doe, yang: kaoso' daui: na: li" genae" .
Ceru wa Khristu yao: ngonhaung" re byid: nae" dao: so: byid' to" ra" apyad ato: kaoso' ngad: ra" .
Naonhaung" re mhug' pyag' yu nae" qam: ke' na ko" ra" mo; khyo we' sin: yang: ngo naonhaung" re mugsug' tung" ke' ru ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: naonhaung" re kam" wa Khristu wa naonhaung" dao mae yao" Byo vhe' sheim: byid' ava" . Naonhaung" dao mae yao" Byo ana: jo, jo, wa naonhaung" re khag' yang re: mho" shid' byid: maqo ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao" Byo wa ja: khao: ngo" naonhaung" re mho" shid' byid' ra" . Ai: Byo: yang mho" shid' byid' ra" gu: wa dangman" ru ngad mung: shad' nghung" ru mabo ngad: ra" . Airumung: Byo: yang mho" shid' ra" khyo re phug' cao" mung: Khristu we' dagaung dasho: za: doe, yang: kaoso' daui: na ge, .
Ngad va"- nga" zo: dau qe we"- yao: joe" li" ra" ba na mae yao: re qho' yang: phao: vho' maqo lo: yao" qhid' kheim: mae mazag mavae qo" ye; jo, genae" qhid' mae" yao: we' dadang: dalam: za: doe; na ge,-
Khristu wa din: man: yaug ngad: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" . Airumung: jo: ra" mau" re kad' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa Mao" So: zo: dau ngad: rure naonhaung" ba: na nae" ngad: ra" .
Pho" wa ngonhaung" re khoqhi" sho' jhid' de; rure qu" qu" ge,- yao" jhid' de; myid wa gyai qi" qhang: jo; ruyang ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: zo: dau qe ga: mhang" ru qhug' va" . Gai gai: yao: ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: zo: dau qe ngad: ra" . Ce: khyo: mathao mae myid gaung byu qe ngonhaung" re maba ko" ru wa yao: bam Mao" So re sao qhid' maba geyang: ngad: ra" .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- ana" ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: zo: dau qe ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ngonhaung" pe" boe" nae" ru de: de: za: maba ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: Khristu thug' li" lao" ngonhaung" wa yao: we' dau nae" ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" wa yao: re yao: the' myao nae" ngad: ra" .
Khristu mae ce: myid: lao" khyo qo" ra" yaug khao: ngo" wa Khristu wa gyang" san yaug ngad: ru we' dakhyo: yao: yao" gaung re gyang" san sho' kad' yaug ngad: ra" .
Qobo shad' lhoe" yaug khag' ngadqere: Mao" So kham" to" ra" tarha" re lhoe" ra" qobo qo" ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re tarha" re lhoe" ra" khyo wa qobo ngad: ra" .
Khristu wa qobo jham re yu: pye' byid: nae" qhid' mae" thug' li" va" rure naonhaung" ba: ako" . Yao: mae qobo made, ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Khristu we' dagaung dasho: za: doe, mung: kaoso' daui: ra" yaug wa xo' yang: qobo makad' ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: xo' yang: qobo kad' ra" yaug wa Khristu re mamyao: qu" yaug mangad: lao"- maba shi" yaug ngad: ra" .
Nga" zo: dau qe we"- khag' yang re: naonhaung" re damhug' pyag' nhao: pye' ge,- Khristu wa din: man: yaug ngad: ru we' dakhyo: din: man" ra" mau" zaui: so" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: din: man" ra" yaug ngad: ra" .
xo' yang: qobo kad' ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa min: yui: nho: byu ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re min: yui wa sao qhid' maqhid' mae" qobo kad' lo yaug ngad: ra" . Ai: min: yui: nho: lo, mau" re phyo' pye' nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yao: zo: joe" li" ru ngad: ra" .
Mao" So: zo: dau ngad: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: xo' yang: qobo makad' ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: ve, khyao wa yao" khug mae bo: jo; ra" . Mao" So wa yao" yao: Pho" ngad: ruyang yao: wa xo' yang: qobo maqo" kad' ngad: ra" .
Ce wa Mao" So: zo: dau qe we' min: yui: nho: zo: dau qe: agyo: mae de: de: za: jho" shai" ra" khyo ngad: ra" . Jo: ra" mau" zo" makad' ra" yaug- mangad: lao" yao: yao" mao: nhaung: pho" re majhid' de; ra" yaug wa Mao" So: zo: dau mangad: ngad: ra" .
Sao qhid' maqhid mae" naonhaung" gyo" yu ko" ra" mungdao: wa- ngonhaung" wa yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; ca" ga" ra" mungdao: ceru ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa Ka-in: we' magai: dau ngad: ra" . Yao: wa ai: makhyang" ra" yaug we' sin" ra" yaug ngad mung: yao" yao: nhaung: Abela re se' pye' ra" . Ka-in wa pe"mung: yao: re se' ra" i? Yao" lo, mau" wa shad' mung: yao: nhaung" nho: lo, mau" wa jo: ruyang ngad: ra" .
Airumung: nga" mao: nhaung: qe we"- myid gaung byu qeyang naonhaung" re nghang: ko" re damyid: mug' ge, .
Ngonhaung" wa ngonhaung" yao" mao: nhaung: qere jhid' de; va" ruyang shid: rure to" pye' co' yang: kaoso' daui: ra" khyo lai: vao: ye: va" ra" khyo re ngonhaung" ba: ra" . Jhid' de; myid mabo: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: shid: runho: qam: so' khug mae na: jo; ashi" .
Yao" mao: nhaung: pho" re nghang" ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: byu se' yaug ngad: ra" . Amung: byu se' yaug mae apyad ato: kaoso' mabo: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Khristu wa ngonhaung" qhid' mae" yao" kaoso' re byid' pye' va" ruyang ngonhaung" wa jhid' de; myid pe" ngad: rure ba: bam va" . Airumung: ngonhaung" re: ngonhaung" nho: kaoso' re ngonhaung" mao: nhaung: qe: qhid' mae" byid' pye' ang: ra" .
Jo,nho" qo" ra" byu dayaug wa yao" mao: nhaung: pho" myaung sho" na: rure the' myao ngadqere: nhag' maqu" khyag' ra" yaug wa Mao" So re jhid' de; ga: khoru: qo" ta" nae" i?
Nga" zo: dau qe we"- ngonhaung" nho: jhid' de; myid wa nhad' dao: thoe za: magai: ngad ngad: ra" . Lo, mau" khyo" qhu" byid' ra" dangman" ra" jhid' de; myid ngad qo: ra" .
Airu: mung: ce: khyo" yang ngonhaung" wa dangman" ru we' sin" ra" mo, ngad: rure ba nae" ngad: ra" . Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae re: lam lam za: qo" ye; li" nae" .
Ngonhaung" nho: aung khug nhag' lam" yang ngonhaung" re dao: phyid' yang: ngad: re wa Mao" So wa ngonhaung" nho: aung khug: nhag' lam: tho' je: qi: yaug ngad: ru we' ja: khao: ngo" re ba yaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Airumung: nga" jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- ngonhaung" nho: aung khug: nhag' lam" yang ngonhaung" re dao: maphyid' yang: ngad: re wa ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae mazag mavae: myid qo" li" nae" ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao" amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" mung: yao" nga: ye; ra" mau" zo" re kad' mo, ngad: ruyang ngonhaung" mho' yao: ra" ja: pe" ngadqere: yao" lo, mae" qo" khae: yu nae" ngad: ra" .
Mao" So: amyin" dao: jham wa Yao" yao: Zo: Yesu Khristu re ngonhaung" lam" mung: Khristu yao: ngonhaung" re amyin" byid' to: co' ru we' dakhyo: yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; qo: ra" ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Mao" So: amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" ra" yaug wa Mao" So we' dagaung dasho: doe, yang: kaoso' daui yaug ngad mung: Mao" So re: yao: we' dagaung dasho: za: doe, yang: na: ra" . Mao" So: yang ngonhaung" re byid' to" ra" khyo" yang Mao" So wa ngonhaung" we' dagaung dasho: za: doe; na: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Nga" Jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- Byo re qo" khae: yu yang: ngad: ga: ta" ra" mo, alhab' re dalam" ge,- ngadqere: yao: bam qo" khae: yu: to" ra" byo wa Mao" So mae" joe" li" ru ngad mangad: rure jham" qu" ge,- pe"mung: ga"re lapa pyag' qe myo: sho' wa khyi" khao: ngo" khyo thug' ye" lo" byaug: avako" .
Mao" So: byo ngad mangad: rure naonhaung" ba genae" ra" khyo wa ceru: ngad: ra" . Yesu Khristu wa xao su byu ve, vin yang: joe" li" yaug ngad: ra" khyo re lhang: yu: ra" Byo wa Mao" So mae" joe" li" ra" Byo ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: ceru re ha: pye' ra" yaug wa Mao" So mae" joe" li" ra" Byo re qo" khae: yu: ra" yaug mangad: ngad: ra" . Yao: qo" yu: to" ra" byo wa Khristu nho: Gyevo pho" mae" joe" li" ra" byo ngad: ra" . Ai: byo joe" li" nae" rure naonhaung" the' gyo" to: gau ngad: ako" . Ai: byo wa ana" ce: mug: myid dao mae joe" na: ava" .
Nga" zo: dau qe we"- naonhaung" wa Mao" So: byu qe ngad gemung: lapa apyag' qere aung: pye' avako" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" khug mae na: ra" Byo wa ai: mug: myid byu qe: khug mae na: ra" byo tho' qam: so' je: bo yaug ngad: ra" .
Lapa apyag' qe wa mug: myid we' sin" ra" khyo re ta" ako" . Mug: myid wa yao: bam re tae" gyo: byid' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa mug: myid byu qe ngad: ako" .
Ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: byu qe ngad: ra" . Mao" So re ba: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: ngonhaung" ta" ra" dao: re tae" gyo" ra"- Mao" So: byu mangad: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: ngonhaung" nho: dao: re matae" gyo: ngad: ra" . Airumung: ceru re qu" yang: dangman" runho: Byo we' shad' runho: byo khoru: jho" shai" rure ngonhaung" qo" ba: kho' ta" ra" .
Jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- ngonhaung" yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; gelang:- pe"mung: ga"re jhid' de; myid wa Mao" So mae" joe" li" ru ngad: ra" . Jhid' de; myid bo: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Mao" So: zo: dau ngad mung: yao: wa Mao" So re ba yaug ngad: ra" .
Jhid' de, myid mabo: ra" yaug wa Mao" So re maba ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So wa jhid' de; myid ngad: ra" .
Ngonhaung" wa yao: Zo: khyo" yang kaoso' qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So wa yao" zote: Zo: re mug: myid khyo nhao: ke' byid' ra" khyo" yang yao" jhid' de; myid ngonhaung" re qhu" byid' ava" .
Jhid' de; myid ga" ru wa ceru ngad: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa Mao" So re sao qhid' jhid' de; ru mangad:- Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re jhid' de; mung: ngonhaung" qobo jham re khyad' pye' byid: nae" qhid' mae" yao" yao: Zo: re nhao: ke' byid' ru ngad: ra" .
Jhid' de; ra" ba nam qe we"- Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re ceqhi" jhid' de; yang: ngad: re wa ngonhaung" re: yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; nae" ngad: ra" .
Mao" So re khag' khonhae" re: mamyao: qu" ngad: ra" . Ngadqere: ngonhaung" wa yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; ngad: re wa Mao" So wa ngonhaung" we' dagaung dasho: za: kaoso' daui mung: yao" jhid' de; myid wa ngonhaung" khug mae jab byang" nhao: ra" .
Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re yao" Byo byid' to: va" ruyang ngonhaung" wa Mao" So we' dagaung dasho: za: kaoso' daui: na: rure we' yao: re: ngonhaung" we' dadang: dalam: za: kaoso' daui: na: rure ngonhaung" jhaug' za: ba: ra" .
Yao: Pho" wa yao" yao: Zo: re mug: myid byu qenho: Khyad' Yu: Asang boe" nhao nae" qhid' mae" nhao: ke' ra" khyo re ngonhaung" the' myao yang: ai: khyo re su gaje qere re: ngonhaung" ta" kyo: byid' ra" .
Yesu wa Mao" So: yao: Zo: ngad: ra" ga: ta" lhang: yu: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa Mao" So we' dagaung dasho: za: kaoso' daui yaug ngad mung: Mao" So re: yao: we' dagaung dasho: za: kaoso' daui: ra" .
Mao" So: yang ngonhaung" re byid' to" ra" jhid' de; myid re ngonhaung" yao: ngonhaung" ba mung: lam: ra" . Mao" So wa jhid' de; myid ngad: ra" . Jhid' de; myid khug mae kaoso' daui: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: wa Mao" So we' dagaung dasho: za: na mung: Mao" So re: yao: we' dagaung dasho: za: na: ra" .
Ai: dao: kho' ra" Ba Na mae ngonhaung" mazag mavae ngad nae" qhid' mae" jhid' de; myid wa ngonhaung" khug mae jab byang" nhao: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ce: mug: myid dao mae ngonhaung" kaoso' daui: ra" khyo wa Khristu nho: kaoso' daui khyo we' dakhyo: za: ngad: ruyang ai: vae" ra" myid re ngonhaung" qo" yu: li" nae" .
Jhid' de; myid mae gyaug: ru mabo ngad: ra" . Jab byang" ra" jhid' de; myid wa gyaug ci" ru alhab' re khe' thug' pye' ra" . Airumung: gyaug: ra" yaug khag' mae re: jhid' de; myid majab byang" ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re gyaug myid wa qobo dae byid' ru we' sin" ru ngad: ra" .
Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re sao qhid' jhid' de; yang: ngonhaung" jhid' de; ru ngad: ra" .
Byu dayaug yaug- yao: wa Mao" So re jhid' de; yaug ngad: ga: ta" ngadqere: yao: yao" mao: nhaung: pho" re nghang" ngad: re wa yao: wa mhug' hab' ngad: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re yao: myao: ra" yao" mao: nhaung: pho" re yao: majhid' de, ngad: re wa yao: mamyao: qu" ra" Mao" So re yao: khoru: magai: jhid' de; ngad: ra" .
Khristu ngonhaung" re byid' to" ra" amyin" dao: wa- Mao" So re jhid' de; ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: yao: yao" mao: nhaung: pho" rere: jhid' de; ca" ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Yesu re Meshia ngad: ga: lam" ra" yaug khag' ngad qere: Mao" So: yao: zo: ngad: ra" . Yao: pho" re jhid' de; ra" yaug khag' ngad qere: ai: yao: Zo: rere: jhid' de; ra" .
Mao" So re jhid' de; mung: yao" amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: zo: dau qere jhid' de; ra" khyo re ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ngonhaung" Mao" So re jhid' de; ga" ru wa yao" amyin" dao: jham re phug' cao" ru ngad: ra" . Yao" amyin" dao: jham wa ngonhaung" qhid' mae" gyai mataung" qug: ngad: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: zo: dau yaug khao: ngo" wa mug: myid re qo" aung: pye' ra" . Ngonhaung" wa ai: mug: myid re ngonhaung" nho: lam khug: myid khyo" yang aung: pye' ra" .
Ai: mug: myid re khag' qo" aung: pye' ra" i? Yesu wa Mao" So: yao: Zo: ngad: ga: lam" ra" yaug za: qo" aung: pye' ra" .
Yesu Khristu wa yao" nho: Qid nyhab' kham: yu ra" qid we' yao" nho: shid: ra" sa: we' joe" li" ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Yao: wa qid khyo" yang za: joe" li" ru mangad:- qid we' sa: shid' ja: geim" we' joe" li" yaug ngad: ra" . Ce: ra" khyo dangman" rure Byo yao: yao: sagse: kham byid' ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re ai: Byo wa dangman" ru ngad: ra" .
Sagse: sam ja: jo; ra" .
Ai jham wa Byo- Qid we' Sa: jham ngad: ako" . Ai: sagse: sam ja: gu: alhab' wa sagse: daja: re za: kham: ako" .
Byu: nho: sagse: dao: re ngonhaung" lam" ra" . Ngad qere: Mao" So: sagse: dao: wa je yang: lam ga" ra" . Mao" So: sagse: kham: ra" khyo wa yao" yao: Zo" nho: khyo we' sin: yang: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: Mao" So: yao: Zo: re lam" ra" yaug khag' ngad qere: yao: yao" nhag' lam: khug mae ce: sagse: kham: ru bo: jo; ra" . Ngad qere: Mao" So re malam: ra" yaug wa Mao" So re mhug' hab' ga: jho: ra" . Pe"mung: ga" re yao: wa yao: Zo" nho: khyo we' sin: yang: Mao" So ta" to" ra" dao: re malam" yang: ngad; ra" .
Ai: sagse: dao: wa Mao" So wa ngonhaung" re apyad ato: kaoso' byid' to: mung:- Yao" nho: yao: Zo: wa ai: kaoso' nho: ajhaung ngad: ra" .
Yao: Zo: re qo" yaug khag' ngad qere: kaoso' re qo" yaug ngad: ra" . Mao" So: yao: Zo: re maqo" ra" yaug wa kaoso' maqo" ngad: ra" .
Mao" So: yao: Zo: re lam" ko" ra" mo, naonhaung" wa apyad ato: kaoso' re qo" yu vako" ra" khyo re naonhaung" ba genae" qhid' mae" ngo wa naonhaung" re ce: mugsug' tung" vhin: ke' ru ngad: ra" .
Yao" myid o: rure cao" yang: ngonhaung" wa yao: re daja: ja: mho' yang: ngad: re yao: ngonhaung" re tae" gyo: byid: nae" ngad: rure ngonhaung" jhaug' za: ba: ruyang ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae mazag mavae qo" vao ye" ra" .
Ngonhaung" yao: re khonhae" mho' ngad qere: yao: tae" gyo: byid' ra" . Cera" khyo dang: rure ngonhaung" ba: ruyang yao: mae" ngonhaung" mho' ra" ja: ngonhaung" re byid' li" nae" rure re: ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Mao: nhaung: dayaug shid man" ra" qobo mangad' ra" qobo shad' rure nao myao: re nao wa yao" qhid' mae" Mao" So re akyu" bao" mho' byid: qo: ra" . Mao" So wa yao: re kaoso' byid' li" nae" . Ceru wa shid man" ra" qobo mangad: lo: qobo shad' ra" mo; qhid' mae" za: ngad: ra" . Ngad qere: shid man" ra" qobo ga" ru jo; ra" . Shid man" ra" qobo shad' ra" mo; qhid' mae" akyu" bao" mho' byid: ca" ein: ta" ru mangad:-
Shad' nghung" ra" lo, mau" alhab' wa qobo ngad: ra" . Ngad qere: shid man" ra" qobo mangad: ra" qobo ga" ru jo; ra" .
Mao" So: zo: dau ngad yaug wa xo' yang: qobo makad' rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" . Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So: yao: Zo: wa yao: re gug: gam byid: yang: makhyang" ra" yaug wa yao: re dae maqo" te' ngad: ra" .
Mug: myid geim" wa ai: makhyang" yaug: yang eib: ra" qao: mae ngad: jo, sho' ngad qere: ngonhaung" wa Mao" So: byu qe ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" .
Dang man" ra" Mao" So re ngonhaung" ba nae" qhid' mae" Mao" So: yao: Zo: wa joe" li" mung: ba: gyo" ra" laba lajhao re byid: yaug ngad: rure ngonhaung" ba: ra" . Ngonhaung" wa dangman" ra" Mao" So we' dagaung dasho: doe; na: ra" . Ai wa Yao" yao: Zo: Yesu Khristu we' ngonhaung" dagaung dasho: za: doe; na: ru ngad: ra" . Ceru wa dangman" ra" Mao" So ngad mung: ce wa apyad ato kaoso' ngad: ra" .
Nga" zo: dau qe we"- so apyag' jham re jao" pye' ge, .
Lau: de, pho" ngo wa ngo dang dang jhid' de; mung:- jhid' de; ra" myiqe: myhi" re we' yao" zo: dau qere mugsug' tung" ke' ra" . Nao re ngo dayaug za: jhid' de; ru mangad:- ai: dangman" rure ba: ra" mo, alhab' yang nao re jhid' de; ako" .
Pe"mung: ga"re ai: dangman" ru wa ngonhaung" khug mae bo: jo, mung: ngonhaung" we' khonhae" re: ngad: jo; li" nae" ru ngad: ra" .
Pho" Mao" So we' Pho" nho: yao: Zo: Yesu Khristu wa ai: dangman" ra" khyo re ba mung: yao: cao: jho" jhid' de; ra" nhag' myan" ra" jeju- nhag' khyag' shogu: ru we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ra" shaman" jeju byid: vashao: wo" .
Ni" zo: dau qemae" damyo" wa Pho" Mao" So: yang ngonhaung" re amyin" byid' to" ru we' dakhyo: ai: dangman" rumae kaoso' daui: na ko" rure ngo the' myao yang: ngo ngaui bau" ra" .
Airumung: jhid' de; ra" myiqe: myhi" we"- ngo naonhaung" re tung" vhin: ke' ra" amyin" dao: wa asag' mangad:- sao qhid' maqhid mae" ngonhaung" qo" yu: to" ra" amyin" dao: ngad: ra" .
Ngo ta" ra" ce: jhid' de; myid wa Mao" So: amyin" dao: jham re ngonhaung" phug' cao" yang: kaoso' daui: ru ga" ru ngad: ra" . Sao qhid' maqhid mae" naonhaung" alhab' mo, the' gyo" yu ko" ra" amyin" dao: wa naonhaung" alhab' wa jhid' de; myid mae kaoso' daui ca" ga" ru ngad: ra" .
Yesu Khristu wa xao su byu: gaung khyao ve, vin yang: joe" li" ru ngad: ra" khyo re makhae: yu: ra" mo, ngad: ra" mhug' pyag' zo: mo, myo: sho' wa mug: myid geim" khyo thug' ye" lo" byaug: avako" . Airu" ra" yaug wa mhug' pyag' zo: yaug ngad mung: Khristu nho: gyevo ngad: ra" .
Airumung: naonhaung" wa lha" yang: na ge,- airu: lao" naonhaung" qhid' mae" ngonhaung" zaui: so: byid' lo: ra" lo, mau" akyu" re aseim" maboe" nhao lo:- ai: aphug' jhaung qhu" re jab byang" sho' naonhaung" qo" khae: yu: li" genae" .
Khristu nho: mho" shid' ra" khyo mae kaoso' madaui lo:- ai: mho" shid' khyo re lhoe" yang: kaoso' daui: ra" yaug khag' ngadqere: Mao" So maqo" yaug ngad: ra" . Ai: mho" shid' khyo mae kaoso' daui: ra" yaug khag' ngad qere: Yao: Pho" we' Yao: Zo: re qo" yaug ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ce: mho" shid' khyo re mavin lo:- naonhaung" jhao" dayaug yaug joe" li" ngad: re naonhaung" yham mae yao: re bang" dalham: tug: yu ge,- bang" se" dao: lhao" re: dalham: jhau ge, .
Pe"mung: ga"re yao: re bang" se" dao: lham: jhau: ra" yaug wa yao: kad' ra" makhyang" ra" mau" zo" re bocao: kad' ra" yaug boe" li" ra" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re ta" nae" khyo myo: sho' qo" ra" . Ngadqere: mugsug' khye' mae tung" cid' mhaug' yang tung" to: nug: ru mangad: Airu: tung" nae" atha"- ngonhaung" jab byang" sho' ngaui bau" ru qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" naonhaung" jhao" joe" li" yang: myo,khung: te' ngonhaung" jho" qo" jhau nae" rure ngo myid: lao" ra" .
Nao jhid' de; ra" ni" nhaung" nho: zo: dau qe wa nao re au" ke' ako" .
Ngo lau: de, pho" wa- dang za: jhid' de; ra" nga" jhid' de; ra" Gaiu re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" ba nam pho" we"- ja: khao: ngo" mae nao na gai ye; gai nae" qhid' mae" we' gaung dau: qao" zin" nae" qhid' mae" ngo akyu" mho' byid' ra" . Nao wa Byo mae qao" zin" rure ngo ba: .
Nao wa khonhae" re: ai: dangman" rumae kaoso' daui: ru we' dakhyo: Khristan mao: nhaung: qe damyo" ngojhao" joe" li" ko" au: nao wa dangman" rumae khoqhi" sho' kyid: ra" khyo ngore li" ta" kyo: geyang: ngo gyai ngaui bau" ra" .
Nga" zo: dau qe wa ai: dangman" ra" khyo mae kaoso' daui: na ko" ra" ga" rure the' gyo: yang: ngo ngaui bau" ra" tho' je yang: ngore ngaui bau: nhao: ru pe" majo, lo: ngad: ra" .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" ba nam pho" we"- nao wa Khristan mao: nhaung: qe: qhid' mae" mau" zaui: byid' rumae nao yao: maba mase" ra" Khristan mao: nhaung: qere lhao" re: gyai kyid kyid za: zaui: so: byid: yaug ngad: ra" .
Yao: bam wa ni" jhid' de; ra" gyaung: khyo mae xo' yang: qo" ye" lo" genae" qhid' mae" yao: bam re bao" thaug' byid' ke' wa,-
pe"mung: ga"re yao: bam wa malam khug: ra" mo, mae" bao" thaug' ru daja: re: makhae: yu lo:- Khristu nho: mau" zo" zaui: so: nae" qhid' mae" gyaung: su" lo" mo, ngad: ako" .
Airumung: ngonhaung" Khristan phung: byu qe wa byu cebam re bao" thaug' byid: ca" ra" . Airulao" ngonhaung" wa dangman" ra" khyo qhid' mae" mau" zaui" ra" mo; mau" zaui: cao: qe qo" boboe" nae" ngad: ra" .
Ngo wa Phung: re vhin tung" alang" dakhye' tung" ke' ra" . Ngadqere: ai: phung: au: jhaung kad' nug: ra" Diotrephe wa ngo ta" ke' ra" dao: re pe" matae" gyo: ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ngo joe" li" lao" yao: kad' lai: lo: ra" lo, mau" ja: khao: ngo" re ngo ta" thug' nae" . Yao: wa ngonhaung" khyo we' sin: yang: gyai lhaung: ra" khyo" mhug' ta" to" ra" . Ai za: malaug lo: yao: wa Khristan mao: nhaung: qe joe" li" ko" au:- yao: bam re malham: khae: yu nae" ngad: ra" . Lham: khae yu nug mo, re lhao" re: tam" pye' mung: yao: bam rere: ai: Phung: mae" khe' thug' pye' nae" qam: ke' ra" .
Nga" jhid' de; ra" ba nam pho" we"- magai: ra" ja: re ave, daqu" yu wa, gai: ra" ave, qu" yu wa,- gai: ru kad' ra" yaug wa Mao" So shad' de; ra" yaug ngad: ra" . Magai: ru kad' ra" yaug wa Mao" So re maba mamyao yaug ngad: ra" .
Byu yaug khao: ngo" Demetri re khin" ako" . Dangman" ru wa yao" khyo re sagse: kham byid' ra" . Ngonhaung" re: yao" khyo re sagse: bokham byid: mung: ngonhaung" ta" ra" dao: dang: rure naonhaung" ba: ako" .
Ngo wa naonhaung" re ta" nae" khyo myo: sho' qo" ra" . Ngadqere: mugsug' khye' mae tung" cid' mhaug' yang za: manug: tung" .
Mataung" myao" re nao we' qhug' nae" rure ngo myid: lao" na: . Ailao" nga" shid' zo: myo,khung: te' qo" jho" jhau nae" ngad: ra" .
Ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru wa nao we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" . Ni" ba nam qe alhab' mo, nao re au" ke' ako" . Ngonhaung" nho: ba nam alhab' rere: gaung dau: nghe' yang: cao" au" byid: wa, .
Yesu Khristu nho: daui daui yaug we' Yaku nho: yao: nhaung: ngo Yuda wa- Mao" So: yang khai: yu qhug' mung: Pho" Mao" So: jhid' de; myid mae kaoso' daui: na yang: Yesu Khristu yang gug: gam byid' ra" qao: mae na ko" ra" mo, re mugsug' tung" ke' ra" .
Nhag' khyag' shogu: ru- ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru we' jhid' de; ru wa naonhaung" mae byang" sheim: jo, vashao: wo" .
Nga" ba nam qe we"- ngonhaung" alhab' qo" kham: yu: ra" khyad' yu: ra" khyo we' sin: yang: mugsug' tung" ke' nae" qhid' mae" ngo qam: ke' na: au: re yao" byu qere Mao" So: yang dalhang: dae bin sho' byid' to" ra" lam khug: ra" khyo re gug: gam: na genae" qhid' mae" ana" yao: naonhaung" re qam: byid: dao: vhin: ke' qo: ra" ein: ngo myid: ra" .
Pe"mung: ga"re Mao" So mabo: ra" mo, damyo" wa ngonhaung" phaung khyo sae za: jhug' vao li" mung: na: jo; ako" . Ai bam wa yao: bam yao" gaung sho: gintho' mau" zo" re gai: cao" sho' ngonhaung" Pho" Mao" So: nhag' myan" ra" jeju khyo mungdao: re anai asham" kad' pye' mung: ngonhaung" nho: date: za: ngad: ra" jeim Asang we' Asang ngad: ra" Yesu Khristu re ngag: ha: pye' mo, ngad: ako" . Yao: bam wa ganhae" mae" jham: Mugsug' mae lapa pa: ta" ra" dao: phyid' rure kham zo: nae" mo, ngad: ako" .
Ai: Asang wa Israel byumyu" qere Egutu mung" mae" khoru: khyad' jhui" thug' lo mung: ai: thao re malam khug ko" ra" mo, re se' tam" pye' ra" khyo cegu: alhab' re naonhaung" ba gau ngadqere: ngo naonhaung" re dam: ta" peim: byid: nug: ra" .
Yao: bam yao: qo" ra" kheim: so' aya: re nhag' madag gelo:- yao: bam yao" jo, qo shapye' to: co' ko" ra" mug: lagyo: jham re myid: beim: ge,- Yao: bam dao: phyid' qhug' nae" ba na ngad: ra" ai: qi" qhang: ra" ba na: qhid' mae" Mao" So wa o: pyae mug: cad' yo mae yao: bam re apyad ato mabyid: ra" jao co: jham: yang taui" to" ra" .
Sodom we' Gomora vogaung: re we' ai: nhae mae" vogaung: jham re myid: beim: ge, . Ai: vogaung: jham mae" vobyu qe wa ai: mug: lagyo: qe we' dakhyo: kad' gemung: gaung sho: gin tho' mau" zo" khyo re cao" yang: shad' nghung" ra" khyo" gaung sho: jho" zam" ako" . Byu alhab' mo, re de: de: za: ta" peim: byid' ra" khyo" yao: bam wa apyad ato de; nga" na: ra" myikhyeim" mae qobo dae kham zo" ako" .
Ce: Mao" So re malam: ra" mo, re: aibam we' dakhyo: ngad gemung: yao: bam myao: ra" qhu" lho jham: yang yao: bam yao" gaung re qobo shad' lhoe" nhao: ako" . Yao: bam wa Mao" So: kheim: so' re maphug' makhyad' kad' gemung: mug: tho' mae" phungbao qi" qhang: ra" mo, re roe" pye' ako" .
Mug: Lagyo: au: jhaung Mikhae lhao" re: ceru: makad' ngad: ra" . Moshe nho: mao gaung re khag' yu ang: ra" khyo we' sin: yang: Satan we' jho" myan" myo: ko" au:- Mikhae wa ai: Satan re maphug' makhyad' dao: we' dao: mavae" phyid' lo:- Asang nao re qeim vashao: ga: za: ata" ra" .
Ngadqere: ai: byu jham wa yao: bam maba: gyo" ra" ja: alhab' re maphug' makhyad' ta" phoe: pye' ako" . Gug' nyhug' lae" jham we' dakhyo: azhao: mae" ba gau myid: yang ba: yu: ra" ja: jham: yang yao:- yao: bam re jeim" lo" nhao: ra" .
Yao: bam byuxa: vaqoe, qhug' vageshao:- yao: bam wa Ka-in nho: khyo re cao" byaug: avako" . Ngaui qhang: mathao mae yao: bam wa Balam nho: shad' lhoe" ra" qobo re boshad' lhoe" ako" . Yao: bam wa Kora we' dakhyo: geim lau to" gemung: yao: we' dakhyo: yao: bam jeim" lo" byaug: ako" .
Yao: bam wa qho' gyaug myid mabo lo:- zo: shaug' pyo" na: ru we' naonhaung" zam" khug: ra" zo: shaug' poe mae yao: bam wa maca' majhad' we' dakhyo: boe" ako" . Yao: bam wa yao: bam yao" qhid' mae" za: myid mo, ngad: ako" . Yao: bam wa la: yang hug' tao" lo" mung: mug: qid mabo: ra" nhag' qhid' thaui: we' dau: ako" . Yao: bam wa xaung: thug' qid mae lhao" re: ashi: mazaui:- agyi: mae" phan" pye' yang: jhag' shid: ra" sag' jam: gae we' dau: ako" .
Alao" yao: bam wa panglai: mae" qu" gyaug sho' ra" bang: lhung" we' dau gemung:- bang: lhung" qid nyab we' dakhyo: yao: bam: aqho' aqhid mung: ra" lo, mau" re qhu" byid' ako" . Yao: bam wa Mao" So yao: bam re no; thao" ra" mug: cad' khug mae apyad ato jo, qo jaung: to: byid' ra" su" lae" qin" ra" kyi jham we' dau: ako" .
Adam mae" khyaug' qae" ein: qae" mae" Enog wa ce: khyo we' sin: yang:- Asang wa yao" gyang" lho" ra" mug: lagyo: ajham ataung myo: sho' we' joe" li" mung:
byu alhab' mo, re dao: kho' li" nae" . Byu alhab' mo, re yao: bam zaui: so" lo: ra" Mao" So re malam: ra" lo, mau" jham: qhid' mae" we' Mao" So re malam: ra" qobo jab qe Mao" So re jhau: shad' ko" ra" gyo" gyaug gyo" lhaung sho' ra" dao: jham: qhid' mae" dao: phyid' li" nae" ga: ganhae" gaco' mae" lapa pa: to" ra" .
Ai: byu qe wa khonhae" re: nyhung mung: su gaje qere qobo vhin: ako" . Yao: bam wa yao: bam yao" makhyang" ra" gaung sho: shab' ra" khyo re cao" ra" mo, ngad: ako" . Yao: yao" gaung re phug mo, ngad: ako" . Yao: yao: o: rure qo" yu nae" qhid' mae" su gaje qere khin" zo: mo, ngad: ako" .
Ngadqere: nga" ba nam qe we"- Ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu nho: lagyo: qeyang ganhae" naonhaung" re ta" kyo" to: ko" ra" dao: re myid: beim: ge,
yao: bam wa lo" thao" ra" ba na mae naonhaung" re jung" gaui: ra" mo,- yao: bam: Mao" So re malam: ra" kao bau myid: o: ra" khyo re cao" ra" mo, thug' li" genae" ga: naonhaung" re ta" to" ako" .
Ai: byu qe wa phung: jho" kho' nhao: ra" mo,- azhao: mae" yao: bam yao" gaung sho: kao bau myid: o: ruyang eib khang" ra" qao: mae na mo,- Byo re maqo" yu: ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Naonhaung" kam" wa- nga" ba nam qe we"- naonhaung" gyang" lho" thao" ra" lam khug: ra" khyo mae naonhaung" yao" gaung re qi" qhang: li" sho' xo' yang: zao: to' na ge,- Gyang" Lho" Byo: qam: so' mae ngha mung: akyu" mho' ge,-
ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu yao" nhag' khyag' shogu: ra" myid khyo" yang naonhaung" re apyad ato: kaoso' byid: nae" rure myid khyo" yang myid: lao" na zo" re" Mao" So: jhid' de; myid khug mae naonhaung" na: jo, ge, .
Aug' o: myid bo: ra" mo, re nhag' khyag' shogu: myid qhu" byid: ge,-
su gaje qere myi: mae" she: khyad' thug' yu yang: khyad' yu ge,- gaje re gyaug myid bo: ra" nhag' khyag' shogu: ra" myid qhu" byid: ge,- ngadqere: yao: bam: gaung sho: shab' ra" qobo lo, mau" yang abe, alhau: kad' pye' ra" yao: bam: mai bau: jham re ca' nghang" pye' ge, .
Naonhaung" re magyang: lang" lo" nhao lo: qo" zaui" zag: ci byid: mung: qobo made, lo: ngaui bau: ngaui yao we' yao" phungbao bao: ra" qhid' kheim: khyo qo" jhui" vao ye" ra" yaug-
date: za: ngad: ra" ngonhaung" khyad' yu: Asang Mao" So wa ngonhaung" Asang Yesu Khristu khyo" yang phungbao- eib: ra" phung: dagu"- qam: so' we' kheim: so' ganhae" gaco' mae" re:- ana" re:- apyad ato khonhae" re: bo: jo, vashao: wo" . Amen
Ce: mugsug' paug' wa Yesu Khristu re Mao" So: yang qhu" byid' ra" boe" ra" khyo jham re tung" xam" to" ra" mugsug' ngad: ra" . Mao" So yao: re ce: qhu" lho byid' ru wa mataung" myao" re boe" ca" ra" khyo jham re Mao" So: daui daui mo, re qhu" byid: nae" qhid' mae" byid' ra" qhu" lho ngad: ra" . Khristu wa yao" daui daui yaug Yohan jhao" yao" mug: lagyo: re nhao: ke' ra" khyo" yang ai: qhu" lho jham re ba nhao: ra" .
Aimung: Yohan wa yao: the' myao: ra" gu: alhab' re ce: mugsug' mae ta" to" ra" . Ceru wa Mao" So mae" joe" li" ra" mungdao: we' Khristu yang yao: re qhu" byid' ra" dangman" ra" khyo we' sin" ra" lau dao: ngad: ra" .
Ce: mugsug' paug' re nghe' ra" yaug wa ngaui lho" ra" . Amung: ce: lapa: mungdao: jham re tae" gyo: mung: ce: mugsug' paug' mae tung" to" ra" mungdao: re phug' cao" ra" mo, wa ngaui lho" ko" ra" wo" . Pe"mung: ga"re ai: khyo jham alhab' boe" li" nae" yo, khyin: wa jhao" li" ava" .
Ngo Yohan wa Asia mung" mae" phung: nhad' lam: khyo mugsug' tung" ke' ra" . Ana" pyad- lai: lo: ra" pyad- joe" lo nae" pyad mae na: jo; ra" Mao" So mae" re:- yao" kho: kham tao" qhid' au: mae na: jo; ra" byo nhad' yaug mae" re:-
Amung: jhaug' zaug: ra" sagse: kham yaug- shid: rumae" sao qhid' daui: to" li" ra" yaug- mug: myid dao mae" kho: kham jham re eib: ra" yaug re:- ngad: ra" Yesu Khristu mae" re:- nhag' myan" ra" jeju we' ngaui pyo: yaug yo: ru wa naonhaung" we' daga" ngad: jo, vashao: wo" . Yao: wa ngonhaung" re jhid' de; yang: yao: shid kham: byid' ra" khyo" yang ngonhaung" nho: qobo jham mae" loe, beim nhao mung:-
Yao: yao" Pho" Mao" So re caung da" byid: nae" ra" mung"dan: nho: khinjaung ngonhaung" re toe' yu: ra" . Yesu Khristu mae phungbao we' qam: so' apyad ato byang" jo, vashao: wo"- Amen .
Qu" ge, Yao: wa jham thaui: dao mae zaung yang: joe" li" na: ra" . Yao: re thug' kyao" ra" mo, bobo mung: yaug khao: ngo" wa yao: re qhug' myao: li" genae" . Mug: myid dao mae" byumyu" alhab' wa yao" mathao mae kaug' qhui: li" genae" . Airu: boe" li" vashao: wo"-
Ngo wa sao qhid' we' lo" thao" yaug ngad: ga:- ana" pyad- lai: lo: ra" pyad- joe" lo nae" pyad mae na: jo, yaug ngad: ra" qam: bo: thao" ra" Asang Mao" So ta" ra" .
Ngo wa yao" Mung"dan: byu qe kham zo" ra" qug: khai: khyag' qhui: rure zang: qhao" kham zo" rumae Yesu thao cao" yaug khyo" naonhaung" we' daga" bokham zo: yaug naonhaung" mao: nhaung: pho" Yohan ngad: ra" . Ngo wa Mao" So: mungdao: re we' Yesu yang qhu" byid' ra" dangman" ra" khyo re ta" hau" kyo: byid' ra" mau" mathao mae Pad Mu gagyo: kao" mae dai" nha: to" ru qhug' ra" .
Asang: ba na mae ai: Byo: yang ngore jaung" mung:- labo" thoe we' dau: ra" thoe qi: nga" nhaung thao" mae jhau: na: rure ngo the' gyo" .
Ai: thoe qi: wa Nao the' myao: rure tung" mung:- ai: mugsug' re Ephesu- Samurna- Pergamum- Thuatira- Sardi- Philadelphia- Ladoki we' ce: vogaung: jham mae" phung: nhad' lam: khyo vhin: ke' wa,- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngo re jhau: na: ra" yaug khag' ngad: rure qu" nae" qhid' mae" ngo lhang: qu" ke' re qhang myikaug' tao" nhad' lam: re we' aijham: agaung: mae xao su byu we' dau: ru dayaug re ngo the' myao:-
Yao: wa khyid vo: joe" ra" bau: qhang re ve; ci mung:- yao" qao gao mae qhang pye: phyid' cui: cui" ci: ra" .
Yao" xae wa sug' gug we' dakhyo:- mangad: lao" gyu: we' dakhyo: phyu: ra" . Amung: yao" myo, jid' wa myi: we' dakhyo: de; ra" .
Yao" khyid wa kyang" pye' mung: boe; jhad' to" ra" gyid: ne we' dakhyo: bao mung:- yao" thoe wa qid coe: gyo" thoe we' dakhyo: ngad: ra" .
Yao: wa yao" lo,yo shad' mae kyi nhad' ce' re zaui" ci mung:- yao" nhad' mae" shid' shad' geim" tho' ra" shae thug' li" ra" . Yao" myo,khung: wa ba khaung tau: au: mae" ba we' dakhyo: zho: jo; ra" .
Yao: re ngo myao lao"- yao" khyid qao: mae sushid we' dakhyo:- gyang: lang" jo; byaug: ra" . Ailao" yao" lo,yo lo, nga" dao mae kai: byid: mung:- Dagyaug wa,- ngo wa sao qhid' yaug we' lo" thao" yaug ngad:- ga: ta" ra" .
Ngo wa kao so' daui: na yaug ngad:- ngo wa shid va"- ngadqere: ana" wa apyad ato kao so' daui: na yaug ngad va" . Ngo wa shid: rure we' movo: mug: re eib: ra" kheim: so' qo" yaug ngad: ra" .
Airumung:- nao myao: ra" ja: jham rere:- ana" jo; ra" ja: jham we' thao re boe" li" nae" ra" ja: jham alhab' khyo re tung" to: wa,-
Nga" lo,yo lo, mae nao myao: ra" kyi nhad' ce' we' qhang myikaug' tao" nhad' lam" nho: no; thao" ra" lajheim: wa ceru: ngad: ra" . Ai: kyi nhad' ce' wa phung: nhad' lam" nho: mug: lagyo: jham ngad: ako" . Amung: ai: qhang myikaug' tao" nhad' lam: wa Phung: nhad' lam: ngad: ako" .
Ephesu vogaung: phung" nho: mug: lagyo: re ceru: tung" ke' wa,- ce: mungdao: wa yao" lo,yo lo, mae kyi nhad' ce' re zaui" ci: ra" yaug- qhang myikaug' tao" nhad' lam" agaung: mae su" lhau: ra" yaug mae" mungdao: ngad: ra" .
Nao kad' ra" ave, lo,mau" re ngo ba: . Nao khoqhi" qam: ke' yang: mau" zaui" lo: rure re:- nao khoqhi" sho' nhag' lam: qhang zang: kham: lo: rure re:- ngo ba: . Makhyang" ra" byu qere nao maqo" zang: kham: rure re:- lagyo: mangad' ra" mo, lagyo: ga: ta" ko" rure ca: qu" mung:- yao: bam mhug' ra" khyo myao: thug' li" nhao: ra" khyo rere: ngo ba: .
Nao wa zang: qhao" mung: nga" mathao mae qug: khai: kham zo: va" ru we' nao qam: magyug: ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: nao wa sao qhid' ngore jhid' de; ru we' dakhyo:- ana" nao ngore majhid' de, lo" ruyang qobo ceru ngo nao re vhin: ra" .
Amung: nao khovha" va: sho' gyo" lo" byaug va" rure myid: qu" wa,- ni" qobo jham mae" phaug' lo mung: nao sao qhid' kad' ru we' dakhyo: kad' wa,- ni" qobo jham mae" nao madam: phaug' lo re wa ngo nao jhao" li" mung:- ni" myikaug' tao" re yao" jo, qo mae" yu: pye' byid: nae" .
Ngadqere: Nikola thao cao" mo, re ngo nghang" ra" qhi" nao yao: bam re nghang" pye' ruyang khin" nae" khyo dalam: de; ra" .
Airumung: nao no: de; ngad: re wa Byo: yang phung: jham re ta" ra" dao: re tae" gyo: vashao:- Ngo wa aung doe; ra" mo, re Mao" So: khyae mae yaug: ra" kao so' sag' gae mae" ashi: re zo: nae" akhang" byid: nae" .
Samurna vogaung: phung" nho: mug: lagyo: re ceru: tung" ke' wa,- Ce: mungdao: wa sao qhid' we' lo" thao" yaug- shid mung: dam: daui: to" li" ra" yaug mae" ngad: ra" .
Ni" nho: qug: khai: jham re ngo ba: . Nao wa myaung sho: ngadqere: gaigai: yao: wa nao qo" rure ngo ba: . Yuda byu qe mangad: mo,- Yuda byu qe ngad: ga: ta" ra" mo; yang magai: ra" khyo" naonhaung" re ta" phoe: pye' byid' na ko" rure ngo ba: . Yao: bam wa Satan nho: phung: mae bobo mo, ngad: ako" .
Nao qhug' kham zo: nae" ra" qug: khai: jham: qhid' mae" dagyaug daci" wa, . Tae" gyo: ge,- Min: yui wa naonhaung" mae" damyo" re thaung: taung" lhaung" pye' ra" khyo" naonhaung" re jham" qu" li" nae" . Ni" nho: qug: khai: wa daxe ba myao" li" nae" . Shid sho' jhaug' zaug wa,- ailao" aung doe; aphug' jhaung qhu" khyo" nao re ngo kao so' byid: nae" .
Airumung: nao no: de; ngad: re wa Byo: yang phung: jham re ta" ra" dao: re tae" gyo: wa,- Aung doe; ra" mo, re shid' lhang ein: lhang shid: ruyang qo" zao" genae" mangad: .
Pergamum vogaung: phung" nho: mug: lagyo: re ceru: tung" ke' wa,- Ce: mungdao: wa shae su: shid' shad' geim" tho' ra" shae ci: ra" yaug mae" mungdao: ngad: ra" .
Nao khai: mae na: jo; rure ngo ba:- nao wa Satan" nho: tao" khau" jo; ra" jo, qo mae na: jo; ra" . Nga" nho: jhaug' zaug: ra" sagse: pho" Antipa wa Satan na: ra" jo, qo mae se' pye' qhug' ra" ayo, gyo: mae lhao" re:- nao ngore jhaug' zaug mung:- ngore lam khug: ra" myid re nao mashapye' ngad: ra" .
Ngadqere: nao re qobo vhin nae" khyo dajhid' zo: bo: ra" . Israel byu qere sulho re qhaug' byid' to" ra" zo: ve re zo: nhao nae" we' gaung sho: shab' ra" gintho' mau" zo" khyo re cao" nae" ju" phyo' ra" khyo" yang yao: bam re qobo shad' lhoe" sho' khoru: au: jhui" she nae" khyo Balag re mho" shid' byid' ra" Balam nho: mho" shid' khyo re phug' cao" ra" mo, damyo" naonhaung" phaung mae bo: ako" .
Ai we' dakhyo:- naonhaung" phaung mae Nikola nho: mho"zo: qe: mho" shid' ra" khyo re cao" ra" mo, bobo: ako" .
Ana" ni" qobo jham mae" dam: phaug' lo wa,- Airu: mangad: re wa nao jhao" ngo phyad phyad li" mung:- nga" nhad' mae" thug' ra" shae: yang ai: byu qere gye kad' li" nae" .
Airumung: nao no: de; ngad: re wa Byo: yang phung: jham re ta" ra" dao: jham re tae" gyo: wa, Aung doe; ra" mo, re nyham" to" ra" mana mug daqhae: ngo byid' nae" . Ngo wa yao: bam mae" yaug khao: ngo" re qo" khae: yu: ra" yaug mae" je yang: khag' re: maba: ra" mang sag' re tung" te' to" ra" ai: laug baui aphyu rere: byid: nae" .
Thuatira vogaung: phung" nho: mug: lagyo: re ceru: tung" ke' wa,- Ce: mungdao: wa yao" myo,jid' wa myi: we' dakhyo: de, mung:- yao" khyid wa boe; qhui: to" ra" gyid: ne we' dakhyo: bao: ra" Mao" So: Yao: Zo: mae" mungdao: ngad: ra" .
Nao pe" kad' rure ngo ba: . Ngo wa ni" jhid' de; myid- ni" nho: jhaug' zaug: ra" myid- ni" nho: mau" zo" we' ni" nho: zang: qhao" ra" myid re ngo ba: . Ana" nao zaui: so" na: ru wa nao sao qhid' re zaui: so" lo: ra" tho' je: rure ngo ba: .
Ngadqere: nao re qobo vhin nae" khyo ceru bo: ra" . Yao: yao" gaung re Mao" So: lagyo: ngad: ga: mhang" ra" ai: myiqe: Yezebe re nao zang: byid' ra" . Yao" nho: mho" shid' khyo khyo" yang nga" daui daui mo, re sulho re qhaug' byid' to" ra" zo: ve re zo: nae" gaung sho: shab' ra" gintho' mau" zo" re kad' genae" qhid' mae" khyonghung: nghung: nhao: ra" .
Yao" qobo jham mae" myid tha" lo nae" ayo, re ngo byid' to: ngadqere: yao: wa yao" gaung sho: shab' ra" gintho' mau" zo" mae" myid matha" lo nug ngad: ra" .
Airumung: ngo wa yao: re yab jaung: dao mae shapye' to: nae"- Aimae yao: we' daga" myi: shad' lao shad' ra" mo, qug: khai: khyag' qhui: ru qu" gyaug qu" lhaung: ru qhug' kham zo" li" genae" . Yao: bam wa yao: we' daga" kad' ra" makhyang" ra" lo, mau" jham mae" myid matha" lo ko" re wa ce: qug: khai: khyag' qhui: rure kham zo: nhao nae" .
Yao" mho"zo: qere re: ngo se' pye' byid: nae" . Airumung: ngo wa yaug khao: ngo" nho: myid: o: ra" khyo re we' kao bau myid o: ra" khyo jham re ba yaug ngad: rure phung: jham alhab' ba: li" genae" . Ngo wa naonhaung" mae" yaug khao: ngo" re yao: yao: zaui: so" lo: ra" lo,mau" re cao" yang: dam: tug' byid: nae" .
Ngadqere: Thuatira vogaung: mae dang: ra" mo, naonhaung" wa ai: makhyang" ra" mho" shid' khyo re macao" ko" ngad: ra" . Naonhaung" wa Satan" nho: no; thao" ra" nyham" to" ra" khyo ga: su gaje qeyang mhang" ra" khyo re mazhao: yu ko" ngad: ra" . Ngo naonhaung" re ta" ru wa naonhaung" dao mae qola: pe" ja: re: ngo makai: byid: nae" .
Ngadqere: ngo joe" li" sho' naonhaung" mho" zhao: yu: ra" khyo jham re tang za: naonhaung" zaui" zag: ci qo: ra" .
Aung doe; ra" mo, re we' ngo o ngaui: ra" mau" re xo' yang: kyab' sho' zaui: byid: nae" . Ngo wa yao: bam re byumyu" alhab' re eib nae" kheim: so' byid: mung:- ai: kheim: so' wa ai: mung"dan: jham re jo,to' zaung: bao" yang eib nae" we' zhogam: ug' jham re we' dakhyo:- aje, aman" be; kho' sin" pye' nae" kheim: so' yao: bam re ngo byid: nae" . Bo" myhung rere: ngo yao: bam re byid: nae" .

Sardi vogaung: phung" nho: mug: lagyo: re ceru: tung" ke' wa,- ce: mungdao: wa Mao" So: byo nhad' yaug we' kyi nhad' ce' qo" ra" yaug mae" mungdao: ngad: ra" . Nao pe" kad' na: rure ngo ba:- nao wa shid: jo, sho' ngadqere: daui: na: ga: mang qi" na: rure ngo ba:-
Airumung: beim: so" lo wa,- nao mae qo" jo, shi" ra" qam: so' bin sho' mathao" byaug shire qam: dam: pyang" yu wa,- pe"mung: ga"re nga" Mao" So: qhid' kheim: mae nao zaui: so" lo: ra" lo, mau" majab byang" shi" rure ngo qhug' myao: .
Aimung:- nao zhao: yu va" ru we' the' gyo" yu va" ja: re myid: beim: wa,- aire phug' cao" mung:- ni" qobo jham mae" dam: phaug' lo wa,- nao mabeim: so" lo ngad: re wa- khug' hab' we' dakhyo: ngo nao jhao" joe" li" nae"- ngo joe" li" nae" ayo, re lhao" re: nao maba nae" .
Ngadqere: Sardi vogaung: mae na: ra" mo, mae" damyo" wa naonhaung" yao" mai bau: jham re san san za: zam" ci: avako" . Naonhaung" wa mai bau: phyu ve; ci yang: ngo we' daga" su" li" genae" . Pe"mung: ga"re naonhaung" wa airu: kad' nae" man: qi" ra" mo, ngad: ako" .
Aung doe; ra" mo, wa ce we' dakhyo: mai bau: phyu qhug' ve; li" genae" . Amung: ngo wa yao: bam: mang jham re kao so' mugsug' paug' mae" mayu: pye' nae" . Nga" pho" we' yao" mug: lagyo: qe: qhid' kheim: mae yao: bam nga" byu qe ngad: rure de: de: za: ta" nae" .

Yao: wa Davi kham: thug' re sang yaug ngad mung:- ai: kham: re yao: phung" lao" khag' maqo" pyid' ngad: ra" . Amung: aire yao: pyid' pye' lao" re: khag' maqo" phung" ngad: ra" .
Nao pe" kad' rure ngo ba: . nao mae qam: so' dajhid' za: bo: rure ngo ba:- nao wa nga" mho" shid' khyo re cao" mung:- jhaug' zaug: rure Ngo ba:- ngo wa khag' re: maqo" pyid' ra" kham: ni" qhid' kheim: mae phung" to: va" .
Tae" gyo: wa,- Yuda byu re: mangad' ru Yuda byu qe ngad: ga: ta" ra" mo, ai: mhug' hab' qe ngad: ra" Satan" nho: byu qere re: ni" khyid qao: mae li" goe; gyo" nhao nae" . Amung: nao re ngo jhid' de; ra" khyo re yao: bam alhab' ba: li" genae" .
Pe"mung: ga"re nao wa nga" amyin" dao: re zang: qhao" yang: zaui" zag: ci: ava" . Amung: myidgaung dao mae" byumyu" alhab' re jham" qu" nae" mug: myid dao khyo joe" li" na: ra" qug: khai: ra" yo, khyin: mae" re: lhaug' zaung" gug: gam byid: nae" .
Ngo wa mataung" myao" lo: joe" li" nae" . Nao qo" rure gug: gug: za: zam" ci wa,- airulao" za: ni" nho: aung doe, jhaung qhu" re khag' re: maqo" lhad' yu genae" ngad: ra" .

Ladoki vogaung: phung" nho: mug: lagyo: re ceru: tung" ke' wa,- Ce: mung dao: wa jhaug' zaug mung: dangman" ra" sagse: ngad mung:- Mao" So: yang phan" to" ra" ja: alhab' nho: ajhaung ngad: ra" . Amen ga" ra" yaug mae" mung dao: ngad: ra" .
Nao pe" kad' lo va" rure Ngo ba:- nao wa angin" re: mangad:- alaung re: mangad: rure ngo ba:- nao wa angin"- mangad: lao"- alaung ngad: qa: we" .
Nao wa alaung re: mangad:- angin" re: mangad:- lam ai" ngad: ruyang nga" nhad' mae" nao re ngo phoe" pye' nae va" .
Nao wa jo,nho" qo"- na gai ye, gai:- ngo pe" maqo lo:- ga: ta" ra" . Ngadqere: nao wa sho: jhin mung: nhag' khyag' tho' ra" yaug ngad: rure nao maba ngad: ra" . Nao wa myaung sho: yaug- gaung pyad' yaug- myo, jid yaug ngad: ra" .
Airumung: nao jo, nho" qo" nae" qhid' mae" ngo mae" qhang gyang" vai: yu nae" qhid' mae" nao re ngo pha,jhi" byid: li" . Amung: ni" aqho' aqhid ngad: ra" gaung pyad' re go nae" qhid' mae" mai bau: phyu rere: naoyao" gaung re vai ve; wa,- nao myo, myao nae" qhid' mae" myo, mocid' xau rere: ni" myo, mae vai: gyad wa,-
Ngo jhid' de; ra" mo, alhab' re ngo wa qeim mung: qobo dae byid' ra" . Airumung: nhag' lam: to" wa,- ni" qobo jham mae" dam: phaug' lo wa,-
Tae" gyo: wa,- Ngo wa kham: mae ye; jo, yang: kham: ko' na: . Dayaug yaug nga" thoe re the' gyo: yang: kham: phung" byid' re wa Ngo wa yao" yham khug khyo vao ye: mung:- yao: we' daga" zo: shaug' nae"- yao: re: ngo we' daga" zo: shaug' li" nae" .
Ngo wa aung doe, va" rumung:- ana" nga" pho" nho: yao" zaung tao" mae ngo zaung: jo, va" ru we' dakhyo:- aung doe; ra" mo, re nga" zaung tao" nhae mae zaung nae" akhang" Ngo byid: nae" .
Nao no: de; ngad: re wa Byo: yang ai: phung: jham re ta" ra" dao: re tae" gyo: wa, .
Ai: thao qhu" lho dalam: mae mug: gaung: mung"dan: kham: dung: bung" jo; rure ngo myao: ra" . Qhid' phyao: ngo the' gyo" qu" ra" labo" myang thoe we' dau: ra" thoe wa Cekhyo do, lo wa,- thao phyao: boe" ca" ra" khyo Ngo nao re qhu" byid: nae"- ga: ngo re ta" ra" .
Dalhang: dae Byo wa ngo re vao: jaung" ra" . Mug: gaung: dao mae tao" khau" dalam: jo, mung:- ai: dao mae byu dayaug zaung: jo; ra" .
Yao" myo,khung: wa phug' de; ra" dan: lung we' Patamya laug we' dakhyo: bao mung: tao" khau" lhang" gam: mae Mya laugsin" anyhug sang yhao lhang" to" ra" .
Amung: ai: tao" khau" lhang" gam: yang: gatau tao" khau" shid' xe: byid lam: mae mai bau: phyu ve; ci yang: qhang ba maug: zhaung" ci ko" ra" lau: de, shid' xe: byid yaug zaung: jo, ko" rure re: ngo myao: .
Tao" khau" mae" lhe' cad' cad' ru- mug: dam: dam" ru- mug: gyug: gyug: thoe jham myang: thug' li" ra" . Tao" khau" qhid' au: mae Mao" So: byo ngad: ra" myidam nhad' dam de; nga" na: ra" .
Ai: tao" khau" qhid' au: mae bao tang" laug we' dakhyo:- gyang" ra" pad' tham: mo" datham: dang: jo; ra" . Ai: tao" khau" lhang" gam: yang: shad' khao: ngo" mae qhid' khyo- thao khyo myo,jid' za: ngad: ra" gug' nyhug' byid dau: na: jo; ako" .
Sao qhid' dau: wa khang khyi we' dau: ra" . Shid' dau: ein: dau: wa nung: jaung lo: we' dau: ra" . Sam dau: ein: dau" myo,khung: wa byu: myo,khung we' dau mung:- byid dau: ein: dau: wa dao" qin" ra" zeim baung: we' dau: ra" .
Gug' nyhug' byid dau" geim" dau: khao: ngo" mae daung khyaug' lam: lam: de; ako" . Yao: bam: gaung akhug taung gaung shad' myo,jid' za: byang" sho' de; ako" . Yao: bam wa myi" na" mathang mano: lo:- lai: lo" ra" pyad- ana" pyad joe" lo nae" ra" pyad mae qam: bo: thao" ra" Asang Pho" Mao" So wa Gyang" Lho"- Gyang" Lho"- Gyang" Lho" yaug ngad: ra" wo"- ga: nghaui"caung: na: ako" .

Lau: de, shid' xe: byid yaug wa tao" khau" dao mae zaung: jo, mung:- apyad ato khonhae" re: daui: na yaug: qhid' kheim: mae goe; gyo" yang: yao: re goe; pa" ako" . Yao: bam wa Yao: bam yao" ba maug: re tao" khau" qhid' au: mae khyad' khyo" to: mung:-
Ngonhaung" Asang we' Mao" So we"- Nao wa phungbao- nga:- qam: so' re khae: yu nae" man: qi" ra" yaug ngad: ra" wo"- Pe"mung: ga"re Nao wa cao jab alhab' re phan" to: yaug ngad mung:- Ni" myid o: ra" khyo" yang ai jham wa kao so' daui: na: jo, nae" akhang" qo" ako"- ga: ta" ako" .
Tao" khau" dao mae zaung: jo; ra" yaug: nho: lo,yo shad' mae mugsug' dang: dalam: ci: rure ngo myao: . Ai: mug sug' dang: wa shid' shad' geim" byang" sho' tung" to: mung:- dazid nhad' lam" yang thaung" to" ra" .
Amung:- qam: bo: thao" ra" mug: lagyo: dayaug wa dazid jham re qhid' pye' mung:- mugsug' dang: jham re phung" nae" khoyaug man: qi" ra" i?- ga: thoe qi: we' hug' ta" rure ngo myao: ra" .

Ai: thao- Yao Nau" wa daui: na: ra" gug' nyhug' byid dau: we' lau: de, qeyang lhang" gam" to" ra" tao" khau" agaung: mae ye; jo; rure ngo myao: ra" .
